review_body: I am currently a client at transform in the fulham branch, I decided to get laser hair removal as my skin type is fair and i have dark hair and thought it would work best for me. The first few treatments i started to see great improvement and less hair regrowth! But coming to the end of my sessions i have noticed patches where have been missed that are alot coarser than other areas. I also have fine hairs scattered about, according to transform's information you should have complete hair reduction after 6-8 sessions. This isnt the case for me, which is quite annoying after paying a hefty cost! That would be the main reason i would rate 3 stars, i would also say the fulham branch is quite lapsy dasy, on two occasions i turnt up to an appointment and hadnt been booked in from previous appointments. Also on times where they remembered to book me in they were often really bad with time keeping. I found myself waiting for 20 minutes at a time! Overall anyone thinking of undergoing laser hair removal at Transform i would do your research before hand!!
Stay well clear from this company.

review_title: Excellent laser hair-removal experience at Transform Glasgow
review_body: I have recently transferred to the "Transform Clinic" in Glasgow for laser hair removal treatment and cannot recommend the clinic enough for its (1) excellent customer service, care and expertise in laser hair removal; and (2) the excellent equipment. I've had previous experience at a different clinic with another laser that was rather painful (and time consuming) - whereas the "Harmony" laser machine at Transform has literally transformed my hair removal experience - it's painless, super efficient (much less time consuming!) and gives amazing results. While the machine is a great reason to consider that clinic, Marie, who operates it and does the consultation is a true professional with great expertise in consulting and treatment. Her outstanding care, knowledge and professional experience have truly made my hair-removal journey a breeze and I couldn't thank her more!!

Iv just had my 6 week post op check up and I couldn't be happier with my results, 1 ear stuck out more than the other so I was worried once it was done there would still be some symmetrical issues but there isn't, there actually perfect and I now love my ears and feel more confident and happier with life, worth every penny!! Thank you.

After my surgery Mr Sinha visited me again to see how I was getting on and to check that everything was how it should be, he also provided me with his personal number. I was diascharged and a few days later I received a call from Mr Sinha checking up on how I was recovering. Mr Sinha was very thorough and caring when it came to recovery, I have had multiple phone calls with him. I am very pleased with my results from surgery and am amazed at how neat my scarring is. Mr Sinha pays very close attention to detail when is comes to scars. I would highly recommend Mr Sinha to anyone who is looking for a very skilled surgeon with lots of knowledge and great kindness!

review_title: I used this clinic over a four year?�?
review_body: I used this clinic over a four year period and though I was pleased with the initial treatment,  there is something about the ?�� doctors?ѝ working there?��s which I find odd.  There is a very tense feeling, which I found rather odd and stressful  ?�� doctors?ѝ come and go and there?��s no aftercare to speak of.   The second time I was treated.  The ?�� doctor?ѝ who treated me informed me that what his previous colleague at the same clinic had done and whom had vanished and nobody could say where she was,! Had done to me was wrong and looked rather shocked.  He then treated me for �1000 which I had to go out to the reception and pay before the treatment was performed on me.  I have never been anywhere where one must pay before any cosmetic treatment.  I was told, the effect wouldn?��t be immediate as with the previous treatment,  but it would take a couple of weeks to show.  I waited with anticipation but after two weeks not much had improved or changed.  I called them and asked to see the ?�� doctor?ѝ who?��s number was given to me by him,  but was never available or returned my calls.  After going to the clinic and seeing him,  I was told to go back after a further week as I had some sort of reaction and my face was swollen.  He asked me to call him directly to his number and visit him at his office,  but he was never available then ether not did he ever returned my voice messages.  I was told by the clinic that if they needed to do some more treatment I would have to pay for it.  All in all I spent a �1000 for nothing and had to spend yet another �1000 elsewhere but this time the results have been amazing, the customer service and aftercare absolutely glorious! I will never be seen or give my money to Transform and their ?�� doctors?ѝ ever! ?�ɍ

Incredibly expensive and there is no aftercare. Told the surgeon I was unhappy with the results and was shoved off and have never heard from the company since. No aftercare although it?��s advertised and you pay for it.

review_title: Aftercare is disappointing but happy with the procedure

review_title: So from the beginning I have had abit?�?
review_body: So from the beginning I have had abit of a nightmare ,I had to stay in the hospital two days on my first breast enlargement due do my co-ordinater giving me false info and saying I could change my size on the day (surgeon wanted to see me again)..iv had my boobs done twice now due to not being happy and needed revision but now im in love with my second breast implants in a week post op now , my problem has been sorted and I can?��t say how good the admin and complaints team are they really keep you updated with all info and my revision was agreed so quickly which I was happy about and it was then booked in the following month .. also the nurses at the pines hospital are absolutely unbelievable!!!!! every nurse I had met both times are so lovely some of the nicest people I have met they really look after you and they go above and beyond for you, I can?��t thank them enough for what they did for me. Over all I do think it?��s a good company even though I have had to have two surgeries to get my final result I can?��t fault the company (it?��s been more the surgeons fault no one else?��s ) having to have surgery again due to no fault of my own I had to take a week unpaid of work which is abit of a shame as I lost a lot of money , paid my parter in a hotel in Manchester , petrol back and forth to appointments and to Manchester hospital , I have lost a lot of money �500+ which I?��m not happy about and transform basically said I signed a form saying there could be complications etc so they could not help with the costs I have lost. This is a big disappointment as I seen how helpful they have been so far I thought they would compensate at least half but obviously not . I would say see more than one surgeon I did get a bad vibe with mine he was quiet rude but I just went with it as he was the soonest available. When going in and saying I wasn?��t happy ect he just blamed me and shrugged his shoulders wasn?��t helpful at all! Staff are amazing surgeon not so amazing

review_title: My Transform experience it was a nightmare
review_body: I will write my full terrible nightmare of my experience dealing with Tranform at Manchester at another time but this is how it all started. I was conned by there false advertising in a well known glossy magazine hyping there new product Trilucent breast implants ohh yes I was assured that's what I was going to get I got all the way there paid my money and shortly after was told I would have to take cylicone or saline implants I was shaken and shocked, I said you assured me twice that you had them as advertised. Omg it got really scarey as the mood became irritated I was told ok you will have to find your own way home to Scotland. The pressure was unbearable the surgeon gave me a short time to think about it then came back..I had fasted from the night before as required I felt sick with hunger and was so thirsty. But my nerves were through the roof..how would I get home such a long way. He the surgeon returned saying have uou decided to get an alternative implant meaning cylicone or saline. He was not happy and the way he looked at me was not pleasant at all. I felt scared and helpless I just wanted to be home. In the end up I felt I had no choice it was horrible. I had to agree to take cylicone instead. I was left till 8 pm at night no tea no food feeling stressed and so hungry. That was only the start of a long nightmare that followed. I would never ever recommend Tranform to anyone. I will never get over that living nightmare!!

I finally decide to go through a breast Augmentation. After childbirth my breasts has never been the same, they lost it?��s shape and volume. I went to three different consultations with different clinics/surgeon, including Transform. The other 2 clinics did not meet my needs, so I decide to go ahead with Transform. Schedule second week in November 2018.

One week post op and I could not be happier with my experience from start up until now. When looking into Brest augmentation I decided I was going to have a consultation with Mr Frati, a lot of reviews I read said his bed side manner could be better and that he could be quite abrupt but I?��m glad I didn?��t let this put me off. I did not have one bad experience with him, very polite, told me exactly what he recommended which I followed his advice and I am so happy with the outcome. His work is amazing!

So I had breast uplift and implants, and a mini tummy tuck (which really I could not afford) but my confidence was so low I was supported by family to raise and borrow the money to allow me to do so. After spending around 13000 pound, I am left with a scar on my tummy which is certainly not aesthetically pleasing, similarly I have been left with breast implants that have encapsulated. Yes I was aware of the risks but believes due to additional insurance I paid I would be okay. As in the small print, I had my implants replaced with a different brand, then after 2nd encapsulation I had them replaced again during my tummy tuck surgery. The 3rd set of implants have again encapsulated. I went to see a different surgeon in transform who suggested after the 2nd attempt he would have suggested placing the implants infringed of the muscle instead as the risk for encapsulation would have been reduced. After the consult I went to see the advisor and asked if this could be done, she said this would cost me another 5and a half thousand, now bearing in mind I was already in nearly 12000 of debt I could not possible afford this, I was gobsmacked, I asked if I could just have the implants removed as I was worried for my health and they were painful, again I was told there wouldn't be a substantial cost for this procedure also, I was very upset and in a no win situation a shame I had no funds to have this done. Knowing my mental health issues and how upset I was I walked out of the room in tears and never even got so much as a phone call to see if I was okay, all they care about it your money. I tried to appeal this due to the pain I am in, but got no where. I am now left with a massively debt and breasts and tummy that look no better than before. Do not use them!!!!

review_title: I have had several rhino surgeries and?�?
review_body: I have had several rhino surgeries and they have made my nose worse off than it was at the start of coming to transform.  I am having difficulty breathing and can?��t smell anything at all on most days.  My current surgeon is excellent but I still feel cheated and have completely lost my confidence.  I hate looking at myself in the mirror or be in any pictures.  I would advise people to seriously not even consider the rhino at all.

review_title: Recently had a Breast Augmentation at?�?
review_body: Recently had a Breast Augmentation at the Transform hospital in Brentford. The service they delivered throughout the whole procedure was brilliant. The nurses that looked after me during my overnight stay were absolutely lovely and can't thank them enough for the care they provided. My surgeon was great though we only really had brief encounters but very nice man. My only downside is I'd hoped my breasts would have been a bit bigger as they pretty much look the same size just more projected. I kinda wanted a little more 'heeeyy'. They get smaller and smaller as the swelling goes down. But you can never really predict the final outcome with implants and am not letting this alter the service transform delivered. I'd highly recommend.
Fantastic results, very happy. Great staff and nurses. Fantastic after care.

review_title: Very  good care and aftercare I'm happy?�?

I?��m 23 and had a BA and Uplift (modified) with Dr Netri at The Pines Clinic Manchester at the begining of Oct. Due to weight loss I went from a E > A. I?��ve had a fantastic experience and the results are beyond my expectations. Dr Netri is friendly yet very professional and has a great eye for detail, taking onboard my concerns and what I wanted from the procedure. I?��m 2 weeks post op and my incisions are amazing practically no scars already. I regret not having it sooner!! I?��d recommend a look at his instagram.

review_title: I had a lower face and neck lift 2017?�?

review_title: pushy sales women thats all they are.
review_body: why is it that you have to speak to a sales person first before you see a doctor that is doing the job . I think its just to make sure you can pay for the treatment.these people are not trained in medical treatment. a lady call on my husbands phone and said that we need your own phone number not your husbands and when would you like it done will you you be wanting it done in the near future or will you wait a few months. I thought this was going to be a none pushing consolation . they just wanted to know when I wanted it and did I have the money. bad news for them I don't need credit and I don't need to speak with some sales woman and if you can't talk to my husband about it after all he is paying for it for me then I will find another company and not bother going to Birmingham to any meetings .

I was comparing reviews between MYA & Transform before enquiring about my surgery and transform seemed to have better reviews. I am very glad I booked in with the Brentford Riverside hospital and had my Consultation with Sabrina as she was friendly, very helpful and quick. She gave me a rough costing, and booked me in with the surgeon for a consultation 2 weeks later. Once seeing Dr.Nathan I decided to proceed as he was happy to operate. He was also straight to the point and friendly, very quick too. I then saw Sabrina again to confirm a surgery date and pay the deposit. Surgery was booked for 2 weeks later. Feeling nervous but very excited I was reading some bad reviews about transform once I had booked surgery this had me feeling a little nervous. Anyway the day has come for surgery and I?��m very excited - I received a warm welcome as I arrived at the brentford hospital from reception and greeted by my nurse who took me through to my room. They had items to get changed into  and done some

Amazing!

review_title: I had a few problems with appointment?�?
review_body: I had a few problems with appointment before surgery and the receptionist saying she had rang me to re arrange appointments when I knew that she had not. This is the only area I have had problems both times I have had an op.

review_title: Had lip fillers with Dr Asher Siddiqi
review_body: Had lip fillers with Dr Asher Siddiqi. Definitely wouldn't recommend! Once they have your money they really dont care. On my filler day whilst I was waiting with the numbing cream on I was telling Asher Siddiqi the results I wanted. However he stood there texting on his phone and completely ignored what I had said. He assumed I only wanted edging and no volume even though I had mentioned I dislike the edged look. After fillers it was quite obvious that too much filler had been placed in the top lip compared to the bottom and there was also more filler on the left side. On the top right side some filler had gone into my upperlip area. However Asher insisted its swelling and that it will resolve. 2 weeks later everything was exactly the same

Gyno surgery at pines hospital. Service is good. Appointments are hit and miss. On two occasions sat waiting for a good 20 minutes after appointment times. Friendly staff. Surgery day was great. Mr Netri has done a fantastic job would recommend to anyone. Nurses make you feel comfortable on the day and happy to answer any questions. Original price was high but managed to get 10% off (worth asking).

review_body: From day one everyone I saw was great. Always greeted with a friendly face... my surgeon was fantastic and my nurse was brilliant always felt I could ask anything would definitely recommend transform to anyone considering surgery you will not be disappointed .

absolutely appalling company. 2 years of complaining, 2 years of being fobbed off. went through the complaints procedure to be told to pay 3500 for more surgery. Their COMPREHENSIVE AFTERCARE I should have received I haven't. I have had second opinions to which all have said they aren't right to still be ignored. a warrenty I paid for, stands for nothing!!! im currently in contacted with watchdog, MEN newspaper and solicitors to see where I stand as transform have failed to comply with their side of the contract. AVOID this company at all costs. they scam you and ignore any issues that occur. more than happy to rush you into surgery taking 4500 off me. I have severe agonising pain in both breasts, to be told I have to pay for breast scan, and wait till middle to end of oct to see the surgeon as he isn't available!!! nothing but ignorance from this company

After leaving it a year, my hump of bone on the bridge of my nose was still the same, my bobble on the end was still big.
Had a brilliant experience from begining to end with transform. Will definitley recommend to friends and family if they ever want surgery.

review_title: I had Botox at Maidstone branch

Excellent service and staff!! Couldn't recommend it enough! If you thinking about breast augmentation don't think twice! You are in good hands :) I'm one week after my surgery, and I feel excellent. My boobs are symmetric and they have a good shape. I feel over the moon with them. I was in pain only for four days. The Clinic will give you everything that you need to make sure that you feeling comfortable and you recovering without any problems. Make sure that you follow each advice. Good luck to all of you! :)

review_body: I had Dr Ottaviani for Rhinoplasty and Ottoplasty in June 2016. Now that both have healed I?��m not happy with either. I had the bridge and tip of my nose operated on. The bridge is much better than before but the tip is awfully done. I don?��t feel like time and care was taken by the surgeon. My consultation with Dr Ottaviani was also really bad he rushed me and made my questions seem inconvenient. If it wasn?��t for the patient coordiantor talking me round and assuring me of his experience and qualifications I probably would have backed out of having the op and wish I had.

review_title: Transform Leeds - The surgery was fantastic but sadly the service was appauling
review_body: The surgery itself was fantastic.. everything else was appalling.. I paid for one of their bras .. they didn?��t even measure me bear in mind I was off my head on drugs at the time, and when I complained they would not reimburse me ..  I had to keep chasing them for follow up appointments.. I had to chase them for test results which took 11 MONTHS !!! Even then the surgeon had to chase them up while I sat in the appointment and insist they sorted it out .. when I asked to see the surgeon because I had a concern about my left breast it was over 2 weeks before I could see anyone .. the surgeon ordered a scan for me that he said the company would pay for as it was a clinical issue .. I had to chase them up about this and was told I would have to pay for the scan .. I challenged this and explained the surgeon said there would be no charge for the scan as there was a clinical need for it .. that was over 3 weeks ago and I?��m still waiting .. I have left messages to ask them to contact me to know when I will get an appointment through .. still have not been called back or had a letter with an appointment or been called to tell me that their is a problem .. it?��s been a month now .. Yet again I have had to call them chasing this and yet again I had to have the same conversation. I?��m worried sick.. basically they have had their money and now don?��t give a dame about me! Apart from the actual surgery (Mr Lim the surgeon has been fantastic) I?��m so disappointed with how this company has treated me .. to the receptionist HAZEL at the Leeds site learn how to take a message and pass it on to the correct person.. to the sales person at the Leeds site SINADE stop telling me ?��it?��s really not my job to do this?ѝ if it?��s not your job who?��s is it ? It?��s certainly ?��not my job?ѝ as a client to have to chase you multiple times for everything .. I AM SO DISAPPOINTED and UPSET with the service as it really has not been a service !!

My nurse Adi who was looking after me most of the day was lovely, she is amazing at her job and nothing was too much trouble. I cannot recommend my surgeon Mr Clarke and Transform as a company enough, my confidence is now through the roof after feeling self-conscious for so many years. Best thing I ever done.

review_title: I had my operation with transform?�?2 week ago
review_body: I had my operation with transform nearly 2 weeks ago and what can i say amazing experience, had my surgery at the pines they were so thorough from start to finish, made me feel very comfortable and at ease (every one was lovely and friendly also very professional) the food was great a wide choice as i was in over night for breast augmentation i was also checked on through the night with heart rate, my temp etc and always asked if i needed anything water, pain relief etc. the morning i was checked again by several and asked questions, given medication, then i received a few days later a phone call by the nurse to see how i was and few days later on to see her again in person to change bandages and i got to see the boobs for the first time i love them! in the next few days i will be back to have the bandage removed and to hopefully shower without a sports bra lol. but all in all amazing experience and fab after care!

All staff at transform are lovely and this is my second time using them.. my only problem was the stay at hospital, it was awful service.. but I am not sure these were transform employees.. I paid a lot of money and was not happy with my waiting times..
The nurses, surgeons and staff ensured that my experience at Transform was as comfortable as could be. Their care and skill was second to none.
Excellent staff and after care, would recommend this clinic to anyone

Great positive experience. From the moment I entered the building through to my surgeon all staff were polite professional and allayed any nervousness I had. They went through each stage with me answering all my questions and I had quite a few. I wanted to stay longer given the service I was receiving but I was only a day patient.!

Wish I had gone elsewhere if I?��m honest. 3 breast augmentations as I have bottomed out each time.. I have seen multiple friends who have had breast augmentations and not one have been as low sitting straight after surgery so my pocket seems to have been made too large and even though the extra surgeries have helped they have not fixed the issue. Each time I have had a consultation or review they have issues finding me on their system as instead of updating my patient records I seem to have been put in the system multiple times which shows poor organisation. I had a consultation with my surgeon again before Christmas to review my problem and he told me he?��s out of options and referred me to another surgeon. This is where it gets worse.. after my consultation with the new surgeon who gave me hope we could get me good results I was told he was going to speak to my original surgeon and get back to me with my options.. months of false promises to get a returned phone call each time I call, ignored emails I?��m basically now being ignored in hopes of going away! The only reason I?��m giving 2 stars is because after my first 2 inadequate surgeries they were great at communicating and the process was smooth to try and fix the problem, the reason I couldn?��t possibly give any more is the stress, unhappy results and unbelievable customer service I have received since. My advice do your research on the surgeon and make sure you don?��t get one who tells you ?��I don?��t know how to help anymore?ѝ after you have less than satisfactory results with not just bottoming out but one breast that slips to the side as you lay down, and if you do get a good surgeon I just hope you don?��t have to deal with the terrible customer service.
Could not recommend transform enough they are amazing. All of the staff make you feel so comfortable and talk you through every part of your procedure making you feel more at ease.

Had lip fillers which was a considered purchase as I?��m not rich. I was so excited as this is something I was desperate to get. I was rushed into the room with my friend (who was having Botox) was told we needed to be quick as there was someone else waiting and the lady doing the fillers finished soon. I trusted that I would look a better version of myself, I left looking as tho I?��d had a stroke. Uneven and I was told I had no top lip and should pay for more filler (having put the majority of filler I?��d paid for into my bottom lip which didn?��t need filler) I was told that they were uneven simply due to swelling, I thought fair enough..  I trusted what they said. I called after a week to say I was concerned about the fact they didn?��t look even.. I was told to wait again as they?��d still be swollen. Eventually after several weeks I got another appointment, I was told that my lips were uneven due to me having crooked teeth!! I was then informed for the bargain price of �180 (half of what I?��d originally paid) she would put that right for me. Ummmmm no thanks! My lips are symmetrical now so I can only assume she had no clue what she was doing, messed it up then tried to charge me to fix it! Unbelievable. Not even an touch of sensitivity or interest in my complaint. I took my money elsewhere having told everyone I can about the appalling service I received with transform.

review_title: Surgeon was great dr Simone, follow up crap
review_body: Surgeon was great dr Simone, but the after care once got home is terrible I got given wrong date before my op to see nurse week after my op they rang me and said I dint have an appointment so made me another one but had to wait another 5 days, which was ok for me as all ok but poor organisation and no follow up from transform staff or nothing no appointment given yet for 6 wk check up I'm just very disappointed with the after care

Excellent service throughout. Had a procedure I have been wanting for a long time. Couldn?��t have gone any better. My surgeon is amazing and I?��m so over the moon with my results even though it?��s only been 2 weeks and I?��m still swollen!!

review_title: Not long been home from my trip to The?�?
review_body: Not long been home from my trip to The Pines hospital in Manchester. I have undergone a breast reduction, with Ms Hadden as my surgeon. From the get go, every member of staff I met were lovely. I travelled down to Manchester on my own, and I couldn?��t have felt more at ease when getting prepped for surgery. From the receptionists, to the nurses, to the aneasthstist, I can?��t thank them enough for their excellent service and manner. Hardly any waiting around, quick and effiicient administration of medication, and delicious food. Couldn?��t recommend Transform enough. Just so excited to see the results when I get my dressings changed on Tuesday!

review_title: I felt I was listened to
review_body: I felt I was listened to,  had all my questions answered in full,  got exactly what I asked for. The care and service from the hospital team was excellent. Highly recommend transform.

review_title: Finally getting the care and surgery I deserve!
review_body: I can?��t thank everyone enough, I had BA (breast augmentation) and I love my look! I had already previously had this op behind the muscle and at the size 325cc I decided I wanted to go bigger and infront of the muscle, my surgeon told me the sizes I could go from 650cc to 800cc along with giving my other options of a fat transfer or a lighter implant (I would have needed to go somewhere else for this special lightweight implant) this told me from day one they weren?��t wanting my money they care and would advise all options even ones that would have meant they would have lost my business. I went to Dolan park for my surgery and the place is beautiful! The staff are great and everyone new exactly what was going on. I can not say this for my previous surgery and surgeon, this whole experience has shown me that my old surgeon (not transform) did not give me the 5* experience I deserved! Would I recommend transform? ... I couldn?��t recommend it enough!

Just over a week since my breast enlargement. So pleased with the result. Really good experience from first contact through to surgery. Rachel my patient co-ordinator at Southampton who I bombarded with questions via phone and email right through to the polish lady who held my hand in theatre (Sorry didn?��t catch her name)

review_title: Absolutely over the moon with my 'new'?�?
review_body: Absolutely over the moon with my 'new' eyes.
Excellent staff and Surgeon. Couldn?��t do enough. Food great too.

I have had the best journey with them and I wouldn't of picked a different company if I was to do it again! The staff are so friendly and welcoming they will help you with any questions you have! They kind of turned into my family a little as they would sit there and listen to any worries or anxiety you had over your procedure! My surgeon was Dr netri, he has done an amazing job! I was worried about having a scar over my tattoo and he managed to avoid it and still do the procedure. My new boob's are amazing iv never felt more myself! I'm only 1 week post op and I have no pain and the incisions are so perfect and neat you wouldn't even tell they were there. I would recommend to anyone who is looking to have plastic surgery to go to transform!! And what's best is a free consultation so you can get to know the company and your surgeon before you pay for anything!

review_title: I?��m having a great experience with transform undergoing breast augmentation
review_body: I?��m having a great experience with transform so far on my journey, they are professional yet friendly and welcoming and I will and have recommended them to family and friends!

5 star Service. I was made to feel comfortable, relaxed and in safe hands. Any questions I had were properly answered. Every member f the transform team were friendly and informative. I would recommend friends and family to Transform. This is my 2nd time with them and both experiences have been 1st class.

review_title: A wonderful group of professionals in?�?
review_body: A wonderful group of professionals in Brentford, especially Anna (the nurse) I would highly recommend Transform to anyone who wanted cosmetic surgery.
Everyone was absolutely amazing with me!  Made me feel  welcomed!  I would definitely use them again!  Thank you so much!

review_title: Superb service from start to finish and?�?
review_body: Superb service from start to finish and beyond. Would highly recommend.

review_title: I would recommend this company to?�?
review_body: I would recommend this company to anyone I have a great experience and all the stuff are very nice.

Very professional from the first consultation throughout. Made to feel at ease and reassured by everyone- always on hand to answer any questions. The surgeon was amazing and explained the whole procedure well. Felt like I was in safe hands with my life changing decision and would not hesitate to recommend to anyone!

I have had a very good experience with transform.  My initial consultation was organised with a surgeon as they took into consideration how far I needed to travel to get to the clinic.  This means that from the start I had a consultation that was tailored to me.  The staff were all lovely and accommodating.  I have two consultations with the surgeon before the surgery was booked and was offered another one before the surgery if I wanted it.  I was told that I was welcome to call or email with any questions I had in regards to the procedure and what was included in the treatment both pre and post surgery.  The surgeon did a fantastic job, and the nurses in the hospital were all very friendly and warm.  The only issues I had personally was organising my post op appointment with the nurse as I moved shortly before my surgery and was closer to another clinic and had just a little bit of trouble re-booking my post op appointment with the nurse, but the staff were all great in helping me sort the issue.

review_title: Caring professional staff made the experience much easier than anticipated!
review_body: Every single member of staff was caring, thoughtful and really understanding. Very professional and experienced medical staff who put you at ease from start to finish. Felt well looked after from the moment I arrived and wouldn't hesitate to recommend this clinic to anyone. I've just arrived home so not sure on the results yet but so far I am very pleased!

review_title: Transform were very professional and attentive.
review_body: Transform were very professional in all my appointments but also very friendly and reassuring and when a problem arose it was dealt with very quickly and very satisfactorily. They are very attentive from the first meeting through to the final follow up post surgery. I would highly recommend Transform.

Over an hour late no apology, no greeting or acknowledge of me even coming into his room, sat on his phone for a good 10 mins to the point it was awkward ...me and my friend looking at each other wondering what was going on! Then still not looking at me started shuffling through papers , asking me the same questions I had filled out in the forms waiting (so clearly couldn?��t even be bothered to look at my paper work) he couldn?��t be bothered with me at all it was like I was waisting his time not coming in to potentially put 5grand plus , and my face in his hands!! He?��s posed with celebs Iv now researched he hadn?��t even done the work, be very wary ! The only genuine ?��hidden?ѝ reviews is RealSelf that keep deleting my review although they want others to not have bad experiences & another girl that had her nose collapse !! Iv seen he?��s caused so many problems  telling them it?��s fine , please guys & girls do your research don?��t be fooled by the fake celeb posts :( I?��m so glad it was such a bad consultation as I feel Iv dodged a massive bullet, and want others to do the same!!
Excellent service and care throughout consultations, during treatment and aftercare

review_title: It was an easy process and the surgeon?�?
review_body: It was an easy process and the surgeon understood the look that I wanted to achieve.

thought they was absolutely brilliant until the day I paid in full and then the operation needed redoing, ever since then they was rude, didn?��t want to help at all. Wouldn?��t recommend them to anyone purely for how rude they are once you?��ve paid.
very happy with the professional service.

I was very nervous on the day of my surgery but everything went very smoothly and I had no reason to worry. My admission time was 7:30am as I was a day case, the nurse took me to my own private room which I didn?��t expect, I thought I would have been on a shared ward. She took my observations, I was supposed to be first on the list but was held back 2 hours due to having a high blood pressure reading, I think this was probably due to nerves. Once my blood pressure had returned to normal the anethesist came to go through some questions with me, then I met Dr Frati who drew out my markings ready for theatre. Everyone was very kind and caring, I went down to theatre at 10:25am so I didn?��t have to wait very long, I?��m also very scared of needles but the anethesist and the team were brilliant and made me laugh to take my mind off it, although I didn?��t even feel the needle go in. Before I knew it I?��d came round from surgery and felt like I?��d had the best sleep ever. I was sore but not in too much pain it was more discomfort, and a tight feeling. I was moved back to my room and had my bacon sandwich and rested for a few hours whilst the nurses took my observations frequently. At around 4pm Dr Frati came to see me and ask how I was doing, I thanked him for giving me my new boobs, then at 5:30pm my drains were taken out and I was given my antibiotics and painkillers to take with me, then I was discharged at around 6pm. I?��m very pleased with how my surgery day went, and the staff were so polite and helpful, and it all went smoothly as I could?��ve hoped for. I would also like to say thank you to Dr Frati for being an amazing surgeon and giving me the breasts that I?��ve wanted for so many years! Life changing experience. Xx

The consultations were extremely quick with not giving any added information unless I asked. I had to phone up to book my own pre and post op appointments. The day of the surgery the nurses were amazing however I left feeling a little bit un easy. I wasn't told that I needed to sleep at a 45 degree angle or whether I could shower or not I had to look all these things up online. All in all I chose this place as I had heard amazing things about the surgeon who didn't dissapoint and I am happy with the results.

I had my surgery yesterday and am already happy with the results (as far as I can see). The surgery day itself was so smooth, the nurses and staff make you feel so at ease and inform/update you constantly so you feel safe. I was obviously nervous leading up to it but had nothing to worry about! The hospital is lovely and clean, and the rooms are nice and kitted out.

review_title: This is my third procedure with?�?
review_body: This is my third procedure with Transform having had breast aug and rhinoplasty previously. I'm now 3 days post-op for my second breast aug (nothing wrong with the first, just been in a while and wanted a change) which was with Mr Mahdi on this occasion.
Lovely staff friendly and helpful,
I have only recently had my procedure, so I can?��t comment on the final results yet, however, what I can comment on are :

review_title: I had the best experience at Transform?�?
review_body: I had the best experience at Transform from the moment I arrived to the moment I left. The nurses were outstanding with their care and attention. The whole experience went smoothly, calmly and I genuinely couldn?��t fault anything. Dr Frati is an amazing surgeon and was very lucky to have him operate on me.

Amazing staff, they were all so kind and lovely. I feel as if I have been treated like a princess here, I had a breast reduction with Dr Dario Rochira and I?��m overwhelmed with happiness from the results. I would definitely recommend going here, my first consultation was April 3rd and my surgery was booked in for 22nd May! I?��ve been wanting this surgery for over four years. It?��s life changing, I was not expecting to be this happy and for my stay here to be so relaxing.

review_title: I had Breast Augmentation and chose to?�?
review_body: I had Breast Augmentation and chose to go with Mr Nathan! He met me at the hospital before my op and immediately calmed me down and put my mind at ease. He was friendly and confident in what he was doing. He spoke with me again straight after surgery and told me ?��we did good!?�� Even half asleep I was still very comfortable with him looking after me. The hospital was beautiful, staff were friendly and would go above and beyond the duty of care. Rachael who took care of all my appointments and discussed finance options was fantastic and answered 100?��s of questions I had without it ever being a problem! I loved my whole experience with Transform and love my new amazing breasts even more! Thank you so much xx

I made an appointment for today 19/05/18 two months ago for a consultation in Maidstone. I arrived 10 minutes early but there was no one there. I waited half an hour in case they we?��re stuck in traffic or something. I checked to make sure it was definitely today and it was. I had an email and text confirmation. I spoke to a lady on the phone in Manchester who couldn?��t apologise enough. It took me half an hour to get to the clinic, I wish I didn?��t waste my time. I will definitely be going elsewhere. I should?��ve read previous reviews about how rubbish this company is. Will not recommend to anyone!

I'd like to thank Mr Antonacci and his team from Edinburgh clinic for a very proffesionsl approach to my rhino plasty and septic correction. High level of consultations before operation and great care taken in Stirling clinic during and after procedure makes me 100% satisfied. Thank you very much for thorough and professional care.
Great staff, very friendly and made you feel at ease throughout the whole procedure.

review_title: Waiting over 7 weeks and probably more for my �350 deposit refund!!
review_body: Went to transform to plan for a rhinoplasty, consulted and planned to have my surgery in between quitting a job and starting in another department. In order for recovery time etc I took 5 weeks off. I paid my �500 deposit to secure the bed in the London hospital and paid for a hotel the night before so I could be there prompt and early. Then I had my pre op assessment which was absolutely terrible. The nurse was unapproachable and I was actually nervous to state I had eczema which is a minor condition. When I interrupted to admit I had mental health problems in the past which was related to other issues (nothing to do with my nose, she looked absolutely disappointed and like she couldn?��t be bothered to deal with the case. My friend who was next to me even pinched my thigh as they saw my disgusted face and then when leaving the appointment my friend said don?��t worry, this is all for your op so you?��ll be in safe hands. Well two days before the op the nurse rang me to say the op is cancelled as the surgeon is not happy that I am mentally fit for surgery. He also apparently stated that I need a PSYCHIATRIC REVIEW to clear me of any mental health issues and to wait six months before I can consider a rhinoplasty. I went to my doctor to ask for a letter to state I had not seen them for three years regarding mental health issues and my surgeon still did not accept this letter. My gp also stated that she was most definitely not going to refer me to a psychiatrist just for them to say I?��m well. All my reasons were clear of why I wanted one and also he did not call me personally to cancel the operation, he had to tell others to tell me. I then asked for my �500 deposit back on 27th of March to which I was told �150 will be kept for pre-operation fees despite not having an operation. And I am still waiting on the �350 I am suppose to receive and it?��s the 18th of May 2018! I cannot contact the number of whoever has my money! It?��s a risk to go with them in all honesty. I am now left with a lack of �500 and that unemployment gap that I took for this surgery certainly isn?��t helping my financial situation. Give me my money back!

DO NOT USE. No concept of customer service whatsoever. I had a breast augmentation done here in November 2017, which left me with uneven breasts and completely covered in stretch marks (which have now scarred) I asked for help and advise as I was disgusted with how they looked, but just repeatedly got told ?��there?��s nothing they can do?��. It is now 8 months since my surgery, and I am yet to see my surgeon as he has been ?��ill?��. Every month I am told he will be back next month, but clearly he will not be returning. I wish I never had this operation done as I had it for my confidence and now I have to cover up more than before due to how awful they look. After speaking to other people who used transform I found that their customer service and complaints process is just truly shocking and I would not recommend this surgery to anyone.

Transform Norwich clinic and Riverside hospital in Brentford have truely changed my life I've never had any boobs was picked most of my teenage years and still as a adult well  not anymore !!! Thank you to cherry and her team and to Mr sinah I am finally a woman at last I will never forget wat you have all done for me I am so so happy xxxxxx was nervous getting to the hospital to have my breast enlargement but the staff at Riverside are so kind and amazing felt at ease all the way through from five weeks ago enquiring about a breast enlargement to now two days post op so quick no Hassel over and done with you are amazing people best wishes Jessica xxxx

review_body: I went here first with no idea what to expect, I went to the one in Edgbaston, place looked ok nothinking special, the receptionist had no idea what was going on which wasn?��t the best starts. Saw my surgeon he didn?��t even look up off his phone when I walked in, it wasn?��t until I sat down he acknowledged me. I voiced my concerns but they was brushed off. I then went to see the consultatant  she literally just asked if I was going to pay deposit she hadn?��t even sized me, I didn?��t have any more information or advise to make me feel comfortable I was going for the right shape and size, I was shocked. review_title: I was that person that read all the bad reviews...don?��t!

The only down side was the change over of staff in the morning before I was discharged no one really cared I was still there and didn?��t come to discharge me I had to ask if I could go no one checked me over or told me anything other than a man that gave me my tablets and told me when to take them.
