user_review_name: Tanya. S. Bartlett/ Managing Director - British Voice Over UK
review_body: I was a patient with Transform 20 years ago and I have been blessed as have never had a single problem in all those years.  I returned back to them recently for a procedure as I knew how professional they are. I knew I would be in safe hands. My surgeon was Mr Nathan and he is a brilliant surgeon and has a very honest approach to everything. It?��s very evident that he has your best interests at heart. Annie at the clinic is absolutely lovely. I remembered her from previous years.  Rachel has been very helpful throughout. Dr Angelis my anesthetist was amazing!  All the staff at the Riverside Hospital were absolutely faultless.  They all go the extra mile. Lovely people.  Would highly recommend Transform. There?��s good reason why I?��ve now been a patient of theirs twice.
I had all my consultations from the Norwich Clinic for my Breast Augmentation and the surgery in London.
Transform are brilliant! Highly recommended

review_title: This was the 2nd time I?��ve had surgery?�?
review_body: This was the 2nd time I?��ve had surgery at transform. 2 breast augmentations & was with same surgeon. Can highly recommend Transform the care is 2nd to none. Thank you!
Wonderful team, very professional! Thank you, i?��m Glad to choose the  right clinic.

I had Rhinoplasty with Transform at the Manchester hospital after 25 years of hating my nose. Mr Ottoviana was straight to the point but friendly at consultation. The staff at the Pines were brilliant. The overall experience regarding pre and post op. was easier than my expectations. There was no pain post op just discomfort. I am nearly 6 weeks post op now and I love my new nose. Many thanks

review_title: Ms lutz and the team are great
review_body: Ms lutz and the team are great. She was very reassuring and informative throughout.
Great service

review_title: smooth running apart from one thing
review_body: Everything went really well only thing I would complain about is the lady (I think she?��s the nurse) who gave me my socks and gown ect, she rushed me so much and made me feel unsettled. She spoke so fast and didn?��t have no care for me and my new experience. Jus seemed like she wanted to get the job done. She was the only negative part of my experinace. Apart from that everything ran smoothly.
Transform was very helpful. I was able to ask any questions I had at anytime. I now look the way I always wanted. Thank you. Kind regards. Simone.

I felt very welcome from my first consultation and was very excited to proceed with the operation. The finance option was also very simply and straight forward, instance results once the online form was completed. I had a tummy tuck and Lipo performed by Mr Ahmed, he was very professional and I felt I was in good hands. Nurses were lovely during my 2 night stay and I was super impressed with the food, it was lovely!!

Hi, I had a wonderful experience. Right from beginning with my first meetings with Sharon to my consultation with my surgeon, Mr Lahoud. It has been a very smooth stress free experience. I would like to give a special shout out to the nurses at Riverside hospital. The care they provided was out of this world, they are were so kind and nothing was too much. Thank you so so much you lovely ladies, you definitely made my experience comfortable and memorable.  I would have no issue with recommending Transform and if I was to have any further surgeries I would happily go back to them.

review_title: I had breast augmentation in September
review_body: I had breast augmentation in September. I had a problem after that because I breast dropped too much and the other one didn't so I had two different boobies. They were horrible, different position, different nipples. I went to see again mr Netri and he suggested to do surgery again. I just had my breast done again 3 days ago and they look amazing! I'm really glad that mr Netri sorted everything. I'm really happy now

Still very early does post surgery but so far everything has gone smoothly! main thing I have noticed is the good communication from your assigned nurse. There was some clash of communication from one doctor to the other after my surgery, but after calling my nurse I was able to get the issue cleared up. Dr Luts is an amazing surgeon and was very realistic with me, discussing my limitations with implant size due to my petite figure. This is something I didn't get from other surgeons I saw for consultations who felt I could go bigger. However I am very happy with the size I went and don't actually think i could deal with the pain if I went any bigger!

review_title: Surgeon 5* nurse 5* hospital 5* everyone else rubbish
review_body: Cannot fault my surgeon Dr Clarke and the hospital staff they were so welcoming and put me at easy and explained every step of the way. My nurse I think she is called Elaine is reassuring and very helpful and caring.
Excellent every step of the way!!
I found my experience to be fantastic. Well trained welcoming staff. Very friendly and put me at ease. I would recommend transform to others.

I had breast augmentation at the Manchester clinic. My consultations were great. My patient co orderinater was Cassie who sorted everything out for me and scheduled all my appointments. My surgeon Mr Clarke who was amazing and answered all my questions. I?��m super happy with my results so far 2 weeks post op.

Had my septorhinoplasty done on sunday with mr ottiviani. From the moment of my first consultation at transform i felt right at ease. I also felt everything was well explained and no hidden extras. I was so nervous on surgery day but now know i didnt need to be. From walking in, to going to theatre, to leaving... all the staff were sooo friendly and comforting. Really looked after me. Nothing was too much trouble for them, they went above and beyond with my care. Thankyou sooo much for making it a positive, calm experiance. I cant wait to see my results
I have had outstanding service. The team at transform are amazing, friendly and very supportive .
Excellent service !
Amazing service and staff
From my initial consultation to my aftercare Transform has been absolutely amazing.
Transform were amazing with me throughout my whole process and I would definitely recommend this company to anyone!
I would recommend Transform without hesitation.
The treatment I have had Is disgusting
Perfect from start to finish

I have recently just had a breast enlargement with transform and would happily recommend them to anyone, intact I have been! This was something I had researched for a long time to make sure I chose the right place to have it done. From the start the service was excellent, communication was superb, the staff at clinic were helpful, knowledgeable and friendly, the surgeons were fantastic at advising what would be best and really listen to your needs. They put your needs first and make sure your ?��journey?ѝ is stress free. Not once did I feel rushed or pushed into making any decisions everything was at my pace. I?��m now post op and the aftercare has been fantastic. And my surgery well I couldn?��t be happier with the results so far. Absolutely perfect! I have tried to think of a suggestion to help transform improve the service and make it more of a balanced review but I can?��t actually think of one thing I would change!

Firstly I would say that I am very satisfied with my breast enlargement surgery and I could not fault my surgeon Mr Sinah. He was kind and knowledgable and I was ready to book my surgery as soon as I met him because I knew he would be the man for the job! My experience with the Norwich clinic was good, Cherie are her team are great and I had a driver take me to and from the Riverside Hospital and he was fab, such a smooth and relaxing journey there and back.  My only very small gripe and it did not ruin my experience but it?��s worth me saying so that perhaps some points can be raised at a later date but I felt I was really rushed though the first part of my hospital stay, from the moment I checked into reception it was a whirlwind of a check in with the nurse I didn?��t have time to read anything that was presented to me I felt like everyone was in a real hurry to get me to theatre. I suppose it?��s better than hanging around all day waiting to go to surgery but something in the middle would have been better. My hospital stay overall was good the food is excellent ! All in all I would definitely recommend Transform
Best thing iv ever done the staff was brilliant and always there if I needed help I would definitely recommend Transform

review_title: Great until you need your money back.
review_body: Great experience when booking the surgery and taking my money. Then my surgery was cancelled by the surgeon 4 days before my surgery date and I was told I'd promptly receive a full refund of the nearly �5000 I had paid. 7 days later and I still don't have my money back and I am being told they haven't even received my refund request forms and once they do get them it will take 28 days to get my money back when I have already waited 7. It's disgusting, I have been ignored and treated poorly since my surgery was cancelled and I will not use Transform in the future or recommend that anyone gives them large amounts of money before their surgery in case it's cancelled. Patients are treated like pay checks.
helpful throughout the whole experience, made you feel very welcome and safe, would highly recommend transform

review_title: Friendly staff, clean and modern facilities
review_body: All the staff I met with were very friendly and were able to answer all the questions I had. Both the Riverside Hospital and Reading Clinic were very clean modern facilities. There was always someone available to speak to during the aftercare. I am so happy with the results of my surgery and have had no reservations in recommending Transform to friends considering surgery.

Had consultation took time off work offered to pay up front but I want to book in 3 months time and was told wait for dates.. Got loan out and I was booking date got re check of price gone up by �250 in 2 months which now I can't afford, since this found recommended places �1000 cheaper... So shop around as these people mess you about and miss leading...
Excellent Service Excellent Results

review_title: It has taken me nearly 18months to do this.
review_body: It has taken me nearly 18months to write this review as I wanted to just be clear in my head that I wasn't being dramatic but I still feel the same. I just want to firstly say I could not be happier with the way I was treated by the nursing staff they were lovely from start to finish but the rest I feel was unprofessional and not worth the predicament I am now put in. The first lady I saw in London's clinic was very friendly but didn't really have the knowledge I was hoping for. I then went on to see a surgeon who booked me in and then very promptly went on leave so could not continue with my surgery. I then had to go back to London to meet another surgeon who said the surgery I had booked in for was not the best way to get the results I wanted but we would could change that if we needed to at the time. After getting home and thinking about it I decided that I only wanted to do this once so if more invasive surgery was needed I would go for it. I spoke to my first consultant who then informed me what the surgeon had said was wrong and I couldn't have that surgery unless I started the process again, moved my surgery date and paid more. I was left feeling stuck and lost. I has lost all faith in my surgeon but I was over �6000 in at this point. I went for my surgery as first planned as I was told it would be fine and it would look great. The hospital was lovely and staff were great until my surgeon walked in, she was rude "apparently you want to change your mind!?" When I said I was originally under the understanding that I able to do this she replied "it's to late now" ( I wasn't even trying to change it as I knew it was to late)

I recently had a Rhinoplasty 11 days ago at Transform The Pines Hospital with Mr Jones and I cannot believe the amazing results I can see already.  When I first met with Mr Jones he told me exactly what I wanted to hear and what I wanted doing to my nose without me saying a word! This made me so confident in choosing to go with him as I knew he had the exact same vision as me. Abigail (PC) and Kris (Nurse) at the Liverpool clinic were amazing I can?��t stress enough how much they made my experience for me. I couldn?��t be happier with the results I can see 11 days post op so I can?��t even imagine how it will look in 6 months to 1 year! Mr Jones gave me my dream nose and it has changed me life and confidence completely.
I have received really good care from the Transform staff. Really happy with the results too. Would definitely  recommend

review_title: Brilliant service from start to finish
review_body: Brilliant service from start to finish. Made to feel more than comfortable on admission and brilliant aftercare.

review_title: 4 stars for surgery, taking 1 for the overnight stay!
review_body: I'm giving transform 4 starts due to the highly skilled surgeon who did exactly what I had always wanted and therefore greatly impacted my life each and everyday for the better. I would however warn others that if your thinking about an overnight stay at the Birmingham private hospital I would think again unless you don't want any sleep at all after the overnight cost has been added to your total bill. I was left hooked up to a beeping machine for 2 hours before getting up myself to figure out how to turn it off after coming out of surgery, there is a loud draught coming through the Windows, the doors won't close and open on their own making me jump which hurts, and the power has gone off and on all night on this ward then every machine beeps LOUD for ages to turn back on...then the power goes again! safe to say it's now 4:40am and I'm itching to get dressed and get home for well needed rest. Other than the annoyance of the overnight stay I would like to mention again that my surgical results are fantastic. Just a little sleep would help now!

review_title: Superb service and so happy with the?�?
review_body: Superb service and so happy with the results

review_title: Staff have been very helpful and caring?�?
review_body: Staff have been very helpful and caring the entire experience. Surgeon was amazing, so so pleased with my results already!! Scar is neat and healing well!
You pay for what get.

I'm 3 months post-op and couldnt be happier with my results and looking back on my experience with Transform (Brentford Clinic). I had a tuberous breast correction + implants with Mr Ahmad and my patient coordinator was Sabrina.

It may be early days but I?��ve been excited to write this review. It?��s been 10 days post op and I had the full works! Breast lift (lollipop) with implant and capsulotomy .... The staff was amazing! Louise Fenwick from the Newcastle clinic is lovely! She gave me so much info from the beginning and answered any questions I had. Then with her being so wonderful she allocated me to see Mr Clarke who was also lovely! I instantly knew I wanted him to do my surgery. I?��m very fussy and go with my instincts and I?��m so happy I did because I love my boobies now thanks to Mr Clarke :-) .  I no it?��s been only 10days but I do love them.
Cornhill Clinic: Unfriendly, unprofessional and rude. No care for people. I do not recommend the Cornhill Clinic.

Ive had a great experience with transform, theyve supported me, given the best advice for my circumstances and provided excellent aftercare. Friends recommended transform to me and i would definitely reccomend them on again. Thank you

Was an excellent experience from start to finish. I'm extremely happy with all the advice and care I received and with the end result of my chosen procedure. I would highly recommend Transform to anyone looking at cosmetic surgery.
Such a shame. It went from bad to worse and I really had high hopes for transform.

I would highly recommend Transform to anyone, my whole process was so efficient and straight forward! Also my surgeon Mr Mashadi was lovely and i am absolutely chuffed with my results. Thank you to all the nurses that took care of me during my stay in Riverside, you were amazing! xox
Excellent results - I would definitely recommend this company. All staff were lovely and very helpful.
Amazing staff, amazing surgeon. Mr Clarke was so polite and understanding through out the whole experience I would highly recommend
I absolutely love this company. Everything about them.
Friendly, supportive staff, excellent service and aftercare, reassuring consistencies in staffing even after 14 years familiar faces !
I would definitely recommend Transform. My surgeon, Mr Netri, was amazing and gave me the exact look I wanted. The procedure went exceptionally well. My nurse was so caring and professional.
Very efficient, professional and caring.

Transform was amazing from start to finish and Mr Netri is an outstanding amazing surgeon who listened to what I wanted and made my vision a reality I now have the boobs I have always wanted and I am so incredibly happy with the results so thank you Mr Netri and Transform I love my new boobs

The experience was very proffesional, My surgeon Mr Lim was excellent, reassuring me of the procedure and giving me some great advice before hand, the nurses were all very friendly and helpful with anything I needed.
Very happy with my results and the care before during and after the operation.

review_title: Always pleased to return to transform
review_body: I've only ever gone to transform for surgery, they are very professional and caring. The best clinic in london I've recommended to my friends over the years .My patient co-ordinatior Sabina was reassuring and got me booked in asap. Dr. Nathan is the best and very honest. I'm still waiting for my finished results but so far looking good .

The whole process with Transform has been fantastic. From my first consultation to my second and my third (I needed to go a few times to make sure I was 100% making the right decision) Having cosmetic surgery is a scary and daunting thought but everyone at Transform has a no nonsense, warm approach! They don?��t force you into anything and they make sure you know the facts. You are doing this for you at the end of the day and having a company like Transform helping you has made this process exciting and so enjoyable!

review_title: From coordinator to surgeon they have all been great!
review_body: My coordinator Gabriella was fantastic! My surgeon was Dr antonacci and I am in love with my results! And the nurse never fails to phone me back & reassure me when worried! The hospital staff where i stayed were also great! In all so far I am 23 days post op & cannot complain about transform!

review_title: They were amazing from start to finish?�?
review_body: They were amazing from start to finish and would do anything to help. A year on and my boobs are still amazing .
A five star care from the first day that i step in the clinic and even after the surgery. was an excellent experience.

review_title: staff are lovely through out transform?�?
review_body: staff are lovely through out transform well looked after at the pines hospital after my op. ms hadden the surgeon is lovely really helps you lovely lady would really recommend ms hadden

review_title: Thanks so much to transform for my?�?
review_body: Thanks so much to transform for my amazing boobs. Mr Nathan was amazing as we're all the staff. The look i imagined and what i wanted I now have! I woke up in no pain. Everyone was great felt very well looked after and they genuinely cared about you. Fab place. Also the ladies at the reading clinic are all lovely ans helpful, especially emily who is brilliant she was very comforting and helpful and made sure I was completely happy. Thanks again x

review_title: very friendly and makes you feel?�?
review_body: very friendly and makes you feel comfortable

review_title: I think my breasts look amazing but?�?
review_body: I think my breasts look amazing but they are not the size I chose and I feel unhappy as I am paying for these.I have plenty of extra skin around my implants and I would like to have the size I a asked as its alot of money and I want to be happy and confident in myself. I would like to talk about this matter in person If possible

review_title: I found the whole experience to be?�?
review_body: I found the whole experience to be friendly and efficient from start to finish. The staff were professional and extremely well informed about all aspects of the procedure and I felt confident that I was in good hands. The  hospital experience was excellent and I felt well cared throughout. I am very happy with the result of my surgery and wouldn't hesitate recommending Transform to others wishing to have the same procedure. The surgeon, anaesthetist and hospital staff were fantastic.

review_title: Initially great but not interested in customer care once booked
review_body: At first consultation the consultant was very helpful, she managed to find me a surgeon available within the dates i had available.and at very short notice however, she didnt speak about the implants or give me any info relating to the op itself, just kept saying how much i will love them and boost my confidence. I later emailed some questions and she got back to me that eve so i went ahead and booked. After this, the consultant never returned any calls or emails i sent asking further queations or queries relating to payment and warranty, i never heard from her again despite leaving numerous messages.
Amazing treatment ! I feel great , thank you sooo much TRANSFORM!

review_title: An excellent service from the start
review_body: From my initial appointment right through to surgery and aftercare, I cannot fault Transform. Every member of staff I have seen have been friendly, helpful, knowledgeable and professional.  Both premed is which I have visited have been spotless and comfortable.
My surgery was excellent. Im so pleased with the results.
Wonderful care throughout. Kept me informed at all times and provided a very personal experience. No complaints everyone I met were kind and helpful

review_title: From start to finish my experience with?�?
review_body: From start to finish my experience with transform was fantastic couldn?��t fault them!
Review done by Pam Fisher:
Would highly recommend transform. Fantastic start to finish. Mr Mahdi is amazing at his job. I am so thrilled with the outcome of my op. Please don?��t listen to the negative Reviews.

Absolutely amazing experience. The staff is really professional and extremely friendly. From the first appointment with the advisor until the actual surgery it only took 3 months. So happy with the choice that I?��ve made and most of all with my selected surgeon
BRILLIANT SERVICE BY EVERYONE

Had a really good experience with transform right through from booking my first appointment to my post op care. Felt very safe at all times, the hospital was clean and everyone is professional. More importantly so happy with the results of my nose job!

review_title: Breast reduction. The staff are amazing!!!
review_body: Brilliant experience with amazing caring service. I went in on the morning of the surgery so anxious. All the staff were so kind. When the  anaesthetist arrived to say hello I really felt the nerves but he again assured me I was fine and was actually funny. Mr Clarke arrived my surgeon he has such a clam manner about him. Just makes you feel so much better.

I?��m 6 days post breast augmentation surgery, and already I?��m so impressed with the results. My surgeon Mr. Nathen listened to my expectations and I felt confident going into surgery. The Riverside hospital was clean and staff were friendly and informative and ensured all my needs were met.

review_title: Pre-op and post op care amazing
review_body: Pre-op and post op care amazing. Every nurse before and after can?��t fault. However the actual day was a nightmare. Will be writing a formal complaint for how long they made me fast for and I was close to walking out and asking for my money back. Something that I waited 15 years for and has put me five years in debt has been tainted by various things on the day and I am not recovering as well as I thought I would.

review_title: Amazing from start to finish. Changed my life and I will be forever grateful !
review_body: I was so nervous prior to my first consultation at the Transform Leeds clinic for Breast Augmentation as it something I?��ve seriously considered for a good 10 years! My personal co-ordinator Jade instantly made me feel at ease and she was amazing through the entire process. All the worries I had were again squashed when I met my surgeon Mr Simone, who again, instantly made me feel that I was 100% making the right decision for myself. His recommendation on my implants/size etc and actually taking my pettiness and the fact I weight train regularly and everything into consideration rather than just offering me the biggest implants there?��s is and sending me off to surgery (which when you?��re caught up in the excitement and prospect of big new boobs would be hard for a young girl to turn down) is when I knew he was the perfect choice. Jade could see how much it meant to me and she made it possible for me to be in and out of surgery within a few weeks of first meeting her and has checked up on me constantly throughout. She has literally made my dreams come true and Mr Simone has changed my life! They are more than I could of ever asked for. The perfect size for my body and they looked amazing from the second I came out of theatre. Some of my family and friends who were sceptical, were all won over and couldn?��t believe how natural and perfect they looked. I had my operation and stayed over night at Dolan Park Hospital in Birmingham which I again will rate 5*. Every single member of staff made me feel so comfortable and I genuinely didn?��t even take or feel scared that i was having surgery until I was actually laid on the table. I?��m nealry 2 weeks post op now and my scars are so neat and healing amazing. I can?��t thank everyone who made this possible enough.

review_title: Dennis is a hidden treasure and has?�?
review_body: Dennis is a hidden treasure and has made my post op care a jot and pleasure. He gives me confid3nce and makes me feel looked after.

review_title: I had my surgery with transform at?�?
review_body: I had my surgery with transform at dolan park in Birmingham.. the hospital was clean and all the staff were lovely! Totally happy with my results

I've just had revision surgery with Mr Saeed. The experience this time round was definitely 5*!! Mr Saeed is very professional and knows his stuff! He put me to ease after my first consultation with him and has been a pleasure ever since. Same can't be said for this time last year when I had my op the first time with Mr. Khodaei. After my op the communication between myself and the surgeon/transform was very poor, and I felt as though I was being passed from pillow to post. Turns out Mr. Khodaei had quit a couple weeks after operating on me and a few others, at first I was promised he would still have to review his patients (which was something I was desperate for as I already hated my new nose!) as time went on it was apparent this wasn't the case. He'd just quit, left and didn't have the courtesy to even bother reviewing his patients... so it doesn't surprise me "9 out of 10 of his patients have needed revision surgery" (quoted from one of the theatre nurses at the transform pines hospital). So I had my first op in April last year and didn't get my "6 week post op review" until December!! and i had to travel all the way to Manchester for all my consultations, when the clinic I'd originally agreed to use as a point of call for all appointments is 2 minutes away from me in Jesmond (Newcastle). Anyways my experience with transform this time round like I've said has been much better! My patient adviser at the jesmond clinic has been very apologetic about the situation and is easily contactable since, also making sure I've been reimbursed for travel expenses. And the nurses looking after me at the pines hospital in Manchester were very caring the second time round, I was quite ill after my op and I had a nurse coming in checking on me regularly, making sure I had everything I needed. And again Mr. Saeed has been world class! And so far I love the results of my revision! Just with my previous experience with Transform from this time last year the overall rating would have to be 3*, if I could go back I would definitely of done more research on surgeons! And only wish I found Mr. Saeed sooner!!

I had corrective surgery (february 2018) as I developed capsular contracture following a breast augmentation in March 2014. The treatment I have received has been exceptional. My original surgeon no longer worked for Transform so Mr Clarke took me on as a patient, he was fantastic, I really could not have asked for a better surgeon. I went to see him 4 times before making my final decision and each time he was patient with me and did not rush me at all. My only wish is that he had been my original surgeon!!!

I have recently had a breast augmentation and I cannot thank Transform enough for giving me exactly what I could've ever wanted and more! The service was amazing, I had very little waiting time to have the surgery done. The hospital was clean and the food was amazing, absolutely fantastic experience all round!
Professional and excellent care.
Amazing care and very well looked after by everyone. Definitely want more surgery.
It was so much easier than I expected, although I was nervous all the staff were so friendly and professional. I would happily recommend or even have it done again!

review_title: They were fantastic from start to finish
review_body: They were fantastic from start to finish

review_title: Amazing team looked after from first?�?
review_body: Amazing team looked after from first meeting
Excellent service and customer services.
Everything and everyone was excellent from start to finish, the staff cannot do enough for you....amazing!

The treatment I have received is second to none.  The nursing staff can't do enough for you. My surgeon Mr Aktar has done an amazing job of my tummy tuck and the comments I'm getting are great and I'm only 2 1/2 weeks post op and a little swollen.  I recommend Mr Aktar 100% and the nurses are 5 star too!!

My initial consultation I had with the surgeon had to be re arranged as he decided not to visit the Sheffield clinic that day, I only found out on the day but it was re arranged for 4 weeks later so no huge issue. The appointment I then attended was running about an hour late so I had a mad rush as I had other things on afterwards. Despite this I went ahead and booked the procedure which was fine. The post op appointment with the nurse was fine and I was advised it?��s standard to see the surgeon again about 6 weeks after to which I expected would be in Sheffield as I was informed all my aftercare appointments would be Sheffield (I asked specifically at my initial appointments and this was confirmed). When my appointment was emailed to me the location said Leeds, so I queried this thinking it was just a mistake but I was told that the surgeon was not coming to Sheffield anymore so it would be Leeds. I was really disappointed about this as this is not what I was told.

Transform ruined my life and my confidence, also resulted in me being put on anti-depressants and having counselling! I paid �4150 for my first boob done by MR NETRI, the first few months was fine. Then one boob dropped whilst the other sat high, they were a completely different shape and size and looked 100 times worse than before surgery except I was �4150 out of pocket! I was assured this would be corrected after numerous visits and complaints. In the end after over a year of false hope nothing was done and I hit rock bottom, had to end up paying a further �4450 to get them corrected by Mr Melagros, they are symmetrical now, this is after I was told it was my body that was the issue in the first place, but that clearly wasn?��t the case! It has cost me �8600 when it should of been correct the first time round. This company doesn?��t care about your well being once that money?��s transferred! I wouldn?��t even rate them a one star after all the tears and upset they have caused me. Please do your research girls and don?��t end up in the mess that I was in!

I had breast implants with transform, mr nitri was my surgeon. Couldnt have asked for a better service, during my over night stay in the hospital staff couldnt have been any better so attentive. All round it was a great experience (except the pain) i have never looked back since the operation it was the best thing i ever did

review_title: surgery Dr Clark was amazing and 3?�?
review_body: surgery Dr Clark was amazing and 3 years on I'm still so happy he was so lovely. But I would not go with transform for fillers or BOTOX as the nurse in Nottingham made a mess of my lips. I went back a week later crying so upset. And she did nothing to put it right. She took photos and said she would send them of with a complaint. I had to go to another clinic and pay to get this put right. I all so sent an e-mail to transform about this. And they never got back to me. every friend of mine that went to transform for fillers had the same thing happen with them. All so since my breast surgery I've not had any one from transform contact me since 6 weeks after my opp. It's now been 3 years. Transform lost a good patient in me and many people I no all due to the nurse in Nottingham messing our faces up and doing nothing to put it right.
My experience with Transform...

Had a hair transplant 2 years ago with Transform my surgeon was Dr Rick Rogers and it doesn?��t even look like I?��ve had a hair transplant also a lot of hair graphs have fallen out leaving me with bald patches. The hair is so thin in the sun you can?��t see it. Been left with a scar on the back of my head for nothing. Called every week for the last 5 months and have got no call backs even no they say they will call me back. I was told they would do the procedure again free of charge but this doesn?��t seem to be happening and now I?��ve heard they no longer do hair transplants. Feel really let down by this and really not happy with the aftercare or service I have received.

review_title: Best decision I have ever made !
review_body: I had a wonderful experience with transform from My first consultation, and still with my check ups post op.
I?��ve wanted a nose job for as long as I can remember and Transform was a natural choice  for me as my mum had multiple procedures with them back when they were based in Bowdon.

review_title: I couldn?��t be happier for choosing ?�?
review_body: I couldn?��t be happier for choosing transform as they really have changed my life for the better. I had a breast enlargement surgery and went from a 32A to a 32C. I wanted to go for a natural look and the surgeon I had specialised in creating natural looking breasts. I?��d wanted the surgery since I was 15 years old but was always told to wait and see if I developed more. The team at transform make you feel comfortable from the start of your journey to the end and I would highly recommend them. I am currently 3 weeks post Op and all things considered I?��m doing ok. Initially I had a bad reaction to the antibiotics and painkillers which I was given as they made me very sick and dizzy but once I came off them I was fine and just stuck to paracetamol for pain relief. I went for an over the muscle operation because I already had some breast tissue there and even though I?��ve still go lots of swelling I couldn?��t be  happier with the results so far. As for pain I wouldn?��t say there?��s been much it?��s more of a heavy and pressure feeling where you feel like you?��ve got someone sitting on your chest. I was able to drive in 2 weeks and returned to work after 8-9days. My nurse Becky is amazing and recommend a medication called Arnica 30 which helps reduce swelling and bruising after an op. You take it 1 week before surgery and 2 weeks after and Surprisingly I only had a 10p sign bruise on my right rib and that?��s it which I was really pleased with. I got it from Boots and it was about �4ish and there they are like tiny sugar pills which you crunch and not to bad at all. The team at the Riverside Hospital in Brentford London were very welcoming and caring. From arriving at the hospital you are greeted by the receptionist who then passes you over to your nurse who then shows you to your room. I had an overnight stay included with my surgery and was very happy with what was provided. You were given a choice of what to have for lunch and dinner on the day of your op and then breakfast the following morning.  My anesthestist was fantastic as it had in my notes I was scared of needles so they gave me a couple of options to make it easier for me to go to sleep for the op but In the end he done the canular in the back of the hand and a I barely felt it he was very quick and efficient. I even had a lovely Romanian lady who let me hold her hand while I fell asleep as no op is never not scary. The nurses came and checked me throughout the night making sure my blood pressure and temperature was all normal and also to look for any possible signs of infection. I?��ve got my 7 week check up appt in about 4 weeks and once I reach that I?��ll be considered all healed and I can start bra and bikini shopping. It?��s a great feeling having breast enlargement surgery and I?��m so glad I went ahead with it and would 100% recommend Transform without a shadow of a doubt.

I had a breast augmentation with Mr Czopkiewicz (Who is unfortunately not with the practice any more) in 2014 - since then, I have been loving life!  Before my surgery I hated going clothes shopping, I never felt comfortable and was very self conscious about my body.  I went from practically nothing to these fantastic C cups that (I have been told) look amazing and not like I have had them done at all.
Operation excellent, treatment excellent, medical staff. very attentive.  The only down side - my room was very cold.  Eventually I was moved but took far too long.  Aftercare excellent.

review_title: I was very well looked after
review_body: I was very well looked after, I have been twice to transform for procedures and both time absolutely made up with the whole experience.

Had breast surgery almost 5 year ago from them and after a year of having them done started to get pains in my right boob, as the years go on the worse the pain gets an my boobs are now two different sizes as one is so swollen and rock solid yet everytime i go back i am fobbed off! And my patient co-ordinator rings me before any appointment with the worst attitude asking do i really need to go in? Well would you want to walk around with two different size boobs which is ridiculously noticeable. Having to wear jumpers none stop so people cant tell my boobs are not the same size? Not being able to wear a bra because the pain is unbearable when i do! The service before is great but soon as they have your money they don?��t give a dahm!

Really pleased with the outcome of my surgery and the people are so lovely ! Would of gave a five star rating but on the day of surgery my time slot got moved forward twice and I hadn?��t ate all day so I was very hungry felt slightly dehydrated pre op.. but they made sure I was well fed after . Other than that the room I was in was decent with on suite and tv to pass the time

After researching breast enlargement for years, I finally found transform. From the minute I made the initial enquiry they have been so helpful, polite and not pushy at all. I had my surgery at the Riverside Hospital with Dr Lahoud 19 days ago. I cannot thank all the staff and my surgeon enough. Dr Lahoud has changed my life, he was honest in regards to sizing and I am so happy with my new breasts. All the staff I came across at the hospital were lovely and very helpful, especially my lovely nurse (Bridget? I think?) and even the man who held my hand whilst I had my GA, everyone made my stay so comfortable. My advisor, Inga has always been on hand no matter how silly the questions I had for her, she really is a star! I?��m now 19 days post op and couldn?��t be happier with my whole surgery experience, thank you Transform!!!!
Amazing, friendly staff every step of the way. Made me feel so comfortable, i wouldn?��t of wanted to have my operation anywhere else. Can?��t thank Transform enough!

review_title: I can not fault the service I have had ?�?
review_body: I can not fault the service I have had from transform. Mr Bhatty was brilliant and listened to what I wanted but at the same time was very honest about what would look right for me. I had total confidence in him and I am thrilled with the results.

review_title: I had a brilliant experience with ?�?
review_body: I had a brilliant experience with transform, from meeting the surgeon to my surgery and recovery.

review_title: I had my breast enlargement almost a ?�?
review_body: I had my breast enlargement almost a year ago now, and it?��s the best decision I have ever made. After breast feeding 3 children, I had lost all of the volume in my breasts, and my self confidence. I had my consultations and surgery done with transform. From start to finish, everyone was brilliant, helpful, informative and professional. My surgery was quick and relatively painless. I?��m now happy and so much more confident. Couldn?��t recommend them enough.

review_title: Had breast op just 2 years ago...clinic ?�?
review_body: Had breast op just 2 years ago...clinic went to have them done in stirling,staff could,nt have been more helpful...had 380cc put in under the muscle,could,nt be happier with the look,look so natural...my only problem is aftercare...I paid for extra warranty so to me that covers anything,on and off just after 2 years been getting bit of uncomfortable numbness on left breast,been recently to clinic to have it checked,surgeon recommended he refer me for an ultrasound to put my mind at ease,did,nt think was anything serious...just over week later recieved a phone call from clinic basically telling me if I wanted to go ahead I had to pay between 300-350 pound to have it done...apparently warranty does,nt cover that,what the he'll is it for then? yeah they say warranty covers surgery if things go wrong,in order to know if something is wrong,it needs to be checked out,don't see why have to fork out more money for it,think it's ridiculous as paid enough for the op...

review_title: Was told by the surgeon that he wasn't prepared to operate!
review_body: I had a few consultations to be told that the surgeon wouldn't do my procedure. I feel he didn't want to do it for his own reasons not for my wellbeing.

review_title: My stay at the Hopstail was bad the ?�?
review_body: My stay at the Hopstail was bad the staff were so rude An un welcoming seem like they didn't wanna be there I always at to have my gard up around them was a bad experience

I went for my first consultation yesterday and the leeds clinic was very clean and tidy, the receptionist was very friendly.  I was asked to fill some forms in and there was tea and coffee available while you wait.  I was seeing a lady called Jade who I first met when she helped me to use the coffee machine.  I was taken into the consultation room and she talked ne through every option for implants and also costing. I have never met such a lovely lady in all my life she made me feel extremely welcome and very comfortable and encouraged me to ask all the questions I wanted.  I met ny suregon on the same Mr Simone who was also very nice and didnt rush me, he talked me through the perfect size and implant for me.  I was booked in for my preop appointment the very next day.  I have to say this was the best experience I have had...also my first. They are a great team at Transform from the moment I enquired to booking my surgery which is in 21 days. I could not feel in better hands!!

review_title: Reduction  and uplift for my breasts
review_body: Mr mashadi reduced and uplifted my breasts , I had a wonderful experience at the clinic (Mainstone ) and the hospital in London, he is a superb surgeon and has changed my life

review_title: I was made to feel comfortable and at ?�?
review_body: I was made to feel comfortable and at ease from the very first call I made to Transform.  My consultant was completely honest with me at my consultation and advised me off what implants to have. I had told him I wanted a natural look, under the muscle. He advised that I also needed a lift. I have exactly what I wanted, couldn't be more pleased with the results.
Happy overall with transform. Very helpful staff, efficient and informative. 1 week post surgery and Very happy with my recovery and the results so far. Hopefullly this will continue

Transform are great, wouldn't hesitate to recommend them, from the first consultation, to meeting the surgeon, the hospital & post op care with the nurse back at the clinic they make you feel welcomed, looked after & at ease. All the staff are great they listen to your needs & give you honest advice & guidence to get you a result you can be happy with, a big thanks to all the staff all the way through the journey especially my surgeon Mr Clarke made me feel comfortable & i was definatly in the right hands he did a fantastic job!

review_title: Do not use Transform for surgery
review_body: Do not use Transform for surgery, they do not care about their patients and bad attitude from the staff at the Southampton clinic!! Did not care they operated on me while I was pregnant (I didn?��t know)

review_title: I went in to have revision surgery due ?�?
review_body: I went in to have revision surgery due to wrong type of implants being put In on my first surgery to come out with even smaller breasts the second time round to say I?��m upset is an understatement to have gained all that confidence and to have it taken away just like that is heart wrenching and to be smaller than I was I feel absolutely disgusting beyond words!!

review_title: I would tell my friends to use traform ?�?
review_body: I would tell my friends to use traform the staff was so friendly and helpful and could not do any more for me and my surgeon Nathan was amazing helping choose the right size for me and answering all my questions x
I am over the moon with my new flat stomach.

From beginning to date the experience has been excellent. I had two consultations and both surgeons were very informative and professional. The staff at Transform were very friendly and helpful.  One small negative was the waiting time as the clinic over ran by an hour and also with the new software I attended but the appointment wasn?��t on the system I was still seen though and apologies given to me.

I had a breast augmentation with transform 2 weeks ago now and I couldn?��t be happier! I had Mr Clarke as my surgeon who was really good at explaining everything to me and made me feel really comfortable from the start. The nurses for my after care have been great too and very informative of what I should/shouldn?��t be doing to help with my recovery. I would definitely recommended Transform and have done already!

i have felt very comfortable with everyone I have seen at Transform, Sharise is very friendly, Andrea makes you feel very comfortable and my surgeon was very pleasant.  The staff at The Pines were very caring and attentive.  I'm 2 1/2 weeks post op and know that I can contact them without hesitation should I need to.  A family member also used Transform and had a very positive experience hence I also chose them.

review_title: Transform... transformed my life for the better!
review_body: I researched Transform and it?��s reviews were comforting. I also looked at the surgeons and got the one I wanted. My overall experience was great from the Medical team that cared for me across to the cleaning staff. I am emotionally overwhelmed to say the least with the results of my surgery, my surgeon was amazing and I can not recommend him highly enough!  He has given me the confidence to go out now and feel so good about myself. Thank so much Mr Bhatty and I would also like to extend that to one very special nurse who looked after me her name is Kisha what a beautiful caring nurse she is. Thank you guys for an emotional experience for me and giving such comparisonate care and easing any worries I may have had.

review_title: Could not be happier with all aspects ?�?
review_body: Could not be happier with all aspects of my journey with Transform, from my initial consultation to the care I received during and after my procedure. Would  definitely recommend Transform to anyone thinking of cosmetic surgery.

review_title: Nothing but positivity for transform!!! Thank you!
review_body: Nothing but positivity for transform! Recently had a breast augmentation, stayed in the London riverside hospital which was great, staff and food fab! My surgeon Mr Rochira was amazing and I couldn?��t be more happy with my results. From meeting Cheri at Norwich my local transform, the nurse Becky who has done my checks etc. All great! Really do recommend!

review_title: Excellent service from start to finish
review_body: Excellent service from start to finish. Couldnt be more happier. Thank you transform. Youve transformed my life x

review_title: All the staff were excellent but the ?�?
review_body: All the staff were excellent but the rooms
Great service throughout - would highly reccomend Mr Sinha for Breast Augmentation

I could not be happier with my experience at Transform. Everything from day one has being fully explained. I was looked after so well at ?��the pines?ѝ it was like a mini holiday & it?��s not be like a Hospital at all. The clinic for after care has being brilliant too-I am still healing but so far I am so happy with my sugery.

review_title: Transform: Open Septo Rhinoplasty with Mr Lahoud
review_body: *UPDATED*

review_title: I felt relaxed and happy with the care ?�?
review_body: I felt relaxed and happy with the care I received at pines hospital Manchester. My nurse was Jackie and she was lovely and answered any questions I had. The lady  who took me to my surgery was Di and she put me at ease and had a calming effect.

review_title: I cannot fault this company in the ?�?
review_body: I cannot fault this company in the slightest. My surgeon (Mr Lahoud) was first class and an absolute artist. And all the nurses and coordinators were fantastic and their duty of care is second-to-none.
Everyone was lovely and really supportive, I was a nervous wreck, they made me feel at ease before going into theatre and looked after me after ?��?

review_title: Brill service from start to finish :-)
review_body: From my first initial consultation to getting surgery I have received first class care from everyone along the way. The process of getting a breast enlargement went so smoothly and I absolutely love what Dr Batty has done, what a lovely funny man. Even the nurse who took care of me was an absolute star she looked after me and made me feel at ease the whole time. Well done to everyone at Transform.
Had the best care, treatment and result would highly recommend transform my life has definitely been transformed

review_title: Just not quite as good as last time
review_body: Just not quite as good as last time

review_title: Had breast surgery with Transform on ?�?
review_body: Had breast surgery with Transform on 15th Jan 2018. From booking my consultation through to my post operative appointment the staff have surpassed all expectations. Every touch point has been fantastic, I would highly recommend to others. I used The Pines clinic in the Manchester area. My personal coordinator, surgeon (Mr Netri), nurses and everyone else made the experience so comfortable and relaxing for me, I never felt worried or left with questions unanswered. As a leader in customer service myself I am very happy with the whole process.

review_title: So happy with my new boobs!
review_body: So glad I went with transform instead of MYA! Had the best experience and the nurses are the hospital were so so lovely! I am I?��m love with my new boobies and would reccomend them to everyone! Thank you Mr Mashhadi I?��ll be forever grateful to you!

Ive always wanted a breast augmentation since I can remember, as I was so flat and didn't have much confidence atal when wearing nice clothes girls my age would wear. So I finally got it done! I was a bit apprehensive about getting it done as I've seen loads of mixed reviews (just like anywhere) but I can honestly say I'm super happy with my choice! The care I relieve from my consultation, right through to my surgery has been 110% !! My surgeon mr antonacci was fab and I've never been happier. So thank you so much transform!!! I can't recommend you enough.

review_title: ?��You fell good, we feel good?ѝ NOT AT ALL!!
review_body: Even reading some bad reviews before, I decided to go to Transform Birmingam and give it a try. In my first consultation with PC Carly, everything went well, she gave me a lot of attention and I decided to go ahead. At my second consultation for breast augmentation with the surgeon, Dr. Ahmad, my husband and I, had one of the worst experiences in our lives, he took no interest in answering any of my questions, all I asked he would start laughing, I asked to see pictures of his procedures and he said he had none, and I asked him to try out the prosthesis sizes models, as they promised me at my first appointment and he said he had no one and started acting like if only he wanted is us to leave, as if we were there to buy a pair of trousers and not talk about a serious and expensive procedure. I defenitively do not recommend Transform to anyone, since I went to the clinic to do a procedure that supposed make me feel confident, but all they made me feel was bad!!

review_title: I would have rated it much higher but ?�?
review_body: I would have rated it much higher but for the fact a few members of your team really let you Transform down.

review_title: BA with Mr Nathan & Reading clinic
review_body: I had my BA done on the 30th Dec and so far so good! All of my appointments have been great from the initial consultation with the PC to my post op with the nurse at Reading clinic. I originally had picked a surgeon but unfortunately he became ill, my PC called me explained that my original surgeon will not be practicing and gave me all the info I needed on another surgeon who could do the same day, they also booked me in to meet with him prior to my surgery. On meeting the new surgeon - Mr Nathan, I came out absolutely buzzing, a feeling I never got from the first surgeon. He was friendly, funny, yet professional and made me feel dignified during my consultation. My surgery was done at riverside hospital, everything there went brilliant and I was so scared and I knew I was being pathetic but they made me calm and feel at ease. I can't believe I've finally done it! Recommending transform and Mr Nathan to anyone and everyone looking to have surgery. 2 weeks 3 days and my wounds are so minimal I was shocked, I know my boobs will change over the next few weeks but I love them more every day, I am pleased so far...thank you!
Surgeon was amazing - he did a great job and every appointment with him was fantastic. This would be a 5 star review if it was based solely on him.

so having my nose done is something i've been wishing for since i was about 13 so now at 24 i couldn't be happier. I originally in 2016 went to the fulham clinic and the service there was great but i said to my rep i wanted to wait and make sure i 100% wanted to go through with it. she only then called me twice in a year to see how i was getting on ! it was great to know they actually cared about me and not just getting my business. i re approached rhinoplasty in october 2017 and went to the maidstone clinic and met louise who is fantastic. she answered every question even the silly ones and completely gave me a piece of mind about it. we then booked in my surgery for the 11th of december 2017 with dr lahoud. the whole process for me was quite nerve racking but the guy in charge of anesthetic came to see me before the op told me where he was putting needles and when i told him i didnt want it in my hand he stuck to his promise. my surgeon was great the whole team was amazing even the nurses looking after me who kept bringing me ice packs every 15 mins even if i was asleep and changed them. the whole process has been amazing and im still due to go for my 6 week post op on the 25th of january and i couldnt be happier with the results it really had made me fall in love with my self and i cant stop smiling. i cant wait to see the final result once all the selling has gone down. an amazing company so thank you to everyone ive met youve all been great

I had breast augmentation and nipple lift in December at Transfrom and right from my first consultation to aftercare the service has been amazing. Couldn?��t be happier with my results and the staff have made the whole process smooth and easy from start to finish!

Mr Paul Clarke did my breast uplift at Manchester Pines Hospital. I cannot fault this surgeon, he was the only surgeon who actually listened to what I wanted and the results are amazing. He was very professional, explained everything in detail and made me feel very much at ease. I would recommend Mr Paul Clarke and Transform to anyone the service was impeccable.

review_title: Surgeons - Great. Service - Not so great.
review_body: Breast enlargement. So here is my honest opinion about Transform Liverpool... the surgeon was fantastic and the end result is fantastic, very happy. Transform as a company are a bit of a shambles, all the people who work there are lovely - but it was about as smooth as a piece of sand paper. Every appointment was a minimum of 30 mins late, a record of 80 minutes late. They scribbled 8am on a piece of paper and told me that was the time to be at the hospital, I phoned to double check this to be told ?��yeah If that?��s what written must be right?��. On the way to the hospital I got a phone call saying I had missed my check in time, as I was on track to be ?��early for my 8am?�� they waited for me - not the stress you want before going under the knife. The paper trail is rubbish and getting information is very hard, no one answers the phone 80% of the time. If I were to do it again I would go directly to Dr Netri and buy the surgery through him.

review_title: I am a patient from the cornhill Clinic ?�?
review_body: I am a patient from the cornhill Clinic I had my breast augmentation nearly 7 weeks ago in the riverside hospital. From day one my coordinator Julie was amazing she knew how important it was I had the surgery done we had some set backs due to my health but soon as I was ready she got me booked back in for surgery. My surgeon Dr Nathan was amazing he knew exactly what I wanted infact he knew better and made me change my original decision on size and position Which I?��m so glad for they look amazing and they ain?��t even finished healing I had hardly any pain and my scars are healing so nicely. The nurse Denise and Rachel have been amazing answered all my questions pre and post op and made me feel very prepared they gave me reassurance when needed very happy with my aftercare. Riverside hospital was very clean and peaceful the food was good the anaesthetist was lovely came in before op to introduce himself and answer any questions the nurses were very friendly and attentive I felt very safe. I would definitely recommend transform and Dr Nathan

review_title: I had Breast Augmentation 6 weeks ago ?�?
review_body: I had Breast Augmentation 6 weeks ago. My Patient Coordinator was Louise Fenwick (Jesmond Clinic) who has been very welcoming and extremely helpful throughout my whole time with Transform. She answered all questions I had and was lovely. My surgeon was Mr Clarke who is also amazing and made me feel so at ease (would highly recommend). He helped me to choose the right size and type of implant for me. I was scared to go too big as I am very slim (especially my back) but I am happy with the size that I chose! Staff at Pines  Hospital were all fantastic and my whole stay was brilliant i couldnt fault anyone. I was so nervous waiting for the surgery but they helped me to stay calm. I am over the moon with my results and havent got 1 negative thing to say about anybody or anything! Would definitely recommend.
Thumbs up I am now very happy, I was worried before the procedure but once I met Dr Tsekouras for the consultation, I felt immediately reassured and confident.

Excellent service throughout, from consultation to operation and aftercare... Ms Hadden i would recommend with the highest regard, was really friendly, listens to you and what you want to get out of surgery and fully explains everything... absolutely brilliant surgeon!
Both myself and my mum had operations with you. my mum a removal reduction and myself an enlargement both our results are perfect couldn't be happier.

Amazing team and amazing surgeon. My patient co-ordinator was so patient and helpful from start to finish and answered any questions or concerns I had. Dr Netri was amazing and done an amazing job. I would highly recommend. The Manchester hospital was so clean and so lovely, nurses and all staff were amazing nothing was a problem. Made me feel completely comfortable from start to finish.
It may be a little soon to be leaving my review as I only had my op yesterday for breast enlargement.
I would recommend to anyone.
Great surgeon, great hospital staff and great aftercare.
Good service, helped me out a lot. Thanks

review_title: It feels a bit soon to be giving ?�?
review_body: It feels a bit soon to be giving feedback on Transform as it's less than 2 weeks since my procedure. However, the whole process has been simple and I feel, and look, great.
Fantastic experience from start to finish.
The whole team were very informative, kind and professional. I am 11 days post op and I am already, happy with results. Looking forward to the future.
good service
I cannot fault the consultations with the Transform team in maidstone. They make you feel very welcome and that you can contact them at any time regarding your pending surgery.

It took me a while to decide to have surgery. I hadn?��t overly researched but I knew what I thought I wanted. At my consultation the surgeon I chose was very insightful and I went away and researched more before my second consultation. On the day of the surgery the hospital staff was amazing treated me really well. After surgery I was amazed with what dr Nathan had done not only did I have what I wanted but I thought it was better than what I asked for. I?��m so happy I chose transform and I?��m happy I had sharon and Dr Nathan to support me in achieving the look I wanted.

Every aspect of my procedure has been first rate. From the free consultation with my surgeon who was really lovely and gave me so much advice, and everyone else involved. My patient coordinator, Cherie, is a star, even sending me a card! All the nurses are fantastic, both in the hospital (Brentford) and the clinic (Norwich).

review_title: I had my lower and upper blephs op 2 ?�?
review_body: I had my lower and upper blephs op 2 weeks ago. I am the most nervous patient - blood pressure sky rocketed prior to surgery.  All I can say is that the care and reassurance I received was second to none.  My surgeon was Ms Lutz and can only be described as 'no nonsense, says it as it is' and is clearly a leading professional in her field.  She and the anaesthetist Dr Skinner made sure I was completely relaxed (OK I had to have beta blockers but I don't think my bp would have gone down without them as I was so anxious).  There was also  a lovely Polish care assistant in the theatre who held my hand and kept me talking until I went to sleep.  I should have been a day case but Ms Lutz wanted to keep me in overnight to keep an eye on my bp (normal as soon as the anxiety had gone).  Waking up, lots of care from the nursing staff who were very friendly and nice.  I was well fed and the room was very relaxing and didn't feel like a hospital.  No pain afterwards (although was given painkillers).  I am so pleased I had it done.  I am still not looking completely 'normal' (still a bit of swelling and you can see the incision marks) but I appreciate it is early days and patience is a virtue.  I would have no hesitation in recommending Transform - they have been fantastic from start to finish and their pricing is reasonable too.

Had a brilliant experience with Transform! My surgery went extremely well along with the recovery being as expected and no complications . I?��m absolutely over the moon with my new breasts and all the pre op appointments etc were all useful and I never left feeling like I didn?��t know everything that I was going to experience !

Had my rhinoplasty done yesterday (20th December 2017). I was looked so well after from my pre op to me post op and the nurses were all so amazing. i feel like my surgeon has done a really good job with my nose from what i can see, however i wont see the full result until my cast removal. only reason why i haven't put 5 stars because was disappointed in how my surgeon treated me as a patient. didn't really take into consideration what i wanted at first and i felt like he was only in it for the money and not my well-being. other than that im very pleased how it went as i was very relaxed and had a very pleasant stay at the riverside hospital in Brentford, London.

review_title: lovely staff and mostly a stress free process.
review_body: Great pre op team and nurses. Only criticism would be post op instructions for leaving weren't very clear and I ended up staying longer then required and then almost felt like I was forced out. So maybe just a little better communication would have been good, preferably not at 11pm full of painkillers ?��?

FANTASTIC   I would recommend Transform and the Pines Clinic and Hospital to every one.    The surgeons ,nurses and all the other staff are all really brilliant,  I am an older lady but they made me feel like a Queen.

Great skilled surgeon, welcoming and friendly environment by all staff. I would have given full stars however a little disappointed with an admin error/miscommunication regarding one of my appointments.
Excellent nursing care (I am a nurse so I'm a pretty good judge)
Friendly, helpful, professional and understanding. Thank you for giving me some confidence back. The smile hasn?��t left my face.
The clinic is amazing, their services are excellent, moreover the hospital services were outstanding.

review_title: Currently still healing but so far very ?�?
review_body: Currently still healing but so far very happy
Absolutely faultless service! Couldn't be happier

The process with Transform was effortless, from the initial appointment with the consultant and meeting with my surgeon, Mr Ahmad. The initial appointment outlined the whole process, addressed any concerns I had and was made to feel at ease with the clinic and surgeon.

Very kind and caring staff, everyone so polite and nothing was to much trouble, made my stay comfortable and provided lots of information both before and after the procedure. Very positive experience. Highly recommended x

review_title: Always have the most positive and happy ?�?
review_body: Always have the most positive and happy experience from Transform from start to finish everyone involved is caring, professional and friendly! I?��ve used Transform on more than one occasion and wil always be my first choice for and surgical or non surgical treatment! Mr Nathan is an amazing surgeon and I?��ve seen my patient coordinator Sharon and Nurse Annie for all treatments over the last 15 years!
Amazing surgeons, Staff & Nurses
Friendly, supportive, straight talking staff. Felt cared for from being to end. Would not hesitate to recommend.

hugely disappointed with my experience at transform Edinburgh! after childbirth and always having very obvious Asymetrry i opted for breast implants through transform, wilst meeting with the surgeon he reasurred me he could fix the problem with a larger and smaller implant, he also gave me the option of a lift which i expressed i didnt want as i didnt wish to have my nipples removed, plus i wanted the fullness and look of the implants, to which he assured me he could make them as symetrical as possible with implants, if I was told a lift was only option to fix them i would have gladly has the lift but i was reassured of a second option. i was happy with this and went ahead with surgery, after surgery when i was coming round the surgeon told my partner that he couldn't have made them any more symmetrical if he tried and was very happy with procedure, which i was delighted to hear from my partner as i never seen the surgeon again, however when i got home i had a little look and the bad asymmetry was still there!! only a larger set of breasts! i called and was reassured it was the swelling however 3 weeks later still no improvement. i went back to Edinburgh to speak with the surgeon who agreed there was still a large amount of asymmetry, in fact they still measured the same in different sizes. after this visit i was reassured revisional surgery would take place to fix the problem which i was delighted with as you can imagine how i was feeling with saving all this money for a surgery that didnt fix the problem i went in with, however 3 weeks later i  called to find out when my surgery would be and was told head office had decided that i must pay �2,000 for revissional surgery eve n though i have 3 year warrenty because my surgeon had told head office i was made aware that only a lift would fix my asymetry to wich I refused! this is absolutely ridiculous I would never refuse a lift if I was told that it was the only thing to fix my lifelong insecure asymmetry problem! I am beyond upset with this. I do not have �2,000 to have my right breast fixed! I cannot live like this it is very obvious in my bras and tops this has impacted my life and self-esteem hugely! disgusted in the treatment i have received, i aim to take this further!
Okay, so I just wanna say, ever since the moment I walked in for a free appointment these people have been amazing.
Professional throughout my stay

I am so happy with the results of my breast augmentation. I wanted a natural look and size for my frame. The surgeon, Dr Mashhadi, was brilliant and has done an amazing job, he was very carefully as I could move well straight away afterwards despite submuscular placement.

Excellent customer care, advice and support from initial contact with Transform. Surgeon, Mr Clarke was amazing really making me feel at ease on initial consultation, prior to op and post surgery. He also done an amazing job in surgery.

I had my first breast augmentation about 3 weeks ago now and I?��m pleased with my result , I was originally meant to have dr meliagros but unfortunately a week before my surgery he fell ill and wasn?��t able to performe my surgery so I was given mr nathan and I was super nervous because I hadn?��t met him and couldn?��t meet him until the day of my surgery but When I met mr nathan he was so nice and lovely and made me feel so at ease an comfy.  Mr nathan consulted with me and answered the questions I asked. I was originally meant to have 375cc but mr nathan told me it would be abit to big for my frame and also said I wouldn?��t be covered so I had 340cc on top of the muscle instead! I would have liked to have gone 1 size bigger but I was originally very flat chested and didn?��t want to take the risk of stretch marks or potential rippling. I am  pleased with the size 340 have come out at I?��m fitting into 32DDs and feel so much more confident in my body! The doctors and nurses at the river side hospital were exptreamly kind and caring , the food was lovely they didn?��t stop offering me food and drinks and the nurses checked up on me and gave me pain killers every 3-4 hours. The rooms were really clean and I had my own bathroom aswell which was definitely needed! The nurse at the Maidstone clinic who did my pre op and post op is also extreamly kind and helpful answered any questions I had even if they were silly. I had read a lot about transform after seeing loads of bad reviews I was extreamly worried about the care and service I would have , I wanted to go to mya instead but after doing research I found a lot of surgeons that work at mya also work at transform so I went for it anyway and I had nothing but a good experience. Everybody is different and everybody has different experiences so don?��t let someone?��s bad reviews put you off, only go by your own experiences.
Hi,

The Pines hospital in Manchester deserve 5 stars, the staff there are amazing. I've only given 4 stars because of some of the staff in the Sheffield clinic seem to have a bit of an attitude and not always truthful. My surgeon Olympia Haddon also gets 5 stars, she's amazing.

review_body: I had a breast reduction with transform on 6th December 2017. I was at the Newcastle clinic and my surgeon was Mr Paul Clarke and my op took place at the Pines hospital in Manchester. Mr Clarke was very friendly, he put me at ease in both my consultations at the clinic and in the hospital before my op. The staff at the clinic were very friendly and helpful. The hospital staff at the Pines were faultless, I felt really well cared for by all the staff I came across. I am now just under a week post op and so far I am delighted with the results.

I highly recommend transform my experience has been great. I was a little nervous about surgery but i had nothing to worry about as the result was fantastic. All the staff were friendly and nurses and surgeon mr Netri and surgery staff were professional, friendly, i was looked after at a high stardard Thank you Transform

review_body: I would recommend transform and dr Nathan to anyone. They were always very helpful and available to answer any questions I had. Dr Nathan also understood what I wanted and I am so happy with just how natural they look.
Excellent surgeon Mr Bhatty , excellent admin Sharise and excellent hospital staff . A pleasure .

review_title: I can honestly say Transform are ?�?
review_body: I can honestly say Transform are Amazing! I was well looked after and I am happy with my results.

review_title: Words can't even describe how happy I ?�?
review_body: Words can't even describe how happy I am that I chose Transform!! I went to my consultations at Roundwell Medical Centre in Norwich and had my surgeries done in London Riverside Hospital and from start to finish the service and care was outstanding! My surgeon is Dr Tsekouras (who is the most professional, kind, incredible man I know!) When I first met him he told me I needed a uplift as well as implants to create the look I wanted (which I already knew I might need the uplift) but that they needed to have them in 2 stages as if we did them both at the same time the chance of them drooping is high and my money would be wasted. At first I really didn't want to have to have it done at different times as had my heart set on my plan (about 3 years of thinking about having a BA) to have wonderful boobs straight away but I am so glad I listened to my surgeon as the results are amazing!! Honestly please listen to what your surgeon says they do know what they are talking about!! I'm 6 months post op with my BA and the scars from my uplift which were nearly a year ago you can't even see. Any questions feel free to send me a message or comment! Thankyou so much Transform for your amazing surgeons, staff and care!!

review_title: Only want your money, so called aftercare is false
review_body: Unhappy with results. They do not have a yearly review to check this. I had to book one in, only to find out they are now partnered with the hospital group. I waited in Liverpool and after an hour walked out. They was too busy seeing to ?�� new patients?ѝ?ѝ

Well I never !  I can honestly say I have never had an experience like today before.  The surgeon was running 2 hours behind and the staff didn't put my mind at ease... all I could see was and hear was discontent of how "sick of the company" the staff were

review_title: Many weeks on from Juvederm injections
review_body: Many weeks on from Juvederm injections, I still have lumps everywhere.

review_title: Lahoud does not care about his rhinoplasty patients
review_body: Transform seem very caring before the surgery - afterwards they don't want to know! Nurses are all lovely but getting an appointment with Mr Lahoud is impossible. 7 months post rhinoplasty and I have a large dent in my bridge which I believe may be an open roof deformity like I know others have been confirmed to have been left with after surgery with him - however I'm unable to get an appointment with him to confirm! At my 4 month follow up he also confirmed a lump in my nostril is scar tissue forming around a stitch that failed to dissolve yet he said it was fine to leave there forever?! The lump is very annoying. Overall I am unimpressed.
Great customer service and great consulation advice l have and will recommend The Transform Clinic to anyone.
Recently had breast augmentation and very happy with the results.

Transform were great from the start! Lots of info available online but also when you went in for the consultation, I didn't feel pressured at all! In fact they said to me "make sure you are 100%, think it through thoroughly". And they didn't try and sell me anything extra. The whole process was discussed and they listen to my concerns and questions. I think it's great that arranged me to meet my anesthetiser too! The staff were really friendly at the hospital before and after surgery. I was surprised at how comfortable I was after surgery- from waking up and the next 24hrs after.
