review_title: Really poor experience from start to ?�?
review_body: Really bad experience from start to finish, from reception booking appointments without first asking if convenient, to appointments being constantly cancelled, to the surgeons carrying out procedures which they felt suitable, not what I had asked for. Review operation results even worse than 1st operation. This company is not at all customer focused, it's all about what is best for them, with no consideration for what's best for the customer. This company's marketing makes it look very professional, but from my experience, behind that facade it's far from reality. My advice, AVOID this company and research somewhere much more professional and customer focused.

review_title: I had such a good experience with ?�?
review_body: I had such a good experience with transform and i can highly recommend especially Dr Giannas he did a good job on my twins had a reduction back in August 2017, my boobs looks so beautifull. I healed very well with no single issue , the incisions are so neat already disappearing. This has helped me with my confindence and my back feels much better. Staff were really kind and received the best care including the night duty staff. Food was good top notch although I wasn't able to eat as I was feeling nausea. Thanx again Transform will recommend.

review_title: would stay well clear from this ?�?
review_body: would stay well clear from this company. been left with a deform boob after 3yrs of having surgury.... the company are happy to take lots of money from you with a big smile but once you had the surgury they dnt like to take responsibility for the actions. staff at the Maidstone clinic are rude..... I'm now on my way to having to spend out more money in taking this company to court after following all there complaints presdure and they seem to change the rules lol every time you speak to them. think maybe they need some extra training in customer care and abit extra for respect to the aftercare patients. so wished I had gone to Harley street but they made me feel so good after my consultation if I knew what I know now wouldn't of handed thousand of pounds over to them.

review_body: I had breast augmentation in Summer this year. I'm sadly not that happy with the end result and have been told that I will have to pay more to have it corrected. review_title: Had cosmetic surgery on the 23rd of ?�?
review_body: Had cosmetic surgery on the 23rd of October 2017 at the Transform Riverside Hospital. Arrived on time at 8am and was admitted not too long after by a lovely nurse. The room she brought me to was all mine for the day and it honestly felt like I was in a 5-star hotel room - it was spotless, peaceful and beautiful!  All staff were pleasent throughout the day and very helpful with any questions I had.

review_title: Quite possibly the worst decision i ?�?
review_body: Quite possibly the worst decision i have ever made is letting Mr Mashadi anywhere near my body. I wish i had done more research before i put my trust and money into Transform. I would not recommend!

My patient co-ordinator and the surgeon were friendly however, I found my consultations uninformative. I spent only 10-15 minutes with the surgeon (the next time would be the day of the surgery) and most of it was in silence. He briefly looked at my profile and told me he would perform a closed rhinoplasty but did not go on to explain why or what a closed rhinoplasty was.

review_title: I can only praise my surgeon Dr Tkouras ?�?
review_body: I can only praise my surgeon Dr Tkouras has done a perfect job and I'm really impressed with my results, I feel he listened to what I wanted then he performed a miracle. The nurse jeanette at the Peterborough clinic is a real credit to transform.

review_title: Disgusted in the way I have been ?�?
review_body: Disgusted in the way I have been treated happy to take your money but not happy to sort out an issue when something isn't quite right, keep you waiting over an hour to see the surgeon

review_title: I had a Labiaplasty with Dr Joe Daniels ?�?
review_body: I had a Labiaplasty with Dr Joe Daniels and have been left with almost total seperation on the left hand labia and a hole in the right hand side which in Joe Daniels own words he felt the righ hand side was a 'good result'.

review_title: Real BA Review by an Ordinary Girl :)
review_body: For 13 years of my life I have had a problem with my chest. It was one little comment that made me so self conscious. After searching years for the perfect surgeon or debating whether to get it done at all I found Transform. From the first phone call I new I made the right decision. I met with my co-ordinator Emily who was so bubbly and very easy to talk too. I left feeling emotional as I never thought I could get it done. I had my consultation with Mr Maleagros who is undoubtably the most talented man I have ever encountered. We spoke about sizes and chose the right one for my shape. My biggest issue was them looking ?��fake?ѝ which on me I knew I would like. The day of surgery was the most surreal day. The whole run up to the operation I was petrified (more due to anaesthetic). When I got to Riverside it was like a hotel!!!how was this a Hospital. From the second I got there all my nerves disappeared,I was the most relaxed on the day of the operation than the whole run up. Before I went into surgery I had a quick consultation and draw ups and could ask my surgeon anything in this time. I went up to have my operation and my cheeks were hurting as the nurses were making me giggle so much, they held my hand through the whole procedure.i woke up and just burst into tears (for at least 20minutes) I just felt so happy! I just couldn?��t stop. From the second I woke up to now (5 weeks post op) I have not had one single bit of pain!like nothing!!!no discomfort, no aches, nothing! Even my nurse called me to make sure I was ok during the first week. I don?��t even feel like I?��ve had an operation it just feels like they have always been a part of me. Thanks to Transform, I feel like a woman. I have honestly never felt this happy in my life. I can?��t thank this company enough! I have recommended them to everyone! The results are even better than expected they just look so natural and even feel that way. My whole experience has been nothing but positives. Thank you so much Transform for the most amazing service I have ever received!

review_title: I have recently had breast augmentation ?�?
review_body: I have recently had breast augmentation  with Dr mashhadi and I'm so happy to say that he has done such an amazing job I can't thank everyone at transform enough that helped Me, the care they have for their patients is just wonderful I'm very very happy and I highly highly recommend! Massive smiles thank you all so much!!!

review_title: From my consultation I got lied to highly DO NOT recommend
review_body: From my consultation I got lied to when I arrived at the hospital for surgery the information I had received was all false so I was upset crying before I'd even had surgery which was wrong and upsetting for me to then be told I would be a size e to be a full c very small d, just had my appointment check up to be told more lies and unfortunately nothing they can do so disappointed and upset and angry and would have took my 5 thousand pound else were. Now I will be getting a second surger in 6 months to spend more money to fix my job so I highly highly do NOT recommend this place what so ever and girls who are considering breast enhancement with these please think before you pay there a company for sales not achieving customers results.

I chose Transform as I believed it was a long standing company with numerous years of experience behind it. Turns out I was wrong. This company is called Trans Form and was taken over by investors in 2015. Who have. I experience in cosmetic surgery. The staff are over worked and paid minimal pay. My notes have been lost , found , and I have also been left alone to view other patients files records (I.e; name addresses, procedure etc). Just terrible. I shall be speaking to the cqc in regards to my experience. Surgery poor and company poor.

Terrible, avoid them. Have been left with uneven hips, a lump just above the scar on one side, an ugly scar which is very messy on one side, numbness and shooting pains around the scar area still after 3 years. After the surgery I met the surgeon and explained the issues but he just said it would take time. Seen my GP and other specialists on the NHS who have said the issues are the result of the surgery and to go back. I was told by an advisor to follow the online complaints procedure because the issues were not right and should be looked at. I did not miss any of my appointments with Transform but they are now using any excuse they can think of to deny any wrong doing. I explained my issues so many times and they said just give it time which allowed them to leave it and leave it so that they can now say it has been too long. I am so upset because it cost me so much money and have been left with so many problems.

review_title: I had an extremly plesant time during ?�?
review_body: I had an extremly plesant time during my consultation with my pc gabriella from the transform glasgow clinic she was very thourough explained everything to me in detail that same day i met the surgeon mr ottaviani who was lovely knew exactly what i wanted, i didnt feel pushed in to having the surgery  i knew straight away from my first appointment i was booking in for surgery with transform,  i continued ro go back to glasgow for pre ops both nurses i met were lovely an genuine nothing was a bother to them finally on august 29th i got my mastopexy and implants at kings park in sterling, i cannot fault the team of nurses/doctors  nothing was a bother  to them from the moment i arrived at 7am till i was discharged the next day, my surgery went very well an iam over the moon mr ottaviani was a gentleman from the start of surgery he even came in an saw me before leaving to make sure all was ok the day of surgery an the next morning before discharge he came to see me twice before i left, i even came home to a card from the transform team which i thought was a lovely  touch, im soooo happy i chose a wonderful team to do my surgery ?��?

review_title: Called your Leeds branch to book in for ?�?
review_body: Called your Leeds branch to book in for fillers and botox.  I was kept on the phone for 17 minutes and was spoken to as an inconvenience.  I've taken my custom elsewhere.

review_title: I visited transform for lip fillers
review_body: I visited transform for lip fillers , and was left with several big hard lumps and told this was normal and would go nearly 1 year on these still have not gone  I now have to pay to have the fillers dissolved and re done by another company

just been for a consultation with mr nathan at the milton keynes branch .. ive come out traumatized !!, i waited 40 minutes past my appointment , and had a 4 minute consultation where i wasnt allowed to ask any questions , "IF I WAS A TALKER I WOULDNT BE A SURGEON" declined to tell me what size enlargement i would be having and was more interested in the paperwork and getting me out the door.. what kind of consultation is that !!??

review_title: My surgery was cancelled by Transform because I asked to see proof of implant brand
review_body: I had a consultation with Transform where I was told by Dr Nathan that the Implants make are Allergan, naturally I asked for this to be put in writing. I also asked for my chosen size to be confirmed in writing, neither of which were done so. I called and emailed to get this information but without success. I decided to turn up to the surgery when I thought I might be able to get clarity but when I asked Dr Nathan again he just became defensive saying that it was absurd that I could ask this and that meant I didn't trust my surgeon then instantly cancelled the surgery 2 minuets prior to my anaesthetic. I was shocked at his abrupt manner and the whole experience was unacceptable and left me in complete doubt as to whether the implants are safe at all.

I just want to say that dr lahoud is great at rhinoplasty! I had my nose done on the 9th of May recovery was a lot more than I expected it really does bring you down so anyone that is having it done your in for a shock when that cast comes off! At 1st I hated it and was going mental! But as time goes by slowly everything goes down and I can truely say dr lahoud is excellent at rhino! The riverside on the other hand is not so good nurses where lovely but not that keen on the hospital drs are very rushed not lahoud but drs that come round the next day and after care at riverside is pants! Very unprofessional! But I must stress that lahoud is very good at rino! I would highly recommend him! Transform are pants but he is great! Love my nose thank you pascal lahoud you are fabulous!

review_title: Firstly if I could give this company a ?�?zero
review_body: Firstly if I could give this company a zero star I would, they are very unprofessional I'm really unsure as to how they are still running the company.

review_title: I had breast augmentation surgery with ?�?
review_body: I had breast augmentation surgery with Transform on the 3rd of July 2017.

review_title: I can't tell you how much I love this ?�?
review_body: I can't tell you how much I love this app. I have tried so many different diets and exercise plans, cutting calories, jogging, hiking and would maybe lose a couple pounds, but would put it right back on. I started this app and lost weight the 1st week and have continued to lose weight each week! love, love, love this app. Can't thank Heidi and Chris enough for creating such an amazing and easy app to follow. The support team is also so quick to reply and fix or answer any questions. Thanks Sonny for such a quick response.
Had a Rhinoplasty procedure in November 2016 with Mr Khan. I am still amazed by the results.

WORST SERVICE! So I was decided to get Rhinoplasty and I looked at three main clinics and transform was one of them.. My first consultation i had to wait 45 minutes! Then after months of waiting for my chosen surgeon Mr Lahoud he came in the waiting area didn't greet me and said follow me and didn't make me feel at ease. I was really nervous and waited months for this consultation and felt so crap after. Then soon as i got into the consulting room he took pictures straight away and told me he couldn't do it and i needed to see ENT. I couldn't even get a word in so rude! After he was done I went to the reception and they didn't have a clue what to do with me and just said they would be in touch and heard nothing since. Private clinic and MYA service is so much better i went with private clinic in the end! They are very nice, the women came with me into my consultation and even after seeing the surgeon i had a chat about how it went. When you are paying over 7 grand you deserve a great service and to feel comfortable!
I had a Breast lift and implants with Transform and from start to finish the care has been excellent!

review_title: No Communication what so ever! Only got 2 treatments out of 8 in a year!
review_body: I started my treatment of Laser hair removal at the Portishead Clinic a year ago and have only received two treatments due to lack of communication and appointments, then when i tired to book an appointment in January/Feb I was told they had moved to the Center of Bristol.

I had a ba and my lovely nurse OXANA she look after me like a proper mum.this women she is so positive,energetic and carrying. I felt like at home.wish to take her home,if l would .only what l could wish for that my surgeon could me more open to me. I'm familiar with a bra size but not with a cup size numeration. Only one thing l regretting to go for a size bigger. 365 or 385 won't tell me nothing.
After having serverly uneven breasts I can now confidently wear anything I want to and feel great in my body!

I had been considering breast augamentation for 20 years. My sister had her breast augamentation with transform 6 years ago and was so please with the results and service I knew when the time was right for me I would also use transform. I had my surgery carried out by Mr Nettri on 18/04/17. I' am so pleased with the results, all my friends were amazed at how natural they look this soon after surgery. I found all the staff to be very friendly and professional.

review_title: Professional and good quality and fair ?�?
review_body: Professional and good quality and fair prices

review_title: Really excellent staff and after care
review_body: Really excellent staff and after care. I felt really looked after and safe the whole time. Love my results too.
The staff at transform were very professional, friendly and efficient... I was satisfied with the outcome of the procedure and treatment.
Great first experience. Kristin is amazing and made me feel very comfortable. Will be back.

Wound deffinatley recommend Transform, felt very looked after and in safe hands, my surgeon Dr Nathan was fantastic and was his manager Sharon. Nurse Annie was so lovely and helpful, all the staff at the hospital were just amazing, I felt like I had gone away for a mini break. I really enjoyed my experience.

I am a professional that works closely with the Care Quality Commission and my team received the grading of "Outstanding" by the Care Quality Commission. The word "Outstanding" describes exactly how I found my experience with the Transformed team. Friendly good advice, no promises and no heavy sales pitch.

review_title: worst experience of my whole life
review_body: worst  experience of my whole life! I would not recommend to any one I'd advise them to avoid at all costs!! Zero duty of care- once they've taken your money they forget about you!

Ruined my Nose,my surgeon no longer works for the company no surprise, Dr Khan ruined my nose, I recently went to an ENT surgeon who was shocked to find out I had apparently had my nose done by a professional, before even knowing I had a rhinoplasty the surgeon said to me oh my you have a very crooked septum, yet, when I went for a post op last month with a different surgeon he told me it was ever so minor and slight and that there was nothing they could do, I find it hard to believe a qualified plastic surgeon can not fix my nose! I was promised I could have a revision if I was unhappy but it does not appear I will get one. I have started a formal compliant.

Would never recommend transform. Got breast augmentation 17 year ago and never felt so let down. Got it done through Glasgow clinic. They still looked saggy after op. When bandages came off I could see no change.  Complained and was fobbed off. 1st surgeon unfortunately died so I saw a Martin Webster who was most insulting and told me I would be better off if I had spent money on tummy tuck. Next lady told me they should never have put them in and done only a lift. Gave up complaining  and just put it to back of my mind. But I've never been able to go topless . They are quick to take cash.  They have left me so unhappy for 17 years . Too late now but don't go near them.  Julie

I feel my that the staff were very inexperienced at Leeds clinic.  Could not answer questions on surgical procedure.  my adviser informed me she was new.  I did wonder if the surgeons were new also and after looking at reviews online, I have decided to have my surgery elsewhere. I did overhear the staff complaining about the their work load also, which I feel is very worrying. The lady who was talking to me was cracking her knuckles whilst advising me about surgery.?
At this state, I would not recommend transform to anybody.

I am really pleased with the results of my rhinoplasty and cannot fault the surgeon and care team at the hospital. However I had some issues at the beginning of my Transform journey with the lack of help or response after my first patient coordinator left Transform. Also there was an error with my booking on my surgery day resulting in a lot of anxious waiting. This ruined the day for me and could have been easily avoided with some improvements to the admin/booking department.
Excellent......would recommend,  Transform have made me a very happy person.

review_title: A few reservations at first but really really satisfied
review_body: I have only had my initial consultation, however they messed my appointment up and when I had called for directions they had me booked in for the week before, despite me receiving a letter with this weeks date. The clinic re booked and got me in on the day but much later which was inconvenient, I did quite a bit of waiting around and the finally saw Rosey, due to this I did have reservations but chose to go ahead and I was not disappointed. Rosey was amazing she really took her time and talked the process through as it was my first time, I was expecting it to be painful and it was minimal. The results were amazing. I wanted really subtle results to get rid of lip lines and she did a great job with no bruising I'm so happy. I will definitely go back to Rosey and would (and have) recommended this clinic.
Was a little apprehensive at first, but after several visits I wouldn't go anywhere else, they are so caring to you specific needs and won't do anything if they feel it's not needed.
Very professional from beginining to end would always use Transform for any procedures i chose to have, discreet and professional always.

Transform have recently moved base again in London. Since then, the level of service has deteriorated. I used to have a co-ordinator with whom I could chat personally about my needs but she left the company some months ago. Instead, I'm having to interact with the main receptionist.  Transform, get back to what you used to do best!
Professional & friendly. Will be returning & would recommend,
Very helpful knowledgeable staff. Put clients at ease very professional at all times. Great service offered and would always and have done, recommend
Excellent Service Provider. I highly Transform for all your facial fillers
Always had satisfactory results and enjoy the comfortable embience and friendly staff. Highly recommended

Transform were with me every step of the way through my journey. They had a very knowledgable team who could answer any little concern or worry I had. The team was extremely friendly and made me feel very calm the day of the procedure especially. The surgeons and anaesthetists are top class, I came out with little bruising and pain. I would recommend transform to anyone looking into cosmetic surgery, they truly are incredible.
I love going to Transform. Everyone is so friendly and always give you all the time you need. The aesthetic practitioners answer all your questions and support you fully.
I wasn't happy with my results & didn't find some of the staff very welcoming especially considering I spent such a substantial amount of money.

I had lip filler at Transform Fulham, my lips are lumpy and uneven and where I was injected superficially it has left me with filler pockets inside the corners of the mouth as well as a visible lump on the front bottom left side of the lip as and the top left lip being bigger than the other. I have had filler before where the results where brilliant...this was the most awful experience I was left so bruised and anxious I couldn't sleep for days.When I complained a week later and sent in pictures on email I was asked to come back to the clinic and the useless practioner numbed my lips popped the filler pockets and squeezed out the filler with her fingers leaving me with eyes watering and almost screaming in agony she also refused to remove the bad job she had done using hylase saying I was sensitive and needed to wait a few weeks for swelling to go down. She completely was rude and said " I shouldn't worry, not as bad a plane falling out of sky or a terrorist attack." When she finished this she escorted me out of the clinic and I felt that she could not get rid of me quick enough. I was left shocked and disgusted with her attitude. Again her attempt to pop and squeeze filler left me with further bruising and swelling for another week. A few weeks on I have a white ulcer on the top lip as well as uneven lumpy lips and the filler spots she had tried to pop are also still there. Transform aftercare is rubbish no one has bothered to contact me since. Don't ever go to Transform to get your lips done especially Transform Fulham London you will regret it like I have.

review_title: I hesitated before having a filler ?�?
review_body: I hesitated for a long time before having botox close to my eye which had become hooded, but with three very important events coming up this year I wanted to look my best.  The results have been great, with bruising, a concern of mine, no larger than the head of a pin. At least 5 people have approached me saying I look really well and I must either be in love or had a terrific holiday.  I'm very pleased and extremely flattered
They done what I asked for  excellent

review_title: Rosey makes every visit so relaxed and ?�?
review_body: Rosey makes every visit so relaxed and so fun. I see her for 3 areas of Botox and some juvederm and she's so meticulous and informative, I always look forward to next time
First class service, first class surgeon, first class Hospital in Brentford

review_title: I had my lips done and was so ?�?
review_body: I had my lips done and was so impressed, I will defiantly be going back

I was very nervous about having my lips done but did a lot of investigation and came across transform. I went to Edinburgh. I cannot thank the girls enough they were very welcoming, reassuring and understanding. My lips were even better than I imagined they would be. I love them. I have no issues what so ever!! I cannot wait to get them done again. My confidence is so much better, I didn't think lip filler could change your life but I swear they have. I'm over the moon!! :)

review_title: I will never use Transform again
review_body: I will never use Transform again. Shocking service.
Fantastic service!! Would really recommend. Really pleased with the person that did the work for me nothing too much trouble.

review_title: I had an experience that I wouldn't ?�?
review_body: I had an experience that I wouldn't expect from a service provider on this level. My observations are as follows

Fantastic customer service from the initial appointment with sharise the patient advisor to the post operation appointments! Mr Netri performed my breast augmentation and was so friendly and approachable, I had no fears having my surgery done. The nurse was also very friendly and helpful and Sharise made me feel at ease from my first meeting. Cannot recommend them enough!

I have had a great experience with Transform from my very first contact after enquiring online up til present. Staff at the Glasgow clinic are very friendly, efficient and on hand for any queries I had. Kept in contact with me right up until the day before my procedure informing me of changes and theatre schedule personally by telpephone. My experience with my chosen Consultan/Surgeon Mr Fitzpatrick was fantastic, very thorough during my consultation, he spent lots of time explaining in detail the procedure, all of my options, answered all my questions. He also gave me things I may wish to think about and to ask him, which I had an opportunity to do before my surgery. I also seen him immediately after my procedure and first thing the next morning, I found him to be highly professional, thorough and very approachable. I have had my post operative check up with the nursing staff in Glasgow and again with my consultant. I am delighted with my procedure and my results from my surgery. I've had an amazing experience with Transform in Glasgow and I would highly recommend!

review_title: transform is very professional and the ?�?
review_body: transform is very professional and the staff are very nice people would fully recommend them
Had rhinoplasty with Mr Srouji and very happy with the results.
I had my breast augmentation some time ago now, however my experience is one I still remember with complete clarity.

review_title: From my consultation to seeing the ?�?
review_body: From my consultation to seeing the surgeon,getting to the hospital and my aftercare was second to none! I would highly recommend Transform to everyone who is interested!!!

review_title: I have already recommended someone who ?�?
review_body: I have already recommended someone who has already had surgery. I was very pleased with my results and my surgeon. I was left waiting quite a while prior to surgery tho and the appointment / time I was seen re surgery appointments and consultations weren't very organised
I had a breast augmentation & uplift everyone was so nice & helpful . My stay in hospital was very relaxing & everyone made me feel very welcome .

review_title: Very impressed with Transform they were ?�?
review_body: Very impressed with Transform they were very professional and caring. They kept you informed of everything and were always on hand to help. Would definitely recommend.

review_title: The actually procedure went exactly how ?�?
review_body: The actually procedure went exactly how I wished. Mr Clarke, my surgeon in an extremely well mannered, respectable and easily to warm to chap!

review_title: Really bad after care from Bristol  ?�?
review_body: Really bad after care from Bristol  clinic I had to keeping ring no one  answered ,  went to appointments and they moved ,  even Southampton nurse said about that after-care clip's still left in my head ,  Southampton nurse couldn't get  it's out because they're into deep went to see surgeon Nathan he said its okay ? But I still have clips in my head 3 time sent to wrong place because are moving , then not ?  Bad communication,,,, I understand the  closure of the Portishead clinic ? It's about I should of  known  before I  left my house for the appointment where I had to go , not ringing to let me know , 3 days  wasting my time trying to get my clips out , finding more clips the pain of  infections because of the clips still there  , trying to get someone to help ? Finally finally getting through to Jenny  bristol clinic she said she would get back to me that day , didn't  bother ringing me back , now  nearly 4 months on  in pain with clips I'm not happy , I  did my research with the other companies and pick transform because of the better after-care ,  which was important to me and I feel let down  with the after-care and the result

review_title: Excellent service from all the staff at ?�?
review_body: Excellent service from all the staff at Transform.  Very happy :)
My experience is something I will never forgot as I was looked after by the most friendliest staff and consultants. I never felt uncomfortable and would recommend to anybody.

Difficult getting adequate aftercare as bristol clinic shut for clinical purposes. Phonecards not answered and emails not replied to. Have had to train to southampton 3 times for dressing changes as having problems with slow healing. Initially I felt abandoned having left the hospitalon sunday with drains in that needed to come out on mon /Tues  it took me 5 days to get this arranged and done hence they were very painful on removal.
Generally, my experience has been positive. The surgery went well, the hospital was nice and the staff are friendly.

review_title: Would never recommend transform to any ?�?
review_body: Would never recommend transform to any 1 you are given wrong information from the sales people (coordinator) and after they have your money they couldn't care less !!!
Was fantastic hospital in London , staff carnt do enough for you , surgeon lovely , well pleased with the out come :) , most definitely recommend

review_title: I would highly recommend transform from ?�?
review_body: I would highly recommend transform from start to finish it was flawless fantastic staff and brilliant consultant

I had my breast augmentation in January with Mr Netri at transform . I couldn't fault the whole experience from start to Finnish it was amazing , my patient coordinator Sharice was so professional and very easy to talk to an I felt so comfortable with her. Defo recommended.

review_title: The doctors and nurses are all really ?�?
review_body: The doctors and nurses are all really nice it was a lovely hospital everyone really friendly which made my stay very relaxin

review_title: Have to travel some distance for surgery
review_body: It's unfortunate that you have to travel to London for any surgery whereas before, Transform were located in the BMI clinic in Milton Keynes, which, for me, was very local.
Best life changing team anyone could ever wish to be supported by. Both experiences of mine when using Transform couldn't be faulted in anyway possible.

review_title: everything was as it should be
review_body: everything was as it should be, appointments on time, cheerful staff

review_title: I can not thank transform enough
review_body: I can not thank transform enough. I felt very well looked after throughout my journey and have already recommended them to my friends
5 Star, the surgeon is brilliant! and the Nurses were lovely, a nice stay!

review_title: Hospital faultless but rest of the experience well below par
review_body: I had open rhinoplasty with Transform in December 2016 with Dr Ahmed.
Good advice and helpful staff. Lot of trust in the care, service and people.

review_title: I couldn't recommend my experience enough
review_body: I couldn't recommend my experience enough. Sallie started off my journey with an extremely friendly attitude, shortly followed by Dr Meleagros. The surgery went better than i expected and i was back to normal within a few days experiencing next to no pain. The nurse was so kind and put me at ease immediately. Looking at my new breasts they appear natural with only one visible scar (under one of my breasts i have a tattoo that had an incision through and Dr Meleagros stitched it back up perfectly may i add) although it's early days I'm very happy with the nice neat scar and couldn't be happier. I've already been recommended both transform and Dr Meleagros to everyone.
The admin was horrendous. The day of the surgery staff were great but the appointments on the lead up were terrible never on time, delays, missed communication, errors!

I had rhinoplasty surgery with Transform back in February 2017 after being recommended by a friend. My whole experience with Transform was traumatic and i would most definitely not recommend them to anyone, not my friend or my worst enemy. The pre op appointments were fine and my pre op appointment with my surgeon Dr Lahoud was fine. I was excited to have the surgery done. It wasn't until i actually arrived at the riverside hospital that i experienced rude staff and lack of care and communication. The anesthetist was very nice and the staff in the surgery room however, i was appalled at my after care. I had the packaging TORN out my nose by a nurse, told i had to leave my room by 8am after being discharged, although i was waiting for my parents to collect me. I also asked multiple questions which weren't answered clearly, i even had to ask the receptionist on my way out, whether i could clean my nose or not. She replied, 'no you can't' and then a nurse came out to the reception and told me i could clean it , to which the receptionist then told me she was not a doctor and i should to listen to the nurse. Once at home, i had a few issues and my mother tried ringing the 24 hour EMERGENCY line, to which no one answered. We were put through to another line, and no one answered. After my traumatic experience my mum decided to come to the clinic in Southampton when i was going to get the splint removed. When we went up to the clinic, all staff agreed that the packaging should never have been torn out. My mum also wasn't allowed in the clinic room to accompany me when getting the splint removed, because of 'health and safety' despite informing her of my experience at the hospital. Annie, the nurse, was quite rude afterwards and made me feel very awkward. Before taking off my splint i did apologise for my mother as she was quite irate about not being allowed in with me. I wrote a letter of complaint to the hospital, to which they responded with a letter saying that as i apologised for my mother's behavior, i clearly thought what she was saying was incorrect, however that is obviously not the case. I tried calling the head office at the Pines hospital, and found that the receptionist was also very rude and abrupt and told me there was no one i could talk to about my complaint or any other matter. Overall, i would not recommend Transform to anyone. The way they treat their customers after taking their money, is diabolical.
Brilliant from start to finish with amazing results

review_title: Firstly I am over the moon with my new ?�?
review_body: Firstly I am over the moon with my new nose results I cannot fault the surgeon at all he really has changed my life for the better.

review_title: Shop around, I would not recommend
review_body: When you first approach Transform, they are very quick and efficient.  they do have an element of hard sell which is disconcerting if you are getting surgery.

review_title: Cannot fault the experience i had at ?�?
review_body: Cannot fault the experience i had at Pines hospital all the staff were fantastic! Sheffield clinic on the other hand are the most unorganized people I've ever had to deal with! Lost count of the amount of cancelled appointments, late appointments, not sure why your here appointments? Which was incredibly frustrating when having to arrange around work and take time off. The staff were generally unfriendly and at times rude!
EXcellent would defo use again

I would recommend Transform because the staff are really friendly, the process is so easy going and straight forward. They provide as much information as possible to you and are always there to help and answer any questions. I had a breast augmentation with Mr Meleagros at the beginning of April 2017 and I am really pleased with my results so far even though it has only been 3 and a half weeks since my op.

review_title: WORST COMPANY I HAVE EVER DELT WITH

Outstanding from my initial appointment right through to my recovery. Very impressed & I would highly reccommend Transform to anyone

review_title: Excellent service from start to finish ?�?
review_body: Excellent service from start to finish - would highly recommend Transform to friends and family.

review_title: The team are truly excellent from start ?�?
review_body: The team are truly excellent from start to finish and months, even years down the line.

review_title: Plastic surgery eyes Lipo my flanks
review_body: Every one was fantastic very help full Louise coordinater fantastic. After care great. Big thank you. Dr netri did great job x

Staff are lovely and helpful however surgeon promised that I would end up with a full D/ double D after surgery and I am a large C cup. Waiting for surgical review and really hoping he will re-operate as unhappy with the final result
Highly recommend, brilliant care before and after the operation.

review_title: My surgeon Giorgio Netri was amazing he ?�?
review_body: My surgeon Giorgio Netri was amazing he made me feel very comfortable explaining everything little thing so I was confident and not worried at all about my procedure.  All of the  nursing staff were very friendly,helpful and  happy & nothing was too much trouble for them.

review_title: My experience with transform was ?�?the new me
review_body: My experience with transform was absolutely amazing I would recommend them 100% to anyone wanting help with the way they look .
Very professional, excellent results and good value for money.
Transform changed my life. All the staff were amazing and helped with my aftercare. Thanks mr lim for making my dreams come true. I would recommend transform to anyone.

review_title: Loved my experience with transform no ?�?
review_body: Loved my experience with transform no pressure to book they were so swift and professional with everything and my aftercare has been amazing so far ?���?��? Would recommend to anyone
Unprofessional Nottingham staff and only interested prior to payment.

review_title: I paid money to get a good shape but I ?�?
review_body: I paid money to get a good shape but I didn't like what they done to me even my breathing has been bad am going back to them next month and if they don't do any thing about it as am not happy with it I will make a complain about them
Felt at ease the whole way through from first consultation to after the surgery. Amazing team couldn't have gone anywhere better!
Staff have been amazing!
Extremely professional, made me feel like I was in safe hands constant communication and any questions I had there was always someone there to answer would highly recommend ??���
Transform are amazing,this is the second time I have been to them,and I would go again because all the doctors and nurses are so nice they really look after you.

review_title: Great experience from my very first ?�?
review_body: Great experience from my very first meeting to the after care. Always available to answer any questions or concerns I had. Dr Lutz was my surgeon. Very honest and I must say very good at her job. I can't fault anything. I would highly recommend them.

review_title: My whole case has been so horrible
review_body: My whole case has been so horrible. I was left with an infection to which another company had to deal with along side my own GP.
From start to finish, the staff were wonderful, couldn't do enough for me. The surgeon i had was fantastic. Love my new body.

review_title: Excellent service from the start to the ?�?
review_body: Excellent service from the start to the end

review_title: This was the easiest thing I've ever done...
review_body: This was the easiest thing I've ever done! All the staff I came in contact with were kind, friendly and more than happy to help! I'm so pleased with my results and would be more than happy to recommend to anyone! Thank you Transform!

review_title: Excellent care from start to finish
review_body: Excellent care from start to finish, excellent follow up post op and everyone kind, caring and have empathy.

review_title: DR Clark one of the best!
review_body: Excellent experience DR Clark was very good and all the staff were great. Good aftercare and I feel you get what you pay for
My tummy tuck experience was excellent....from beginning to end. The surgeon and staff were very accomodating
Outstanding facilities,clean and professional.
So far I've had a very good experience with Transform and don't have any doubt this will continue through my post op appointments.
Absolutely brilliant, felt at ease from the onset, loving friendly staff and surgeon.

review_title: The level of service I received from my ?�?
review_body: The level of service I received from my first introduction to the day of my procedure and leaving the hospital was exceptional and would recommend and I have recommended Transform to friends and family.
Great staff, clean hospital and everyone was friendly and caring.

I have had a faultless experience with Transform. The aftercare, procedure and everything else has been absolutely brilliant. I have recommended this company to so many of my friends already. I am looking at more procedures in the future and transform will definitely be where I have these done

review_title: I had rhinoplasty surgery in January
review_body: I had rhinoplasty surgery in January, I would highly recommend the riverside clinic where I had the surgery all the nurses there was lovely and was always checking up on me and my surgeon Dr Lahoud did an amazing job and I'm so happy with the results and would highly recommend to anyone who is considering the surgery!

review_title: I am really happy with my breast enhancement
review_body: I am really happy with my breast enhancement! I would highly recommend to my family & friends!  I wasmade to feel really comfortable & at ease every step of the way! Thank you very much!

I had a fabulous experience at Transform, the Riverside Clinic in Brentford is where I had most of my appointments and where I had my surgery. Breast lift surgery is something I had wanted since having my first child I had a consultation two years ago but as I knew I wanted another child the sales coordinater advised me to come back after having another baby. Which is exactly what I did. I had my first consultation in Febuary I met two different surgeons and Dr Ahmad who did my breast surgery was just amazing. I am so glad he was my surgeon. I was not nervous or anxious leading up to my surgery he made me feel so confident and relaxed around him. The nurses and the anesthetist were all so lovely and friendly and made you feel at such ease. Afterwards I was very well looked after. The food was delicious, the rooms are lovely. All of my post-op appointments with Anna the lovely Nurse ran smoothly. Seeing Anna each week was like catching up with a friend she is so lovely. I could not fault my experience in any way and I am beyond happy with my surgery results they look perfect and even better than I had expected. Thank you Transform this has changed so much in my life I will recommend this company to anyone.
Excellent experience with transform. Amazing how I now feel and felt confident with them from the start. All the aftercare was great well looked after whilst in the hospital! Can not fault any of it!

review_title: I am so pleased with all the care I ?�?
review_body: I am so pleased with all the care I received from transform. I was highly satisfied espiecially with my aftercare. The nurse at transform was very kind, patient and extremely approachable. She made me feel at ease at every appointment and answered every question I had either in person or on the phone.

review_title: Honestly couldn't be happier with the ?�?
review_body: Honestly couldn't be happier with the service and care I have received from transform. Couldn't speak more highly of transform at Milton Keynes, particularly Debbie and Lola and Dr Lahood was brilliant at reassuring me and explaining what he could achieve. The hospital were brilliant on the day of my surgery and I felt very well looked after.

review_title: I had a breast augmentation with Dr ?�?
review_body: I had a breast augmentation with Dr Ottaviani and I have to say I had a great experience from beginning to end. I am over the moon with the results and would recommend Transform and Dr Ottaviani to anyone.
Transform were amazing, I was so happy with the care I received, the aftercare and support and the price was fair. I'm happy with my results, exactly as I discussed with my surgeon.

review_title: Amazing outcome from my breast augmentation!
review_body: Amazing outcome from my breast augmentation, Dr. Massahadi did an amazing job and am so happy with the results! Everyone at the hospital was so welcoming and caring! I wanted a bigger size than the surgeon originally suggested but he did a great job making sure I was happy and comfortable with the size I wanted to go!
Fantastic service everyone was lovely much better than MYA ! Thanks so happy with the results mr lahoud is a great surgeon.

review_title: Great treatment from surgeon & nursing staff in Manchester
review_body: Fantastic surgeon Mr Clark and nursing staff at the pines hospital in Manchester and surgery went well , however the journey with the patient coordinator in Leeds was poor and her communication and service knowledge was poor.

review_title: The most amazing service from start to ?�?
review_body: The most amazing service from start to finish. Couldn't be happier having chosen to go with Transform.

review_title: My experience with transform has been ?�?excellent *****
review_body: My experience with transform has been great, from start to finish they were all so helpful 5 * company understands your needs listen to what you want always there to help. I highly recommend them. Fantastic

review_title: Transform have been amazing through my journey
review_body: Transform have been amazing through my journey - to the beginning, right through to the end. The team at Transform were always there for any questions that I needed answering or even if I just needed a little advice about something. Everyone at Transform were friendly, always smiling and very approachable and made me feel 100% comfortable through my journey. I would recommend Transform to anyone that asked and have already with a few people that I know. What a great team and a great place!
Couldn't have asked for a better surgeon than Dr. Ayous. 2 weeks on from my surgery and I had minimal bruising and now have very minimal scarring.
Highly recommended! Very happy with the care I received and the results!

review_title: Being left in pain for two years
review_body: Being left in pain for two years and palmed off to only now be told I either find pain management with the NHS or have my implants removed. Appalling. That's without the patronising surgeons I've had to deal with who simply do not care for someone who isn't happy with a half arsed job. After my first surgery which was a supposed lift and implants I was left with breasts that sat lower than they did before surgery at all. And spoken down to when I was upset at results simply to be told if I'd explained to my surgeon dr tskecourus what I wanted he wouldn't of operated on me as it's not possible. Yet I thought that's what a consultation was for ? Absolute money robbers no concern or regard for patients once they have the money aftercare next to nil avoid at all costs. I'm now two surgeries in still in constant pain and living a day to day nightmare which I've paid close to 7k for. After drs notes expressing concern for my welfare and a second surgeon opinion from spire head office have still no interest in my current situation and pushed me back towards the care of the NHS which after paying for private treatment is simply unacceptable. Edit : in response to the reply from transform yes I have been in touch repeatedly to be told my only

review_title: I'm 50 years old and felt my breasts ?�?
review_body: I'm 50 years old and felt my breasts had drooped so I wanted a implant  a friend recommended transform I was a bit apprehensive because of my age but from the moment I went there they make you feel so comfortable, my surgeon was Mr Mashadi who did suggest a lift and an implant , I really didn't want to have my nipple removed so just went with the implant to make them fuller, I love them I went from an A cup to C they look fabulous It really isn't that painful at all, my aftercare was superb I really cant fault Transform I've already recommended them to friends.

review_title: Without a shadow of doubt Transform is ?�?
review_body: Without a shadow of doubt Transform is the Very Best  all round, from start to finish everyone at Transform is with you 100% of the way.  Excellent Hospital in Brentford, from the moment you walk in to the day you leave there level of care is second to none 24hrs a day like there clinic in Norwich everyone is warm and welcoming and more than happy to go over anything that may concern you again and again, nothing is too much trouble you are made to feel completely at ease. I would Highly recommend Transform to everyone.
Great staff, very friendly , give you all the advice you ask for , explain the procedure clearly , especially advice after the procedure.
The nurse's were lovely..... however there were to many mess ups with appointment.... and my notes going missing !!!

review_title: Excellent would use them again and ?�?
review_body: Excellent would use them again and would recommend

I could not fault Transform who have been through this journey with me and reassured me along every step. Rachel and the Southampton clinic has been always just a phone call away and helped me with any queries I had. My stay in hospital I could not fault with regular check ups and every nurse was so chatty and really put me at ease as I'd never had a surgical procedure before. Unfortunately I had to have additional surgery for a seroma I had on my breast but even with that my surgeon Mr Nathan fitted me in between his appointments to make sure I was pain free and treated asap. My journey has not been as straightforward as I'd hoped but every step I've been reassured by Transform and not felt they were just after my money which I have heard friends have felt when going to other cosmetic companies. Thank you Transform for my new boobs I have always dreamt of! Am currently recovering from my additional surgery and so far looks good!

review_title: Absolutely brilliant I had a 2 night ?�?
review_body: Absolutely brilliant I had a 2 night stay on good Friday for a bust reduction my surgeon was amazing I am so pleased and the staff from consultations to the after care I have received was outstanding I am like a new woman I am so happy I chose transform and grateful for all their care love and support. The result was amazing with a speedy recovery and I'm only onto my second week I've hardly needed painkillers as I've been so well thankyou so much to all the staff at transform for everything
Fantastic, I look amazing

Transform were professional from start to finish. I had a breast augumentation. Before during and after everything was explained clearly, and the operation itself was a doddle! Very happy with all aspects of medical care. Over the moon with my new boobies!

review_title: Every part of mt experience with ?�?

The surgeon was very informative and realistic in what he could do, whereas some promise unrealistic expectations. The hospital staff we lovely and looked after me so well, I couldn't ask for more. I would 100% recommend to anyone who is looking into any cosmetic procedures.
I would highly recommend Transform.
I would recommend Transform without any reservations. My doctor told me my case was one of the worst he'd seen (ruptured implants) but the post surgery outcome is amazing!

review_body: Surgeon was amazing and im very happy with my procedure..after care with appointments are not so good and i found there wasnt much information on what i should do after my operation..
Caring and fantastic! Wouldn't go anywhere else

Fantastic. The after care contact and treatment is priceless! Even on boxing day I managed to speak to a doctor and gain advice. The staff are excellent. Knowledge about the product / procedure and manage your expectations from start to finish. I would recommend to anyone
These people are amazing! From reception to surgeon, I would recommend Transform every time :)

The whole process was so easy & pleasant.. this isn't my first time at Transform. The staff, all the way from the receptionists, the consultants & nursing staff are all really polite & caring. I Had my surgery just 2 months ago by the very wonderful Mr Tsekouras. My scars are already barely visible.. I'm super happy with the result.

Transform where so professional and very welcoming from start to finish. I decided to go ahead with my rhinoplasty and I have no regrets. Nurses where fabulous and the hospital was very clean and calm. Couldn't recommend enough. Best thing I ever did.

review_title: I've had two hair transplant via ?�?
review_body: I've had two hair transplant via Transform Newcastle. I've been happy with the results on both occasions. The procedures were carried out at their hospital in Manchester. The Manchester staff were all excellent and put me at ease.

review_title: from start to finish very professional ?�?
review_body: from start to finish very professional to your first consultation to choosing procedure to meeting your surgeon to the procedure being done. caring staff at riverside clinic and a very good after care . i'm 4 months post op and feel fantastic my surgeon mr tskouras was absolutely fantastic couldn't be more happier
Highly recommend, surgeon was great, after my procedure my partner has decided to go ahead with same surgeon to have implants and breast lift. Overall very satisfied from start to finish
Bad surgery. Not professional surgeon. Not good results

The hospital room i was allocated is in need of an update, my room was very tied looking, NO TV controls, the blinds needed replacing as several of the sections were missing over all not impressed, other then that everything else was fine

review_title: I felt that i was very much a number
review_body: I felt that i was very much a number. Surgeon sped through procedure like it was reading from script he also briefed me morning of op for another persons operation! Did not make me feel special. The team at the hospital were very good though.

review_title: Have used Transform since 2014 and live ?�?
review_body: Have used Transform since 2014 and live in the Isle of Man. I tried a few clinics but it was Transform that had the nurse in the IOM which would in the end save me quite a bit of money without having to travel back & forth for pre/post op appointments. Initially my first op didn't go to plan however Transform were more than willing to put it right this time with Mr Bhatty - who is incredible. The nurse in the Isle of Man was more hassle than not. She was continually late or missed appointments. Never on hand for any questions (I understand she's now left the company). The subsequent appointments I've had with the nurse in Liverpool has been TEN fold. Chris has been amazing. Along with her niece the best nurses I've had.

Good service. Very pleased with the Maidstone clinic. All the staff are brilliant. The nurse is fantastic. Mr Meleagos did a great job with my tummy tuck. The Riverside hospital did a great job, overall. Still need to attend two more appointments, but would highly recommend.

I couldn't recommend Transform enough very profession and helpful throughout and with the aftercare . Mr mahid was absolutely amazing and I am so happy with my results I went from a 32A To a 32C and I could not be happier. It was such a lovely first time experience as I hadn't had  any surgery done before .  I strongly recommend him and the company.

review_title: R E C O M M E N D E D!!!!
review_body: I have had two operations with Transform and I would recommend and have recommended them to my friends and family!

review_title: Take time to research all options
review_body: Initial appointsment were great, pre op was great day of surgery was a horrible experience. I complained and got a long reply but no apology on how I'd been treated. After care has been good. The communication between centres and consultant is terrible and this is where my problems started. I'm not sure I'd chose them again after my experience however I am happy with the results.
Great exsperiance well looked after

review_title: I thought the service from reception
review_body: I thought the service from reception staff to the nurses and consultant Mr Bahaty was fantastic would definitely recommend.
I would never recommend transform to any of my friends or any one in the world for that matter!!
Couldn't fault them at all.
Very impressed, looked after from the first appt. hospital experience fantastic, felt like royalty being looked after. From the receptionist to surgeon, very friendly and explained things thourgh.
Absolutely no problems, well taken care of before during and after surgery

I had an excellent experience with Transform for a competitive price. Their follow up care was brilliant. I would go back to Transform in the future should I wish to have any other cosmetic procedures.

My experience with transform has been amazing... from my first consultation up until today (10 weeks PO) amazing staff looked after me so well after my surgery, my surgeon was amazing gave me exactly what I wanted, always there if you need them, can't fault them in anyway... HIGHLY RECOMMEND!

review_title: I can't even begin to explain...
review_body: I can't even begin to explain the change I have seen in myself over the past 3 weeks after having my tummy tuck.
Amazing company, couldnt recomend enough. Perfect
Fantastic service, trusted, professional and the only place I would go for all my surgery or beauty requirements

review_title: I was very happy with my decision until now!!
review_body: I was very happy with my decision to go with Transform for my breast augmentation until after my 6 week check up. My swelling had gone down and they were not the size I wanted at all, they are also very far apart which is what I said I didn't want. They also sit too low. The shape is not good either. They do not look like they are 'fake' at all. I am not happy at all now!

review_title: Fairly easy journey I would recommend ?�?
review_body: Fairly easy journey I would recommend anyone wanting a rhinoplasty!

review_title: I had a ba and uplift with dr Clarke ?�?
review_body: I had a ba and uplift with dr Clarke and I'm absolutely happy with my new boobs the scars are amazing and all the staff at nottingham and the hospital in Manchester was all amazing and couldn't help enough thank you

review_title: Very happy with the results of my ?�?
review_body: Very happy with the results of my breast augmentation from dr netri but the nursing and aftercare from the Leeds office has been poor.maybe better staff training about the processes is in order
From start to finish exemplary.  Would definitely  recommend.  Staff so friendly and helpful.  The day of my procedure went smoothly .. just 10 out 10

review_title: Transform deformed my body!!!!!!NEVER GO THERE
review_body: Transform deformed my body, I had the worst experience of my life with transform. Dr Khan is awful and would never recommend him. I spent � 5200 for dr Khan rubbish and terrible implants, then he did not want to correct  his huge mistake leaving a  13 cm gap between each breast and one breast was lower than the other , he just sent me away looking deformed. I urge the public do not have implants with transform they know how to take your money then your nightmare begins. One doctor will cover up the other doctor when you complain. So please do not use transform , especially Dr Khan!
Fantastic results
I am very pleased, thank you!

I'm now 10 days post op, i had a lovely experience with Transform clinic, the nurses where brilliant, checking on me every 2 hours and giving me the best possible treatment. I'm in no pain what so ever!!

I'm due to have rhinoplasty next month and My experience with transform has been terrible. Lack of communication to the point where I don't know what's going on, they've changed appointments without telling me and I've ended up going to the wrong clinics because of this and missing appointments and wasting my time. The surgeon and nurse have been fantastic so far but the administration staff are so unprofessional and will fob you off with anything so you stop ringing them. If my operation wasn't all paid and booked in, I would have definitely changed to a different company.

I first had surgery with Transform back in 2010. I went from an A cup to a E cup. At the time I felt my experience went very well but looking back I didnt really know much, all I knew is that I wanted bigger breasts. Which I felt I got.
I am so happy with the outcome of my breast enlargement. It's made me so much more confident after having all my kids. I can't thank transform or mr khan enough.
I wrote a letter of complaint. The response i received from Transform is dissatisfactory.
Had a breast uplift and implant- surgery fine.
I chose Transform as they had been personally recommended by friends and family.
Really pleased  with my results .all staff were friendly. And the sugion and anathetist were really lovely .

I am happy with my results, But I did want more reassurance before my operation from the nurses  as I'd never been under before an I did explain this as I was nervous but it felt rushed as I wasn't really spoken to  much while I was heading to the operation room ,  my after care wasn't that great  I didn't receive calls when I was told I would,I did recieve apologies for this the food was ok but your kind of left unless you ring a bell,But night staff was great popping in without having to  use the Bell.
Having surgery was one of the best decisions I've ever made & that's down to transform. From my first clinic visit through to my last has been very professional. The results are amazing I'm so happy!

When making the decision to have the surgery everyone was really caring and supportive after deciding to go ahead it was all about the money. I didn't rate the care or environment of the riverside hospital at all infact found one of the nurses to be quite rude. Surgery was running very late on the day and I kept having to ask for updates rather than be informed by them. In the end I had not eaten or had anything to drink (including water) in over 12 hours.
Transform impressed me from start to finish. I was welcomed for all my appointments by lovely staff and was made to feel at ease about my surgery.

Transform are an amazing company.  From their receptionists to their surgeons every single one of them are fantastic. They make you feel comfortable and do not pressure you into anything. I was given as much time as I needed to make the right decision for me but they were always there if I needed any help. I was well looked after before, during and after my surgery. I am more than happy with my results from my breast augmentation surgery and would highly recommend Transform to anyone looking to improve their body in anyway. Best money I've ever spent. I feel more confident in myself now glad I done it. A special thank you to Martine in the Glasgow branch and my surgeon Michele Antonacci. Couldn't have done this without uz.
I had Mr meleagrous from transform. My whole experience  has been fantastic. I couldn't be happier with the results.

From start to finish my whole experience was excellent. Kind , considerate & professional consultations, impeccable care at Pines Manchester by wonderful staff who answered my every query & nothing was any bother to them. Fantastic care at local Carlisle clinic . Telephone follow ups by nurses and patient coordinator. Over the moon with results.
Ive been with Transform twice now for breast augmentation, 16 years ago and September this year to have them done again, very happy with all aspects of care and advice, I wouldn't go anywhere else
honest , efficient and no fuss!!
Great friendly staff & I felt very comfortable & at ease when I go for my repeat face & lip fillers
It was so easy from start to finish, the staff, the surgeon, the hospital, the recovery and no pain whatsoever! Exceeded all my expectations and soothed my worries! Strangely I actually enjoyed it
Staff lovely and caring. Whole experience was great can't fault anything.

review_title: From start to ongoing care Transform are highly recommended.
review_body: From the start every member of staff where amazing at looking after me and made me feel very comfortable and confident.

review_title: Excellent care before during and after my surgery
review_body: I couldn't have asked for anything more from the planning and preparation before my surgery to the care and attention I got in the hospital. Mr Clarke was fantastic, the nurses were all amazing and all of my after care was brilliant
It waa my first visit and everyone's very friendly and approachable.

The team at transform were great , from initial phone call the lady was so polite and helpful , the patient co-ordinator was great I felt no pressure to go through with any procedure . The procedure was done on another day everything explained fully so I understood all the risks involved but felt completely at ease . I had the Botox done after just 5 days I love the results already will be going back in future ! Thank you transform team !!!
I have never had botox before.so this was my first ever treatment :)
Would highly recommend***** The very best Botox I have ever had!

review_title: I am so happy I went with transform
review_body: everything about transform was amazing! my consultant Emily was incredible...she was with my the whole way through the process and I couldn't of thanked her enough. I wasn't sure on my sizing and she met with me again and helped settle my mind. so professional but so welcoming. I would recommend to anyone! thank you Emily! thank you transform

I have to be honest, my overall experience of The Pines Hospital was generally disappointing. The sales pitch referred to luxurious rooms and executive chefs, in reality I had a basic room with a 14" portable TV on top of a wardrobe, the TV didn't work!!!!
Thanks to all the staff at Transform, my recent lip enhancement decision was calm and informed and the appointment went very smoothly.

Transform were outstanding from the first consultation. Larna (my coordinator) is lovely and gave honest advice and has a lovely friendly manner. The pines in Manchester had a lovely atmosphere and the staff were caring and very professional. Mr Clarke is an amazing surgeon, I can't thank him enough! I'm a very happy customer.

I had breast implants some years ago and was assured they were not PIP in 2012.  I had my breast implants removed by the NHS in August 2016 as they ruptured.  It has come to light they DID use PIP implants and also used a bigger implant than was agreed.  I have complained, they are not interested and said Transform Medical Group has gone into receivership and to contact the administrators for any compensation request.  Funny the Transform clinic is still open in Manchester - how can they have gone into receivership!  Terrible Company.
Efficient, quick, polite. Makes me feel so much better. Need to go back.

review_title: Great care at the hospital but not so great after.
review_body: I was very happy with the care given to me at the hospital. The nurses were very friendly and attentive and I felt very comfortable and safe in the hands of my doctor.

I absoloutely cannot fault my experience with Transform.  Having breast enlargement has been something I have always thought of in the back of my mind but never really had the confidence to go for it. It was coming up to my wedding and I thought this is the time it's now or never. Someone I knew recommended transform so I booked a consultation. From then on it was great I liked the girls and felt like it was a busy friendly place. I liked the surgeon mr widdowson when I met him there was no messing about and was very honest with me about the pros and cons of the treatment and all medical factors. I paid my deposit there and then and had my surgery done just a couple of weeks later. I went to the Edinburgh clinic and the place was spotless and everyone really friendly. It was all over quickly and I was back home recovering. I am looking forward to going back to mr widdowson to show him the results but for me everything has went even better than I could have expected and I love the result. I would recommend my experience to anyone and if anything I wish I had done it sooner!

Run up to my surgery was fine. However they were supposed to tell my surgery about difference sizing... They didn't. After surgery AWFUL. Still haven't heard back from my consultant still awaiting refund 8+ weeks later really un happy with my results and I'm absolutely gutted I did not take more time to research and choose somewhere else.
I had surgery with dr lahoud on 8th august 2016 2 moth passed now still didn't fix my problem and the shape of my nose is not good which i was expected and told them, really disappointed
Very good service and honest

I was called the day before my appointment to tell me my appointment would now be at the NHS walkin center, after waiting half an hour, I ask how much longer I would have to wait, only to be told there was no appointment made for me. I have given 2 stars, it would have been one but the person I spoke to did see me after confirming I should have indeed had an appointment, however that was to the disadvantage of other patients in line.
I had my procedure at Transform and can honestly say the service and help I received was first class.
Excellent care. Results already impressive.

It was rushed, the hair on my face was not removed properly by the consultant before the patch test! I now got scars because my skin burnt, i bled around my lip, my skin felt on fire for an hour plus before calming down. As professional this should never happen. Im upset and hurt to have travel 2 hours to get there for this.

review_title: Very personal to me, very impersonal to transform
review_body: Decided that from a very young age, I was extreamly upset with my boobs. I booked 3 consultations, with MYA, Harley medical group and with transform. I was so disappointed with transform compared to the other two. I had a 5pm appointment with transform so I think she wanted to get home early!! This is extreamly personal and upsetting for me and I felt more upset when I left than when I got there!! No time to talk about ME and my reasoning for my augmented mastopexy. We're more concerned about what my mum thought and about what prices the other companies had quoted me. To me this was not important, as I would pay whatever to get my problem properly sorted. Comparing this to other consultations it was awful. Some people may have good experiences with transform, but personally I would not give them my money. Horrendous how inpersonal something so personal could me. Spend your money wisely and do your research!!!!

From the very beginning to the end I felt I was in great hands. Friendly, professional, helpful, kind, supportive are just some of the words I would use to sum up the staff and my experience with Transform.

Right from the start they were great. They explained everything to me, even though I had done a lot of research they made sure I knew exactly what to expect. The operation went really well, and I actually felt like I was on a mini break on the day. I was amazed at how little pain I felt in the days following and didn't have to take any pain relief for 3 days following. I would highly recommend anyone looking for a pleasant, professional procedure to come here. I'm so happy I did.
It was the first treatment and I  was very nervous, but I was put at ease straight away from the consultation right through to my treatment.  I am extremely happy with my result.

Just got out of Manchester pines hospital this morning, I was looked after from the moment I arrived at hospital the whole team was amazing and helped me during every step I did not feel rushed or stupid when asking questions they had time for me when I needed them. Can not recommend Manchester staff enough!

review_title: I feel like a friend, not a client
review_body: I've had a few visits to Transform and each time I go they are friendly, polite and professional. Correspondence is answered quickly and you really can ask the most stupid questions (they've heard them all before)
From start to finish, the staff at all levels were professional and courteus and did everything to make the experience as easy as possible.
The standard of care each time I visit Transform is wonderful. Every procedure I have had has been excellent with fantastic results.

On three separate visits I saw three different people and was recommended three different filler options.  On first consultation I was recommended a full liquid 'face lift', when I booked to have it done I was recommended to only have the lines between nose and mouth filled which I went ahead with.  When I returned recently after 13 months to have it redone I was told that it was a mistake/to never let anyone do that to me again, and was recommended to have filler in my cheeks only. I feel that it's pot luck what treatment you get depending on who's working that day and I do not trust that I am getting the best option for me.

Only down fall was a particular nurse in Glasgow who gave incorrect information twice. I ended up having to get  my surgery postponed for 2 hours due to being told I could have break fast at 6am! Really was not happy!!!!!
I had my breast enlarged and I can honestly say it's one of the best decisions I have ever made and the surgeon was fantastic
Lovely informative staff.  Hospital stay was really nice and aftercare perfect.

review_title: Excellent service very happy with my outcome!
review_body: Transform delivered a fantastic experience for me and I would recommend them highly! I was made to feel comfortable by the whole team and supported.
When I tried to use my points the price was the same whether I used them or not - rather convenient !
Excellent service at transform , staff are fab and make you feel really welcome and comfortable !!
The team at transform were very professional and made me feel relaxed and confident in having my treatment. I would deffinetly recommend transform.

Went to transform for an obaji blue peel and the nu derm kit. From my initial consultation with Kat who is amazing! I felt secure and well informed. The procedure was really good and my skin looks amazing! Highly recommend.
First time with Lucy. She was really easy to talk to, gave me lots of advice about other products and treatments I am considering.

review_title: Feel like I've been using Transform for years!
review_body: First impressions are important and on the day of my consultation, I was made to feel extremely welcome! No hassle, few questions and all staff very friendly. Flexible with payment and I couldn't recommend more!
Im delighted with the results. Im addicted. Saving up for my next lot.
i was more than pleased with the advice and treatment I received at transform would highly recommend to my friends ,

review_title: I think it's very professional.  but I also think it's pricing  itself out of the market.
review_body: I think it's a great place but get much more expensive  may have to look else where.

Met for a free Consultation regarding a treatment. The Therapist that I met with was very helpful and informative and honestly told me that the treatment that I was enquiring about was not going to yield the best results for me, then took the time to explain what I needed, along with helpful tips and advice on a home maintenance techniques. All in all, fantastic service, as a result of which, I will go straight back to Transform for any procedures that I may need in the future and have total confidence recommending them to family and friends. 5 star service - Thank you!

review_title: experienced attentive staff that put you at ease.
review_body: I would not let any other company touch me.
I was really nervous about getting botox but Kristin discussed it in great detail and gave me all options I was very satisfied with the results

I wanted my lips done to give me a fuller look I researched loads I went to a few consultation but didn't feel comfortable. I went to transform and was happy with my consultation and had lip fillers. I had a amazing results so so happy with the staff the service would recommend transform.

I've been to many 'nurses' at salons to have my lips done and although they've never been bad, it's just nothing compared to transform. They are professional and you know they are fully trained in what they do. As its a professional company you feel safer and covered in case you needed to go back. The loyalty card system is amazing. My lips are fantastic and I wouldn't go anywhere else now!
