My experience at Transform, Newcastle was very, very good. I will recommend and return.  Thank you.

review_title: Fantastic doctor - rally happy with results
review_body: Had the lip filler 1mm - advice was clear and procedure was really quick - really impressed with results - a service you can trust I would highly recommend Transform . I have had a breast enlargement and now my lips which were rather thin before - I would only use transform now :)

review_title: Amazing experience and amazing team ! Thanks very much I will be back for a top up on my lips when needed ! ?�Ɂ
review_body: First time getting my lip fillers and I was very nervous however I was made to feel very comfortable and in good hands ! Wouldn't go anywhere else.

Went to Transform for Lip Fillers. Consultation was great and informative, no pressure. Actual procedure was hassle free. Swelling went down within a few days. Wish I'd gone sooner! Will defiantly be going back. Can't praise the team enough.
All the staff were very welcoming really full of knowledge and reassurance in making my decision to have lip fillers. I will always choose transform really worth the money.

Everything was done so professionally even the first phone call I made! Kat was amazing in the consultation answered all of my questions and made me feel at ease about getting lip fillers.  Then when it came to the day of getting it done she made sure I was feeling okay and the Dr was amazing he checked everything over properly and talked me through step by step.  Honestly the best service at transform and I wouldn't go anywhere else now!!! What an amazing team!  Thank you so so much I'm so pleased with the outcome

review_title: If I could give transform no stars i would
review_body: I had my breasts done at transform and they are disgusting I won't let my partner near them I feel so ashamed I mean I didn't have much of a chest before but at least they didn't feel disgusting. My surgeon Dr ottaviani was useless and I swear I will never go back to transform again so if you are thinking of going there please DONT try finding somewhere better.
Have now watched what other professionals do the same work, very different. We should also have been shown the filler, and what the exact cost is, before it's done.

I had a very good experience I was not sure about the botox but after speaking to the nurse practitioner I was ready to go ahead the experience was far better than I thought it would be I will definitely be having it done again
Excellent staff and service, very happy with the result. Would definitely recommend to others.
Discussed Botox & filler treatments with Julie Jackson she was very informative & listened to what my expectations were. I am happy with the results
I found the staff very helpful and put me at ease.
Went for lip fillers in the Reading Clinic

review_title: Exceptional rosey is always a pleasure to see :)
review_body: I love visiting rosey for my lip enhancement treatment, rosey is always a friendly and welcoming member of the team. Though out my lip enhancement treatment she has always been supportive and professional and ensuring that during the treatment I am as relaxed as possible. I am very pleased with the outcome of my natural enhanced fuller looking lips. And pleased that straight after there is no bruising and the swelling is very minimal.

review_title: Friendly and professional but should have been informed of delay.
review_body: Very friendly, professional and knowledgeable service from all staff, especially my treating doctor. However a negative for me is that on appointment day I was not informed of an hour long delay in being treated! I believe this was down to short staffing that day as a one off. Luckily I wasn't in a rush otherwise this might have caused issues. I would definitely recommend though even with this small negative.
Would recommend you guys to anyone, I couldn't have been looked after any better and my results from my breast augmentation are fabulous!
Surgeon was fantastic and informative. Receptionists always pleasant. Consultant knowledgeable.

Fiona was brilliant and effecient. The doctor was highly skilled and im really happy with the procedure overall. I will definetely be coming back to Transform. Only downside was the waiting time. All in all it took over an hour and a half to be seen which was longer than expected.

review_title: excellent service, great care and lovely staff!
review_body: I've had the vaser liposuction.

review_title: Fantastic from the moment I dialed their number!
review_body: Fantastic team, you are made to feel so welcome. Could not recommend them enough
Friendly staff that are informative, caring and above all trustworthy.
The team is great, very friendly and professional. I felt welcome and safe.
Lovely staff, welcoming and very understanding, I would defiantly recommend.
I had 1lm lip fillers for the first time by kristin. Not only was she kind and gentle in her manor she was professional at all times. A genuine lovely woman and I love my new lips!

review_title: Expected more for the price I paid
review_body: Had lipo on abdomen and flanks

Greeted by friendly staff and seen on time. Staff that did my treatment were friendly and profesional, I felt relaxed and trust the staff (Julie), she listened and was able to give me the right treatment, i'm really pleased with the result and will definately be going back. Only gripe is the coffee machine is not very good, it's a bit confusing and doesn't give many choices for a nice coffee.
The nurse that treated me Kirstin MacLeod (Edinburgh) had a lovely warm manner. She was knowledgable and professional. I felt completely confident and at ease with her expertise.
Very good and professional

From my first consultation I felt comfortable and at ease. Having chosen and met with my surgeon I was nothing but excited for my procedure. My hospital visit was smooth, and I was given everything needed along the way, even extra time in my room waiting to be picked up 4 hours after my discharge time.

I am over the moon with my surgery the staff are excellent that is all staff from the clinic to the hospital. I would recommend transform to anyone excellent service well done everyone who works for them.

review_title: Good surgeon but mediocre customer care
review_body: Mr Lahoud is a very experienced and competent surgeon and i'm delighted with the way my rhinoplasty has turned out.  However, other elements of Transform experience weren't so good.  Reception staff at the Riverside hospital in Brentford were rude, indiscreet and made me feel uncomfortable.  I had two patient care co-ordinators both very young.  One messed up an initial consultation booking and later gave me wrong information about operation availability.  Both made me feel like i was on a conveyor belt.   The nurses (and indeed all medical staff) at the hospital whilst having my op were fantastic - I can't fault them.  I was also pleasantly surprised at how nice the room was and how great the food was - yum!  One criticism would be lack of information from transform about aftercare, such as how to look after stitches, nasal douching for congestion, icing etc - i wasn't given any info on this and got it from other rhino patients blogs which has been invaluable in helping my recovery.  Overall I would recommend Transform for rhinoplasty simply for Mr Lahoud but I probably wouldn't recommend them beyond this.

The staff at the Riverside hospital were very friendly and help put me at ease in going into my operation. Even though I can't see the full results yet. I am very happy with my outcome. I will go back for other treatments.

Had lip fillers done in June, consultation was very helpful and informative, given realistic advice and expected outcomes, got appointment in next week at a time that suited, staff friendly and put me at ease. Treatment was done in no time at all! No bruising on lips and very excited to go back. Couldn't recommend enough!

review_title: extremely  good in every  thing they do .
review_body: I have nothing but praise  they are very professional  in the way they handle there  client  .
I had my first lot of lip fillers & was very happy with the whole procedure & care. I had 1ml will be back for 1/2ml soon ?�?��

This was my first experience with botox injections and I love the results but I think that I still have some face movement that create wrinkles on my forehead and I think that the next time it will e much better. In rest I'm very happy with the friendly and clean environment.I will definitely go back soon  for more advice.
The doctor who gave me Botox was very slap dash even though I mentioned I bruise easily I have a bruise on my face for over two weeks

Outstanding service from everyone I spoke to. Listened, advised and answered any questions I had, put me at ease prior to my procedure and aftercare and service were faultless. Couldn't recommend this clinic enough.
Very professional. The practice is clean and modern. No question is too small or silly. Very helpful. So far I am very impressed with the service and the results.
Very happy with everything from consultation to end results, would recommend transform, mr Clarke and the pines clinic in Manchester are excellent
Loved my experience with transform. I spent years shopping around byt found transform to be the best in term of clinical skills/ environment / succsess
Amazing service and results
The care I have received in both the clinic and the hospital has been outstanding, I can't thank you enough as I am a very anxious patient when being put to sleep, staff are fantastic.
Had a lovely easy experience from start to Finnish. The staff were all lovely and helpful and made you feel at ease.
Phoned to let them know that I wasn't happy with the results... I was then told to just spend more money....

From my first appointment at the clinic in Enfield, all the way through to my surgery, Transform have been wonderful. The staff at both the clinic and the hospital in Brentford were so friendly and very reassuring. I would definitely recommend Transform.
I literally cannot thank and recommend dr . Nathan ,Transform clinic Southampton and riverside hospital staff enough .
I honestly cannot thank or recommend Transform enough. From their reassurance, professionalism, personal care and contact, Transform have gone above and beyond my expectations.

review_title: Excellent I am very happy with the service and advice I receive.
review_body: Absolutely great service, experience and treatments.

I have had the best treatment by far. My co-ordinater was beyond helpful, made me feel at ease straight away and has been there for me. My surgeon was a pure genius (Mr. Khan), what he has done for me is beyond magic. And the nurses, oh my, I can't get enough of the nurses. They are so good at answering questions, making me feel at ease, beyond helpful and have enjoyed spending time with them as they help me heal. My nurse at the transform clinic in Maidstone, she is amazing, has helped me immensely and has kept me positive, I can't thank them enough for what they have done so far. Immensely impressed and can't wait to have my finished results.

review_title: Excellent and professional at all times
review_body: I simply cannot fault any aspect of the service . I am thrilled to bits with the results of my Abdominoplasty . Everyone from the co-ordinators to the surgeon were brilliant . I would recommend this company to anyone .
The  whole process went very smoothly with care and attention
The nurse was great. The lady that put the numbing cream on didn't put it far enough round the outside of my lip so I was in a fair amount of pain having the injections.
Surgeon and staff at the hospital were brilliant. Really caring and I'm so happy with the results.
Excellent facilities and care. A very pleasant experience

review_title: Great results from Obagi nu derm
review_body: I went to transform for a Chemical Peel and the nurse  with recommended the obagi nu derm system instead. The results have been great so far and I am very happy with my new skin. The client service on the other hand was not great, I felt rushed and unsure of the answer is received to my questions.

Very happy with the service and the girls who worked there. Very informative and relaxing as I was a little nervous at first. There was a really  Friendly atmosphere .. Have already recommended to several friends and clients and family!!...
Found all staff at transform very kind and considerate. Made my procedure a relaxing experience would not hesitate to use thier services again. Many thanks

I had a cyst removed from my face which could not be removed on the NHS. The price quoted by Transform was at least 50% less than other private hospitals but I was very impressed with the service and aftercare. After less than 2 weeks the small scar is almost invisible.
Quick, simple, professional. They have spent time with me reassured me and cared for me really well I can't fault them
Had an excellent procedure in Leeds, but there needs to be more contact before and after from Transform to make sure all is well with their clients

review_title: Doctor great, everything else below standard
review_body: The treatment I had was great and the doctor was friendly and informative. I was pleased with the results.
Excellent Service, friendly, knowledgable and professional staff! Nothing bad to say whatsoever!
Couldn't have asked for a better process. Thanks to everyone.

review_title: Great Staff, not really the right treatment
review_body: My experience with Transform was a good one, despite my initial consultation meeting starting with a very disgruntled customer who was actively telling people to leave because all will be well until they have your money & then it goes downhill. I almost did consider leaving but was happy to make my own decision. The consultation was great, very polite, options discussed, long and short term and there was no pressure to purchase anything, though I knew exactly what I wanted so was happy to make arrangements there and then and stick to my own requirements, although other options were given.  My treatment, which was just 3 face peels began weeks later, my experience with the lady doing my treatments (Emma) was excellent, she is amazing, such a polite, caring and knowledgable person who i instantly connected with.  The way in which she did the treatments were fantastic but unfortunately it became clear after my first two sessions I wasn't getting any reaction or results/side effects, anything from the treatments which was very disappointing but no fault at all of the lady doing them. I think in the end it turned out that the treatment that was recommended in the consultation just simply wasn't what I had wanted/expected but I hadn't been aware of that until I started and just wasn't getting the results.  After my 3rd and last treatment I had some light shedding but as I am getting married in a few months time I had wanted something slightly more aggressive in the shorterm with some good results, to which I didn't get. Overall I was disappointed with the treatment as I feel I was very clear about my requirements up front and had to be trusting in the information supplied. I spoke with Emma who agreed that possibly different/stronger treatment was probably required to get the results I wanted and she was going to speak with the nurses to address this for me but by this time I had already spent �175 on treatments and didn't really want to start spending more when I felt like I had already wasted this up front so I decided to leave it.  I would wholeheartedly use and recommend anyone to have treatments with Emma but I likely wouldn't use Transform again as I feel that despite being very clear of what I wanted, the treatments recommended were not designed to cater for it. My appointments were always on time and the facilities were nice too, it wasn't a bad experience at all, was just disappointed I never got the results I had wanted/expected and felt I was very clear about this upfront.
Amazing service from start to finish! All went smoothly and I am so happy with my end result.

I found the whole process from meeting with my coordinator, to the surgeon to the actual surgery to be excellent. They are a truly caring team and my warmest thanks go to Lola my nurse who is always at the other end of the phone should I need advice or kind words. My surgeon Dr Tsekouras was also excellent, friendly, professional and I am delighted with my results.

All staff are very friendly and helpful however I felt like my questions weren't correctly answered by my surgeon and more time and care could of been put in by him towards me before and after my surgery to have a better understanding of what I was aiming for by having a breast enlargement

review_title: 3 procedures - all 3 I am incredibly happy with!
review_body: I would highly recommend transform to anyone. Great experience from start to end with 2 surgical and 1 non surgical procedure.

Initially pleased with meetings with both Administrator and Surgeon. Went ahead with surgery, but afterwards was not happy with results, sent several emails but felt I was being fobbed off, as they kept saying give it time.   After 3 months met with the surgeon for a review, I told him I was not entirely happy and he was very abrupt and suggested I still hadn't given them enough time.  He actually said "how can you say that, look at your before and after pictures, you had wrinkles before"  and yes they are better, but I still have bags under my eyes! When you pay a lot of money you expect things to be good, I didn't expect perfect, but I also didn't expect to still have bags!

I can not thank all of the staff at transform enough, for making my whole experience as good as it was. All the staff were so helpful and friendly and not at all pushy as I found other companys. So pleased with my results! The results are even better that I imagined!
Staff very friendly treatment done.  Did go back for adjustment which was no problem.  so far so good.

I fount transform staff very welcoming. The medical staff made a point of advising me to hold off from having treatment due to a medication that I was taking. I was happy of the advice and felt that they had put customer safety first.

review_title: Excellent quality, by people one can trust
review_body: Transform is an excellent clinic. They are proud of their work, and it shows. They make sure one is fully informed about any procedures, and do very good quality work. These are people one can have trust in, with what can be important choices.
I have had such an amazing experience with the staff from transform! Been very please with all the service provided and most of all my treatments.
Endymed �2,500.00 complete waste of money. Botox and filler results not always as expected.
looked OK fir 4 weeks after that hardy any noticeable difference

The whole experience was made less stressful by the excellent staff at Preston for the consultation and Manchester for the surgery. Mr Ali was really nice, helpful and caring and I am really pleased with the end result

review_title: Unhappy - still have what I paid several �K to get rid of...
review_body: There were lots of errors with my experience with Transform and no one has suggested how to fix them other than "wait" or they don't get back to you when they say they will...
Very impressed with the lady I saw to top up my treatment. Sorry not to have remembered her name
My experience with Transform, Mr Nathan and the staff I have dealt with has been second to none and I would totally recommend.
Had a rhinoplasty quite happy with it, with the three month check up appointment was a bit more thorough but I'm much happier now
From the very first visit to the operation and after all I can say is what a perfect and honest company.  Thank you so much.
excellent results following my bletheroplasty 4 months ago
very professional
My experience with Transform was perfect from start to finish, Dr Lahoud and his wonderful team have changed my life!
After several years of using Transform for non surgical procedures I have looked elsewhere for my most recent procedure.

This company is outstanding they've help me change my life for the better and done it with the best service possible. Anyone who's considering anything like this should definatly consider transform I've had the best experience with them and can't thank them enough.
Dr netri is a fantastic surgeon and anyone who has surgery with him will be more than satisfied with the results.

Was excellent experience, staff were caring and understanding to my individual needs. It was an experience personal to me and I always had someone I could phone and answer my questions. I had 3 procedures now with transform and couldn't be happier. I'm confident if you pick this company they are professional and you be in safe hands . I would recommend.

Staff very friendly and helpful, although were very busy the day I was there. However have used transform several times, and even though a distance other firms just have not lived up to the brilliant standards I have been used to by transform.

Botox reviews/top ups should be performed by any registered practitioner not just the one who performed the initial treatment. Julie Carson at The Pines is a fabulous nurse but only works 2 days per week therefore Transform should be hiring more doctors & nurses to help clients that have very busy work schedules. I've had to go forego a Botox top up because of Transforms inflexibility. Very doubtful I'll return. The receptionists & patient co ordinators at The Pines aren't very cheerful & fairly abrupt. Much prefer how things were when the clinic was based in Bowdon as you always felt special & valued there.

I chose Transform as I wanted some facial moles removed. I went in with an open, if somewhat cynical mind, and was very pelasantly surprised. First of all, there was no hard sell and secondly, they really seemed to listen to what I wanted. The most impressive thing was the meet with the surgeon himself - Mr WInter - who clearly had my best interests at heart and gave me honest answers. He was easy going yet very professional and put me at ease so much I had the surgery with him there and then.
Have recommended this company to friends, brilliant service very nice colleagues! I don't feel uncomfortable when going in for a procedure, come out happy everytime.

I've had an amazing time with transform right from the beginning. Staff are amazing and so helpful. It's very clean and tidy and extremely welcoming. I would not recommend any one else!! Thank you all so much for your time and excellent service! I'm very happy with my result x

review_title: Never again would I use this company.
review_body: So basically I had a labia reduction on the 10th of April this year, I had 3 appointments before hand all of them were rushed, as soon as they took my money I didn't hear from them again. I turned up to the surgery and although the staff that worked there were nice the surgeon was rude and didn't seem interested. I'm 20 years old so for me this was a very scary thing to be doing, it was something I had wanted to do for a long period of my life and I was extremely exited but very nervous. The surgeon was so rude that I almost didn't go through with the procedure. I would not reccomend this company
Excellent. Mr Mahdi my surgeon has made me happy inside and out. Over the moon with my new look! I will be recommending him and transform to everybody!

review_title: Great experience for my first time at transform.
review_body: Everything was explained well and the treatment was quick and painless.
Professional and noticeable results
Efficient service by the receptionist, greeted warmly and appointment was made to accommodate my needs with the practitioner I usually see.x

I had lip enhancing and botox done by Barbara, she was lovely and very professional. I will be returning to see her soon! My only criticism would be the receptionist didn't seem to know what was what but may have been new and I wasn't informed about the points card before my treatment.

Having undergone breast augmentation by a different company " a total nightmare" I was reluctant to trust anyone else again, as I had pip implants there was a pressing need to have them removed and a bad job made good. I put myself in the hands of MR Persico of Transform, from my initial consultation right through the procedure I was looked after and made to feel confident in the Transform team. Three weeks on from my operation I am exceptionally pleased with the outcome. My breasts look much more natural than the original surgery and my trust in The Transform team was and is 100 percent founded. I would whole heartedly recommend Transform to anybody, which I have already done so to my GP who as seen the before and after of my present surgery and asked who and where I had the job done as he has a few patients enquiring about breast surgery. Well done all the team at Transform and welldone.

review_title: Outstanding care at the Crosby, Liverpool branch
review_body: Outstanding care at the Crosby, Liverpool branch

I had my rhinoplasty done at Transform back in January n I could not be happier with all the service and advice I got.I've had a consultation with a different company before I chose Transform and there is no comparison really.

Love Transform. I'm a male been suffering from gynaecomastia since 2010. My story began when I started to notice my nipples getting bigger and where constantly very sore. I made an appointment to see my NHS GP, I told him about my Breasts, he checked them and told me just to take pain killers and not to worry about them so I thought ok. A few of my friends started to say 'your growing boobs' and at that point my self esteem was shattered. I stopped wearing tight 'T' shirts and started to wear oversized clothes. I looked hideous as I have an athletic body. Two years on my breasts got bigger and become painfull. The swelling became so bad that I used ice cubes on my nipples to allow the swelling to go down. I made another appointment to see my NHS GP, he then referred me to an NHS breast surgeon. He had a look and took a sample from my left nipple he sent the sample to be tested and said he will call me that day to give feed back, so stressed and worried I lost hope. The surgeon called and said nothing to worry about your just suffering from Gynaecomastia. I asked if he could remove it or give me medication to help the breasts to go down but he said it needs to be cut out but NHS have cut the funding but stated I'll try to put in a request. A week later I received a letter from the NHS saying that NHS will not carryout the operation due to funding.

Hi am a good customer of transform and spend about 5000 pounds with them so I was going back to have botoxs and they charged me 295 pounds for 2 area when I could of got 3 area for 295 because they did not tell me the offer was on very disappointed
Excellent professional service
As always great customer service and quality treatment. Would recommend?���
Wonderful care before and after surgery, friendly staff , I felt welcome, such as one of the family member . I would recommend Transform to everyone.  Thank you !!!

I can't fault any part of my journey with transform. From my initial telephone call to my 3 month post op check everything has gone smoothly. My surgeon Mr Tsekouras is a lovely polite man who has changed my life and I now have confidence in the way I look and feel.

Thought I'd invest in laser hair removal and have found the results excellent. The treatment was quick and so effective. My therapist was brilliant. Made me feel really comfortable and we always had a laugh during my appointment which is important to me.....nothing worse than inane small talk!

review_title: Quality treatment but time keeping bad
review_body: The laser hair removal treatment I had was great, especially as I have dark hair. However for every appointment I had (6 appointments- all booked for 8:30am) the clinic was not open and my laser hair removal therapist was always at least half an hour late. The reason I was given was because the traffic was bad.
It was my first time at Transform so I was a bit nervous, but everyone was so friendly and professional which helped put me at ease.
I thought the staff were fantastic and the after care is great the only thing I would change is the room were I stayed could be modernised it was a little old and drery .
Arrived at  reception desk (she was working behind the desk )to be greeted by the same person who did the Consultation !

review_title: great results, great advice, great after care
review_body: Transform allows you to take your time to make the right decision for you. They never rush you into treatments. I was very nervous about my first sessions of botox, Sculptra and dermal fillers but they put tiny amounts in and then I revisited so we could review the situation. I had the treatments over a a few sessions so there was no fear of the dreaded Trout Pout or frozen face. Other places that I researched did not offer this service.
From the consultation all the way through to the the procedure every staff member was polite and informative and put you at ease. Couldn't fault any part of the process.

review_title: Fab treatment - lovely practitioner. Love the results.
review_body: I was put at complete ease as I was very nervous - this was my first ever procedure.  The Botox was virtually pain free and over in seconds.  The lip filler was more painful but no where near as bad as I was expecting.  My practitioner was very professional, knowledgeable and had made the experience pretty much pain free. I've recommended her to friends and family - I can't wait to go back!
Did exactly what I asked for, they did let me know of offers they had, but they was not pushy.

Firstly when I first called to arrange my consultation I was given Sharon from the manchester office. I was a bit skeptical on the services due to previously speaking to mya and they were just so persistent it put me off. So when I met Sharon she was so lovely and went at my pace, she never pressured me into anything or bothered me with calls. Which I think from a customer care view this up there on the list of important things to think about when going for a breast enlargement

review_title: Great support through out my treatment!! Would highly recommend
review_body: I had BA, and it was the best thing I have ever done!! From start to finish, with my consultation with Anna, to the aftercare team Ruth my nurse, great support great team of girls.
Currently undergoing laser treatment for removal of facial hair. Excellent professional knowledgeable staff. Appointment reminders. Excellent results!!
good and efficient staff, perfect services
Always helpful and I Feel amazing !

review_title: disappointing results, that lasted about 4 weeks
review_body: On a arriving at the transform clinic i was disappointed as the overall appearance was more like a Nhs clinic than a private clinic -  2 well used  outdated magazines with stickers stating do not remove, not a good first impression. The staff were friendly but more interested in suggesting additional treatment. I came for one area of concern and ended up having 2 areas treated at the cost of over a �1000 pounds. Extremely bruised for over a week afterwards and no follow up aftercare. WithIn 4 weeks the fillers are already disappearing, although it stated they would last up to a year. Very disappointed and won't be returning
Fab lovely Doctor and fab Receptionist
Amazing company, changed my life forever and had the most amazing experience. Would 100% recommend to anyone looking into surgery. Simply amazing.

My whole experience was totally fabulous! I was so impressed with the level of service I received and my surgeon (Ms. Hadden) was absolutely incredible! I am SO happy with my results and would definitely recommend Transform! Xxx

Were brilliant when it came to booking me in for my pre op and consulatation with my surgeon and then my surgery. In my initial consultation the price was discussed and the additional insurance which I wanted, was told it was �150 and had that written down then at my consultation where I booked my op I was then told it was �200, you should of honoured the price I was told 3 weeks prior. Once I had my surgery went all down hill, I come round from my op and was sick 3 times so was given the anti sickness injection and it was directly in my muscle of my leg and made my leg dead for hours and hard to walk. Woke up the next morning and was released and allowed to go home, didn't have any courtesy call to see how I was getting on had to ring and ask if I could take my bandages off as they were bunching my skin up and causing it to crack and was really painful. Then went to my post op and was told my right incision was 2-3 days behind in heeling bearing in mind it was open with no stitches left at this point and was advised to keep it covered for 2-3 days then it will be fine. The following day it was really red, weeping, pussing and started to smell so called the Cardiff and Bristol clinics all day and left messages at both to have no reply!! Then rang the emergency 24 hour helpline to ask them and they advised me to go to A&E which is disgusting as I was a private paitent and hadn't been released from your care yet, she then passed on the message to Bristol and they rang me the next day and after speaking to every clinic you have they finally booked me in to see the nurse that day. So driving to Bristol again I was told that it was delayed healing and may be infected so took a swab and sent it off was bandaged up and sent on my way for another week. Returning the next week I was told it was infected and I needed an anti biotic prescription from London to then pick up from my local pharmacy which I then had to pay �5 for!! And to return weekly until they notice it's heeling so now returned this week for my 8 week post op where the nurse told me to take the bandage off for her to have a look so I led on the bed for her to have a look then she took my post op pictures and then sat at the desk to book my appointment with the surgeon leaving me to bandage it again myself and her telling me keep it covered until it's closed properly again. We also discussed the fact that I haven't got a patient co ordinator and I haven't from the start, who I should of been able to call if I had any problems. Following visits with the nurses where I was told to keep it clean and covered with the bandages etc they had used, they sent me away with just the 1 bandage for the week and none of the additional things to keep it clean and help it heal. So having to provide my own when I am allergic to most dressings from the high street. I am very unhappy with the post operative service I have received from yourselves and will not be recommending you to anyone!!

From the very first visit, 0to my post op treatment, I've been completely happy with my care. Having had consultations with quite a few of the company's, I'm happy I went with transform, would be happy to go back in the future.

Absolutely delighted with my experience, the consultation took as long as necessary to give me comprehensive information. The treatment was tailored to my needs and I'm pleased with the results. Personal approach, professional quality. Thank you.

My experience with Transform was first class, the staff were so professional, caring and knowledgeable.  I was treated at all times with courtesy and respect and keep informed at all times'  Follow up care was excellent as well.

I had Botox injections last week at Glasgow branch. I felt very assured by the professionalism of the team at Glasgow branch. Delighted with results and can honestly say I really enjoyed my consultation.
From first consult to check up after surgery the journey has been pleasant, helpful and professional from all levels of staff.

I'm really pleased and can't wait to see the full results at the end of my recovery.. All the staff are really lovely and very helpful at the Bristol clinic before and after the operation. The hospital was very nice, very clean, the care I received was very good just a small issue with communication between the nurses . Dr lutz did a great job and given me something to be proud  of. The after care has been amazing so far. I'm pleased I choose transform!
All went well for start to finish!

Could not fault transform at all! I had such a wonderful time when I went for my surgery and my pre and post ops, the staff were all lovely and very helpful and their pines hospital was lovely, more like a hotel than hospital I had a great experience and would recommend transform to anyone thinking of surgery.

review_title: i am pleased with treatment and will probable return for further treatment
review_body: I would recommend transform to anyone thinking of having any treatments the staff were kind and pleasant  care was taken in the procedure and everything was explained in detail.
Professional, experienced, trustworthy staff.

I was really pleased after my first treatment but really disappointed on 2nd had 3 areas and ended up with droopy eyes which I never had before Botox had to shell out on an eyes top prescription which made me look like I had a stroke eye drops went straight in bin I wouldn't ever go for eye area again !
Disgusting aftercare

My experience was absolutely brilliant the doctor who done my lips was lovely and chatty and went through a lot even the stupid questions and the other staff was so friendly i would recommend 100% will not use any other company
Fantastic staff, facilities and treatments. I have had surgical and non surgical treatments at the pines in Manchester.  I will recommend every time, worth every penny
I wouldn't go anywhere else for my treatment . Always treat with high standards of care , quality assured
Nobody tryed to help me when my procedure didn't go right and they would not correct the faults even when I payed �300 for my lips not happy
Very friendly people, making me feel comfortable, explaining everything , i recommend them to everyone.

review_title: No availability for treatments but only tell you that after you pay!
review_body: They were very good to sell the treatment (laser hair removal) but then offer no options to book in the sessions. Very disappointed and recommend people to go somewhere else.
It seemed to be a good deal initially, but I didn't get what I'd expected as the treatments had changed.

i have been a customer of Transform for at least 10 years, within the last 18 months the service and choice of clinic has deteriorated to an unacceptable level which has made me decide to find my treatments elsewhere. I have had non cosmetic treatments and surgery in the past so i am extremely aware of the standards needed to provide an acceptable level of service. I am very disappointed with Transform and it would take a lot of persuasion that the levels have improved to make me reconsider them for my treatments.
The prices are a little high but the results are good
I was  made to feel very comfortable and advised on which treatments would suit me..5 star service!

I have had two non-surgical procedures - laser hair removal and lip fillers. Both procedures I was made to  feel relaxed, everyone is warm and friendly and put you at ease if you're nervous.  I have seen good results from both treatments, very happy!
Excellent care. All staff were amazing. Surgeon did an amazing job very pleased with the result. would highly recommend
Took money made right mess of face

review_title: I was very pleased with my treatment
review_body: The staff where very freindly and made me feel at ease during my treatment. I did hurt a little, but over all  the lady that treated me  was very gentle.
I used Transform for Botox and Dermal Lip Fillers. I was welcomed and treated very well by all members of staff.

I have had my lips done here (Sheffield branch) numerous times and they know exactly what they are doing and produce an amazing and natural looking result. My lips have tripled in size and you wouldn't know I have had any work done at all. Truly natural and beautiful results. I am looking at having my breasts done again here and will also be having Botox in the near future X

review_title: Recommend to everyone, faultless service, perfect results!
review_body: I am delighted with the whole experience, from start to finish I have had excellent care and the end result is fabulous, I would recommend transform to anyone!
The customer service is  good  at Transform is good, however it could be improved with better special offers and competitive prices.

Had a good few sessions wasted at the hale clinic with staff that wasn't doing a good job and I wasn't getting good results so feel that my money I've paid for them sessions was a waste of money, I'm now at the wythenshawe clinic where I'm continuing my sessions with jenni who's does a very good job and makes you feel in safe hands but this doesn't excuse my time and money wasted as it's been a big set back in my overall results.

review_title: Excellent, I would recommend this company
review_body: I was unsure which cosmetic surgery company to go with, but Transform reassured me and I feel they helped me ever step of my journey. Staff were excellent and I couldn't ask for anymore from them.

I have had both botox and fillers previously at other clinics and unfortunately had a bad reaction to lip fillers, this understandably made me a little nervous at having the same procedure again.  However after visiting Transform and discussing the various treatments with Julie I was reassured and went ahead with the fillers.  I am pleased to say that three days later I have no swelling and my lips look really good.  I would have no hesitation in recommending Transform clinic.  I should also mention that despite being a large organisation I felt under no pressure to go ahead with any treatments at any time.
I would fully recommend this service
I am appreciate for the service for staff,nurse-they so helpful and friendly!

Glad I made the decision to go ahead with the procedure and was very happy with all staff that attended to me. I mentioned to the practitioner that I was nervous about the procedure and how it would turn out and she took her time with me and explained in depth what was being done and how it should turn out. Very happy.
had mastopexy with implants very happy with the service from start to finish.
I can only say that both times I have had treatment I have been completely satisfied with the natural effect, no one could tell and I have just been complimented on how well I look
The staff at the Birmingham branch were rude and unprofessional. I would not recommend anyone to have treatment there.

review_title: Everything a woman could want !! and MORE!!
review_body: Friendly honest professionals and true artists.

In March I had a breast augmentation, and am so glad I chose to do so with Transform! Was very happy with how everything went from the consultation to the day of surgery. The day of surgery went very quick! And the nurses were very helpful and friendly. Would definitely recommend using Transform.
Extremely put at ease and overwhelmed with how natural my results are. Have already been recommending transform to people.

review_title: I was extremly well looked after
review_body: I've just had a tummy tuck with lipo was much more painful than I thought it was going to be but already looks like it will be worth it Dr Mardi as done an amazing job
People friendly non judgmental would recommend to anyone. Five stars

I had Breast Augmentation with Transform about a month ago now and the whole experience as a whole has been amazing! From the very first consultation leading up to the day of the surgery i can not fault them at all. My surgeon has done an amazing job and everybody at Transform really made me feel comfortable and at ease! I would highly recommend to anyone that is thinking about any kind of cosmetic surgery too use Transform. You will not be disappointed.
I was made to feel welcome and relaxed throughout all consultations and procedures.

I had my lips filled, they bruised badly so did my nose I expected this too happen a few days later I developed little white blisters were the bruising was on my lip and nose, I phoned up too see if this was normal, when I rang the receptionist was really rude too me and sort of laughed when I told her what had happened, she got the manager too leave me a message which was saying they expected bruising and swelling so they couldn't see me till after this had went down, in the mean time I was in so much pain I went back up to the clinic to show them this didn't really resolve anything as they were rude and wouldn't listen to anything I was saying they just spoke over me, the manager then come too see me and got a shock at the sight of my lips she told me I had invertgo and had to go to hospital for antibiotics she told me she would ring me the following Monday to see how things were incase it had effected my fillers, I haven't received any phone call and now Iam going though a complaint proceedure as I have photos of before inbertween and after, the fillers got done at the transform in jesmond I will not be going back there and the staff need some training in customer care as they have zero

review_title: Difficult to deal with, very impersonal service.
review_body: A faceless organisation where no-one seems interested forming a relationship despite repeat client business. I often have difficulty in making appointments at times convenient for me and almost every practitioner seems aloof - this service provision should revolve around me as the fee payer....this unfortunately is not the case.
After numerous visits on veins and lots of time off work still trying to get the results after forking out a lot of money and extremely unhappy with results.
Hair removal did not work at all wasted one grand, they changed the machine after 3 sessions then relocate the clinic after 5 session. Will not recommend to anyone.
I would recommend it for my friends I received a good service everyone is nice there
Trustworthy, friendly, and expertly caring. Felt right at home and know if I need anything they are just a call away.

I feel confident in transform, they give honest advice on the best treatments that are suited for you, there not just trying to get money by saying the most expensive like some companies do. I feel confident knowing they are well qualified & use some of the best products & the clinic has always been clean with welcoming friendly staff.

review_title: Very happy with company but not 100% with outcome
review_body: Transform have been a pretty easy and good company to deal with all the way through the process. Everyone has been extremely nice and treatment in the hospital was good too. The only thing I would like to comment on is my outcome isn't what I was hoping for but that is something I need to take up with the surgeon and have to wait 6 months before we can discuss this any further.

I genuinely love the transform team, after having a breast enlargement I recently also had rhinoplasty with transform and didn't have a second thought about using transform for both procedures. The surgeon is specialised to each procedure and the staff in the clinic are so lovely and helpful. I was talked through each procedure before booking anything and they work at a pace that you are happy with. Would definitely recommend to anyone thinking about having a procedure - even if you are unsure the free consultation is definitely worth taking up!

review_title: left hand side of face improvement but right no improvement
review_body: Staff and ambiance good
I had a fantastic experience using transform. I would do it again in a heartbeat!
Excellent service and no pushy sales patter, Maria is professional and approachable as is Jennie who carried out my procedure.

I had a BA in March 2016. The care I received was amazing, from the initial consultation all the way through to the day of the surgery. I wouldnt change any part of it and I am so happy with the results. I went from a 32A to a 32DD and the scars are only about an inch and a half and already faded to a light pink just 2 months after the surgery. I would recommend Tranform to anyone
Unprofessional. Unreliable. Unhelpful. Will never go back nor would I recommend them to anyone.
Reena is always helpful, gives great advice and is always willing to talk about the different procedures I think she is a real asset to your company.

I had a detailed consultation with Mr Tahery who also showed me his portfolio and told me I could see him as much as I wanted before surgery. The aftercare was amazing, the nurses were fantastic and did everything they could to help.
Transform is very professional and has changed my life! Love love love!.... All the staff are very friendly and are great help thanks to everyone who is apart of transform you really are AMAZING!

I received the best service at transform, all of the staff from the receptionists to the surgeon I had, were all amazing and cannot be faulted in any way. I highly recommend everyone to go with transform for their surgery.
I would like to recommend this company to anyone,
so knowledgeable and kept me at ease through the whole process. They're really professional and friendly.
Can't thank everyone enough for everything,it's been the best experience of my life,if I ever need to use them again I will 100%.
I've had several treatments with transform both surgical and non surgical
Hi, I just wanted to share my FUE hair transplant experience which was performed by Dr Raghu Reddy at The Wellness Clinic, Harley Street in December 2018.

Today I attended The Wellness Clinic at Whiteladies Road, Bristol. I had a consultation with Mr Charles Ranaboldo. I was nervous about attending, but am so glad that I did.  From the moment I walked in the door I felt welcomed and my husband & myself were offered a cup of coffee. The nurse was a very friendly lady and put me at ease.  When I met Mr Ranaboldo he was very professional and thorough, but equally explained things very clearly of what to expect.  I have had my varicose for over 30 years, but having spoken to Mr Ranaboldo he put me so much at ease, that I cant wait to now have it removed and have booked for 2 weeks time. Thank you all so much.

review_title: Best decision i have ever made!
review_body: After years of debating a breast augmentation and a lot of research i chose to book an appointment with the patient coordinator at The Wellness Clinic in Leeds.

review_title: what a shambles of a company
review_body: what a shambles of a company. I rang them asking for an appointment to talk about breast augmentation this will be my 3rd operation. They had said they would ring back nothing after first phone call. So I rang them and yet again another call back promised this was 5 days ago. I've basically said what I want and even given them a date of when I can have op give or take a week. I'm not sure where there awards have come from as the staff seem to have trouble operating a phone with a sure customer who wants the work. Utter disgrace
Wonderful staff, always smiling and helpful . Dr khan was friendly and professional . He discussed options and clearly explained the procedure . Excellent experience and I love my result .

review_title: Great customer service and friendly staff
review_body: I've had an excellent experience with this clinic. From the moment I had my initial consultations, I was treated with great care, provided with excellent advice and felt comfortable in choosing this clinic for my procedure.

From the moment I stepped into the Manchester clinic until the moment I was discharged my journey with the team was amazing, they are so friendly and put me at ease. They made me feel part of the family and I looked forward to attending my appointments. My results are just outstanding and life changing to me. I would recommend The Wellness Clinic in a heartbeat

After parking easily right outside the Bristol clinic I visited the clinic for a scan on my ugly varicose veins. The staff could not have been more friendly offering me a hot chocolate as soon as I arrived. Due to child care I ended up taking my 9 month old son with me. I was dreading this but during my appointment nurse Katie wisked my son away so I could have a relaxing appointment. The surgeon spoke in great detail of what he needed to do until I was comfortable and understood everything perfectly. I returned to reception to find my son very happy playing with Katie. I won?��t be bringing him to my next appointment but if I did I know the staff would treat me with the same kindness.
After years of suffering neck and back pain from large breasts I bit the bullet and decided on breast reduction surgery.
Brilliant staff and very professional

I'm so glad I chose The Wellness Clinic, Birmingham, as my choice of place for my procedure. Right from the very beginning everyone was so helpful and informative, I felt so comfortable! Mr Kok performed the procedure and was very friendly and made me feel at ease, and I am definitely more than happy with the results! I would definitely return there for any other future procedures.
I had vaser liposuction 2 month ago.Everybody was very professional,helpful,caring and friendly.I was given every information I needed.The aftercare is very good.

review_title: I cannot sing the praises loudly enough?�?
review_body: I cannot sing the praises loudly enough for the staff at The Wellness Clinic in Leeds.

Had laser hair removal with Emma. Really pleased with the service and overall results of the treatment. Emma is friendly, highly professional and makes you feel totally as ease during the treatment. She listens and cares! I?��ve recommend her to two of my friends already.
Brazilian abdominoplastry.

Hi I recently had EVLA treatment at Bristol by dr rabaldo it was amazing not as bad as I thought as I was nervous but the results are amazing and well worth it the staff were very friendly and made me feel at ease after a week I can already see great results I'm sure after my recovery it will give me a new lease of life and my confidence back thank you

review_title: I had the best experience here
review_body: I had the best experience here, would highly recommend! I had my consultation in Birmingham where the staff are lovely (Steve was who helped me out!) and really helpful and friendly and then had my surgery in London with Dr Fazel. Super happy with my results! life changing for me :) Wouldn't ever go to with anyone else. So professional and perfect results, made me feel very comfortable and lovely calming staff in London also!

Six months after receiving EVLA and foam Sclerotherapy for terrible knobbly varicose veins on both of my legs , i feel i can leave a very positive review. Professor Rajiv Vohra who performed the procedure at the Birmingham clinic told me i would be pleased with the results and I certainly am. I have gone from hiding my legs away, even through the hottest of summers to wearing shorts and dresses at every opportunity, not thinking twice about it. The procedure itself was slightly uncomfortable but bearable, nothing I wouldn?��t consider doing again if i had to and all the staff were caring and considerate, keeping me informed of what the professor was doing and checking that i was comfortable at all times. Its taken 6 months for the bruising and discolouration to fade and i am so happy with the results that i wonder why I didn?��t have it done years ago .
I'm so pleased I decided to have vaser liposuction and fat transfer with Dr Wolf, the results are fantastic and 6 months on I feel like a different person.

My operation was cancelled 24hrs before I was due to have procedure. I had already booked the dog in kennels and paid fee as this was to be in London, booked hotel and could not get all that refunded paid for a driver to take me up to London and bring me back 2 days latter only to be told I now needed a HDU and that the only one in the group was in Turro. Said OK then to that, then got a call back to say now they didn't wish to do my surgery at all and would refund  my fee. well 5 days latter still not returned my money and now they have closed for Christmas. Less then impressed even less impressed by the copy paste response  that did not even get my name right. As to your care when you show some, I will examin that. Took you from the 17th to 28th 3 phone calls to secure the refund of fee.  You caused me to incur losses and expenses

review_title: Delighted with the results of my laser treatment
review_body: I am delighted with the results Ive achieved with my laser treatment by Maria in the Harley Street practice. I was a bit apprehensive at first, but Maria put me at ease and 2 years later, I've achieved results in underarm, leg and bikini treatment. Its so liberating, especially on holiday, to be hair free. I just wish I had done in 10 years ago

review_title: Left with uneven eyebrows after Botox?�?
review_body: Left with uneven eyebrows after Botox not injected evenly.

After much apprehension regarding having surgery I can honestly say that the decision to go ahead with vaser on my abdomen was one of the best decisions I?��ve ever made. Dr.Wolf and the whole team were honest and supportive and answered all my questions. The results were immediate and although I?��ve changed my diet, which helps, I?��ve dropped almost two dress sizes and a stone in three weeks. My MDL masseuse said it was the best surgery she?��s ever seen. There is a 24 hour contact number if you need to call someone with a question. I?��m super pleased with the whole experience and would recommend Dr.Wolf and the team to anyone looking for vaser liposuction.

Fantastic experience at the Leeds clinic. The staff made me feel so welcome and they have corrected my biggest imperfection and ensured my health in the long run would be safe, you cannot ask for more than that.
I have just had my very first treatment ever at the Bristol Private Clinic.

review_title: Lesley is the best nursing profesional I have ever experienced for Botox and Fillers!
review_body: I go to The Wellness Clinic in Bristol on Whiteladies Road and I see Lesley the nurse for my fillers and Botox.  Lesley is incredibly professional and able to put you at ease immediately.   She is honest and gives excellent advice and is able to point out areas that need a "tweak" that I would otherwise miss.   Her work is to an extremely high standard and she is so very gentle and thoughtful and always assesses pain threshold etc right throughout the procedure.   I would comfortably  recommend Lesley to anyone without hesitation even to the most nervous of clients.

review_title: I have recently had EVLA treatment on?�?
review_body: I have recently had EVLA treatment on my varicose veins at The Wellness Clinic Bristol my surgeon is mr Charles Ranaboldo right from the first consultation felt at ease very professional and friendly I had this procedure done over 6 weeks ago feel like I have new legs I have some more treatments to come but wish I had done it years ago great clinic lovely professional and friendly would recommend.

review_title: I am very pleased with my experience at?�? The Wellness Clinic
review_body: I am very pleased with my experience at the The Wellness Clinic I felt nervous before my procedure,The care I received from Khadidja Kaci was very professional but caring and friendly which put me at ease .. I would definitely recommend and I will use them again in the future

review_title: 5 Stars I recommend this clinic in full?�?
review_body: 5 Stars I recommend this clinic in full for the
attended the clinic for a course of treatment.  lovely, friendly clinic, good treatment and attentive staff.

review_title: The experience I had from this clinic?�?Excellent
review_body: The experience I had from this clinic was one of the best and friendliest I have had from any other clinic. I was made to feel at ease as soon as I walked in, everything was explained in detail to me, which in turn took away any reservations I may have had.

review_title: I would do it all again!
review_body: I went to The Wellness Clinic after being let down at very short notice by another company. Everyone involved in my journey was very supportive, informative and did everything in their power to ensure I had procedures done in a timely manner. My patient co-ordinator, Steven, was excellent, and listened to my situation with empathy and made it possible for me to move forward within the short time frame that I had. My surgeon, Dr Ahmed was very open and honest and made sure I completely understood every step of the process. Every member of staff I met leading up to and on the day of my surgery as well as follow up appointments have all been amazing. On the day of my surgery, all the nurses and the anaesthetist made me feel completely at ease and comfortable. I couldn?��t recommend The Wellness Clinic enough, and would definitely have any future procedures done with them.

Amazing results and fantastic support throughout, Dr Kok is amazing surgeon and very informative and to the point. Steve was lovely - always checking up to see how I was doing. No hassle from start to finish, would recommend to anyone!

Has the feel of a money making factory. It didn't feel like there was any real care about my condition - just a case of let's get the procedure done and get your money. Firstly LAUP has made very little difference to my condition. The first consultation was a cursory examination, the questions I later asked of my so-called patient liaison officer were not properly answered. During the operation itself Dr Yves Kamami used acupuncture and was very rough taking the needles in and out. He also kept going on about snoring, when that was not an issue for me so gave me huge concern that I was just told I should have LAUP rather than what was best for me. They never bothered to follow-up how it went or how I found things either, very strange in this day and age when you only have to buy something to be bombarded with rate us emails etc.

I use the clinic for IPL treatments on my face (sun damage) and legs (red veins), and have recommended to friends (facial rejuvenation) and family (rosacea).  I?��ve been using the clinic for many years as they produce results. Friendly, helpful and knowledgeable staff who make you feel relaxed and welcome at every contact, be it in the clinic or over the phone.  The environment is very clean and the equipment up to date. The location is convenient. Definitely recommend.

review_title: I visited The Bristol Branch on?�?November 1st
review_body: I visited The Bristol Branch on November 1st for Evla + phlebectomy2, I was very pleased with how this went from start to finish.

My implant removal surgery was 5 weeks ago and I'm thrilled with the results. Dr Adrian Richards is a wonderful, compassionate Doctor. I feel very lucky to have found him in London, after several consultations with Surgeons in California. His Senior Nurse Aggie is lovely and like having your best friend with you, throughout the journey. Aggie was always there to answer my emails and my many questions. All the staff in Harley St and Fitzroy Hospital have been wonderful (Melissa, Pamela, Leon?) Thank you so much to everyone!

review_title: I went to The Wellness Clinic for?�?thread veins
review_body: I went to The Wellness Clinic, Manchester for treatment for thread veins. I expected laser treatment, but was advised that sclerotherapy would be better for some of my veins. I was given a thorough explanation as to why by Hannah, this was extremely helpful. She was really friendly and informative. I went ahead with the sclerotherapy which was virtually painless, just a tiny scratching feeling. Mr Inglott was friendly, kept me informed throughout the treatment and kept checking that I was okay.  I am staggered by the results after just one treatment. The veins have completely faded!  I wouldn?��t hesitate to recommend The Wellness Clinic after my experience there. Everyone I encountered there, including Rob on reception, made it an extremely positive experience. The results speak for themselves.

I have recently been for a consultation at the Birmingham Clinic. I was extremely nervous as i hadn't had a very good experience at another company. They put me at ease and the depth of knowledge was both reassuring and impressive. It was reflective of not just their level of training but their passion for excellent service and customer satisfaction.
I had my procedure on the 14th of September and honestly couldn't be happier!!

We have just enjoyed the best summer in this country for decades and I decided, finally, that I no longer wanted to hide my legs. My veins looked dreadful and my legs often ached or were 'restless' - especially when flying.
The procedure went well and all was explained clearly, the procedure was relatively painless with exception of  the injections to the inside of my right thigh, very painful :(

I decided to undergo surgery with The Wellness Clinic for chest fat removal after spending most of my teenage and adult life feeling self-conscious about the issue, and the entire process with The Wellness Clinic has not disappointed. I am now 6 weeks removed from the surgery, and feel better than ever! The results are fantastic and I cannot thank the surgery enough.

review_title: They lie about returning your �50 deposit!
review_body: Hi,
Mr Vlok and his team in LEEDS have changed my life . From an initial consultation , total reassurance through to the Vaser Lipo and follow up checks .. it has been A seamless and caring  process .

review_title: Life changed thanks to Mr Richards & The Wellness Clinic
review_body: After battling crippling self-confidence for years I decided to pursue breast lift surgery. From the very first interaction with The Wellness Clinic, I knew I was doing the right thing. The staff were amazing, supportive and informative throughout the whole process. Mr Richards made me feel totally at ease and the surgery went better than I could have ever dreamed. Aggy was an absolute star with all post-surgery care, literally only a text away to squash any worries I had. I feel like my life has changed & I honestly can't thank all of The Wellness Clinic team enough!

I would just like to thank the entire Private Clinic teams at Harley Street and the Fitzroy Surgery for my amazing treatment and aftercare whilst going through my gynaecomastia procedure. The treatment was painless and has left me with no scars. Dr Jallali explained everything very easily, my coordinator Emma Raeburn was always at hand to answer any questions and all the staff were friendly and professional throughout. If like me you are a guy that has suffered with gynaecomastia since puberty then bite the bullet and get it done, it has restored my confidence to wear what I like and go swimming again! thank you all so much.

review_title: Thank you so much you have changed my life xx
review_body: I honestly can?��t thank you enough Mr Richards, you have changed my life, the work you did on me is just amazing and the after care I have received from Aggie has also been equally as amazing thanks soooo much xxxx
Extremely disappointed.

review_title: Took my Money now ignore my calls and emails. DISGRACEFUL!
review_body: Paid over �7,500 for a treatment. Now I am having concerns. Called twice and promised a call back but NEVER got one. Sent an email of complaint over 20 days ago, NEVER received a reply.

review_title: I had both my breasts enlarged 20 years?�?
review_body: I had both my breasts enlarged 20 years ago and one of them reputured this year. My previous surgeon had since passed away so I needed to look for a new surgeon. I am so lucky to have found Mr Kok and The Wellness Clinic!! It?��s terribly daunting when looking for a surgeon because there are SO many. I would highly recommend surgury at The Wellness Clinic and it MUST be added to your list of clinics/consultants to visit while you are deciding!! I had my surgery at the BMI Edgbaston Hospital and the care I received there was breath taking with follow up calls since I?��ve been home - just to check I that I?��m ok...Totally swept off my feet! From start to finish I have been taken care of in a sympathetic way, not a controlling way, and so I?��ve felt I?��ve had nothing to worry about. I believe that positivity and happiness helps with recovery. The Wellness Clinic, Mr Kok and all at BMI Edgbaston made this real for me...

review_title: Thank you Adrian Richards, Aggie and team.
review_body: I can't thank Adrian, Aggie and the team enough for helping me with my new breast implants and getting rid of my ruptured PIP implants that another company had given me. My results are amazing and I was put at ease by the whole team who have helped me through this. Thank you guys so much for all your efforts and I am over the moon with the results.

I recently had a breast augmentation done by Dr Dario Rochira and I don't usually leave reviews as I am too lazy for it, but my experience with The Wellness Clinic or harley street was so good that this time, I had to.

Had Vaser Liposuction on 5 areas 13th Sept 2018.  Dr Vlok is brilliant.   Two weeks later feeling great,  It hurts but no pain no gain.   All the staff are very friendly and treat everyone with respect, nothing is too much trouble for them.       Would definitely recommend this Clinic

I had my FUE transplant yesterday which was performed by Dr Tam and his team all of which did an exceptional job and ensured I was comfortable throughout the procedure. I would also like to thank Nabeel for helping me through the entire process since my first visit to the clinic answering all questions I had for both the procedure itself and all the aftercare, and like the surgeons made my experience as easy and confortable as possible. I would fully recommend the clinic and Dr Tam and his team to anyone considering FUE treatment.

review_title: I had a FUE hair transplant a week ago?�?
review_body: I had a FUE hair transplant a week ago today and I cannot thank the team enough. The whole process was effortless and the team took really good care of me. My procedure was with Dr Tam who explained the procedure in detail and really put me at ease. The procedure it's self was a surprise as it was completely painless, I was expecting some discomfort but I was wrong. To be honest I could have fallen asleep that's how relaxed I was. I've already has visible growth in my new hairline which myself and Dr Tam spent time designing. I can't wait to see the full and final results. For anyone looking at having this procedure I would highly recommend The Wellness Clinic. It's definitely one of the best decisions I've made, after years of covering up my hairline I am finally going to get my confidence back. Massive thanks to Dr Tam who has undoubtedly changed my life. Thanks to his team who helped with the procedure although I'm sorry that I cannot remember your names. Also thanks to Louisa and Nabeel who have communicated and supported me through my procedure.

review_title: I had a Fue hair transplant (6000?�?
review_body: I had a Fue hair transplant (6000 hairs) 13 months ago at Harley Street with Dr Reddy and I could not be happier with how the surgery went and the results, a huge thanks to Dr Reddy and his amazing team.

review_title: I recently had my first hair transplant?�?
review_body: I recently had my first hair transplant with Dr Tam and the team at The Wellness Clinic, Leeds.

review_title: My journey of having a breast augmentation
review_body: My journey of having a breast augmentation was fantastic. From the 1st consultation to my aftercare, I was made to feel at ease and comfortable with my surgeon and nurse ( Mr Olu and Rachel ). Mr Olu was very understanding of my needs and the outcome I desired, and I am over the moon with my result, as he took on board exactly what I wanted. My aftercare was great, Rachel took great care of me and TPC was on the other end of the phone if i needed them. Mr Olu has changed my life . Thankyou to TPC, I am so happy I chose you for this journey.
I have yet to have my procedure but I trust it will all go well. so at this juncture all I can comment on is my experience with the staff so far.

Excellent treatment from The Wellness Clinic in Leeds. I underwent EVLA and phlebectomy on 23 August with Mr Hussain, Helen and Bev. Many thanks for your care and professionalism. It was good to talk to Bev today about my progress.
Amazing experience! Really supportive, always there to answer all questions pre and post op. Procedure was really straight forward and quick and recovery shocked me at how short it was.

review_title: The best thing about having my FUE hair?�?
review_body: The best thing about having my FUE hair transplant at The Wellness Clinic in Harley Street was the friendliness and professionalism of the staff . From the first consultation , to the procedure itself they give you the best care possible and genuinely care about their work . They set you at ease immediately which makes everything run smoothly .I would like to thank Henry , Umar, Bev and of course Dr Reddy for the way they treated me . I could have not chosen a better option . Thanks to the team and for anyone in 2 minds about a procedure .... go for it ... this team is the best .

As far as the operation went, it was great! I am a 46 year old white female and I had Bilateral Inverted Nipple Correction (I was a Grade 3). The injections were the worst pain EVER, but after that I just lay there and chatted whilst Dr Richards worked.  Everyone was very friendly and sweet and I was made to feel relaxed, bearing in mind this is the most mortifying problem and I have always been very stressed/embarrassed about it. The results are amazing! I have actual proper sticky-out nipples now and I am beyond thrilled and have 100% more confidence!! I am seriously contemplating a tummy tuck now after this experience.

I had a wonderful experience of a Mastopexy (breast lift) with The Wellness Clinic. Mr Richards is an amazing surgeon and my results have truly exceeded my expectations in every way. I am 4 weeks post op and have had no complications. The entire team are lovely; my nurse during recovery was very helpful, Aggie was lovely for my first consultation and was amazing before the op when I was really nervous. She was also wonderful on my follow ups and I'm so pleased I just can't stop smiling. Words cannot express just how happy I am with the results. Everyone I have encountered during my appointments have been wonderful! Thank you to you all!

I did a lot of research into The Wellness Clinic before going ahead with surgery and what I liked about the reviews I read was that the aftercare was amazing but unfortunately I did not find this. My operation was cancelled the same day as I was due to have procedure, in fact whilst on the train to the clinic. I totally understand that emergencies come first and although I was very upset I accept these things happen. What I didn?��t expect was no one to call me to check I was ok considering all the planning I had to do for childcare and time off work without the emotional stress you have when having such an operation. I had to send an e mail expressing how unhappy I was before Aggie called to apologise. I was told they would look into compensation and I went ahead with the operation one week later. Seven weeks later and I was still chasing loss of income and travel costs for my childcare as they cancelled the operation. I have now been told I will not be getting any of these financial outgoings back but if I cancelled the operation I would have had to pay, this does not seem fair to me. This is not something I thought would have happened so be mindful your operation may be cancelled and your financial loss because of this will be down to you.

Today I revisited the surgery (The Wellness Clinic) and spoke with Dr Adrian Richards, he reassured me that they will do their best to rectify the situation below but also explaining the best possible way to do this which immediately put my mind at ease, so I have changed my score from a 2* to a 5*.

review_title: Excellent results, with friendly an professional staff.
review_body: I underwent an unshaven hair transplant with Dr Zioga, and I am very happy with the results. The treatment went very smoothly and all of the staff were friendly and attentive to my needs. I was given clear instructions to follow after the procedure, and was able to keep in contact with the staff if I had any questions. 8 months in since the treatment and I am very happy with the results - would definitely recommend to anyone who is considering it.

I had vaser lipo with The Wellness Clinic a few years ago on my thighs and stomach. Pre surgery everything was great, I was replied to quickly, the surgery went well - without complications. Afterwards it all changed... I saw little to no difference. My thighs were exactly the same as before (no thigh gap), and my stomach was only slightly improved, not enough to warrant the cost!
Highly recommended. From consultation to after care everything was smooth and great customer service.

From making the first appointment to the completion of the surgery, the service has been first class.  The clinic is impressive, staff are pleasant and efficient.  Mr Constantinos Kyriakides and his team are professional and work to a very high standard.  I was particularly impressed by Mr Kyriakides clinical abilities and general demeanour.  I would have no hesitation in recommending this clinic.

review_title: Leeds Private Clinic -Fantastic team + Professionalism = Happy Customer.
review_body: I would like to thank Dr Tam, Stan, Annie & Ann for making me feel so at ease with my FUE procedure. After taking my time and carrying out extensive research and having numerous consultations I decided to have the procedure with Dr Tam and his team. I can?��t recommend and thank Dr Tam and his team enough from start to finish and being only one day out from the procedure I?��m overwhelmed with the FUE result and I?��ve still got the best to come.

I had an appointment with Mr.Ranaboldo for varicose veins at The Wellness Clinic in Bristol .EVLA and phlebectomy procedure ...,worth every penny ..,there is absolutely nothing to worry about ..,simply walk in walk out ..,clinic is very nice with professional people .I am very happy with results ,my BIG THANK YOU to Mr.Ranaboldo , to his young assistant and of course to Chantelle and other  nice people on reception .

After years of painful bikini waxing and being fed up of unsightly ingrown hairs I bit the bullet and visited TPC Manchester for laser hair removal. It was the best decision I have made. I met the lovely Hannah who talked me through the procedure and did a patch test. I returned for 6 treatments and I must say the results are worth it. Not a hair remains, the skin is smooth and no ugly ingrown hair.

review_title: I found the whole experience extremely?�?
review_body: I found the whole experience extremely positive .I had an excellent reception on each visit . Staff were friendly and welcoming - the clinic looked good and the facilicilties were excellent. Care was taking at each stage of the procedure to explain what would happen and to ensure I was clear and happy.
