Mr Ranaboldo was amazing - thoroughly professional yet caring and compassionate - and we had great conversations - likewise Geraint the assistant nurse.
Really happy, will definitely be visiting you again
Dear Aggie

After previously having a breast augmentation when I was young I visited The Wellness Clinic in Northampton as my implant had started to feel very hard (I only had one). I knew my breasts were very uneven, even with the implant.

I had a hair transplant at The Wellness Clinic with the lovely Dr Zioga and her wonderful team, and have just had my 6-month follow-up appointment. The results are great, and you really couldn't be in better hands than with Dr Zioga. Everything was clearly explained, and you could tell that the transplant was being done with immense professionalism and care for detail. It was something I'd initially  looked into with some fear and trepidation, but the whole team were so friendly and capable, and made it seem such an easy and natural thing to do, and I had no worries at all that I would end up regretting it. And I certainly don't. Follow-up has been excellent, with the lovely Katerina repeatedly inviting me to take and send endless selfies to make sure everything is going as it should. I had the marine cut and shaved back of the head treatment, but the donor area grew back quickly, and 20 days later I went on a course, and people who knew me just commented that I'd had quite a haircut, and that it suited me! There's more still to grow in, and I know I'm going to be even more delighted with the final result.

Had previously done some scouting at other clinics before finally settling on The Wellness Clinic in Birmingham and I'm glad I did. The whole experience has been amazing! I was seen and treated very quickly, which was exactly what I was looking for. Every member of staff that I interacted with was professional and courteous. Dr Wolf did an amazing job on the surgery, my body looks and feel so much better and has helped so much with self confidence. Cannot recommend highly enough! Worth every penny!

I enquired by phone and managed to get a consultation at the Leeds clinic a few days later due to a cancellation, which was great as I had been thinking about inverted nipple surgery for a while and really wanted to move quickly with this. I was made to feel very comfortable during the consultation, and managed to book my surgery the next day, which was to take place 2 weeks later. The surgical team made me feel so at ease and were supportive at every step of the way, including during my aftercare. I have no regrets about the surgery and my confidence has improved so much since. Thank you to all the staff at the Birmingham clinic.

review_title: Microlipo of Abdomen by Dr Gupta
review_body: I had microlipo on the abdomen with Dr Gupta at their Harley Street clinic.   Was simple to book initial consultation, a small fee was taken but refunded on arrival for the appointment. The clinic is spotless and welcoming.   Dr Gupta and his nurse Kasia were present, listened to my concerns and Dr Gupta informed me of what was possible and any risks.  I was impressed and booked the procedure.  The Procedure went well and I was 90 percent happy with the results as I had some excess skin issues after healing but I resolved this by having a course of endomology and RF treatments.   I would point out that Dr Gupta warned me of this beforehand. He is both professional and caring as is his nurse Kasia who was on hand to deal with any aftercare issues I had.  I have no hesitation in recommending The Wellness Clinic and Dr Gupta.  Thank you very much for your care and I will be looking into the possibility of having other areas tended to in the future.

I have been to The Wellness Clinic many times and have never been let down. They are extremely good and what they do and and are extremely thorough. I was originally with Sarah who was fantastic but sadly was off for a while so I am now with Nadine who is extremely professional and patient. She made me feel extremely comfortable and was so reassuring. I am having laser hair removal so it can be a bit pinchy at times but she didn't rush and made the experience as pleasant as possible. Highly recommend, i have been going to The Wellness Clinic for years now and have recommended to family and friends who have also been very pleased. They also give free consultations; mine was an hour long and she talked me through the entire process and what it involves, as well as costing etc.

It's been great so far. Easy to book appointments and treatment has worked well. Lost a star because i was given wrong info on the phone about when I could have next treatment after holiday and when I turned up they explained I couldn't have it for another 2 weeks, which was a bit of a waste of time. Also because I found out after 8 sessions that the area I was paying for wasn't being done fully and I could've been treating another area all that time. Otherwise it's great, very careful and effective. Wish I'd come here sooner!
Friendly,professional staff.Never rush the clients.always available to talk                  & answer questions. Standard of care & treatments given is excellent. Would definately recommend.

Dr Thomy Kouremada-Zioga and her team were absolutely amazing. I researched extensively to find a hair transplant surgeon with such a large number of excellent independent reviews from clients. She was realistic about what could be achieved and stressed that hair loss will require lifelong attention with treatments such as Minoxidil, correct shampoos and nutrition. It can be depressing when she shows the extent of your hair loss. When you have spent years trying to conceal a problem to others and yourself. But I understood that she wanted to manage expectations of whats possible in each case and keep an eye on leaving some reserve of donor hair for future use. She is a perfectionist, a fantastic quality to have for a hair transplant surgeon. More importantly she is very highly skilled and her results are completely natural. The internet is full of examples of bad hair transplants and you only get one chance at it. You could risk going abroad or a cheaper transplant surgeon here, and ending up looking worse and destroying any self confidence you have left. I would not take that risk with something so important. The treatments, I had 2, front/top and then crown a year later. The density available wasn`t the highest from the donor area and extent of balding I had. But my hair looks amazingly full and my hairline is better than it ever was before. Even as a child I had very high temple hair lines that did not suit me and I always covered up with longer hair. That became Increasingly impossible from the ages of 28-41, my hair loss probably exacerbated by the stress from sadly losing my wife to a terminal disease requiring me to care for her over 6 years, our 3 children and keep a full time job. During that time I didn`t obviously have any concern about how I looked or If I was losing my hair. After losing my wife, grieving and having a very low self confidence I knew I had to do something, at least about my confidence. Many men reading this who have tried to hide there hair loss with their hairstyle will know that this simply limits what you do in life. You wont go out in bad weather or do activities that affect your hair and it gets ridiculous. So I was at the point that so many men get to, shave it short or find a solution. For me a transplant was the only solution and the results are amazing and entirely natural looking. Dr Zioga has given me back my confidence, I can see people noticed something but were not always sure what. Lots of comments about how I look younger though. I told my family and friends, the stigma about having such a procedure seems to be mostly gone now. The treatment is very expensive if you need a large area transplanted, in my case for 2 treatments (2 days each). But it is honestly the best money I have every spent on myself and would not hesitate for one second to have it done again. I am now 43 and feel a second lease of life, I can not stress enough how happy I am with Dr Zioga and her team. If you are considering this treatment I would book your appointment with her now. She is undoubtedly among the best hair transplant surgeons in the world.
I have visited the clinic on many occasions and have received first class treatment delivered by a friendly and professional team. I have on numerous occasions recommended your clinic.

All the staff at the Leeds branch of The Wellness Clinic have been really helpful, friendly and professional and provided excellent advice and referrals for consultations with the relevant doctors or specialists.

Rang and complained. Went back. More chat. Wants me to be happy blah blah blah. Will do another treatment. Not pleasant, not offered any form of anaesthetic. Ended up with horrendous bruising on one side for 10 days - honestly felt he?��d done it deliberately as was cross with me for making a complaint. Would never go back.

I can honestly say I trust him with anything after my surgery and I am in love with my new natural look. The nurses at the clinic were amazing, and I would especially like to thank Aggie, Vicki and Olivia for being the nicest team of people to accompany me throughout my journey. They made me feel so welcome and I will miss coming to the clinic! Thank you so much for changing my life, I am so grateful!
Very professional, honest and friendly staff that make you feel entirely comfortable throughout the process.

I had a two part procedure removing an old NHS implant that I had over 25 years ago incorporating an uplift and new implants to correct my asymmetry. Adrian Richards and nurse Aggie talked me through what was needed and suggested I have the procedure carried out in two phases to achieve the best result. So glad I took their advice. Over the moon with results and can not thank Aggie enough for her support. She is a real credit to this company.

Had my ba on Tuesday and the service has been second to none. Although it?��s early days I?��m so happy with the results and my care has been perfect from start to finish. Dr Adrian Richards and Aggy are so professional and really listened to what I wanted and made the whole process so easy and informative. I cannot thank them enough it has given me so much confidence and I know they will be there at any stage of my journey if needed.

review_title: So HAPPY with my results!  Top Clinic with Top Staff!
review_body: I had my surgery 6 weeks ago.  From start to finish I received a faultless professional and friendly service.  Mr Adrian Richards performed my procedure.  I cannot thank him enough for the results.  Absolutely perfect and exactly what I wanted.  I would highly recommend him!

Visited Dr Reddy last year to discuss hair transplant. The consultation was extremely rushed and I basically felt he wanted me in and out. Dr Reddy made a quick diagnosis and advised me to take some Propecia which he couldn?��t prescribe and I would need to ask my GP. I was also advised that I needed some bloods to be taken and I would receive a follow up summary of our discussion.

review_title: I had my operation over 6 weeks ago
review_body: I had my operation over 6 weeks ago,  and I have to say from the initial consultation with Dr Dennis Wolf through to the aftercare appointments, the service provided was excellent. All the staff at The Wellness Clinic have been very friendly and have made me feel at ease throughout the operation. I am extremely happy with outcome and would not change anything. I would highly recommend Dr Dennis Wolf and his team at The Wellness Clinic.
I had my second cosmetic surgery procedure with TPC in November, I would not use the TPC again however I would use and recommend my surgeon.
Excellent service and care both clinically and from all the support staff.
Fantastic service from the initial consultation to the follow up care.  I was made to feel at ease at all times especially during the procedure - don't remember a thing!
I had my Breast Augmentation surgery just over 10 days ago. I know is still quite early on after the op but I really wanted to expressed how happy I am with the care I received.
This is a late review. I had my surgery in August but I know now fully how much it has positively impacted my life.

I recently came in for a procedure and I am over the moon with the results. Dr Adrian Richards has given me exactly what I wanted and had taken my confidence to another level. The aftercare has also been great with Aggie texting to make sure I am ok.

I attended this clinic for a varicose vein procedure and I am delighted with the outcome. The staff are warm and welcoming and very professional. The aftercare is also very thorough. I would highly recommend this clinic to anyone thinking of having similar procedures.

Amazing service offered by the staff. The minoxidil they recommended me worked fantastically and I'm extremely happy with the results of the procedure. I would highly recommend to everyone looking for a great clinic to help with the numerous procedures they offer.

review_title: Attended the clinic for nearly ten ?�?
review_body: Attended the clinic for nearly ten years.  Always extremely happy with my results and the service.
I found Dr Wolf and The Wellness Clinic very professional. My results were fantastic I am extremely happy.  I can recommend Dr Wolf unreservedly.
Have been to this clinic many times and cannot fault it whatsoever.  The staff are lovely and welcoming. 100% recommend

review_title: I've been a regular client for up to ?�?
review_body: I've been a regular client for up to 15yrs now and there's a very good reason why.  I'm always able to make an appointment for a day & time that's convenient for me, and with my preferred consultant.  Treatments are always pain free, punctual and effective.  I'm extremely pleased with the service that The PC offers me, and I'll be back.
Lovely staff, courteous, knowledgable. Made me feel relaxed and talked me through every stage of my treatment. Would reccomend them

review_title: Recently had an appointment at the ?�?
review_body: Recently had an appointment at The Wellness Clinic Leeds and was highly impressed with the level of professionalism & friendliness shown from all the staff.

My experience with The Wellness Clinic has been beyond amazing. I had a breast augmentation 6 weeks ago and with the help of The team at The Wellness Clinic especially Steven Ashworth my surgeon Mr Kenneth Kok i have gained the confidence i have always wanted! I cannot thank everyone here enough!
I have wanted to have breast augmentation since I was 18 years old but wanted to wait until the right time, I am now 35 as a birthday present to myself I felt it was the right time.

I can?��t rate the Glasgow clinic highly enough. I received the best care and advice from the moment I started dealing with them, nothing was a problem. Stefanie is worth her weight in gold! The clinic itself is a lovely and modern space. Super pleased with my results, I?��ve never been better! Thank you!

review_title: Fantastic service and care from start ?�?
review_body: Fantastic service and care from start to finish. The procedure has made me feel like a million dollars.

Beautiful clinic and office space. Spent a decent amount of time with my consultant who did the tests I needed. The result was positive so he said I didn't require any further procedures, which I was very happy with, as I expected there being further consulting at more costs and he said no.

review_title: Another 5* stars for the Gatehouse Northampton.
review_body: Once again I leave another 5* review to the wonderful team at The Gatehouse Clinic, Northampton, (I could live there). A very warm and friendly greeting always awaits me from Nuala the lovely receptionist and of course coffee and biscuits.
always there if you need them, great after care, very pleased with the results. Mr Fazel made me feel at ease and provided me with all the necessary information when I had several questions.

review_title: Highly recommend Mr Richards to all ?�?
review_body: Highly recommend Mr Richards to all considering breast surgery. I felt calm and comfortable from my first visit and throughout my whole experience. I didn't feel under any pressure to proceed and trusted Mr Richards and his wonderful nurse Aggie to take good care of me - and they did! I saw Aggie from my initial consultations and she was with me throughout the surgery which made me feel in good hands and safe. Very professional service and would highly recommend - and my results are great!!
Nicola McClean is an absolutely excellent health care professional. I had 2 scars on my face which were getting me down and I had lost a little confidence in my appearance.

review_title: Totally recommend vein treatment! It?��s change my life!
review_body: On arrival I was warmly welcomed and offered a drink whilst waiting then I had my meeting with the consultant Dr Vittoo. Who took away all worries and concerns I had and answered all questions and explained everything about the varicose vein procedures. Once I decided to go ahead I went away and returned for the procedure. Throughout the procedure I was well looked after by Dr Vittoo and his team and especially the nurse that stayed with me throughout talking to me and making me feel good and telling me what?��s happening. I recovered really well and the aftercare was very good! I can honestly having the treatment was the best thing I have ever done. My confidence has improved and I can?��t wait to show my legs off this summer and on holiday. No more ugly veins and swollen legs! Amazing and Dr Vittoo was amazing! Thank you so much! Totally recommend!

review_title: Dont put off tomorrow do it today
review_body: I had a truly great experience at the clinic and would recommend it to anyone.

review_title: After many years wanting a breast ?�?
review_body: After many years wanting a breast augmentation I finally plucked up the courage to have a consultation at the Birmingham clinic , I was seen by Steve who put me at ease and answered all my questions I needed to ask.
professional and friendly service.

review_title: They tell you as it is
review_body: They tell you as it is. Very well informed and professional.

review_title: I can honestly say that all the staff ?�?
review_body: I can honestly say that all the staff are very professional and very caring. They looked after me from the moment I booked to the moment I left after my treatments. Highly recommend!!

review_title: having had various surgeries over the ?�?
review_body: having had various surgeries over the years for various medical needs, I believe I am welll experienced to recognise quality when I see it.  I couldnt ask for better service, care ,treatment, or results than I have finaly found at this clinic.  Dr Vlok is a one off as a surgeon & a fellow human.  The whole team.... Lee, Louisa & julie to name a few have the essential skills & personalilties to create the neccessary experience to an all round excellent satndard.  Thank you all.

review_title: Overall view of the The Wellness Clinic(Leeds).
review_body: My opinion is, the convenience of location was a bonus. It's not always a case of staff & how well your treatment worked out. This clinic in Leeds was just a short walk from the train station. This put me off Bridgwater in Manchester. Which was a good temptation when I checked it out. One thing I didn't realise until my surgeon Michail Mouzakis explained it. In the future, in my case an eyebrow transplant. That further treatment was on offer at no extra expense. This can maximise your results. It is the same principle as having treatment at the dentist. Good staff, spot on team. I can't see how anyone could give this place a bad review.

I have been really pleased with all aspects of my treatment ay the Leeds clinic. All the staff were friendly helpful and caring. Everything was explained and any questions I had answered. It was nice to have a phone call afterwards to check all  was well, and being able to ring the clinic with any questions and know I would be able to speak to a nurse was really reassuring. Thank you to all involved.

review_title: Such a positive experience and amazing ?�?
review_body: Such a positive experience and amazing results!

review_title: The procedure went well and the results ?�?
review_body: The procedure went well and the results are very good. I still have one more treatment to go. The staff were friendly and helpful and put my mind at ease.
Great staff, friendly but professional and the treatment and advise great.

review_title: Had the FUE hair transplant last ?�?
review_body: Had the FUE hair transplant last February at the Harley Street clinic. I was apprehensive at the consultation, wondering if it would work, so only asked for half of the recommended hairs from the donor area,1000 grafts  (3000)hairs.
Comfortable environment, good customer service and accessible location.
From my first visit I was made to feel very welcome the staff are amazing & very friendly, I would definatley recommend The Wellness Clinic.

Well where do I start, I have always hated my knees and never wanted to show them as I have fat tissue around my knee area and no matter how much exercise or dieting i do, I have been told by numorus fitness instructors that I will never remove the fat in this area as its a stubborn area to remove. So because I never felt confident about my legs and of always disliked them I decided to look up and do my research on liposuction, now I knew that I would never get thin legs and I know liposuction is more of a body sculpting that a drastic change but I thought if this operation would may my legs look better than it was w orth the expense. So before making my decision on finding the right clinic and surgeon I saw a few surgeons and they all said slightly different things and also the prices ranged from �3000-�6000 which I thought was quite a big jump. The first surgeon I saw said he would only recommend getting my knee area rather than my thigh as he said I wouldn't see much result by getting both areas done as I explained that my problem area was my knee and I just wanted to look in the mirror and feel like I can show my legs off because my knees looked more like everyone else's. He quoted me of a fee of �3000 which I thought sounded reasonable I also mentioned to him that I had seen another surgeon who mentioned that the reasons for my knees been like How they was because I had a condition called lipedema, the surgeon said he didn't think I had and asked if they were genetic which I said yes my mum has got the same knees. Then I had a consultation with DR Wolf at The Wellness Clinic in Bi rmingham, I had read up about this surgeon I had also seen him on YouTube and the fact he also worked in London I assumed he must be really good at his job. DR Wolf said I had the condition lipedema and I never heard of this condition before he explained not many doctors no the history on the condition and recommended that I should have the thigh and the knee done because if I just have the knee area done then I would have an in proportion leg as my knee would be smaller but my thigh wouldn't look right and the cost for both areas was �5800. But because Dr Wolf had said he had done another lady's leg who had the same condition it made me feel at ease that i would get the best results from him even though it was more money. After going away and thinking about it, I had made my decision that Dr Wolf was the surgeon I would like to carry out my operation and I had Also read the really good reviews at The Wellness Clinic. I thought that he was the right choice to get the best r esults from and in my head because I was paying more this also made me think I would get better results. After calling the clinic to arrange my appointment, well from then it just went from bad to worse the service from the staff was so unprofessional when you are paying a lot of money you would expect you would get really good service, first of all it was all rush rush to get the payment. Well time when by and i received a call from a nurse who explained she needed to ask me a few questions as my op was in 3 days. She asked me if I had been taking a course of antibiotics that I should have received to reduce blood clots before the operation, I didn't know anything about any antibiotics that i needed to take I wasn't told or given any she also asked me if I had any alcohol in last 2 weeks luicky i hadn't, then I questioned the nurse and said why are you asking me this 3 days before she I not had been told before this, she replied did you not receive you pack about the operat ion and what you need to do before. I said no I have received nothing! At this point I was disgusted that I was terrified as it is that I was going to have an operation and to be told I should have had a course of antibiotics and I also said what if I had alcohol what if I had been on the sunbed, would I still be able to go ahead with the op because of your error that I have received the right information. I was so angry at this point and scared that it could increase me getting blood clots because I had not taken these antibiotics. The day of surgeory the surgeon said have you taken the course of antibiotics I replied no I wasn't given any, is this going to effect me? He kinda said okay no it should be fine. So I had my op done the lady on reception said that she would call me the next day to arrange my next appointment with the nurse. But 2 days passed heard nothing so I had to chase my own check up appointment when I called and told her I was annoyed about the situation her words was she's on her own and it's been busy. I thought that's not my problem if you under staffed. She also told me to shower my legs the day after surgery and I wasn't sure if my legs should have been wet so soon after as I had open wombs. I they got worried and called the nurse she said I should have got my legs and bandages wet so soon after my op, so again been told the wrong thing about the staff. I then had a few after care appointments with the nurse and then Dr Wolf, he said he was happy with the result and he asked my opinion and I said to be honest I don't feel like they look much differnt my thigh looks thinner but my knee looks the same, he replied well we can't get in around the knee area because of the bone, I felt like saying well you didn't say that st the beginning so I basically thought the reason why he said I should have my thigh done Also is because he knew I wouldn't get any results from just having the knee area done. I also said can I see the ph otos you took before so I can see the difference and he changed the subject and wouldn't send them me! So he knew the liposuction hasn't made any differnce to my knee area, he then said that to see a change in my knee I would need a thigh lift, so he was then tryna to sell me that.Such a rip off be warned before you decide to go here such a poor service and not much change to my legs, worst experience I have ever had! Don't choose The Wellness Clinic!!! Literally felt like they take your money and then fob you off would never recommend

I had a laser hair removal top up session recently at The Wellness Clinic. I would thoroughly recommend this service from start to finish. Arranging appointments is simple, all of the staff are friendly and professional. The results of this procedure are excellent. An annual top up keeps the hair at bay.

review_title: My experience with The Wellness Clinic ?�?
review_body: My experience with The Wellness Clinic has been seamless. Everything has gone smoothly and there has been no faults. Both Aggie and Dr Richards have been amazing and really made me feel comfortable and happy throughout the whole process. I am very happy with my end result.

A nervous new client I was immediately put at ease by the friendly reception staff.  I have been a client of Marie & Sarah's at the Harley Street clinic for almost two years.  They listen, they care & they give you great advice.  Absolutely delighted with my skin treatments! IPL & Botox.  Brighter more even tone skin, and no wrinkles!

review_title: Well worth it but be prepared.
review_body: The staff at the clinic were really friendly and professional. The consultation with the doctor was really informative and there was no hard sell. I had liposculture on my legs. I?��ll be honest the procedure was a lot more painful than I expected. Wearing the bodysuit after was painful and uncomfortable. That being said it was so worth it. My whole shape has changed. I?��m very into exercise and fitness but could not shift my saddlebags no matter how much weight I lost. I now fit in my skinny jeans perfectly! I?��m happier and much more confident. I would recommend but I?��d say have it done in winter as the bodysuits are hot and the bruising does take a while to go.

After looking into breast augmentation for a number of years i finally plucked the courage up to book a consultation.I went to see Mr.Richards at The Wellness Clinic in Northampton. From the moment i walked through the door i felt at ease and like i was in safe hands. Mr Richards nurse Aggie was the person i had the first half of my consultation, she is so amazing. The opperation came around in no time, i was welcomed with smiles. Aggie messaged me the day after asking if i was ok. That was so nice of her. I am now 7 weeks post op and feeling like new women. I am very happy with my result. I couldnt thank Mr Richards, Aggie and the rest of the team enough and would recommend them to anyone. Andzelina Mcdaid. Corby

From the moment I first met Adrian Richards and his team (once I had got past the administration of The Wellness Clinic - hence 4 star review) I felt in safe hands.  I had a 3 finger diastis recti due to pregnancy and whilst I was a size 6/8, my tummy was a size 12.  As well as back pain not helped by my misplaced stomach muscles, I had also gone gluten free as my digestive system could no longer cope with many foods causing bloating after only a light meal. It was a big decision to have the operation but I wanted my body back and I'd already tried many specific exercises to bring my stomach muscles back together with only limited progress.
TERRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE! GO ELSEWHERE!

review_title: Great but watch out for credit card fees
review_body: The staff at Northampton clinic are all incredibly friendly and personable, I felt I could trust their experience to provide me the most honest advice and care. The staff in the London clinic on day of surgery were fabulous and really made me feel relaxed both before and after surgery, they were thoroughly professional at all times. The only criticism if there was any would be around pre op assessment which was supposed to be conducted by another member of staff from another clinic. Unfortunately they didn?��t seem to know what they were doing and finding myself telling them how to do their job left me lacking confidence in the company but actually I think in retrospect this was the individual and perhaps a training gap rather than a reflection on the company and the key people that count ie the surgeon and their operative team. Also the company tried to charge a 2.5% credit card surcharge on two separate occasions which I refused to pay having reminded them it is actually illegal to do this now. The most they can charge is 0.5% and from Jan 2018 it is 0%. They need to review their finance admin procedures unless they want to alienate their customers.

After looking into breast augmentation for a number of years I finally plucked the courage up to book a consultation. After many recommendations off friends and family I went to see Mr Richards at The Wellness Clinic in Northampton. From the moment I walked through the door I felt at ease and like I was in safe hands. Mr Richards nurse; Aggie was the person I had the first half of my consultation with, she is AMAZING, after talking me through the procedure she then answered all the questions I had (believe me there were a lot!) and explained the process from start to finish. Mr Richards then came in to see me and explained what implant, position and incision he would use and talked me through the specifics of the procedure. Mr Richards had such knowledge I felt sure I had made the right decision using him as my surgeon! I booked a sizing appointment with Aggie for a few weeks later, this went smoothly as expected and I left feeling fabulous, knowing I was in safe hands with her and Mr Richards - I really felt they understood what I wanted from the procedure- I wasn't just a number to them!! The operation came around in no time, I was welcomed with smiles and reassurance on the day and before I knew it I was awake and returning home! Aggie messaged me the day after and for a couple of days asking if I was ok and was there to answer any questions I had which was amazing as I felt someone was always there for me! I am now 6 weeks post op after having 270cc over the muscle and I am delighted with my results! I couldn't thank Mr Richards, Aggie and the rest of the team enough and would recommend them to anyone! Kelly, Milton keynes
Fantastically knowledgeable clinicians offering an holistic service in friendly efficient environment

I had surgery with Mr Miles Berry in October 2017.  From the first contact to the latest checkup I have been treated with kindness, respect and dignity. I am transgender so am extremely sensitive about parts of my female body. Mr Berry was very respectful of my unease and spoke to me in a manner that showed me he was trying his best to explain the procedure and then having to take photos that it was as comfortable as it could be.

review_title: Had an amazing experience win Hannah ?�?
review_body: Had an amazing experience win Hannah for laser hair removal treatment. The treatment was very effective and there is reduction of 80% of hairs. It was the best decision I have ever made. Superb service and very friendly and professional staff. Hannah was very professional and friendly. Will definitely recommend to family and friends. Five star service!! Thank you Hannah! Will be back soon for more sessions.

Would like to say a massive thank you to Mr Richardson and my brilliant nurse Aggie for looking after my durning me breast augmentation, I?��m over the moon with my results, such a professional and friendly team!. I highly recommend the privat clinic of Harley street for anyone looking into cosmetic surgery.

review_title: Impressed with my subtle and natural treatments.
review_body: At the Princes Risborough Clinic I have now had many subtle skin improvements such as a little botox and filler, silhouette soft and Profhilo.

Appalling use unqualified reception to discriminate against lipo-lymphoedema sufferers which is unethical as only form of treatment that may possibly help . Yet refuse appts if over a certain BMI  ??!! Assume by using BMI not addressing issues where not necessarily a weight issue .So only taking on cases can be successful which is outrageous.This doesn't happen in Europe?

I would like to thank Mr Richards and his amazing, friendly team for looking after me. I initially went to them in 2008 for breast augmentation and I can still remember back then how brilliant everyone was.  In September this year (2017) I had my implants removed after 9 years (personal choice, nothing wrong with the implants). Needless to say I was very nervous. They put my mind at ease, were always contactable, during and afterwards, and actually went the extra mile. If I have any future work done The Wellness Clinic Northampton is the only place I will go and I would recommend them to anyone.

review_title: Second to none... in my opinion
review_body: Where to start? Probably at the beginning I suppose. I have previously had Liposuction on my abdomen and flank area, about 13 years ago, under a general anaesthetic. The results from that were never as I would have liked and since then, unfortunately, I had put a bit of weight on around my flanks. Even after a few years of going to the gym the flank area just did not budge, so I had been considering Lipo again. However, due to my previous experience I was reluctant to spend the money in case I was not fully satisfied again. Then, earlier this year I came across some articles on Vaser Lipo and the type of results it could achieve so I decided to bite the bullet and give it a go. Well... I wish I had read that article a lot earlier. The results, even now after only a few weeks, are a world away from my previous treatment. Even with some swelling still apparent the results are more than I ever expect... all thanks to not only the treatment but those that provided it.
I love coming here for my treatment. The staff are very friendly and accommodating, especially Raminta and Alicia. I would definitely recommend to anyone.

review_title: I had called previously - thank you,
review_body: I had called previously to enquire on my facial products which I was informed were available. When I got to the Clinic at Harley Street,  I was informed that I would need an appointment for a consultation. Both Alicia and Raminta were extremely helpful in setting up an impromptu appointment for a consultation and sought out the facial products that I needed. They were both very pleasant and understanding of my dilemma as the Call Centre had not informed me that I would need a consultation prior to getting my facial products which I have used for over 2 years. They both remained extremely professional in their handling of my situation and I could not thank them enough. They are both gems to the Clinic so thank you Alicia and Raminta for your help. I remain grateful! Helen
Amazing staff. Highly professional. Nest in the business. Will come back over and over

Fantastic clinic! Friendly and caring staff. Felt very well looked after on my first visit and was instantly calmed and fully informed of treatment. The nurse took her time with me and I was extreamly happy with my end results.
Very professional clinic. All the staff are very informative and approachable. The clinic also has planty of car parking.

review_title: My outstanding lip filler! Thank you
review_body: I had my first lip filler in this clinic yesterday, 1 ml of yuvederm, my doctor which was Richard Brighton Knight explained to me how he will work and how my lips will look at the end. He was very professional as he is not the kind of doctor who will fill up your face how much you want just for profits, he want the best for your face and as much as natural can be. I found my self really good, he is exactly what I was looking for, very professional. The receptionist were really helpful and smart looking (very beautiful as well). The filler was not painful at all! Not even bruised, even the day after I mean that's a record as my first filler which I had in another place was painful and my lips were horrible the day after, but this time was completely different. Thank you so much The Wellness Clinic I'll see you soon for sure as I want to try yours skin treatment!!! Xx

review_title: Absolutely excellent treatment and service - highly recommended.
review_body: I visited the Harley Street branch for a consultation and skin treatment with Dr Rosa Santa Cruz. Upon arrival I was treated extremely well, all the staff were very friendly and competent.

Had my hair transplant in March 2017 by Dr. Zioga and team. The team made me feel very relaxed about the procedure from the original consultation to the day of the procedure itself. Communication by the team was excellent both pre and post op and having had a follow up appointment to evaluate the results at 7 months later the team as well as myself could not be more happy with the results.
I haven't made any decisions on where I'm having my surgery yet but everyone I met at The Wellness Clinic was lovely.

review_title: Beware when booking a consultation and very poor communication
review_body: Beware when booking a consultation, I was promised a full refund once I attended my consultation however with a number of calls and emails they still haven't refunded me. They are quick to debit your account but when it comes to refunds they are very unhelpful. I've sent loads of emails and still no reply, they replied to me eventually after and said they refunded me however 10 days later no refund. Please check your bank account after consultation. I left a review on another site and they were quick to respond, it appears they only respond after leaving bad reviews. I decided not to leave a review on the whole experience of my consultation at this clinic but all I can say the surgeon was not as in depth as other surgeons I've visited at other clinics.

review_title: Excellent service and the ladies at ?�?
review_body: Excellent service and the ladies at reception were very good!!

review_title: I found the treatment at the Private ?�?
review_body: I found the treatment at The Wellness Clinic very professional, discreet and quick.

I would like to thank Dr.Constandinos Kyriakides for his professionalism and the excellent treatment he gave to me by removing my legs varicose veins with laser 2 weeks ago.I felt no pain during and after the procedure.He is a very human doctor who takes the time to explain everything and make you feel a pure confidence in him.If I knew how simple he made it for me I would have done it years ago.Thank you so much my dear doctor

My experience from start to current (2 weeks post op breast implants) has been nothing short of excellent. The patient co-ordination, surgeon and surgery were professional, thorough and made me feel completely relaxed and well informed. I would definately recommend The Wellness Clinic, in particular Steve Ashworth (Patient Advisor) and Mr Fazel.

review_title: From the time I walked through the ?�?
review_body: From the time I walked through the front door, the care received from all staff has been consistent and  amazing. The surgery I had for my horrendous looking varicose vein was, yes a bit uncomfortable but so worth it when I got to see the results.  I am now able to go swimming and, best of all, wear dresses and skirts again.  Don't put your life on hold - just do it!

review_title: I had a tummy tuck and breast explant ?�?
review_body: I had a tummy tuck and breast explant operation in March this year.

review_title: I used the Manchester clinic for laser ?�?
review_body: I used the Manchester clinic for laser treatment. Hannah who did all the treatments for me was great and awesome at her job.
Would highly recommend this clinic. Have been to see Adrian Richardson on 2 occasions about mole removal. Him and his staff are very welcoming, friendly and knowledgeable.

I have just finished a course of laser hair removal. I was quite nervous going in but Hannah McLean, my therapist, soon put me at my ease. I've been really impressed with the professionalism and friendliness of Hannah and the other staff at The Wellness Clinic and have already recommended to friends.

review_title: I can not thank the staff enough
review_body: I can not thank the staff enough! Especially a lady called Elaine Meltcer , she went above and beyond her call of duty and I can not speak highly enough of her! Would defiantly use the clinic again.

I cannot recommend The Wellness Clinic in Manchester enough! From my first consultation with Alex (who was lovely) to my surgeon dr fattah , nurse Rachel and Andy.. everything was brilliant, they are always there to answer all your questions and their aftercare is fantastic! Rhian who chaperoned all of my check ups was absolutely amazing and I can't thank her enough for being so kind and reassuring! My surgery went great and I am unbelievably happy with the result! Thankyou all so much!

If you?��re looking to get a hair transplant and wondering where to have it done, look no further.  I had a FUE hair transplant with Dr Zioga at The Wellness Clinic of Harley Street 3 weeks ago. The entire experience from initial consultation, to the procedure day and follow-up care has been amazing.
Thank you so much Lesley you absolutely amazing had treatment done in The Wellness Clinic in Bristol,

review_title: I recently had a male chest reduction ?�?
review_body: I recently had a male chest reduction surgery done at The Wellness Clinic in Leeds. It was an amazing experience and the matter was dealt professionally and efficiently.I spoke with Sorena on my initial consultation and process was very straight forward. Within 4 weeks of visiting the clinic I had completed my surgery and got amazing results.This has enhanced my self confidence.I was very sceptical at the start however Sorena put me at ease and was great. My surgery was with Dr Vlok who I had a meeting with before the surgery where he showed me pictures of some before and after surgery images of other patients.I was very pleased with the results I saw therefore agreed to go ahead with the surgery. I would recommend anyone who has the same issue as I had to contact The Wellness Clinic as they are the best.

review_title: I had a procedure at The Wellness Clinic ?�?
review_body: I had a procedure at The Wellness Clinic last week which I am extremely happy with.

review_title: I had lip fillers at the Clinic with ?�?
review_body: I had lip fillers at the Clinic with Lesley, Lilly booked the appointment for me and both of the ladies were extremely lovely, helpful and professional. They really made me feel completely relaxed through out the whole process and  I was very surprised by their knowledge on the product and expertise. Lilly was very attentive and even offered coffee / biscuits!

review_title: Private Clinic Birmingham - Dr.Wolfe and Steven
review_body: Now 1 week post op I am hopefully in a good position to give an accurate review.
I will give 5 stars and  I would recommend this company to anyone.

review_title: Hair transplant at The Wellness Clinic Leeds
review_body: Had my operation yesterday and so far so good. The transplant was performed by Dr. Mousakis, himself and his staff were all really helpful and I never felt alone at any point. Would highly recommend them
I went to The Wellness Clinic in Birmingham for a consulation regarding a Tummy Tuck and Liposuction.

review_title: I am now 8 weeks post op after a hair ?�?
review_body: I am now 8 weeks post op after a hair transplant with the wonderful and muticulous dr Tam. Results are superb even this early, I am so pleased, there really was no pain  at all, I didn't even need painkillers afterwards. I want to thank all the team especially Cat Rainsbury who made me feel really special.

A really positive experience at the Birmingham clinic. Steve and the staff looked after me very well both pre and post op. Dr Mouzakis also did a great job on my hair. Very pleased with the results so far.
Excellent treatments and great products. Would definitely recommend to a friend.

review_title: Excellent 5 star service from the day I walked into the Manchester clinic
review_body: I had been suffering from chest pains a few months ago and found out that my implant had ruptured. I had originally had my implants done in the Philippines just over 4 years ago by one of the best surgeons in the Philippines. I did some research and found The Wellness Clinic in Manchester. From the first phone call and the first time I stepped in the clinic, the service was nothing but first class. I was treated with respect and everyone was so welcoming. When I saw my surgeon Mr Oudit, he reassured me that the problem could be fixed as he was an expert in doing surgeries like this. I felt so comfortable with him, he did not make me feel nervous at all and made me feel like I was in the right hands from the start. Mr Oudit suggested that I had an uplift, removal of old implants and clean and replace implants to fix the problems I was having. The pain started to get really bad and they managed to move my surgery 5 weeks earlier, which was amazing. The team in Manchester really pushed for it so that I could be put out of my misery and pain. Since the pain was so bad during my first surgery I was convinced that the pain would be so much worse, but in fact the pain was actually nowhere near as bad as when I had them originally done. This is testimony that Mr Oudit put so much care into my surgery. It has only been 6 days since my surgery and I am healing a lot better and faster than anticipated. The aftercare has been amazing, the clinic nurse even managed to fit me in before my first official appointment to ease my mind and make sure no infection has developed. Mr Oudit is the best surgeon who I would recommend over and over again to anyone. He really has taken care of me and provided first class 5 star service. From what I can see, my breast are absolutely amazing and I never thought they would look and feel the way they do. This has surpassed my expectations. My patient coordinator Alex is the best in the business. He always answered all my calls and eased my worries when I really needed him and answer any questions I had. He rang around finding me the hospital at last minute and making sure my surgeon could perform the surgery. Cheryl, the clinic manager moved my appointment earlier and made sure I was priority. She also answered any questions I had prior to the surgery and made me feel less nervous about the procedures I was having. Andrew, the clinic's nurse has been amazing pre and post-op, providing me with information and making sure I was healthy with no complications after the surgery. Reception staff (Rhiain and Sarah), always friendly voices at the end of the phone and whenever I was in the clinic. If I could give this clinic more than 5 stars I definitely would. I can't wait to be fully healed and see the final result. Thank you so much Manchester team, you have done an amazing job and I am sure you will continue to do so. Nothing less than 5 stars for you all.

review_title: High praise for Sorena and Dr Vlok at Leeds
review_body: Im so delighted that I plucked up the courage for a consultation at Leeds private clinic. I have an embarrassing condition that I has caused me problems my whole life and I can finally see the hope I have been looking for. Sorena and Dr Vlok have been incredibly helpful and supportive in offering me realistic help for my issues. I am pleasantly surprised at what results can be achieved for me and I can't thank them enough for their support and professionalism.  I am also particularly impressed that my safety has also been a priority when looking at my options.
Having researched lots of clinics for advice and reassurance for my decision on a male chest reduction I called The Wellness Clinic in Leeds.

I attended the Bristol private clinic in February to undergo a fue hair transplant. I had previously met my surgeon Mark Tam for a consultation which was arranged by Clinic co-ordinator Chantelle. I have spoken to Chantelle several times by phone and in person, she has always been very professional, friendly and reassuring.

After looking at plenty of clinics for a hair transplant I settled on The Wellness Clinic in Leeds after reading the great reviews. From the initial consultation with Dr Mouzakis , Sorena and Nabeel to the day of my transplant the team have been superb. The surgery was practically painless and very happy with my new hairline , all the team were constantly ensuring I was ok and were very professional. The Aftercare I have received has been great I've had phone call already to check how I am and can phone at any time if I need any advice.

review_title: It was the best decision to have my ?�?
review_body: It was the best decision to have my surgery at The Wellness Clinic, Birmingham branch. I had my consultation with Steve who listened and understood what I wanted. He was very informative and friendly. I met with my surgeon mr kok and nurse brid who made me feel at ease straight away. Mr kok gave me the confidence that I would get great results. It's been nearly two weeks since my areola reduction and I am so happy with the results. Better than I expected. Both nurses kiran and brid made me feel so comfortable throughout the surgery as I was awake during it (local anaesthetic). Honestly so glad I chose to have my surgery here, they all genuinely cared and looked after me throughout my journey.

Excellent overall experience. Mr oudit is a brilliant surgeon.  Had upper eye bags removed. And I am delighted with the results. And was in no pain at any time. Will definitely go back for any other procedures in the future.

I've been having facials at the Northampton clinic for about 2 years now, Vicky is great at listening to your skin concerns and recommending the best treatment for you. All the staff are so friendly and welcoming.

review_title: I recently had Vaso liposuction an have ?�?
review_body: I recently had Vaso liposuction an have to say that i'm very happy with the results. Dr Vlock and his team were very friendly and answered all my questions i had to the full. the procedure while uncomfortable was over in an hour and i was back on my feet straight away. A special mention must go to Bev as she put me at ease from the moment i walked in to when i walked out. What a lovely Lady.

review_title: I had breast augmentation last year by ?�?
review_body: I had breast augmentation last year by Mr Adrian Richards.  I can honestly say him, the adorable Aggie and his team were absolutely amazing from the very first consultation to the aftercare.  Post op I unfortunately had a reaction to some medication and Aggie was there at the end of the phone and even checked on my wellbeing over the weekend.  I am absolutely in love with my boobs and I can't not believe how much confidence they have given me!  The only regret is that I didn't have it done years ago!  For anyone considering this procedure. Mr Richards is your man!

The best service ever! Honestly I had been to a few..Transform and MYA for Rhinoplasty but The Wellness Clinic are amazing! My first consultation with Steven was just so good he made me feel at ease but also took his time and understood my concerns. After visiting Transform i honestly was going to give up because I felt so disheartened by my whole experience and this was my last shot at it! Their service was just the best. I met up with the surgeon on the next available date and he was amazing! He listened to what i wanted but also didn't try and rush me out the door and really took his time. I had a second consultation with him and then booked my surgery date. It is a lot of money and I believe you should feel comfortable and cared for from the very start. Steven keeps me up to date and the whole team at Birmingham are brilliant. I look forward to my surgery. Thanks guys!

review_title: Visited Mel yesterday at the Gateshouse ?�?
review_body: Visited Mel yesterday at the Gateshouse Clinic, Northampton for non surgical cosmetic procedures. WOW!!! Where has this girl been all my life? What a Gem! She is amazing and totally transformed my facial ageing features and road map lines into a very lovely and natural looking more youthful me. The transformation was so good I was crying joyful tears as I think it was as good as or if not better than a facelift. She had worked out exactly what was right for me and explaining every step of the way what she intended to do and what was needed. Big bonus, she's a wiz with the needle, so gentle.  This has been the best non cosmetic treatment I've ever received. THANK YOU MEL, you're a Star!  Kathy T ..... xxx

I would like to express my thanks to The Wellness Clinic Bristol. In particular my patient coordinator Chantelle, who has been fantastic  in arranging my procedure and taking time out to explain the finer details. She has made me feel in safe hands & I would have no qualms in recommending Chantelle herself or The Wellness Clinic for any kind of procedure or initial consultation. Chantelle offered noting short a 5* service. Very happy patient.

review_title: Breast augmentation consultation for transgender woman.
review_body: I recently visited the Bristol clinic and spoke with the very lovely and extremely helpful Chantelle Williams. Chantelle was highly professional,she explained to me the entire procedure and answered all of my questions as I asked them.Furthermore, not only did Chantelle refer to me as my chosen gender,she also took the time and trouble to ask about my transition,how my journey had gone so far and where I wanted it to go,which i thought was extremely kind and thoughtful of her to do. Chantelle and her colleagues, who I met there and who I spoke with on the phone, were very knowledgeable, professional and understanding and also very friendly, polite,caring and genuinely sincere. When I am able to do so (hopefully soon!) I will definitely be having my breast augmentation surgery with The Wellness Clinic of Harley Street. I will also use them later for other procedures (nose and chin) that will help me obtain my desired feminine look. I would definitely recommend them. Thank you for your advice and guidance.
Had vaser liposuction last November, paid circa 6k.

review_title: I had a breast augmentation about 3 ?�?
review_body: I had a breast augmentation about 3 months ago through The Wellness Clinic and I couldn't have asked for a better service. The results are exactly as I had hoped for and I am extremely happy. From start to finish I felt at ease and well looked after. The surgeon, Richard Karoo was fantastic, and took great care in listening to my concerns. His work and aftercare was second to none. Thank you all very much.

I had breast reduction surgery 7 weeks ago and received the best service from all at the Northampton clinic. Staff were exceptionally friendly and helpful and I am extremely pleased with the result of my surgery

review_title: I had Vaser Lipo on 6 areas on the ?�?
review_body: I had Vaser Lipo on 6 areas on the 27/4/16 at the Leeds Clinic. All I can say is im delighted with the results. The team  Dr.Vlok, Sorena, Claire and Harriet are fantastic.

This is my second procedure with The Wellness Clinic which I will leave a full review for later on, however I just wanted to leave some positive feedback for now regarding my latest experience. The staff at The Wellness Clinic have been phenomenal - Alicia Wojda the manager at reception in particular has been extremely generous with her time, understanding and has accommodated my ridiculous schedule and appointment time changes due to a series of unfortunate events. Handling everything in her stride with efficiency and kindness. Sarah my current nurse is so very patient and extremely professional, always taking the time to answer all of my questions and is very gentle when checking / cleaning my dressing. My current surgeon Mr D Fallahdar is in my humble opinion one of the best rhinoplasty surgeons around, he has been honest and realistic in his approach, leaving nothing to chance and is an outstanding surgeon without question. I highly recommend The Wellness Clinic because of the lovely people mentioned above, who have taken the time to build fantastic rapport with their patients!!

I can't speak highly enough about The Wellness Clinic! I have been going  for a few years now ... always great service, treat you brilliantly! Very knowledgeable! Which is what you want when you want to look good! You can really trust the staff in telling you and knowing what is best and also highlighting whats new or up and coming out on the market! I see Vicki for my skin care and she has been fantastic and has a massive range of knowledge about skin products - what works and what is going to be a waste of time. This is so important, as you DON'T waste you time and money getting the right thing! 10/10 for me wouldn't go anywhere else!!! Can highly recommend!!!!!
Amazing service, Alicia on the front desk and Sarah are the best!!
Couldn?��t recommend the Glasgow Clinic , surgeons  and staff highly enough.

review_title: Very helpful and knowledgable staff (Thanks to Alicia in particular!)
review_body: Very helpful and knowledgable staff; particularly Dr Richards, and all the nurses and lovely Alicia at the reception, who helped me throughout the whole day! Big thanks for that!

I would highly recommend the Bristol clinic, the support and care with Harley Medical is amazing. Treated with upmost respect and friendliness from start to finish my patient coordinator Chantelle has been amazing at answering any questions that I have had. Over all the whole staff are amazing.

review_title: Boobs by Dr Karoo and partners :)
review_body: Every aspect of my operation couldn't have gone any better, my surgeon Dr R Karoo made me feel that I couldn't be in safer hands, oh and he done an amazing job on my boobs :). The clinic and hospital is lovely and the staff make you feel so welcome. Lilli who is based In Bristol has been extremely helpful, giveing me calls and emails just asking how I've been and if I need anything, I am also now having my lips done with the privet clinic as I feel so welcome and at home I just couldn't go anywhere else. You guys are the best!!! :)
I had a liposuction on my legs and theresults were not good . I had paid �6500. Had a review appointment with Dr wolf but  was asked to pay another �1400 to rectify the problem
Excellent treatments, warm and friendly staff, I've have a great experience every time I've attended. Would thoroughly recommend to new clients
FIRST CLASS TREATMENT. VERY EFFICIENT AND FRIENDLY SERVICE.

I booked to have a skin consultation at The Wellness Clinic in Birmingham. My skin and laser practitioner was Lauren, she is very knowledgeable and personable. It was a thorough consultation where she assessed my skin and discussed procedures suitable for me, as my main concern was thread veins/redness I was advised to address this first, the treatment outcomes and expectations were explained as well as the process of the procedure and I felt at ease, she knows her stuff!

I started looking online in Feb/Mar of this year at a couple of procedures that I was interested in having done.I came across The Wellness Clinic which had one of their clinics based not far from where I live in Northampton.I left a message as it was late at night and within 24 hours somebody had got back to me.

I have had 2 treatments now and have been amazed by the results so far and will be going back for more. Very professional and friendly staff and my skin practitioner, Lauren W explained the treatments to me and made me feel at ease. I would highly recommend The Wellness Clinic Birmingham.

I had Dr Grant Hamlet for Vaser liposuction around 10 months ago and I couldn't be happier , he managed to get rid of my dreaded lumps and bumps with no loose skin and a perfect result and he's lovely and personable
Brilliant service, staff are very friendly and welcoming. Would definitely recommend.

I had done dermal fillers and botox. Not only the dermal fillers did not smoothed out my lines but in a couple of places there was to much,looked horrible.I went back to have it dissolved twice,the second time I had to insist on continuing dissolving the filler which was visibly still there.After two attempts there was still to much and I just decided I don't want to go back there and keep asking since it looked like the doctor wasn't interested in fixing the problem.Not impressed with the botox results either.
City branch is lovely.

review_title: I visited this clinic to have some ?�?laser treatment
review_body: I visited this clinic to have some laser skin treatment . I had been disappointied with what I had received in some Liverpool clinics and so I thought I would try The Wellness Clinic . I was made to feel at ease as soon as I walked through the door . Hannah talked me through what I could expect from the procedure and outlined the pricing structure. Sometimes clinics are more concerned with what's in your wallet but I can honestly say that her concern was to outline the best treatment for my condition. I was able to make an informed decision as a result of her advice . Had a patch test and will be returning very soon to commence my treatment. Could not recommend anywhere more highly . Thank you .

review_title: I booked an appointment with the ?�?
review_body: I booked an appointment with The Wellness Clinic in Bristol and had a consultation with Chantelle Williams who was lovely.  Chantelle was very friendly and made me feel really comfortable.  She went through everything with me and answered all my queries.  When I decided to go ahead with my surgery I found that everyone I spoke to were so nice and helpful and guided me well.  I did want the surgery done pretty quickly so thank you to Chantelle for getting everything organise for that to happen but I did feel that a few details were left to the last minute like confirming the address of where I needed to go and the booking of train tickets and hotel bookings.  It was slightly annoying that I was told to be at the Harley Street clinic by 11am to then not be seen until about 2.30, so there was a lot of sitting around but I have to say the staff were really nice.

I was interested in one of their treatments and booked a "free" consultation. It was �25 and that was refunded when you arrived. That went well and I was asked if I'd like to book a consultation with the surgeon.

review_title: Overall I have had a very good service ?�?
review_body: Overall I have had a very good service in the clinic and in my operation. Everybody is been kind and professional with me but I want to thank specially to Chantelle from The Wellness Clinic in Bristol. She is the first person I met and she had been looking after my case very well. I am very gratefull because after my operation she had helped me about some enquiries..so thanks so much for everything

When I first walked into The Wellness Clinic in Birmingham I knew straight away this was the company I wanted to go with. Staff were very welcoming, engaging and thoughtful. The environment was peaceful.
I have be having regular skin treatments at the Northampton clinic and the device is amazing.

I have been a customer for about 4 years now and on each visit I am made to feel very welcome and treated more as a friend than a customer.  The team at The Gatehouse are extremely helpful and professional. I wouldn't dream of going anywhere else and would highly recommend them.

I have been going to the clinic now for 3-4 sessions of micro needling. Vickie Newman has done very sessions and she has been extremely helpful, professional and honest in her guidance on what is best for me going forward and thus far everything has worked 100%. The Northampton branch as a whole is very helpful and make you feel at home.

I have been visiting The Gatehouse Clinic in Northampton for over 5 years now and I would never go anywhere else. If I could give more than 5 stars than I would... An extremely friendly, and professional team with the highest knowledge in all products and treatments. As soon as you walk through the door they make you feel part of The Wellness Clinic Family. 110% highly recommended and I would definitly recommend them over and over again.
I have visited The Wellness Clinic several times and seen Vicki, Aggie and Adrian. The staff are lovely and you feel very at ease in their company.

review_title: Happy Days - my experience at the Birmingham  clinic
review_body: I think that the star rating speaks for itself. I had vaser lipo on my inner thighs, abdomen and flanks yesterday. The staff at the Birmingham clinic made me feel comfortable and at ease through my entire journey from consultation to procedure.  Steve, the Patient Coordinator, and nurse Kiran were extremely supportive, friendly and professional throughout; face to face, email and phone.

review_title: I attended The Wellness Clinic of Harley ?�?
review_body: I attended The Wellness Clinic of Harley Street in Leeds on Saturday the 13th of May. The experience and the way I was welcomed was 5 star. I was met initially by Nabeel who put me at ease from the first moment. My treatment with the surgeon Michael and his college Monica could not have been any less stress full, the manner in which they carry out their skills is to be recommended. I cannot thank them enough for the treatment and the relaxed professional surroundings, the after care was explained clearly and was also given to me in typed form so that I could keep referring to the required after care. I can highly recommend this companies services.

review_title: Ruptured PIP implant removal and uplift
review_body: Recently had PIP implant removal and breast uplift with Adrian Richards at The Wellness Clinic

review_title: I felt extremely deflated after my ?�?
review_body: I felt extremely deflated after my consultation. After travelling for 3 hours to the clinic, the surgeon saw me for 1 minute and then left the room - I felt that this consultation was very unpersonal, as if the surgeon did not care or want to listen to the treatment I was requesting. I ended up leaving my consultaion feeling very upset and disappointed.

I have had a fabulous blepharoplasty by Mr.Adrian Richards at the northampton gatehouse clinic, great result and great care by Aggie(senior clinical practitioner). I also regularly have VPL lashes with Vicky - very experienced,very friendly,always ensures you are completely happy with results.   Lyndsey is a  very experienced, skilled, lovely practitioner who has given me amazing semi permanent brows.  Caroline,Jess and Nuela are always extremely helpfull, very friendly and lovely!  First class team!!

I recently underwent an FUE hair transplant procedure at The Wellness Clinic in Leeds with Dr Mark Tam. My experience has only been positive. The staff are friendly, welcoming and professional. Dr Tam gets my highest possible praise. I would recommend Dr Tam and his team to anyone considering a hair transplant. Special mention to Nabeel Faarooq who kept me informed and was always available to answer any questions from the initial consultation to the aftercare.

Loved Dr William and couldn't be happier with my results. I never felt rushed during my consultations like many of  the other places and felt utter confidence in him by his great attention to detail. Throughout every step of the way i felt we were on the same page and felt  in safe hands. Everyone at the surgery was lovely however the only piece of constructive criticism i would say would be the organisation by reception staff due to mistakes/cancellation  and delays/ waiting times on appointments.   A small price to pay though for such a life changing result.
A very kind, approachable and professional company! Extremely happy with my service there! Was done quickly and methodically! Recommend them to anyone!

Had Vaser Liposuction at the Manchester Clinic, performed by Dr Vlock, with Alex as Patient Coordinator. Can't be more complimentary of the treatment, the kind and friendly nature of the staff, and the overall professionalism.
Wonderful Team, Im a regular and when im there I feel like part of the family as opposed to a paying customer.  Their treatments are fabulous and effective, I can highly recommend.  Debra

review_title: Had the most amazing experience with Dr ?�?
review_body: Had the most amazing experience with Dr Richards - from start to finish everything was perfect. From my first consultation to leaving after my operation. The final result is incredible and I couldn't ask for a better outcome. Going from a 32B to a 32DD - looking natural and complimenting my figure. I feel better in myself and happier with how I look. It's made a huge impact on my confidence already and I'm only 6 weeks post op. Couldn't recommend Dr Richards enough and for anyone who is thinking of having a breast augmentation consider Dr Richards and you won't regret it!
Hi

review_title: I had a very friendly and professional  experience.
review_body: I had a very friendly and professional experience at The Wellness Clinic.I can't thank you enough.I would not hesitate to recommend you to anyone thinking of having this procedure .All the staff were so helpful through out especially Alex and Sarah..once again thank you.

Cannot thank Sarah, Alex, Cathy and Dr Vlok enough for the fantastic experience I had at the Manchester clinic. Not only were they professional and welcoming but so friendly and completely put me at ease over my procedure. I am so happy with the results! I would (and do) recommend them to everyone I know. Great clinic, great staff, great value and great results.
I was very nervous the day of my procedure, but the extremely friendly and profesional staff reassured me every step of the way. I cannot praise them enough. Thank you all so much!

review_title: I had my eyebrows done by Lilly and ?�?
review_body: I had my eyebrows done by Lilly and they were the best I've ever had them done! She was very professional but made me feel so welcome and looked after. Very helpful with any questions I had after the procedure and was just a true gem all round! Wouldn't hesitate to recommend!

review_title: I had my eyebrows done by Lillie
review_body: I had my eyebrows done by Lillie, she done them amazing, lovely lady to! Xx

I had microbladed eyebrows done at The Wellness Clinic and they have healed perfectly. Lillly carried out the procedure and was very reassuring in explaining the process and the colour and shape that would complement my features. My eyebrow shape is exactly what I hoped for and they look very natural. I am very pleased with the results. Lilly also put me at ease during my first visit and at the same time was very professional. Would highly recommend a visit.

Received laser hair removal treatment; Lillie was amazing at making me feel at ease and extremely friendly and professional. Treatment itself was outstanding; so pleased I had this done. I didn't really find it at all painful and could not recommend enough anyone thinking of having this done to just do it!!

review_title: Wonderful staff- professional and personalised care
review_body: My experience with The Wellness Clinic has been wonderful. From first consultation to post operative care, the support, friendly staff and professional attitude I have received is second to none.

review_title: Another lovely treatment at the Private ?�?
review_body: Another lovely treatment at The Wellness Clinic in Northampton this afternoon. Staff were very attentive and informative as usual, I look forward to the next one.

review_title: A very big thank you to all at The ?�?
review_body: A very big thank you to all at The Wellness Clinic Manchester.  I had a vaser lipo procedure carried out on my inner thighs, lower back and flanks.  Dr Vlok and the nurses were all fantastic and the results have been excellent, I'm so pleased. I would recommend The Wellness Clinic to anyone.

review_title: The city private clinic - Controlling Acne
review_body: I went to the city private clinic as I've been suffering from acne since my teens, booking an appointment was easy and the reception staff were very friendly when I arrived for my appointment. Charlotte was lovely and gave me belief that after years of suffering with acne she can suggest products and treatments to control my angry breakouts. 6 months since my initial appointment and my break outs are under control and my complexion is the clearest it's ever been. I'm no longer concious of wearing my hair up and I'm getting compliments weekly which is boosting my self confidence and it's all thanks to the city Private Clinic. Next step to address my scars and I'll be going back to The City private clinic for this as I know they'll have the right treatments.

review_title: Very happy with The Wellness Clinic from ?�?
review_body: Very happy with The Wellness Clinic from start to finish. The initial consultation was good and very informative and the breast reduction results excellent. Surgeon was Adrian Richards. I will be going to TPC again later this year for facial rejuvenation. Highly recommended.

review_title: I have had breast augmentation with ?�?
review_body: I have had breast augmentation with TPC, LVL Lashes, Microdermobrasion and a chemcial peel.

I went to The Wellness Clinic for an areola reduction. I found the staff very friendly & helpful from booking the procedure to getting the procedure done. I was given lots of information from the patient coordinator Alex & the doctor Mr Fattah I felt at ease during the procedure the doctor & nurse chatted to me throughout which was lovely. I am due my follow up appointment next week. All is well so far so i would definitely recommend The Wellness Clinic & thank the staff for being helpful

review_title: A big thank you to all at the private ?�?
review_body: A big thank you to all at The Wellness Clinic Manchester. They were all very helpful people and I'm really looking forward to how my hair transplant turns out

A big Thank you to Amy from The Wellness Clinic, Birmingham. During our consultation she was very kind and accommodating, and gave me some great advice on what the best course of treatment would be for my skin problem. I look forward to trying out my new skincare routine and would definitely recommend this clinic to anyone.
Great results and good service, especially an offer to do an additional check up for free to ensure good results!

review_title: Would highly recommend visited Leeds clinic
review_body: Pleasant experience from the initial appointment to the procedure.

Excellent throughout the whole experience and procedure. Mr Richards is very knowlegeable, professional and reassuring. His nurses are fabulous and the support staff are always very helpful and accommodating. First rate service, would recommend. Excellent outcome!

review_title: I have been a patient of the Bristol ?�?
review_body: I have been a patient of the Bristol clinic for a few years after having treatment on my varicose veins with mr ranyboldo which was very successful.

review_title: I had a tummy tuck and breast uplift on 20th march 2017
review_body: I had a tummy tuck and breast uplift on 20th march 2017 by Dr Adrian Richards and an over the moon with the results and care received. From start to finish Dr Richards, Aggie and the whole team have been fantastic. I had a slight bleed on my nipple which turned out to be nothing but I called the clinic st 9am and Aggie got me in to see her at 10 the same morning. Fantastic before and after care. I was worried about changing my own dressings at week 3 but Aggie talked me through it and then got me in to see her to put my mind at rest. I cannot recommend this company enough. I'm looking forward to my implants in July. Thank you. Sarah Hammond

review_title: My review of Mr Richards at The Private ?�?
review_body: My review of Mr Richards at The Wellness Clinic

review_title: I went for a consultation in ?�?
review_body: I went for a consultation in Birmingham. Amy on reception is outstanding providing great care and communication both prior to and during my appointment, helping me feel welcome and comfortable. Many thanks.

review_title: FUE at TPC (also had previous FUT x2 at ?�?
review_body: FUE at TPC, Harley Street (also had previous FUT x2 at another practice back in 1999)
Great staff at their Cheapside Branch. Treatment was done in a very professional way and was very effective.

review_title: FUE at The Wellness Clinic of Harley st
