review_body: I had fue treatment at the clinic and from start to finish everything was great. I first met the patient co-ordinator Steven and he was really welcoming, reassuring and answered any questions I had and put my mind to rest. I then had a consultation with the surgeon Michael and we looked further into the detail of my specific case. He was a really nice guy and was honest and open about what I needed and the pros and cons and realistic about worst and best case scenarios. I decided to go ahead as I felt this was the right place for me. On the day of the surgery I met nabil and Monica the specialist nurses part of Michaels team. Again they were really genuinely nice people, making sure I was ok every step of the way and also along with Michael again answering any questions or concerns I had. The procedure went great and I couldn't ask for more. From the receptionists to the surgeons everyone I found was professional yet approachable.

Yesterday I had a hair transplant at Leeds clinic. All of the staff from the doctors to the receptionists were lovely. Sorena, my patient co-ordinator, went out of her way to help me find a suitable treatment option as I am a student on a limited budget, and we managed to decide on something that would give me great results within my price range. My surgical team, Dr. Mouzakis, Monica, and Nabeel, did a fantastic job. Dr Mouzakis spent a lot of time designing my new hairline with me, I was not made to feel rushed or silly for voicing any questions I had, and in the end I took his advice on the hairline design because he seemed very knowledgable on what would give the best appearance for me. I am pleased with the results, although obviously it has only been one day so I cannot comment on the final results! However, one day later I have no pain and am feeling good about the procedure. Looking forward to my review in 2 weeks.

review_title: Just had surgery with Paul Tulley ?�?
review_body: Just had surgery with Paul Tulley through The Wellness Clinic Harley street, it's been a smooth experience actually nice even though the operation itself is pretty painful, I had mini tummy tuck with lipo I am experiencing some fluid at the moment but mr Tulley is fantastic and sorting everything out for me along with the  girls at The Wellness Clinic, especially Alicia I have found her very lovely and helpful,, surgery is scary even when it's elective but The Wellness Clinic and mr Tulley have all been brilliant.. thankyou

review_title: Would just like to thank the team at ?�?private clinic Birmingham
review_body: Would just like to thank the team at the clinic for my excellent treatment I received for my hair transplant procedure on 4/4/17. From the warm friendly welcome from Kelly who couldn't do enough for me at reception and was extremely warm and welcoming, to the surgeon Dr Michail Mouzakis who gave a pain free procedure with great initial results providing total care, professionalism and concern for my well being throughout the procedure. His team Maca and Monika were also fantastic showing total care and attentiveness to my needs throughout the procedure and ensuring any minor pain I experienced was dealt with immediately. At the end of the procedure all my after care needs were explained clear and concise in order to give me complete confidence in how to maintrinsic results. I cannot speak highly enough of the experience and would recommend The Wellness Clinic to anyone thinking about having the same procedure.
I have been affected by gynocasmatia since my early teens. It was a nightmare, from no swimming to being super conscious whenever I had to get changed and showered.

My 19 year old son has just had a hair transplant at The Wellness Clinic in Bristol  with Dr Tam and his team. We chose Dr Tam as he specialises in high density hair transplants in temples and hairline.

review_title: My experience with Adrian Richards and ?�?
review_body: My experience with Adrian Richards and all of the Aurora staff was nothing short of outstanding. I did lot of research on breast augmentation, clinics and surgeons and I couldn't have made a better choice. From the initial consultation where I was immediately made at ease, right up to my surgery and post surgery appointments. I felt that I was really listened to and incredibly well informed. The pre-op staff were absolutely lovely, as were all the staff on my surgery day. Dr Richards is an outstanding surgery and my results far exceeded my expectations.

I went to The Wellness Clinic in Birmingham for my consulation for a hair transplant in january this year, it was booked with Steven, upon arrival at the clinic i can honestly say i was completed at ease and relaxed. Steven was fantastic during the consulation, he told me the ins and outs lf the procedure and various things involving pre and post care. Hes such a loverly proffesional guy yet very approachable. On the 22nd of march, the day lf the transplant i got to clinic bright and breezy which again i was met by the loverly Steven who chilled me out a little before surgery, the transplants went extremely well no pain and was pretty much relaxed throughout !! Dr Mouzakis and his team worked so well that day not only with the transplant but just being really friendly !!would not hesitate in recommending The Wellness Clinic in the future ! Thank you

review_title: Fantastic couldn't of asked for a better surgeon and aftercare team
review_body: I have recently had Vaser to x5 area with the fantastic dr vlok
Rang The Wellness Clinic to enquire about varicose vein treatment, in particular the recovery time and how long you can't fly for afterwards, as this is involved in my job, which I explained.

Couldn't have chosen a better clinic to have my procedure done, I was dealt with by Chantelle the patient coordinator she was brilliant everytime I called she was always so lovely and full of knowledge, I was so nervous on the day and she made me feel at ease and I felt like she really cared. I had my procedure done by lesley dean she was amazing and gave me the results I wished for. 100% returning in the future and would 100% recommended this company.

review_title: The Wellness Clinic of Harley Street Glasgow- exceptional
review_body: The Wellness Clinic of Harley Street in Glasgow is absolutely outstanding and provides an extremely professional service. All of the staff are friendly and helpful, but I have to specifically mention Dr Connelly and Cherie Lincoln.  I could not have wished for better support, guidance and results. I do not give ratings like this lightly; I am a healthcare professional and have high standards, but I have absolutely no reservations in giving this clinic an excellent rating. I cannot thank them enough for helping me get my health and wellbeing back!

review_title: Amazing Staff & Fantastic Results!! - Harley Street, London
review_body: I can not thank and praise Mr Adrian Richards and his team at The Wellness Clinic enough!! My results are exactly what I have always wanted, Mr Richards is a very skilled and attentive surgeon. The reception staff at the Harley Street Practice have been so helpful and friendly, my favourites being Alicia Wojda and Charlotte who are beautiful inside and out!! My patient co-ordinator Becki is an absolute sweetheart, she has given me so much of her time in our meetings to discuss and plan my procedure in detail. Verity (she's so nice) and Lauren were lovely too!! I really wanted to recommend and give a special thank you to my nurses who have helped me throughout my procedure, pre opp, during and post opp without fail no matter how many silly questions I managed to think up; Alice (really honest and sweet), Melissa, Christine (they're both very patient), Aggie (absolute angel), Anna-Marie (very attentive and caring), (there are a couple of lovely ladies that I have forgotten the names of who are part of Mr A Richards team and were wonderful) and my Anaesthetist Ray who kept me alive!! Everyone really did play their part in making me feel safe, comfortable and relaxed. Amazing staff who I can not thank enough for helping correct something that has effected me for so long. Thank you :) (I feel like I just wrote a speech for the oscars but they really do deserve it lol) x

review_title: Didn't even get to attend my consultation
review_body: Last week, I made a consultation booking and paid a �50 deposit, which I thought was very reasonable, considering how expenive other clinics fees are. On the day of my booking, at 1.20pm I arrived at the clinic, for my appointment at 1.30pm. I filled in my questionnaire and waited till quarter to, then waited till 2pm, until I finally went up to ask how long it would be until I might be seen, knowing I had to get back to my office. The response was not at all unpleasant, but was told I would have to wait until one of the ladies from upstairs came down to find the approximate time. She later explained that there were still a number of people in front of me, by which time I decided to leave. I did get my �50 back, but what I can't understand is why I wasn't phoned beforehand to explain the situation or even given this information when I checked in. I think it is only the polite thing to do, since I am considering spending thousands of pounds at the clinic for a very intimate procedure. I can only assume that if I hadn't bothered to ask when I would be seen, I would have just sat there until he was ready to see me. It just gives off a very unprofessional appearance and am very disappointed as I really wish I had had the time to speak with Adrian Richards.

review_title: Afro-Caribbean FUE hair transplant with Dr Zioga
review_body: Before I went to The Wellness Clinic I was told by other doctors that because I have Afro-Caribbean hair they couldn?��t help me with FUE hair transplant, as my kind of hair is very hard to work with. While two other doctors told me they could help with no problem and could book me in asap (just leave a deposit). Even though they might have been able to do the job, I will never know but something just didn?��t feel right. So with this in mind I did some more research, found Dr Zioga and had to meet her.

review_title: Very nice place and professional. Alicia was a great help at reception and hospitality was first class
review_body: Very nice place and professional. Alicia was a great help at reception and hospitality was first class

review_title: Very professional and experienced staff along with fantastic aftercare.
review_body: Having undergone the FUE hair transplant procedure at the Leeds clinic I can safely say it was one of the best decisions I ever made.

review_title: I visited The Wellness Clinic today. They turned me away.
review_body: I visited The Wellness Clinic today. They turned me away for an FUE procedure. As I don't have enough hairs in my donor area, they advised me against having a HT. I am very unhappy they can't do the procedure and cover all areas of my hair loss; however, I am very happy with there professional staff and candour. They could of easily promised me the world and took my money. But they were open and advised me to have something like SMP instead of the HT. Thank you to The Wellness Clinic. Keep up your great standards.

review_title: The end result was better than I expected
review_body: After 30 yrs of having very little or no eyebrows  I  made as appointment with The Wellness Clinic in Leeds. The staff were lovely and very professional and after a consultation I had an eyebrow transplant. The first 3 week's I had to take off work as I did not want to disrupt any of the transplanted hairs after that it was ok and the transplant started to settle down and then I could see the results and I was over the moon, I love my eyebrows and they have revolutionised my life no more eyebrow pencil melting in the summer and I  go swimming and do so many things  now, I didn't realise how having no eyebrows affected my life so much and of course my face looks younger which is an added bonus, the procedure is uncomfortable but did not hurt and afterwards it is sore for a couple of weeks and during the whole process the staff look after you , and keep you informed. I can't thank the consultant enough that did my transplant, That private clinic is a place that I would highly recommend to my friends and family .

review_title: Highly qualified, caring and trustworthy staff offering excellent facilities and aftercare.
review_body: About 8 years ago after considerable research & consideration I had a couple of consultations at the Gatehouse Clinic in Northampton and underwent breast augmentation and, the following year, a MACS facelift under the excellent surgeon Adrian Richards, assisted by his amazing nurse Aggie. Cosmetic surgery is a big step and everything was explained to me beforehand and I could have as many consultations as I required and be put in touch with previous patients if I so wished and I went into surgery completely relaxed and assured that my life was in the best hands.  The aftercare was also excellent.  A year later I underwent rhinoplasty under the surgeon Mike Tyler, recommended by Mr Richards as he did not specialize in this area, with again excellent results and was able to have my aftercare with Aggie who was wonderful.   My daughter is now 22, has had hormonal problems and is extremely shy and lacking in confidence. She recently told me how embarrassed she was by her disproportionate bust so I had no hesitation in recommending Adrian Richards and she underwent surgery in January and is extremely satisfied with the results and excellent care she is still receiving.

review_title: Excellent facilities, polite, professional and friendly staff.
review_body: I found the staff Alicia, Emma (clinician) and all the staff were Kind, helpful, friendly, professional. They were gracious, answered all of my questions and queries.
Alicia (front desk) & Carly were exceedingly helpful. Their advice was second to none.

review_title: Warm, friendly service and great expertise
review_body: I recently booked a facial treatment in Cheapside with Charlotte. She was attentive, listened carefully and showed great care in her advice. I am confident in her expertise and in her ability to understand my needs. It was the best experience I have had for this kind of treatment and everyone in the clinic was very friendly and helpful.

I had a tummy tuck with muscle repair with Dr Davood Falladhar this year and the entire experience from start to finish was simply outstanding. The consultation, the surgery itself and the aftercare were perfection. Sally Whitwham, the
The clinic had friendly staff that were very helpful, especially when it came to aftercare. They were easy to contact through phone and email and were very supportive.

review_title: FUE Hair transplant by Dr Zioga
review_body: Marc's review on 29th December 2016 is superbly written and I couldn't have described the whole experience any better myself; simply brilliant!

review_title: Male breast reduction and abdominal liposuction
review_body: I thought long and hard before going ahead with this procedure. I'd been to see Dr.Gupta 2 years before finally plucking up the courage to go ahead. During that time I'd occasionally been in contact to ask more questions which were always answered promptly and honestly, at no stage was I pressured into anything, in fact he almost tried to talk me out of it in case my expectations were too high!

From start to finish, I found the whole experience using The Wellness Clinic of Harley Street to be faultless.  They understood my needs, they introduced me to a wonderful surgeon and arranged everything including my hospital stay and my aftercare.
Would highly recommend Kerry Herbert
Very professional service from all staff. I would highly recommend The Wellness Clinic of Harley Street to Friends and Family.
I am very satisfied with all the staff. They are all welcoming and friendly.

review_title: 98 Henley street is my favourite choice
review_body: Alicia the manager always friendly , nice , very patient, great service and professional spirit, thanks a lot -:))

I have had an awful experience with this people with my scar revision. I am here writing this review so that others can avoid it. If you need any serious cosmetic surgical procedure, please make sure to go look elsewhere. You will find cheaper prices elsewhere with the same quality standards if not better. Unfortunately I could only find out later by chance, after already having paid this people lots of money I could have saved. Apparently on this site I am not allowed to mention better places you could go for help, but trust me there are such places in Manchester. Please stay away from them!!!!!

review_title: You Get What You Pay For!
review_body: The most wonderful experience to have ever done to my body! It's so true, "You get what you paid for!" I got THE BEST! Dr. Karoo, you are AMAZING!
Ive had good results

I've had a few problems at this clinic, due to the nlit laser not working once I've arrived. Thanks to the lovely receptionist they have made me feel very welcome and delt with all my ups and downs professionally, especially Alicia. She has been extremely kind, friendly and genuinely interested in my experience at the clinic.

After seeking advice and researching which type of Lipo treatment was best for me I choose a Vaser treatment. Having previously had 2 consultations else where I decided to Visit the TPC at Birmingham. Dr.Wolfe is reviewed as an experienced well trusted doctor and so decided to have a consultation. Dr.Wolfe's colleagues at Birmingham are very friendly, professional and after 4 weeks of my operation am extremely pleased with the result.  Before, during and after my treatment I had my own liaison Steven who would contact me each week to ask if I had any question (Which I always Do!) During my operation the staff made me feel relaxed and I underwent Vaser whilst the Doctor was explaining what was happening. I Would defiantly recommend the TPC and from my experience the team at Birmingham are Fab! Thanks Guys!

review_title: Hair trasplant with Dr Zioga - Amazing experience
review_body: After several consultations with various top clinics and Hair Surgeons both in the USA and U.K., my decision was easy after meeting Doctor Thomy Kourmeda Zioga. She is one of the few Hair Transplant Surgeon offering U-FUE, she is competent, trustworthy and her team is simply the best and make things look so easy. After almost 3 months, I can see the results, of course I have to be patient and wait a full year to appreciate the final outcome. I would highly recommend Doctor Zoiga as she is truly qualified and competent; when making such a life changing decision, you want to make sure you are in the best hands possible and rest assured that you will be with her and her team: Katerina, Lisa etc. Thank you so much

I have just completed 12 months of varicose vein treatment with Mr Ranaboldo in Bristol.  It started with a 90 min procedure followed by several follow up appointment/minor procedures until both Mr Ranaboldo and I were happy that the job was completed.  I have found everyone very friendly, professional and thorough.  This was a big step for me to take both financially and physically but I have no regrets and am glad I went through The Wellness Clinic.  I wouldn't hesitate to recommend both Mr Ranaboldo and the clinic.

Dr Adrian had a welcoming presence about him which made me feel comfortable to express how I felt and what I changes I wanted. He openly listened to what I had to say and gave me his professional oppion without any pressure. I am extremely happy with my results and his work.

After procrastinating for years about my hair loss, I finally took the plunge and booked a consultation at the Leeds Private Clinic. Prior to this I had been to 4 consultations in London over many years and decided to go with this clinic. A friend had been and had a very positive experience. He specifically told me to book with a lady called Sorena. Communication was good and I received a confirmation following the booking.

I got in touch with TPC as I was very depressed about my man boobs and wanted to have a chest reduction. I was never able to take a t-shirt off on holiday and would only go topless in front of my wife. About 4 or 5 years ago I finally plucked up the courage to try and get it sorted. I was happy with the initial consultation and Dr Wolf gave me every assurance that my chest would be virtually flat after the procedure. He went through the procedure with me and then took 'before photos'.

The Wellness Clinic at St Pauls is excellent. So convenient for me as its close to work, the staff always manage to accommodate appointments that fit my schedule. Charlotte deserves a special mention as she's warm, friendly and puts clients at ease, when the procedure might ordinarily make you feel uncomfortable or self conscious, you don't feel that way with her.

I would highly recommend The Wellness Clinic, all of the team were professional, diligent and courteous at all times, i felt fully informed regarding my procedure and received excellent aftercare and advice. Most importantly i no longer have a mummy tummy (Thank you Dr Wolf).
I have been there twice and the quality of the service I have received is high. They do not try to upsell you, they do patch tests and they make you will appreciated as a client.
Hair Trans - Zioga - Outstanding!!!

review_title: Terrible experience.. Did not get to see surgeon for follow up
review_body: Re: I am extremely disappointed with this company. They were extremely helpful until they received payment. As soon as they received their money the care and contact was almost non existent. I did not get to see the surgeon after the initial procedure, even though I had big concerns as I came out with a mis shapen stomach. I had to fight for the clinic to include what was agreed with after care. Failure to return calls. Terrible experience and poor out come. I would never use this company again.

I have been attending The Wellness Clinic in Leeds since January, and have since undergone several different treatments. My first of which was a revision of my previous plug hair transplant treatment from many years ago. My aim was to soften my very harsh hairline which I was quite conscious of. Before arranging my appointment with TPC I had visited many reputable clinics across the Country and had not felt comfortable with proceeding to the next stage. For me, it has to feel right. My initial consultation with The Wellness Clinic was with Sorena, who made me feel at ease and went through in detail what I wanted to achieve. Sorena was very thorough and asked many questions, to find out what I was expecting from the treatments, a professional lady who conducts herself well. I was never made to feel pressured into going ahead and was looking forward to meeting with Dr Tam as I didn't think there were many surgeons who could improve my previous plug hairline. My meeting with Dr Tam went very well and again he was very thorough and honest. He took my points into consideration. Dr Tam understood the reasons I was contemplating the treatment and after the assessment I was looking forward to booking in. He was very receptive to my needs and made me feel comfortable. On the day of treatment I was greeted with a warm welcome and the day went better than I had expected. Dr Tam's surgical team made me feel at ease and I was very well looked after. Since my FUE treatment I have had other procedures with Dr Vlok and his team and again extremely happy with results. The clinic is very clean and Sorena and her team have made me feel welcome each time I have attended. The communication pre and post surgery has always been prompt. I would highly recommend Sorena and the team of skilled Doctors in Leeds who have definitely changed my life and would refer my friends and family. I am assured that they would have the same experience I have. Thank you also to the bookings team who again were again very knowledgable and steered me in the right direction. I will be in contact again soon as looking to have some skin treatments.

Having suffered from a sudden outbreak of quite severe acne over a year and a half ago now and having only recently got it under control, I was unfortunately left with pitted scarring around my cheeks and chin, resulting in a huge loss of confidence. I came across The Wellness Clinic of Harley street having read amazing reviews and cannot thank them enough. I had the pixel laser treatment and I am absolutely over the moon with the result. My scarring is pretty much nonexistent, my skin looks luminous and I have had so many compliments. I would not hesitate in recommending The Wellness Clinic, and the pixel laser treatment. While I had not heard very much about pixel laser prior to my treatment, Nicola was extremely knowledgable and supportive and I would highly recommend this for a those who, like me have been left with acne scarring!
I battled with the justification of this procedure for some years - both from a vanity & financial point of view, not to mention that I'm a devout coward where injections are concerned!!

I've just been to The Wellness Clinic in Leeds for a free consultation About my hair loss. I spoke to woman called Sorena, She clearly knew what she was talking about, she was very professional and friendly at the same time. They look all options with you not just hair transplant and Advise you which would be best for you. I would advise anyone who is struggling with hair loss to book an appointment with The Wellness Clinic

I have been attending The Wellness Clinic Birmingham for over a year now, very helpful staff and friendly environment. In Particular, Ki has been treating me for my Rocesea & Acne condition . I feel she is empowered with knowledge and has a very good understanding of the treatments she has to offer. Ki is very supportive and thorough when explaining any process. She is a professional and has a naturally loved personality. I would highly recommend her to anyone.
I am so happy with my results

I recently visited the bristol clinic and the patient coordinator chantelle williams was very very helpful. She gave me all the information i required anc made me feel most at ease at the clinic. I had botox with lesley the nurse who was very professional and i was very happy with my results. I would highly reccomend The Wellness Clinic of harley street.
I have been a client at The Wellness Clinic in Leeds from the year 2010.
I would recommend The Wellness Clinic to anyone.

Welcomed by a warm and friendly smile by a gentleman named Steve, who directed me to the receptionist who was very professional and polite. I was offered hot beverages by Steve. Afterwards we had a private consultation which was very informative and encouraging.

I had Vaser liposuction and breast fat graft with Dr Wolf at The Wellness Clinic. I had conducted a lot of research into who was going to be the best surgeon to perform my procedures and I?��m glad to say the excellent reviews I read about Dr Wolf and The Wellness Clinic were absolutely true. From the outset I found the time and attention I was given was outstanding. At no point was I rushed to make a decision and I was invited back in for an additional consultation to discuss any arising concerns I might have about my procedure. There was no hard sale at all just time and  very clear information from Dr Wolf to make the right decision for me.

Came to The Wellness Clinic to have thread veins treated.  Dr Ritu was extremely professional and caring in his manner and treatment with me. The staff were lovely, would highly recommend this clinic.  Very happy with the results so far.

review_title: Alevere is my best kept secret for keeping trim
review_body: Faced with an impending "magic birthday" (one with a 0 on the end!) I wanted to do something to trim down and head into the next decade in style. Thank goodness a good friend was already a client of The Wellness Clinic of Harley Street.  She was about half way through her own transformation (for a wedding) and it was the best decision I ever made. Not only is the treatment and nutrition program the most effective way I have ever slimmed down but the team in the Glasgow branch are the best I have ever worked with. Huge thanks to my doctor Simon Connolly and my aesthetic therapist Stephanie Johnston for taking such care of me and always with a wonderful approachable style. I would recommend Alevere with these guys to anyone who wants a new lean and fit look.
I found the staff to be very professional, knowledgeable and reassuring.

review_title: Botox and filler treatment at The Wellness Clinic - Glasgow
review_body: Couldn't rate Dr Simon Connolly any higher! I seen him at the clinic in Glasgow and would now not see any other doctor for my treatment! He listened to me and done exactly what I wanted, I was really clear that as a mature woman I did not want to look younger, but simply refreshed, and that was what I got! The clinic has a lovely, calm environment and the team have looked after me at every step! Thank you!

I pondered getting a procedure carried out for almost 12 months before finally opting to entrust TPC Glasgow to do the work.  I met with a lot of practises claiming to be experts in the this field however none of them came close to giving me the level of comfort Stefanie and her team in Glasgow did.  She diligently answered all my questions in a timely fashion and at no point did I feel pressured into making my decision.  On the day of the procedure I was met with a highly professional team and Dr Kunnure and his technicians were fantastic at talking my through the process.

review_title: Very pleased with The Wellness Clinic
review_body: Have visited The Wellness Clinic since July and underwent liposuction which gave me a fantastic result. Dr Gupta was my surgeon and I happily recommend him. He showed me photographs of pre and post op patients and it went exactly as planned.  I feel very confident now - top off and stuff.

review_title: Experience of Varicose vein treatment July, August and Sept 2015
review_body: Having 3 treatments and numerous appointments, staff were always friendly and welcoming. Professional but open to a chat with advice. Well done. Have already recommended to friends

everyone who works at the clinic has made me feel more than amazing from the admin staff , through to Geri and and the Doctors. I am more than happy with my results I came today for my 6 month review and the difference in me is so good I am really happy to have chosen Manchester Private Clinic and I'll be coming back for further treatmeants that I didn't even know anyone could help with! Best team , made me feel so comfortable - Thanks for the Mince Pie , have a great Christmas

From walking through the door I was greeted with big smiles and positive energy. Alex and Sarah are full of knowledge and very caring - I am half way through my treatment with Hannah and already am I seeing great results. I enjoy coming to the Manchester private clinic and think if anyone is considering treatment they should attend The Wellness Clinic.

Came in for a very informative skin consultation with Sorena, she is super friendly and made me feel welcome. I have been suffering with skin problems for some time and she made me feel at ease and gave me lots of advice on various skin treatments.  Thank you Sorena!

I came in for a skin consultaion and the staff were exceptionally friendly. I spoke with Alicia who made me feel very comfertable. I would highly recommend The Wellness Clinic to my friends and I will be back just after the New Year!

Staff are friendly, informative and attentive, recommended a fantastic skincare range that does what it says on the tin by the beauty therapist who keeps me regularly updated on the essentials. Overall a fantastic service with a warm and friendly environment

I currently attend the Glasgow clinic for Alevere diet programme and find the staff very welcoming and friendly. They are extremely professional with a wealth of knowledge. I attend Stephanie Johnston every Friday for my ultrasound and endermoligie treatment and find her very understanding and motivational ,therefore feel encouraged for each new week. DrSimon Connolly oversees my progress and I feel extremely confident that medically everything is running smoothly.

review_title: Chantelle Williams made me feel amazing
review_body: I am looking to get a breast lift, never had any surgery and was a bit scared to ask as felt I would be pressured to pay something on the day. I would need to save money for the procedure so I was worried I would be called a time waster or something rather than a human being with bills to pay etc.

review_title: outstanding - very professional and caring would highly recommend.
review_body: Would like to thank all the team at the Bristol clinic for their outstanding care and treatment that I received.

review_title: Fantastic team who have a wealth of experience behind them- would highly recommend :-)
review_body: I researched Vaser Lipo for many months and read lots about Vaser Lipo. I noticed that lots of clinics offer Vaser and prices vary. I chose The Wellness Clinic because they are an established clinic and the surgeons are well experienced. The procedure was exactly as expected and I was back at work within a couple of days. I was particularly impressed that this clinic offers MLD as I noticed that most clinics don't offer it but expect patients to source MLD specialists. I was also very impressed with Dr Wolf who was evidently experienced with performing the procedure. I felt completely at ease and all of team at Birmingham were helpful, friendly and informative. The results so far are amazing and I am excited for the coming months to see the final results from my Vaser Lipo procedure.

I have always been well received at this clinic and have had fantastic treatment from Ki with my hair removal. She has always accomodated me, providing me with as much information about my treatment and made me as comfortable as possible. I wouldn't go anywhere else. Recommended.

review_title: My FUE Hair Transplant with Dr Mouzakis at TPC Birmingham
review_body: I'm now twelve days on from my FUE procedure with Dr Mouzakis at The Wellness Clinic, Birmingham and I'm so happy with the results so far.
OMG a totally mind blowing experience and without any doubt far better than I expected.

I have had fillers by Marie on a couple of occasions, both time my experience has been very good . Marie is very experienced in her field  and I have total confidence in what she might recommend  for me have in the future . The front of house also is very professional, yet warm and concerning, especially Elaine , who is alway ready to answer queries , or concerns that I might have . I would be very happy to,and have recommend The Wellness Clinic to anybody who would benefit from the it

I would like to say a MASSIVE thank you to Nicola and The Wellness Clinic for giving me the most amazing treatment and care possible. It was 6 months before my wedding and when I came in for my consultation for N-Lite Nicola was extremely helpful, making me feel relaxed and reassured. I left feeling happy, relived and excited about my future treatment. Throughout my sessions of N-Lite Nicola always made sure I was comfortable and always extremely professional and very friendly. I can not thank you enough and The Wellness Clinic for everything you did for me leading up to my wedding. The treatment was extremely successful.

I have had lip fillers a few times here by Bruno who is excellent, he knows i'm nervous every time, and does his best to reassure me. He listens to what i want, and advises; always making sure i'm fully happy with the results before i leave. The ladies on the reception are really lovely also, always smiley and make you feel very welcome! Would highly recommend :).

I am so happy Lilly recommended this treatment to me! My nose is something that has always bothered me. With this treatment I was in and out in no time and the staff at The Wellness Clinic made me feel very comfortable and at ease! Would highly recommend to anyone thinking of having this procedure!
Alicia the front of House Manager was very helpful and assisted me well with the query.

Enjoyed my experience at The Wellness Clinic, all the staff were professional and welcoming. I had my surgery one month ago and my surgeon and patient coordinator have always been on hand to answer any questions. I highly recommend The Wellness Clinic.
I had Botox done by Dawn Lisa at The Wellness Clinic Manchester, and I truly can't rate the service highly enough.

review_title: The whole experience with The Wellness Clinic has been excellent.
review_body: All the staff are professional, lovely and friendly. During the treatment the nursing staff and Consultant explained what was happening and reassured me all the time. I was extremely nervous, I needn't have been, I was immediately put at ease, I cannot praise everyone enough, I would definitely recommend The Wellness Clinic, I attended the Leeds and Manchester Clinic, both equally as good.

There is one word that accurately describes The Wellness Clinic; compassionate.  From the first instance I have been treated with the utmost respect, support and kindness. I made an appointment to inquire about the laser liposuction service and was greeted with friendly staff with a calm and clean environment. I saw previous clients coming in just to say hello and show off their results with the staff. There were genuine  smiles everywhere!

at first i was so nervous i was going to walk out before my consolation but I'm so glad i didn't, it was the best thing ever, dr wolf was so kind and helpful make me feel safe and my nerves went, had a week of pain due to drains ect but so happy with the results can't thank dr wolf enough :) had a consolation at a different places and it scared me but The Wellness Clinic was the best so glad i went there
I?��m a 56 year old woman, and had particularly bad spider thread veins on the outside of both thighs.

I recently had treatment for leg vein problems. When booking my initial consultation I was asked to pay a fee that would be refunded to me once I attended my appointment. The refund was not mentioned at my appointment. I was simply told the cost of the treatment that would help me. I paid an initial fee and agreed that I would ensure that the balance was paid three weeks before my treatment.

I had my first session today with Victoria. The place is clean, there is a strict procedures and process. Very safe and professional. She prepared my skin well, then gently did the treatment, it was all done with caution and
Had my 2nd FUE treatment this week with Dr.Tam & Team. Satisfied with results again so far, fingers crossed for progress.

review_title: Excellent FUE Hair Transplant with absolutely no scarring
review_body: I wrote my first review of my hair transplant in late September, following the procedure to move 4,500 hairs from the back of my head to the front in late January. Today, I had my 9 month follow up session with my surgeon, Dr  Kouremada Zioga. It hit me just how much my hairline had improved when I compared the photos of me before the transplant with after. How much older I looked back then!
Very impressed with the service and results at the City branch of The Wellness Clinic.

review_title: 5* clinic, friendly and professional,extremely happy with my results would recommend the Birmingham clinic to anyone
review_body: I had a look at a number of clinics for a breast augmentation, and chose this one as it was the most reputable. I also wanted the procedure as quickly as possible but without compromising on the quality. From the point I had first contact with this private clinic they were friendly and went out of their way to meet my needs and got everything done in a time scale I wanted. I was given a choice of surgeons and chose Mr Ken Kok. Mr Kok was excellent at making sure he fully understood everything I wanted and making sure I understood fully the whole procedure and any possible problems that could occur, i had the chance at any point to question him directly in regards to any concerns I had. At one point I was concerned about the size we had agreed on and he invited me back to the clinic to try sizing and talk through the concerns I had which made me feel comfortable and relaxed about my choices. I also asked for a mole removal off my face which they had no problem adding to the procedure. I had the procedure within a month of my first contact with the clinic; I also used their finance scheme which was easy to apply for. Post op I am more than happy with the results that look natural and Mr Kok made everything the way we had agreed and he is very professional, easy to approach person and shows compassion for you as a client and a personal interest in a good recovery; the staff at the clinic had the same approach, the anaesthetist discussed my pain control options and reassured me their aim was to try and make this as pain free as possible . The after care has been brilliant and I felt in safe hands throughout. I have already recommended him to people and I would strongly recommend this clinic as the quality and standards are second to none . I feel that due to this is why I had a low amount of pain and a quick recovery and a stress free process.
So glad I picked this place went for consultations everywhere and these guys made me feel so comfortable . Clinic is gorgeous and was well looked after. Doctor was brilliant too

After about a year of deliberation about undergoing a FUE due to a significant change in my hairline at 25, much research led me to The Wellness Clinic at Bristol. I arranged a consultation with Cat and attended not really sure what to expect.

review_title: Nothing but praise for your Leeds Clinic
review_body: My partner and myself have both just had vaser Hi def (4 areas each) with Dr Vlok at the Leeds Private clinic. We did a fair bit of research before choosing The Wellness Clinic and knew that after the vaser , recovery would be no walk in the park.

review_title: Great experience at The Wellness Clinic
review_body: I would recommend The Wellness Clinic to anyone considering Vaser Liposuction, you are very much in safe hands and the results are fab.  It's pretty unpleasant for the first 2 - 3 weeks post operation so think carefully, but if you decide to go for it then this is the place to go.

The service and after care is outstanding! I have had really great results that are like a work of art from the very talented Dr Vlok and his team of trained professionals. The initial consultation answered all my questions putting my mind at ease and was not pressured into anything with a very relaxed comfortable environment. Pricing was all upfront with no hidden charges and cost was explained in a detailed breakdown of where the money was being spent. All of the staff at the clinic are very friendly and professional, greeting everyone with a smile and are happy to help with whatever you may be worrying or wondering about.

Excellent client care from the first consultation to my 8wk review yesterday. Fantastic results done by Dr Vlok who genuinely cares about his work. I would definatley recomend this company for anyone considering Vaser Lipo or other cosmetic procedures ...not for the faint hearted as recovery can be very uncomfortable but the after care is there 24/7 and the results are so worth it.

review_title: Vaser Liposuction - Excellent service and Excellent Care
review_body: 2 months post treatment, and I can honestly say I am happy that I had the treatment done at The Wellness Clinic Leeds. The initial consultation was with Clare, I found it to be very informative and helpful. We discussed what was needed and how it would work. I was very pleased with all the information and help I was given at the consultation that I booked a surgery date a few days later. I also saw Dr.Vlok briefly at the consultation, he as well was very thorough and informative.

I had about 250 varying in size skin tags and seborrheic warts removed from my neck, face and torso. The consultant spent along time making sure she had got them all and that I was comfortable during the process. I am so pleased with the results and highly recommend anyone to get them done at The Wellness Clinic
Popped in with a skin issue which was dealt with quickly and professionally which put me at ease. Thank you!

review_title: Skin & Beauty by The Wellness Clinic on cheapside
review_body: At Skin & Beauty by The Wellness Clinic on Cheapside today I had treatment for a broken capillary and milia.  Both things have been causing me concern because of they are front and center on my face.

Having noticed my skin ageing more quickly than I would like and being 47, I thought I would take the plunge and look at getting some help. Booked the appointment with the City clinic and paid a booking fee that you get back when you turn up for the appointment which I think is a very good thing as once you have made the decision to book an appointment, it makes you turn up.

review_title: made to feel comfortable and at ease  from start to finish
review_body: So here I am 2 weeks after abdominal  vaser lipo and can honestly say it's one of the best decisions I have made.  Yes I'm still in the swollen recovery stage and looking a little lumpy but the difference is amazing and I wouldn't hesitate to recommend going for it . My consultation in Harley Street with Dr Wolf was swift but not rushed with plenty of opportunity to ask questions.  Following that I was  taken through to the lovely Lisha who gave me the cost of the procedure and then went on to explain how things would proceed.  I made my decision immediately but didn't have to,  I just knew it was what I wanted , even though I was extremely nervous! I paid my deposit and from then on things moved quickly with emails, prescriptions and clear instructions for both pre and post op. My actual procedure took place in Knightbridge and not Harley Street with 4 professionals in attendance who all made me feel at ease. I can't say what the actual lipo felt like as my sedation was amazing and I was out for the count and didn't feel a thing!  Seeing my 'cocktail' of liquified fat was actually  quite emotional and I had a few tears of pure joy.. probably just the sedation affecting me but I was extremely happy that things had gone so well. During the 1st few days there is leakage from the drainage tubes and the area is a little sore but after 5 days the tubes are removed and healing is quite quick. Over the last 2 weeks I have had the recommended MLD to help with the swelling and lumps that happen due to the invasive procedure and continued wearing the compression garment but other than the obvious sensitivity to my skin I feel pretty good. My scars are next to nothing and I'm looking forward to seeing the full results which can take 4-6 months but already wearing cloths more confidently and that's what it's all about.  This decision has given me much more than a flat belly for sure. My one negative comment would be that I expected the place in Knightsbridge where the procedure took place to be as luxurious as Harley Street but it isn't at all!  I believe new premises are being sought so hopefully some thought will be given to the decor and the feel of being a private patient paying substantial fees,  hence my deduction of 1 star.   However it wouldn't stop me recommending The Wellness Clinic as I feel the whole package is worth every penny and I am extremely happy

review_title: Excellent result, care and after care . Professional, approachable & genuine  caring team
review_body: If you're thinking of having a hair transplant, then The Wellness Clinic is the best choice you can make.

review_title: Review of male breast/axilla contouring treatment
review_body: Hi, I wouldn't normally feel the need to write reviews but the excellent treatment at the hands of Dr Grant Hamlet and his TPC team, from initial consultation, through to surgical procedure and including post-op follow up, means I felt  obliged to share!

review_title: FUE Hair Transplant - the best decision I've ever made!
review_body: I had an FUE hair transplant in January 2016 with Dr Kouremada-Zioga at the Harley Street, London clinic with 4500 hairs transplanted to the front of my head. It was the best thing I have ever done. Not only has it transformed my appearance and led to lots of compliments from friends, work colleagues and family about how youthful I look, but it keeps on getting better!  Every month that goes by, the hairs grow even stronger. I have been using Regaine since the transplant and I have had no need to try Propecia or any other medicine. My hair looks much thicker now, and I'm no longer scared of the bathroom mirrors at work that used to show up my balding head! I have so many more hairstyles available to me now to choose from that wouldn't have worked before.

Suzanna genuinely cared about my treatment progression and it's a testament to everyone at The Wellness Clinic who does this. It's a shame she had to move on to do bigger and better things but everyone is friendly and part take in your happiness outside of the clinic, I recently got engaged and they all showed genuine happiness and excitement which was so refreshing to see. I can also see the results from the treatment and my acne is always improving

review_title: Excellent Company and Fantastic and Professional Surgeon
review_body: From beginning to end the care I have received was more than I could have expected.  Dr Wolf was professional and kind.  Any concerns I had were addressed and the only issue I had which was my garment size was resolved quickly.   All of the staff at the clinic have been amazing.  As for the procedure, the pain was minimal and the results were excellent.   I never expected for drastic results as I have quite muscly legs but in terms of shape, I feel so much more confident and feel comfortable in my jeans.   If you are ever thinking about having this procedure, I cannot recommend Dr Wolf and his team enough, you will not be disappointed.  Amanda
The staff were wonderful, very friendly and I was treated very well as a customer. I am happy with the outcome of my treatment so far and would recommend the company.

I attended the Manchester clinic for the EVLA varicose vein treatment with Mr Inglot. I had a large amount of unsightly veins which caused me discomfort. I was supported throughout the procedure by the clinic staff and Mr Inglot. Although I had a large amount of veins treated my recovery was swift and simpler than I expected and I am delighted with the result.

review_title: Become the person you want to be
review_body: Having had liposuction to my abdomen over ten yesrs ago I  thought I knew what to expect, but my experience far exceeded expectations. The whole process from initial telephone enquiry to post op check was superb. The team at Manchester are so caring and professional, the co-ordinator, Geri made me feel at ease straight away and in fact inspired me to have an extra treatment  (having seen her perfect jawline!) Dr Vlok, my surgeon, was lovely and again very patient and caring. I had vaser lipo to my upper and lower abdomen and neck.  The results are amazing, I now have a flat stomach and no double chin, I look years younger. If you are thinking of having these treatments, take it from me, go ahead. The downtime is minimal, I only needed pain relief for two days. Yes cosmetic surgery has a bad press and yes its costly but in my own experience it's well worth it. I was a little impatient wanting instant results and thought the swelling would never go down but of course it did,  I would recommend the lymphatic massage,  it really does work. Friends who haven't seen me for a while comment on how great I look, I smile, thank them and then tell them about The Wellness Clinic. Hopefully I've put some business their way! I will certainly be using them again, you just know from the off that these are people you can trust, it's not all about the money, it's about helping you become the person you want to be.....
Visited The Wellness Clinic Manchester recently for EVLA treatment.

review_title: IPL @ The Wellness Clinic in Bristol
review_body: I am having IPL for skin pigmentation (dark spots and redness) with Lillie I'm getting some great results so far! Lillie has been really helpful in advising me on how to manage my skin between sessions and has always made me relaxed throughout.
Worldclass facility (and I've been to a few around Europe). Latest technology and equipment guaranteed. Stunning building with delightful Chandelier in main lobby.

review_title: I won the lottery having Dr Grant Hamlet!!
review_body: After having vasor lipo previously on my abdomen with a different company and different Doctor - who I won't name, I thought I knew what it was about... until I met Dr Hamlet.

review_title: First time at the clinic, certainly won't be my last!!
review_body: Wow, cannot recommend The Wellness Clinic Glasgow enough! The staff are so helpful & made me feel at home from the moment I entered the clinic. Simon is absolutely wonderful at what he does & gave me the fuller lips I always wanted. I have already had several compliments & friends are now looking into The Wellness Clinic for their own lips as Simon done such a good job on mine. I can't believe I haven't came to The Wellness Clinic sooner! I am already looking into my second procedure & the staff are once again going above & beyond to help me in this. You will not be disappointed! Thank you to all the staff at The Wellness Clinic, (Stefaine, Stephaine, Simon & Danielle) I am over the moon!!!

review_title: EVLA and Ambulatory Phlebectomy for Varicose Veins
review_body: Excellent service and customer care from Mr Rittoo, Stefanie and all the team at The Wellness Clinic, Glasgow. I'm delighted with the results. A quick, efficient and pain free treatment. Wish I had done it sooner as I can now show off my legs after years of hiding them.

review_title: Wouldn't go anywhere else! Such lovely staff
review_body: With a rթsumթ of manager Caroline it goes without saying she knows her stuff, and purely from the first meeting you can get the answers you need where as else where a second appointment with someone more qualified ie: surgeon would be needed for the important stuff, but with Caroline's hospital experience she had all the answers for me.

I am very impressed  with Mark Tam and his team at Leeds. I had 2 consultations with 2 different hair transplant  companies and they were  interested  in your money  first  then do the transplant. Mark  immpressed  me at the consultation stage within  the first  2 minutes  he's  very professional  the way he explained  things  to me.I went through  with  the transplant  2 weeks  ago  .The Wellness Clinic  have gem in Mark anybody  considering  a hair transplant with him don't worry he's  brilliant

I researched the procedure & different companies who performed it. My initial consultation with Dr Faris was informed and I felt at ease. My procedure date was quickly allocated & on the day the nurses and doctor were brilliant. I am now awaiting the results... 6 days after with 6 weeks to my holiday! After 10 years of hiding my legs fingers crossed I might wear my shorts again.

Having arranged an appointment with the TPC over two weeks ago,  I arranged with work to book time off to attend. Firstly they sent me the wrong address to attend in London when it should have been Nottingham. No great drama.I phoned to confirm the Nottingham address on the day.

Having done my own research about hair loss treatments, i decided to book an appointment with treatment consultant Lisa at The Wellness Clinic, for her to review my case and advise on my options. Not only she was very clear in laying out the various pros and cons of each of my options, but she was also highly professional by suggesting various hair strenghtening remedies for me to consider before going for the implant option. I found her approach very professional and ethical and it gave me lots of comfort that i am in very safe hands at the clinic

I am an older '47' year old woman, who finally decided to have a breast augmentation procedure with Dr Karoo. I am so very happy after so many years of wanting this procedure that I came across Dr Karoo at the Bristol clinic. I had a couple of meetings with him (and a nurse), to talk about all the expectations of this procedure and what it entails etc. He listened to me and then made recommendations as how to achieve my goal (within my personal limitations). I went ahead with it all.....and wish I'd found him years ago! I can't believe how well it all went. The scars are so small and the pain was so manageable, I'm certain it was all down to his skill and judgement as a surgeon. So immensely happy with how it has all turned out........best decision I've ever made.

Last Friday I attended The Wellness Clinic for an initial free consultation with regards to my suitability for the FUE/ U-FUE transplant procedures, and I cannot say how impressed I was with the way in which the consultation was handled from start to finish, along with follow-up emailing.
From start to finish this has been an excellent experience.

review_title: Poor hair transplant consultation with a nurse
review_body: I had an absolutely terrible experience here. Having paid �100 upfront when booking  for a hair transplant consultation with a surgeon I did not receive the service I should have.

Excellent service, all staff were brilliant.  Doctor excellent, nurses excellent, reception and all other staff I came into contact with from day 1 were excellent.  Couldn't do enough for you, very nice people who were caring and supportive. It's early days but I am very happy with my results. Thank you!

review_title: A very professional clinic delivering results.
review_body: I recently visited the Leeds clinic for a consultation which gave me the necessary information and confidence to arrange my gynecomastia procedure under local anesthetic. It proved to be a painless  procedure with only the slightest of discomfort post-operative, I could have returned to work the next day but decided just to take it easy for next few days. The difference to my appearance is really quite astonishing and naturally, confidence boosting. The staff are excellent, professional and reassuring and the clinic is comfortable and discreet. It's almost a cliche but at 62yrs old I wish I had addressed my problem with them years ago, however, it's never too late.
I had a consultation at the City Clinic and the staff were very helpful.  Made various recommendations without being pushy, which is always a refreshing change.

Thank you so much to all members of staff, but most importantly to Lillie who throughout my treatment has made me feel at ease and has been such a lovely person to talk to whilst having my lengthy treatments. I had laser hair removal and the results have been unbelievable. I went in with dark, course and plentiful hair and now I barely need to shave. I can safely say that the results have been life changing and confidence boosting. I can now strut myself on a beach at late notice without a worry. I will miss coming in and know I will be back in the future if top ups are required. Thanks Again. Sammy  :-)
My medical condition was undiagnosed for over 30 years despite me knowing and visibly seeing that something with my limbs were clearly not right.
Since my breast fat transfer by Dr Gupta, I've had a new lease of life and my confidence level is significant. Friendly and caring staff. Dr Gupta is exceptional, warm and emphatic.

review_title: Dr. Zioga and her team are excellent
review_body: I live in Dubai and underwent a hair procedure last July in London with D. Zioga.  I must say that I was extremely impressed with the care and attention afforded to me, the team is highly competent and the after-procedure treatment was top class.  I was able to resume my normal daily activities very quickly when I got back to Dubai and will be doing another procedure soon hopefully.  Would recommend this team to anyone.

review_title: Dr Gupta is a perfect doctor if you want perfection,
review_body: Dr Gupta is a truely professional, knowledgeable and highly skilled doctor who is friendly and sensitive to patients' needs.  He and his team made me feel at ease from the consultation to the actual procedures.

Visited The Wellness Clinic early last year and booked a procedure for July, 2015.   Had my right leg treated with laser vein procedure and then had a follow-up visit in August.  I attended this and the doctor stated that my leg was showing signs of healing but he would like to see me again at the end of that year.   We are reaching the yearly anniversary of my treatment and I have heard nothing from the Clinic.

review_title: Laser Treatment at the Cheapside Clinic
review_body: I've been having laser sessions at this clinic from 2015. I'm a transgender woman and the staff has always been amazingly kind and friendly with me. I highly recommend this clinic for both the professional services they provide and the staff.
Everyone at the clinic was very discrete. Service and after care very good. All in all  very worth it.
Had my very bad varicose veins treated by evla and surgical removal. All done in one session with minimal discomfort. Excellent care and follow up by Mr Vohra and his team.

review_title: Would not go back for further treatments
review_body: I had the treatment on my varicose veins and cost me nearly �4000 I did not get the service I would expect from a private clinic
Very profesional. I would recommand this clinic to anyone
I was very nervous of having this treatment but I didn't need to be !
Hi Ladies,
I'm very happy with the results of my microlipo at The Wellness Clinic with Mr. Gupta.

review_title: Great service, quick and results were excellent
review_body: I had laser treatment for blue veins under my eye and the results were great. It took a few months to fade completely, which was expected,  i am looking to go back to get my other eye done .The procedure was quick and consultation was clear. Dr Gupta was very professional.

Had laser treatment for blue vein under the eye and the results were great. It took a few months to fade completely, but I was expecting that. The procedure was quick and consultation was on point. Dr Gupta was very reassuring and professional.

review_title: Not inexpensive, but excellentservice and products - very professional and personal in their approach.
review_body: I find all of the staff at the Cheapside branch to be extremely helpful and professional.  They take the time to listen to my questions and provide a bespoke service.  The facials themselves are excellent - I am left with glowing, clear and soft skin.  The products have been wonderful - they cleared all of my adult acne within a month, and the results have stuck.  It isn't a cheap place, but you get value for your money.  I have recommended it to friends and family.
All the Nurses were very knowledgeable and they were able to help me understand what sort of problem I had with my Skin. They reviewed every couple of months and helped me to reach my goal with ease.

review_title: Incredible service! The Wellness Clinic - Cheapside, London
review_body: I experienced extreme acne on my face, in particular across my cheek and recieved Roaccutane for over 7 months. Thankfully the acne redcued. Unfortunately, I was left with scarring which left me feeling very self concious as your face is continuously on show and make up seemed to highlight the scarring.

I recently had some vaser-lipo with Dr Hamlet at the clinic in Leeds.  The clinic is clean and welcoming. I dealt with Sorena for my initial consultation, she was was very professional and had good knowledge of what I was considering having done. She has been approachable throughout and has dealt with any queries/ concerns very efficiently.  I then met Dr Hamlet, fantastic straight down the line honest manner, I felt like I had been listened to and knew what to expect.

I recently had a consultation for a procedure that I had been interested in at the Harley Street clinic and just wanted to say that I thought the whole experience was incredibly professional, approachable and friendly with very attentive staff all the way through. I will almost certainly go ahead with my procedure and am looking forward to going back. I was quite anxious so this has been a real break through for me. Thank you
Following a terrible  terrible experience with The Wellness Clinic - Harley Street.  I was extremely apprehensive and nervous about continuing acne treatment .

I recently underwent a hair transplant with Dr. Tam at The Leeds branch of The Wellness Clinic. The staff were extremely friendly and helpful, and went out of their way in order to make sure my experience was as stress free as possible. Dr. Tam is a very receptive and capable surgeon, and has a great sense of humour. I am overjoyed with my results just two weeks in!

Very nice reception area. Looked after well at this point, refreshments as required.  Nurse came to collect me, very friendly.  She chatted away explaining what would happen.  Doctor was very professional and full of information.

The Wellness Clinic for me was a sanctuary. They not only made sure that I was 100% happy all the way through my experience but they were determined to ensure that the procedure was the right thing for me. They certainly weren't an organisation who would do anything for the money, they invested time and effort to ensure that not only was this in my best interests but that I was certain it was what I wanted. This means that The Wellness Clinic value their patients you aren't simply a pay cheque, they want to make sure that this is right for you and ethically the right thing to do. Their focus may be on results but that is because they want you to get the best result for you. In a word it's about you. As a recovering anorexic my body image was a huge problem for me and my years of battling to reach recovery meant that I had to challenge mentally so many issues. My body however would be the only thing to send me backwards, I felt at home at the clinic I never once felt judged and they completely understood how I felt. I wanted to avoid dieting again and after the years of battling with weight my surgery was seen to be a preventative to heading down that path again. This decision however was not taken lightly, the wonderful Dr wolf ensued that he contacted many specialist psychologists within the eating disorder field and my own psychologist to ensure that the procedure would help. He took time to get to know me and has made sure that within my follow up I have support and close contact with him. He was an amazing surgeon and is understanding always wanting to give you time and his true opinion. You as a patient feel valued and understood. The whole team at The Wellness Clinic from the start of my journey through surgery to my follow ups have been amazing, they are always on the end of the phone for any concern or question and are always happy to see you if you want to chat anything through- all with no extra cost. They have been like amazing supportive friends and I feel completely valued by them.

review_title: Excellent care from Dr Zioga and the team.
review_body: Suffering with hair loss changed me as a person,  from a confident, happy out going individual I became an extremely self conscious and introverted character. I found myself avoiding activities that would expose the true extent of my hair loss which had a detrimental impact on my quality of social life and friendships. I became that boring guy who didn't want to do anything exciting including holidays, sports, trips to theme parks etc

review_title: Very basic skin review but left with very expensive products
review_body: Had a skin review at the St Pauls clinic but it was very poor. 5 minute appointment, flashed my skin under a light and recommended some products worth 180 pound.  Definitely didn't do a proper analysis or provide a variety of recommendations. Less informed but much poorer, wouldn't recommend!
excellent company would highly recommend

I'd suffered acne in the past and at 28 years old it reappeared more aggressively than ever. For a year I tried nearly every treatment offered by my GP. When all options were exhausted, I was on the point of being prescribed Roaccutane which I'd taken years before and was very apprehensive about.

review_title: Raddy from Private clinic (lymphatic message after vase lipo)
review_body: I had a vaser lipo and fat transfer with Dr Grant Hamlet, the results were great, I am over the moon.

review_title: Dr Zioga - Hair transplant ( micro FUE)
review_body: I am a 54 years old and had been toying with the idea of having treatment for my hair loss for around five years. I had studied the procedure, test cases and looked at various options numerous times, before finally plucking up the courage to do it. I can honestly say that I wish I had done years earlier.

I thought they were very good as a whole. The whole procedure went smoothly and DR Tam was very professional but still came across friendly. I was very nervous with having the procedure done but after only two weeks I can tell having it done here was the right decision. Plus if I have any questions at all in the future I can contact them for answers which is very useful! Thanks guys

review_title: Hair Transplant Consultation A Big Let Down!!!!!
review_body: I was really let down with the consultation i had with a hair transplant surgeon this week.

Having suffered with hair loss since my early thirties,by my late thirties,I was starting to feel very conscious of the fact I has lost quite a lot of hair and after trying all the alternative methods like Propecia and the various shampoos, I decided I wanted something more permanant.

I had gone to see Dr Wolf and must say after almost 8 months of surgery I feel great . I have lost 15 kgs but the best part is have lost 4 inches of my waist . Have gone from 38 to 34 . I would definitely recommend Dr wolf. He made me so comfortable and everything he advised me was so correct .

I had microlipo done on my inner thighs recently and it was one of those things that i wish i'd done 10 years ago. The results are absolutely incredible, exactly everything i had dreamed of, and it literally changed my life.
I had a consultation with Dr Gupta in vue to have Micro Lipo on my abdomen, flancs and bra line on my back as I did gain quite a lot after my menopause.
FUE hair restoration:

review_title: I felt looked after and cared for.
review_body: I received a very personal service from Amy. She made sure all my concerns were addressed and managed.

review_title: Dr. Dennis Wolf is an Artist
review_body: Had vaser lipo at the end of February. Everything from the initial consultation has been very professional and everything explained in great detail by Dennis Wolf. A genuinely caring man with amazing results, he is an expert in his field. Everything you need for post surgery is arranged and given to you on the day. All the staff were very caring. Really can't fault them and would definitely recommend The Wellness Clinic.

I had got to the point where at the age of 44 I was avoiding looking in the mirror!! I had deep frown lines between my eyebrows and at the top on my forehead, and felt that I looked permanently miserable.  I started Botox last July and can honestly say that I am blown away with the result. I feel that it has taken years off me.  Friends that have not seen me for a while comment that I am looking really great. The great thing is that I don't have the stereotypical 'frozen' look. I still have movement and it looks so natural.  Definitely something I recommend.  I feel like a new woman!

I had vaser lipo on my stomach and inner thighs. They were 2 areas I was never happy with, despite being relatively slim and regular workout sessions every. I found The Wellness Clinic on google and honed in on Dr Wolf due to his extensive experience. I did a LOT of research, found other people's very helpful reviews, looked up Dr Wolf, read up on the procedure itself, watched to tv clips etc. and booked a consultation with the Dr himself.

review_title: NICE PEOPLE BUT VERY POOR OUTCOME!
review_body: I have given the clinic 1 star just because the people were nice and friendly including the Doctor that did my surgery. However i was told i was a prime candidate for Hi def laser surgery having been a competitive bodybuilder for years. I let myself go having eaten the wrong foods and stopped training and needed a kick start to allow me diet and compete again. All promises made to me about a faint 6 pack and some definition and fat removal did not happen and i saw very little change in-fact the changes i saw would have taken me only 4 weeks to achieve on a diet! I kept getting advised to wait for six months to see the results but i didn't believe them and after six months it still looked the same! just as i had expected. I had wasted a whole year and now have to get it done all over again by a different clinic! I paid �8k for my treatment and it was a total waste of money and that doesn't include train journeys to London and loss of earnings and pain and anxiety. I am now booked in to have the treatment done in America. The clinic was very slow to respond to my complaint and concerns and phone calls made to clinic were not returned. A very poor experience.  Shame as the people were nice.

review_title: Vasor lipo by Dr Dennis Wolfe
review_body: If you are like me and  were unsure of which surgeon or private healthcare team to use ,please look no further than The Wellness Clinic . from the first consultation to the last, the service was first class ,very professional and I would highly recommend Dr Wolfe and his team to anyone ,the man is a genius . I had Vasor lipo on my chest and abdomen after botched Gynocomastia surgery at  ( The Nuffield in Glasgow ) and Dr Wolfe and his team in all honesty have gave me my life back , took me through the procedure from start to finish ,discussed his expectations and what I hoped for and believe me when I say I honestly couldn't be happier . The surgery went very well , my confidence is back and I now cannot wait for summer all thanks to Dr Wolfe and his team .My chest no longer has unsightly dimples or creases ,my abdomen now has definition and is completely flat ( and I am now working towards my 6 pack lol . I honestly cannot recommend them highly enough ,make the decision and please give them a call you will not be disappointed but rather over the moon ! I know I am

Just want to say thank you again, particularly Lisa Scannell. The N lite treatment has no doubt been more than a great help, my skin is practically acne free :) I will definitely be recommending this to anyone wanting to improve their skin.

review_title: Excellent customer service, very professional and great results !!!
review_body: I would just like to thank The Wellness Clinic for brilliant customer service throughout. Special mention to Dr Tam and Sorena from my first consultation to my post consultation I couldn't have asked for a better experience both professional, knowledgeable and very welcoming. I am very pleased with the results already so can?��t wait for the final result. Once again thank you very much I would recommend to anybody.

review_title: Why did I wait so long??
review_body: I had the EVLA procedure with Phlebectomy [varicose vein treatment] on both legs at the beginning of December 2015 in the Bristol Clinic. Even my children[ both adults] have been amazed at the 'new legs' I now possess! I am over the moon with the result and just wonder why I put up with such ugly legs for so long.

The team that Dr Zioga leads is absolutely top notch. All the members of the team are very friendly and caring. You feel very well looked after throughout. Equally impressive is the aftercare led by Lisa. Thank you all so much for your attentive care.

review_title: TPC Leeds - professional, friendly and informative from the minute you book your appt
review_body: As a male suffering from hair loss it has not been an easy subject to come to terms with, never mind talk about. However The Wellness Clinic Leeds were absolutely great.

It is always a pleasure to be welcomed to the clinic by Barbara Irvine and Sheryl Hennnessey. The best part is of course, the facial I get done by Kerry Herbert- not only is she a great therapist, this team has excellent customer service skills.
The PITIFUL RESPONSE FROM "The Wellness Clinic Manchester" IN NO WAY REFLECTS HOW I'VE BEEN TREATED, OR INDEED WHAT I WAS OFFERED AND "MOST DEFINITELY PROMISED!!"

I had purchased laser sometime ago and the clinic honoured it. Kerry excellent at administering laser hair removal treatment.  I am half through a course for bikini and underarm and the results at fantastic.  I have recommended her to all my friends.

review_title: Excellent customer service and Botox treatment
review_body: I used The Wellness Clinic in St. Paul's for the very first time in October 2015. I have to say the staff including Sheryl and Barbara were so friendly and attentive towards to me. I would definitely recommend this clinic to anybody looking for treatments. So glad I found this clinic I will not ever go elsewhere. Thank you to all staff members for being so amazing to me. Sabina x

review_title: Very thorough skin consultation & treatment with Kerry at cheapside
review_body: After a very informative skin consultation I was treated to a fantastic treatment leaving my skin feeling clean, bright & glowing. Kerry is clearly very knowledgeable and experienced in skin. She assessed my concerns, offered advice on my skincare regime & recommended a tailored treatment plan. I would highly recommend Kerry and The Wellness Clinic Cheapside!

A would recommend The Wellness Clinic to anybody who would like to lose weight, i have been going for a year now and have lost four stones, And feel absolutely great and feel really pleased with myself  The staff have been very helpful and made me feel at ease when you arrive at the clinic they always have a smile for you and offer tea or coffee till you are ready for your treatment, so yes a would offer The Wellness Clinic at park circus in Glasgow for all the treatments they do, hope this was helpful to you all, thanks for helping me lose my weight,,c,Jack,,,

i always recommend The Wellness Clinic to all my friends everyone here is so professional and always make me feel at ease recently had my some lip fillers and semi permanent make up and it's given me so much confidence in my self I will definitely be back in the future xxx
Very professional in their approach, very friendly and overall excellent experience. Thank you guys!

Never having undergone anything like this before I was understandably nervous and apprehensive. However, right from the initial interview with Stephanie, I was made to feel at ease. My procedure (thread vein removal) from my legs,has involved several sessions with Dr. Rhittoo who is wonderful as are the lovely nurses who assist him, in particular Jean. I am pleased with how it has gone so far.
Excellent pre information.
