Always cancelling appointments and won?��t refund. Very disappointed when implied I was the difficult one. Then told me to book with another clinic which I tried who then told me I would have to go and redo patch tests as it?��s a different laser when I had already told them I wanted the same laser. Was talking to me as though I was stupid. Need to sort staffing issues out and stop making it the customers problem!!

review_title: Failed appointments and take your money without refunding
review_body: I tried to arrange two appointments with this company for a consultation, the first one was booked on the wrong day, resulting in a phone call to correct it. This meant another appointment being made and �25 deposit taken. I was consulted on the day then saying the consultant was ill, so after two failed appointments I asked for my deposit back as I had lost faith in this company. Emailed and phoned and to date not received a refund. Buyer beware of this company who take your deposit and then cannot even get your appointment right and honour it. I have now reported to credit card company.

The staff were professional and friendly. The process was quick and the new machines were painless. I booked 8 sessions for which wasn?��t cheap and still have hair re-growth so unfortunately it?��s going to cost more

review_title: The staff clearly don't know anything?�?
review_body: The staff clearly don't know anything about the skin, they can't even answer the basic questions. I actually would be scared to use their service's as if they can't answer basic questions they definitely can't use machines or offer antiwrinkle or filler procedures. Staff is also super rude and don't know how to treat their clients with respect. It seems that in this clinic they are only keen to sell creams on the first appointment and not assessing your skin. They truly don't know anything about the skin. The first appointment is to sell stuff to you. And if you don't buy anything they make rude comments and give weird looks. It seems like they think that women now a days are so stupid and would be happy to buy every useless product they offer. I would not use their service's even for free. My suggestion is to stay away from them as it is an absolute waste of time. And if you did book it just get your money back immediately!

review_title: Left feeling disappointed and still no follow up
review_body: I was so excited about my consultation and finally getting my skin sorted out. I left feeling utterly disappointed and ripped off. I paid �25 for my consultation. I met with who quickly appeared to be an inexperienced lady who didn?��t even look at my skin or get me to remove my makeup. She gave me some very generic advice like ?��vitamin A is good for skin?��. The products she recommended had salicylic acid in in quantities you apparently can?��t buy on the highstreet(definitely untrue). When I expressed concern over products I had used in the past with salicylic acid in drying my skin out, instead of reassure me she suggested instead another cleanser suitable for everyone. Not exactly the greatest bespoke plan I was hoping for. I agreed to give the recommended serum a go as was reluctant to buy all the three products recommended or sign up for treatments when I?��d been shown nothing but the boxes they came in. And given no reassurance about what would happen if they didn?��t work for me. I went to pay for the very small tube of serum and was told it would �61 but the �25 consultation fee would come off that cost. Then I was told actually no it wouldn?��t and I would need to pay �61. I had been told that the �25 consultation fee could be redeemed against a product or treatment which I said. I was told I had been misinformed. I was so shocked that I decided to leave and didn?��t purchase anything. It took me courage to book this appointment and finally get some advice on an ongoing issue and I felt like a mug. Please don?��t waste your money and time here like I did. I emailed Paul as per his request below and over a week on and I?��ve heard nothing from the Guildford clinic.

On consultation agree treatment and paid. Product recommend to use prior treatment was �20 cheaper elsewhere, I bought it. Treatment denieds because I didn?��t buy product with them. Also when booked treatment on the phone there was an offer for a free product. They new appointment was a month later and checked with then if it was still ok, They said yes. When attended my appointment they refused the product because booking was a month ago.

Modern and clean clinics.However call centre lets the company down, takes ages to get through even at off-peak times, person on the phone clearly didn?��t understand the system as she told me I redeemed something then I was told I didn?��t ?

review_title: Ordered my product one month ago
review_body: Ordered my product one month ago. After 8 days I emailed asking for an update and when it would be delivered. Four days later I emailed again as I hadn?��t had a response. On the same day I contacted them on Facebook. Still no response. Two weeks after my original order date I?��d had no response from multiple emails or Facebook. When they finally contacted me they said it had been delivered, but my neighbors didn?��t sign for it. I emailed back and was told my request was with Head Office. I had to email again today to chase. I still haven?��t received my order. Worst customer service I?��ve ever experienced.
Good service. Received in time. Postage is a little expensive.
Treatment and aftercare procedure was well explained. My expectations was managed well.

After my initial consultation at Skin Leicester in march I decided to have Sculptra treatment, the first treatment which was done at end of may went well, happy with the doctor and had no problems. I saw doctor Sanker in June the treatment was booked for july and then was cancelled rescheduled for august, problem with the mixture when I arrived there, that was probably due to the hot weather I was told!.ok fair enough, but dates were then changed again, I was now booked in for today, a week before this I was called to make sure I was coming to the appointment because mixture had to be made up before hand, I said yes, yesterday I had a phone call to make sure I was still coming for appointment of which I said yes, had an email too. At 8pm last night I received a phone call to say no doctor to administer that treatment. To which I replied its a joke, I keep changing my work commitments for these appointments, I was told the next available appointment was October!. No thanks, I would rather spend my money elsewhere, someone there is certainly not doing their job!. I cant believe a company on the high street with branches all over country have given such poor service.

I am really disappointed with the service I have received. About 3-4 months ago I went in for a consultation and I was recommended the jessner peels for my macular scarring. I booked my appointment in and had my first jessner peel done. However I had booked in 4 altogether and the jessener peels usually have to be done within 2 weeks of one another. So after having my first one done I tried to book in another but they had cancelled a couple of times saying the nurse couldn?��t make it. I?��ve rang several times, but they still have not go back to me! I feel like my money has gone to waste because I have paid upfront for my treatments and I keep getting told there isn?��t any appointments till November! I am really annoyed and disappointed with this service!
Never received my product. Can?��t get through on the phone and my emails haven?��t been returned.

Sk:n clinics = rip-off.   As mentioned, by other reviews Sk:n clinics appear to be designed to rip you off,   My first set of treatments were a complete waste of time (told I was the perfect candidate for laser hair removal - 6 treatments in no change).  However, I decided to give them a second chance regarding a small area of thread veins in the nose. The charge was �150 for an initial consultation fee to see a "Medical Director".  The consultation was a mere 5mins , 3mins of that him repeating questions already I had already answered on the form.  Then I asked if he could advise about thread veins in my leg.  He told that should be another appointment!!! Shocking.   Then when I asked for the costs, he advised the highest cost possible, �300-�400 per treatment, i.e.  to treat a few a tiny veins, �.  I expressed that this sounded incredibly high based on other quotes and took the form to have a look.  To my sheer surprise there was option for a nurse to perform the same procedure at HALF of the price.  He neglected to share that option.  Selling up in the biggest way. The time I used them they did the same , but I put it down to be some young and inexperienced.  This clearly is company policy.   Basically, my �150 just covered him telling me what nurse to go to.  Very poor indeed.
I only received my order after 6 days of payment. Not until i rang to follow it up no messages or emails were sent to say that you are having audits in all your branches.

I tried to re-arrange my appointment as I was going to be away, I rang before 10:00am for the cancellation however was placed on hold for so long that I had to ring numerous times to finally get through to someone for 10:10am. From this point there was no leniency from the customer service that It was not my fault I was unable to get through before 10am. I was told that i must book a later appointment instead otherwise I would lose my money for this appointment. Although I did state I would not be able to make the appointment she booked me in. I ended up missing the appointment as I said and now have lost out on Money. I do not think it is fair that there is no leniency especially for 10 minutes considering it was their fault that the lines were so busy. After this treatment I will not be using the service again, due to the lack of consideration and flexibility.

review_title: I work in client based environment?�?
review_body: I work in client based environment related to beauty. Came in for microdermabrasion treatment. The lady was very nice to me and polite 5* for the personality, however, I felt very rushed and couldn't relax. I still had some particles left on my face from the treatment and I could see that some parts on my chin were missed as they still felt uneven. Treatment is highly overpriced and I was not explained much about my skin type either. Procedure took 10 minutes. Won't come back and recommend either. �65 is way too much for this sort of service. Would recommend the company to sort out their timings for procedures as it is clear that workers run behind often because they don't have time to prepare for another client properly. Sad.
Amazing, polite staff! I was made to feel so comfortable when I had my consultation and my treatment. Looking forward to the rest of my sessions!

Sk:n has been absolutely amazing for me. I started sk:n in January with Moderate Acne which really effected my confidence. Since January I have worked through a selection of treatments and home care which has completely changed my skin and I am much more confident about it. This is the first thing that I have ever found to make such a big difference to my skin. I started with very bumpy out of control skin with quite a bit of scarring. Now my skin is smooth, almost acne free most of the time and the scarring and redness has gone down soo much. I can?��t thank Sk:n enough for both the products, the treatments and the amazing help of the skin practitioners. They create what?��s right for you and what work with you and what you want to do and achieve. Amazing!
I really do like these products, the quality is great and I find them really effective.  Service was great.  I will be using them again.

review_body: Horrendous experience with laser hair removal to upper lip and chin. The second treatment blistered my skin and left me with scars. Nearly 3 months later and I still have marks. The Dr refused to acknowledge my complaint (even though the nurse in attendance admitted my chin had been scarred) and even wants to charge for the 2 sessions!!! Will definitely be taking this to the regional director. Would advise prospective clients not to use Sk:n clinics. Pictures of burns to my face available upon request.

However, it did feel quite perfunctory, in silence for the most part. No discussion about my skin or how it was responding to treatment - some of the therapists here are more engaging than others but they all carry out the treatments just fine.

The reception area is just like sitting at home in your living room with refreshments and reading material available, with attentive staff on hand should you have any questions.

I?��ve had two amazing clinicians there and one really tense one but every appointment I?��ve made they?��ve rang me on the day of the appointment to say that I have to be rescheduled! It?��s annoying that this has happened every single time!!! And I have to change all of my plans to fit in a new date and time. I would usually accept that but it?��s an awful lot of money that I?��m losing and the fact that they have rescheduled almost all of my previous appointments annoys me! I don?��t ask them to pay me for the inconvenience?? I?��m really disappointed with them because they?��re unreliable when it comes to appointments and I feel I?��m so annoyed that now I lose out on a treatment. I understand that I was late but what about all the times that I?��ve been made to change all of my plans for them??

Advised area would be inflamed and red with scab potentially for weeks.  As this was facial decided not to proceed .  This could have been imparted free as advertised

review_body: I've had a number of experiences with Skin but have now decided I won't ever deal with them again after my last appointment. No chance to repeat any of those questions. Then they charged me a lot more than was discussed in the previous appointment and what is advertised on the website. I talked them down �50 since I discovered they had overcharged me at the last visit according to the new terms that appeared at the current visit. No apology or compensation were forthcoming regardless of their inability to communicate or understand they own pricing or for having kept me there for over an hour to do a procedure that takes less than two minutes.
This was such a quick and easy process! Very pleasant, professional team here and I'm totally satisfied with the results. Can highly recommend skin xx

Poor customer service and bad experience  in the leamington branch was told one price and was charged another even though they admitted it was their error! Treatment wasn?��t done properly as staff didn?��t have the right equipment! Made a complaint nearly 2 months ago and still no response despitie chasing for a resolutions.....Shocking and disappointed.

review_title: I attended Sk:n in Newcastle for facial mole removal
review_body: I attended Sk:n in Newcastle for the removal of 2 moles from my face, 3 weeks later I couldn?��t be any happier with the results. They had bothered me for years and it only took 15 minutes for them to be removed, I wish I hadn?��t waited so long! The procedure was painless and I was put at ease throughout. The staff are professional yet very friendly. I wouldn?��t hesitate to recommend this clinic

Really disappointed with how this company treated me. Had my arms lazered so I could feel confident in my wedding dress and with my new life abroad in the sun. After being a client for several years I trusted I would receive good results little did I know it would cause paradox growth which one of their doctors confirmed and told me it will settle by the new year however its is now June and still not settled! So to keep me quiet they offered me a PARTIAL refund of what I paid. No compensation or additional treatment to fix the area, even when staff said it could be treatable with a few sessions. I am now 8 weeks away from my wedding and upset that my arms are in a worse of condition with no offer to fix them just a partial refund for that area. If that's not bad the area is constantly now breaking out with marks on my skin due to ingrown hair and removing the hair often as I have no choice to remove it often due to the thick state its been left in. My doctor even prescribed me antibiotics to try and reduce the acne breakouts but its a short term fix to a long term solution. Not only will I have thick stubble hair on my upper arms but also acne marks so thank you for ruining my arms and skin and only offering a partial refund for leaving them in a worse state then they where to begin with. Complaints procedure is a joke,, never felt like I had been taken seriously by branch or reigonal manager. Do not know what to so going forward but they have taken away all my confidence at a time I need it most. So upset with the Wolverhampton clinic. Do not know why I should have to look into paying another company for additional treatment to fix their mess, when consultants at other companies have said it can be treated with a higher energy level. Very very disappointed after being a client for several years having spent a lot of money in that place over the years!
Great results

No call back was made so I?��ve now chased this (when finally free) and was so awkward to re book my appointment, the lady sounded like it was a chor for her to be on the phone to me and provided half asleep style customer service. To which she replied ?��well they?��ll just tell u it?��s ur fault u should book in with anyone?�� GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE. The girls in the store are lovely, and my practionar is amazing at her job but the whole treatments, call centre and advice is pretty poor... my friend told me it was a waste of money from her previous experience with the same peels at skin and wow I wish I?��d have listened to her. review_title: I have been going to skin for laser?�?since July 17
review_body: I have been going to skin for laser hair removal as Canary Wharf since July 17 - course now finished. Overall I?��m happy with the result but I probably need a couple more in the future which is fine. I had 8 but it can take up to 12. Money well spent I think. All the girls doing the laser treatments are plesent but some are very thorough in their work over others which really helps get a good result so when I go back I would request the person I want. I also had one treatment of Botox at skin but I wouldn?��t recommend that treatment there. The doctor was nice enough (qualified which is important)  but there still wasn?��t enough care - really just in and out with not enough consideration to getting the best individual result. I was concerned about a droopy brow which he said I wouldn?��t get but I did and had strong headaches for weeks - heavy eyes to open. I went back but I was just told not to worry. It really put me off and it?��s far to expensive at skin even with offer. I?��ve since being using Dr Booysen based in Bromley- she?��s really careful , spent loads of time with me injected small amounts in multiple points and then I went back 2 weeks  later for her to see how it settled before she added more. It?��s a much better result and experience. No issues this time. I wouldnt recommend skin for Botox but laser hair removal yes.

review_title: Good customer service and knowledgeable staff!
review_body: I recently had my first treatment and patch tests done at the sk:n clinic in Union Street, Aberdeen. review_title: To all my dark skinned girls.
review_body: I used to have hair on my chin and jaw line. Serious dark thick hair!! They were ingrown, bumby and no amount of makeup could cover it. It was so bad I used to wear a scarf around my face like some snowman, I would wear the scarf 365 days a year regardless of the weather because I was so embarrassed. I am in my early 20s so I felt I was too young to be going through this.  The ingrown hairs were really dark so there was no hiding. Skn clinic has changed my life, I wish I could post before and after pics. If you see what my face looks like now you scream. I saw results in a month and I have done 10 sessions so far. My face is bump less and the dark scars are lightening. As for the hair, I went from shaving twice a day to twice a month. By the way I am dark skinned girl, full of melanin. I highly recommend Roma from the Shepherd?��s Bush Clinic she is the best out of all them, she attacks the hair like a ninja, she?��s not scared of the machine and she really gets into those hairs. The day she was not available to do my treatment I cried because I know the results won?��t be as good and it was true. I have never used anyone but Roma since I joined the clinic. I know it?��s expensice but they do deals like 40% off so check their  website. for me, it was worth every single penny.

review_body: Everybody at the skin clinic are amazing, very helpful and polite star, I 100 per cent recommend the clinic as I am having the hair laser removal treatment and although I have had one session it has made a lot of difference and secondly the staff are very patient and with u every step of way!! Please if u have not tried this before do give it a trail as it is the best thing I have ever done for myself even after the one session! review_body: I went to sk:n in regard to my acne. They put me on a course of 3X Salycilic Acid Peels, stating that they are almost ?��certain?�� to work. Absolutely no change what so ever, so they referred me to the doctor at another cost of �150. The doctor wasn?��t even a qualified dermatologist, can?��t prescribe any medicine, barely spoke English and didn?��t care in the slightest what I had to say. Moral of the story - DO NOT USE SK:N! Unless you want to waste large amounts of money on nothing. Complete waste of time and awful staff.

I was booked in to see the doctor and my spider veins were gone within minutes! At every appointment, I was made to feel very comfortable and well informed of the treatment. Really happy with the service throughout and the final result has made such a big difference. I will definitely return if I ever have any other skin problems.

I feel that I have wasted my money and I don't think I will use Skin Cambridge again.

I had a consultation with the Aberdeen clinic this evening  for dermal fillers. Both of the receptionist were extremlely pleasant and informative. I  had my consultation with Dr Kaz Rahman who was extremely helpful,understood my needs and explained the ins and and outs of the whole procedure, as well as answering my questions. I?��m going to take a few days to decide if I want to go ahead with the procedure but I felt after reading some disappointing reviews on here I would give an honest opinion. The whole process from making the request for a call back online and the consultation itself has been smooth and once I?��ve made my decision I feel 100% confident in choosing SK:N. review_title: I had my first skin session here so far ?�?
review_body: I had my first skin session here so far I loved it and I will be going back again

review_title: Sk:n care about money rather than whats best for you
review_body: I have had full leg and bikini laser hair removal at sk:n and then I booked a consultation for laser to get rid of a spider vein. I had tonsillitis and called up a week before my appointment to change my consultation. I spoke to a lady on the phone who said I could not change my appointment (even though my voice was so croaky etc) so I asked to speak to the manager who shouted at me on the phone and said that she will not say anything different than her colleague and that I was clearly not going to go to the consultation and just wanted my money back. I was so ill that I just cried and couldn't believe what had happened even though I had used them before for 16 sessions. I was treated as if I was a trouble maker. My husband called on the day of my appointment to make a complaint but he spoke to someone else and managed to change my appointment. I went to the appointment just to get my money back as I could never spend money with a company like that again after my treatment on the phone. I will never use them again after that bad experience as it really knocked my confidence and I felt I was put down whilst I was feeling vulnerable. I now go to a local clinic which do not charge for a consultation and go through everything clearly for what's best for you which is great. I feel like sk:n are just money grabbers who don't care about the individual despite being a great customer before hand.

review_title: The staff in Sk:n Clapham was really ?�?
review_body: The staff in Sk:n Clapham was really nice and welcoming, they really made me feel very comfortable. The place was impeccably clean and so far the treatment seems to be working perfectly. The only thing I would ask to be done differently was to get more in detail explanation on how the treatment works scientifically: all potential issues and preparation were covered, but there was quite little on how and why it works - even when I asked. But so far all very happy!
Thorough consultation. Efficient team. Great results.

I recently had botox for the first time and my experience was very pleasant. I was a little nervous as I have never had injectibles in my face before but Dr Patalay made me feel comfortable and at ease as he discussed what I wanted to achieve and the treatment options available. He was honest about possible undesired effects and did not pressure me at all to make any decisions until I was sure how I wanted to proceed. I decided to go ahead and have botox which was very quick and painless. The results were visible after just a few days and I am really pleased with the overall results. I would recommend Skn to anyone, and feel confident having future treatments with them.

I had 4 moles removed from my face and from entering the clinic I was made to feel relaxed and welcome. The doctor took a great deal of time to explain the procedures on offer and help me make the best decision. There was no pressure to go ahead with the procedure. I returned a week later for the procedure to be done and 2 Weeks on I am fully healed. I was concerned about this procedure on my face but felt comfortable throughout and was able to put all my trust in the doctor.

A professional and friendly service provided in a comfortable and clean environment. All of my appointments have so far been on time.  the lady who does my treatments puts me at ease and I am seeing great results so far.
very friendly and professional staff
Dont make you feel like an alien, friendly and normal! was hardly any pain for laser hair removal and seen results from the first session already.

I now always look forward to going for my laser hair removal session at Sk:n as I know I am another step closer to having a potentially hair-free face for the first time in my life. review_title: Friendly staff who are well trained and ?�?

Booked an appointment in early December 2017 for my wife. Saw the consultant and paid �150 for advice and he state that she needed peels. I told the Harborne Clinic which we went to that we would prefer the Bull Street Clinic as its closer to us. The Harborne Clinic said they will send the file over and that the Bull Street clinic will be in touch. Nearly two months on and despite repeated phone calls and promises no one has bothered calling me or my wife about the treatment. I went into the Bull Street Clinic two weeks ago in person and they apologised for the inconvenience and yesterday I rang again and was promised a call from the manager Nav. Absolutely scandalous treatment of customers seems they want to take �150 off you for a ten minute consultation and not give you the treatment.

Overall my experience was ok, however there are areas for improvement from Sk:n in terms of ensuring good customer service and explaining the treatments correctly including the prices involved. review_title: I ordered a SKIN cream for sun and ?�?
review_body: I ordered a SKIN cream for sun and damaged skin. review_title: Hopeless! Can't even get a consultation appointment
review_body: Rude, very poor service. Have been trying to get in touch with them for years but it seems impossible. As a new customer, there's no way to contact them online, and if you try using their "request a call back" option it just takes you to an automated system and keeps you on hold for ages. If you look up the yellow pages number for your local clinic, they pipe you back to the new customer system (and back on hold for ages). It's as if they actively want to discourage new customers (despite their frequent email spam suggesting they are seeking new customers). The ridiculous thing is that the clinic is about 3 minutes walk from my office door, yet I can't contact them. I can't comment on the quality of the treatments as it's been impossible to schedule one!

review_title: Very happy client of Sk:n for many years! :)
review_body: I've been a client of Sk:n for around 10 years, on and off, in Liverpool and Manchester. The staff are all professional, friendly and highly trained, and are the reason I am a loyal customer - I feel comfortable with them performing laser hair removal on me, and it has been a highly effective treatment over the years. It is admittedly quite a large price to pay for courses of treatments but they often do discounts of 30-40% and interest-free installment plans to split the payments over 6 months. The results are incredible and life-changing, to those of you with brown or black hair I wholeheartedly recommend laser hair removal. If you have red, blonde or other non-dark colour hair they also do electrolysis which is extremely effective but covers a small area at each session due to the technique involved.
The very knowledgeable and friendly staff make me feel informed and relaxed about my treatments.
Ordered dec 14 still not been despatched tried messaging their Facebook page was told it?��s nothing to do with them . Cannot find any email address to contact them .

review_title: Laser hair remover upper lip Manchester clinic
review_body: I started my treatment for laser hair removal on my upper lip last year. I have purposely waited to do my review after my 6 sessions and some time to figure out if it actually worked. The first 3 sessions I had just did not work I was shaving as that?��s what I had to do rather than waxing and it seemed there was more hair than ever ! I had different ladies each time who seemed to do it differently some didn?��t go low enough round my lip with the laser. On my forth visit I had a lady who I?��d never had before. I told her I wasn?��t happy with the results and she recommended I up the laser and use a different one. They?��d always be conscious of doing this before because my skin tone is slightly tan. So when I got onto the new laser the laser burnt it felt so hot and I could smell burning , when I looked in the mirror after my upper lip was BRIGHT red,more red than its ever been, I ran to my car and drive home I put all my after Care treatments on it. The next day I woke up with lumps on my upper lip it was awful and so so so embarrassing! I called the clinic and sent them an image they said it was heat lumps. It took a week and a half to go. I think the staff were good but some weren?��t as experienced as others and it really shown throughout my sessions. They were all lovely and I can?��t complain to much about the service. My main complaint is that the laser didn?��t work so well until they changed me to the higher one , at this point I only had 2 sessions left on the other laser which started to make a difference. Basically if they started this higher laser sooner I would have had better results. I know it?��s not guaranteed to give you compete hair loss but I know after the higher laser I seen more hair loss. The hair now grows fine and not as often which is good but I think I needed a few more sessions on the higher laser. I would still recommend skin clinic Manchester but I would advice you find a good laser therapist and stick with the same one as much as you can. Overall I?��m okay with my results but I could have been happier if they upped the laser sooner. I think I could do with a few more sessions on the higher laser but I don?��t really want to waste anymore money if I?��m stuck with a therapist who isn?��t experienced, I also don?��t want to spend more money as it already cost me over �300 !

review_title: I can see results only after one laser ?�?
review_body: I can see results only after one laser hair removal session already! The staff has been extremely helpful and polite. Overall a very good experience

Yesterday I was due to attend an appointment at 11am at the bold St clinic Liverpool.  However the train I was waiting for was cancelled but it was announced another would be arriving within 15mins time. I rang skin customer service to explain due to this I may be a few minutes late and was told by the person who took my call they would  contact the clinic to inform them. A few moments later it was announced that the train due to arrive would now be arriving within 30mins. I therefore contacted skin again to inform them I would now not b able to attend the appointment as this would put me way over my appointment time. The advisor who I believed to be called Nicola said she would see if there was a later appointment however after checking informed me there wasn't any but she could book me in for sat. I explained I couldn't confirm it until I had checked my diary to which she replied well you need to re book or you will occur a cancellation fee. I explained I would be making another appointment once I had arrived home. Nicola became some what abrupt and said well we have a policy and if you don't make a booking you will be charged so I'll book you in for sat. I again explained I couldn't confirm I could attend this until checking my diary which I would be able to do once I had arrived home in 10mins time. Nicola continued to insist I make an appointment there or then or occur a cancellation fee. By this time I had lost my patience with Nicola and told her to go ahead and do wat she had to do but if I couldn't attend the sat appointment I would have to rearrange it to which she replied you will be Charged if you do that. I then told Nicola I would not be attending any appointment she made for me that I was unable to do so and I would not be paying any cancellation fee! Nicola then told me she would allow me up until 11am that day to re book or used her favourite threat of occurring a cancellation fee! I arrived home ten minutes later re booked with another advisor with no issues. I have now been using skin for 7yrs and will have to do so for the rest of my life due to the condition I have. I have never once cancelled an appointment or been late. The girls that work in bold St clinic are all wonderful and very professional,which is more than I can say for Nicola. While I appreciate you have a cancellation policy I don't think I was unreasonable asking to be able to arrive home to check my diary rather than committing to an appointment I could not attend, and  I certainly did not take kindly to basically being threatened with a charge over and over again! Maybe a little training in common sense wouldn't go amiss!

review_title: First time having laser hair removal
review_body: It's my first time having laser hair removal and I must admit it hurts less than I thought. The practioner was really good, she managed to help me relax during the appointment and it was over before I knew it.
Friendly staff and great atmosphere. Would definitely recommend other treatments at skin to friends and family
Having something such as laser hair removal doesn't sound like it should be enjoyable. But with the friendly and professional staff the process and treatment is easy and as relaxing as possible.
Fantastic treatment with nurse Julie - started on time and did the job fantastically.

I  find the products although a little more pricey than other skin care products I would definitely recommend them because it is superb, and as a 63 year old with psoriasis i have tried many skin care products.
Efficient and friendly service.

No fuss! -  Made a request on the website on a Sunday, got a call back in a few minutes, made an appointment for Monday afternoon, walked in, filled out some paperwork, was seen by the head nurse and had my botox injections with care and professionalism.
Professional, friendly and honest. I could not recommend Sk:n more strongly.
This was my first treatment, staff very friendly and put me at ease. Will put another review after a few more sections to tell u about my results.

review_title: Had a great experience at Sk:n Grainger ?�?
review_body: Had a great experience at Sk:n Grainger St. I had my consultation and treatment (Hydrafacial) with Jordan. She was really thorough when she was doing my consultation, I told her about the worries I had about my skin and she gave me lots of recommendations. I will definitely be back for another hydrafacial in the new year!

Lovely staff, really friendly, really helpful and really know what they are talking about. They give you a realistic idea of what to expect and do very thorough assessments of your skin, results and any concerns you have throughout.

review_title: I?��ve just had a great experience with ?�?

Dr.Madan and nurse Jenny were excellent and so very supportive. I would definitely recommend this treatment, at this clinic to everyone.

Very well coming smiling  staff. The male you feel home, comfortable and wanting to come back. Very clean and tidy. You get the answers to all your questions and staff are really reassuring taking your anxiety away. Prices are unbelievably cheap compare to other places I have used before. Excellent custome services

review_title: I'm so glad I trusted to sk:n clinic
review_body: I'm so glad I trusted to sk:n clinic! I got excellent attitude from good specialists, information and great results. I will gladly visit them again!

review_title: They are not straight forward with the ?�?

review_body: Just did a fractional CO2 laser treatment and I was very pleased with the services I received and would definitely recommend it to anybody who needs a good place to go and fix their skin. Professional doctor and nurses with the right attitude towards the pacient.

review_title: New to Glasgow but so far so good

review_title: My experience from start to finish was ?�?
review_body: My experience from start to finish was extremely pleasant.  The staff are really accomodating and the environment feels very professional yet relaxed on entering the clinic.  The advice during the consultation was thorough and informative.  The professor who I had my initial consultation with was honest and upfront about all available treatments and costs.  He wasnt pushy or totally salesman orientated.  Once I'd decided on the treatment I saw the same person who carried out the procedures.  There was no pain or nerves on my part, as he was very professional and relaxed before, during and after the treatment and this put me at ease also.  I would highly recommend this clinic at Mapperly Park.  I will definitely use them in the foreseeable future.  The results are fantastic as well, my appearance is fresher and I feel more self confident.  I had Botox and dermal fillers.  J
As a first experience with Sk:n, everything went great! Staff is always friendly and professional, ready to answer questions.
Absolutely brilliant! Friendly and understanding staff, amazing customer service. I really enjoyed my visit and treatment.

good service.

review_title: Friendly and professional staff, promising results in very stages of treatment

review_title: Got an appointment within 24 hours of ?�?

The clinic is quite busy, but they are poorly organized. Always had to wait for long, more than 1 hour than my booked time. My treatment was delayed 3 hours leaving me so starving while surgery. And I cannot eat afterwards. They did not call me again after treatment as they promised. They charge for review after my test patch without letting me know in advance. Over all, I am not pleased with their service. I didn't feel I was taken care enough. For results, I need to wait for 6 months to see. So far, I cannot tell.

review_title: I had my lip filler done ....
review_body: I had my lip filler done i loved it at first after few days of healing the volume gone down with few lumps and one side of my lower lip is bigger than the other side! today i had it massaged and iv been told it is still healing and i have to let it heal for 3 month! so lets see what happens, so far im a bit disappointed as at the time of a consultation i have shown the doctor what i desire and he told me its achievable with one treatment whoever if i want the result im looking for i have to go with ultra lift which is around �350 (at the time it was on offer otherwise its over �400) so i did go for it as i wanted a visible reasult, now seeing i havent had a result i was expecting im a bit disappointed whoever i will take the advice that doctor gave me to consideration and i will let my lips to heal for 3 month i just hope after paying so much money the skin clinic and the doctor will be helpful and fix my lips if need be otherwise i will be extremely disappointed.
Really good experience! Staff are polite and really nice and also offer a welcoming environment.

After a while of walking around I had to call the reception and have them stay on the phone with me while they directed me to the clinic - I wouldn't have got there on time without this. There are no signs outside and the front door is hidden. I caught my foot on the lock on the glass door when leaving and cut my foot.

review_title: My name is Bella and I have had my hair ?�?

Organisation is high as well, great appointment reminders & allowed to book appointments months in advance.
Attended for facial mole removal. Lovely staff, professional opinion and advice. Offered treatment on the day which went really well. No complaints. Great care all round.

My first ever dermatology experience and it was a absolute dream. I read all the reviews but was still quite cautious. The staff were so kind and very experienced. They answered all my questions and were very patient. I have booked 2 further appointments with them and cant recommend them highly enough!

This is an update: didn't want to comment on how well the procedure went when I first wrote this review as my feet were still healing. Been almost 3 months and I felt like updating to let whoever is reading this know that the procedure did absolutely nothing. When I examined the wounds after a few days I noticed the doctor did not in fact remove all of it, but I just figured it was healing so will get better. The doctor said they can grow back but it's very rare, well they weren't removed properly in the first place so they didn't even have to grow back. Complete waste of time and money, really disappointed.
Excellent service, efficient treatment and professional staff.
I felt a bit nervous before arrival for my treatment, but the staff at Harley Street were professional, friendly and reassuring (one girl helped me make a hot chocoate latte in the waiting area!).
Very friendly, organised and professional, will definitely be returning here for my next treatment.

I was told we would have to try a higher intensity to see if my skin will be okay. It was however extremely hot, and what I wasn't told is a small 5p sized section of my face would be burned off!

review_title: Great Service, if a little costly

review_title: I was very pleased with the service I ?�?
review_body: I was very pleased with the service I received. Everything was explained to me in detail, which helped me there and then to have the procedure carried out.

The service received so far with my encounters with Sk:n have been exceptionally bad so far. I wouldn?��t even expect such from a NHS clinic yet alone private. I was booked in for a consultation at the East Finchley branch for which of course they were fast to take the �25 booking fee. I went and the consultant there then advised I need to be referred to a doctor in the London Harley Street branch for which another �25 booking fee was then collected and I was told that the total �50 spent would be deducted from my consultation fee of �100. This was false as I paid an additional �100 after my consultation at Harley Street to which I was later told I was mosadvised and there is a surcharge on price when seeing one of the ?��specialist doctors?�� at London Harley Street. The doctor Brazzini finished her which assessment of me and simply explained what I should do but with no written follow up. The prescription given to me which I took to my chemist was not legible due to the handwriting of the doctor. I spent 2 weeks chasing Sk:n for a typed prescription with the instructions for application so I could go back to my chemist to get the medication. The prescription did not even detail the size / volume of the medicine that the chemist should provide to me so my chemist and myself just assumed the size that will be sufficient for 3 months treatment. It was only until I found the doctors personal assistant?��s email by googling her did I get a response (the PA is great and replied within hours of receiving the email). Sk:n?��s service however so far has been poor.
Great staff and service.
Lovely people that work in there. Women was very reassuring and knew what she was talking about, would recommend.

review_title: I can't recommend their services highly ?�?
review_body: I can't recommend their services highly enough, they are informative, thorough and really take care of you and your needs. I have had great advice, without pressure to proceed and had a facial treatment yesterday that was 50% off and would have been worth paying full price for!
