review_title: Awful call centre .. but you are forced to use it!
review_body: I would advise everyone to think hard before using SKN .. not for the treatment the clinics provide (which for me has been excellent) but because of the unbelievably awful call centre, which customers are forced to use to communicate with their clinic. During the months of my treatment so far I have had to use the call centre around 6-8 times, either in response to messages from SKN because they wanted to cancel/rearrange appointments, or because I needed to change one. Every contact with the call centre has been on a scale of disappointing to frustrating to, frankly, near-traumatic. They have failed to send messages through to the clinic, sent inaccurate messages, been very rude and even hung up on me. Today was the worst (rude, obstructive and hung up) so I called them back and asked to speak with a manager to make a complaint. I got the stock 'no managers are available' response which the agent would/could not deviate from.  I asked for a copy of the phone conversation (which they say are recorded) and was told that my request would be sent to a manager who would decide whether I could have a copy.  I asked for a manager to call me back and was told that the agent would request that but the manager would decide whether to call me or not.  I was calling to change an appointment in 48 hours (they charge if less than 24 hours notice is given) so I asked for a message to be sent to my clinic to call me back today.  So far I have not received a call.  So I am about to drive from my village into the city to speak to the clinic staff directly.  That is the only way I can be sure of avoiding being charged for a failed appointment. Their call centre is appalling and as it is the only way of contacting your clinic (other than going there personally) I would advise anyone to not use SKN unless you want a very frustrating customer experience.

review_title: The team were very welcoming both times
review_body: The team were very welcoming both times I have visited and Ruta my practitioner was very friendly, professional and positive about the skin peel treatment. My treatment appeared to go well at the time and waiting for the results to show this week. I would definitley recommend Sk:n to others and will use them for other treatments in the future.
Lovely doctor who was professional and provided me with a quick and efficient service. No problems post treatment. Would definitely use them again and recommend to everyone!

review_title: I was pretty impressed by this clinic
review_body: I was pretty impressed by this clinic. And I will be back!

review_title: Attent the clinic on 26th august to get ?�?
review_body: Attent the clinic on 26th august Glasgow Gordon street  to get cyst cut away from just below my eye and have to say doctor Gilmour done a fantastic job and also made me comfortable from start to finish with is pleasant and professional manner

I have tried plenty of products and treatments as i am a beautician myself but none of them work! When i start my first treatment here i see the massive different on my skin.My acne was reduced and skin feel more presentable and better.The nurse Shannon was very helpful and listen to my problem.She made me feel at ease.

I went in for a mole removal at the bluewater clinic, they managed to remove it the same day in approximately 20 minutes and the results have been amazing it was a surgery just under my eye and you can't even tell anything has happened all I have is a little scar but it's easily covered with make up and with the help of vitamin e oil it will start to fade, thank you so much SK:N you have literally changed my life and now everyday I have a smile on my face

I paid �150 for a ten minute private consultation with one of the doctors. I was given a prescription for a medication that is no longer being manufactured. When I rang up asking for a different prescription I was told three separate times over three weeks that I would receive a return phone call from the clinic. It never came. In speaking with the call centre I asked for the matter to be escalated to a supervisor as a month had passed and I was still without the service I had paid for. I was told that the supervisor "could not help" and the best they could do is email the Harley Street clinic and "hope" someone replies. After two appointments, one prescription (that I'm still waiting on) and purchasing three products I've decided against the fraxel treatment at Sk:n. It was a horrible experience and frankly, I feel bad for the nurse and doctor who were lovely yet are made to look horrible because of the call centre/admin staff. Will not return.
Staff are externally friendly and helpful. The laser clinic is very clean and professional. The price is also reasonable, I have had my first laser session and notice less growth already !
very good�?�shipped it  fast
Efficient, friendly and professional highly recommend

review_title: Bought some Acne Blemish Control Serum ?�?
review_body: Bought some Acne Blemish Control Serum and it has worked really well over the week that I have used it. Still a long way to go, but think that this product is definetly one of, if not, the absolute best product I have used on my face results wise.
We're well good

review_title: Great service with friendly staff who ?�?
review_body: Great service with friendly staff who make you feel very comfortable.
Very good service
Friendly and informative professional staff.
Staff are approachable and friendly. Feel comfortable coming for my treatment.

review_title: Best laser treatment I've ever had
review_body: Best laser treatment I've ever had. Amazing service, all the girls are polite and professional. No faults whatsoever.
Expensive, but worth it. Seen same day!
Great clinic..wonderful staff..looking forward to my next appointment ?�ɾ?�ɾ
I've just started my treatments and the first impression was really good. The staff his very friendly and professional.
Professional, reliable, consistent

review_title: I have to say it was a very ?�?
review_body: I have to say it was a very professional service. The appointment didn't feel rushed and they carefully explained the entire procedure. The staff were friendly and welcoming.

review_title: Had an excellent experience so far and ?�?
review_body: Had an excellent experience so far and have felt very comfortable. Will rate again at the end of my treatment

Really knowledgable and professional dermatologist. As they use all lasers, PDL, IPL, ND Yag etc, he could make an accurate recommendation as to what would be right for me versus other clinics where they don't have a full range or specialise in a particular type.
A very professional and friendly experience again at Sk:n. Thanks Sarah Jane for talking me through the procedure and reassuring me.
Never seen such good service. Walked in, was seen slightly early, diagnosis was immediate, treatment offered on the spot.
Went in for dermapen treatment. All staff from reception to nurse and doctors were very professional and polite not to mention the friendly.

The staff are extremely welcoming. I've wanted this done for years! The girls told me about the current promotions that I would benefit from and gave me a further understanding of the treatment! Lots of places do laser surgery but I knew I had to come here, I'm glad I did. I can't wait to finish my treatment and have my dreams come true :)
Friendly, professional, good quality service from SK:N so far.
They've made me feel very at ease with their openness and professionalism! Would highly recommend!
Great staff, very friendly and made me feel at ease on my first visit. Would definitely recommend
Excellent service at the Holborn branch. I went in for a consultation at lunchtime and was able to have 2 moles removed later the same day. Very quick, painless and efficient. I plan to return!

review_title: I felt very comfortable and staff was ?�?
review_body: I felt very comfortable and staff was very nice would highly recommend.
Jean was excellent. She reviewed what had been done and explained what then needed to be done. The whole appt took about 20mins.
All procedures where explained thourughly. Really pleased with results

review_title: Much smaller bottles than I was expecting
review_body: For the price I paid for the acne range I was expecting much more of it. They do advertise the size of the bottles online so I can't argue with that, but it is difficult to get perspective of size online. When I first saw the pore refining lotion it was that small I thought it was a sample! My spots haven't started to clear up yet but I have only be using them just over a week so I am prepared to give it a bit more time before I comment on effectiveness. I'm having to use the products sparingly which I'm sure won't be helping.

review_title: Very welcoming staff and really take ?�?
review_body: Very welcoming staff and really take the time to listen and ask any questions to make you feel more comfortable. I really felt they were they to help me and did so in a very professional and friendly way. Would recommend, definitely.

review_title: Professional from consultation to after care
review_body: The whole experience I have received  from the Skin Clinic has been absolutely wonderful, professional staff from the first appointment through to aftercare.  I have had the first of three treatments and can't wait for my next. The products I have purchased are lovely and I will never go back to any other products. Katherine in the Norwich clinic took total care of me.  I recommend the Skin clinic, even if it's just for a consultation. They are total professionals.
My therapist Willow was great - super friendly and professional. Felt totally at ease. Only my first treatment but I'm looking forward to seeing results.

Awful! Don't go! I went to get a consultation for lip fillers and ended up actually getting them done on the day by who I thought was a doctor but was actually a nurse! Then it went wrong and she did them uneven and I went back to see the doctor who then tried to even it out. It still wasn't even and I went back again and he said he would need to dissolve them and put them back in again! I said it was unacceptable and I didn't go back as it was far too much for me to travel all the time to get it fixed as I am now 3 and a half hours away from the clinic. I thought I could trust them as they have clinics all over the UK but I was so disappointed and I spent money for nothing! I should receive a full refund because of all the hassle I had to endure and how horrible they looked at my graduation too! I don't suggest anyone to go, especially not to the Aberdeen one! Bad service all over!
Was put at ease immediately. Claire the nurse practitioner was so knowledgable and reassuring. I'm really happy with the results.
Excellent professional staff who really took into consideration my feelings and took care of me when I was nervous. They really put me at ease during my treatment.
First time for a brazilian and it was an almost painless experience. I was made to feel very comfortable and relaxed. Thoroughly recommend

review_title: No waiting or hassle and very simple.
review_body: Phoned up, booked an appointment for the next day.

review_title: Laser hair removal at Aberdeen SK:N clinic
review_body: I recently had my first laser hair removal session at the Aberdeen SK:N clinic. I was fairly apprehensive about how it would go but straight away I was put to ease by the lovely staff members. The laser treatment was quite nippy in certain areas however I had music with me which definitely took my mind off of it. I would certainly recommend the Aberdeen branch based on my positive experience so far.
The receptionists were very welcoming and friendly, The practitioner was professional and explained procedure.

review_title: The whole experience from start to ?�?
review_body: The whole experience from start to finish was quick and very reassuring and friendly. Completely put me at ease with any questions that I had. Can't wait to go back for my review

review_title: The ladies in Sk:n Milton Keynes are ?�?
review_body: The ladies in Sk:n Milton Keynes are wonderful. Ruta was my consultant and she was very compassionate at my consultation, she listened, asked questions and gave me options. She did not pressure me to book a treatment. A month later I returned for a TCA peel (to reduce my acne scarring). She talked to me throughout the treatment and I felt comfortable. I am looking forward to seeing the results. Thank you
My laser treatment was very quick, and the staff did everything to ensure it was painless and enjoyable!
Happy

I'd been thinking about having Lazer Hair removal for a while and looked at various places. When I went for the consultation at Sk:n Nottingham, Cat put me at ease straight away and was great at answering all my questions. She explained the process really thoroughly and went through how the Lazer works before taking my patch tests. During the treatment 2 weeks later she was really welcoming, asking if I had any more questions and got on with the treatment quickly and efficiently. Overall the service has been great and I can wait to start seeing results.

review_title: Items always arrive quickly and hassle ?�?
review_body: Items always arrive quickly and hassle free

review_title: First time to use laser hair removal
review_body: First time to use laser hair removal and the clinicians were very knowledgable and helpful. It was a very relaxed and comfortable environment
Very little pain staff all friendly and polite
An excellent and very professional service

Really good customer service all with great knowledge and all very friendly! Everything is very well run. During appointments and treatments all the staff are very lovely and answer any questions that you might have.

review_title: I'm very happy with my first treatment
review_body: I'm very happy with my first treatment. Professional stuff, good atmosphere.

The whole process was fantastic, my consultation was thorough and gave me all my options and Dr Harris was really calming and friendly. I decided on a treatment and was able to get it done a week later, I was extremely nervous about the needles but Dr Harris was very patient and made me feel at ease and the whole thing took 10 minutes, the practice was a calm and friendly space and I was so pleased with the outcome. The receptionists were lovely too. I wish I did it sooner and would recommend to anyone considering a treatment that they attend a consultation as it was completely worth the money and the experience was professional and offered at a great price.
I had my first laser session yesterday - very nice and clean premises, pain free, quick and lovely staff! Felt super comfortable. Thank you
Kirsty made me feel so comfortable, talked through everything as it was my first appointment and answered any questions I had. Thank you!
Excellent.  Very professional yet welcoming.  Highly recommend this practice.

review_title: I am not sure if I would like to come ?�?
review_body: I am not sure if I would like to come back or not, i don't know if I would recomend it to my friends as well. I had a treatment done yesterday but the way it was done was slightly different of what I used to have with previous clinic in Cambridge and it is exactly the same treatment, just It is felt to me not enough, so as I cannot see any difference today, usually after hydrofacial skin looks radiant and fresh, but when I woke up today I thought that there is no difference at all and I better go to beauty salon to do microdermabrasion for a much cheaper price with a great result which last weeks. I do not feel satisfied to be honest.
Great, was very easy to get the treatment I wanted. Friendly staff at reception.
Lovely and informative staff, attentive to everything and very knowledgeable about skin care.

Had some small lumps and  a mole removed. The doctor and nurse were very professional and also mindful that I was a bit uncomfortable by the procedure. They put me at ease and got the work done very quickly.

review_title: Poor service when there is a problem.
review_body: My daughter and I both booked laser hair removal courses.  Of the course of 6, we have had 3 cancelled at short notice - due to staff illness, staff being moved to cover an illness at another location (bizarrely causing the Southhampton branch to have to cancel THEIR appointments), and a machine breakdown.  After being promised call backs to rearrange the appointments, this did not happen. Contacting them is REALLY hard - you have to call a central number which then takes you through a long menu of options to select - at which point you speak to someone in the central office who needs to speak to your branch - but will have to call you back.  They call me back, I'm at work so it goes to voicemail - and guess what - I have to phone the central office....  it starts all over again.  NOT GOOD SERVICE!  I'm sure it is cheaper for them to operate like that but it certainly doesn't help the customer.  And there is no email address to contact them on - just phone or post!

After effortlessly making an appointment to have a number of ugly warts removed from my neck, I turned up at SK:N London Wall for an initial consultation with Dr Torkan Hirbod. After an examination and full explanation, I was surprised to learn that the treatment could be carried out on the spot. This was done painlessly and effortlessly in about 15 minutes, after which I strolled out with plasters and no warts. The price was reasonable and the whole experience from initial booking to the treatment and the reception at London Wall was excellent. I would recommend SK:N without hesitation.
The practitioner was very friendly

Fantastic service! I went for a wart removal, I wanted it removing ASAP. After waiting 4 months for the NHS I decided to give these guys a ring. I was seen within a couple of days and even had my wart removed on the same day. I would highly recommend to anyone considering them ! Thank you Sk:n !

review_title: Great value facial hair removal by ?�?
review_body: Great value facial hair removal by laser. I've only had one session so far, it was a little bit painful but certainly not unbearable. I'm eagerly awaiting my next appointment and can't wait to see results.
Staff member seemed knowledgeable, answered my questions and provided reassurance.
great service and treatment

review_title: I had never had any injectables done ?�?
review_body: I had never had any injectables done before, and I had a really good first experience.
Both the receptionist and nurse were very polite and pleasant. They make me very comfortable.
Fantastic!
Professional and extremely friendly staff who made me feel very at ease. Would 100% recommend!
I went in for a Jessner peel and I was a bit worried because  it was my first time getting a peel. They were very friendly and informative and I will definitely recommend it to anyone

review_title: I was apprehensive but I was made to ?�?
review_body: I was apprehensive but I was made to feel relaxed and informed.

The ladies at Sk:n in Northampton honestly made me feel completely at ease. Very clean and professional. They were clear with the process and after care both during my consultation and my first session. Whilst I was having my treatment the lady was brilliant and would check that I was comfortable and knew what happening. :) So thank you! I thoroughly recommend them.
SK:N are brilliant. Highly professional and friendly too.
Very professional, fantastic consultant that really puts you at ease.
My experience at the hampstead clinic was great. Staff are really friendly and helpful which was nice.

Fantastic service all round. Clare is outstanding. The treatments that Clare McKenna the Advanced Nurse Prescriber provided are way beyond my expectations and so natural. An exceptionally happy customer.
Really knowledgeable staff, made me feel at ease completely and explained everything well
Excellent staff

I turned up for an initial consultation and was given the opportunity to have the treatment that same day.  Being my first time I did have reservations over the final look and overall I am pleased.  This would have been 5 stars if I had been given the opportunity to look in a mirror to give my view of how i wanted my lips to look like as the procedure was taking place.
My Rotherham based GP refused on two occasions to remove a Mila from my face due to NHS budget cuts and told me I needed to "go private" - don't get me started....
Excellent service people were really lovely and friendly. I was made totally comfortable and felt at ease with the whole procedure .. I would definitely recommend.
Had my first laser treatment, so far so good, wonderful staff who have answered my numerous questions and put me at ease. Looking forward to the results!
A professional and relaxing experience. The technician was lovely and put my mind to ease about my treatment.

review_title: After my first laser hair removal ?�?
review_body: After my first laser hair removal treatment yesterday I can honestly say that Skin are the best beauty/personal care company I have ever dealt with. Everyone, from their contact centre staff to their receptionists to the nurses and practitioners are 100% friendly and professional. You are valued and nothing is rushed. I wouldn't hesitate to recomend Skin to anyone looking for any kind of skin treatment.
Easy and painless experience

review_title: Made to feel welcome and the consultant ?�?
review_body: Made to feel welcome and the consultant explained everything to me

My son wanted a wart removed from his knuckle. Our consultant made my son feel very welcome and relaxed and explained the different treatment options, the discomfort levels and the outcomes of the expected results plus the costs involved.

review_title: Acne treatment didn't work for me
review_body: I visited the Leamington Spa clinic for acne treatment about two months ago. I was sold some DermaQuest products which was a cleanser and serums, which would be used alongside me having skin peels. Unfortunately I had a reaction to the DermaQuest products. My skin had never been as bad as it got. When trying to treat such a small area it spread across my face resulting in more acne appearing, in places I never got it. My acne appeared a lot worse from the products so had to stop. After stopping, my skin calmed down a week later and have been refunded for the products and two remaining peels but I feel I should be refunded for the three peels (including the one I had) because it wouldn't have worked anyway without the full course so I don't think it's fair keeping one peel payment. I would have been more satisfied being refunded for all 3 peels. Overall, I guess it isn't for everyone. Staff were kind and knowledge was ok.
Product was advertised on website and money paid, several days later I was called to say it was out of stock and no information as to when it might be available was offered.

I visited the clinic in Aberdeen today and paid for a consultation with the doctor who barely looked at me. I have a mark on my face and he told me not to worry as it didn't look like a mushroom. Not very helpful! Whilst waiting in reception I overheard a foul mouthed argument over the phone between the lady on reception and her partner. She was through the back but shouting her head off, swearing and ranting and raving. All in all I was unimpressed with the clinic. I had hoped for a professional medical consultation and left feeling completely ripped off. I would strongly recommend avoiding. Complete waste of money.
Excellent customer service through out, i will definitely recommend them.

The venue was easy to access and welcoming; all the staff were professional and friendly.  The doctor was clear in his explanation and provision of options.  The surgery was quick, pain free (apart from initial injection); there doctor was very sensitive throughout the procedure.  I was given clear post op instructions and medicine.  Very happy with the whole process, and the outcome.

review_title: The Doctor and the nurses were so kind ?�?
review_body: The Doctor and the nurses were so kind and helpful, they made the whole process go really smoothly and easily. 10/10

review_title: First Time Patient - No stress, No fuss - Just a lot of friendly helpful people
review_body: Helpful, friendly staff. My treatment was clearly explained and as a first time, scared of needles patient; it was a definite go back experience. I would definitely recommend it.
First I had consultation and I was given some really useful advice and product recommendations. I decided to go ahead with the treatment after having the consultation.
Very helpful staff  a relaxing experience and have booked to go again .

I am receiving a course of laser hair removal at the Cheltenham Clinic. My practitioner, Jenny, was friendly, warm and caring from my initial consultation. Jenny understood my worries and concerns and reassured me accordingly. She was happy to answer my questions when I called the clinic in a panic a few days before my first treatment. The clinic itself is clean and all other staff were happy to talk to me. The treatment was pain free and so far appears successful (only my first session). Skin staff are trustworthy and I would absolutely recommend it.

review_title: My experience so far has been great
review_body: My experience so far has been great. All staff are extremely friendly and accommodating. The nurses put you at ease immediately and provide you with all the information you need. I feel in very safe hands.

I have always struggled with the condition of my skin and have often felt far too embarrassed to seek out any help. Having finally plucked up the courage to contact skin I can honestly say I have never been more relieved! From the get go the ladies have been nothing but warm and accommodating, making an experience that was promised to be uncomfortable a walk in the park!

review_title: My little op was handled with kindness ?�?
review_body: My little op was handled with kindness and care. All organised promptly and easily.

review_title: Local clinic and staff five star just let down by call centre
review_body: Would be five stars if the generic call centre service was better - I had issues getting through to an operator on several occasions and I felt I could have been better informed as a newbie to what to do before and what to expect at my initial consultation. All local staff that I have encountered at the Nottingham clinic have been excellent however, extremely easy to talk with, polite and appear genuine. I do not feel that they are trying to upsell anything (which I hate) and I feel that they have given me all the information I need to know and probably more! I have never had to wait long for appointments. I used a deal so the price was cheaper than usual - it is still more expensive than some places but I think worth it for the quality and reassurance of going to a proper clinic. Currently undergoing treatment so cannot state how successful it has been.

I have had one treatment so far and have been very impressed with the professionalism and friendliness of the staff at Sk:n. I am very hopeful about my results as I have already started to see an improvement!

From the start I found going to Sk:n  a good experience . The booking process was easy and clear. I was called back and an appointment was made to suit me. At the consultation everything was explained clearly, I could ask anything I wasn't sure about and felt reassured by the level of professionalism. My appointment a week later was great, the treatment was carried out well, we discussed the outcomes and I made a follow up appointment. I would recommend this clinic to friends and family.

I had two moles removed on my chin recently by the SK:N clinic in Glasgow. It was quick and easy and reasonably priced, given what I've paid previously to have this done privately. My options were explained to me thoroughly during the consultation meeting and the procedures explained too. The process itself was very quick, I was in and out within 20 minutes. My only gripe was that I made the effort to attend my appointments 10 minutes prior, as requested, to fill out the necessary paperwork but was then kept waiting 25 minutes after this each time - a total of 35 minutes - without anyone informing me of the delay or apologising for this. I appreciate that someone else's appointment may run over but to happen twice?

review_title: 56 yrs old with deep enlarged pores .
review_body: After suffering for many , many years with deep enlarged pores to my nose ,I visited the Bournemouth SK:N Clinic . I have now received five treatments from Sophie , an extremely  professional  and knowledgeable consultant .

Haven't started treatment yet-am due back soon to collect my products and be given advice about their use. Happy with the consultation-the nurse practitioner was friendly and informative. She suggested a low level treatment rather than anything very intense or invasive to start off with. No issues, hoping my treatment will be a success

review_title: Really happy with my 1st treatment and ?�?
review_body: Really happy with my 1st treatment and the skin consultant explained the treatment thoroughly and answered all of my questions.

After being a customer for more than 5 years, I have spent a great deal of money on their treatments. However, I received very poor customer service from them recently after I came in for an appointment only to be told that I got the time wrong, and that I had to wait for an extra 40 minutes. I even had my appointment card on hand detailing the date and time but it was refuted. Instead of waiting, I decided to reschedule for the next day.

review_title: It was very good and I received a ?�?
review_body: It was very good and I received a useful consultation session and quick first treatment. When it came to payment though, the information on which treatment plan was selected at consultation could not be located. There was a bit of confusion over payment.

review_title: Dr Samirs was really informative and ?�?
review_body: Dr Samira was really informative and helpful- made me feel at ease and in good hands!  The receptionist was friendly and the clinic was welcoming and clean.
The staff at skin are very friendly and knowledgeable. The clinic is a very high standard everything looks wonderful. It however is pricy but you definitely get your moneys worth.
Friendly, helpful and informative before the treatment. Everything was explained throughout and constant support provided.

review_title: Before I went to skn clinic I read the ?�?
review_body: Before I went to skn clinic I read the reviews online and it wasn't really good however it did not stop me from still going. I went and I received the best service from skn clinic Victoria. They were genuinely nice too meet and suggested treatments for me. The treatments worked 100% for me and I will recommend skn clinic to anyone
I went in for a birthmark removal last week and so far it looks like my skin is healing well. I can't see any signs of it coming back. As soon as I get some time off work I'll be going again.

Booked a consultation and paid my booking deposit of �25. Not long into my appointment I was then put through a sales pitch for a whole host of products I wasn't interested in and was not covered by the treatment cost. Apparently, in order for me to have the peel treatment I was to pay an additional �42 for a at home peel gel, that was not included in the treatment price but apparently needed for the treatment. It wasn't pointed out to me that I could purchase this exact same product elsewhere for �4.99.

review_title: Had a good experience with clinic
review_body: Had a good experience with clinic, the doctor and assistants were great!!

Great service, lovely staff members and the session was to too long. Skin do provide you with an after care kit including aleo Vera gel, a spray solution and sun cream which is really helpful to soothing treated areas after your laser treatment as naturally the laser can cause some pain. Although during the laser treatment they do blast cold air at the same time which is really helpful to soothe the pain. I no people who have also gone to the Canary Wharf skin clinic and all have said great things I would recommend this clinic.

review_title: I had a Mandelic peel done and the lady ?�?
review_body: I had a Mandelic peel done and the lady who did my peel was lovely however the peel itself has made no difference to my skin. It still looks the same & feels the same. Feeling disappointed!

review_title: I was a little worried about the ?�?
review_body: I was a little worried about the procedure. But was put at ease and didn't feel embarrassed because of the kindness and professionalism of the clinician. A very positive experience.

review_title: Amazing service and the nicest people
review_body: Amazing service and the nicest people
Double the price, to what I was expecting & what was listed in their policy & procedures folder.
Really friendly staff, felt at ease throughout.

Terrible customer service at Esher yesterday . Manager is unaccommodating  and not willing to listen to her clients. Despicable considering the amount of money I have spent at Sk:n Having already paid for two courses of lower leg laser hair removal my hair continues to grow back. When I arrived for my review I was asked by the therapist "Why was I there" ?? she couldn't be bothered to look at her monitor. I was in the process of explaining when she rushed off to do something else. Returning to say she didn't have time to treat me. When I again explained to the therapist (who I will add needs some serious training in customer care, she is rude, blunt and her face never presents with a smile always whinging, everything is too much for) .

I booked in for a consultation over the phone at the Norwich clinic and was advised that this would be free of charge but required a �25 charge if I missed the appointment, I gave my card details to the receptionist over the phone at the time of booking the consultation who explained that I would only be charged if I missed the appointment and that after my consultation had finished on the day to go to the receptions desk give them my card and they would release the funds back into my account. I then discovered that I had been charged yet on the website it explains that this is a free consultation? After querying this at the clinic I was then told that this only comes off any product that I decide to buy today? I explained my previous conversation with their receptionist and was told that this is just here policy? I just think its very unfair to be charged when I was told that its a free consultation and it even states this on their website and to be made to feel a bit pressured in to buying a product on the same day straight after a consultation. The staff member who I had the consultation was very nice and informative but whoever I spoke to on the phone needs to make it clear that this is not a free consultation but a chargeable one. I am awaiting a response from their head office.....................

review_title: I went to  the Cambridge Clinic in July ?�?
review_body: I went to  the Cambridge Clinic in July just for a consultation

review_title: I have only had one treatment session ?�?
review_body: I have only had one treatment session so far so cannot comment on how will it works yet but the consultation was easy to book and the treatment was really well explained. The first treatment session was quick and painless. The staff are so lovely and make you feel relaxed which is vital if having treatment in an intimate area!

Great experience at Skin. Sophie talked me through the whole process so I felt fully informed of exactly what to expect before my first treatment. My first treatment went to plan and I felt like I was in the hands of true professionals. Would definitely recommend.

My experience so far of SK:N has been great. The staff are really friendly and immediately put you at ease. It must be all good as I went in originally for a consultation for laser on a small area and have ended up having a full body treatment! I would definitely recommend....?���?���
Efficient & professional service

review_title: I have visited the Chester branch a ?�?
review_body: I have visited the Chester branch a number of times and have found the staff to be friendly and professional.  Irrespective of who you deal with from the reception staff to the clinical staff their approach is to put you at ease.  My treatment is on going and the results so far are promising.  I have found all the advice they have given from the treatment to the aftercare very helpful and given in enough detail to allow me to make balanced choices regarding what treatment I wanted.
Highly professional, honest consulations

review_title: Laser Hair Removal  -So pleased with my experience.

A friendly, professional service. I was put at ease at my consultation and during my treatment. Very happy so far.
Friendly staff, make you feel very at ease and they don't try to sell you treatments you don't need - I like the honesty if they don't think something will be of benefit.
First experience was great!

review_title: I had a wart growing on the side of my ?�?
review_body: I had a wart growing on the side of my head ?�� it was starting to look like a second head ?�� but the NHS wouldn't take it off as it's cosmetic. So, the doctor at SK:N lopped it off. A week later there's hardly a sign of it, and I'm now much more popular at parties, and successful with girls.

review_title: A highly professional and friendly clinic
review_body: This is a lovely clinic with a friendly and relaxing atmosphere. The staff are very helpful and any questions or worries I had were quickly dealt with. I would definitely recommend Sk:n to anyone.

The clinic I attended was in Bluewater Kent. The staff were lovely as always and I felt at ease at all times. My practitioner Katie was absolutely amazing. She put no pressure on me and explained everything in such detail. This is my second time at the clinic and I am already booked for my next treatment.

staff very helpful and pleasant. They informed you when you would be seen , offered you water, while you waited. Treatment was explained and after care. It was dealt with quickly and you where in and out. I am hoping to receive more treatment at the end of August as I was made to feel comfortable at the clinic.

review_title: Friendly professional staff who made me ?�?

Really friendly and informative, gave me the best advice and made me feel at ease. Had a laugh throughout my procedure which made me feel comfortable and vey please with my results.
after 2 appointments being rescheduled I finally got my appointment and my first treatment, which needs to have worked but I need to wait for results
Very professional service. Great care was taken to put me at ease & explain the treatment I was in to have. Fully transparent prices & incredibly friendly staff. First class.

When I first arrived there was some confusion. The call centre had offered me a consultation followed straight away by the treatment when they weren't supposed to. I felt frustrated as it had taken me an hour and 15 mins to get there and I didn't want to chat for 5 mins and go home.

review_title: Had first session of laser hair removal ?�?

review_title: The staff were really welcoming and ?�?
review_body: The staff were really welcoming and friendly from the moment I walked into the clinic.  I was given plenty of advice on my options and aftercare for the chemical peel I was having and all my questions answered fully.  The girl who was carrying out my treatment was so positive and,  even though I had some reservations about the treatment and was worried about side effects,  she really put my mind at ease and helped me to relax with her sunny personality, friendly chit chat and reassurance. It's the day after my treatment and my skin looks clearer already and I'm happy with the results so far.  I was given a discount on my next few peel treatments.  I'd definitely recommend this clinic to anyone and will be coming back again.

review_title: I felt like I was slightly rushed ?�?

review_title: I was really nervous about getting this ?�?
review_body: I was really nervous about getting this done but have been thinking about it for a while. The girl I've been seeing is lovely and it's nowhere near as painful as waxing etc. Have 7 sessions left to go but looking forward to the final outcome.

Excellent and quick, they were able to treat me immediately on the day of my consultation and the doctor I saw was honest and professional and easy to deal with. Only loses a star because it's rather expensive.

Really informative and professional. Nonjudgmental and non-pressured environment, so perfect for whatever treatment you are thinking of getting. I was given all the information I could ever need booking my consultation, during the consultation, and during the treatment itself.  The whole process was made very easy and comfortable. I'll be going back.

Was instantly made to feel very comfortable and treatment was carried out very professionally and quickly. So please and can't wait to go back!
Helpful and friendly staff
Professional service

review_title: Seems like a great place for laser hair ?�?
review_body: Seems like a great place for laser hair removal. Great location on Harley Street and friendly staff.

review_title: I've just had my first hair removal ?�?
review_body: I've just had my first hair removal treatment at your Hampstead branch. Very lovely, friendly staff. The treatment for me was literally pain free. Very happy. Can't wait to see the results!

review_title: After having done a lot of research for ?�?
review_body: After having done a lot of research for the treatment I wanted i finally found a place that could offer me the treatment with out getting ripped off.. SK!N so I decided to book my consulatation with one of the medical directors Dr Husor who i had previously read up about before booking. Dr Husur and Stephanie the nurse were amazing they both offered me support an guidance through out my conslutation, answered all my questions and made me feel at ease even when i had an emotional moment. From the moment I entered SK!N I was greeted by the lovely staff I never felt pressured to do anything I didn't want to do i was told to have a think an come back at a later date, everything was down to myself and what would benefit me right from the start to finish. I was initaly going for my consulatation but instead I left one happy lady  after having had my treatment done there and then due to a cancellation and Dr Husur fitting me in promtly I can't thank them both enough also the staff that work there at Harboune road , Birmingham I can already see amazing results I would highly recommend you to anyone an everyone ?�Ɂ?�Ɂ

I found SK:N Clinics to be absolutely amazing! I was so nervous as I had been debating this treatment for a long time before finally taking the plunge and everyone at the clinic from the receptionists to the nurses to the doctors were so welcoming and friendly. They really set me at ease and provided me with all of the information I needed to make an informed decision. Sooo pleased with the results. I wish I'd have done it sooner!

review_title: The first appointment with the Doctor ?�?
review_body: The first appointment with the Doctor was only scheduled for 15 minutes and the skin tags were quickly diagnosed. I was offered treatment the same day but would have to wait 1.25 hours which I was not prepared to do. The next appointment would be in two weeks?�� time as the Doctor only came to this practise every two weeks. I accepted this appointment and when I turned up for treatment it all went well.

I arrived early for my appointment so had a half hour wait; the receptionist was lovely and friendly, there were magazines and flyers to read to fill the time, and the toilet was clean and fresh when I used up some time there! The doctor who saw me for my appointment was professional and friendly, putting me at ease immediately. He listened to my concerns, looked at my skin, gave me a list of suggestions, told me prices for treatments, and proceeded, much to my amazement, to give the first treatment - which I had not expected. On the way out I booked my next session and paid for this one. All simple and easy; nothing to be frightened of; I will definitely recommend this place to friends.

review_title: My experience it was very good ,and i ?�?
review_body: My experience it was very good ,and i like my tretment.

review_title: The beauty therapist was very helpful ?�?
review_body: The beauty therapist was very helpful and clear about the treatment.  I will definitely go back again in the near future.
Faultless and excellent service.

Even though i was running late, the ladies still took their time with me. Explained everything to me so clearly, really made me feel at ease. I feel extremely confident in having the rest of treatment here.
Good experience and friendly staff. Only had one session so far.

review_title: All the staff were lovely especially ?�?
review_body: All the staff were lovely especially keeley she talked me through everything and I loved my treatment
Very friendly make you feel
Very friendly and helpful, would recommend as they explain what they are doing and why at every step.

I went to sk:n yesterday and instantly I felt completely at ease. I've never have something like filler done before but Dr Hussain explained everything I needed to know about the treatment. I only went in for a consultation and ended up having the treatment done there and then! I'm in love with my new lips and will defiantly be going back!!

Professional and friendly staff

Appointment changed at the last minute, turn up on the day to be told the machine not available, did not have my notes, tried to offer a different treatment despite being told at original consultation there was only one option left. Non apologetic despite all the mishaps, totally unprofessional, worst medical experience I have ever received.
Staff were really professional, knowledgeable and friendly.

review_title: The Argos version of Cosmetic Procedures
review_body: The argos version of Plastic surgery. If you know that you want to have the procedure done and want it done promptly and quickly. this is the place for you. If you require more support and advise I think go elsewhere.

I went to sk:n in Brighton for a consultation with regards to having a mole removed from my face. From start to finish I received great treatment including the reception staff, nurse and consultant. I was fortunate enough to be able to have the treatment I required there and then and can't wait to see the final results when the healing process is complete.
Very professional

So far it's be an amazing experience. Staff have be so nice and have explained everything fully. They also try really hard to get you at ease before and after treatment. Price for treatment was very reasonable as well.
Super professional but personable practitioner, a semi-painful treatment made comfortable.

review_title: I went for a consultation and tried a ?�?
review_body: I went for a consultation and tried a lazer treatment on two warts and it worked after a week and a half. Booked up to see them again and zapped some more warts on my hands and happy with the results so far. The people who work there are very kind and friendly and you feel at ease with them. They're a very good  practise in Hamstead. They do all sorts of treatments but i went there for just the one treatment.
Put me at ease. Helped me to make choices that suited me.

review_title: Great staff the doctor in particular ?�?
review_body: Great staff the doctor in particular puts you at ease would definitely go back and highly recommend.

Skn edgbaston very bad customer service. Misleading advice and poor customer service. All they want is your money. I was then lied to about things that I know were not correct. In these actions you have lost my trust, and a potential loyal customer. Wouldn't go there again.
Very good service, didn't feel a thing!

I have been a customer since 2012, spent a fortune with them and the level of service is absolutely appalling. You can never log a formal complaint with anyone, they change address and then expect you to turn up on time without providing any details of new location. If you can avoid using Skn I would absolutely recommend that you do. Awful.
Great service, courteous friendly staff. Yes there may be cheaper but there is always an offer on for price (laser) and having a reputable name behind the service is a plus in my book.

I had very good experience with skn. Right from consultation through microneedling session. I felt very confident to come to skn. I had lots of scars on my face and I had lost my self confidence. I had to wear heavy makeup which I wasn't comfortable. I was recommended 5 microneedling session. After 3 session I could feel the difference in my skin texture and scars visibility reduced. By end of 5 session I felt I had a fresh new skin and felt very confidence with myself. Amazing results. I received lots of compliments regarding change in my skin texture. I would definitely recommend skn.i loved their products too.

review_title: Very happy with the doctor and the ?�?
review_body: Very happy with the doctor and the procedure performed. Friendly and helpful staff - would recommend to anyone.
Excellent service, nice clean clinic and the beautician was very knowledgeable and caring. I will recommend Sk:n to friends and family.

The lady who carried out my treatment was so thorough about explaining everything to me that I didn't feel anxious about the treatment at all.

good service

Excellent from consultation to procedure. Thorough and informative. Excellent, knowledgeable and friendly staff.

Been amazing skin peels have really helped my acne and always use all the skin products. Only thing I think could be improved is using the same person I've had so many different nurses over the time! Attend the Milton Keynes clinic at the hub. Whenever I order online very prompt delivery!
staff are helpful and friendly...

review_body: I personally find it awkward discussing my aging skin,  but at Sk:n the aesthetic doctor was wonderful.   She was approachable,  informative and friendly.   She made the whole experience easy and straightforward.   I highly recommend.
excellent service!

I'm very happy with the treatment I've had done at the skin clinic in Bournemouth. Very friendly and professional service. I'll be back for next treatment. Thank you.

review_title: I had a poor experience with this ?�?
review_body: I had a poor experience with this company -first of all they did not give me the correct information when I booked a consultation at Harley Street Clinic - consequently my consultation wasn't able to happen in the correct way, I had to go again - more time and unecessary travel expense for me and I was unsuitable for treatment. I told the consultant I was not happy about this and asked the consultant to sort this out for me  - on two occasions she did nothing - the call centre did not call me back at all despite two telephone contacts - I had to call the call centre several times before anyone took notice of me.  The manager who eventually contacted me didn't seem to concerned about it either - in my opinion not a very good experience for a medical practice who are supposed to care about their patients - In my opinion they only do so once they're a paying customer maybe - thats the impression I got
Very good service, I did get a little bit of bumpy skin the day.

review_title: Very happy with the quality of care ?�?
review_body: Very happy with the quality of care during my appointment and not feeling uncomfortable throughout. One thing I would say is that during laser hair removal, the "Hollywood treatment" doesn't laser the whole area like you'd expect. It does worry me that I'll pay to remove all hair and it may be that I have to shave certain places every now and then.

Arrived for my first treatment after consultation/test patch two weeks before, to be told my file is missing! I had to wait 40 mins before i was taken into the treament room, and had to sign another consent form. I had made three phone calls to the call centre regarding this appt and a few other mishaps to be told they woukd email the. Ranch and they would get back to me but no one did!  the staff were well aware i was on a tight time scale but i understand they had health and safety regulations to follow. There was not enough time to complete my first appt fully which i am VERY unhappy about. When i came down to reception, I was introduced to the branch manager, Katie. I had to rush off as i had a preschool pick up so i asked if the staff could explain the events of the morning to her and requested that she call me to discuss. Never got a phonecall!!

review_title: I love the staff very welcoming
review_body: I love the staff very welcoming, friendly you feel that you are at home. Is my first treatment but i feel more confident and i now is going to work. I also bought some creams and theu are the best for my skin.
Very professional and friendly. Clear about what the procedure was and what to expect. Had my confidence. Would definitely go there again.martina

review_title: I was put at ease and felt confident in ?�?
review_body: I was put at ease and felt confident in trusting the practitioner in my laser treatment. I liked the experience so much I am already looking for my next treatment there.

review_title: Very happy and friendly staff at Esher Sk:n
review_body: All the staff at Sk:n Esher have been so friendly and helpful during my consultation and beyond. Always a welcoming smile and hello at reception and they are all happy to help advise on the different treatments they offer. I would highly recommend them!

review_title: every detail of my skin problem was taken.
review_body: every detail of my skin problem was taken.I was examined by the specialist.Then I was given the choice of treatment.Also I was given the choice If how would I like to be treated quickly or step by step.over several months I was explained the cost of the treatment over the period.During the treatment every minute I was asked if I am all right..There was not a bit of  during the treatment.The skin specialist knew the procedure of the treatment so well which made me so happy and explained every thing step by step.I will be visiting again
Amazing staff really friendly. Felt comfortable from has soon has I walked in.

I thought the reception service is very professional.  The Doctor was very good and professional as well.  There was no added extra service or warmth (schmoozing) which I feel would make the experience more pleasant.  I would continue to go back because the results are good.
Great staff, first-rate treatments, top results. Perfect!
Very friendly and informative. The treatments and products are a little on the pricey side though
Very quick and efficient.  Procedure was done with minimal discomfort and well explained beforehand.

Excellent experience at the Sk:n clinic. Doctor and nurse explained everything I needed to know about the procedure. They answered all my questions. It was a fast and easy appointment. I would highly recommend the Sk:n clinic to everyone.

I'm impressed with my dermafiller result. Can't wait to go back.
Very well looked after, even got a box of chocolates.

review_title: I have extreme difficulty in getting an appointment then poor client care?�?
review_body: I have extreme difficulty in getting an appointment with my doctor since I reported that the treatment was not totally successful.    When I eventually did get the appointment at Sunday 2nd July at 1.20  I attended at the correct time having received texts and phone calls to ensure that I did.   when I arrived I was told take a seat and wait to be called for my appointment at 1.20.      I soon realised that there were several other patients that had been waiting for up to an hour to be seen.    What would you have done if I had attended my appointment one hour late?    I do not live nearby to the clinic and had to travel to get there.      Once some of the patents walked out because of the wait and asked for their deposit to be repaid I realised that other patents were before me and it was going to take over an hour before I would be seen.  I had not been alerted to the delay when I booked in and waited over 15 minutes when I realised that I would have to ask the staff whether I would also have a long wait.    I was told that I would.    I had my husband waiting for me in the car so I could not agree to the unacceptable delay.    No explanation of the day was given.   There does not seem to be sufficient qualified staff to deal with the workload although the clinic are advertising special offers.     it felt like there were patients packed in for the money only and no client care.

review_title: great service knew what my skin needed ?�?
review_body: great service knew what my skin needed straight away. And offered a range of treatments. Highly recommended.

review_title: A very warm welcome from the moment I ?�?
review_body: A very warm welcome from the moment I walked through the door. I was made to feel at ease and was given clear information about the treatment I was receiving.
A great experience with SK:N, was able to get a last minute appointment, really friendly and helpful staff, and I am so pleased with the results of my treatment. Highly recommended!

Lovely doctor explained in laymens terms about juvederm filler even refused to do the area I thought I needed to be done I ended up having the filler in another area which I needed more nobody enjoys injections but I can honestly say the treatment was as pain free as it possibly could have been and the day after hardly any trace of the injections I will definitely go back for future treatments in fact I'm having a mole removed in two weeks time and I feel perfectly confident in there hands
Had a brilliant first experience! Staff are really friendly and professional, no complaints at all!

I would highly recommend Skin Guildford. All of the team were very welcoming from the minute I stepped in the door. They put me at ease instantly. The appointment was on time and the consultant answered all my questions. Claire the clinic manager was friendly and had had the same treatment as me so was talking me through it as well. The nurse who's name I didn't catch was also helpful and approachable. If you are considering a visit here I would definitely say do it!

review_title: this was my first time and it was a ?�?
review_body: this was my first time and it was a very gentle treatment. ideally i would like to have a bit more guidance as to what can be achieved and the likely costs and ongoing frequency as i feel that the decision is a bit open and i am not really clear on what might be achievable. I will discuss this as my follow up

I had 2 moles removed at the clinic.. after thinking about it for years I finally bit the bullet and went for it. It took exactly 5 minutes! The whole process from consultation was seamless with minimal fuss. The receptionists in particular are very friendly and helpful. Thankyou all at skin Bristol.

I had my laser removal treatment at Skin Clinic in Victoria. It was complete shambles and a big disappointment. After the second course, one of their therapist Sara who is probably the best one there told me I was put on the olive skin setting although I am quite fair. She mentioned I probably need a different setting as it would be unlikely to remove finer hairs. She however did not patch test me and when I attended the 3rd treatment I had a different therapist who refused to use a higher energy as I was not patch tested. When I voiced my concerns she reassured me if I did not get a good result she will give me a further treatment for free. At my fourth treatment I discovered I was still on the same setting the olive skin one but a higher energy level. No surprise I did not get a good result and was still shaving once a week. My fifth course was done with Sara who was fantastic and I had a brilliant result, only shaved once between treatments. I asked to have my subsequent appointment with Sara. However when I turned up for my appointment Sara changed shifts and none informed me from Skin Victoria. When I tired to reschedule with her she was booked for several days and the manager refused to do anything about it despite the fact that my laser hair removal only takes 10-15 minutes as I was only treating the upper lip area. I had to complain to skin customer service and the manager phoned me an hour later to offer me an appointment with Sara the next day. When I attended my last treatment with Sara, the manager was present when I was booking my additional free session and she refused to give me the session they promised to compensate for the fact that they treated my on the lower energy setting on the third occasion due to failing to patch test me. If I had to be treated again I will not go to Skin Victoria.

review_title: This was my first time on having laser ?�?
review_body: This was my first time on having laser treatment and Hayley was amazing and put me totally at ease. She talked me through the process and all the time kept asking how I was.  She made me feel quite comfortable and I trusted her completely and it was all over sooner than I had thought! I can now say that I shall not be at all concerned about my next treatment.

review_title: Very good customer service  and made me ?�?
review_body: Very good customer service  and made me feel confident that my treatment what I  was going to receive was going to be the best
Had laser hair removal. Quite an uncomfortable procedure but the cooling fans help a lot. Advising me to take simple pain relief prior to the procedure would have been a nice touch.
Fantastic place, very friendly & professional staff
Highly recommend skn Birmingham bull street. Had a great experience from start to finish. Felt at ease throughout.
Fantastic service throughout

Lovely friendly staff, talked me through everything, I got products for my exact skin type and I can see a difference already. Can't wait to go back for my next peel. Lots of offers on for products and treatments.

Yesterday I had lip fillers for the first time.. so happy with how the whole thing went! Carman made me feel so comfortable and at ease! I'm swollen now but I'm aware that it's all normal and not to worry! The whole experience so far has been great!
Excellent. Had a mole removed. Painless and quick and healing better than I thought.
Fantastic approach,very high skilled staff,I can really recommend to anyone who wants to improve the skin. I feel like a brand new Me!!!
Good place, excellent customer service.

review_title: The staff are very professional and ?�?
review_body: The staff are very professional and really make an effort to put you at ease. Ease of getting information and facilities are great. Just had my first laser hair removal session and it was distinctly more sore. That took me by surprise, although it was still bearable, as I thought the test patch session would be a good indicator of what the treatment is like.

I went to Canary Wharf branch for my consultation. I wanted to remove mole on my chin. I was told that they don't have the right laser at Canary Wharf clinic and I'll have to go to Harley Street. I didn't mind that. When I was on my way to Harley Street I had call from reception saying that the doctor I had appointment with could not make it but someone else was available. I didn't have much choice as I was nearly at the clinic. I had another consultation before the treatment. I have asked how many treatments are required. I was told just one and I'll have a little pink scar which will fade with time. Unfortunatly a month or so after treatment my mole had reappeared. I went back for check up thinking that I will have correcting treatment just to find out that this is normal and nothing they can do. Waste of money. Why would anyone go for mole removal just to end up with that mole again?
Very candid advice given during the first consultation. Each treatment was done with care and expertise. Confidence-inspiring experience. Would recommend without hesitation.

An absolutely seamless experience. Throughout the whole process I didn't feel rushed or forced into anything I didn't want. I was given plenty of reassurance and even though my procedure was very simple time was taken to make me aware of every aspect of what was going to happen.

Went for the consultation for microdermabrasion and ended up having the treatment there and then.  We talked about what products I use, what I would benefit from, what I wanted to get out of the treatment etc...and I can't fault it.  Have booked in for another 2 sessions!
Yesterday I had my tear trough's done at SK:N James Cooks Middlesbrough and the results are amazing .
Incredibly friendly and welcoming staff. Explain everything really clearly. Made the whole experience much less daunting. Feel like you're in very safe hands

numerous issues here ranging from being overcharged and given someone else's details,  through to struggling to get to a scheduled appointment (they are incredibly inflexible)  only to find when I got there and lay down for the treatment that they'd run out of the treatment anyway. Also discovered weeks later that the product application list I was given was incorrect. Very disappointed and have not signed up for further treatment . I told them twice that I was not getting the expected post treatment feedback emails but nothing changed.
Really welcoming & friendly service. Made me feel very at ease with no embarrassment at all.

Staff were super welcoming and so friendly. Made me feel comfortable for my first treatment and provided me with all the key information I needed, as well as advised me how to take care of my skin on a daily basis. Great experience over all
Great service, friendly and efficient. Would happily recommend

The staff were quick and efficient and thoroughly good at giving me any necessary information. The treatment was well carried-out and effective. The clinic was clean and looked very professional - all the staff conducted themselves promptly and professionally. Also to note the extended opening hours which means appointments can be made evenings and weekends. Would definitely recommend.

review_title: Sk:n really catered for my needs
review_body: Sk:n really catered for my needs, with the right treatment being chosen for me. The staff were friendly/helpful and answered all of my questions!

review_title: All the staff are really friendly
review_body: All the staff are really friendly. Good clear explanation is given before starting a treatment. Care products are given to look after the skin. Would highly recommend.

Welcoming clinic, the staff made me feel at ease and dr Azad is very knowledgeable and willing to provide the best treatment option rather than just follow a script. I will definitely go back in the future for any other treatments and recommend to friends and family
Friendly and comfortable environment. Everything was explained to me before and during the treatment

I was disspointed in the fact that my initial appointment was cancelled on the day of. I had already arranged for travel to the clinic so the short notice was frustrating, although I understand these things can happen. My rescheduled appointment went great, my practitioner was amazing and made me feel at ease. She was constantly asking me if I was comfortable and really had my best interests at heart.
The staff are very helpful and knowledgeable. They made me feel very comfortable during the procedure. Would recommend it to anyone.
Love the creams that have been recommended for my skin and my hydration treatment was lovely.  I am now on a journey with you to make ,y skin healthy and younger over the coming years.

review_title: My first time - definitely not my last!
review_body: This was my first time to the SK:N clinic and everyone I met there was very friendly and I felt at I was at ease as soon as I entered the clinic. Dr Azad  explained the procedures and after care in thorough detail to me. The receptionists were lovely, chatty and smiley! Thank you everyone.

Service doesn't improve despite being a loyal customer and having spent a lot of money with them over the years.  The telephone staff in the call centres are generally good though.

review_title: Very efficient service and friendly staff
review_body: Very efficient service and friendly staff made the experience quick, painless and easy.

great service, lovely therapist

I so far had an excellent experience with very welcome, polite and professional service provided regarding laser hair removal. I was talked through the process and technology in geat detail, always asked if I feel comfortable, had so far no issues with booking, treatment or the clinic. Only had a test patch and one treatment out of 8 done so far but have no complains only good experience.
Really friendly and professional staff, I was very nervous about my treatment and they were fab at putting me at ease.
The team always delivers a great service and their treatments have been first class. The peels got my acne under control for the first time in 10 years... I would definitely recommend SK:N!

review_title: Everyone made you feel at ease

review_title: Friendly staff but a poor product
review_body: The staff are brilliantly helpful and very polite, however I do not rate the underlying treatment I received (hence the rating). I was informed this would be good for blotchy facial skin and actually my skin is now marginally worse than it was beforehand. My advice is pay the additional fee and go to a good quality dermatologist, I feel they will take more responsibility for the treatment they provide (no waivers to sign).
I was quite nervous to begin with, the therapist made me feel comfortable and at ease.

review_title: Went in for laser hair removal ?�?finally!
review_body: Went in for laser hair removal treatment. The lady who assessed me and conducted the treatment, Claire, was really wonderful. She made me feel comfortable and explained everything really well. She gave me all the time I needed to ask questions and I genuinely felt that I was in safe hands. I just did my first session and can't wait for the rest. This is something that I've been wanting to do for years. I painfully dealt with the symptoms of my pcos and thought that it was just something I had to live with, but I don't and I refuse to. I just cannot explain the relief I feel having finally done started this journey towards gaining back my confidence and my LIFE! I know I won't regret it.
Nice helpful staff. Relaxing atmosphere. Very happy with results. Highly recommended

review_title: Fee charged is much more than the website quote
review_body: The fee charged after the procedure did not match the fee on the website.   This is blatant profiteering when I have no choice to pay as I was asked for money after the procedure was complete and when I checked against the quoted prices it was too late. �500 to have 2 small skin tags removed taking 10 mins. Nearly twice the website quote.

review_title: I find the team to be very warm and ?�?

review_body: Today I had my first underarm laser removal session and I would highly recommend as I can already see an improvement. I also signed up for chin laser removal. review_title: I have had  treatments and brought ?�?
review_body: I have had  treatments and brought products from the clinic and found both to be excellent. Staff are kind and helpful.

Easy to find. Easy to book appointments. All info easy to understand and explained fully. Quick and easy treatment. Wasn't rushed or kept waiting. Clean and good facilities. Staff were friendly and welcoming.

Amazing!!! Juvederm Ultra, pleased so far (but only 15 hours in)

The support staff are excellent - very professional. The clinician was knowledgable and thorough in his assessment. My only concern was the administration of the local anaesthetic. There was no option for numbing cream due the length of time we would have had to allow for it to work. This resulted in a number of very painful injections to my nose. There didn't seem to be much time to let the anaesthetic work before the lasering started. Needless to say I could still feel everything. In fairness, as the treatment was on my nose I appreciate how sensitive they are; but perhaps that is why a longer appointment time to allow for numbing cream would have improved my patient experience.
Friendly, helpful and listened well
The team at the Glasgow Clinic are friendly and welcoming . They explained everything clearly and made me feel totally at ease . True professionals who care .

Skin is absolutely brilliant, their professionalism is second to none. I had 6 laser treatments for my upper lip which actually took a year to complete due to holidays (must have 4 weeks out of the sunshine before and after any treatment). Never felt like they were rushing me through the system. In fact they took extra care when I developed a slight skin pigmentation which completely went away thanks to the knowledge of their experienced dermatologists who altered my programme slightly. I was quite scared right at the beginning but my practitioner Jenny Bayliss was so kind and made me feel totally at ease. The procedure was extremely effective, although I have just booked an additional 3 treatments to remove the last few unwanted hairs. Skin frequently offer generous discounts up to 40% so look out for them.

I recently attended the Guildford Sk:n branch and received a lovely warm welcome. After filling in my details I had my consultation which was very thorough and all my questions were answered. Excellent service, very professional and great results. Really liked the honest and knowledgeable advice. I will be back.

review_title: Very professional but please increase appointment times.

I was seen promptly by the doctor who talked through the wart removal and within 10 minutes had it removed and I was on my way. Impressed would be an understatement, I love seeing a company run well and a clinic that provides a service such as SK:N you've got all the right ingredients for doing it right.

review_title: Sk:n are a very modern and professional ?�?
review_body: Sk:n are a very modern and professional outfit with high-end equipment.  The staff are very friendly and approachable.  I was particularly impressed with the no-obligation consultation which featured a patch test with the laser so I could decide whether it was something I wanted.  I would highly recommend Sk:n to anyone having laser hair removal, even if you are anxious about it.
Incredibly nice staff, lovely and clean facilities. I felt well informed and in good hands (especially since I was naked waist down!)
The staff are really friendly and have a lot of knowledge. My procedure was done quick and effectively. Highly recommend!
After my thorough consultation with friendly, understanding staff, I was recommended a 3 step treatment to suit my skins' needs.

review_title: I visited SK:N for the first time ?�?
review_body: I visited SK:N for the first time yesterday and had a wonderful experience.  The person that I saw was extremely kind, helpful and informative and I would not hesitate to go back again.  After moving to London from NYC over a year ago, I have been looking for a place like this and am quite happy that I decided to visit.  Thank you again.

review_title: Hair removal laser is pretty much ?�?
review_body: Hair removal laser is pretty much painless. Staff are amazing, very high level of customer service. I had just one treatment so far, but my hair didn't fall as I was expecting. Feeling a bit confused ...

The wonderful Debbie has boosted my confidence my helping me achieve the lips I've always dreamed of. From the start she was professional but casual about the treatment. Talking to me all the way through with an honest view about the procedure and making me feel at ease . I was very nervous as it's something I've never done before; dreaming for years and now.. I'm thrilled I've talked away with a mouth being truly proud of. I was told what was happening where and when all the injections were made. I honestly thought I'd look ridiculous but as she's so skilled she won't let you leave looking like an idiot. A lovely natural set of lips have been created and one big happy smile to follow. I seriously can't recommend enough how worth it this treatment has been. The service alone is why I'll be going back. Debbie if you're reading this I thank you greatly, more than I can say or show. I'm truly proud of my beautiful new mouth. Hats off to you, you know your stuff x

review_title: I am happy to recommend SK:N

review_title: Wish I had done it 10years ago...
