Great environment. Super professional staff.  Put me at easy right from the start. I had been looking into this treatment for quite some time.  From the minute I walked into the SK:N clinic I knew everything was going to be fine.  Everything was explained and explained again to make sure I don't miss anything. My practitioner was fantastic and I would highly recommend her.

review_title: the best choice i have done :)
review_body: I have done so much research about hair laser removal and was always convinced the cheaper ones offered in Groupon. However, upon inquiry on those clinics I always ended up finding out they only do IPL which obviously not going to work for me. Just this Monday, I googled any clinics nearby offering the 'real' laser treatment and came across sk:n... I immediately booked a consultation and went to their clinic the following day due to their 40% discount promo. Upon knowing that the clinic is located in James Cook Hospital, I then realized this clinic can be trusted 100%. Everything was explained to me very well in my consultation day. After my patch test has been done, I immediately said 'yes' for the entire 8 course treatment as ive already seen a difference on the tested area.  Since I am in my transitioning phase (male to female), I would definitely go back to skin not just to complete my current 8-session treatment but to get another course for the rest of my body parts. Thank you so much sk:n for making my struggles in my transitioning lessen.

review_title: I went to visit the Manchester clinic ?�?
review_body: I went to visit the Manchester clinic to enquire about the dermapen treatment for some superficial rejuvenation and paid for a consultation with the dermatologist. I was briefly talked through several treatment options but felt a bit confused and overwhelmed by the choice. I would have preferred having paid to be given their expert opinion on what would have best suited my skin type. I was also recommended Skin's own brand glycolic facewash cleanser. After using this for 2 weeks my skin had a really bad break out (I've never suffered from acne before) and on calling the clinic I was advised that my skin was purging and to continue with the product. After a further weeks use my skin had never looked worse and left me with unsightly red marks so I quickly switched back to my dermalogica special cleansing gel (lifesaver!). My skin has since began to clear but it has left behind a lot of hyperpigmentation. Products can react differently on all skin types, but in hindsight I wish I'd researched more into glycolic acid as I have since found gentler treatments that don't cause the diverse side effects especially when my skin was clear to start with, I don't believe such a harsh product should have been recommended for my sensitive skin when there are alternatives with less risk. If your skins not that bad please consider the risks against the potential gain, as I've ended up wasting a lot of money to have worse skin when it actually looked good before!
Good service. Very quick and easy to arrange a consultation at a location to suit me. The price is not cheap, but the service was quick, professional and helpful.

You feel you are in safe hands as you are dealing with health professionals who listen to your concerns and then give you advice. They are not trying to push products or treatments on you and this made me trust the them to have my best interests at heart.

I've been twice to ask:n Sheffield and both times felt very comfortable. The first time was for my consultation, where I felt everything was honest and the nurse Angela made me feel at ease, the second time was for my milia removal which was very quick and was very thorough. I couldn't be happier with the results!

I have just started a course of under arm and hollywood laser hair removal in the Bristol clinic. I have found the staff very professional and friendly, the same girl did my consultation and first treatment and I have booked in with her again in 6 weeks to do the next treatment. I like the continuity of having the same therapist every time I attend. I was made to feel very comfortable despite the areas she had to get close to.
Very friendly and understanding. Down to earth staff. Quality treatment
Really friendly and helpful staff

review_title: I had three skin tags removed from my ?�?
review_body: I had three skin tags removed from my eyelids and feel so much more confident. Wish I would have done it sooner ;the procedure was painless and very quick. I found the staff at the London Wall clinic friendly and helpful and my doctor very professional. My experience has made me trust the clinic and I will be booking a mole removal appointment.

I was very worried about how painful it was going to be as it was on my face and neck however the specialist who was doing the laser treatment was very professional and kept asking if I was ok throughout the treatment, I still have 7 sessions to go and I am really hoping for some good results as IPL did not work for me.

I was very nervous and I was made to feel very comfortable by the Doctor and his Nurse.  The treatment was completely painless and I am very happy with the results.  i would definately recommend SK:N to anyone who wanted the same treatment.  Also the Reception Staff were very friendly and efficient.

The staff at SK:N are very professional, experienced, and efficient. I would definitely recommend SK:N to my friends who are interested in laser hair removal. I only wish that they provided a bit more of a relaxing and less of a clinical atmosphere, but that is just my opinion.

review_title: Do not trust these clinics!!!!!!!!! unprofessional, incompetent and unreliable. "Number 1 Skin Clinic" is the biggest lie ever.
review_body: I am so disappointed with the professionalism of these clinics in particular the Fulham Broadway clinic I would NOT recommend it even to my worst enemy and I will not be having my treatment done here. I paid �100 for a consultation with a very unprofessional doctor who reassured me about nothing and basically acted like he didn't give a s*hit and would rather be sat on his sofa at home. They are way more expensive than they are worth I wouldn't even expect this from the NHS. This clinic claims to be "number one" but I'n not really sure who awarded them this title because it couldn't be less true I'd actually rather be treated by the National healthcare. I booked to have my treatment done after my consultation, and then I was called a day before by the clinic only to be told it had to be postponed because of a 'broken machine', the treatment was rescheduled to two weeks later and then AGAIN a day before I received a phone call telling me my appointment had to be cancelled because the 'machine was still broken'......they couldn't even tell me when I'd be able to have my treatment done because they were unsure of when this 'machine' would be fixed. Unacceptable. Over my dead body would I now put my skin in their hands. I would encourage anyone to go elsewhere for any kind of procedure as matters of your skin etc are much too important to be put into the hands of incompetent people and an unprofessional business. I read plenty of bad reviews about this clinic but still went forward with booking consultations and appointments to have a birthmark removed from my lip, something that has caused me problems for many years, but I tried to hope for the best and thought 'everywhere has some bad reviews' but seriously. This place is BAD!!!!! I did not feel reassured about anything or comfortable in fact I'm glad this happened because I cant imagine how competent they would be in solving my problem. I have been so anxious about this procedure, just wanting to have it over with and every time it gets cancelled last minute, what sort of joke is this? If I am paying for a service I expect to be able to at least choose the date? I don't know where they get off charging so much for such s*hitty service. You can't even call the individual clinics directly!!!!! You have to go through 'head office' who seem just as incompetent as the rest.

Very professional yet friendly. I was quite nervous as am very body conscious but was made to feel totally at ease by all staff at sk:n bluewater... can't comment on the results of the actual treatment yet, as these won't be seen for some months... but cannot fault the service.

Have had 2 treatments so far to treat acne damage, treatments themselves went well however I wasn't advised on after care or anything, had to google it myself. Booking appointments has proved difficult, I was informed that I would receive a call back within the next week or so after my second treatment to book the next one however 6 weeks later I still hadn't received a phone call, after finally managing to get hold of the clinic I was informed that they were fully booked for the next few weeks. A week after my next appointment was due I spoke to the call centre and cancelled, they were unable to get through to the clinic themselves but assured me they would send an email confirming to the clinic the cancellation. However on the afternoon of the appointment I received a phone call to say that I had an appointment scheduled for 1pm. They had clearly not bothered to check their emails! I am extremely disappointed with the organisation level of this clinic, lack of information and communication. I will be searching for another clinic to go to for my next few appointments.
Efficient, professional and friendly.

review_title: Very quick and efficient however double ?�?
review_body: Very quick and efficient however double check quotes they give and how much you actually pay. I ended up paying more on the day after the consultant told me how much it would be in my consultation. Didn't realise until I had got home and went through my receipts.

I had never had a skin 'treatment before, I'd  only been to "spa" type places.  Sk:n is quite different. It was certainly relaxed and friendly, but over and above that was a distinct sense of professionalism, care, and safety about the treatment I was undergoing. Even checking I am the patient named on the forms was carried out with me. As a registered nurse and midwife that was an early sign of accountability and  responsibility about the work Sk:n do. Some of the  treatments are with potentially harmful chemicals  and the right treatment for the right patient Is very  important as well as close patient checks during the treatment. This all happened.  Very reassuring. Will I have more treatments in the future? Absolutely and will recommend Sk:n to other people with skin problems .
Really made me feel relaxed

review_title: Knowledgeable, informative and would absolutely recommend
review_body: Having never visited a skin clinic before, I was very impressed from the moment I completed the enquiry form to the actual treatment itself. Every staff member I spoke with was friendly and helpful. The consultant was extremely knowledgeable about hydrafacial procedures and recommended a treatment right for me. On the day itself, she explained each step of the treatment, what she was doing and why. I found it all very informative and my skin felt wonderful afterwards. The consultant was very helpful in recommending products, but not pushy into purchasing them. I live overseas at present and she recommended products that I would be able to purchase overseas. I would recommend the Leicester SKN Clinic and the hydrafacial treatment, I shall 100% visit again.

So far so good. Got what I wanted, fast access to consultant dermatologist advice and the latest available treatments. Would have sadly taken years of banging my head against a wall to get referred via the NHS. Can't give full stars yet as only received first phase of treatment and results can only be accessed long term but early signs are promising. Staff have been brilliant. No complaints x

review_title: All of the staff at the clinic were ?�?
review_body: All of the staff at the clinic were welcoming and friendly. The place was clear and not at all intimidating for someone who was a bit nervous! The doctor took his time explaining the treatment during the consultation, and talked me through the various options. At no point did I feel pressured to progress with the treatment. Once I had decided the doctor communicated clearly throughout each stage of the treatment and made me feel very comfortable.

review_title: Very welcoming and felt at ease
review_body: Very welcoming and felt at ease. Consultation was good and i was taken through all of the options.

I went for what I thought would just be a consultation about getting some moles removed. I saw the consultant surgeon, who works part time for SK:N but is also an NHS Paediatric burn plastic surgeon. He talked me through the procedure, the various options and potential side effects. He also quoted me a rough price. I went back and spoke to the Clinic Manager who actually offered me a very discounted price in comparison to what I was expecting, and I ended up booking to have the operation completed a matter of hours later. The clinic was running a tad late when I went back for my appointment and the Clinic Manager gave me a complimentary gift back filled with SK:N products. The procedure was very quick and the surgeon was great. I currently still have plasters over the stitches and am waiting to hear back from the histology, I'm excited to see the final results in weeks to come

She was very professional and clearly has lots of experience with laser hair removal treatments. All the staff are very welcoming. I cannot recommend the Skn clinic Chester enough !

review_title: Had a positive experience at the ?�?
review_body: Had a positive experience at the Leicester clinic. From the initial consultation you get a full assessment of your skin with various treatment options. I suffer from slight redness and acne with some scarring and appreciate there is no quick fix to any of these problems. However since starting using the recommended products I have noticed my skin is looking better. I however was disappointed by the hydrafacial, I appreciate my skin probably needed it but I can't say my is glowing or in anyway more hydrated as a result. Thankfully I didn't sign up for the 6 courses as in my opinion this would not have been money well spent.

review_title: The whole experience from start to end ?�?
review_body: The whole experience from start to end was very enjoyable. I was made to feel at ease and all questions I had were answerwd. I was then talked through my next appointment and the aftercare regime again to make sure I knew what I was doing.

The girls are great in the clinic are really help you feel at ease about your treatment. They talk you through everything to ensure you have no worries. The treatment was very quick and efficient albeit a little uncomfortable. My only disappointment is that you get no aftercare information or any gels/lotions to take home. The treatment is very expensive and this would be a nice little additive to it all.

Staff were extremely friendly and informative. They explained the treatment they felt would suit me best and why, along with the correct products for my skin. I would definitely recommend SK:N to friends and family.

My skin is now clear however I have been left with acne scares, which I am looking to get removed from skin. Sindy is always very patient and professional and both my teenage son and daughter have benefitted from learning good skin care regimes and varying treatments with Sindy. review_title: Rude staff and happy to waste your time
review_body: Firstly they made me wait 15 minutes past my appointment time (I know this is not much but they were not treating anyone else and did not even give me a polite "sorry to keep you waiting"). Then due to the fact that I had been in the sun 3 months ago (just after my last treatment) they wanted to waste my time with a test patch. I told and showed them that there was no tan line and no risk, I would even be happy to sign liability for me the idiot client but they basically said that I needed to lie in order to get treatment. I have been receiving laser treatments for 10 years, I know my skin! I get paid per hour and losing several for their narrow mindedness is not worth it.
great, clean place. staff know their stuff!

I am needlephobic and they really made me feel at ease. I had a nose operation and was really anxious and scared before hand but that soon went away with the help of the surgeon and nurse. Bandaged up at the moment but the aftercare advise was brilliant and anytime you are worried or have a question they are there to answer. Thanks guys x
Great service with friendly professional staff
I felt I was in very capable hands and that put me at ease. Selina is amazing.
Excellent service friendly staff
Staff are accommodating and friendly. They reassured my concerns and remained professional throughout

I went to Sk:n due to thread veins on my face cause by sun damage. I received excellent advice and I decided to go ahead and have the laser treatment. They gave me a series of "test" patches in one session and then I went ahead and had my first treatment. I was really nervous but the session was nothing to worry about in the end. I have more sessions to go but even know I can notice a difference.
Great experience. Very pleased
Staff members are very professional and always have a smile on their faces. Treatment were explained in great detail which allowed me to feel secure and calm through each procedure.
My first trip here after visiting another practitioner. I felt at ease instantly and received great service. Thank you
The team at skin were very professional throughout my experience.

review_title: Disappointing, prepare for a hard sell
review_body: I guess I should have known. Sk:n is a private company selling their own treatments, all be it to help people with certain conditions. But since the reviews are so good I thought I'd pay �25 and give it a go, hoping to get more than just the hard sell.
Staff were really friendly and helpful. The process was really easy, along with a chat on how the process works.
I didn't feel pressured to buy treatment, once I sense that usually makes me pull out. They were able to provide offer which made it more appealing to go ahead with treatment.
The staff at Sk:n go above and beyond to help where they can. Friendly and approachable.
Very happy with the service provided.
Excellent service not painful at al would highly recommend
I was taken on time and put at ease straight away; good experience and I knew what was going on throughout my treatment.

The most traumatising experience ever, if I could give 0 stars i would, although they have previously lost my medical records at Victoria street clinic, I continued to attend the clinic assuming that it was a one off mistake. Today I realised that they are absolutely unprofessional and incompetent, Skin Holborn staff denied me treatment and saw it fit that i was turned away after a 2 weeks wait for an appointment, which i had secured with a �25 pound payment, this is usually taken not to waste their time if I don't turn up but my time was wasted. The team of staff all seemed to stick together and they all gathered around which was very intimidating. I called the call centre and cancelled any future appointments and will never be attending skin clinic and will make sure everyone I know knows about this, I have a full voice recording of the incident and will happily be sharing it for consolation.They are happy to take your money and carry treatments but if anything goes wrong they are very unprofessional in handling situations and there's no one senior that you can turn around and speak to. Its not worth it, I would rather go somewhere were i can be treated fairly regardless of circumstances.

From the moment I walked through the door it was a lovely relaxed enivornment and the receptionist was lovely and welcoming, Sarah who saw me was brilliant and she helped me understand why my skin was like it was and gave me a variety of different products to replace my daily routine. I'm also having a treatment done by her every 2 weeks and I had my first one yesterday & I can already see the results! The prices are very reasonable for the treatments and products. I'm so happy I chose skin and I would highly recommend them to anyone. I've got a feeling it's going to be the best money/decision I've made. I'm feeling more confident & happy!!
The stuff are quite friendly and happy to answers any questions.
Friendly, knowledgeable and caring professional staff. It's a really nice experience that I'll become a regular customer.
Knowledgeable and informative staff who really care about your end results. Thank you Sk:n!
I went to Sk:n for a consultation as I had a spider vein on my nose. The nurse that dealt with me Angela was extremely helpful and made me feel at ease throughout the process.
Very clean, young professional staff. Very efficient with treatment and aftercare advice.
The team were really well informed and made me feel very at ease. Highly recommend.
Friendly professional staff from the receptionist and the doctor who saw me.
Very friendly and professional service. Would highly recommend.
So pleased with the results , made such a difference to me
Staff great and very friendly. However, they always run late for the appointments.
Very attentive staff. Checked up on me very often during the treatment to ensure everything was okay.

I was slightly apprehensive about the laser hair treatment, especially with regards to the location I wanted it removed. However, the staff at my local branch are so friendly and put you at ease straight away. I would absolutely recommend this to anyone thinking of getting it done.
I felt completely at ease both in my pre treatment discussion and patch teat and then on to my initial booking.
I was quite nervous about my laser appointment but the staff were fantastic and put me at ease. Very excited to start seeing results!

review_title: Don't book because of NHS name.
review_body: had laser treatment in Harley Street London,

All staff are kind, friendly and can't do enough for you. Made to feel at ease as soon as you arrive. Procedures are explained in depth and it is obvious that they are very knowledgeable. Yes the treatment hurts but they help you through it. I see Sam and she is very calming and so friendly, I feel completely relaxed with her and would trust her for any treatment. Would recommend the Leeds clinic to anyone.

Pleasant staff when I nipped in to make an appointment. Calm, smiling and efficient. You pay �50 when making the appointment ("no shows" are a problem i'm told), deducted from your final bill or refunded. They were able to fit me in the next day. During the consultation, I explained my issue and what I expected out of the treatment. The process, treatment, and outcome I could realistically expect was clearly explained and discussed. We agreed to proceed, but not in a pressurised way.
All the staff are very welcoming and make you feel at ease.
Everything is explained very clearly. Very efficient and friendly. Felt very comfortable.

review_title: Call centre errors, poor experience and misleading pricing
review_body: Call Centre. Booked an appointment via the call centre a week ago and arranged to see a doctor at the London Holborn clinic on Friday. Arrived for my appointment on Friday and discussed my needs with the Doctor, only to be told that she didn't provide the service that I needed and would have to rebook.  Rebooked there and then for an appointment with the doctor at London Wall.
Everyone is really caring, careful and professional! I would recommend especially to someone who has never done laser hair removal like me. :)
As the title states

review_title: Not giving importance to the details
review_body: Although the girls are really nice, the one that did the laser to me didn't pay attention to the details. the result is that she left some hair on my face.

I found SK:N to be an excellent company to deal with. Medical and management staff were very professional and helpful. They are very competitively priced and their friendly and welcoming approach to clients like me was much appreciated.
My experience of skin on Harley St was brilliant. The nurse was extremely professional and made me feel comfortable throughout the consultation and treatment. I would definitely recommend!

I had my consultation for getting my moles removed on the 26th of Jan and my first impression was that the place was really nice and they made me feel comfortable. I was briefed on what moles had to be shaved, what moles would have to be cut out and what I should expect them to look like after. We then decided on what I wanted to have done and I was informed that it would take about an hour to do. So I booked to have this done (the earliest they could get me in was the 1st of March).

I visited the skin clinic for acne scaring treatment. I had the first session of mandelic peel which went quiet well. it is hard to judge the effectiveness of the treatment as yet as I only had one session. the practitioner gave me a set of skin care products from dermaquest to treat any acne eruptions during the treatment which are of good so far. However, the overall cost is very expensive and you have to discuss with the doctor how much is your budget  before receiving any treatment.
Definitely recommended

I was admittedly a little nervous when I came in to start my lazer hair removal surgery. However, all of the staff immediately made me feel at ease. They are all very easy to talk to and are very professional. Even though the treatment was uncomfortable both Jordan and Jade were brilliant as they kept talking to me and made me feel relaxed!

review_title: Excellent first time visit ... staff were welcoming and informative
review_body: My experience of the SKN in bull street was excellent.

I was really impressed with Sk:n in Epsom. The staff were very helpful in all my dealings with them and the doctor who carried out my treatment was lovely. She put me at ease immediately with her friendly but professional manner.
Such a calm, friendly and professional experience. I have already recommended it to my sister.

On Saturday I had quite a bit of work done.  Botox to forehead , fillers to temples, tear troughs, cheekbones and the lips.  I was put at ease from the moment I arrived and I have to say felt no pain through out the treatment, apart from a little discomfort at times. Will definitely be booking in the future, for my marionette lines to be done.
Would 100% recommend
I had my first skin needling treatment at Chiswick Clinic. I must highlight the professionalism and sympathy from the Lead Nurse Julie who looked after me.
The service was quick and my therapist was kind and efficient
Couldn't be happier with the service I received from Katrina! She clearly loves her job and wants to do the absolute best for her patients. Would recommend to anybody I know

They are very welcoming and professional at the Bluewater branch. I felt well informed and the lady that carried out my laser hair removal was lovely, she really put me at ease and made the whole experience as painless as possible.
Mariam was great, the not only explained everything into detail but was really focused on making the whole process as easy as it could be. Would love to continue all the treatment with her.

The staff at SK:N are very proffessional and very friendly. They go to great lengths to make sure you feel comfortable and safe during your appointments. I was very anxious when i first walked in but they have completed allieviated all the worries i had. I 100% recommend SK:N to anyone who is looking for a proffessional level of treatment.
Knowledgeable, kind, polite. They don't make you feel conscious or embarrassed about why you are there. They understand and do as much as possible to resolve your issue/condition
I received extremely professional and impartial advice.
Lovely staff and well-appointed equipment.  I would highly recommend visiting Sk:n Epsom.

review_title: Wish you could sample the products before you buy
review_body: Lovely treatment/ service but had a reaction with the products I purchased which aren't cheap. Just wish you could trial the products before you buy

review_title: Good treatment - a bit clinical approach not relaxing
review_body: I was happily surprised because I had read a lot of bad reviews but everybody in the staff has been very nice and smiling with me. The treatment left my skin fresh and tighter but I am not an expert in facials so I dont know if the high price is worth it compare to normal facials. I just regret the strong lights in the rooms it is just not as relaxing as doing it in a spa and for this price I want the full experience which is also feeling pampered and relaxed.

All the professionals there are just lovely. Information is good. Facilities are clean and tidy. I was put at ease when making my decision (not a sale speech), and they followed up politely when I was slow to respond. The hair removal is ridiculously painful... But that is just the sacrifice necessary! Thank you SK:N.
The service I received was professional, friendly and made me feel welcome abd at ease during the procedure. Left really happy and sure will be coming back.
My first time with Skin Clinic, made me feel relaxed and comfortable. Carried out my appointment efficiently with fantastic results!
Professional staff. Made me at ease with my procedure

Went to skn for laser hair removal to my face. I saw Jade and she was very knowledgeable and approachable. She has a lovely manner and spent time with me deciding what was best for my particular skin. It gave me the reassurance I needed to go ahead with a course of treatment. I have had the first session now and I'm very pleased with the initial results. I would definitely recommend jade for advice if you are considering this treatment
great service, lovely people, decent results. already booked further treatments.
Friendly Staff. Highly recommended and very professional

review_title: I would recommend this clinic to anyone
review_body: I had my first laser treatment out of eight yesterday and staff were professional and helpful

I would reccommend Sk:n to anyon,  I was very nervous on my 1st treatment my nurse Suzanne put me at ease answered all my questions I had gave me brilliant advice talked me through every step of my treatment I was 1 very happy client x

review_title: Very friendly staff and no complications
review_body: Staff very friendly, mole removal surgery was explained well, very simple and quite quick. No complaints.

I paid �1200 for micro- needling for acne scars and enlarged pores. I had five sessions and can honestly say that the treatment literally made no difference to my scars. All that money for a treatment that didn't work! I'm very very dissapointed and would not recommend The Skin clinic or Miro-Needling as my experience has left me very angry and skint!! ?�ɍ?�ɍ

I had a facial mole removed at the Epsom clinic and honestly cannot fault the care I received - all of the staff were friendly and kind and the quality of the stitching is excellent. I am very glad I chose this place and did not go elsewhere :) The consultant dermatologist didn't even charge us for his time once he realised he couldn't help and that we would need to see the surgeon instead. The surgeon was lovely, very skilled and interesting to talk to during the operation too, and all of the other staff I encountered (including a nurse and several receptionists) were very kind and helpful. I should say that I have no experience with other private dermatology clinics but I really cannot fault the care I received and am very glad I did not go elsewhere!

review_title: Nice friendly staff but Acne treatment did not work for me.
review_body: Maybe I have unique skin? I don't know. But I was recommended dermaquest dermaclear and a course of peels. This caused a big blemish breakout which did not improve after 6 weeks of treatment. I went back to my oxy10 (benzoyl peroxide) and acne completely under control again within a week or 2. I did ask repeatedly if they had anything else to offer but only a deeper peel which I chose against. To be honest I thought they might have offered a consultation with the dermatologist perhaps but I guess there are limited options for acne treatment. This has reaffirmed how great Oxy10 is! At this clinic they were very negative about it: why?? It really works for me. There is a great moisturiser mixed in with the BP which combats the drying. The BP kills acne bacteria. Only downside: it bleaches your sheets! I now wash it off before bedtime and use Tea tree oil at night. Due to some stupid EU law, Oxy10 is unavailable in the UK so you have to order it from Malaysia via eBay. To be fair I will still occasionally use dermaquest :  it is good for closing pores on my nose for some reason. I hope this review is constructive and helpful.

Fantastic clinic.. would highly recommend to anyone.. The staff were so friendly and helpful. They made me feel welcome and comfortable from the moment I walked into the clinic and all through my treatment.. I'm looking forward to my next treatment already.. If I could give more than 5 stars I would :)
Good friendly service
Overall good experience, nice staff/Doctor, professional procedure and a little pricy. Would go back if decided to do another treatment/procedure
Great service for a newbee,all staff were  very friendly no one was pushy. The surgeon was great very professional and i love the results!

review_title: Staff are really helpful and friendly
review_body: Staff were really helpful and friendly
Staff were all lovely and friendly and very professional
Excellent staff, always happy to help
I was given a personalised treatment and all of my concerns were addressed. Great service
The therapist was professional and very reassuring. I was a little apprehensive after reading the side effects. But once she spoke to me i felt very comfortable with the procedure.

Went in for first laser session, seen promptly at a time that suited me after work, pleasant staff. Procedure was quicker than I thought too. Bought after care product separately as expensive in store. Overall very happy! Would recommend to anyone looking for laser hair removal.
I recently had a consultation and have started treatment with the team in Victoria. Very friendly staff and relaxing atmosphere.

The staff are friendly and welcoming and put you at easy when discussing your treatment. They are very professional and always check that you have understood and are ok with everything. Couldn't wish for better service.
Just undergone one treatment.  The staff is really friendly.  So far so good.
Had birthmark on neck removed at constant was friendly, reassuring and did a great job.
Everybody at the clinic was kind and efficient. They cared for me at all times, making sure that I understood the procedure and supporting me through out.

The staff at your Chemlfords branch are the most welcome. They help you relax and understand what kind of treatment is best for you. The product are equally great. Just 2days after my first peel, I have seen a bit of fresher surface on my face.

I was very impressed with the depth of the consultation offered, and the friendly and welcoming attitude I received from every member of staff I interacted with - completely settled any reservations I had for going forward with the treatment. I felt very informed with every stage of the treatment process, both the positive and negative aspects, and so felt very confident throughout that I could raise any qualms/issues and they would be happy to answer.
Found the clinic online, was able to book a convenient appointment for the following day.  Friendly reception.

review_title: Sarah at Mansfield road; beyond service!
review_body: Had a fantastic experience yesterday from sarah and the team at Mansfield road during my milia removal and laser patch test. The team are so knowledgeable, helpful and make you feel at ease. You never feel rushed and sarah is the ultimate professional with such a personal touch. Thank you for looking after me and all your amazing advice!
Excellent customer service.  Really friendly.  Made me feel really comfortable.  Really good products aswell.  Recommend to anyone suffering from acne.
Extremely good treatment and I would thoroughly recommend using the clinic.
Jordan is an excellent practitioner. Great care taken and everything explained.

I went in to the Skin clinic for my consultation. All the staff were fantastic and the calm atmosphere calmed any anxiety I had. The doctor was great and she actually ended up doing the surgery there and then. Great experience

I've had a consultation and one laser session so far at the branch in Guildford but so far so good! (Seven more to go) The team are super friendly and I have asked them lots of silly questions which they don't mind answering at all. The laser also didn't hurt for me which was a nice surprise as I was expecting to feel it more. I would recommend the treatment and the clinic!
no reservations, I would recommend this company to anyone
Quite painful for a split second but definitely worth it.

Skn Bull street Birmingham are amazing! Was so nervous but all worries were put to rest as soon as you walk through the door! The therapists are so friendly and proffessional! Would never ever go anywhere else! I am 2 treatments in and the results are amazing! So happy i chose this place and i would highly recommend!!!!
Made me feel very relaxed, looking forward to going back

Just had my first laser hair removal treatment!  Was a little anxious but shouldn't have worried as it was far less painful than I thought.  I was made to feel relaxed and it actually took less time than anticipated. Looking forward to gain nice smooth legs!
I had my first session following my psych test and can't fault the service. Both the reception staff and my therapist were very helpful and efficient and they made me feel very comfortable.
I had an initial consultation on the Wednesday and by Sunday that week, I had had the surgery. Both Doctor and Nurse, lovely people- genuinely caring about doing a good job.

review_title: extremely efficient and friendly service in Holborn
review_body: extremely efficient and friendly service

review_title: Service levels have dropped. Prices have gone up
review_body: Iv been with the skin bull street clinic for over 5 years and over the years the service has dropped but especially over the last year and a half. Maybe due to new management and pricing structures.
the receptionists are very welcoming.  Doctors very professional and understand your need.  Options discussed with the patient on what is best.
Staff have great knowledge and make you feel comfortable during procedures
Great service!

review_title: Bad service at London Wall clinic
review_body: I was booked in for my first appointment and they had booked me with 2 different people for 2 areas of laser hair removal, but hadn't told me this to be the case. They left me waiting after the first treatment, by this point I had to get back to work. I went upstairs and the girl that was supposed to be doing the second treatment was just sat at the computer on the desk with no sense of urgency at all. I've had to rebook the appointment. I also received no after care advice and have had to google that instead. Really would expect a bit more when paying �2000.
I had a great experience having laser hair removal yesterday for the first time yes a little painful but the lady who did it was reassuring and made me feel relaxed!!! Thanks !
Knowledgeable and friendly staff, good service provided.

Everyone I have spoken to at Skn has been knowledgable, friendly and made me feel at ease. I have just had my first appointment with Katrina, who was great, and I'm looking forward to seeing the results.
All the staff were polite and helpful. My technician made me feel at ease, which made the whole process so much more relaxing.
The clinic was very clean and presented well. The doctor was AMAZING and helped me solve my skin concern whilst offereing me advice for others, I would recommend.

I have wanted to get rid of a number of 'sun related' blemishes on my face and shoulders for a long time: brown discolouration, skin flaps and keratisis. I've waited until I was sure that I was going to be treated by people who KNOW what they are doing! I wanted to be SURE that I wouldn't end up actually looking worse that I started with. I was referred to this clinic by a specialist skin doctor, who I badgered until she relented and advised me to see this company.
I found the treatment and staff to be excellent, thank you.
No hard sell just professional advice and service. The process is relatively pain free and done in a clean environment with friendly staff.

review_title: Quick, easy and no time wasting.
review_body: Had a couple of skin tags removed. It was quick easy and no time was wasted hanging around. Very professional. Thank you.
Great customer care, I felt very well looked after.
Staff are beyond friendly, they make you feel right at home. Very professional. It's a very well kept clinic. Would recommend 100%

A professional, caring, informed experience from the moment I walked into the Clinic, where I was greeted by the receptionists, to the completion of my treatment.  The Doctor explained the procedure in detail and at no time did I feel any pain or discomfort. The aftercare required was also explained to me and clearly written aftercare instructions given to me before I left the Clinic. I would not hesitate in recommending the Clinic to anyone requiring treatment.
Went for a mole shave. Advise was clear and straightforward. Operation was fast, expertly carried out and affordable. Highly recommended.

I had an appointment booked in to speak to a doctor regarding two small legions on the skin; the doctor was also the head doctor of the clinic and was so helpful and accommodating. He had asked when I was thinking of removal and I commented that I would like this completed as soon as possible. The laser machine happened to be at the clinic on this day and patients at the clinic I attended had been waiting for this machine to be available for several weeks; I was able to have the legions removed straight away and the whole process was seamless and pain-free. Highly recommended and such a friendly team!
I went for my first treatment yesterday. The girls were very helpful, answered all my questions. Treatment was done in a professional manner. Would highly recommend sk:n to anyone
Very comfortable,effective and friendly good results.

I was put at ease straight away by the friendly professionalism of the laser technician. She couldn't do enough for me. She explained everything and when the going got tough and I had to stop for breathers she totally understood and reassured me throughout the procedure.  Already booked my next session.

Very comfortable though procedure seemed painful as it was my first time.staff is really friendly which adds on to the comfort.very professional n theres no waste of time.ive already recommended 2 friends..

Not overly impressed with the person I spoke to at the central call centre, but the staff at the Newcastle branch were excellent - very friendly, very knowledgeable, no hard sell and professional treatment.

I would not recommend skin clinic at all. I entered into the clinic feeling very upset and embarrassed on how my skin looked so decided to try treatments and products that were recommended to me at skin - these were not cheap. After each treatment I expressed my concern but was told I should see improvements after my course had ended. I did not see any improvement what so ever infact it had caused my skin to become worse. My skin was very inflamed and sore. Because of this I logged a complaint on the 28/09/16 and I am yet to hear back from the clinic to refund me my money. I am a reasonable person and I understand everybody's skin is different so results may vary however it is completely unacceptable to make my skin worse. I followed the nurses instructions regarding after care and use of their products religiously. I would have expected my skin to remain the same or improve - not worsen. I trusted the nurses at this clinic which was a very bad idea. Skin caused my confidence to plummet even more than when I first went into the clinic!! Lastly the whole complaints process has been awful. I feel like I have been passed to pillar to post and every time I'm told I will get a response I am thobbed off with another excuse. I would not recommend skin clinic. Avoid.
Fabulous and friendly service from Carla at SK:N.

Excellent clinic - the staff are very professional and helpful. The actual clinic is a lovely atmosphere and so calming and relaxing. My consultant was extremely knowledgeable, helpful and friendly. I would definitely recommend the Sk:n clinics!

I am 66 years old and my face has become hairy. My daughter advised me to go to Skin Clinic because she was satisfied. But I did not know the laser and what it involved. After hesitating a moment I finally made an appointment. I appreciated all the explanations. The test went well. And I had my first treatment session yesterday. Everything went much better than I imagined. Some redness but I am happy I apply the products provided by the clinic and watches to comply with the recommendations that have been made to me. I explained to my son that I even aged to remain correct I said if imagine that I am sick and that you come to see me and that you see me with a mustache because I would not have the time to take off my hair on my face Do not even dare to kiss me and I would be ashamed And then it does me good morally

review_title: The team is very friendly helpful
review_body: The team is very friendly helpful

Secondly, the parcel ordered was complety different to online order. Absolutely awful experience and customer service.

Excellent and professional

Great service

With regard to laser removal process,,on first consultation very good friendly and professional. So far after one schedule process the 2 areasa have still require additional work to remove the moles successfully.it was explained that it may require further work. review_title: Quick and easy to find my products  ?�?

I do still suffer the odd breakout but these products have really helped me achieve clearer skin. sk:n also have good offers on skincare every so often which helps greatly.
I have no problem with the service or treatment
Skin is a very friendly, hygienic and professionally run establishment which I go back to time and time again.
Quick dispatch. Great service. Love the products.
quick, easy and fast delivery.
I'm very happy with the anti-aging moisturiser I purchased. It's the right consistency - not too thick not too thin, feels great on the skin, doesn't leave skin greasy and smells great.

I had a course of salicilic acid face peels and the results were amazing. After suffering with acne for a number of years I was thrilled with the outcome. I have since had a baby and my face has had a few flare ups but I am thinking of having some more face peels to help.

I went to skin hoping for clear skin which I was promised. After each treatment my skin got worse and I was told my skin would improve but it was the worst it had ever been. My face looked like it had chicken pox and it affected my confidence so much.  Wasted over �300 and I regret it so much.
Awesome products. Never purchased anything from normal store after buying products from Sk: n. Just love it and nothing can be compared with their hydrating mositurizers.

The staff were very welcoming and make you feel comfortable. They always give me great advice on the prouducts and treatment best for my skin. They go through what they are doing throughout the treatment and always make sure I'm happy with the results.
Not bad services and good products
The products are always good for my blemish prone skin.
Service is excellent. Everything is explained clearly and staff are really welcoming.
Friendly staff who make you feel comfortable when having treatments.
Professional and knowledgeable staff who always provide  excellent service and great after care ! I wouldn't go anywhere else,
such friendly staff. made me feel so welcome and comfortable.

After having a few consultations for laser hair removal i came to skin and instantly knew this was the company i wanted to use the ladies where so lovely and reassuring, during treatment i was nervous but was made to feel assured by the friendly staff, would highly recommend this company if you are looking for any treatment.5 stars amazing :)
I am one treatment in to laser treatment and it seems good so far

I went and was told by the first girl who did consultation because my 2 thread veins were so small the initial patch test would be enough to get rid of them but she couldn't do patch test as I have rosacea so it would need to be the consultant. When I get to appointment I'm told she has got it wrong and it was a treat
Absolutely amazing experience, jenny in Cheltenham was thorough and knowledgeable
Good quality products and friendly service. Met Helen for my consultation who was professional and kind. Answered all my queries and recommendations for treatment were appropriate
The service I received was excellent, but the reception staff were not so sure about what was happening.

I started having laser treatment at this clinic at the beginning of this year. Since then there have been a number of problems. In the first instance, you never get the same nurse to undertake your treatment(which doesn't provide you with much confidence).

Earlier this week I had lip fillers at the Northampton clinic. Both the receptionist and doctor that I had for my consultation/treatment were lovely and very helpful. However the treatment itself didn't give the result I had wanted. My lips are very thin (I'm also very self conscious of them) and the doctor recommended that I only have half of a syringe. He was very careful in making sure that they were even and looked as natural as possible. When I was in the clinic I was happy with the result. However since the swelling has gone down I can't tell any difference, not even my boyfriend noticed that I've had them done. I had to pay for a full syringe which is �285 and I am disappointed that for that amount of money there's no difference. I wish I had insisted that the full syringe (which I paid for) was used as that hopefully would have given a difference that is noticeable to me. I was also surprised that there wasn't any follow up appointment and when I asked about aftercare the doctor had to ring the receptionist because he didn't know the answer. He was a lovely person however didn't seem 100% on the process which could be why no difference has really been made.

The staff at the clinic were really friendly and helpful.  This was the first course of my laser treatment and I was a bit nervous to be honest, but I needn't have been as the consultant treating me was very good.  She explained everything and made sure I was not in any discomfort.
Fantastic treatment and advice. I will be booking again.
I m very satisfied with my treatment .

Was a little nervous about venturing into laser but Ati at Fulham sk:n made me feel so comfortable and welcome and talked me through every step tailoring it around not only my skin type but explaining how to work it best in line with my lifestyle.  Am so happy with the experience of the treatment and the results.  Thank you!
Mole removal - quick and relatively painless. Very professional surgeon.

review_title: Friendly, competent, efficient staff and service
review_body: I arrived early but wasn't kept waiting. Greeted warmly by staff. Felt comfortable and relaxed. Procedure dealt with efficiently but with care.

Having previously used Mapperley Park Clinic pre becoming skin, I tried to book there for Botox. Unfortunately I couldn't see the person I'd chosen there so booked for the Loughborough Rd Clinic at Nottingham on 29/09/16.
I would highly recommend Sk:n, the customer service has been great. Everything was explained to me and treatment executed in professional manner. Thank you
Brilliant. Super fast, super reassuring. Super all round. And my skin looks fantastic!
Staff were great, results straight away, but hurt more than expected in some areas due to my hair density.
Dont believe all the negative feedback you read online. Quick, painless and fast results.

review_title: High standards, better explanation of the treatments availble would make me spend more
review_body: I am highly impressed with the team @ Sk:in Leamington. The premises are immaculate, the team are pleasant, welcoming and professional. From enquiry through to treatment I felt confident I was in good hands. My only feedback for improvement would be the explanation of the treatment options available. I felt as though decisions were made for me and had I know more about the other (more expensive) options open to me I may have chose differently but nevertheless I am very happy with the treatment I did receive.

Had my first session of laser hair removal and was amazed how quick it was. All the staff at Sk:n are so welcoming and professional, and make you feel relaxed even when intermite areas are being treated.
It was a great experience.
My first time having laser hair removal. The process was handled well and in a relaxed environment.

To see a difference after one treatment is amazing. The condition has affected my life in so many ways, so when this treatment, fingers crossed, looks like its working it feels amazing.  The staff are lovely and attentive, they reassure and are very professional.
Such lovely staff with a quick & easy service. They really try their hardest to make everything work for you, satisfaction and cost wise. 100% where I would recommend for any skin treatment :)
Nurse and treatment very good
So impressed with my laser hair removal therapist and hospitality of the reception.
All the staff have always been extremely helpful, relaxed and professional.

Holborn center: first appointment for laser removal, very professional and good client service. She checked with me several times how I was feeling during the procedure and explained what she was going to do ahead.

They were really patient when I arrived two minutes late (traffic!), they explained everything really clearly about my procedure, the procedure itself wasn't bad and the practitioner let me take breaks when it got a bit painful! Overall, friendly and professional.

review_title: Made me feel better about myself in less than an hour
review_body: Although appointment was running late due to no fault of anyone at the clinic, was contacted asap to be informed of the delay.  Very happy with the results.  Doctor and staff very friendly and professional.  I felt in very safe hands and when you are having work done on your face, it is especially important to have confidence in those carrying out the procedures.  Excellent appointment and I will be returning for further treatments.
Easy to make appointment treatment at same visit.  Very professional manner good advice given.  Made to feel important by all the staff.
Was my first appointment at Skin. amazing staff, good advice and treatment from the clinician.
The staff at SK:N Southampton are absolutely amazing. Non judgemental, happy and helpful. Everything you could wish for when dealing with personal and embarrassing problems.

review_title: Good face to face experience however not all starter pack items available.
review_body: Good face to face experience however not all starter pack items available.

I had heard about Skin clinic alot. Considering the money i paid for laser hair removal, i was not happy with the results. I was told that not all the hair are supposed to fall out at the first session; but i had done this laser treatment before and am aware that it should not ve like that.
I recieved excellent service from Skin. I felt reassured by the fact that the doctor was highly trained. My treatment was expensive but I think I got value for money.

review_title: The team at Epsom are exceptional!!
review_body: The Skin team at Epsom are friendly, professional and put me at ease during my Core Laser Treatment by Dr Hussein. The nurses are lovely and Dr Hussein is one of the best in the country who has been contactable throughout this process and answers any questions I had. I would defiantly recommend the Epsom Skin Clinic.

From the moment I contacted the Sk:n team through to the consultation and proceadure everything was professionally dealt with but in a friendly and calm manner which really put me at ease, A great experience I would highly recommend

I visited for a consultation a month ago and found the whole practice professional and friendly.  The consultant was great, understood what I wanted and recommended a course of treatments completely in line with why I went.   When I changed medication a quick call was all I needed, and when I turned up to my appointment they had reviewed everything with a doctor - excellent and reassuring service that filled me with even more confidence.  I had my first treatment yesterday and was dealt with the care and attention I would expect which made it a really easy experience.
Thank you Dr Adam Haworth for a very simple and quick solution to my problem! Brilliant!

Such a daunting experience however my first laser hair removal was made an easier process by the professional, friendly and approachable staff at skin Glasgow. Special thanks to Laura who performed my hair removal.
Carmen was fantastic. This was my first experience with injectables and she eased me into it perfectly I highly recommend her!

Extremely professional from start to finish. Sk:n has had a 25 year partnership with the NHS and I was first referred by my GP 18 years ago for laser treatment for hyper pigmentation. I have have had two lots of further treatment since then, at my own expense, and it has been worth every penny to know I was in the hands of such experts. My treatment yesterday was efficiently and expertly carried out, by the doctor I chose, in a calm, supportive atmosphere.
Prfofessional clean and efficient

review_title: Excellent service - exactly what I expected!
review_body: Everything was easy from booking onwards. Lynn at Milton Keynes carried out my treatment. She was friendly, informative, and the treatment was quick, effective and  painless. Highly recommended!

review_title: Painful and hard, red swollen lump on upper lip after laser hair removal @ Sk:n Glasgow
review_body: This was treatment 5/8. After 4 effective treatments with minor discomfort and hardly any redness after the procedures, on this occasion, the staff member (Kirsty, I think) increased the strength of the laser without informing me. The first 5 laser zaps (as I call them), was on the right-hand-side of my upper lip and was extremely painful. The staff member stopped the machine of her own accord to readjust it for a few seconds. Again, I was not informed of what was happening. The rest of the procedure, although painful and brought tears, was bearable. My upper lip area was very red and was painful which did not happen in the previous sessions. The right hand side was especially red, painful, hard and swollen. Aloe Vera gel was applied twice. I mentioned the pain and found the staff quite dismissive, stating that it was more effective on a stronger setting and that redness was normal (not normal for me on previous sessions). I rushed home and sprayed with Avene thermal spray and applied cold water compresses on the lip area and more Sk:n  aloe vera gel. 5+hours later, I'm having difficulty sleeping, the right side is still sore, the redness has gone down but is discoloured compared to the rest of the lip, it is still hard and swollen. I am worried about long term damage and scared of returning for session 6. When the pain is more than the pain of getting my tattoo, and the consequences are this bad, there was something not right with the treatment in my opinion!

review_title: Easy to talk to friendly staff
review_body: My mom had always used this sk:n for her Botox so I had a lot of confidence in them already when I went in for my fillers. They put you at ease and are at hand with really good advice
Quick,nice place,friendly staff,would recommend .
Excellent, professional and clean. A+++
The experience could not be better.  Shanah is amazing. The right spirit. The right atttiude. Professional. This lovely lady should manage people one day!
Really friendly, reassuring staff
Currently seeing Tabitha at the Sk:n clinic in Esher, lovely lady and very professional. Would recommend her and the clinic.
The attendant was polite and informative. The treatment was quick and relatively painless.
The Staff here are excellent, I have total confidence in their ability to look after me.

I was put at ease straight away. The procedure was explained to me in depth in the consultation then the lady recapped in my first session. The questions I asked were fully answered and I felt confident in the compency of the lady carrying out the laser removal.

Can't really comment on the service as they wouldn't book me in for a consultation! They said I would have to pay in order to see the medical expert of the clinic when that's not what I wanted to do. I mentioned I was prone to getting impetigo in a very small area but was looking for treatment on a separate part of my body for rejuvenation purposes and they wouldn't see me - made to feel like some sort of disease ridden person. All I wanted to do was have a consultation and discuss my options, but apparently I wasn't able to. Telephone staff were really friendly and explained things well, but the system wasn't on par. Sorry!

The staff were very warm and friendly and explained everything about my appointment and what would happen in great detail. So far so good and am looking forward to seeing there results of my treatment!

review_title: Great service, professional, friendly and clean.
review_body: Made to feel very comfortable, talked through every stage. Very friendly and knowledgeable staff. Looking forward to my next appointment!
from the initial telephone inquiry to the first appointment the service and experience was excellent. as for results i will tell later as just started treatment. thank you sk:n

My consultant was knowledgable and able to provide good information about the process. At my first treatment I was made to feel very comfortable and adjustments were made to give me the best experience, e.g. Laser intensity was decreased when too painful and I was given short breaks between sections. Would definitely recommend the skin company.
Easy and straightforward procedure.
Happy with the treatment i received whilst having a mole lasered yesterday.

The ladies were very friendly and prodessional from start to finish and the service was amazing! They explained everything and made sure I was 100% happy before the procedure. Looking forward to returning again in 6 weeks, can't wait to see the results.
Had a great first treatment - efficient, professional and reassuring.
Wanted the consultation and treatment at same appointment and as soon as possible, the lady couldn't have been more helpful, finding me somewhere only two days later in Holborn.
Quick and painless.
Excellent service, the consultant was very knowledgeable and professional.

review_title: Very friendly and make you feel comfortable.
review_body: The staff at sk:n made me feel very comfortable. They provide detailed information regarding the treatment and quell any worries you have. They found the best price package for me and explained the details of the procedure very clearly and thoroughly.
All staff welcoming, not kept waiting, informed of what was to be done and having to change an appointment was no a problem.
Efficient and friendly.  Issue resolved very quickly

A lovely team who were really understanding.  Laser hair treatment to chin was pain free and fast. Technician was friendly and calming, so feeling very positive about further treatments on other areas. 40% off offer was great.

Perhaps not the best customer service as I was not listened to and my concerns were deemed as bot bad enough.  The real deal breaker was that the room was freezing and my feet almost fell off after laying there for 20 minutes without any blanket.
Explain everything very clearly; very professional

The girl doing my treatment is absolutely lovely, and I have been made to feel comfortable from the beginning.  Excited to see results from my treatment (so far I have had treatment one of eight so nothing yet!)
I felt no pressure only good advice . I will return
After my patch test the therapist never checked the skin that was tested for any side effects and purely relied on my feedback and decide to go ahead with the treatment.
Would highly recommend this treatment and the clinic

review_title: Can't fault the service I recieved
review_body: Staff, both on the phone and in the store, went out of their way to make me feel in control and empowered. Very impressive.
Great people great product.
The team did all they could to accommodate my needs. Excellent service by an excellent team.

review_title: Excellent service so helpful and friendly.
review_body: I have had a great experience so far with skin. They have been so helpful and informative to help me make my decision.
I have to admit I was very nervous to have my first laser hair removal treatment!

From the initial consultation to the first treatment, the service received has been fantastic. The staff have been helpful and have definitely made the experience less daunting. Sam, my practitioner was absolutely brilliant. She kept me well informed and dealt with any of my enquired/worries, ensuring that I was comfortable throughout. Would definitely recommend this service.

I came into the clinic very nervous and apprehensive but was instantly reassured by the professional and kind manner. There was no upselling of treatments or products which was one thing I was worried about as it would have made me question their ethics. Instead the plastic surgeon really seemed to care about his patients, he made absolute sure it was something I definitely wanted to go ahead with before proceeded. The mole excision took about 20 minutes in total, I felt no pain whatsoever, it's a weird sensation when they're sewing the stitches but like I said no pain whatsover. My mole was about 3mm in width and was just to the right of my cleavage. It wasn't particularly repulsive I had just never liked it and knew I'd be happier without it. I can happily say I stand by that now 2 weeks after the removal. My scar is healing very nicely and will just be a thin white line once fully healed, I'd imagine with a touch of concealer it would be completely invisible. I didn't follow the exact instructions of the doctor when it came to aftercare. I was advised to leave it dry and covered for 2 days but I took the dressing off after two days and popped a  waterproof plaster over it for a further 5 days, just to be cautious. I wiped it with warm water and salt after around 3 days and patted dry I continued to do this every couple of days. I'd recommend you do the same as mine is healing perfectly and has exceeded my expectations.

I was very impressed with the treatment I recieved. As someone who gets nervous I was delighted to be able to get my treatment in the same appointment as my consultation. The staff were supportive, the treatment was excellent and the information on aftercare was outstanding.

My experience was very good with this clinic.I did a first time micro-needling procedure. I was assigned to Alice, a skin specialist who is both friendly and easy to talk to. She elaborated on the various options to treat my acne scars. After understanding my concerns and requirements she recommended Microneedling. The procedure was quick and painless and this was thanks to Alice who performed the procedure on me with ease and great technique! I overall enjoyed my experience and would recommend this clinic to anyone for acne scar treatments.
First laser hair removal session went very well. Practitioner Lizzie was very professional, helpful and thorough. Discounted prices in November (saved 30%) were very welcome too.

It was my first session and i hadn't really known what to expect. It was uncomfortable at times  and the upper lip was particularly painful. Luckily the session does not last too long. I have been left with hair in places though so wonder if that is usual or the coverage is not thorough.

I am only 2 out of 8 treatments in with sk:n and ALL of my dealings with them have been excellent; both the call center and the treatment center. Friendly & helpful staff. The consultant Kristy is particularly lovely to deal with. Informative, pleasant and friendly, even after the end of a long day. Would (and already have) recommend sk:n to my friends.
Had some facial moles removed. Easy, quick and painless.  Very happy with the results and the service!

The 2 ladies i have seen at skin have been so brilliant and friendly, just started my laser treatment so fingers crossed it all goes well. They made me feel comfortable and would definitely recommend people to go to skin got great offers on too.

review_title: Nothing I can say but excellent
review_body: Great employee

I only had my first if 6 treatments yesterday so can't comment on results but the whole experience was great. From parking the car almost pretty much outside the branch to friendly and professional serve received. My consultant was very thorough with questions and kept asking me if I was ok throughout the treatment. It was all fab!

review_title: Very disappointed with botox consultation and results
review_body: The reception staff were very friendly and helpful which I assume are paid by SK:N. The facial aesthetics consultant may be an independent consultant as he only attends the clinic on certain days. I wasn't happy with the initial results of the botox treatment for crow's feet after one week as I didn't notice much difference. I appeared to have more wrinkles under my eyes and down the side of my face and a deep dent in my cheek had appeared. It looked like displaced wrinkles. I went back for advice and he was very defensive and about my unhappiness and advised that the under eye wrinkles appearing could not be resolved. He told me it would wear off after a few months. He offered a top up treatment which he administered and applied a lot more injections with greater force than the first time which were extremely sore with more blood evident  - he also injected lower down the side of my face this time. A week later I now have an uneven smile which is very lopsided and feel the left side of my face is paralysed. I'm quite worried now and just hope this stuff will wear off.
The Team at SK:N Newcastle are well informed and polite. They professionally deliver a quality service. They made me feel comfortable at all times and the treatment has been very effective.

After having my patch test I attended for my first appointment of laser hair removal with Hayley. The service has been excellent from all staff I've encountered and Hayley put me completely at ease for my first appointment, all the staff are warm and friendly whilst maintaining their professionality.
Made to feel at ease Excellent
On time, sympathetic, not scary. The verruca was under a toe nail. I don't feel too bad the morning after.

Really impressed. I visited several places for laser treatment and skn were the most competitive. I compared them on a like for like basis so knew what I was getting. Got some good advice and good products to supplement my treatment. Treatment was quick and after 1st session, improvement is already noticeable.
I had a great experience at Skin clinic. Staff have been very welcoming and professional, able to make me feel at ease.
Not able to make a proper comment yet as I have only had first treatment .

I wasn't given a customer number. I went to SK:N Harley Street to treat my acne scars, but instead the damage they did was irreversible. I will never trust a doctor whom study from a different country. I went to seek other doctors if they could possible reverse the damage, but they are not confident and said it may even take years to recover or it may not recover at all. I only had 1 fraxel treatment from SK:N many months ago!!

review_title: Would recommend and use again if need to!
review_body: Great welcome by reception staff.
The consultation quickly identified what could be done and the treatment was even carried out there and then, so saving me a return trip.  I would recommend to anyone.
Great service, lovely people and very reasuring at every stage.

review_title: Lovely and professional staff. Great service.
review_body: The staff have great customer care skills. They are friendly and professional and very knowledgeable.

The service I received throughout was excellent from making the booking to having the treatment. Just felt the price overall was high -�50 for the removal of up to 5 milia. I would however, use the company again for any other treatment.
Was made to feel very welcome by staff, friendly and full of information! Had my treatment same day as my consultation witch was great. Highly recommend using this company to anyone.
I'm currently on the first of a series of treatments for acne but have been satisfied with all aspect so far and looking forward to results.
It's early days, so far so good. All the staff have been lovely and very helpful.

review_title: Lovely staff, very engaging and professional.
review_body: Helpful staff, all made me feel at ease. Procedure was quick and professionally carried out with constant chat and reassurence.
Came in to get my milia removed. Staff were super friendly and reassuring!

review_title: My skin looks better than I ever thought it could
review_body: My skin was dull and uneven - I spent a lot of time and money trying to find a cleanser or cream which would make me look bright and youthful again, but nothing seemed to work. I'm so pleased that I decided to make an appointment with SK:N - from the start I was guided through a consultation process which allowed me to identify exactly what my concerns were so they could recommend the right treatment for me.
Staff were lovely, very efficient and were happy to answer any questions I had. Very happy with the way the process went and was inane out in good time.
Very professional and efficient service, would definitely recommend!
The whole place was clean, modern and welcoming.
As a new client everything was explained and felt comfortable with treatment

Such a professional, friendly service. I felt very informed following a no-pressure, thorough consultation. Just finished my first treatment. The nurse immediately made me feel truly at ease. She was very professional and took care over details. By FAR the best service of this nature I've experienced.
Everyone is friendly and very professional. They make you feel at ease and answer any questions or querys I may have.

Absolutely wonderful female doctor and nurse.   I was put at ease immediately.  Both were kind courteous and very professional and the results noticeable immediately.  Going back for more treatment and probably to have my eyelids lifted.

I booked in for Laser Treatment with Helen (nurse) she was professional, friendly and made me feel at ease immediately. Even though it was slightly painful it was a pleasant experience. Helen is a wonderful asset to the Clinic.  I look forward to amazing results.

I've had 2 hair removal treatments so far on my face and neck. I cannot believe the difference it has made. I'm so happy with it. I've been seen by a lady named Helen and she honestly is so nice and helped reassure me when I was feeling nervous. And you can tell she is really pleased for me with the results. She's not just doing her job. She really cares. I have been recommending it to everyone.
Staff are really  nice to help with everything. Treatment is quick and safe. Really convenient service for laser hair removal.

I was nervous going to sk:n for laser hair removal but that girls there were very informative and honest about treatment options. They make you feel calm and relaxed and the treatment was over in just afew minutes. I would recommend to anyone
Lovely ladies, make you feel comfortable and very knowledgable
I love my lips, Claire at the Middlesbrough clinic was great, made me feel at ease and made sure I was happy with the look before I left the clinic.
Great easy service
I received clear information and everything was done as expected. Very happy with the result.
I saw the doctor for tattoo excision but she recommended laser initially. Such a lovely doctor and staff, and I'm pleased with the results.

Had a great service, from quick appoinments and reservsations to consultantion. I found the clinic very professtional and pratical. I called end of week and got a Sunday appt for doctor Consultantion. Would  definately recommend this !!
The service was great from booking through reception, consultation and the procedure itself but it does feel expensive, I guess I'm not used to paying for treatments.
Functional and to the point. No frills - nothing special or to make it stand out. Got what I wanted and didn't try to encourage me with other treatments or to buy any of their skincare.

review_title: Yes I would recommend to anyone
review_body: Very friendly most helpful
Was incredibly nervous the night before but the receptionist and the doctor both put me at ease.

Every single member of staff is friendly and helpful. They take the time to really explain the processes and procedures To ensure your comfortable with everything. Would definitely recommend to anyone.
Sam was brilliant. Made me feel at ease from the moment I walked into the treatment room. I wish I could have her for every treatment. Thanks
Thank you so much, that is all I can say.
Overall, I find the staff trustworthy, suggestions fitting, and treatment timely.
The consulate toon was straightforward and quick. The therapist gave me a clear assment of my skin and how we could remedy the problems.

The initial consultation was very informative and helped me make the right choice for my treatment. I write this now after my first treatment session of a full body laser. Previous to the treatment I was apprehensive as I'm not comfortable with my body, but I was made to feel at ease from the get go. I'm not going to lie, the laser treatment does hurt, but only in places and the practitioners are more than happy to give you breaks if needed. Or if you're like me and just want to power through and get it over and done with, they'll support you through that too. Everything is explained to you before it is executed which means there are no surprises. All the staff I have encountered around the clinic have been extremely friendly and relatable. They provide an excellent service and I now have no nerves going into my second session, my only hope is that the standard is maintained.
Really nice people and quick smooth experience
Very good customer service, affordable prices and quality services. Thank you!
