I waited 15minutes for my appointment to begin - not the best start. However, the treatment was ok and the specialist's manner was good. Looking forward to seeing the results.

I've been very pleased with the service I've received from the clinic. My consultation was thorough & I had plenty of opportunity to ask questions. My treatment (removal of moles) has just been performed & still healing, but so far, so good. I was pleased with the Doctor who treated me. The clinic was very clean, modern & hygeinic.
Fast, effective and painless. Friendly staff and seen very quickly. Good outcome overall
Wonderful staff and a real pleasure to visit. Very much put at ease.

review_title: Had first peel of 3, skin feels refreshed.
review_body: Had first peel of 3, skin feels refreshed. A bit too clinical in the room for my taste but this was clear at the initial free consultation (no spa feel) overall good experience and very good staff. I recommend it.
Quick and easy treatment, easy to book and quick to perform. Not the cheapest option, but hopefully the best.
It was great customer service

I have recently had laser treatment for facial thread veins. I was very nervous about having this done but the clinic have provided an excellent service from the first enquiry I made through to the treatment.
I had micro needling and I can't fault any part of the experience... all staff are very friendly and professional.

review_title: I liked Amy the consultant. Its people that make the difference.
review_body: Though I prefer the Soprano laser. It is lot softer than the one you use

review_title: Should have gone to a Podiatrist!
review_body: If you have a Verrucae go to a Podiatrist. I was seen by a consultant plastic surgeon and paid an over inflated price for someone who did not really have any expertise in feet! Also the treatment is priced per verrucae, which wasn't clear in the literature, so a very expensive experience and I now feel fleeced!
Following my earlier negative review about the failed appointment at the East Finchley clinic, I've been really pleased with how my complaint has been dealt with.
It was my first visit to the clinic one of those well kept secrets in Guildford.
Getting LHR at the Brighton clinic, great experience so far, very professional staff. Good value for money.
At skin clinic they really make you feel comfortable!  The appointments are quick and painless and they always check in with you. I've started laser hair removal there and it was quick and easy.
They are very professional, and were able to answer all my questions
easy to book, quick appointments. only issue is that for my particular service there was no out of hours appointment which meant having to take time of work which is very tricky.
Dr Hussein was fabulous. Professional and friendly. Performed mole removal effortlessly.
Friendly reassuring staff.  Quick and painfree mole removal (4)

review_title: Professional, discreet & very clean with bonus offers on treatments to boot!
review_body: Excellent professional staff make you feel at ease and answer any questions you have. Talk you through the process and it's efficient but you're not rushed.  Good aftercare advice including non-pushy advice on aftercare products.  Looking forward to seeing the results!
Very professional, not remotely pushy or 'salesy', lots of great information and s very down to earth approach.

Had a consultation for acne. Was told it was very mild, which it may be but it was not very mild for me otherwise i would not have been considering treatment. Felt like I was force upsold a fruit chemical peel which was rescheduled to my inconvenience. The peel itself was not good and have been experiencing very dry, tight, red, flakey skin in some areas on my face that have made me feel very worried and insecure. This was not part of the possible side effects that i was made aware of. I think the peel may have burned my face and perhaps wasn't what I needed afterall but they were simply upselling their treatments to me.
The lady was friendly, but she was late and really got me in and out in 10 me with no small talk or explanation... efficient but disappointing given the money you pay...
Very friendly and professional. Went for laser treatment.  Make you feel at ease.  Not kept waiting, seen on time. Aftercare fully explained. Would definitely recommend.
The staff are so friendly , nothing's to much very good service ,  top doctor ,Kenneth kok put me at ease and is fantastic at his job, complete trust in this man.

struggling with acne can be really upsetting and frustrating!. I have suffered with mild to moderate breakouts since i was 17, i am now 24. People can always say "oh it looks fine, its not that bad" but when its on your face and when you take pride in your appearance it can be very difficult to deal with emotionally!. is makes you feel completely rubbish in yourself. I cant recommend the skin clinic in East Finchey London enough. They have helped me and guided me through my whole process. I had 3 Salicylic acid peels and i can see such a difference!... i am not out of the woods yet but i can honestly say its the best thing i have ever used to treat my acne. it has made my breakouts and blemishes so much better and more controlled. I will definitely be going for regular peels to maintain my skin! VERY RECOMMEND
Would highly recommend Sk:n, all the staff were welcoming, friendly and knowledgeable. Can't wait to see some results!
Very good service
Seen right on time, member of staff friendly and helpful, expectations checked prior to treatment, treatment felt good and if I could afford it I would go all of the time!
Thank you for making me feel at ease

I knew I wanted the procedure which is why I probably overlooked a few things in the beginning. To start with the consultation (which cost �129) lasted all but 5 minutes and I got the impression the consultant had places he wanted to be. When I booked and paid for the treatment I didn't receive a receipt or confirmation of the appointment or the payment.

The staff made me feel really comfortable and went over in detail what aftercare I should take etc. I was nervous before I had my treatment done but they put my mind at ease and I will definitely be going back.
Knowledgeable ad very friendly service

review_title: I felt listened to and cared for
review_body: I recently attended the Chester skin clinic to have two moles removed that had been causing me concern. From the moment I arrived I felt valued and at ease. The staff were really helpful. The Clinic manager (Louise I think) was very kind in offering to help with my parking, knowing that I would feel self conscious with stitches in my face.

Excellent service, all staff were friendly and inviting. The treatment was quick and all questions answered in detail. They made me feel very comfortable, not like just a another patient in probably a very busy day. Excellent communication with appointments and I look forward to returning for my next treatment. Already mentioned it to a colleague at work!
Good and professional service!!
Friendly, professional staff, Jasmine at Chiswick branch is lovely.

The therapist showed much consideration and took time to let me aclimatise. Obviously the therapist has a job to do but she really did make me feel that my needs were important unlike other places which seem to expect you to fit their time frame and system.
Great experience yesterday, friendly staff, pain free and extremely clean calm environment

I have been a customer at Mapperley Park Clinic since 2009, as a male to female transgender person I have had many laser sessions at Mapperley Park, lots of face sessions and a number of chest and back sessions, and in recent years it has been agreed with the ladies that do my laser that I come in for top up treatments as and when required which is roughly once a year. So today I phoned up for my next top up session only to find I am through to the central skin customer services department, and when trying to book I was told I would have to have another consultation before treatment as I haven't been treated for just over 12 months. This is contrary to the management of my treatment in the past. The man I spoke to on the phone was next to useless during my call. The main reason I continued to visit Mapperley Park was that I had already had my consultation, so if I need another consultation before continuing my treatment I will look elsewhere closer to home. Overall I would say that skin is an awful thing to happen to Mapperley Park Clinic and a company I will avoid in the future.

I have attended 2 appointments at the Norwich clinic with my Mum - one for the start up, and one laser appointment. We have been treated with the greatest of confidence and we have both agreed on both occasions how comfortable we were made to feel. I've seen 2 different members of staff due to the day I picked for my appointment and they were both really excellent. They were confident in what they spoke about and made me feel so at ease. My Mum has said the exact same about her nurse. If you're considering the treatment, we'll recommend it.

I had the first early morning appointment with a doctor who didn't complete my consultation. I think he was a bit rushed, and didn't interpret the notes correctly. We got there in the end, but I had to pay for more than what I originally wanted/expected.
I recently went to sk:n for a skin peel for my acne scarring. The service was excellent and I was kept informed of what was happening at every stage. Very excited to see the results.
Staff at Chadwick branch is very friendly, helpful and well trained to offer a great service.

My experience with sk:n has been great from the start. I can't fault it, everything was explained to me clearly from taking a deposit for my consultation, to the actual treatment. I was made to feel that there was no pressure to go ahead with the treatment, I could have walked away at any time and had my deposit refunded. I'm also happy that I have been rebooked in for a later date so that we can review my treatment and check I am happy with the results. Will be recommending to everyone!!
Had my first appointment the clinic staff are so professional and knowledgable. They really do make you feel comfortable when feeling nervous. The Clinic itself is immaculate. Thank you sk:n.

Booked a consultation at Chester SK:N clinic for a mole removal. The doctor made clear the different options available to me and I had mole removed on the same visit, which I didn't expect! The staff were also very friendly with great customer service. Thank you Chester SK:N!

review_title: Consultant good precise and to point
review_body: Consultant diagnosed and treated there and then. Were 20 mins late and we were first in so just late. Quite expensive for a minute proceedure. No aftercare leaflet. Need few days to see if treatment successful. they say if need to do again it will be free.

Before my arrival at Skin I was really hesitant as to whether or not I would go ahead with my treatment as I was looking to removal some whiteheads around my eye. On arrival of my consultation the team were really friendly and welcoming even though I was 20 mins late! I was able to talk to my consultant and really go through my options carefully. I was given them option to go ahead with the treatment right away which was a relief as I didn't want to wait much longer! I was really happy with my experience and will definately be back if needed!
First session with Sk:n, the staff were very supportive through any concerns or questions I had, and it really made a difference.
Good freiendly customer
The staff are extremely professional, polite and welcoming as is the salon. I was made to feel comfortable and reassured. All my questions were answered honestly and felt in good hands at all times.
Hope that laser will work :) I liked the treatment at Skin at Harley Street. Looks like I'll achieve good results :)
Not as frightening as I had anticipated: good care and after -procedure advice.
The staff are lovely especially Becky they make you feel welcome

My first treatment at sk:n was professional and pleasant. After a very thorough and informative initial consultation, I was prepared for what happened. I felt in capable hands throughout my first experience of laser hair removal. Thank you Sasha.

I am having laser hair removal treatment because I want to feel more confident and the SKIN clinic are so friendly and welcoming. They give you all the right information and are very experienced. 100% would recommend.
treatment good, admin passable

review_title: Friendly staff made me feel very comfortable
review_body: I felt relaxed at my treatment, very aware of what to expect because the team were well informed and professional. They provided me with the best options for treatment for my needs at the consultation. They made sure to schedule appointments at the most suitable times for me and set up a treatment plan to suit my needs and budget. Overall, the place is cleaner, more specialized and better equiped than other places I have sought treatment (spas/beauty salons etc). Looking forward to seeing the results progress.
The receptionists were lovely, the doctor was brilliant. Quick and professional with my care being number one on their minds it seems. You get what you pay for.
Staff friendly and helpful.
Amazing staff, felt completely safe
I went in for a �35 deal facial were you get a skin test, facial and two free products for �35.
Dr Hussain took the time to explain everything very clearly and answer all my questions. I eagerly await the results of my botox!

review_title: Wish I'd done it months ago
review_body: After being a bit scared & reading reviews I took the plunge & booked an appointment at the Chiswick branch. The initial consultation was easy & the Dr was very understanding. I had the procedure done a few weeks after & I am extremely pleased with the results. The receptionist was friendly & helpful. The Dr was very efficient & I was in & out in half an hour. I would recommend SK:N I wish I'd had the procedure done months ago

The first MD I saw kept offering me treatment which I didnt want. I had to explain few times that I dont want it and thats not what I came in for. In the end the MD concluded that my request is out of her skill range and referred me to a more senior MD. The other MD was amazing and the results are great. So overall a good score, just wish I didnt need to explain myself so much and if I was not assertive enough I might have ended with a treatment I didnt want.

review_title: Excellent staff very knowledge in what she's doing thank you very much
review_body: I just started doing the hair laser removal treatment Hollywood bikini and for me was a little bit ?��? painfull but nothing unbearable and the Carla staff was great ?��� very experiente she's done very quickly I love I can wait to start to see te results?�Ɂ Thank you.
Consultant was pleasent and friendly.. more parking is required for the reading clinic

review_title: First visit at the Leicester Location; Stay Away Save your money
review_body: Staff is lovely, it is too early to determine if the treatment worked or not, but if so, I will return for future treatments
I was impressed at the speed and professionalism of the Sk:n clinic, plus, of course, the treatment itself.
Very professional service. Dr explained everything to me and there was no heavy sale pressure. Need to wait a few weeks to now see if the treatment has been successful
I had my first laser treatment and it went very well.
My doctor was really kind and professional,

A month ago I ordered Heliocare Advanced XF Gel, so that I had an extra supply of it for when I went on holiday. When the product arrived it was the wrong product. I did call them on the number that they provided and I explained the problem. The lady that I was speaking to told me that the correct product will be delivered to me by the time that I came back from holiday. I subsequently ran out of this product whilst on holiday and as it is the only product that I can use, without it causing a breakout, I was very disappointed with Skin. Despite this I was hopeful that my skin would return back to normal because the lady had promised that the product would be delivered for when I was back from holiday. This however was not the case. I called up again and the lady told me that I should receive the product in the next few days (again this was a further delay). I told the lady that this delivery experience had not been great. The lady did not apologise at all; she simply said that the product was out for delivery now. She also told me that they had to arrange a collection for the wrong product and that I had to stay in until 6pm for the collection to happen. As I lead a very busy lifestyle this is of great inconvenience to me. The very fact that I have not been given an apology or a discount for a months delay is TERRIBLE customer service. I have spent thousands on buying treatments and products from this company for years, and the fact that this has happened is incredibly disappointing. They clearly don't care about their customers, which is evident from the fact that they do not have a clear complaints procedure.
I am really satisfied with the service and the professionalism of the employees.

review_title: Top notch service - Laser Hair Removal
review_body: I recently visited Sk:n in Portsmouth and had a truly great experience. My consultation was so simple with no hidden fees, I didn't feel pressured into anything or as if they were trying to make my pay for things I didn't need. I came away feeling confident about my choice of clinic.

Very nice and welcoming staff. The doctor was incredibly informative and pleasant which makes you feel at ease. It was very quick to get an appointment and to get subsequent treatment. Would recommend here to anyone seeking skin advice/treatment

The experience so far has been really great. The whole process from booking the consultation to starting the treatment has been smooth and friendly. I am booked in for 8 treatments for laser hair removal and the staff explained everything clearly and simple. I've only had 1 treatment so far but I have faith that everything will go as great as it has been going.
I had treatment carried out for facial thread veins. The nurse who dealt with me (Sally) was personable and professional.

Have had one appointment (in addition to my initial consultation) at SK:N for laser hair removal. Things were clearly explained to me and I was put at ease and had a clearer understanding of what to expect from the appointment and also regarding what results I could expect to see - actual treatment was nowhere near as painful as I had been anticipating.
Absolutely delighted with the service would totally recommend it to anyone thinking of using them

review_title: Friendly, professional service with results better than expected.
review_body: Booking my appointment was quick and easy. All the staff are very friendly and professional. The doctor I had for my procedure was very focused on what I wanted to achieve, making sure I was happy every step of the way and the outcome was definitely better than expected.

Excellent therapist, good treatment, excellent customer service and post-treatment service. Did not see as much of a difference as I would expect but still happy with the result. Would definitely recommend.
Easy to deal with, excellent staff and plenty of appointment flexibility.
Katrine is an excellent member of your team, is informative, friendly and have received laser treatment at your salon in Chester.  A great experience and highly recommended.
Very happy with my procedure, very clean and professional
They were kind and catered around my needs. They were understanding when I came late and just offered to rearrange.

review_title: Appalling customer service and complaints procedure
review_body: I perceive as barriers to complaints by SK:N
Such honest and genuine people. Mr. Ali and Julia are an absolute pleasure to interact with.
Cassie was very reassuring and thorough throughout my treatment, she also gave aftercare advice

review_title: felt at ease from the start
review_body: I was given honest advice and felt comfortable through the process of Botox around my eye area. All staff are friendly and welcoming.

review_title: Such nice staff and great experience!
review_body: Staff explained everything and experience was great,  really friendly, and I'm returning for more treatments!
Very friendly staff and purchased products are very good. Only reason for 3 stars is that the Jesner Peel has not made any difference to my skin.

review_title: Amazing service and very friendly staff - great experience
review_body: Staff are so friendly and welcoming - made me feel very at ease.  Amazing, professional service - will definitely be back! Thank you!
Very friendly and helpful people

review_title: Recommended to me and I will recommend on!
review_body: The staff at SK:N Chiswick are great and extremely knowledgable and friendly. I was recommended going to SK:N and I have already recommended friends to use this branch. Great service, communication and instantly put at ease.
The staff at Sk:n Holborn were very kind and put me ease throughout the process.
I was made to feel welcome and totally at ease at my appointments. The lead nurse was friendly and chatty and really good at talking me through my treatment!
Had a really positive experience with helpful, friendly and professional staff

review_title: The best clinic for any laser hair removal ?�� &, any other therapies & treatments
review_body: The staff ?�� the receptionists, the consultants, the aestheticians ?�� are all so friendly that, even when one walks into the clinic for the first time, they greet one as if they had known one for their entire life. They're so welcoming & courteous that it truly makes one feel absolutely comfortable from the get-go.
Such a friendly place
Great information and customer service . Automatic appointment reminders really help too . Excited to see results .

review_title: Good but left with a bruise
review_body: I've been having anti wrinkle injections for a while now and have been using a place in Harley Street this is the first time I've used SK:N. Sadly whilst everyone is lovely I left with a prominent bruise on my forehead. Its really inconspicuous.

review_title: Disappointing Customer Service - Excellent treatment and staff at Reading branch
review_body: I was encouraged to attend a SK:N clinic following a routine doctors appointment regarding a skin tag removal.
I had a mole removed from my face. The clinic staff were welcoming and helpful. The Doctor was great - reassuring and professional. Everything explained well, and a follow up appointment was offered.

I had never had a private health experience before & can see I was very naive. I should have been more proactive & asked far more questions. The initial consultation, which I thought would provide  me with a thorough review of moles or similar didn't - but then I didn't specifically ask for it before I found that the consultation was over after 5/10 mins. Similarly I didn't understand the full pricing structure which left me paying more for the actual treatment than I expected. (I thought I was paying for a chunk of time for laser on SK blemishes, not per SK) I don't remember being given this on paper - but again I didn't ask. Finally, when I indicated an additional SK for treatment which was on my collar bone, I didn't check or ask to check that we understood the one I wanted rid of so I paid an extra chunk of money to have removed an SK I wasn't bothered about, and the one visible above many necklines is still there. Hmm. A mirror and a check should have been involved here.
Excellent service, very quick and friendly, would definitely visit again

A very professional, kind, patient and friendly service with no pressure that put me immediately at ease. Which is at slight contrast to the booking of the appointment with their telesales team which seemed a bit rushed, still - the treatment part is the important bit and Dr Hassan was brilliant. I look forward to seeing the results now!
I recently has a burst blood vessel removed from my forehead and the experience was quick and painless. I am due to get the stitches out this week and have full faith that everything will look great
Friendly and informative staff

The experience of having laser hair removal was severely painful...but the colleagues in the clinic were fantastic, couldn't have asked for a better service. Very happy to help, and make you feel that they are 100% there for you. I would definitely recommend the clinic to a friend or family member.
Hi I had about 11 setion on hair removal and it rabish it's lying it's just robing your money
The staff is great and welcoming and I have had a good and vibrant skin after the treatment

Excellent customer service. Eventhough they were short staff they teid their best not to cancel my appointment. I cannot comment on the result as this was only my first session. I can however confirm that it was not painful despite having my full body lasered.
Professional and friendly service. Makes you feel at ease and talk you through every step of your treatment. Would recommend to anyone.
I would definitely recommend Sk:n after my experiences so far - very professional staff who put you at ease straight away

Very good, the staff were friendly and welcoming. The dr was straight on it, I got my mole removed there and then. The only reason I didn't give 5 stars is the wait before had was waiting about 30 minutes for my appointment.

overall it was comforting to at least speak to someone regarding the acne problem however i felt the time frame was not enough and there were many questions which i didn't get to ask due to timeframe and must say that treatments are quite expensive as well and even the products.
Great experience during my laser treatment. Very calm and friendly, making it a comfortable experience for as much as was possible.

Went for my first laser treatment and I was quite nervous; I also wan't sure if i made the right decision. I was warned that I may experience discomfort and pain in some areas. However the therapist understood my worries, carried out the laser in steps and did not rush. She continuously asked if I was okay, if I wanted to stop etc. The whole treatment probably lasted about 15 minutes and the pain was very minimal I was surprised. It may be different for everyone but I was lucky enough to feel little pain and feel very comfortable with the therapist. Very happy with the service so far!
Would recommend
The girl who did my treatment was lovely and so quick ! She was very confident and informative but very friendly and approachable !!

Having been in for my tester appointment and booking my first session for laser hair removal while I was there I expected no problems with having my treatment,  however when I attended I was only booked in for one area rather than the 2 that I had asked to be booked for. This meant there was not enough time to complete the treatment, normally this wound not have been a problem but I had already left work early to get to my appointment and when I tried to book a second appointment for the second area they were not able to book me in for 3 weeks. As I am going away for Christmas this would have put all my treatments behind and would mean I would have much longer than the recommended 6 weeks between appointments. I have now had to book an appointment at a different clinic which is much further away and I will have to leave work early again.
I started my laser hair removal treatment this week and was pleasantly surprised at how straight forward it was. I was very well looked after by my consultant.
Quick and painless mole removal.

review_title: Excellent service and staff very friendly and professional.
review_body: Very happy with treatment , staff very friendly and put me at ease .

Receptionists could work on their greeting, ignoring someone who walks in and carrying on talking to your colleague is not great, a smile of acknowledgement goes a long way, was called into treatment room 10 minutes late also. The treatment itself could barely feel half the time because of the cooling mist, only a bit of pain around the ankles, very quick and barely any redness afterwards.

First treatment and the nurse (Katie) was very good and made me feel at ease.  It's important to do your research so you aren't shocked by your appearance once it's done. It didn't hurt as much as i thought it would though, thanks to the numbing cream applied 40 minutes beforehand. Face was severely red,  hot and lumpy but has calmed down a bit overnight. I think I will need a few days before venturing outside.

During my consultation, I was told my acne was mild. This was the first time anyone had given me answers and directions to effectively treat and repair my ongoing skin issues. I was explained how the skin works and what I can do to manage it. I was offered to have microdermabrasion right after the consultation and it wasn't painful to my surprise. My skin, although quite red and warm all day, felt instantly smoother and had a glow to it when I went to sleep.
Brilliant service, from making the appointment to having it done.

Began seeing the team at sk:n a couple of months back and straight away I was confident I was in the best place. The staff are friendly, helpful and very professional. I've only had 1 treatment of laser hair removal so far and can already see results! Ive always been reassured of any queries and given as much information as possible. Can't fault them!

review_title: Wonderful nurse, very knowledgeable, good overall experience
review_body: Had a glycolic peel with Kimberley, very knowledgeable and made me feel at ease. Highly recommend.
Very good clinic . Highly recomend

review_title: Bad customer service but good doctor
review_body: No follow up up given to me despite having three appointments for botox where I was told I should be booked in for follow up. Have requested appointments and a finance agreement and never actually been sorted. Doctor is great, friendly, helpful, but the way you have to book in and deal with the customer service lets it down.
The service was great. All the staff were friendly and really helpful. The practictioner was really informative and friendly.
I had a consultation with Dr Goel and had my treatment during the same visit.  I felt listened to and treated well. Great value for money.  If I have issues again I would be back.
The doctor I saw was very professional and efficient. I felt comfortable and confident with his recommendations.

review_title: Good job and the prcticioners really take care of us
review_body: Good job and the prcticioners really take care of us

I had 3x moles removed from my face using the laser method. The clinic and staff are really nice. The procedure was pretty expensive (hence only 4 stars) but it was really quick, easy and all seem to be healing well
I had botax treatment.Good access and friendly staff but price are expensive.
My appointment was a bit rushed.  Otherwise was ok
Jo is fantastic, professional and puts you at ease as well as being very detailed with post treatment options.
I had some moles removed by SK:N for cosmetic reasons ,  I am really happy with the results.
The staff  were very friendly and helpful.   My first time experience of lasering was stress  less and painless  due to the staffs professionalism.
Treatment was a little uncomfortable (laser hair removal). Too early to know if good results....
good first treatment.

review_title: A professsional service with professional therapists
review_body: The staff at Middlesbrough James Cook Hospital SKIN are really lovely and explain everything to you. I feel confident that my treatments will be worthwhile and look forward to the Results.

I wanted to remove a mole because of its location. I found out the clinic from Google search, made an appointment and went for a consultation. The doctor explained what he thinks is the best thing to do and let me decide. I made another appointment for the removal of the mole which went quickly and without any pain. At the moment I am in the process of wound healing.

review_title: It was okay. Need more information
review_body: The peel itself was fine. I wasn't told in detail what I could use and couldn't use on my face afterwards and when I tried to ask, I just kept being pushed to by their cleanser which I didn't want. Then the lady at my initial consultation told me the peel would be 120 pounds. However I was asked to pay 200 pounds so you can imagine my surprise! When I rang up to query this, turns out they'd given me a completely different peel from the one I had discussed with the lady! If I misunderstood then fair enough but it just shows they don't give enough information.  If the staff themselves are unwilling to keep repeating themselves, perhaps they should give out a leaflet detailing instructions after use and the price of each peel. The price list I has made no mention of a jesner peel.
Very professional and knowledgable staff. Immediately put you at ease and explained everything thoroughly
Excellent client care, friendly staff and I am so happy with my treatment :)
So far so good.... Very efficient and the opening hours fit perfectly around work
Friendly and efficient!
Helpful staff who gave a clear explanation of what the treatment could and couldn't do, and the associated costs.
Treatment was good and quick, was explained everything about the treatment before hand.
Very good from start to finish. Would definitely recommend.

Highly professional service. Very friendly and caring staff. I felt quite nervous but was put at my ease immediately.  The consultant explained the procedure in great detail and at no time did I feel rushed or pressured to make the decision to go ahead with it. I am absolutely delighted with the results of my procedure! I will definitely return to the Leicester SK:N clinic and would highly recommend it.
I was nervous about my first treatment but staff totally put you at ease, there is no need to worry!
My experience at SK:N was really good. The practionner was friendly so It made me feel comfortable and she was also professional so I trusted her.

I was treated with the greatest courtesy by everybody.  I am fairly satisfied with the results of my treatment although my expectations were not totally met.  Maybe next time. (And, yes, there will certainly be a next time!)
Friendly, professional service

The staff at Sk:N are very professional and provide you with a thorough consultation before any decision to go ahead with treatment is made. All of the information you require is provided and recommendations on your treatment based on your individual requirements is discussed. Although i have only been to my first laser session up until now it is definitely too early to see any true results. Laser hair removal treatments are carried out every six weeks which suprised me at first as it felt like a long gap in between each session. I decided to choose Sk:N after many hours of research and am hoping to share my own experience with others once my full treatment is completed. Sk:N's reputation really does stand out above the rest and I am looking forward to seeing the final results at the end of my treatments.
good service
Friendly and caring staff. Great service and immaculate surgery.

The trial was really good but when I went for the 1st session I was left a bit disappointed as the hair wasnt removed as much as i thought it would am booked on the 8 course so hopefully should see better results as i have more sessions. The consultant who saw me was real�?y professional and friendly also.

review_title: MADE MY ACNE SEVERE WHICH NOW REQUIRES ACCUTANE
review_body: I am a girl in my early 20s who has suffered with mild acne since my teens. I finally decided to do something about it so I went to see a private doctor at SK:N as the NHS will have a lengthy waiting list.
Excellent value for the money given !!! I recommend it to anyone !
The treatment was done very quickly and professionally and mostly pain free.
Easy booking,  lovely staff- very professional and made me feel very comfortable. Will definitely be booking more treatments here!
From the moment I waked into sk:n I was put at ease by the staff. They were very friendly, helpful and knowledgable.
Excellent, friendly service from Skin Liverpool
Very professional service and made to feel at ease.

review_title: Good service treatment slightly more painful than I expected
review_body: Very good consultation jo explained everything  clearly had my first  treatment yesterday very pleased with the service resonable price lovely staff slightly more painful  than I expected  (laser hair removalal)
Service was fine. Facilities are clean and well lit. Was disappointed to find out that one treatment they had agreed to provide when I paid could no longer be performed.

I had my first appointment for laser hair removal at Sk:n yesterday. I was very impressed with the efficiency of the team - appointments were running on time and the treatment itself was very quick and much less painful than I had anticipated! The therapist was great too, really friendly, putting my worries at ease, and experienced and skilled. Overall, great, professional service. Thank you!
Very nice and polite staff. Effective treatment too.
It was a nice experience, the staff were friendly and I had an initial assessment and all the information I was given was very clear..great place so far, Looking forward to my first treatment!

I had my first treatment this week at the Darenth Road clinic. It was more and less painful in places than I was expecting but Becky could not have been anymore comforting and reassuring. I felt like I was in expert hands at a professional facility. 1 down. 7 to go!
First session for laser hair removal and waiting for the results but great service

review_title: Amazing! I can't wait to come back!!
review_body: Jasmine at the Chiswick branch is amazing! She is super friendly and completely put me at ease. I had my first session of laser hair removal yesterday and barely felt a thing. I can't wait to come back for my next appointment!
Very friendly staff, extremely welcoming and professional, would definitely recommend to anyone.
Good..but can be painful in certain areas..body feels hot and itchy afterwards....

The doctors and nurses at the centre are professional and give very sound advice. I just had a discrepancy with the treatment the doctor recommended and what the nurse thought was best. Perhaps the doctors and nurses should agree on the best testament between themselves and not leave this to the patient to decide - isn't this what we pay for?

review_title: Quick and not as painful as I thought!
review_body: I was rather nervous and worried about the level of pain I'd be able to tolerate. Sam @ Sk:n was so polite and helpful and this put me at ease. It wasn't as painful as I thought (don't get your hopes up it isn't a particularly nice feeling and it's a little uncomfortable but you can tolerate it)! It was over quicker than I thought it would be too. :)
Good and quick treatment
I was in very good hands n they were absolutely fantastic. I would recommend Skin any day.
Very good experience, not sure that I got my deposit back though

I've signed up for a series of laser hair removal and had the first session the other day. Angela is so professional and very reassuring! The whole thing cost so much less than I thought, and the process was actually really quick and not painful! Felt very at ease right from the start. Definitely recommend!

review_title: I would not entrust my face to anyone else ...
review_body: Top stuff!

I had my first appointment with Sk:n yesterday. Staff was very friendly and helpful. It was a very straightforward appointment with the doctor. She understood what I wanted and helped me chose the right treatment for my requirement. I am happy with the result so far.

I went in for my first laser hair removal treatment and was immediately put at ease. The practitioner Samantha was very patient and kind always checking if I was alright and answered any questions that I had. I would definitely recommend the service to others and look forward to my next treatment!

review_title: Not warned about the possibility for pain
review_body: I understand that many people feel little to no pain w/laser hair removal but this company's materials and consultations really downplay the pain factor.  I found laser hair removal excruciating. I wasn't warned that this was a possibility even if remote. Is there a numbing gel or something that can help? No one there seems to be interested in helping.  Now I'm locked into a 6 treatment plan for something that brings tears to my eyes.
I really had a great experience. Staff was very friendly and made me feel at ease during the treatment.
I come away with what I wanted.
Great customer service and treatment.
Felt very relaxed and procedure was fully explained beforehand. Still to return for aftercare to check everything is healing as it should be which also gives me confidence in the practice.
My first laser session, over so quickly I could hardly believe it. The technician was friendly throughout, made me feel very comfortable. Really happy & would recommend,.
From booking my consultation appointment to the actual operation I have nothing but praise for their service. Highly recommend.
All the staff were lovely through out both the consultation and treatment. Highly professional and put your mind at ease about any concerns. Would definitely recommend to anyone considering treatment
Very friendly and professional

I purchased an 8 session laser course on my bikini area last year, in Manchester, for �600. I was put on a laser that didn't suit my skin, and despite complaining session after session that nothing was happening, I was ensured that it would work.  It has NOT worked.  I was eventually put on the correct machine for my last two sessions, however it was too late.
So far so good... first session of full leg and bikini...

I felt nervous before my procedure, but after chatting with the doctor I became more confident of the treatment I was about to have.  It went so smoothly, I wondered what I was worried about in the first place.  Would I go through with it again.  Yes.  The professionals are excellent, the girls on reception are friendly, and I was in safe hands.  I would recommend SK:N to anyone. Thank you.
I liked personal. Everybody was very polite.
The doctor managed to get the procedure done quickly and effectively. Also felt very comfortable asking and was informed about what was being done exactly.

First laser treatment went great and the practioner was lovely. Put my nerves at ease and was friendly.  Was told a lot of information at the consultation and got  knowledge of the treatment . Looking forward to seeing the results of future treatments.
Very good experience, excellent and friendly staff
Great Service

review_title: Overall an excellent, efficient and friendly service
review_body: The staff in the Manchester clinic are very friendly and make you feel at ease. They explain everything and are very thorough and professional. I am only one session into my laser hair removal treatment so can't really comment on the effectiveness but it's been pretty painless so far. The call centre in Birmingham seem to book me one appointment time, which then differs from the one that is on the system in Manchester but I mentioned this and they said they are looking into it. Apart from this very happy so far.

I went for a "consultation" yesterday and came away feeling like I had paid for a non-refundable �25 sales pitch. The nurse told me I should be taking a 3 steps process of cleansing, exfoliating and then moisturizing... all with their products...
The clinic is clean and the staff are professional, friendly and welcoming. They're very explanatory and make you feel at ease with their level of knowledge.
Lovely team and was a fun experience. Very professional and thorough.

review_title: Friendly, approachable and a great service provided from my consultant
review_body: SK:N makes every effort with contacting me asap if they have to rearrange an appointment (whether the consultant is ill). They have made continuous contact with me in terms of payment (I have been at work and keep missing the call). The test patches and consultation has been helpful and insightful. Also providing me with aftercare (starter pack)

review_title: Friendly and made me feel relaxed as I was super nervous!
review_body: I was very nervous about attending my appointment as I have put it off for a while! The staff make you feel so welcomed, and they helped ease my nerves. Would recommend to friends and family in the future.

It was my very 1st session for lazer hair removal on  sunday 18th sept and i was abit apprehensive as i was expecting it to hurt. However the staff at the clinic were lovely and made me feel very welcome which carmed some of the nerves i had. The girl carrying out my treatment was called Helen and she was extremely professional and very nice.  She talked me through everything and immediately made me feel at ease.  While carrying out the treatment she kept checking if i was ok and kept friendly conversation going. The treatment was over within 20 mins and was definitely not as bad as i was expecting. As this was my 1st session im still to see the results of the treatment but the experience i had on sunday was excellent.
It was very good

review_title: Had to wait but great service
review_body: I had to wait a while for my appointment but the receptionist was lovely and gave me a goody bag to make up for it!
Excellent service and really helpful staff
Had my first out of 6 appointments and the staff were friendly explained the procedure well. I felt relaxed and at ease.
Very professional and friendly staff, highly recommended.
Only two sessions into eight treatment laser hair removal programme and the results are impressive!
Excellent service, friendly staff, no judgement and private. Very impressed with the service recieved already.

I have attended only one facial hair laser session so far. Once I get the expected result after eight sessions, I can give my opinion.  My impression from the first session is that laser works and I recommend Skin Care for people.

I have just had my first treatment for facial thread veins and am delighted with the results. Helen, the nurse, explained the procedure and, because I have a tan, advised a lower level of laser to begin with. The veins have definitely shrunk and the surrounding redness has lessened. The procedure is only a little uncomfortable rather than painful. I am going on holiday this week and for once I will be happy to go bare-faced during the day. Highly recommended.

review_title: Amazing l treatment  and customer service, could not fault it in any way affect you, perfection .
review_body: Anyone thinking of getting anything should just do it, wish I got it done sooner, never felt so happy.
Felt relaxed and comfortable.
Such friendly staff who take the time to explain everything to you and what your options are. I am thrilled with the results after just one visit.
I was nervous at first about what to expect during my treatment, however I was soon made to feel at ease and the treatment itself didn't hurt at all. It was very quick and clean with no hassle.
Lovely people, lovely clean and professional building! However the staff are what makes it a lovely place to go! Excited for more treatments :)
Quick efficient service
It was good experience and treatment for my first session. Waiting for further sessions results
Really friendly and professional
All staff were professional and welcoming. 100% would attend in the future and recommend to friends/ family.

I cannot fault the service. The staff were very friendly and helpful from the moment I walked in the door to the moment I left. They explained exactly what was going to happen and what they were going to do and reassured me as well as I was quite nervous. I cannot recommend them enough and have been back for a different treatment since
Excellent professional service - was impressed with the advice, kind, made me feel at ease when I was feeling incredibly embarrassed and self conscious.
Staff are polite and considerate and helpful in informing you make a decision. Highly recommend. Thank you
Quick and professional. Love it! The staff are always so helpful
Staff were friendly and knowledgable. I was quite nervous going into the treatment but all my questions were answered.
I have just had my first Lazer hair removal treatment and have to say the team at Southampton have right from the initial consultation beed efficient, friendly and professional.

Went in for mole removal on my face. Was slightly nervous before hand but made a consultation where I was made to feel at ease given options of treatment and price list. I was then able to book an appointment for the following week and have the procedure carried out. Overall a safe friendly environment with excellent staff and treatment.
Professional and friendly service from first online enquiry to treatment.
Mole shaved from the forehead - very quick and professional service.
Great customer service. Friendly, welcoming and helpful staff.
Very professional staff, clear explanations, a safe and easy experience in nice surroundings.

Had my first treatment for laser removal. Some areas were a bit painful and others not at all. The nurse was really attentive always asking if everything was ok. She took her time. Really first good experience. Looking forward to see the results !
Brilliant knowledgable staff, who made the process easy.

Reception staff so friendly and helpful.  Doctor answered all my questons.  My very first treatment so was just a little bit anxious. There was no need as treatment was a okay and the outcome absolutely wonderful. Keep looking in mirror ascannot believe how nice my mouth and lips are. Thank u
My experience was fabulous,  could not have gone better!

The staff at Milton Keynes Clinic are very nice and welcoming, however, I have had five appointments cancelled with less than 24 hours?�� notice due to staff illness so they are not providing the most reliable service unfortunately.

I've been really impressed with Sk:n, from booking and changing appointments to the service recieved before, during and after treatments. The staff were friendly and gave great advice. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend to someone looking at having laser hair removal.
Excellent service, made me feel really comfortable and in good hands. Thank you.
Professional service and friendly staff.  Very impressed with the over all experience.
Good customer service but not sure if the peeling treatment they recommended is good for me !

review_title: Patient safety is their first priority.
review_body: I have been having difficulty with my skin, and on the advice of the staff at Chiswick, this has meant that I have had to reschedule my start date for laser hair removal twice.

I felt comfortable and relaxed . just one thing will have to go back as they forgot to do a test patch on my consultation will just have that area done separately this time.Im not to worry about that as I'm pleased so far with the service
Lovely and polite, made me feel at ease straight away. Answered any questions I had. Lovely people, good experience.

I attended a consultation appointment on Saturday to discuss Botox treatment for hyperhidrosis. The specialist answered all of my questions and I was keen to proceed with the treatment. To my surprise, he said that the treatment could be done right away and within 30 minutes it was done. 24 hours later everything seems to be fine and I'm looking forward to not having the embarrassing sweat problems. I was told it may take some time to become effective but already noticing a change. I may need to repeat the procedure in 6 months or so. Highly recommended.
The treatment was fully explained and I was put at ease. Therapist was very professional
First time for laser treatment . Harley street ..
After an initial mix up over when my treatment could start after a recent holiday I completed my first full treatment yesterday.

review_title: A skin clinic you can trust.
review_body: I had used this clinic before for some laser treatment on a broken vein under my eye and had great customer service and fab result, so I thought I'd give some anti aging procedures a try. As I have not done anything like this before I was nervous. At consultation everything was clearly explained and the decision was entirely left to me. There was no 'hard sell'. Procedure was professionally done and I'm very pleased with the results so far. I'm told it will take up to 2 weeks to see proper results so can't wait as I already look a few years younger.
great treatment, made me feel comfortable

review_title: Very friendly, knowledgable and experienced staff
review_body: I have just received my first ever laser hair removal treatment. It hurt but Helen made me feel at ease, kept talking to me through it and stopped for short intervals when I requested this. The team have all been friendly, welcoming and professional. I would recommend this clinic for anyone wanting laser hair removal. I have got another seven treatments to get through, but I know the team will help me achieve great results!
Very helpful and understanding staff. Everything done very professionally and all staff put you at ease, looking forward to my next appointment.
Excellent service, friendly staff, nice environment
The staff is friendly. She explains very well everything that I need to know about the treatment and the expected result.
The lady doing my treatment is very friendly and put me at ease before my treatment. The treatment was explained very well to me and I was happy with how my first session went.
The staff made me feel very comfortable and we're very professional
I had CO2 laser resurfacing. It has made a huge difference to my complexion and I am so pleased I went ahead, I would reccomend this to anyone.
Harley St delivered efficient service, Good customer care, honest sound advice and excellent treatment results.
Very efficient
I had an nice experience with the staff, So far had my first laser treatment ad I'm hoping for good results out of it.

review_title: A good experience but wary of the hard sell
review_body: I have visited Skin on two occasions now, once for the initial consultation and the following week to begin treatment. Although I went ahead with treatment I felt the whole consultation was very rushed and lots of information is thrown at you very quickly, it unfortunately left me feeling on the wrong end of a hard selling technique

review_title: Excellent service and very knowledgable staff.
review_body: So glad I made that step and booked my first appointment to finally help my problem skin. I love the products that were recommended to me and felt very reassured when I had my first skin peel. My nurse was very helpful and talked through everything with me and I didn't feel rushed. Would definitely recommend!!
Staff very friendly and helpful and made me feel at ease. Very professional and clean. Would recommend.
I came to skin clinic following a recommendation from a friend. It was extremely professional and the staff were friendly helpful and knowledgeable. I wouldnt hesitate to recommend to others.
Staff were so friendly and put my at ease. Very professional and I'll recommend them to anyone thinking about having laser hair removal.

review_title: Professional, accommodating, friendly and efficient - great experience.
review_body: I booked an initial consultation with the Newcastle clinic to coincide with a visit we were making.  Although the booking is made through a central office, everything went smoothly and the staff were welcoming and friendly but maintaining a professional approach at all times.  They managed to fit me in for my first appointment post consultation, during our stay (we live 2.5 hours away) which has saved us an extra trip and although there was a misunderstanding regarding the finance arrangements, they were flexible and accommodating to ensure the best outcome for me.  I have been pleased with initial results, but obviously I have another 7 appointments to attend before I could comment on the end result.  I look forward to my next visit and the whole experience couldn't be faulted.
Very professional, good understanding of treatment being given
Greeted with a friendly and relaxing receptionists, got seen on time and service was 5 stars.

Very professional and friendly. I was pleased that I saw some results instantly even though it was just the first session. I felt very nervous about the treatment but I really felt like I was put at ease and in the safest of hands.
Very friendly. A little more explanation on after care would be nice. But overall very good service.
Clinic was clean, staff were friendly and welcoming, the surgeon explained the procedure clearly and I felt at ease.
Brilliant staff at the Epsom clinic, professional and friendly. Very informative and make you feel at ease. Would absolutely recommend!
Very friendly and professional , treatment was pain free

I was impressed with the facilities and the clarity of the information. The practitioner explained things well. As it was my first time at the clinic I did not get much done but it has gone well so far and I feel comfortable to come back for a further consultation.
All staff were excellent. Very nice and clean clinic
First treatment and staff made me feel very relaxed.
Staff were friendly and knowledgeable. They were supportive and comforting during treatment.

I got a mole on my face removed which I have never liked and always felt self conscious about. I put it off for over a decade as I was worried about scarring, cost and tried to convince myself to just live with it even though it affected my confidence.

Staff was very welcoming, always had a smile on their face and made me feel comfortable even in these situations where sharing private fears/concerns about my body! Would recommend to anyone wishing to make the change they've been waiting to do!
Friendly staff quick excellent service
It was a very good session.
Clean, well organised, quick appointment. Made me feel at ease and answered any questions I had.
Really friendly staff, I felt well looked after and in safe hands!

From beginning to end, I had a great experience with the Harley Street clinic.  Reception were super friendly. My practitioner Bindu was excellent. I was a little nervous before hand but was put totally at ease for my first hour long laser session. She answered all my questions and regularly checked that I was comfortable throughout the treatment, and advised me on other sk:n services that I was curious about. Highly recommend. Looking forward to my next sesh!
It has asked me to review. I don't start  treatment til next week.
Professional informative staff!!!
Very accommodating, trustworthy and professional. Staff made me feel properly taken care off. Highly recommend!
Hollywood laser hair removal isn't the most dignifying treatment!!! but kirsty couldn't have been nicer and more calm. Couldn't ask for a better person to do it
Made my daughter feel completely at ease having a minor procedure. Friendly & calm. Quick appointment from phone-consultation-procedure. Would highly recommend Skin Clinic to anyone.

review_title: Treatment fine but poor continuity of care
review_body: Happy with the treatment however, paid �150 for a consultation to then have a different doctor at treatment who could not read the writing from my consultation. So we repeated it all over again. Was late going in and treatment took longer as it felt the doctor wasn't prepared so that took longer too. For the cost of the treatment I didn't feel this was satisfactory.
The staff are absolutely brilliant. They are understanding, really helpful and non-judgemental. They make you feel at ease.
Really helpful, kept me relaxed and very happy with my results

review_title: Fantastic experience, I'm now recommending it to all my family andfriends!
review_body: Having suffered with ingrowing hairs I opted for laser hair removal. Before my initial consultation I was anxious about the process but instantly put at ease by my friendly clinician. At test patch was completed which made me feel reassured and allowed me to experience the procedure before I went ahead.
Great service
I've had a consultation and my first laser session at Birmingham skn. Very friendly staff. Efficient service.

review_title: Perfect, friendly consultation and instant treatment.
review_body: I am still healing after a skin tag removal, so can't fully share my experience. But the consultation and procedure were great, no pain everything was simple and explained well, it was so quick I was in for my consultation, had decided to go ahead and had the removal within around 40 mins. Well worth the cost.
Great customer service, friendly and helpful staff. Explain everything as they go along, but try and keep your mind off the pain. make you feel very relaxed.
Excellent- no reservations
friendly team, understanding and patient - only had one treatment - will wait to see the results over the next few months!
Great results on first treatment. The nurses have all been very friendly and professional

review_title: Brilliant service from the practitioner - just running very late with appointments!
review_body: I couldn't have asked for better service - she made everything very clear and the treatment was as painful and thorough as possible.

review_title: Service was great, very informative and assuring
review_body: On the first consultation I got all the information I needed to assure me to carry on with the treatment
Always made to feel welcome it's a real pleasure going to SKN Maperley Park.
Very supportive and encouraging specialist during a painful session. Loved it even though screamed throughout the session!
Nice environment, procedures and risks well explained, no inappropriate or unnecessary questions
Made to feel very comfortable at skin clinic from my very first appointment. All staff are really friendly and professional and have a great knowledge about my treatment.

I was a bit nervous about going to the clinic but as soon as I called them they were very friendly on the phone and when I went to the Aberdeen Clinic they were welcoming and very friendly which put me at ease. I'd definitely recommend!
Professional and friendly service, would highly recommend.
Excellent professional staff. Wonderful experience

My experience was great - I didn't have to wait, I was treated as soon as I got there, the ladies are friendly and accomdating. My treatment was explained to me and then done very efficiently. I felt very comfortable and confident that the treatment I was having was being done properly. So glad I choose SK:N to do my treatment, once my course is finished I will definitely be considering other treatments.
Lovely customer service
Have only had x1 treatment but the leamington spa clinic has been very professional and explained everything thoroughly.

So far so good, including consultation, admin and 1st treatment. Just one thing I wasn't completely satisfied with:  I felt the nurse didn't cover all 'bits' during my first hollywood laser hair removal treatment. I was sat on the treatment chair with my legs merely apart, expecting the nurse to tell me how I should position myself to enable her to treat all areas. However, it seemed she treated just the areas she was able to reach with me sitting in that position and then handed over to her colleague who treated my legs. Only then I realised that she didn't even apply the aftercare products as her colleague did on my legs.
Excellent consultation although it took 40 minutes to be seen initially.

Every time I've been in the staff have been friendly, attentive and preformed whatever I'm in for that day to an excellent standard. I've never had a bad experience or reaction to any treatments and I genuinely believe this is because of their knowledge and understanding regarding different skin types  and how to work with them. I will happily keep going back.

review_title: Early days but very happy so far!
review_body: I only started my course of treatment yesterday so very early day to say if it's going to be fully successful but I can say that the staff are very friendly & professional.
Made to feel very comfortable and from booking the treatment to having it was all very fast and efficient.
Very impressed so far with professionalism and skill.  Awaiting results new.

I have only had my first treatment but the staff at sk: n are very friendly and care about their clients. The prices are good especially when they have promotions. I feel better about myself already. The clinic is always spotless too.
I got Botox injection. I was explained step by step. I did not feel any pain, no redness, no uneasiness.

review_title: Friendly, helpful and seem very open and honest.
review_body: After requesting a consultation online it was less than 30mins before I got a call back. Quick to get a consultation and the doctor was incredibly helpful, reassuring and informative. I felt he was very upfront and honest and any queries or worries I had, he answered and took time to explain everything. Very happy and will definitely be going back

From my initial phone enquiry to the    "goodbye " after my surgery, I cannot praise SK:N enough. Everyone is so lovely, discreet and understanding. Would recommend to anyone. Thank you for everything.
Had an excellent experience so far. Staff friendly and informative. Would not hesitate to recommend

Friend waiting for me in reception surprised that i had the laser so quick..No pain,just a bit red.my daughter GILLIAN MOORE had her moles removed she recommended me,and i will also to my friends .Nurse saw more veins so i saved money also getting them done at same time thank you .x
Great service fast and effective skin looks great now. Only downside was price but not much you can do about that.
A very good experience.The doctor was patient answering all my questions clearly. Very confident in choosing this clinic for my treatment and so far have had great service and results are good.

review_title: Wonderful treatment, rude call centre staff
review_body: Jenny and Katy in the Cheltenham clinic made me very welcome and were reassuring and professional. This is my first round of laser hair removal so the care they provided was appreciated.
I had my first treatment and I was very impressed with the way the treatment was carried out.  The nurse was very professional and explained everything professionally.
I felt the doctor was very knowledgeable and took his time to explain all the options, made sure I understood possible complications, etc.
Efficient, professional service
I went to SK:N to have my upper lip done about 4 months ago. Very disappointed with the result and unsatisfied with the after-sales service.
My first laser hair removal treatment was quick and easy. Amy put me at ease and it was over in no time! Thank-you.

I had several appointments with Skin over the past few months and each one was change around last minute. One time I arrived and they left me waiting for 10 minutes before even notifying me that the nurse I was meant to see wasn't even in that day. They lost my paper work one time, the office manager mis-diagnosed me at my initial consultation which costs �25 (the dermatoligist confirmed this mis-diagnosis at the real appointment, which cost me �100 for nothing), they also rescheduled on me on the day my last appointment. Not a smooth experience. Very disappointing
Friendly service, made me feel at ease and great advice provided for My treatment plan.

review_title: A safe, professional and faultless experience
review_body: I have started laser hair removal treatment at the London Wall clinic, for an issue I'm fairly sensitive and self conscious about. Your staff were kind, yet professional, reassuring and treated me as a valued client might be after years of treatment, despite this being my first session. All the facts were laid out to me clearly, I felt comfortable asking as many questions as I wanted and the treatment itself was quick and yet thorough. I'm very pleased with the results so far and equally pleased that I have chosen Skin as my clinic. I would reccomend it to friends and family without hesitation.
Had my first laser hair removal treatment, didn't hurt at all. Laura was amazing really put me at ease and extremely patient with all my questions. Highly recommend skin clinic Cardiff.

It was my first visit to the Skin clinic and the first time I have ventured to have this kind of treatment. I was most impressed with the professional, engaging and efficient  manner of the staff that I met. I was seen on time, there was no pressure and I was given a thorough understanding of the treatment and any possible side effects. I elected to have the treatment directly after the consultation which was painless  and expertly done. Overall it was an excellent customer experience.
Professional treatment in a friendly environment with plenty of tips for aftercare
Eliminated all the unwanted hair on my face. I was always a little bit cautious of facial hair removal just in case it grew back far more thicker, as of yet it has been fine.
Very good experience. Professional and efficient.
First time receiving treatment at the establishment. Great first impression and service
Very friendly staff who make you feel comfortable. Good knowledge  and explain things thoroughly before you get started. Painless so far so good hoping for some good results.
Professional and friendly

Staff are lovely, all have a friendly smile and welcoming manner.  Very impressed with the Doctor I saw.  Extremely knowledgable but also personable.  Premises have a clinical vibe and appearance, unlike a beauty clinic.  This also increases confidence they know what they're doing.  Will definitely be using this clinic again.

review_title: The Team at 144 Harley Street was Amazing!
review_body: After much research, I chose SK:N for my skincare treatment. I was visiting London on a short holiday and they went out of their way to meet my scheduling needs. The facility was good and the cost reasonable. Dr. S...., is awesome! He is engaging and did not try to sell me on unnecessary procedures, quite the contrary, he was very straightforward with his opinion recommending the most cost effective and minimally invasive treatments that would satisfy my requests.  I never felt taken advantage of or like I was just another "routine" payday to him.  The hours of operation are a huge bonus as they are open 7 days a week. The entire staff was accommodating and the service superior. Special shout out to Jax at the reception desk, she truly went above and beyond and she is absolutely hilarious! She made an awkward situation completely comfortable, I felt right at home. When choosing a doctor,  I believe your first experience with the staff makes all the difference, no matter how great the physician is, if the customer service is lacking, most people will take their business and money and spend it elsewhere.  I would highly recommend SK:N Clinic for their superior service and vast range of treatments offered.
Lovely staff, professional and competent. Nice treatment areas and comfortable.
I was expecting more than a general informing about acnes, and a detailed treatment rather than suggesting some products which I have some already have similar things
hi,consultation at skin leeds excellent,dr helped me a lot with which way to go for my treatment,i will be going again for more treatment,thankyou.
The practitioner was very good and calm for my first session (laser hair removal). She made it all seem very normal and not as daunting as I had anticipated!

review_title: the whole service was great but they should really let you know everything.
review_body: The service was great from start to finish.

From the initial consultation to the treatment the nurses and clinical staff instantly made me feel reassured and at ease and were extremely informative. Only downside was that the staff at reception had obviously come out of a meeting and were openly discussing staff/colleague issues openly, wasn't too professional. The treatment rooms could do with a sprouse up, very dated and lacking inspiration. However if you are purely interested in clinical aspect of treatment then this is a great place to visit.
Excellent first treatment. Felt very comfortable during the entire visit. All member of staff are friendly and professional making it a pleasant experience overall.
For my first treatment, I was feeling a little nervous but before I knew it my treatment was done, it was so fast and pain free.

review_title: Results from the first day on Laser Hair Removal
review_body: Great Customer service and Results on Laser Hair Removal
This is the first time I have visited a company like this {for skin tag removal from my eye lids }. The service was very good, fast and efficient. Happy all round.

review_title: Clinicians are nice but call centre isn't very good
review_body: My consultation appointment was fine, although the emphasis everywhere is very much on signing up and the money rather than answering detailed questions about the process.
Had skin tag removed painless

I felt very confident in undergoing a minor surgical procedure at this clinic.  I'd been a little nervous and anxious but the staff and clinician put me at ease and the whole experience proved to be quick, almost pain-free and cosmetically extremely successful.  I thoroughly recommend SK;N clinics.
The staff couldn't of been more helpfull. The girl who gave me my treatment was reassuring and friendly. Over all a grate experience.

I cannot fault anything about my treatment from the first phone call to the actual treatment, it was completely professional, the treatment it self was very quick and apart from a few pricks of the needle painless and you could see a difference straightaway , something you could actually have done in your lunch break, brilliant experience for me

Although the young lady was very pleasant, I felt she was very disengaged, she didn't really look at the patches that needed the treatment, treatment was hurried and didn't feel all areas were covered.

I had a skin consultation and decided to go for the dermapen. I had my first treatment of three and my skin has been looking great after the post down time of 3 days. I am looking forward to the next treatment.
Very good experience . Staff are caring and efficient
I've had my first treatment and have booked seven more! I'm sure that says it all!
Professional service, quickly done and pain free.
The staff were friendly and professional, making a new treatment seem less stressful.
Not organised for booking appointments and given appointment on date where I haven't booked.
I was actually 15 minutes late and Sarah was so understanding and took me anyway. Procedure was quick, clean and pain-free. Love the place. I recommend it to anyone.
Had reservations about the treatment, but everything was explained to reassure me. So glad I did it, I will be going back again.
Very knowledgable and friendly staff.

review_title: Mole/skin tag removal quick and professional
review_body: My first ever visit for a consultation great communication from booking the appointment to staff at Northampton Cheyne Walk. Took time to understand my exact needs and any concerns and make sure i was totally happy before any treatment. Treatment itself was very quick and totally painless and very pleased with results on a first ever visit.
Very happy with your services

review_title: ISOLAZ TREATMENT LEFT ME WITH BURNT MARKS ALL OVER MY FACE
review_body: I would like to discourage anyone thinking of having isolaz acne treatment at any of the  Sk:n clinics from doing so. I have been a Sk:n client since January 2016. I suffer from acne and thought Sk:n would help me sort this issue.
I went to have some treatment for acne scaring at Milton Keynes clinic, something I have been conscious of for a long time.

Ruta was friendly and professional as always. I felt extremely comfortable and trusted that was in capable hands. My treatment was completed quickly and Ruta checked that I was ok every step of the way.

review_title: making the appointment not good however the nurse who gave the treatment was first rate
review_body: I don't understand why it's not possible to just telephone Norwich to make an appointment.  The nurse who gave me my treatment was careful professional and very pleasant and I intend to go back again.
The manager Kerry is lovely who is very helpful and friendly. I was nervous about getting my lip fillers and she was very nice and reassuring.

I went to the Reading clinic yesterday for my first session of laser hair removal treatment. I got to the clinic early and was seen straight away which was good as I was expecting to wait. The treatment it self took about 10 minutes. The lady doing the treatment made sure I was comfortable and kept asking me if I was ok during the procedure. She was very professional. She answered all the questions I had about the treatment and their other products. Overall I am satisfied.
I appreciated the fact that I was offered a couple of choices for treatment.

review_title: You know you're in safe hands
review_body: Dr Patel made me feel at ease and provided me with all the information I needed in order to make the decision to go ahead with the treatment.
Very friendly staff, treatment was virtually pain free!
I was very happy with my treatment and the ladies that I dealt with from reception to the doctor. Great help

At consultation very professional and decided the plan of removal.My appointment 2 weeks later went without any problems  so far !  I would  like a receipt for consultation  and treatment  as I was only  given my credit card receipt which has no information on it .

review_title: Excellent, quick service and great care
review_body: The whole experience could not have been easier and more stress-free. The doctor was really kind and reassuring and I felt really confident about the treatment I received. I am absolutely delighted with the result and can honestly say it has changed my life.
Had my first appointment yesterday and I am very pleased. Lovely staff, professional and they made me feel very comfortable. Looking forward to the rest of the treatment.
My consulltant Ellisha was very good explaining all the details of the treatment and answered all my questions. Very good service and very professional. Would definitely recommend it.
Good and professional staff
Not exactly the nicest of pain but short lived and end results are fab!

I visited Sk:n to have a Mole removed. I arrived for the consultation, and was offered the chance to have it removed almost immediately. The Plastic Surgeon that handled my case was great. He answered all my questions and alleviated any fears.
Really good considered service - definitely going back
Was excelelent
I've only had one treatment, but everyone was very friendly and reassuring.
So supportive and considerate as to what you need and want.
