The doctor was very professional and had a lovely bedside manner. Everything explained really well. Made to feel at ease.

review_title: 5 stars, very happy - I would recommend this company to anyone
review_body: Service was fantastic, would highly recommend.
Efficient quick service. Friendly and welcoming
Very professional, relaxed atmosphere. Excellent service, highly recommend.
Friendly staff and very good technology

review_title: Adequate service however issues with pricing
review_body: Recently attended consultation and decided to go ahead with treatment discussed. Satisfied with clinician, consultation, treatment plan and treatment carried out.
Full consultation was very reassuring. Staff were helpful and knowledgeable.
The staff were really friendly and really made me feel comfortable
Just before I underwent my treatment there was an open discussion between the doctor and her assistant about not havng the correct surgical instruments which didn't fill me with confidence.
staff are very thorough and reassuring had my first laser hair removal session yesterday hoping for good results :-) happy so far
The staff welcomed me and Carmen is great.
All the staff are extremely helpful And friendly. Chellsie was professional but friendly at the same
There was a little confusion getting appointments but the treatment was great and my skin feels a lot better already.
Good friendly experience
Really friendly and approachable staff. Everyone was great and knowledgeable. Fast and efficient. Great service.
I have just done one appointment and I am happy with that .
The lady who treated me was very professional. I would recommend this clinic.
I had my consultation with Barbara and she talked me through my options of laser hair removal. There was no pressure to buy, she was so helpful and discussed the procedure and what to expect.
Great staff very friendly. 5 star treatment

Great service and treatment, made to feel very comfortable for my first treatment. Staff were very helpful and friendly and resolved the fact they hadn't booked my appointment in and I was seen straight away.
Kim who did the session (London Wall) was great. She has been very helpful and the treatment so far has been effective.

review_title: Professional service, made me feel at ease
review_body: Recently had my first laser hair removal appointment at the London Wall clinic. The treatment was quick and the staff were friendly, and professional.
Shame the consultant at the London Wall branch was really rushing each of my appointments and didn't listen to what I wanted
Little time for the assessment. Too many people, rushing.

After using the skin clinic I wouldnt go anywhere else.  Extremely friendly and polite staff. Overall a very professional service,  full confidence in the consultants and nurses at the leicester clinic . I'm now a regular  regular customer.
I have waited to review because I wanted to see the final result after healing. Good result, no problems at all and discomfort after the anaesthetic wore off; minimal. Very please!

I am absolutely disgusted with the service received from the Bull street clinic in Birmingham.  I have received incorrect information/advice on TWO separate occasions and then told "there's nothing we can do/what would you like me to do if someone told you something which is wrong!!"
Positives:
I still have 7 visits to go, but the first one went v well, the lady was v professional and put me at ease.

Visited initially for laser hair removal consultation and subsequently booked a course of treatments. Staff very happy to answer questions / put you at ease, they know what they are talking about and you really feel like you are in good hands and your are paying for quality, and will get a reliable outcome. Besides the treatment is so far working out to be worth every penny!!

SKIN clinic is where I can trust the most and its entirely soothing to know they are professionals and nothing will go wrong. I know that I am in safe hands. I have received the best care and service, I am very pleased with the treatment I have been receiving. I have already recommended it to friends and some are in the process of leaving their clinic to come to skin clinic.

I felt as if the dermatologists were more interested in selling there products rather then helping me treat the problem i had. I asked if i could have a stronger chemical peels from the first of the 3 peels however she neglected the idea and recommended the idea after the 3 peels had been done in order to gain more money. The positive however was that there has been some improve to the condition i have around 35-40%. After looking at some of the images on the skin clinics website of before and after the chemical peels i thought it was slightly misleading as my acne and acne scarring was not as bad as some others but still the there was not a significant difference from after the peels!
Fantastic treatment and care and v informative second time round but the first appointment was quite salesy and a lot of information was left out

I had a Chemical face peel done in February where the treatment somehow got into my eye. A total accident i can accept no problem at all... however the way is was delt with has left me with complications to the left side of my face and eye 16 weeks on.
would recommend. quick and easy
One of the best places I have used who give great advice and don't have you waiting around unnecessarily. Highly recommended.

Had my first treatment a few weeks back and already noticed how little my hair has grown back and it's amazing! Staff at the clinic made me feel extremely at ease with the whole process and talked everything through in the consultation. Would advise this to anyone who has dark/coarse hair and gets fed up with constantly shaving! Yes, it's quite expensive but totally worth it!
Friendly helpful and made you feel relaxed

Treatment was fine, people ok. Bruising is worse than envisaged so will have to take time off work. Consultant said just tell people I have had a reaction to a cream or something. Not really the comment I was looking for but nevermind. Bearing in mind Rosacea is a ailment that makes you really self conscious anyway, being told that kinda felt like he didn't give a crap, especially now my face looks like it has been blasted, with a load of pellets from a shotgun!
Very friendly and welcoming.
Felt thoroughly taken care of, nothing was too much bother at their Southampton branch.

I got laser done, and the advice I got from both people I saw was excellent, and I felt like i was in really good hands. Also, the 40% off offer gave me a great final price and i loved the free products!!
Was made to feel comfortable, good treatment

review_title: Great service! The staff is excellent!
review_body: The staff was brilliant!
Very professional service received for hair removal at James Cook Hospital.  Would certainly recommend.

My experience with Sk:n was amazing! They are very welcoming and make you feel comfortable if you are nervous. Sk:n is good value for money especially for laser. I have only had one session so far and I can already tell the difference. :)

review_title: First visit to sk:n clinic Glasgow
review_body: Clean and bright clinic with friendly staff.
Super happy with my treatment so far - the salon is smart and clean, and the staff are efficient and friendly!
Reassuring and professional
Great and quick service at the Holborn clinic
This procedure was pain free for me, I didn't feel a thing, and it only took a few minutes.
Great service and skin feels good the few days after treatment!
need to improve offers
All the staff are friendly and put you at ease. Appointments are quick but not rushed in any way. The proceedure is explained very well and imformative.
Excellent experience.

I am extremely happy with the service I have received so far from the friendly staff who have made me feel comfortable, to the results I am seeing with the treatment so far. I would highly recommend Sk:n to anyone.

I'm not entirely happy with my first visit, it didn't go well, when I expressed my dissatisfaction , it was considered more like an offence than a feed back. And, it wasn't resolved. I went to the second visit it was fine, it really depends on who the staff is. Zoe in the second visit was excellent at her job and very well mannered. Both sessions were laser sessions for different parts.
Skin in Liverpool is lovely and Carla is fantastic xx I would highly recommend!

Parking was the biggest problem! Treatment was fully explained and although there was a bit of a wait for reception to process my payment and also a paper printing problem (!) the staff were pleasant enough
I will definitely visit again, the staff are friendly and offer excellent advice in a professional knowledgeable manner.

Great customer service, honest and friendly. Explain everything very well and make you feel incredibly relaxed. Laser treatment is painful, so dnt listen to anyone who says otherwise.  True that's it's not painful always, just in certain areas - but they are great and stop when you're in pain. I've only had my first laser treatment and already see great results. Can't wait for the finished product. Thank you
Would recommend to anyone, everybody was very polite and well-informed about the subject
I wasn't convinced with the treatment and the issue did reoccurred with a 3 weeks.

review_title: Lacked first class private health care feel
review_body: The treatment was fine - no complaints about that - but received nothing in the way of pre-treatment advice (what to wear etc) or written aftercare notes - just a sheet detailing all the little things that it would have been good to know but which you don't think to ask at the time. My appointment was messed up a bit so having psyched myself up for a painful procedure I then had quite a long wait. Not really the first class experience you expect when paying for private health care.
I thought I was just going to go for a consultation and ended up being able to have my first treatment in the same appointment! ?���
The girls were lovely, I was keep informed as to what would happen and I was in and out within 35 minutes. I am seeing a difference even after 1 session so I am very pleased so far!

I was very happy from start to finish. The staff were very helpful and friendly, happy to explain everything in full and answer my constant questions. I was quite nervous for my treatment, but they made me feel relaxed and out me at ease. Also happy with the outcome of my treatment.
Couldn't have went any better

From my initial consultation to my first treatment as a male customer I have had excellent professional service. If I compared the service to a competitor that I originally contacted, sk:n wins hands up. I feel safe & have trust in the clinic.
At the clinic I was made to feel totally at ease. Staff were all welcoming and polite.
Arrived for first appt. feeling quite nervous, was met by friendly reception staff .
Had a large cyst removed form my head and never felt a thing including the local anaesthetic. No hair loss either which was even better news.
Had my 1st treatment.
Service was great but I'm really not happy with the result as it doesn't look natural.

I went to Sk:n to find out how I could improve the appearance of my skin and get some professional advice on my options.The staff were very friendly & approachable,the free skin consultation was great & I was given advice on how to look after my skin day to day & advice on alternate products suitable for me.I've started with glycolic acid peels which are cheaper than I thought & I can already see the difference in my skin.I don't feel that they would 'push' something on you unless you not only wanted it but they feel that you really need it.
Just do it !!!
Everyone was really nice and showed great care.
First treatment went brilliantly. The therapist talked through everything. When to expect what etc. She was very quick and professional!

I am happy with the service I received.  I knew about the treatment I was receiving and the nurse recognised this. It was efficient and effective. A little pricey with no negotiation on price for my treatment.  I hoped as it was such a small treatment I would have been able to pay less than the prices on the website.
Professional staff and good results
Friendly staff treatment great as expected
Great service and staff are accommodating with appointment times.
For such a personal embarassing problem i was made to feel at ease and all the girls were very nice...girl who did treatment was amazing and explained everything very well..nice proffesional place
Very helpful and polite staff. Had a very comfortable first session.

review_title: After all the years suffering with acne ! This company are the solution
review_body: I have had acne since I was a teenager and at 47 I finally have found a company who have helped with my scarring ! After just 1 treatment there is distinct improvement ! Though my scarring is so bad the doctor says I need to be treated 3 times  The cost of the treatment is expensive but for me it is worth every penny . The staff there are lovely and I cannot praise them enough ! I am so pleased with my first treatment and for my skin and confidence things are only gonna get better ! You do not need to suffer with this awful affliction , visit a skin clinic and meet these Wonderfull people
Had two sessions with different and both of them were very courteous and helpful.
Discrete, quick appointments followed by treatment. Very good results.

The service at Wolverhampton Branch is always perfect. I went for my second treatment on 2/06/2016. Keeley is patient and attentive and very good at what she does. The manager Kelly is very pleasant and friendly

My treatment was pain free in more than one way. It's bad enough having facial hair but to talk about is worse. The consultant immediately put me at ease and told me it was 'normal'. I am having treatment at the moment and I'm seeing results from the first session. Would recommend a consultation to anyone with concerns, it's pain free!
Had micro dermabrasion. had fab results and the lady who did it was lovely.

I have PCOS and I have felt very self conscious about my appearance due to the level of facial hair I have as a woman. It has effected my confidence, caused low self esteem and has prevented me from going out at times.
Very friendly staff in Chester clinic

The clinic has been so professional and helpful. From the offset they gave me detailed information about the treatment I was interested in, made me feel at ease, and took their time answering all of my questions. 10/10.
Amazing service and friendly staff

I was so nervous going for my treatment but I was quickly feeling at ease with the care I received.. all the staff at Sheffield are so welcoming an lovely to meet an chat too.. I would recommend Skn Sheffield to everyone.. 5 stars plus...
I have told many friends about the new Chiswick branch. The girls are great and so professional.

The service I have revived since treatment started has been really positive. The therapists have all been chatty and friendly. I must admit I didn't quite like the consultation appointment and felt that sales was their number one concern. I felt like I was Bejng pushed to buy more laser skin treatments and felt like I had to explain more than once that it was out of my budget. Since buying my package the price has been further reduced so consistency in pricing not great.
Everyone so nice treatments amazing you can trust it 100%
A great branch of SK:N.  Fantastic service, friendly and courteous staff and attention to detail. Will be returning!

I received 3 treatements of microdermabrasion at around �125 and also purchased the SK:N pore refining lotion, but have not been overly impressed with the results. I was expecting to see a noticeable difference with the overall appearance and number of blackheads I suffer from but I haven't felt that there's been a great improvement at all. I also had really red, dry skin after the treatment and looked sunburnt which was disappointing as I'd heard the facials result in lovely, glowy skin afterwards. I had left feedback regarding my disappointment and the staff in the Glasgow store had promised to contact me further and hopefully offer a solution but I haven't heard anything since my last visit. Overall I feel its been quite an expensive lesson to learn that microdermabrasion hasn't been successful with removing blackheads at all.
Excellent service and after care.
However only gave four stars as they were meant to call me to follow up on a query I had and did not.

review_title: Great service great treatment, have recommended you already!
review_body: I was given a treatment suitable for what I needed and the staff were friendly and professional and provided a great service. The treatment left me with really smooth skin and I have already recommended the clinic to others! Thanks

I went with an instinct and wanted to have a consultation first.The staff was professional and informed me well of my options.Got another appointment with a doctor as the first one was with a nurse to make sure I get confirmation from someone who specialises in this particular area. I managed to get a discount and didn't feel pressured to pre-pay or buy more treatments which I really appreciate.

review_title: Quick and convenient with excellent results
review_body: I had a mole that I had for years removed for cosmetic reasons as a birthday present to myself. I was able to see a consultant the same week. The clinic opens on a Sunday, which was very convenient for me as I didn't  need to take time off work. The consultant outlined all the risks of the procedure and when I decided to go ahead, he performed the procedure on then and there. The whole thing from walking in to leaving took 20 mins!

review_title: respectful, efficient, informative but pricey service
review_body: paid for the technician consult and tried a mild treatment to no great effect

review_title: Excellent service and friendly chatty staff A+++
review_body: Excellent service and friendly chatty staff A++++
Couldn't be happier with both the clinic and the treatment, will be retuning as soon as I can
lovely and professional staff I will definitely go back there again!
This clinic is clean and welcoming. The staff are very professional and provide exceptional service.
Great service, really pleased with the result and the follow up care was second to none.
A professional friendly experience
Excellent results just after the first treatment. Staff are very well trained and very professional. Great service overall.
Friendly an approachable staff .. However the treatment offered made no changes to me skin, it made it worse !
Fantastic experienced!

The receptionist refused to let me pay the advertised and discounted price. She basically said I was lying. Very rude and dismissive. I was kept waiting for a long time prior to my treatment. The treatment however was great. The therapist was professional and friendly throughout.

I suffer from adult acne and have pitting marks left from scaring of blemishes. I normally avoid facials due to high irritation, stinging and redness which lasts for days. I had an express hydrofacial during which, I initiatally experience some minor irritation but it didn't last more than 12hrs and it actually left my skin feeling hydrated. Would definitely have a hydrofacial again, when I can afford a treatment.

review_title: Lovely staff and facilities, treatment exactly as advertised
review_body: Does what it says on the tin
Dr AlNakeeb was nice and very professional. I am happy with the result after removing mole in my face. I recommend strongly to go to his treatment
My daughter was booked in for a Mole Removal but the consultant felt he could shave it and cause less skin trauma, within a week the scar had fallen off and she had no sign of the Mole.
Lovely, friendly girls who are extremely well
5 star service!

review_title: Love the manager at Chelmsford branch
review_body: She was patient and professional, able to answer all my questions and give support.

I had Subscion for rolling acne scars and initially the thought of it seemed scary, but actually it was pain free and the next few days there was bruising but no pain at all. I am confident my next treatments for laser treatment will be just as positive.

review_title: Ended up with worse skin than before
review_body: I wasnt going to share my experience but have recieved multiple emails. The place is nice & staff are friendly enough but I ended up making an unecessary trip because I hadn't been advised to stop using the pre-treatment cream a couple of days before my glycolic peel so they couldn't do it. We had to re-schedule. I was then told to use the pre treatment cream for longer than the 7 day limit even though it was giving me spots. The glycolic peel was fine & left the skin between my spots looking nice but overall I was left with awful spots from the cream which have scarred so i feel out of pocket for something that made my problem much worse
Great place  ~ treatment speedy done same day as consultation - fair price would highly recommend this place
My experience was poor. My 'consultation' was a waste of time. If I hadn't asked questions, we'd have been sat in silence for 15 minutes. The girl didn't even look at my skin or ask me any questions.
So glad we went to SK:N so professional and fantastic results for my Son's skin laser treatment. Thank you!

Doctor was fabulous and work impeccable but no BUPA recognised so no refund for private treatment.  Histology results a bit slow and required chasing.  These guys are excellent if you want quick, top quality medical treatment and are prepared to pay for it.  Cost circa �500 for mole removal and analyisis
Already seeing results after only 3 treatments. Really professional and friendly staff. Would recommend.
Great staff, felt safe and the results and amazing. Would really recommend it

Simple procedure to remove sun damaged area on nose. Understood thoroughly what was involved and carried out with little pain leaving only a small scar which no doubt will fade over time. Seperate biopsy completed to ensure non malignant. Recommended
Selina was  professional and she delivered a very good service with excellent results. I wish I had done this earlier!
Really please d with my akin still ine session to go but would definitely recommend my friends and family to Skin

review_title: Excellent, I wouldn't hesitate to recommend them.
review_body: Friendly and professional staff, great facilities and equipment.
The customer service and helpfulness of the staff was brilliant.

My teenage daughter has had hair laser removal at Sk:n on her face, with excellent results from the very first treatment. The staff have been very kind and supportive and put my daughter at ease during treatment as she was extremely nervous. I would recommend this company to anyone, I couldn't sing their praises any higher.
My procedure was good but the doctor there makes me a little uncomfortable.
Staff were all lovely and the procedure was well explained to me and I am delighted with the result.
Good service, helpful staff.

review_title: Good service but treatments did nothing & my skin is now worse
review_body: I have suffered with acne for 3 years, using all sorts. Twice I have managed to get my acne under control. About 9 weeks ago I went to sk:n after 6 weeks of the product I was on doing nothing. They suggested 6 weeks of treatment, including Isolaz treatment as well salicylic 20% peel while using Skinceuticals .3% retinol in between treatments, I am also on antibiotics (Lymecycline) . When the treatments finished my sk:n did look a bit better, I went away quite positive however 2 weeks later after using the retinol every night and the moisturisers they suggested in the morning, I had quite a severe outbreak (worse than prior to my visit). I went back to sk:n to ask what the hell was going on, they arranged an appointment with doctor. I then stopped using the retinol because I felt this was the problem and yes it stopped my outbreak. Today I went to the doctor where he prescribed me Isotrex, something my GP prescribed me for my first outbreak 3 years ago. I'm unhappy with the treatments as I feel they did ABSOLUTELY nothing to control my acne just give me temporary results.My experience was a huge waste of money and a huge waste of time. Don't waste your time and money go to your GP. (or go to a dermatologist that suggests clenziderm). Staff are very pleasant though.

review_title: I have had a good experience.
review_body: So far I have had a good experience. The people working here are friendly and helpful and care about my needs and feelings. I hope to continue to see my skin get better.

The lady in Fulham Broadway just tried to sell me your products and the treatments. She didn't even said anything about my skin or my problem; the only think she did was trying to sell me anything she could. She wasn't even knowledgeable: when I started to ask some deep questions she couldn't give me satisfactory answers. She literally just gave me the impression that your only objective is to make money rather than help.  Plus, over the phone they told me my deposit would have been taken off from the treatment but then I had to pay �25 for my consultation which is unacceptable since the only thing she did was selling your stuff. I am very disappointed, will never go back.
My experience was pleasurable, put at ease and felt very comfortable throughout my treatment.
It was easy to book the appointment in the first instance. The staff at the branch in Leicester were polite and courteous.
Excellent service - was seen quickly and treatment was delivered in a safe way.
The staff made me feel welcome and we're very professional.
Nice and friendly, yet professional service.
Friendly and professional service, good selection of treatments.
Very friendly staff with great knowledge and experience.
..but no price break down or receipt given on payment.
Quality service made me feel at ease as was very nervous on my first visit Would defiantly recommend

The policy that an appointment can only be cancelled before 10 Am of the day before the actual appointment is not appropriated. If you carry on with this policy at least make sure that all the clients know it in advance

My experience with sk:n was a little more traumatic than anticipated, but everyone cared about me whilst I was with them. After a laser procedure went awry I was tested for  a skin cancer. This was a very distressing but the care I received from the whole team throughout the month or so this journey took was brilliant. I would and have recommend sk:n to friends.
Great result! The procedure went as planned and l felt comfortable during the process.
The team at Chiswick skin are brilliant! Super experienced & great advice on the treatment. Great understanding of my needs and really happy with my treatment so far! Would highly recommend.
Thought about it for years, experience was so good I wish I had done it years ago, very happy with whole experience
Were very accommodating  as due to traffic issues I was late getting to my appointment , but they still managed to fit my treatment in
Everyone is lovely, personable and professional. I would highly recommend anyone looking for a treatment clinic to use Sk:n

I'd never been to Sk:n (or any other type of skin clinic) before so was obviously quite nervous and not sure what to expect. My nerves went out the door as soon as I entered the clinic. The overall atmosphere was incredibly calming and the receptionist was lovely. My treatment couldn't have gone any better (I had Microdermabrasion). It was really relaxing and I felt like I was at a spa! I'll definitely be back for more MicroDerm and I can't believe I hadn't been introduced to it sooner! I had a wonderful experience at the clinic and would recommend it to anyone.
Sk:n was recommended to me and I'm not disappointed.

I went along to the clinic for an assessment but ended up having a test laser treatment as well as some minor surgery - so that was good but expensive.  I also paid and made an appointment for a further different laser test but this was a couple of weeks later cancelled and I had to chase up for the new appointment even though I had been told I would be contacted !  The new revised appointment must be at least three months after the original so very slow !!
A really professional, kind and informative service with excellent location
The appointment was fine but it's very expensive compared to other places and the result is no different
Really professional, very kind and informative. Listened to what you wanted and your requirements and tailored the course around what you need.
I was really pleased with the process and outcome of treatment. My appointment was delayed, so that was the only thing that really let it down. All staff were very pleasant though.
I'm really pleased with the minor operation and extremely satisfied with the end result, so wish I had it done sooner. Great value as well :))
In an age of shoddy deals in back Street clinics...skn is refrestingly proffessional and trustworthy.

review_title: Great service, great treatments. Would recommend
review_body: Really happy with my treatment

review_title: Excellent result but they do oversell sessions
review_body: Professional and friendly service
The nurse who was present made it a pleasant experience. Will definitely return.

I have found the service to be excellent, the staff are professional, approachable and skilled in the area of work. My treatment is part way through but is proving to be successful. I would recommend this company to my friends and family.

review_title: Lovely staff, although felt a little rushed
review_body: I recently attended the Sk:n Clinic in Norwich for some laser treatment. The staff were lovely, and informative. My only criticism was that I felt a little rushed into the treatment. Also, my main residence is in London and it was quite difficult trying to book appointments in accordance with the staff working every other weekend. Overall, a positive experience.

The biggest problem with Skin is not being able to talk to the Salon direct.  The central booking facility is dreadful.  Anything up to 15 minutes to answer the phone alongside promises to return calls which just do not happen.

Procedure and staff were efficient and friendly. Three weeks after the removal things are healing nicely. I was called back to ask about my recovery however was left on hold and the line dropped. Not a big issue I suppose.

review_title: Excellent ?�� no reservations, I would recommend this company to anyone.
review_body: Excellent ?�� no reservations, I would recommend this company to anyone.

I was recommended to have Botox in my chin rather than my usual filler by the doctor,it has left me with a deformed twisted mouth,I talk with a lisp,I can't eat properly and I constantly bite the inside of my mouth,this was my first visit to skin in Newcastle upon Tyne and never again,I was told by the medical director that I should find someone who could do my Botox who I was happy with their results and stick with them,the receptionist Helen is brilliant as is the nurse also named Helen,that is a shortened version of my bad experience at skin Newcastle,they don't deserve 2 stars as I feel I have been treat very unreasonable...

I was nervous about having my port wine birthmark on my face removed with laser treatment but the team at Sk:n are really professional and supportive, I felt very comfortable and confident. The treatment is fairly priced and the clinic is compact but perfectly functional and welcoming.

review_title: Fantastic treatment and hopefully fantasticc results.
review_body: Still undergoing treatment but have thought of having this done for years. Can't wait to see finished results.
Great service, everything was explained thoroughly, experienced 95 percent hair reduction after first treatment , very pleased with results, will keep going back for other treatments
I had the Glycolic peel, very good treatment and the discussion with the therapist was very informative.
Very knowledgeable staff, with fantastic customer service. Would recommend to anyone.
I was a bit scared before I went through the process but the lady was very kind and patient and made me feel comfortable

I have recently had microdermabrasion at the Bristol clinic and because I have moved I had to transfer the remaining  pre bought sessions over to a London clinic. This process was so easy and flexible. Lovely customer service
Really happy

I was seen by Nicole at East Finchley.She made me feel really comfortable.Had 3 laser hair removal treatments so far very happy with the results.Not only the hair growth is reduced by 60% but growth is much finer.Treatment is expensive but worth totally worth it as it changed my life.I dont have to thread everyday.Dark shadow on upperlip is slowly getting lighter.Highly recommend SK:N.
great treatment session and happy and comfortable with the friendly and professional  approach .
My surgeon had a lot of trouble removing a cyst I had on my scalp.

I have found all the staff at Skin very friendly, and I feel comfortable to ask any questions about the treatments. This is very important when having certain treatments carried out which require more trust, for example laser treatment. I also trust them to carry out the treatments to a high, safe standard. On one treatment they called and sent photos to the dermatologist to ensure it was ok to treat before going ahead. This helpful service is what would make me recommend this company.

I visited your Sheffield branch recently and from the moment I walked in I was made to feel very welcome and when I met my consultant he was amazing, made me feel at ease instantly, I didn't feel rushed I anyway, we even had a chat about our families and hobbies. I have already recommended skin to my work colleges and I'm looking forward to my next visit. Thanks. Rachel x

Really efficient service. I made the booking via the online form for a skin tag removal, I was contacted the following day and given a booking within a couple of weeks. On the day, I had a consultation where I was immediately put at ease and the procedure was done there and then. It was all done in a couple of minutes. I am very happy with the results.
The staff are all so genuine and helpful. In store and on the helplines, they answer all your questions and are really reassuring on order to give you the best treatment and service.
Have received two consultations both excellent.  Warm and caring environment and team.
Answered all my question and explained the process. Sometimes the appt don't run on time which is my only little criticism. I do my treatment in my lunch hour so v much want to be in and out.

review_title: No idea, who put this together? What is the question?
review_body: On making my initial appointment I stressed the importance of treatment following consultation as my round trip journey was 60 miles. I was advised that an extended appointment had been made to facilitate treatment. Following consultation it became apparent that no arrangement had been made for treatment. Following discussion I was given approximately 15 minutes treatment which cost �200. No-one was available to administer the laser treatment required. The alternative treatment has proven unsatisfactory. I require further treatment because of this. On previous visits the treatment usually lasts 45 minutes.
I was totally nervous about the procedure. From the first appointment to having the treatment the service and reassurance from the staff was excellent. Would definitely recommend SK:N to anyone!
Staff are very pleasant.It is good to be able to go to a clinic and get treated quickly.
Kind yet professional, clean, timely and just how health care should be. Thanks to all so very much.
Professional service with great results. Will be back for more procedures.

I arrived at the centre and was made very welcome by the staff. The waiting room was inviting and within a few minutes I was offered a drink. I was booked in by the staff who were extreamly professional. I was taken to a room to have my treatment by a friendly member of staff. I will fully informed of what was about to happen.I was able to ask questions and talk about my concerns with the beauty therapist. I have since had another treatment, and looking forward to another one tomorrow.
Good service
NHS and BUPA would not fund. Had to cover the expense

review_title: In the hands of true professionals
review_body: Of course it's scary trusting your face to any sort of invasive treatments....with lots of what ifs? But  from my consultation through to after treatment care I have felt truly safe and confident that I had come to the right place for my long awaited laser treatment. So far I'm delighted with the results however I'm told the best will be in 3 to 10 months time so I'm really looking forward to that.
So happy with my treatment so far, staff are so friendly.
I would recommend this company to anyone
I self-referred after developing a cancerous growth that wasn't recognised by my GP. I was seen so quickly and was diagnosed and had it removed the same day.
I honestly cannot find any fault in my  session for laser hair removal with SK:N Harley Street clinic.  It was fast, as painless as laser hair removal can get, and the nurse was very attentive.
Friendly and professional staff.
I have the highest regard for the staff and Dr that looked after me. I completely trust their service and treatments. I am very happy to recommend the Skin clinic

review_title: Excellent service, friendly and professional staff!
review_body: I was a little nervous as this was my first visit but was immediately put as ease by the lovely staff and knew I was in safe hands.The consultant was very professional, informative and patient. My treatment was very successful and I couldn't be happier with the results. At the two week check up the consultant identified a small blemish on my face as a basel cell carcinoma, for which I am now having treatment at the Hallamshire. As soon as this is completed I will be returning to skin to discuss further treatments.

review_title: Brilliant company and really helpful with advice!
review_body: I've visited the skin clinic in Chelmsford now 3 times, it's brilliant?���
Sk::n staff in Cheltenham are knowledgable, kind and they understand. For me, it's been a life changing experience and I couldn't recommend them enough

Unable to get moles removed on NHS I searched online.  Delighted to find SK:N in my town at much more reasonable cost than a private hospital offering the same service!  Pleasant and friendly reception staff, qualified and friendly consultant who combined my consultation meeting with the treatment which was painless and quick.  Small scars healed quickly.  Would definitely recommend.

review_title: Very impressed with end results - well worth a visit.
review_body: I had a microdermabrasion which was on offer.  My skin glowed afterwards and in addition was given two full size products one being a cleanser and the other a facial scrub, which are also fantastic sk:n products.
Great experience and wish I had gone here first before attending a less known local company who did not meet my expectations.

I was advised by Jasmine on what would be the best treatment for my skin acne.  In a short course of three microdermoabrasion sessions, she was able not only to reduce incredibly the amount and redness of my spots, but also to improve the overall appearance of my skin. Thin lines are reduces, acne is almost completely gone and the texture is much more smooth and healthy.  She made me beautiful!
Great service and amazing friendly staff!
Good friendly quick service. Did everything I wanted in one visit.

Brilliant service provided with noticeable results (for me anyway), as I have some areas of dark hair (these were treated) and some with red hair pigment(not treated) staff were honest that the laser would not be as effective on red pigmented areas so they helped me make the decision not to treat these areas!!-wheras the dark areas have been treated and I am so happy with the results! Staff are also efficient and very helpful-I usually go to Jodie and find her great.
Lovely staff & Doctor very welcoming
My nurse was very polite and friendly and did a superb job in removing my milia. I would highly recommend.

review_title: Superior , professional service from all staff.
review_body: I am really pleased with the results of my treatment . I must highly commend the staff for their professional approach and attitude.  Also I felt confident through my consultation and treatment that I had came to the right clinic.  I would highly recommend skin clinic .

I attend the clinic got Laser Hair Removal, the process was explained fully and the therapist are fantastic, kind, knowledgeable, thoughtful and considerate I totally recommend these guys and this treatment 100% happy
Friendly staff, procedure worked much better than I had even hoped. Would definitely recommend.

I had never had any skin treatments before so booking a consultation was a new experience for me. I can honestly say I have no complaints- from booking the consultation right through to my treatments. Friendly knowledgable staff who make you feel at ease and relaxed. It doesn't feel as through they're selling you products for the sake of it AND the products actually work amazingly! Excellent clinic! Would definitely recommend :)

Received first treatment of Botox in frown lines. Consultation was informative and helpful and felt effects between 3-5 days as advised. Lines did not disappear completely but was told that they would reduce by 50-60%. They became less deeper and noticeable. Nearly two months on the muscles have started to try and work again but not to full extent yet. Would be happy to receive further treatment.
Started having laser hair removal and I can see the results already ?���?��?
Everyone at Skin has been helpful and friendly and made me feel comfortable to be there. My treatment is not yet finished but so far the results have been great!

review_title: Feeling at ease as soon as I walked in!
review_body: As soon as I walked in, I was welcomed by lovely staff who made me feel less anxious and nervous.
Very friendly professional staff who always make me feel welcome and not embarrassed about my treatment. They are easy to talk to and give good advice.
3rd party payment instalment company made an error with my application which delayed treatment. Treatment was great and all details of my treatment were thoroughly explained.
I was totally nervous and completely embarrassed about my condition and having to sit and talk to someone about it.

Professional and friendly. Great results . Highly recommended. The staff at the Brighton clinic were amazing. Fantastic customer service by Noula and helped me to find the perfect skin products for me. I'm converted to SK:N .

review_title: The test patch was more successful than the treatment.
review_body: I had a test patch done for thread vein removal on my face and this completely cleared one of the veins on my nose.
Dr Sarah was brilliant she made me feel very relaxed and talked me through my treatment . Her professional approach from start to finish was reassuring .
Very good service
Liked treatment and result

I am currently undergoing treatment at the Skn clinic in Manchester and the staff there are very professional. On the consulation appointment they outlined clearly what the procedure would entail and they also ensured that I knew the risks. They genuinely take care of you and look out for you're wellbeing. Definitely would recommend
I see the same lady every month for facial hair removal. And th service is always great
The care and customer service from Skin are second to none. Everyone was very helpful and lovely and my treatment was carried out quickly and painlessly. I will absolutely be returning again soon.
Such a great service from the team. The treatments really work!! Would recommend and wish I had visited years ago
I think the consultant was great and very approachable.  I was made very comfortable all the time, I would strongly recommend it to others.
My skin has improver just with three payments
Would highly recommend Sk:n to anyone.
I love this treatment

My first time for any kind of rejuvenation treatment and I found the service and treatment brilliant. Results exceeded my expectations, with great free follow up. I am already booked in again. Highly recommended.
they don't know their work
I received very good care from the team at Sk:n.  They were friendly, supportive and very professional. Many thanks!

review_title: I'm your Venus, I'm your fire, your desire...
review_body: I went into my laser hair removal appointment worked up for the pain I was about to ensure but honestly the girls were nothing but caring, genuine and trusting!!
Treated quickly and with total professionalism by every one.
Kind and informative

I've started having my treatment & it's fabulous. Started working from the very first time, everyone is so friendly & Susan is absolutely wonderful. Was put at ease & made to feel very comfortable. Had everything explained in detail too so I understood exactly what was going on. Really recommend to everyone!!
I have so far only had 1 treatment out of my 8 and already the results are amazing! I cannot wait until the final result. The girls at sk:n in guildford are lovely and very welcoming. Very pleased!
I'm now looking and feeling revitalised and it's getting better all the time. Discreet and friendly with good advice. The years are literally peeling away.

review_title: Quoted a price then it doubled
review_body: I was told a treatment would cost me �40 and when I paid it was double that. They said they would look into this and then never got back to me.
I was apprehensive at my first consultation and was made to feel comfortable and at ease very quickly. I have recommended several people to the skin clinic following my great experience.
Excellent service. Clean, efficient and great service contact. HIGHLY RECOMMEND.
Skin made me feel extremely comfortable during my treatment. They were friendly and personable. Also, I'm extremely happy with the finished results! Thanks!

I was placed with a different nurse and it wasn't a pleasant experience in terms that it felt like she was unsure of what she was doing. After the treatment for the first time I broke out above my upper lip and under my chin and have some dark marks around the area. I don't think she held the cooler the right way because for the first time I could feel the heat and pain while she did the treatment. Was majorly disappointed in this treatment.
Very polite and a very good job.
Brilliant process, friendly and relaxed Dr and excellent staff on the phone.

I find the service and procedure very well - explained with much detail as to the happenings of each stage. As a customer, this is important as we do t have required knowledge and appreciate all the advice and information given.

review_title: Excellent ladies who know their stuff!
review_body: Was extremely nervous for my treatment as it was my first time with the ladies.... I now will never look back! They were fantastic and really professional! Highly recommend the clinic in Cardiff ?���?��?
Kind and helpful staff. Lovely facilities.
The treatment skins do and the results you get make you want to keep coming back for more and more and more

review_title: Really good - well informed and good customer service
review_body: Really good - well informed and good customer service

Attended a 9am appoinent for a glycolic peel treatment. Completed basic details form etc. Was asked to give details of any medication I have been prescribed from gp. Due to medication I had been taking Sk:n was unable to do the peel. I feel that If Patients were asked this question before appointments it would save wasting Patients and Staff's time. I Was very disappointed about the fact I could not have the treatment and that I had a wasted and unessesary journey.
Happy with treatments and recommended products.  I have seen a good improvement in my skin.
I won't be going anywhere else for treatment!
I was a really nice time and the staff is very welcoming and approachable.
Amazing results and lovely stagg

review_title: Very good treatment and look after client
review_body: Very good looking after client and take care and honest and very nice welcoming

review_title: Good venue.  Super nice staff.  Great results.
review_body: Good venue.  Super nice staff.  Great results.
Amazing customer service,helpful advices,great treatment and visible results.
Went for my 2nd microdermabrasion at sk:n.

review_title: Really good service and pleasant staff
review_body: I have been impressed with the service provided and the quality of the treatment.

The clinic was able to see me quickly and able to remove a questionable mole on the same day. The services were very expensive, but it was a good option as opposed to waiting on the NHS. I had to go to my GP to have my stitches removed, because the nurse was out sick. I would suggest that they have more full-time staff (instead of staff that float between locations).
Well trained knowledgable staff who are very polite
Lovely staff and great treatment. The treatment itself is fairly painless and over with very quickly, made to feel at ease and very comfortable but the nurses. Would definitely recommend
Professional people and excellent service.
Good place and service. And most importantly good results. Worth the money
Would highly recommend
Always look forward to the treatment, even when it's a touch painful/ uncomfortable. It never feels like a chore. I'd even go so far as to say that the treatment here is a treat.

Half way through laser hair removal treatment package and can already see a difference. Staff are friendly, polite and approachable. Im definately one happy customer. I've already been recommending to others.
Pleasure seeing Catherine again. Open, honest and supportive practitioner.

booked 3 laser hair removal sessions to just try it out and see if it worked for me. Was so surprised by the results. So much better then I expected. Finished my 3rd session in March and 2 months on I have no regrowth so far! It's had a massive impact on my confidence and would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a more perminant solution to hair removal. No more in growing hairs and scaring! It has changed my life!
I wanted to drastically reduce the hair on my face.
Staff will adapt the treatment to suit you. They will offer advice on how to get through uncomfortable treatments like laser. They are always willing to go at your pace.

I have been a client at Skin Clinic for about 12 years. I had my first laser hair removal treatments when I was 21. I started of with 6 to 10 sessions every 6 weeks on various part of my body. As I noticed my hair has reduced to about 70% and it's very fine that is when my nurse recommend that I get top up treatments every 3-4 months. I am still getting top ups whenever i feel it's necessary as I get odd patches here and there. Also It works really well if you have dark/coarse hair. It varies on different skin and hair type. I can say from my experience that my armpits and and navel area worked really well. I am very pleased with my navel area that I didn't need any tops at all, all of the hair disappeared permanently just after 8 sessions. The staff/nurses are very friendly and helpful who always made sure I was happy with the treatments and made me feel comfortable.
I was put very much at ease by the doctor. Treatment wasn't too painful, just the bruising to hide for the next few days and hopefully great results afterwards.
This review relates to my experience at the Loughborough Road, Nottingham branch.

review_title: Excellent Clinic and immediate results for teen acne
review_body: An excellent clinic and one of the very few with a Doctor that specialises in and treats younger teenagers with acne.  We have had fast results within just two months of a combined multi-treatment approach that involved laser, topical and oral antibiotics.  A wonderful positive is seeing my child regain his self-confidence with his vastly improved skin. I could not recommend this clinic any higher

This is the second time I've used Skin and I'd use them again. It's professional, quick and you see results from the first session. Not cheap but I'd rather pay a bit more and know I was using a regulated and qualified company for this sort of service.
The experience was good as would be as expected. The staff were professional and very good at their job. Overall experience was good but nothing Beyond my expectation

I'm having laser treatment on 2 areas. I have had 2 appts so far and already I am noticing an improvement, hair is growing finer and at a slower rate. The lady I see at Epsom is very nice and puts me to ease. Can't really fault the service I've received. I would have scored 5 stars but the prices quoted on the website is cheaper by several hundreds of pounds than that confirmed by the clinic which is misleading and frustrating. I was also encouraged to purchase a skin care kit but as yet havent had the need to use the products supplied and regret buying. I have meant to make a complaint about the website prices but haven't.  Hopefully I will be contacted following this review.

I got the 3 course peel. I had micro dermabrasion in mind but they thought the peel would be better for my skin. They were really professional and my skin looks and feels amazing!  The take home treatment (I think it's a lower dose peel you apply each night) is so good I'm going to buy another bottle when my current one runs out. I would definitely go to SKN again.

There was a slight ligthening in the pigments on my face and after 6 sessions of using the glycolic peel, I still felt the same way about my skin as before. Very expensive and not worth the money. There are products out there such as cleaners, exfoliaters and peels that you can use at home an get good results such as murad. Wouldn't come here again for this treatment or anything similar
Brilliant!!!
Quick, painless and effective. Nice staff

Good customer service, approachable and friendly staff every time I visit. However the treatment was uncomfortable and I was advised to get numbing cream, perhaps this should be offered within the clinic as it would make the experience a lot less stressful and time consuming for both myself and the specialist performing the treatment. Requiring to purchase numbing cream on top of the already expensive prices at the clinic can be very costly.

I am currently in the process of recieving my treatment. I purchased 11 half face laser hair removal sessions and 6 BHA peels. I recieve my treatments every two weeks so this way the individual treatments end up being a month apart. Its still far to early to see any drastic results with the peels, but with the hair removal i have already noticed a reduction by at least 10% so hopefully things continue to go smoothly. The staff are friendly and professional and very accommodating. So far overall it has been a great experience i would have given them 5 stars  but out of my possible 17 sessions I've only had 4.
My nurse/therapist was welcoming, thorough,  and very knowledgeable about the procedure. I felt in safe hands and left pleased about returning again.

Staff were very helfpul and experienced. Due to illness I had a different practicioner a d was notified of this in advance. My only complaint albeit minor is that appointments seem to start late, which is a bit annoying since they ask you to arrive early. So far I'm very content with the results but have a few more sessions to go.
Very carring and comforting

The procedure itself was fine I had the juvederm ultra for my lips.there was no pain and everyone was no nice although I was waiting over an hour for the consultant to arrive.i had saved up for a long time and it was something I had always wanted.they were lovely at first but then two weeks later the swelling went down and you could not tell I had got them done at all they were the exact same as before.i rang up to ask if they could be reviewed and told them I was not happy to which they replied that I would have to pay an extra 50 pound just for a review.it was so disappointing considering my friend got hers done in Harley street the same week  at a much much lower price and they look fantastic .very disappointing will not be attending any skin clinics in the near future

review_title: Good service but not sure on results
review_body: The service I received at SKN was excellent. The staff were considerate and helpful at all times. I had a course of 6 glycolic peels as advised in my consultation, and for the cost of them I am unsure if they have had any effect. I wanted help for mild acne, eczema and scarring and I still have the same problems, though they cleared for a couple of days each time. I will say that the products they recommended to me at my consultation have been very good, and helpful for my sensitive skin which responds badly to a lot of other products. I will continue to use those.
After the treatment my skin is discoloured for 6 weeks now in some places.
Really enjoyed having the laser done. Service is good, people are friendly

They charged me �200 to have a raised mole removed shaved off at their London Holborn Clinic. When I later found out 2 of my friends have had the EXACT same procedure performed at Skin's Manchester clinic for just �50. Disappointed doesn't cover it.
Really professional and re assured me of all the things I was worried about.

I had a very good experience with Sk:n in epsom! All the staff are very professional and accommodating. The treat if quite intimidating but the staff makes me comfortable and relaxed. And i got amazing results.. I will definitely recommend sk:n to my friends and family..

I've been going to Sk:n since last summer and I have been impressed with the professionalism of the staff and with my laser hair removal treatment.  What I like is that they don't pressure you into signing up for treatments unless you're fully happy.  They always answer questions fully too.
very professional service from Sindy Birmingham Harborne clinic
Excellent service - as always!
I found them to be professional and experienced at all times.
Strongly recommend people to get hair removal treatment done at epsom clinic!

review_title: Friendly, professional and responsive to clients' needs
review_body: A great, caring service. The practitioners were thorough and responded very well to my personal needs. The results were very effective, and it was well worth the money!
Excellent service, friendly and professional staff, and the treatment delivers what is promised.
Great results but expensive.
Friendly, helpful staff, who work hard to keep things ship shape.
Good very professional would highly recommend

Attending for a minor treatment which was well-treated by the doctor, I was nevertheless appalled by being taken into the treatment room (after having waited for twenty five minutes from the time of my appointment) to see blooded tissues and what seemed to be the mess from a previous patient on the table beside the couch.

The results of my laser hair removal were greater than my expectations. It's an amazing transformation. Had lots of different people administer treatments and thy all work in different ways high ultimately impacted the results. There seems to be a short time allocated to treatments as I did sometimes feel rushed.

The ladies were very helpful with advice.  The treatment was good and I have seen a difference to hair on my chin.  I dont feel as conscious of the hair as I was.  A few hair have returned as white hairs but I feel that could be down to me reaching 50 and nearing the time of the menopause but i am happier
I have been incredibly impressed with the very professional and friendly service I have received. The treatments are truly excellent and highly effective. I would not hesitate to recommend.

review_title: Excellent - I would recommend Sk:n to anyone
review_body: The nurses are really excellent, they are very professional and put you at ease before, during and after the treatment.  I've also found the treatment to be hugely effective, so much so, that it has really improved my confidence.
I was made to feel very at ease, but would have liked to have been asked exactly what my wishes were as it can be embarrassing to ask for more.
Excellent service provided by my skin specialist on my 2nd appointment,my skin looks brilliant. Thank you

review_title: Yes it's expensive but very worth it
review_body: I am currently having laser hair removal, the treatment is exactly as described and I am seeing great results. The staff are very friendly and professional. I highly recommend Sk:n.

review_title: As usual, good service. But would be better to allow time limit for being late.
review_body: I was only 5-10 mins late for my appointment, which was almost cancelled even though I had called in before my appointment time to say I was running late. I was still seen only be because I had driven from abother city. There should be an allowance of at least 5 mins (as a minimum) for lateness, before having your appointment cancelled.

I have now completed my 8 week treatment for laser hair removal and am thrilled with the results. The staff are always very friendly and professional, I will definitely be booking again to treat other areas.
Excellent care and very worthwhile treatment.  Brill consultant and highly recommend.  Thank you
It can be intimidating and sometimes embarrassing to get naked in front of a stranger to have treatments.

This is my fourth appointment (but it was a different woman I feel this may be the reason), it was quite painful compared to the others. I've now got burn marks hopefully it goes down, it's quite sore. However the other 3 appointments have been great, I saw improvements on my skin after the first appointment.

I would highly recommend Skin to anyone who wants a professional, affordable and effective service. All staff are friendly and put you at ease and I am more than happy with the treatment they have provided. My laser hair removal course is nearing the end but I have already seen amazing results. I would have no hesitation in revisiting the clinic for other treatments or recommending to my friends and family. Thank you Skin!

Friendly professional clinic - results seen halfway through treatment - staff polite and knowledgeable. Only downside is after paying the 800 odd I realised what competitive prices other reputable companies offer for the same service. My fault for not researching thoroughly! Would recommend based on service provided.
IPL treatment for hair removal - great treatment, great results.
Brilliant service

review_title: The place to go for more confidence!!
review_body: Skin makes you feel good about yourself. They take away what you don't want and give you back your confidence. No more self consciousness!!

I use the Edgbaston branch and my consultant has been top drawer. Being male was a bit nervous but now speak comfortably and after 2 treatment I'm finding it value for money. I know of people who have had it on the cheap and been left with scars and marks. Also their treatment hasn't reduced their hair greatly. Skin has the best and most powerful machines with fully trained consultants. Will defiantly be using and recommending again.

SK:N are excellent. Helpful booking staff on the phone. Great staff providing the treatments. They really put you at ease and are friendly while being professional. Great aftercare advice and service too. I highly recommend them.
Very effective treatment and customer service was great. I am very satisfied, happy and glad for this treatment, it has given me my self confidence back.
Lovely, friendly staff who make you feel very welcome and explain the treatment well, answering all questions. Relaxed atmosphere.
Friendly & good customer service.

review_title: Invest & save in the long run, sooner the better!!
review_body: I can't tell you the money I've wasted...only wish is done it sooner!! 5 star service not to mention the fact that this is the only thing that actually works. Seems pricey at 1st but if u do the math then you'll save in the long run not to mention the time u save not having to pluck/wax/shave everyday. So pleased with every aspect of my treatment and usually I'm really hard to please?��?

I only have positive comments to make about Sk:n staff, the nurses in particular are so friendly and welcoming that you don't feel self-conscious about discussing your issues. They explain everything thorougly, never rush procedures and are happy to answer multiple questions. Kimberly at the Wall Street Clinic was fab, couldn't fault her!
Very good service , all round
FANTASTIC TREATMENTS OFFERED.

review_title: friendly and lovely staff as always
review_body: really enjoy going there- even though no pain no gain, but ladies over at SK:N makes you feel so much better!!
Very Accommodating!

review_title: Happy SK:N are now in Epsom
review_body: Very happy with advice service and attention received. Changed my life !
I have had laser hair reduction that has just been wonderful. The staff are obviously trained well, knowledgeable and safe.
The consultation and the treatment were both very professional, and the treatment itself was extremely efficient.

review_title: I had to wait for a long time
review_body: Unfortunately my last trip to Sk:n left me disappointed, I am used to a high standard from Sk:n. This time, I was early for my appointment, however I was left waiting for an extra 10 minutes after the start of my appointment with no explanation. This is not the service I am used to from Sk:n!

I've been having laser hair removal at SKN for a while now. I purchased a package of 8 treatments, and have had 7 now. All the staff at SKN have been super professional and make you feel completely comfortable, even though the laser hair removal treatment itself is not the most enjoyable experience. I have found that the staff here have made the whole experience a lot better. I also thought that the quality of the treatment has been really good, and I have seen very good results already.
The staff at the sk:n clinic in Leeds are very helpful and friendly, the premises are always spotless, the treatments are really effective

review_title: Professional and easy to deal with
review_body: Service was professional, medically sound and as easy as possible for the patient.
Great service with friendly staff at the Epsom clinic.  Would recommend
From the warm welcome, through the efficient caring procedures to the final goodbye -I am always pleased with Sk:n Cardiff. Thanks
Very good service .. & I would recommend to my friends
Excellent professional services with great results too would definitely recommend Sk:n to anyone

review_title: Professional and made to feel very much at ease
review_body: Each appointment has been a positive welcoming experience, despite my apprehensions I always feel very comfortable with the staff members
Staff are so attentive and really out your mind at rest, I felt comfortable at every moment of my treatment and would recommend to absolutely anyone.
Not what I was hoping for but things did improve.
I felt very comfortable during the treatment, everything was explained to me in details so I knew what to expect.
I went to skin for the removal of 4 moles.  During in the consultation I was told I could have all 4 miles removed on the day how much it would be including histology.
Three words - AWESOME, AWESOME, AWESOME!
Very professional and friendly service.
caring, professional, everything you could dream for, i couldn't recommend them more :)
Brilliant service. Staff were very kind and considerate.

I had to wait 25 minutes past my appointment as it was busy. No information or advice given before botox . 1 week after botox I got a droopy eyelid, my eye was half closed. This lasted 6 weeks. I was devastated as I looked awful and I had the botox done for a wedding. I read on the internet that a droopy eyelid is due to the injector's inexperience. I loved the effect on my forehead but it was totally spoilt by my droopy eye, which  I was embarrassed about.

I have had lip fillers before and decided to try skin as they are a reputable company. I paid over 100 pound more than I have paid in the past. I am very disappointed with the result. My lips barley look fuller and I have a lump either side of my face above the lip line. I called back to say I was not happy and was informed I will have to pay for another treatment if I would like them fuller/ corrected. This would mean I would be paying over 600 pound for something I could have paid 200 for elsewhere. A lot of my friends have lip fillers and after my experience and result I will not be recommending skin. In fact I will be doing quite the opposite to anyone that will listen!!!

The ladies are always lovely and very welcoming, Shabanna is very professional and very re-assuring about the treatments she carries out.  I have found their products good value for money and last several weeks.  I have definitely noticed an improvement in my skin since having treatments

I thought it was overpriced in comparison to previous Botox I have had. I was also unable to see the doctor in the two week follow up period because he was unable to make the booked appointment and I was going on holiday the next week after the two week period. I was also not impressed by the result and if I had been seen at the scheduled appointment I would have asked for a top up. So all in all not impressed. I was going to have IPL  for photo rejuvenation but I am probably going to cancel any further treatment discussed at the initial meeting and request my �50 deposit back and seek treatment elsewhere.
very satisfied with the result

I made an appointment based on a promotion due to the opening of the new store and wasn't disappointed. The staff are lovely, very friendly and informative. Always looking to make you feel welcome and answer every question you have. In terms of the treatment itself, I'm very pleased so far, Rebecca was great at settling my nerves and reassuring me about the treatment process. I would recommend Sk:n to anyone!

review_title: Good Service- seems worth the money!
review_body: As a South Asian I'm on the slightly hairier end of the scale. Normally if I want to stay stubble free all day I would have to spend at least 10 minutes shaving my legs first thing in the morning AND again before I go to bed. And I would STILL have those horrible black dots on my legs that come from having very dark hair follicles, so skirts were always a no go for me. The treatment process HURTS in some places, but since having my first treatment the speed at which my hair grows has reduced dramatically- I can actually go all weekend without shaving my legs and not feel stubbly. I'm not saying it will work that way for everyone- my black dots are still there but I assume they will go away as I continue with the course. But for me it has absolutely proven that it was worth the pain and every single penny, and I can't wait to see what my legs will look like once I've finished the course.
Great service very professional
Friendly and experienced staff. I would recommend this clinic
Had laser verucca treatment - with a completely disastrous experience. Long list of issues:
Love the hair removal results!!

I booked a treatment for lip filler and was given plenty of information and advice.  The treatment was not too painful and was administered by a friendly nurse who was completely understanding of my concerns.  The results were acceptable but I was hoping for a little more.  However I will follow the advice given and would always recommend this company

I had laser treatment for facial thread veins at Glasgow clinic, by an NHS doctor, My face was burned.  I suffered from severe swelling and blisters, I visited my GP three times for treatment.  I went back to complain and was told I had signed a disclaimer that says scarring can occur, so no comeback.  They could not care less.  I now have permenant scars in 7 places on my face.  I was told it is rare to happen just one in a hundred, Not rare then!  Would never use again
Profesional treatment

review_title: Leslie always provides a professional and caring service
review_body: The whole team in Nottingham are professional and polite however I am disappointed to see that I've had no response from my rating and comments about your call centre!

review_title: Fantastic team to deal with and great results
review_body: I found the skins team very professional and pleasant and made me feal very much at ease. Very impressed with results so far
Sk:n provided me with a high quality level of service from my initial enquiry right through to each treatment.

review_title: Very friendly and set you at ease. Would recommend them to all.
review_body: Very honest and clear with what procedures will be about and great customer service.

I had three warts on my hand, after using lots of different medications I couldn't budge them. I decided to pay a visit to Skin in Guildford. The staff were friendly and approachable. I met with a Skin consultant and explained my problem, she said laser treatment would take them off at the cost of �300.00. I decided to take the plunge and after the consent forms couldn't be found i was told we could sort the consent form after the procedure. The laser was set to 10mm which seemed pretty big at the time, I wasn't told what would happen after the procedure. The treatment was carried out and some antiseptic gel rubbed on my hand. I was given a form after the procedure to sign, as no consent form for "laser wart removal" could be found I was made to sign a "laser vein removal" form then sent on my way without any other advice. The past 5 weeks have been a nightmare. Being a plumbing and heating engineer I need my hand for work, my job description was listed on my personal details when I arrived. Day two of the procedure I had to go to the doctors as the burns looked serious, they described the wounds as "serious", I was bandaged up and sent away, I spent a week off work as I couldn't use my hand, one of the warts was on my knuckle so the burn means I can't move that finger. A week later the wounds seemed to get worse, I walked into a pharmacy to have them take another look, they looked shocked and advised me to go to hospital, after a hospital visit I was bandaged up again. I'm going to left with pretty bad scars and still have a bandage on the deep wound apparent on my knuckle. I would say whoever did my procedure didn't really know what they were doing and I'm pretty sure I'm scared for life, if you read this review I'll be more than happy to send you the photos of my hand after the procedure leading up to now 5 weeks on, you will be shocked.
Amazing clinic with friendly and helpful professionals. It works for me, so why don't you try it too?
Excellent treatment! I've been scared of having a laser hair removal for the first time but it went smoothly without any problems and the results are outstanding!
The woman I spoke to kept getting the months wrong when I was talking to her and was confused about what I needed to get done. It left me unconfident that I have the right appointment

Jeanette was very thorough in her treatment and she is by far the best practitioner I've come across. I've previously had laser hair removal and Jeanette was very friendly and very professional in her approach.
Received excellent treatment and after care. Pleased with results
You cant beat paying a small amount of money,  to instantly get access to speak to a top professional and get the job done.

I visited the Skin clinic at victoria for a consultation. I was welcomed by the lovely staff members who immediately put me at ease and answered all the questions i had. I decided to go ahead with the treatment around my chin area. So far i have had 2 treatments but my god what a difference it has made. I am so happy i finally made the decision to go ahead with laser hair removal @ Skin clinic.
The tecnucoan put me at my ease since she knew I was anxious
With a number of acne patches and almost boil like problems on my face, I came to SK:N in hope they would be able to help get rid of these.
Was really happy with the service received. Felt very relaxed and would definitely recommend the treatment to friends. My skin has been 100% better since.
Excellent service ! Results seen from first visit!

Very impressed with the Laser Hair Removal treatment, although the procedure is a bit nippy after the first round I'm delighted with the results so far. Staff are professional, friendly and courteous.

SKIN are very professional, clean and efficient. I have had 2 treatments with them and have been impressed with the results.  The only reason why I don't give top marks is I have come away with a lot of questions and uncertainties about either the products, aftercare / side effects after a glycolic peel. Please produce a handout on what to expect, the products you should use and how to use them.
Lovely staff and clinic
I have tried other laser hair removal before however the laser they use here are far superior and much more effective.

I went for my first botox in my frown line. The doctor was very informative and was keen to listen to my expectations and explained exactly how it would work. They recommend a visit after two weeks to check it has worked well and if you need a top up they do it free of charge. Will definitely go back.

review_title: Provided exactly what I needed - not cheap, but good. Thank you
review_body: My treatment not available on the NHS so a professional solution needed and found. Highly recommended.
Lovely staff, very clean, amazing advice, good quality and most of all fantastic results love it, love it, love it, thanks

review_title: Expensive and given the wrong advice
review_body: I attended the skin edinburgh clinic for some advice on one large milia spot on my face. Despite the consultation costing �100 I felt rushed and was told bluntly that I would need a small operation requiring stitches leaving a permanent scar on my face to get rid of it. The operation was going to cost hundreds. I left the consultation feeling disheartened. Luckily I sought a second opinion at another clinic in Edinburgh. They offered a free consultation, they were lovely and they confidently treated the milia with electrolysis which worked amazingly. The treatment lasted less than a minute and the spot was gone within two weeks without any stitching or scarring! I am so happy I got a second opinion and did not go on the advice of this doctor.
Very professional, knowledgeable and friendly staff
I had 3 different nurses during my 8 treatments - not ideal as they each carried out the treatment slightly differently.
Definitely the place to go for beauty procedures.
Great service very welcoming extremley good
The staff are brilliant and very knowledgeable.  They are always ask if you are comfortable and are prepared to answer any questions you ask.  The treatment works!!

I experienced an unintentional, but obviously undesirable eye droop following Botox administered by the most senior member of staff (a plastic surgeon).
