I pay premium rates for this level of expertise for obvious reasons and I understand that there is always a risk of a droop, but when this occurred and I was told nothing could be done about it, other than just waiting til the Botox wore off, I was disappointed that I wasn't offered something in return as s gesture of good will, given I am a loyal customer paying premium rates. I would have at least like to have been given my next treatment free. I will remain loyal to Skin as I do feel they are the best out there, but if this can happen with someone so qualified, I would think twice about paying the Surgeon rate again for future treatments. The episode has made me think I might as well just go with one of the experienced (and lovely) nurses. This has been both an eye-opener and AND eye-closer of an experience for me!
Love the service, love the tailor made package to my skin and needs and love Gupriya!! She makes me feel so welcome and comfortable throughout every appointment!

After having years of different treatments ie waxing electrolysis ipl threading none of it worked except for the first week then a friend told me about skin so went had consultation they told me about what they would do booked 8 treatments of laser after 3 sessions could see it was starting to work now after having all eight I am hair free and it has not come back the nurse I had Catherine was excellent she was a book of information definitely recommend skin and would go back if need be .
Treatment done by specialist is excellent
Professional staff, relaxed environment
I would recommend this company to anyone. The people who work there, all of them are friendly and really helpful.

review_title: The staff were fantastic and delivered the treatment with impressive efficiency,  precision and care.
review_body: As stated in the title I gave 5 stars because I can't fault the expertise with which the staff carried out the treatment, and they were all lovely ladies. The only time that was noticeably worse than the others was when I was being treated by a staff member visiting from the Newcastle branch and I found her to be much less consistent which made it far more unpleasant. I should say I was getting laser hair removal and as always your pain tolerance and your results may vary (do your research) but I'm extremely pleased with both the service and my personal hairlessness!
Customer service is fab! It's always lovely to see the smiley girls!

Had reservations  re. "treating " myself to having laser treatment  for the red thread veins on my cheeks.  The nurse put me at ease and made it as comfortable  experience  that she could. Friendly staff,comfortable  surroundings. So handy for the train station.

The staff are very knowledgeable and friendly, everything is explained exactly as it is going to happen so you feel at ease and relaxed. Your expectations are put in real terms and not a fantasy world which is confidence inspiring. I have been seen on time every time so there isn't much waiting around and the staff are very professional. I would recommend a consultation if this is what you are looking for because it's reasonably priced so not bank breaking.

I've only had two tattoo removal sessions so far. But service I've received has been great. All the members of staff I came across were really nice. And most importantly my tattoo has started fading already. Excellent experience

review_title: Professional and lovely staff, with great results of treatments.
review_body: I've been a client of skn for a very few years now. Absolutely lovely staff, extremely polite, plesant to be around, professional in their work. Knowledgable about treatments in which are delivered, great product knowledge too.
Total confidence in Elizabeth who does my treatment. Puts me at ease
when is the machine coming back very disappointed that this was removed had 4 treatments and was pleased and lots of other members were keen to sign up for Lypo treatment why was the machine removed?

review_title: Laser hair removal for underarms and hollywood
review_body: My expierence at skin clinic Norwich was bad. I supposed to have my laser hair removal treatment at 11.15, they been running late half an hour, then they told me that I will be having procedure with other practicioner, she was the one who did once my laser treatment and she was bad, there was no improvent on my hair loss/growth, just the waste of 210� , because girl was new she didnt know how to control laser, but is not my problem, Im paying every time Im coming 210 �, now in total I had 6 procedures( including the bad one too), so I said no to do this treatment again with this new girl. That's why my expierence wasnt good with this clinic.

The staff really do try & give the best procedures that I need, I dont feel like I'm being forced into buying a product I don't really need. It's not a money making thing, it's giving the right advice to the patient.

I'm having laser hair removal at Victoria Street and so far is great! I had 6 sessions and two more to go! The customer service there is excellent! I hope that no hair will grow back so I can go back and do more treatments on the rest of my body and be hair free :)

Easy to book an appointment, was seen at a time convenient with my working day (an evening appointment), Was told at initial consultation that  the skin tags could be removed the same night if I could wait until the other patients had been seen, so waited and the three skin tags I was unhappy with were removed the same night, with no issues. Had no issues since, all areas healed quickly, very happy with the service received and would happily recommend SK:N for this treatment.
Excellent customer service and treatments
The staff at the London Wall Clinic are always very polite and friendly. I am really happy with the results of my treatment so far.
Well pleased with this service from professional staff.
always helpful and nice

I've been utilising the services of the SK:N clinic in Edgbaston, Birmingham for over ten years and I can honestly say that I would not go anywhere else.  The staff are exceptional in the highly skilled services that they provide; and are very warm, friendly and professional at all times.  All I can say is THANK YOU SK:N FOR MAKING ME LOOK AND FEEL FABULOUS!
Thank you Nilly( Bham bull st) Treatment has worked wanders

review_title: Excellent and always friendly and helpful
review_body: I have used Skin clinics for laser hair removal  after a recommendation  and always find the staff professional and friendly.

The clinic was recommended to my daughter by an NHS skin specialist for thread veins. This could not be carried out by NHS so he recommended laser treatment by SK:N. He advised not to go to a beauticians as they only had one type of laser, unlike the clinic who have various different types. The staff are all long serving professionals and extremely friendly. They tell you the best option for your treatment, the most economical package and are truthful about any risks. They also set expectations as to how successful the treatment can be. I wouldn't think twice about passing on their details to friends and family!

Leigh at Victoria branch has been the most professional and thoughtful consultant. She identified how best to carry out my treatment and completed as she had explained. I am pleased with the results and how it had been carried out.

Have been coming here for years it's recently been taken over by skn clinics the staff are wonderful and very knowledgeable I've never felt pressurised into unnecessary treatments and I trust the staff and feel safe in their hands would recommend highly
Professional service. You feel in safe and knowledgeable hands when you visit the clinic.
Very good friendly service. Would highly recommend

review_title: Fantastic company,  very professional and supportive.  I would recommend to anyone.
review_body: When I first visited sk:n Southampton I was suffering from severe acne and was at a very low point mentally.  My consultant, Chloe, was so nice to me and really supportive.  She gave me so much information about my skin and lots if simple tips I could implement straight away to help my skin as well as going through treatment options. Chloe remained my consultant throughout all of my treatments and even though they couldn't promise that the treatments would help she remained positive and was always so friendly and welcoming everytime I went in. She always performed the treatments professionally and we eventually got the desired results and I couldn't be happier.  My acne has completely cleared up and and I feel so much more confident with my improved skin. All that's left for me now is to have some scar treatment and seeing how well my first lot of treatments went I can't wait to see the results from the next lot. I wouldn't hesitate recommending skin to anyone, the results I've seem have been brilliant!
I always feel welcome & the treatment I receive is very professional.
Professional staff who look after you every step of the way. I found cindy to be very knowledgable and made me comfortable through the treatment.
Just excellant the staff were freindly and made me feel relaxed and at ease really rate this service.
very happy with the service and progress so far
I am so impressed with the professionalism of the staff who take great care to make sure the treatment is a positive experience.

review_title: Always leave smiling ! Kaz is such a star and truly makes you feel comfortable
review_body: I will only use this company from now on wish I'd started sooner
I was very happy with the treatment I have received so far.

Excellent treatment, lovely staff. Made me feel relaxed! Looking forward to my next treatment

I couldn't have asked for better treatment.  My doctor made sure I was comfortable throughout and despite it taking longer did my stitching in such a way to ensure minimal scar rather than getting it done fast.

Personnel  very polite and professional.Administration of  treatment -excellent ! Arrangements for appointment ver. Y poor! Advised in advance that appointment was at Mansfield road Clinic,only to get there and be told that I was at the wrong clinic!! Appointment was at West Bridgeford !
I'm getting hair laser. It hurts but was told to use Dr numb and it made a BIG difference! I'm comfortable getting the treatment done.
Stuff is friendly and explains clearly, treatment are great

Love coming to get my treatment done, think staff are wonderful and professional.

I go to Sheffield Skin Clinic and couldn't speak highly of the treatments and staff. I see Angela Johnson who is very caring and professional who I trust to treat me. Also I find the offers very helpful tool as if having several sessions treatments can become costly.

Professional team

Professional staff, excellent service and so pleased with the results of treatment. Would definitely recommend sk:n to everyone!

I've had a fantastic experience so far during my laser hair removal course of treatment. Alarmed at first but now 3weeks into first treatment and can see a real difference. Highly recommend this treatment. Two more to go!

They aren't cheap but you get what you pay for and I'm not happy trusting my face and skin to just anyone.  I have and will continue to recommend Skin to anyone who will listen!

I've had 1 full laser hair removal treatment done and I'm half way through my second and third areas. I've been coming to Sk:n for over a year now and I feel like I would trust my therapist Natalie with my life. Not once have I been in pain from the treatment (during or after), nor have I had a single complaint about the service I have received. The clinic is always clean, and I feel safe in Natalie's care.

The staff are really friendly and put you at ease and the treatment really works. I'm light skin dark hair and the results so far are brilliant, still have a few sessions to go but the best money I have ever spent!
Everyone is so lovely and professional. They make you feel really comfortable.
All the staff are friendly and make you feel comfortable especially Samantha at the Newcastle branch
Brilliant service from start to finish. Would recommend SK:N to anyone. The staff are lovely and really friendly and the actual procedure was quick, pain free and performed beautifully

Really not happy at all.

review_body: I was so nervous when I entered the room where the treatment was to take place.  I was immediately put at easy and all through the procedure I was engaged with the nurse which helped me.  She kept me abreast of what was happening and soon it was all over.  I must admit I wondered why I was so nervous as it was all over before I knew it.

review_title: I had a great experience with Dermal?�?
review_body: I had a great experience with Dermal Fillers in Ealing. The location was great, clinic lovely and new and clean. My appointment was on time and the nurse was lovely. Explained everything to me in a simple way with no pressure and only the truth. I was shocked when she said it could be done then and there and would only take 15 minutes as I was only expecting a consultation. But I am so glad I agreed to go for it on the same day.The nurse put me at ease, helped me with breathing exercises to ease the pain. She constantly stopped to check what I thought and how it looked. She made sure I was ok at all times and ultimately she did a great job with my lips. My friend has already booked in for hers to be done after speaking to me and seeing mine! I will definitely be coming back for a top up and other treatments (took me years to be convinced to even have a treatment like this so that's saying something!)

Amazing as always! My journey with Mya has been one of the best decisions I have made. They are a little more pricey than others around but the before and aftercare, along with the girls they have working in the Newcastle branch, made it all worth it. The Newcastle girls, Julie, Louise and Charlotte are very professional, friendly and most of all caring which is what you want when going through a life changing decision. Right from the start I was made to feel welcomed and comfortable. So happy with my results, they are amazing thanks to Mr Mahdi. You have resorted my confidence. Thank you all for everything, my journey has been amazing

review_title: My experience with MYA has been amazing?�?
review_body: My experience with MYA has been amazing from start to finish thanks to my P.C Hannah who made sure I was well informed, comfortable and ready at every step. Right from the 1st meeting she was really friendly and yet super professional covering every necessary step (from finances, pre-operative plus post operative information) and connecting me with the perfect surgeon for my procedure (Dr. Sleiter, he's brilliant).

So far my journey with mya has been amazing right from making my very first appointment.  The friendly welcoming reception staff/the hosts where amazing.  My biggest worry was walking in and feeling judged but from the moment I walked into what felt like mya world was amazing.  My consultation went great, finally someone who understood my needs.  Booking the next appointment getting finance, meeting the surgeon, everything just went so smooth, planned to perfection.  Extremely professional team.
Terrible. Money grabbers, liars and professionals at keeping your money that doesn't belong to them

I went to Leeds branch for a consultation with Katie and spoke with her over the phone, got made to feel really comfortable while I was there and while speaking over the phone. Lovely set of people & I can't  wait to go again in April ?��?

Currently awaiting surgery day but everything up to yet has been such an amazing experience, from being so nervous receiving my first phone call to putting my absolute trust into everyone I have delt with with at MYA and feeling more than comfortable, has been amazing. I?��m sure I?��ll be leaving another review after my surgery day leaving nothing but positive comments

review_title: I think my experience with MYA has been?�? welcoming and filling me with confidence
review_body: I think my experience with MYA has been 5 star. The surgeons and staff are of the highest quality and you can tell. They offer the most comfortable experience and truly do care. They won?��t push or rush you and they make sure you are happy no matter what.  The prices are great considering the quality. I have tried elsewhere and have found MYA to be far superior.  I have every confidence and trust in MYA which I have not found with others and would not consider risking going elsewhere as they just wouldn?��t be the same.  The staff have been incredibly welcoming and friendly and everything is explained clearly with it all being reiterated in literature that you can read over and over again at your own pace at home.  The clinics are nice and clean with a less surgical feel with helps me to feel at ease. At no point have I felt like the staff are just after making money, they give you plenty of breathing space and do not make you get ahead of yourself.

After spending thousands of pounds with this awful, unethical company I expected a little more than a bodged job, a lashing of verbal abuse from my surgeon, constant stalling, and countless amounts of posts and pictures removed from the forum. The 'open & honest forum' was one of the main reasons I chose MYA as none of the other providers had this. What I didn't know at the time is that it's far from honest as anybody having problems after surgery, or ending up with horrendous results are gagged, ignored and simply cannot post about their experience. Aftercare is non existent when it is really needed as is the companys complaints procedure. That's when the hell really begins and unfortunately I am not the only case. This is not just the only company with a forum but they are the only cosmetic surgery company to have a group solely for their victims! (MYA Cosmetic Surgery Justice)

review_body: I am exceptionally happy with the results and the surgery day itself was smooth and the staff were extremely attentive. I genuinely enjoyed the day of the surgery and I feel as if my new breasts suit me body so well - I really feel like this was me all along.

I am so happy I chose to have my surgery through MYA, from start to finish the consultant, the nurse and the surgeon were just amazing. I would like to say a huge thanks to the fabulous nurses and care team who looked after me at the first trust hospital in Preston nothing was too much trouble for them and I felt well looked after. Absolute 5 star service.
Very friendly,  made to feel relaxed,  highly reccomend

I had such a pre conceived idea about cosmetic surgery before going to MYA I researched for 2 years before even contemplateing going to a consultation. From the very first steps MYA made everything so personal and easy. I had my consultation with my surgeon and knew I was in safe hands. I had a few issues with mental health and they talked me through my options and helped every step of the way. My Patient Coordinator Natalie answered all my questions promptly and I emailed her quite a lot haha! She was amazing. On the day of surgery I went to Preston First Trust and wow!!! What amazing staff they have there I had such a wonderful experience. My recovery has been great although I underestimated how hard it would be with a baby. All in all I would 10000% recommend MYA to any of my friends and family. The best experience and I am in love with my new boobs they look so natural!!! Beyond happy!

review_title: Does anyone have the email address for?�?
review_body: Does anyone have the email address for complaints please
Excellent service and care from start to finish.

My experience with Mya was upsetting and stressful. After 6 months of planning, consultations, pre op appointments, travelling to and from the clinic and arranging mine and my partners work and other commitments around my planned surgery and appointments.. it was cancelled 1 week before I was supposed to under go the procedure. I was extremely upset and the options offered to me were to have a full refund or start the whole process again with another surgeon. The whole process meaning all my pre op appointments that had taken me months to under go, and to start the process again in 6 weeks time. I was never really offered an explanation as to why my surgery was cancelled at such short notice and asked for a manager to contact me as I felt I had wasted a lot of time and felt that the options I had been given were not particularly adequate. When I finally got hold of a manager, I found them particularly rude and whilst I was trying to explain the situation was basically told it wasn?��t Mya?��s fault. The manager also kept trying to pin the blame on my Patient Co-ordinator, who i actually felt was not to blame in any way, but she had just been in the unfortunate position of having to tell me that my surgery had been cancelled at short notice. When I tried to explain this to the practice manager, as I felt she was putting words in my mouth, she asked me if I was actually going to let her talk? I was disgusted! I had contacted her to make sure this experience didn?��t happen to anyone else and to explain that I felt it could have been handled better. I felt it was inappropriate to speak to me like that, and after all, I was blameless in this situation. I had wasted a lot of time, money and planning to ensure my surgery could go ahead. Even after all of this, is took almost a month to get my refund. This made it difficult for me as was then in a position where I had to start the whole process again with another company, and Mya had my money! I felt badly let down by Mya. I would never recommend them, and am disgusted with the way I was spoken to by a Practice Manager. I never had an explanation, complete waste of my time.

review_title: I only made an inquiry with MYA about?�?
review_body: I only made an inquiry with MYA about rhinoplasty, and the way they hounded my phone with calls just seemed off for a "reputable" company. Should we feel more indulged due to all the celebrity endorsements?! Absolutely not. I just wanted reassurance that I would be paired up with a talented surgeon who could achieve the look I was after. In the end, I went elsewhere for my surgery with no regrets and I'm very happy with the outcome.

Cosmetic surgery is something I've thought about pretty much since I was old enough to know what it was, but I honestly had no clue where or how to even start the process. Well, I think there is definitely a reason MYA is the most well known provider of cosmetic surgery. The whole process since the initial consultation has been streamlined - so simple and easy! I cannot fault any of the staff at the MYA Fitzroy at all, everyone I have met have been so caring, friendly and informative. All my questions, no matter how small or silly, have been answered and I felt so comfortable heading in to my surgery. The post op care has also been fantastic! I am so happy that I made this decision, and even happier that I made it with MYA

My girlfriend was ment to have breast arrangement on the 13th of December, but now it is going to be on the 10th of December giving her and my self 3 days notice to sort work and a hotel, which we had already booked and can't get a refund! And if she couldn't do that the earliest they could do is after April which I believe is almost blackmailing her into saying yes to the 10th! We have both booked days off work and I had to turn down overtime to take her on the 13th, mya won't compensate for this or the hotel! I think it's horrid that they can change the date that close to the time and basically blackmailing her in to having to take the date they've changed it to!

review_title: Please, please avoid this machine like soul-less company
review_body: The thought of anybody going through what my sister and I experienced at the London clinic with Mr Mashadi recently horrifies me and I feel I must speak up to stop this happening to somebody else.  Deciding to have surgery is such a huge decision and when you get past the initial consultation stage and decide to go ahead only to have the surgeon you have been recommended completely demoralise and patronise you it is so upsetting.  I feel this company are a machine - they churn people in and out with no thought to the fact that it is the first time for many people.  There was so much wrong with our experience - it may be that he was having a long hard day, we were seen towards at the end of the day, but he literally had zero time and interest.

I have now the body I always dreamt! I saw different doctor in my life and according to them there were no chance for me but abdominoplastic, because of my skin elasticity. I am only 30 without child! Dr Joffily told me to not worry. I had the lipo! The result after only one week were amazing! My skin is perfect! He was so quite and he ensured me.

They are the best ?�?

review_title: My experience with Mya was awful
review_body: My experience with Mya was awful. My patient co-ordinator only tended to contact me via text so if I had questions I would have to try and get hold of her by phone which was no easy task. They got my medical notes and noticed I had trichotillomania which they did not know what it was but decided this was a medical issue and I needed to get consent from my doctor that I was medically fit. They only got my medical notes in October after my consultation was in July my op was due in December and they had already taken my �500 deposit to secure a date. Mya said they just needed a signed form saying that states I am medically fit. But as I am chasing this back and forth it turned out there was another form that Mya had sent. Eventually I got a letter from my doctor stating that mine is a habit not a medical problem. But now Mya did not care to see it after me paying for that letter. Mya keep saying I had therapy when I didn't I did a questionnaire! The head nurse never met me she just pulled out of thin air that I may pull my stitches out. Shows lack of knowledge on trich. So little is known about it and I have never seen it as a medical problem, I have a mild case and I forget I have it as I cant remember not having it so its just part of me.

review_title: Rhinoplasty - worst decision of my life
review_body: I went for a consultation at MYA and met with a very pushy sales person who recommended a surgeon for Rhinoplasty (Dr Giannitrapani). This doctor told me what he could do for me and I felt confident that he knew what he was talking about and the procedure would go well. I was happy for around 3 days after seeing my results, however things changed drastically over the course of a year. It was as if my old nose ?��grew back?��. My nose was left deviated, wide and completely unsymmetrical, one nostril blocked and totally bulbous. It took 6 months for MYA to arrange for me to see my surgeon who told me to come back at 1 year and arranging the second appointment was just as much of a battle. I told my surgeon my concerns and he made me feel terrible telling me I had unrealistic expectations and admitting no fault, but also agreeing to a revision. However having researched him more I am totally unconfident in his ability to revise my nose and will have to pay to go elsewhere. If I had been allowed the time to think about the procedure and research more I would have found the countless other patients he has botched and chosen to go to someone more capable. But I was offered lucrative discounts (�500 off) and last minute cancellation dates to cut the wait time signficantly as long as I put the full amount down within a week. This company is unethical, unprofessional and run by halfwits who can?��t manage their own diaries let alone the care you deserve when paying �6000+ for surgery.

review_title: Had the worst experience with MYA
review_body: Had the worst experience with MYA, when I had my consultation with the surgeon they didn't feel me with any confidence, rude and felt as though the appointment was rushed. I went on to see more consultants I agreed to book to have a nose job paid out �9500 got my operation date in and then got an phone call to say they have double booked and cant fit me in on that day anymore and then next appointment is in months time. I didn't end up going with them whole experience was terrible, also took ages to get my money back !!!

At first thought the process was really good and staff were all super friendly then had my op, surgeon was lovely and check ups were regular and okay. Felt one of the nurses checked me out better than the other though. Told them every time I wasn?��t happy with my end results. You?��re supposed to have 3 month appointment to discuss it all with your surgeon, still heard nothing 4 months on. I have chased with my office near me who apologised and said they?��ve messaged the London clinic to see what?��s going on and had no response back. Feels like they?��re longing me off on purpose because I?��m unhappy with it. If they were trying to leave it longer for a perticular reason wouldve been nice to be informed rather than left in the dark.

review_body: I had my first meeting with MYA a couple of day ago. The receptionist was friendly and welcoming, first impressions were great and the consultation was easy and she covered everything I needed to know x

Absolutely amazing! Went for my consultation in the Leeds clinic and had patient coordinator Aimee she has been so caring and supportive throughout my entire boob journey. My surgeon Andrea Giannitrapani has the hands of a god, I was left very disfigured after breast feeding and he has worked a miracle on my breast augmentation and nipple surgery I can not thank him enough for giving me my confidence back the results are more than I could of ever dreamed of.

I would defiantly reccomend MYA cosmetics. The staff are professional and very understanding with any concerns I had/have. My patient coordinator Katy at the Leeds clinic is so positive and this has helped me throughout the journey. My nurse Donna has reassured me throughout the experience and been very patient with me when I'm constantly ringing her. I have no regrets at all!

When I arrived, Mia at Fitzroy, a lovely nurse was a great help, so friendly and really put me at ease, she was relaxed and calm and took time to speak. Everything was pretty straight forward and explained well. The only thing that dampened the experience was a rude polish surgeon/Doctor, older lady with short blondish  wispy hair who was rushing me down to theatre, she was moaning at the doctor with me for taking too long, at my most nervous point I was made to feel like cattle being ushered back to the farm. Apart from that I cannot fault anyone they are all lovely and you receive a personal service tailored to you. Thank you again Mia you really helped making me feel at ease and relaxed, also thank you to Joanna, who was very helpful and never made me feel a burden and was very patient helping me x
Do NOT use them!!!

Cannot praise Mya enough. Fantastic service from. Consultation to operation. Great communication.. Always happy to help and keep you informed.  There are so many clinics to choose from but you really do get what you pay for. Quality is important. Thank you to Candice, Laura and Grace at MYA Liverpool. Xx

I am completely satisfied with my surgery and my surgeon was excellent...however I would urge anybody who lives far away from the clinics to investigate closer options because the amount of post op appointments that Mya require was not made clear to me in my consultations...also the communication between the staff who chance medical details was not very clear. If mya where to establish a clinic closer to me I certainly would consider them if I should need them in the future.

The lead up to the surgery was very comforting and made me feel calm about the procedure. Dr Andrea was the best surgeon I could have asked for, friendly and chatty making me feel really positive about the whole experience. I am in love with the results and have never felt so confident before in my life. Louise was an amazing nurse too, who made a huge effort to make sure I was relaxed through my recovery as well as in the post op appointments. Thank you Mya :)
Great aftercare and support would recommend

review_title: I was completely over whelmed by how?�?
review_body: I was completely over whelmed by how good they were in the beginning. Everything was done quickly and I got my surgery 2 months after the initial appointment. It was after my surgery it went bad. I have received absolutely no after care what?��s so ever from the company. I haven?��t even heard about my post op with the surgeon. I had to cancel my post op with the nurse and was told she would ring me on my allotted time the next day to discuss a few things. I heard nothing. I haven?��t heard anything since even after calling, and texting my patient co ordinator. I have had issue with my breasts which I needed questions answers eg. Why after 2 months do I have rippling in both breast with the silicone gel implants? I have heard nothing. I paid an awful amount of money to get bad service and no aftercare.

MYA have been amazing from start to finish, I have been given all the information I needed and support and patience! My boobs are amazing shape and size for my frame, I can?��t wait to be on the beach ?�ɍ.
Amazing from start to (nearly) finish. I'm 2 weeks post op and already know it's the best decision I've ever made for me and have my confidence back.

review_title: My consultation was cancelled twice so?�?
review_body: My consultation was cancelled twice so it was very frustrating as each time there was about a months wait inbeteeen.
Best esperient ever answered any questions I needed and surgery was fantastic felt really relaxed and happy with my surgert highly recommended and amazing results

review_title: I?��ve found my experience at MYA so much?�?
review_body: I?��ve found my experience at MYA so much better than I expected. Everyone was so helpful and explained everything in a clear and easy to understand manner. I felt put at my ease about the procedure and after care which was very helpful for me. Thank you.

Definitely would not recommend! I booked my surgery, the day before I was due to travel down to London they rang and cancelled. Surgery was then rebooked for 4 days later, I travelled 150 miles down to London, was waiting to go down to theatre and they cancelled again! Due to the nurse signing me off without all my medical history from the doctors. Very poor communication throughout my whole experience with mya! They only seem interested in you when you are in the stages of booking, as soon as they have your money they could not care less.

review_title: I?��ve had the perfect experience with?�?
review_body: I?��ve had the perfect experience with mya! From day one I?��ve felt comfortable, at ease with everything and I have had very little questions as everything has been explained to me in the best way! My surgery went amazing and all the staff were fab! Did everything to make sure I was okay and calmed my nerves when needed! Couldn?��t thank the staff enough and I would recommend to anyone! Thankyou mya!
Absolutely FANTASTIC.... Can't fault them Dr G did a brilliant job on my nose.... Staff were good and Very helpful.... They just need to lower they're prices a little but that's the only downside....

My patient co-ordinator was absolutely fab during my time with mya. I saw a surgeon in Manchester called Mr Netri and I was not happy at all with my consultation I came out of the room feeling worse then I went in. The surgeon told me I was unable to have implants under the muscle and that he would need a second opinion whether I needed an uplift or not.  I did not understand why an uplift would even be in question as I?��m a 23 year old girl who was a B cup and did not have much breast in the first place, with one breast slightly larger then the other breast. I left the practice not knowing we?��re i stood and was in tears feeling all sorts of thoughts. I have recently just had a breast augmentation yesterday with another surgeon!! I never needed an uplift and I was able to have my implants under the muscle like I wanted and I?��m absolutely overwhelmed with the results. It felt like I saw a cowboy cosmetic surgeon at MYA that wanted to give me cosmetic treatment that would cost me more money that was unescessary.

review_title: Great experience from the beginning to?�?
review_body: Great experience from the beginning to the end of my appointment. I given honest and professional advice.
Excelent from

First surgeon had poor listening skills.  Second surgeon said he would do an op, which was booked and then at second consultant (which they said I didn't need to attend - thank go I did!) he changed his mind, leaving me with a �7500 loan but no op booked.  Took ages to get my deposit back as it was processed incorrectly.  Overall a really disappointing roller coaster experience.  I think they are only keen to work with younger patients where they can guarantee a perfect result - I was happy with just looking better than I do now but they were insisting on further operations to achieve perfection.  Would hesitate to try them again.  On the positive, my patient coordinator was brilliant.

review_title: MYA was recommended by a friend of mine?�?
review_body: MYA was recommended by a friend of mine who had previously had surgery. I have been to a few consultations with different companies, however, MYA was my preferred option. The reasons for this was I had a fantastic patient coordinater and everything was explained in through detail. My surgeon who was Mr Mahdi was very welcoming and had given me his honest opinions prior to surgery, this helped me with my decisions and chose to book breast augmentation with him. Having had my surgery very recently I am over the moon with the results and he is a very professional may I add. He is well mannered, compassionate and has a very high level of professionalism. Overall, I am giving Mya 10/10.

review_title: I'm happy with my breast enlargement overall...
review_body: I'm happy with my breast enlargement overall however the care could be improved.

review_title: Nottingham Clinic and Mr Mounir... amazing!
review_body: Laura was an incredible PC. The girls at the Nottingham clinic were amazing. They answered all my questions and still continue to do so even though I?��m 6 months post op. Mr Mounir was the most suited and best surgeon I could have asked for. If I had more cosmetic surgery I would go back without a doubt!

review_title: Great care all staff are fantastic I?�?

review_title: I honestly couldn?��t be more impressed?�?
review_body: I honestly couldn?��t be more impressed if I tried and I highly recommend MYA! from day one of my journey I felt at ease and in safe hands :)

So I thought MYA was the place to go for me, I?��ve heard really good things about them and the results from the surgeon I wanted looked amazing! Exactly what I wanted! My initial consultation meeting was okay, it was very brief, but maybe that?��s just how they?��re suppose to be. Anyways a few days later I messaged to book to see the surgeon and for her to send me the finance link, she only sent the link. A week later I asked about the appointment again I got totally blanked! It?��s now been 3 weeks since I sent the messages about meeting the surgeon! I?��m not happy about all!
Staff so helpfull, always fitted in for appointments whist post op and needed reassuring from nurse.

review_title: I have had such a brilliant experiance?�?

Best company ever MYA!!!!! My experience with them was amazing!!! MAKE YOURSELF AMAZING ?�??�??�??�??��?
My friend recently had a procedure which at the moment, seems to be ok.

Biggest mistake of my life, if 100% sure your surgery will go as planned then your aftercare might be great, if you run into problems and require revision you have the most draining degrading journey ahead of you and will need thousands to pay somebody else to put it right, 15 months post op, double bubble in both, animation deformity, lateral displacement, telemastia and muscle damage, revision refused, 7K-9K to find to get me out of the pain ive been in since the day of the op, can't even wear a bra it hurts so much, if your considering using them please do your research on the facebook groups first and not on the MYA space forum as bad reviews are removed then girls are blocked or deleted if they continue to beg for help or to warn others, please search the facebook groups

I am 8weeks post op and I Couldn?��t of gone with a better company they have all been amazing and friendly!!! I felt comfortable at all my consultations, I would recommend mya to anyone! Also couldn?��t of picked a better surgeon ( Mr Marcellino) Im so happy with the results!

review_title: I've been thinking about doing a nose?�?
review_body: I've been thinking about doing a nose job since forever, so I finally did some more research and chose to go with Mya. Sherene my Mya girl coordinator was the best and couldn't have asked for a supportive and amazing person...she was always there to answer my calls, messages and answer any questions I needed. She was also able to allow me to have two appointments in one day, due to living far. Even now after my surgery she asks how im doing and always ask for some photos, she really does care and honestly made a friend out of this whole experience! She is now going to be my mums mya girl coordinator which is also amazing! Thank you! Also want to say thank you to my surgeon as I am loving my nose so much!! No regrets..just love love love it! Xx

review_title: Their customer service is an absolute?�?
review_body: Their customer service is an absolute joke I have never had a call, or reply to any texts I have sent my PC I have rang the office many if times they have no idea how to answer even the simplest of questions, say they will always call me back and never do, I have now been forced to cancel my surgery I have lost complete faith in the company

review_title: From the start all staff have been very?�?
review_body: From the start all staff have been very helpful and make you feel comfortable I've had a very good experience with mya and very happy with my breast enlargement, I would highly recommend friends and family to MYA.

review_title: After making a formal complaint-still nothing
review_body: After making a formal complaint back in February...I AM STILL awaiting a response! Poor quality, they don?��t care once they have your money! Appalling! I would never even recommend to my worst enemy. I have been left feeling worse about my body than before.
As soon as they get your money they lose interest in you!

A fantastic, personalised experience from the first consultation appointment through to the post operative visits with the nurse. I was reassured throughout my MYA journey and have been delighted with the results, to date. My surgeon was completely honest and realistic with what he could achieve having had x2 children, both of which were breastfed until 6 months of age. MYA have given me back my confidence and I cant wait to invest in a new Summer wardrobe.

It?��s ok for some people but the wait to meet your surgeon is too long to make any decisions paying etc you must leave till the very last minute. I was promised the best surgeon for my Op but felt extremely rushed in meeting him and I felt my questions where not answered there was a language barrier and I kept asking the answers over which made me feel uneasy plus left confused about my op. Decided to go else where

Fantastic customer service from start to finish! Everyone I?��ve dealt with at MYA has been friendly, professional, cuteous & they helped to put me at ease every step of the way. Really pleased with the end result too! I absolutely recommend MYA to anyone who?��s thinking of having cosmetic surgery.

The one thing I would change with MYA is that if there is any mention of mental health issues in the initial medical survey we fill out, make this the main priority to sort out, whether it be a DR's note, letter from a councillor etc; I believe this should be done before any further process is made such meeting surgeons, nurse or any pre or post op appointments being scheduled, as this caused a lot of stress, my op was paid for and booked, met my surgeon, had my pre op (bloods etc) and all post op appointments were made to get cast/stitches removed.
Would not recommend mya fitzrovia!
Couldn?��t of asked for a better experience with mya. The team at mya Newcastle have been brilliant throughout. Highly recommend
would highly recommend, very professional and prompt

Having had my initial consultation and booked to see the surgeon, I found the surgeon rude and arrogant he wasn?��t interested in my breasts at all and he rushed my consultation to get me out the door as quick as he could, as for my pc I hardly heard from her at all other than to confirm my attendance to see the surgeon. You are paying �5k for a procedure and the service isn?��t there one bit from the beginning, why would you waste your money on this company at all? All the seem to care about is getting the money, there is no patient care or customer service at all. It?��s shocking that they have been in business this long. I wouldn?��t recommend them to anyone at all, I suggest patients considering procedures look at other clinics.
Everyone so far has been so welcoming, understanding and informative! I?��ve never felt any pressure to go ahead with the procedure!
I think it?��s not acceptable when I?��ve left a couple of emails to the coordinator and I don?��t think I?��d pursue my cosmetic surgery with Mya.

review_title: Awful- liposuction left me looking horrible
review_body: Awful company. Liposuction an absolute waste of time, my curves around my stomach are out of proportion. One is higher than the other side. I also now have a deep line above my belly button that will be there forever- I never had this before. It?��s been over a year since my surgery now and I wish I never wasted all that money, you just end up looking deformed.
Unreal! The co-ordinator i had laura was fantastic and really made me feel comfortable and was so quick to get everything rolling! She was fantastic!
Great people!I'm very happy
Absolutely Fabulous experience!! My patient cordinator Natasha Du Preez was great!!

I?��m actually disgusted at the way I?��ve been treated by MYA, I had this company recommended by both my sister and a friend, I went and had a consultation with My patient coordinator who would look after me, she was lovely, felt they were always on hand, she phoned and text regular to the point it could have been a bit forceful but I felt at ease, I saw the consultant a few weeks later and was quoted �2000 more than I initially was by her. I had to decide if I could afford as had a budget, The contact was then minimal and in fact pretty none existent and I had to chase them! review_title: Highly recommended just based on first?�?
review_body: Highly recommended just based on first consultation. Have no doubt that every other appointment will be just as lovely and the staff will be just as welcoming
Form the moment I called to make my first ever consultation appointment to my last surgeons appointment. I?��ve had the best experience I could ever imagine to have.
Great experience so far. Dr Traynor, Mya Manchester team(PC, nurse) , staff from First Trust Hospital in Preston fantastic. I am so Happy with my new breast. Best decision in my life. Best surgeon!

review_title: I am totally outraged and disappointed ?�?
review_body: I am totally outraged and disappointed at a company that clearly do not care about their customers.

I am currently 9 weeks post op and had the most amazing experience with MYA! Sherene who was my patient co-ordinater was great and so helpful from day one. She was able to provide me with all the advice and support I needed, even post op! She matched me up with Mr Jallali who was very understanding and accommodating to what I wanted and advised me on the best rout to take. He was also very supportive on the day of the surgery and very reassuring as I was slightly nervous. It was lovely to see both Sherene and Mr Jallali whilst I was in recovery and for them to check first hand that I was happy. I would with out a doubt reccomend MYA! They are such a supportive team and the nurses that take care of you after your surgery are fabulous! I felt fully supported throughout the process and still continue to feel supporte to this day. I can say that I do not have one complaint and absolutely no issues. I am so happy with my results! A big thumbs up from me!

Seeing through my breast augmentation with MYA Fitzroy clinic was one of the best decisions I have made. My patient co-ordinator, Sherene was a diamond from my first Consultation with herself. Sherene was informative, professional and provided me with all the information/advice I requested and more. Sherene recommended surgeon Mr. Jallali and she was 100% spot on. I met Mr Jallali and decided to proceed with the procedure and I couldn?��t be more happier. Mr Jallali is a master at his job and my assets are now perfect from my point of view and I feel Mr Jallali couldn?��t not have done a more magnificent job. This surgery has changed my life for the better and it?��s all thanks to Sherene, Mr Jallali and the London Clinic. I highly recommend them all to anyone even just deliberately to have a procedure carried out.

From start to finish I have received first class treatment from meeting my surgeon to the care I received at the hospital. The nurse at Birmingham clinic has been fantastic and always monitoring my healing progress. Really pleased.

review_title: Could not recommend mya enough had a
review_body: Could not recommend mya enough had a breast enlargement 7 months ago my sugoen was traynor and he?��s just amazing went above and beyond for me the staff at the newcastle clinic where brilliant Louise the nurse is lovely xxx

review_title: So grateful to MYA for changing my ?�?
review_body: So grateful to MYA for changing my life, all staff members that I?��ve dealt with at the Newcastle clinic have went above and beyond for me and I won?��t forget that. Thank you so much.

From start to finish I couldn't recommend highly enough! From setting up the first appointment, meeting with my coordinator to choosing a surgeon, to having the procedure , to the aftercare. I have been well informed, well cared for and I am completely 100% happy with my results. I was on a bad place mentally regarding my breasts. Being 29 years old with 2 children and no desire to have anymore I looked at myself in the mirror with a chest that I felt appeared like that of a very old lady. Through breastfeeding and weight gain and drastic weight loss I was left with very little breast tissue and what were empty pockets of skin. I really didnt expect much hope jn terms of improvement. My coordinator was supportive and an attentive listener (Nicky@Rodney street Liverpool) and she advised me to speak with Dr Mahdi. She told me all about him and how she felt he was the perfect choice for me through her experiences with his work. He completely was. He was honest, thorough, realistic, passionate, informative and importantly very precise. The surgery went extremely well with all involved at the hospital being exceptionally nice and the after care with my nurse Jeanette at Rodney street Liverpool has been great! She has listened, advised, supported and gone above and beyond for my care. Mya completely have your best interests at heart and will always give you their time, answer any questions and help in any way they can. If the future brought the need for further procedures I would not hesitate in using Mya and nor would i even consider anywhere else.

review_title: I had a very positive experience and I ?�?
review_body: I had a very positive experience and I am very pleased with the results of my surgery.

Before I chose to go with Mya I had read all the comments about the aftercare being really bad. It made me a bit paranoid and worried but I had seen more good reviews than bad so I decided to go ahead with my BA at MYA. I must say that everything from my initial consultation right though until now has been faultless! I'm going back in 1 week to see my surgeon for the final time for him to check all is okay etc.
Amazing aftercare, thorough and would highly recommend. I am so happy with my results. Dr Trainer was so professional and I felt very safe in his hands.

review_title: Had my ba 3 weeks ago at the London ?�?
review_body: Had my ba 3 weeks ago at the London Fitzroy clinic and so far everything is good, the nurses and all the staff are so lovely and really look after you, my surgeon Dr Fratti is amazing and gave me exactly what I asked, so far so good with my recovery, The only thing i was  dissapointed with was my patient coordinator I only ever spoke to her at my initial consultation she never replied to my messages personally it was all automated and I expected a text or call before or after my surgery just to see how it all went otherwise it would have been 5 stars xx

Great initial consultation with my PC and surgeon. Unfortunately there was a bit of a mess up by MYA very close to my operation date. However, after highlighting this was their error, MYA paid for 1 extra investigation that I needed. Surgery went well - I am pleased with the outcome so far. My surgeon (Mr Mahdi) has been excellent. I have had one post op appointment with the nurse. What was disappointing is that no-one called or followed up me personally after my op to check how I was. Overall, I?��d give the company 3/5 and my surgeon 5/5, hence the 4/5 rating.
so professional ?���

Professional and caring. Everything has been explained to me. My PC always happy to help and quick with responses even if that?��s just an email that she will get back to me later. So far so good. I?��m happy with my choice. I wouldn?��t go with anyone else but MYA! Highly recommended!

I went for my consultation at the Newcastle clinic (it's fab) the receptionist was so lovely and friendly. My PC was lovely and the nurse was great, she is very helpful They all put me at ease and were very knowledgeable. My surgeon was Mr Mounir who gave me my boobs on 20th Dec which are perfect. I had my own room at first trust hospital in Preston. I saw nurses for pre-op who were so nice and helpful, the anaesthetist met me before op and put me at ease. I woke up pain free, was given sandwiches and a cuppa then discharged a few hours after. The aftercare is fab. I felt so supported. Can't recommend MYA enough!
Great experience - fab organisation, amazing surgeon and PC.

MYA is a fantastic company who look after, don't put pressure on you and have your best interests at heart. They work really hard to please and work with you so everything is done the way you want it. They are also very honest and reassuring, who have a great understanding of what you're going through. Nicky Eley is a brilliant person to help you.
After putting off speaking to a professional for YEARS!!!! I well and truly kicked myself after meeting my PC Laura.

Patient coordinator was knowledgeable, friendly and approachable. Surgeon was very professional. Really knew his stuff. Answered all my questions. Advice was spot on but I didn't feel pushed into anything or fobbed off.  Both the Patient Coordinator and Surgeon were supportive throughout and the PC especially was always contactable via text or email if I had a query.

review_title: I just had my first consultation with ?�?
review_body: I just had my first consultation with Natasha and she was very helpful and I cannot waiting till next week to see my surgeon xx
Amazing company so friendly and professional on both my experiences with them would recommend to anyone looking to have something done
My very special patient coordinator Angharrad I could of not done any of this without you xx
Amazing staff, very clean place, very comfortable and i received a lot of information! All questions answered
Staff at mya are the loveliest people I?��ve ever met! They all make you feel right at home and so comfortable. Very professional place.

The coordinator was lovely, really helpful and put me at ease. However, upon meeting the surgeon who I met at the next appointment I felt bitterly disappointed. I found her rude, abrupt and clearly not interested in the procedure I wanted. I felt that she did not represent the MYA brand at all. I found another surgeon who I am extremely happy with and cheaper to boot!

I was getting a breast augmentation after wanting one for almost 6 years! The consultation is very reassuring and at your own pace which I liked as I was able to raise any concerns and ask questions.... the girls are lovey there! The surgeon was short and sweet with the pre op and I felt I was in good hands! The hospital was very nice, clean and friendly staff who were constantly telling you what was happening theouout the day and were very warming and reassuring! I would deffinatley recommend them and if I ever considered more cosmetic surgery I would use them again! The results are fantastic and I can?��t believe I didn?��t do it sooner!

Best decision I have ever made. Mya was an easy way to achieve everything I ever wanted and my surgeon is the one who truly deserves all of the credit for my amazing results. I wouldn't go anywhere else for the procedure. Mr. Ibraheim is the best in the business.

review_title: I was disappointed with the service I ?�?
review_body: I was disappointed with the service I received i was told different information by different coordinators , they didn?��t seem to no what they were doing and they didn?��t even no if the information they were telling me was correct. I had two different numbers from two different coordinators which they both told me if i had any questions not to hesitate to contact them which i did on two separate occasions and never got a response, i would like to say i was happy with the surgeon they selected for me but I decided not to go ahead for surgery with mya
Amazing from start to finish! Perfect! Highly recommend!!

I definitely made the best decision having my breast augmentation with Mya. From the moment I arrived to the moment I left the nurses were so helpful and friendly. Dr Fuimara has done a fantastic job, I couldn?��t be happier.
Excellent and professional service, friendly, down to earth and none judgmental staff!

review_title: My experience was amazing i felt well ?�?
