review_title: I am very impressed with MYA
review_body: I am very impressed with MYA. You have been on the ball without being pushy, and I?��m very happy with my surgeon you have guided me towards.
I?��ve nothing but good words to say about mya fantastic staff so friendly. I can?��t wait to have my surgery now would Definetly recommended mya to anyone.
Everything from the consultation to the end results and support from everyone is Amazing! No bad experience through out :)

I was sooo nervous about the whole "boob job" thing, from booking my first consultation, to speaking to someone about my boobs and going under the knife. However, MYA put me at ease straight away. The girls at the Birmingham clinic and the nurses at the Fitzroy hospital were so lovely!
So glad I chose MYA! Everything went so smoothly and could always rely on the MYA team to be there whenever needed! Thanks MYA

review_title: I had the best experience that could possibly have
review_body: I had the best experience that I possibly could of had with Mya. It has genuinely changed my life for the better. My surgeon Dr Mounir was absolutely amazing and the staff at the first trust hospital in Preston were so reasuring and brilliant over all it was an amazing experience and I would do it all again! Couldn't recommend them enough

MYA have been great, professional, responsive and I have always felt in safe hands. Right from the beginning I have felt like I have been listened to and supported. I have had a great result, more than I could have asked for, and feel very happy with my choice of company.

Excellent service, friendly, professional staff. The only reason I chose not to use Mya was there aren?��t any hospitals in Nottingham and I would have to travel at least 2 and a half hours by car which after an operation isn?��t ideal.

review_title: From the start of my journey to now
review_body: From the start of my journey to now, being 3 weeks post Op The care from the MYA team in Bristol gas been outstanding. Ms Lutz my surgeon is amazing and i completed trusted her in everything. The support they give you and the communication was fantastic. They are literally on the end of the phone from morning to night ready to answer any questions you may ask them. Very approachable and understanding and take the time to talk to you and resolve any queries immediately that you may have.

review_title: Everyone who works there is friendly
review_body: Everyone who works there is friendly, always happy to help and answers questions as thoroughly as possible. Made my experience a lot nicer.

review_title: Amazing journey so far with MYA
review_body: Amazing journey so far with MYA

I'm 3 days post op, I'm thrilled with the results. All of the staff at Mya have been great before and after surgery, My PC has contacted me and checked on me, so has the clinic nurse, who I'm due to see next week. The staff at the Fitzroy London were lovely and couldn't do enough for me and my surgeon has given me exactly what I wanted.

review_title: I travelled to Bristol for my initial ?�?
review_body: I travelled to Bristol for my initial meeting which was great then had to travel to Birmingham to meet Dr Frattis, over an hour away from me but I wanted him, I arrived 20 mins early to a packed out waiting room full of very young noisy patients to be told clinic was running over 45 mins late, I was furious that I wasn?��t notified of the lateness & couldn?��t wait that long due to travelling back, the receptionist did not seem like she had a clue & was totally unprofessional & was not a good representation of Mya, I would not go back & now I have booked my surgery with another company & not only that it was �700 cheaper for exactly the same service.
Amazing experiance, very helpful, not pushy at all, i would defo recommend to anyone and if i fancy anything else im sure to be back!

I am 6 weeks on from a BA and Areola Reduction and everything is great. The service from the very start from the Newcastle Clinic, PC Julie, the reception staff and the Nurse Louise has been fantastic. Nothing was ever too much trouble and I was always made to feel welcome and I always had any concerns answered, this really made me feel at ease throughout. Dr Traynor was straight to the point with his advice and recommendations,on the day of surgery, he made me feel totally at ease. The results from day one of operation have been fantastic, better that I could have imagined. I went to see Louise, the Nurse every week as part of my aftercare and she was so great, caring and very gentle and re-assuring. I can't believe how fantastic everything looks 6 weeks on. I am just waiting to see Dr Traynor for my last appointment and I can't wait to tell him what a difference this surgery has made to be. I would definitely recommend the Newcastle Clinic and Dr Traynor.
Awful results

I have nothing but good things to say about MYA, from start to finish everyone was so helpful and caring from my PC Julie, receptionist's Elle and Charlotte and nurse Louise at the Newcastle clinic. They all couldn't have done anymore for me I am so grateful and thankful for the help and support they have provided, such lovely people! Also my surgeon, Mr Mounir such a talented man! Also caring, kind and so professional. He has done such an amazing job I am absolutely over the moon with my results I couldn't recommend him enough!
Highly recommend! All the staff are lovely from the very beginning to the end. I would always recommend this company over any other company! Can?��t fault them at all! x
Amazing experience with Mya! My only issue is after much chasing I didn?��t ever get my pictures so lucky I took my own.

So far my experience with Mya has been great! I'm one week post op and I am over the moon with my results. Mr Frati did an amazing job with me and my PC Sherene was the best I could ask for! Definitely recommend going with Mya.

review_title: Worst decision i ever made going to ?�?
review_body: Worst decision i ever made going to mya!! After i had my ba went back and fourth only to be told one thing then another ! I developed pain in my right boob about 6m after having them done was told nothing to worry about after waiting i went about about a year after was told my right boob had dropped because i had lost weight not true ! Went back agin and was asked if i had been in an accident!! No!! Was no after care at all took my money and left me to it ! Had to have my own scan and to see other surgeons! I have capsular contracture and have done for years !! No one in the manchester clinic is interested never have been !!! Oh but if i pay another 9000! Then they will ! do not go near this place !! Been back to see mr t about 6 7 times no one could careless nice untill they have your money

I would give this company a zero rating if I could. They claim to have an 'open & honest forum' but what they fail to mention is that any bad reviews and experiences are deleted. I really don't see the point of having a forum if anything that isn't pro MYA is removed. False Advertising! They are more than helpful when taking your money until you come across a problem �5000 later and I have been left looking a mess. The so called after care they say they offer is appalling. Avoid at all cost! My solicitor is now having to take over as they don't seem interested in my botched job now they have my money!

I remember reading the odd bad review of poor experiences on here but I experienced none of that and MYA have done their job from start to almost finish. I am currently 2 weeks post op and they've sorted out any issue I've encountered and have been nothing but helpful. They've got back to me when they said they would. They provided me with an outstanding surgeon and I don't think Ms Lutz gets enough credit for her work on the forum. But without a doubt I would recommend MYA if anyone was looking for cosmetic surgery.

Had my surgery done back in July, my journey has been amazing with MYA! Everything has gone so smoothly and easy, no complications what so ever. Customer services is great! All staff, nurses, surgeons are friendly, caring and helpful from my first consultation to now. Couldn?��t ask for much more to be honest! I am over the moon with the result as well, best money I?��ve ever spent! Would highly recommend MYA?�?��?�?��

Had my first consultation in June, Emily was my pc she was lovely. I have thought about this for years and had the money ready so I was pleased I could book a date and pay a deposit. Was recommend a surgeon based on the look I wanted. I had Mr Traynor, he is quite to the point and a little blunt in consultation but he was nicer on day of surgery and came to see me after the op. I had the biggest size he offered which was 350cc and they are perfect for my body and I never got any stretch marks or rippling so I?��m glad I didn?��t ask for bigger. His incisions are really neat and my recovery was amazing. The nurse Louise was really lovely and the receptionist Charlotte is also really nice. Highly recommend

review_title: My journey with MYA has been amazing!
review_body: My journey with MYA has been amazing, from my initial consultation to removing the bandages they have been so supportive and attentive every step of the way! All of my questions were answered and they give you their professional advice on what?��s best; from the type of surgery to post-op care, for the look you?��re wanting and the best outcome. I would highly reccomend this company to anyone, and in fact have already to my best friend who is booking in with MYA soon! Couldn?��t fault any of the staff and if I consider any more cosmetic surgery I will be sure to return to MYA! They really are the best at what they do!

review_title: My experience at MYA has been positive
review_body: My experience at MYA has been positive. My PC has been fab and very helpful. Any time I text with any worries/concerns she ensured she got in contact with me within 24 hours to discuss and put my mind at ease. She even went an extra step in contacting the hospital ensuring I was able to get my operation done at short notice, I can?��t fault her. My nurse has also been so lovely and helpful too! She listened to me and also called me after my op to check everything went okay :) Thank you MYA!
I would highly recommend MYA, I had a fabulous experience throughout, from the moment I called to book a consultation, to my final post op checks, everyone has been amazing!

review_title: I booked a consultation and then found ?�?
review_body: I booked a consultation and then found out I was pregnant less the 4 hours out of the 48 hour cancellation time, given this was not a planned expected pregnancy and as soon as I knew I informed them they still wanted to charge me �25 and was quite rude along with it.. not the happy to please accommodating attitude when you initially book. So please if you need to cancel I would recommend cancelling your card so they can?��t take your money! I would never use them in the future now and will always state their poor customer service not happy

review_title: I am 3 weeks post op (Tummy tuck/Abdominoplasty/muscle tightening) and very happy ?��?
review_body: I am 3 weeks post op tummy tuck/abdominoplasty with the amazing Dr Andrea Giannitrapani.

review_title: I had rhinoplasty more than 2 years ago ?�?
review_body: I had rhinoplasty more than 2 years ago and I can't breathe properly through my nose. It's always blocked or running. As a result my nose has a bobble at the end. Nice shape but not really what I'd hoped for

Firstly i am writing on behalf of my wife. We searched many clinics in and out of London for a cosmetic procedure for my wife. After much research recommendation we ended up at the MYA clinic in in Fitzrovia London. Our initial impressions from walking through the door were great they were very welcoming, professional and made us feel very relaxed. We then were introduced to our patient coordinator Hannah Mathews who was very professional. Also it is always a good impression when your coordinator is well dressed and presentable. She then got us seated, made us feel relaxed and took us through the whole procedure in detail and addressed any of our concerns. She also provided us with her honest opinions on what she felt was best for my wife. My wife felt very relaxed and was filled with trust and excitement after the appointment.
overall bad experience would not recommend here.
Had a consulatation at birmingham branch. My patient coordinator was so so so nice! Most likely going ahead with surgery.

6 weeks post op and unhappy with results. Was told I was going to have my natural asymmetry corrected and have 25cc bigger in one breast all along by my PC. I woke up with 300cc in each side. Just hit 6 week mark, went to have a bra fitting finally and every place said I have 2 different sized boobs still. Paid �5000 to have a bigger version of my problem. :( Can't see the surgeon until 3 months and just praying that he finally corrects the asymmetry and allows me to have revision. I can't believe I have paid so much money to still have one cup size bigger than the other as my PC promised from day one that asymmetry was going to be corrected.

review_title: I enquiried online about an uplift
review_body: I enquiried online about an uplift and had a call back straight away. The appointment worked around me and the information sent to me was very informative. I went to the appointment and was given some great advice and information. Unfortunately due to leaving my job I have had to postpone the idea of having a boob job but the price was very competitive. And I will stress that MYA have not hassled me atall since, they are also not pushy which is a breath of fresh air. Will definitely look to do this in future. Thanks to the team

review_title: I have had an amazing experience with ?�?
review_body: I have had an amazing experience with Mya, the staff are lovely and helpful and would 100% recommend to anyone!
Give u false hope
Excellent customer service, I would recommend this company

review_title: Dr Maisam Fazel is amazing! Love MYA?�?��
review_body: Dr Maisam Fazel ?��?��??��?��??��?��? he has changed my life in a way I can?��t thank him enough he did a wondeful job on my breasts. He made me feel more like a woman and reached over my expectations. Am really happy. My Pc Sherene Graham has been kind and supportive all through. Dr Fazel exceeded my expectations and did a wonderful job I would have never thought to have such good looking breasts. He was very professional and honest with me all through. The whole MYA team has been amazing well done to the nurses they really do an amazing job. Thank you MYA ?�?��

The care is amazing. Wasn't keen in initial consultation as felt very sales like but everything else was spot on. The nurses are incredible at the hospital and clinics. Very easy process from start to finish. Excellent experience and great results and would recommend MYA 100%

My journey with MYA is quite complex, I have come out of a battle with the NHS and what I am asking is not straight forward. What I have found is honesty and safety but no fear of what I am asking but looking at the best way to achieve it and covering all medical angles. They have been frank and honest with me and I appreciate that, I feel that they are not just taking my money they are trying to give me what I need as safely as possible. I would recommend them to anyone whether it be a straight forward cosmetic or repair/repeat procedure. Every time I enter the clinic I come away happy with the outcome and I can?��t wait till my surgery day. The staff never stop working for you I have received emails at 10pm and nothing is too much trouble for them. I would always recommend them to anyone looking at any cosmetic procedure.

review_title: Only had the initial consultations and ?�?
review_body: Only had the initial consultations and booked the date of my surgery but couldn't be happier with picking mya, my patient coordinator Ria at the nottingham branch was absolutely fantastic and so supportive, I had the full hour of our initial consultation and she really took the time to understand and listen to what results I was looking for  and any questions I had. Dr Giannias who was the second surgeon I met was equally as amazing, very patient and thorough with what operation I wanted and the results I could expect. I felt he was very realistic with the results I could get and was very honest with me. So far so good, just very excited for my operation now!

review_title: I can truly say from my first ?�?
review_body: I can truly say from my first consultation all the way through to my surgery has been amazing. Everything was so well organised, the staff in Fitzroy were the best and I'd happily have them all look after me again?�?�� I'm 4 days post op and I'm so happy with my result so far, I'd recommend anyone to go to MYA?���

review_title: MYA clinic has been amazing throughout
review_body: MYA clinic has been amazing throughout! From my first consultation with Ria to my pre op with Alice and then surgery with Dr Giannas. I couldn't be happier with the care I received and my results! The aftercare is has also been fantastic. It has only been approximately 6 weeks since my op and wow my confidence has improved so much. I would recommend anyone wanting cosmetic surgery to just go for a consultation. Every bit of advice given was truly honest and I have no regrets. I also want to say thank you to all the girls on the reception your all so lovely and the nurses and anaesthetists at Fitzroy were really reassuring throughout.  Massive thanks xxx

Way overpriced. I booked with another clinic in London for almost half the price! and a more professional service.  Mya also quoted me a price only to call 2 days later saying it was a mistake and my price was more. I went to London to see the surgeon though and I waited for 2 hours to be seen with no acknowledgement or apology. Absolute rubbish considering they charged �7800 for rhino! The surgeon clearly knew his stuff and I'm sure he would of done a great job but he rushed me through the consultation as it was near the end of the day and I felt for almost 8000 I wanted a perfect experience. He cancelled the poor guy waiting to see him after me too. The first consultation is also a waste of time as it's with the patient coordinator who simply tells you the price which could be done on the phone. I prefer clinics where you see the surgeon straight away. Terrible experience.
Everyone was wonderful, made me feel at ease, was all professional and informative and always happy to help with any enquiries.
Lovely staff. A few small problems that made me nervous but overall a great experience and I will recommend them to my family and friends.

review_title: I have had such a good experience with ?�?
review_body: I have had such a good experience with the nurse especially and the surgeon, if anything I would expect the patient co-ordinator to be a little more involved but overall I've been satisfied as she was very nice

review_title: My experience with MYA isn't over yet ?�?
review_body: My experience with MYA isn't over yet so I can't give my full rating but so far it's been great

review_title: From my first meeting with my patient ?�?
review_body: From my first meeting with my patient coordinator Krystina, i felt totally at ease. From my first appointment through to surgery date someone was always on hand to answer my questions. My surgeon was man of little words but knew exactly what i wanted and delivered exactly that. My recovery has been nothing less than perfect. Thank you so much MYA you truly are the best.
Absolutely brilliant love my results already and I am only 1 week post op. Laura and Alice are both brilliant always there on hand when I had questions and put me at ease through out it all

review_title: My experience with MYA has been ?�?
review_body: My experience with MYA has been amazing. Im now 4 weeks post opp and had the nest recovery ever!!! Care coordinator has been intouch for after care regularly and any questions ive asked pre op/ during/ post op have been answered. Mya staff and my surgeon DR Gary Trainor have been fantastic and made my whole experience perfect.

review_title: My experience at Mya was amazing
review_body: My experience at Mya was amazing, people there are very friendly, funny and helpful.. they really made me feel like home. Esther was one of the people who looked after me, she was so nice and she offered me everything i need and she was keep coming to see if I'm well. I don't remember the names of all of them but everyone was very nice and i will highly recommend this place as a very professional clinic. Mr fratti is a great doctor and he offers you all the confidence you need before the op. My consultant Sherene is amazinggg i really liked her, she is genuine nice and she is every time there if need anything or have any concerns. Thank you to all of you whom made my dream comes true!!! Love you guys xxx
Absolutely amazing service from my PC Leanne she made me feel very comfortable and at ease
Patient consultant was amazing! however tried to rearrange an appointment and waiting to get back to me. still no idea what day or time I am able to be booked in.

All fine to begin with. Upon consultation with surgeon was told I needed a letter of psychiatric competence from my psychologist. I told them I don?��t have a psychologist, the surgeon waved me out and told me to sort it with my PC. When I asked the PC she told me the GP would be sufficient. Not the case, as at seconded consultation was told it was insufficient. My PC was away and I had another in place of her. Lovely lady but unaware of the confusion. Long story short, I asked them to recommend a psychologist and I would pay for evaluation- as I don?��t have my own. Rather than do this, I was called the next day to be asked if I would see another surgeon to try and bypass the letter, although not a guarantee. Not acceptable. Little to no communication between departments. Was told I would receive a call on the Friday. That was ten days ago. No call! Good job Mya! Shall take my money elsewhere!
I have to admit to be a little disappointed after hearing lots of good things.....
Very pleased so far with my experience with MYA. The staff is very welcoming and nice.

review_title: My experience so far has been ?�?
review_body: My experience so far has been excellent, lots of contact keeping me updated with everything and my pc has arranged appointments on the same day for me as I am travelling so far this cutting down the number times I have to travel. Very smooth process so far!
Good overall experience from consultation to the operation

review_title: So far with mya I have had an amazing ?�?
review_body: So far with mya I have had an amazing journey! The staff are absolutely fantastic and I would definitely recommend to friends and family, thank you for everything so far.. Not long till op day :) xx

review_title: MYA - the only place I?��d go.
review_body: From start to finish I couldn?��t have asked for more from the Nottingham clinic and First Trust hospital in Preston. My patient coordinator Laura has been fantastic throughout, she made me feel completely comfortable and instantly put me at ease. Everyone did. My surgeon Dr Netri was gentle, welcomed me warmly and instilled a huge amount of confidence in me. My nurse Alice has been so insightful and reassuring, again she?��s been incredibly gentle.
Fab journey with mya. From start to finish. Really happy with my care.

Worst experience! I travelled all the way from Luton to London for a consultation and was told I couldn?��t be seen because I was 3 minutes late !! The receptionist was rude and did not want to help and just brushed me to the side. I am soo dissappointed with my experience here as I have heard good things but did not expect to be told to go away for being merely 3 minutes late !?

My mya experience was amazing (so far) I had my op two weeks ago with DR Frati, although Dr Frati is quite blunt and not overly friendly he has done an amazing job and the scars I can already see will be next to nothing! I felt my consultant Sherene was brilliant, she has been just a phone call away from start to finish answering my many many questions, even now she will check in to see how I'm doing.

Terrible aftercare terrible results!!!! Had my ba 3 years ago here 3 years later paid 5000 again at the hospital group to get them corrected from dr.kazzazi mistakes said I should just be happy with what I had got, and what I got from him was scars 2 inch lower than my actuall breast pockets. Ladies save yourself some money don?��t bother!! Mine are just perfect now after recorrerive surgury wish I?��d have avoided this company and saved my self the time and money!!!
My MYA experience has been amazing! (so far).

review_title: Dr Frati sat and text on his mobile
review_body: Dr Frati sat and text on his mobile, all through my daughter's consultation, I had to ask him what he thought would be best for her, he briefly looked up. My daughter was so unsure she had to travel all the way back up to London a 6 hour round trip, I phoned them to make sure she was seen on time as she had to get tube and train back and explained how rude Mr Frati was, I was told that they know he is like that, that's how he is!!
Really good experience so far, my pc Gemma was always there if I needed anything and was always professional, my surgeon mr mounir put me at ease and advised me well.

From start to 14 weeks post op cannot fault Mya cosmetic surgery. They have been supportive and caring throughout the process. My PC was always on hand to help and answer any questions, my surgeon Dr Frati is the best there is and the mya nurses on op day and post op were very kind and gave me the best care. would definitely recommend.
Hi guys

review_title: So happy with my results xx
review_body: From start to finish I was really looked after and would highly recommend MYA!! I am extremely pleased with my outcome of my breast augmentation. Just Want to thank Dr Frati for his amazing work and Natasha my care coordinator for being such a lovely lady.

review_title: I always knew I wanted a breast ?�?
review_body: I always knew I wanted a breast augmentation so when my journey started I knew exactly what I wanted but when I first took a peek at my new boobs I was overjoyed with happiness, they where beyond anything I could have imagined and my confidence grew in the same moment. my journey at mya I loved every minute of it My patient coordinator was Sherene Graham she was a huge part in my journey and was amazing throughout, was available anytime and went way above and beyond in my journey! My surgeon was Dr Fazel, as soon as I met my surgeon I was so excited for the next steps, he has fulfilled exackly the look I wanted!  He has changed my life !!! Thank you so much for everything everybody has done for me at mya!! You have changed my life ")

review_title: Breast enlargement with the fabulous MYA!
review_body: I've had such an amazing experience with MYA! I'm so glad I decided to go with MYA I'd highly highly recommend them to anyone! Straight from the start I've received nothing but amazing care from the amazing team at the Manchester clinic most amazing girls on the desk who always give you a warm welcome and make you feel at home as soon as you arrive to the loveliest PC Lauren who gave me all the answers I needed and stayed with me on text whenever I needed her throughout the whole process she made me feel super super comfy in her consultation room through out all our chats! To the most amazing team at First trust such incredible nurses who made me feel right at ease continually made me laugh making everything a lot easier to the MOST AMAZING surgeon Dr Traynor such a fabulous talented surgeon he's very straight to the point but also very easy to talk to and super funny! When I had my first consultation with him at MYA I knew I made the right decision! MYA nurses with the aftercare are fabulous can't fault them either always giving 100% no matter what! so thank you to the Manchester MYA team and first trust hospital for the most amazing experience and giving the best customer care possible always going above and beyond.

review_title: I have overall had a great experience ?�?
review_body: I have overall had a great experience with MYA, my co ordinatior has been fab since the first visit, the operation day I was kept comfortable and my surgeon was lovely. Post operation I had numbers I could call at anytime and they were more than happy to get me in for a couple of check overs. The only negative I have to say are the reception staff are not very friendly and don't make You feel that welcome and also on the day of my operation everyone was so great and really put me at ease, but at the end of the day I was waiting for my family to come and pick me up and it took a bit longer than Expected and I felt one of the older nurses was a bit impatient and trying to get me out quickly. Other than those couple of points I would definitely reccomend mya!

Breast reduction with Mr Marcelino. Very happy with the results, the scars don't even look as bad as I thought they would. Have had a slight complication with a dissolvable suture working its way out but they're booking me an extra follow up for this, no problem. Excellent service and aftercare so far in my experience and would definitely recommend.

review_title: I got no aftercare at all
review_body: Once i had paid and had the op there was nothing from mya. No Aftercare at all, never had a check up ect. Shocking . Felt like they was only after getting the money and like they dont really care about aftercare checks to see if everything is ok. Iv called numerous times in regards to bits and iv b3en told id get a call back but a year later i still havent had a call. To me they perpously didnt call so that my time frame was up from having anything done in my garantee time. Have pre warned friends and family about the aftercare not being done !

If you are going here for service it's absolutely horrific so don't bother however surgeon was 11/10 which I suppose is the main thing! My first apt was cancelled 3 times hours before I was due to go, 2nd apt ran 2 odd hours late and finally when I went for surgery was told I had been given the wrong time (6am instead of 10am!) The results from my Rhinoplasty are amazing though Dr Frati is a credit. However, I have been waiting for my before and after pictures for 9 months which I have given up chasing now so take your own!

review_title: Staff are friendly and always at hand ?�?
review_body: Staff are friendly and always at hand to answer any questions, before and after the procedure.

Breast enlargement . My coordinator Sherene was amazing . She direct me to the right dr and everything was organised superb . Mr Jallali and all the team where fantastic and very caring . Highly recommend MYA

I had nose job with Dr Lancer and unfortunately I wasn't happy with the result so I have requested to have second operation that I was entitled for. However they have made my journey so difficult and they have been ignoring my calls. First time I have received a good customer service but I felt after they took my money, they didn't care at all. I wasn't confident person before the surgery and it is still the same after the surgery. I had to go through complain procedure but typical they rejected. So the least thing I can do is to warn you and tell you that you will pay the money which includes second operation but it's all fake. Never ever again maya and I have adviced all my friends and family.

review_title: The staffs at MYA are very helpful and ?�?
review_body: The staffs at MYA are very helpful and caring. Sherene is an amazing coordinator and listens carefully to all my concerns. Dr Frati was very professional during the process of my surgery and I am loving the results so far.

review_title: The staff are so caring and polite
review_body: The staff are so caring and polite. I was put at ease form the first time I spoke to an employee of MYA. They are there with you every step of the way.

review_title: I am a Big  fan of sherene and Dr Frati
review_body: I can honestly say that MYA from start to finish are so lovely and very professional. Everyone is so genuine which is rare. The staff seem to really enjoy their job. It's quite clear they are genuine friends.

review_title: Can't put into words how fabulous MYA ?�?
review_body: Can't put into words how fabulous MYA have been from my first consultation to now when I'm post op! Lovely staff, always there for you. Hospital and surgeon were amazing. Can't thank them all enough. Would definitely recommend going with MYA!
Excellent company, had BA surgery last year (13 months ago now) and couldnt be happier with my results.
My mya experience so far has been amazing. The staff are all lovely very informative and supportive.

Absolutely disgusting experience with this company, was told by the PC (bearing in mind that she didn't even take a look at my area of operation) but still went on to tell me because I had children my breasts would definitely need an uplift as well as BA.

review_title: Breast Enlargement at the MYA Fitzroy Clinic x
review_body: I had been thinking about having a breast enlargement for pretty much my whole teenage life. I waited until I reached 21 just to make sure I was definitely sure about my decision.

I had my boobs done back in June and I cannot recommend MYA enough!! It was such a quick service and everyone there is so nice and helpful. Even afterwards I have had nothing but them checking up on me.

I attend the Bristol clinic and I couldn't of asked for a better team of girls!! From the girl on the reception desk to my pc and nurse they are just all so friendly and helpful.. as soon as you walk in you are greeted by Lauren at the front desk, always greeted with a big smile! lauren isn't just a receptionist she's definitely the little heart to the clinic, she's always there for a chat or help and advise... my PC Faye made my experience very relaxed and took my worries away, she's so helpful knows exactly what she's talking about, again she's such a lovely person! Always at the end of the phone if I needed her, will always pop her head into my appointments to see how I am and even told me I could FaceTime her while I was on holiday if I had any concerns. My nurse joanna is who I've been seeing more out of everyone and she's just fab!! She's more than a nurse she's like having a friend at the end of the phone if u need a chat (about your boobs ha!) anything little or anything big she's always there and always has an answer for me! She's a lovely welcoming person who I've felt so comfortable with. The girls at the clinic have never left me waiting long for a email back or a phone call back! They've always been right there when I've needed someone... I couldn't of asked for better care! If I ever have any other  cosmetic surgery done I will 100% come back to the mya Bristol clinic!

Anyone thinking of having a breast augmentation with Mya, I would 100% recommend them to anyone! It is honestly the best decision I have ever made and I couldn't be happier. Everyone is so lovely and friendly and they make you feel at ease.

review_title: First day I went to mya I was so ?�?
review_body: First day I went to mya I was so nervous, and then I met my consultant jade, she never made me calm she was so nice and friendly and the girls was so nice aswell! I really can't wait for day of my operation counting down!!

I won't go to into detail but overall was a horrible experience. So glad I never chose MYA. It's a shame as I heard some good things about MYA regardless of the awful feedback I saw on the Facebook page. Receptionist were so rude and so uninviting, faces like slapped arses. Have no customer service skills what so ever. This is meant to be a happy and exciting time for everyone visiting so was a shame that they were so stuck up and rude. Felt like the patient cordinator was just speaking down to me the whole time. Think she loved herself a bit too much, Slating other companies which i found extremely unprofessional. I went for a consultation 2 years ago with MYA and they were great. Can't believe how different my experience was this time round. I have now booked my surgery with another company and I am very happy so thank you MYA :)

I met with my consulatant Naomi and she was incredible, when I met Dr Frati (my surgeon) he told me what I needed to know, how he was going to do it and spoke about the stitch sizes, the nurse then talked me through everything from the procedure to which bras I would be able to wear after the op, she was amazing! If I was to get anything else done I would come straight to MYA it's such a friendly environment :)

My operation isn't until the 17th August but after considering this operation since my mid teens I have to say that from the moment I made contact with my PC Lauren at the Manchester clinic, to meeting my extremely reassuring, professional and considerate surgeon Mr Netri to my pre op I have been nothing but Impressed. I would highly recommend surgery with MYA and I am extremely happy with the service and care they have provided me with. Everyone I have spoken to have been pleasant warm and welcoming

review_title: Breast augmentation and rhinoplasty with MYA

My patient coordinator was so good towards me and I felt like she genuinely cared and made me feel so at ease! My nurse Lauren was also lovely I just felt so comfortable around them and I didn't get this feeling at any other consultations I went elsewhere. My surgeon Andrea Gianipatrani is also amazing, I couldn't recommend him enough! Although I'm having major boob greed I feel like this has been a great experience

I would highly recommend Mya Bristol clinic for breast augmentation. I went with them on the recommendation of a friend. Everyone there is so friendly which made me feel at ease straight way. They were all very knowledgeable and informative throughout.
The best decision ever made!
My journey with MYA has been great! And the best part has been the post -op care! I feel safe in their care. Keep it up!

My experience with MYA has been incredible. I definitely went with the best surgeon, they knew just who would be perfect for my needs and who specialises in this sort of thing, especially  from a cosmetic side of things.

review_title: So I was thinking about Rhinoplasty and ?�?
review_body: So I was thinking about Rhinoplasty and my sister had it done with MYA so i thought i would try them. I booked my consultation with them and it was with Dr Andrea, very honest and nice guy. Their service is really good and they follow up with you. I had been to Transform and honestly it disheartened me because of their service. Going to MYA they really care about you and your needs. Spending a lot of money so i always say make sure you feel 100% comfortable with who you are going with and they should offer you the best service and care and MYA do that!

The initial consultation with the patient co-ordinator was alright as she explained what the surgeon would be able to do with my nose, and she recommended tip reduction and open rhinoplasty which would together cost �7500, or �6100 for open rhinoplasty alone. I found this to be rather expensive for a service such as MYA, and this is also above the private UK rhinoplasty recommendation (of �7000 maximum). Despite this, she was nice and seemed to have a pretty good understanding of the nose.

review_title: The whole treatment from start to ?�?
review_body: The whole treatment from start to finish has been amazing. I'm a very nervous patient and all the members of staff took this in consideration throughout my journey.

Terrible terrible company. Will completely ruin your looks and refuse to do revision. Please beware and stay away!!!!! They repeatedly lie and do their best to avoid you once you have had your initial surgery. Rude staff and unreliable surgeons.

I would highly recommend MYA, my experience and journey has been wonderful. From my first initial phone call to book an appointment through to meeting my surgeon and on to my post op check up, my experience has been perfect. The care, understanding and service provided is amazing! I am so happy. Thank you MYA x

My whole journey through Mya at the Newcastle clinic was amazing. Every person that was involved from my first enquiry to now the after care team were very friendly approachable and nothing was a problem. I would definitely recommend Mya to anybody and if needed wouldn't think twice to use them again in the future.

review_title: I would highly recommend MYA to anyone ?�?
review_body: I would highly recommend MYA to anyone thinking about surgery.

Highly recommend MYA for breast augmentation! They have been great from start to finish... all the girls are really friendly & helpful. I've had no trouble at all. My surgeon dr.traynor was great too! In the hospital I was really nervous but all the nurses reassured me and I was made to feel comfortable. I have no regrets on anythjng & I'm so glad I've done it! Also a big thankyou to Jeannette (the nurse at the liverpool clinic) she's been super!

Everything from my initial consultation to post surgery has been 10/10 for MYA cannot fault one step of the procedure at all! Dr Traynor my surgeon was amazing put me at ease straight away and made me feel so comfortable he is very straight talking and I think with something as big as breast surgery that is exactly what you need! The nurse Alan I had on the day of surgery was amazing also put my nerves at ease and made me laugh all day and now 2 weeks post op I am loving the results more and more every single day, achieved exactly what I wanted! The aftercare so far has been amazing too!

review_title: Loved my experience with MYA and so ?�?

The staff are absolutely fantastic and give you great reassurance. Love all the MYA girls and i can't thank them enough for everything they have done for me. My journey with MYA will stay with me forever. Thankyou so much. X

Can't thank the team enough and all the staff at the London Clinic. The aftercare has been amazing and they fixed it within 48 hours! I am currently recovering and they have been fantastic so far!

So he doesn't really care how it will look,  he just will do it?!?!

7 weeks post op and I've never felt happier:D from day one the clinic made me feel at ease, the surgeons were very helpful and made me feel warm and welcome, aftercare advice was on point,they still ring to make sure everything is ok, which is lovely of them! :)
Lovely staff, really welcoming feel and overall a very professional outfit. Would recommend to anyone.

Everyone was so helpful and kind, I was really happy with the outcome and how I was treated, I felt that everyone explained to me everything in detail whether it was having the operation, have the procedure, what to expect after. Everyone made sure I was happy with the decisions I made. I would definitely recommend MYA to anyone who wants to get cosmetic surgery done

Nobody knows how to do their job properly and noting all the negative reviews ftom patients dating back from 2013, I'm shocked the owner / Director of MYA has done nothing to alleviate the issues being experienced by patients. I have used Transform in the past and have got to say I will not be using MYA again.

Had rhinoplasty around 3 weeks ago at Mya with Dr Frati and they have been absolutely amazing! my results are just unbelievable and swelling went completely down within 2 weeks! Completely pain-free and they've been so helpful, would 100% recommend MYA and Dr Frati (he is a miracle worker!!)

review_title: Only had the initial consultation so ?�?

Not heard anything since

review_title: Lovely staff and excited for my ?�?
review_body: Lovely staff and excited for my procedure!

review_title: Excellent company and staff. Would recommend to anyone and everyone
review_body: Never felt so comfortable in my life. Everyone helped me every step of the way considering this was a big journey.  Would definitely recommend them

I had rhinoplasty with dr giannitrapani at Fitzroy. My first consultation with my PC went well so I booked a surgeon consultation for the following month. All of a sudden my PC disappeared off the face of the earth, maybe advice to MYA would be to not have new customers be PC'd by employees who are just about to take their annual leave and travel the world for 18 months which was mentioned in the email I received after plenty of ignored emails before my visit. I met with Dr G and he definitely knows what he's talking about and he was very honest, so was happy to have him for surgery and paid my �500 deposit to book the date which would've been 6 months later. After this I met with my new PC who seemed friendly, however a month or so later I received an email from someone with a different name. To this day I couldn't tell you who my actual PC was. A month before surgery I paid the extortionate amount �6250 making the surgery a total of �6750 (bare in mind my nose only had a very small bump I found this a huge amount of money but thought you get what you pay for so went ahead.) and the call started rolling where I met up with nurses etc who I cannot fault they were lovely. However I do remember having to chase up an appointment for my pre surgery about medical information a week before surgery which isn't very organised. Moved on to surgery date, everything was organised and went well. I did not appreciate the way I was treated by a certain nurse who didn't speak to me kindly once I woke up, and the fact they offered me a menu to choose from yet I never actually got asked what I wanted?? Just a small thing lol. I waited for 4 hours to be discharged due to him being busy which isn't good when you're forgotten about and just left alone in a room on an uncomfortable bed. I left eventually and next day had my splints out and a week later had my cask taken off to finally reveal my nose which I was happy with. 3 months later dr g took a look when it was still completely swollen and instantly discharged me even tho I said about how my breathing was the same. But god forbid if anything was wrong with it! 6 months post op I started getting anxious about bumps appearing on my nose that made it look bent, so I have emailed 4 times and made 2 calls, within the calls where I requested to speak to someone for advice I was put on hold for so long it eventually hung up on their behalf which I feel was their plan all along if it happened two times. Funny how it all gets complicated now yet when I called to make a payment I had the quickest customer service you could imagine. Overall, I wouldn't use MYA again simply because I wouldn't trust the after care. If something went wrong who would I go to?

review_title: I had Vaser Lipo Surgery in 2014 and ?�?
review_body: I had Vaser Lipo Surgery in 2014 and then revision surgery in 2016 and still, I didn't get the full result I most desired. The after care customer service was poor, they didn't keep in touch and it was also very hard to get ahold of them from time to time. I definitely would not recommend getting surgery from MYA, they are overpriced and lack the quality that most people are looking for.

review_title: Kept waiting and they don't keep in contact
review_body: Firstly i found it awful that people were left waiting an hour an a half in the waiting room with no explanation and the receptionist repeatedly phoned up to mya to say the surgeon had noone in with him for at least half an hour. Then a month after my surgeon consultation and my patient coordinator promising to call me regarding procedure and price  (i've had surgery with them before so she said i will receive a discount) i've not heard a thing! I think this is awful considering the amount of money i was potentially going to be spending with them!! First time around i had a good experience....this time I'll go elsewhere. If they can't be bothered to phone now imagine what they'd be like once they had my money!

review_title: A positive experience so far with MYA
review_body: A positive experience so far with MYA, both consultations were running late by around 45 minutes, however everything has ran smoothly, PC, nurse and surgeon seemed trustworthy. Hospital used had excellent staff and very clean. Did think PC slightly pushy at first to get me to book a date, however was looking for surgery quite soon after first meet. Overall experience has been very good and i would recommend to friends and family.
Whole journey went smoothly everything felt right,  really felt like I was in good hands, lovely surgeon who has given me a fab result.. early days for me yet though but i am confident in her work .
Friendly and helpful staff

review_title: Mr Frati is a legend he has fixed my ?�?
review_body: Mr Frati is a legend he has fixed my asymmetric breasts. He is an amazing talented surgeon I am more than pleased! I was a 34c naturally with uneven breasts (my right was a c cup & left breast was a b cup) I've been uncomfortable and insecure all my life. As a 31yr old female with no kids my breasts should naturally be in good nic but through the years of sunbeds & smoking/drinking etc the skin on my chest could've been in better condition for my age so I also had a lift as well as breast implants taking me from a 34c to a 34DD. I am so happy with my outcome it has been 2 months and I am healing very well, I'm so happy my breasts they are perfectly even which is the main reason why I spent the extra money and chose Mr Frati, he knows what he is doing girls I am so happy that I chose him. I must say a huge thank you to the MYA nurses & staff for their great after care, it made a huge difference to my confidence & recovery.

review_title: If you ever believed in the miracal..we ?�?
review_body: If you ever believed in the miracal..we should have the trusted in Maya too..cos i am so excited whenever i had been to the clinic..i had so much warmed experence just even to talk with those specail list of specail people there...and all the nurse were so caring and make you feel so specail..i hope you all have the same trusted and the best results and the satisfasion in the future like me..lots of love hugs and kisses xxx
Very informative, lovely staff, left me feeling very confident

a great place to go, the staff are helpful and friendly! My pc from Nottingham office was Ria I couldn't fault her at all, explained everything and was always at the end of the phone if I had any questions. I met my surgeon and although he was a little quiet he answered all my questions and gave me his opinions. Not once did I feel pressured or pushed into anything.

review_body: All the staff and the surgeon I met with are warm, friendly and supportive. Always there when needed and very helpful. Very happy with my consultations.

Amazing place! And Love My Personal consultant Ria!! Always makes me feel welcome and gives her honest opinion when i need advise! Was booked in very quick and met my sergion quick too. Would recomend to anyone !

review_title: Very professional and caring and helpful and friendly cannot fault this company ?�??�??�??�??�??�??���?���?���?���?���?���
review_body: Every step of my journey so far has been absolutely amazing and cannot fault the experience. Very professional and if very high standards this cosmetic hospital is of top and high class a step above the rest in my view!!! I would recommend to all of my friends and family and would go back for other procedures for sure.

I was petrified thinking about breast augmentation because you hear so many stories but i had wanted it done for over 16 yrs, i decided to look into it + as soon as i did the response was quick from mya, i was then booked in for my consultation with charlotte who is amazing, after meeting with her i felt like i had enough confidence to go through with my breast augmentation. I met my surgeon dr traynor who is lovely + he went through the procedure with me making me feel really comfortable. I had my surgery on 31st jan this yr + i am so happy i went through with it as i feel i have gsined my confidence back + feel good, All the staff at mya rodney street are lovely as for the staff at first trust hospital in preston they were fab + made my stay with them enjoyable, my aftercare is really good. THANK YOU MYA + FIRST TRUST HOSPITAL x

review_title: Care for you up until payment.
review_body: I personally wouldn't ever recommend MYA, I paid for my procedure upfront as didn't want the finance, saved for years as I'm only 22. From my very first consultation the company are very unorganised. Atter my second consultation, and meeting my surgeon I decided to go ahead & book. I was told that the deposit to secure my date was �500 so bought the �500 along with me and couldn't wait to book my date etc. On the day, they told me I needed �1000 at least to book and at the time I didn't have that extra �500 so left upset and having to wait to save the extra �500 just to secure my date. Two days after that conversation/consultation i had a phonecall asking why I hadn't booked my date yet & I explained that I needed the extra �500 before I could do so. The lady told me that I could definitely book with �500 so within two days the rules has somehow changed? God damn awful to allow me to leave upset yet I could have booked all along. Anyhow, managed to book for my date & that was fine.

I cannot recommend MYA highly enough, right from my first consultation with my patient coordinator to the amazing aftercare I have received, the service, attention to detail, individual care and professional friendly staff have even second to none. I've had 500cc over muscle breast implants and my surgeon was the amazing Mr Traynor. My aftercare nurse has been amazed not only with my results, but also the speed at which I am healing. I would have no issue recommending MYA and Mr Traynor to anyone looking for top quality cosmetic surgery.
My experience with MYA has been great from the start. If I could choose again, I would definitely go with MYA without a doubt.

My experience with mya has been excellent, couldn't of asked for better care, I will deffinetly come back to mya in the future if I choose to have more surgery. And I will deffinetly recommend to family and friends, 5* from me

I have only been for first consultation. Office on Rodney Street isn't up to much. Staff were really lovely girls. Consultation was professional and fun (it is a treat after all.) So far I would recommend as has been recommended to me by my friend and patient.

review_title: There all very friendly and make h feel as ease
review_body: Katy was my mentor and she was lovely she was friendly made me feel good helped with my nerves I felt like I'd known her forever
I had a brilliant experience with MYA, everyone was very welcoming and reassuring. It was definately the best decision I have ever made!
VERY WELL LOOKED AFTER AS SOON YOU ENTER SURGERY

The first impressions of a company are everything and I was greeted an unwelcoming receptionist in the Liverpool branch. She literally took my turn up like an offence before telling me to take a seat. I then waited and waited, a full hour after my appointment was suposed to be. I could then see the receptionist struggling to figure out who was next scribbling people's names down on a scrap piece of paper in pencil. Then telling a women who turned up 30 minutes after me that she was next up to see the same surgeon. Not filling me with confidence to continue my experience with MYA if this is the treatment I'm getting at the first stage

If you are debating surgery and are doing some research i would recommend MYA, im not the most nervous of clients and are just the one to say go for it but i was still getting reassured each and every step of the way by the amazing staff! So if you are that nervous person dont worry you will be put at ease! EVERYONE, was amazing, polite and so professional i didnt feel as i was waiting around everything was done for me i was made sure i had water, juice, food the lot and i felt really relaxed and comfortable! Everything was on point to the cleaness of the room to the comfort and i would definitely recommend MYA and MR trainer if you are going in for a breast enlargement!

review_title: Great experience in the end! Thankful to all Mya staff
review_body: Great experience in the end! Rocky start but Cloe my PA got all my issues resolved! Cloe is fab.com!!! Dr Fratti (greatest surgeon in my opinion) knows exactly what he's doing and so far only day 5 post surgery and very very impressed with how things are starting to look! Thankful to all Mya staff!  x

review_title: My confidence is back thanks to MYA!
review_body: I am so pleased I chose MYA! I I had other consultations with different companies but I knew I had my heart set on MYA after my consultation with Julie at Newcastle and researching my surgeon Mr Traynor. I walked into MYA with no confidence at all and I've walked out a different woman! My surgeon did not lie to me, gave me his honest opinion and I trusted him, I'm over the moon with my surgery and will 100% be recommending him to my family and friends! The aftercare I have had has been spot on and I can't thank you guys enough! Thank You MYA!
Exceptional service, ongoing support and no messing around at all. Full confidence in staff and surgeons! Can't wait for my surgery :)
amazing care from all aspects throughout my journey!

Mya have been good throughout my journey with them. The girls are very friendly and put you at ease. My only issue was that on my consultation days, they were always running late by over an hour both times. It was like there wasn't enough time booked out for your appointment. This however did not put me off as the surgeons are very experienced and i really felt like they listened to what i wanted. I would recommend mya!
MYA is amazing, all staff very helpful and friendly. I would recommend this company if you want a perfect journey and brilliant results.

review_title: It was brilliant loved every minute
review_body: They were caring and very friendly and helpful

review_title: Best day of my life at MYA
review_body: I couldn't be anymore happy with my new pair, I had the most amazing journey at MYA And it couldn't of gone any better! Changed my life completely made me that confident girl again and I couldn't be more thankful hands down the best day of my life!

I am nearly 6 weeks post op now and couldn't be happier MYA just felt right and I wasn't wrong. Helpful welcoming staff, all my questions answered straight away. Brilliant care and aftercare, and obviously amazing results and advice
I have had a good experience with the MYA clinic in Birmingham, I was well informed and they where always polite
My experience at Mya has been excellent it's only 20 days after my op and the results are amazing .
Great staff, so polite and welcoming, dr Marcellino is a brilliant surgeon made me feel at ease and knew actually what do to do :)

review_title: Long wait for five minute surgeon appt
review_body: Waited two hours to see dr frati. Apparently this is due to the fact he is. ' very thorough with patients' if that's the case then why did I wait two hours for a five minute meeting? No regard for patients time. Did not feel that I had a proper consultation so would not be comfortable having surgery there.

I would highly recommend mya to anyone who is thinking about cosmetic surgery, everyone I have met or had appointments with have been brilliant and answered any of my questions or concerns I had . I recently had my surgery and all the nurses and staff at the Fitzroy in London are amazing I was truly spoilt and looked after thank you mya team for making my journey a good one xx
great service

I wouldnt have picked anywhere else to have my op amazing results, brilliant surgeon and 5* nurse. Only downfall was lack of communication with my patient co-ordinator as did not hear from her and didnt return calls but apart from the service was spot on.
Everyone in the team are lovely and I was well taken care of.

review_title: Amazing, great communication and i always walk out smiling
review_body: Im having breast augementation and was really nervous on my first consultation. I was made to feel welcome, i was given all the info i needed and i walked out knowing i wanted Mya to do it. I was quite embaressed to undress, but was made to feel comfortable and by my third appointment of undressing the embaressment and nerves were gone. Everytime i have had a worry, my concerns have always been dealt with. i always seem to walk out of Mya Clinic smiling and happy knowing im going to be looked after. My surgery is April 30th and im counting down the weeks with excitement. I didnt realise my surgery date would have been so quick. I would definately reccomend Mya , i already have and a couple of my friends have their consulatations this month. x
My journey has been positive so fat apart from feeling very anxious after leaving my pre op assessment with the list 'dont's' it scared me a little.
Had excellent and professional service from Donna at my consultation
I would recommend going to MYA even though I didn't go through to surgery at this time I would definitely go back if I changed my mind.

I saw the patient coordinator & she was very good & explained everything & answered all my questions then I heard nothing for 2 weeks so I rang MYA & asked to speak with her & was told she didn't work there any more but they would look at my notes etc & get back to me, guess what ? Nobody got back to me, that was 2 weeks ago so, 4 weeks after my appointment & I have heard nothing. Very disappointing.

review_title: A great experience from start to finish !
review_body: I went to mya for a breast augmentation consultation and found the staff on my first appointment to be very welcoming and explained everything well
Excellent staff at MYA so pleased with my result at 2 and a half week post surgery.all staff have been amazing and supportive.special thanks to aimee kasstan at leeds clinic for all hwr support
From the first call to meeting my surgeon all the staff have been so helpful and honest with me.

review_title: Absolutely amazing experience from start to finish
review_body: From the moment I booked the appointment at MYA I had endless assurance from my patient coordinator and was able to ask any questions regarding the process and procedure at it looked closer.

review_title: I had an amazing experience with mya
review_body: I booked my surgery with Dr frati for breast enlargement he was so understanding and listened to everything I wanted. when I arrived at the mya fitzroy in London I was sooooooo nervous but the nurses reassured me I'm in the best hands. I was literally waiting an hour before my surgery which really surprised me thought id be waiting longer the anethatist was lovely he joked and tried to take my mind of it. next minute I know I'm awake and was taken back to my room. I felt in so much pain because I had implants under my muscle I couldn't move but after a day or so I was fine. my pc Natalie messaged me nearly everyday to see if I was ok. I'm now 6 weeks po and I love my new boobs I would recommend mya cosmetics to anyone that's looking to have surgery they are amazing

review_title: The worst most degrading experience of
review_body: I arrived at MYA Manchester ready for my Vaser lipo at 12pm stated, after an hour and 20 minutes wait I finally get took for what I thought was for my procedure, I was wrong the man who took me into a consultation room repeatedly told me ' I don't work for MYA I'm just here today' so this made me feel very uncomfortable. After the paperwork had been signed and he had gave me my power gown etc he then said the anaesthetist would be in shortly. I waited 1hour 45 minutes before he arrived I was sat on a plastic chair in a freezing cold room. Not once did anyone come in to see how I was. This was unacceptable and not what I was expecting especially after paying over 6000 pound. He then asked me to change into my gown I did ask could I wait as the room was so unbelievably cold he said the surgeon will be in strait after, so I did as he had asked, I then waited another 35 minutes before the surgeon had arrived he drew up the areas and then said we had to wait for the theatre to become available that was around another 30 minutes. The scrub nurses then came to collect me they asked if I had emptied my bladder I didn't because I didn't know I had to as I had no communication with anyone. I was then asked to use the public toilet which may I add any member of the public visiting MYA  and MYA staff are able to use. I was extreme uncomfortable as the gown was paper thin and was visibly see through! I felt embarrassed and degraded. I quickly ran back into the room where the lady asked if I was pregnant, I stated I wasn't and she took my word for it! NO PREGNANCY TEST was taken even though I got told beforehand that that was the procedure they did. I remember waking up after surgery begging for a blanket and I repeatedly was told you would get one in recovery! I was put in my garment and pushed to the recovery room which again was a consultation room but with this time a padded chair. I asked where my partner was I was told' oh I don't know do you want me to ring him and see' I was so upset and shocked I thought they would or rang when I had awoken from surgery to tell him everything went well but to my surprise they didn't! I received no after care advise no advise on how to stop the gallons of fluid leaking out of me or what to use to soak it up or at least try to. I finally was on my way home the time now was near to 7pm, I arrived home wet through I asked my partner to get my tablets from the bag which MYA provided me with to find loose tablets spread across the bottom of the bag!!! I have a small child she could of picked one up!!!!! I wouldn't ever go with MYA again  !!  DO YOUR RESEARCH! I will not let this go! I will take things further! I am appalled by the service I received

Generally, I enjoyed my experience with MYA. Every visit and chat was very friendly and all members of the team were great, from the receptionist at the Fitzroy clinic, my PC Eka, and my then-surgeon Andrea Giannitrapani.
Was very nervous and unsure what to expect for my initial consultation but Ria was very welcoming and friendly and made me feel hugely at ease!
Really happy with the service from the girls at Nottingham clinic and all the staff and surgeons at London.
Very informative.

I had my surgery over a year ago, which I have a closed rhinoplasty. Overall, I am really pleased with the results. Dr Frati was my surgeon, and has done a fantastic job. There are just a couple of things to bear in mind when going with MYA!

review_title: Brilliant place to go if your thinking of surgery
review_body: Lovely place, hospital is clean and well run and the staff are super helpful and friendly. Nothing was too much for them and always on hand if you needed help, would recommend Mya to anyone looking at getting surgery

I had a breast reduction surgery in January 2017 and I have had no issues at all. Just a slight asymmetry issue, but I was given ample warning (pre-op) about  all of the possible risks involved with this type of procedure. The asymmetry itself is barely noticeable - but is just depends on the individual.
I went to a few places before choosing MYA and soo glad that I went with them in the end. I have received more than enough support and very happy with my results!

I had a breast enlargement with MYA Fitzroy in early March 2017 and I'm extremely happy with my experience so far. I researched few different companies but chose MYA as they made me feel most comfortable. My PC Eka was lovely and informative. I didn't feel pressured at all to make any quick decisions and she was always on hand if I had any questions.  The meeting with my surgeon, Mr Frati, was brief but we spoke about all the important things. He was really professional (as I expected from reading prior reviews) and made me feel confident that I was in good hands. My experience on the day of my op exceeded my expectations - my room was nice and comfortable and ALL the staff were extremely attentive throughout the day. I felt relaxed and safe which in turn made my mum feel at ease - I really can't express how impressed I was.The tea and toast after the operation went down a treat too.
I have seen a few negative reviews on Mya here but I have to say So far I have had a great experience at Mya, especially with Hannah Matthews - my patient coordinator
My experience of Mya was very good from start to finish, despite any hiccups the staff at every point provided a very good service.
I'm extremely happy with my procude i never expected to get these results.

Couldn't be happier with the service and friendliness from all the staff at MYA Cardiff. The waiting area is modern and tidy and all staff are friendly and supportive. Any questions asked are answered either imediately or near enough as Soon as the team have an answer . Surgery ran smoothly and the private room and staff were excellent! Would definitely recommend

review_title: Crap customer service but the hospital and staff made up for it
review_body: I have just returned from a tt and vaser at fitzroy london. I have to say before going i was extremely nervous i had had very inconsistent patronising contact from customer care..i really think they need to retrain staff, it seems because its cosmetic that they think all customers are plastic bimbos. When parting with ALOT of money i dont expext to be called hun! Im a customer, a client i dont think in any other company where you were paying this much for a service you would  get talked to like a moran. I felt they were very insincere and uncaring of an emotion you might be feeling leading to surgery. They only kept upncontact until id transfer the money for operation. However saying all of this the surgeon and staff at hospital where amazing! I can not fault them. Dr marcellino came to see me when i arrived..seeing how nervous i was pushed my surgery forward so i was sitting around thinking. I was taken down to for the op by an African guy who kept me talking and made me feel calm then the anethitist came in and was so nice he gave me something to cam me down and next thing i knew i was coming around in recovery. They made sure i was warm and comfortable before taking me back to my room. I have read the staff where rude but mine where all lovley and caring. Nothing was too much. I was infact so greatful tonthem i made my husband get them chocolates. I know we pay for good care but the level of care and professionalism was to such a high standard. Also i adored the food! The beets and feta salad was amazing. Would go back to the same surgeon but not sure id go through mya again simply because i feel the contact was so poor before the op. Im due to go for my post op on moday so we will see.

I had a boob job with mya on the 14th march 2017 at the London Fitzroy hospital with dr frati. My clinic was nottingham the PCs there jade and rhia were amazing and very helpful at all times. The nurse Alice was so lovely and helpful aswell. The staff at Fitzroy was so amazing mia and Laura the nurses were fantastic such a great experience. Thank you MYA I feel so happy x

Very happy with the care that I recieved throughout my Mya journey very friendly staff especially in London very kind they made me feel so relaxed and welcoming, finally my results are amazing I couldn't  of asked for anything better exactly how I wanted It highly recommend ?���

The staff at Leeds Katy my patient advisor Beth Sugden and Donna Goodall my nurse amazing best place for any cosmetic surgery amazing experience couldn't be happier with outcome of breast implants and my surgeon DR Mounir best surgeon at
Had my consultations in Nottingham with Ria....She a superstar!!!!

Throughout my journey I've been consistent in knowing what I want, which is honesty and consistency. I have searche and researches and landed with three companies which I wasn't to try. In my opinion Mya gave me everything I needed! The honesty from the surgeons and consistency of appointments and everything else that comes with the journey. I have been reassured by my PC throughout my journey (Liverpool) she's been fab and at the end of the phone / email whenever I've needed to speak to her or been anxious about anything. My BA all went to plan, I was not one bit nervous, everything was fabulous from the start to the end. My nurse is great I have been a few minutes late to most of my appointments which is me all over (and the traffic) and she's always been great with me, gave me good advice and reassured me as its a bigger deal than you think getting the bandages off, not knowing what is coming is the only bit I have been nervous for.

I am so happy I went with my gut to have this procedure especially to have it with MYA. I?��m constantly getting reassuring texts from my PC Natalie and the nurse Charlotte, they have both confirmed all the reasons I chose MYA! They truely are a credit to the company as they are so happy and bubbly at each meeting. They made this experience so exciting for me and filled me with knowledge and questions I didn't have they are amazing at what they do and I can't compliment them enough!!' I know if anything went wrong (which I doubt it won?��t) they would be there 100% which is what makes the company great!! Thankyou girls and Thankyou MYA,
Highly recommended company  ...PC was Natalie she was just amazing through the whole process ...any time i needed her she was there !

Had the best experience with mya, the best choice ive made! My PC was called claire, and she made me feel so comfortable and relaxed about the whole situation as i was really nervous, i heard from her atleast once/twice a week pre op and post op, my surgeon dr frati was really nice too explained everything that i needed to know and any questions or worrys i had. The after care of the nurses on the day was great was really looked after and am still receiving phone calls 4 weeks post op to see how im doing and to call up if i have any problems or questions. I would defo recommend mya and defo go back for more procedures in the future. I had the best experience and im so happy with my results x
AMAZING!

I had my surgery back in October and was due to have a 3 month check with a surgeon, I got a call from someone saying the clinic had been cancelled and that no dates were left, it's now feb and I've not seen my surgeon to be signed off! I called to book in and I was told there is a 3 month waiting list!!!!! Absolutely ridiculous paid 5k for surgery and I'm not even getting half decent aftercare seems like no one cares.

Having been through a similar procedure a few years ago I kinda knew what to expect but I have got to say all the staff I haven been in contact with have been truly amazing- Can't say a bad word about my experience and I'm going back for my second stage soon...also have recommend by best friend to join me and we are going back together.  Friendly, informative and very professional..... highly recommend to anyone considering surgery to visit the Mya clinic - I thank them for their guidance and honestly - Great service   The post opp care is spot on - Thanks xxx
I would recommend MYA to anyone. I had Mr Frati for my recent BA, he is just wonderful. The aftercare i received post surgery from the medical team was fantastic.

The staff here are ridiculous! They are the most slow, unorganised, unfriendly people ever. I came along with my friend for her operation and was spoken to like a robot. I would not be happy paying the money my friend paid to receive the service MYA provide! From waiting 20 minutes for a single cup of coffee, to then being left in the room for over 40 minutes after being told the operation could be cancelled (somebody only then came as I had to go down to reception and ask what was going on) THEN, after over an hour waiting for the sandwich to arrive the nurse came at the same time to discharge us. Honestly unbelievable!
SO UNPROFESSIONAL!
I am only 11 dpo, an so far MYA has been amazing, the chelmsford clinic girls Natalie an Charley are allways there when i need advice.

review_title: MYA are amazing, this will be my 2nd procedure with them.
review_body: I highly recommend MYA, they are caring and extremely helpful throughout the procedure. You can ask any question with honest answers. This will be my second procedure with them. I am happy with my results and if I ever wanted to improve something on my body I would always go to MYA. Thank you for everything you are life changers and you do it with style !

Initially I was happy with the results as I had some swelling after a few weeks I noticed that some areas had been missed, and I was left with a large area of fat that was noticeable and had been missed. I went back to my surgeon and was told it was swelling and to come back after 6months, so I waited as requested and still noticed 2 Areas of noticeable fat still visible and could feel it had been missed. I went back again after 6months and was told I have to wait another 3 months for swelling to go down. This time I was told it was loose skin,  in the mean time I have had 10 courses of massages to make sure all fluid was being moved and also a pt to make sure I maintained my weight down. I said it was not all loose akin and you can feel the fat in the area. Again I was told it's swelling and to come back after its been a year. Unfortunately I have no confidence in what I'm being told,I wanted further work doing but feel my aftercare has been appalling and I have been treated like an idiot and that the fat I can see and feel is loose skin. The surgeon has not even said he would fix it which I was told when I sat with him of he had missed anything he would fix. So I have been fobbed off with am excuse everytime I have been to see him. Disgusting

I had a great experience with mya! Everyone was so lovely and so helpful through my surgery and healing process. I knew exactly what was going to happen and was very well prepared for the surgery and the post op. All the staff were so knowledgeable and so sweet! I am extremely happy with The result so far wouldn't go with anyone else for my surgery! Linda was my surgeon and she was so great! Joanna was my nurse at Bristol she was lovely !

My experience with Mya has been very good. All initial consultations were free which I thought was amazing considering some places will charge around �100 and you may not even use them! One small hiccup was my pre op appointment being cancelled just 15 minutes before my appointment! By this point I was already in London and around the corner which was rather annoying considering I live in Kent and couldnt see why they would not cancel a later appointment and give somebody else more notice than 15 minutes!  But other than this they have been fantastic and I am very grateful that they offer free aftercare as I was unfortunate enough to have a haematoma 6 weeks after my operation. I called the 24 hour emergency line and straight away they told me to come to the hospital with an over night bag and I was operated on first thing the next morning and had to spend an extra two nights in the hospital and it was all covered in the original cost.
