I cannot fault the friendliness of all the staff and think that MYA are amazing!

Throughout my journey MYA have been fantastic from beginning to end. Even throughout complications MYA have been understanding and responded to my issues straight away and without query. I cannot thank them enough!

review_title: Went with MYA as I wanted a specific surgeon
review_body: The beginning contact with MYA was fab they are very on the ball and have someone ring you as soon as you put interest in on the website etc. You are then assigned a girl who you chat to about the procedure and what you might want. they then suggest different surgeons who would be good for your case. You then book in to meet your surgeon for in my opinion a really quick consultation where you will talk through about positives/negatives and what they recommend. Then you have a cooling off period where I then booked in. I felt here my PC pushed me to make a payment 3 months in advance but because I had the money I paid. Once paid you dont here from your PC at all. I had to email her about my op time. Dr traynor was quick and ive probably met him about for around 20 minutes in total not including my operation. I chose him and wanted him because he has a good reputation and did a great job on my breasts so far. My nurses appointments have been really good and they have always been on time and on my 2 week one she booked me in for another appointment a week later just to check on something. I have one more appointment at 6 weeks then meet the surgeon again after 12 weeks. So far I have found it easy to rearrange appointments and the staff have all been lovely. The only thing I would suggest is perhaps the PC contacting you between paying and your operation just for a  call and having a receipt for payment because I wasnt sure they had taken the money and it is a lot of money.
My whole experience has been nothing but positive, the only thing I could fault MYA on is the delayed appointments but that is only because they are so popular, for good reasons!

review_title: BA with mini uplift with Dr Linda Fiumara
review_body: From start to finish I have been very impressed with the professionalism and attention to detail Dr Fiumara has shown. I had wanted a breast augmentation for over a decade because I was unhappy with the lack of volume at the top of my breasts and wanted a surgeon who specialised in a natural look. I did my research and immediately knew I wanted her to perform my surgery.
Friendly co ordinators guiding you through your transformation. Surgeons help you make the right choice to suit you. Staff at the hospital caring and friendly. Aftercare team reassuring and on hand.
great company, everyone at the clinic is always pleasant. 100% happy with my result and the aftercare. Would recommend to others

I can't recommend MYA enough. From starting my journey getting a breast enlargement mya have been amazing! I have my appts at Manchester and my PC is natalie m and my nurse is txell. They are so attentive and lovely and have made sure to always put me at ease and looked after me. I had mr traynor and I can't thank him enough he truly knows what he's doing and I am a 100% happy with my decision choosing him as my surgeon. I had my surgery at Preston first trust and all the staff are so reassuring and really do look after you! I have had follow up calls to ask if I'm ok which is so nice & the nurses on the emergency number are also great! I can't fault mya one bit everyone is fab and my experience with them has been amazing I couldn't ask for more, 10/10! Thank you so much I look forward to seeing how my boobs look when they are fully healed! Xxx

review_title: They put in the wrong implant size!!!! Seriously! Now i feel more awkward and uncomfortable to take my clothes off than before... AND I PAID FOR IT!!! ... Not ok....
review_body: They put the wrong implant size in!!!! Seriously! Now i feel more awkward and uncomfortable to take my clothes off than before... AND I PAID FOR IT!!! ... Not ok....

From the start to the finish of my journey everything was 5 star quality from the clinic in Cardiff and London the the staff being so helpfull and friendly you felt at ease they talked you through everything step by step can't wait to get my next procedure done

My daughter recently had a very bad experience with MYA where in December after having a pre-surgery consultation with the consultant he cancelled the operation.  We had made a 2 hour journey to their facilities in Preston and was prepped ready for surgery.  The Nottingham office phoned and said not too worry about the money and I just needed to have another consultation before surgery.   The situation now is that they will not perform the operation and refusing to refund any monies. The excuse is that she is not suitable for surgery - they thought she was suitable for surgery when they booked her to have surgery and took �3000 off her.  The negotiations are continuing but I have little hope of reaching a satisfactory conclusion. I have seen a few posts like this and would like to hear from anyone else who has suffered a similar experience

I'm 6 weeks on after my breast augmentation and I couldent be happier. From 34 A to now measuring into 36 C I love going in shops and picking out bras without feeling Ashamed. Everyone at Mya are really helpful and all polite and that goes a long way with me. The aftercare is excellent and my nurse Jeanette really looked after me and checked up on me many times. I have reccomended mya to a few girls now and one is having her nose done and another is going for a consultation about breast augmentation. So happy I chose mya I feel so happy xxxx
So happy with everything great company would recommend it to everyone I know
Soooooooo glad i went with mya made my experience so easy. Dr andrea amazing surgeon i love my new boobs ?�ɍ mya nurse in birmingham clinic so helpfull an always on hand to answer any questions.
I just want to thank MYA for my amazing experience with them!

My experience has been amazing with mya.from my 1st consultation all the way through.i am still on my mya journey as I am 6 weeks post op.but the service they provide is fantastic.all the staff are so friendly and caring and always happy to answer any of your questions.my surgeon was so nice too and put me at ease with all my queries.my hospital stay was fab and I felt so relaxed and cared for it was an amazing experience and I'm so so happy with my results.i will and would highly recommend mya to everyone I know or who I hear of wanted to have cosmectic surgery.thankyou mya nicola.x
Having my breast reduction last year was the best choice I've ever made. I have received an excellent service and aftercare from MYA after being recommended by one of my friends.

Everyone at MYA has been completely amazing from the very start of my journey. They are all so friendly and caring and always there to answer any questions you may have along your journey, no matter how silly you might think it is! The staff are all so friendly and helpful, everyone from the girls on the phones, to the amazing staff at the Bristol clinic, which I must say are second to none. The guys at Bristol are so lovely! I'm going to be sad when my journey with them ends!! Recommend them to everyone!

Overall I am very happy with the service and treatment I received. There were a few hiccups along the way before my breast augmentation which I felt could have been avoided but mistakes happen - they weren't serious, just an inconvenience and a little unsettling.

Choosing MYA was my best decision I've ever made! My whole MYA journey was fantastic from start to finish!  The whole team looked after me so well inc my PA, surgeon and nurses! I couldn't thank them enough. I am so please with my results from having a BA! Make sure for any one having surgery done with MYA you listen to what you have to do for your aftercare!

review_title: From start to finish MYA have been  ?�?
review_body: From start to finish MYA have been amazing. I saw Dr Frati for my initial consultation and he also performed my surgery he is a great surgeon very honest and direct which made me feel at ease after having previously had a bad experience elsewhere. Since my operation the care given to me has been brilliant I have had regular checks and there is always someone at the end of the phone to help if needed. Massive thanks to all of the staff at the clemsford clinic you have all been fantastic. Special thanks to Natalie , Charley and Dr Frati.

review_title: Great service from start to finish!
review_body: Was recommended by friends who have used MYA previously and I can honestly say I was very impressed. Due to time constraints the time between initial consultation and operation was very quick, but I was never rushed or pushed to make any decisions. I always felt like at the time of appointment I was the focus. Nearly 4 weeks post op now and I'm very happy with the results & aftercare.

So far I've only met natalie from the Chelmsford clinic and Dr Andrea. They both have been very helpful with my decision to go ahead with surgery, and both very knowledgable! Tomorrow I have my pre-op appointment where I get to meet my nurse. Surgery is next month and I'm so excited to see my results. Would definitely recommend

No plastic surgeon to discuss with chelmsford. Just some silly woman who gives you the wannabe doctor/receptionist treatment. No thanks. Not spending �1000's to be spoken to like that scathing and immature. Avoid.
I have been for my first consultation with MYA in Liverpool.
Great staff at the hospital, couldn't fault them at all! Have had follow up contact also to ensure I'm all ok and recovering well.

review_title: I loved my experience at Mya
review_body: My stay at Mya went very well. As soon as I entered the lovely building in Fitzroy Square, I was made to feel welcome. The rooms are very clean and comfortable. My nurse (who I think was called Nia) was amazing and made sure I was ok once I came around from my surgery, checking on me very often and making me laugh. I was one of the lucky ones who didn't experience any pain after my BA so I didn't need to take any painkillers. The attention I received was second to none. I also had to have a revision because I got capsular contracture and there was no problem getting seen straight away and being granted a revision. If there was one negative, it would be that the doctor who operated on me did not visit me after the surgery to tell me how it all went but the nurses filled me in on everything I needed to know. I have already recommended this company to friends and would not hesitate to use them again. A very happy customer!

Love Mya, have just had my second procedure, as I had contract capsular. Mya was amazing an got me booked back in within 2 months as couldn't repair itself. Dr Frati's work is amazing an would highly recommend him. All the nurses an staff are amazing at the Fitzroy. So if you want or are thinking of having a breast augmentation then have a visit to Mya you won't be disappointed

My surgeon was amazing, he helped work out what implants to give me that would suit my frame and the operation went off without a hitch. I wouldn't have got such a great result without MYA and Dr Kazzazi.
All of the team, patient Co ordinator surgeon nurses to receptionist were all lovely.
Absolutely amazing with Chelmsford clinic my  patient coordinator(Natasha) and nurse (charley)  and surgern(dr frati) and his team were brilliant and so supportive would recommend to anyone!

I felt so comfortable with MYA from start to finish! Before I was so scared about having my operation but every single member of staff reassured me that everything was going to be okay and gave me nothing but 5 star support :). They all made me feel so at ease and going with MYA has to be one of the best decisions I've ever made as every single person I came across has been nothing but friendly and so reliable. I would definitely recommend the MYA experience to any girl thinking about having cosmetic surgery.
Great service by the MYA staff all so helpful and made my experience easy to deal with. Fab results and aftercare couldn't be happier with my decision to go with MYA.

From day one everything I had to do with MYA was done in the most professional way possible. From consultation right through to operation and after care, I cannot rate them high enough. I would recommend them to anyone especially family and friends. I will certainly be using them again for further work I would like done at a later stage.

review_title: Open rhinoplasty-do it again in a heartbeat!
review_body: I couldn't fault MYA for the journey I am currently experiencing. From my first consultation with my patient coordinator to the expertise from my surgeon and the post op aftercare service.
Excellent customer service. Mya was great from start to finish. Very happy with results.

review_title: Amazing experience from start to finish
review_body: I would recommend MYA to anyone, i am so glad i chose them to have my surgery with. When having cosmetic surgery, its a pretty big decision so you need to feel safe, looked after and above all comfortable and MYA were more than this. Everything ran smoothly from start to end, and even after my surgery i have been getting phone calls checking that i'm okay post op which is lovely, more like friends really! Thank you so much MYA, my result is amazing and i have never felt more confident in myself :) xx

My experience with Mya has been fantastic. Sometimes you have to wait a couple of hours for a response but they do have other patients and jobs to do, in an emergency there's always someone there straight away. My op was at Fitzroy and how amazing the staff are there I've sent emails to praise them as they are an asset to Mya and that day is huge they made it so much better than I could ever imagine they had me laughing before I was put to sleep rather than crying. I felt so comfortable the only down side is yhe reception staff at Fitzroy not welcoming and they act stuck up and rude towards you which many people have complained about but otherwise erasing them I wouldn't company at all
MYA have been fantastic from the very start! I'm 3 weeks after my op and still in contact with mya for my follow ups and any concerns I have, my patient co-ordinator, Asma has been amazing :)
Extremely professional and friendly, great result!
I booked with you guys last year - got 9 days before my op and had to cancel for medical reasons. I was devastated.
I had a life changing operation last Thursday and I am so happy with my journey so far thanks to the service and staff at MYA.

review_title: Botched breast enlargement. My concerns disregarded by my surgeon.
review_body: Had a breast enlargement after a year the left breast still had not settled according to my surgeon but would be fine in 6 months. I informed him that it felt like my left implant was sitting to far left and also looked that way. I had an appointment with a nurse before she referred me to my surgeon because she agreed with what I was saying but yet apparently he saw no problem it's now been 8 months since that appointment and the appearence of my left implant has NOT improved!
After years of wanting I finally decided after my 2nd child and going from a 32d/dd to a very empty 32b to take the plunge and do it.

I'm now 10 weeks post op with a BA and I couldn't be happier.  Before I came to MYA i had a consultation with another company and it was a nightmare. I felt rushed and left feeling extremely stressed and they only wanted to give me 295cc aand to go infront of the muscle which is not what I wanted.  I then contacted MYA and when I had my first consultation with kimberly the PC in Nottingham and I knew I wanted to give MYA my money straight away.   I was put in touch with Dr mounir.... who btw is a boob God and deserves so much recognition! I re searched him loads and even came across his you tube channel of him performing ops. I really did my research and knew id be super happy with him and he also did my friends BA about a year ago. His consultation was amazing. He was so precise with his measurements and I felt so comfortable around him. He asked me what I wanted and listened to me. He gave me 430cc ultra high profile behinde the mmuscle... he could put big implants in me because I have 2 children so my skin on my boobs was stretchy anyway.  I never had any problems with my appointments and they made sure i had everything ready for my surgery... i was phoning them quite alot and aimee was lovely and was always happy to help me. I had my surgery at Preston first trust in Manchester and the staff were amazing. They went above and beyond to make me feel comfortable.  I felt rather I'll coming off the anesthetic and the pain killers didn't help... no exaggeration the nurses was in every 5-10minutes to check on me. I was one of the first in the hospital and one of the last out. They really do look after you. When having my 1 week and 6 week post op appointments my nurse is alice... she is lovely. After my op i was worried about a few things and she would answer straight away.. nothing is ever too much trouble for her. My scars are literally just tiny lines and so far I'm healing really well... I've had so many compliments and the confidence I have now is unreal. Alot of people who complain I fully beleive that either they havnt done their research propey on their procedure or didnt follow their aftercare properly, Because I followed everything to a T and touch wood I have had no problems at all. I have recommend MYA to a couple of friends and 1 of my friends is due to have her OP with dr mounir in a couple of months. Keep it up MYA you have been Brill to me and many others xx

The staff were so helpful & made me feel very comfortable & to get to the place was easy .my consultation I felt comfortable &easy going very good at listening to what I wanted.loved the whole experience would recommend it to anybody that's thinking about it.

I decided to book an appointment at MYA after researching at length online as I have always wanted a breast enlargement. After going for my first consultation with Julie at the Newcastle office who put me at ease straight away I knew it was a sure thing and booked in straight away for my op. I used surgeon Dr Traynor who has done a brilliant job! I went to the Preston clinic and all the staff were great and I have had no problems at all. Anyone can trust this place and the staff if I decide I need anything else in the future it will be with MYA.

Cloe was very helpful and answered all my questions.  So glad she recommended Mr Joffily for Vaser Lipo I feel like a new woman.  It's only been a week since op and I finally have the body I always wanted. Nurses were so good with me throughout. Been the best experience.

I had rhinoplasty done at Maya with a Dr. Gonschior and he botched the Job!! I was very worried about stories I had read that noses ended up looking deformed after surgeries yet he assured me they do not botch jobs! HE IS A LIAR! After getting the cast off my nose o was horrified at my results he gave me a nose looking like a pig!!! The whole nose was too short and uneven! I was again reassured it was just due to "swelling" and it would be fine in a few weeks!!! THEY THEN REFUSED TO SEE ME AND NOW 3 YEARS LATER I AM STUCK WITH A BOTCHED NOSE JOB!!! AVOID MAYA ESPECIALLY DR. GONSCHOIR!!!!

review_title: Brilliant surgeon. Fantastic helpful staff and after care.
review_body: From the first consultation I felt like I was treated as an individual.  The staff gave me loads of information.  I would definitely see them again. The surgeon was fantastic.  He made sure the results I expected were right for my body.

When a complication arised with my breast implants the company aren't very supportive as they are in the beginning of the process... when I contacted them to advise them of a rupture thinking I would be able to sort things quite smoothly as they had a guarantee against ruptures, but no... they tried to say it wasn't ruptured for me then having to do all the leg work in getting my scan results. Once they had the scan they said I would need another procedure which I knew would happen but what I didn't know was they was about to charge me for the operation... disgusting! They give you a warranty for 10years for replacement of the implant but not once did they say at the first operation that you have to pay for surgery fees... what's the point in the warranty?? How else am I suppose to replace my implants??? Big con really to get more money from you!! I also wasn't very happy with my consultant he was rude and unfriendly, I asked for a different consultant but was told I couldn't have a new one. He had listened to what I wanted and after the procedure I expressed me opinions. The consultant claims I was asking for something they couldn't do... all I wanted was a breast uplift but instead he told me I should go bigger to fill out the excess skin and have a higher profile to achieve my look... this did not give me what I wanted!!!

I had a breast enlargement with MYA last November so it has nearly been a year. Since then I have flown on a short flight, I now sleep on my front again (at first this was very uncomfortable) & I finally feel comfortable in my own body. If anyone wants advice I say do it. MYA changed my life for the best surgery was quick and after care was great. Go for it.

I had my procedure in August 2016 and I was extremely happy with not only the result of my surgery but also the pre op and post op care. My first consultation at MYA was with my patient co - ordinator Clare Hennicke who had outstanding customer service skills and made me feel extremely comfortable about my decision to have surgery. She answered all of my questions in not only a professional manor but also friendly. From the beginning and through to the end MYA as a whole have been very helpful attentive and supportive.
I had a reduction in July 2014, i felt very comfortable with the staff and surgeon at the time of deciding on the surgery, however the aftercare was not as the best experience.

excellent experience, first three days after the operation on my nose was scary but after splints from inside my nose were removed I was very comfortable.  very happy with the results glad I went through with it only wish I had done it years ago.

review_title: Surgeon was great, service was impersonal and rushed-Leeds
review_body: This review is for MYA Leeds...After a rushed consultation with the patient coordinator where she barely stopped for breath I met with my surgeon. I had multiple consultations with various companies and this was by far the worst, it was rushed, impersonal and I felt like one of hundreds of people who had sat there and listened to this forced speech. Multiple consultations had taught me that the most important thing was that you liked the surgeon and felt reassured by what he had to say. After much research I decided to go with Mr Muneer despite the poor service I had received prior to meeting him. He was great, and I am 100% happy with the results he has created. The aftercare at MYA however was horrendous. I was discharged with codeine and as a nurse myself I am fully aware that codeine is ineffective on a large number of people. My post-op pain was uncontrollable despite my best efforts. I was seen at the Leeds clinic 2 days post-op (which was terribly uncomfortable as I was at this stage struggling to get in and out of bed) after my partner had had to loose his temper with the nurse on the telephone to express how concerned he was about me as nobody really wanted to know. I left with the reassurance that their doctor on call would produce me a prescription for my partner to collect later. Which did not prevail. In a state of despair I got an emergency appointment at my GP after waiting around all day to collect the so called prescription that they had promised. I was prescribed tramadol and this saw me through the next few days of pain as things started to improve. The staff at the Leeds clinic were unhelpful and were reluctant to see me/give advice post op. I was given an emergency out of hours contact number too to use which was neither use nor ornament, it just made the battle to see someone when I was in utter desperation even harder. I would not recommend using MYA, it reminds me of a 'boob factory' with zero compassion or care in their nature. Mr Muneer was superb and if it wasn't for him I wouldn't have turned a blind eye to the poor initial consultation. 100% happy with my results, 100% unhappy with the service provided.

I wasn't happy with MYA at all. picked them just as I liked surgen and he couldn't care less. very little advice from him before and complete no interest after. he did a good job but I wish he would spend more time with me before to advise me. it was all rushed in 5 min and he hardly looked at me
overall a good experience and positive results. lack of after care though
I loved Mya I'm so confident now I am in love with my boobs

review_title: Very good, but improvements are necessary.
review_body: I chose to have my breast augmentation with MYA after being impressed with my cousins' results. I opted to visit the clinic in Manchester, as it was the one she'd visited, as well as my nearest. My consultation ran smoothly, with my patient co-ordinator being friendly and informative. I was impressed, and paid my deposit upfront, and the remaining cost a week or so afterwards. I did, however, find that once paid, my patient co-ordinator was extremely dismissive.  Upon my consultation, she informed me that she was having her implants replaced a week later, and this seemingly took priority over her patients, as I was never contacted again - not after my pre-op appointments, or post-op. When going through such a daunting process and with the amount paid out for procedures, I do feel that this is unacceptable. It's a shame that my experience couldn't be entirely positive, as my nurse, surgeon, and hospital were all exceptional.

I should have known from the minute I walked in the door not to bother with Mya. I used the Fitzroy clinic, and I'm convinced half the reception/admin staff there were only there for the perks of the job. I met my PC Alice Potts, she's since left, and booked my surgeon consultation. When I returned a couple of weeks later to meet Mr Marcellino, my appointment was at 7.30. It was a Thursday night, I'd travelled two hours to be there, and I arrived to be told he was running late and it would be easier to re-schedule. (You could have called). I waited it out and was finally seen at 9.30pm. (He's lovely FYI, just use him through his own clinic). I went from the surgeon in with my PC and booked a date 15 days later (she wouldn't accept my query of late booking discount, so I wonder what counts as late), and I paid up. I returned for my pre-op 7 days before my surgery. All went ok. I arrived on surgery day at my allocated time of 7.30am, I was in theatre by 9am and back to my room by 11am. All the staff were perfect. However, they were short staffed. Another patient was having pain management difficulties so ALL staff were rallying around her. I was left for hours at a time, and eventually left at 7.45pm after a nurse promising me at 2pm I could go home in an hour. 7 days post op appointment I was surprised to find I needed a 14 day post op appointment as my stitches weren't dissolvable (my surgeon never uses dissolvable stitches) - it would have been nice to be pre-warned. 14 days post op, my stitches were removed. Six weeks post op. I got stuck on the M11 in traffic, I called and left a voicemail to say I'd be late. I arrived FIVE MINUTES LATE, to be told my nurse couldn't see me and she'd already gone and I should have called (I did). At this point in time I had a few difficulties with my incisions and insisted I needed to see someone. As I sat in the waiting room for about 20 minutes to see a nurse from the ward, my actual nurse scuttled past to leave!!! The ward nurse suggested I booked to see my surgeon regarding my incision. Two weeks later, I saw my surgeon. Fairly on time, he had nothing good to say about the receptionists either, he signed me off early ahead of my 12 week check up and removed my rogue stitch. I haven't been back to Mya since. The surgeon and ward staff were great, the rest of the staff need to take a reality check.

Very helpful and contactable before handing over your money but once they have it absolutely useless no support what so ever and left feeling deflated after surgery that didn't go how you wanted it to

I am currently waiting for my op and wanted to post to warn people who are looking for the right company! If it hadn't have been for the last space availability I would not have gone anywhere near this company after a disastrous experience with the Birmingham clinic. They are unorganised, rude, and patronising. The day I met frati there was a 2 hour delay and people not even being informed and turning up from all different parts of the company! I had to complain to head office regarding the service of the patient coordinators as as soon as they get your sale, they disappear!!! I can't wait to file a proper complaint, I will be taking this further! They lie and do not have a clue what they're doing!

I had 400cc overs on the 12th April 2016 at preston with Mr Traynor ,  I have never had any pain at all from the start to finish, I was a deflated 36B now I am a 36E my confidence has shot through the roof,  the whole experience and care I received was fantastic my appointments at Newcastle were brilliant, money well spent.

review_title: Good service let down by aftercare
review_body: The experience before surgery brilliant and straight after surgery too. However after 12 months of the breast implants settling i wasnt happy with how one breast looked. My surgeon called it a small thing and to just deal with it and when i have been trying to get transferred to a different surgeon (due to moving from leeds to Newcastle) for a second opinion nobody wants to know. Left message for call back and still waiting. So alot of money paid to not be 100% happy. Disappointed really.

I waited over an hour in the Nottingham clinic for every single appointment I had with them. One nurse I saw was young and patronising. Aside from that I'm not happy with my treatment either! After speaking to people who have had the same procedure at other places, so much more care was taken during consultations! Wish I had another 4 grand to have it done again! Shame I didn't know better at the time!

review_title: Great job but overall experience very poor
review_body: When I went to the Newcastle clinic it was very sales driven, I experienced to many phone calls to see if I had decided on operation, got given pre op date went to clinic and it was shut went a few weeks after where the nurse was so rude, still deciding to go ahead I went to London for operation at Fitzroy where my mother got told she couldn't wait I the room and after 5 hours was allowed to go home.

review_title: Good communication and caring team & good  clean faciilities
review_body: Overalll I  had a good experience

Had vaser done and was left with one side bigger than the other which I had to have another session of vaser. I should have been entitled to some money back! Other than that I had pointless appointments with nurses who could not take bloods! I was never seen after my correction surgery. Just proves how unprofessional they are.  Very displeased with the service and never would recommend to anyone.
I got a large breast augmentation (800 cc), I am very happy with the result, which is the most important part! Thank you so much, Mr Singh.
I had an amazing experience with MYA from start to finish.

On the advice of a close friend, I decided to go with MYA for a breast augmentation and I'm very glad I did! My patient co-ordinator Cassandra (who left the company the day before my procedure) was amazing throughout,  gave great advice and even called me on her last day to check on how I was. My nurse Teagan (not sure of the spelling) has also been great! She's very helpful and friendly and even calmed me down after I felt faint when my strapping was removed.

review_title: Overall great service, just no continuity with the nurses post op
review_body: Great surgeon, great hospital, great results. There was a slight delay in the healing process due to my own health, which meant that I had to return to more post op nurse appointments. It seemed to depend on which nurse that was running the clinic as to how much time was allocated to me and how much knowledge and advice they could share. One nurse was most unhelpful, and was trying to get me out of the door after about 3 minutes!

review_title: Absolutely awful experience in every which way possible with Mya.
review_body: I haven't enough words or time to explain how bad the experience, care, surgery, and after care was that I had with Mya. When I look back I actually can't believe how bad things were and how badly things were handled and extremely unprofessional. I was meant to file a complaint to the head office but I was that fed up with what had happened I handn't got the energy to go through it all and just wanted to forget it all.

review_title: I didn't  get what I asked for!
review_body: I had vaser liposuction at the end of June.  The specific areas I were concerned  about  were my back fat and public monis.  The doctor  was very enthusiastic  and said I would get great results,  this gave me the confidence to proceed even though the cost of treatment  was a lot more than I initially  expected to spend.  The procedure and theatre staff were brilliant,  there is quite a bit of discomfort afterwards mainly due to the leakage.....  I was told to expect this... But it was more like a hosepipe,  this subsided after about 4 days.  I had a last check after about 5 weeks and was told I could stop waring my support and they would contact me for my 12/13 week final check.  To date I haven't heard anything!  I still have fat sausages beneath  my bra straps so it's still an issue  in clothes and I still  can't Ware a bikini as my pubic monis is  still heavy plus I have two rather unattractive  indentations where the procedure had taken place I'm probably more conscious  now than I was before.... My stomach is flatter but that's not what I went for,  I feel the surgeon has done what he wanted to do and iv still got the issues I went with plus  I'm �5000  lighter,  I'm actually quite devastated. I hvnt been invited back for  my final consultation,  despite the fact that I aired my concerns with the nurses at the follow  up appointments.... I just feel like they've taken my money  and now  it doesn't matter.

review_title: Worst money spent, deformed body.poor communication!
review_body: Save you money, your body and yourself a headache.dont have lipo and don't go to Mya!

review_title: Fantastic from the first appointment to the last.
review_body: From the start I knew exactly what would happen and how it would happen. The first meeting with Julie the practice manager of Newcastle clinic was fantastic she took me through everything showed me what I may look like with breast implants. She was great and very friendly. My surgeon Mr traynor told me showed me everything I needed to know and then done an amazing job for me. Since then I have never been happier. I thank everyone a the Newcastle clinic for everything they done for me. Fantastic amazing

If your thinking about having any cosmetic surgery with MYA! I wouldn't hesitate!! I absolutely loved it! People are so friendly there make you feel like your at home! If I could afford to have it done again I would ?���?�ɍ
I had a BA last May 2015, my results are amazing and loved the work my surgeon did Dr Traynor. So 10/10 for the surgeons they have at Mya!!!
10/10 for mya and mr traynor!!

Mya Clinic at Newcastle have been informative, helpful and supportive throughout my journey so far. All the staff at the Newcastle Clinic have been so friendly and professional. They gave me confidence in them and my journey at each appointment and made me so aware that they were available should I need them at any stage. I would recommend Mya Newcastle to anybody.

From the beginning to the end of my process MYA have been very helpful, attentive and supportive. Its nerve wracking at first and the friendly faces on reception and the lovely surgeons make everything a lot easier. Had no issues post op and would definitely recommend this company.
They've changed my life for the better! I'm now a more confident woman. Dr Traynor listens and does exactly what you ask. Julie and Charlotte from the Newcastle MYA are so friendly and approachable.
Great surgery, everything went well, however terrible aftercare. It felt as soon as they got my money from me they didn't care anymore.

review_title: Didn't get my last appointment for checkup
review_body: Got a call saying they couldn't keep the appointment they gave said so one would call and I called back to be told someone would call and it's now been over a year

Just had my Breast Augmentation and Abdominal Plasty as well as Lypo with Mr Frati. What a fantastic surgeon as well as surgical team. Thank you for changing my life. And to my consultant nurse Natasha Du Preez first class service and pre op advice etc amazing lady X
From start to finish first class service. From consultations to surgery and aftercare lovely honest people. What they promised is what I got

Had a great experience when first booking staff were friendly and helpful and always easily contactable. Surgeon was fantastic and I highly recommend mr traynor! Shame they cancelled my 12 week post op check and have never managed to get through to them since and they've not even contacted to say they haven't seen me. I'm now 11 months post op!!!

I had my boobs done yesterday with MYA at the first trust hospital in Preston! I have been so impressed with how smoothly the whole process has been from consultations right through to my surgery. My PC Charlotte at the Liverpool clinic has been so helpful and reassuring, I had Dr Traynor and have been so confident that he was the right surgeon for me I love my boobs already! So so happy and would recommend MYA to anyone xxx
Felt they were the right company for me as soon as I walked in. They weren't pushy like some others I had already visited.

I can honestly say everything about mya has been amazing! I went for my first consultation for a breast enlargement in Bristol which is about 1 and a half hours from where I live. Discussed why I wanted it and how big I wanted to go and they arranged for me to speak to the surgeon that day rather than have to come back if I wanted to go ahead. Rang a couple of days later and booked in and paid. 4 weeks later I was in London having it done! Arrived at the hospital at 7.30am and was out of surgery and back in my room by 11am. Had my own nurse who kept checking on me and making sure I was comfy and that the pain was bearable. I've just been for my 6 week check up today and my scars are fully healed, boobs have softened and dropped nicely. I had 300cc in my right and 325cc in my left. This originally made me think they would look odd but they look amazing, I am so happy with my results! Booked in for my 3 month check up already with the surgeon. The Bristol clinic was amazing, always happy and friendly. I would 100% recommend mya to anyone!
Definetly regret getting vaser Lipo done at mya very uneven ugly result

I had surgery with MYA and it was a excellent service from the moment I got introduced to the Mya world . A really warm welcoming company from the patient co-ords to the Sergon to the nurses in the hospital. I felt really cared for and the Sergon was great to help me not be nervous. The op changed my life and gave me lots more confident and I am much happier with my apperance thanks to everyone at Mya. If say for anyone wanting rinoplastry to go for it !! It can change your life so much like it did mine . 10/10 service from MYA

review_title: Very attentive and always there on the other side of the phone
review_body: I'm pre op at the moment can't wait to be a post op patient my surgery is coming along in the next two and a half weeks and I'm so excited about it all any queries I may have mya or my PC are there on the other end of the phone which is great

From beginning to end everyone was so friendly and helpful. Mr Trainer was completely amazing. Before I heard about mya I missed out on family holidays due to being too insecure to were a bikini swimming was out of the question and I stayed covered up at all time. After my surgery I'm full of confidence booked my first holiday in five years and I couldn't thank MYA ebough. I highly recommend MYA to anyone thinking about cosmetic surgery.
Amazing, very pleased!
I have visitied MYA with lots of hopes but I was faild vest of time and money plz make lots of research before u come to MYA

review_title: Trust worthy, safe, understanding, professional, extremely happy! A*****
review_body: I've had my breast enlargement with my MYA for 3years now, I am extremely happy with them, they look natural and I love them. Before I was a 34AA now I'm a 34DD. Before I found MYA I had a consultation with Harley medical, I found they were stuck up snobby and looked down on me made me and made me feel silly, they would only offer me a C cup which I didn't want if I was gonna go under the knife I thought I might aswel make it worth my while, I left there feeling upset and couldn't help thinking they didn't understand. I was online one night and discovered MYA. I had seen previously on a episode of Towie that Lauren pope had gone with them to have her implants replaced with them. I required a ring back with them and with in 30minutes or so I was talking to them and had booked my consultation, at this point I was full of excitement, the day arrived I got the train to London with my sister I turned up to a very clean building, and inside was very posh, I was welcomed by kind stunning ladies, my name was taken and I was told to sit in the waiting area, soon after I was called in by a lovely lady who asked me about what size and look I'd be going for, now unlike Harley medical I didn't hear them say "cannot" once, I know to a certain extent they can't always give you exactly what you want but it still felt like my decision and not them suggesting other ideas. she was very helpful and understood me, after chatting and explaining the procedure and that she asked a date and then it came down to the price, I was extremely shocked to how much it cost because that's one thing you never hear or you can't find it out straight away, it was costing �3950.00 which I thought was brilliant, I put a deposit down and walked out of that building so happy, I could not wait, a week later I had come back for my second consultation to meet my surgeon to  decide on size, he was lovely and understanding, in the end I went on the D-DD's round cups, and was having them put under the muscle to make them look more natural as I lacked breast tissue. It was the morning or surgery I got up nice and early and took a taxi down to London Highgate hospital, I turned up feeling welcomed and got my bags carried to my room, my room was big and had my own bathroom and tv, with in 20minutes or so the nurse came in to give me my gown and what I thought was a hat but in actual fact was knickers haha so when she came in finding me wearing them on my head I think she was quite surprised but it was funny, the sergeon came in and got his black marker out and drew where he needed too, then 15minutes later I was on my way down to theatre, at this point I was nervous and who wouldn't be if it was there first time going under the knife I didn't know what to expect, as I got there I did feel my heart beat faster but I was assured and was told to lay down on the bed where I had a lady and 2 others there checking me over, they explained what they were doing and within minutes I was asleep, and what to me felt like 5minutes was just over 40minites I woke up with a pair of breasts I was still half asleep at this point so wasn't to sure what was going on, I was wheeled back to my room in my bed, my friend did try to talk to me but i was still half asleep, I woke up not in much pain atall I was relieved it was done and couldn't wait  to look down to see, they were taped up but I could definitely see there was a pair of breasts, later on I was brought in dinner that I had previously chosen before I went into theatre, I ate it but couldn't keep it down but this is normal. I had two kind of jugs either side my bed joined to tubes going inside my breasts draining them it was quite weird but it was fine, the sergeon came in and told me everything was straightforward and was successful and there were no complications during surgery, after a few hours me and my friend chatting and looking at my new breasts the nurse came in to take the draining tubes out, it was a very weird sensation I have to say but I didn't hurt, it was time to go and I didn't stay in over night and my journey was only an hours length. But I was happy to leave and couldn't wait to get home and show my sister, you wouldn't have known id of been in and out the same day and walking around on the day of surgery. I signed some papers and they gave me a number incase of emergencies. I was given some antibiotics and pain killers which I collect from there little chemist at reception. I said my good byes and I was gone on my way. After the journey me and my friend went straight round hers and her mum was baffled and wondered how I was up and about , the first day was fine it was the second day I felt stiff and bruised but it was bearable I was still able to go shopping and buy some new clothes for my new shape. A week  went without any problems I went back to London for my check up and for my bandages to come off... It was exciting, the nurse took off the bandages and to me they looked quite weird because they hadn't settled and why would they of it had only been a week, but they were healing good. A month went by I kept them supported in a sports bra, after a while I noticed they started to become a part of me and looked like they had always been there like they were my own, 3years down the line, my confidence has grown and I love my breasts! If for some reason I ever had to have them replaced or I wanted them bigger I'd definitely without a doubt go back to MYA. Thankyou so much for changing my life!! I couldn't recommend you anymore! A*******
Surgeon seemed lazy and didn't complete to the time shedule I had paid for, (refunded for the rest) I didn't want a refund I wanted him to complete what I asked for.

review_title: My surgeon was great - mya not great
review_body: Cosmetic surgery is a life changing thing to have done where you hope you are doing the right thing for yourself. Mya dont give you any confidence in them at all! After having my pre opp appointment change just as i was setting off to go to it (which is an hour away from me) it made me think do i go with them or not. I trusted them to know what they where doing. My surgeon was great, but after having pain i couldnt wait to go see the nurse after a week. To then get my appointment cancel at 7pm at night when i had it the next morning, to be told i couldnt have another appointment until the wednesday after because the nurse isnt in. Why book appointment if you cant do them, if a nurse doesnt show up you should have cover so no one has to feel the way i did! Let down and thinking why did i ever choose mya!!
they are so good! Wouldn't go anywhere else for surgery. The surgeons helped me and guided me through all decisions lovely staff and great aftercare.
Had breast augmentation with Mr frati and he was fantastic from start to finish. Recommended him to friends and family

From the initial consultation to op day the staff at MYA made my experience more than satisfactory. The whole process was made easy and stress free. All of my questions were answered and made me feel cool as a cucumber on op day. Even the surgeons had good chat with me before subtley putting me to sleep. Post op was from what I can remember pretty painless and nothing worse than I was expecting. I would highly recommend this company.
Very comfy hospital,very nice poeple working there .No coment

Really attentive and seemingly caring...Until they got my money - then the customer care disappeared. I had 3 patient coordinators that all disappeared too. My results were awful. The surgeon disappeared too. It took forever to get a follow up appointment - I was offered one option to correct the 'bodge' more surgery which posed a higher chance of even more problems. I consulted with other surgeons and they all agreed it wasn't right to go back on the table. I sought alternate non-invasive options and had to pay for it myself since MYA were not interested in providing non-invasive less risky alternative solutions to rectify the problem.
The entire experience from the first online enquirers I had to my one year post surgery have been second to none.   Every last detail explained and my every question or request answered.

I was extremely nervous about my op, but thanks to the incredible staff the appointments and the operation day itself was amazing. I felt so relaxed about everything. I'd recommend this company to anyone,I'm even thinking of going back for a second operation! A huge thank you to all the MYA staff.

review_title: NOT THE BEST EXPERIENCE OF MY LIFE
review_body: EVERYTHING THAT COULD POSSIBLY GO WRONG, DID!!!

Overall Iv had a great experience with Mya.my body decided it didn't like my breast implants and caused me to get capsular contracture, but it was dealt with really quick and with little to no stress in the process, glad I chose Mya I love my new boobs

Right from the start I was well informed and well looked after. Couldn't fault anyone from my personal advisor Gemma, my surgeon Dr Singh, to all hospital staff and nurse. Everyone was professional, approachable and helpful. I felt fully informed along my journey and never had any doubts at any point. Can't praise my surgeon enough, very pleased with my results. Would most definitely recommend.

I have had mostly a good experience with Mya. I cannot fault my surgeon at all. He throughly explained everything before surgery and was kind and compassionate acting professional at all times. I had difficulty obtaining a gp letter which led to some very confusing phone calls. This delay resulted in me being told I would have to travel out of area to attend a pre op because my nurse was off sick. However after a lengthy discussion this was resolved. I had a long wait for surgery., arrived at 11 went down at 6pm and had a 2 hour journey home. I was also informed by the hospital staff that I should have been staying within a hour of the hospital which I had not previously been told about. I felt that although I was eventually informed of things it could have been a bit more prompt.

review_title: Pleased with my surgery after care terrible
review_body: Really pleased with my surgery and care in the hospital but after care terrible rang so many times for my 12 week ap with the surgeon and still waiting 25 weeks on.Reception staff worst ive ever dealt with at Newcastle clinc.

review_title: Customer service at MYA is terrible for the amount of money you pay
review_body: I have had a brest enlargement with MYA London.  The surgeon's and nurses are brilliant when you eventually get to see them, as every time I have been to MYA I have waited at least 30 minutes after my appointment time they are always running late. You can never get through to anyone on the phone as they never answer the phone. This was very worrying for me as I didn't find out if I was actually having surgery until 3days before my operation was due. MYA like to say how good they are but in actual fact they just want as much money as possible because once they have your money they don't need to keep you happy. I love my new assets and I'm very pleased with them although I'm not 100% happy as one boob falls to the outside when laid down and the insision is  wonky so you can see one scar even when I have a bra on. I'm told my breast will settle in time and it's nothing to worry about. So all in all they have done a good job on surgery but not good on customer service. I hope this helps and makes people think twice before choosing MYA.
Mr Fratti, did an amazing job. Absolutely love my boobs and would highly recommend it to anyone. Would do it again in a heartbeat x

After wanting surgery since I realised as a young teenager that I would never have anything happening in cheats I finally did something about it at 26. I'm not sure why it took long. Perhaps it's because I just accepted my body as it was as I got older or the fact that it was a considerable monetary investment, either way, finally going for my free consultation changed my life. As soon as I'd booked the appointment I couldn't think of anything else. MYA made the whole process simple and supportive and now I've had my surgery I couldn't be happier. I have heaps of self confidence and am always body confident. I never felt unhappy before but I also never realises I could feel this satisfied. My surgeon Dr Mounir especially needs to be mentioned. He gave me great advice and my final result is faultless. Thank you MYA!

review_title: A wonderful experience from the start!
review_body: From the very first appointment I felt so comfortable with my consultant. There was no pressure in any way, shape or form! Just professional, unbiased friendly advice. When it came to the actual surgery everything was so smooth. Met everyone involved before hand. The nurses were there when I needed them for any silly little thing and held my hand when going under from the anestectic - a little thing that meant a lot for my first ever surgery! Discharging was quick, straightforward and on time. The aftercare was/is brilliant! Couldn't ask for a more friendly, professional nurse. My whole experience was outstanding and so easy. Plus I am in love with the results! Highly recommend!

Litterally couldn't fault my experience with mya. From booking the inital consulation to post op, my PC, nurses, surgeon and even the girls on reception have been nothing but helpful, informative and very reassuring! All appointments were made well in advance and to suit my schedule. My PC Julie at the Newcastle clinic went above and beyond to find the right surgeon for me, I would recomment them and Mr Traynor 100%.
Everyone very professional and caring.

I had an amazing experience with Mya, the consultations was always very thourough and professional I was always advised on what the best options was for myself, the follow ups after my op have been very good. I'd highly recommend the company

I had a great experience with MYA from going to enquire about surgery running up until the day of my treatment however on completion of surgery I got an infection in my Left breast and found it very difficult to see my surgeon. I sent numerous emails with Pictures attached as I was advised he couldn't see me so to send emails and phone calls that was never chased up. I'm still having problems with my left breast 3 years on but I give up trying to get in contact. I did manage to see my surgeon last year and he told me it was nothing to worry about but like I say I still suffer with numbness, swelling, and pain. Overall if I was to get my breast done again I would not go back to MYA.

review_title: Little precision, sketchy follow up, non clinical staff not knowledgeable
review_body: Little surgery precision -what you ask for isn't essentially what you get, they don't seem particular about the finer details.
MYA were amazing at giving me honest advice for my operation and listening to what I wanted to give me a great result that I'm thrilled about!

I cant thank MYA enough!! My Breast augmentation was something I had thought about for years and they made the surgery experience such an easy process. I would recommend them to anyone who is looking to have their breasts done. The surgeons are incredible, they give you the best advice and results. 5* !!

review_title: High end service from start to finish
review_body: From consultation to operation MYA provided high quality expertise and proffesionalism. Comments, discussions and opinions were open and honest and I would highly recommend anyone to use MYA

review_title: Excellent customer service and amazing results
review_body: I had a really good experience with MYA as i had a unique issue which they managed to solve for me

review_title: Mildly pushy approach to a sale, but i didn't end up going with them
review_body: I went with MYA for breast surgery around 4 years ago, and had no complaints, so approached them for VASER Lipo this year. I went in August with the plan of getting the procedure the following year, so I was in no rush and just making early inquiries.

Ive wanted breast enhancement for so many years searching through all of the different companies. Came across Mya which was close to where I lived so I booked a consultation with a lovely lively women that helped me go through the process, it's a shame I can't remember this ladies name... being only 19 I was taken seriously for what I wanted which was amazing! Booked after meeting with the surgeon once size of the implant was chosen. At this point I actually wasn't happy with the size I was given as I wanted to go bigger as mine were pretty much non existent but I wanted it done so bad I just went with it.. couple of weeks before my operation I had a call saying that i would have to swap surgeons so went back in to Mya to have a meeting with him (he was known as the big bob surgeon) after talking to the new surgeon I was over the moon I could actually have the size I wanted and was paying a lot of money for! Operation time everyone was beyond lovely,  made me feel so comfortable and in good hands! After operation again everyone so nice the 1st week after having the surgery was properly the worst week of my life couldn't sleep, uncomfortable bored with the lack of things I could do. After care was again amazing I couldn't recommend Mya enough my sister actually went to them after I had mine done'!

I had a breast augmentation with dr traynor in July he was brilliant straight to the point and he will tell you what he thinks is right for you and won't just do what you want to get your money which I thought was great .

review_title: Great staff, they made me feel very comfortable.
review_body: Everything went very smoothly, i had no problems and very happy with the results. The staff really helped me with any questions or worries.

My first interactions with this company were great, they made me feel confident about my procedure. I did rush into it with out much thought however and I feel they were just happy to take my money. The aftercare was ok. they seen me for my follow up appointments and answered any questions when I asked. I was not  fully satisfied with my end result and I was never asked or given to opportunity to discuss this at any point. I have since had another procedure at a different company (the hospital group) and found that to be a lot better. The after care was second to none and they have been in touch all the way through my recovery and even after that to make sure I was fully satisfied with my operation. They also paid for my travel to and from the hospital and they provided me with a driver in with the price.
Professional and friendly staff and the surgeon was unbelievable first class pre and post op. Best ��� spent and the results are stunning

review_title: No problems, very happy with results
review_body: I had surgery under Mr Frati and have been very happy with the results.  It's now two years later and I haven't had any problems or regrets.

Would I encourage anyone to do this? No. Was it worth the cost? No. It is not a quick and easy procedure. It was 12 very painful weeks of post op recovery. A year on, it did not do what I wanted. My stomach is lumpy and uneven in an unnatural way, even though I followed the clinics instructions to the letter, and my flanks which were supposed to be done weren't, so they are now more obvious than before.In hindsight (as wonderful as it is) I'd have saved my money and gone on a focussed diet instead.
Not happy with my experience with Mya, there have been a lot of complaints about this service and i'm afraid I have to add to that.

Not happy with service. Once they have your money that's it!! My paitent coordinater moved to London I never got offered a new one. Had my implants with marcellino and they are awful, I regret getting them done. Never thought I'd ever be writing a bad review. Thought I would pay all that money and be happy, how wrong was I.
Great job, well satisfied and well cared for. Would certainly contact them again if ever i had any cosmetic issues i wanted to undergo.
After years of considering plastic surgery I could not have made better decision than go with MYA.

My journey was nothing short of fantastic. The clinic and my coordinator Cloe made everything so easy. The results were better than I expected and I cannot thank Mr Joffiley, his team & Cloe enough. I would highly recommend MYA
My experience with MYA was very up and down, but I still would have chosen them for my BA!
Very friendly and professional staff, would highly recommend.

Excellent company. Very friendly, yet completely professional. I had absolutely no issues what so ever, everything was handled so well by MYA and I had a wonderful experience. The nurses and doctors at the Hospital were so reassuring (I am usually terrified of hospitals or anything medical/surgical, but on the day of my surgery I felt so at ease). My surgeon was amazing! I had hunted Dr Frati down and as soon as I met him, I knew he was the man for the job (I am very particular). Dr Frati was so welcoming and informative. He truly went above and beyond to ensure I was happy and comfortable. I could not be happier with my results and I have already recommend MYA and Dr Frati to everyone I know that is interested in having cosmetic surgery. Thank you Dr Frati and MYA :)

Dr frati and all the nursing staff at fritzory are amazing, extremely helpful and professional with out standing care given, which made up for the poor care and lack of non responsive patient co ordinator I was appointed to in the Birmingham clinic
Lovely staff and very efficient. Great journey throughout!

When I first came and met to discuss what I wanted done everyone was nice and friendly all the way up until my surgery. On the day of my surgery I was asked what meals I would like as I would be staying over night (I had a breast reduction), I never got any dinner or meal even though had been there all day, and only got given some dry toast the next day. I then went on to have complications meaning I had to come back twice a week for checkups, but the worse part is on my six week review which should of been my last meeting I never heard from anyone so had no final check up, never got my before and after pictures or even an email to ask how I was. For the amount I paid I expected better treatment, not to be treated one way then as soon as the surgery was over and I had paid the money for me basically to be swept under the carpet!

Very informative consultation had all the information I needed which was great! But communication was not very good my patient coordinator left the company and no one informed me leaving me feeling like I had no one to talk to. After the op I felt like mya didn't want anything to do with me. I tried to arrange a meeting with the surgeon post op but they weren't interested in booking me in.
I felt I was in perfect hands and my results are amazing.
No difference in my body at all. Waste of money and extremely disappointed.
Had my breast enlargement done with Mya they are 100% amazing I'm so happy xx

They make you feel at ease and they give you all the information you need to make the right decision. I was at both MYA Leeds and had my surgery done at Preston First Trust Hospital and the staff were very friendly and make you feel completely at ease and I couldn't have asked for better care!

I underwent closed rhinoplasty with MYA around 8 weeks ago and can say it was the best decision of my life. From my first enquiry the staff were always extremely helpful and knowledgable. I had my initial meetings with Katy at the Leeds branch who then referred me to Dr Frati for my consultation. I hadn't planned on getting the surgery until next year but after seeing how good Dr Frati's work was I changed my mind just a few days after meeting with him- he knew exactly what I needed to get the perfect nose for my face. He was lovely when he saw me before my op and I'm due my post op check up with him next week in Manchester. The results of my surgery even after a few months are astounding and I've had so much great feedback. If anyone was considering rhinoplasty I would definitely recommend Dr Frati and MYA.
Amazing.. Everyone so polite and kind.. Love love love MYA

review_title: I had the most appalling experience with service post operation to a point that I was too traumatised to progress and meant I sought personal follow up outside of the MYA system to get wound care.
review_body: The experience was atrocious and I had to seek separate care support a the service was flawed and limited.
I had the best experience! From booking the date to the surgery and my recovery. I experienced no pain at all, I feel blessed!

Great surgeon, rubbish communication after from Mya. Turned up times where my appointment had been cancelled and nobody had told me and other times where I'd have to wait 2 hours after my appointment was scheduled for to be seen.
couldn't of picked a better company and surgeon to have my operation with! so happy with my results best thing I ever did, Dr Fratti and Amanda were amazing xx

I'm rating one star as there's no option for zero stars. I was so excited, went for my first consultation in September 2014. Went to meet the surgeon and was told 550 cc but the girl who was looking after me said well if you decide bigger on the day - I'll order 550 and 600cc and you can decide. Went to London, paid for a hotel and all, had my last meal at 6:30 the night before the operation because they said not to eat past a certain time and I was due in at 10am. The next day I waited until 5:30pm (last on the list - they did 7 or 8 before me) so I hadn't eaten for hours and hours. The surgeon said no way could I have 600cc as his consultation we had decided on 550 - so I had been lied to. He said I could always have another consultation with him, cancel the op and go back but I had already spent too much on hotel and all and as I was already there...  All done and drains out at 8:30/9pm. No offer to stay in. Went back to hotel. Went to three month check up and also twice because stitches were leaking badly and got strapped up with an iodine bandage thing which did work tbh.  Didn't hear anything back - nothing about a 6 month check up, 12 month or any other check ups tbh. Was supposed to be offered to meet the surgeon again at the 12 month check up I think but he then didn't do Cardiff or even Bristol!!!!  Really let down. Boobs are not what I was looking for at all, they've dropped loads and to be honest yes they are better than what I had - but not �6000 better. Not impressed and would never recommend them! Poor service throughout. I'm livid actually - I'd think twice about using MYA.
The surgeon, nurses, anaesthetist, doctors and ward staff were all amazing and I could not have asked for better care both pre and post op.

review_title: Very impressived with my surgery and care
review_body: I had an amazing experience and love my new figure now!

review_title: MYA - The worst surgery I've ever had! Just interested in getting your money!
review_body: Terrible customer service - made to wait well over 25mins at every appointment I attended, with no apologies - some z list celeb walks in from hollyoaks and gets seen straight away, before me, even though I'd been waiting half an hour past my appointment!! All young girls on reception and doing consultations - didn't come across as professional or qualified - seemed more interested in their own procedures and what they could get done for free! Wouldn't recommend MYA to anyone! My scarring is awful too!

review_title: I had a lovely experience with mya
review_body: I had a lovely experience with mya
Brilliant experience. Excellent finance options too. I'm so happy 3 years on, given me so much confidence.

I wouldn't recommend having the surgery at all. Not happy with the after care and the outcome of the results of my breast enlargement.   Hope to go back to get a second opinion, I will be making an appointment to see my surgeon ASAP
Fantastic service from start to finish, 3 years down the line and I'm still completely over the moon
The service at MYA is amazing. The surgeon and anaesthetists are second to none and do everything to make you feel relaxed. The nurses are also fantastic.
The only advice I have is: Go somewhere else!

Initial consultation was good. Surgeon consultation was ridiculous! Practice bras were so ugly that you couldn't get any idea of what you would look like. Sizes were so small that I filled them BEFORE I'd popped in the implants?! The Surgeon then looked at me and said "well, which size do you want?" I had no idea. Frumpy black bras and skin coloured see through vest tops did nothing to aid my decision. My consultant saw my frustration and took me back to her consultation room to go through the whole thing again. This time I put my own top over the bra/implant combo to try and get some realism as to what I'd look like.

Had a lovely first meeting but it seemed as soon as they had my money they didn't care my PC seemed to be very hard to contact after my payments went through and made a few false promises of calling me back or visiting me when I was in MYA on my surgery date. My pre op examination was scheduled to be on the same day as meeting my surgeon but because he was late they refused to do my pre op later than scheduled which isn't my fault. They then told me I couldn't reschedule my pre op appointment because my op date was so close meaning I nearly to cancel it. I sorted it out after being put on hold and told I'd be getting a call back which never happened numerous times. My surgeon and the after care team were amazing cannot fault them at all. Just a shame my PC and the receptionists seemed to forget about me the second my money had cleared in their bank!

I had my breasts done in August 2015, since then I've had to have one redone as they was noticeably odd, and have been back for the other one because one is high and very painful all the time and the other has dropped but doesn't feel like it's sat right. I have just received a prescription that I have to pay around �60 for for a 3 months course of meds to see if it will help with the breast that is sat high and hard to touch. After been lied to saying the prescription had been sent weeks ago for them the nurse to say o sorry it hasn't been sent I'll get it out now and suffering in agony! I feel when I was at my consultation the advisors were so amazing and easy to talk to, now I'm having a lot of problems know body wants to know! So I'm still suffering everyday with pain in both breast, the look horribly abnormal and I'm even more conscious about my body then I was! I'm past been angry now I'm just upset everyday!

review_title: Top quality service, I have recommended Mya and still would recommend this company to anyone.
review_body: From the first appointment to the actually surgery Mya was very professional with a 100% satisfaction. Will definitely use Mya again
Best decision of my whole life !
All staff and surgeon made me feel Comfortable and confident for my operation procedure.

review_title: I've had the best experience!  Everyone has been so caring
review_body: Surgeon was fantastic. Nurse is lovely. I've had a fab experience.

review_title: My experience at MYA amazing, top class
review_body: I was given honest practical advice on what could be achieved and was more than happy with the results.
Overall very happy with MYA. Experienced a few difficulties with communication but overall very happy.
The overall customer journey was so poor and shambolic.i was booked in for a wrong appointment after surgery and with the wrong doctor on a SATURDAY and after waiting for 1hr30 still wasn't seen on
Best decision I made was going with MYA for my surgery! Would recommend to anyone.

review_title: Surgery went great but after care let it down
review_body: Surgery was great. Very little pain and minimal bruising!
Had a great experience with MYA and felt that my best results were achieved. Definitely recommend

review_title: Not as good as I'd hoped
review_body: Great to start with but once deposit was taken felt the service went downhill. Getting the relevant information from the GP was left 2 weeks before the booked surgery date I was told things were being chased when they weren't. Surgey was nearly cancelled due to the time limit to get the info back felt like I was bothering the clinic trying to get information. Service not worth the money but the surgeon, hospital and follow up nurses were great.
Had a brilliant experience with mya, would defiantly recommend and use them agaib
I had a BA 18months ago and have never had any problems what so ever, MYA still keep in contact now which I find is great. 100% reccomend and mr traynor for BA is fabulous.

Pre op was professional and put me at ease. Post op nursing care was poor. Given tramadol 100mg at 6am. Discharged to sit sit alone in reception feeling unwell until my transport arrived. Wound infection post op which meant lots of visits to Manchester clinic for redressing and antibiotics. Unhappy with healing process and I requested to see surgeon. I was told I could see him at 6 weeks post op only. I am now left with ugly scarring to my right breast! I have over 20 years experience as a nursing sister and understand that this was preventable . In my opinion go elsewhere .

I had the surgery back almost two years ago in October, when I first got in contact MYA couldn't do enough to make me feel welcome, however the advisor I had at the time pressured me in to making payment for the treatment, telling me the Manchester clinic would be closing in the New Year of 2015 so that I wouldn't be able to have the treatment I wanted done, and I needed to book and pay now to get it done. I then wanted a date later on, but again was told I would have to pay extra because they would have to fly another surgeon out, although I was told they would work around me before any payment was made, I felt bullied in to making a quick decision by the advisor. The surgeon anaesthetist and the original nurse I had were absolutely lovely and made me feel at ease on the day. However after my surgery I had to wait a whole week to come back in for after care, when this is usually in the next day or two, after that I was not contacted again or checked up on for anything, I tried to voice concerns but again I was dismissed. Overall feel disappointed with the level of after care and the lies told to get me to make payment.
From start to finish it was a good experience...always professional but nice and friendly. Helpful and sympathetic ..I would recommend anyone to go there .....

The only thing I could say negative was all my appointment run late sometimes waiting for over an hour to see the surgeon...but all the staff were helpful and welcoming and the advice given by my surgeon was of high standards..and I am so delighted with my end results ,I would recommend MYA if your thinking of breast enlargement

I will be taking this further. Really unhappy with my 'bumpy' belly after vasor! My scars are also lumpy and my aftercare was unprofessional! Not even the right garments after such a big and EXPENSIVE operation!!

review_title: Great before and throughout but not after
review_body: Really helpful before with appointments
amazing results, brilliant customer care, very professional service
Fantastic experience. All staff very helpful, caring and attentive. Support when needed to answer any of my questions from start to finish and beyond.

review_title: First time surgery experience (London Fitzroy Clinic)
review_body: I had BA surgery with MYA earlier this year, and am 100% happy with the results. I found the team to be extremely friendly and knowledgeable - something which for me was very important given that I had never undergone any type of cosmetic surgery previously. The aftercare was also great, and I'm now 7 months down the line and do not regret a thing. Would recommend MYA as a company and would definitely use them again should I consider any further procedures.

I had a breast enlargement in July 2016 and the results are amazing! Mr Traynor really is very good and he is a very nice gent. The only downside for me was the service at the Manchester branch. On 4 out of 5 appointments I waited 40 mins or so to be seen and I had to visit twice because one of the nurses didn't take the needed information. It may be a little thing but service is important in my opinion. The service at the Preston hospital was brilliant and I felt very well looked after there by the nurses. Very happy but not quite 5 star service!

review_title: Surgery and results - perfect, aftercare - not so good
review_body: My pre-op consultations were good, really informative and relaxed. I felt so comfortable thats I booked up straight away and had my surgery four weeks later. My surgery was smooth and hassle free, the nurses were very friendly and professional, and they made a lovely cup of tea! The only slight hiccup was that I did not have a post-op consultation with my surgeon because he stopped working from the Newcastle branch by this time, so the nurse did it instead, which was totally fine. Would have been nice to see my surgeon though. I have not heard from MYA since my six week check.

A good few months after having my second breast augmentation with MYA due to implants flipping and capsula contraction one implant started to go hard misshaped, lumpy and painful. Went to see a nurse in clinic because I knew it was capsula contraction again and she told me it wasn't and not to worry (this was in the years guarantee time so any problems would be sorted for free)! Now my year guarantee is up it is getting really bad, the implant moves freely, is a hard sausage shape and painful! Now I am going to have to pay to have them sorted out when they could have been sorted in the beginning. also my first augmentation I weighed around 8 and a half stone, small framed asked the doctor for a dd cup so he advised I had 525cc! I trusted him and ended up coming out a GG! When the nurse took off my sticky bandage it ripped my skin off and left really bad sores! Other than that the people are friendly.
I felt I wanted breast augmentation surgery years ago, and struggled to find somewhere I felt really understood what I wanted and one whom I felt at complete ease with.. MYA were fantastic!
