Very good results I was a size 36b n now a 36e I'm more confident n happy with my boobs , I also gets lots of attention , had lots of good comments about them .

overall treatment was fantastic only thing let me down was I live in Swansea had to go to Cardiff for meeting to talk about the operation and having to go to London for the operation apart from that the staff was welcoming and really helpful.

i booked 3 consultations with 3 different companies & after i had gone to my first one(mya) i cancelled my others, they made me feel so relaxed and i was so happy with it... Had my 2nd consultation with my surgeon & was told what size breast implants i could have.. I was offered 350cc which i was happy about! As soon as i paid my deposit i didn't hear off the company once, was so hard to get in touch with somebody too(only downside to my experience) .. When my op day came i was told to make myself at home .. I went to the hospital in preston the nurses were so lovely.. When i woke up i had strapping & stayed over night... I was allowed to leave at 10am the next day, i healed so quickly, and i'm now a 32DD (was only a 32AA) my confidence is now sky high & i would definatly recommend mya, absolutely amazing! Can't thank them enough.

review_title: Good but aftercare could be better
review_body: Great pre op experience but little in the way of post op care.
Not happy at all no after care wish I went somewhere else feel like I can't tell them how I feel they are not approachable
Couldn't fault MYA, especially the lovely girls at the Liverpool clinic. Always made me feel relaxed and welcome.
Surgeon was brilliant but dealing with Mya wasn't the best
Having these operations have given me my life back. A big thank you to Dr Joffilly and his team. Words can't describe it. Will recommend every friend who wants to have any procedures done.

review_title: MYA are amazing, definitely would recommend them!!
review_body: I had closed rhinoplasty 7 weeks ago now through MYA with Dr. Frati. He is an amazing surgeon and I couldn't recommend him enough, I'm over the moon with my results. MYA Birmingham Clinic have been so helpful throughout, especially Nurse Anj, she was quick to answer any questions I had and really made me feel at ease. If I ever considered any other type of cosmetic surgery, MYA would be the number 1 choice for me. Also, special thanks to my patient co-ordinator Kayleigh, she was really helpful throughout! xxxx

review_title: Very upsetting experience for follow up appointment 1 year from surgery
review_body: I was very happy with the surgery but have recently found some lumpy material in my breast. I have seen a consultant under the NHS. He advised that the lumps needed to be removed. I was obviously very worried about this as the surgery could impact on my implant, leave a dent in my breast and leave a big scar. I thought it would be a good idea to speak to my MYA consultant before having any surgery done as he had recently conducted the breast re-augmentation. I was extremely disappointed by his response which was curt and not very helpful. It made me feel very upset and uncomfortable. I simply wanted to hear his advice and instead I felt like I was being a nuisance and taking up his time. I left feeling very worried and also felt that I was very much brushed to one side. He did not appear to have any concern for me at all. I did not pay for this appointment and I was left feeling that his attention was not focussed on what I was trying to ask him. I understand that without an MRI its difficult for him to say exactly what it is but a bit of care and understanding would not have gone a-miss. A very upsetting experience.
My daughter and myself used MYA and were really pleased  with the results and staff throughout the whole process.
Could not of gone with better company from start to finish had the support I needed

My whole journey with mya has been amazing fantastic staff AWSOME surgeon seriously looking forward to exploring my next move with MYA . Already recommended mya to family and friends seriously girls MAKE YOURSELF AMAZING I feel like wonder woman now x
Okay service but found I was being a little pushed to pay at first that's why I only put 4 star

review_title: i had a breast enlargement and I'm really happy with the results .
review_body: My experience with mya was amazing I was scared at first but they mad me feel so relaxed and comfortable . They explained everything I needed to know about the operation . I am glad I went with my mya and the outcome was fantastic I feel like a different person I would recommend anyone to go there if they are thinking off having something done?��? I m giving mya 5* fantastic team thanks so much
My experience with MYA was excellent from start to finish and so pleased with my results.
Excellent willing  to put in extra time and work round customer times
I had breast enlargement with Mya, I can't say anything negative! Friendly, helpful and professional staff all the way through. I recommended Mya to a friend, who was also just as satisfied as me! :)

From my first phone call to my one week post op appointment all the staff have been professional friendly and kept me fully informed each step of the way. I am very pleased with the outcome and would not hesitate to recommend MYA to anyone thinking of cosmetic surgery.

Absolutely comforting and warm experience. The nurse and trainee nurse were both very kind and welcoming. The nurse explained everything to me in depth and made sure I understood everything. I'd recommend MYA to anyone . Just overall a very nice atmosphere and great staff including the receptionists.

I had many consultations for rhinoplasty before I came across MYA, none of them made me feel as comfortable or at ease as they did. I knew it was finally the right thing to do and I went straight ahead with the surgery, i felt like things where in my hand and not just there's. Everything went 100% correct and my aftercare was fab! Would reccomend to anyone!

Everything up until a week after my procedure went well. But after that no body contacted me and I had to reschedule my surgeon check up and I was never able to get through. I am a year on and still have not have a surgeon have a follow up appointment. I called and emailed MYA and no one has really tried to do anything. Shame as I had the initial impression that they would be a great company to go with.

I had my surgery just over three years ago now, and I am honestly still over the moon. I was so worried at first when choosing somewhere to go & with so many options it's hard to filter through who is the best. Mya held my hand right the way through from my initial consultation to my follow up appointments. I have recommended them to all my friends and so far three of them have been and come back happy.  I had a breast augmentation taking me from an A cup to DD - my main concern was how natural I wanted them to look, I had a great surgeon who was able to achieve the natural look. I couldn't be happier!!
Cannot fault any staff that I've come into contact with they've all been fantastic and especially at the clinic I felt very well looked after and everything I needed was catered for!

review_title: Unprofessional, bad time keeping, wrong information given to patients!
review_body: I was given different information from one person to another, I was told on my last nurse appointment before my surgery that my Vaser Lipo required me to eat and drink as normally before surgery. This was repeated on a number of sheets I was provided with, yet other sheets said not to drink and eat for 6 hours prior. I double checked the morning of the surgery to make sure it was ok to be eat and drink which I was confirmed that it was. I got to my surgery in the morning and was told they weren't going to do it because I was suppose to not eat and drink. It was an emotional rollercoaster, I was 100% ready for my surgery and just told I wasn't allowed to have it that day.
Woun't go back there again after my last visit.

Dreadful treatment from the start, turned up for my appointment, they made me wait 4 hours then told me they didn't have time for me. Was given a ten min chat, I got upset over time wasted so they apologised and asked me to come back a week later, they did the same again. Surgeon even said " with this treatment I'm surprised you came back"
Would go back any time.
The most caring company
Great staff, answered all my questions! Great aftercare and very lovely understanding people.

My whole experience with MYA from my initial consultation to my post-op appointments has been very positive. They are very open and accessible whenever I had a query, happy to help and give advice, and make allowances for me when needed. I was put at ease on my operation day, and I'm happy with my results. My surgeon consultation was a bit brief but that does not mean I was left with any additional questions or worries.
Excellent service from start to finish. I would recommend MYA.
I recently underwent a break augmentation with Dr Frati at MYA. I would highly recommend MYA from start to finish, everyone has been great and I am so happy with my surgery result.

Staff very helpful and was made to feel at ease as was quite nervous consultant was excellent and explained everything . And made me feel more confident about the procedure would recommend to anyone .
Julie was excellent at newcastle and Mr traynor would definitely recommend  don't hesitate do it .

My experience could not of been any better! It has now been a year since my breast augmentation. Nurses were friendly and supportive, Dr frati did a perfect job. I have no issues or complications since.  I have recommended MYA to so many other girls.

Best experience I have had amazing after care and the surgery was painless n hassle free. My results are amazing couldn't thank dr Gary trainor enough. Highly recommended and want further surgery in the future I will be coming back thanxs so much to the MYA team and hope to see you all soon.

I had a good experience with MYA, everything went well and I'm pleased with my results. I found getting in contact a little frustrating as on a number of occasions I struggled to get through to anyone and if there were any complications, this would have been extremely worrying.

Going in to Mya was daunting! I hate needles but was willing to face one for my procedure. Was made to feel very welcome, and put at ease with the needle situation. They do it as quickly as you like, no waiting around. Very professional and caring company

review_title: Surgeon agreed i needed revision surgery but company wouldnt agree to it.
review_body: everything else was great, but agreed revision with surgeon never happened.

review_title: Not a great service on the day of the surgery.
review_body: So during the consultations at the Bristol office I had requested that I have a surgery as early in the day as possible as I was being driven to London from Bristol by a family member and I had then been advised that this was okay; so after driving to the London clinic for the surgery on a Sunday I arrived at around 7am-8am as had been asked of me.. I then sat in a recovery room with no TV, no magazines and hungry (I wasn't allowed to eat after 8pm the previous night) until after 8pm.

Amazing everyone who works for MYA was lovely helpful and very welcoming , any question or concerns that may have crossed my mind were answered over all very very good no disappointment would definitely recommend MYA :-)))))

review_title: 5 * from start from start to finish
review_body: I have recommended MYA to many of my friends due to the service I received. 2 of my friends had their surgery through MYA due to my recommendation and I would never go anywhere else in future.
Amazing surgeon, nurses, hospital and service! An all round quality service! Highly reccomend ?���

Basically once you've had your op they don't care. I have had numerous appointments cancelled and rescheduled. Once you have paid for your operation they don't want to know. I've had my emails ignored and no communication, every cancellation has been on the day and I live an hours drive away. Not very professional, they never have your personal records so don't have a clue what or why you are booked in. Would not deal with them again. Poor service for an over priced operation that I'm not even 100% happy with.
I would recommend mya to anyone and have already to friends. Brilliant service

Traynor was the best and most honest surgeon I could of asked for.... I had a breast enlargement and on the day of surgery requested to go larger, my surgeon refused saying the implant i had agreed on was the perfect size and I would regret going any bigger. Hia opinion was correct I love my breast size and on my small frame and height look just right. Everyone from the receptionist to the night nurses and cleaners of my room were plesent and warm hearted. I'm looking at having more surgery and would go back to Mya to achieve this....

After losing weight my boobs looked like teabags, I took the plunge and had 350cc over the muscle implants. Dr Traynor did them, I'm pleased with them but it has taken well over a year to soften and feel more natural so don't think they are like that straight away. One boob didn't feel the same as the other for months. I did go back for reassurance and Mr Traynor was great he said it was fine going back and made me feel relaxed. It's taken a while to get use to the size of them especially in certain clothes. One thing I didn't think about was buying clothes after, try and go for a size that fits the rest of your body. I'm a size 8 but some dresses don't fit my boobs but fit my hips. Something to consider.

review_title: Aftercare at the hospital was amazing - breast enlargement
review_body: My initial consultation was good and the follow up with the surgeon went well. I had complete confidence in him. On reflection I wish I'd asked more questions and done more research on the implants and sizing. I didn't realise at the time that there were many more options available to me. The care I received at the hospital before and after my operation was amazing. They were so reassuring and friendly and created a relaxed and calm environment. The aftercare appointment with my nurse was brill too and I am generally happy with my results, there are things I would change going back but I think that was mainly on me for not doing enough research! That would be my advise to anyone moving forward, ask questions and research the surgeon.
Overall I'm happy with the results (Dr Fratti) however the aftercare was non existent. I was never scheduled in for my last appointment with the Dr.

review_title: Wouldn't recommend to anyone I know
review_body: The patient coordinator only wanted you to pay then you heard nothing else. There was no follow up post surgery, I would not recommend it to anyone

Not happy at all with them. They never answer the phone - good luck trying to get in touch with your patient co-ordinator. Had mine done two years ago and I have a seroma that's been under one scar for over a year and they wanted �1100 just to scan it- one boob is not good and I'm in pain every period with it where it swells and there is nothing they will do and I don't have any more money to spend they're a joke. This has been ongoing on my boob for 1 year and a half and it's ruining my life. NHS won't touch it and I can't afford new implants only on a payment plan which I failed even though I've never missed a payment other credit. I don't go out anymore I cry every other day the pain lasts for a week at a time and I can't even get out of bed. The scar then opens and seeps out liquid and takes a few days to heal! Every month!! Thanks MYA.

Fantastic after care, surgeons and hospital. Patient coordinator only interested until payment has been made!! Texts afterwards and phone calls soon stop once they have your money, wanted a few questions answering and never got a reply :(
Everything was good except the hospitality service at London hospital
Very professional and friendly staff to deal with. Would recommend as stayed with you all the way through and aftercare was good as well.
The staff were great. Made me feel really comfortable and talked through a lot of the procedure and experience with me.
3rd day after operation and so far I am pleased with how everything has gone with my boob job
Never been contacted since my operation  that I had to have done 2 times in 5 days to correct what had gone wrong now very unhappy with the outcome completely botched

review_title: Excellent 5* service. Truly made me amazing.
review_body: With any cosmetic surgery you are advised to look around and do your research.
The service I recieved was good but the results of the surgery I'm very disappointed in.

Surgical and clinch teams were fantastic . Surgeon was Dr Traynor, very good surgeon aa i had hone with MYA specificaly for him. I do think the after care could be improved as I wasnt aware of the number of pre op appointments and how much time I'd have to take off work to attend them, as there only ever seemed to be day time appointment available . Spare dressings could of been provided as I had to attend urgent care due to the fact they had gotten wet and it was a total nightmare. Over all I'm very pleased with the results I've achieved, but the process could of been smoother.

review_title: Disjointed  pre op post op care
review_body: Day of surgery was fabulous-Surgeon and team were brilliant. Appointment at Liverpool -initial inquiry appointment was a waste of time should have just made the appointment for Manchester to see the surgeon. Pre op appointment at Liverpool again a waste of time-nurse forgot to take my measurements and I had to take them myself and email her!! Post op at Liverpool saw a different nurse told to phone up in 6 weeks for another appointment. Decided not to bother and nobody has made contact with me 7 months after procedure.

Two and a half years after having my rhinoplasty, I'm so pleased with my final result and can not praise the standard of care and the attiudes of all the different workers I encountered during the process. Thank you, MYA!

review_title: Great from consultation and well into after care!
review_body: All staff have been fantastic support from the minute I decided to go ahead with the procedure. Staff would be in touch with answers to all my pre and post op question.
My rating is on the basis of the surgeons (Dr Fratti) work. He did a great job and knew exactly what I wanted/needed.

I was having problems with my previous breast inplants - one of my inplant which were tear drop shape had 'flipped' causing pain and odd in appearance left  breast. Having to go through  surgery again  can be daunting and an emotional experience however when I  decided to have a breast changes ,  Mya   made the change to my body  a much more positive outcome . The staff have all been very friendly and  helpful and the Surgeon who did the procedure assisted me with the  right choice of inplant and the right decisions that would give a great result in appearance -the results are fantastic!! - I cannot thank enough Mr Traynor and strongly recommend his fantastic work.

review_title: Still struggle to see a difference
review_body: I had my vaser liposuction surgery around 3 years ago now and it took around 6months to for the swelling to completely go and now I look and think for the money was it worth it?! If it made me a dress size smaller maybe but it didn't.

Once you had my money you didn't care lots of times appointments was cancelled after  I would take time off work still haven't had my last appointment with the doctor because was cancelled three times one less then 24 hours before
Excellent from start to finish
Very professional for the whole of my visit , didn't feel rushed and all my questions were answered .

review_title: Good surgery, poor experience with Mya Birmingham
review_body: This review is solely for Mya Birmingham, I've commented on the surgery on another forum.
Couldn't be any more happy with my surgery using MYA

review_title: From start to finish I was looked after from head to toe :)
review_body: Great office in Leeds, everyone made me feel very welcome and the surgeons were honest and approachable, A year on I stay in touch on the forum and help others going through the same. Payment options were easy and I had a better rate with a cancellation booking.

review_title: Couldn't fault DR traynor at all
review_body: Breast enlargement was so easy for me thanks to Dr traynor however once I paid my money I didn't get contacted by my patient coordinator at all, couldn't fault DR traynor at all.
Felt at ease straight away - everyone was friendly and caring and well normal !
I had hated my nose for years and always wanted a nose job. I felt my nose was wonky across my face when you looked straight at me and I  was very self conscious.

My experience with MYA was nothing but brilliant. The care i received before, during and after my procedure was fantastic everyone i dealt with was friendly and approachable. I would do it all again in a heartbeat

I had the most amazing attention before and during the op, but once it was done after my first follow up I was forgotten about. I was apparently meant to have a 3 month follow-up and when I phoned to ask I was told they would text me or email a confirmation date. This never happened. It's a shame because Dr Frati has changed my life and the girls at MYA were fab. Just a let down that once they had my money and the op was done I wasn't cared about.
So glad I contacted MYA I have a perfect nose.. So reassuring and a comfortable experience.

review_title: Amazing results! Just what I wanted!
review_body: I have always wanted to have breast enlargement & never knew who to go with! I first went to MYA for a free consultation after seeing their advert on TV. I went to see how the procedure worked.

review_title: Not happy with the size and the care I had.
review_body: Some of the staff need more training instead of them discussing about their night out.

MYA clinic in London is beautiful as are the staff who work at the reception desks. I felt the service I received before the augmentation procedure was good and I was happy to go with one of their top rated surgeons. Unfortunately, the aftercare was very poor. It was at this time I needed reassurance that the procedure had gone to plan and to make sure I was healthy enough to resume normal daily activities.
I had a really pleasant journey with MYA from my consultation to my reviews post operation. The whole team there are lovely and I couldn't be more happier with how the surgery went :D X

review_title: Poor communication between consultants and surgeons a
review_body: As much as I am happy with my surgery, I was very disappointed with the communication between myself, my consultant (I only met her once at my her first consultation) never seen her since, and the surgeon. I was torn between two sizes. One of the nurses and my consultant told me I could put down both sizes and decide on the day, however when the day of my opp came they only brought me the one size and I had no choice. Iv now spent a large amount of money and I'm not completely satisfied as I wanted to go for the bigger size, but the lack of communication meant this wasn't possible!
Excellent staff, helpful and professional from start to finish
Amazing process, amazing result. Very Happy, professional, honest and through. amazing surgeon.
Everything amazing with my experience with mya
Very unhappy with treatment from Dr Kingdon, procedure repeated 1 year later after he finally agreed the first op wasn't a success.

review_title: Happy with results but after care not the best
review_body: All the way through to the procedure I was very happy but after the procedure I found it hard to get in touch for my post op appointment. It's like they were not bothered now the op has been done. I also had a threatening letter for a payment I apparently owed which was not the case as I had paid up to date. It was very difficult to sort this out until I spoke to Amanda who sorted it straight away. I feel like the surgeon should come and see you after the op too but he didn't.
Since I came to Mya they made me feel so comftable lovely staff and love the work, would recommend to anyone xx
Very happy with surgeon and team and hospital excellent job after care is shocking
Put it this way I still haven't been signed off by surgeon and its been 2 year by breasts are so ripperly I'm thinking about getting them removed avoid at all costs aftercare is rubbish

review_title: Mis-information, delays, no after care, breach of contract!!
review_body: Differing information from the start.....
Nice, good. I am happy with this,

Fantastic from beginning to end ! I have recommended this company already ! All members of staff make you feel at ease and confident you are making the right choice. There is no rushed sales pitch, no worry and no hassle. I wouldn't go anywhere else.

I feel like my whole operation was rushed. I had no experience of cosmetic surgery before, I was young and felt like no-one explained to me properly the procedure and the after-effects of what was going to happen. I was never contacted to have an after surgery consultation to talk to someone about how I was feeling and again talk through what exactly happened to my body. I still feel like now I talk to friends and I cant actually explain my procedure. I dont even know where my implants where placed AKA above or below the muscel. At the moment I am not 100% happy with my surgery, I have horrible scars that havent faded and my breasts feel as though they are lop sided, but again I have no idea who I can speak to about this? Overall just bad communication and explanation from the consultants and the surgeon. I am not 100% satisfied and there was no obvious way to report this.

review_title: Breast Augmentation with Dr Frati @ MYA
review_body: Amazing results from my breast augmentation! So happy with how my boobs have turned out and I've had a wonderful deal experience from start to finish the whole team have been amazing! Thank you MYA x
Fantastic service and I was very happy with my surgery results. Would definitely recommend.
Results were unoticeable
Stop your searching,if your reading this MYA is the perfect choice.The pre operation and follow up consultations was excelent from start to finish.

Treatment and surgeon were great. Not a lot of aftercare or support after operation. Still haven't been signed off by surgeon as the appointments kept getting messed up/moving my appointment and with someone that is in full time work - that means I was messing my work around. It's now 2 years later.
Excellent surgeon for breast augmentation natural and perfect results

Mya were quick enough to get me in for my op. Which went well. But I then developed capsular contracture and went back for a check up. They had no space to book me back in straight away for a re-op, so I was told they would contact me. This was nearly three years ago. After multiple phone calls I kept getting told. "Don't worry we haven't forgot about you" "we are rather busy with operation" they obviously had forgotten about me.  And I am still suffering today. Not happy at all with my experience and it's a shame because my surgeon was lovely but the rest of the company has let them down. I hate my breasts now and I feel they have sagged and gotten worse because they havent been corrected.
It was the best decision I ever made

review_title: Very persistent.... Until they've got your money.
review_body: Having been recommended MYA by friends, I thought I would go with them for my breast augmentation.
Had liposuctionnin fiur areas was not happy with results had to fight to get parts of it done again still wasn't happy but was not worth the hassle wouldn't use again

I have had surgery twice, 1st time wasnt bad but 2nd time they tried charging more and a returning customer wasnt taken in account. Also my consultant was useless and didnt kno anything. She Kept going out and asking someone else for answers.... after i finally said yes and said will arrange dates for surgery she calls next day saying she needs to charge me more. My after care wasnt great, i got one phone call and check up 2 weeks after thats all.
They never called me back , they don't pic up the phone , and it's the worst operation I ever had!! I want my money back !

My PC made me feel like i was the only person she was dealing with, always on the other end of the phone when i need her and so helpful with everything! The online forum on the website is amazing for sharing experiences, getting all the MYA girls to help each other out and answer any personal, surgery related questions which puts your mind at ease. i would absolutely recommend anyone to go with them, it will be the best journey they've ever been on!

Amazing company, just need more compassionate patient co-ordinators! As a customer you want to feel like you are important right from the consultation and there is a genuine interest, I did not feel that, but luckily I knew who I wanted my surgeon to be. This is my experience from a few years ago but I always think about the consultations I went to with Mya and other companies.

A VERY UNSATISFACTORY EXPERIENCE. THEY WAS NEVER ON TIME WITH APPOINTMENTS AT THE CLINIC MY APPOINTMENT FOR MY SURGERY GOT CANCELLED NOBODY BOTHERED TO LET ME KNOW  EVEN THOUGH I RANG AND EMAIL QUITE A FEW TIMES REGARDING THIS IN THE WEEKS LEADING UP TO THE APP. I HAD TO GET MOVED TO A DIFFERENT SURGEON , WHEN I HAD MY STITCHES OUT AT THE CLINIC ONE WASNT QUITE HEALED SO THE NURSE PUT A STRIP OVER IT NOW I HAVE A BIGGER FOLD UNDER MY EYE THAN I WAS TRYING TO GET RID OFF IN THE FIRST PLACE,NOBODY EVER GOT BACK TO MY EMAILS OR VOICE MAIL
Felt like the whole process was rushed and felt like all they wanted was the money off me ASAP.

I Have always been very self-conscious about how small my natural breasts were, in 2013 MYA made me feel special and looked after until they got my money! After that I had no phone calls, 'or even the day before my op to reassure me! I didn't stay In Over night as thought �500 extra was a bit much, I had fluid and blood leaking out of my left breast the evening after surgery when I had arrived home, I called the emergency nurse and she said to call the hospital I had the op done at to get a dressing change, the hospital (Fitzroy) were extremely rude and refused to give me a dressing change because my surgeon wasn't in the following day! Not a phone call to try and arrange anything else or to check me out! After my op they contacted me 7 days later to ensure I was ok! Not been contacted since, even for the 6 months check up! I went back in 2015 as I wasn't happy with my results pretty much since day one and I was told that my results were fine and was dismissed very quickly! Would 100% not go back there If someone payed me! Very dissapointed! Also have 3 other friends who experienced very similar cases! After care is shocking
Would recommend to anyone thinking of surgery

Always wanted my breast enlargements since I was 16, finally got them done last year, I went with mya because they gave me the best feedback and saw there amazing work, a year later and I'm very happy with the results, all that needs improving is the aftercare with their patients. Overall happy women

Dr Singh ruined my breasts. He left them scarred and uneven and when I tried to complain to MYA they didn't want to know. As soon as they had my money they changed and became rude and didnt want to know. The hospital they put me in was awful and the nurses forgot to feed me and give me my medication. Awful experience, wish I had never used MYA and I would never recommend it to anyone.
I had my breasts enlarged last year with MYA and couldn't of asked for a better service from start to finish!
I had a boob job with mya a few years ago now. I love my boobs however i feel like MYA just wanted my money.. i never had a check up after my surgery with my surgeon and never heard from Mya since
Once they had my money, they did not want to know.

I was recomended MYA from a few people for a breast enlargement i wanted specific results and was recommended the surgeon DR Traynor. I had my consultations and i was very pleased with this surgeon and felt he understood my personal preferences and size/shape. He made me feel very comfortable and i felt i trusted him 100 percent . I was dealt with very professionally through my consultations and on the day of my surgery i felt very nervous but was put at ease by the private hospital team straight away. The anaesthatist came to meet me before surgery and also my surgeon came to see me on the morning and put me at ease too. It was very fast on arriving that i was sent down to surgery so no waiting time hardly. In the anaesthetic room they were lovely and comforting i could trust them with my life i felt. Very professional. When i come round from surgery i was comforted and they made me laugh straight away in revovery. I was then wheeled to my provate room i was in before surgery and the nurse made sure i was ok and had everything i needed and relevent painkillers all the time. My surgeon came around to see me and made sure i was ok too. I had some tea while i was there and was later discharged that evening with all my aftercare and painkillers in hand. After 6 weeks tge surgeon called me back to check all was well with surgery and that i was happy. I am now 2 years into my breast enlargement and it has changed my life in a great way was the best decision i made to go with  MYA and would recommend them all the way.
Surgeon as absolutely incredible and have no faults - however MYA as a company left me disappointed and feeling scammed. Didn't deliver any of the promised after care.

review_title: Loved my result but had a lot of problems.
review_body: Loved my result at first but had problems. Firstly I had to wait hours to get my surgery done. Also I had to get one of my implants removed due to a infection, I had to leave 1 implant out for 3 months so I was left with 1 in and 1 out which I was really upset about. 7 months on I am still waiting for it to drop like my other one. I would of liked to go bigger to which I was unable to do on my consultation.
No after care from patient coordinators. Felt like the surgery was sold to me with false hope and advertising. Nursers on the ward were amazing and fantastic.
I had a breast enlargement over 3 years ago now, my surgeon was amazing, and knew exactly how I wanted my body to look
Excellent from start to finish!

My breast reduction was the best decision I have ever made. Thanks to Mr Mounir the srgeon and all the staff at MYA for excellent pre and post operative care. I would and have recommended MYA since my own experience.
My journey with MYA was amazing I always recommend to friends and family.. It's been nearly two years since I had my procedure done and I've never had any problems!
Pre op care was really good and information was readily available.
I booked an appointment with mya in April time. The process was quick, an appointment was within a few days and the process was explained to me.

Where do I start... From the beginning from end it has been a disaster. My patient coordinator was never there so I was often talking to other members of staff about personal issues. On one occasion I rang to speak to my patient coordinator, then 10 minutes after I rang back another women answered and told me she wasn't in today when I literally spoke to her 10 minutes ago. I planned to have my operation on a certain day, it then got changed to a week after which was an inconvenience as I had a wedding and graduation soon approaching, however they assured me I would be recovered and well enough to attend. On the day of the operation I spent the whole day in a stuffy room, with no signal, the wifi wasn't working and one channel on the TV. I was in this room with no food and hardly any water from 8:00 till 5:00 only to be told the light in the theatre had broke. I thought this service for a private hospital was horrendous! Also no one knew what was going on so I was sat there guessing what was going on. They told me I was in the bad half of the hospital which explains the bad signal and wifi, well excuse me why am i paying for this service if that is the case. I paid for the wifi which didn't work and was unable to contact family to collect me from the hospital. This got delayed further to 15 days later. I was then told my addmission time was 11:00am by email and a MYA nurse, on the day of the operation the hospital staff was ringing me at 8:00am to see where I was because I was meant to be there. I had to rush to the hospital it was 45 minutes away and get checked in asap or I was going to miss my operation!!! As I got there I had people dressing me whilst a doctor was asking me health questions it was so rushed and hectic and my nerves where through the roof.

Thank you so much MYA Newcastle! I had a brilliant experience with MYA from my initial consultation and still do now 11 weeks post op! No problems what so ever, the care is brilliant and the staff at MYA Newcastle and Preston First Trust hospital were exceptional. Thank you so much for such an easy experience!

No one hardly ever answers the phone at the Birmingham clinic,  I have experienced this myself aswell as sitting in the clinic to witness this. There is no point leaving a voicemail as no one returns this also. The easiest way to get hold of anyone is via email.
From the start everyone was lovely and very professional
I would definitely return. Amazing pre and post care.
So happy with my experience at Mya. They made me feel so comfortable and the after care was great. I'm so happy I went with them.

review_title: Very disappointed as the aftercare at MYA is very poor
review_body: I am very disappointed with the level of ignorance about patient after the surgery at MYA. I would never recommend MYA to anyone. Complaint being ignored and patient satisfaction means nothing to them. I fought with them for 3 years to get to the point to do the revision session for me, it got cancelled on a day of surgery. I was told that they the Manager will get back to me to rearrange, which has never happened. Their delay in revision sessions caused me to miss the chance to complain about the surgeon who has done the surgery for me, and MYA seems to less bother about it. They got the money and they don?��t care anymore. DON?��T FALL IN TO THEIR TRAPS. They are super nice at the start, but things will change afterwards.
1. Had a change of coordinator, handover was poor; I had to re-confirm  several details on more than two occasions
Horrendous service! All they care about is your money, they lie to get it from you and then don't care one bit once they have it! Go elsewhere where you can guarantee you will be looked after!

I am very pleased with mya overall after my consultation i got regular phone calls and texts they went out their way to book me the date I wanted they replied to me 30 odd texts near enough the same day. The surgeon was great I am really happy with the results and the day at preston I got a few phone calls after to check how I was at home and didnt have to wait when I got in for my 1 week post op app. I have my 6 week app on the 11th of oct and couldnt be happier

review_title: Man boobs gone in 1 hour.... AWESOME
review_body: I had issues with my man boobs since I was 15. After getting early retirement at 55 decided to get rid. Found MYA and I cannot recommend them enough. From start to finish excellent customer care. Plenty of time to fully consider the operation. Doctor Vlok was amazing, all the theatre staff brilliant and Lauren my liaison officer first class. Go on men GO FOR IT!

The girls at Bristol MYA are fantastic, so lovely and welcoming. I felt at ease straight away and was greeted with a smile and glass of water from Jessie! Gabrielle was so warm and friendly and talked me through the whole process. I instantly felt at ease when I met Linda and I knew she was the perfect surgeon for me. Joanna answered any questions I had through the whole process and was fantastic! The day of my procedure couldn't have gone any better. I felt calm and relaxed with nurses checking on me every 20 mins. All of my after care has been faultless and Joanna has been amazing. I would one million percent recommend MYA to anyone!

review_title: excellent , would recommend this company to everyone.
review_body: They have your best interests at heart all the time, really would recommend there brillant.

review_title: Not very happy with after service poor
review_body: When having my opp I was pregnant and it wasn't picked up I panicked and called but they just fobbed me off n said call my doctor and never here'd from um since until now they are way to big and I hate them asked about having um reduced n it would cost me more but no customer after at all wouldn't use again thanks
Felt my experience was completely rubbish and wouldn't recommend anyone to this clinic!

No one ever contacted me back, Extremely unhappy with my results but no one seemed to care and wouldn't answer my calls, reply to my texts and emails. Still unhappy with the service and results that I received.
Technically all was fine but the sales patter was annoying

The surgeon was fantastic, he could not have done a better job if he tried. Extremely satisfied with the result. No issues since surgery - however, the clinic has not checked this either. Poor aftercare and service in clinic. Was kept waiting during consultation process because staff were too busy chatting.  Overall very careless, especially when you pay around �5000. Surely CQC regulations must state to chase patients up post surgery? I'm sure whether this is because my coordinator left the company. I have not contacted the clinic personally to rearrange my review due to busy lifestyle, but I am applauded the clinic have not bothered to check either after major surgery.
I've contacted MYA assistants via the online portal twice, they said they'd phone me regarding my concerns after I provided my number & both never did.
Excellent staff & service!

review_title: The after care at Mya is shocking!!!! Do not book with them
review_body: Ok my story is rather long, I went in for breast enlargement with mya on 2nd feb 2016 and everything was OK,  part from paying extra �500 for over night stay and not being fed? But apart from that everything was good, no pain. 2 weeks later I woke up in serious pain, one breast looked twice the size as the other. After sending pictures to mya hotline they advised me to travel back down to London ( nearly 3 hour drive) over the course of the next week I made 4 jounernys back to London to have my breast drained awake! (Very painful) this is called Seroma a build up of fluid around breast. on my 2nd visit that week Dr Frati asked me if I had changed dressing? I hadnt but The nurse had put me in wrong dressing so had to have it drained again as no pressure was on my breast therefore it filled back up again.. the following week my breast went rock solid so dr frati decided he was going to "crack" the scar tissue around the implant again another painful situation! Which still didn't solve my problem. Another week went past of me being off work unpaid even though I was advised 2 weeks would be plenty of time off work. By the 15th march 2016 I was back in London having my implant removed, washed and replaced back in my breast.. this time when I woke up I felt like I had been ran over by a bus! Was very painful.. after a long 6 weeks went by of still being off work healing my stitches were not healing... I had to head to Preston for more stitches. Now I'm left with one breast feeling very different to the other.. completely numb in my left breast... and a scar looking awful. I also have had a total of 14 weeks out of work, over �2000 extra cost in private prescriptions that could range from �20 to �150 over the course of 14 weeks, fuel costs from traveling back and forth to the hospital, congestion charge of �10 everytime we entered London, car parking of up to �100 some times depending on how long we would be in the hospital, over night hotel charges for my mum who stayed with me extra 2 nights in london (roughly �250 per night stay) to sum up this experience I would say completely awful. And fuel money traveling to Birmingham up to 3 times a week for dressing to be changed. Also the mental stress and upset this has caused me is unacceptable! Mya were very quick as a company to be ringing you getting you to book and pay but soon as they recieve your money they don't want to know. The clinic never answers the phone and the staff are very patronising towards you. The manager at the Birmingham clinic is so rude and no help what so ever her name is Amanda. You are made aware of problems happening but "it's rare don't worry, sign here babe" is the response I got! I think everyone considering surgery should be made more aware that there are a lot more problems happening that is made out. Now I think if it is so "rare" that a clinic manager should be aware of the problems people are experiencing. Also The waiting Time at the clinic is unbelievable, couple of times I've waited over 3 and a half hours at a time to see dr frati.. and this is a so called private clinic! I'm very disappointed the way I've been treated at mya, after care is totally shocking and I wouldn't recommend this company to anyone!
I enjoyed my experience with Mya, Great results!
From start to finish whole experience with MYA was excellent. highly recommended. Fantastic results.
I have had a smooth experience with MYA. The care has been of a high quality and any queries have been immediately answered.

I found evryone friendly and supportive. The only downside i would say was not having the same appointed mya lady the whole way through my experience. Other then that the ladies were very open and shared their experiences with me which helped me alot. Would definately recommend / use them again.
Great experience polite staff and care before and after.  Timing could be better, wiring a long time to see consultants and taken to surgery but the rest was very good.
So professional and worth every penny, I love my new look and it's all down them!
Soon as arrived at first trust i felt very at ease staff were lovely.

review_title: THE best surgeon! But bad service from all other staff
review_body: MYA is very lucky to have such a wonderful surgeon working for them.  Linda was very honest, passionate and professional. She knows what works and is not prepared to do something if it could have an undesirable result.  I am over the moon with my results and I am really pleased I listened to everything Linda suggested.

I had my surgery appointment cancelled only a couple of days before I was meant to have it meaning I had to change things around at work. Despite the massive inconvenience it had caused they had a very bad attitude about it. Patient coordinator didn't communicate well thoughout the experience; no quick check up to see how I was doing. Just after the money and commission! Happy with the surgery though - boobs themselves look great although scarring could have been a lot more minimal compared to other surgeries I've had.
Very friendly staff

I had reservations when choosing which company to go with as the procedure is a big deal! I did extensive research into the procedure and into each company I chose MYA made me feel so comfortable and relaxed, I trusted them 100% with everything. Their surgeons are amazing. I used the Leeds office & the Doncaster clinic for my op.

review_title: Aftercare was awful. Would never recommend
review_body: I had my breasts enlarged over 2 years ago and have been left devastated by the result. I have complained to Mya about the rippling I have and after a 6 moth course of tablets to break down my capsular contracture and a second opinion with another Mya Dr I got told everything was fine and I need to live with it. After spending �4K I am not happy and the support I have had from Mya is so upsetting. I hate waking up seeing them and feeling the ripples.  I am now more body conscious than I have ever been.

Find someone else. I have visible scaring that the surgeon basically told me I should get over as it would fade (it hasn't really), also have numbness, pain and discomfort and loss of sensation to name a few. I am looking to have them taken out or downsized but with a reputable surgeon, not one that relies on celeb endorsements and ramming as many people in the door as possible. When I had a consultation with Dr Frati he actually made me cry I was that embarrassed, however the patient co ordinator talked me into seeing Dr Singh. On reflection should never have gone near a surgery that made me feel so uncomfortable however I was very unhappy and wanted to change things quickly.

review_title: Amazing people friendly staff great treatment
review_body: Honestly can not fault anything the ladies were really lovely helped with any questions I had, treatment was great aftercare was fantastic and I love my new boobs x
I have had a really good experience with MYA from my consultation to surgery day, I would highly recommend MYA for any surgery.

review_title: Poor service, one in one out...
review_body: Once they have your money the service hits rock bottom. On the day of my operation I suffered terrible side affects, because they needed the room the nurse told me to get a grip and go home. I was projectile vomitting all the way home. The surgeon was good but MYA as a company is a massive let down, I'd recommend my surgeon being booked through another company. 3 of my friends have used the same surgeon as me but I made sure they went through another company so they were treated much better.

Looked after me well and have well established processes. Adapt well to different customer types too for example I'm the kind of the person who took only 1-2 minutes in my appointments with surgeon as I like to get 'straight to the point' and they were fine with that as long as both me and them had all the necessary information. However I have no doubt if I had wanted to speak for an hour about all the details they would be happy to do that. Feeling much better about how I look now, had no problems since.

review_title: A highly professional, quality, caring company.
review_body: I would recommend MYA to anyone who is considering the cosmetic surgery route. From start to finish I felt well looked after and not like I was being given a sales pitch. I felt like the advice and options that I was given were all of the highest professionalism. All staff were very caring throughout my whole journey.
Receptionist was very rude and unfriendly.

The surgery experience was flawless! The hospital and all the staff looked after me so well. I wish I could say the same about the Liverpool Mya staff - dropping appointments on me last minute and constantly changing them. No consideration for me working full time and unable to change at short notice - no apologies just a tough you have to attitude.

From staff to surgeon they were just amazing, absolutely happy with the results and would highly recommend them. With such a big decision like what they offer nothing more important than feeling like an individual as suppose to a number, and with them they cared not only before but after too
I had mr frati best surgeon by far love my result already.
MYA was great, from my first contact to my consultation with an amazing consultant called Pam. She was such a great support, likewise everyone I met along the way of my amazing surgery.

Worst experience I have ever had bad customer service, surgeon rushed as he was about to go on holiday ... not happy with my results. Even going back a second time was not taken seriously and no follow up given.

review_title: I had an amazing experience with MYA!!!
review_body: I had an amazing experience with MYA! The whole team were so p8vely, welcoming and helpful... they had no problems when it came to answering any queries I had and were flexible and supportive if I couldnt make an appointment at the clinic. The nurses and team at the hospital were also very helpful and caring after my surgery. Would highly recommend them to anyone looking to have work done!!!

review_title: Don't expect too much from sales staff
review_body: Great service till they take your money, rubbish aftercare by staff. But had great results from Dr Vlok.

review_title: Not at all the end result I was hoping for!
review_body: I had vaser lipo in March 2014 and while the clinic and surgery were fine the end result isn't.  I know you are told it won't be symmetrical but I have lumps and bumps everywhere and it looks like areas have been missed.  I think I would think carefully about ever doing it again, I hated my stomach before but hate it even more now.

I never had a follow up, I was left with a viable scar on my face, when I was told it would be non visible. I called up for a follow up and did not receive any calls back. Completely disappointed, waste of money and would never recommend MYA.

review_title: Disgusting and currently looking into legal action
review_body: I woke up during my procedure of breast augmentation... I came round as I was having my stitches done... the surgeon was more or less resting on top of me... I was calling out 'I can feel what your doing!' And he's response was had on Kaylea, were nearly finished!!

Being just 20 when I had my breast enlargement I was a little worried, the lady who I first met to sort out my surgery couldn't of been more helpful, she was amazing and made me feel confident about going through with it! The hospital service was also good and I was home 3 hours later!
My experience with MYA was fabulous from beginning to end, the advice and care I received before, during and after surgery was excellent. I would recommend this company 100%.

review_title: I'm please with the result but it was a awful experience for myself!
review_body: I had my opp back in  September 2014 which was fine but I suffered a hematoma which I was told I was the first patient that year to of suffered one! It resulted to having my left boob re done 4 days after my first opp! My surgeon was very good in getting me from my local hospital straight into London and getting me straight into surgery, as the pain my completely unbearable! I had to stay in London for 3 days after my second opp the nurses where great could fault the after care in hospital, but was very disappointed once I left hospital didn't really have much contact with anyone unless I called them, I would of thought they would of monitored me closer after suffering an internal bleed! I went for my follow up with the nurses which was fine! I massively struggled to go back for me year  checkup  after ringing a number of times couldn't get a conveint time to suit as I'm a working mum, so I just gave up l! My Consultant that I first ever saw said there's a lot of girls that don't go back for there year check up which I was surprised about but I now know why as the times are so limited for the post check up with the surgeon! I'm please with my boobs but I was really unlucky to have suffered a hematoma and I do feel a little let down by mya I think they could of done more  once I left hospital but didn't hear a thing as I was so scared of it happening again, it was a scarey  experience for myself I lost 2 stone through it all I was really ill after, took me Nearly 6-7months to recover from it all and I dread the day I might have to do again!

review_title: Excellent service - from planning to surgery!!
review_body: Had a great experience with Mya- lovely staff .. surgeons and really put you at ease with whatever you're choosing to have done.. and my outcome is amazing .. would only consider Mya for anything now ..

review_title: Positive results however the communication is an issue
review_body: I absolutely love how I look now and always get compliments even three years later.

At first I was happy with my results. They did my implants 4 months after I'd had my son. So as you can imagine I had some baby weight. My friends who have been to other surgeons have had to wait 9 months post baby to have there breast enlarged because of the weight issues amongst other things after having a baby. They where brilliant for the first 6 months but as I started to lose my baby weight the implants started to show. I have literally lost a few pounds and am back to my normal weight as I where post baby. The lines are so visible that I cannot not wear bra I can't wear anything which may reveal any part of my breasts. I went to see my surgeon again and he basically said I need to put some weight on which i have struggeled with all my life i am a perfect weight for my height and my doctors think the same !the surgeon said I look anorexic!! Which I think is a disgusting thing to say to someone as there are people who are suffering from this kind of thing. So I then left there feeling upset and cheated. I've spent 5000 pounds on something that I now hate and are seeing another surgeon to put them right. I think they should put on a time limit after just giving birth instead of just thinking about the money. Hope you all have a better experience than I had.
Throughout my journey I felt looked after and never felt any hard sell.

I had a fantasitic experience having my breast augmentation. My consultant Hollie at birmingham MYA was very supportive throughout my journey. Dr frati really is an amazing surgeon. Only small complaint would be long waits for appointments and my consultant left so I had numerous different girls assigned to me, but nothing major. I'm so over the moon with my result. They look great and so natural couldn't be more pleased to be honest. Had them just over a year now. I would recommend MYA to anybody that is considering surgery :)

When I went for my first initial consultation , everyone involved was lovely . Once I paid for my surgery , I didn't hear off anyone , I had to phone round head offices and everything the night before my surgery just to get the time I had to be in . I haven't seen anyone since . That was a year and a half ago . Poor poor customer service .  I highly recommend NOT to use mya

I was a very nervous patient but my mind was put at ease by both my patient co-ordinator and my surgeon. Dr Mounir knew exactly what was best for my body and really listened to my needs. From my first consultation to my last check up I had no complaints and really enjoyed my journey with MYA. They have really changed my life and the way I feel about my body.

I ended up in hospital after having my breasts done. I was waiting for a nurse to ring me back for advice which they never did! As for that i ended up in hospital having a reaction to the medication,  which is absolutely disgusting and appalling . I also got told I would have feeling back in my breasts after a year. It has been over a year now and still have no feeling at all. Tried to ring to speak to nurse and  of course they was busy. I would not go with you again!.
Fantastic from start to finish. Mr Singh is an excellent surgeon and I would recommend him to anybody looking to have cosmetic surgery.

review_title: Lovely company staff more like your best friend nothing is ever any trouble
review_body: Great staff always on hand if you need them brilliant bunch of people xx

review_title: Fantastic experience! Couldn't of gone any better. ?��?
review_body: I had Mr frati do my breast enlargement. I got a perfect result with no problems at all. I have recommended MYA to everyone. Brilliant company.  Thank you
Had my surgery 2 years ago and still happy every day!
My experience was horrendous, the only reason I am scoring a poor and not a bad is because the staff were all so nice.
Choosing mya was the best decision I made, I feel so confident since my BA surgery and would definitely recommend it to anyone

I was very pleased with the staff and MYA experience as a whole. My only disappointment was the facilities in the hospital in Preston, as I was in for around 11 hours and there wasn't a comfortable chair for my chaperone to sit on and the hospital was freezing which put a dampener on the day when you are sitting in a backless nursing gown! Overall I am happy though.
I had a Brest Augumentation at Mya 1 year ag�? from 34B to 34 DD with Doct. Frati and I couldn't be more happy
Really good result and was everything I could have hoped for. My surgeon was really good, listened to what I wanted and he achieved without a doubt.

review_title: Great Boobs, not so good Patient Co-ordinator afterwards
review_body: My BA was perfect and i am very happy with the outcome and i love my boobs!! My surgeon Mr Traynor was amazing, my PC was great to begin with checking up on me to see how I felt leading up to my operation. I had a slight bleed after my op (my fault - I caught the stitches when changing) I panicked but could not get hold of my PC- 6 days later she finally replied, throughout my healing I had pains and was trying again to contact her and nothing. The lady on reception however was perfect and I ended up having to speak to her (who really is lovely!!) but that wasn't her job......
quick, simple and good experience

I honestly can not thank Mya and the Bristol Clinic enough. My procedure was smooth from start to finish and my results are fantastic. I highly recommend them to anyone and feel very glad I chose to go with this company. Thank you :)
Great hospital, nurses and clinic. So happy with my results for breast and lipo ?�?�
I did some shopping around but knew from the first visit that MYA was the right place.

This was my second breast augmentation (went with another company previously) and I have to say mya have been amazing. They talked me through everything from the start. The sent texts and emails regarding appointments etc. Everyone at the bristol clinic was friendly and helpful. I had my surgery at Fitzroy in london. I was very sceptical as I was a day case, but they didn't disappoint. I was shown straight to my room, made to feel at ease and was checked on countless times to make sure I was ok and ready for my surgery. I didn't feel to great afterwards and was advised to stay for at least 4 hours and was checked on yet again every 10 minutes! They were faultless. I was given all my aftercare leaflets to take home and discharged. I returned to the Bristol clinic for my follow up and stitches removed, again, very well looked after. I have just been to my final appointment and can honestly say everyone has been amazing. I would recommend mya to everyone and wouldn't even consider another company xxx thank you mya Bristol xxx

review_title: BEST Choice I have ever made with the BEST company and staff!
review_body: I have been toying with the idea of breast enlargement due to having ridiculously odd boobs! It has been a touchy subject all my teenage life! My friend told me to speak to someone, just to see my options! I has down and looked into companies, the first one was obvious! MYA, I have seen them on the TV, facebook, Instagram, celebraties...basically I see their name all over! So, I looked them up, reading the bckground and procedures etc. I chose to book a consultation right then without looking at any other companies as I was so impressed! The staff were absolutely amazing! My consultant was a lady called Julie Nicholson at the Newcastle clinic and she was lovely, made me feel at ease, explained everything thoroughly! I booked my surgery date for September, my first consultation was January and they kept in touch, checked in to see how I was coping, explained all my pre-op to do's! Everything went so smothly, I wouldn't change a single thing! Appointments were on time, information was spot on, answered all questions! Then the big day came, the surgery for me was easy! the recovery was perfect I had no problems, I did worry cos I pulled a scab off and I thought it was infected but I emailed my nurse straight away and she got back to me almost straight away! Her name was Charolotte Mallen she has done all my post op checks and she was so friendly! Overall I am absolutely over the moon witht he service MYA provided and I'm so impressed I have reccomended my friend! Thank you MYA for helping gain my confidence back and get back to the girl I used to be! <3 xx

Rang up and arranged an appointment for Tuesday 20th September 2016 at 17.45, EN we encountered traffic at dartford crossing that we had allowed extra time for, (a 45 min journey took us 2 hours), which made our arrival 6pm. We rang when a couple of minutes away to explain the situation and were rudely told that we were now unable to be seen this evening. After trying to discuss a little further as our journey had now taken over 2 hours there was no empathy, we were offered to sit and wait to see if there was a cancellation. On arrival at 6pm we told them we would wait to see if there was a cancellation and they said we could go to the high street, they would call us at 19.10 exactly if we were to be seen. Knowing how prompt they are we proceeded to the car at 19.11 and started our journey home. At 19.22 they rang to explain that someone had not turned up and we were abruptly told we had 3 minutes to get back there if we wanted to be seen. We mentioned that we thought we would have been called at 19.10 and the lady said they held on a little longer for the client. How is it we were a few minutes late and not seen but it's okay for them to call us late. To summarise there purpose and company values are a fraud. We were paying cash for a cosmetic procedure, not only have they lost our business they also had a no show appointment. It is clear that the main value is going home early. Customer services, non exist, going the extra mile, not at all, helpfulness, none. I'm glad I haven't gone under the knife because God help me if I had problems. I will defiantly be going back to Harley street.

Honestly the best around! I had been thinking about getting a breast augmentation for years but didn't know where to begin. From the very beginning everyone at MYA made me feel comfortable and confident. They gave me all the information I needed and plenty of support. Special mention to Ellie who was a diamond! Mr Mounir was my surgeon and he was brilliant! Best decision I've ever made! LOVE THEM!

I chose MYA after going to see a few other cosmetic surgerys in Leeds. They were so friendly and approachable and made me feel so at ease from day one. Katy Mcgloghlin went above and beyond to help me make the decision to go ahead. I was scared as this was the first operation I've ever had but it was fast and the care I received after was second to none. Thank you MYA and Katy for your unrivalled support throughout the whole process! I'm now enjoying my new assets with confidence!!
I'd do it again and again if I could!!! I love them! And I'll never ever regret it!

I had open rhinoplasty with Dr Andrea in June this year. It was something I had thought about for years but was naturally nervous about the procedure. I decided to go ahead and organise a consultation. At my first consultation I was immediately put at ease by the patient coordinator Julie and given alot of information which answered all my questions. I then went on to have a consultation with the surgeon and again it went well and all my questions were answered. He told me what he could do and I was confident of his ability. I didn't want to rush into anything so i thought about it for another 6 months before going for another consultation with the surgeon. MYA were very understanding and didn't rush my decision. I finally booked in for surgery in April this year and had the procedure done on the 21st June. When I went to Preston for the procedure the staff were excellent, I couldn't fault them. I had my operation around 9 and was out by 2 in the afternoon. I was expecting to be in alot of pain and the nurse had given me alot of painkillers but I only had 2 on the second day after the operation and then I didn't use them. It was more uncomfortable than painful. I would say my sore throat and the swelling were the worst parts about it. I've had various appointments post op with the nurse since and again she was lovely. I had my final 3 month post op consultation last week with Dr Andrea and everything is healing great. It is still swollen but I am very happy with the results and I am so glad I went ahead with the operation. MYA have been great throughout and I would recommend them to anyone.
Amazing results , I'm still happy 7 years later and I'm planning my second after having two kids they need uplifting. ��?��?
I had an open rhinoplasty and alar base reduction in May with Dr Giannitrapani and I cannot speak highly enough of him and the company as a whole.

I had an Open Rhinoplasty with Alar Base reduction in July 2016 at the Mya Fitzroy in London. I am extremely pleased with the result. I had considered a few places and had consultations with two different surgeons, but Dr. Giannitrappani gave me so much confidence that I knew that I wanted him to perform my surgery. Even though the cost of the surgery with Mya was more than the other companies, I knew that I wanted to go ahead.

review_title: Great service before surgery, real poor afterward
review_body: I had my breasts enlarged in 2010, the before service was excellent can not fault it. Assisted with everything I needed. The hospital was fantastic, very clean and lovely staff.
I would recommend MYA, from consultation to the aftercare and everything in between! Forum is so useful and helpful to speak to other patients too. X oh and Instagram follow now!
I have been appalled by the customer service from MYA... or lack there of, because once they have your money, you can say goodbye to their customer service.

I had my BA 10 days ago now and I'm over the moon with the results so far. My first meeting with my Pc was great. She was lovely and very helpful (obviously just wanted her commission)  messaged me back straight away and called me to keep in touch. Once she booked me in and I paid a deposit that was it. She never messaged me back/took any phone calls!! I booked about twelve weeks in advance. So in this time I had quite a lot of questions and in the last week just needed some reassurance to which no one bothered to get back in touch. I also messaged a couple of days after my op as I was worried about something and once again still havnt heard anything back :( I found this very annoying and rude and it completely let the company down. The first trust hospital I went too was amazing and I couldn't fault anything there. But I would not recommend mya. I would go threw someone else if I had to do it again. All they want is your money and then they are not arsed!!!! Very annoying as I was going to go with transform but after my first consultation felt more comfortable it's mya. That wasn't to last though! Iv read a lot of girls saying the same thing so bear this in mind when choosing who to go to.

First the bad: I visited the Cardiff clinic and thought the customer service was outstanding. However as soon as I had my op the customer serivce died away (several messages, no replies etc) and I haven't even seen my PC since I paid.

review_title: MYA were amazing would recommend to anyone
review_body: I've wanted a breast augmentation for more than 4 years. I had a couple of consultations with different companies however MYA really stood out for me mainly due to my Patient Coordinator Lucy Hutchinson and my surgeon Dr Fiumara. Lucy understood what I wanted and organised a consultation with a surgeon who could achieve exactly what I wanted. I had a specific date in mind and she not only secured that date for me but organised a consultation with my surgeon the day after I met with her to get the process moving. Lucy has provided continued support throughout the whole process. Dr Fiumara was extremely kind and professional. She managed my expectations perfectly and everytime I met with her she made me feel completely at ease. The whole process has been excellent so far and I am so pleased with the result. All of the nursing staff have been amazing and I have felt like I have been in safe hands at all times . I cannot recommend MYA enough.

review_title: I love Mya that much that I want to work for them!
review_body: I chose to have a consultation with MYA cosmetic surgery after seeing an advert on the TV and finding out Vicky Pattison had hers done with them. I had a bad experience at a consultation for another company in Glasgow and felt very pressured so was very nervous about my one with Mya. Since I live in Scotland, my closest Mya clinic was in Newcastle so I would have to travel a great distance to go for a consultation that would only last 20 minutes and travel back and forth to appointments.  Mya were able to resolve this by making my first consultation and surgeon consultation on the same day.

had my initial consultation at the Birmingham clinic and my patient co-ordinator Kim was fantastic! I received all the information I needed and everyone was very friendly and helpful. I had a closed rhinoplasty with Dr Frati and I am extremely happy with my results- I could not recommend him enough. My nurse Anj at the Birmingham clinic was great. She gave me lots of advice and instructions on after care and made me feel very at ease. Overall I am extremely happy with my experience and the service I have received from everyone.

Birmingham clinic was very helpful and friendly to me before during and after my procedure, they put my mind at ease as I was very nervous and they provided every information as and when relevant. The hospital in London where I had my surgery was friendly and helpful. My overall results of surgery is amazing and I am very happy with the results and can't thank MYA enough for all there hard work and my surgeon is very good at he's job :-) will always recommend MYA and Dr frati to anyone who is thinking about having surgery. Kimberley was my patient coordinator at Birmingham clinic she was very helpful and supportive to me.

I have had two procedures with mya Birmingham and I am very very happy about the results it's changed my life! My coordinator Amanda was brilliant and answered all questions asked. Anj the nurse also looked after me superb. I went to Preston first trust and it was so clean, didn't feel like a hospital at all. All staff looked after me and the after care was explained very clearly. Would defiantly recommend  mya Birmingham anyone looking to having a cosmetic procedure!!

This company has looked after me and accommodated everything for me. All the staff have gone out of their way to make my appointments at my request, even if fully booked. Big thank you to Rebecca Sweeney and Samantha. You guys have been amazing. Can't wait to see the results next week! :)

I had my breast augmentation on 9th May at Fitzroy in London and I couldn't be more happy with my results! I feel more feminine and at ease with myself and my surgeon and nurse have been so helpful and supportive throughout. For anyone considering cosmetic surgery I would recommend MYA 100% :)
Mr traynor at Manchester lifestyle hospital was fantastic. The staff and nurses there was brilliant too. I had my surgery 7 years ago and I would highly recommend this surgeon

Amazing company. Always helpful. Go above and beyond to answer questions, and are always at the end of the phone if needed. Sarah at Cardiff clinic is such a wonderful patient coordinator. Always takes time out of her free time to have a catch up, she has gone above and beyond with my treatment and MYA experience and I couldn't be happier!

I can't put in to words how bad this company is! On first visit you are greeted by beautiful women who tell you they will be there with you every step of the journey, the aftercare and support that you will receive is second to none...bla bla bla. This must be a programmed script in to each and every one of them.

i decided on implants some years ago but just lacked the courage to just do it, that was until i heard about MYA through a friend that had her surgery with them,i decided to book an appointment for a consultation,wow i need not have worried, there was no pushy sales pitch,all my questions and concerns were answered and i felt completely in control of the situation and that was from start to finish,all mya staff from reception to surgeon were amazing, i had my surgery in november this year,i am so pleased with the results and wish i had done it sooner,cant wait for my holls this year i have so much more confidence, thankyou MYA
I decided to book through Mya as I wanted Mr Fratti to do my surgery knowing that a couple of friends had also had him as their surgeon.

I booked with may Birmingham my pc was Kimberley I was very scared and nervous at first but now I am so happy with my results. The hospital on the day was amazing everybody was always checking up on me, theatre staff to nurses in the room. Dr frat was very quiet but he gives amazing results so can't fault that. Birmingham staff were excellent all the time. Aftercare with the clinic had been amazing too, the nurses are always there to help and the admin staff organise everything well. I would definitely recommend mya to my friends and family! MYA have made me feel amazing exactly what they say they will "make yourself amazing" thank you MYA and Birmingham staff x x x

From the start I felt confident and reassured I was in the best hands. My PC, Clare Hennicke, is so lovely, professional, very informative and clear. She seemed to know exactly what I wanted when I couldn't really explain it myself! My surgeon was Dr Frati, from the first consultation I knew straight away he knew what he was doing which gave me a lot of confidence and I trusted him with every decision. Now post-op I am over the moon with my results! I can't thank Dr Frati enough, I now have exactly what I had always imagined, perfect for my frame and the look I was aiming for. Not a single fault with after care, I received frequent phone calls, especially the week after my op. MYA have a great, very attentive team! Highly recommended.

I am currently almost 4 weeks post op after my BA and I must say my journey with MYA so far has been brilliant. From my first consultation with my PC I felt comfortable and not put under any pressure, we discussed what I wanted to achieve and she helped me choose a surgeon based on this and was also happy to answer my numerous questions.

I had a BA done with MYA in March and I couldn't have asked for a better experience. Everyone was so friendly, and made me feel so welcome. My Op went so smoothly, and my recovery was perfect. No complications and hardly any pain. I felt comfortable in the ward and everyone was there to help and answered any questions I had. The process before my op ran so smoothly, everyone generally cared about their patients. On my first meeting with Dr Frati, I was nervous, I didn't know what to expect or what he would say. I was worried that I wouldn't be able to go ahead with what I wanted, because obviously he wouldnt do anything ridiculous or stupid. He guided me, told me what he thought was best and gave me three implant sizes he thought I should choose from. However, the choice was still mine and I didn't feel pressured into any decisions.
