I am so in love with my new boobs and couldn't thank all the girls at MYA and Dr Frati enough. Thank you so much MYA!!! X

review_title: MYA professional Trustworthy and well worth the money.
review_body: After years of wanting my nose fixing and quite a few visits to various other cosmetic companies I visited MYA and decided to go ahead with them. From the very beginning everyone who I came into  contact with was very polite and friendly. The staff make you feel very welcome and I really liked the non-clinical friendly warm feeling. I decided to have my surgery with Dr.Andrea Giannitrapani  ( I might have spelt his name incorrectly) as he was recommended for what kind of surgery I needed. On meeting the surgeon I found him very nice and he actually listened. I visited other companies and their surgeons were the ones that put me off using them, despite the lower price, it is about feeling comfortable and happy not price. I felt it was important that I got the right feeling from the whole experience and all the staff and MYA gave me this. I had my operation at Preston First Trust Hospital which has a hotel near by where my husband and I stayed the night before. When you have the operation you have to have a chaperone with you. The staff at First Trust were all absolutely great. The nurses are lovely I can not fault any aspect of my visit at all. Even the anaesthetist came and shook my hand and introduced himself. I was so nervous but they really did their best to make me feel at ease. Afterwards Dr.Andrea came to the room I was in and was showing my husband his work and saying how happy he was with the result. I was allowed to leave after a few hours and I went home.  I am currently 8 days post operation and I still have the splint on. I can already see the difference although it is important to be honest with yourself and not expect to see true results for up to a year. Having realistic expectations and knowing how long healing takes is important. I have had a  minimum amount of pain and I am happy with the service MYA has provided me with. The girls call on a regular basis to see how I am and even drop me emails.  My instagram is anjs_rhinoplasty if anyone would like to see my journey and images.  I  am happy to answer any questions you may have. Would I recommend MYA YES !!! I am so glad I went through them my only regret is that I didnt so it sooner.
In February I became a patient at Mya and underwent a tummy tuck and also had Lipo
This year I became a MYA patient and couldn't be happier!

I researched a few options before going with MYA for a consultation and eventually my surgery (mastopexy).  I can honestly say from start fo finish that I was super impressed with them.  From my Patient Coordinator through to my surgeon (Mr Marcellino), the staff on the ward when I went in for my operation and the nurses I met with for my post-op check ups were absolutely fantastic!  My original PC left the organisation but my case was passed to an equally super PC (Cassandra). I never felt rushed or pressured (there was no hard sell).  I asked to meet with more than one surgeon before making my final decision and I was super happy to be able to select Mr Marcellino.  His bedside manner was amazing and I immediately felt comfortable and secure with him.  He truly listened to what I wanted to achieve and was very honest and open about what to expect and what could be delivered.  Looking as natural as possible is very important to me and I was able to have a mastopexy without implants and now, six months now since my surgery, I cannot even begin to tell you how satisfied I am with the results.  I had the surgery purely for myself to feel more physically comfortable but even my better half, who was very sceptical about my doing this in the first instance, was impressed both with MYA and their ethics as well as Mr Marcellino's work.  I intend to have a lower blepharoplasty at some point and my first stop will definitely be MYA and Mr Marcellino.

review_title: Take your money and forget all about u
review_body: I wasn't going to leave a review but after several unswered texts to my Pc I had a generic text asking for feedback so here it is in a nutshell...
Had the best experience wirth MYA. Everything from my initial consult to my operation went pretty well.
I'm 3 weeks post op from a BA with MYA and Dr Frati at Chelmsford clinic and Fitzroy hospital. I'm over the moon with my journey.

review_title: Breast enlargement Dr Fratti- Mya Cosmetics Chelmsford
review_body: My patient coordinatior was Nicola Hollick who was extremely friendly and helpful. She recommended I met Dr Fratti and cannot thank her enough as I'm extremely happy with my results! I met Dr Fratti twice to decide on size and procedure. We agreed on behind muscle moderate plus 350cc. I was a 32B and aiming for 32DD.

This page has been started (Mya complaints group) to make the UK aware of the butchery MYA do as plastic surgery. Over a handful of people have been scared for life by this money grabbing company and then left alone to pick up the pieces! Anyone who has a bad experience please comment below. As they have recently updated me in a letter if i go to the press or post on social media they will issue legal proceedings! GOOD! I would love to see what a judge has to say when everyones life they have so far wrecked and not compensated has to say and whos side they will take! MONEY GRABBING RIP OFF COMPANY!
Hello. I am currently 2 weeks post OP after having BA surgery with MYA.

Mt patient coordinator was ver insensitive and patronising. Staff do not communicate well with each other. Charges applied to my account unexpectedly and they are really all over the place. I will never use mya again as they have caused me stress and honestly haven't been as helpful as expected. The nicest people was the nurses. Everyone else seems to act like they no what they're doing but it's evident they genuinely don't.
I started my breast augmentation journey with MYA in January and here I am, 3 months later, finally happen my own skin.

review_title: 8 week post op (breast reduction + uplift) - Gary Traynor, Manchester Clinic
review_body: Firstly, I could not be happier with the results. I now have what I have wanted for so many years - my days are so much brighter.

I have had such a great experience at mya from having a BA and a nipple uplift, the staff at the Fitzroy who helped me through the op  (07.03.2016) were so lovely and kind throughout the whole over night stay. The after card with my nurse Joanna as well was brillaint she has gone out of her way to make sure I got the best after care so a big thank you to everyone at Mya !
I had my breast enlargement at the end of Jan, so 3 months now and I am happier than ever.
Hi, I'd just like to say I would recommend anyone to MYA.

review_title: Disgusting aftercare service. Avoid like the plague
review_body: I wasn't going to do this on here mostly because I'm worried that Mya will cause me more problems than Ive already had but seeing as how I spent the majority of last night crying and I've had two hours sleep because of pain Mya have caused me I feel the need to sure my experiences with Mya because nobody deserves to go through what I have.

My daughter had a breast enlargement and nose job with MYA in London in 2012. After telling me her reasons for surgery I was supportive although slightly nervous of her decision. I came with her on the day of surgery and my nerves were put at ease seeing the care she recieved. Mr Frati was so confident, I knew she had come to the right place. Since having her procedures she is so confident and so much happier in herself. From her first consultation with her patient coordinator, to her follow ups with the nurses and mr frati I could not fault one thing! If I ever consider surgery myself it will be with MYA

I've been contemplating a tummy tuck for a long time (17years) and have finally taken the first step. After a recommendation from a friend I went to see Gemma at MYA who has been amazing and has made my first step a pleasure.  After so long a wait I now feel it's the best thing I can do for myself.

MYA is a fab company my PC Gemma bassani has been consistent through the entire process and still stays in contact to see how I am doing. dr frati from my experience with him knows exactly what he's doing for any before and afters I am on the MYA forum which is also a fantastic way for new patients to see results and feel confident with their choice. You won't regret it.

From the first phone call I knew this was the company I wanted to go with. Leann was very understanding and sympathetic on the phone and made me feel at ease. Then Gemma at my appointment amazing, I couldn't ask for a better service. She made me feel brilliant and that I was making the right decision and already follow up texts to this appointment. Truly first class customer care. Thank you x
It`s been a month since my surgery and everythings been great so far. Everyone at MYA has been really lovely and helpful and are always happy to answer any questions I may have.
Absolutely loved the team! All so friendly and comfortable to talk to, so happy with my result too with my BA, couldn't be any happier!!

I couldn't be happier with my amazing results. My patient coordinater Nicola Hollick was so lovely and totally put me at ease through out the process. Dr frati was also just fantastic and help me make the right decision regarding size. I was so worries about the scarring that comes with having a mastoplexy but can honestly say already 4 weeks later the scars are unbelievable. I'm so so happy and would recommend anyone considering having surgery that MYA are brilliant. This has changed my life so thank MYA, Nicola and everyone at MYA

review_title: Best results I could of wished for
review_body: I can honestly say I've felt so at ease with MYA, my patient co ordinated was called sav, she was so lovely and really reassuring. I would most defiantly recommend MYA as I couldn't be happier with my results !! Money well spent.

I had a breast enlargement from a 34b up to a 34dd 5 years ago in in March just gone, and they get better and better every year. My surgeon, Mr Chantarasak who I believe has now retired, was amazing. He was professional and fantastic at what he did. My patient coordinator, Amy, was a breath of fresh air with service and made me feel at ease and happy all the time. When the day of surgery came, needless to say I was nervous, but the nurses helped in every way possible to help me feel comfortable and informed at all times. The surgery was quick and painless and recovery was relatively painless too. I had a few anxieties after the surgery was done but everyone at Mya helped me through them and gave me back some normality. I am so happy with results now and have never had any issues with my breasts since. My Confidence is high, my anxieties have disappeared and I couldn't be happier with the service and support I received. I would recommend Mya to anyone and will defiantly return for any future procedures I may wish to have. If your reading this and deciding whether to have a procedure, just do it, it's the best thing i ever did and I'm so thankful I chose to do it with Mya. Thank you Mya.

review_title: Amazing company!! Highly recommend Dr Frati and Rebecca Sweeney ( London clinic)
review_body: Only had my operation last week and already so happy with the results . Amazing company and staff! Dr Frati is amazing!

review_title: Amazing company wouldn't choose anyone else !!
review_body: I would use mya for any cosmetic surgery I was considering and highly recommended them to anyone!!

MYA has been amazing for my breast augmentation. Sarah my PC at the Cardiff clinic has been great, always at the end of the phone or email! My surgeon Mr Marcellino is so friendly & very honest. After care has been fab as well. Couldn't recommend them enough! I would do the whole experience again.

review_title: Best thing I ever done so glad it was with MYA
review_body: I went through the Nottingham clinic my first appointment was wonderful everyone was so kind,helpful and friendly I felt at ease and like I knew everyone, my procedure went through very quickly, so happy with the out come and so glad I didn't wait any longer!!!

Finally I have plucked up the courage to go and talk to someone about how I feel about my breasts and why I want to have surgery. I was so nervous about going because this is not something I am comfortable talking about and I was worried I would get emotional or just have a panic attack.

Could not be happier with the service I've had from the Leeds Clinic. My PC is Katy McLoughlin and she has been brilliant all the way through. Had a few issues with my bloods, which the Leeds clinic tested & sorted quickly & wasn't a problem in the end. Met my PC twice to try on sizers as I wanted to be 100% sure, and she gave me great advice and helped me to make my decision- she was really patient with my indecisiveness and understood that it was pretty big decision to make. Communication was good, so I knew what to expect at each stage & the pre-op info that the Leeds Clinc  provided was very thorough & calmed me last night when I wanted to check something. Had surgery at First Trust in Preston yesterday morning, and couldn't fault the hospital one bit. It's easy to find, very private and feels like a hotel. The staff were friendly, caring and reassuring & again explained everything step by step and continually made sure that I was feeling ok. I was first in for surgery yesterday & was back in my room recovering by 9am! They were apparently brilliant at keeping my chaperone/friend informed & they collected her from the waiting area to make sure that she was in my room as I properly woke up, which was lovely for me.  So pleased with my results so far and know they'll only get better & better each day. I'd totally recommend the Leeds Clinic for a professional, reassuring and excellent service.
Choosing mya at Nottingham was a 10/10 experience from start to finish, I couldn't be happier with the end results.

I had my Breasts done with MYA and could not of wished for a better company to go with.  The whole journey from the first step into the Nottingham clinic to the aftercare was outstanding. All the staff at Nottingham were so friendly and put me at ease! I am so pleased with my results and so are my friends, even a couple of them are now booked in for a consultation! thank you for changing my life! I love them! x

My wife had her breasts done at MYA 7 months ago we researched and spent time looking at other companies after meeting my wife's PC at Nottingham (Kimberley) we instantly knew that MYA was in a different league to other cosmetic clinics. My wife's surgeon Mr Kazzazi was professional and has given her a natural result that she is over the moon with. Money well spent we would defiantly recommend any one to MYA great service Nottingham thanks again for helping my wife gain back her confidence.

review_title: Amazing support from Kimberly at Nottingham.
review_body: Was so happy with my results after my BA. The Nottingham clinic was brilliant! Kimberly was so helpful and supportive through the entire process. I have recommended MYA to my friends. so happy with everything xx

review_title: Fantastic service from start to finish
review_body: From the start I researched the company after a few recommendations.

I had Vaser last year at Manchester. Mya were exceptional from start to finish. I'm delighted with my results, I couldn't rate them any higher... First class service! Thank you for everything Gemma Knowles xx

The Bristol clinic are amazing, such lovely and friendly people that make you feel really comfortable and welcome. My overall experience was great too and I love my results (breast augmentation) would recommend MYA to anyone

I had a Breast Enlargement with MYA just over 2 years ago and I am so happy with my results! The whole experience was absolutely amazing, I went to the Bristol clinic where everyone was really lovely, I instantly felt an ease and comfortable being there. The aftercare that I received was excellent and I would stongly recommend MYA :)

I would definitely recommend Mya to friends and family, my experience with them has been very good. My surgeon was Dr Frati who was quite talkative in the consultation despite what other reviews suggest, he ran through the risks with me and helped me to pick a size. I am now 4 weeks post op and have no regrets going through with the surgery, and find myself getting more confident as the days progress! The ward staff were so amazing and reassuring, as well as the post-operative care team at Mya.

review_title: Great experience - MYA Lond Fitzroy - Dr Frati
review_body: From my very first consultation to my 1 week post-op check up, I've had a brilliant experience.
My whole experience at MYA was great! My op is in 2 weeks and I'm excited. Alison who sorted everything out was amazing and so helpful. I'll highly recommend this company to everyone!!

I had my closed rhinoplasty surgery with Mr Frati at MYA. From my very first consultation with my patient coordinator, Clare, to the surgery and after care, I couldn't have been happier with my experience! All of the staff were more than happy to help and answer any questions or concerns. They were all genuine, friendly and very professional! I couldn't recommend MYA highly enough and will definitely be choosing them for any possible procedures in the future.

I originally went for my BA in November 2014, I was only 18 and so terrified that I backed out of the surgery just as they were about to put me under anaesthetic!! Ever since then I have building up my courage to go through with it, not because I wasn't sure I didn't want it, but because I was so scared of being in a situation where I am not in control. My patient coordinator Alison helped me through it the whole time and kept in touch to give me confidence. I finally went for it again in March 2016, and I cannot believe how amazing the whole experience was!! Dr Munir was my surgeon and I can't praise him enough for his amazing work! I am now two weeks post op and they look amazing! I have had no pain what so ever, the second day was a bit uncomfortable but no where near as bad as people had been telling me! I was off my painkillers after three days and back to work within a week! I can't thank Alison, Dr Munir and my anaesthetist, who kept me calm and told me everything I wanted to know, enough. I have never been so happy!

Had such an amazing experience with MYA from beginning to after my BA! From the get go Julie my consultant gave me all necessary advice and help going through this huge process, I went with Dr Traynor who was lovely and has done an amazing job! 2 month post opp and I am so happy. Best decision I've ever made going with MYA  for this procedure!

I came along to the clinic to meet the surgeon Dr Fatti feel excited. After being told to take a seat, we waiting 30 minutes and decided to ask how long he would be.. He wasn't even here and they didn't know how long he would be or where he was!

I would strongly avoid Mya having receiving disgusting customer service from both Manchester and Birmingham clinics! I'm taking waiting over two hours for what was a 10 minute very rush and uninformative consultation! Paying over 6k for a procedure for op to be canceled day before and I have since been in a 1 year battle trying to ft my money back! PCs are pushy sales people who do not care for your wellbeing, admin side of things is shocking recieve no paper work or phone calls when you are told you wil

I can't express enough how happy I am with my results, mya has definitely changed my life and gave me the look and confidence I could ever imagine, I would highly recommend mya to anyone. I am absolutely in love with my new boobies. All the staff and nurses at the Birmingham and London clinic have been amazing i want to thank you all for a very excitingjourney. To my surgeon Dr Frati... Your the best, you've changed my life and I will forever be grateful... I LOVE MYA :) xxx

I've recently just had a ba through mya. My pc was jade from Nottingham clinic. I actually had all my consultations and op appointments at the Leeds clinic. All my appointments have ran smoothly, my pc has been there whenever I needed her and don't have any faults. My op went the best it could have and  I am so pleased I chose mya. The company is professional and everything you need when going through a cosmetic procedure.

I would recommend MYA to anyone. From initial consultation to post surgery aftercare, they have been brilliant. Everyone at the Newcastle clinic, (especially Julie Nicholson and Beth) and Preston first trust hospital have been so friendly and accommodating. A special mention to Dr Andrea Giannitrapani also for doing such a good job on my nose and being so reassuring and knowledgable. If you're considering having a procedure with MYA, go for it.

I have had such an amazing experience with the Nottingham team, they have all been so nice and supportive. I was so frightened at first but the team are so reassuring and tell you everything you need to know, and help with any questions.. definitely recommend by me! I love my new boobs, 6 week post op. And I couldn't thank you all anymore!xx

I visited mya last month and met with my PC Alison , Alison made me feel comfortable and welcome straight away I knew that I was going to be looked after here. Alison went through every single detail with me that I wanted to know and I knew that I could ask any questions I wanted to and I would get an honest answer. I had a couple of questions leading up to my surgery as I was getting nervous and Alison was always there to answer all my questions! I had my breast enlargement surgery on the 16th of March I have been so well looked after and I am so happy with the results. The after care has also been brilliant and I know that even though my treatment is don't I can still always ask Alison anything I need to know. I would definitely recommend MYA to anybody that was interested in the treatment. Couldn't be happier!

I had my BA done with Mr Kazazzi on 20th March 2016. From my initial phone call, on 16th February to my surgery date 4 weeks later, MYA have been amazing. My PC is a lovely lady called Gemma who with out fail always answers every question and does so quickly. I was a unsure on the recommended size Mr Kazazzi recommended (as I thought they would be too small) but I am now 4 days PO and think once swelling goes down they will be perfect. Mr Kazazzi and his team at The Natural Look Clinic are amazing and I do not have a bad word to say about them. My admission time was 11.30, I was in theatre for 12.10 and on my way home for 3.30. My recovery, whilst only still very early stages, has been amazing very little pain controlled with paracetamol and ibuprofen. I am still strapped up so havnt yet seen them fully but so far I can't recommend MYA enough they have been amazing!

I had my BA with Mr Kazzazi almost a year ago and I'm very happy with my results, great care and support before and after surgery and I'd like to say thank you to the team,  it was a really good experience from start to finish!

I haven't yet had my surgery but so far my journey with Mya has been amazing. I went to other places for consultations and it never felt right and I felt like I wasn't fully guided or was given much advice and guidance which made made me anticipate ever getting surgery. I finally made the decision to go to Mya and it was honestly the best decision ever. My patient coordinator is brilliant, very understanding, supportive and so patient! I recommend Mya to anyone!!! I can not wait for my surgery, a big thanks to MYA and my patient coordinator Gemma.
I've only had my consult with my pc and have had to move my next one. But so far, so good and can't wait for my next appointment. Wish it was all happening tomorrow ?�?

I have had my boob job just over 5 years now and they still look as good as they did when I first had them done, and I have had two baby's since my surgery also....I will be returning in the near future for a small tummy tuck and maybe bigger boobies as well :)
I used MYA for a BA in January 2016, I've wanted this procedure for a very long time and I'm so pleased that I used MYA and with my results.
From the first consultation to the aftercare, my experience with MYA was brilliant.
I had a Surgery with Dr Frati in December 2015 and I'm impressed with my results.
I had a breast enlargement with MYA a couple of years ago and never got chance to review but I wanted others to make the right choice!
I had an amazing experience with MYA, the girls here were lovely and helpful and I LOVE my result!

review_title: Fantastic experience, poor patient coordinator service
review_body: I'm 18, had breast lift with 375cc implants. Bristol Clinic and London Fitzroy Hospital, Linda Fiumara was my surgeon, Fay Williams Patient Co-oridnator and Joanna Blewitt was my nurse.
Amazing experience from start to finish.
I had a BA with Dr Frati in November 2015 and I am amazed with my results.
I am extremely happy , would love to have an opportunity to see a nurse and give a big Thank you to my Patient co-ordinator and all staff and my Consultant.
Have saved up for so so long now to have surgery and so glad that I decided to go ahead with MYA! Dr Frati has been amazing and I would recommend him to anyone and everyone!! I LOVE MY BOOBIES!!!!

First impressions had been very good staff where very professional. Girls At front of house where very helpful and easy to get an appointment with - especially Becky. Happy with my surgeon (mr frati) surgery went well nurses very caring although a very rude anesthetist. I do however have what I would call unsatisfactory results. Aftercare had originally been going very well but as time has gone on this has been neglected particularly by PCs - I don't actually know who mine is. It does feel as though any issues will be pushed back as much as possible and that you will need to jump through a lot of hoops for any resolution if a problem does arise. Booking an appointment now post op has take several weeks of calls and ignored emails for someone to confirm a date and the appointment is scheduled in for nearly three weeks away which would not have been a problem at the beginning as a new patient. Overall I would use Mya again mainly as I would want me frati to be my surgeon. In terms of customer service they have been better than competitors that I have had limited experience with.
6 months on from my procedure I am happy with the result and wish I'd done it years ago.
Brilliant staff all lovely and friendly and helped me with everything gave me great confidence! Dr frati amazing results couldnt be more pleased! Overall a brilliant expirience would recommend!
Very happy with my B.A, great aftercare and a really good experience from start to finish! Thank you

I have been absolutely blown away with my results. I never thought I would ever have cosmetic surgery but after not feeling confident for many years I took the plunge one year ago.  I can not express how brilliant MYA were from my first consultation to after my surgery. I always felt comfortable and knew they were helping me throughout. I felt that they were always there if I needed and I would definitely recommend both the service and the outcome!!
I had such an amazing experience and care with MYA. I would definitely recommend it without hesitation. Plus the results are absolutely awesome!!! Thank you MYA

From the moment I 1st made contact with MYA they treat me with professionalism,dignity & respect. All the staff at Newcastle Quayside were excellent & so so friendly, you are actually made to feel like part of the family. My dealings have been with Beth, Julie & Amelia, they all get a 10 from me. Dr Andrea Giannitrapani performed the op at Preston First Trust where again all staff were excellent. Dr Andrea made you feel so at ease with his reassurance & professionalism I can't thank MYA enough. Recovery is long but well worth the end result Dr Andrea achieved .

Id like to give my honest review about my whole experience with MYA. To start i am over the moon with everything. The whole process my paitent co-ordinator has kept in touch and been very helpful and quick to respond to any queries i have had (Tanya). I had consultations with other companies previous, but MYA was by far the best and made me feel really comfortable.

review_title: Post Op / Cardiff Clinic ~ London Hospital/ Marcellino
review_body: I am truly over the moon about my entire experience.

review_title: Fantastic co ordinator terrible hospital!  (Fitzroy hospital London)
review_body: I've recently had a BA with mya and I am over the moon with the results even tho there were a few issues in the process . Firstly my operation was cancelled a week before I was due to go in for my op which I was really annoyed about but my fantastic co ordinater who was absolutely brilliant and managed to get me 10% of what I had paid for the my procedure back although it did take a while to go into my account, secondly I thought the hospital was terrible I went to reception and then waited in the waiting room for 90 mins as the receptionist hadn't told the ward that I had arrived.  When I was taken to my room it was freezing!! They brought a heater in and as soon as it warmed up they took it away again. I was there from 9.15 until 22.15 and all I was given was 4 pieces of toast and I had not eaten any thing else in 30 hours! I did complain about the hospital and got sent a bunch flowers and was happy to know that they acknowledged my compliant

I was originally recommended MYA by one of my friends and I'm so glad I decided to go with them. MYA have been absolutely amazing from day 1. So helpful and made me feel reassured about any worries I had. I felt so comfortable with my patient coordinator Julie, as she answered all my questions and was so supportive all the way. The Newcastle clinic staff are all so friendly and all my appointments pre and post op have always been on time! So glad I went with MYA as they are such a great thorough company where nothing is ever too much for them. Would definitely recommend to everyone!!!

I was reassured very well at initial consultation,  didnt feel like i was rushed. Even after changing my mind alot of times! Got a late appointment so didnt have to wait very long on that side. Admission time was 8am however I didnt get seen until 4:30 because of two major cases, so a later admission time would have been better. Nurses and surgeon at hospital were professional after my surgery.  For my 7 day post op check up I turned up and the nurse had gone home thinking she had no more appointments. I showed my email of confirmation and the girl on the desk was very apologetic. I rearranged for two days later, not sure if the nurse was aware but no apologies for the missed appointment.. Considering they take �50 off patients for missed app's, I would atleast expect an apology for them missing mine! The nurse was good at the check up anyway, put my mind at ease about pain etc. Overall a good experience, i am happy with the results. Excited to see how they change from 11 days post op onwards. Only thing I'd say is to ring to confirm your appointments even if received an email.
Right from my first consultation to my post op all the staff are helpful, friendly and professional. Surgery experience was very thorough,informative and made to feel at ease from start to finish.x

I had breast enlargement with MYA & throughout the experience its been fab & iv felt at ease with all the information that was given. Both staff in MYA Cardiff & Fitzroy London Hospital were so welcoming & made sure I was comfortable at all times. I have no regrets & so happy with my results, I'd highly recommend this company to anyone looking into surgery! Xx

review_title: My heroes! From start to finish everything I hoped for!
review_body: I had closed rhino and breast enlargement in January with dr frati my PC was Clare and my nurse was Sarah. The entire process from start to finish was seamless always returned calls, worked to achieve a great price for me, generally looked out for my welfare all the way through and the results are incredible Dr frati worked a miracle on my nose and breasts listened to every word I said - people complain that he is sometimes late or rude but he wasn't to me and if anyone else says this he has every reason to be the man is amazing at what he does! Clare honestly thank you without what you did I would of never got to meet Dr frati never mind enjoy his results and Sarah was honestly lovely remembered everything about my case and made me feel so important! Thank you to everyone I spoke to including the nurses and staff at the hospital I couldn't be happier you made my dreams come true! Xxx

I've had a great experience with Mya from beginning to end, I was at the Bristol clinic and had my ba surgery at the Fitzroy hospital in London, and the staff at both were very friendly and welcoming, looking after my needs. I felt all the information I was given was great, all my questions were answered. My aftercare so far has been excellent, have felt totally at ease and in good hands, very happy I went with this company, would highly recommend :)

I thought the care both before and after my treatment were second to none. Very kind, caring and professional staff, from those at the practice in Nottingham, to those at the First Trust Hospital, Preston.

The reception staff were wonderful and inviting and my paitent co-ordinator Sarah was amazing!! She made me feel so comfortable and at ease about everything and the communication was faultless. The whole experience could easily of been uncomfortable or embarressing but wasn't! Such a friendly environment
Would defo recommend Mya cardiff to anybody they have all been very friendly and professional I'm very impressed with my whole experience with them

I am just over 3 weeks post op and I have not regretted it at all. MYA have been amazing throughout my journey and I am really pleased with my results so far, and how I have been treated by all members of the team I have met along the way. Right when I went in for my first consultation til now, I have been made to feel comfortable which really settled my nerves leading up to op day! I always thought I would never go through with the op as I was really scared of the pain I might have experience but honestly I really worked myself up for nothing really. I would say it is more uncomfortable than physical pain for the first week. Yeah it was sore but nothing compared to what I imagined it to be. I am seeing changes in them every day and now can't wait to go bikini shopping!! I am really pleased I went with MYA, they are really a great company!

review_title: Amazing personal coordinator and customer service
review_body: I am in the middle of my MYA journey and whilst I am young and also had a bit of problems knowing what exactly I wanted and which company to go for, I have not been judged or pushed towards anything unlike my other experiences.
I have had the best experience with Mya could not fault  my experience from the start to the end.

review_title: Pre op and nervous after reading these reviews.
review_body: I am pre op, due to undergo surgery next Saturday. I have been feeling slightly neglected by my patient coordinator as I haven't heard from her since I payed my deposit but thought perhaps she was just busy. However after looking at these reviews I'm beginning to agree they don't care about you after they've taken your money. I'm a week away from surgery and it seems impossible to get hold of anyone at the clinic, even after sending a text message to my pc who didn't respond. I was excited  when she was being supportive and lovely, sending me texts, checking I was okay, but now I'm starting to feel very nervous of how I may be treated in the next few weeks. Hopefully I'll be writing a much nicer review next week! I hope.

Overall so far I have had a great experience with Mya and although I'm still healing I am happy with results so far and can see how much more it will change. The best part of my experience was my Patient Coordinator, Emma Wells who went above and beyond for me through out the whole process. I honestly couldn't thank her enough for answering all my questions, being prompt and being supportive. She really is a credit to Mya and deserves a bonus for the work she put in with me (and I am sure all of her other patients too). The aftercare service with the nurses has been fantastic too I had seen Michelle a few times and she has always been friendly and informative which made me feel at ease, most recently I had a check up with Sarah who was more than happy to answer all of my questions and reassured me about my swelling. Both nurses were lovely, not once did I feel rushed or like I asked too many questions. My experience with the Chelmsford clinic has been first class, thank you.
I had my boobs done with MYA's Birmingham clinic (Dr Frati) in March 2014.
Firstly, I have to be honest - after all when researching about a life changing procedure you don't want people to beat around the bush. I wish people were more honest.
Mya Nottingham have been fantastic with me! From showing interest online to now, I'm early at the 3month stage.

While surgery is expensive, I believe it's been worth every penny. I now have confidence, feel sexy, womanly, I can't wait for my next holiday and to get in a bikini which I've NEVER looked forward to! Always spending upwards to �100 for expensive padded bikinis, now I can wear anything. Not only that, I can buy any dress I want, no more searching for something that covers bra straps or sewing panels in to cover my bra. I was completely flat chested at a curvy/athletic 5 foot 10, it's never matched me! Dr kazazzi knew exactly what I wanted, I even had my doubts and asked to go bigger but he insisted I stick with his suggestion. I didn't want to go too big and now no one assumes I've had a boob job, mainly because I always wore padded bras. Even my mum doesn't think I was as flat chested as I was. And that's exactly how I like it. theyre so natural looking and I can still wear all my clothes I still have. Anyway...enough about how I feel...the nottingham and Doncaster clinics were fantastic. The only negative I have for nottingham is they regularly ran over schedule, I was once a waiting nearly 3 hours for my appointment even though I arrived on time. A courtesy call would've been helpful. But the good far out weighs the bad, hence 5 stars! The surgery itself was pain free, I had no pain killers and remained that way throughout my recovery :) I know not everyone is that lucky. I look at them every day and can't believe I finally took the plunge after 12 years of wanting it done and thinking about it every single day...there wasn't a day that went by I didn't catch a glimpse of myself in a mirror and think I hated it. It didn't get me down but it was a constant worry, now I'm so much more confident. Can't wait to start running again, been back in the gym most days since my 6 week sign off, just need to book a holiday now. Sorry for the rambling here it probably doesn't make much sense but there's so much to say!

review_title: Results not what was expected and poor customer service
review_body: My results were not as expected. Appointments were rescheduled several times, I've still not seen the surgeon for my post op 3 months later. I will be following this up due to my disappointment in relation to my results.

All the staff at MYA are incredible and very knowledgeable. I do not regret choosing them for my Breast Argumentation one bit. They always answered my calls and always answered my questions no matter how silly. They made me feel very comfortable and did not judge me one bit. Mr Frati is amazing and has changed my life.

review_title: Terrible waiting time - Average after care
review_body: I had breast surgery with MYA. Very nice patient coordinator, only bad point regarding her would be, pushing too much regarding taking payments. Commission I guess. Delays for surgeon appointments (2h), delay on surgery day (4-5h), delays for follow up appointments (up to 2h). Taking off bandage/strapping been done with no care and I had impressive red mark oozing and hurting for the following 3 weeks. Very low care from the nurse on the day, even if bruising was expected /normal, this mark wasn't and the lack of care was there. I still have the visible mark 4 months after, no pain fortunately. Scars turned out a bit keloid, as My scars, somehow had difficulty to heal properly. I have been Noticed that to nurses but advices coming from them were not appropriate to solve the problem unfortunately. Even if they were calling back for following up.

I chose Mya because I liked the fact that the patient co ordinators you get awarded with are X Mya patients, So when you discussed the surgery with them you were talking to someone who had first hand experience. The only problem I experienced really was that my patient co ordinator wasn't very experienced when it came to customer services. Considering I was her patient she didn't keep me up to date with any information, never returned calls, in fact the only time she was ever attentive was when it came to taking payment after that I never heard from her again! At one stage I felt she had lied to me because the information she gave me often contradicted itself.. But apart from that all the surgical staff and nurses are absolute gems, they made me feel really comfortable and acted professionally at all times. So my 3 star rating is for that part of Mya I wish you could rate the 2 teams separately because the admin side are totally diabolical!!! And wouldn't get any stars from me at all!!!

my mya journey has been amazing from the first consultation to the post op appointments the staff are great and are always there to answer any questions you may have all in all my whole experience has been amazing and I am so happy with the results.

Had my breast augmentation with MYA Leeds and I was a bit apprehensive about undergoing surgery but the staff and surgeons are so friendly and professional I was made to feel very at ease throughout the entire process.
I was very nervous of having any surgery but after having children I was really unhappy with my shape. I chose MYA because they'd been recommended to me by several friends.

Brilliant service from Mya Nottingham, from start to finish. All of the staff have been brilliant and in constant contact and always available at the end of the phone. My surgeon, Mr Mounir was brilliant and I could not be happier that I chose both the company, and my surgeon. I could not praise Mya Nottingham enough and will definitely recommend them to friends, family and anyone else who asks!

I had a breast enlargement with MYA in October and it was the best thing I ever did. I can't thank them enough for everything they did for me, They've changed my life and given me the confidence I always wanted. The Cardiff consultants/nurses was absolutely fantastic before and after my surgery. Any issues or questions I had they would ring me within the hour to answer any questions I had. The clinic in London was also just as amazing. My surgoen was wonderful and gave me the result I wanted and much more. The nurses in London made me feel so relaxed and happy. I can honestly say MYA are an amazing company and excellent at meeting your expectations. Amazing experience and I would do it all over if I could.

I wanted a breast enlargement for about 5 years, I kept just putting it at the back of my head and forgetting about it, I saw mya on tv and just thought I'd give it ago. I rang them, had a consultation the week later, and the week after that had my surgery!

Having my B.A was the scariest feeling but I have to say every step of the way MYA were amazing. Nothing was too much for them pre op or post op. There was a consistent support network which was incredibly comforting and reassuring. This has been the best decision I've ever made and I would recommend MYA to anyone! Xx

I honestly cannot express how fantastic my whole experience with MYA has been. The day of my consultation with Fay (who couldn't have been more help even if she tried) I was given my date to go in for surgery. So soon but so exciting!!! We tried on various different implants to suit exactly what I wanted. Fay was absolutely brilliant and so friendly! Mr max marcellino was just as brilliant, unlike some surgeons he really listens to exactly what kind of breasts you want, and then helps you decide exact implant for you. I didn't want to go too big I wanted to be a nice natural D-DD. Without a fake looking profile. However the implants I chose originally he was advising me to go just tha little bit bigger. So after a couple of weeks of thinking about it I decided to go back into Bristol clinic and see him again, he was so much help and takes his time. You don't feel rushed. On the day of my op everybody at the mya hospital in London was brilliant from the minute I got there to the moment I left. I got there at 10:30 am and was on the operating table at 12:55. And was able to go home at 8:30pm. My whole experience with MYA was fantastic and I would 1000% recommend them, and my results are even better!! I couldn't be happier... Thank you to everybody at MYA!! Xx

Newcastle clinic have been amazing I couldn't have asked for anything better only 3 weeks ago I got in contact with MYA and first spoken to my PC Lindsey who is from the Newcastle clinic I got a date the following Saturday for a conciltation, it went perfect it was proffecional yet really friendly I didn't feel pushed I just got the information I needed and went away really happy having booked to see my surgeon Mr Traynor when I went to this appointment I went into see him he looked at my body and suggested sizes and talked me through everything I could have ever thought of which I was happy about as it covered things I hadent even thought about, he was confident and obviously very experienced once I had been in that I went the same day to Lindsey's room my PC and she talked me through things again which I either had further questions about or just forgotten aswell as trying out the implants she gave me good input helping me choose the size, after that we negotiated price which they are very good on they work with you not against you! After this I had my pre op which was just allowing them to contact my GP practice and checked my genral health as well as pre pics ! Since all this I have been in contact most days with my PC who is amazing checking I'm okay I have had answers to all questions the same day helping my choose post op bras etc ! I am just so happy and could give MYA any more praise so far I don't have a bad thing to say. If anybody asked me if they are good to go with I would say 100%

Had closed rhinoplasty with dr Frati at London Fitzroy clinic and I'm over the moon with the results dr Frati is a man of few words but I definitely wouldn't let that put you off his work definitely speaks for itself! Amazing

I haven't been too happy with MYA. Same story to begin with the patient coordinator is fine, then as soon as you have paid never hear from them again. My operation was fine, however I thought it was strange to not be visited by Dr Frati after the operation. I next saw him 13 weeks after, where he barely says a word. I told him about a concern I had, and he asked to examine the implants, he proceeded to "crack" my implants, without first explaining what he was doing and why he was doing this, upon speaking to the nurse the next day she explained it sounded like i had hard scar tissue that he has broken down. I think its disgraceful he doesn't explain what he is doing, and I told him numerous times throughout the examination i was in a lot of pain, and only when I started crying did he stop. I appreciate he is trying to assist with any problems before they become major concerns, but to not be informed or have any explanation is disconcerting. The extreme pain caused by having my implant "cracked" has caused me to be very weary of them, which isn't what i wanted, now I am just worried the problems will continue and I may have to go back!

review_title: Vasor Lipo on the Flanks and Arms
review_body: I did my second lipo with MYA unfortunately I do not feel as satisfied as the previous one which was on abdomen.  I saw significant difference on my arms but my flanks seem even worse now. I am happy with the process and customer care which I received but I wish they declined me as many other plastic surgeons.

Kimberley and the team at Nottingham MYA were outstanding and I would thoroughly recommend them to anyone thinking about a procedure. From the initial appointment to the amazing after care, their personal service and professional clinic were on another league from

Had an amazing experience at the Fitzroy Clinic in London! Right from the start I was looked after by my patient co-coordinator who really gave me the confidence to go ahead with the surgery I've wanted for so long. After speaking with Dr Frati I was sure he would do and amazing job and now almost 6 weeks post surgery I am over the moon with the results already! My overnight stay at the clinic was very pleasant and all the nurses really looked after me. Overall I'm grateful to everyone at MYA who made my experience so great!

review_title: Mr Marcellino is a fantastic surgeon
review_body: If I had ever had any surgery again I would choose Max Marcellino. I went to see about 7 different surgeons before picking and he stood out, giving me honest advice and realistic expectations in line with what I wanted. The nurses were great and the clinic at fitzrovia was comfortable and clean. The wait time on the day of surgery was long, and of course the follow up is with nurses not your surgeon - but that's what you get when you pay for a chain/company. I could have paid �3000-�5000 more, gone completely private and had more time with a surgeon after and more personalised care, but I couldn't afford that and I'm more than happy with the results. I can see how if you're unhappy, it might be hard to get attention as they do just turn over patients high volume...but that's the same with any cosmetic surgery group! Everyone I met at MYA was lovely, my PC, even the girls at reception and I really trusted the nurses with my follow up - the knew what they were doing (my mums a director of nursing so she knows!), and really love the results. Only problem now is wanting more...oops!

I had a routine operation BA with Dr Frati at Fitzroy. I chose MYA because they do so many of these that I figured the risks were lower in respect of how much they do and how experienced they must be. Everything went well. Appointment times overran at times etc but I wasn't expecting a bespoke type service as its relatively cheap and caters to the masses so not sure what some people expect. Overall very positive experience would use them again!

I started my journey at the Bristol clinic. From the moment I stepped foot through the door, all the girls were super friendly and made me feel comfortable. Krystina was my patient co-ordindator (this woman deserves a medal), she is so passionate about her job and worked her butt off to get me my new boobs! Dr Frati was my surgeon and my results are fab! Yes other people might complain he runs a little over schedule but he's a highly sought after surgeon that gives you amazing boobs so you really can't complain! My time at the Fitzroy during surgery was a breeze, every member of the MYA team I've met have been a pleasure. I honestly cannot recommend them enough! My confidence boost from this whole experience has changed my life! ?��?
I have spent the last year and a half communicating with staff at MYA Chelmsford and the Complaints Department, Head Office, and will review on my experience of this.

review_title: Breast enlargement - Fitzroy, London - Dr. Frati
review_body: Patient co-ordinators are super friendly, definitely all pretty faces to keep the image of MYA strong. As I had done a ton of research beforehand, I didn't have many questions - the appointment was around 15mins long. She was helpful and nice.

review_title: Great job rubbish patient Co ordinators
review_body: I know this is said by many so I will keep it brief!

review_title: Dr Andrea giannitrapani. BA with uplift.
review_body: After finally deciding to go ahead with my BA, I gave mya a call, I was booked in for a consultation at Birmingham mya clinic, which I was then explained to everything very well and in detail. I then met my surgeon, turned out I needed an uplift as well as BA , ( uplift had already been discussed with my PC) Just 8 weeks after my consultation my op was booked! Eeeek mega excited. I attended my pre op my nurse angie was lovely. She made me feel very welcome, such a lovely lady. 3rd November 2015, I chose to go to the first trust hospital in Preston. I arrived at 8am, staff were amazing, shown to my room,  and popped the tele on. Before I knew it dr Andrea came round to draw on me and take pics. Me and my husband were just relaxing till the time came. The nurse came in to do check ups, blood pressure etc. Then the anaesthetist came round I knew it was alsmost time. So excited. Then I walked down into surgery and it started. I woke up thinking where the hell am I. What's happened haha, once I came round I realised what I had done and was so excited to see. I looked down although I was slightly covered up I could see a massive  difference. The nurse was in every hour checking up on me, offering me tea and toast, there service was second to none. Fantastic hospital with wonderful staff. My post op appointments all went well. 9/10 i got seen to on time. I saw my surgeon twice in in the 1st 5 weeks as I was going abroad. So he gave me some advice. Overall I am pleased with everything. From my consultation, pre op, actual op, post op meetings. Everything went smoothly. Staff at Birmingham clinic are lovely. Helena always made me feel welcome. Thanks all. And a massive thank you Dr Andrea for my new fantastic perky boobs!! HP inplants partial, 325 & 350 cc.

I had my breast augmentation back in September 2015 and the care I received from the nurses and the theatre staff blew me away! Don't get me wrong my patient coordinator was great, she explained things to me that I didn't know..but the after care was phenomenal couldn't fault them!! Thank you soo much ?��?

I had breast augmentation in Septemeber 2015 with Dr Traynor. From start to finish the experience was amazing! The team is professional, friendly and really helpful. I must have asked a million questions and they still are happy to answer more to make sure that you are aware of what to expect.

Had the most amazing experience at Mya and am over the moon with my results! I had my consultation with Natalie Gregson in Manchester, she was the first person I met from Mya and she made me feel so relaxed and confidant about the whole thing that I knew from the get go that Mya was the right place for me! My surgeon, Dr Mounir was also just as amazing and is such a character! I have so much trust in him and am so glad he was my sergeon as he has given me the most amazing boobs I could ever dream of! Every single member of the Mya staff were so lovely, I can't praise them enough for their kindness and patience, thank you thank you thank you Mya! The best thing I ever did!!! Can't recommend them enough!

review_title: Tummy Tuck with Dr Marcellino - London
review_body: Overall i had a very good experience with MYA, I  had reservations at first as I didn't like their adverts on TV but my first call back after I made my enquiry changed all that. My initial call was very easy going and friendly and made me excited to go on to the next step.

Despite Rebecca being based in London and myself in Leicester, she has always been completely available to answer any questions and sooth my nerves. I haven't yet had the Op, but Rebecca has made the whole experience really easy and straight forward and even managed to get me in to see the surgeon a lot quicker than expected!

After having my eye lid surgery in February 2015, I can honestly say it has changed my life. From the word go the service I received has been excellent.  Putting my details onto the website, a call within the hour, booked in for a consultation after I finished work, meeting my coordinator Lauren, then my surgeon Mr Frati, the nurse in Manchester Anne Marie....everyone was brilliant. My Surgery day came round and I was very nervous, but the staff in the hospital put me at ease, as well as seeing Mr Frati again.  My Recovery checks I had in Manchester and Anne-Marie was brilliant so knowledgeable and professional. Bruising took a while to go down, as did the swelling...but worth the wait as my results are just what I wanted.  Mr Frati was very realistic with what could be achieved, which I thought was great as it's easy to promise the world!!  I thank MYA for my fantastic experience.

review_title: B/A with DR Frati and PC Clare Hennicke
review_body: Mr Frati is the kindest and most talented surgeon. I would not go to anyone else. He put me at ease about the operation and gave me the exact size I wanted. He really makes sure that your happy and does what he can to give you the outcome you would like. I was told from my PC that he was asking how I was and how I feel about my results. He really cares about his patients and is such a funny, friendly man. Clare was also a perfect PC, making sure I knew everything I needed to know about my operation and told me I can speak to get whenever I needed if I was worried. These two have to be the best pair going. MYA in general is a Lovely environment and a great company. I would recommend everyone to get their procedures done there, so professional and clean.

My experience with MYA was fantastic! The procedure I went for was a breast enlargement. At my initial consultation with my patient co-ordinator they were so friendly and reassuring, easing any of my nerves about the procedure and answered all of my questions. Right through the process the staff were fantastic! They really took the time to make sure that I was happy, comfortable and well informed about the decisions I was making. Mr Marcellino was my surgeon, he was recommended to me by my patient co-ordinator, at my first consultation with him he was very professional and very confident in what he does, he told me what would suit and work my body and give me the look that I wanted. He was very honest and direct. On the day of my surgery the staff were brilliant, answered all my last minute questions and panics. When I woke I felt absolutely fine, a little sore. I was given tea and toast and was checked on regularly. I got 325cc implants, which took me from a B cup to a E! Which was slightly larger than predicted, but they work with my body shape and look fantastic!

review_title: the best decision i ever made!!
review_body: Before going to Mya I was a bit  apprehensive simply because I had never undergone a cosmetic procedure. However all that changed  after  my consultation with my nurse co-ordinator Cassandra. right away after meeting and  talking to her I felt at ease and was super excited by the time I left the room, I knew there and then that I had made the right choice.The staff were amazing, they were always happy to help and answer any question that I had. When I met my surgeon Dr Marcellino he was very professional and seemed very confident in what he do .He gave me his honest opinion and what to expect instead of unrealistic expectation which I took on board. On the day of my surgery I felt a bit nervous but happy to finally have my Vaser Lipo on my abdomen  as I have always found it difficult to loose weight from that area. After my surgery I woke up to one of the nurses  holding my hand and re-assuring me that everything went well and that gave me great confidence. I am nearly 3 months post op and extremely happy with my results that I am looking forward to having my BA and Vaser on my thighs by Dr Marcellino.

I recently underwent a breast enlargement operation which turned out to be the best decision I have ever made. My consultant Clare was so helpful and really helped me with all decisions that were made. The day of my operation I received a great amount of care and attention from ALL of the nurses that were on shift. Since having my breasts enlarged I have been back to the surgery twice for checks up and have been very happy with the amount of help from nurses Teghan and Sarah. I HIGHLY recommend this surgery.

review_title: Amazing experience with MYA & Mr. Marcellino
review_body: Had my op 6 weeks ago on 2nd December at the London Fitzroy hospital. I went via the Cardiff clinic  and my surgeon was Mr. Marcellino. He was lovely and his work is amazing. My incisions are already barely visible at only 6 weeks! I'm so happy with the size, I got everything I wanted. The patient coordinator, nurse and hospital staff have all been so friendly and helpful from day 1. I recommend MYA based on my experience :-)
I'm so happy I chose MYA, and cannot believe my final result, amazing!! Would recommend to anyone, I was looked after from my first ever consultation all the way to the end - thank you xxx

My whole journey with MYA has been amazing from start to finish, the after care has been so good and there has always been someone there to help me when I've needed it. I had the best surgeon and I'm so happy with the results! Recommend MYA 100%

After being treated like royalty in my initial consultation, i felt MYA was the best place for surgery and booked to have the procedure in December 2013. Swiftly after parting with �4500, the contact between MYA and myself became non existent until my surgery date. When attending my aftercare appointments with Dr Fratti, i could be sat in the waiting room for 4 hours past my appointment time. Having traveled for an hour to get there you can only imagine my frustration. After experiencing problems and pain in my left breast, i went back to the surgery (of course Dr Fratti was not running on time with appointments). I was informed that one breast had encapsulated, and the other done the opposite which meant i had one rock solid breast and another that flopped like jelly when i laid down and twisted inside me any time I moved. After having to push for both breasts to be re-done as apparently only the encapsulated one qualified, i had my second surgery in May 2015. I was due to arrive at Fitzroy London at 12pm, so that i did. Dr Fratti obviously decided to have a lay in that day as he also arrived at 12pm, meaning he has missed all of his appointments waiting there since 6am. I did not go down for surgery until 8pm after not having eaten or had a drop of water for over 24 hours - the excuses from the staff were unbelievable. I finally left Fitzroy at 3am the next morning, and was not even offered an overnight stay despite the fact i was very unwell and non-coherent. i have so far been seen for my one week check up, 8 week check up, and am currently still waiting to be seen for my 3 month check up 8 months down the line. Although initial appointments with MYA Chelmsford seem great - please be warned that the aftercare is the complete opposite, and once you have parted with your money - you are just another body on the operating table! Dr Fatti is rude, informative and unable to communicate with patients in the correct manner. Be careful!

Feel amazing! Had a consultation in April 2014 and never went ahead with it, then in August 15 decided to go for it why not!? I rang Julie the manager from the Newcastle clinic and she was fab as always got me Booked straight in, had my operation 4 weeks later ! Never Had a operation in my life so it's fair to say I was nervous ... Went to the Preston hospital staff and my surgeon Gary Traynor were amazing, the procudure took around 20 mins and I woke 30 mins after, would do it again tomorrow, I was put at ease instantly ... The next day I was shopping .. Had no pain at all, post op appointments were also fab, Beth from the Newcastle clinic printed some before and after pictures for me which was really nice... I am sure in the future I will be visiting MYA for another cosmetic procedure xxxx also got voted number 1 boobs of Instagram 2015!! X

review_title: Amazing experience, I can't thank MYA enough!
review_body: I had my BA on 22/10/15, and my whole experience from start to finish has been faultless. I had wanted my boobs done for over 10 years, and finally plucked up the courage after seeing the amazing results my sister achieved with MYA. I met with my patient co - ordinator Clare at MYA Fitzroy (London), who was an absolute star and immediately made me feel at ease. My surgeon was mr frati, and although he's not very talkative, he really knows his stuff. He has given me the boobs I have always dreamed of, and I can't thank everyone at mya fitzroy enough. My surgery and healing all went perfectly, so I never had any aftercare issues. Clare (my PC), keeps in touch to check all is well, and reassure me that they're there if need be. I think the fact that they have an online forum for people to share their experiences (any patients can join, not just mya patients), shows that they are confident in the service they offer, and rightly so. Thanks MYA for all you have done x

review_title: MYA are absolutely amazing! Highly recommend.
review_body: I had breast augmentation surgery on 26/11/2015, and could not be any happier with my end results and how exceptionally well I was treated by all the staff at MYA Fitzroy London through my journey from my initial consultation with my patient coordinator Clare - who was very friendly, informative and understanding with my circumstances, through to the after care I have received from a nurse called Taegan who is absolutely lovely and made me feel very comfortable and reassured before and after my op.

I wanted the procedure done because I?��d wanted breast implants for as long as I could remember, although I never really mentioned it to anyone. I always kept it to myself in the back of my mind thinking that cosmetic surgery was only for celebrities and the rich and famous. I never discussed it with anyone as I never thought it was a realistic option.

I was very nervous about meeting my surgeon but he could see I was nervous and took time explaining the procedure and what would happen. Mr Frati is a man of few works but I wholeheartedly trust him, he said I required anatomical implants which I really pleased about as I wanted a natural look. Throughout my journey, I had constant contact with my Patient Coordinator who also came to see me on the morning of my procedure to wish me luck. Mr Frati met be before I went to theatre to confirm implants and mark me up. The procedure took just 23 minutes in total and the theatre staff were brilliant. I was home by 5pm thanks to the ward nurses, I was quite sick after the anaesthesia but they quickly sorted that with some medication. After my procedure my Patient Coordinator put a call in to make sure all was ok, I'm now 3 months post-op and I couldn't have been happier. Thank you to all staff at MYA :)

My daughter had implants about 9 months ago. The pre surgery process  could not have been better. The coordinator  was fantastic. My daughter looked into everything that could go wrong and made sure that everything was covered, or so she thought, eveb though MYA was more expensive thet seemed to be the best place to go to. After the surgery all seemed great then she the implants started getting painful and harden.  She went back to see Mr Fratti who 'cracked' her boobs. She had hard scar tissue and that was causing the problems. She had them cracked again. This is quite a painful thing to have done. Her boobs have to be squeezed, if that is the correct term, quite forcefully to break down the scar tissue. She is unable to lay on her front, cuddle her son  and maasaging them to try to stop the scar tissue formimg is very  painful  but she does this regularly as instructed. Her boobs are still hard and painful and the left one has now dropped an inch lower than the right. She knew that she was insured for capsular contracture,  which is what this is and so  6 weeks ago she again contacted them to see Mr Fratti  again as the pain is bad to see what could be done.  She finally got to see him today after phoning anumber of times and noy being phoned back, quite a difference to pre surgery but they had not had her �5000 then..... She  was told today that her capsular  contracture  is stage 2 and they would not do a reop unless it got to stage3 even though she is in a lot of pain. They have given her medication and told her to go back in 3 months. She was also told that one boob was lower than the other before her  operation  and that is why it is lower now, but it has only dropped in the last couple of weeks and to be honest it didnt look lower before the operation and this was never mentioned in her pre op consultation.. We are now waiting to see what happens in the next 3 months but she is not very hopeful. If it does not progress to stage 3 does that mean she has to live in pain with hard implants. She asked all the questions that she thought she needed to. She looked into everything that could go wrong. She could not have done much more. If she had been told that one boob would be lower than the other she would have thought about having an augmentation as well although to be honest I dont think she had enough  boob for one of them to be that much lower. The photos that she had done did not show  this.  My advice is to be very careful as even though they say they insure against capsular  contracture  you may still not be covered. They are brilliant before the procedure but for us they dont seem to care that she is having problems and it took quite a few calls for them to arrange for her to be seen. They kept saying we will call you back and then not phoning. Perhaps it is not worth paying the extra for peace of mind if it doesnt mean anything. If all goes well with no problems they are good but if you have problems.................

I would definately recommend mya, they have been amazing, my PC Gina has stayed in contact throughout calling and texting after op to make sure I was ok. Anytime I was worried about incisions I emailed the nurse Anjana who would always contact me straight back offering me advice, putting my mind at rest and telling me I can go an see her whenever I wanted!

Wouldn't like to give them a 1 star I went in for an uplift and implants but the doc said to have them done in 2 procedures so had the uplift first I had that done and the first week was ok looked good and a few days after I had a small hole the nurse said it was fine I wasn't happy so went to my doc and hospital they said it was infected so put me on antibiotics a few days later went back they still insisted it was ok had to keep going back every 2-3 days on the 2nd and half week the hole now was green Pusey and bigger they said it was still fine I went back to my hospital got put back on antibiotics again went back there the day after and another nurse filled it with ribbon to then come home then pull it out in the shower the next day I wasn't happy went back to hospital then they took it out with sterile water and they said I should never of been told to take it out so went back there on the Monday they said it was fine ect I demanded to see dr frati as the hole now was massive so see him on the Friday and took me back in to surgery on the Tuesday its only just healed they won't give me the money back for the implants only as a good will gesture so I said no as its my money as they won't  do the implants and now have a solicitor involved Please girls look at a few places before u chose mya and specially look at the aftercare xx

review_title: So happy! MYA are the best :)
review_body: So happy with my experience and feel I'm have been in the safest environment possible, my pc Amelia has been great. I can ask her anything and she will always come back to me as soon as she can. I even got an out of hours call just to make sure I was happy with my first consultation as I work long hours and find it difficult to answer my phone in the day.

Going to MYA was one of the best decisions I've made,  before I was very self concious about the way I looked and now after having Breast enlargement surgery I feel so much better about myself! It is truly life changing. All of the staff at Nottingham have been extremely helpful and have gone above and beyond to make sure I am happy and comfortable throughout my post op surgery. I would definaltey recommend this company to anyone who is thinking about cosmetic surgery !

review_title: Best thing I ever did going with MYA
review_body: So happy with my results, going to mya was the best decision I ever made. My patient coordinator was amazing. I would text Lauren when I was nervous or needed anything and she was so helpful, So was my surgeon dr monier,

This is my second breast enlargement with Mya. My patient coordinator is Alison from Mya Manchester. I would highly recommend Alison to anyone considering plastic surgery. Alison explained everything to me from start to finish, was available if I had any concerns or questions regarding my procedure. I always wanted a breast enlargement but didn't have the money and also the guts to have it done, ha ha. Alison was really excited for me as she knew I wasn't entirely happy with my boobs. Really fab experience with Mya, would recommend to friends and family. Thank you Mya for bringing me more confidence and a big thank you to Alison for all her support. X

I have been wanting a tummy tuck and breast augmentation for some time now. I had been to see other surgeons but I wasn't fully comfortable committing to them , I saw an advert on the tv read a lot of the reviews and decided to give them a call. I spoke to a lovely young lady called Amy who talked me through everything and booked me in.

I went in to have breast enlargement with uplift and labiaplasty about 18 months ago and I'm really not happy with the results! I've tried contacting the surgery by phone and email phone response I'll get someone to contact you but they never do and still no response to emails. Really disappointed and upset!

Just had my 6 week check and everything is perfect, I am extremely happy with my results and the whole procedure experience.. The staff at Mya Nottingham and the hospital were all so lovely and helpful the whole time! So so happy :)

They did not inform me about day case scenario so I overpaid about �600. They did not take deposit from me but told me to pay total amount before I even saw my surgeon! They did not offer any discount for payment in advance like they did to some customers. A surgeon during first consultation was rude, ignored me and made me feel not welcome and uncomfortable. April 2015

Throughout the whole process nothing was too much trouble and there was always a member of staff on the other end of the phone willing to help. For what can be a daunting and scary process, the MYA team made it an exciting and enjoyable experience
Couldn't recommend MYA more! So happy with my results, the staff at MYA Nottingham have been so friendly and helpful and my surgeon Dr Mournir has been fantastic. So happy! Thank you!!

Everything is fine until you have to part with your money - then MYA's true colours start to become apparent. I had a breast augmentation and uplift with MYA almost two years ago and the surgery was fine but less than a year after my procedure I started to have some problems. I went to them straight away with my concerns but of course, as I have already had the procedure and paid they don't care. My calls were rarely answered and when they were, I was treated so terribly - the staff were rude and don't appreciate your time. I have had a string of appointments that 'haven't been booked' when I've turned up and emails that 'have been sent' but I've 'missed' them but miraculously appear in my inbox after I have complained. When I eventually managed to get an appointment, I am told a different piece of information and then given a timeframe to wait which is usually about a month or two and that quickly adds up when you count all of the mistakes made. It seems like the staff and surgeon are not on the same page and the staff need to be trained on what the procedures are as well as an intensive course on customer service. I won't even touch upon the amount of time you have to wait for your appointment as the surgeon is often running 2 hours behind. It has taken almost a further year to get some sort of resolution and I use the word resolution extremely lightly. Since I have had an issue, it's been a constant struggle to get any kind of answer from anybody and when I said I would like to make a complaint I was urged not to as it would slow down the process - this has been ongoing since January. I am utterly fed up with this company and have been in talks with press and PR about how I have been treated. I would urge people to tread with caution before going with them. I thoroughly regret my decision and I will have to go elsewhere to get the help I need.

review_title: Plastic surgery at its finest- don't trust no where else with your body
review_body: Firstly having a consultation at Harley medical I found the staff pushy, rude and I also lost a �500 deposit which she practically forced from me. I later learnt that I couldn't get finance and I lost my deposit. After saving up I then decided to go to Mya after having so many recommendations from different people. I had a consultation at Leeds and I was relaxed and it wasn't like Harley medical at all . I was under a no obligation to book and even got a change to see and feel different implants. A week or so later I booked my op. The day of my op I was treat like a vip in a beautiful private hospital in Preston. I was fully aware what time I would be going down to theatre and kept very comfortable. At 1pm I went down and was surprised to be back awake before 2Pm . At 5pm I managed to eat and was told I could leave . I didn't have any initial pain and pain 2-7 days later was bearable actually. The aftercare was fantastic and my boobs have made me so confident . I haven't had any problems , can barely see my scars and they look so natural . Thank you Mya and Dr traynor

I am a 5ft 3" female who is 8.5 stones and relatively fit and healthy. I am over 40 and despite my extremely healthy diet have deposits of fat that I just cant spot reduce no matter what I do. Fed up with tactfully covering up and not being able to dress how I wanted to I was quite excited to discover Vaser Surgery. It seems ideal for stubborn deposits of bodyfat expecially on people who were'nt over weight. I booked in to have 3 areas flanks, abdomen and underarms. The pain and discomfort of wearing the vest and suit has been awful but for 6 weeks its a small price to pay if you get the desired results. 8 weeks later I am depressed, cancelled my holiday and have spent a lot of money and not got what I was promised.
