The surgeon and staff are all amazing and well qualified but my stomach is still round and swollen so I cant wear anything fitting , my flanks are still bruised but are looking very good and I am happy with them. But my underarms are still the same, they dont look much different to before the procedure. The Surgeon did an amazing job with the incisions as the marks are tiny. But all in all I am really dissapointed with the results and await a further consultation with the surgeon next month.

I had a time slot before I was going away and they managed to fit me in. I have lost a stone in weight before surgery but no one noticed. a week after surgery and people I hardly knew were asking me 'have you lost weight'. I was obviously a different shape, a lot slimmer on my previously wide thighs. I feel the best I have ever. I have been lighter in the past but never had such a good shape no matter how slim I got. now I have !!!!

I had a closed rhinoplasty with Dr frati and I could not be happier with the result! I feel so much more confident in myself and Dr frati was very reassuring. As well as this the support from my patient co ordinator Clare was fantastic, she was there right from my first consultation to months after my operation, always helpful, professional and friendly. All in all very happy I chose Mya, I will never look back :)

review_title: Couldn't ask for a better result
review_body: I had a BA by MYA recently, I am so happy with the work they have done that I have even done my own blog based on my experience. Everyone has been so helpful and I honestly couldn't be happier. Thank you so much mya

review_title: Great service and an amazing surgeon
review_body: I had my breast augmentation on 19th April 2013. Best choice i ever made, they have made me so happy! Mr Kazzazi was brilliant and my scars are hardly visible! The hospital took great care of me and the staff at the MYA clinic were very helpful!
So pleased with all the support and the out come xxx ?���?���?���
I decided to go to MYA having researched other cosmetic surgery companies and i found they seemed more fun and welcoming.
MYA Nottingham were great from start to finish, all the girls were lovely and Mr Moniur did a great job, BA exactly what I asked for!!! Thank you soon much
I can't believe that there are so many happy customers for this company, maybe the staff are on bonuses if you know what I mean.
Lovely staff, very helpful specially my pc Fay Williams at Bristol clinic she's amazing. I'm happy with my result.

Excellent experience, care, and results following BA with Mr Traynor in April '15 (MCR Clinic). Greeted by welcoming and realistic patient co-ordinators. Consultations with my surgeon pre and post op were clear, informative, and unrushed. I genuinely felt cared for by all at MYA.

review_title: Professional company with friendly, informative staff
review_body: From beginning to end my experience of Vaser Lipo at MYA Leeds has been first class. Truly a life changing procedure carried out by Mr Kazazzi.

After years of research, I decided, after reading numerous 5* reviews, to go to MYA for a consultation. My patient co-ordinator Clare was amazing and did everything she could to help me throughout the whole process. I had an Open Septorhinoplasty with an Alar Base reduction with Dr. Andrea Giannitrapani and I couldn't be happier! I look so much better than I could have ever imagined and I literally have the most perfect nose, he is a genius! All the staff at MYA go out for their way to help and the nurses are flawless. I couldn't recommend this company more.

My daughter went to MYA Nottingham and had a procedure done and loved it so when I was ready for mine I couldn't think of going anywhere else but to MYA . I had my op just under 3 weeks ago and I'm very happy with the results ( still healing obviously ) the care I've had before and after has been brilliant and I would highly recommend them x

I couldn't recommend MYA enough! I had a breast enlargement in June and they have been amazing from start to finish. Lovely, professional and welcoming staff at MYA Bristol. I felt completely comfortable and knew that I could contact them at anytime if I ever had any questions. I was extremely nervous about having my procedure but all the staff made me feel completely relaxed I knew I was in safe hands. My surgeon was amazing and all the doctors and aftercare team at Fitzroy in London were brilliant they helped me every step of the way, and although I'm only 6 weeks post op the aftercare has also been amazing with great support especially the lovely nurse at Bristol anyone thinking of having this procedure would be silly to go anywhere else. Thank you so much MYA you have really changed my life, im so happy with my results I couldn't ask for anything more.
and after-care from Leah and all of the girls at Cardiff.

review_title: Ruined my figure and useless support after surgery
review_body: I had vaser lipo which is uneven and ugly. I was unhappy with my shape before but now I am ashamed. The operation and pre-op was fine, but my after care was shocking. They cancelled my 2 day follow up as the nurse was off sick with no replacement and when I phoned they were unhelpful and rude. I could have gone back and had corrective surgery but there was no way I would allow them to touch me again.  The advert on TV is totally misleading as the recovery is long and painful and worse than traditional lipo which I have also had.

From Inception straight through to completion, MYA remained by my side. My patient co-ordinator was friendly, knowledgeable and professional at all times. My surgeon was caring and consistent and provided me with HONEST advice about sizes and shape etc. Aftercare was thorough and gentle along with trustworthy. I feel there are enough positive words within this review to present MYA as the leading Cosmetic Surgery Company. I couldn't be happier with the results and my confidence levels are at an all time high!
I explored different options before choosing MYA.

My experience with mya has totally changed my life. Before I wasn't happy to not wear a bra Dr Singh done an amazing job on my breast enlargement my confidence has grown so much I'm like a new woman ?�ɍ the support before and after my procedure was brilliant if I had any problems mya was sure to talk me through every thing. I'm always sure to recommend mya to any one thinking about surgery and would Defo use mya if I was to have any more surgery done thank you mya and all the staff that looked after me throughout my op

I had an uplift with dr frati 6 months on my boobs look AMAZING!!!! I cant believe how professional and helpful everyone at mya is ! Especially the girls at the birmingham clinic you have all been so supportive and changed my life for the better i couldnt be more thankful for an amazing experience best company ever ! Xxx!!!

I had capsular contracture, I persevered with this for almost three years until it became too painful. Mya were fantastic to say the least! They fit me in with Dr Singh on 02nd July 2015, Dr Singh well what a lovely kind man, he was brilliant and assured me I was doing the right thing by having another op! Victoria and the nurse kindly squeezed me in for my

review_title: Amazing - Love, Love, Love! Definitely recommend
review_body: I had my breast enlargement done 15/05/2015 10 days after my initial consultation I was desperate to get them done in time for my holiday. They managed to get me in and prepare me for surgery an what I would need an what to expect. Nervous and excited when the day come I was seen by nurses ready for surgery and also by the surgeon put my mind at ease an felt in safe hands. When I woke up I was so happy took a while for it to sink in cause of the anaesthetic an morphine after a few hours I felt absolutely fine just tired. Think my pain killers were still working lol. 2/3 days later was when I felt the pain more so in one side than the other I think because at first I felt no pain I over did it, I contacted my consultant an nurse and was assured it was normal an everything was fine and to keep taking my pain killers. Now 9/10 weeks on I feel amazing so much more confident and have no pain at all or concerns. My consultant is always there to talk to and the nurses if I need too. Best thing I ever did. Super happy. Cheryl x

Hi I'm Jamie, I got my breast uplift and implant on the 10th of June, exactly 6weeks tomorrow?�Ɂ I haven't got the words to describe how much I love them! It's been life changing it gave me back that confidence every 25year old should have. I'm a mum of 2 and hated how my boobs looked after having my second child so thought I'd treat myself and so glad I went with mya they've been brilliant my PC was Louisa she's more like a friends to me and my surgeon was dr Andrea he was amazing! My after care has been just as good??���??���??���??���??��� I 100% recommend MYA

I had my breast enlargement may 20th with Mr Traynor! I went from barely an A cup to now a D/DD i am so amazed by my results but you know from all the meetings you have before your op i was 10000% confident MYA would do a great job! I am not a hasty decision maker im very indecisive i always go by what my gut tells me and instantly i knew MYA was the company i wanted to go with, i had made other apps elsewhere but cancelled them all as soon as i left MYA and im sooo happy i did!. Not only are my results exactly what i wanted but the staff are AMAZING Julie at Newcastle clinic plus all the receptionist staff especially a girl named Beth (if I remember correctly) the company is so professional but incredibly friendly! Mr Traynor is a GOD and i LOVE my results! The staff at Preston were also all lovely! All aftercare apps have been great too so the niceness doesnt stop after the surgery this company is just that LOVELY. I healed fantastically I rested like i was told i was in very little to no pain! I went almost all my life feeling extremely self conscious about my body! Because of MYA i feel amazing which sounds so clichթ but its soo true i couldnt Thank Mr Traynor and the MYA team enough! All my friends and family think the results are perfect and everyone's slightly jealous which is nice as alll my friends have boobs now im the one who they are envious of which is a great feeling. I have recommended MYA to anyone and everyone who will listen to me! Someone I recommended even made her apps to get booked in! I dont think another company can beat how fantastic MYA were/are everything went so smoothly and thanks to MYA im the happiest i have ever been. MYA really does make you feel AMAZING so if you're thinking about it, GO FOR IT you wont regret it especially not with MYA! Thanks! Sam xoxo
For the past couple of years I was always contemplating a breast enlargement due to being active and going the gym and my boobs just wasn't looking as good as they were before due to loosing weight.

I Had breast implants with MYA & found the aftercare from day one terrible! there fine until you have a problem & then they don't return your calls. There Aftercare for rupture and capsular contact is ONLY 5 YRS on  breast implants. I found out mine ruptured when I was just  6 years post op..Contacted MYA & after a lot of time and hard work i eventuality got to speak to some one! They was not at all helpful & Told me I would have to pay full price again, I asked to speak with the Manager & was promised a call back that day which never happened! It took me to make a journey to the MYA clinic and demand to speak to someone! They then offered me a supposed discounted price, think they was having a laugh!! I told MYA I Still wasn't happy with this price, and they said they would get back to me, It took a while yet again & I was stressing so much, I had to get these ruptured implants removed asap! So I Had to get my revision surgery booked with another company!  I have now had my implants changed with The Hospital Group, the surgeon who was excellent, said my implants was both very badly ruptured! and must have ruptured a good while ago. Makes me wonder if the surgeon at MYA damaged my implants while putting them in!  I now have 10 years cover against rupture towards all surgical costs, with The Hospital Group & they have done a fantastic job of repairing MYA's Mess! Wished I had of gone with them in the first place!... Girls you don't realise how important aftercare is until you have a problem. I paid a lot of money in the first place with MYA & that's customer loyalty for you! I seemed to be the only one concerned  My breast implants was ruptured & what was the silicone doing to the rest of my body? My advice stay well clear of MYA!!!!! My Surgeon at the hospital group took Photos of my Ruptured implants & as soon as i get copies of them i shall be posting them over the Internet! They are shocking!! Not how you would expect them to look at 6yrs post op!!! Thanks for Nothing MYA.

I had my surgery with MYA 3 months ago everything went smoothly and the staff at the Chelmsford and Fitzroy Clinic are amazing, only downside is I have to wait until September to see my surgeon when I had surgery in April but I get he is busy because his amazing!!! Overall I would recommend MYA to anyone they have changed my life in such a great way and I can't wait to show off my new body this summer,

I initially researched Vaser Liposuction a few years ago but decided not to have it done as i was too scared about having surgery and that overall cost of it. Earlier this year i again started researching it and went for an appointment with a PC at Transform, i found her abrupt and got the feeling she looked down her nose at me which made me feel even worse about myself; however the worse part was she told me i couldn't have Vaser as 'it is only suitable for small areas' which went against all of the months of research i had done. She said she will speak to the surgeon and get back to me, this was early March 2015 and to date i  still haven't received this call back despite leaving several messages. This made me very skeptical about booking another consultation even though it was with a different company but took a leap of faith and contacted MYA.

review_title: Post operative care is not good at all !
review_body: I had my surgery 13 days ago and i have some concerns about my scar , i keep calling them but they never pick up (unless u making  payment!!). When when they do pick up is to tell me that all nurses are busy they will call me bck, i leave my name and number and in case the answering machine picks up i also leave a short message... NEVER got a call back! Im so disappointed with Mya...

my experience with mya nottingham was great, all staff very friendly and couldn't do enough, had a few hiccups with payment fault on there system which was quickly resolved, only bad thing i have to say is the date i had my surgery booked in for became unavailable and i wasn't notified about the date change until i had all my confirmation through via email, needed to work around childcare issues. apart from that the rest went smoothly,

I am ridiculously happy with my breast augmentation results, the only thing I would say for people considering using them is the appointments often run behind and you can be waiting for a good couple of hours for a surgeon or nurse but this is obviously due to them being so busy. Everyone always polite and helpful and my results are better than I ever expected.

had a tummy tuck with MYA 14 weeks ago, and then I went on to have a breast augmentation 3 weeks ago. I found MYA to be very good as a company, aftercare was amazing and my full journey was enjoyable and stress free! I wouldn't highly recommend MYA as a company if your unsure of who to choose!

I had my BA with MYA and they were absolutely fantastic every step of the way. I felt like all my questions were answered honestly and I was well informed on all aspects of the procedure. I am due to have my final 3 month appointment in a couple of weeks, and I am absolutely delighted with the results. I have nothing negative to say about MYA, and I would recommend them to anybody considering any sort of procedure.
The Clifton mya clinic is fantastic, the staff are friendly and helpful. They are always available to contact via telephone during working hours. You feel truly looked after here.

review_title: Most AMAZING experience from start to finish!
review_body: I would recommend anyone who is looking at cosmetic surgery to MYA. From the initial consultation to the very last appointment with the surgeon after the operation has been an amazing journey. The staff at MYA are always so kind and helpful, the PC's & the nurse, the surgeon and also the girls on the reception. Anna the receptionist always goes out of her way to make sure you feel welcomed and can't do enough for you. My results are incredible and I am so happy with the breast augmentation. I have recommended MYA to all my family and friends. Thankyou for such an amazing journey.

I had breast augmentation over 2 years ago and after 4 years of deciding who to go with I stubbled across MYA and i'm glad I did! They were so helpful at the clinic (Leeds) and kept in regular touch with me regarding any concerns etc I had. On my first op date there was confusion as I have a latex allergy and the room wasn't prepped for that so It meant having to change the date. But MYA helped me throughout and ensured I got the best service. Defo would recommend MYA and will be using them again for sure in the future! Excellent company xxx

My experience with MYA was amazing from beginning to end they really do look after you and I will be returning for some more surgery 100% incredible results and fantastic people all so friendly and I'd say MYA is the best cosmetic surgery company there is !!!! Loved every minute of it I would highly recommend this to anyone who's looking for surgery in the near future

review_title: Lost all faith after revision surgery,great nurses and surgeon-appalling/non exsistant aftercare.
review_body: After posting a great review after my inital surgery almost 2 years ago now I feel it would be fair to update my review after the awful experience I have  had since my revision surgery recently.

Absolutely in love with my results, I've wanted my boobs done for a few years, when I finally had the cash together I went for a consultation with Mya after my first appointment I new this was the place for me, they was so friendly and helpful on everything. I booked in for surgery pretty much straight away, I had a consultation with Dr marcellino where we discussed size etc, 2 weeks later I was in London ready for surgery! I was petrified to the point where I was almost ready to come home, the nurse convinced me I'd be gutted if I left so I convinced myself to go ahead, I woke up so excited to see the results it was amazing I had boobs!! If anyone is wanting the procedure I would say 110% go for it! Mya gave me the best expirience with amazing results!!! Thankyou sooooo much x

review_title: The best there is!  Leona x
review_body: Had breast enlargement surgery in November 2014. I was seen at the Bristol clinic and my PC was Krystina Adams. Immediately she made me feel comfortable choosing MYA for my surgery, and made me informed of the whole process of the surgery including risks and complications. Couldn't fault her at all, she was amazing and was there for me to text, or call with any questions, at anytime through out my journey!

From the consultation to the follow up appointments I cannot fault MYA at all! Made me feel completely confortable! Everyone who works here is professional and friendly. Having a BA with MYA was one if the best decisions I've ever made! Went from a 32AA to a 32DD :)
Just wanted to say that my whole MYA experience has been great.

My whole experience has been amazing! There has been some with me to help and support me throughout my whole journey! The result of my vaser lipo has given me so much more confidence. I would 100% recommend MYA.

review_title: Breast enlargement- happiest I've ever been x
review_body: I had my surgery on the 24th may. I had my bandage off yesterday and the result is unbelievably amazing! The scars are not bad at all and I am in love with my new boobs. I went from a 32 B to inbetween a D and DD, I feel so much better in myself already and cannot wait to go bra shopping. I had Dr Frati as my surgeon and he is definetly a boob god! And my patient coordinator was Emma and she was so helpful and is the loveliest girl I've ever met, she really made me confident in my consultation and we got close so quickly! I recommend MYA 100% and wish I could do it all again! X

Never ever in your life even think about using MYA. This is the worst decision I have ever made. What a waste of money I went through all the pain to come out looking the same and the staff are from another planet they haven't got a clue if they are coming or going they just lie to you so you can go away and clearly MYA don't care otherwise they would try and resolve the issues once they have your money they will just ignore you I now have to spend �5000 again to get my Lipo done properly I think they should be shut down so they can stop robbing people. Worst company ever.

All my life I was embarrassed to wear what I wanted because I had no boobs! Being young it was a constant competition with my friends about boobs I would always get the triple gel bras to make myself look like I had something there. I wore these for 6 years! I put some weight on inbetween where my boobs did grow but not for the right reason. I lost the weight got myself a full time job and thought this is my chance. I had been for a consultation before but was not in the right financial situation. So in January I went for my consultation with Julie and she was lovely made me feel so comfortable when my family didn't want me to have the procedure. The hospital was average everyone was a bit slow getting round to the operation. I was a nervous wreck when I got there being sick all the way from getting up till I went into theatre. I had left the hospital by about 5 so wasn't in too long. I was sore for the next few days but couldn't stop looking at them it still didn't feel real. I had a lot of shooting pains and as soon as I rang mya they had me in with the nurse to make sure everything was ok and it always was. Now 4 month down the line and I still can't stop looking at them, I'm like a different person honestly it's the best thing I've ever done and I recommend mya to everyone looking to get a breast enlargement! Absolutely amazing!!!

Everything about the experience was brilliant from start to finish!!! I'm so happy with my new boobs and feel so confident now and I can honestly say I'd rather have a breast augmentation then a teeth pulled out it was that painless!!!great work mya!!!

I had the best experience with MYA! I have always been self concious about the way I look regarding my boobs, but as soon as I came to see Kimberley Howarth at Nottingham she was absolutley amazing, she made me feel at ease, did not pressure me into anything and also explained the procedure in steps to help me get an understanding of what would take place throughout my MYA journey. She was honest throughout the consultation, explaining the pros and cons of the surgery.  Money is also not a huge problem, as I also got reassured about this as their are many different routes I could of taken to ensure I was able to afford them surgery. The experience within Nottingham MYA was great, all of the staff, from the nurses to the admin team were all really friendly.  On the day of my surgery with Mr Kazzai went really well.  The nurses, staff and Mr Kazzai himself were all great in making me feel comfortable and at ease, also when I went into theatre the staff reassured my mum as she was more nervous than I was.  The aftercare from the team at the Natural Look Clinic was great.  My overall experience with MYA could not of ran more smoothly, from my inital consulation to the after care it was 10/10 for me.  MYA changed my life and made me feel more confident.  I would highly recommend this company to anybody for cosmetic procedures. xxx

waiting room was cheap, everyone in it looked cheap, the entire consultation experience consisted of "OMG ur gonna look great babe" without any real understanding of the risks, next steps, or anything other than "you'll look amazing"  very transparent and cheap.  I'm sure the surgeons might be different but the whole experience felt hurried and cheap, never have I encountered so many bimbos in my entire life.  I asked an intelligent question that other clinics have been able to answer easily, 3 times, and didn't receive a response until I moaned, then I was told "sorry you don't feel like you've had the contact you needed"....I wasn't being needy, and being ignored via email is factual, I didn't perceive it!

Mya did my boobs 3 years ago, I'm still waiting for them to correct the terrible state I've been left in, by DR RU--O ( don't think I can name) he was struck off during my complications, my breasts got infected resulting in having one of the implants removed until the infection cleared up and I'm now going through hell trying  to get this corrected, most of the time mya doesn't even reply to my emails, if they do it's just "we'll look into this and let you know " I've tried to go to solicitor but they say the way mya have left it there's nothing I can do because they are saying they are waiting for a response from Dr Ru--O and they are not refusing to correct but need a reply from ru--o. However I was a patient of mya not Dr ru--o and think they should at least correct the problem? The scarring is horrendous. If a solicitor reads this and has a solution  please contact me. I'm depressed and need this sorted and would advise anyone using mya to rethink ??? If there is a problem this is possibly how you will be treated.

I had breast enlargement with MYA on the 13th may 2015 and I must say they have been amazing!! From beginning till now they have been fantastic, so supportive and there whenever I need to speak or had any concerns leading up to my surgery. Surgery when very smoothly and I must say my doctor was the best in my opinion, he has done an excellent job on my breasts and I'm so pleased to have had him to do my procedure. I would definitely recommend MYA to anyone who is thinking about cosmetic surgery they have truly made me so much confident and I will be going back again for my next procedure which is a rhinoplasty.

MYA have changed my life! Couldn't be more happy! I had a BA in January 2015 and it has made me so much more confident in my body. All the staff at the Nottingham clinic have been amazing and I would highly recommended MYA to everybody. Because of MYA I now have the confidence to go out and wear the things I've always wanted to wear. I am now in a relationship and this is because I now have the confidence and am a lot happier within myself. Dr Kazzizi performed my surgery and it was a breeze, He is a boob God! I would happily go through the whole journey again. MYA have the most amazing after care, I always have a number to ring in case I am feeling worried about something and I know it will always be answered.

I went from having a 30a chest to a 30DD from having 250overs. I have never been so confident! They look natural, feel natural and it's the best thing I've ever done! I was nervous for the procedure but once I seen my surgeon I knew I was in safe hands. I <3 MYA! xXx
Can't thank MYA enough for changing my life.

My experience with MYA was brilliant. I had a breast augmentation back in November at the Fitzroy client. My surgeon was Dr Marcellino he was brilliant from start to finish. He was very honest with me on my consultation. Made me feel very relaxed and confident in him.   I was quite sick when I was coming round from the surgery but  Mr Marcellini came and saw me to make sure I was okay after my surgery. Which is quit unheard of. I highly recommend him.

Had beast uplift and implants (350cc in left and 300cc in right) I'm almost two weeks post op and could not be more happy with my results! :-) I went to MYA in nottingham as I am nottingham based and would reccomend anyone to go there the staff (Kimberley, Jade and Sophiea) are really friendly and are happy to speak to you about your journey post op and pre op! I had my op at first trust hospital Preston and so happy I chose this one as the nurses was so helpful and kind nothing was too much trouble couldn't of asked for better after care.. Thank you to my surgeon for my amazing results ( Dr Moniour) who was really honest about my expectations and how may the out come be post op! Fantastic job and wouldn't change anything! I now have in my eyes perfect boobies so thank you very much :-) :-) :-)
Had a breast augmentation through MYA & can say it was the best thing I've ever done . The staff were fantastic , the surgeon was honest & easy to talk too & the aftercare was Brilliant !!!!!
Wasted �6000 for liposuction not a slight bit of difference! It was clear that nothing was ever going to done to put this disaster right! I'm amazed that I have been sent an email for my opinion!!!

I had a Beast Augmentation with Dr Frati in April 2014, so ive just celebrated their one year birthday! I can honestly say its thebest thing i have ever done, my confidence is sky high ! I attended the manchester clinic and the girls there were amazing, so helpful and welcoming. My surgeon was brilliant, i was advised before my operation of all the possible risks and details of the operation so i was 100% comfortable as to what i could expect ! I had a little discomfort afterwards but nothing major and any queries i had the clinic nurse was happy to answer. Over all i am over the moon with my new boobs and mya and would reccomend them to anyone !!:) t ( im even considering Vaser Liposuction for next year with Dr Frati .. His before and afters are amazing !!)

I went in for a breast re-aug 2012 and was told by the pc that they're silicone implants were guaranteed not to ripple!! I was also told by the surgeon that rippling or sagging would happen later on nearer the time to replacing them but not immediately. The strapping came off and there were big ripples all over the breasts, i complained to the surgeon and was told to put weight on take vitamin e tablets and go home and pray! months went by of me constantly trying to get an appointment, talk over issues etc but the staff were extremely rude putting the phone down on me not replying to emails and not calling me back. after a few more months of waiting, the rippling got worse and both breasts were uneven i could no longer get through to MYA so i had to ring several other MYA clinics to talk to someone, I live in London and should have been talking to someone in London instead I found myself ringing cardiff birmingham and wherever else I could. I told my surgeon i was a runner and did not want the boobs to affect my active lifestyle he assured me I would be able to get back to the gym within a few weeks but I was never able to, i was in constant pain and could hardly walk without pain, i continued to complain to MYA about my concerns and was always fobbed off. About 10 months ago I started getting pains in my shoulder, it progressed so much that I am now on muscle relaxants. My physiotherapist said it was due to the heavy implants that my posture had changed causing spasms in my shoulder blade. I initially asked for higher rounder fuller breasts and was given 700cc, I had no idea about sizes silicone etc, but the surgeon did. I now have two big dents in both breasts and am sure I am bottoming out, i saw the revision surgeon who confirmed this but my own surgeon said I am not bottoming out and its extra skin and that i need smaller implants and an uplift! As a surgeon I would have thought he would have recognised that the skin was sagging beforehand and that I would have needed an uplift as well as implants but instead he put big implants in me in hope that this would mask the problem. Now, I don't know if i'm bottoming out or if I need an uplift as both surgeons I have seen gave contradicting advice!! I am currently being told to wait, again, for a decision from head office on what the next step is, my options are go implant free for 6 months, have smaller implants wait 6 months with sagging skin and then have an uplift....number one my aftercare period will be finished by then and i would have to pay, number two i do not want smaller implants as small as he is offering to save his own skin, and number three i do not want two operations! if other people can have an uplift and implants done in one op why can't i? its all to do with the aftercare period...all this time they were telling me to wait to see how the breasts develop or that nothing was wrong was just their way of fobbing me off so that the aftercare period finishes and any other procedure i would need, i would have to pay again. I am totally disgusted, i have never had aftercare at all, i was even told that i could not have my pc's contact number and was rudely spoken to by most of the staff at MYA whenever i complained. I waited 6 months or more for an appointment with the revision surgeon and have been treated unfairly by everyone at MYA, I now have less confidence than before, I do not undress infront of my partner, I do not go out, I do not wear revealing clothes, I am embarrassed by my boobs because of the dents in them, i have to constantly re adjust them as one is bigger than the other and higher than the other and i get horrible comments from total strangers! all i wanted was a boob job for my own reasons this has been one big nightmare the staff are disgusting, the surgeons are liars and the company just want your money. i have asked for my aftercare to be reinstated as i have never received any from the start and also requested one op implant size of my own choice and for all of it to be free of charge as i have already paid for something that has made me unhappier than before. the aftercare is supposed to cover the initial look and i hate the way they are so why shouldn't it be free? if i had been told i need an uplift in the beginning i would have been happy to pay but i do not have the money and i will not put myself in debt to put right what the surgeon has done wrong, they have fobbed me off by saying that my skin quality is poor, well as a surgeon whose been doing this for years, shouldn't you have seen this and advised me about it? whether its sagging skin or bottoming out, too big implants or too small etc, it should be fixed without question as this is what we pay for! calls emails queries complaints worries nursing issues etc are all part of aftercare and i have not had any! i have every email i have sent and made a note of all calls etc so if they think they can tell me i have had aftercare they are wrong!! i would never recommend MYA to anyone, they do not care about you after you hand the money over and whatever problems you have they laugh...literally. they fob you off and tell you they were busy with calls etc but after sitting and listening to the staff gossip about patients etc while the phones are ringing i do not believe they do their job properly, if talking about what you're having for lunch to someone on the phone whilst other patients are trying to get through is deemed as professional then i am shocked!! i wish i never chose MYA and i would warn everyone else against going there for any procedure.

review_title: Couldnt of asked for a better company!
review_body: I had a breast enlargement at MYA in November 2015, I cannot praise the company enough I am so happy with the outcome of my new boobs, I also could not fault any of the staff at MYA every single member of staff that I spoke to were absolutely lovely! My patient co coordinator Kate was absolutely brilliant was always on the end of the phone if I needed any questions answered, I haven't had any problems at all with my boobs and they have healed really well I couldn't thank MR Frati and the staff at MYA enough and would return in the future if I decide to have any further surgery.

review_title: If you're unlucky enough to have problems then you're on your own! Don't be fooled
review_body: I chose this company for a breast augmentation because I believed they were the best company for the job but oh how wrong I was! I met with my PC who told me my experience would be 'AMAZING!' I heard that so many times it was almost brainwashed into me. I had also spoken to some of the girls on the forum and asked about their stories, I know every company has good and bad however this company only ever seemed to have good reviews, I later discovered that's because they delete any bad feedback and also the users accounts if they speak out about a bad experience they have with mya instead of mya rectifying their customers awful results and very sad situations. If I had known then what I know now I would have chosen differently as I would have been fully informed.

review_title: Had a boob job and had them removed it's a no go people
review_body: My honest experience I will be totally honest! Had implants 300cc sept 2014 was told they could cut my implants in half and they wouldn't leak ect ect found out after my implants from the paper work I did not get those implants. Putting that side I was so ill and my hair was falling out. MYA advised me my fatigue, shaking, memory loss, vision loss and balance as not due to the implants and I had a thyroid problem, I went to my doctors one of many many times during this horrible time if my life to be told after blood tests I did not have a thyroid problem so I ring mya and told them I did not. They then told me I had heart problems and it wasn't the implants so I went to docs and had an ECG to check my heart and that also came back clear, I went to get my eyes tested and got told I needed glasses fjr the first time in my life. In the end my doctor demanded mya take my implants out after 4 months of suffering, they listened to my doctor but not me, I had been asking for them out for 4 months prior to the doctors orders. Anyway 3 days later they was out and my illnesses have gone and after an eye site test magically I no longer need glasses coincidence?! I don't think so. Anyway after removal I asked for my implants as they are my property, I was told it's against the dept of health law that I receive my implants. I thought this was weird so I emailed the dept of health and got the reply that my implants are my property and I am entitled to them. This lead me to believe my implants may have been ruptured hense why I was so poorly. I complained to mya who sent me a reply basically suing I'm strange for asking for my implants in the 1st place but with no apologies for what has happened or nothing to compensate all the travelling I had to do when I was poorly demanding them to listen to me. I'm now left with a 4000 bill and scars. Please if you are considering this you need to really think if your health and your body is perfect as it is trust me I know. And please do not use mya at all. This is only my story in a nut shell there is so much more to it I'm currently writing to mags and papers about them I feel betrayed and dumped

I decided on MYA for my BA, I booked myself in for a consultation and booked the procedure for exactly a month from then! I saw my surgeon years ago and knew i had trust in him and with MYA, I booked up before seeing the surgeon!

i started at Leeds and saw Louisa, she was brill and I met the surgeon Mr Kazzazi he was fab and honest with me about everything. On the day of the surgery I was told to be at Doncaster for 830 which was fine and was in the operating theatre for 920 and out for 11 ish. The whole experience was amazing the nurses knew my name as soon as I arrived they took me to my own room and couldn't of looked after me better. I would highly recommend all of them 100% . I went local anaesthetic which I was a bit scared of but don't remember anything. When I came round I was wheeled back to my room for tea and toast and asked for more and the nurse dos that for me . I have had phone calls checking. I was ok before and after the operation and feel I have been well looked after .
Mya really have changed my life for the best.

After a consultation with a surgeon at another cosmetic surgery company, I booked an appointment with MYA. The whole process was a lot more relaxed and I didn't feel pressured by them whatsoever. I had my first consultation in February and didn't book until July when I was ready and they didn't hassle or pressure me throughout this time. The staff are very friendly, I felt like a genuinely cared for patient rather than just another number on their records to make them money (which is how I felt when I visited the other company). I had consultations with 2 surgeons at MYA and I picked Mr Mounir, I felt comfortable with him performing my surgery knowing how thorough and meticulous he is. The results have completely changed my life for the better! I've got the results that I wanted and other people have noticed the huge confidence boost more than anything :)
I worked so hard to get my body in good shape post pregnancy but no matter how much I exercised, I was never going to get the fullness back in my bust. I decided to get an BA.

My journey with MYA was so simple from start to finish, after my first consultation with my pc I knew this was exactly what I wanted, im 14weeks post op and I am so so happy with the results, they are in proportion and so natural just what I asked for, the first trust at preston, the staff there and at the mya manchester clinic and dr traynor are all so friendly and welcoming, professional and understanding, all done in under an hour from being put to asleep to waking up, which amazed me. I was checked up on every 15-30 mins after waking up.

review_title: Overall pleased few areas need to be improved with the care results fantastic
review_body: I will start this review with my results being absolutely fantastic so the surgeon I give 5 stars too I had a combined procedure re aug and vaser to hips and flanks with Mr Fratti in the Fitzroy hospital 2 weeks ago.

I would reccomend MYA to absolutely anyone. I'm so glad I had my procedure done with them and will go with them if I ever wanted another procedure. You feel like you're in safe hands from the initial consultation, to the hospital, to home. The after care is brilliant and there's always someone to talk to if you have any concerns or questions. No other company would appeal to me now as MYA are friendly, professional, they truely care and I felt I had the best service possible. Changed my life and I would do it all again.

MYA has changed my life with the great work of my PC and my surgeon.. both were always keen to answer any questions i had and my surgeon did brilliantly with me changing my mind a bit on size etc. He also advised me on sizes and what would be best for me instead of just letting me get on with things and probably going wild. Even 3 years later when i had some concern and both my PC and surgeon had left, they quickly found me someone else to talk to and were even happy to arrange a meeting with my old surgeon. Everything turned out fine too, was concerns about nothing!
I have had a tummy tuck and a breast enlargement, and I am so pleased with the results I couldn't be more happy!

Amazing experience from start to finish. Very professional, have recommended MYA to several friends and family. Can't thank my surgeon enough, this procedure was life changing. I brought breast, got breast and bags of confidence!!

review_title: 1 year on and couldn't be happier
review_body: So happy I made the decision to go with mya .. From meeting Julie at the Newcastle office to my surgeon dr traynor I always felt like I had made the best choice .. Everyone at the clinic in Preston were great too :) .. Thank you Mya xxxx

I had my surgery with Dr kazzazi on 10/4/15 I had a BA and had 350cc HP unders to take me from a 34B to 34D/DD currently I am 3 weeks post op and fit in a 34DD at the minute. I could not ask for anything more than I received all the staff at Leeds clinic and the natural look clinic was great! Also after I had problems with an incision bleeding and was seen to straight away by my nurse and she also rang me regular to see how I was getting on so the aftercare I have received has also been great! I wouldn't change this day, the best thing I've ever done!

I researched my surgeons rather than companies when i decided i was going to go through with having a breast augmentation, i found nothing but fantastic reviews on dr kazzazi and dr frati who were both at MYA, so i booked in for a consultation. My patient co-ordinator was Kimberley at Nottingham and she was fantastic at informing me on all the information i needed and wasn't pushy, i booked my surgery date at my first consultation with Dr Kazzazi after my PC sat and went through both surgeons with me, i decided Dr Kazzazi would be best for me.
I would recommend MYA to everyone thinking of getting surgical procedures. They made my experience so relaxed & enjoyable. I will definitely be going back to them in the future.

I gave MYA 5 stars for the care I received throughout my treatment. A year ago I had vaser lipo on my flanks and outer thighs and was pretty happy with the result. On my 6 month post-op, I discussed with Dr Traynor (AMAZING) that I still felt more could've been taken out. We came up with a plan together and he was very willing to help sort this problem out for me. He was very honest throughout the procedure and I have another meeting 12 months post op to see how I am feeling about the results. Brilliant service. My nurses appointments were chopped and changed a bit however I was seen more often due to missing certain specific days (3 day post op, became 5 day) but I saw them regularly over the first two weeks. Although the procedures are a lot money (they are competitively priced) I would definitely recommend MYA from my overall service. The twitter service regularly keep in contact with me and when I tweeted that I'd fallen at the beginning and hurt myself, they took the time out to get in contact, ensuring that I was ok and could anything be done if it wasn't. In addition on the day I was nervous about the anaesthetic but the anaesthetist that came round was very reassuring, took the time out to to discuss my feelings and made sure I was calmed before going in - definitely not a rushed service. Dr Traynor himself had music playing from an iPod as I went in to calm me again! After the operation my mum was panicking that my blood sugars were low but the girls were very quick to help, one even giving me some of her lunch to ensure that I was fine! Although some reviews suggest MYA is all about breast augmentation, I appreciate this is their main operation but I definitely didn't feel second best because I was having a different op. Thank you to the girls at the Manchester MYA clinic, Amy and definitely Dr Traynor!

I recently just had my breasts done with MYA at the London Fitzoy clinic and I really couldn't be happier! As a young person Of only 18 it's quite a scary procedure to go through, but I was made feel so comfortable and at ease through out. All my questions were answered very clearly and the staff were always happy to answer any of my queries however silly they sounded. Before deciding to go with MYA I shoped around elsewhere just to see where I felt most comfortable and even though I I was quoted a bit cheaper elsewhere but I just loved how mya made me feel compared to the other places that where unprofessional and pushy! I knew after that that I would go with MYA and I booked my surgery for a month and a half later in between that time I had a consultation with my surgeon Dr Frati who was highly recommended by many people he isn't the most talkative but he really knows what he's doing, after my consultation with him I met my nurse two weeks later who was lovely and talked me through the process and took pictures for my profile. On the day of my surgeryI met my nurse for the day who was AMAZING her name was Summa and was always checking up on me and she was so lovely and talkative and was always in a great mood which is what you need nothing worse than miserable people. Then I met my anaesthetist who really put me at ease bAring in mind ive never been put to sleep he made me feel in safe hands and was having a real good laugh with me before I went in! And then off course I met Dr Frati again just to go over my chosen size etc. After the surgery I was recovering in my room which was so clean and lovely with a TV!! Then I was given my medication and aloud to go home! I didn't actually want to go I was so comfy there haha! Overall my experience was great and I loved it and if I ever want to get anything done again I will without a doubt pick MYA the premises is gorgeous and super clean and gives such a warm feeling and the staff are so lovely! Can't wait to go back tomorrow to get my bandages off and get checked I know they are going to look great! Go with MYA you won't regret it :)

i have had a breast lift and implants with mya clinic in birmingham and have been left with horrific scarring and i paid �6000 which i had to get a loan for and have been left with saggy breasts and half a cup size bigger than i was before i have tried numerous times to get in contact with them but they're very good at avoiding your calls so at the end of it all I have paid a ridiculous amount of money to have boobs that pretty much look the same as before but with ridiculous scarring i cannot even let my husband see them now and the whole point is to make yourself feel better so i've got to go and try and find someone that can fix this if it even possible! so my advise to anyone going through mya clinic DON'T!!! as you will soon find out after you have handed your money over they have no interest in you or your health after i went to all my follow up appointments and pointed out to the nurse about my scars and she couldn't care less just got told to give it time and now i'm left with a absolute mess!! i am now seeking legal advice i think it is absolutely disgusting that they can leave people in these states

review_title: Great experience, best thing I have ever done thank you Mya! :)
review_body: From the first consultation with the patient care co-ordinatior Amanda to appointment with the surgeon Dr Singh and seeing the nurse to the operation itself down at Mya Fitzroy everyone has been amazing and so reassuring through out. Lovely people who genuinely care about what you want and how to get there would recommend Mya to anyone. Best thing I have ever done, brilliant surgeon really knows what is right for u and wants the best for u, listens to what u want to achieve. so glad I took the step and have done it! :) best decision I have ever made for myself. Again thank u so much to everyone at Mya!! x x x x

I have lost a lot of weight and despite all my best efforts at the gym I could not loose my saggy stomach after much deliberation I decided to undergo a tummy tuck and liposuction. I attended MYA and spoke to the genius himself Mr Traynor who talked me through the whole procedure the risks involved and the recovery process and timescale for recovery, he answered all my questions honestly and advised me of the realistic results.

review_title: Great company. Glad I went with MYA.
review_body: Had an amazing experience with MYA from start to finish. Consultation with my coordinator and surgeon was very helpful and made me very excited. I'm very happy with my results and it's the best decision i have ever made.
My experience with Mya has been fantastic.
I could not have had a better experience with MYA.
I don't have a bad word to say about my experience with MYA. Dr.Singh has given me so much confidence, I couldn't be happier A!

I went with mya because of all the great reviews they had and im glad i did because they was amazing my pc was emma and shes been great keeping in touch and making sure im ok my surgeon was dr frati absolutely amazing im soo pleased with my results would definately recommend this company 100% nurses and staff so lovely if i were to do it all again i would one very happy girl!

Everything from the initial consultation, to the operation, to post op check ups all exceeded my expectations. All the staff and Dr kazazzi were welcoming, reassuring and really made me feel like I was in good hands throughout. I am over the moon with the results and cannot praise mya enough. All of my questions and concerns were acknowledged and answered honestly and I would highly recommend mya :)

I had heard so many good things about Mya and after a lot of research I decided to book a consultation. The initial consultaton went well and I was really excited, I then spoke to the surgeon that would be doing the surgery, and thats where is went wrong. The surgeon didnt even know how to use the camera firstly, i was thinking hmm im going to let him cut my face open. He then told me i didnt have a clue and there was nothing wrong with my nose (even though it was broken as a child and has a big lump on it AND its my face). I was the last appointment and I could tell he was just trying to rush me (he wanted to go home), he then got a piece of paper and wrote down all the things that was wrong with my face and gave it to me and actually said the words "there is nothing wrong with your nose, its the rest of your face that is the issue", (looking at the paper the costs were �20,000) some people may find this hilarious or funny to read, but I was left feeling upset and embarrassed. I have a lot of self esteem issues and this only added to it! I ended up going somewhere else because the way i was treated was disgusting! I would NEVER recommend Mya!!

I am a week post op and so far so good.  Up to the actual operation i was given as much advice as I wanted, the forum was really helpful and Mr Mounir certainly made me feel settled and calm about everything.  My consultant Lizzie was really helpful, she always replied to any questions i had and kept in touch the day before and a couple days after the op to check i was ok.

After years of feeling unhappy about my figure I decided to do something about it! I contacted a few company's but there was only Mya that got back to me. From the first initial phone call everyone has been amazing and so friendly and completely understanding about how I feel. I had my VaserLipo a week and a half ago and I'm just waiting for my results to start forming. 2 days after the proceedure I got to see my results and was over the moon with how I looked, I'm now waiting for the swelling to go down. After reading some of the comments below ref vaser I did panic about my end result but I am confident with the after care I have received up to press that these are unfortunate experiences and look forward to the swelling going down.  I can't thank lizzy, Dr vlok and the wonderful nurses that have looked after me up to now :) xx

I received a BA in 2013 and 4months later i had minor complications due to my skin sagging and the implant flipping. My consultant Louisa was very supportive and ensured me that it will be fixed as soon as head office gave it the get go. Due to the surgeon leaving the clinic and dates clashing with myself it did take a little longer than expected to have the re-op. I was eventually given a reasonable date, and after being given numerous appointments with the surgeon and other team members we then came to a conclusion of what needed to be done to get the perfect outcome. I am now 2wk post op of my second augmentation and I am happy with how they look and the continuous support from Jenny the Nurse and after care I've received from Mya as a whole. I would recommend Mya to anybody.

review_title: Unrivalled, Professional, Dedicated, Caring and Expert!!!!
review_body: I didnt take surgery lightly and after 6 months of research with 5 different organisations I felt completely compelled to let others know how Mya stood out over and above all the others and write this review!! From the moment I walked in the office through to checking out of the hospital, the attention given to my thoughts, feeling and needs was 100% from every single individual I came in contact with. Mya take the time to get to know you as an person and not simply a 'money making means on a conveyor belt' as I experienced with many other companies. With Mya, no pressure was exerted on me and I received full information, support and guidance at all times. All of the staff I became involved with genuinely care about their patients and their only aim is to give the best experience and results possible. Mya have a dedicated, proffesional, expert team who exude warmth, sincerity and always have full focus on you as a patient. I am overjoyed at the results of my surgery and found the whole experience made easy with Mya. Exceptional company exceptional people at all levels!!!!

I had breast enhancement surgery 2 years ago by Mr Kazzazi and am still over the moon by the results the staff and nurses  in the Leeds clinic especially Louisa made me feel at ease from start to finish and would defiantly use MYA again if I wanted any more surgery .... Brilliant service from a brilliant team

review_title: Best decision I have ever made...
review_body: I am so happy I chose MYA, I had my op yesterday and nothing could have gone smoother. The staff at the first trust hospital in Preston were absolutely amazing and so welcoming, i never once felt uncomfortable. I am so happy I was given Dr Traynor as my surgeon he is amazing, I am already in love with the results and can not wait for them to heal properly. I was expecting to be in loads of pain and had prepared myself for the worst but I am fine just a bit stiff, I was back at home the same day. I had Lauren as my patient co ordinator when I was enquiring about the surgery and she was great, she answered all my questions honestly (and there was 3 pages of them) and she kept in contact throughout all the stages of my surgery even checking I was ok after.

review_title: You asked me to leave this review!!
review_body: Mr Traynor, my wonderful surgeon I would recommend this man 100%!!! No problems whatsoever !!! Now..... The sales staff.....,you asked !! At the beginning 1st appointments were great the girls couldn't do enough for me,calling , reassuring ect! I decided not to upgrade to the more expensive implants due to finances , I did want them but decided after research I was happy with the normal ones. Once I said I wasn't upgrading I hardly heard from

Mya are an amazing company the best out there iv had two operations and both went fuss hassle free and mya were there with me every step of the way and the aftercare is amazing all the girls who work there are so kind and helpful and i would never of had my perfect boobies without MYA .. Xxx

I had been considering a boob job for a while and decided to book a consultation with MYA. I thought the staff were lovely and friendly especially Amy (Newcastle office) there was lots of choice, very informative and very helpful. I was given a choice of 3 surgeons and went with the French guy, he has made my boobs look amazing going from a A to D they look extremely natural and people can't always tell at first glance. The aftercare was great too. Would highly recommend.

Went with MYA for lipo. What a wrong choice that was... I went to a boob factory for something other than boobs, big mistake. MYA are all about the boobs, if you have a boob job with them, then you may get a decent result and experience, if you dont mind being on a boob conveyor belt. But if you want anything other than a boob job, DO NOT go to MYA.

After years of wanting breast implants, at the age of 24 I decided enough was enough and did it! I went from a 34B to a 34D. I don't regret surgery one bit! I love my breast now. I had surgery to make myself feel better about myself. Having surgery is one of the best experiences I've had in my life so far. Mya Liverpool before and after care were fantastic

I had a breast uplift with a small implant a year ago. I can not recommend mya enough, from the first day walking through the door in leeds to having my operation in Preston they gave me the best support and the most amazing results, the girls in Leeds felt like best friends when going for my check ups after my op,

I went with MYA for a breast enlargement , best thing I ever did! Everyone was helpful & friendly & really knew thier stuff !! Having surgery is quite scary but with MYA it was a lot less painful & not a scary as I imagined ! I would recommend them 100%

I can not fault mya in any way shape or form I had my surgery for breast inlargement with dr monior and from start to finish I was looked after only being 19 I was a bit concerned but it was fabulous I will recommend them to anyone and will defiantly will be going there for further surgery

I had my BA with MYA in dec with Dr mounir, from the minute I walked in right till the end of my journey I was supported through every step by everyone, I know I could go back to the Leeds clinic at anytime! All the staff was amazing.. It's the BEST decision I made ever!!, with also the help and support I recieved from my patient co ordinatior Katie and nurse Jenny, they was great! Deffo will be back in the future for other surgerys...
The company is excellent from the reception staff right through to the surgeon , my experience all the way through was a brilliant one and the end result was excellent .
I was very happy with all the staff and the way they treated you, from reception, to consultant, to surgeon. Excellent service, felt very comfortable and I love the end result.

I had a breast augmentation with Dr Frati in December 2012. I fell pregnant straight after & my boobs still look great! Natural & full. I love them. MYA are helpful & there is a lot of support. It's not just a hospital procedure, it's a change of lifestyle. I'm now thinking about having vaser.

I had a breast enlargement, before this my left breast was smaller than my right and the surgeon re assured me they would turn out even but it is still smaller i do love the results but not as much as i could!
Despite staffing issues and an ever changing list of coordinators I cannot fault my surgeon or the hospital!
From my very first consultation all the staff at MYA have been fabulous and extremely friendly and informative. I'm so happy with my procedure and the constant care they have all given me xx

MYA have been amazing so far! I would not fault them! I especially love they have a forum for patients to share there stories and answer any questions you have. The MYA staff are so lovely also! Could not fault them

review_title: Very happy from start to finish
review_body: I have had cosmetic surgery abroad before and I wish I hadn't. This time I wanted to feel that I could be in the hands of a trustworthy company, and I felt completely confident from beginning to end with MYA. They were not pushy, they turned me down on one procedure that they said I didn't need, which I was glad of later, and I am now so happy with the results and was so happy with the aftercare that I would happily recommend them to anyone.
I'm very happy with results. Mya was and is the right choice.

I had my procedure 3 months ago through MYA, i had this done with my sister at the same time. We were recommended by a friend who spoke very highly of them, on our first consultation we were so happy with them as everyone was so friendly and nice we booked our surgery then and there for a couple of weeks later, they were so helpful! The whole process was exciting and everyone we met along the way was so friendly! I would recommend to anyone researching cosmetic surgery! I cant thank them enough!

I had a procedure with MYA last October and I couldn't be happier. The results are amazing and exactly what I wanted, the staff at the Nottingham branch were so friendly and helpful, and Mr Kazzazi and his clinic staff were fantastic on procedure day. MYA seem like they actually care about you unlike some of their competitors, who made me feel like I was on a conveyor belt of patients. I couldn't recommend MYA Nottingham more. Mr Kazzazi is a genius and I will definitely be back again in the future.
I have had two procedures with MYA so far and my experiences have been amazing. i couldnt fault the staff or service at all.

I recently had rhinoplasty at London Fitzroy hospital with MYA. My surgeon was Dc Gonschior and I had my cast removed yesterday. I am literally in love with my nose! My results are completely representative of my whole journey.

I had my consultation on 10 November and couldn't have been happier with how it went. They were informative, friendly and compassionate whilst I cried and explained exactly what was wrong with my breasts and made me feel at ease straight away.

I have been looking at having surgeery for some time. I spoke to another company, prior to Mya and they came across as abrupt, and really not interested. I didnt feel comfortable, so i spoke to some other people one of which had gone through Mya. I booked into the Nottingham branch and saw Kimberley, who was lovely and friendly. I went to Birmingham to see Dr Singh, and the girls there were just as nice and Dr Singh, was very warm, and friendly.  I had my procedure on the 12th December at the Fitzroy, and everything went fine. I had two calls the following day to make sure i was okay, and three other calls in the first week to make sure i was feeling well. I had some blisters, from where the strapping came off, and actually wrote for help on the Mya forum, as i didnt think to bother the nurse in Nottingham, within half an hour of that post, the nurse was on the phone giving me lots of help and advice.  I actually cannot fault them, i have been well looked after, and I love my results.

From the moment I rang up to arrange my consultation I felt so happy with the service I recieved from MYA! I have gone on to have my consultation and then my pre-op assessment which I was 100% happy with so I went ahead with my surgery. Everybody is super friendly, approachable and has a genuine interest in what you are undergoing.

I really enjoyed my experience with Mya, I only have two negatives, first is i had a new patient coordinator half way through the process and she didn't know what type of implants i was having so i presume the wrong ones would of been ordered if i hadn't made sure, and considering i'd paid �500 more for the better implants that wouldn't of been the best. And my patient coordinator also suggested ordering two sizes of implants to come on the day as i was having trouble choosing and when i got there only one size had been ordered so i had to just go with them. And second applying for the loan was unnecessarily hard, as i wanted to pay on two cards, part debit and part credit, which wasn't allowed. And so my mum said she would help me out and pay for it on her card but then couldn't because the loan was in my name, and it was her name on the card, which just caused unnecessary stress. Other than that i enjoyed my experience with Mya, everyone was so nice and very efficient and the hospital i went to on the day was very posh. And i absolutely love my new assets.

MYA are an amazing clinic and I'm so happy I went with them. From the very start everyone I talked to and met were so friendly and helpful! I don't have a bad word to say about them. A choice of amazing surgeons, which you have a consultation with for free. I'm over the moon with my surgery and couldn't have asked for a better experience.

I always knew I wanted my breasts enlarged and wasn't quite sure on where to go. I had a few consultations with different companies but right from the start everyone at MYA made me feel completely at ease and important. I had been to one other company who were late seeing me and just felt completely rushed like they didn't really want me there. My co ordinator Fay was fantastic and talked me through everything step by step, my nurse Natasha was brilliant on all my appointments before and after surgery and my surgeon Mr Singh is a god! Every step of the way everyone was more than happy to help, made me feel at ease and didn't pressure me into anything. Every single member of staff at The Fitzroy looked after me, made me laugh, calmed me down when I was nervous and were very easy to talk to and get along with. The advice I got was brilliant and im over the moon with my boobs! Would 100% recommend them to everyone!

review_title: Thank you Mya for making me look and feel Fabulous!!!!
review_body: The best journey I have taken .... Mya made me feel comfortable right from the start and at no point did I feel worried about my procedure. I felt in safe hands and left everything to my surgeon Dr Singh to decide what he thought best for me and I'm glad i put my trust in him! I have never felt so good about myself and can now look at myself in the mirror and feel happy and confident for the first time in my life :)
I cant recommend Mya enough!

review_title: Fantastic service from all members of staff from start to finish!
review_body: From my initial consultation with Kimberley at the Nottingham clinic, right up until today, the service and the help i have received from all members of MYA staff has been first class.

review_title: Amazing experience with Mya & their team. A cosmetic surgery you Can trust!
review_body: I had Closed Rhinoplasty with Alar base reduction one week ago today. I have never had any type of cosmetic surgery before and found the whole experience wonderful from my first consultation to pre op assessment, surgery and aftercare. The Nottingham clinic team of girls Kimberly, Lauren & Victoria took care of everything and kept in contact throughout. I chose Dr Gonschoir after researching as he is one of the best cosmetic facial surgeons. This is the really important part - When I met the doctor I found him very personable, understanding of what I wanted, realistic and honest. I felt so excited after meeting him that I trusted putting my face in his hands. Surgery was a breeze, we found road parking (pay by meter) within walking distance of the Mya Fitzroy hospital. Shortly after checking in Doctor Gonschior came in to go over everything. The nurses were attentive and friendly. I am one week today post op and have just visited the Nottingham clinic to have my stitches removed. I have one more week before the final reveal to take the splint off but it already looks perfect.

review_title: Friendly professional service from start to finish.
review_body: From day one I was met with friendly professionals who were knowledgeable about the procedure I wanted. I felt happy to progress to meeting my surgeon.  All the way along I was fully informed of everything, ample opportunity to ask questions, and left the consultations feeling informed and confident with the service being provided by mya.  After the procedure there was more than adequate support. The nurse Lauren, was superb and mya contacted me regularly to make sure everything was going ok and if I had any queries.
Mya is based of a lovely polite friendly team, that has a lot of time for their patients and happy to answer any questions that you may have,would recommend to any one thinking about having surgery

I couldn't reccomend MYA enough! My whole journey from start to finish was fault free and enjoyable. Everything was coordinated perfectly and communication was great! I am over the moon with my results and my aftercare is as exceptional as the pre op assessments.

review_title: best service and even better care
review_body: i couldn't praise Mya cosmetic surgery even more. all the before operation meetings wete super friendly and I've been given good and professional advices every time , after care was just as brilliant. I've been checked on few times if im doing okay, all my queries were sorted very quick and solid, best company and i know that I couldn't chose any better

review_title: Over the moon with my experience!
review_body: I am so happy with the whole process with MYA. From the beginning they have been so friendly and helpful, my pc was lovely, always keeping in contact to make sure I was happy with each step. My surgeon, Mr Frati is brilliant, very professional, knows exactly what hes talking about and I am very happy with my results so far. The hospital I went to were great and the nurses also very friendly and welcoming. I wouldnt change anything about the experience I have had with this company. Highly reccommended!!

review_title: The best experience I've had with a company, amazing people too
review_body: I have wanted my boobs sorting out for 15 years, I had severe asymmetrical boobs and it haunted me. I went to the doctors on 3 separate occasions and was told they couldn't do anything. I then decided to go to MYA as a few friends had had procedures with MYA and they couldn't stop raving about how good they were. When I went to see Kimberley for the first time I explained that I wanted to know for sure that I could have surgery due to my past disappointments and she booked me in with Mr Mounir. Mr Mounir made me feel relaxed and comfortable straight away, another big thing for me was that Mr Mounir included my partner throughout the process, asked if he had any questions or concerns and was able to put his mind at rest.

I've wanted my boobs done for 2 years and looked into a lot. Just before turning 20 I went for my first consultation at MYA Nottingham clinic and straight away I knew I wanted to go with them and booked my surgery the day after for 6 weeks time. I had my breast enlargement with Mr Mounir at the first trust hospital and everything went great! 3 weeks post op I got an infection in my scar and developed seroma. I rang the MYA nurse at Nottingham on the Thursday and went to see her that day. Friday she rang me and told me my surgeon wanted to see me as she had shown him the photos of my scar, I went up to see him and immediately he said it was an infection and seroma, he booked me in for the day after to have my implant removed and cleaned. I was devestaed but the nurse and surgeon assured me it was for the best. I can't thank MYA enough for making me feel like a woman and getting my infection sorted within 2 days! The staff at nottigham clinic are all lovely! 100% recommend MYA and if I decide on having any other surgery I'd be going back to them!

review_title: Amazing company! Amazing Staff! Amazing results!
review_body: The title says it all, my experience with MYA has been absolutely amazing from start to finish. I choose Mya due to the relaxed atmosphere and the un-clinical feel I got from the website and the Mya clinic in Nottingham. From start to finish of my breast augmentation I have felt relaxed and in control of my decision, I was made to feel comfortable and confident in getting across what I wanted to achieve. After choosing to have my surgery with Mr Mounir I could not be more happier with my results. He has turned my self confidence from zero to 100% he gave me exactly what I asked for and more. I suffered with terrible stretch marks after having children and he has made what looked terrible look amazing he truly is a fantastic surgeon. The aftercare I have received from MYA is fantastic the staff are very welcoming and friendly and I would certainly recommend them to anyone considering surgery.

review_title: So happy with my Surgeon Consultation for Rhino- So excited to book!!!!
review_body: I've been waiting for so long to to get my nose done but have always been so nervous. I finally had a consultation with the amazing Mr Gonschior who completely calmed my nerves as soon as I understood how easy the recovery is. I've wanted this for so long and finally feel I'm going to achieve my dream and get the perfect nose I've always wanted. The entire process has been so easy- seems too good to be true! Thank you so much Mr Gonschior x

I always wanted the procedure, for as long as I remember. I attended a consultation elsewhere and it was awful, I nearly gave up my dream. I then, by chance found MYA. I was so pleased by how I was treated, I booked in as soon as I could. The procedure went to plan, and the recovery period was as they had told me. I am happy with the results, it has made a big difference to my life and my confidence has improved. I would most definatey use MYA again in the future.

review_title: Incredible customer service and amazing surgeons
review_body: MYA has helped me feel a way I never thought I could feel. Their customer care, patience and kindness has made me feel like a valued member of a tight knit community and their surgeons are second to none. They are understanding in answering all my queries and never made me feel anything other than comfortable during my whole experience with them.

If you are thinking of having cosmetic surgery I would definitely recommend MYA. I had my breast enlargement in February and I have never felt so confident! From my excellent and super friendly patient co-ordinator Louisa at the Leeds clinic to my amazing surgeon Mr Kazzazi the whole MYA journey from start to finish has been a superb experience.

After spending most of my younger years with asymmetric breasts I decided to chose MYA for my Breast Augmentation, and i've never looked back. What makes MYA stand out from the crowd is their exceptional expertise, care and understanding. My patient co-ordinator was there every step of the way to clear up any concerns I had and support me in this life changing decision. I can't even begin to describe what a remarkable impact MYA has had on my life! I feel so much more confident in my own skin. I can go to the beach and happily be seen in my underwear without feeling embarrassed about my body. There is no way I would go with anyone else for cosmetic surgery!

review_title: Really is amazing, staff are so kind, so professional and the results are incredible!
review_body: MYA is such an amazing cosmetic surgery company to go with, they made me feel at ease about the whole thing and we're extremely friendly throughout, always there to ask questions and help you with anything that you need! Surgery and aftercare was fantastic and I love my results! I went from a 32A- 32G and the surgeon picked exactly what was right and would suit my body! I would never go with anyone else, they are such a fantastic company! Thankyou for everything MYA! Xx

review_title: Since my neck procedure Im the first infront of the camera after being camera shy for years !
review_body: I love my new neck, after having a horrible double chin for years, I had lazer lipo and now have a brilliant jaw line !!! The staff at the Newcastle Clinic were fantastic and I would definitely recommend MYA to anybody thinking of having a cosmetic procedure done.
I felt so comfortable and confident in MYA they were so helpful and professional. I am still in touch with them 3 years on after my surgery:) x

review_title: Amazing! Trustworthy, friendly and just truelly amazing!
review_body: I went throught mya for my surgery as they had the amazing surgeon who i had researched and heard so many good reviews about. After mixed reviews i went with my heart and chose mya as my consultant. My consultant Amy was amazing! She done everything to make me feel confortable and booked me in as soon as she could.
