She was always available for any little question, problem or worry i had. I would text her and she would reassure me right away. First trust hospital was great too. I would reccommend mya 100%!!! Thankyou for the best, at ease life changing experience!

If I had to fault anything it would be the emphasis they place on your patient coordinator, she was impossible to get hold of and not much use really. However the clinic coordinators/receptionists were in touch constantly checking on me. The surgeon was amazing, and the staff at the Natural Look Clinic went above and beyond to put me at ease before and after the op.
I'm only a week post op, after having my BA on October 1st but my experience was fab!

review_title: Made me look/feel the woman i always wanted to be :)
review_body: I had BA with MYA about 4 years ago, my surgeon was Dr Singh and I couldn't thank them enough, I got an instant confidence boost and the whole journey from consultation through to aftercare was spot on, a couple years later (as you do) I wanted them slightly fuller and bigger and without doubt I went back to MYA with the same surgeon and even though I didn't think it was possible to be any happier...I was :) I absolutely love them and MYA and I have and would recommend MYA to anyone xxx

After having vasor lipo with grant hamlet in manchester in November last year I was left with a haematoma above my belly button.which at my 3 month post op appointment with him he said to come back if it didn't disperse with massage which I did.it hasn't gone and sticks out when I lay on my back.i have made numerous texts to one of the staff who initially saw me on my very first appointment in liverpool to speak about the surgery.she told me to write to mya regarding me being seen and I have not had any reply what so ever.i would not recommend mya to anyone .all those thousands of pounds to be left with a big lump on my stomach.

review_title: I had a breast uplift and implants with Dr Falladar and I'm not happy at all with what he picked for me :((
review_body: Since my operation I've been under a lot of deprecion. He gave me the wrong size inpalnt and left very ugly scars  I even had a second operation for the damage that he did on the first one and it was a scar revision. The scars are still the same and the areolas have a very uneven shape to them, one is lower than the other and one is bigger that the other too.  it's been a very bad experience. I wish that  Mya would take me seriously and have my problem fixed with a different surgeon:((

review_title: Good for boobs not for lipo
review_body: Excellent service when seeking advice/ prices etc but not so interested after.

I wanted breast augmentation for around 2 years but I knew it was a big thing and had to be right!! After studying clinics for a while I found my self keep going back to the mya website. Reading patients story's, looking at pictures Ect Ect. They seemed perfect. So I booked in for a consultation. First one went really well, they make you feel so comfortable, Kim the clinic manager, she was just amazing! So then I went back and thought on it again for a few months, still going on mya'a website probably every week!! After discussing it with my partner, we decided I should just go for it!! So I did, with out hesitation I booked in for my meeting with the amazing dr mounir!! And my pre op all on the same day. I couldn't recommend dr mounir enough, he was just fantastic, he has got all the time in the world for you, he goes into every last detail with you so you have all the information you need and are at full understanding on what will happen. I then paid in full for my op and went for the soonest date they had...3 weeks away, I'd prepared my self for a very long time so wasn't nervous at all, until I got to the hospital in Preston, nerves kicked in!! All the nurses was caring and couldn't do enough for you, then dr mounir came into the room and went through every thing again, still making sure I'm happy with every thing, which of course I was!! The anaesthetist explained what he was to do, also made me feel at ease. Then it was time to go in, they took me into theatre, put the needle into my hand and the anaesthetic, the nurse and anaesthetist was having general conversation with me about my kids and the next thing I know, I woke up with breast!! Everything was over and done with in a flash, I was dis charged in no time, the nurses checked my blood pressure a few times. Gave me pain relief all my paper work and off I went. Since then Iv had phone calls to see if every things ok, after care is brilliant, I have my post op in a few days!! I feel great!! Not much pain either, just limited to what I can do. Over all 5* rating I would recommend mya to any one considering cosmetic surgery!!

review_title: Loved every part of my experience!
review_body: I came to MYA to get my nose and my boobs done! From start to finish they looked after me! Patient bookings were so helpful when I phoned to book my consultation, my patient coordinator was great, my surgeon was amazing and the nursing staff and hospital staff made me feel so comfortable and looked after! I'm so happy with my results and would recommend MYA to anyone considering cosmetic surgery xx

I went with MYA because of positive reviews I'd read and been told about abyway. All the staff are incredible, friendly and easy to speak to; from the consultants to the surgeons. I felt completely supported throughout my whole journey and would (and have) reccomend the company to anyone considering plastic surgery to *make themselves amazing*

Harley Medical Group have been outstanding from start to finish. I had breast reduction surgery and it has changed my life. My surgen was so informative, explained everything, listened to me and my concerns, i felt very confident that i was in good hands. The surgery went very well, the nurse who looked after me was lovely. The recovery process and after care was brilliant, as i was working in london and visiting my family in Leeds, i was able to have the option of going to both clinics, when every i needed to. The nurses in Leeds and in Harley street were so wonderful and reassured me at every step. 1 year on the scars are barely noticable. The surgery really has changed me, i am more confident, can wear anything i like and i no longer have a bad back and i just compleated my first half marathon, somthing i thought i would never do.

Entered Harley Medical Manchester clinic feeling very nervous, the lady on reception was very welcoming and the clinic itself is very clean and had that medical feel.  I met with the very lovely Deborah who went through absolutely everything, so much so she answered every question I had without me even asking.  I felt very comfortable in her office and she made the consultation a fun and informative experience.  I even got to ?��try on?ѝ my new boobs!
Very helpful staff that gave me detailed information regarding my procedure and were very happy to answer any questions that I had. I?��m extremely satisfied with my results ?���?��??��?
I definitely recommend Harley Medical Group to anyone.

I had breast augmentation carried out by the surgeon Ashley Topps who has done an amazing job...he put me at ease very quickly the first time I had to get my boobs out! I Frequently receive comments about how natural my implants look and my scars are already barely visible 10 weeks later. I would also like to mention how fantastic Andrea in the Manchester clinic was throughout my recovery. Nothing was too much for her and she was able to answer every single question I had within minutes. 10 out of 10!

Went to reschedule my appointment today and was told that I couldn?��t and I have now lost my payment! Been using Harley for years!!!!

Oh my goodness. They have been very kind, comforting, thorough, detailed about my treatment and how I was ?��feeling?�� throughout. I didn?��t feel like a number on their dairy for the day & always welcomed whenever I had an appointment.

review_title: Excellent professional treatment from start to finish
review_body: Excellent professional treatment from start to finish.

I have wanted a rhinoplasty since early on in high school but never thought it would really happen. When i turned 21 i decided it was something that would definitely change my life for the better. I went to the Leeds clinic in November and they didn't push me into anything, in fact, they didn't sell me a fairytale or make me promises that would make me sign up there and then. After my two week cooling off period i decided i needed more time. After a month of consideration i booked and had my surgery on the 5th of February with Mark Solomos at the Highgate hospital. My admission into the hospital was great, I was given privacy to prepare for the surgery and was told everything i needed to know, and staff were happy to answer any questions. My aftercare has been amazing and I am unbelievably happy with the result of my nose job- i'm in love with my new cute little nose. My swelling hasn't fully gone down yet but i can already tell Mark did an amazing job. Couldn't recommend Harley Medical Group enough!
Excellent service very professional

I had my consultation at Chelmsford with Danielle she was lovely & knew the best surgeon for me. The nurses at Chelmsford are so friendly. They will help u with anything. My surgery went very well I had open rhinoplasty & a tummy tuck with lipo. I was taken care of very well at Highgate Hospital. I'm 2 weeks post op & my results are amazing Mark Solomos is a genius!
Great advice in the initial consultation, great price & quick response to emails

review_title: I am a week post surgery
review_body: I am a week post surgery. My surgeon was called Ben Klass and I had a full abdominoplasty including liposuction. Once I was back in my room I was cared for by a nursing team to make me comfortable. I was given painkillers which I didn?��t need. I slept through to morning and the nursing team commented on how good my surgeon was as they have not had many that haven?��t required any pain relief. Ben came to see me the next day in person to see how I was and to discharge me. I am a week post surgery now and still have not required pain killers. I have been for my post review, my nurse is called Andrea who is amazing. The clinic manager Matt, the nursing team make you feel apart of a little family when I go into the clinic. They are absolutely amazing.

Stay away from this company!!! Ladies if you are thinking about getting a breast augmentation please go to transform. Around the same price and the aftercare is 100x better. I've recently had breast implants with harley medical group and I definitely wouldn't recommend. Transform do yearly check ups and lots more included. I am only insured for 2 years with harley medical group where as you can get insured with transform for 10 years! Also when you book your first consultation, HMG want a deposit before you meet with the surgeon.. Transform don't take any money off you and book in with the surgeon so you can get an idea of what your outcome will be. My surgeon didn't show me any before or after pictures of what he done and when I asked the nurse if I could see any they told me it wasn't allowed therefore I went with a surgeon that I didn't know anything about. Please please please choose another company when you are going for your breast augmentation, harley medical group do not care about you and everything is so rushed and they are just after your money. This was my first time getting breast implants and no one I know has them so I was clueless, yet they didn't give me much information. I went into surgery not knowing what my breasts would look like afterwards as I wasn't explained this!!! I have 2 different sized breasts and my surgeon said he would put 2 different sized implants in (which he did). After surgery my breasts are completely different and my surgeon basically told me that was always going to the outcome. I wish so much that he had told me this before surgery because I definitely wouldn't have gone ahead with it!!! I'm left with breasts that I hate more now than I did before surgery. He now has recommended getting a lift to make them symmetrical but again I wish he had recommended this before surgery. Being a first time breast augementation patient I thought that implants were the answer to symmetrical breasts. I explained so many times that my reason for getting breasts implants was to make my breasts symmetrical so why am I left with 2 obvious different sized breasts aand not explained the differences that i would still have after surgery. Honestly I could go on all day but the moral of the story is stay away from harley medical group.

My journey didn't go as I had planned due to high blood pressure but the team supported me throughout. They consoled me when my original surgery date was cancelled and supported me all the way up to my revision date. They explained the procedure, the risks and gave me advice on how to manage my BP but also my mind to relax and look beyond the surgery ... to something I wanted and the results that I will have. 3 months after my original surgery date I was ready and it couldn't have gone any better. I'm now just under 2 weeks post op and my healing is going well. The results so far (remember I'm still swollen) are amazing and I am now being very impatient with myself to see the final results. I can't thank the team enough ... I truly believe that love the jobs and helping people achieve what they want. Mark Solomos ... no words can express how grateful I am, he will always have a special place in my heart! The team at the Highgate hospital ... the same ... they truly care. Thuli, Roberto are two of the nicest people I have ever met in my life ... they remembered me from 3 months previous which eased my anxiety on the day but also expresses their love for their jobs and also their patients. I could go on and on about the support but I think from this small acknowledgement you can see that I can't recommend the Harley Medical Group more highly. The reason for the 9 score and not a 10 is down to a few little things: 1. I had to chase my admission time for surgery... this didn't come till the day before surgery 2. I had no follow up call post surgery / return home as a duty of care. Other than those small improvements, again The Harley Medical Group are outstanding.

The staff are amazing and make you feel at ease! Never needed to ask many questions as they were so thorough and explained everything in so much detail that they answered all my questions before I asked them! Definitely recommended!

Since the beginning, I have had no issues with the staff in Cardiff or Bristol locations. After meeting my suergon he gave me more information than I thought I could have! He understood exactly what I wanted and he even told me what he would do to improve it that I hadn't even thought about! After booking my surgery date, I had an endless amount of support from HMG. Any questions I had I would have had answered. Once the day came I was unbelievably nervous, but the service I had in the hospital was amazing, I cannot praise the staff enough for everything they did, they were always there and made me feel the most comfortable that I could be! Mr Allwn made me feel at ease before surgery going over again what he would like to achieve in surgery. Now I'm nearly one week after having my cast off and I'm loving it already (even though its still very swollen!) Will be having another appointment with the nurse that I cannot fault. She made me feel so relaxed after having a little breakdown as I was very emotional! She understood completely and made me feel at ease and more exited than scared! The best skills of a nurse I have ever encountered! Cannot fault any of the staff I'm looking forward to my next appointment so have things cleaned up! Loving my new nose and want to thank HMG my surgeon and all the staff that made this change my life. Cannot fault the service at all.

On the 17th January 2019 I had abdominoplasty (tummy tuck) with lipo and mastopexy (breast uplift).  From my initial consultation with Deborah Rea my Surgical Counsellor it was the most positive journey.  Deborah talked me through all the options available to me, including sharing her own experience of the surgery i was after which was so helpful and reassuring for me.  She recommended a great surgeon Mr Mark Solomos who was able to carry out both procedures in the same surgery.  Following on from this I met with a nurse Nicola Hague in Manchester several times who was lovely and again reassuring to do my pre-operative checks.  I then went to visit Mr Solomos at the Harley Street clinic.  He was very honest and practical about what we could achieve and left me positive and ready to take the next steps.  The surgery itself took place with Mr Solomos and a great team at the Highgate Hospital, London.  All the staff were really friendly and positive and put me at ease.  I have never had surgery before so was a little daunted but i felt comfortable and confident in the outcome.  I was made to feel very at ease, I met with Mr Solomos on the morning of surgery and i recall him saying "Oh you are going to be so happy", how exciting for me, even when it came to going down for surgery the team were chatty, making me laugh, keeping me relaxed.  I had the surgery and once i came round from the anaesthetic the nursing staff were amazing looking after me, special mention to Joanna, Magda and Alma all lovely ladies who really looked after me.  Once i was home I had an appointment a week after surgery at the Manchester clinic and met with Andrea Ingham Lead Nurse, what a fantastic lady.  She really looked after me and made me feel reassured of how my recovery was going well and kept me positive.  She changed all my dressings, removed staples from my tummy tuck and took care to make sure I wasn?��t in pain as she did it.  I had several follow up appointments with Andrea to check my recovery and change the dressings, she was consistently lovely and supportive.  Now all that remains is for me to have my last appointment with Mr Solomos to review the results when I am six weeks post surgery.  I cannot recommend Harley Medical Group highly enough and Mark Solomos as a surgeon, he has done an incredible job and transformed me completely, no regrets and I?��m so happy.
Not happy at all.

Do not go here! Yes they have glossy adverts and an address that sounds like they must be the best. They are not! I paid for mattress silicone implants, they were the same implants the nhs use! They accepted no responsibility for fitting these ticking time bombs into so many girls bodies. The joke is that when you call them they speak to you like something they just stepped in! They won't offer finance for victims of pip.. they don't care when you tell them you have every symptom of Rare breast implant lymphoma. .they do not care that you have been unable to breast feed...they do not care when you are so ill that you actually feel like you are dying. Oh and they refuse to tell me what my payment method is????!!! Stay away from these cowboys! Worse than that.. they are Satan! It takes a seriously evil person/company to make you pay for your own potential death! �4050 I paid for my implants. they paid �50 for bathroom silicone and still pretended they were the same product that was of medical grade! Sick vile human beings!!!

My observations:

review_title: The worst nose job anyone would?��ve laid eyes on.
review_body: Absolutely devastated with my rhinoplasty results. Have had two rhinoplasties with Harley medical - the first one I was left with open roof deformity and inverted V. Made to feel the awful appearance was ?��swelling?ѝ (at 9 months post op??). Surgeon begrudgingly agreed to a revision rhinoplasty, promised he would fix my nose. Guess what? IT LOOKS EVEN WORSE. I?��m left with open roof deformity yet again. How hard can it be to remove a hump AND THEN PUT THE BONES BACK TOGETHER. Absolutely horrendous results I cannot believe their ?��expert surgeons?ѝ made such a mess of my face. Now ignoring my emails so I?��m ready to take legal action if this continues. Do not book here. I would not recommend this disgusting company to anyone. Has had a huge impact on my day to day life having this ruined nose in the middle of my face. I wouldn?��t wish this on anyone. If you want an expert - go elsewhere. God knows how much it?��ll cost to fix this.

I had my consultation with Barbara Banaszczyk. She was professional and extremely helpful. I had previously done my research on lazer hair removal, but she was able to fill in all the gaps. Additionally,?�� Barbara was very welcoming, and although I live in Birmingham, I would actually rather get treated in Chiswick as she made me feel such at ease. Thank you for your help. I hope to start this treatment with the Harley Medical group in the future :)

review_title: From start to finish the whole process?�?
review_body: From start to finish the whole process has been fantastic. I am only 1 week post operative, however the care I've had has been brilliant, from initial consultation to the surgery. Simon Smith made me feel at ease with his recommendation to go dual plane (under muscle) so that I had a more natural look and although still very swollen, I can see the results already and they're more than I could ask for. All the staff at both the Harley medical group and the Chelmsford day hospital have been friendly and helpful and I am looking forward to feeling more confident about my breasts over the next few weeks/ months as they heal.

I had a very helpful practitioner called Nadia Imran who I had a consultation with. She was extremely helpful and informative. She gave me an in-depth information about the laser treatments and different options. She also made me feel comfortable where I was able to share my insecurities and ask any questions that I had. Excellent service!

Friendly staff and reasonable prices. The surgery went well and the plastic surgeon offered reassurance and was very professional. l can't wait to see the full results as I only had surgery three weeks ago.

I came to The Harley medical group Nottingham to have fillers and Botox. I had previously had tear trough fillers and Botox at a different clinic in London and I have to say the level of care I received at Harley medical far surpasses that I received at the previous clinic. I had been thinking of getting further facial fillers for a while as I was unhappy with a couple of things and had looked at several other clinics in Nottingham before speaking to Melissa, the clinic manager who was really helpful in giving me guidance on the treatments I was looking into and so I decided that I would book to have my treatments here. Melissa and the team are so lovely and make you feel so comfortable which really helped with being nervous! During the consultation Dr Constantinos advised me on what he thought was best for me and talked me out of having a couple of areas done which now I?��m really glad of because I?��m so happy with the results I have just from having the areas he recommended and feel I?��ve got a much more natural look! The patient care I received was second to none and even after the treatments, the aftercare was amazing! Melissa was always on the end of the phone for me when I contacted her as I had some swelling and bruising and even contacted me to check on my healing after this which was really reassuring! Thank you so much Melissa and Dr Constantinos for your exceptional level of care and expertise! I felt so looked after here and can?��t recommend it enough if you are looking to have anything done!

review_title: I am absolutely over the moon with my?�?
review_body: I am absolutely over the moon with my results following my breast augmentation with Dr Allwin! My new ?��girls?�� are amazing!!  He was great from start to finish & was even waiting at the lift after surgery to tell me everything had gone well! My ?��councillor?�� Jade was fantastic also, always there if I needed a question answering & was very good explaining everything before hand. After care has been brilliant, ringing the day after surgery to see how I was doing. Follow up appointments booked quickly!

review_title: I have recently had breast augmentation?�?
review_body: I have recently had breast augmentation and I am absolutely amazed at the results.  From the consultation to various appointments, to the actual surgery and even the post surgery appointment, all the nurses, consultants, the surgeon Marcus Davis and the team were fantastic.  They were all very helpful, informative and more importantly really friendly which helped me relax and enjoy the whole experience.  I have recovered well and I would not hesitate at all to recommend Harley Street to anyone.

I had a really wonderful experience with the Harley Medical Group in London for my breast enlargement and would 100% recommend them to anyone! My consultant Shradha was really helpful and professional throughout, and she really understood the look I wanted and chose a surgeon perfect for me. What really stood out to me the most is that the Harley Medical Group value you as a customer opposed to just another number on their books. Therefore, the decision to choose this company was really easy for me and I didn?��t feel any concern at all. My surgeon Dr. Sarakbi has done an amazing job at giving me the natural look I wanted and I couldn?��t be happier. I cannot fault the level of care he puts into his work and would recommend him to anyone! He has given me the confidence I was lacking and I am absoloutely in love with how they have turned out. I?��d like to thank the Harley Medical Group so much, my experience has honestly been incredible.

review_title: I was very disappointed with the Harley?�?
review_body: I was very disappointed with the Harley medical group, I felt as though I did not receive the highest standard of care as I wanted my first 3 sessions done with Dr Nadia (Manchester clinic) as she was recommended to me by my family and friends, however My initial consultation was booked with Zoe (Manchester clinic) which I didn't mind, as I thought it's just a consultation, when it came to the treatment I would be seen and treated by Nadia, I booked my 3 microneedling sessions with Nadia, I got treated by Zoe. On my second session I booked again with Nadia again I got a call from the Manchester office, the lady stated the microneedling machine had not been serviced so my appointment was to be cancelled, this bearing in mind this is a day prior to my appointment , and I had booked a babysitter aswel, this i found very unprofessional how can a machine not have been serviced and only notice a day before. I was really annoyed with the service, I said I would call back to book again which I did I called head office arranged another appointment with Nadia, I further stated please assure it is not rearranged or cancelled and or booked with another person, I spoke to a lovely gentleman (Chad) at the head office and he assured me I would be seeing Nadia. A couple of days before my appointment I again got a call from the Manchester office again saying my appointment has been cancelled due to unforeseen circumstances, I was very upset as I had now missed 2 months of treatment,. I then rang the head office (HR) again, I requested for Nadia and they said it was confirmed to be with Nadia, I then attended my appointment at the Harley medical group (Manchester) I called in to say I was running late due to traffic, Zoe answered and replied no problem I will see you shortly. I was abit surprised because my appointment was booked with Nadia, this was the fourth time and I had enough., I did not understand why my appointment could not be with the person I requested (Nadia) I went in to the clinic and spoke to Zoe myself and told her my appointment had been booked with Nadia and she said it was totally fine. I don't know why this couldn't have been clarified months ago, I'm sure it was embarrassing for Zoe and myself which caused me a lot of upset and anxiety due to which I had to take my inhaler as I was out of breath and  reiterating what I have been for the past 5/6 months. I finally got to see Nadia, she firstly apologised for any convenience caused and asked me to take a seat as I was out of breath and told me to take deep breaths and to take my inhaler. She offered me tea or coffee which I said no to.  I finally had my treatment done by Nadia and I would definitely recommend her to all my family and friends as she does make you feel at ease and comfortable while doing the treatment, I will give her 5 stars.

Nadia is very friendly and extremely professional, she takes great care in the treatments she provides and always offers good skincare advice.
