I attended a consultation for a breast augmentation and uplift at the Nottingham Clinic. I felt that everything was explained very thoroughly, I was given professional advice and full information about the process from start to finish including recovery.

I am 5 weeks post op for a Breast Mastopexy and I couldn't be happier with the treatment I received. Harley Medical gave me all the information I needed and I knew that they were always on the other end of the phone if I needed them. My surgeon especially, Dr Allwin was incredibly thorough and made sure I was comfortable every step of the way. The procedure I had was a major surgery but I am thrilled by the results.

review_title: It has been an amazing experience
review_body: It has been an amazing experience. Very professional and good suggestions about the treatment.

Be careful when booking appointments that you have all of the information you need and understand any preparation required as they will take your money 'to secure the booking' without checking that you're suitable for the treatment, even when it a clear the customer needs more information.
Very helpful team, knowledgable and professional. They have given me great advice on what to do with my persistent acne

review_title: Loved the results from the laser hair?�?
review_body: Loved the results from the laser hair removal treatment I received from Nottingham's Harley Medical branch. Highly recommended if you are looking for professionals who deliver.

I booked for a promax consultation with Nadia. She was excellent informative professional and geared the treatment specifically to my needs. I felt at all times i was in safe hands and she knew exactly the result I was looking for. A very friendly approachable and professional practitioner.

review_title: I went to Harley street medical for a?�?
review_body: I went to Harley street medical for a consultation for laser hair treatment and i met Nadia Imran who explains everything thoroughly about your treatment and makes you feel at ease she is such a kind and lovely woman definitely recommend this place if you want any kind of treatment
"High quality service with guaranteed results rather than false promises. Professional staff. Organised and efficient service. "
I?��ve been receiving treatment from Harley Medical since 2002 and have always been pleased with the results

I Had my consultation and laser hair removal with Nadia Imran. She is really friendly and I?��m happy to deal with her and with remarkable results of my treatment.  She is very professional in her approach.

Please don't go to this clinic ever (the one in Cardiff to be precise). After a lengthy fight to get my money back for a set of 8 laser hair removal treatments to my chin that costed me �304; they refused to give me a first treatment according to them due to the colour of my skin, then they took two months to give me a refund for the �164!! They stated that in their terms and conditions they will charge me the full price of the treatment and if I am tanned I will loose that treatment. What a cheek!!! This seems a con! I wonder to how many people they do the same and get from them �132 for NOTHING!!! no treatment!!! nothing!!! I contacted a lawyer to see if I can get my money back. Of course their fees are much higher than my refund, but I wish this company is fined for misleading customers!!! Don't use it if you can! I was robbed �132 by a company in the UK! Unbelievable!!!

I have had a great experience with Nadja, she was very informative during my consultation, and has always talked me through what she is going to do when I come for my promax appointment. A lovely, pleasant lady!

Had my consultation and treatment with Nadia, really pleasant person to deal with and answered all my questions.  Gave me the overall expectations of the treatment at the consultation and very professional in her approach.

review_title: I went to the Wimbledon Clinic for?�?
review_body: I went to the Wimbledon Clinic for botox.  The reason that I chose the Harley Medical Group was for 3 reasons: (1) they offered treatment with a doctor; (2) they offered weekend treatments; and (3) they offered a follow up review.  I contacted them to request a follow up after receiving the treatment and was initially advised that the next available appointment with the doctor was outside of the time period for review so that I would not be able to have one.
Sharon said:
Consultation call back service once I registered my interest. Danielle, the consultant was very informative. Follow up email with quote and link to the loan received promptly.
They are very professional and make you feel comfortable.

Leeds Clinic. Great experience so far. Katie at the Leeds office is super friendly and a lovely person. She instantly makes you feel comfortable, asks the right questions and is very straight forward and honest with you. Lovely staff. Look forward to my surgery x
If I could put as zero I would - avoid like the plague!

I?��m so grateful for the Harley medical group and their patience with me being a difficult client! I initially met with Melissa at the Nottingham branch who was really helpful and knowledgeable. I was a 32D but my boobs sagged and I hated the shape of them.
Nadia is very knowledgeable she explains everything in detail, very professional and friendly.

staff dead friendly and professional  and very  understanding and explain everything in detail about cosmetic surgery and are always willing to help you .and don't make you rush in to anything enjoyed going there they  made  me feel welcome.  and made me feel relaxed and confident thanks for that

review_title: Simon Smith has given me everything?�?
review_body: Simon Smith has given me everything plus more with my breast augmentation, I have had such a natural result, my breasts, just enchanced. They sit perfectly, I?��m healing very well and this is only day 11 since surgery. The ladies at HMG Chelmsford have all been so helpful and lovely as well, they all know what they are doing and make the whole process look and feel easy for you. I?��ve enjoyed the last 6 months planning, booking then having my surgery, now I?��ve got what I want and feels amazing.

It was good until things went wrong, they closed the Newcastle branch where I had booked laser hair removal in a block booking. I paid for in November 2017. Was only time to have half of my treatments then they closed. I had unsolicited calls from ex staff confusing the life out of me making out they were reopened for business. When it all come clear that HMG weren?��t open for business I requested a refund, initially they told me I could only have my treatments at Leeds, then they agreed to paying me several calls and emails later me I would have to wait a further 28 days to get a refund ? They shut allowed my number to be taken off a system by ex staff I have unsolicited call then they take over two months to return my money and even then I was getting various amounts one person said I would only getting under half another said a full refund in the end I got 3/4 back and I had to Send a lot of emails to get it. This is not my idea of professional and relaxin it it was all out my hands. They didn?��t communicate effectively that the clinic was closing down and should have been more forthcoming to return my money.

review_title: I walked into the Harley medical group?�?
review_body: I walked into the Harley medical group in Manchester as I had heard so much about it. I literally walked in and it was such a warm welcome. I didnt have a appointment but the team was happy to get someone to come and speak to me.

review_title: Very friendly was in touch from the?�?
review_body: Very friendly was in touch from the start and is able to give a lot of information

review_title: When I first booked my treatment for?�?
review_body: When I first booked my treatment for micro-needling I was quite nervous because I did not know anything about the products that would beneficial for me use before I start the treatment. However 4 days later, I received a phone call from a practitioner called Nadia about my skin preparation, she recommended me to buy and use the skin brightening cream for atleast 4 weeks before I start my first treatment, she explained to me in detail on how to use the cream and when to use it. The cream was really great, it left my skin softer, firmer and brighter. I followed the instructions she gave me and I can honestly say I am so grateful that she had called me to let me know beforehand because it made me feel much more comfortable and confident, I did not have to worry about my skin as I knew it was safe and taken care of correctly. I have had 4 sessions done and I have seen a massive improvement on my skin!! The results are insane!! I feel so much more confident about my skin, the scars on my face were soo deep, I used to cover them up with a side fringe, all thanks to Nadia I don't have to cover them with a fringe anymore!! I am so pleased!!! I wish I knew of Nadia Imran (from the Manchester branch) a lot earlier!!! She is amazing, I cannot put in to words on the effort and time she took on improving my skin. I am very satisfied with the attention and care that I have received. I highly recommend Nadia Imran to everyone as she will definitely make your insecurities dissapear.

The Dr took her time to be very informative, and the receptionist was welcoming and nice, putting me at ease for my first procedure. The only hesitation on my end would be the price difference between other clinics. The sale price was adequate, but I would shop around if charged their regular full cost.

review_title: I would not hesitate to recommend
review_body: I would not hesitate to recommend the Harley Street Medical Group the same way they were recommended to me by a family member. From my very first appointment through to post-op the staff have always been friendly  and supportive. I have received nothing but first class care and  service.A big thank you to everyone involved!

review_title: If I could score them zero stars I?�?
review_body: If I could score them zero stars I would. Miss-communication from the start, months of being messed around. Hundreds of pounds of my money wasted, I was told conflicting information by staff who are so unknowledgeable considering they are suppose to be nurses. The whole experience with them has caused me nothing but stress and upset. I sent an official complaint to there online team 10 days ago, aswell as a follow up email and have had no response at all another example of there poor communication as a company. Absolutely shocking. I warn you to go elsewhere because I know I certainly will be.

review_title: The lady that I had my consultation?�?
review_body: The lady that I had my consultation with was lovely. I felt really comfortable talking to her and I didn?��t feel pressured into doing anything straight away. I will be back to see her soon!

I have recently finished a treatment at Harley Street. At the same time I booked to have some surgery done in January 2019. I paid �500 deposit and booked a consultation with the surgeon in December 2018. While I was receiving my present treatment I was asked for full payment for the surgery in January. I was not happy knowing that I had not even spoke with the surgeon. Taking this into consideration I decided not to go ahead. As I cancelled the surgery, they stated they had made a mistake of asking me for the money. I still cancelled. I was told my deposit of �500 would be returned in 28 days. I have had to chase this and was told it would come in a cheque. I was told they do not pay direct into people?��s bank for data protection. If they can quickly take and ask money off a client and do that via bacs etc why can?��t they do that in return. I received the cheque today of which I have now to wait until it clears. Not happy and quite disappointed of how I had to chase this. But also being asked to pay for a surgery of which I had not even discussed with the surgeon.

Exceptional staff. Lynne cottle and Sarah at the Bristol branch are particularly helpful and the nurses are lovely. I went to the welbeck hospital, London for a breast augmentation with Dr. Jasper Gill and I could not have had a better experience. I am over the moon the results and anytime I have needed advice from either the clinic or the hospital they have been most helpful.
Excellent advice and info

The dermatology team were fantastic at addressing my concerns and Dr Natalia Spierings in particular did an amazing job with the procedure. I would definitely recommend the dermatology team at HMG to others.

review_title: Sadly I didn't catch the name of the?�?
review_body: Sadly I didn't catch the name of the technician I had tonight at the Edgbaston clinic in Birmingham but she was amazing! She had a lovely foreign accent which is the only way I can identify her.

review_title: Overcharged for procedures not communicated and approved of
review_body: 1 - I was told by the dermatologist during consultation of costs which I agreed to

Honestly cannot say enough about how amazing this whole experience has been from start to finish. I am now 1 week post op and couldn't be happier with my results so far. The customer service you get from the very first consultation to the surgery and post op check have been phenomenal. I've already recommended The Harley Medical Group to my friends and family as they really have made this experience so relaxing and easy. I'd give them 10 stars if I was able to. Genuinely so impressed with them and will 100% use them for any future treatments

review_title: The Harley Medical Group- rhinoplasty with Dr G
review_body: Everyone made me feel so at ease and everything ran so smoothly. Dr G is incredible and has exceeded my expectations in every way. I am 2 weeks post op and even with all the swelling I am 100% happy with my rhinoplasty, he was realistic with what he could do and completley honest with what was achievable. All of the staff in the Southampton clinic that I have come across in person and on the phone have all been lovely and caring. The hospital staff were amazing and the nurses looked after me SO well. Just can't thank Dr G and everyone enough!

review_title: Brilliant service right from the start!
review_body: I have been having laser hair removal with the Harley Medical Group. The service from the very beginning has been exceptional. From the first consultation through, the practitioners have been brilliant; first Kyomi and latterly Nadia. For a trans-woman hair removal is exceptionally important and affirming of identity. Harley genuinely seems to understand this. The willingness to go the extra mile to make my appointments a positive experience seems to be delivered as standard. And I really do hope Nadia is able to continue with some future appointments in Birmingham.

review_title: I had a great time at Harley street
review_body: I had a great time at Harley street. It was my first time there and it sure won?��t be my last. I was seen by Melissa who was friendly and professional and made me feel at home.

review_title: After nearly 3 years and two rhinoplasty operations
review_body: After nearly 3 years and two rhinoplasty and over 12 injections inserted into my nose i havent got the rhinoplasty i wanted or asked for. NoSharp tip or define nose i paid for. I had a american surgeon first who i was advised would be good for me because he was afro carribean( i am afro carribean btw and maria the manager at the time insisted to have it done by him)who unfortunately didnt do nothing just made the width of the nose holes smaller,(let me add when i had to do a test for 2nd time before my operation, harley medical made a error and stated my test from lab came back and stated i had sicka cell disease trait which meant my operation date canceled , to then find out the lab made a error and it wasnt postive and apologised so i was upset and distressed thinking i had a disease  ) second time dr slater a lovely man did my rhinoplasty again (the 1st american surgeon had left now for unknown reasons) but made the bridge smaller but due to the tip of my nose not getting smaller or having any shape on bridge or anything after surgery i had to have 12 injections for 8months to speed up the healing process as no results was showing, so again i was distressed-   its been 1 year 6months since my 2nd nose job and my tip nor nose has shaped or made any difference.At 1st i had a flat broad nose no shape and i look in the mirror and still see the same after so many years and they stated its healing, its been maybe over 3.5 years my last appointment was few months ago?! Only result was just a smaller broad flat nose and a huge loss of money for me. I asked from the start of my journey for a sharp define tip n slim nose (bridge) after 2 surgeries you would expect that. i have other mixrace and afro carribean friends who had 1 surgeon 1 surgery and there nose is perfect after 1 year- besides staff being nice and trying their best...i still havent gained confidence and feel a wasted 3.5 years and have to contour my nose to hide the fact it doesnt look how it was meant to.Thank you x
Breast Implants by Will Sarakbi

Friendly, professional, caring and just wonderful service from start to finish. I honestly couldn?��t recommend this company enough. Yes, you will pay a little more, but surely your body and piece of mind are worth that? There is a reason why this company has a top quality reputation.
The Harley medical group provided an excellent service. Very friendly professional group would definitely come again and recommend to others!!

Lovely friendly and understanding staff.Was given lots of information over the phone and at my first appointment.I had a very warm welcome and was made to feel very comfortable.I can't wait to return for my treatments and i look forward to seeing the end result.

review_title: I went to THMG in London
review_body: I went to THMG in London - Harley Street and what a good choice I made.

review_title: highest quality of care any person?�?
review_body: highest quality of care any person could ever ask off.

Cat, the lead nurse, who did my first consultation was absolutely lovely and put me totally at ease. She was kind, friendly and clearly passionate about her job. Could not recommend her enough. I look forward to going back to the Harley medical group for my surgery following this consultation and know I can put my full trust in them

review_title: I had a lovely therapist in charge of?�?
review_body: I had a lovely therapist in charge of my laser treatment.  She was friendly, supportive and efficient.  However the manager at the Chiswick clinic was unfortunately the opposite, and really lets HMG down.

review_title: Outstanding service by Nadia Imran - some concerns with admin and other practitioners
review_body: I have been having  treatments at the Harley Medical Group for several years now and ovetall I am  happy with their level of service. All staff are very polite and accommodating and I have seen great results with laser hair removal and lipomax treatments. However, I have had some issues with customer service and different practitioners.

I contacted Harley Medical for an abdominoplasty after losing a massive amount of weight which left me with the most unsightly mass of skin and unshifting fat around the middle. No amount of exercise or continued weight loss would shift it. I actually qualified for the operation on the NHS but a move meant I had to forsake it. I therefore had other options to explore, but knew not having it wasn?��t an option.
Excellent & professional personal treatments

I?��ve been to Harley medical for a number of treatments, including rhinoplasty, lip fillers, promax and more recently laser hair removal. The staff are incredible, very attentive and knowledgeable. I would definitely recommend Nadia Imran for promax or laser hair removal, she?��s a true specialist in the field and made me feel at ease throughout the whole process. Thanks again.

review_title: I had a breast augmentation and could?�?
review_body: I had a breast augmentation and could not be happier with my result. I was extremely nervous going in, and chose to have the surgery done with Mark Solomos after doing some research and hearing he was the best for the most natural look. I became more nervous about reading some bad reviews about him online, but DON'T listen to them. Yes, Mark does come across quite bluntly in appointments, and perhaps doesn't have the best bedside manner, but trust me when I say that he has hands of magic! He has done thousands of these surgeries and the experience has paid off, because my new boobs are perfect! Not too big (I had two consultations with him and actually went down a size from the initial one, as I really did not want big boobs). They are so natural looking, and symmetrical. For a few weeks after surgery one of them was sitting a bit higher than the other, and was also noticeably bigger, but they have completely evened out and dropped and now three months later, I honestly could not be happier. Thank you Mark!

review_title: Nice ladies, varying in experience and women of colour be aware
review_body: Started laser hair removal treatments. After the first few treatments it was removing the hair but now the hairs are growing back to its initial state.

My surgery experience was fantastic. The facility in London was excellent and the staff were great throughout the whole experience. My surgeon Dr. Solomos was approachable and precise throughout and the whole surgery experience was fantastic
Felt very comfortable when talking about a big decision. Absolutely lovely people therՌ

The appointment was within a couple of days of phoning and they treated me on the day. The only reason I didn't give 5 stars was that the treatment on my back didn't work but under my arms was very effective.

review_title: I would highly recommend this company?�?
review_body: I would highly recommend this company to any one, the service they provide is of a very high standard and keep you updated of all appointments. The staff are amazing and they put me at ease straight away with there friendly but professional approach.  Will definitely use Harley Medical Group for any future procedures
Had my first appointmen with Michelle. She was so friendly and made me feel really comfortable. I got to try on implants and see what size would be best for me. Would not hesitate to recommend!

review_title: Please take my advice and do not use Harley Medical Group!!
review_body: Please take my advice and do not use Harley Medical Group!

review_title: The service was incredible and so?�?
review_body: The service was incredible and so informative. The consultant was warming and caring. Loved the care, will be recommending the Harley medical group x

review_title: Unfortunately not the surgeon for me.
review_body: After my initial consultation with the lovely patient coordinator I was keen to proceed with seeing the surgeon and paid for an appointment with him. Upon meeting Mr Baker I felt completely different about proceeding as he didn't seem to understand the look I wanted to achieve and said I should go bigger than I felt comfortable with.
Very friendly,caring and comfortable environment thoroughly recommend to everyone who wants to feel more confident in themselves.

review_title: I?��ve recently had a fantastic journey?�?
review_body: I?��ve recently had a fantastic journey with Harley Medical from start to end. All staff are very professional, kind, helpful, polite even appointment times were made quite flexible. Mr Sleiter, my surgeon, has done a fantastic job he also is very friendly and caring man who put me at ease straight away

review_title: I visited the Bristol clinic for a?�?
review_body: I visited the Bristol clinic for a consultation, I was told id see a nurse but I didn't, I was seen by a scruffy girl who didn't even look at my hair to see if I was a good candidate for Lazer hair removal, but would have sold me a package without knowing if it would work. The consultation room was untidy with bits of paper scattered everywhere, needless to say I didn't choose them, very unprofessional, I went with someone more expensive but more professional

"I had my laser treatment done with them. They are a gem. They always update me on treatments and services especially if its on promo. Stephanie is my main nurse and she is lovely! Always feels like visiting a friend instead of a clinic."
I?��m really happy with everything, lovely customer service and really professionals .

review_title: If you are looking into surgery
review_body: If you are looking into surgery, this place should be very last on your list, on your initial consultation, they will promise you the earth and tell you anything is possible, In my case it was a revision rhinoplasty, the lady told me everything I wanted to hear and left feeling very positive that I was going to get what I wanted. After being told there was only one date available for a surgeon consultation ( which I very much doubt ) I booked my �100 consultation for 3rd July. Arrived at 11:50 for a 12pm appointment,, wasn?��t seen till 12:40pm, then to my dissapointment, I was literally in the consultation room 2 minutes Maximum, everything I was told in my first consultation, I was simply told ?��not possible?ѝ then suggested I go back to see my original surgeon. Half my day wasted, and �100 wasted !
The staff are friendly, knowledgable and offer a reliable service; I highly recommend Rhona in the Liverpool Clinic.
Highly recommended, excellent advice and aftercare.

review_title: My first appointment with the lead?�?
review_body: My first appointment with the lead nurse was very relaxed. She made me feel comfortable and knowledgeable all throughout. She honestly recommends what's the best procedure for me without pressure. I am very happy with that. I highly recommend Harley Medical Group.
I could not have wished for a better experience from start to finish. All of the staff have been amazing and have made me feel comfortable with the whole experience.
I had my surgery in April in Highgate Hospital. The care and aftercare from Harley Medical was great. I would like to thank the team of being so professional and amazing!

I cannot be happier with the care I have received from Harley medical, I had my breast augumentation on the 19th of June and from the time I spent at the hospital till the time I came home I was looked after so well, my post op appointment went really well with the nurse saying how well I?��m already healing in just a week. Amazing people who change life?��s.. :)
I was really nervous about having my treatment but Sally was extremely reassuring, she talked me through everything she was going to do, explained everything in depth and was really personable.

review_title: Staff are all welcoming and I always?�?
review_body: Staff are all welcoming and I always get a great service , the aftercare I also had was excellent.

I had my initial consultation at the Manchester clinic and any reservations I had about rhinoplasty were gone the second Deborah Rae started talking. She was the most friendly, professional, down to earth surgical counsellor you could wish for. She made me feel completely at ease answering all of my questions honestly and as graphic as I wanted. She didn?��t pressure me to book anything without going home and thinking about it first.  My surgery is booked for September and I am really looking forward to meeting Mark Solomos as I?��ve heard so many great things about him.

review_title: Do not trust Harley Medical Group!
review_body: after having my baby and breastfeeding I felt my breasts needed uplifting. Went to the manchester branch and told the advisor that I wanted an uplift, she advised that a breast augmentation would give me the look I desired, so I mistakingly took her advice and consented to an augmentation. 6 month after surgery I was not happy with the result as they looked no different, just larger (obviously) so spoke with manchester clinic and was invited in to discuss with the surgeon. Surgeon agreed I needed an uplift and this went to a board! 6 month later I get a call from Harley Medical to advise me it had been agreed That the uplift would be done ?��free of charge?ѝ and there surgery was booked in for 11th July 2018! After arranging childcare, annual leave etc I was called again by Harley Medical 3 weeks before my surgery, telling me I needed to pay �2150 or the surgery would be cancelled! Harley Medical should have listened to me in the first place then I wouldn?��t need a second surgery!! I have lost all confidence in this company, I don?��t even trust them to do the uplift, never mind parting with another �2150 for the pleasure! Then to add insult to injury I am informed by the manchester clinic that in all my documentation there was never a mention that I had asked for an uplift, how convenient! I would never recommend this company to anyone.
I recently received breast augmentation, the surgeon Simon Smith was absolutely perfect! He knew exactly what I wanted and my results were even better than I could imagine!
Fantastic Company!

review_title: BEWARE - DO NOT PART WITH YOUR MONEY
review_body: It took a matter of seconds for them to take the �500 deposit from me during a consultation but when I decided that I no longer wanted to have my Breast Augmentation with this dodgy clinic they are unwilling to give me back my money.

Horrendous !!!  Had my consultation all booked and paid for to see Dr Sleiter then I get an email saying he no longer works there.... Fine so asked for refund. It's been over a month and still no refund!!!!!  They've continuously ignored my emails. �100 to a student is a lot I need it to pay for another consultation with another more reliable company. Terrible experience I wouldn't reccomend Or trust them. After reading other reviews of people's experiencing I'm glad I never actually got the surgery they seem like a total Micky mouse company

review_title: Great experience from beginning to end?�?
review_body: Great experience from beginning to end Very happy with my result can't wait for 6 weeks post op check up as I know they will look even better
Avoid at all costs. Do not trust what they say or part with any money

If you are looking for a treatment and unsure where to start, or whether it's the right choice. Speak to the nurses and staff at the Harley Medical Group. I wouldn't use anyone else... they are professional, highly experienced, friendly and backed by an excellent reputation.
Harley medical group is amazing they are so helpful and informative and everybody is so nice and easy to talk to.

review_title: Honestly avoid the Harley medical group..
review_body: Honestly avoid the Harley medical group. Had rhinoplasty 8 months ago and am extremely gutted. Results are nothing like what I asked for and the response from the surgeon is 'you need to be patient it is just swelling' although after having two second opinions from other surgeons they have stated I am likely to need a revision surgery. The surgeon just cannot admit that the surgery didn't go to plan and may need fix it with a second surgery. My nose is still very painful and feels like a heavy brick on my face which I have been told isn't normal, however the surgeon completely ignores this and changes the topic. Post op check ups last 5 minutes and the surgeon is annoyed when I ask questions and raise concern.. Yet this company pride themselves on their 'great aftercare' quite the opposite of great. Try to contact them and they say they are fully booked.. yet were fine when I made payment for the surgery. Please avoid this company especially for rhinoplasty.

review_title: The consultant was patronising and very?�?
review_body: The consultant was patronising and very horrible. Mocking my insecurities, I  felt very uncomfortable with the consultation. And wouldn't recommend anyone to Harley Medical Group.
I recently had breast augmentation surgery at the harley medical group.

review_title: BREAST REDUCTION AT HARLEY MEDICAL GROUP, CHELMSFORD
review_body: Harley Medical Group in Chelmsford have been fantastic. Extremely friendly and informative from the first consultation and they put my mind at ease during the whole process of my breast reduction.  Organised and professional at each appointment leading up to surgery and the Consultant they chose for me was fantastic - very approachable and he listened to me.   I have now had my procedure and am extremely happy with the results.   Would highly recommend.  Many thanks.

review_title: The Harley Medical team are always?�?
review_body: The Harley Medical team are always there when or if you need to ask a question. It doesn't matter how big or small. They are friendly, approachable and very professional.

review_title: Staff are very friendly and helpful
review_body: Staff are very friendly and helpful. They're very knowledgeable and help to put your mind at ease. Highly recommended and I will definitely be a returning customer.

review_title: Felt really cared for every step of the?�?
review_body: Felt really cared for every step of the way. Really professional and after thorough research I am glad Harley Medical were my choice. Will continue to use their services.

After arranging my appointment with the Harley Medical Group, on arrival the staff were so kind And friendly. They made me feel right at ease and were so helpful during my consultation. The office itself was very clean and tidy but still very welcoming. Staff were very well informed and I can not recommend then enough. Absolutely lovely team who could not do enough.

After visiting other companies for a implant replacement, i felt Harley medical group treated me with professionalism, sensitive to my needs. Very friendly staff that informed me at every stage what to expect. And good communication.

review_title: Harley medical group have been truly?�?
review_body: Harley medical group have been truly fantastic. I would highly recommend them, Dr Solomos my surgeon has given me a new found confidence, I can not thank you guys enough!

Had my consultation for a breast augmentation a couple of weeks ago and honestly couldn?��t be happier. Sophie supplied me with all the information I needed and made the consultation enjoyable and comfortable. I am very excited to have my surgery in June and do not feel as though I could be in better hands.

I?��m 10 days post op BA and I?��m absolutely delighted. It?��s no exaggeration to say that this has changed my life. I have been supported, listened to and cared for every step of the way by the team in Marlow and my surgeon - they all treated me like a VIP and are really invested in my wellbeing. Every treatment I?��ve received (and there?��s been a lot!) has always been top quality and I?��ve been delighted with the results. Every stage is clearly communicated to me. I can?��t thank HMG enough.

review_title: I booked into the Manchester clinic and?�?
review_body: I booked into the Manchester clinic and booked my surgery date to be told few days before that the surgeon would be on holiday and not be able do it!! I then booked with another surgeon and surgery date before he cancelled my op ... I requested a refund which took them 2 months to process!! Terrible communication ... Very unprofessional .. stay clear .

review_title: I was very nervous but Emily was very?�?
review_body: I was very nervous but Emily was very professional and put me at ease

Rhinoplasty - At my first consultation 6 months ago, Trish, my consultant was faultless, did not pressure me into booking anything, gave her honest opinion and gave me as much information as required. Then I had my consultation with Mark which made me make up my mind that I wanted to use Harley Medical as Mark was very reassuring but did not promise perfection.
I was extremely happy with my initial consultation. Deborah was very knowledgeable and explained everything around the procedure and my options on great detail.
Helpful & very friendly
Disgusting after care from this supposedly well established healthcare entity, avoid them at all cost.

review_title: BAD SERVICE-I am disgusted with the after care
review_body: I am disgusted with the after care, or rather lack of aftercare, provided by Harley Medical, I wish there was a minus star rating otherwise I'd use it. They were keen to take my money when I had my initial operation but now I am having complications they do not want to know. I am constantly being fobbed off, I'm so upset, hurt and worried as I still don't have answers. I have had numerous appointments with various members of staff, most of whom have not been able to answer my medical questions, I have been given incorrect advice and their internal communications within their offices is a joke, it is quite evident that the offices do not liaise with each other. The incorrect advice resulted in me missing an event which I have been training for since June last year when my mother passed away, I am totally devastated and they do not seem to care. Every member of Harley Medical knew my situation but despite this they gave me the wrong information. I am so upset and feel sick with the knowledge that I could have participated after all, I'll never get that opportunity back, words cannot express my loss.  After travelling to their Manchester office from London I was told, yet again, that my notes were archived and unavailable despite my first appointment 3 weeks ago.  No one seems to know what they're doing. They do not respond to my emails or calls. They have taken over �5,000 for an operation that is not going to go ahead. This is totally unacceptable, I want my money back and I will be making a full complaint. Do not use this company, even the surgeon I spoke to today admitted the way I have been treated is just not good enough, can you believe it? If their own staff think that then something is really wrong. More to the point I am still none the wiser as to what's happened or what can be done to make it right, they do not have any sense of urgency but why would they? It's not their body is it....not only are my boobs broken but my heart is as well.

Mark Solomos was amazing. So friendly and professional. He is amazing at what he does. My results are more than I could I have wished for. The staff were lovely too, especially Louise Holohan. Highgate hospital were fab too. I left my dressing gown and they even posted it back to me!

Very professional and honest, the nurse I saw explained that Pro Max lipo would have minimal benefits for me and explained that the only option was a tummy tuck and liposuction. The nurse was transparent about the cost of this procedure and also explained that the company does offer loans but advised me it may be better financially to obtain a loan from my bank due to a lower APR.

My Harley Street journey couldn't have been any better. The nurses/surgeon/co-coordinators were very friendly, helpful, professional and made me feel at ease every step of the way. I couldn't fault the service I received from the girls at the Brighton clinic
Amazing care and constant support throughout the whole procedure. Everyone really went above and beyond to make my experience really enjoyable.

review_title: i have loved how friendly the staff at?�?
review_body: i have loved how friendly the staff at the first trust where they made my experience so much easier! Also the staff at rodney street have helped me so much especially during my after care.
User
Very professional,helpful and friendly !

review_title: I have enjoyed my lazor hair removal?�?
review_body: I have enjoyed my lazor hair removal experience so far. I have just had my 2nd appointment and can see a difference already
Wimbledon team are very friendly and professional. They always check to ensure you feel good and confortable during your sessions and share great tips about skin etc.

I could not of asked for a better service, from the start to the finished the care I have received has been outstanding. The Harley Medical Group offer person centred, compassionate and exceptional standards of care. I feel the service provides professional quality staff who are always willing to help and give necessary information to the clients. Overall I am extremely happy about the care I have been given and do not have one bad thing to say. Thankyou for everything.

review_title: Meg was kind honest and understanding
review_body: Meg was kind honest and understanding. I didn't feel like I was being sold something, and she actually advised me against one of the surgeries I wanted which I found reassuring. Looking forward to my surgery in may!

I had my Breast Augmentation consultation appointment with Louise at the Watford clinic, she was very informative and gave me all of the information I required about the procedure itself. Louise made me feel at ease and was able to answer all of the questions I had confidently. I would definitely recommend the Watford clinic. I am now looking forward to meeting with my surgeon and having the surgery in June. Thank you Louise
Trustworthy and safe.

The Ladies at Chelmsford have been helpful right from the start of my first consultation and throughout my healing. As someone who used to suffer with anxiety it was always a bit rubbish having to go to appointments as I always felt nervous but coming to the Harley Medical Group I feel relaxed and at ease and very much looked after. I've had a longer healing process than most but it's been made easier by the understanding and care of the staff at Chelmsford. Plus I love my new boobs thanks to my surgeon Will and feel like this has been an enlightening and overall positive journey and chapter in my life. Thank you for your continued help and support ladies. I'll always recommend.

Nearly 12 months ago I had rhinoplasty with Dr Sleiter throughout Harley medical group, Liverpool. I honestly could not recommend them any more, my entire procedure was easy and stress free. Lesley, Dr Sleiter and the rest of the team made me feel relaxed and confident about my decision to have surgery and I could not be happier with my results! Amazing team, thank you so much!

review_title: The microchip implant is the mark of?�?
review_body: The microchip implant is the mark of the beast in revelations. The key passage reads: ?��He causes all, both small and great, rich and poor, free and slave, to receive a mark on their right hand or on their foreheads, and that no one may buy or sell except one who has the mark or the name of the beast, or the number of his name?ѝ (Revelation 13:16-17).
I am currently 1 day post op for my breast augmentation and I couldn?��t be happier with the whole team of staff and the company.

I wanted to extend a heartfelt thank you to my surgeon Dr Baker, for the fantastic care that I received and for listening to me during the whole process. The result is beyond words and I couldn't be happier, you have given me something I never could have dreamed of, a positive self/body image!. Needless to say if you are contemplating a breast augmentation like myself, rest assured the skill and talent of Mr Baker will not leave you disappointed.Also wanted to extend a heartfelt thank you, to the staff and nurses they truly are a unique group of people.
I always felt welcome, no question was a silly question. I feel like I can contact them at any point with any concerns I may have. Excellent service in the hospital!

I would 100% recommend the HMG and their services. I had to postpone my procedure a couple of years ago when I found out I was expecting twins. The team handled this news professionally and didn?��t make me feel like I had messed them around (which I felt like I had done as everything was booked). I am delighted to say that I have now had my procedure (just last week) and I couldn?��t be happier with the results. The patient care I have received from the word go has been amazing. No question too silly. Prompt replies to emails. Lovely nurses and manager at the Marlow Clinic. Dr Mark Solomos is incredible. I felt in safe hands with Mark from the moment I met him. He is cool, calm and collected. I appreciated his honesty and expert advice at my consultation. His calm manner on the day of my procedure was just want I needed. A lovely gentleman who is an absolute genius. I have no reservations in recommending Dr Mark Solomos and the team at HMG.  Thank you for everything you have done so far in helping me feel like the best me.

review_title: I went to Harley for a minor injection?�?
review_body: I went to Harley for a minor injection and the procedure as well as results were excellent.

Had under eye (tear trough) fillers and was quite nervous going in. My doctor and consultant nurse were really helpful and friendly and the results are fab, so subtle but just how I wanted it! No more eye bags! 5*

review_title: The nurses at the Harley Medical Group?�?
review_body: The nurses at the Harley Medical Group are really excellent and very caring. They have made the post operative phase of my surgery very easy.

review_title: Staff are wonderful very friendly and?�?
review_body: Staff are wonderful very friendly and always give out superb advice. I cannot fault at all
Excellent customer service.. friendly environment

review_title: I attended at the Harley Medical Group?�?Fantastic !
review_body: I attended at the Harley Medical Group clinic in Liverpool and on arrival was met by Lesley Ainsworth, clinic manager. Prior to my treatment Lesley showed her in-depth knowledge of the procedure I was having. Her caring nature shone through. Her customer service skills are second to none and she had my best interests and wellbeing at the forefront of my visit. Lesley leads from the front and is great asset to the HMG. I would also like to acknowledge Emma, who works in the office and arranges my appointments. She is always very helpful and friendly. Well done Lesley and Emma.
Excellent all round

Samer Kazmi (Therapist Nurse) saw me for my initial consultation and she was just so lovely and reassuring. She listened to me when we spoke about what I wanted. She was honest with me and told me that my original plan would not really suit what I wanted so she helped me identify an alternative plan that would give me far better results than I realised.

Friendly and reliable staff with a large variety of knowledge and experiences. They made me feel at ease and comfortable when at the clinic and have supported me all the way. Couldn?��t have asked for a better service. The surgeon I chose was recommended by Deborah and he specialised in everything I was looking for. Keep up the amazing service !
Highly recommended service, friendly and informative. The Harley Medical Group have clients best interests and wellbeing at the forefront of everything.

After going to two other clinics in the area, my very first meeting with Ellie Burns made my decision she has been so informative put me at ease and this has been related in the rest of the staff too.
Very friendly welcome & supportive

review_title: Fantastic experience knowledgeable and caring staff
review_body: Extremely positive experience on my first consultation for a breast argumentation with Harley Medical Group at their Wimbledon clinic. Joanne really put me at ease and was extremely thorough in explaining the full procedure from beginning to end, what to expect, costs and recuperation time. I felt confident that I would be in good hands and would definitely choose them above anyone else.

review_title: I went to harley medical group for?�?
review_body: I went to harley medical group for laser hair removal. Upon consultation, the staff were very lovely and discrete, however the lady was quick to tell me that it would work on my skin and I had nothing to worry about so I decided to go ahead. Having finished all the sessions, I am extremely disappointed as it has barely worked on my skin type, being asian and am not happy at the results. and also when missing an appointment due to child care, there was no consideration of the situation. Feels like they got their money so they are happy.

I was very nervous attending my first consultation for derma fillers, I really had no need to be.The reception staff were so welcoming, friendly and very professional indeed.The consultant (Mr Constantinos Louis Loizou) explained everything to me in a way that I fully understood. At the end of the appointment I asked if I could go away and think about it and he was very happy I suggested this rather than jumping in feet first.Two weeks later I had my derma fillers.............what a transformation!!!Such a amazing  difference and I am over the moon with my new look!!I finally have my confidence back and without doubt I will be back again to try out other different treatments they have on offer.I defiantly recommend Harley Medical Group, professional, friendly and affordable.Bernardine Sharp.(Manchester)
Had a great consultation, Debbie answered all of my questions. Very happy with the overall experience so far

review_title: Very welcoming staff on the phone and ?�?
review_body: Very welcoming staff on the phone and in person everything is explained in detail I would recommend to anyone who is thinking of having any kind of treatment or surgery.

review_title: I chose Harley Medical Group for my lip fillers
review_body: I chose Harley Medical Group for my first cosmetic procedure and I?��d never go anywhere else. All members of staff at their Cardiff branch were extremely friendly, welcoming and professional. I can?��t wait to visit again!

I felt very supported and confident in my decision to go ahead with my surgery after my consultation with your senior nurse. I am now very excited to get going knowing I am in safe, experienced hands.

I recently had breast augmentation with the Harley Medical Group and had my appointments with the Watford branch. I met with Becky who was so friendly and helpful and answered all my questions. I decided I wanted to take a few weeks to think about if I wanted to go ahead with the procedure and Becky was really patient until I made my decision. I had a few other appointments after I decided to go ahead and eventually met with the surgeon (Dr Sarakbi) a few weeks before my surgery and went by recommendation of a friend who saw him too. He was friendly, thorough and again answered all my questions. I went to the Wellbeck hospital on the day of my surgery feeling very anxious and all the staff were so supportive (particularly a lady called Breda) the hospital was lovely, really comfortable and very clean. There was a bit of wait to go into surgery but all the staff kept me regularly updated and helping with my nervousness for the surgery! It was a super speedy surgery and I was in a bit of pain after but they kept me very comfortable. I met with Louise (I think this was her name or it could have been Louisa) 10 days after my surgery and she was so lovely and checked to make sure everything was okay. I'm so happy with the service that was provided and I couldn't be happier with the results. I would highly recommend Dr Sarakbi and the Watford branch. Thank you for such a speedy process and being so great at answering all my questions.
Fantastic care! Wonderful nurses! Great customer service! Couldn't be more happy with my surgery, my fillers & would highly recommend!

The Harley Medical group have been absolutely amazing from when I went for my first consultation to after the surgery, they made me feel very welcome and answered any questions I had, also very happy with the results !!

Couldn?��t recommend enough! Had my consultation on Saturday and booked my surgery on Monday. This is a procedure I have been wanting for around 8 years and have reaseched all company?��s. Counting down the days until June for my procedure, very excited. Thank you Deborah Rea for everything!

review_title: Everything I hoped from an initial consultation
review_body: Everybody I?��ve dealt with incredibly friendly and helpful. My initial consultation was very informative, unrushed and gave me the time to ask questions

I would definitely recommend Nadia Imran for Laser Treatments. She was very thorough and walked through every step of the treatment explaining it very well. Once the treatment started again she was very thorough in keeping me updated on what she was doing. Felt totally at ease. Lovely lady.

I just had my cast taken off for my Closed septo-rhinoplasty with Dr Sleiter. I was so nervous I cried before even getting the cast off, but I cried even more when I saw the results! Tears of joy! I couldn?��t be happier with my new nose if I tried. dr Sleiter is an excellent surgeon. He did exactly as I asked!

My surgical councillor Deborah was so attentive and caring. She made me feel at ease and answered all my questions I had. I explained what I wanted and she totally understood what I wanted. I would recommend The Harley Medical group for their professional yet welcoming atmosphere.

review_title: The Harley Medical team are great at ?�?
review_body: The Harley Medical team are great at making you feel relaxed and takes the time to answer any questions you may have and you never feel rushed

review_title: Harley Medical Group have been amazing!!

My initial consultation with a Jenna was very easy, she made me feel very comfortable and had so much knowledge that she answered all of my initial questions before I had time to ask them. I?��m looking forward to the rest of my journey with the Harley Medical Group and strongly believe that I have made the right decision of surgeon and company to undertake my breast augmentation with.
Friendly and helpful staff! Great results
I had a consultation with the harley medical group in manchester last year  am still yet to make a decision who it will be who carrys out my otoplasty.

I waited a year and a half to write this review because, frankly, it's been a difficult journey and writing one up wasn't exactly a priority. Now that I am healed, healthy, and clear of mind, I see how important it is to review Mr. Sarakbi, since when I started on this path I too scoured for any nugget of reassurance.

I have used the Harley medical group in London (Harley Street) for almost 2 years now. I have been having laser treatment for unwanted facial hair. All the staff are extremely friendly. I have seen a few therapists and I must say that Sarah Shaban is the best that I have ever come across. Her work is to a high standard, she?��s extremely thorough, and precise, every time I have a treatment with Sarah I come out of there feeling I really have had a high quality treatment. Just felt like Sarah deserved a mention on here. Alice.

review_title: Everyone is very friendly and helpful
review_body: Everyone is very friendly and helpful

I went to them for Gynecomastia. They advertised on the website that first consultation is free with no obligations. But later they charged me �100 for it. After consultation with surgent they told me to pay in full to confirm the surgery decision. They gave me a date with was not suitable for me. So they charged me 20% of the cost for not accepting the date.

I had rhinoplasty surgery done over 2 years ago. I still have a bump which i am not happy with. I went back to meet with my surgeon within the 2 year time frame that was given to be told that he thinks my nose looks fine and that he's not going to operate on it again. He was very dismissive and disagreed with everything that i said. Prior to meeting him, I met with a lady from their Wimbledon branch who agreed that there was still a bump and that if i'm not happy then the surgeon would be happy to help. I travelled over 2 hours to meet the surgeon and as you can probably gauge i was very upset and disappointed to have spent over �5000 and still not be happy with my nose. The surgeon was generally nice and polite, just felt that he couldn't be bothered to operate again as it's more hassle for him which is a shame. I feel that Harley Street shouldn't offer a 2 year cover if the surgeons are not happy to re-do or amend a procedure. I will now have to pay another company a further �5000 to have my bump removed which I very isn't unacceptable considering they're a big firm.

Harley Medical are amazing. I had consultations with numerous companies and knew as soon as I walked out the door, that Harley Medical was the right place for me. So welcoming and informative. I could never ask too many questions, they went and above and beyond at every point of contact. I had 100% confidence in them from the start, my results are amazing and the post-op care has been just as brilliant as the rest. Couldn?��t recommend them enough!

You instantly feel welcome and comfortable. It honestly feels like talking to a good friend of many years. I wasn?��t afraid to open up and all my questions were answered with knowledge and clarity which completely put my mind at ease.
I've wanted Rhinoplasty for almost two decades and so you imagine, finding a place that would help me to realise that dream was very important.

review_title: Harley Medical have been absolutely amazing!!
review_body: Harley Medical have been absolutely fantastic from my very first appointment, throughout my surgery and all aftercare. I can't thank everyone at the Liverpool clinic enough for everything they've done for me especially Lesley and Natalie! I wouldn't hesitate to recommend them to a friend, in fact I already have to a few and if I was to have any more cosmetic procedures I wouldn't dream of going anywhere else. xxxx
Excellent knowledge about laser hair removal, able to explain the process well. Friendly staff. Multiple locations and flexiblity with dates. Good promotions

review_title: Great experience with the Harley Medical Group
review_body: I have had an absolutely amazing experience from start to finish with the Harley Medical Group. I had rhinoplasty 7 months ago with Dr Solomos and it was honestly the best money I?��ve ever spent. I always felt so looked after and they were so attentive, always phoning and checking up on me along the journey. I  recently had my birthday and received a �100 gift voucher from them to use on a treatment. This came as a lovely surprise and I?��m going to put it towards dermarolling. Would highly recommend.

My experience was friendly and comfortable with Danny she made me feel at ease to ask her all the questions, putting any doubt I previously had gone!!!! I now am excited to book a consultation with the consultant and hopefully get my operation  in the near future .
Great service, friendly staff and very happy with my treatment.
Lovely welcoming experience.  Highly recommend leeds Harley medical centre.  Helpful and friendly
Easy address to find, easy to park, very friendly receptionist and nurse, fuss-free and informative consultation and procedure! Can't say more than that!

What a pleasant experience! Going in I was quite nervous but the staff at the clinic, Highgate hospital and Mr G were incredible. I am so pleased with my results from breast augmentation and would recommend Harley Medical Group and Mr G to any of my family or friends who might be thinking about it. 2 weeks later and I have had very little pain or discomfort and also very neat incisions which are healing nicely. I went for the 350cc implants and was suggested by Mr G to go on top of the muscle, a good choice! Before I was a B Cup and now I am DD. I wasn't sure about choosing 350cc over 325cc but now that the swelling has gone down I am happy with my decision and they suit my frame very well. I am very happy and feel a lot more confident in myself! Thank you.

review_title: I came here 10 years ago and had ?�?
review_body: I came here 10 years ago and had wonderful service and a great facelift.10 years have passed and I need a little tweeking,so where would my first point of call be???The Harley Medical Group.

review_title: Bad rhinoplasty...I wish I never went here!
review_body: I had rhinoplasty in 2009 and have had serious issues ever since, they performed two revision surgeries, I had countless appointments and was told by the medical director that I needed a third revision surgery to fix my nose but after that Harley Medical Group avoided all my calls and emails. Not only does my nose look terrible from the outside, inside the septum is massively leaning over to one side, I struggle to breathe every single day and often have to use nasel sprays. I have a smell of rotten fish in my nose and I still have a stitch left in the bottom of my nose which if I tug I can feel pulling through to the other nostril. This stitch irritates my like crazy and I've often got my fingers up my nose scratching it which then leads to my fingers being covered in blood. I have a constant bunged up feeling but if I blow my nose nothing comes out. I'm always having to cough up thick green stuff that seems to be stuck behind my nose and at the back of my thoat. I also have a clear runny water that drips down my nose which I read can be the water surrounding your brain leaking down your nose. I even saw an article a few years ago which said that my surgeon had been banned from practicing in the UK after receiving so many complaints and being sued. Having surgery here was the worst decision ever, I've suffered for almost 10 years and currently saving up for the reconstructive surgery that I need to help me love a normal life that isn't dominated by my nose everyday. I spent another night crying about this which is what's lead me to leave this review. If you're thinking of getting rhinoplasty take the time to find a specialist and pay the money for it. You're nose is a sophisticated and amazing part of your body and has a vital function, you don't want just any old person messing with it.

Excellent service...no nonsense approach to what I needed to know and what I want in cosmetic surgery....I found the choices of surgeons and the cost amazing and very realistic....I would recommend anyone who would like anything in cosmetic surgery to feel the way I feel after just a consultation ...leading onto see the surgeon of my choice then a day date in the near future for the surgery to go ahead in London this year....Miss Willow Herve...5th January 2018.

From my initial consultation with Meg I was happy and comfortable to leave my life changing surgery in their hands when I met my surgeon Mark Solomons I was so pleased he clearly knew his stuff and I was confident that I was going to love my results. Just 7 days after my breast enlargement and I am totally in love with my results I literally cannot take myself away from the mirror and the best thing is my results look so natural! My recovery has been a breeze I've had barely no pain just a little discomfort as expected and I have such mininmal bruising it's basically non existent! I can't recommend Mark enough he really does know his stuff and I'm so thankful for his work he really has changed my life!

I?��ve read an number of these reviews but the London Branches and the Mr Solomos the surgeon I could not say nice words about. I 100% reccomed Mr Solomos, every memeber of staff were absolutely love and most important the results of my breast augmentation are absolutely unreal. Thank you so much!
From start to finish the nurses were very attentive. Dr Solomos was also excellent. He listened well to what I wanted. Very pleased with the overall experience.

I?��ve had a really wonderful experience at Harley Medical, all the Staff and my Surgeon were extremely helpful and so kind; I had a lot of reservations about having surgery originally, but the clinic really helped to set my mind at ease. Now post-op I love the results of my surgery, and can?��t wait for my next one! Would truly recommend Harley Medical to anybody.

review_title: Lesley Ainsworth is THE best nurse in Liverpool
review_body: Lesley Ainsworth is THE best nurse in Liverpool. She is the only person I would let touch my face and always makes sure I am fully aware of what procedures entail and that I am making the right decision for me.
I love how my practioner Sarah is always talking through the treatment and making sure I am at ease. I am glad I have a professional like her who knows her stuff! Thank you Sarah x

review_title: My experience of Harley Street Medical Group
review_body: I like the friendly athmostphere, all the staff make you welcome and are friendly, speaking from previous surgical procedures and non surgical procedures I have never had any problems or complications even though I was warned that with any surgical procedure nothing can be guaranteed, I would never consider anyone else to carry out any future procedures either

I would absolutely recommend The Harley Medical Group to anyone and already have! I had an amazing experience from the very first consultation to now 2 weeks post op! You are treated with the upmost respect and cared for extremely well! I couldn?��t of wished for a better and smoother experience. Thankyou so much to everyone.
Very friendly and professional staff !!!

review_title: My experience so far has been ?�?
review_body: My experience so far has been absolutely amazing and I haven't even had my surgery yet!! The team at Harley medical centre have made me feel so comfortable and welcome and so at ease with the surgery I will be getti g done. My consultation with Sophie Walsh was more than fantastic! We had such a giggle aswell as going through all the procedures etc. If you are considering any type of surgery I would highly recommend these guys. I'm not even one bit nervous about my surgery but I am really excited.
Well trained staff and they are very sociable.
Fantastic friendly staff. The treatments deliver what they promise to. Always a vacant place to park.

review_title: Please do not use this company
review_body: Please do not use this company. I am really not happy with my Rhinoplasty. Very poor job done. Before the Rhinoplasty it was straight with a bump. But instead of just getting rid of the bump they managed to make is wonky as hell and looks weird. It looks wonky and it's not symmetrical. Very unhappy. They will tell you that you will be happier after the surgery, but I am so unhappy now. Also, the aftercare was an absolute joke. When I rang it sounded like a single mother with her kids screaming in the background. She was extremely unhelpful and had zero compassion. Oh, and I almost forgot that they tried to rip me off �500 charge for changing dates. I really wish i never used this company. Please look elsewhere guys.
I haven't had my operation yet so I will provide a more accurate review after that! But so far everything's been absolutely fine and I feel like I'm in good hands.
Amazing. Couldn?��t fault them in any way!
I felt the whole process was very professional and I felt in safe hands considering it was my first time having lip filler. I would 100% recommend to friends and go back again!

Upon my first consultation I was put straight at ease. Everything was explained clearly and thoroughly for me so that I really understood the ins and outs of my treatment. The woman who held my consultation was very honest with the effect the treatment may have on me / how well it would work, which is really encouraging considering a lot of places would happily take your money before properly assessing what is required. I am really excited to start my laser treatment with the Harley medical group and would be happy to share another review on the results once I have finished my course.
Great service!

Very pleased with the care from this company right from the start. Waiting area extremely clean and tidy staff very friendly and helpful. I had lots of questions to ask about my treatment and the ladies had all the information I needed. I would recommend The Harley Medical.
Great experience at the Liverpool centre, super friendly and welcoming staff made me feel at ease from the start.
Nothing is to much trouble, they are above standards and will go out their way to cater to your needs. Very polite, friendly and a calm environment. They put any worries at ease! I highly recommend.
Great experience, over the moon with my results from my open rhinoplasty and lovely staff :)

I had juvuderm volilift in my lips and it was my first time having any kind of procedure like this done. I was soooo nervous however the nurses were so comforting. The doctor was extremely patient with me, my nerves and my 101 questions. I was petrified I would be left looking fake however he promised me I wouldn?��t. AND I DONT! My lips are undetectable. I had 0.5ml put into my top lip as it was hardly visible, especially against my much fuller normal looking bottom lip. Now my face is symmetrical and in complete Balance.

review_title: Everyone I've met or spoken with
review_body: Everyone I've met or spoken with - either via email or telephone - has been friendly, polite and approachable. The team at the Brighton clinic are down to earth, kind and always happy to help which made me feel so at ease.

review_title: Professionalism and care at harley medical
review_body: The staff at the harley medical centre in Cardiff are amazing. They are so professional and caring and just amazing at their jobs. Their professionalism is second to none and I wouldn't hesitate in recommending anyone to them

Visited the Birmingham clinic to improve my skin and I am now undergoing dermaquest treatments and have seen a big difference so far! I am really impressed, the staff are really friendly but my practitioner Danielle is great, she put me at such ease and informed me of everything, the process of the treatments and what to expect. I?��d highly recommend this girl if anyone is visiting Birmingham. I feel so much more confidence now. I would definitely recommend Harley medical
Excellent company with genuinely nice and knowledgable staff, couldn't fault them at all. And the surgery was a breeze, couldn't recommend enough!
Excellent services
Looked clean and very professional, staff friendly and welcoming. Answered all of my questions.
Pressure sellers. "If you don't book right now and pay your deposit then we might not be able to do surgery for some time.... The surgeons are very busy!" Complete rubbish.
Trying to get a breast reduction done privately as NHS are skint and said no despite my prescription HRT being the cause of massive waps.

review_title: Melisa who does my treatments is very ?�?
review_body: Melisa who does my treatments is very nice( friendly). This makes the time goes quicker and makes me to enjoy the treatments I am having every time.
I would recommend The Harley Medical Group, they are friendly and very proffesional, the clinic in Northampton is very clean and hygienic. There is no hard sell, but they do keep in touch.

I had never had any sort of surgery and was unsure on what I wanted I had breast augmentation I told the surgeon Dr Reza Nassab I wanted a double D which I know you can?��t be guaranteed a cup size i could still wear my old bras after having the surgery the only thing that had changed was the shape and I wanted them bigger which he was aware of. From the second I came out of surgery I hated them even when they was swollen then Harley Medical then had the cheek to ask me to pay 6000 for them to be redone wouldn?��t go back here if it was for free!!! Dr Reza then shown me before and after photos of breast augmentation he had done after he realised I wasn?��t happy I don?��t understand why he didn?��t do that in the consultation !???? Wouldn?��t reccomend Harley Medical to anyone worse customer service! Made me wait 6 months to make a complaint ! To make sure I was definitely not happy about them

review_title: Amazing staff from start to finish ?�?
review_body: Amazing staff from start to finish thank you all so much. Kate was very welcoming and extremely helpful when I first went to Harley medical in jesmond. Dr Sleiter is a wonderful guy and what I can see from my cast been taken off 2 days ago it's exactly what a wanted! This is an amazing man who is very clever with rhinoplasty. Anyone wanting this procedure this is the man to go with.
Understanding and friendly nurse who put me at ease while discussing my chosen procedures. I can?��t wait to have it done, even as soon as Christmas 2017, wow !
My consultation was fantastic. Laura (Manchester) made me feel so comfortable with her friendly smiley attitude. She was extremely knowledgeable and tailored the consultation to my needs. Thank you!

review_title: I had the best experience from ?�?
review_body: I had the best experience from beginning to end. The care I received was amazing and if I had any questions HMG were happy enough to answer them. I had rhinoplasty and after the surgery I had very high blood pressure. The nurses at the wellbeck hospital were in and out checking I was ok and anything I needed they would get it for me. Can't fault the whole experience!

review_title: information Provided is great and a friendly patient advisor
review_body: Great information received in an email to review again at home on procedure I am considering. Showed me photos and answered all the questions I had.

review_title: Dr Thrush was for me the right choice for my Breast procedure.
review_body: I went to the Harley Medical Group for a few reasons.
The HMG is professional, efficient and reassuring.
Excellent doctors and nurses who provide good information and the results I want. Also pretty easy to get an appointment.
Fantastic experience, very professional and friendly, I can?��t rate Cat more highly! Thank you so much :) xxx
Hello,
Friendly and knowledgeable staff provide exceptional care from initial consultation to post-surgery after-care.

review_title: Great experience from beginning to the ?�?
review_body: Great experience from beginning to the end result. Hospital experience was excellent with fantastic nursing care and excellent medical care. I would highly recommend.

review_title: I have done my research and visited a ?�?
review_body: I have done my research and visited a few other clinics Harley medical was the one for me. Booking my consultation was easy which I had with Sammi she was so nice, gentle and professional, she listen to what I wanted and how I wanted my breasts look with the implants I wanted. I?��ve decided to go with Harley medical but because I?��m going to go through finance I?��m going to save up as much as I can and put the rest on finance.
It's easy to talk to the staff and discuss different problems and solutions.

Wonderful experience with Harley Street medical group. All the staff were lovely and kind. I was so nervous about my procedure but everyone of them put my mind at ease. They all made me feel so comfortable?���

review_title: Very personable from reception to Consultant
review_body: Very personable from reception to consultant and then to the medical review prior to the operation, a very thorough check up and sound medical advise As a result I found I had high blood pressure, so had to visit my GP, my operation is now postponed until I am medically fit to proceed with my procedure.

Really great experience with my patient counsellor at the HMG Jesmond. She had lots of information and didn?��t beat around the bush about anything. My boyfriend had more questions than me and she was more than happy to answer them. She herself had a BA by the same surgeon I am going to see and I am really Positive about going ahead with this procedure.

I have been to several consultations but Harley Medical Group really stood out to me. I met with Katie Ashman who was absolutely wonderful and definitely was very experienced and knowledgable especially in comparison to previous consultants that i had seen. She was very reassuring and informative about some aspects of breast augmentation that i was unsure about. Very impressive and highly experienced company. Would recommend to anyone!
Excellent experience with caring, professional staff and nurses. Can?��t wait to see my final result.

review_title: The Harley Medical Group are very ?�?
review_body: The Harley Medical Group are very professional, polite and extremely helpful, when attending my appointments I am greeted with a smile and made to feel welcome. All questions are answered there and then, nothing has been too much trouble for then, even when I have needed to change my appointment dates. I would recommend the Harley Medical Group to anyone, I have not had my surgery as yet so will leave feed back, once I have.

Cat in the Marlow office had me sold from the day I met her. Technically, I did everything wrong and didn't 'shop' around but I trusted so much in what she was saying, I felt 100% comfortable. She couldn't speak highly enough of my surgeon, Mark Solomos and so I was happy to proceed with him. He's a busy guy and whilst I wasn't able to build a connection with him in my appointment before hand, as I would have liked to, he 1000% knows his stuff and within minutes had the perfect implant mapped out for me. He just knows immediately what he is doing. My expectation was for them to be natural and that's exactly what he's given me (once the swelling has gone!) On the day of surgery, I was able to joke with him and it made me feel at ease but all the other staff made me feel comfortable too, the whole day so I really never questioned my choice and so far so good with recovery (6 1/2 weeks later) everything feels good and looks good so i'm a really happy customer!!

review_title: My experience at Harley Medical was ?�?
review_body: My experience at Harley Medical was fantastic!! It?��s such a scary feeling getting cosmetic surgery but the people at Harley are so sweet!! My nurse Rebecca Warrant has been amazing and so sweet throughout everything and so pleased for me when I told her I was going through with it! My surgeon Mark Solomas was really great and made me feel very comfortable with everything we discussed!! He has done a fantastic job and would recommend him to anyone!! Such a lovely man aswell! Best experience ever! If I had to I?��d do it all over again! I can?��t thank everyone at Harley Medical and Highgate Hospital enough! You all are a pleasure! Very lucky girl to have met some amazing people!
i had research this company (and others) before my consultation looking at patient reviews consultants exp clinics/hosp used

I was very nervous prior to the consultation but as soon as I walked into the clinic i felt very welcome and at ease, thanks to the lady who greeted me in reception. The lady who I had the consultation with, Hayley Edmonstone also made me feel very at ease and I was very satisfied with the consultation I had with her. I know that Hayley has undergone the procedure that I am looking into and I feel that she was able to give me much more in-depth information. This was the first consultation I had gone to with cosmetic surgery and I have booked to see the surgeon as I was so pleased with the overall service.

Definitely recommend Harley In Liverpool to anyone. Very professional and knowledgeable. Your first impression when met by receptionist puts you at ease. Lesley Ainsworth Clinical Manager is fantastic she makes you feel your the only client and gets to know you as an individual, Thank You

I've had my breast implants and my rhinoplasty done at the Harley medical group, both were done by Bernard sleiter. I couldn't be happier, he knew exactly what to do and how to make me look as natural as possible, my nose is better than I could ever have imagined!
