Thank you for making me feel so much better about myself. Would recommend to anyone .

It took them 10 minutes to take the money out of my account to reserve an appointment but, now that I have decided not to go ahead with it, it will apparently take 28 days to refund me. And that is after a phone call asking me to explain myself. This has to be the worst customer service I have come across in some time.

I visited the Wimbledon clinic regarding my hyperpigmentation. Staff were very friendly and I was made to feel welcome, the nurse I saw was also very nice. I was sold products for �200+ which, I was told would make a significant difference and yet haven't made 1 bit of difference whatsoever. Very disappointed to say the least!
Very profressional and welcoming! I felt really comfortable straight away! kate was really friendly, helpful and put no pressure on me at all

review_title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME ON THIS COMPANY!!
review_body: Absolutely atrocious service at Birmingham! Incompetent staff, time wasters, unnecessary problems created, LIARS, and horrendous attitudes!! A week before my surgery was supposed to take place I was still being told it may not happen because we made up a load of rubbish about you and now we have to look into it....tell me how that is my problem after paying a large amount of money for surgery I want??? I can't begin to tell you not to bother wasting your time with this company, they will string you along for months then drop you at the last hurdle if they don't like your face or a member of staff hasn't done their job properly and then they blame you!!! I have never come across such dishonest people and you are putting your life in their hands!!

review_title: I have had a great experience with ?�?
review_body: I have had a great experience with Harley Medical from start to finish. The staff in the Leeds clinic are fantastic. I was immediately made to feel at ease and comfortable by the lovely Pippa, followed by my appointment with Lynn. I am really pleased I picked my surgeon, Dr Sleiter. he has done an amazing job. I have just the first of my post-op reviews and all good so far. Would definitely recommend.

From start to end, everyone was lovely and I was so happy with my whole experience. I had an open rhinoplasty done at HMG by Mark Solomos and I'm two weeks down the line now and loving the results so so happy :)

Had a really great experience. The staff are brilliant and the results are fab, I feel great. Lynn has been amazing and I intend on having further treatments. The office staff in Leeds are great too.  I would recommend HMG to others who are looking for treatments.
It has a been a great experience for me with Harley Medical in Leeds.!!!

review_title: All of the staff were lovely and I had ?�?
review_body: All of the staff were lovely and I had the best after care possible, definintly using them in the future!

I had my Rhinoplasty just over 3 weeks ago by Dr Solomos, it is AMAZING! I'm so so happy with the results. The ladies I dealt with leading up to the operation and the care I received in the hospital after was nothing but outstanding, everyone was so friendly and helpful. By far one of the best decisions I have done and have recommended a few of my friends!

Had septoplasty and rhinoplasty, was happy with staff and with the work at first. Several years have passed (about 5) and my nose appears to have drooped again and is no longer straight. Disappointed considering the cost of the surgery and time taken to heal. Expected better. Have seen better work done by other places.
Great service especially from Deborah Lea who helped me make  good decision at the Manchester Clinic.

review_title: staff have been very helpful I was ?�?
review_body: staff have been very helpful I was reassured all the way very professional in every way happy I decided to go to Harley Medical

review_title: The staff were friendly and very ?�?
review_body: The staff were friendly and very considerate of the fact that I'm not good with needles. I'm very pleased with the results of my treatment as well.

review_title: Couldn't of had a better service
review_body: Couldn't of had a better service. All the girls in the Southampton branch were lovely and had the answers to all my questions. One of my friends is going through Harley Medical also as she saw how good the service was with myself. I will definitely be recommending further.

review_title: Would recommend harley medical group am ?�?
review_body: Would recommend harley medical group am always so happy after my lasor treatment . And smiling when i leave.

I chose Harley medical Manchester for my first ever lip fillers. The experience was amazing from the consultation to the procedure. Laura was brilliant during the consultation answering all my questions and some. I left knowing everything I needed to know and booked in for the fillers the following week. The procedure was carried out by Hannah who calmed me down and was so professional but friendly too. She was right when she said I'd love the results. I finally have the smile  I always wanted. I couldn't have chosen a better clinic so thank you ?��?

review_title: Absolutely first class attention to all ?�?
review_body: Absolutely first class attention to all detail at Harley Medical Group Brighton . Staff are always really polite and attentive. The nurses are very helpful and  professional, as well as highly skilled.. I can recommend HMG without hesitation .

review_title: Everyone is so friendly and happy to ?�?
review_body: Everyone is so friendly and happy to help. I felt like I had a million questions, and felt silly for questioning the size I had chosen to go for my BA, but they reassured me it was perfectly normal and that mine was the fourth phone call they took that day asking the same question! They were so patient and made sure to allow me extra time at my next appointment to try on the size one more time so I could rest assured. This meant so much to me, and truly is an example of how patient and understanding everyone at Harley Medical really is!
A nice clean modern waiting room, secure access, very friendly staff.
So happy with my Laser Hair Removal results after just 2 treatments the hair is significantly reduced!
Lovely service , knowledgeable and helpful staff .
Professionally trained staff. Comfortable environment. Not pushy when it comes to what you want done. They give you their professional advice.

During my consultation with the Harley Medical Group I was told the surgeon i would be having breast augmentation with was quite famous, having appeared on tv shows about plastic surgery. Naturally this would put your mind at rest that you're in good hands. A few weeks before surgery after requesting links to the shows he appeared on i was informed that there was a mix up and he never appeared on any programme. It may seem minor but i felt a bit duped that they try impress you with false information during the 'sales pitch'.

This was my first time visiting the Harley Medical Group in Liverpool, and I must say I'm extremely impressed. I was unsure how it would go as this would be my first treatment of this kind, ever! The receptionist and nurse made me feel so welcome and at ease, so much so that as soon as I left I called to schedule my appointments. I cannot wait to go back to begin my laser hair removal sessions and to see the results. I couldn't recommend the company enough, I only wish I that I booked in sooner, what was I waiting for?!
I am delighted with Sally's work (Birmingham). Supremely professional.

I couldn't be any happier with my experience with nurse Anna Beal at the Wimbledon clinic. As it was my first time getting lip fillers, she took me through the whole process and was able to answer every question I had. I felt she was extremely professional and friendly which made me feel at ease. I will definitely be going to her again in the near future. Staff in the call centre however could use some training and I was repeatedly told misinformation about the same issue.
I had a helpful, honest and reassuring consultation at the Birmingham clinic.

review_title: Very happy with the Harley medical ?�?
review_body: Very happy with the Harley medical group everyone is friendly and keep in contact to see if you're okay. The Highgate hospital were amazing, everyone came into my room and introduced themselves, I was kept informed on timings throughout the morning they couldn't have done anymore for me. Dr Solomos was amazing! Very honest and scaring looks amazing already only 11 days post op! I am just waiting for my boobs to settle as one is a little more swollen than the other.
Excellent service and Emma explained what was going to happen before the treatment.

review_title: First class service from start to ?�?
review_body: First class service from start to finish. Wonderful results. Would recommend 100%...

review_title: From going to meet the nurse Phillipa ?�?
review_body: From going to meet the nurse Phillipa to meeting the surgeon I felt at ease. All the staff look after you and would do anything for u

review_title: Nurse shared her own personal experience and advice...
review_body: Very happy with my meeting with the nurse. Whilst getting my rhinoplasty splint removed she was extremely friendly and put me at ease, sharing her own personal experience with me!

review_title: I am yet to have my surgery with HMG
review_body: I am yet to have my surgery with HMG, but so far I have no complaints about the service I have received. Everyone has been more than helpful even when I got my appointment times mixed up they were very helpful and have made me feel very at ease.

Absolutely SHOCKING customer service! The London clinic is terrible! I have had excellent experiences at the Bristol clinic but when I went to the London clinic I was shocked at how appalling it was. I had been charged for a missed appointment despite never being sent a confirmation email or a reminder email... and when i called to dispute it the staff were unhelpful and defiant. Save yourself the trouble and go somewhere else!

review_title: I went to the Harley Medical Group here ?�?
review_body: I went to the Harley Medical Group here 6 months ago. I have been spending 10 years trying to improve my skin (I suffered of acne scars) without any result.

Very professional. Treatments explained in great detail. Ttreatment still on going but i can see a difference after the first session. Staff very helpfull and approachable. I would reccomend the Harley Medical Group to friends.

review_title: Taken care of right from the start
review_body: Taken care of right from the start

review_title: I've been visiting the clinic in ?�?
review_body: I've been visiting the clinic in Birmingham for years now. The staff are professional but warm and friendly. The facility is pleasant and the service is good. I've never been disappointed with a treatment. Oh, and the coffee is nice too.

From day one everyone I have spoken to and met has been brilliant, honest and patient. All of the information about my op was available to me and I felt reassured every step of the way. I didn't hesitate to ask questions as I knew that they were happy to help. Shradha at the Chiswick Clinic has been supportive through my journey and the nurses and Wimbledon have been looking after me very well. Dr Mark Solomos has done a fantastic job on my Breast Reductiom and I am very happy with the life changing results! All in all I wouldn't hesitate to recommend HMG, in fact I already have!

m part way through my laser hair removal treatment and so far everyone I've encountered has been nothing but helpful. From a useful voice on the phone helping me to find the right treatment for me (and the greatest value option) to a friendly face during each session it's been a great experience so far.

review_title: A lovely friendly very helpful place!!
review_body: A lovely friendly very helpful place!!! Put me very at easy in a situation that was all very new and scary to me.
Amazing experience!
Always professional and helpful. I can't not see my self going elsewhere.
Very professional, friendly and I've had excellent results

The Nottingham clinic were welcoming and friendly.  The professional and informative staff made me feel very comfortable and at ease at my initial consultation. I feel like I would be in safe hands for both the surgery and the after care.

I'm not one for leaving reviews but when a company has been this amazing, I absolutely have to. From my first intial consultation all the way through my surgery and the aftercare afterwards has been faultless. Every single member of staff are helpful and there with you every step of the way. I had a breast uplift by Mr Solomos and I couldn't be happier with my results. I would highly recommend all my family and friends.

At Manchester Harley street branch I've had several filler treatments there now and the results have been good enough but it's the attitude of the staff that's not. I have b"@?h miserable face yes because of a down turned mouth but that's what bothers me that I came to correct as far as so be treated like a pain for it even though I'm actually a nice well mannered person is upsetting. With no one in the waiting room why send to me wait in a side room, do they do this so they can discuss patients thinking they don't know because it seems like it. The consultant comes across false and the experience was just not right. Transform have been good the last few times so I'm staying with them now.
Harley Street Medical group are amazing!

review_title: Harley Medical Group - A winning formula
review_body: I found Harley Medical Group combined first class professionalism with warmth (a winning formula in my opinion).  It has been a pleasure dealing with them
Polite,proffessional and.expert service i have ever had would highly recommend.

review_title: NO NO NO!!!!!!! SHAMBLES OF A COMPANY
review_body: Never ever would I recommend this company...... after surgery being cancelled 1 week before it was due and being told the reason for this cancellation was because the anaesthetist believed I couldnt cope with the pain ( is this even a valid reason? ) I was then Charged �350...... after trying to discuss this I was then told I hadn't even had any procedures with them so they had no reason to speak with me........ anyway since then I've gone to a much more professional company with fully competent staff..... from admin through to the amazing surgeon who performed my surgery to an exceptional standard (dealt with pain like a true warrior may I just)...... my advice...... steer well clear of this company especially the clinic manager Deborah Rea........ unless you would just like to experience how not to be treated....... !

review_title: The Harley Medical group at Southampton ?�?
review_body: The Harley Medical group at Southampton have been fantastic. Especially my nurse Trish. She gave me all the information I would need to make an informed decision and made me feel so comfortable every step of the way for my procedures. Everything has gone perfectly and I am so incredibly happy. My surgeon Mark Solomos was amazing and has done a fantastic job. The results are so much more then i could of hoped for. Thank you all so much

review_title: The staff are very welcoming and ?�?
review_body: The staff are very welcoming and friendly and actually listen and keep really positive! Would definitely recommend the Harley medical group!
Friendly , approachable staff,always helpful and all questions answered, gave good advise and helped me to make an informed decision about my operation
I had a consultation for laser hair removal with Sarah and it was just a great experience. The receptionist was polite and made me feel very welcome.
Extremely unprofessional service. Appointment for 4 was delayed to 5 then 5.15 the. 5.25. Left without receiving treatment  at 5.35 when told of yet another delay. Waste of an afternoon!
Extremely Happy with the excellent service received. I was looked after every step of the way and the results are wonderful. Would highly recommend to anyone.

Was asked for personal and sensitive medical details by the receptionist, who wouldn't let me schedule an appointment without answering her invasive questions. The questions were not at all relevant and should have been something to be discussed with a medical professional, not a receptionist!
Very Friendly helpful staff. They tailor packages to suit your needs and do not try to sell unnecessary extras.

review_title: My experience with The Harley Medical ?�?
review_body: My experience with The Harley Medical Group was perfect from start to finish. I am now just under four weeks post breast aug op and I am over the moon with my results. Dr Sarakbi really knew what he was doing and I 100% recommend him. Nurses Sarah and Yasmin in the Harley Street clinic were so supportive. Even now if I have any issues or worries they're more than happy to book me in for an appointment which is usually within the same week. Could not fault them one bit.
Excellent staff. very helpful. definitely recommend

Had an amazing experience with the Harley medical group, I just recently had Rhinoplasty surgery and I couldn't be happier with the results so far from Dr. Sleiter ?���. I couldn't rate the staff at the Manchester clinic high enough either they're all so friendly and helped me feel at ease, and have felt welcomed on every visit from my consultation all the way up to having my cast removed! Iv already recommended this place to two girls who are considering surgery as I feel you couldn't get better! Very very happy, 100% with everything thanks so much ?���
Absolutely fantastic experience so far, excellent staff! Very happy!!!
Wonderful staff and knowledge :)

review_title: Why ask us to answer personal medical ?�?
review_body: Why ask us to answer personal medical questions over the telephone when we are only booking for a consultation to meet with someone who will then ask us the same questions?! This is not appropriate over the telephone and I have no confidence of the security of this
Excellent service! Friendly, approachable and supportive staff, always there to help and reassure. Would definitely recommend The Harley Medical Group, Edgbaston Clinic.

Really bad service. Staff does not do any patch tasting. People like me has to suffer for there mistakes.Northampton branch has unprofessional staff who doesn't treat there coustomers properly. Really dissipointed unhappy. They treat me badly. Paid �750. To get severe infection on my face. My face was completliy damage by them. Staff did not take any responsibility at all. No apology no compensation what's evere. End up dealing with alone still have the scar and dark pigmentation all over my face because it was burnt so badly. I strongly do not recommend to any one this Harley medical branch.

I have had nose surgery and lip fillers done through the Marlow clinic and couldn't recommend them enough. From the start through to the aftercare, they do everything they can for you and the results are great.
Excellent very friendly very helpful and explained every thing really well
A friendly and professional service.

I would definitely recommend Harley medical to anyone, the care and service I received was second to none. Mr smith the consultant was extremely helpful and I couldn't be more happy with the outcome. Thank you to you all for helping me make the best decision of my life an easy and pleasant one.
Lovely professional staff, no pressure just helpful information. The after care is also wonderful. Don't go any where else !!

review_title: Everyone at the Harley Medical Group ?�?
review_body: Everyone at the Harley Medical Group Leeds are fantastic! From the moment you enter to the moment you leave they can't do enough for you!
Excellent service, lovely, knowledgeable staff & perfect opening hours for people who work full time.
Would recommend to anyone

review_title: I went the The Harley Medical group ?�?
review_body: I went the The Harley Medical group based in Leeds. Both in the hospital (The Alexandra) and in the clinic, staff have been amazing, everyone is so friends and I felt so looked after. I felt like you are the heart of it all and they do what's best for you. Staff at the hospital really looked after me they were all so friendly and caring. And at consultations I never felt pressured and felt at ease telling them what I wanted and any worries I had. Harley medical even rang me the day after to see how I was and if I needed anything and I also got a card before my op wishing me luck! I've already recommended to 2 of my friends and would 100% recommend this company to anyone. I had rhinoplasty and I am so so so happy with my results. Thankyou very much
The treatment is really effective, significantly weakening hair after every session. The staff is really competent and friendly , which is the cherry on the cake!
I had such a fantastic consultation with Sophie. She was welcoming, easy to talk to, understanding and told me everything I needed to know about going forward with the process.

Upon first impressions, Dr Allwin came across as very humble man. I had a deviated septum and also breathing problems through my left nostril. I had wanted my nose corrected for a long time. We agreed that he would perform septorhinoplasty, but that he could not guarantee that he could get my nose 100% straight. I went into the contract under the impression that if my nose wasn't as straight as I wanted it, I could have corrective surgery. With full trust, I had the surgery and was very disappointed with my results. My nose is still deviated and not as straight as I would have liked, and my nostrils are completely uneven. The tip of my nose is horrendous and I much preferred it before the surgery. My nose is straighter, but I haven't had many improvements with the breathing and the tip of my nose is completely messed up as well as my nostrils. When I had the post- op appointment, I told Dr Allwin I wasn't happy with my nose and he got the contract out in front of me and told me that we agreed he couldn't get it 100% straight. I was very disappointed with his reaction. He should have at least showed concern. I laughed and said to him that showing me that is like setting me up for failure. After this, he proceeded to 'show concern', although I didn't feel as though he was exactly showing concern at all since he should have done this before showing me the contract. I paid him that money if I am not happy with my nose I expect him to do his job as a surgeon and correct it. From my own observations, it was as though he was trying to make it very difficult for me to have corrective surgery. I do not believe that Dr Allwin is practising in good faith. The moment he showed me the contract I completely lost trust in him. I was very disappointed with my nose and reported him to the manager. The chaperone that was present with us denied any recollection that he had shown me the contract. I requested a meeting with the both of them but was refused seeing as I said I didn't want corrective surgery with that doctor. I do not recommend Dr Allwin at all, or the Harley Medical Group.

i would definitely recommend Harley medical group to everyone.in fact I'm day one after my breast surgery and very happy already with the results I got.friends already wanting to look into having the same

review_title: Love the girls at the wimbledon branch!
review_body: Love the girls at the wimbledon branch!

The ladies at the Wimbledon branch are amazing, Danielle, Sorcha, Jo - what gems. They make you feel comfortable and relaxed. They give you all the information you require and then some. Love going there!
Excellent service and very professional job done.

review_title: The staff are so helpful and kept me at ?�?
review_body: The staff are so helpful and kept me at ease throughout the whole consultation, so I am now fully competent and confident about my procedure.
This is my second procedure with Harley medical group and am very impressed with the team there. They make you feel friendly and help to make the right choices. Would definitely recommend!

Professional service that makes you feel at ease. Does not feel like a sales environment as that would have made me go else where. I did not want to feel under any pressure what so ever and wanted to make my own informed choice. The women at the clinic are fantastic and explained everything to me and all prices and different options presented to me. I went ahead with the treatment and I have nothing but positive things to say

review_title: Very kind and you take care of your ?�?
review_body: Very kind and you take care of your customers, you help and make sure the customer gets exactly what they want. Happy to recommend!
Very friendly and professional. Reassuring. I feel completely happy with them and confident that they will look after me.
Very happy with everything throughout.

review_title: Have been to Harley for lip fillers a ?�?
review_body: Have been to Harley for lip fillers a few times and soon to have laser hair removal which I have heard good things about. The lip fillers I went for the most expensive product volift but it didn't last longer then a few months on me, and I have had it 3 times. They have been very helpful with this and will be trying out juverdermine smile next. The staff are so lovely and make me feel really comfortable, I wouldn't go anywhere else. I do think that they should offer loyalty discounts, I have been to them quite alot, and I have referred 2 friends.

The harley medical practice in Chelmsford have been brilliant from the start. Their call centre were very helpful and now having met the team, I can say it's even better than expected. The staff are very professional and confidential and all seem really happy to help. So far I have had my consultation and 3 laser treatments and am so pleased with the results so far and again, how lovely the staff are. I am sure I will be booking more treatments after this! Thank you all. X

review_title: My surgeon Alwin did my abdominoplasty ?�?
review_body: My surgeon Alwin did my abdominoplasty (fleur-de-lis ) he was very realistic and told me exactly what would happen and the results I could expect . I'm beyond happy with the results and my healing has been fast and thankfully uneventful. Nurse Lynn was fantastic throughout also. The manager Katie went above and beyond and gave me advice whenever I needed it. I was treated at the Highgate hospital London. The service was wonderful. Overall an excellent  experience from start to finish.

I'm not one for reviews but I had to leave one for The Harley Medical Group. Every part of my journey was amazing. The lady's at the Watford branch always made sure I had everything I needed, my mind was always at rest. My surgeon was Dr Philip Drew. All I can say is he was 100% worth waiting for. Always spoken to so politely and things were always made clear so there was no confusion. So happy with the outcome. Although it was a compromise for what I essentially needed (a lift), my breasts turned out better then I could have imagined. Would recommend.
At the Harley Medical Group I feel confident that I am being treated with face fillers by qualified nurses. I wouldn't risk going anywhere else.

review_title: My experience with the Harley Medical ?�?
review_body: My experience with the Harley Medical Group has been 5* throughout! From my first consultation to the removal of my rhinoplasty cast. They have been professional and approachable. Highly recommend.
Not bad service, I think prices are reasonable so all in all good stuff!
Very helpful with information, up to date woth all information. Very friendly, made to feel comfortable during  consultation .

Katie and her team at the Leeds clinic went out of their way to make me feel at ease with the procedure I was having, and I felt that they were/still are with me every step of the way. From the card I received wishing me luck prior to surgery, to the bunch of flowers afterwards, the team made lots of small gestures that all created a feeling of care and trust. I would gladly recommend The Harley Medical group and would continue to use them in the future. Lucy
Hi

The staff at the Birmingham Clinic are really welcoming and Friendly. Kyomi and Rachel my laser hair therapists are fantastic the treatment is not painful and I've had fantastic results from only 4/5 treatments I cannot wait to see the finally result once I've finished the pack of treatments purchased.

review_title: Always a nice friendly atmosphere only ?�?
review_body: Always a nice friendly atmosphere only once had someone rude on phone but decided to ignore it as everyone else really lovely
Fantastic care from arrival. Very patient care focused. Kept well informed, not much waiting around and staff very helpful and caring

Really professional service, the staff were all friendly and listened to any questions or concerns I had.  The consultant and surgery team were amazing helping to put me at ease.  The surgery went perfectly with out any complications, the healing process went even better than I had thought and researched.

The nurses that I had appointments with were all really friendly and down to earth. This includes the one I saw for my initial consultation, the one who I saw after my meeting with the surgeon and also the nurse who did my pre op - I Iiked how some of them had also had the same procedure so were able to give me honest advice and they put me at ease.

The support and care with Harley Medical is amazing. Treated with upmost respect and friendliness from start to finish. Constant communication leaves you feeling reassured you're in the best hands and that you're cared for as an individual. Can't speak highly enough of them all!

The staff have been very friendly and welcoming. If my appointment is running late, the staff are very apologetic and helpful, I cannot fault the service and how professional everyone is. The experience has eased the stress and nervousness of my surgery.

Would highly recommend to anyone. The staff are incredibly helpful and really go that extra mile to ensure you are happy. I had never had fillers before so was very nervous and the consultant,Verity, was incredibly reassuring and took the time to explain every option, making sure I understood each product so I could make the right decision. I am over the moon with how natural the results are and couldn't be happier!

review_title: Ver Very understanding and made me feel ?�?
review_body: Ver Very understanding and made me feel very well cared for.

My experience here has been horrendous, I came to the Harley medical due to the name and reputation they had for laser hair removal. And I am shocked at the service and care I have received, to get appointments is a joke, I have always had to wait months in between my treatments, so my hair growth is still The same as before I had this treatment, and I've spent ALOT of money on this and I am appalled. Staff members don't care about your situation, or that you've had no treatments for months they are just a person at the end of the phone.
I'm 34 days pre op and they have been great so far

review_title: Brilliant care from start to finish and ?�?
review_body: Brilliant care from start to finish and beyond i would recommend to anyone who wants plastic surgery
Everyone is so helpful, friendly and professional

Fantastic company -all staff wonderful. Consultations were great, all questions answered. Able to try on different implant sizes and pictures were taken for me. Sophie was so sweet and helpful. Surgeon Dr Sleiter was so knowledgeable and knew exactly what he was doing. Helped me pick the perfect size for me, I'm now so in proportion now. I'm 3 weeks post op and they already look amazing. Would definitely recommend this company and surgeon.
The service was fantastic through out and I've had really good results. Definitely good value for money.

Staff are very helpful and friendly, I felt very comfortable and the nurse Sally was able to answer every question I had without hesitation or having to think about the answers. Everything was planned and I had no waiting time for my appointment I was seen to straight away, thank you for the excellent service.

My new breasts are amazing! A great doctor is essential for a great breast augmentation. My breasts are fuller, natural looking, and lifted. I am so glad i decided to go through with the surgery finally and so glad i chose the surgeon i did.(Will Sarakbi)

review_title: Lovely staff in Harley medical group
review_body: Lovely staff in Harley medical group, made me feel welcome from my first visit and listened to my needs!
Harley medical Newcastle is amazing. I was put at ease straight away and made to feel at home. Kate has been a rock throughout and can't thank her enough. Thank you Harley medical

review_title: Very friendly staff made me feel at ?�?
review_body: Very friendly staff made me feel at ease explained everything in detail and I now happy to go ahead with the treatment
Great service for a great price!
Such friendly staff!

After suffering with cystic acne and pigmentation scarring for over a year I decided to have a consultation at HMG Cardiff to see what options were available after trying everything you can think of on the high street. It was very hard for me to face the team with no make up on and I was completely stripped of all confidence - nearly 5 months later I'm 8 laser treatments and 2 peels into treatment  and I couldn't be happier! From the bottom of my heart, you have made me so much happier within my own skin and I can happily hold my head up high with little to no make up on! I can't wait to see the results after I have completed my last peel (the 6th!) you are all absolute superstars xx

review_title: The Harley medical group are amazing I
review_body: The Harley medical group are amazing I simply wouldn't trust any other company and feel they are such good value for the level of professionalism you receive, I have had laser hair removal on my face and cannot wait to see the results in a few months after my eight sessions have been complete!

review_title: I haven't received any treatment yet ?�?
review_body: I haven't received any treatment yet but the staff were all really accommodating and friendly during my consultation and put me at ease.

review_title: Harley Medical Amazing. Blown away from start to finish!
review_body: Harley Medical have been absolutely amazing. They were recommended to me by a friend, I went in for a BA yesterday with Dr Sarakbi and I cannot praise his work and the service from all of the staff enough. All risks were clearly explained multiple times and I was confident in my decisions. Day1 post op and I can genuinely say this is the best decision I've ever made. Thank you Mr Sarakbi and Harley Medical.

review_title: First class company with very high standards
review_body: I have just had revision mastopexy surgery as I got in touch with Harley Medical to tell them I wasn't happy with the result of my first mastopexy. Nadia was fantastic, she reassured me and booked me in straight away to see my surgeon who was also very understanding. The hospital I went to was so lovely, I felt very well looked after and the staff were so kind, nothing was too much trouble. The day after my surgery I received a call from Nadia at Harley Medical to see how I was and to see if everything went ok. I would recommend Harley Medical to anyone that's considering cosmetic surgery, they are a first class company that really know how to look after their clients. I can't thank them enough for the support they have given me and for the fantastic job my surgeon has done.

review_title: I went to 6 Harley Street for a breast ?�?
review_body: I went to 6 Harley Street for a breast reduction with surgeon Mark Solomos.
Fantastic staff at Brighton

Although the experience by the team was mostly pleasant I feel that I have left dissatisfied with my results. I underwent breast augmentation after being overly self conscious for many years about having practically no boobs! As a shapely woman I wanted the breast to match my physique. Upon discussing size I was unsure and was advised and "tried on" sizes to decide what size I should go for. We came to the conclusion of a D/ potential DD cup. Trying on the implant I felt it suited my shape perfectly and I looked to have a very full bust with a seriously promising cleavage something I'd longed for to make me feel more womanly and self confident. I couldn't wait to see how amazing they would look and how amazing I would feel. However following the surgery when I got home to reveal the results I was underwhelmed by the change... letting the result settle in and be swelling free left me even more disappointed. In comparison to the D/DD outcome expected i don't feel they look anything like the preop test we did and I have 0 cleavage which was the entire reason I forked out the money to undergo this surgery. I am so confused as to how and implant can look so different once placed in surgery I almost feel as though I didn't get what I asked or paid for at all.
Septorhinoplasty

review_title: Thrilled with my results from Harley Medical
review_body: Anna was superb in advising me about the treatments I wanted. She didn't try to sell me anything that I didn't need, in fact quite the opposite. She did my fillers with such precision and care...no bruising and bleeding! I also had Botox administered by Rachel. Again, I am delighted with the result. I can't fault Harley Medical in Wimbledon at all.
Superb care from start to finish and I couldn't be happier with the results- Dr Solomos is amazing!

review_title: I'm so glad I chose Harley medical ?�?
review_body: I'm so glad I chose Harley medical group and my surgeon Simon smith, perfection 100%
Excellent care at all times. Professional service and would definitely use them for future procedures.
Excellent service, amazing staff really helpful top ratings for the Harley medical

review_title: I would highly recommend this to ?�?
review_body: I would highly recommend this to Anybody. I meet a few of people that work there and they have been very helpful and supportive and ain't even had my procedure yeh looking forward to rest of my journey x
Al my reviews was great
Excellent service. I've had 3 visits to the Harley Medical Group and have been very happy with all of them! Would definitely recommend.

I would recommend HMG as when I went to my first appointment they were very understanding and respected why I wanted to go through the procedure. The nurses at Highgate Hospital were amazing I couldn't fault them. The surgeon was very honest with my surgery so I knew what to expect and didn't have any unexpected surprises. I'm very happy with the result of my surgery.

review_title: I have had a fantastic experience with Sara
review_body: I have had a fantastic experience with Harley Medical Group, all throughout Sara who i have dealt with. My skin has improved dramatically with people noticing the difference and I have not been 'tied' into buying anything which I am not comfortable with. Anything suggested has been truly beneficial for me.

review_title: i have visited the Harley centre
review_body: I have visited the Harley medical group
Excellent, made to feel at ease from start.

review_title: I chose Harley medical because it is a ?�?
review_body: I chose Harley medical because it is a trusted place to have work done. I am currently 1 session into having dermaroller treatment and so far it's going well. The staff are polite and the building is very clean. I would recommend
excellent experience !
Not had treatment yet but my consultation was friendly and thorough and I will be using them in the near future.

review_title: Amazing staff make you feel very ?�?
review_body: Amazing staff make you feel very comfortable and calm service is perfect

review_title: Excellent welcome and comfort felt so ?�?fantastic
review_body: Excellent welcome and comfort felt so at ease on my first time coming in back in 2012 and for the 2nd time this year would recommend to anyone x
Absolutely brilliant.. From initial consultation to the after care..

I am absolutely delighted with the outcome of the treatment I received at The Harley Medical Group. The whole experience was easy and made me feel very relaxed, certainly not pushed into anything. Verity was fantastic - clearly a very knowledgable and skilled practitioner. I was only supposed to be having one treatment (prior to my wedding in May) but I'm so thrilled with the results and feel so much more confident that I know I'll be back.

review_title: Wish I would of had it done before
review_body: I had my first session with chelsea and I am really pleased with the results. She was very knowledgeable and thorough and also gave me a full understanding of the processes and what to expect. Really friendly and made it an throughly enjoyable process .... wish I would have come sooner.
Fantastic from start to finish!
Very professional and informative. All my questions were answered and any concerns overcome. I can't wait for my operation in 19 days
Very friendly and helpful staff, which were easy to talk to and willing to go the extra mile

review_title: Staff have been very informative and ?�?
review_body: Staff have been very informative and helpful throughout the procedure.

review_title: My initial consultation with the nurse ?�?
review_body: My initial consultation with the nurse was great, really put me at ease and didn't put any pressure on me what so ever.
Very friendly makes you feel comfortable excellent service
Lovely staff

For someone who is a little body conscious having  'hollywood' bikini laser hair removal seemed a little daunting. The staff were professional, comforting, welcoming and discreet, I have only had my first treatment but would definitely recommend.

review_title: I would recommend Harley Medical to all ?�?
review_body: I would recommend Harley Medical to all my friends and family as I find my experience with the staff to be comfortable and relaxing as if I've known them all my life, so it was quite easy for me to about my insecurities.

review_title: The 2x nurses I have met have been very ?�?
review_body: The 2x nurses I have met have been very informative, friendly & supportive.

review_title: I had a seen Marilyn Jennings and she ?�?
review_body: I had a seen Marilyn Jennings and she was great during our conversation. I will see her again soon and then a surgeon soon so hopefully everything will be done.

review_title: I guess if your having to pay via ?�?
review_body: I guess if your having to pay via finance for the procedure they kinda leave you high and dry after the consultation. I was told i'd get an email/call on the application status/approval but nothing and i basically had to chase up with the external party. I even asked for a new application link to be sent to me and I was quoted a higher price than the one given on my consultation. And the person i spoke to said there were no notes against my name which was unhelpful
The customer service is abismal. You rarely get to speak to somebody who can do something. "Not my department", :someone will call you in 48hrs" Nobody does.

Well first let's start by saying I paid �100 to see dr allwin, when I arrived he made me wait 1 hr after my appointment time to see me. When I got in the room he complained about me being the 18th person he's seen that day, that didn't make me feel safe or cared for at all, if I was to go ahead with him it would be a conveyor belt. I was there to have a breast augmentation with lift, so as you can imagine I'm not comfortable or confident to just show my breasts, to be told within the next breath to 'get my top off'! No consideration to how I feel or cared, I left feeling upset and peed off! Safe to say I will not be going back there and will tell everyone to majorly avoid Harley medical, I have found a amazing dr named graham offer! He is a true man and passionate about his clients and care. Avoid avoid avoid Harley medical!!!

I've had the worst experience with the Harley Medical group. Waste of my money . I bought a dermaroller package -which I didn't want , I went there for laser treatment and they pushed me towards buying a dermaroller package. The treatment was a waste of money and time. It just filled me with stress by their service and no results by the treatment. I would never recommend them to anyone .
Thank your for dealing with my complaint. Amazing manager Debbie and nurse hannah on a great job!

Had an appointment  at 1pm, was running late and tried to call in no answer. When  I arrived just 10 mins late the person I was meant to see had gone home. Very unprofessional, wasted my time and money on travel. Extremely annoyed and will never use their services again.

review_title: Staff are fantastic - Results are very disheartening
review_body: Now six months since the surgery and if anything the swelling around the chest area appears to be worse.

I've wanted a breast enlargement since I was 17, 5 years later I'm still strong on the idea. I was a typical girl looking at photos of celebrities, watching movie and seeing beautiful women and it would make me feel insecure about my own body. it took over my life and it did cause trouble in my relationships. I visited Harley Medical when I was 17 and decided I wasn't ready since then I have gone to other clinics to speak to advisers and see how I felt. I wasn't happy with the other clinics I visited I felt rushed and nervous and unsure I never had the  same feeling as the 1st clinic ive ever been to.

review_title: Friendly staff, disappointed with the results.
review_body: Had the dermaroller treatment for stretch marks on my breasts. I am a brown lady and was given no warning at all that I could potentially suffer dark pigmentation from the treatment. Yes the treatment very slightly reduced the stretch marks, however I've been now left with the treated area darker than the rest of my body. When I noticed the darkness of my skin tone after the first session I raised it as a concern and was told that upon final treatment I will be given something for the darkness. I had my final session today and I'm being asked to pay for expensive brightening products on top of the �800 I laid down for this treatment. Unacceptable and disappointed with this service I've been left in a worse condition than I came. A real shame.

I've had laser hair removal on my lower arms. After one treatment I have already noticed a significant reduction of hair. It has definitely already contributed to my growing confidence. The procedure itself is easy and quick: it does hurt but not in anyway that is unbearable. They blow cold air at the same time so the pain is really minimal (this is only in reference to lower arms). Overall happy with my course so far
I am 2 days post op and so far I couldn't be happier. Everyone is so friendly and helpful. I would recommend harley medical to my friends and family.
The service I received cannot be faulted. Would definitely recommend.

review_title: Fantastic. I would recommend to anyone.
review_body: The hospital was amazing, very clean & well presented.
Made me feel totally at ease, great service and treatment.  Proffessional and I would definitely reccommend, I have even started a different treatment!  Lovely staff and facilities at Liverpool.

Very happy with my resaults even tho I'm only 3weeks post opp and I'm glad I went abit bigger than what my surgeon suggested as no regrets,as ppl do get boob greed lol so happy ?��? I so highly recommend Harley medical clinic ?���?���X

I had breaat argumentation and I was so scared of how they would look, whether they were going to be in proportion with my body. I was so self confident of my boobs before the op and so I was worried after getting it done that I would be even more self conscious. Harley medical group really looked after me and put my worries at ease. I felt so comfortable. The support was amazing. From my first consultation to after care. The hospital was amazing. Felt like a hotel! Straight away I was comfortable. I can't thank HMG enough. My surgeon has done an excellent job and I honestly feel like a woman

So I have been twice now for lip enhancement. The staff nurses everyone are just so lovely and amazing!!!! I would soooo recommend everyone to come to Harley medical group very professional just AMAZING I am due back reallll soon xxx sarah
Very professional and supportive. Lovely friendly staff. Highly recommended.

What an amazing experience I had with the Harley medical group.  From the minute I walked into the Newcastle branch to leaving the hospital after surgery,  i had a warm and professional experience.  My surgeon Dr. Mahadev was amazing! Very professional and caring.  Highly recommended.  My boobs look amazing.  3 months on and I still can't believe the results. Thank you to my surgeon Dr. Mahadev,  Kate and Lisa at the Newcastle branch for an experience to remember.

From initial consultation to meeting my surgeon, I have had a great experience with very helpful, friendly staff.  All my questions have been answered & there is always someone at the end of the phone or email.
I enjoy going and getting treated down to the meeting greeting - getting a great service & down to approachable staff.
It's been a good experience each time i have visited
The staff is very professional and make sure they make you feel at ease. They try their best to accommodate you and I would say the service is above my expectations.

I've had a few treatments with THMG: Medical Microdermabrasion, and Dermaroller for stretch marks. The MM is spot on: my skin feels tighter, smoother, and has far fewer fine lines than beforehand; I am very happy with this treatment and will definitely be coming back for more. I've had a couple of Derma treatments, and thus far I can't see very much of a difference...although the nurses keep reassuring me that the scars should be completely gone after three more treatments. Results TBC.

I've always gone to Harley Medical group for laser hair removal and found them to be a lot more professional than other places. Their advice is very honest, realistic and they make you feel comfortable and at home in the Brighton branch.

I spent �5,500 on a breast uplift at 20 years old that is a ridiculous amount of money, all my savings, gone. I had one originally slightly bigger and got told if I payed an extra �300 they'd be made the same size. For the first week they looked amazing very lifted and in a perfect position. When I went back for my first appointment after my op I took a photo of them to show them off all the replies told me how my left boob was bigger than the other, which I found funny because the right one was the bigger one to start off with that I'd been told would be evened out to match the left but the surgeon took too much out of the originally bigger one and made it smaller than the left one. After a few weeks they weren't evening out so I made an appointment with my surgeon who told me that they looked fine and that he did a very good job, which I don't disagree he was an amazing friendly surgeon but it is no where near good enough for the amount I paid. He also went on to tell me how they would become the same size which confused me, how can a boob shrink by itself or grow. And then continued to tell me that I should come back in 9 months. The left one is much heavier than the right and won't fit evenly in a bra I have new stretch marks where the breasts have dropped ridiculous amounts and the scaring under the left breast is double the size of the right and is also stretching onto the unscarred skin. It is extremely painful I've been to the hospital for scans and also made another consultation with Harbour Private Hospital to over look the work I have had done at Harley medical I have told everyone I know NOT to come to this surgery I've also been told by a couple people that have also been with Harley that they weren't happy with there surgery either. It angers me to think it's been 6 months since my op the scaring has hardly changed and I will not be able to show them off in a bikini this summer like I planned if I could go back in time I'd have gone somewhere else. Dont waste your money going here!

I went to the Harley Medical clinic in Leeds wanting a breast augmentation, from the minute you walk through the door to the moment you go for your post op appointment you feel satisfied, welcomed and no questions are unanswered. My nurse Pippa was amazing she understood exactly what look I wanted and didn't leave any stone un-turned so any doubts I had were completely gone. Having had the same procedur done herself only a few weeks prior to my first consultation she was able to give me her first hand experience which really put my mind at ease. Such a kind group of people and I could not be happier with my results after only 11 days post op.

I go to HMG for laser treatments and in the past it has always been easy to get appointments and they are usually very flexible with changing them.  Over the past 6 months it has become increasingly difficult to book appointments - the evening and weekend appointments fill up really far in advance which actually makes it impossible to stick to the 6 week time frame between treatments when having a new area treated.  They desperately need to get more staff and more evening and weekend appointment slots!  I definitely wouldn't recommend HMG to anyone who has a busy lifestyle and needs flexibility with their appointments.  It also doesn't feel like great value for money because it's so expense.  The fact that they could offer packages at 50% off for their version of a black friday event just goes to show how much mark up they are applying on the cost!  This was an especially nice piece of news to hear shortly after spending a large amount on some packages...

review_title: This place has changed my skin
review_body: After suffering with adult acne, I thought that there was no real cure. I'd tried antibiotics, creams, and even hormones from the doctors - to no avail; my spots and boils were going nowhere! My sister had the bright idea of booking a consultation here and I honestly can't thank her enough for it.

i went for my treatment on Saturday 10th  December for laser hair rempval on my jawline and chin as i have done before. I was early and I was quite happy to wait . First off the practitioner , in this case, Monica El-Meady stood in the middle of the reception area saying hello five times without saying who she was talking to until I  looked up said hi cause I thought she was just greeting when in actual fact she was talking to me and proceeded then say yes I am talking to you. She also turned around to a clients wife and said " and who are You?" We then went to the treatment room and I was told to sit. I did so and was asked the usual questions and signed the document as usual. I was then told to get  on the bed and I was given the goggles which were not fixed properly and she insisted when I told her that she said that as long as my eyes were shut the laser was safe needless to.say the goggles slipped and I have had laser before and I have never seen the laser but this time the I could see the laser flashing only to be told that I was "seeing it with my nervous system " which by the way is only possible if they were actually working on my nerves.  Then as she was was working on my jawline and  actually pushed the laser device into my jaw  bone. It was very painful and I asked her to stop. She just cranked up the laser. And it was very painful and she just carried on. After all this she then decided to, without actually asking.me , put  on one of the makeup products which has now resulted in a acne breakout on my face. She also decided it was a good idea to slap down the tube of product in front of me and lecture me on how to use SPF . I am well aware of what SPF is astill I am a south African and we get a lot more UV there than here. I felt like I was being rushed and I actually felt humiliated and somewhat violated. I usually have good service from this branch . I wasn't even offered a drink ofor water or tea or really anything.I don't care how.much experience you have in your field if you want tokeep.your clients then you should.listen to them. People pay a lot of money for this service and shouldn't be made to.feel like idiots. I will be coming back as there is have paid for two.more treatments but I don't  ever want to be worked on by Monica again. She has no respect for a clients dignity and I still feel violated . It was overall the worst treatment I have ever had at Harley Medical Group Wbledon.
Give me loads of helpful advise, friendly service felt positive and safe about any the procedure and advised what was best for me

All the staff where really friendly & felt like they was with you all of the way, from the initial consultation & my post op consultations. The results have all been amazing so far. Would recommend Harley medical group to anyone.

My experience at the Harley in Rodney Street Liverpool was 1st class.  Vicky and Lesley made me feel very comfortable and put me at my ease in what was an intimate procedure (laser hair removal on bikini line and buttocks).  I would wholeheartedly recommend them and wished I'd had it done years ago.  I am looking forward to my next visit without trepidation.

My experience with the Harley Medical group was perfect just like in the other reviews. The meetings were flexible, the atmosphere was relaxing and the staff were so helpful and understanding of my request for breast augmentation.

I went to the Harley medical group for a consultation for breast enhancement surgery. From the get go everyone was polite and informative. The surgeon was not pushy and discussed all the options of what size was best and honestly felt comfortable with my choice. Would highly recommend
Excellent and understanding.....a service worth reccommending.

review_title: Excited to have my mastopexy with BA in April!!
review_body: Doctor Bernard sleiter is lovely, and so are all the nurses at the Leeds clinic, looking forward to my mastopexy and implant procedure in April!!
I lost a significant amount of weight via a healthier lifestyle & food choices.
90% of the time I am extremely happy with my treatment.
Wonderful staff always make you feel valued.

I looked for a long to time for a company to go with for my surgery I must say I made the right choice Harley medical group are so flexible with payment and dates the people that work there are amazing the hospital stuff we're amazing couldn't have asked for any thing better if your considering anyone please speak to them
Great clinic
I went a few times for a laser hair removal and after the first session, as they said, I saw evident results.
Would highly recommend harley medical from the nurse trish at southampton to dr mark solomos to all the team at highgate hospital all were fantastic.

review_title: Excellent and personalised care and treatment
review_body: Since my first consultation all the way through to my last post op checkup I have received nothing short of excellent treatment at all times, the clinic and the hospital and all the staff have treated me with respect and understanding throughout. I have always been given the opportunity to ask any questions and they have always been answered professionally and to put my mind at ease. I would highly recommend this place to anyone looking for superb patient care by truly knowledgeable and professional doctors and nurses and I am so happy with the outcome of my surgery it truly has changed my life and given me confidence I never imagined I would have.
I am very pleased with the professional support and results of my previous visit

I have decided to share my poor experience with Harley Medical group in Harley Street. I had paid for four sessions for laser hair removal. I was advised that I would only need four sessions for the area I was treating. However, few weeks ago when I came for a review, I was then surprisingly advised that Inwould require 10-12 sessions for the treated area for good results! How is this acceptable! The advise that these nurses/ staff give should be consistent and not misleading! Additionally, On two occasion, they had re- scheduled my laser appointment, which clearly lead to inconsistent and poor results- and a different nirse/ practitioner treated me each time- no personalised service at all! I have recenly forwarded a complaint/feedback regarding my experience, it has only been acknowedged, but unfortunately, I had not heard from them since! Abselutey poor service and cutomer care. They do not keep up with their promise at all! I regret wasting my last 12 months there. I decided to cance my last appointment and have now seen a different skin company. I did not expect this from this 'well known' company.
The therapist I had was very calm, polite and reassuring. All in all a very positive experience.

Everyone's been really nice and I don't wait long for appointments at all. Also, appointments are speedy and efficient. My only gripe is the size of the parking spaces at the clinic! They're a bit crammed in.
Spider Veins all but gone with my lazer treatment, lazer made them crawl away :)
Happy with my service

My operation was booked and ready to go, nurses checks went fine, consult was rushed but ok, then 1 week before surgery they rang and said they had cancelled it due to my doctors letter. Although they already knew my health and mental state was sound and had had no problems with me, they whipped the rug completely from under my feet. Stating that all the pre op funds I had paid would have to be re-paid if I wanted the surgery at a later date. I had my hotel booked, childcare, all the arrangements done, cost, time, I had put everything in place and they were very cold, blunt and unhelpful, when I tried to re-coup funds. DO NOT TRUST HARLEY MEDICAL GROUP.
I was giving an honest assessment and it was not about collecting clients money but ensuring that their health was first and foremost important
The service was great, the people made me feel so much at ease, and confident with my decision.
Had a really good meeting with consultant and I got all the information I need it to start my journey.
You leave your appointment feeing reassured and confident that you have made the right choice and chosen the right company. Nothing is too much, and no question too futile. Reassurance is the key.

From the moment i arrived at the hospital every one was so friendly and welcoming! I was seen by everyone that was going to be involved in the surgery and they explained what they will be doing! 5??????????????? service through out my stay x
Amazing everytime i visit the Marlow clinic! Would not go anywhere else!

review_title: Laser Hair removal waste of money
review_body: I booked a set of 4 treatments for hair removal on my upper lip at Maidstone, as Harley were offering a package of 4 sessions at a greatly reduced price. I asked, if I needed less than 4 treatments for my upper lip, would I be able to get a refund on unused sessions and was advised that it wouldn't be worth it as they would charge me the standard rate for each session used, so I might as well use remaining sessions on another part of my body and was advised that yes, that would be possible. I was told this by the clinic manager, and at no point did she indicate that I would need at least 4 sessions to treat my upper lip. The treatments commenced, the first of which was by a trainee but overseen by the clinic manager. After the second treatment I commented that there was little visible reduction in the hair, and also that they seemed to be concentrating on a small area, and I was concerned that the 4 sessions wouldn't be adequate to cover the whole area. I was told not to worry but the lady carrying out the treatment turned up the strength of the laser. After the last session I once again expressed that I was disappointed that there were still many hairs visible and some on the areas that had been done in the earlier sessions had grown back. I was then advised that they will grow back, particularly over time, and that this is dependent on hormones and individuals, and as I have dark hair (one of the reasons I wanted it removed in the first place!) this is more likely. A few months down the line, and my upper lip looks no better than it did prior to treatment.

review_title: A joke from start to finish
review_body: Wasted many months trying to get surgery though the Harley medical group in Birmingham.  First appointment was great,  felt happy with what I was going to have and took all information home with me. Decided to book and paid my deposit for the surgery date and pre op appointments. Assessments are a long travel just to be seen but seemed worth it to me. A week after paying the deposit my assessment appointment was changed from Bristol to London so alot longer journey. I decided to do it anyway. My pre op was still in birmingnam.  When I arrived I met another couple who were there for a post op appointment. She had the same op I was waiting for  (tummy tuck) and she said she was hugely disappointed and said she would never use them again.  I wish I had listened.  Hour wait for the appointment and the lady couldn't get any blood so was a wasted journey anyway. Had to rebook for another nurse to be there to help.  As the assessment had been moved it was now after the 31 day cut off to pay the balance. I paid this in full and set off to maidstone for my appointment very excited.  Long journey and overnight stay so more expense. Then told at the assessment by the surgeon I would need alot more work,  I explained I was only unhappy with my tummy he said he wanted to do the rest totally another  �7k or he wouldn't do it.  There was no way I had this money and would require two surgeries and work would never allow the time off.  Rang harley group who after a week of chasing accepted I could have a refund.  I was disappointed and out of pocket but was happy to be getting the money back. It took over a month to recieve the money!  I had to chase them everyday and they would only refund by cheque so even longer to get my money. Terrible customer service. I've now had the surgery I wanted without the ridiculous extras elsewhere which was �3000 cheaper and I am over the moon with the results.

I had my breast augmentation 2 months ago by Dr Sleiter, and I could not be happier with my results! All of the staff at the Manchester clinic are brilliant, so friendly and really go out of their way to answer all of your questions and put you at ease. Dr Sleiter is amazing, he makes you feel so comfortable and he is great at what he does! Also, the first trust hospital in Preston is very good, I was extremely nervous but my nurse made me feel a lot better and all of the staff there were lovely!
Absolutely great experience here at Harley medical group

review_title: really bad experience from private clinic to aftercare
review_body: really would not advice to use it at all! if something goes wrong they will not fix it surgeon are never available after surgery the local office no longer pick up the call! i send 2 complain and receive no response

The staff at Harley Medical Centre are caring and considerate at all times. The practise is well kept and the treatment rooms are always spotless. The nurses are very supportive and friendly. They always seem to have time to listen to any concerns about the treatment you may have and are willing to discuss at length to put you at ease.

review_title: Don't waste your time and money
review_body: I booked package of 4 laser treatments on full legs and bikini. It is so hard to book any treatment that it expired and I lost all my money.

review_title: After surgery, my breast looks very small and big gap in the middle
review_body: I have surgery in Harley medical Birmingham. The stuff isfriendly. However, I am not happy with the result after my surgery. Because I spoke with the surgeon and asked him to choose for me a big size but still look natural. My breast was almost flat. But he chose for me a implant only 270cc. I didn't know anything, i felt it was small but he said if I choose bigger size so it will look very fake and he said my breast after surgery could be size c or d.. Although, i reminded him to make the gap between these breast very narrow. But the gap is very big now. I have been very disappointed after the surgery . The breast is too small than what I expected. Only size b cup. The gap between these breast is very  big. I trusted the doctor too much. Let him choose my size and do big gap between these breast. very very disappointed
Would recommend Harley street especially my surgeon Simon smith who done a brilliant job so happy with my outcome, really understanding and supportive

I had a breast augmentation at the Chelmsford clinic with surgeon Simon Smith, during the consultation Simon was very honest and gave an in depth consultation, he wasn't rushing me, he gave me lots to consider, answered all my questions fully. The day of the surgery, Simon and the anaesthetist/and team were amazing especially as I was very very nervous, the nurses care throughout was above and beyond. My results I am sooooo happy with and would highly recommend Simon and his team 100x over
Met a really lovely niurse who was caring and honest in her advice
I have had the best care and attention from the nurses and couldn't ask for anything better. Friendly, helpful and down to earth.

My experience with HMG was absolutely amazing, very professional and friendly service, every consultation I had there was never anytime I came away thinking I should have asked this or that, they are very informative. I only had my operation 2 days ago and have already recommended HMG to my friends.
Amazing professional advice with no hidden agenda! Definitely not a sales driven company, they are there to help people and make them happy too!
I'm very happy with my new look. I would recommend The Harley Medical Group to anyone.

As soon as I walked through the door I felt a sense of ease about the whole situation of considering to have surgery I have been thinking about since early teens. My experience so far has been 5 star treatment, the staff are so friendly and are there if you need to answer any questions. I was so nervous about having a rhinoplasty but I definitely chose the right people to share the experience with.  I'm currently waiting to have my surgery in a few weeks and they have been so good so far
So pleased with results, had a really good experience and will NEVER go anywhere else
Very poor explanation of matters and do not give them a deposit.
Excellent service, results of my Botox treatment is amazing. Well worth the money!
Recommend to everyone
As a nurse myself I was very happy with the information and care I have received at every step of the process
I Could not fault the harley medical group. My experience so far has been outstanding. I am over the moon with the care and support i have received so far throughout my journey!!!

Every single member of staff was helpful and supportive from day one!  I'm quite a confident individual and I felt reassured so I cannot imagine what other women would feel like. It's been less than 24hrs since the op and I have hardly any bruising or pain- just feel pressure. Thank you to everyone for all support! X

I have considered surgery for a long time, and have been delighted at the level of support and dignity I have received from Harley Medical Group especially the nurses I have had contact with both pre and post operatively (Lynn and Pippa at Leeds). They have been fantastic and provided me with care and attention.

I had Vaser on my stomach, flanks, inner thighs and knees via Harley Medical, Southampton. I can honestly say my whole experience has been nothing but pleasant, professional and carried out to the highest standards.
I use fillers to maintain my youthful appearance. I feel rejuvenated once the nurse has finished. The clinic and staff are very professional and friendly. I do it for me. I

I cannot fault The Harley Medical Group - they were amazing throughout the entire experience. From the first consultation to the day of my surgery I always felt 100% comfortable and at ease. Kate (Newcastle) was so nice and helpful throughout and always happy to answer any questions or worries I had. I would definitely go back for other treatments and recommend them to my friends and anyone who is considering cosmetic surgery. My rhinoplasty was done by Dr Sleiter, I am so pleased with my results he is amazing.
Incredible staff: knowledgable, professional, kind and friendly.
Would highly reccomend Harley group, the staff are amazing, keep me up to date with everything I need, so friendly and nothing is ever too much trouble for them.

review_title: HMG A+, First Trust Hospital TERRIBLE
review_body: The Harley Medical Group staff could not have been any more helpful! However, I did not feel I received first class care from the The First Trust Hospital in Preston. I was welcomed to my room and the anaesthetist and surgeon came and introduced themselves and went through the operation again. However, when I came round, I was left in my room on my own and partner was not told I had come back from the operating room. I asked for pain relief and ice (to help with the swelling), but was given neither. They also kept confusing me with another patient, which I thought was a breach of patient confidentiality! I couldn't wait to leave and just come home!

review_title: Professional, friendly, kind and caring staff
review_body: The hospital is clean and the staff fantastic. They look after you from the second you arrive until the moment you leave.

I am currently waiting for my breast augumentation  on the 15th December. when I attended my consultation I left feeling very supported and that I would be in safe hands. My nurse was lovely and very welcoming, and I cannot wait to meet my surgeon. Now really excited for my op ?��?
Staff are very friendly, open and honest.
THMG is the best cosmetic place you can ever go. I will recommend them to anybody!!!! The doctors and staff are a amazing!! Loving, caring and genuine!!

review_title: Avoid Avoid #They toldme i had a diease!
review_body: i will be writing another review as its a ongoing thing with these lot
I've sent my complaint form about my results to Harley medical group about 2 weeks ago and still waiting on reply ...

review_title: Biggest mistake I have ever made
review_body: After reading several bad reviews and then reading a few good ones I decided to give Harley medical Manchester benefit of the doubt which I deeply regret. I have wasted so much time and money. I could have spent the exact amount somewhere else and received the results I was promised. They are quick to book you for a in for a consultation and take the deposit but once the job is done they aren't interested. On the consultation we discussed my expectations and which product would give me the best results. I left happy and excited as I had wanted fuller lips for quite some time now. When I returned I saw a different nurse whose own lips didn't look great. I guess that was my warning sign but from the excitement I didn't notice at the time. I then had numbing cream applied, after around 20/30 minutes I was taken in to go over the paperwork. I showed the nurse a picture of some enhanced lips to give her and idea of what I was looking for. She then told me I would need a complete different product than to what was recommended. After that I told the nurse I wanted the 1ml filler in two sittings as I wanted to gradually build volume. She basically said I'd walk away with no difference if I had 0.5  today really pushing me into paying another 150 and get the full ml. I wasn't exactly happy with this but thinking she was the expert and I was in good hands I trusted what she had said. The nurse then left me for maximum five minutes so that I could read and sign the papers. By this time the numbing cream had worn off quite a bit. Anyway I signed and got into the chair. When she began injecting I felt so much pain. I'm quite a strong person but there were tears streaming from my eyes. I wasn't numb at all. After asking her to apply more cream I was told it wouldn't do anything at this point I decided to stay quiet as she seemed annoyed. So not only have I been rushed and pushed into paying more I now have to endure the pain also. After what felt like an eternity the torture finally ended. At this point I didn't even care what my lips looked like anymore I just wanted to go home. Fast forward I have been left with uneven and lumpy ugly lips, which has had a huge impact on my confidence. I have been back several times and only wasted my time and money becausr she cannot accept she has messed up. I believe the job was rushed. When I have showed her comparisons of other practioners she had the audacity to tell me their pictures are fake or that their work doesn't look good etc trying to cover her mess. I deeply regret trusting Harley medical and will never return. I will also ensure no other person makes the same mistake I have. Your practioners are inexperienced and need proper training. I am now going to someone who knows what they are doing and has plenty experience to back it to fix the ugly mess created by her. Do not trust these money hungry people. Once they take your money they lose interest. So many people had said this, I wish I had listened to my gut feeling.
I wanted to say thank you to the Harley medical group and to my surgeon Mark Solomos.

I've had a surgery with Harley Medical Group, and several other consultations before. It always left me feeling confident and looked after. I have made very little attempts to look for any other clinic to provide me the requests I have just because everyone I have encountered throughout the Harley Medical Group have been so brilliant. I don't see the need to look anywhere else.
I have darker skin and have just completed a 3rd course of laser hair removal.
Brilliant company, I went for some advice due to some scars I have and was quite nervous as it's very personal.
Excellent experience. Thoroughly professional and efficient.

The staff in Northampton were friendly and professional, explaining everything clearly and making the experience as pleasant as possible. The results have been fantastic and I am very happy with the treatment.
They are very professional I'm  always seen on time, they provide a great service
Although the treatments are pricey you get what you pay for! This is Harley Street London!
Great service.  Accurate and helpful info.  Reassuring and friendly.

So far my experience has been positive. I did get a post op infection but this was dealt with effectively. Even though I am currently not a hundred percent happy with the result of my bilateral thigh lift I am confident that when I see my surgeon in October this will be rectified
staff very friendly and heilpful
Recently been to Harley medical group for a consultation. I felt completely at ease and not pressured at all.
My first visit made me feel confident in their ability to perform the surgery to my exact requirements.

From the moment I stepped foot into the Harley Medical Group in Birmingham I had nothing but a superb experience.
