All the staff were fantastic from the reception team, the nurses and most important the surgeon. They were all so friendly and understanding of my situation. All the consultations i've had which is now 4 and have 1 more post op to go have been perfect. I am over the moon with my results and can't thank the team at Harley Medical enough for the confidence I've gained and how my self esteem has built over the past 4 weeks. My experience at the High Gate Hospital in London was great, no waiting around i was in the building about an hour before actually heading into surgery. They were all so quick and efficient but also very thorough. I couldn't be happier and would recommend to anyone who may be considering cosmetic surgery.

I have been looking to have surgery for the last 4 years but may 2016 i decided to take that first step. After researching companies I decided to go with Harley medical group. Had my first appointment with the patient co-ordinator and that went well so I decided to book in to see the surgeon. In the mean time I done my research on him. I was very happy at what I found as he is a professor in breast reconstructive surgey  amongst other breast conditions so immediately I thought this man knows what he is doing. I met with him in June  and immediately I was at ease. Between meeting with him and waiting for my surgery date in August I googled everything possible etc recovery,results, what to expect and so many people had gruesome story's  eg worst pain ever, elephant sitting on chest, bad bruising, can't move for days, frakenstien boobs, hermatoma basically everything bad that could happen.

review_title: felt so relaxed in the consultation room
review_body: so comfortable to talk to, very knowledgeable staff, they care about your opinions but also tell you the truth about what might work better for your shape through their years of experience
Have  used Harley Medical for three years  it has been satisfactory ADA. O
The staff were welcoming and understood my needs. The clinic is discreet and has a lovely calm atmosphere.
Friendly,confident staff.

I've known about The Harley Medical group for sometime now but did not think the service would be any use to me. One day I decided to give the Obagi nu derm skin system a try because I needed to clear my hyper pigmentation that I had on my face, and it seemed like the safest for black skin. I was so surprised by how much it work on my type of skin. I recently came in for a facial and the staff was so lovely, she gave me a run down on everything and also did a great job. I Would recommend here to anyone.
Very personal and catered service for each individual. They are very professional and care about the patient and the work being carried out.

review_title: Give the choice I wouldn't go back here again.
review_body: I purchased a breast ornamentation for the other half. Every was going great for the 3 oppointments before the surgery.  We where able to choose our times and our dates. When it came to the surgery we where able to choose a date being told we will be contacted about a time. Less than 48 hours before the day they told us our appointment was at 8am. We arrange them back to try and rearrange the time as this was before a school run to be told no not unless we pay a cancellation fee. How can this be right as we never picked the time. I paid just shy of �4000 for the procedure and cause they have given use a time which we can't make they now want more money to cancel it. I could understand of they let us book a time but that's not the case. There are a couple of more procedures we are looking at getting done and for those we will be looking else where.
Very happy with the whole process from start to finish.  Good after care too

review_title: Trust them to do the right thing
review_body: Good experience after some problems from previous surgery which was all put right this time thanks to Dr Slater at Harley Medical. Thank you all for your patience .

From the moment I first contacted the Harley medical group I have experienced nothing but professionalism . I am amazed at how my results have effected my life in such a positive way and cannot thank my surgeon dr mark Solomos enough .

review_title: If you're nervous about speaking to HMG, don't be
review_body: I was really daunted by the idea of coming and talking to someone about lazer hair removal but Hayley in The Avenue branch was brilliant and made it really easy. She was objective but empathetic throughout. Looking forward to seeing the results of my treatment. Thanks
I just had first Dermaroller treatment to reduce stretch marks, need more time , hope it works.
I am very happy with the information and care I have been given so far . The Harley medical team are all so caring and will do anything to help.
All the staff at Harley medical group are lovely, they are very caring, supportive and have a lot of time to listen to what your needs are.
I'm having op 2 weeks from today so will let you all know the outcome be looking very forward to it
Couldn't fault any part of my experience with the Harley Medical Group, and I have recommended them to anybody I know considering Cosmetic Surgery.
From the consultation up to today which is 2 weeks after my operation they have bern amazing.. The staff are so friendly helpful and nothing is to much bother..

So if all goes well then I'm really happy for you but it seems if it all goes wrong then you can be left frustrated to bits and uterly ripped off like myself. Is this why staff are leaving? I paid just under �1000 in good faith and they were quick to take that upfront for treatment that so far they haven't delivered. No manager is there to speak to. The complaints procedure is not followed this nobody has helped me on the matter for over a week now let alone ""24hrs"". It's very upsetting to be left out in the cold by this company in which I thought I could trust. With No manager then what can you expect!!!!!!

Just out from appointment for fillers at Harley Newcastle.  Both ladies were brilliant from start to finish put me completely at ease.  So pleased with my results.  Thanks to both. Will be back.  Brooke

review_title: Dodgy company still waiting on refund
review_body: I am so frustrated and wish I never went to Harley Medical Group specifically Harley Street London. Still waiting on someone to get back to me. Awaiting call back from manager I will be escalating my complaint. I went to consultation and one of the things that came up was if I was to fall pregnant during treatment I would get a refund because harley medical group would be unable to treat me. I am pregnant and contacted the harley medical group. I was told by the patient advisor yes I could get a refund. They are unable to treat me but also refuse to give me a refund now. I paid �599 of which I feel like this company has ripped me off. Everytime I call to speak with someone no one is available to take call and in clinic. This is now going into the 2nd week now. I regret and will never use or recommend any to use harley medical group. Perhaps HMG does not like processing refunds just reading through previous comments and can see I am not alone.
HMG have always been professional, friendly and knowledgeable when I have visited for consultations and treatments. Sara in the Leeds clinic has been amazing.

The harley medical group could not have been more helpful! They were there to help at every stage and always on the end of the phone as well. They understand that comestic surgery is not a decision to take lightly and happily explain  the procedure to ensure it is right for you and that you come to the right decision.

review_title: lovely girls lovely clinic lovely treatments ?��?
review_body: Had many treatments at Harley street clinic surgical and nine surgical and i'v been very happy with them all wouldn't go anywhere else they make you feel so special and go into detail about their treatments  thank you ?��?
I had a great experience. The staff are all very friendly and made me feel comfortable before my laser treatment. I would recommend them to anyone.
Friendly staff, amazing nurses and doctors. Listened to my requests and my concerns and supported me in every way. Would highly recommend and very happy with the outcome.
Professional, knowledgeable and friendly staff, didn't try to persuade me to pay for treatments, but offered alternative suggestions to try first.

I've had a brilliant experience with my first of four laser hair removal appointments. Tracey at the Bristol practice was brilliant in answering my questions and I had an efficient and even enjoyable appointment.

review_title: Really happy, but wish I'd heard more following my treatment
review_body: I was really happy with the staff and services on offer at The Harley Medical Group, and would not hesitate to go again or recommend the practice to a friend. However, I was disappointed that no one got in touch with me following my treatment - particularly as they were very keen to contact me beforehand!
Excellent customer service from the team. Very friendly approachable and professional.
Highly informative, very friendly and welcoming so far very happy with my experience.
The staff  are always very friendly and make you feel at ease.they are very professional .caring.understanding.

review_title: Reliable and committed to their clients/patients!
review_body: Chiswick branch: I received my complimentary Papaya Facial one week ago, after having to cancel twice and was surprised to have a polite customer service phone call to reschedule subsequently.

I had a Bleps Lower procedure a few years ago and can honestly say it was the best thing I have ever had done - the results are brilliant - the aftercare was brilliant and all in all cannot fault it one little bit - would definitely use HMG again if I was lucky enough to afford the surgery! - but thank you once again.

review_title: Poor customer service & value for money
review_body: I felt that my requests weren't listened to and this was obvious in the results of my surgery. I had no follow up appointment and had to request this myself and when sharing my disappointment of the results with the consultant I had my follow up with (different person as the surgeon had left the company) he said 'I can see what you mean but it looks ok'.

review_title: HARLEY MEDICAL IS THE ONLY ONE FOR ME
review_body: I had a tummy tuck with Harley Medical coming upto 10 years ago, the entire process from start to finish was 5*, the initial consultation, the staff, the before and after care of all was amazing. Last year I opted for lower eye bag removal, I search no further and wanted to go with Harley Medical due to my perfect previous experience, and again, they were outstanding, I have just now had some revision surgery some 4 weeks ago....the care and attention I have received was just as I expected. Any future surgery's I decide on will most definitely be with Harley Medical, the entire team is friendly and professional. Well done Harley Medical and keep up the high standards. Xx

review_title: Offered half refund for botched tum tuck
review_body: I have already given review on here. Still nothing in writing but lame offers of corrective op...not likely after my last experience plus can't afford another 5 months off work as I'm a carer and that's the recovery time. Unless I get full refund I will go to court for refund and compensation claim.   I would be happy to put  photos of my poor belly on media.

review_title: Excellent treatment, Felt safe in the hands of every nurse!
review_body: I have the Isolaz laser treatment every 4-6 weeks and always purchase a package to attempt to finally shift my Rocasea after suffering with it for 8 years, after various doctors, dermatology treatments etc.

I underwent surgery on 13th July at the First Trust hospital in Preston and I cannot thank all the staff, nurses, doctors and surgeons enough for making me feel at complete ease! Before my surgery, my step mum and sister had to leave to go to work, so being alone was pretty scary. But all the nurses went to great lengths to make me feel comfortable and all had genuine interest in how I was doing. After my surgery I couldn't have felt in better hands, every single nurse did everything they could for me, getting me endless cups of tea, so much food and just being there for a nice conversation! I've never had surgery before or had to stay overnight in a hospital without my mum but I cannot thank the staff enough for making me feel at home and taking the time to sit and chat with me about anything I wanted! Seriously, thank you so much for making me feel so content on one of the biggest days of my life. I truly hope this gets passed onto everyone as they deserve to know how great they are! Thank you ever so much!
i had a lipo in 4 areas done last week and it is still all fresh and i haven't seen the results but my initial thoughts are as follow:

From my initial consultation right through to surgery and the after care the Harley Medical Team were absolutely superb, thorough and truly excellent. My Surgeon was wonderful and incredible, the result is so natural I'm astounded and 100% satisfied.

review_title: Great service but felt let down day of the Op...
review_body: From the first meeting with HMG and every appointment right through to the day of the Op I couldn't fault the service I received. The staff are all so friendly, helpful and supportive.

All the staff at the Harley Medical Group were fantastic, very helpful , friendly, kind and answered any questions I had. I was made to feel very comfortable and ensured I was making the correct decision for my situation. Highly Recommend!

I have had amazing treatment by the Harley medical group! They have been incredibly helpful, informative and been able to help with any concerns immediately in order for me to have a settled mind. I couldn't recommend them more! The hospital used is lovely and the staff there are also amazing and comforting. I genuinely don't think I could have had a better service from both!
Very pleased so far with everything .surgeon is brilliant and the staff ...very professional, friendly and helpful  .. would definitely recommend the harley medical group to a friend or family.
Had the best experience within a professional and knowledgeable environment
So far harley street have been amazing!  I have my op in a few weeks and couldnt be more excited . They have been nothing but supportive.  Highly recommended! !!

I have had an amazing experience with the team at Newcastle. I chose to have my surgery with The Harley Medical Group by trusting my gut feeling, which has never proven me wrong to this day. Kate Whitehead, the coordinater, is brilliant! She is very quick at responding to emails and answering any questions. She is very friendly and makes you feel at ease. My surgeon is Dr Mahadev. Again he made me feel at ease from the first meet, and i felt that i could completely trust him. The results are absalutely insane. I have seen other peoples results by other surgeons on the realself website, which in some cases was quite scary. But trust me, the results that Dr Mahadev has left me with is no less than perfect!! review_title: Told me I was naturally deformed
review_body: They told me I was deformed and I could only have 200 cc's, went somewhere else they said I can have up to 800 and I have no deformity, made out I was only a b cup when I'm a double d, made me feel very uncomfortable as the surgeon has no bedside manner, completely sobbing my eyes out and he paid no attention, was made to wait outside for my taxi as clearly it's not a good look to have a crying woman in the waiting area. Worst experience of my life.

I had a breast augmentation in March this year and the experience with Harley medical has been fantastic from start to finish. I had been for consultations with other companies and not felt happy at all about going ahead with the surgery. When I met Katie the manager I immediately felt comfortable and at ease to discuss all that I wanted. Then on meeting Mr Sleiter my surgeon my decision was made. Again he was so approachable and made me feel at ease. I went ahead with the breast augmentation, the results are fantastic and much better than I ever imagined. The after care has been great I have felt well looked after, from the reception staff to the nurses they have all been fantastic. A special mention must go to Pippa the nurse aswell, just before the surgery I was having a meltdown because I was so scared of what result I would get and she really talked to me and helped calm me down. Thankyou to all of you:)

review_title: Professional, friendly and a wonderful experience
review_body: My experience has been fantastic. From the initial consultation by Kate, to my pre check up with pippa and post op with Lynn everyone has been incredibly helpful,friendly and professional. They all put you at your ease immediately, are informative and let you know they are there for any questions you have at any time. My surgeon dr Bernard sleiter was professional and accommodating at my initial consultation, even ordering 2 sizes of implant so I could decide on the day. I listened and read all the advice and guidance they provided and have recovered brilliantly! I couldn't recommend this clinic and their staff highly enough!

I have had 8 treatments on my back, shoulders and arms (every 9 weeks). Although my hair has not gone  it has become thin, short and less dense. I guess that with another 8 sessions it will completely disappear. My back becomes very itchy for the first week after treatment till the hair falls off. The treatment is not painful but some parts are more sensitive and can be a bit uncomfortable. I will definitely recommend it to everyone. And the staff are very friendly and helpful.

review_title: staff at the harley st. clinic
review_body: Staff are professional, very helpful and friendly.
Every visit feels so personal.  Everyone treats me as if I am the only person that matters at that moment.
Really nice team in Maidstone, friendly and discreet. Good results. Thank you.
Great clinic, friendly staff. All around fantastic experience.
Very friendly staff, amazing surgeon, great results.
My treatment is not yet complete but overall I have had an very pleasant experceince!Extremely professional and they commicate very well through each step of the process of my treatment!

The surgery was excellent but every aspect of the admin has caused a lot of frustration and dissatisfaction in so many aspects. The practice manager of Harley Street branch is fully aware of most of the issues.
Each step of the way my treatment was explained to me to help me make my decision. I'm pleased with the results so far.
Great care from all

review_title: Lip Fillers: Very happy and will return.
review_body: I was very nervous about this procedure as it gets quite a bit of bad press.
Very professional, felt at ease all the way through. Very quick and easy process all information given to me. I'm very happy with my result and the care I was given. Great staff

Met with Dr Solomos for my rhinoplasty consultation; He was very friendly, made me feel really comfortable, explained everything clearly and most of all was very honest about what I would achieve. He answered all my questions and has made me feel really excited about having rhinoplasty (something I have wanted to do for many years). I would highly recommend the Harley medical group and I can't wait to have my surgery and see the results. For anyone thinking about having this procedure, then it is well worth going and having a consultation with your surgeon, he definitely helped reassure me and I now feel ready to finally go ahead with my procedure:)
My experience can be summed up in just one word  fantastic. Service .staff.care.approach,and understanding of what you want ?��?
all the staff are very professional and friendly

From the first visit i felt at ease and that my needs were completely understood. Nothing was a problem and everything was explained. I had pondered and wanted this procedure for 20 years,the staff  from beginning to end made this such a fantastic experience for me. I couldn't be happier with the service, the entire procedure, the after care and most of all the result. Amazing.
Great experience with a fully qualified GP - put me at east immediately. Will be going back.

review_title: Amazing BA experience- cardiff branch/Highgate hospital
review_body: I've just had a BA with Harley medical I used the Cardiff branch and surgery was with DR G at Highgate hospital London.

review_title: Receptionist have no idea what they are doing.
review_body: Had a full tummy tuck in January 2016 with Dr Mark.An appointment was booked for me to see him on the 20.05.2016,they called me 2 weeks before to reschedule my appointment for the 21.05.2016.I called these people 2 times before just to confirm my appointment is correct and I also get the to send me an email confirming.Took the time off work went for my appointment on the 21 ,they telling me their was no appointment booked for me the receptionist did not me on the main system. This happen to me in the past before my operation they apologise accept.But we made mistakes me ment to learn from them and they clearly have not learn.I know this happen to alot of clients because see people arguing about this is reception. I was so mad to control my temper I had to cry know I spend �8000 for my operation to be treated like this.My advice to any one booking or have a booking with Harley street be the receptionist and do their job just to make sure you don't travel for disappointed.Especially if you are travelling from far I have no prob with my doc and my operation just the receptionist part.

review_title: Breast Implant surgery I decide cancel and wait for refund 28 days!
review_body: I went to harley for breast implant surgery and yes, off course first appointment was okays. The only problem I had to use a long stairs, no lift, well apart from that fine, the lady who attend me told me that  implant was forever all depends in your body you don't need to replace if theres no issues, but when I search for info in breast implants with Harley website state that between 12 and 15 years you have to replaced that information put me off so I discuss with my family and of course they don't approve it, and the fact that I need replaced I decide to cancel the all surgery and had a better think, the deposit is 500 and I paid 1400 now that I cancel no one enter in contact with me to says how much I get it back, but before all emails and call advert all pass to me all times until today, I still no know how much I get it back and why it 28 days process I guess it life, so my advice before you go and pay something think twice if that what you wanted to do! others ways you facing same situation as me

For a company that are supposed to offer a service second to none and charge a fine price for it too, they offered no customer service whatsoever and seemed more concerned about what was important to them rather than what I needed or requested. I will continue my treatments else where for half the price and the customer service that I need to suit my requirements.
dont bother them fake professionals

So so glad i chose to have BA with Harley medical group!! Clinic staff (liverpool) were fantastic, very informative and always rang to keep me updated. Was originally meant to be a day patient at the preston hospital but due to my medical history was transferred to the highgate hospital and stayed over night (free of charge)!! Nurses were lovely and instantly put me at ease the surgeon was fantastic too!

Having being treated for blonde facial hair removal for over a year ..feeling hopeful and determined. ..definite results and then I get told Harley can no longer supply the product I need to facilitate the hair removal...and worse still its because  they have no faith in its ability to work. They weren't saying that when they were giving me my consultation and encouraging me to book and pay for block treatments. Yes..they said..cant guarantee all hairs will go completely or that some may return but I was determined to try and with seeing hair reduction...its spurred me on. As long as they were there to perform it..i was willing to keep on. .if some good results then there's gotta be more to come...I thought. So imagine how disappointed I was to be told something tht feels like ive just wasted over a thousand pounds and a year of my life. I feel like ive hit a brick wall. I have been told I can look on internet to buy the product though itll be more expensive and Id have to make 2 visits to the clinic then....to have a patch test to determine tht the treatment will be safe. Then go for treatment 2 days later once patch test is ok.  How frustrating when ive been having the treatment over 12 months already with no problems.  It's not easy to get there. I use the train to come for treatments...it wont be good to come for a 5 min patch test m home again.

review_title: Excellent service from start to finish!
review_body: Had been thinking about a breast enlargement for a long time. When I was finally able to do so I was raring to go! Harley have such a great reputation and the ability to pay in instalments were a bonus! They always kept me updated and were available if I had any questions!

review_title: If you're contemplating laser hair removal...
review_body: I can absolutely recommend Louise Worley at the Manchester clinic. A complete professional who instantly put any concerns I had to rest, answered all of my questions and explained the whole process to me. I am currently half way through my treatment sessions and can honestly say that as a sufferer of polycystic ovaries, the results have changed my life and my confidence. I wish I had enquired sooner!

I had my first consultation with Jemma at the Manchester Clinic who told me everything I needed to know and more, she was amazing and answered all of my questions I went fully equipped with! My second consultation was with my surgeon, Dr Sleiter, who talked me through size and guided me in which he thought was best for my shape and body frame. I picked two sizes, one of which I would be getting on the day of my surgery.. I went with 325cc and they are perfect! The hospital staff at First Trust were amazing, they made me feel at ease as I was a little nervous on the day but I really had no need to be as I knew I was in good hands. I am now 6 weeks post op and I am over the moon with my results, and my scars are beyond brilliant! I feel like I have a new lease of life, I only wish I'd have done it sooner! I really can't thank Dr. Sleiter and all of the staff and nurses enough. I would 100% recommend Harley Medical Group to anyone considering having a breast augmentation in the near future. Thank you again!

I had the best experience when arriving for my operation at Highgate Hospital through Harley Medical Group. The nurses were amazing and everyone make me feel very comfortable and relaxed. My results are amazing. I went from a small B to a D/DD which look so natural you would not even be able to tell!

review_title: Perfect service from start to finish.
review_body: I went to the Harley medical group for a BA after being messed about by MYA.

review_title: Great staff at ease from the moment I stepped in
review_body: Couldn't have been more confident in my decision to use Harley medical group for my lip fillers.
I am really happy with my choice after have been in 20 different clinics in London.

Everyone I dealt with at Harley medical were very professional and caring. The whole experience has been a positive one. One thing that would of been helpful would have been an after care sheet. I would definitely recommend Harley medical and I would use them again

I would like to write this review with regards to the care I received from both Nicki in Maidstone clinic and Mark Solomos the surgeon who did my breast augmentation. I am absolutely thrilled with the result I had my 3 month appointment today and from start to finish I have received the same amazing service. I would definitely recommend harley medical to anyone whose looking for a breast augmentation as I feel that they listen to everything I said and the end result is superb thank you so much.

review_title: Bad customer service from day one
review_body: Terrible customer service, my appointment was cancelled just 2 hours before it was due, everytime I tried to speak to someone on the phone I was told they were unavailable and promised someone would ring me back. No one ever rand me back, so I decided to cancel and get a refund, 2 months after requesting my refund I still have not recieved it! Very disappointed and would never recomend! ?�ɍ

review_title: They dont care about you after they take your money
review_body: Hi

I have booked myself in for a consultation for laser stretch mark removal. But I am now very worried as I have come across a lot of bad reviews on here and their Facebook site, Has any one had this Treatment done?

So I went for my consultation at HMG in Southampton over 2 weeks ago now when I got there the receptionist wasn't very welcoming I waited to see the nurse and in my appointment we had a problem so the nurse said she would email the surgeon and get back to me and still nothing I travelled a long way to use this company and I've been completely ignored I think If there like this now what would they be like if there was problems after surgery i definitely Won't be using this company it's not the way i expect to be treated considering I was going to be spending �7000!! Never mind I'll be looking into transform or mya!

I had a  good experience in getting my Lip Fillers with the HMG, lovely consultation nurse, fab lady who did them, a little on the expensive side however it was worth it as I felt comfortable going with a recognised company. Lady who did them was reassuring and answered any worries I had. My lips look fab. Will be going back. My only complaint is that some of the clinic nurses weren't the friendliest when I went to pay and just took my payment without saying thank you or bye.

From my initial appointment to the finished results of my augmentation and uplift I could not be happier. My nurse was so wonderfully supportive throughout and my surgeon Dr Mark Solomos is a pure genius and was lovely to deal with too! I hated my boobs before but I was scared about scaring and the pain from the two procedures, but the pain was very manageable and better than I expected. I can't believe how good they look. They are so neat and even. I highly recommend the Harley Medical Group (I dealt with the Marlow office) and my surgeon and am so grateful to them as my procedure has changed my life.

It is nearly a year following my surgery and I can safely say it was the worst experience of my life. I had a breast reduction. HMG stole all my savings and gave me a bad quality procedure and a horrific customer journey. My hospital stay was a disaster. Staff walked in on me naked, I was shouted at by staff, left on my own and fell as a result of being too weak with no one to check on me. My surgeon was late on the morning of the surgery and the Anaesthetist referred to how inexperienced he was whilst putting me to sleep. I was terrified.

I have been having agera peels for just over a year now, I have received the best advice and care from the nurses at the Liverpool clinic. They have been amazing! I suffer from acne and although the peels are a lot of money for me, they and the Harley medical products I have been using have really made a difference to my skin and confidence. I couldn't be happier. I am however really dissapointed that the skin care line has now been discontinued. I have heard you are introducing a new skin care line which I have researched and its cost is extremely higher then what I paid for the Harley medical range! This to me is not on. I pay a lot of money for the peels and I am a regular customer, however I cannot afford an extra �100 a month for the products I use at home, especially when the old stuff worked a treat for a fraction of the price! I feel very let down. I got told that a home care routine is just as important as the peels but at this rate I will not be able to afford both so what is the point in getting either?

I had a breast uplift with dr sleiter in september 2015. The service i recived was amazing from start to finish and i can not thank the staff and sergeon enough. I still attend the manchester clinic as i am now having underarm lazer hair removal and i am pleased with the results so far after only 3 treatments. I cant fault HMG one bit.

I've used HMG in the past and their service has been impeccable. However on this occasion, although the service for both my consultations couldn't be faulted, the service I recieved in terms of getting information back to me has been appalling. It's taken several phone calls and requests at the consultations over a period of almost three weeks for me to get this information., and I'm still waiting for someone to go over it with me.

I had my first consultation Tuesday, found the staff were amazing really made me feel at ease, found the Birmingham clinic very clean. Booking my surgery for breast enlargement. A little bit nervous with the reviews I've read on here though but there's also some great reviews

review_title: avoid crap only 1 word for it
review_body: I was told 2 different appointments went all way to Bristol to be told no was another day even though it was on email that day there error TWICE had laser on face no before pics or after pics and last one yesterday didn't even say to come back for review just take money do what they got to do and goodbye offers no drinks its so much like nhs standards I would avoid people

review_title: Jobsworths - Response to their Customer Care
review_body: I am writing this in response to the reply that I had received from Customer Care. I read it with interest and regret to mention that it only re-confirms my initial impressions that the staff lack any common sense and ability to comprehend simple matters.

I have recently had a brilliant experience with Harley Medical Group who performed traditional liposuction on four areas of my thighs.  I went for an initial consultation and spoke with nurse Cat who was totally awesome throughout. She said for the results I wanted I would need four areas - both sides, front and back of my thighs.  She offered me traditional and vaser options and didn't pressure me to take the vaser option (the more expensive option). I chose traditional because the only benefits I saw to vaser were recovery time and pain, which didn't really worry me. I was booked in for a consultation with my surgeon Mr Allwin Gnanajebamani who was lovely. He listened to what I wanted and made the same recommendation as Cat did - four areas of lipo all around my thighs, except he swapped back of thighs for side of knees.  I was told I would have to stay in overnight as four areas is a bit hardcore so I paid the extra for that (approx. �300 if I remember correctly) and was VERY glad I did as I feel I needed that in hindsight after the surgery.  I had my appointments for swabs with Cat which all went fine.  I had some questions in the run up to the surgery which Cat answered over the phone and e-mail very promptly.  She always made me feel very at ease.  I went to Highgate Hospital which was nicer than almost all the hotels I've ever paid to stay in by a long way.  The staff were all incredibly friendly - they made me feel very at ease and answered all of my questions.  Nothing was too much trouble and they explained everything.  The food was lovely and they came very quickly when I rang for them.  I went down for the surgery and woke up in my pressure garment feeling sleepy and sore but they helped to manage my pain so I felt very comfortable.  My overnight stay and check out with meds all went very well, no problems.  Went for my follow up with Cat who removed my dressings and checked my stitches.  I am now almost 3 months post surgery and can see the shape I think my thighs will be (for the most part, although they say another 3 months for final result) and am deliriously happy.  I have had the equivalent of a Coke bottle of fat/liquid removed from each thigh and the difference is striking.  Allwin told me there maybe unevenness to my skin surface afterwards, as skin isn't perfectly smooth and although I do notice this in places, my legs are slim now so I don't care!  And it may still reduce with time to settle.  My advice would be to anyone who wants to go ahead: 1) Don't expect the unreasonable - understand the limitations of your chosen surgery and if you don't like them, don't go ahead 2) Ask every question you think you might possibly need to know and do your research - being prepared makes everything easier 3) Do as you're told!  You're as responsible as HMG are for your recovery/results so if you have to wear the pressure pants non-stop for a whole week then do it!  Your recovery will be faster and your results better 4) If you're having liposuction then book yourself in for some medical lymphatic drainage massage afterwards - for as soon as you feel able - it reduces bruising, swelling and pain really quickly.  Overall I would recommend HMG, Allwin and Cat all very highly - they were brilliant throughout and I'm very happy with my results!
I visited the Harley street clinic this morning for 0.5ml of Juvederm lip fillers and I couldn't be happier.

review_title: Ill advised, false promises and hidden costs
review_body: Upon my first consultation for a breast augmentation I stated from the start I wanted my incision to be under the armpit (Transaxillary approach). I was told having an incision under the armpit was possible, however In order to discuss this with the surgeon a minimum deposit of �500 was required. I put down my deposit, booked my surgery and assessment dates and met my surgeon. He then told me he could not do it under the arm. I was extremely dissapointed and was advised to have the incision under the breast and under the muscle. I then sort the advise of several other surgeons who told me about the submuscular procedure and how it was a simple procedure and around an 1hr long and I would be home that day. I spoke to several other patients about their procedures under I was comfortable with the decision of having it under the muscle with the incision under the breast (Inframammary approach). I was told �3990 upfront cost with no hidden costs and slightly more for the finance option. Now it is a few days before my surgery and I have now been told it is an overnight stay (which I was constantly assured is a personal option) and I will be charged an extra �710. And if I did not feel comfortable with having the surgery then I will be subjected to a cancellation fee of �1500, despite the fact I was not aware of these costs. If they had told me from the start I would have had the option to consider their requests. I feel cheated, ill advised and cornered. The surgeon stated it was because I needed drains put it, but all the patients I spoke to had drains put it and were day cases. All the surgeons I consulted with stated it was a day case and some even advised against an overnight stay to encourage movement.

review_title: The most impressive clinic I've been to
review_body: The Marlow clinic is set in an absolutely stunning building, I was so impressed with how clean and tasteful it was. The really have made an outstanding effort. The staff were so lovely and welcoming, my treatment has been amazing so I will 100% be back in the new year and hope to bump in to my old boss, Helen Chapman who is clearly a cut above the rest when it comes to clinic management.
Professional, friendly and lovely staff. All made me feel at ease and my surgeon was amazing! Great after care would completely recommend

so for the past year I've been having facial laser treatment with harley medical in cardiff.. First off I couldn't thank the staff enough for being highly professional kind and caring and on my journey they offered me the upmost support you could ask for. Now unfortunately my treatments have come to and end I can honestly say I don't think it's worked for me it's reduced lots on certain areas of my face but unfortunately when I was going for my treatments I was told to still shave in between and because my cheeks were very blonde but very hairy and long they couldn't get rid of it as quick so because of this I was told to shave in between to get the hair to grow darker and thicker for past year Iv been doing so and now the treatments have come to and end I am unfortunately left with even hairier cheeks and more prominant, it has however knocked my confidence even more when the sun is shining I find myself trying to hide my face with anything I can il even wear a scarf when it's warm so that I can cover this. When I told the lady who treated me on my last couple of treatments this she was shocked and said that she never tells patients to continue shaving. Especially in areas they never did. Sadly I don't have the money to keep up with the treatments so apart from my neck Im sorry to say it has worsened and I have mixed feelings on wether to recommend the treatment to anyone. I think if you have a lot of money then go for it but for me 1000 for 8 treatments is hard to keep up with. Hope you have a better expierience :).

review_title: Laser treatment with Nurse Olga-Excellent (Harley Street London)
review_body: I've been going to Harley medical centre- Harley Street London Branch for laser hair removal for years however the best experience was today. I was treated by laser specialist Olga. She was professional, very knowledgeable and took care to provide full coverage. She did not rush and was able to provide more than the perfunctory basic advice. What I liked best about the service was I felt it justified the cost. I would continue visiting Harley medical group to receive treatment with this excellent member of staff.

I had Dr Arwin and I had my operation a week ago. I highly recommend Mr Arwin. I was very self conscious before this, they were so nice before I went down to surgery. It was so easy and I was terrified of the annastetic- but he talk throughout before I fell asleep and i actually enjoyed it. I woke up to a friendly nurse who have me pain killers. I had never been happier with my new breast and everyone has said how great they look! I never normally do reviews but I think they deserved it!

While I am happy with the level of customer service and treatment received up to and during my rhinoplasty operation (although I was not offered a follow-up appointment a few months after my operation so have not seen my surgeon for a check-up, but this must have just been an oversight), I am very unhappy with the result of the operation which I had back in May 2014 (about 17 months ago).  The tip of my nose is still very enlarged (bigger than before the operation), and I have a lump on one side of my nose, and an enlarged knuckled shape at the tip of my nose.  After spending about �5000 I am very disappointed as my old nose tip did not have the above issues and it seems unlikely there will be improvement and I would not want to go through the full operation again.  I was not made aware of potential problems following a rhinoplasty and was only shown photographs of good results so I think I should have been warned of the specific risks and I may then have given more balanced consideration to the operation. I think the Cambridge Clinic has now closed (my e-mail was returned) so I sent an e-mail to the Chelmsford Clinic almost a week ago and hope to hear back soon with some advice, and hopefully there will be a way forward.

I just called the Harley Medical group in Manchester to ask to book in for a consultation. When asked what the treatment was for I said it was for my under eye darkness and I thought it may be laser but I didn't know and was after advice which was why I wanted to book a consultation. The lady simply told me that unfortunately they dont treat dark circles for under eyes. If she would have actually asked me a few more questions about my concerns then she would have found that after taking the time to actually help me that they do offer the treatment I was after which I have now booked to have elsewhere. I myself work in an customer services in an aesthetics clinic and to be fobbed off like that was unbelievable! Disappointed.

From the moment I walked out of my first consultation with one of the Harley medical nurses. I knew this group would look after me 100%. They made me feel so at ease with everything. And answered all my questioned I had with confidence. The day of my surgery was nice and pieceful, the nurses took great care of me. And the chocolate cake was amazing! The after care I received so far has been very reassuring. I seen my surgeon a week later, just to put minds at rest that I was ok.

I could not be happier with the treatment that i received from the consultation to the treatment, the technician was very proffesional and very experienced, i could not fault any part of my treatment and i would recommend them to anyone, very happy!!

I was pleased with the result but the aftercare was very disappointing.I was supposed to be seen in Chelmsford but the nurse was off ill.so I had to go all the way to London. More should have been explained that you can be in pain

I was not guided the right way at the beginning about how to use the products...which was really upsetting for me...eventually when I have started to use the products the end result is still to be seen.....

I had a rhinoplasty in April 2015 and whilst happy with the size reduction, nothing has been done to the tip of my nose and it is still exactly the same. I've been told it can take up to a year for swelling to go down but this is not swollen, it's just the tip was not finished to my satisfaction. I had a bad time at the London Highgate hospital and I received a letter apologising for the poor level of treatment. I would never go back to Brighton/London clinic. I'm now going to have to pay again for the tip of my nose to be corrected. I am disappointed as spent �5,000! There has been no offer of help, I was just told to be patient. My pictures of before and after are identical of nose tip. Surgeon did not know who I was when went back for check up.
My name is Laura I'm 25 and I had a procedure done with Dr Alwin at the Nottingham clinic.

I have using my obagi for two weeks and three days to date. I would like to recommend this treatment for anyone as I can see a big big defferent my face. If it's this good for two weeks I just can't wait until three month to see my new face. I have tried in every medication is posible for my acne. But never work like obagi. Thank you so much for the obagi team for giving me back my lovely face and my confidence. Good Luck. Lanka
So disappointed with the obargi blue peel did not peel very much could not see any improvement

After looking at a few places and visiting another I decided to use the HMG for my breast augmentation as I felt very comfortable and found there staff very friendly and caring.  My surgeon Made me feel relaxed straight away, was friendly and answered all my questions no matter how small. The Highgate hospital where I had my operation was just as professional and very  clean.  Overall my whole experience has been very positive.  The only thing I would have found more helpful is more information/ paperwork to take away on after care/ treatment (ie. Massage/scars) however the team are only a call away and only too happy to answer any questions I have.

review_title: Excellent care, before, during and after
review_body: I have had a fantastic experience.  They have been so supportive the whole way through the process.  They are always available,  and very efficient when it comes to responding and arranging this . They are experienced and I felt confident in their care . I am still recovering and know that I can go to them whenever and as much as I like , if I have any worries or concerns.

I have found the treatment from the HMG staff great from my initial consultation through to the follow up calls to check I was ok. The initial consultation was informative and there was no pressure put on me at all, even when I said I was 'shopping around' and had other appointments at other companies. The procedure went exactly as planned and Mr Solomos has done exactly what he said he would. The only reason I have not given 5 stars is because it has been difficult to schedule my 6-8 week follow up appointment with the surgeon and I am having to travel further afield as I do not want to wait 13 weeks to see him. I have been reassured by the nurses and other staff at HMG Watford that I can call any time with queries which fortunately I have not had to do as everything has been good so far. I would use HMG again for any other cosmetic procedure that I might consider in the future.

I have recently had a breast augmentation with The Harley Medical Group and i am over the moon with the end result. The surgeon has been brilliant, he has been very informative from start to finish, made me feel at ease throughout and has done a fabulous job, I would recommend him to anyone looking to get this procedure.....However i am not so sure i would use The Harley Medical Group again. Whilst all the staff i have dealt with from receptionist's to nurses have been very polite i have often been referred to as "babe" and "hun" which despite being in my early 30's i found most unprofessional and all but my initial consultation and post op appointments were cancelled and rearranged - most frustrating.

review_title: Wonderful pre and post care fantastic results from a lovely surgeon thank you thank you thank you
review_body: I can't fault Harley medical at all. Pre care and consolations were treated with the most sincere care making you feel that they understood your needs personally . All staff from reception to surgeon were kind considerate and very professional . At no point did I feel nervous or worried and I was always treated and spoken to as if I was their only patient . Post care is wonderful and although not on my doorstep I feel that they are Nextdoor nothing is too much trouble . Karen Hamberg my nurse from Chelmsford is a beautiful person inside and out and has always made me feel that she cares on a personal level . Mr Alluin my surgeon has achieved fantastic results and already my scars after only 2weeks are very minimal and my pain even straight after was almost non existent . I can't thank everyone enough and I would highly recommend the Harley medical group. Wonderful fantastic kind caring considerate and very professional from start to finish . THANK YOU ALL XX
I have been coming to Harley medical Birmingham for some time now, the staff are delightful, caring, supportive and extrenely good at what they do! Particularly Kyomi who is always a pleasure!

review_title: Professional, friendly service at Harley Medical Group Watford
review_body: I use the branch in Watford for Botox to my armpits and for laser hair removal to the bikini area. I have always found the staff to be professional and friendly and I am always happy to return. The nurses are really nice and make you feel comfortable and the Clinic Manager leads the team and manages the clinic well. They are clearly passionate about their work.

From the moment I walked through the door to the moment I left the service/treatment was excellent, the staff made me very welcome and explained in detail what to expect with my treatment. I was made to feel very comfortable and even though I was a little nervous that soon disappeared and I ended up enjoying the whole experience. Thankyou Maidstone clinic.

I have been using the HMG facial products for about a year now and I love them so thought it was about time I wrote a review! I have been so happily surprised by the comments of friends who have noticed a difference and have simply asked me what I am using. One friend said, "you look five years younger than the rest of us". I use the Anti-Ageing Moisturiser, Youth Serum, Enhanced Performance SPF25, Eye Lift and the Cleanser. They are a pleasure to use, smell delicious and the packaging is beautiful and I have got used to the 'squirt' of the Eye Lift and Serum as it can sometimes be a bit too much! These products are really great and I am delighted with the results.
I have used many companies over the years for less invasive procedures, I booked in Harley for  a medical microdermabrasion as I wanted to use a more known company for this.
I had a good experience.  The staff were helpful, the treatment went well.  Thanks for sorting out my stretch marks!

My (now) wife made me have treatments before our wedding. The nurses were friendly and made me relaxed, I was out if my comfort zone. They talked me through my treatment and got me ready for our wedding day. By the end of it I looked as good as the bride!

At first I was really happy with the service I revived very helpful staff until I paid the full amount for my op. Never received my confirmation of hospital and date till  one working day before and that was after me chasing them. After op I attended my one week check and was told someone would ring me every week to see how I'm doing for the next six weeks. I'm on week four now and still waiting for someone to call.  Over all I am very happy with the results of my op but would not recommend the Harley medical group to any one I know

From consultation to surgery I was treated excellently and given the best care and advice throughout. All the staff are very helpful, friendly, welcoming and understanding. I had my breast augmentation done by the fabulous Mr Mahadev. (the best of the best) Thank you to all the girls and the surgery team for giving my life a happier me xx
I am not happy stitches are quite low, breast size doesn't feel that larger either very disappointed as thought going with this company would be better service
From my first telephone call, to my consultation to my procedure everyone was extremely friendly and professional.
My time with Harley Medical was great, from my first consultation to my last, there was always someone to help as answer any of my questions and everything was sorted for me so quickly!

I had my first laser hair removal session yesterday i was so scared yet the lovely kim at Birmingham clinic made it an amazing experience for me. I recommend her to everybody now. It took me a year to go ahead yet i wish i did it sooner definately 5 starts for the harley medical group im so happy
Very good treatment and service and very happy with results

I had an excellent experience with The Harley Medical Group for a closed rhinoplasty operation.  I was provided with all the necessary information and I never felt pressured into the procedure or any related procedures.  The pre op process was very good and I am extremely pleased with the early results.  The surgeon was really nice and did a fantastic job.  Would recommend to others.

I had laser treatment on my bikini line and I would definitely recommend the Harley Clinic in Wimbledon. The result was amazing and the staff were extremely personable whilst still being very professional.

The results are brilliant, couldn't fault the treatment I received. Just the service I received has let this company down and I feel cheated out of extra money. Surgeon was good and any concerns I had before I had the op were dealt with, just after I had the surgery it went downhill.
Excellent service provided by HMG from start to finish. All staff were extremely accommodating and were always happen to answer any queries along the way.

I highly recommend HMG for offering such fantastic customer service with their own personal touch. For a procedure that is so life changing and potentially stressful HMG made it easier for me to be comfortable and happy during the entire process. Plus my surgeon was so lovely and helpful, answered all my questions and put me at ease.
Breast augmentation. Not so straightforward after surgery as had a leak. Probably didn't take it as easy as I should have.

Booking friendly and efficient.  Representative pointed out to me how I could save an additional 10%.  I have used many times and always found staff to be friendly and courteous.  Good advice from Doctor.
I am extremely happy with my botox and was made to feel very comfortable and relaxed.  Will definitely be back.
Im very satisfied with my treatment in this clinic

I paid nearly a thousand up front to have lazer hair removal.   The second appointment I made was moved twice due to a staff member not being available.   Then unbelievably I was contacted again to move it a third time.   I was even told that if it needed to be moved again I would get priority.   The staff have very poor customer service skills probably due to a lack of training.   I was obviously livid having paid so much and said that if it happened again I would have my money back.   I got absolutely no reaction when I said this, another example of poor customer service.   When I go it is ok service but Harley street Medical seem to think their time is more valuable than anyone else's.   Generally car crash service.
Dealing with HMG has been a good experience. Friendly staff who explain & help without difficulty. Highly recommended.

review_title: Wonderful experience, such wonderful staff (especially Louise).
review_body: From start to finish I was treated extremely well and given advice that was in my best interest. I looked forward to my fortnightly treatments and to catching up with Louise, the lady who gave me my procedures. I am already wondering what else I can have done, just so I can go back and get pampered and have a nice chat with Louise.
Been having treatment for a few years, and have always had a positive experience.  Love the treatment

review_title: A highly professional team, caring, thorough and attentive. A very positive experience
review_body: The team in Liverpool are great, they are very professional, supportive, thorough and conscientious. You feel welcomed and valued. There is no pressure. I have found that they will discuss procedures in detail, you do not feel rushed at all. The environment is warm and welcoming. As a man, I did not feel embarrassed or out of place. Lesley Laura and Catherine who I have dealt with are fabulous, they really are

I had been considering rhinoplasty after been bullied since I was at school, through college, work and older adult life.  The staff at Harley Medical Group put me at my ease, from my initial appointment at the clinic,  in hospital and during recovery.  They answered all my questions clearly and explained the procedure very thoroughly.   My surgeon was very professional and keen to give me the best outcome he could, which he achieved.   My confidence has rocketed since my op, I just wish I had done it years ago.

review_title: Friendly, supportive and with great results!
review_body: I have to praise HMG for their professional yet personal approach to my cosmetic procedure. They have been supportive from pre to post surgery, always contactable and made me feel confident throughout the whole journey.
Excellent, friendly, professional. I would use them again.
From start to finish I am extremely happy with the service and care I received..
The staff were amazing both at the clinic and at the hospital. I couldn't have asked for a better experience.

Harley medical group, was with  me every step of the way. Always on the phone  if I was worried (I always over worry) my mind was out rest every time I called or was seen.if I decide  to have  cosmetic surgery  again,I most definitely  us harley medical again.

review_title: Always first class standard, and excellent customer service
review_body: I have been a customer for over ten years, I have had plastic surgery with my nose Rinoplasty, and I visit 4 times a year for my botox and twice a year for my fillers.
I had amazing service. The girls - Sinead and Bethan were nothing short of brilliant. Friendly, professional, helpful and informative.

Harley Medical Group have been outstanding from start to finish. I had breast reduction surgery and it has changed my life. My surgen was so informative, explained everything, listened to me and my concerns, i felt very confident that i was in good hands. The surgery went very well, the nurse who looked after me was lovely. The recovery process and after care was brilliant, as i was working in london and visiting my family in Leeds, i was able to have the option of going to both clinics, when every i needed to. The nurses in Leeds and in Harley street were so wonderful and reassured me at every step. 1 year on the scars are barely noticable. The surgery really has changed me, i am more confident, can wear anything i like and i no longer have a bad back and i just compleated my first half marathon, somthing i thought i would never do.

Entered Harley Medical Manchester clinic feeling very nervous, the lady on reception was very welcoming and the clinic itself is very clean and had that medical feel.  I met with the very lovely Deborah who went through absolutely everything, so much so she answered every question I had without me even asking.  I felt very comfortable in her office and she made the consultation a fun and informative experience.  I even got to ?��try on?ѝ my new boobs!
Very helpful staff that gave me detailed information regarding my procedure and were very happy to answer any questions that I had. I?��m extremely satisfied with my results ?���?��??��?
I definitely recommend Harley Medical Group to anyone.
Fab service!

Fantastic experience from start to finish! I have never had any kind of surgery before and the staff at Harley made me feel so welcome and safe. I had breast augmentation carried out by the surgeon Ashley Topps who has done an amazing job...he put me at ease very quickly the first time I had to get my boobs out! I Frequently receive comments about how natural my implants look and my scars are already barely visible 10 weeks later. I would also like to mention how fantastic Andrea in the Manchester clinic was throughout my recovery. Nothing was too much for her and she was able to answer every single question I had within minutes. 10 out of 10!

review_title: The process so far has been so easy

review_title: Treatment was not good first had for?�?

I promised myself that when I reached the ripe age of 50 (52 this year) I would think about fillers under the eyes, fed up of looking tired all the time. I have just had my second treatment with Rhiannon who I might add is amazing, I am on day three and absolutely love how different I feel.

review_title: High Barnet branch is the best
review_body: High Barnet branch  - The best team ever!!! Girls are lovely, very helpful, open and you can really go on and on saying what a good/ best experience I had and still have with them. Seriously there are not enough words.

I am in the middle of treatments for laser hair removal at Destination Skin. Jenny who is treating me is ultra-AMAZING! Incredibly personable and down to earth, she carries out her work with both professionalism and great care. review_title: I have used destinations skin Bristol 1?�?
review_body: I have used destinations skin Bristol 1 year ago for Micro-needling. I have paid over 500 hundred pounds with a very big discount all together with an extra treatment.  My skin was in a decent condition. I had some acne and some little scars which I wanted to get rid of. After completing all of the treatments -I had no results what so ever. Scarring did not improve even a little. I would say that my skin condition got even worse.
Very bad experience...one of the worst...never would recommend to go there.

Great, Friendly, Knowledgable! I love pamper days and DestinationSkin in High Barnet is the best place to treat your skin and relax. I?��ve had acne since I was 15, I?��m now 26, so you can imagine all the scars acne has left on my skin - After 8 months of microneedling and microdermabrasion sessions with their amazing specialist Eden, my acne has stopped and my scars are not as deep as they were and have smoother skin now. I am so happy with the way they talked me through the process step by step and see results after each treatment. I?��d definately recommend them if you are looking for a professional, friendly and informative team to look after your skin.

review_title: Successful treatment at the Muswell Hill branch
review_body: I have visited the Muswell Hill branch for three electrolysis sessions to remove red cherry spots.  The treatment has been very successful and the spots that have been treated have all but gone. Would recommend Rowena she is very professional.

review_title: I have just visited Birmingham branch?�?
review_body: I have just visited Birmingham branch to get some help with my cystic acne and looking forward to start my treatment soon. Very professional team and great service! Only giving  4 stars as haven't started my treatment yet...?��?

review_title: I visited the Cardiff branch a few?�?
review_body: I visited the Cardiff branch a few years ago, having laser vein. I then went on holiday and was advised I?��d have to wait a while for my next treatment. I then had a baby and was informed I?��d have to hang on further as hormones etc can affect the treatment. The fact I had to wait was a little frustrating, as it had been a really effective treatment.  But it really assured me that Destintation Skin can be trusted to do the best by their clients, giving honest advise and feedback. I used to be a therapist so I really value their ethics and professionalism. I have begun a new course of treatment in the same branch, based on my previous positive experience. I have to express the high level of customer service is really brilliant. It is consistent and again, the treatment?��s begun working immediately.

review_title: Skin Tags are now a Distant Memory
review_body: Having had a cluster of about 20 unsightly skin tags causing me misery, I stumbled across Destination Skin (Birmingham) whilst walking through the city. I noticed that they were advertising Skin Tag removal and took note of their telephone number. The following day I called and was politely, efficiently and cheerfully dealt with, my booking being made for the following day. When I arrived I was quickly processed through to Liz Hill. She explained the procedure to me and set my nerves at rest. Although not the most comfortable experience Liz's manner made sure the process was almost enjoyable, as we chatted throughout her professionalism and expertise shone through. The result - two weeks later, skin tags have all disappeared. I would thoroughly recommend this company to any who could benefit from their highly customer centric services. Thank You Liz and all at Destination Skin Birmingham

review_title: Overall, a regrettable experience at Destination Skin
review_body: A year after 6 sessions on my face and 9 sessions on my arms, the laser hair removal has triggered hair growth in these regions. More so than prior to the treatment.

review_title: Today I went to have laser hair removal?�?
review_body: Today I went to have laser hair removal  for the first time at the Manchester clinic, I was very nervous. Amy was my therapist and she was so lovely and really calmed my nerves.

I ve just finished the 5th session of laser hair removal with Anda , in Maddox street and I could notice a huge difference after the 3rd sessions. I am extremely pleased with the result and Anda has been so patient with me, advising me also about the best solution I could adapt for my face(redness). I will highly recommend all my friends with Anda, thanks to her passion for very good results.

Destination skin absolutely ruined my face and wouldn?��t take responsibility. Four years ago I visited destination skin for lip filler, this was the first time I had ever had lip filler and I believe I was 21-22 at the time...less then four weeks later I called back and said now the swelling had gone down I wanted them to be bigger... not long after/maybe even sooner the nurse injected another ml - this means 2ml was injected within the space of 6-8 weeks into my very small to begin with lips. 6 months later I finally found a voice and called them up to complain and voice my concerns, I was completely disregarded they said it had been to long to complain. Now older, I thought it was only fair to warn others of what has happened to my lips as a result of your companies incompetence. Not only is one side of my top lip bigger then the other, scar tissue has formed inside of the lip as a result of injury caused by YOUR company. I wish I was as clued up and knowledagble as I am now about filler, as I wouldn?��t have allowed the second ml to ever be put in. This is what happens when people take advantage of others for no reason then lining pockets. Every nurse I have spoken to since said they would have never put 2ML into anyone?��s lips of that size and especially not that close between appointments. My point is, that most companies or nurses would have said no, but yours didn?��t, and instead saw financial gain, and I now have a constant reminder of your incompetency and my immaturity on my face.

review_title: Fab service & results at Destination Skin?�?
review_body: Excellent service at Destination Skin Bristol. All staff very friendly & helpful. Full history taken before discussing treatment options. Once we had agreed a course of treatment, patch tests were done & the treatment explained. One treatment on thread veins & a red ?��blood mole?��  on the end of my nose saw them disappear within weeks.

I've just finished my 3rd treatment at the Bristol branch.Ceri Anderson has been advising me as well as administering the treatments.So far I'm extremely pleased with the results and Ceri has been fantastic talking me through every step and making sure I'm ok.Im having the TCA peel next and Ceri showed me pictures of her own skin when she had it done herself to reasure me.All in all I'm enjoying the whole experience highly recommended.

review_title: Amazing service at the City Clinic
review_body: I am very impressed by the new City clinic by Liverpool street station (Broadgate) its more spacious and very well presented. The staff there are incredibly friendly and helpful with professionalism maintained at all times. In particular Beverly and Kerry who take the time to make sure your query is dealt with as efficient as possible, also they take the time to discuss any concerns you may have with the treatments and advise etc. This makes me feel very comfortable and builds trust with the staff and practitioners.

I went to Destination Skin in Manchester for my laser hair removal. My practitioner, Amy, was very helpful and knowledgable and made me feel at ease throughout. I am really pleased with the results and will definitely be going back for another treatment.

My only experience with 'Beauty Salons' has been for hair removal, mainly electrolysis. I am now in my late 60's so I have had quite a few years of treatment overall.  I have to say that my recent experience at Destination Skin in St Margarets has been absolutely first class.  It almost feels like a family business because there is such attention to giving good service, to ensuring that the customer is looked after.  The practitioners I have had are both very experienced and they seem to really enjoy their work.   Apart from hating the treatment itself I do rather enjoy my sessions because we have good chats!

ladies destination skin Bristol helpful booked appointment in august for mini facial cant wait to look younger.get the spring back into my step afterwards.know look feel more confident.thankyou ladies for the helpful advice you given me..roll on my appointment date best wishes maryx
Excellent welcoming staff and excellent knowledge and service.

Every time I go here I enjoy the experience and get decent results. All staff are well trained and take pride in their work. Very clean and presentable shop. Friendly staff looking out for you. Muswell Hill branch

She is passionate about results and always makes people feel valued. I I have been using electrolysis for skin tags and broken veins on my nose and red cherry spots. And it works.

caring staff (Amy is great!) and treatments work wonders. I always feel Very good and comfortable with them. my skin looks amazing!

My therapist who I always get to see everytime I go in for my treatment is Tracey Wright - for my skin therapies and for my laser hair removal - she is knowledgeable and always gets the best of my skin! Where others have failed in my skin department Tracey has actually managed to improve my skin condition and get rid of lot my hair fuzz. review_title: I have been going to Destination Skin?�?

review_title: I?��ve been going to Tracey for a few?�?
