review_title: I used destinations skin Bristol years?�?
review_body: I used destinations skin Bristol years ago for hair removal and it was great then. Last year went to have the age spot treatment using laser, it made it worst. It got even darker, they then tried a peel which did nothing. Then I was offered the obagi system this made my life  hell! Not only are my age got got darker, the it brought out those underneath to surface and my worst nightmare is that now I have a Melasma moustache.

review_title: I can only highly recommend Destination?�?
review_body: I can only highly recommend Destination skin at Weybridge. Impeccable trustworthy service from Doreen. I went here for treatment for  facial hair and red veins thinking laser would be my  option but was advised Electrolysis would give me better results. I was a bit hesitant at first as I had my heart set on laser but Doreen was so knowledgeable I trusted her wisdom and experience and I?��m so glad I did now . She treated my red veins with marvellous results I?��m so pleased and the hairs  are so much less too. Thank you Doreen and thanks to all the girls there for the wonderful service.

Could not recommend Destination Skin enough. I've been going to the Basingstoke Branch for years and they've helped my skin concerns massively. The face peels are amazing and have treated my acne as a teenager and reduced my scars. The peels and products can be pricey but they often have deals and discounts on and honestly they are so worth it. Vicky has not only helped my skin concerns but also my confidence. She provides real strong and deep peels which provide amazing results. The girls are so knowledgable and recommend the right products for my skin. My skin is improving year on year and it's all thanks for Destination Skin!!!

I?��ve been going to the Guildford branch for about six years now and they are just getting better and better. Ilona, Amy and Paige are always welcoming everyone with a smile. My treatment are carried out by Ilona who is so knowledgeable and confident in her work, she gives a thorough treatment and really knows my skin. The other thing I love about going is the girls all remember the clients and ask aboit family, pets, holidays so you feel as though you?��re visiting a friend. Excellent treatments and customer service from all the team. Highly recommended!

review_title: Reducing the redness on my face.
review_body: I have been attending Destination Skin  recently to reduce the redness on my face.  Amanda has done an amazing Job.  My skin looks so much better, and the redness has reduced significantly.  The care and treatment I have received from Amanda has been excellent.

I have been going to destinatiom skin manchester for a few years now after I was recommended by a friend for my acne and scarring. The practitioner, Danniella,  I'm seeing now is the best I've seen so far. I love how thorough she is and I'm impressed with the level of care she delivers and I can tell she really cares. Be assured you will receive top notch service! They are pricey but  well worth it because you know you'll receive the best treatment. My acne has improved considerably and I very often receive compliments about my glowy skin now. My mum also suffers from rosacea and was recommended some products which helped clear it all up. Highly recommend!
Tear Trough Filler.

review_title: Just had my first visit to the Barnet?�?
review_body: Just had my first visit to the Barnet clinic and have to say how impressed I was ,
Excellent service and treatments ?�Ɂ

review_title: From acne nightmare to spot free in a year!
review_body: I?��ve been receiving treatment for my acne and acne scarring from Danielle at the Manchester branch for about a year now. She is honestly the loveliest person I?��ve ever had the pleasure to meet. She always remembers what I?��ve been up to and asks about my life which is so nice and welcoming. She even remembers how I like my coffee! The results of my treatment have been incredible. My skin has had a new lease of life. My once acne covered face has gone to being literally spot free in a year - amazing! I?��d recommend DestinationSkin to anyone with acne problems.
Pily Cluett - Re Windsor Branch

review_title: The best there is.  I am THRILLED!
review_body: I would HIGHLY recommend DestinationSkin in Guildford. I have been going there for almost a year and have had retinol peels, microdermabrasion, glycolic peels and injectibles.  The beauty therapist, Emmi (sorry if I've spelled your name incorrectly!) who does my treatments is one of the loveliest people I have met.  She went over everything prior to any treatment I received, assessed my skin and made recommendations to me based on what my goals were, what was realistic and what would help.  I feel my skin really looks amazing (especially for being 50 now).

I highly recommend destination skin ! I had my skin assessed by Nina I think apologies if I have the name wrong, but she?��s based in Birmingham clinic and she has been so helpful and has made me feel so comfortable and is very informative. I?��ve had skin peel treatments for acne and I have to say the result is AMAZING! I?��ve had acne now for about more then 5 years and I have tried every medication, lotion potion and nothing has worked and I was really at a low point few months ago when my acne flared up again. All these years I?��ve spent thousands on different creams and medications but nothing?��s worked so I thought I might as well go for the peel not really looking for a huge difference but my acne has cleared up! And I?��m so happy with the treatments Nina has recommended me with as all of them have clearly worked all my family and friends can see the difference! Super happy customer and I?��ll be happy to share before and after pics to anyone who is looking to get this done just dm me  ?�� thanks destination skin you?��ve really boosted my confidence I hardly even wear makeup anymore which was my main goal.

Where to start? ... Destination skin Guildford have been helping me for the last few years. I have been suffering with an unfeminine amount of dark, unwanted hair. I have had a full 9 sessions of laser hair removal over  a large percentage of my body with a few top up here and there! The girls in there are informative, friendly and always willing to help. They are always making me aware of other treatments and great offers I just cant refuse, helping me with my skin and my new full pout! I have recommended them to many friends who also swear by their professional  and effective treatments served with a warm and friendly attitude :D  THANK YOU LADIES x

i have awful skin , to the point it has a significant impact on my life, i have been going to appointments at destination skin for a few years now, I've had many different treatments and the staff always go above and beyond to ensure customer satisfaction. can't recommend them enough looking forward to booking my next app.

review_title: Can not recommend enough... you must try for yourself
review_body: I have had treatments in various clinics over many years, though am ecstatic to have come across Amy at Guildford Destination Skin. She is so knowledgeable and passionate about skin care and treatments. I had a very thorough consultation and was left with a real understanding about what treatments would aid my skin concerns. I was complimented on areas of my skin and my maintenance of it and given tips to enhance it and at no time pushed into anything. I have gone on to have both TCA peel and Dermaroller and both treatments have been professionally carried out and I now wouldn't dream of going anywhere else. Paige at Guildford has also been very helpful and answered any questions I've had and again demonstrated a real passion about skincare. And it is so lovely when I turn up and both Amy and Paige have such big,welcoming smiles.

I have been coming to Destination Skin for 6 years to improve my skin and reduce dark pigmentation. This was sun damage from living abroad in my childhood. The results have been fantastic and I would highly recommend the Retinol treatment to anyone who could do with brighter, smoother skin. Page at the Guildford branch is a wonderful person to see and a pleasure to have treatments with.

review_title: Excellent service and value for money
review_body: I am a very hairy young black female. I have researched many companies which specialise in ethnic laser hair treatment and there were few. I chose destination skin as they were warm an encouraging and professional. I have had my first treatment, and I?��m happy to say that my dreaded facial hair has improved drastically. I was advised that to have great results I would need several treatments. I am one happy customer.

review_title: Amazing clinic, perfect atmosphere!! The minute you step through the door at?�?
review_body: The minute you step through the door at this clinic, you have very professional welcoming therapists to greet you, If anyone out there is thinking about having laser treatment, then go for it at destination skin, I used to have my laser in Spain 3 years ago and never works always my hair grew again and in this clinic seems its gonna disappear forever Or I hope so!! So far I had some amazing results. All staff is very helpful and lovely, specially Alice, she is always very friendly with a smile in her face and look after to me every single time, excellent service!
It has Changed my life.

I cannot reccomend Destination skin enough - it has changed my life. I suffered with excess hair and the results have been mind blowing, not only physically but for my confidence too. I attend the Muswell Hill branch and I am seen  by Leila. She had me at hello , she is unbelievably patient, caring and comforting. She makes me feel valued and respected! Thank you Leila! :)

review_title: Booked a 6 session package for laser ?�?
review_body: Booked a 6 session package for laser treatment at the Birmingham clinic. The clinic itself is clean, bright and easy to get to.
Where do I begin! I?��ve had acne since I was 13, been on roaccutane x3 as this also followed me into adulthood ... Along with scarring, premature ageing and generally dreadful skin !

review_title: I am just coming to the end of laser ?�?
review_body: I am just coming to the end of laser hair removal treatment with Zoe at the Cardiff branch and everything has gone really well.  Zoe has been fab and the treatment has worked so I'm a happy customer... would recommend to a friend no problem!

review_title: I used Destination Skin in Maddox ?�?
review_body: I used Destination Skin in Maddox street a few years back and found service and results very good. However, I have decided now to go back and use the clinic in Knightsbridge and I have extremely disappointed with the service. I was meant to have a skin patch (which literally takes 5 min). However, I arrived 13 min late (I also tried to call to inform of my delay but no one picked up the phone) and the receptionist refused to honor my appointment saying that I had to fill a lot of forms and that took 30 min. I suggested to send the forms via email or to use the ones I already filled at the clinic in Maddox street but she refused any sort of flexibility.  In this way, given my limited flexibility in the next days I will lose the Jan promotion and frankly I am not sure I can go to a clinic that is so rigid given something unexpected can always happen

review_title: I have had several treatments at ?�?
review_body: I have had several treatments at DestinationSkin Barnet branch.  Being a young male I thought I would feel intimidated in a womens environment however all the staff made me feel at ease.  I have been having treatments for the hair between my eyes which is working really well.  I also had a break out on my face and I can not thank Eden enough for all her help.

review_title: enjoyed my experience and will look ?�?
review_body: enjoyed my experience and will look forward to keep enjoying my treatment with destinationskin, had IPL and Cardiff Zoe was so patient with me and explained every step from start to finish.
What an awesome and relaxing atmosphere!! Would recommend that everyone does a skin peel at least once!! Destination Skin Oxford is awesome, thank you for such exceptional service

review_title: Just had a consultation with lara at ?�?
review_body: Just had a consultation with lara at basingstoke. She was very helpful and knowlegeable. She really put my mind at ease as i was unsure about treatment. It was something i had thought about for a long time but never had the courage to go ahead with but lara made me comfortable and confident to go ahead and cant wait to get started!
I've been using Destination Skin for laser hair removal, since the salon I previously used has closed down.

review_title: very basic not worth the money
review_body: very basic not worth the money, visited the Birmingham store for a facial and was very dissapointed , Ive used dermaquest for many yrs and know they are good products this facial was not a facial she literally applied the  glyco waited wiped it applied the retinol sweep  and voila we were done!. 30 mins including paperwork, perhaps you don' t follow we go for these things as a bit of pamper, the room was basic  a towel laid over me,  it was all like being on a conveyer belt.   I asked for one zone to be looked at she paid no attention to it .  This was not facial it was just paint by numbers by 4 yr old nephew could have done it, i will never go there again i would be happy to drive an hr to my old dermaquest clinic where you come out feeling and looking amazing.  If you want a good facial don' t go here, did not  even off er me a glass of water.

review_title: I?��ve been customer in Destination Skin Weybridge
review_body: I?��ve been customer in Destination Skin Weybridge for almost a year and I?��m very pleased with their service and prices! It was real bargain my full body laser package!! With the help of my practitioner Barbara I could finally improve my skin appearance. She is very friendly and welcoming.

I?��ve seen a huge difference in my skin since having frequent appointments of the pumpkin peel. The consultants have been thorough, very helpful and professional and the clinic is clean and well run. They also have a good knowledge of products and aren?��t just trying to sell you anything they can. I will definitely be back.

review_title: Karen from DestinationSkin is the best!
review_body: I have been a client of Karen's from the Richmond Branch (St Margarets) for many years. Karen is an absolutely brilliant beautician. She is friendly, knowledgeable and always puts you at ease. I would recommend her and Destination skin to anyone and everyone! Karen has been my total saviour and I really don't know what I would have done without her.

I had an amazing experience at destination skin Barnet, I was made to feel very comfortable by all the staff at the barnet clinic. The procedure was carried out by Emeline who was very professional and friendly and I am over the moon with my results. I will definitely be returning and wouldn?��t go anywhere else now.
Hi

Offered a ?��free?�� consultation, which costs money? Got IPL at knightsbridge clinic and the practitioner (Deanna) made my hair grow back longer and thicker, I don't think she was very knowledgable/ new.
Wonderful experience! Great advise and professional treatment.

My experience at Destination Skin was very good, I was able to receive useful advice on how to treat my skin and was able to get products that would help tackle my issue. I was also very satisfied with the answers I received from my questions which gave me good help. I would definitely recommend this company to anyone.

I recently visited the Basingstoke clinic after researching skin clinics that will help with red acne scarring. Booking an appointment was very easy, and the receptionist was very knowledgeable, giving me a few tips to follow until my appointment the following week.

I have been getting treatments (laser for hair removal and skin peel/EDS) with Chloe at Destination Skin for the past year and I found her to be personalble and professional. As my allocated treatment time was running out she managed to organise a plan in place so I could use my treatments in the allocated time. She is easy to talk to and will guide you through the best treatments you can get to see good results. I definitely recommend Chloe if you go to the Barnet branch.
After spending a fortune on laser hair removal and getting next to nothing of a result. I met a person who not only convinced me that laser can work for me she actually proved it.
I have been having treatments done by Karen at Destination Skin ,

review_title: Destination Skin Richmond- IPL - with Karen
review_body: I would recommend the Richmond/ St. Margaret branch when having a treatment. The staff are friendly and informative.

review_title: I've been going to the St Margaret's ?�?
review_body: I've been going to the St Margaret's branch for years and decided to switch after no luck at a previous laser place. Karen at the St Margaret's branch is brilliant; friendly and reliable. I feel confident in her professional judgment as I know I'll be receiving quality service. I've always been recommended the best products to what suits my skin and financial situation. Would definitely suggest trying them out if you're new to laser or skin treatments in general...you will be well looked after!
I've only just started going to destination skin in the Basingstoke clinic, I had my consultation which was very informative and I was happy to go ahead with laser hair treatment, I had my
Very knowledgeable, great service, wonderful staff, convenient location. I'd absolutely reccomend destination Skin :)

review_title: I had a great experience at Destination Skin Basingstoke
review_body: I had a great experience at the basingstoke branch with Vicky.  Professional, polite and really friendly. She really listened to my concerns, and took everything i said into account when putting together a great action plan to get my skin back into healthy order! I'm looking forward to starting my course!
Great company

I chose destinationskin because it was one of the few companies offering electrolysis. Practitioners were very friendly and seemed professional and so I committed to a lengthy electrolysis treatment which took approximately 1.5 years of weekly treatments. After some time I noticed that the treated areas were getting scarred. I raised my concerns with my practitioners who advised me that the problem will go away / can be dealt with after the treatment was over. I decided to drop my treatment when I realised that the scarring was getting worse. It has now been over 6 months since I stopped treatment but the scarring did not improve although I tried a product suggested by one of the practitioners to deal with the scarring. Very disappointed that after having invested a lot of time and money into my treatment I am left with what appears to be permanent scars.

review_title: The staff are great in particular Jodie in the Reading clinic
review_body: The staff are great in particular my skin specialist, Jodie. Her knowledge was amazing and gave me great advice and tips in how to look after my skin. I was put on a skin care treatment plan, and I am pleased with the results, even after my first session.

Just had 2 laser hair removal treatments (full legs and bikini) at the Barnet clinic, and would highly recommend Chloe who was looking after me. She was very friendly and approachable and made me feel at ease immediately. She also was very knowledgeable and helpful regarding other treatments I am interested in.
Avoid this company at all costs.  Don?��t waste your time or money.

review_title: Laser sessions at Destination Skin Barnet
review_body: In January this year, I had a consultation with Chloe Slogett at Destination Skin Barnet. Since then I have had a course of 5 laser sessions with Chloe. I have the one final session left.

Worst treatment in my life i had to pay almost 500 hundred pounds in products and pumpkin peels which never work for nothing and i could not see any change or results on me with 3 months of treatment, the worst part is that they said we have not start the treatment yet (within 3 months of paying products and peels without any result at all) definitely bad clinic and non interested on you at all you need to insist for an appointment otherwise they don't really care! WORST CLINIC EVER!

review_title: Great staff and straight forward treatment
review_body: I came to Destination Skin after my GP recommended it for skin tag removal. I was self conscious about these but the staff were helpful and confident they could help. I have since had all my tags removed and I cant recommend them enough. The process was really easy and although it hurt a little it was over quickly and the outcome was well worth it.
I had 3 sessions at DestinationSkin Guildford. Great results and really friendly staff. Paige was in charge of my treatments and was excellent! Would recommend!

I have been getting laser hair removal (full bikini, underarms, upper lip) at the Bristol branch of destination skin for some months now and I would highly recommend them to anyone. The staff are really friendly and professional and they aways make me feel at ease during treatments. I am so pleased with the results, my confidence has boosted no end, it's so nice to be able to throw on any clothes or swim wear I feel like without worrying about awful shaving rash and the dreaded 5oclock shadow! They are also the best value for money I could find in the area and I don't feel this has any impact on the quality of their service. Thank you so much!

review_title: Customer comes second, if at all...
review_body: I am thoroughly disappointed with the service I have received over the past few months from Destination Skin, Maddox Street. I have been visiting this clinic for over 10 years since the time it was Renew Medica. At that time, it was always about the customer, now it seems it is just about the money and the sale, the customer doesn't matter.

I recently had a skin tag removed at your St Margaret?��s branch by Karen. Karen made my experience not half as bad as I was expecting as before visiting Destination Skin I had been researching skin tag removal techniques on the internet and was feeling very nervous from what I had read. The procedure was very quick, simple and not as painful as I had been expecting. I was very happy with the treatment and service I received from Karen as she made me feel very comfortable and put my mind at ease.

Have been going to Destination Skin New Kings Road for several years and have had laser hair removal done as well as regular facials and peels with great success. Staff is friendly and knowledgeable about their services and skincare in general. I highly recommend their services.

Neeka is lovely !!! I started my treatment in the new year and neeka is always friendly and helpful. The place itself is clean and tidy, their laser machine is amazing so much better then the one I used to go to. Highly recommended. Many thanks

I have been going to the City branch for just over a year. I went initially for advice on how best to treat my acne breakouts on my face. The therapist Daniela went through all the options and explained in detail what I should expect. I bought a course of skin peels and some home care products, I was so pleased I decided to continue with monthly facials "My skin has never looked healthier" not to mention my confidence improved, as a result I have recently visited Dr Jones for anti wrinkle treatment and lip fillers. She made me feel at ease. My next investment will be laser hair removal before the summer. I have recommended my friends and they have offered me �50 for referring my friend. Win win. Just fantastic!
Had amazing service from Aimee she is fantastic really transformed my skin, I can't recommend her enough. From an ugly duckling to a beautiful swan. Thank you so much.

I would like to bring to your attention the treatment I received while a client at the Oxford Circus Branch of Destination Clinic. On the 14th of February was the third session of my peel, and it was that day I asked to speak to the manager about some problems I experienced in the payment system.

I was recommended to visit Destination Skin in Knightsbridge by my good friend who has been a regular client. They booked me at the day and time I wanted. I came in for a consultation, and was greeted by lovely friendly staff, they made me feel so relaxed and comfortable. It made it easier to trust them, as I wanted to get laser treatment. I am extremely happy with my results and I cant wait to go back to try other treatments!.

I trusted this company with my face. I had 3 shots of laser treatment to reduce my melasma. After the treatment my melasma worsened. when I went back to the clinic to complain, they couldn't care less, they didn't offer me anything to help me to fix it. I wish I had never stepped foot inside there Maddox street practice. I am still left with the laser marks and it has ruined my social life, I no longer wish to be in public or for people to see me, because of SkinDestination... I mean Skindisaster. I urge all women with melasma to think twice before stepping inside one of there clinics.
Great salon!

I have been going to this clinic on and off for 15 years when it used to trade under a different name. Laser hair removal was life changing for me, and I can not thank them enough. They have never made false promises, and I understand enough that they offer hair reduction. In fact some areas there has been no regrowth in 15 years.  I would never trust my skin with any other company. And in fact their prices are competitive if anything, have come down in last few years. Visit city clinic without any hesitation.

review_title: Skin is safe in skilled hands
review_body: Recently had Lip Fillers at DS City Clinic. Firstly the clinic was lovely and clean and all the staff there were lovely. Dr Jones performed my treatment. She relaxed me, talked me through procedure, what to expect, before, during and after. She was understanding when felt mild discomfort. I have had this procedure before, and had not great results at a different clinic. The results I got from Destination Skin, namely Dr Jones were amazing! Very natural looking fuller lips. Very much recommended! I will be going back to City for more treatments in the future.
Lovely staff, always helpful. Being coming for on and off 5 years now and never had any issues. Always really friendly

review_title: Nicole Jackson laser review Cardiff clinic
review_body: Very professional and with a full body laser treatment the staff always kept my dignity and made it a pleasant experience.
I have been going to the Skin Clinic in Basingstoke for a few years now.  I would say that the doctors/nurses are excellent, alas not the front of house ladies.
Does anyone have a telephone number for their customer service?

review_title: the treatment is good but the attitude not so good
review_body: Wanted to book and appointment for a facial peel. I was asked if I use the products to prepare my skin for the procedure and I said yes I do.
I have been having laser and IPL treatment over the last 3 months. The staff are excellent and friendly and I am very pleased with the results.

review_title: cancellation policy very punitative and rude manager at the Muswell Hill Branch
review_body: 48 hour cancellation policy very difficult to comply with for anyone juggling work and family. Attitude of staff (manager in particular) in treating customers like naughty children when they miss an appointment is very patronising. They need some more training in this area

review_title: My visit at the Destinationskin Bristol
review_body: Hello,
I am happy with this product I amglad to ufe this product the staff is friendly  big thank you destination skin team
I'm glad to use this

I have just booked my second treatment at the Bristol Branch. The staff are very friendly and approachable and will spend time discussing products and treatments. I saw Marie for my Botox treatment and I was very pleased with the results and felt that I was in experienced hands. The ladies on the front counter will share their thoughts and experiences having used a lot of the products so you get valuable input to help you decide what is right for you. I will happily return again and book different treatments.

review_title: Destination skin at House of Fraser, Cardiff
review_body: Destination skin Cardiff have been amazing in the value for money they offer, staff advice, flexibility, experience and friendliness.
This clinic offers great skin services that really make a difference. The staff are lovely and they never try to hard sell anything.

review_title: Excellent results, leave you wanting more!
review_body: I have had an excellent experience at Destination Skin Birmingham. The staff are very professional & efficient.They also tell you all you need to know about your treatments. The clinic is extremely clean & relaxing, which makes you feel very comfortable.

I had IPL red vein treatment in London to remove broken capillaries on my nose. The so called therapist ended up burning my nose badly with the laser machine which ended up bleeding. The treatment was very painful which burnt my face because she clearly didn't have a clue what she was doing. She said this was "normal" and my face would heal fine. A big scab appeared over the next few days and weeks and I am now left with permanent scarring and a hole on the side of my nose.

review_title: changing goalposts - rude and no loyalty to customers
review_body: When I started with Destination Skin (before they were destination skin) back in about 2002 on my upper lip.
I started having a series of skin peels with destination skin in Cardiff.I went on to have further treatments with them such as Botox and microdermabrasion.

I had fillers on my face at Destinationskin in Guildford House of Fraser  (marionette lines) and it made absolutely no difference at all, in fact it made it look worse as it was incorrectly injected at the side of the line. I complained and was told there was a difference... but as I know my face and look at my face every day I knew they were lying.  I was deeply disappointed as the procedure was costly, but they took money and didn't care.  I found out the Doctor was leaving the next week.   I have since had it done again, and am thrilled by the results. Never go to Destinationskin they are unprofessional, uncaring and unskilled. I wish there was a no star option as that would accurately describe my experience of them.

review_title: Best choice for laser hair removal
review_body: Destinationskin in Bristol is the best choice for laser hair removal.You can see the results after first treatment.The team are very helpfull and always friendly.I'm very happy i found this place and always recommend to many people.Big thank you to the team.

I have been having facial treatment with a very experienced therapist in cardiff branch for over a year. I have acne prone skin with lot of scarring due to acne. Since I have been having right treatment as they suggested, I can see and feel the difference on my face. I also use their recommended products which seems to add extra boost to my facial skin. My friends say that my skin has a glowing look. I am very happy with their treatment and the professionalism. And I think they can be trusted for what they do. Also they listen to what you actually have to say if you are concern about your treatment or the service.

DestinationSkin is my place of choice for facial's, peels and laser hair removal! They have a great variety of treatments that are not so easily available on the highstreet. I would have struggled with unwanted facial hair for much longer without DestinationSkin.

I have been Deastinationskin's costumer for nearly 3 years if no longer. I have very sensitive skin. They always give me the right treatment without any "force" or false promises. I am very happy with them (Cheltenham branch.)
I love coming here (city branch) for my treatments and have recommended lots of people to them.

Absolutely loved my time there. I visited the Henlow spa, everything was immaculate and the food was lovely, plenty of entertainment throughout the day there so you're not just stuck in the pool with nowhere to go. Bought my voucher online with 25% off and other than a 10 minute wait to get through to book everything else was perfect.

We have been given Champneys vouchers to spend and the booking system they have is hopeless.  The cost to call to book a treatment is 7p a minute from a landline and goodness knows how much from your mobile.  It is the most clunky, unfriendly booking system I have ever come across.  Not to mention hideously expensive.  I will need the spa treatment to get over the stress of trying to book it.  Dreadful customer experience and I would have thought that this company should be far more customer friendly.  Never again!

My review is for the service (or lack of) when making bookings.  Unfortunately, my partner purchased me a voucher for Champneys for my birthday last year, I say unfortunately, as since mentioning to others I'm going to Eastwell Manor I have heard/read nothing but bad reviews.  I have after a number of phone calls (which included being passed from one person to another more than once) managed to book a stay.  I would like to book a couple of treatments for my Daughter & I but unfortunately nobody at the Spa bothers answering the phone....no wonder there are so many bad reviews.  I'm very surprised Champneys do not try to rectify this.
I had a Delux Jessica gel manicure, 50 minute full body massage and a pick me up facial at the Saint Albans Champneys.

review_title: Terrible do not waste your money
review_body: My partner treated me to an overnight stay at Champneys Henlow for my birthday on Sunday 13th as a surprise. Sadly this was far from enjoyable. I am beyond disappointed and feel like my partner total wasted his money. I expected so much more.

review_title: Champneys Springs has is a very good?�?
review_body: Champneys Springs has is a very good spa with excellent treatments.

review_title: I would not recommend Eastwell Manor as a Champneys Spa experience
review_body: I would not recommend Eastwell Manor as a Champneys spa resort, it is a hotel with a separate Champneys spa centre detached from it. The manor house is beautiful,as are the rooms but you are not allowed to walk around in robes, so the whole experience of a health resort is lost. To access the treatment rooms you have to walk outside, only 2 mins away but there is little external lighting so if you are unlucky like I was and your treatments/and or dinner are booked in the evening you have to walk through a pitch black car park. Not friendly in any way for a single woman. The hotel is just that, a hotel with open bars so lots of drunk people around, not what I would book a Champneys spa experience for. The other resorts are lovely, single women friendly, this one should be marketed as different so you know what you are signing up for.

I had a facial and massages booked in Enfield salon yesterday at 11.00am. I arrive to be informed by the manager that they had tried to contact me to cancel regarding staff issues. Apparently upon booking my contact number which I repeated twice was taken in correctly by the beautician that had taken the booking 3 weeks ago.

review_title: Tring, fabulous but could be improved
review_body: Have been a couple of times in Tring. Good value for money, great healthy food and plenty of fitness classes. Lovely and memorable waitress called Jessica who I've not seen there for quite some time now. But in general the waiting staff are all very polite and accommodating.
Citrus blush is my favourite, smells great n feels amazing, the foot scrub and foot butter is the best I've used...
Absolutely awful experience - a therapist so called manger called Hannah made my whole experience hell.

My review is about the frustrating booking system. The 0843 number you have to ring is a farce! I rang on my landline as this was the cheaper option, 7p per minute doesn't sound that bad until you realise the fact that you can never get through straight away & you are left waiting & waiting! I had a call from my phone provider to say my bill for ringing the 0843 Champneys number was �10! What a joke Champneys obviously make some money using this system! Don't ring from your mobile as the calls will be considerably more!

The whole experience was really disappointing. The biggest shock and let down was the food, particularly dinner. I think we'd have let quite a few of the other issues slide if we'd had good quality food.
The Champneys Bootcamp - I left two days early, in tears.

review_title: Very disappointing stay at the Springs?�?
review_body: Very disappointing stay at the Springs Resort for our wedding anniversary!
Leading Spa Brand - Worst Spa!

review_title: Champneys Spa Day for Two with Lunch at Tring
review_body: I had been given a voucher for a spa break by my mother at Christmas. To use the voucher during the summer months I?��ve had to supplement the cost by �63 taking the grand total to �198 without treatment. I then spent an additional �150 for 50 min full body massage. So in total �350 for the day. Generally the experience was ok but there were some concerns.

review_title: VERY disappointing stay at Eastwell Manor
review_body: We were a party of 16 that booked Eastwell Manor Spa weekend for a big birthday. As we were a large party we stayed in the lodges. On arriving the lodge was unkept and dirty the bed sheets and duvet had stains but the sheets were clean.  However the boiler for the three rooms (also occupied by some of our party) was not working. For the whole stay we had no hot water and no heating whatsoever. We reported this just after arriving and the maintenance person came along and supposedly fixed this. This temporary mend lasted all of 30 minutes and then the boiler made a noise and packed up.  As this was one of the coldest nights of the year it was not a pleasant stay to say the least.  We had no hot water or heating for the rest of our entire stay.
Milton Keynes, had facial last year was lovely. Eyebrow shaping was excellent.

review_title: Champneys are disappointing and we didn't even get there?�?
review_body: Disappointed and didn't even get there thanks to inefficient booking system and staff - a fortune to call on a premium number too - pretty glad as the reviews are dire and at over �600 it should be VIP treatment not hard sell and cattle class... costs you a fortune to eventually get through to someone too... don't bother - plenty of better places that want your business...

review_title: My first visit to Forest Mere was?�?disappointing. Shocking comment from their CEO
review_body: My first visit to Forest Mere was disappointing.

review_title: I wouldn?��t even give it one star.
review_body: I wouldn?��t even give it one star.
Me and my family have just spent a night at Champneys Tring and we've decided not to go back to this resort.
Henlow is old and tired.  We had a lot of problems.  Customer service don't answer for a long time (20 mins+) and they charge a high per minute cost!  I'd go to a normal hotel.  Really awful food too

review_title: Spent a day/night in Champneys Tring
review_body: Spent a day/night in Champneys Tring. My first stay with Champneys. Just extended my stay by 2 days. This place is absolutely superb. Pool and Spa area is amazing. Staff super friendly. Feeling great already ...... Would Highly recommend.
I had no other option than to use Champneys premium rate contact number to book a stay. On three occasions I failed to get through after connecting and being left on hold for 10 / 15 /16 minutes.

This review rating is given for Champney's phone-line customer service, rather than for a treatment at one of their spas.  Realising that a gift voucher was about to expire, I phoned their reservation line, only to be kept on hold so long that my line cut dead. To add insult to injury, whilst on hold, you are bombarded with messages about their wonderful, relaxing spa treatments which only increases the sense of frustration and, ironically, of your blood-pressure rising.  Along with several aborted phone calls, I also tried emailing them, asking them to call me. By the time they phoned me back - 24 hours later - it was too late.  I had ended up driving to the spa in question after work and making the booking in person.  My actual massage was lovely, but the whole booking debacle has left me so annoyed that I will never use Champneys again.
1star is on based on our last experience at Champneys Henlow, this includes the issues experienced during our stay and their terrible customer service in dealing with our complaint.
Another amazing experience at Champneys Enfield.  Jade and the therapists were warm, helpful and welcoming.  The store was, as always, clean, well organised and everything we wanted was available.

review_title: Day spa experience and lived up to expectations.
review_body: Visited champneys springs on the 21/5/16 with my husband for a day off to relax and rewind. On arrival we were met by professional staff, taken to the breakfast area, not in the dining room but non the less plenty of choice, robe and slippers provided and as I had been 3 times to stay before I was familiar with everything. Booked treatments and loads of choice, my husband had his hair cut and a specialist treatment, it was his first time there, lunch lovely and plenty of choice in the dining room, staff very efficient and willing to help, treatments were lovely, cleaners everywhere changing towels at a high volume, cleaning round and felt happy that this was evident,the spas and saunas just what I wanted and the swimming pool lovely again too, we didn't book any activities but plenty of choice and availability. One big thank you to Carol G who made my booking a reality following a problem with Spabreaks. I will book as I always did before on champneys website and then it's problem free.
This is the second time I have been to EF Medispa and have seen little to no results, giving them the benefit of the doubt second time round- which cost me.
Dear YIM - I am shocked to hear that you had such a terrible experience! I had a superior result with the Eye and Lip Peel and cannot speak highly enough of the EFMedispa team in Edgbaston.

In it for the money. All glitz no professionalism. Went for an eye peel should be 3 peels in total spread 4-6 weeks apart. Sarah is like a car sales man totally convinced me they?��d worked on black Caribbean skin with total success and promised a 50% improvement, with hindsight this promise should of rang alarm bells but I went ahead. After first treatment I got a call to see how it went, didn?��t really have any peeling and minimal and I mean minimal flaking, blink and you?��d miss it!  During 2nd eye peel application it had to be aborted as skin was so sensitive like it was in fire. Thought I?��d get a call from Sarah after getting feedback from Veronica who attempted to apply the treatment.... but nothing. I  contacted Sarah 4 weeks later asking her to review my treatment and email me, as no flaking, sensitivity etc., Unfortunately turns out they don?��t like being questioned, Sarah called and became quite belligerent, and the follow up email from Harchie the Director says it all.

Awful experience !! I went in with slight acne. I came out with scars, double the acne, sensitive skin and much more. Not professional OR experienced girls working there. Used all wrong products each time new girl doesn?��t even read the notes. Spend more time gossiping than they do working. No one has called back to find a solution in all the times I have called.

I have been going to EF Medispa, Edgbaston for some radio frequency / ultrasound body treatments, and also radio frequency on the face. At first I was quite optimistic about what the outcome will be and as to whether I would achieve the maximum results I wanted from the course of treatments. Having gone through my course of treatments now I can honestly say that I am very impressed with the results of radio frequency/ultrasound on the body, and also radio frequency on the face. The overall results are amazing and I am continuing to see improvements.  The staff always make me feel at ease, and are thoroughly professional.  I have become a regular customer at EF Medispa and would recommend their treatments to family and friends.

review_title: I had a great experience yesterday at ?�?
review_body: I had a great experience yesterday at EF Medispa on Kensington Church Street.  From the moment I walked into the beautiful spa I felt looked after and pampered.  The receptionists were helpful, honest and knowledgeable about their range of treatments.  The treatment I had booked was called T shape which is on the legs.  Great treatment which was like nothing I'd had before but at the same time very relaxing.  Magda, who did the treatment explained in full detail about what was happening and what the benefits were, answering all my questions.  I left the spa very relaxed and my legs certainly look firmer and smoother.  I will definitely go back to this spa. Well worth it and a great array of treatments to choose from.  Thanks.

I recently visited the Bristol clinic after seeing so many great things about them on Instagram. I took the plunge and went to their clinic for lip fillers. I was so pleased with the results. The staff were so friendly, and the nurse who did my lips was very reassuring, friendly & professional. The clinic was so pretty too. I couldn't recommend them enough. Thank you

review_title: Dr Joanna is a fabulous specialist
review_body: Dr Joanna is a fabulous specialist. She worked with me to get a plan together for my wedding and I'm thrilled with the results so far. I wouldn't go anywhere else
Very professional and caring personal!!

review_title: I was very please with my procedure
review_body: I was very pleased with my procedure. The staff at the centre are friendly but very professional. Always happy to help

review_title: I have nothing but praise for the CSC.
review_body: I have nothing but praise for the CSC.

Unfortunately I am rather disappointed following my last visit. I experienced very bad bruising, so much so that my face has been very uncomfortable and the bruises impossible to hide.  I phoned the clinic and followed their advice (arnica and a cold compress) but I still have the bruises over two weeks later.  That said though, the results are very good and my face looks naturally healthier and plumper so I will likely go back.

I had cool-sculpting for my double chin at the Cosmetic Skin Clinic. The clinic is beautiful and relaxing and the treatments were excellent and I would recommend them.  I am very satisfied with the end-result and it was definitely worth the cost even if it took longer than expected and required a second treatment.

review_title: The first time I visited The Cosmetic?�?
review_body: The first time I visited The Cosmetic Skin Clinic, I was very apprehensive and nervous.
Very thrilled, as always, with the results.

review_title: Cosmetic Skin Clinic for natural results
review_body: I would not trust anyone else but Dr Tracy Mountford with my face. She is gentle and particular, giving fantastic natural results. The lovely Ria for Coolsculpting is very precise and ensures the best possible outcome. The Cosmetic Skin Clinic itself is calm and very welcoming, and I cannot recommend it enough.

review_title: CSC is not the cheapest clinic around
review_body: CSC is not the cheapest clinic around. There are cheaper clinics but you need to be careful where you go,and that applies to clinics in this country and overseas.
Lovely clinic, welcoming and friendly, very professional ..

review_title: Sets the standard to which others should aspire!
review_body: The Cosmetic Skin Clinic is quite exceptional.  Every single person demonstrates the highest level of expertise and you feel that they all genuinely care about what is best for you.  The warm greeting from all the receptionists, the most professional consultations with the practitioners, and the knowledge that Dr. Mountford is overseeing everything from behind the scenes, all mean that you feel confident that the outcome from whatever procedure you undertake will be the best it could possibly be.

review_title: The Cosmetic Skin Clinic is second to?�?
review_body: The Cosmetic Skin Clinic is second to none.  I see Dr Joanna and she is everything you could wish for in a cosmetic doctor...professional, knowledgeable, informative, caring and really skilled in the treatments she offers
Dr Joanna is so friendly knowledgeable and professional, Talked me through different treatments and their advantages, First class service

review_title: Dr Joanna is a pleasure to visit
review_body: Dr Joanna is a pleasure to visit. I had never had botox before and she has helped create an incredibly natural and youthful look for me. she is extremely informative and friendly and I genuinely could not recommend her highly enough.

My husband and I both patients of Dr. Shotter.  She listens and gives her opinion as to your needs.  She isn't just a "yes" person as she firmly believes to look your best you must look natural.  We are both so pleased with our few subtle enhancements...mine with filler and my husband with filler and botox.  It has been a thoroughly pleasant and easy experience, and we're both looking forward to our next visit in 6-9 months.
I would highly recommend The Cosmetic Skin Clinic . Always a first class service.
I felt completely supported throughout
Excellent on every level.  Treatments, care and reception staff.  Would highly recommend.
I have been a client for many years initially with Dr Mountford & more recently with Dr Christou.

As a newbie to cosmetic treatments such as Botox I was nervous about where to go, as I didn?��t want to look ?��unnatural?��. During my initial consultation I felt they understood what I wanted and have been delighted with the results of my Botox and subsequent fillers. I am frequently complimented on how well I look! The nurses are not pushy sales people, if you want to know about a treatment they will talk through it and give you time to decide. Esther is fabulous and I look forward to our chats every 3-4 months. If you ever thought Botox isn?��t for you I suggest you try it just once at the Cosmetic Skin Clinic, and then decide.

Awesome professional staff. All of my questions were answered in the initial visit and every concern was addressed. Procedure was completed flawlessly by Dr. J. She did truly remarkable work and can't compliment her enough and will definitely be coming back to her.

I have been a client here for many years, I totally trust the judgment of the practitioners, The results are amazing and I like the ?��less is more?ѝ recommendations, making the treatments ?��an enhansment?ѝ and not obvious. I would recommend every practitioner that I?��ve experienced with confidence.

review_title: I visited the clinic after having had a?�?

review_title: Great professional friendly service, beautiful results
review_body: Dr Joanna christou really understands how to make you look the best version of yourself and still appear natural. I can?��t recommend her highly enough.
Very friendly & knowledgeable - highly recommended

The staff are fantastic in every way - highly trained. Joanna is amazing, she sits you down and talks you through whatever procedure you need with the pros and cons. She listens to what you need and bases ner recommendation accordingly.

review_title: Awfull experience of cheek filler which?�?
review_body: Awfull experience of cheek filler which I had to have dissolved at significant expense. The practitioner did not  smooth the filler on one side leaving a big "egg" shape under my cheek .
Excellent service and results. I?��ve been a customer for several years and highly recommend

Great service, lovely environment. I didn?��t feel pressured to commit to any treatments when I had my consultation, which was a very good sign. My treatments (cheek fillers) have been life changing, I was very well looked after from start to finish. I?��m now a repeat client.

review_title: I visited many clinics before finding?�?
review_body: I visited many clinics before finding the CSC.

Ive had an issue with bags under my eyes since I was a teen - a genetic issue rather than lack of sleep. I had my initial consultation with Tracey who instantly made me feel totally comfortable and safe. She recommended I see Tara and I have now been seeing her around 4 years. She is so lovely and an absolute genius. Ive had a mixture of filler and thermage and she has transformed my under eye; as well as giving me brilliant skin advice.  I wish I had gone sooner! The results are incredibly subtle - none of my nearest and dearest have suspected I have had 'work' but all think I look 'so well'.  I plan to be a very long term visitor to Tara and the clinic. All the ladies I see walking out are so natural & fabulous looking! Very highly recommended!

I have no hesitation in recommending the Clinic, the team are wonderfully welcoming and down to earth so you are put at your ease on arrival.  There is no 'sale' pressure so you have full confidence in the expert advice you are having. All treatments are discussed fully and tailored just for you.
Highly trained dedicated knowledgeable and charming therapists

I visited Magda for CoolSculpting, having read positive reviews and I?��m so glad I did. Magda was professional and friendly and I had total confidence in her from the start. She was very honest about achievable results and also advised me against further treatment, when she felt it wouldn?��t be beneficial. I wouldn?��t hesitate to recommend her and was pleased with the results of my treatment and my experience at The Cosmetic Skin Clinic as a whole.

review_title: Dr Joanna Christou is excellent and I?�?

review_title: Sophie Shotter is the most gifted and?�?

Been going to the Cosmetic Skin Clinic for the last three years and a big fan.  Treatments are natural looking and not overdone.

review_title: Magda is The Queen of Coolsculpting in?�?
review_body: Magda is The Queen of Coolsculpting in London

Awesome front of desk staff that make you feel relaxed and are more than attentive and helpful. All the practitioners I have seen have been highly skilled and knowledgeable. I cannot recommend the Cosmetic Skin Clinic enough!!

I always feel that I?��m in safe hands. Procedures are well explained and there is no pushiness to go ahead unless you are sure. The aftercare is brilliant with a follow up appointment usually a couple of weeks post procedure. I would have no hesitation in recommending.

review_title: I had my first Botox experience
review_body: I had my first Botox experience. I was very nervous about ensuring I have a natural enhanced look. My nurse understood exactly the look I wanted to achieve and gave me the perfect results. I am very happy with the end result.

Fantastic service and atmosphere. The reception team are immediately welcoming and attentive to your queries and the practitioners themselves have unparalleled experience and professionalism. I recently visited Dr Joanna Christou who, with a dual medicine and dentistry qualification, was able to offer expert advice about my ongoing problem with TMJ. She treated the area with Botox to relax the muscles and recommended useful further steps to relieve my constant pain and discomfort. Almost two months on from my treatment my pain has significantly lessened which has made my day-to-day life much easier - thank you Joanna and The Cosmetic Skin Clinic!

review_title: I have been using the clinic for nearly?�?
review_body: I have been using the clinic for nearly 10 yrs & have found it to be excellent. The staff are all lovely & attend to your every need from the moment you walk in. Dr Joanna who I currently see is meticulous in the way she uses the product (sculptra)  on my face & always gives me exactly the result I want. She is so friendly too & I feel very comfortable & at ease with her.

review_title: The best professional clinic and team
review_body: The best professional clinic and team. Top procedures. Excellent results. Highly recommended.
A discrete, competent and professional outfit, that specialises in a low key but polished look.

I would highly recommend  The Cosmitic Skin Clinic. Everyone I meet at the clinic was absolutely lovely. Dr Sophie Shotter was patient and very honest with me. Her aim was to make me look natural which is exactly what I wanted.

I visited the cosmetic skin clinic in stoke poges last year and couldn?��t be happier with the results. I was seen by Bianca for my acne scarring and she recommended a course of Intracel which has produced a significant reduction in the scarring in the months following. In addition to the scar reduction it also left my skin looking much healthier and more radiant. The procedure itself was somewhat uncomfortable but definitely worth it in light of the results.

review_title: Ria is the go to person for Coolsculpting
review_body: Ria is the go to person for Coolsculpting! She has immense knowledge and is honest about achievements and the outcome of the procedure. Her demeanour is relaxed and professional and she puts you at ease from your first meeting. I?��m thrilled with my results especially the chin and jowl area. I didn't think results like this were possible, but with Ria?��s expertise I have achieved results beyond my expectations. I had the backs of my arms done as well and although there is improvement, it?��s a tricky area and might need a few goes!

review_title: The Cosmetic Skin Clinic has a?�?
