Dr Mountford has an excellent eye for what is needed with subtlety her watchword.  I trust her implicitly.  The clinic staff are extremely friendly and professional and certainly make you feel welcome and relaxed.

review_title: I would trust no other clinic with?�?
review_body: I would trust no other clinic with something so important.

review_title: Dr Joanna Christou at the Cosmetic Skin?�?
review_body: Dr Joanna Christou at the Cosmetic Skin Clinic's London enclave is an exemplary specialist.

I received my first ever Tear Trough Filler and Botox treatment at The Cosmetic Skin Clinic. Wow - Dr. Mountford really does live up to her "Best In The Business" reputation. Her manner is fantastic. She put me totally at ease throughout the whole procedure. It was all surprisingly painless and the results, for me, have been absolutely amazing. Its only been two days and I can't believe how refreshed I look. Thank You SO much, Dr. Mountford!
A professional service with customer confidentiality and comes highly recommended.
Fantastic staff and excellent aftercare definitely recommend ?���?���
I trust the Cosmetic Skin Clinic to make me look my best and work within my budget. I am thrilled with the results of all the treatments I have had with them.
I am very confident with Dr. Cristou?��s attention and detail.  She has a great eye for balancing the look I requested.

I am beyond happy with the work I have done here. Dr Joanna Christou is gifted in the extreme. Her work is simply exquisite. The difference she?��s made to my life is immeasurable. Never over done - I appear subtlety glowing - I receive no end of compliments - usually ?��wow you look amazing?ѝ....
I have been seeing Dr Mountford and members of her capable staff for several years.  I'm always impressed with:
Friendly, efficient and effective

review_title: Always lovely to go and get an expert?�?
review_body: Always lovely to go and get an expert opinion or ones individual needs and concerns. Very welcoming atmosphere and extremely hospitable with lovely coffee and yummy cookies, whilst you browse through the new and innovative treatments they offer.

I was apprehensive when choosing a doctor for my first Botox appointment and Tracey and her team put me at ease from the first visit. I was not pressured into having more done than necessary and I feel they give honest feedback to what is required ( they don?��t just tell you what you want to hear which is refreshing).
Excellent advise and treatment. Unbiased answers all my questions. Great service.
Professional, experienced and discrete.  Be prepared to pay at the top end of the scale for treatments but you get what you pay for. First class

review_title: Very good experience and I highly?�?
review_body: Very good experience and I highly professional. Thank you Magda :)
Very happy with cool sculpting. I was given very good information by Magda (no pushing, no overselling) and the results have exceeded my expectations. Very professional. I would highly recommend.
I went in for cool sculpting and had Magda as my technician. The results have been absolutely excellent and I would not hesitate to recommend the clinic and her.

review_title: Amazing place with first class treatments.
review_body: I cannot recommend The Cosmetic Skin Clinic enough.  From the cheery welcome by staff on arrival with the offer of beverages to Dr. Tracey Mountford herself, who has the uncanny ability to put you at ease and offer truthful feedback, even advising not to do certain treatments if she thinks you don't need to.  I recently had Ultheraphy for the lower face about two months ago and notice improvements everyday to the firmness and appearance of my skin, especially around the chin and jawline areas.  This is great news as apparently full impact takes up to three months.  Thank you Cosmetic Skin Clinic, I will be returning for further treatments. x

review_title: Very pleased with all the treatments ?�?
review_body: Very pleased with all the treatments and found the Therapist very thorough at their job .. Highly recommended

I will continue to  recommended the cosmetic skin clinic . There are treatments to suit everyone and with a less is more approach to looking the best you can without looking ?��done?ѝ is what fills me confidence .
Rea has been excellent, thoroughly professional and a pleasure to come in and see.
Wow... They're the best. Highly recommended!

I had a really positive experience at the Cosmetic Skin Clinic. I had the cool sculpting treatment and was very happy with the results. Magda was fantastic, friendly but professional. She explained everything in detail in advance and all the way through. There were no surprises and I got the results she said I would get if I followed her instructions. I always thought if you went to one of these clinics that they would hound you to purchase the treatment. I had the first consultation and was given all the relevant information including prices. No one called to follow up, try to offer discounts if you purchase within a certain date or made you feel pressured. They really just leave it up to you to make a decision. I had my final review recently and again no one tried to encourage me to have additional procedures or treatments. I really appreciate this approach and if I ever did need any additional services would not hesitate to go back to the Cosmetic Skin Clinic.

I am thrilled to bits with the results 8 weeks post cool sculpting.    Magda is a safe pair of hands and highly experienced.   She instantly made me feel at ease when I met her to discuss the treatment and her reassurance and detailed explanation of what to expect continued throughout the treatment itself.      The clinic is well run, professional and discreet.     I will definitely be going back if anything else needs fixing!
Very good experience and highly professional
Love Dr Joanna's work.

review_title: Have had many treatments at clinic with ?�?Tracy and Ria
review_body: Have had many treatments at clinic with Tracy and Ria. I feel totally safe and confident in their work and expertise and would not consider going elsewhere.
I had CoolSculpting by Magda and fillers with Dr Melissa and I cant praise either of them highly enough! Both were very reassuring and gentle and obviously both are very skilled.

review_title: Make this the only clinic you visit!
review_body: I had visited many clinics prior to seeing Dr. Christou, and I knew within minutes that I had met the practitioner I wanted to treat me. Instead of encouraging me to have treatments that I didn?��t really need (as the other clinicians had done), Dr. Christou actually advised me against many of my own suggestions, taking a keen interest in the reasons why I was seeking treatment in the first place. I left the clinic with a spring in my step, armed with a treatment plan and a new-found confidence.

Very supportive and excellent advice. I was very anxious about the treatment, Botox, and wasn?��t sure if it was right for me. We spoke for at least 20 minuets going through the whole procedure. At no point did I feel presured or felt I had to have the procedure done.  Everyone is so friendly...reception staff lovely.

review_title: I have been to th cosmetic skin clinic ?�?
review_body: I have been to th cosmetic skin clinic a few times over the last year and find the atmosphere friendly and efficient.
Quick and friendly service.
Excellent service, caring professionals who really take into account what is the right amount of treatment.

review_title: I was a little nervous at my initial ?�?
review_body: I was a little nervous at my initial consultation but have been guided so professionally and honestly.
Really friendly and welcoming staff.
I had CoolSculpting at the Cosmetic asking Clinic in Stoke Poges in August with Ria.

review_title: I first visited cosmetic skin clinic ?�?
review_body: I first visited cosmetic skin clinic over 15 years ago. I have always found then to be professional and welcoming. they never push you into anything you don't want and always advise you on what you have asked to be done. there moto is less is more!

The service was professional, but also personal and friendly.  The staff are wonderful and as this was my first ever treatment they really put my mind at rest.  I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this clinic.  My treatment was for tear trough filler and it looks very natural; work colleagues and friends have asked what I've done different, none of them can put their finger on what's changed, only that I looked rested and happy! Thank you!

review_title: A very positive experience from the ?�?
review_body: A very positive experience from the clean and airy environment to the expertise of the practitioner, Dr. Christou.  I particularly appreciate the opportunity to go back for a review after 2 weeks.

I am a relatively new patient to the Cosmetic Skin Clinic and have attended just twice so far. I was initially treated by Dr Tracy Mountford and most recently by Dr Melissa Fitzgerald. I am in my late 40's and have been treated for loss of  facial volume in my cheeks, nose to mouth lines and jowls. I was nervous on both visits but both Dr Tracy and Dr Melissa reassured me and I have been satisfied by treatments suggested by both, especially noticing the subtle difference on my latest visit. I am really pleased with the results so far!

review_title: Took a lot of trouble to give me the ?�?
review_body: Took a lot of trouble to give me the correct treatment

review_title: Dr Mountford and her skilled team at the Cosmetic Skin Clinic
review_body: Dr Mountford and her skilled team represent the pinnacle of professionalism, knowledge and expertise when it comes to aesthetic procedures. I went to the Cosmetic Skin Clinic to find out if anything could be done to reduce the appearance of the dark circles under my eyes. I had previously had some dermal filler injected but was not happy with the results. Dr Mountford explained that the filler needs to be injected correctly in order to offer enough support. She suggested that another member of the team, Dr Joann Christou, complete the procedure.

review_title: Went for a coolsculpt consultation and ?�?
review_body: Went for a coolsculpt consultation and was told yes you can have it done. The nurse used a calculator and came up with a price. It was totally random there was no pricelist or anything; just a random number plucked out of thin air. The nurse said you can watch tv on the day of treatment. Totally unprofessional consultation; no further information provided apart from the tv. Overpriced as best clinic in Europe but the coolsculpt machine going to do the same job regardless of what clinic you go to!

review_title: Great experience with Magda with good ?�?
review_body: Great experience with Magda with good results. Thank you!

review_title: Very pleased with results of my ?�?
review_body: Very pleased with results of my treatment but it was more painful than I expected afterwards. Also I bruise very easily so had quite a lot of vruosibg after treatment. My therapist Ria was lovely and made the whole treatment as comfortable as possible.

Great experience with Dr Joanna.  This was my first cosmetic treatment and I was very nervous, but she took the time to answer all my questions and listened to exactly what I wanted.  I really feel like I am in safe hands with her and clinic is nice and clean with friendly reception staff.  I will be back!

review_title: I was greeted at reception with ?�?
review_body: I was greeted at reception with kindness and a smile and immediately felt comfortable with Dr. Joanne. She was wonderful.  Dr. Joanne  answered all my questions concerns and took the time to explain what she felt would be the best personal treatment plan for me.

review_title: I did a lot of research and visited ?�?
review_body: I did a lot of research and visited other clinics before I decided to book a consultation with cosmetic skin.  I was made to feel very welcome and time was spent explaining everthing about the treatment. There was absolutely no pressure to sign up there and then or follow up calls!

Very profesional service from the moment you walk in through the doors. The treatments offered are top of the range and the therapists are  extremely experienced and offer great advice along with excellent treatment.
Amazing service- would definitely  recommend!

review_title: 5 star clinic - book, you won't regret it
review_body: Superb cutting edge treatments, extremely skilled, industry leading practitioners and professional and friendly staff - I can't think of a single reason not to recommend the Cosmetic Skin Clinic to others. I've been so impressed I encouraged my mum and my husband to go, and both also love and rate it very highly.

I have had ultherepy, Botox, filler and laser treatment all done by Helen who is quite simply the best practitioner I have ever had do work in my face. She put a little filler in my lips and has made them ltotally symmetrical which has improved my whole face. I'm still waiting for the results of the ultherapy and laser but I will only be coming to Helen at the cosmetic skin clinic from now on - so relieved to have found a practitioner who honestly advises and treats me and my aesthetic concerns so professionally, And beautifully with no pressure.

The chance reading about a treatment called CoolSculpting in Woman & Home magazine lead me to to make an appointment at the Cosmetic Skin Clinic. I was very nervous but even on my first phone call to them they were so friendly and informal and my experience on every visit to the clinic (in Buckinghamshire) has been the same. it doesn't feel like a clinic at all at this converted house its rural setting and you can park right outside the door.
Highly professional and experienced staff. True experts, I was very satisfied with my treatment, the result was very natural.
I have seen Bianca twice now. Very professional and a lovely person!

I have seen both Joanna and Magda (for different things) and they are both very professional.  They each explained what they were going to do and seemed really caring, listening to my concerns and answering any questions.  A lovely, warm environment to go to.  I would definitely recommend them.
Professional yet caring with excellent results! Thank you

review_title: I think you have a great concept and ?�?
review_body: I think you have a great concept and excellent staff. I have recommended 2 of my friends to you and I know one of them went ahead and had a cool sculpting treatment
Very professional treatment, friendly staff, good environment and excellent aftercare. What more could one ask for?

I have never previously had any form of cosmetic procedure, so before having botox for the first time, I spent a long time researching.  I'm so glad I did, as that research lead me to The Cosmetic Skin Clinic and I have been blown-away by the results.  During the initial consultation I was put entirely at ease, and had my questions answered patiently and fully - I never felt rushed, or under any pressure.  Prior to the actual injections, I started to feel a little nervous, but Helen calmed me down and reassured me and we went ahead.  The injections were - genuinely - nothing to worry about; far less painful than a vaccination, even.  I'm over the moon with the results and will continue the treatment with The Cosmetic Skin Clinic.

review_title: I was initially hesitant about having ?�?
review_body: I was initially hesitant about having cosmetic surgery, albeit relatively minor ,a bit of tweaking here and there l thought..then had second thoughts. However Libby was very reassuring, kind and thoughtful.She did not pressurise me to have any procedure,just gently suggested where l might benefit from a little filler along the lip line and a little Botox around the crows feet area. Libby is an expert in her field and a great ambassador for the clinic. I have returned twice since and am very happy with the results.

review_title: very good service and fast shipment
review_body: very good service and fast shipment! thank you
Excellent treatments, everyone, from the reception to the consultant. Made me feel totally confident and relaxed about my treatments. Couldn't recommend The Cosmetic Clinic highly enough.

review_title: Super friendly staff who make you feel ?�?
review_body: Super friendly staff who make you feel really comfortable

I have been visiting the Cosmetic Skin Clinic for many years. I have had many different procedures with different practitioners.I have always been very happy staff have an eye for the aesthetic and natural improvements whilst trying to achieve what I want.  It is such a welcoming environment and I was filled with confidence from day one. I would highly recommend the clinic for anyone wanting a little something to improve their appearance, I know I will continue to visit .
HIGHLY RECOMMENDED

I have had various treatments at the clinic over the past ten years and the results are fantastic. The customer service is exemplary, the staff are professional and friendly. The clinic at Stoke Poges is clean and welcoming and has plenty of parking. Excellent in every way. Wouldn't hesitate to recommend.
Totally professional and clearly very knowledgable about their business.

review_title: Nervous to start with, now very happy.
review_body: I was quiet concerned about my facial lines and deep lip linesaround my mouth  before I went for a consultation at The Cosmetic clinic , I am now enjoying my summer with a face that looks much less lined.Also receiving lots of compliments on how good my skin looks,

Patient since 2007. Various treatments - always good results and discreet, professional and friendly service. Never pushed into anything and treatments fully explained in advance. Premises at Stoke Poges smart and comfortable. Easy parking. Excellent in every way and lovely staff. Thank you. Highly recommend.

Tara is a real magician.  I have been coming to Tara for some time now and always feel and look much better and am more confident after my visits.  She always understands what I am trying to achieve and gives me the best advice and recommendations.  I know I can always trust her to get the best results.

review_title: Excellent personal one to one service
review_body: I visit Helen Chapman who is so good at what she does.  Being a worrier she is always confident and puts me totally at ease.  I treat the visits to the Clinic more as catching up with a friend than coming for treatment, she puts me at ease that much.  I would wholeheartedly recommend The Cosmetic Skin Clinic to anyone.

review_title: The staff at Cosmetic Skin Clinic are ?�?
review_body: The staff at Cosmetic Skin Clinic are extremely friendly and capable and the experience is world class! Thank you for always producing fantastic results!

review_title: My experience at The Cosmetic Skin ?�?
review_body: My experience at The Cosmetic Skin Clinic is always excellent.  Very professional, helpful staff, right from first walking through the door and being greated by the Receptionist to my treatment.  Libby never fails to put me at ease and I feel entirely confident with her advice. 5 star treatment every visit. JW

review_title: I have now been to this clinic twice ?�?
review_body: I have now been to this clinic twice and had perfect service both times.  Tara is completely professional and honest and not pushy or overbearing at all, which can be a common theme at some of the high end clinics.  I would highly recommend a visit.

review_title: My first botox & fillers treatment and I absolutely loved it!
review_body: My first botox & fillers treatment and I absolutely loved it! Dr. Melisa Fitzerald achieved extremely natural look, totally painless and instant results. Professional and makes you feel comfortable. And the team at the reception is very nice as well. I could not be happier!
Dr Melissa Fitzgerald
Dr. Cristou  is extremely professional and friendly. After discussing my concerns she has devised a treatment plan that I am very happy with, both in the short and long term.

review_title: I enjoyed my experience at the Cosmetic ?�?
review_body: I enjoyed my experience at the Cosmetic Skin Clinic. The staff that I had contact with were very professional and put me at ease.  I had Juvederm injected into my cheeks. This has given my face a softer look and I am looking forward to more procedures as I feel confident that I am in good hands.

review_title: I feel I'm in safe hands..
review_body: I feel I'm in safe hands when I visit CSC and feel confident with advice and treatments given.

Following my treatments with Dr Joanna and Dr Mountford over the last couple of years I have felt much more confident in the way I look, I am really pleased with the results. I would not go anywhere else now and completely trust them and believe me I have been to many clinics, they really are the best.
Great facilities, with the amazing treatment that the doctors offer.
Very Professional and welcoming Staff. I asked for a second opinion and this was given. I was very happy with Consultation and treatments.

Truely fantastic experience, all staff are friendly, professional and most importantly .. discreet !!! Joanne gives wonderful advice and creates a cosmetic plan which is both realistic and practical. Very happy with the service I have received so far.

review_title: I'm so pleased I decided to address my ?�?
review_body: I'm so pleased I decided to address my nagging feelings about my face and went to speak to the amazing Dr Joanna - wth a few tiny tweaks I feel SO much better about how I look. Her work is subtle, natural, smart and immensely skilled. Well worth the money and I'm never going anywhere else again!

Very pleased with all aspects of the clinic. I have had fillers and Botox with Dr Joanna Christou, she is perfect for me, I wanted it to be subtle and Joanna achieved that. I feel she has a talent for getting it just right.
Very friendly, exellent trained staff. Very good treatment result.
Excellent - I would highly recommend Esther she is the most wonderful, genuine and honest nurse. Always feel like I am in safe hands.

I have been visiting the Cosmetic Skin Clinic for about 5 years.  I am 49 and have had botox and fillers.  The botox is in my forehead and around my eyes.  The filler is in my tear troughs and around my lips.  My face is smoother without looking pulled and plastic and my lips are just that little bit plumper and I don't have lipstick bleeding in to the fine lines.  I was worried that I'd look like one of those over worked celebrities that we all know but the doctors at the clinic do a fantastic job of giving a natural look so I look refreshed and more youthful without looking like I've had any work done.  None of my friends or family can tell.  I did a lot of research before allowing anyone near my face and I have not been disappointed.  All of the staff are professional and courteous.  I would highly recommend them.

Amazing experience  with Dr Melissa Fitzgerald who works at The Cosmetic Skin Clinic. The treatment I went through was a non-surgical rhinoplasty and she was incredible. I achieved excellent results. She is so kind and caring. I highly recommend her if you would like a non surgical rhinoplasty. Go for it!!! Best Cosmetic Doctor Ever!!!!!
I felt I was in safe place & in good hands!
Really clear, honest and thorough explanation of treatment options. Professional with good aftercare.

Welcoming and lovely  (esp. Gorgeous dark long haired receptionist..sorry dont know her name)!! Great treatment and advice and good phone service. 4 stars as one of my latest appointments was incorrectly scheduled and wasted a journey. Still coming back thou!

review_title: From reception through to treatment I ?�?
review_body: From reception through to treatment I am always treated in a polite and friendly manner. Practitioners are always honest in their assessments of your needs and ensure you leave with natural looking improvements.
Such a great clinic,amazing staff who are totally professional and extremely frank about their products and abilities.

Delighted by the results I have had. I am 58 and have had many comments on how well I look since having treatment. Dr Cristou is a skilled and very talented specialist and knew exactly how to achieve the natural look I wanted, with smoother-looking skin and more fullness where fat has been lost in the face but without looking like I'd had anything 'done'. The technique she used meant that I did not have any tell-tale bruising afterwards. I would highly recommend Dr Cristou for her expertise.

Everything that Ria explained would happen was exactly as she said.  I felt comfortable with the changes and what i was experienced throughout.  Results on belly were pretty impressive - clearly a reduction.
Unreservedly professional!
Treatments by Esther.

review_title: Esther is always very helpful and ?�?
review_body: Esther is always very helpful and informative with my numerous questions, thoroughly looking at me each time to decide and explain what we need to do to get the effect that I would like. I feel very confident visiting her even though having anything done makes most people a little nervous!
Excellent service with clear precise information.
Very professional, explain everything  very clearly, You feel you are in the hands of professional experienced people that you can trust!
She is most charming and I am
Highly recommend and completely trust  Dr Mountford. I have seen several practitioners over the years. She is the best absolutely superb.

review_title: The Best......      Highly professional and caring
review_body: I am 70 and always get told. I look a lot younger which is due to The Cosmetic  Skin Clinic .
Welcoming, friendly, dedicated team, client focussed, expert and honest advice, straightforward, good results, pleased.....
A patron of the clinic for the last couple of years, I have experienced both the Buckinghamshire and London clinics.

review_title: Amazing results with fantastic customer care
review_body: I have had Botox with Bianca at The Cosmetic Skin Clinic and have been so happy with the result. On my first appointment I had a consultation for about 45 minutes where we went through what treatment I would benefit the most from and the results to expect. I wasn't advised on the most expensive option, I was advised on what will give me the end result I wanted. A lot of time and care was given with no pressure and a very personable approach was given by all of the team. I highly recommend Bianca and this clinic, I won't go anywhere else now.

This is long overdue, and it is an absolute pleasure to share my experience! I have been coming to your clinic for years and have been nothing but thrilled over the outstanding results and service, the (always) truthful advice, and state of the art treatment options! As a journalist and commercial model an attractive appearance is crucial to my work and success. I would not hesitate to recommend the Cosmetic Skin Clinic, and in particular Tracy and Tara, to anyone like myself that is seeking (dare I say) perfection in skin rejuvenation and non surgical cosmetic treatments. Tracy and her team are true face architects and know their field better than anyone I have ever come across, both in the UK and overseas, allowing me to have the most relaxing treatment experience every time and, most importantly, piece of mind that I (my face!) am in good hands. Thanks a million, Stephanie xoxo

review_title: The Cosmetic Skin Clinic has transformed my life!
review_body: I truly cannot recommend the Cosmetic Skin Clinic highly enough. Tracy Mountford is a total genius in what she can achieve with your face but she is also approachable, sympathetic and understanding too. With her skilful use of fillers Tracy has helped solve the eye bag problem that has blighted my life for years. Thanks to her they are all but gone but the change is so, natural, subtle and clever that I still look and feel like myself. Just a far less tired version! I have been going to the Clinic now for 3 years and both Tracy, and the lovely Tara have helped me feel like a better more confident me ever slnce I first walked through their door.

This week I had my first appointment with Dr Christou.  Her understanding  of my particular cosmetic needs and full explanation of the procedure put me completely at ease and 24 hours later I am already delighted with the result and am looking forward to the second phase of my treatment.
Dr Mountford as professional as ever, took herself time to give me advice on what procedures would suit me, very happy. Good treatment as well.
I been a patient for over 8 years now at The Cosmetic Skin Clinic,and I highly recommend Dr Tracey Mountford.The best out there!!!

I have had 4 treatments on different areas , very successful. the lady who does my cool sculpt is Rhia ( I have most likely spelt her name wrong) Fantastic to say the least, she took a lot of time and care to make sure she targeted exactly the right area, and makes sure I am comfy throughout the procedure. I am coming back for more.
I found the Cosmetic Skin Clinic through extensive research. I am terrified of looking weird or done! Following an in depth consultation with Dr Mountford, we decided my best option was Ultherapy.
I loved the cool sculpting treatment. It's really worthy the "investment". I recommend doing it with Magda, she's the best!
Great first experience - highly professional and good attention to detail to get right. Would highly recommend.
I joined the team nearly 10 years ago and since then I have always had an excellent service from all the staff, I have taken on close friends too who are using regular the clinic.
Very happy with whole experience, no problems

review_title: I couldn't be happier with the treatments and results achieved.
review_body: In my late 40's I think I felt like many other women at that stage of their lives, when mentally I still felt as I did in my 20's and 30's, but when I looked in the mirror I was seeing something different. That 'late 40's' person with the signs of ageing - lines were appearing in places I never realised it could happen and I was looking tired even after a good night?��s sleep. I think it is always a little scary when you initially think about having treatments of any kind, especially when it comes to your face, so I thought I needed to find a clinic where I felt confident about their approach to treatments and where I could have trust in their practitioners. I was recommended The Cosmetic Skin Clinic, and I have never looked back over the past 5 years. I have total confidence in the practitioners and Dr Tracy Mountford with regards to their advice on treatments that are right for me and their ability in providing the results I am looking for. I initially started with Botox treatments, and then over time increased my treatment programme to include fillers, having built a good relationship with my practitioner and the Clinic, having confidence that they understood what I was trying to achieve....and for me that was to look as good as I could for my age, look fresher, to feel more confident in the way I looked and that is precisely what they delivered!

review_title: Fabulous results in a trusted pair of hands.
review_body: I have been visiting the Cosmetic Skin Care Clinic for the last few years, the last time being a few days ago, and I have always been extremely delighted with the results. I have had botox in my forehead and around the eyes and facial fillers in my cheeks, temple area and tear troughs. I have seen both Dr Mountford and Dr Joanna at the London clinic and cannot praise them highly enough. I was very apprehensive on my first visit, but from the minute you walk in you are impressed with what a lovely friendly, welcoming atmosphere the clinic has. I have always felt that my concerns have been carefully considered and then suggestions made to achieve the best outcome, without any pushiness whatsoever to have anything done. Both Dr Mountford and Dr Joanna have such a lovely caring manner and you always feel completely confident that you are in extremely safe hands. Their philosophy of little but often ensures that you get very natural but effective results without that 'overworked' look that is often seen on celebrities. Super discreet 'miracle workers' who are at the top of their field; I believe you won't find anywhere better for non-surgical treatments.

There is always a lovely atmosphere and Tracy and Magda make you feel relaxed and both have a reassuring, friendly but still professional manner.  There is never any hard sell here, only helpful advice, and even discouragement if a treatment / procedure is considered to be unnecessary, which is unheard of at many similar establishments!

Felt very welcomed into a comfortable atmosphere. Had lines between my eyes injected with botox very pleased with the results. Also had filler under my eyes and thrilled with effect. When they say you look fresher that is just how you feel. It didn't hurt at all and I have zero pain threshold. Would definitely recommend both. Dr Joanna did mine and she was so professional. Then got carried away and had some cool sculpting on my tummy, a ridge of fat I hated. This treatment is slightly uncomfortable but I was so cosseted with pillows blankets, neck pillows,knee pillows etc., coffee and magazines. Now a bit swollen and tender and waiting a few weeks for results. It all looks very natural and am sure it's the way forward. I really congratulate the clinic and recommend them.
Have been attending the CSC for 3 years. Have always received 1st class service from all the staff. Wouldn't hesitate to recommend!!
Always made to feel welcome and comfortable. Really appreciate the treatments offered and confidentiality.

I found Tracy through a review in high end lifestyle magazine article. I was already visiting someone in Harley Street but unhappy with the results. Since seeing Tracy she has given me honest, straightforward advice and excellent treatment. On an occasion where i felt things were not as they should have been, i was seen and the matter rectified at my earliest convenience. The environment is discreet and professional at all times i have had an appointment.

review_title: Whimpole street is easy to find and very conviemt
review_body: Helen is always very professional and advises on what's best for me . Helen I highly recommmend .

Finding words to describe Tracy Mountford and the team at The Cosmetic Skin Clinic(CSC) has been difficult without coming across too gushy and excessive, but then why not if that is how one feels.  Since I met the team some years ago now, the whole experience has been based on honesty, caring and what 'you' see in yourself that they could possibly help 'improve'.  What more do you want from a cosmetic skin clinic than all of the above including professionalism and qualification which is in abundance taking the lead in the Cosmetic Industry as quoted my major publications.  Whatever the treatment you can expect a personal service second to none.  With huge thanks and gratitude I leave this review which I decided to write voluntarily based on how I feel.  Thank you CSC and in particular Tracy.

review_title: Professional advice and care which can be trusted.
review_body: I have been a client of The Cosmetic Skin Clinic since 2012. My philosophy is less is more and my aim is to look fresher and good for my age. Tracy and her team always listen carefully to what I want to achieve and advise accordingly. I have travelled all the way from North West London to Slough to have certain treatments as I trust them implicitly with my face. Initially I saw Tracy but more and more now I rely on her incredible team in particular Lori and Libby. I also have now referred my  daughter to have a course of Crystal Clear facials. The treatments I have are non-invasive e.g. Ultherapy and Intracel which have been amazing.

I have been visiting the Cosmetic Skin Clinic for 7 years always very happy with the results.  Always a warm welcome from the receptionists (and booking appointments) and practitioners are very good. Dr Mountford really is top class and in safe hands.  On my last visit I did feel a little rushed however but this is unusual.

Dr. Melissa Fitzgerald really knows what she's doing. Her treatments are well thought through and explained and the results are fantastic: subtle and crafted to my own looks and bone structure. I look in the mirror and instead of looking a bit dragged down by life, I appear fresh, relaxed and about 10 years younger.

I've been a client of Dr Mountford's clinic for several years now and would only trust them with my essential face tweaking! Despite just turning 42, I was asked for ID in the supermarket the other week when buying a bottle of wine! A happy customer.

My experience at the cosmetic skin clinic has always been excellent, welcoming reception staff and the practitioners give you an honest view of treatments without any pressure and I have always felt reassured and found the results to be exactly as described to expect which has really boosted my confidence. I would definitely recommend the cosmetic skin clinic to friends.
I've had 2 practitioners both of whom have been friendly, helpful & professional.  Esther in particular has been excellent
Hello,
Really, really pleased with the work that Tracey did yesterday. I feel so great and happy to take off my glasses

Very professional consultation and treatments with Dr Mountford.  Cannot praise her enough, lovely manner and no hard sell. So happy with results of recent treatments. Would not go anywhere else and it takes me two and a half hours to get there!
Dr Mountford is a precisionist, her expertise and professionalism are second to none.
The clinic of s very welcoming and professional in its treatment  of clients, not at all intimidating or too 'clinical'.
Thank you Tracey for your gentle touch....I am completely thrilled with the work I've had done...  thank you thank you!

when I arrive at the Clinic, Reception straight away are attentive and know who I am and I am greeted with a warm welcome, offered refreshment right away, I cant praise my experience highly enough. all my needs are catered for and all my questions answered, and my Consultant at the Clinic is Exceptional cant Praise her enough, I have already recommended two of my friends,
A very professional clinic. The friendly consultant was honest  and listened carefully to my concerns. I felt totally at ease and reassured with her advice.
Laurie advises and works very in tune with her clients .I have used Laurie for many years and am delighted with my subtle Botox and filler.

I have been to many practices over the years and none have come close to delivering the seamless service and gold standard results provided by the team at The Cosmetic Skin Clinic. The best investment I have made in my appearance was booking an appointment with Laurie - she is a truly gifted artist who will help you to become the very best version of yourself. Your search for the answer to ageing well ends here...

review_title: I'd highly recommend the Cosmetic Skin Clinic
review_body: I've been having facials and peels with Magda for over a year at the Cosmetic Skin Clinic and I can highly recommend her. She is always friendly but professional and the treatments are tailored to my individual needs (including adapting whilst I've been pregnant). I have already recommended her to my sister in preparation for her wedding and she has also been thrilled with her treatments. All the staff at the clinic are fantastic and I will continue to come here for facials with Magda.

First time visit for me at the clinic , recomend by a friend , could not have been made to feel more welcome , reception staff very friendly and discreet , could not have been more helpful , the clinic its self is very clean , modern and reception area very comfortable, Libby who did my treatments, Botox and fillers in my cheeks and either side of my mouth , was a delight totally put me at ease and I felt i could put my full trust in her which is very important to me , I really wanted a fresh natural look which Libby manned to achieve working her magic , I am looking forward to a return visit for a silhouette soft treatment . Would recomend this clinic whole heartedly .

review_title: Pure luxury combined with first class service.
review_body: Absolutely superb treatment, excellent reception, elegant comfortable and discreet surroundings. Half a star lost because sometimes the waiting time can be anything upto 20mins+. However that is a small price to pay for such a unique and first class centre of excellence. Well done.
The reception staff are welcoming, helpful and discreet.

Tracey is the best. Great manner and very unintimidating. She knows exactly what she is doing.  You don't feel you are being sold anything and you feel she takes pride in what she does without any judgement.
5* from the moment you walk in the door. All the staff are very professional. The treatments are well explained, including what to expect. Very happy with my results.
I have been visiting the Cosmetic Skin Clinic for several years.

I hesitate to put a negative review about their fat freezing as the lady who carried out the procedure was so nice, however,  I was deemed suitable for this treatment on my tummy area. They agreed  It didn't work so they offered to carry out it for a second time (no extra charge) but I have been left with a worse result than before I had the first treatment, a complete waste of money.  It cost me almost in the region �2000, so disappointed.

review_title: I wouldn't trust anyone else to touch my face!
review_body: From the first time I came to the CSC I loved the results Tracey gave me from botox. The technique she uses is amazing and no one would know what you had done.
The team are very professional I have been seeing Libby she is very gentle and listens to what you want. I fully trust her and she always makes you feel relaxed brilliant
You are completely in the best hands possible. Do not go anywhere else there is simply nothing better!

review_title: Excellent results from a very professional team
review_body: The team are terrific at both clinics, professional, friendly and discreet. I was nervous on my first visit, but the front of house team soon put me at my ease, and every visit since has been a pleasure.
I have had a great experience at the Cosmetic Skin Clinic. Staff are really nice and friendly and provide a great service.

This was my first visit to a skin clinic & I was quite apprehensive, however, I was put at ease immediately & made to feel very comfortable . I am completely happy with my treatment so far & will be continuing with my physical maintenance & improvements ?���
Both my partner and I have used The Cosmetic Skin Clinic at Stoke Poges. She's had filler and botox and I've a had some fillers etc.

The Cosmetic Skin Clinic is one of the best.  The care and attention to detail is increditble.  The staff are so friendly, kind and caring, from the practitioners to the reception staff.  Never made to feel like 'your in the wrong place'.  I have to give a personal thanks to Tara Jackson.. she always makes me feel so comfortable, such a lovely lady... she is amazing.. and so good at what she does.. always gets it spot on :)
The reception team on arrival were as welcoming as they always are!

review_title: A highly skilled professional clinic you can absolutely trust
review_body: The CSC has an excellent reputation, and it's very well deserved. I have been attending appointments with Dr Mountford and her team for the past 10 years. Their work is faultless: I've always received intelligent, appropriate, friendly advice. All procedures have been clinically excellent and every time I have been delighted the results (which have always been in line with what the team have told me to expect,) If you choose to use The Cosmetic Skin Clinic expect to find a clinic you can grow old with - but only as old as you wish to look!
Been a client for many years and have always been given sensible, honest advice. Trust the staff completely

What a wonderful place, everyone is so considerate and very understanding.  I like it that treatments are not heaped on you.  Tracey Mountford is outstanding and would not do more than necessary to make one look brighter, younger and natural.
People say I look really well, not what have you done! Subtle work and absolutely delighted
The treatment I received at the clinic from the very moment I walked in was excellent. Friendly, spotlessly clean and efficient service.

review_title: Botox treatment with Dr. Melissa Fitzgerald
review_body: I have just had my second treatment with Dr. Fitzgerald and I am extremely satisfied with both the results and consultation.

After an initial consultation with Tracy, I was given an appointment with Tara and since then I have never wanted to see anyone else! Apart from her obvious expertise, skill and patience, she always spends time at the beginning of each session talking through your options, as well as your budget, and then advising accordingly. Not wishing to tempt fate, I have to say I have never been less than delighted with the results. Tara insists it's down to the products but personally I think she is far too modest!

Could not be more delighted with the results of my treatment at the cosmetic clinic. Laurie is brilliant  and from my nervousness at the beginning, I am now quite relaxed to put myself in her hands and that I know I will get honest and professional advice and know that any treatment I receive will be to my advantage and wellbeing. Thank you Laurie,  I am also receiving treatment from Madga, and though it's early days am beginning to see the progress of results, am so happy with it. All the staff at the clinic are great, friendly, professional and put you at ease from the time you walk through the door. I would recommend them to anyone. See you all soon, Mary.
After searching online for the best place in the UK for treatments around the eye area I came across The Cosmentic Skin Clinic and one other!

I had a wonderful experience having botox for the first time at The Cosmetic Skin Clinic with Bianca. She was incredibly professional and talked me through everything in detail. She very also very honest about what I DIDN'T need to have done at this point which was very refreshing. I will definitely be returning. Thank you
I have been coming to the Cosmetic Skin Clinic for about five years to have Lip Augmentation and have alway had a great experience. I am very happy with the natural looking results that I get.

I went in for a treatment not knowing what to expect.I just simply wanted my legs to look better and was hoping for some improvement.I have to say that after two treatments I can see a difference.The vanes are less visible,some of them had desapiered for good.I am very happy with the result i got.It helped me with my confidence and my self esteem .I do believe I will be able to wear a skirt again very soon.The treatment wasn't painful ,a little bit of stinging  and swelling but nothing to affect your day to day life .The nurse was brilliant,she made me feel very comfortable ,gave lots of information about the treatment.I felt I am in the safe hands of the professional .I would recommend it to everybody who is conscious  about their legs ,the treatment does work and it does make a difference .

review_title: My results were fantastic couldn't be happier.
review_body: My consultant was amazing very helpful gave me lots of options and spent time explaining everything to me.

review_title: An absolute ARTIST at fillers, exceptional clinic
review_body: In the past I have visited several of london's top "Botox kings" and always come away feeling less than 100% satisfied with both the professionalism and results. I am a model and my face is my livelihood. This clinic blew me away. Staff were polite, kind and professional beyond compare. The clinic was beautiful, clean and felt extremely exclusive though with a down to earth and friendly vibe. Dr Mountford made me feel so very much at ease and like she had all the time in the world for me. In my experience this level of service and compassion for patients is an extreme rarity, most others seem to be running a production like operation and can't wait to get you out of there. My face and the outcome were the priority, not lining her pocket! A genuine, caring lady with your best intentions at heart. This is a doctor who will quickly turn you away from unnecessary procedures and quell any unrealistic expectations. Seeing Dr Mountford made me realise just quite the poor levels of service and outcome I have always previously received. Patients are encouraged to get in touch with any concerns and a follow up appointment is made to ensure the work done is to the hugest standard and that everyone is happy. I feel this clinic leaves no stone unturned and the levels of care are simply second to none. I have found a holy grail here and I am so greatful!
The welcome is always warm, friendly, however, remaining, at all times,

Hi. I've recently visited the team at The Cosmetic Skin Clinic and have to say it was a great experience. Their advice, care and attention really took away any of my pre conceived concerns and the results are fantastic. Thank you.

I recently visited the clinic for dermal fillers,my practitioner was very professional gave me excellent advice and treatment to my problem of loss of volume in my face.i will definitely be returning to the clinic for further treatment .

After thinking of going ahead with a certain treatment, I was reassured with my expectations and expected results. Laurie Arias was my practitioner and made me feel so comfortable throughout my consultation and treatment. I was already extremely pleased with the way the treatment went and have been increasingly pleased with the results I am seeing! I highly recommend The Cosmetic Skin Clinic for the professional and amazing results they have given me over the years. Laurie Arias has always been my practitioner and I would never change where I would go for further treatments due to the excellent service and treatments I have received. Thank you again Laurie and The Cosmetic Skin Clinic. Highly recommended.

review_title: Superb quality of treatment and care with great results !
review_body: Treatment at The Cosmetic Skin Clinic comes at a premium cost but this reflects quality of consultation and treatment to ensure a result that looks natural.  I love it when friends say that I am looking really well !

I've always been self conscious of my wonky top lip, and finally plucked up the courage to see if there was anything that could be done to make my lips 'normal' without looking 'done.'   Dr Fitzgerald listened carefully to my concerns about remaining natural and was honest in her opinions of what she thought might be possible with my unusual problem.   She injected the flatter side of my top lip so it would be more symmetrical to the other side, and then enhanced the appearance of the whole of my top lip when I went back two weeks later for my follow up appointment.   I'm just thrilled with the results and am wearing lipstick for the first time in my life!
Always a pleasure from the front of house to the therapist. I would highly recommend. Thank you.
Individually customised cosmetic procedures,expertly and meticulously carried out by Dr Tracey Mountford,I always look and feel so much better and happier after her wonderful care.

I trust Laurie to give me accurate and non biased advice. The treatments I have had have always been conducted in a very professional way and I have been more than happy to recommend her to my friends.

The Cosmetic Skin Clinic is without a doubt the best Clinic in the U.K. and Dr. T. Mountford is in my opinion the best for non surgical procedures. The staff are all friendly, polite  and very knowledgeable. I would without hesitation recommend this clinic and I am a very discerning patient!

review_title: In safe hands with great, aesthetically age-appropriate results
review_body: For an understated, fresh look that won't make others see you as Donatella

I have been a patient of Laurie for around two years, she has the nicest manner, she's not pushy, she listens to your concerns and after some thought she provides you with a treatment plan to suit your budget and meet your expectations.

I love the way I look so much better after seeing Dr Mountford. She can spot exactly what I need and never fails to make me feel like a valued and special customer. I would recommend her without hesitation.

Dr Mountford did a fantastic job of removing my extremely deep tear troughs through fillers. I was terrified having the fillers injected so close to my eyes, but she reassured me all the way through. No more under eye concealers for me! I would definitely recommend Dr Mountford
All the staff were friendly and helpful and gave great advice.

My recent experience was excellent (very personable service). I felt very comfortable and completely looked after (by all).  I would highly recommend The Cosmetic Skin Clinic to anyone thinking of undertaking any kind of cosmetic treatment.

Thought I would have my Tear troughs done as they are quite prominent. I was informed that the fat pads on my cheeks needed to be done and this would help the tear troughs although work may be needed on them at a later date as well. At the time I agreed as it all made good sense. When it was done it looked quite good but was obviously swollen and blotchy from the needle. Have left it just over a week and there is very little difference and although they did explain we are all asymmetrical the difference between the two sides is even more noticeable now. Having the cheeks done seems to have pushed the skin up and made the bags under my eyes even more prominent.I am now going on vacation and can not see the Practitioner until beginning of May. I really liked the person who administered the injections but feel considering that two vials were used (without much discussion or cost implications) the outcome is disappointing. I have to save hard for the treatment and really hoped this would give me a little more self confidence but unfortunately it has not. Although I personally am not happy with the outcome of the treatment I will say that the staff that I have met are really professional and freindly

I have been a client of Dr Tracey Mountford for over ten years now and simply wouldn't think of going to anyone else.  Tracey's philosophy of less is more and subtle enhancement works really well for me and know I will never look overdone!
Extremely professional ...offered me a coffee on arrival which was great as had been on train for 2hrs. Friendly and welcoming.

I had a good experience at the clinic, the staff were lovely, kind and helpful and I felt very relaxed and at ease.  The treatment went well on the day however I woke up with a complete black eye next morning from my tear trough treatment which I strongly suspect is not supposed to happen and I had to attend my special event with a purple/red and black bruise all along my left tear trough.  I am hoping that this will remain only as long as a normal black eye - I guess we'll see at the review.

I have been seeing Laurie for nearly a year now and she has been wonderful. I was so nervous to start with but she immediately put me at ease and calmed my nerves and has done and still continues to do an amazing job!

Expert professional advice given without being pushy. All staff are friendly and the clinic has a very relaxed, calm atmosphere. Overall feeling of complete confidence in the advice and treatment given. Can't wait for my next treatment!

The receptionists and team are very friendly, creating a relaxed clinic.  I had two CoolMini treatments on my double chin and bra fat, with an unbelievably amazing result in less than 8 weeks and continued improvement since.  Magda was honest about results I could expect and the areas that would achieve the best results.  I have also had Ultherapy with Magda which was virtually painless, even without pain killers.  Magda has a professional, caring manor and I feel confident about treatments recommended and the results that will be achieved.
The ladies are all lovely, treatment excellent. Always leave very happy. Just wish prices were a little cheaper so I could have more treatments ?���

I could not recommend The Cosemtic Skin Clinic enough. They are discreet and are superb at  understanding individual needs. All the therapists are very warm and caring and have a wonderful mannerism . The ladies at the desk are also very slick and professional .
I loved the treatment that was recommended to me!

After several years of becoming increasingly dispirited with my ever-present eye bags and wasting hundreds of pounds on lotions and potions that make not a jot of difference, I decided to take the plunge and look into tear trough fillers.  After some web-based research, I decided to contact the Cosmetic Skin Clinic and made an appointment with Dr Melissa Fitzgerald.

The Cosmetic Skin Clinic really is five star! From greeting on arrival by the friendly reception staff to the informative& in-depth consultation with your practitioner ( I've seen several different ones for various treatments and they are all excellent) your immediately put at ease and know your in safe hands. I would highly recommend Dr Mountford and her elite team.
I found my experience at The Cosmetic Clinic very pleasant. The staff are friendly and professional and I will definitely be returning soon! Highly recommended.

From my first consultation , I was give sound advice on treatments and the outcome . I have never been disappointed with any treatment reccomended .I have alway received a professional understanding service, which is personal to my needs .
These practitioners are exceptionally confident and knowledgeable. Lovely practice.

All the team at the Cosmetic Skin Clinic from the reception to Beauty Care Specialists are exemplary practitioners in their field. I feel completely at ease discussing how I would like to subtly manage my ageing process with their support and am expertly but sensitively guided by Dr Mountford and Helen to choose the appropriate methods achieve my goals. Each person is unique to them and their service is bespoke, up to date and based on sound clinical knowledge.

I have fillers for nose to mouth lines, I have a lady called Tara carring out the procedure and she is lovely; she calms me down and is very gentle with the needle I can't feel a thing, the results are amazing. I would not go anywhere else for these kind of treatments!
I have been coming to the clinic for about year and have found everyone very friendly and helpful.
I have been going to the clinic since 2012 and I'm impressed with my results. Laurie is great with dermal fillers.

I have been going to Tracy Mountford for many years, I trust her implicitly.  I have a terror of looking 'done', this will never happen in Tracy's hands.  She is incredibly skilled and I always walk out looking refreshed and simply better than I did when I walked in, in a completely natural way.

I decided to get some Botox around my eyes for my son's wedding .I felt that my crows feet made me look tired , and I just wanted to look a little fresher. I went to see Tracey on recommendation  of a friend and was extremely nervous,as the thought of Botox terrified me!! Tracey was amazing she explained exactly what she would do and answered all my questions , no matter how silly! I explained that I wanted a natural look and that's exactly what I got. I was absolutley delighted with the result and I have continued to have regular treatments. The staff at the clinic are so professional and always make the visit a pleasure. You have to really trust the person that is going to inject your face and I feel totally confident in the hands of the staff at The Cosmetic Skin Clinic.

From phoning to an appointment to any after treatment care, the experience at the Cosmetic Skin Clinic is excellent. Laurie works with me and from the start she has got to know me, listened to what I would like and used her professional expertise to get me the results I'm after. I always feel like she has my best interests in mind. I would recommend her and the Cosmetic Skin Clinic. Everyone is genuinely treated as a VIP and the quality of service is faultless.
I have had nothing but positive experiences here, you are made to feel comfortable straight away and I really trust the staff. Laurie is wonderful.
Always a pleasure visiting your stoke Poges clinic. Lorrie is brilliant and offers wonderful and honest advice. I am always more than satisfied with the end results!

Magda was very knowledgeable and I valued her expert advice. I had treatment on my outer and inner thighs and am pleased with the results. I especially welcomed the way that Madga managed expectations as this is not a way to loose weight but to define shape.

I first visited The Cosmetic Skin Clinic about 18 months ago as I was very self conscious about my nose to mouth lines. The advice and subsequent treatment I received from Dr Mountford was second to none. My lines disappeared and I have not needed further treatment in this area. I have since had other treatments and seen other consultants at both Stoke Poges and London clinics and I really cannot recommend them enough. The team are kind, friendly, extremely knowledgeable and above all do not push you to do anything you do not want to do. My confidence is very much restored! I would (and do) recommend The Cosmetic Skin clinic to anyone thinking of having none surgical treatments.

I could not speak highly enough about Dr Mountford and her team. The clinic itself has a warm and friendly atmosphere with very experienced staff who put you immediately at ease. I have had quite a few treatments done at the clinic and am delighted with the results every time. Dr Mountford herself is a true gem and nothing is too much trouble. If you are nervous do not worry you are definitely in safe hands at the Cosmetic Skin Clinic so just go for it!

review_title: The cosmetic Clinic---where you come first
review_body: I went to the Cosmetic clinic for a consultation and was immediately put at ease from the moment I entered reception. Meeting with the experienced & professional physician &  the medical aesthetician I felt really confident that I had chosen this clinic over many others in the  London area for all the right reasons that are important to me.  I work in Healthcare so am familiar with the various options in invasive & non invasive cosmetics. I did alot of research before I choose the Cosmetic Clinic & am delighted that I make the right choice.  Firstly, I  felt all my questions were answered .I was fully briefed on both procedures that I was interested in & what was immensely gratifying was that they allied all my concerns. My first treatment was coolsculpting with Magda, who was the first to be trained in the UK on this technique so I was extremely confident in her ability & expertise. Magda made the entire experience really enjoyable, her lovely friendly personality,her experience & her patient/client focus is very apparent. I am on day 5 & have had no side effects what so ever & really excited about the results.  I had such a positive experience that I am looking forward to my next treatment with Dr Fitzgerald later this week . To me  it was important to choose a clinic where professionalism, credibility & honestly are are the fore, I found that in the Cosmetic Clinic
I have been going to this clinic for treatment for a couple of years now, The staff there are very polite and friendly.

I have been treated by Magda and found her to be kind, knowledgable, understanding and professional. Everything was explained clearly and I never felt I was being 'sold to'. The welcome at Reception was great and made me feel very comfortable. It has a real feeling of organisation and calm. I heartily recommend the The Cosmetic Skin Clinic.
I decided it was time to do something about my  aging face and did a lot of research on-line before choosing to make an appointment at the Cosmetic Skin Clinic in Stoke Poges.

Everytime I've had treatment at The Cosmetic Clinic, I never want to leave. I'm always slightly apprehensive before any kind of procedure as worried it may appear noticeable in some way but The Cosmetic clinic never fail me and I see the subtle results immediately which is the biggest confidence boost any girl can ask for.  I had a small enhancement to my upper cheek,  temple and lower chin area recently and loved every minute. Subtle and beautifying in the most natural way and absolutely no bruising. Lovely warm team there that know exactly what they are doing and care about the results as much as the clients.

I have attend this Clinic for a number of years and have always found the team welcoming and friendly whilst being highly professional and knowledgeable.I value and trust any opionion/ advice given to me by Tracy and feel "safe" in their hands.

Extremely happy with the results and the fact that friends and family have commented on how well I look without realising I have had any cosmetic treatments.  Would thoroughly recommend the Cosmetic Skin Clinic.

The experiences I have at the Cosmetic Skin clinic is something I have not had at other clinics I have visited.  From the moment you enter the clinic staff are friendly and welcoming which makes you feel at ease straight away.  I completely trust the advice from the wonderful clinical staff who always given me the natural look that I am aiming for. I am so grateful to have found Cosmetic Skin clinic and would not go to anywhere else.
I have been using The cosmetic Skin Clinic for years. I usually see the very talented Laurie. But all the practitioners are extremely skilled.

review_title: This is how Botox is supposed to look
review_body: If you have a rough idea between good Botox & not so good Botox then I think you will not be disappointed here. You get what you pay for.
I had a couple of cycles of coolsculpting done in the states and then came to the cosmetic skin clinic and saw Magda to have a second cycle on my lower abdomen, my waist and inner thighs.
I originally found the CSC by researching online....if I was going to try any cosmetic treatments I wanted to make sure that I went to the best!!
Had and initial meeting with Tracey who recommended I see Magda in their London clinic. I have had three sessions and I can honestly say I have had good results on my thighs, arms and hips.

I have been attending the CSC for 3?years and am amazed by my results.  Prior to that I had Botox and fillers in a beauty parlour and was left with an odd looking face and a streaming eye.  I then tried another 'drop in' Botox service at another location with terrible results. Botox and fillers must be performed not only by medical experts but real artists that can look at your face and tweak your natural beauty.  Lori is an artist and has made me look amazing, enhancing my natural features and turning back the clock 10 years.  Everyone at the clinic is professional and friendly.  Nothing is forced on you.  You are offered a review for treatments to make sure you are happy and that the treatment has worked.  They may be slightly more expensive than going to your local beauty parlour but you get lasting results and no bodged work.  Highly recommend.

I have been a patient of the Cosmetic Skin Clinic for years and recently my practitioner recommended Ultheraphy me for its skin lifting qualities and long term results. I have to say, I could not be happier! My face feels so much firmer and was visibly lifted immediately after my treatment, particularly around the eye and jawline which is where I wanted to improve most. I couldn't  recommend this treatment and the Cosmetic Clinic highly enough!!

review_title: You say you would trust someone with your life and it's just a saying but I trust Tracy Mountford completely with my face and I honestly mean it!
review_body: I Know Tracy both knows me and every treatment out there. That knowledge means I look my absolute best. I don't need to say much more my photos tell the story I think I look younger now than when I first came 11years ago.

Over the last 6 months or so, I have given over my face to Janine to work her miracles on and whilst it has been an uphill education (as the area of cosmetic work for me is very new) for me,  I absolutely love the results and although I am still work in progress, I can definitely recommend Sculptra and IPL and of course Janine.   It is not a quick fix but the results come slowly and steadily  and I now have really learnt the importance of taking care of what I have.  I also really appreciate the patience of everyone at the Clinic when I ask so many questions - and probably questions that I have asked many times before as well.

I recently visited the Cosmetic Skin Clinic for some cool sculpt- I do exercise and watch my diet but my ?��muffin tops?�� never seem to budge and with a beach holiday coming up?�� I had a consultation that was incredibly thorough with a lovely practitioner ?�� I think her name was Ria ?�� who took photographs and discussed which areas to treat , the actual treatment was not uncomfortable at all-in fact it was lovely to lie still and catch up with emails on my eye pad! The treatment only took one hour as two machines were used-and I went straight back to work afterwards, it has been five weeks since my visit and without doubt I can begin see a difference and feel a difference in my jeans and skirt waistbands- I will defiantly be going back for the follow up consultation and after treatment photographs ?�� but have to say I already I feel more confident about putting on a bikini ! I would thoroughly recommend the clinic and the treatment ?�� I am delighted with the results!

review_title: Wonderful clinic, excellent staff, great results!
review_body: Staff couldn't have been more welcoming and friendly and my practitioner was was highly experienced, explained everything well and put me at ease. I have had a number of treatments with CSC and can't recommend them highly enough!
I have been having treatments at the Cosmetic Skin Clinic for a number of years and I would not think of going anywhere else.

review_title: Dr Joanna is a fabulous specialist
review_body: Dr Joanna is a fabulous specialist. She worked with me to get a plan together for my wedding and I'm thrilled with the results so far. I wouldn't go anywhere else
Very professional and caring personal!!

review_title: I was very please with my procedure
review_body: I was very pleased with my procedure. The staff at the centre are friendly but very professional. Always happy to help

review_title: I have nothing but praise for the CSC.
review_body: I have nothing but praise for the CSC.

Unfortunately I am rather disappointed following my last visit. I experienced very bad bruising, so much so that my face has been very uncomfortable and the bruises impossible to hide.  I phoned the clinic and followed their advice (arnica and a cold compress) but I still have the bruises over two weeks later.  That said though, the results are very good and my face looks naturally healthier and plumper so I will likely go back.

I had cool-sculpting for my double chin at the Cosmetic Skin Clinic. The clinic is beautiful and relaxing and the treatments were excellent and I would recommend them.  I am very satisfied with the end-result and it was definitely worth the cost even if it took longer than expected and required a second treatment.

review_title: The first time I visited The Cosmetic?�?
review_body: The first time I visited The Cosmetic Skin Clinic, I was very apprehensive and nervous.
Very thrilled, as always, with the results.

review_title: Cosmetic Skin Clinic for natural results
review_body: I would not trust anyone else but Dr Tracy Mountford with my face. She is gentle and particular, giving fantastic natural results. The lovely Ria for Coolsculpting is very precise and ensures the best possible outcome. The Cosmetic Skin Clinic itself is calm and very welcoming, and I cannot recommend it enough.

review_title: CSC is not the cheapest clinic around
review_body: CSC is not the cheapest clinic around. There are cheaper clinics but you need to be careful where you go,and that applies to clinics in this country and overseas.
Lovely clinic, welcoming and friendly, very professional ..

review_title: Sets the standard to which others should aspire!
review_body: The Cosmetic Skin Clinic is quite exceptional.  Every single person demonstrates the highest level of expertise and you feel that they all genuinely care about what is best for you.  The warm greeting from all the receptionists, the most professional consultations with the practitioners, and the knowledge that Dr. Mountford is overseeing everything from behind the scenes, all mean that you feel confident that the outcome from whatever procedure you undertake will be the best it could possibly be.

review_title: The Cosmetic Skin Clinic is second to?�?
review_body: The Cosmetic Skin Clinic is second to none.  I see Dr Joanna and she is everything you could wish for in a cosmetic doctor...professional, knowledgeable, informative, caring and really skilled in the treatments she offers
Dr Joanna is so friendly knowledgeable and professional, Talked me through different treatments and their advantages, First class service

review_title: Dr Joanna is a fabulous specialist
review_body: Dr Joanna is a fabulous specialist. She worked with me to get a plan together for my wedding and I'm thrilled with the results so far. I wouldn't go anywhere else
Very professional and caring personal!!

review_body: I have nothing but praise for the CSC.

Unfortunately I am rather disappointed following my last visit. I experienced very bad bruising, so much so that my face has been very uncomfortable and the bruises impossible to hide.  I phoned the clinic and followed their advice (arnica and a cold compress) but I still have the bruises over two weeks later.  That said though, the results are very good and my face looks naturally healthier and plumper so I will likely go back.

I had cool-sculpting for my double chin at the Cosmetic Skin Clinic. The clinic is beautiful and relaxing and the treatments were excellent and I would recommend them.  I am very satisfied with the end-result and it was definitely worth the cost even if it took longer than expected and required a second treatment.
