The warm greeting from all the receptionists, the most professional consultations with the practitioners, and the knowledge that Dr. Mountford is overseeing everything from behind the scenes, all mean that you feel confident that the outcome from whatever procedure you undertake will be the best it could possibly be.

review_title: The Cosmetic Skin Clinic is second to?�?
review_body: The Cosmetic Skin Clinic is second to none.  I see Dr Joanna and she is everything you could wish for in a cosmetic doctor...professional, knowledgeable, informative, caring and really skilled in the treatments she offers
Dr Joanna is so friendly knowledgeable and professional, Talked me through different treatments and their advantages, First class service

Only nice until you refuse to buy a �1800 package. Anna, who called herself area manager, took me in for a ?��consultation?�� which turned out to be just a sales pitch to sell a package which was discounted ONLY that day and turned very unprofessional and irritated when I refused to commit to a package. Made a patronising remark as I was leaving. Very unpleasant.

I love this place! I had a bad experience with another Leeds salon Pierre Alexander who were very unprofessional. Vgmedispa have always been amazing friendly and very professional. Always feel on w high when I leave they are so lovely.

The Fitzrovia branch is appalling. Having pre-paid for my treatment I have now had three appointments in a row cancelled at short notice. I have left messages and emails asking for someone from the management team to contact me but have heard nothing.

I have had a few treatments at the Manchester clinic. I am finally seeing some good results on my full legs and bikini. My therapist is Dee and she is always really friendly and professional. Makes me feel very comfortable during ever visit. Thanks Dee ?���

review_title: My therapist Dee makes me go to vg?�?
review_body: My therapist Dee makes me go to vg medispa. If it wasn?��t for her I wouldn?��t go! she?��s progressive but not pushy, gives frank advice, makes me feel at ease and comfortable, efficient yet thorough, I honestly can?��t sing Dee?��s praises enough except to say that I won?��t have an appointment with any other therapist, just Dee. Thanks Dee for encouraging me to stick it out to the new hair free me!!! Diane X

Percy Street salon has cancelled last minute on me twice and I have had to have long waits in between treatments. The beauticians have not all had the same training it seems - some of them ensure they go over every part of my leg and take their time, others speed through it, with no more than about 6 flashes each side of my leg leaving large areas untouched. When I have said something they have told me that's how it's done. It is so frustrating. I was not given protective goggles last time either and the beautician spent the whole time moaning about how tired she is because of her work.

review_title: Don't even bother wasting your money?�?
review_body: Don't even bother wasting your money (even if you get it on Groupon). The Fitzrovia clinic is a complete and utter waste of time. They've cancelled 99% of appointments i've had booked in with them the day before and i've then had to chase and chase to rebook. The treatments are also 1* compared to other places i've had laser hair removal. PLEASE, PLEASE, DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME OR MONEY ON THEM.

review_title: Poor customer service, badly organised, a complete waste of money
review_body: In short, don't expect a regular treatment, good customer service, or to be informed of any changes to your booking. Unprofessional service all round.

review_title: It is with regret that I am?�?
review_body: Fitzrovia - Percy Street.

review_title: THE WORST COMPANY I HAVE EVER COME?�?
review_body: THE WORST COMPANY I HAVE EVER COME ACROSS. DO NOT USE THEM.
To:
nan

review_title: Dee is very kind and helpful
review_body: Dee is very kind and helpful. Glad to her in my laser treatment!!

review_title: worst customer service and reception staff
review_body: I have been going to Vgmedispa Fitzrovia for more than 1 year now and I've also referred the clinic to 3 friends that are still doing the laser. I am only going to this clinic because the laser is really good however I can't say the same for the staff. Reception staff is very rude with no empathy at all. My appointment was cancelled few hours before (whereas clients have 48hrs cancellation policy) and no one even apologised (it also happened in the past). My appointment has been rescheduled after 1 week (my friend 2 days later) and after my session I had to book the next one after 7 weeks because apparently everything was fully booked. However my friend got the next appointment after 4 weeks so I don't really understand on which basis they manage the agenda. The lady at the reception was very rude (Elaine was the name if I got the right spelling), no eye contact at all, I gave my feedback regarding appointment being cancelled and rescheduled after 1 week and that it's quite frustrating to have next appointment after 7 weeks. She made no empathy at all, nor apologise just kept saying this is what I can offer you, without even looking at my face.
Dee in Manchester is amazing !
Great service every time, friendly staff good location, flexible with appointment rearranging.
Dee was great, very quick but efficient. Coming back
I visited the East Croydon branch today & my treatment was completed by Jade.
They keep cancelling my appointments last minute at the fitzrovia clinic. Today they cancelled it for the third time!

review_title: I got burnt whilst having my hair?�?
review_body: I got burnt whilst having my hair removal treatment done in December. They promised me they will refund all my money back, we are now in March and I've still not got my money back.

review_title: I am having my laser hair removal?�?
review_body: I am having my laser hair removal treatments with Dee she is amazing very professional and friendly definitely recommend this place. Good offers, clean and tidy, very easy and fast to book my appointments
nan

review_title: I?��m only giving 5* because of Dee as?�?
review_body: I?��m only giving 5* because of Dee as she is amazing at what she does if it was not for her I would not be coming to the Manchester clinic.

review_title: I had treatment done for nail fungal by?�?Dee
review_body: I had treatment done for nail fungal by Dee and I received a really good service and she was very helpful with after care treatment.
nan

review_title: BEST service in Manchester for Laser hair removal
review_body: Currently getting my laser hair removal for my underarms and I?��ve had the best experience ever, get my appointments done by Dee, super professional and friendly. Already seen results after the first session and I?��m in love, would recommend laser hair removal from this VGMediSpa.
TERRIBLE SERVICE!

I?��ve been going to VG Medispa in Manchester for almost 2 years now and Dee is the only therapist I see! She?��s very attentive, professional and absolutely lovely. Ask for Dee if you?��re thinking of going!

review_title: If could give 0 star I would
review_body: If could give 0 star I would - unacceptable experience and rude conduct.

review_title: Thank you to Kirsty at VG Medispa Leeds?�?
review_body: Thank you to Kirsty at VG Medispa Leeds branch for laser yesterday. Friendly and good service =).
They are extremely unprofessional and so hard to get a hold of. If I could, I would give 0 stars to this company.
On my 2nd session of laser hair removal with VGMEDISPA and I?��m over the moon with my results! Highly recommend the treatment and the clinic!

review_title: Lovely service today at the spa in?�?
review_body: Lovely service today at the spa in Fitzrovia from Symone and Paige!! They are so helpful, always very quick and professional.

review_title: Therapist Dee at the Manchester branch is amazing.
review_body: I always book with Dee in the Manchester branch. She is amazing, i have been seeing her for almost a year and i think she is amazing at what she does. I would highly recommend her. She also has great customer service skills and always makes me feel comfortable whenever I visit the clinic.
Same as most other comments on here, came across them through Groupon. Had laser hair removal in the past and wanted to do it again on a different area. Wish I?��d never bought the Groupon!
I've purchased a discounted packages of 6 treatment for my son's fungal nail infection for �300.
Not Recommended.

I found this company through Groupon and it was for Laser Hair Removal appointments, 4 sessions in, I felt bullied into buying an extra service and I did. Afterward, I booked my next sessions as normal as they have to be six weeks apart for this particular treatment, it was canceled but not just that time, another 3 times after that. The booking team never made effort to rebook me I always had to hound them down to ultimately get a canceled appointment on the day of. I am now asking for a refund to which I am getting no response from anyone or vague responses when I do manage to get through to a member of staff or I Just get hung up on. I am still trying to get my money back. Do yourself a favor and spend your money elsewhere!

This company is a disgrace. When they want to sign you up for deals they will call you when it suits you and make everything look simple. Bit once your signed up and they have your money they dont care. I signed for laser treatment at the croydon branch and paid just over �1000 and even paid extra as an add on treatment whilst there. I did this through 0%interest and my payments finished in september and since then they have been cancelling my appointments. I was promised extra treatments for free as they kept cancelling my appointments due to staffing or least that was the excuse. I have emailed them several times to rebook my appointments, tried to call them but no joy. So now I have lost my money also the treatment is now invalid because there is over 8months lapse in between. Dont waste your money on them. I worked hard to earn the money they have taken from me

This company is a disgrace - they value your money, but not your time. After waiting weeks and weeks for an appointment, they call me the day before to say they?��re cancelling. Then when I turn up at the rescheduled appointment, they tell me (after I?��ve been waiting in the reception area half an hour) that they?��re going to have to cancel my appointment as their tattoo removal technician doesn?��t actually know how to remove tattoos yet.

I've had numerous sessions of laser hair removal and I can honestly say that this is one of the best places I have ever been to. From the moment you walk through the door you'll be greeted with a warm hello and a smile - totally putting you at ease - far from a lot of beauty places you go to where a horde of women eye you up and down the moment you step in.

review_title: Olatz Mompeo - I look like I slept for 2 years!!
review_body: OMG. I just woke up this morning and I looked like I slept for 2 y in arrow. NOT JOKING.  My skin looks fresh, less red and has a great complexity- exactly what I was expecting from the the glycolic peel I got yesterday! I booked consultation + glycolic peel. VGMediSpa is very clean and bright. All workers very nice and relaxed.

I bought six laser removal sessions via Groupon, went for my consultation (Fitzrovia branch) and all went well, super friendly and helpful staff. The manager offered me a black Friday deal so I said yes but asked if I could split the payment. Of course it was possible, so went happily to my first laser session a few days later. Then I've been told I had to pay the whole immediately or the price would go back to normal, and I was refused the refund of the deposit I did. I was also refused to book my next session "until it was solved" though I had paid for my whole 6 sessions on Groupon. Since then (November) no one answers either phone or email. I was hoping the problem would be solved in a minute by talking quietly but apparently a client isn't worth picking up the phone. Total scam, I wish I had read the reviews before buying.
I?��m giving five stars for Ria, in the Poole branch, who is fantastic. Love the results of my laser hair removal treatments as Ria?��s very professional and thorough.

review_title: Surprised by all the bad reviews!
review_body: I've always had a good experience at the Manchester site so I'm quite surprised by all these bad reviews. I've always got an appointment for the days I wanted (I work close by so fortunately can be flexible with times which I understand won't be the same for everyone). Dee has done the majority of my appointments and she's always bubbly, friendly and professional. Happy with the progress considering the low price and will probably book more sessions when I see the final result.

review_title: I always receive great treatments here?�?
review_body: I always receive great treatments here (Reading Clinic) my results are amazing and I?��m really happy, have added more areas so can?��t wait to not spend so much time removing my unwanted hair! The girls are always friendly and welcoming, the lady on reception is always helpful with booking future appointments for my best results too. Would highly recommend.
This review is for the VGMedispa in Manchester in particular for Fiona and Dee.
Just like many reviews I have just read on trustpilot, avoid at all cost.

Avoid at all costs! Thankfully I paid on my American Express and was able to charge back due to the salon's appalling service (or, lack of any at all). My first appointment was great and I felt like I had found a great salon and a good price. However, too good to be true, and of course they expect you to pay upfront for all six sessions. They cancelled my second appointment on one day's notice (it had been booked in for six weeks) and then despite calling them three times and being given different excuses, I gave up and emailed their "customer service" email an ultimatum to be rebooked in, or else I expected a refund or I would be small claiming against them using the relevant consumer protection legislation. I never heard back from customer services. Reading all the recent reviews now, I cannot advise you to AVOID more. I wish I had not trusted them with my time or money.  Thankfully, credit card providers have customer service. This place does not.

RIP OFF. I never ever write bad reviews but I am so disappointed with my experience at VGMedi Spa. I had 6 sessions of laser hair removal on my legs and there is pretty much ZERO difference. Booking appointments was next to impossible with any normal person's work schedule. There was also confusion at their salon with the cancellation of one of my appointments, saying it was down as a missed session (where you pay if you don't call within 24hrs of appointment) - this was not the case and had to fight my corner and play them a voicemail I still had confirming the evidence of me cancelling with enough notice, eventually one of the girls on the desk was understanding about this. Overall, absolute no go. I wish I had spent my money elsewhere, I'd saved up to get this done :(

review_title: REFUND SCAM DO NOT BUY FROM THEM
review_body: I bought a laser, my apponintments were cancelled 3 times and I also asked for a refund on January the 8th.... and after 10 emails nothing, they also asked me my credit card details in order to proceed witht the refund, but nothing disappeared! i also contacted them on messenger but agter a couple of answer like " I will tell the customer service to get in touch eith you" they blocked me on facebook and messenger!! Hope this reviw will help me to get my refund, PLEASE DO NOT ANSWER TO CONTACT CUSTOMER SERVICE, ALREADY DONE 10 TIMES WITH NO ANSWER.
Total scam - avoid.

review_title: A con - bought 6 sessions but no bookings
review_body: Bought six sessions and they cannot fit me in due to issues with their booking system that have lasted six months.

Poor service & rip off! They cancel appointments without giving any notice and not even a call back to reschedule! and I also had 2 sessions where the technician worked so fast that I doubt I had much hair zapped! 2 full legs in under 15 minutes, thats ridiculous and seems like the spa is trying to cram in more people in an hour so that they make more profits, and leaving the customer out of money! absolutely the poorest service I've ever had regarding any laser hair removal. I think everyone on here that has complained should make a formal complaint to VG Medispa and then go to the Ombudsman and file a complaint so that they see this is not a one off offence, that they really are trying to scam people out of their money!

The beauty consultant Kirsty was professional yet friendly and made me feel comfortable throughout the treatment. Whilst doing the laser therapy, the consultant was very thorough and didn't miss a spot. I've always had fantastic results with my treatments at the salon - and taken advantage of their special offers!

review_title: Took my money, kept cancelling and now ghosting me! Where's my refund?!?
review_body: I called up six months ago to inquire about their Groupon offer before I made my purchase. The lady over the phone was very helpful and even applied the Groupon offer over the phone and arranged an appointment in Percy street. Unfortunately, I wasn't able to get anything till a month after (in October) but after the delightful service over the phone, I was happy to wait. However, two days before my appointment, they sent me a cancellation due to staff unavailability. A little disappointed, I rearrange the appointment for the soonest possiblity - this time having to wait for another two months (December).

Was offered an appointment the day after I contacted VG Medispa the first time. it was cancelled the next day. Then told there was a 6 week wait for my first appointment and extremely limited times even 6 weeks away. This continued over a period of months. Almost impossible to get an appointment. Just arrived for my appointment that I booked 7 weeks ago only to be told my appointment has been moved to an hour later. They never answer the phone at the call centre. Don?��t waste your time and money. The treatments have been fine but the effort and frustration to get them have made the whole experience unpleasant.

review_title: Thanks to Jana and Dulcie on reception?�?
review_body: Thanks to Jana and Dulcie on reception who are really helpful and helped me with getting my sessions organised and the best deals for what I needed.
Really good therapist does a thorough job and really spends the time to make you feel comfortable and get you through it thank you
Terrible experience - Richmond VGMedispa

review_title: They took photos of my naked bikini area and now blank my emails.
review_body: I had laser hair removal on my bikini area and I was reasonably happy with the treatment (regardless of having a different therapist each session which became slightly frustrating) until it came to my final session. In this session, they took pictures of my naked bikini area, legs open! There was no explanation of why the photos were being taken or what they would be used for. I was too scared to say anything at the time as I felt intimidated but I since emailed to request that the photos were permanently deleted as I felt very uncomfortable that they had such pictures of me, but I have not had a single response to any email address I send my concerns to. Horrific experience which remains unresolved for me.

review_title: Looked after by symone front of house
review_body: Looked after by symone front of house. She was very accommodating given I had to rearrange my appointment. Highly recommended!

Horrible service , I am not a complainer but they make the experience of booking with them so hard and are not transparent on prices , I bought a treatment online and I am so NOT looking forward to do it , they made me feel very unwelcome

review_title: Excellent Review for Louisa & Caroline in Reading
review_body: Today I had both an amazing treatment with Caroline very professional &full of Experience but also had fun chatting too!

review_title: This review is for Koko in Fitztrovia
review_body: This review is for Koko in Fitztrovia. I've now had two sessions with Koko who I've found to be very thorough as a therapist and easy to get along with. I've read that some people have had last minute cancellations to their appointments but so far I've had no issue and instead have found Koko really helpful in getting me my next appointment in time.

review_title: The five stars is specifically for Dee
review_body: The five stars is specifically for Dee, who has treated me for most of my Laser Hair removal and is professional, helpful and makes you feel so comfortable! However, the organisation of the company is poor, every time I ring or call in to make an appointment the girls have trouble with the internet or system you seem to use, my first ever appointment was not booked in because the system was causing problems. Without these issues my opinion of the company would be better and I would probably pass it on to friends, at the moment the only reason I return is for Dees wonderful customer service which is holding the Manchester branch together! Thank you!
The service I received in Fitzrovia with my two first session was excellent and I was really glad, I also recommended the clinic to some of my friends and we booked other treatment.

there should be a way to give this company no stars at all. i have a list of reasons as to why you should never even consider this place, and i will state that the price may lure you but dont be fooled.

review_title: I had booked to try and get my nail?�?
review_body: I had booked to try and get my nail fungus sorted .I had kept leaving it, trying other things but I am so glad I did this as it was spreading it now starting to look like healthy toes again. Dee was lovely very supportive,helpful most importantly very friendly.do try

review_title: Fabulous! Dee was wonderful highly recommend
review_body: I bought a voucher for the laser hair removal bikini line and booked with the lovely Dee at the Manchester branch on John Dalton Street. I was a little nervous as I had never had any hair removal process done on this area by another person before.  I have just had my first session and I must say that my experience so far has been wonderful from booking in my first appointment to having the treatment done everyone has been lovely they make the process so easy and they're always pleasant!  Dee is lovely! She made me feel really comfortable and she was so helpful /informative with aftercare and the general process that I'm actually excited to go back she made the experience so easy and a good laugh thank you Dee!  The treatment was not painful at all and Dee even gave me an offer on one of the other treatments,  Highly recommend!  Thank you xxx

Up until today I was fairly happy with the service I received here, although they are always running late which is annoying and is always blamed on the technician being off sick, when you finally get in to your appointment the service is fine.

review_title: Dee always does an amazing job with?�?
review_body: Dee always does an amazing job with laser hair removal treatment, she is very informative friendly and helpful.

I have just come back from a treatment at VG Medispa in Fitztrovia and wanted to take the opportunity to highly recommend to others.  I want to commend Koko, one of their incredible therapists, who was nothing but warm, friendly, open during the treatment process, and who was gentle to ensure that I was comfortable.  These treatments can make one feel quite vulnerable, but I must say that I left my treatment today feeling great and thankful. Well done, Koko and team.

Still awaiting a response. Bought a voucher for a family member who attended a patch test in london. Was told that what had been bought for them only covered lower legs and was told for 100 pounds more they could have whole legs lasered. Unfortunately they paid for it there and then, which is terrible practice by this company, and looking at other reviews I would suggest they should start charging for extras afterwards if they want to keep any customers at all.
Had first session of laser yesterday was made to feel comfortable and asked if was ok throughout.. lookingvforward to completeing my 6 sessions just hope its by summer as the clinic is busy!

Honestly I am so dissapointed in this service - they cancelled my appointment because I was 5 mins late and refused to see me throughout the whole day even though I informed them there was traffic and it took me over 1.5 hours to get to their branch (Percy Street). I don?��t understand why the timeframe to get every customer in is so short. Surely there should be some lineancy in the time dedicated towards each customer. I was also not informed that appointment are not available in the next two weeks after booking and only after I demanded a refund was an appointment given to me. If you can?��t manage to look after your customers or you simply do not have the time to dedicate to your customers needs DONT ISSUE A SALE. The sales assistant are so quick to take money by saying the ?��sale might not be on in a couple of weeks?ѝ but don?��t even offer the level of service to match the amount we?��re paying. Ridiculous! So dissapointed and would NOT recommend anyone to visit unless you want to waste your money and time.

They don't even deserve 1 star.  My girl Nisha has left and I'm so disappointed as she was the best therapist there. Staffs there right now are extremely rude. One looks half asleep when you talk to her, cannot be bothered to be there clearly.  The staff ( wore big glasses) that treated me this time when I finally got an appointment, told me when treatment was done, to take the tissue I was lying on to wipe my face with it then there is spf on the table where I can use.. well before, Nisha would clean the area n apply the spf herself. Maybe I was spoilt, but come on, isn't that common decency to do that when you treating someone.... They never answers the phone, if you email, well good luck in getting an answer. So quick to take your money but when it comes to appointment, they double book you to shut you up, then when you turn up, nothing in diary or we have sent you an email as staff sick, walked out or fell down the stairs. Sick of this place.. always have an offer in salon now, leave deposit to secure then you come back 6-8 wks later, the same bloody deal. I heard one of the managers saying we need to create a sense of urgency for them to buy, really, do u think we are that dumb and stupid to spend our hard earn cash. I never used Groupon, I walked past n thought i'd inquire, oh my goodness, biggest mistake of my life. It was too good to be true. Now reading the reviews, I should have done my homework.. I can see some good too, maybe those people are lucky...I will be taking legal actions against this company, this is a joke.

review_title: I have been going to VG medispa for?�?fungal nail infection/ laser treatment
review_body: I have been going to VG medispa for laser treatment on a fungal nail infection that has taken hold in my right foot. so far I have been four times for treatment and I can see the results the infection is now on the way out of my big toe and the other largest toe . every time I have been to this place the staff are so polite and helpful nothing is too much trouble . the member of staff I deal with the most is Dee. she gives me the treatment and she is very professional .she knows exactly what she is doing and has offered me advice on aftercare . if I was in charge I would give dee a pay rise before somebody poaches her.
I have had a laser hair removal on my upper lip in Fitzrovia centre.

review_title: So I came to fitzrovia to have my?�?
review_body: So I came to fitzrovia to have my second laser session today which I was actually dreading because prior to my first experience with a lady caձձed Nisha I was left very unhappy and disappointed due to the lack of professionalism from here. However I had my second session today with another therapist Koko which was completely different not only was she much more professional but I felt she looked after me more and really made sure I was completely satisfied with everything today. This has definitely changed my experience with your clinic and I am now happy to continue my sessions with her I can?��t reccomend her enough and urge you to all

Even though I am happy with the service during the treatment I DO NOT RECOMMEND this clinic.It is impossible to get an appointment and when you finally get one it is cancelled the day before and get another one in a month. This is the third time they cancel my one with a very short notice. I have purchased the treatment in June and I had only 2 sessions (supposed to be every 6 weeks)
nan
DO NOT BOOK WITH VGMEDISPA

review_title: They cancelled my treatment 15 minutes before it was supposed to start
review_body: I booked chemical peel month or more ago. They call me and ask to reschedule, and come some days earlier. Didnt work well for me, because i had company Christmas party 2 days after treatment, but the only other option that worked, was in february. So i accept. I cycled to their salon, and arrived 5 minutes before. I look at my phone and i see they cancelled my treatment while i was cycling - 15 minutes before it starts. Who cancels appointment 15 minutes before start?
Therapist - Dee.

review_title: Warning! They ask you to pre-pay and then you can't get your money back if things go wrong!!!
review_body: I have had a course of 11 out if 12 sessions of laser hair removal at Manchester branch of VG medi. Despite me saying that I did not think it was working, I was told by Dee that I needed a third course (another 6 sessions) and I felt I was pressurised with all the sales talk to buy it in advance of the treatment. So a month later I completed my 12th session and was booked to have my 1st session out of 6. I then had to have surgery due to an unrelated condition and came in before my surgery to VG salon in Manchester asking for a refund to the 6 sessions because I would be immobile for 3 months so could not come for treatment. Guess what I was told. That because 14 days have passed since I paid (forced to pay in advance more like!), they cannot refund the money! They said, contact customer services by email, they could help to resolve the issue because clearly I had exceptional circumstances. So I emailed the customer services. Even attached confirmation of my surgery from my surgeon. Then emailed again. Then again. NO response, NO acknowledgement. NO communication whatsoever. They owe me 500+ for the treatment I have not had and do not even bother to acknowledge a complaint! AVOID THIS PLACE as they will keep your money and blank you out if you have any issues with the treatment.

review_title: Had my first session today and was very?�?
review_body: Had my first session today and was very nervous but Jolanda was great and made me feel very at ease and comfortable. Look forward to seeing the results. Thanks.
Hi,
Good treatment but poor customer service - Reading

review_title: I?��ve been many times for my treatments?�?
review_body: I?��ve been many times for my treatments at this clinic in Goodge street but today I felt really nice and comfortable from a girl named jolanda. Really happy about my treatment today.

review_title: Great treatment by Dee at Manchester VG?�?
review_body: Great treatment by Dee at Manchester VG medispa. Would highly recommend! She was professional, chatty and caring! Thanks Dee!

review_title: I have completed my 8 laser sessions?�?
review_body: I have completed my 8 laser sessions with VG and have seen amazing results. The staff (including therapist Charlotte) were very friendly, and I had a thorough yet timely treatment. I will be purchasing more sessions for touch ups in the future!

Absolutely unacceptable, all my sessions are continously cancelled, have not been able to have a session for over 5 months due to last minute cancellations from the clinics part. When I have to contact to rearrange the session, all sessions are booked up again for weeks, having delayed me for over 5 months on my treatment.
Absolutely appalling service. Unacceptable experience, unreasonable and not even getting back to me. Steer well away!
Poor customer service and the saprano lazer hair removal does not work well.

They keep cancelling appointments and are rude. After they repeatedly cancelled on me for my first appointment, I requested a refund as my sessions had not started but they declined. they never have open slots and are very difficult to even get on the phone. Their systems keeps going down so you always have to fill out forms.

review_title: Great customer service by both Dee and?�?
review_body: Great customer service by both Dee and Fiona in the Manchester salon. Thank you.
Very poor service.
Hi ,
Dee makes me feel comfortable and happy when getting laser on my underarms! Would highly recommend!!

VG Medispa Fitzrovia (London) is the worst experience: the staff is very rude, appointments booked 3 months earlier are cancelled by email without offering any alternative slots, I called 10 times the place without success...
Hi, my name is Angela. I had today a lasser removal session in my face with Dee in Manchester and I'm very happy with the results. Dee is very helpful and professional.
Awfull, very unhappy with VG Medispa.

Absolutely TERRIBLE!!! First I was ripped off and sold the entirely wrong treatment type - conned into buying a block booking of laser treatment that was not suitable at all! Even the third clinician I saw verified that it was totally unsuitable and wouldn't work at all and went to check why I had been recommended (clearlift instead of iPixel). Second clinician racially insulted me and burned me with the laser - I now have permanent dark patches as she left the laser on too long and effectively caused burns. She also recommended a different type of laser and when I asked for a patch test and came to book my next appointment- no sorry you have used up all of your sessions trying that last one out!...it was supposed to be patch test but she effectively ripped me off two sessions. I had the remaining two sessions reinstated after lots of complaining that this was unacceptable - but apparently they are unable to schedule another appointment and are fully booked up for like EVER! I have complained- sent 3 emails...all unanswered and ignored. Not sure what is worse...conned, ripped off, lied to, racially insulted, burned and permanently scarred??? Can't decide. Completely avoid! These guys are cowboys! If they were a reputable clinic they wouldn't need to sell Groupons in the first place! Don't go here!

review_title: Laser Hair Removal at the Richmond Branch
review_body: I?��m currently having laser treatment on several areas atvthe Richmond Branch, initially I was unsure about the service I was receiving and not entirely confident my treatment was being carried out properly. At my third session I was greeted by a new member of staff named Anna, Anna has completely transformed my experience at the Richmond Branch! Anna is very friendly, informative and goes above and beyond to make sure the laser session is carried to achieve ultimation results. Prior to Anna?��s arrival at the Branch I would not have recommended the service at all. Anna is an amazing addition to the Branch and I couldn?��t recommend her enough for laser treatments!!
Lovely staff, friendly, knowledgable and every visit to the clinic has been a pleasurable experience.

review_title: The best laser coverage I've had
review_body: The best laser coverage I've had. Ria is super thorough. I feel confident that my bikini line will be lush and smooth after today.

absolutely disgusting company! I paid for a laser hair removal package directly to VGMedispa via phone. I explained the meds I am on and they said it would be fine as long as I come in for a patch test. When i get there they consult with their doctor via slack messaging and tell me they cant do a patch test at all because of the meds I am on.

review_title: Don?��t waste your time with their crabby Customers Service .... start your legal case and don?��t worry it?��s not that difficult!
review_body: I had really bad experience with this business. My appointments were cancelled several times because the machine was broken. This meant I couldn?��t have the full benefit of the treatment. I asked for refund and unpleasant journey with their customer service started. It was too frustrating,time consuming and aimed to make you give up your money. My advice to those who are having hard time with them at the moment: Don?��t waste too much time and claim your money back in court. If you don?��t know the procedures just ask your local citizen advice bureau.

Been going to VG mediaspa now for several months  for my soprano ice hair removal. The place is spotlessly clean, staff are lovely especially Louise who is very professional and talks you threw what she doing I highly recommend VG media spa .I travel all the way from Liverpool to Manchester to this lovely little shop .

review_title: Perfect underarm laser and perfect staff!
review_body: I?��ve been doing all my laser sessions for underarm with VGMedispa on Percy Street. First discovered them on groupon and then stuck with them cause they?��re brilliant.
I have had 2 out of 6 sessions with Louise at the Manchester John Dalton Street clinic.

Disrespectful  company, they are quick to take your money, but customer care, will not reply to emails. They refuse to give me refund, receptionist was so horrible, she had an attitude, sarcastic, it was so stressful that  my daughter walked out of the clinic, shocking experience, receptionist had no experience in customer care service. I paid �300, I want a full refund, the company is not obliged to refund. I am so disappointed. Customer care department are no help at all, it's like talking to a brick wall.  Someone please help.

Had my appointment this morning with Jess and she did a very good job for me covering every area. She also gave me some valuable advice for post treatment care. I will definitely go to her again in the future.
Simran was very friendly and attentive. The room was clean. All the staff seemed very polite.

At first all seemed well. I asked the right questions. But after treatment which i feel was not done correctly i had bruising i was told this was normal and to wait 12 weeks for it to subside. It subsided but a year on im left in pain and the original thread veins i had treated are still there if not worse!
Worst customer service EVER! I was forced to buy a package that I did not want after using my groupon package and I was told I could get a refund if I changed my mind which I did the next day.

absolutely a very bad experience! it was a business to book the appointment, then they convinced me to finish the treatment and make me pay in advance, for serious problems I had to cancel my appointment and afterwards they told me that it was impossible to book another and that to do it I would have to repay all the share. so they stole my money. absolutely rude girls at the desk! do not be fooled too!
I am half way through my laser hair removal package and the staff are incredibly rude, sessions are rushed and rubbish results.

I had my laser remove session at the Fitzrovia, Percy street.The place is very clean and the staff is extremely friendly ( I had the session with Simran, she also gave me additional information about my pigmentation). I had only one treatment, so I don't have the result yet. But I look forward to have my next session.

review_title: Shockingly rude, do not use them
review_body: Only nice and smiling when taking your money.

Extremely rude and unaccomodating. They?��re only polite until you buy a package and then they do their best to scam you out of your moneys worth. They pack clients together with only 15 minute slots, rushing them in and out like a factory. They also have an extremely outdated contact system. The receptionist responded to the fact that I couldn?��t contact her by saying ?��Oh yeah the calls go to the ?��main office?�� ?��... hello? So basically there isn?��t an existing communication system between clients and this business. Like how cheap do you have to be to not even have a working phone... Moral of the story: don?��t come here and definitely don?��t buy a package! Huge waste of time.

review_title: Me and 2 other friends booked a facial?�?
review_body: Me and 2 other friends booked a facial through Groupon. Firstly we were told we couldn't get an appointment for a further 2/3 months which we didnt mind too much. Closer to the time only one of my friends was given the courtesy of a phone call to say they could not do our facial anymore due to a recall in the products they would have used. At this point it was around 2/3 months further down the line and we just did not want the facial anymore especially after the products seemed unethical to use. We were not even given the courtesy of a phone call to let us know they would have to rearrange our appointment.

review_title: Don?��t waste your money or your time
review_body: Don?��t waste your money or your time, I was told I was the perfect candidate for laser hair removal- cut to 6 sessions later spanned over approx a years time due to time needed in between sessions and I have more hair now than before!! I was told by the girls there (on my sixth session) that 6 sessions is minimum and should have booked 12!  That hair removal hardly ever works on six session. Change your marketing if this is the case!!! Total waste of a year and covering up on holidays etc.

review_title: I went to VG Medispa in Manchester?�?
review_body: I went to VG Medispa in Manchester yesterday and I had a really enjoyable experience. It was great to meet the lady on reception and Dee the Therapist who did a tummy tightening treatment on me. She was very professional, well informed, she made me feel very at ease and relaxed as i hadn't had a treatment like this before. It was a great experience and I'll be back for more definitely.

Had around 3/4 laser hair removal sessions now, don't know what to say about the results, it's a long process you need to be patient with I guess. Everyone's always friendly but particularly Kemmi, I had her for the first time today and she was really thorough with everything she did and made me feel comfortable. It's always clean and I've never had to wait long either

review_title: I had a hair removal session at the?�?
review_body: I had a hair removal session at the Fitzrovia unit. The place is clean and welcoming, and the staff if very friendly (i had a session with Vicky and she is great). I can't comment on the results because i had only one session, but did receive lots of information on the procedure (had a 'test session' prior to the beginning of treatment, receive emails with all the prep required, etc). One thing to keep on the radar, they do have quite a full agenda - it might take a couple of days to find you an appointment.

I find the staff very helpful, warm and welcoming. The place is clean and the lady in the reception is friendly, she explains the before and after things I needed to do. I was nervous on my first hair removal session but both the receptionist and Dee is very professional and made me comfortable and at ease during the session.  Dee has explain the procedure to me and was very informative.  This lady knows her stuff and very consistent too.  Honestly I couldn't praise her enough.  I have been there to see her for the 3rd time and get the same treatment.  I am happy with the results.  I would definitely recommend her and would keep coming back.  She is a credit to VG Medispa.

review_title: Had 10 sessions of tattoo removal in?�?
review_body: Had 10 sessions of tattoo removal in Manchester clinic & I?��m really disappointed to say the least. The company lost my photos. I asked to see these at each session & was told that I?��d have to contact head office as they didn?��t hold my photos in clinic. I contacted head office to be told that they did not hold them & I would have to ask in clinic. Now gone to someone else for my tattoo removal & have found out I have been left with scar tissue. Minimal resuls seen in 10 sessions & was told each time I?��d have to book ?��another 5?�� & would need to do it ?��today as the offer ends tomorrow?��. Completely ripped off & feel as if it was more a scam than anything. Avoid!

Terrible customer service. Paid over �500 for both laser hair removal and laser tattoo removal and in over 6 months have only managed to have ONE treatment because "their machine is broke" or "lack of staff".

review_title: had my third session but my first time?�?
review_body: had my third session but my first time with kemmi she made me feel very comfortable great service

Appauling service. I was told my appointment for a derma roll would take 1 1/2 hrs. 1/2 for the numbing cream to work then 1 hr for the derma roll. The cream was only left on for 10 minutes & the derma roll procedure lasted 20 minutes - which was very painful as the numbing cream had not taken effect. The therapist also missed many facial areas.

I've been having laser hair removal at the Birmingham clinic. Always received great service. Lovely chat during my sessions. Recently started having sessions with Kemmi which im really happy about. She makes you feel very comfortable and at ease. Happy with my service with Kemmi and the Birmingham clinic so far

I did contact your customer service, really unhelpful and still haven?��t heard back from you directly. I tried another spa nearby that uses the same laser machine. Treatment is much more precise and through. Not much different in price either.
Friendly and professional service from Amanda at Fitzrovia today. Thank you.
Great service, Amanda from Fitzrovia is very professional.

review_title: I had laser treatment with Katie in?�?
review_body: I had laser treatment with Katie in Manchester and she s been really nice and made me feel at ease . clean place , friendly staff

review_title: 2nd of six laser treatments and was?�?
review_body: 2nd of six laser treatments and was excellent. Was treated by Rosie the Richmond branch manager and she knows her stuff. Calm, professional, diligent.

review_title: I enjoyed my sessions at VG Mediaspa?�?
review_body: I enjoyed my sessions at VG Mediaspa Birmingham and it made a difference. Laura the therapist was great and its a shame the Birmingham branch dont do tattoo removal no more as I would of brought more
Amanda was really sweet and professional, really looking forward to my next visit!

I had 2 sessions in VGMedispa Richmond in the first session the girl that was doing my treatment was not that much polite and she was trying to sell more session rather than doing her job properly, I had a deal with herself but on the first session she denied about some areas and she said that I have to pay more, she did my session in 29 minutes while I did 6 session in Birmingham VGMedispa and average was 45 minutes. my second session was with Rosie she did the best treatment I have ever had she was so professional and friendly and I wish my future sessions would be with her. All the star I gave to this center is only for Rosie and 2 star that I did not give is because of my first session.

review_title: Astoundingly bad customer care. Refused to refund our money and ignored our emails/letters. AVOID AT ALL COSTS!!!
review_body: My wife booked some laser hair removal through a Groupon offer at the Birmingham salon. She had two sessions and after the last session she paid �169 in advance for 6 more sessions. A day or so later she had a reaction to the laser treatment and no longer wanted to continue with the 6 sessions she had paid in advance for and kindly asked for a refund. The company emailed to say they were not prepared to refund her even though we hadn't started the treatments she paid for. We have since sent numerous emails/letters contesting this and asking for some for some further explanation as to why we weren't entitled to a refund for a service that has never been provided and we have been completely ignored. Two of our letters were sent recorded delivery to the Head Office and signed for but still no response. What kind of a company operates in this way?!?! It's absolutely disgusting the way they treat their customers once they have their money. We all work hard for our money and to refuse to refund our money and then be completely ignored is totally unacceptable.  We will certainly be telling as many people as possible through review sites and social media about this.
AWFUL. I purchased a voucher on Groupon for laser hair removal (underarms/legs).

review_title: I used Manchester clinic for laser hair?�?
review_body: I used Manchester clinic for laser hair removal, it was my worst ever experience as staff did not know what they are doing,they just  try get more business by pushing you buy more sessions rather than focusing on actual treatment. For 1st three sessions I was treated by three different staffs and for last three session I was treated by a lady called Dee on my complain she was not good either but better than 1st three. In every session they took 5 minutes to treat my upper body and 15 minutes to convince me buy more sessions. Would not recommend to anyone  Don't waste your money .
I?��ve been coming to this salon for over a year now. The staff are inexperienced and try to upsell without realising what they are selling.
I would recommend this place. clean and nice place. Amanda did my laser hair removal . She is very patient and nice person to get treatment done with

review_title: I had laser hair removal with?�?Charlotte
review_body: I love VG Medispa!!! After a bad experience at a different salon I was apprehensive about my laser hair removal treatment, but my worries were quickly put to rest! Charlotte was amazing and made me feel relaxed and at ease, my treatment was quick and painless, and is working incredibly well! I wouldn?��t go anywhere else! Thank you Charlotte and VG Medispa!!!!

review_title: cheap laser hair removal in central London!
review_body: I have been here twice for laser hair removal - the salon is clean, the staff are always friendly and welcoming and I started to see results from my first visit! Plus they are super speedy when doing it.

review_title: I am still waiting for a refund since?�?
review_body: I am still waiting for a refund since the 9th March from the Richmond Branch. Very disappointing.
Had my ninth session of laser hair removal at the Manchester branch last Friday, and can't recommend it enough!

review_title: Excellent treatment and good customer service
review_body: Rosie was very professional and the treatment was completed to a high standard. So would highly recommend.

Avoid at all costs!! I have had laser treatment before and purchased a groupon for some top up sessions so I could test the service before purchasing more treatments for 3 other areas. Some of the staff at reception are extremely rude with no customer service skills. I have arrived during my lunch break before and been left waiting while staff just gossip at the counter. I tried to move an appointment because it would be a stretch to get there and the receptionist refused to check when the next appointment was and said I would have to wait two months - treatments only take 5 minutes!. I then arrived 6minutes late and they refused to see me even though I had notified them I may be late, there was someone free to do my treatment as her client had not yet turned up and at least 4 staff behind the counter. The receptionist was unacceptably rude and then offered me appointments sooner than I had been offered on the phone but completely ignored the fact I work in the Wharf so cannot come anytime. They try to hard sell additional treatments in the first session over estimating how treatments you need before actually giving you any and lose interest when you don?��t immediately buy more. They also do a poor job of laser treatment only covering the area once and not always throughly depending on the staff. I have been having laser treatment done elsewhere on 3 other areas on the same machine and the difference in results and customer service is incredible. Don?��t waste your money or time as they do a poor job to make you think you need to buy more! You can definitely get better service and results elsewhere

review_title: Just had my patch test today with Dee?�?
review_body: Just had my patch test today with Dee in Manchester. She was thorough and very professional and yet friendly. Going in tomorrow for my first session and I can?��t wait. The receptionist was warm and very receptive. Read a lot of bad reviews here, might be too soon to judge but I know I won?��t be having any problems or complaints during my treatment. Giving a four star only because it was my first experience and I?��ll like to wait a little longer with treatments to give a follow up review.

review_title: I do not advice VGMedi Spa in Percy Street, London
review_body: I had quite a bad experience at VGmedi spa in Percy Street.

review_title: Definitely the best groupon I've ever had!
review_body: Found them via groupon. I hadn't experienced diathermy treatment for threadvein removal before & didn't know anyone who had to ask them so I took a gamble as the groupon made it inexpensive & it was so worth every penny.

review_title: Laser hair removal. Good service so far with friendly staff.
review_body: Had my first laser hair removal treatment in Manchester, done by Louise. She was very patient and understanding as I was extremely apprehensive at the time. Can't praise her enough. Give her a bonus :)

Richmond Branch - Sobhna is very experienced and shows her professionalism that you trust her so much. I bought pack from Group on for laser and since then OMG  she convince me keep on purchasing more and more of their service. 1. Alma Sopranoice is very nice laser and I had to buy more for myself and convinced my daughter for Cover girl.  2. I have been having Touskani skin peels amazing 3 Bought extra session of clearlift and so far I am very pleased with the results, my skin has never felt so good!
Came for my first session to get my arms done and Kemmi was great. Makes you feel comfortable. Hoping the laser works!
VG Medispa Richmond

Don?��t think my wife and I will ever be using VGMediSpa again. Was sold a package after a groupon deal, without being told about the T&Cs. When asked for a refund as nothing was booked, they simply mentioned, it was non-refundable and it was stated in the T&Cs.

review_title: Don?��t get anything from vgmedispa a?�?
review_body: Don?��t get anything from vgmedispa a year on and still no refund.

review_title: Don't get any service from this company
review_body: Don't get any service from this company!! I paid for a lip filler 2 months ago and No one picked up the phone for 1 month to discuss about the appointment. 2 weeks ago I finally got to talk to someone at VGMedispa and they confirmed I will get a refund- STILL HAVE NOT RECEIVED ANY MONEY BACK ! I am also sending emails and calling with no success.

I had 12 sessions of laser on my face, and at the time it felt a little like they were not doing it properly. I has 3 different ladies do it at different sessions, and they all took a completely different approach. Some were mostly thorough, some barely seemed to cover anything and finished in about 20 seconds. I finished my sessions 3 months ago, and the hair has now come back worse than ever. This was supposed to lessen hair growth and it's done the opposite.

I got the voucher through Groupon as I was booking a session they were trying to hard sell me to pay for six more sessions.  When I politely decline their service went really bad after that. I found them quite rude and patronising and the session was quite bad as well. The laser treatment made no difference  it?��s not due to the technology it?��s how they used it on me.  I would absolutely avoid this place. A possible scam.

review_title: mole removal @ Birmingham branch - excellent service
review_body: I have to say my experience was nothing short of fantastic and this was all due to Pam. She explained the procedure for mole removal to me and arranged my appointment. On the day of the visit she greeted me and explained the procedure again and went through the relevant paperwork. The nurse that was doing the procedure was running a little late and Pam made sure she kept me updated. Overal one of the best customer service experiences I have had. Thanks Pam.

Felt very at ease with Sobhna when doing my laser.  Procedure is over before you know it which is awesome when feeling slightly sensitive.  Lovely lady who makes you feel extremely welcome. I have had laser elsewhere before so know it should work well. Excited to see the end results.

I?��ve been getting laser hair removal with Dee in Manchester for quite a while now :) very happy with the results. Dee is lovely, professional and always makes you feel comfortable. Could not recommend her or VG medispa enough!
I have been having Obaji skin peels at the Richmond branch and a session of clearlift and so far I am very pleased with the results, my skin has never felt so good!

Vgmedispa in bham is awesome. The receptionist pam is always friendly and very accommodating when it comes to booking appointments she gives great offers on laser treatment i am on my 7th session and am satisfied

review_title: I have been having Soprano laser?�?
review_body: I have been having Soprano laser removal on my legs, it's difficult to tell how it's working so far (half way through course of six) but salon is professional and Candice is lovely.

review_title: I've been having laser hair removal at?�?
review_body: I've been having laser hair removal at the Manchester salon with the therapist Dee. She is really great and makes me feel relaxed and comfortable in what could be a pretty awkward situation. Overall really pleased.

Had another session with the lovely Natasha at the Richmond branch, who answered all my questions regarding my treatment and results. Also impressed by how quick being seen is, really looking forward to see the end results. Thank you :)

review_title: Had a great treatment from Sobhna at Richmond upon Thames.
review_body: Had a great treatment from Sobhna at Richmond upon Thames. Sobhna is very informative with a lot of knowledge of all the treatments. Today I had a peel of the first time and it has left my skin looking very good! Thanks Sobhna and the lovely receptionist/Mgr Farharna.

Had my third session with the Soprano Ice laser hair removal and already am noticing results. Dee is brilliant and makes you feel at ease during the procedure.

VGMEDISPA replied to my complaint with this -  'We understand you have been in contact with customer care & the regional manager and your query has been resolved.' This is a complete lie, I have not been in contact with customer care or any manager, they have never bothered to contact me after my complaint. Complete scammers stealing money from so many people then faking their replies that customer issues have been resolved. Absolute joke.
Richmond Branch. Was treated by Sobhna who provided me with a knowledgeable and friendly service. The Sop Ranoice Alma is great!
Richmond branch and Sobhna
I've been into the Richmond branch and Sobhna provided by treatment throughout. She's fantastic at her position and has all the knowledge a client should know.

review_title: Have just started a course of laser?�?
review_body: Have just started a course of laser hair removal at the Manchester clinic with Dee. She's fab - made me feel at ease and is very knowledgable! Can't wait to see the results. Thanks! :)

review_title: Richmond branch and Sobhna - fungal nails
review_body: I've been into the Richmond branch and seen Sobhna and she has been doing wonders (with Alma XL harmony machine) for my toe nail fungus infection. I am on my 10th treatment the fungus has almost gone and I am now not ashamed for people to see my feet. I have a bad back so after the treatment Sobhna kindly put my fresh sock on ?�Ɂ
A great place to have treatments. Everyone is very friendly and professional. Chloe is a fabulous therapist.... I highly recommend this place ?��?
Unprofessional staff at Fitzrovia

review_title: Do not use this company: it took 2 1/2 YEARS(!) to get a refund!!!
review_body: In August 2015 I booked a course of Carboxy a the Birmingham Branch costing �350.  I had one treatment and had to have further treatments within a certain time frame but got a telephone call to say that the machine had been broken in transit, and would hear back when it was fixed.  VG Medispa never telephoned back.  I had to be the one constantly calling and each time I was told they would get in touch and never did.  I was then told the machine had been fixed but now the nurse was off sick!  Again I was told I would be contacted when she retuned and nobody phoned!  I got fed up of contacting them to be fobbed off!  So, I asked for my money back and was told they do not do refunds.  I E-mailed several complaints, and guess what not even a response to those.  After 2 1/2 YEARS of me telephoning, E-mailing, and finally one caring employee from Head Office who actually did her job and REPEATEDLY contacted Customer Care on my behalf I got my refund.  Do not use this company because if something goes wrong they will not respond, or pay!

Just enjoyed another wonderful visit to VGmedispa in Richmond. A warm welcome is always guaranteed & in the professional, expert & highly knowledgeable hands of both Farhana & Sobhna; satisfaction is also guaranteed. Purchasing a package of treatments is not only by far the most economical suggestion but also definitely the way to get the most out treatments.... most importantly, they really do work!!! I can?��t recommend this team highly enough!

review_title: Avoid Birmingham clinic they rush rush !
review_body: I had my 1st laser session in the Birmingham clinic. And was very disappointed. The session was very rushed and i don?��t feel it was done properly . I have used this particular laser machine before in different clinics and know exactly what to expect and this was definitely a fob off session I?��m just upset I have paid for 6 sessions . Would say avoid this place they don?��t do the job properly.
I had my recent laser hair removal session with Natasha in Richmond. She was very professional and welcoming - would recommend!

review_title: I bought an offer on groupon for a ?�?
review_body: I bought an offer on groupon for a glycolic skin peel. It?��s not a glycolic skin peel. Whilst you?��re having your treatment the beautician is trying to sell you other treatments, it?��s a really uncomfortable experience.

I recently visited the Leeds branch to have lip fillers, on the recommendation of a friend. I cannot thank Petra the nurse enough. She made me feel comfortable immediately. She could tell I was nervous, so calmly explained what would happen and continually checked that I was ok. You can tell that she has many years of experience, as her service was flawless. She does what is best for you and what, she knows will look good. She doesn?��t just say what you want to hear. A true professional and lovely lady.

review_title: Been to Richmond spa twice now
review_body: Been to Richmond spa twice now. Natasha has been very helpful, and professional both times. Am pleased with the level of information given, and my treatment. Staff are great, good location.

review_title: VG medispa Leeds. excellent staff. excellent results
review_body: I have had several treatments at Leeds VG medispa and wouldn't go anywhere else. Petra the nurse is exceptionally professional and helpful. I feel the advice is genuine and not given from a sales perspective. all the staff are really friendly. even when I changed my mind about a treatment I was allowed to change without issue.

review_title: I had a great experience with this lady ?�?
review_body: I had a great experience with this lady called Natasha in Richmond. Very attentive and caring. Shout out to her! :)
VGmedi spa has been one of my worse experience of getting a laser hair removal.

review_title: The laser does work however the staff ?�?
review_body: The laser does work however the staff are very pushy and are constantly trying to sell more and more to you which gets annoying. I have also found much cheaper laser places which have way better professional staff.

review_title: Their treatments do not work -AVOID AVOID AVOID
review_body: Their treatments do not work. I have been to the Manchester clinic for laser hair removal and had 4 sessions so far - seen zero results. An appointment for full legs lasts 15 minutes - should be over an hour. I have now started a course in a new place and you can hear the machine reach the hair follicles  with the odd hair even popping out. After that you shed loads of hair when it is growing back. None of this happens at VG Medispa as they purposefully use the wrong settings and heads so you end up buying more treatments... They told me I would need at least 12-15 treatments! At the new place it's 4-6... Please don't waste your money and believe the negative reviews. This place is scamming people out of money and should be closed down!

I go to the Manchester clinic for laser hair across multiple areas.  The therapist I usually see is called Dee, and I love her! She's so professional and a great laugh. Having treatment in certain areas can be embarrassing and being someone who has suffered a lot with confidence troubles due to PCOS hair growth, she really makes me feel comfortable and I'm over the moon with the results so far after only a few sessions with some left to go. Highly recommended.

review_title: Thank you Jade for an excellent customer service
review_body: I have done 11 full-leg laser sessions and despite the ladies being very friendly, each time you can feel they are stressed and running against the clock.I really felt the added value in customer service when Jade treated me yesterday, because she took the time to thoroughly laser each inch of the treated area, as opposed to rushing the full-leg session in 10 minutes as others have done so far. I hope the business will allow more time for future treatments. Jade was the only one who managed to get me to buy additional sessions, by simply just doing a great job.
Natasha is a good beautician & very helpful.

AVOID!!!!. Had my appointment for botox cancelled on the morning of the appointment because the nurse had rang in sick. I decided to have a refund. I'd already paid the month before.  after numerous emails(must be at least 15) no refund and no replies. what an absolute joke of a company. no customer service number and no head office.  they were quick enough to take my �245 when I booked but only the refund department could put it back on my card. nobody seemed to know where the refund department was or who was in charge. 4 months later and ive issued them with a court summons.  by some strange miracle I get a phone call back offering me a free face peel and do I want to rearrange my appointment. NO BLOODY THANK YOU.
Avoid at all costs !!!!! SCAM !!!!!

review_title: Percy Street is a place to avoid
review_body: Percy Street is a place to avoid.  I have been through 8 sessions with them and every single time there was an issue.  I booked the time and date and got the confirmation e-mail or text but upon arrival I got the educating tone of 'no, you did not'.  It not just ridiculous that they can even say a sentence like that but where are we, kindergarten? Of course they were wrong but no apologies.  But that is just one from the 8, at one point I was demanding refund which was refused without any apologies or symphaty.

review_title: Do not recommend, absolutely appalling service.
review_body: Do not recommend. I went to the London Percy Street branch for laser hair removal, the treatment was abysmal. The laser was not used correctly and made no difference to hair growth even after a course, I had to go elsewhere where the laser treatment worked. This is either to do with VGMedispa's poor training/poor lasers/or to make more money by making people believe they need more sessions. They also messed with my appointments countless times. 2 were booked at different times to what I was told, when I arrived on time I was told I was late and that they might not be able to fit me in even though it was their mistake. 2 occasions my appointments were cancelled due to lack of staff. And then when one appointment was rebooked over the phone I travelled all the way and it wasn't booked into their system. Absolutely horrendous customer service. I would never go back.

terrible experience. On arrival they were extremely rude and said I didn't have the appointment I knew I had. WHen I said I knew I had the right date and time, she said "people always say that". Then she discovered I was actually right. But no apology. Whole appointment was very rushed. They obviously forgot my appointment. Treatment did not work. Waste of time and money. Unfriendly. staff.
Richmond VG MEDISPA is excellent, If your getting Bikini Hollywood then definitely go here, ask for Natasha! Very lovely and caring, made things relaxing and made me less anxious!!

Most unprofessional company I've ever been to. Staff have no idea about the treatments. Unhygienic. They gave misinformation so I decided against treatment. But I had already paid. They said I needed to contact customer service to get it back. 2 weeks on. No response from customer service. No reply to emails. No reply to phone messages. Disgusting scam!! By the way, by coincidence, at the weekend we met a guy in a bar who's job it is to get paid by companies to write fake reviews. This was one of them!!! ALL GOOD REVIEWS THEY HAVE ARE FAKE!

review_title: AVOID AVOID! Refusing refund. Unqualified staff
review_body: Had an initial call back re my treatment. So I was told I needed to pay before I got even a consultation. I took time off work and paid to get to the place. Then when I got there, they are very rushed. Seemed unprofessional As a test, I filled out a form and faked my signature. As we walked to the treatment room I told the girl taking me there I didn't like putting my personal details and that they were fake including my signature. She said that's fine it didn't matter. Then the first thing I said was I had my last treatment 2 months ago. She immediately said they couldn't treat me if I had been elsewhere in the past. I have taken time off work and PAID IN ADVANCE, and paid for my travel. This question would have taken 20 seconds on the phone when I spoke to them, and saved me hours of my time and money, Then had the cheek to tell me I had to contact their support center to get my money back. Yet they took it in seconds on the phone. Very unfriendly when they found out I would be getting a refund. AVOID!
Tonya was very friendly and professional which put me at ease. Third time getting lip fillers with VGMedispa and she did an amazing job, and was very helpful with aftercare. Will be returning!

review_title: Nisha was very nice and professional!
review_body: Nisha was very nice and professional.
I had soprano ice treatment from Natasha and she was great; thorough in her treatment and good conversation with her!

Therapist Dee is absolutely fantastic, I've been to VGMedispa a couple of times over the last year and she has never been anything but professional! She's always friendly, makes you feel and is a real credit to your company.

review_title: Therapist Dee is very friendly and ?�?
review_body: Therapist Dee is very friendly and makes you feel comfortable during the procedure! Overall the salon has good environment and helpful staff!

I've had 3 sessions of Soprano Ice Laser Hair Removal and it's amazing!  It's quick and easy and not painful and I am already noticing good results.  Sobhna is a great therapist, really helpful and friendly.

I bought a groupon voucher for �50ish.

I?��ve been into the clinic on Percy Street four times already and I?��m very happy with the hair removal treatment. All the staff are friendly and helpful but Jess is amazing. She?��s very professional, strict and follow the progress of the treatment from day one!

review_title: I cannot recommend VG Medispa enough
review_body: I cannot recommend VG Medispa enough. The best clinic in Leeds. The staff are amazing, so friendly and helpful. Fiona and her team make every single visit an absolute pleasure. I was treated by Tonya yesterday and she was just incredible! The results are outstanding. You have to see her! First class therapist ?�Ԫ
The service in VGMedispa in Leeds has been amazingly professional and friendly, and foremost very effective. Fiona and Georgina are amazing! Thank you ladies. Will definitely be back.
I was seen by  Candice, who was very friendly, she explained all she was doing every step of the way. I would recommend her and the team she work with.

I absolutely love this place! All of the staff are friendly and helpful, and highly professional. The atmosphere is calm, welcoming and comfortable, and even though the treatment I?��m having could be construed as embarrassing or awkward, I have never once felt that it is. The therapist I have seen most is Dee, and I?��ll be forever grateful for the excellent deal she put together for my laser hair removal treatments. Dee is efficient and really good at making the time fly by! I can?��t recommend this place enough!

review_title: I've been to the clinic three times for ?�?
review_body: I've been to the clinic three times for laser hair removal. They are professional and friendly. Caroline is particularly lovely and puts you at ease, which isn't easy when she is lasering your bikini line!

I can honestly say that the Reading Branch has got the highest level of customer service I have ever recieved from anywhere. I have been going there for nearly a year now and I have laser hair removal in two areas, everytime I have been there which ever lady I have my appointment with is an absolute delight.
