Caroline, Jessy and Jade are an absolute credit to the company and I would not only recommend laser hair removal but I would definitley recommend giving one of these three women a visit due to their professionalism and care for you. The lady at reception is always very friendly and is very informative of the latest offers and news.
Had laser tattoo removal from the lovely Jess,made to feel very relaxed and my treatment went very well,highly recommended.
This place is a scam!

review_title: I have given them a 5 star rating only because of..
review_body: I have given VG Medispa a 5 star review based on my dealings with Karen from Customer Services and Farhana the laser treatment therapist. They are both very helpful and pleasant to deal with.

I had my 11th hair removal treatment at Vgmedispa Manchester today, I've never had a bad experience there all the girls are really friendly and make you feel welcome, the all have a good knowledge of the treatments and if there is anything they don't know they to out of their way to find the answer for you.

From the very start, from having my patch test to my very first treatment, the staff were very friendly and informative. Dee, the therapist was very nice. Everything was explained to me throughly.  From shaving the day before to what I need to do after my first treatment. I am so glad to finally find someone who knows what they are really doing, very professional and I would recommend to friends and family, as I was recommended by my daughter.
VGMedispa Manchester is clean, friendly, professional and affordable.

review_title: First of all i notice the majority of ?�?
review_body: First of all i notice the majority of comments VG Medispa are replying to on here are positive.

review_title: I've just been for my first full ?�?
review_body: I've just been for my first full treatment after a patch test on Friday.  Both times I saw Dee who I have to say is very professional, knows her stuff and is a very friendly, lovely lady who makes you feel relaxed and at ease.  Looking forward to hair free legs

review_title: I would honestly not reccomend the ?�?
review_body: I would honestly not reccomend the Birmingham branch. Staff are stuck up. It's always dead, and when you call they don't answer and claim they were busy. They moved site and did not inform me by letter or phonecall. I went to my appointment and it was all closed up. Really bad customer service. I booked alot of treatments with them and regret it so bad. Do not go to the Birmingham branch.

I have been going for treatment for over a year at the Bristol centre and it has been great! I'm very happy with the results so far, the new facilities are nice and always clean. The best part however throughout the treatment has been the staff! Both Steph and Rosie have been incredibly helpful, patient, professional, and have always been willing to help! Always look forward to going to my sessions! Overall I would highly recommend this clinic!

review_title: VG Medispa Manchester - Brilliant Customer Service.
review_body: I've been attending the Manchester clinic for laser hair removal for some months now, and I can't praise the staff enough. The treatment is a 'process' not a quick fix, so people need to have realistic expectations. The treatments are really working and most of my sessions have been done by Dee who is very professional, caring and makes you feel at ease. Thank you Dee for your good work. Looking forward to my next visit. Christine.

Worst customer service ever. Everything about this place is bad. Went for laser hair removal at Birmingham clinic, they use the suprano ice laser which they describe as the best. Absolutely shocking, no difference after 12 treatments. Apart from wasting your money the staff are TERRIBLE!!!! They are rude, talk about other staff infront of you, and talk about other clients infront of you aswell. The location is terrible, it?��s not a clinic, it?��s a run down building in digbeth , surrounded by pubs and sex shops. The place also has no sign outside, and is called a hairdressers. There?��s no disabled facilities and the reception is grotty, there were rat traps! Seriously! And the lady joked about it. I thought ok maybe it?��s a one time thing. I went to the room when I was collected and the treatment rooms are disgusting and dirty. The staff change constantly!!!!! Never the same person. The only reason I HAD to haven?��t treatments is because they DONT give refunds! At all! When I was given a ?��head office?�� number and address it didn?��t exist!!! It?��s shocking honestly. I also asked a therapist there why the staff changed all the time and she told me they?��d just got rid of a girl because she was sick for 1 day! So apart from them treating clients terribly they also treat there staff badly! Please don?��t use this company! Time wasters, awful! Don?��t get sucked into there groupon deals! Don?��t go here!!!!
Iv been a loyal and regular customer at VGMedispa,

review_title: Awful laser treatment at VGMedispa Percy Street London spa
review_body: I used Percy Street London spa. I purchased 6 sessions for full arms, full legs, full bikini, eye brows. For all of those areas, they spent less than 20 minutes every session to treat you, so do not expect good quality service. They did not give full sessions (I still have 3 but they claimed I used all of that). They forced me to let them take pictures of my bikini area "for insurance purpose" when I refused (at the end they still did)?! Always advertising that they have 80% discount packages to make you buy. Avoid as much as you can! At the end of the package, there are still a lot of hairs growing back darker and thicker.

review_title: Really didn't make my booking experience pleasant to the point that I just didnt use them even though i had paid for a treatment
review_body: Really didn't make my booking experience pleasant at all... Had a Groupon voucher and I know most places don't really like them, but really don't use Groupon for marketing if you are going to make your customers feel bad! In the end I never even used the voucher as they made it so difficult and I won't be using this company for anything in the future.

My treatment was supposed to include my dթcolletage yet, despite me advising her of this, she stopped at my neck. I was also surprised at the lack of attention within the session. This treatment retails at �690 yet consisted only of being treated with the machine for 30 minutes. My face wasn?��t cleansed before the treatment; I was handed shine paper towels to wipe my face afterwards and given a tiny amount of moisturiser on a cotton pad to replenish my face. For a treatment of this value I was very surprised that my face wasn?��t cleansed and moisturised or that I wasn?��t offered some day make up before I left. The salon was so sparsely furnished it had all the feel of a pop-up shop rather than a high end treatment salon. I?��d travelled from Somerset to Richmond, 3 hours drive, to access my treatment yet there was no drink offered. My �30 nail technician offers coffee, hand massage and comfortable surroundings yet you couldn?��t run to this with a �690 treatment. Very poor!

I purchased a Groupon package for VGmedispa and I have loved the results. Sing e that initial package, I have purchased 2 further packages. Not only have the results been amazing but the service I have received from staff had been superb. I would definitely recommend them to a friend!
Dee effectively manages her communication at all level. Great customer care and effectively enforces company values and policies without evoking negative reaction. Always professional and respectful.

review_title: I am close to finishing 12 sessions of ?�?

Steph, Rosie and Borysia have very thorough and professional during all my treatments. They listened to the concerns that I had and put my mind at ease. You can tell they enjoy what they do and I always look forward to my visits to the salon. I definitely recommend taking advantage of the Groupon offers and wouldn?��t hesitate to come back for further treatments

Rosie is an amazing laser hair removal beautician, she reduces pain to minimum with her professionalism and care. She also makes you feel comfortable with her friendly and kind manner and you can relax despite of the nature of the treatment.

review_title: The Laser does work, actually really well
review_body: I used a groupon voucher for 6 sessions of Laser hair removal on the face/large area for �69. The results were lovely. To counter some of the bad reviews on here that seem to state that the laser hair removal doesn't work, take this from a current theoretical physics student who has extensively studied and even built simulations for lasers. Those who are complaining about a lack of it working are all girls who have very fine pale hair. Lasers have difficulty in working on this because it needs to get absorbed by the hair, which is a lot lot easier if your skin is pale and your hair if dark. This is because the darker colours absorb the light more and so by having a contrast it makes it easier as it acts like a 'target'.
The girls (especially Dee) are exceptionally well trained and work with you to achieve the results you desire.  Would recommended to anyone and have already recommended to friends!!

review_title: Great service at the Manchester clinic
review_body: Great service at the Manchester clinic, Dee puts you at ease and I am pleased with the results.Good range of treatments too.

review_title: Richmond Branch Manager, Paula, Should Be Sacked

Had Tania from the booking office not called me and completely changed my mind about this company in a positive way, i would be telling people to avoid VG Medispa completely. But thanks to Tania who treated me like a customer, as opposed to a worthless nobody, my faith in this company was restored and I'm carrying on with treatments in a different branch. Never go to the Richmond branch, its manager Paula has no managerial skills let alone any knowledge of customer service. She will not listen to you nor understand your complaints.  She repeats a few lines she was taught to say and can't resolve an issue. She should be sacked and glad to see others have complained about her.

I overheard them laughing about the 'weight' of a prev client and giggling 'she can spend what ever she likes she will still be fat and ugly' haha - I couldn't believe my ears. Ove paid for a course but will never visit again. It has made me feel very self conscious.

Some of the labia and the outer/ inner peri-anal area. This was not clear at all when I booked and traditionally a Brazilian bikini is everything off except a strip of hair. It also isn't in the small print anywhere. I do believe this might have been intentional to try and sell me more treatments. However the areas that have been treated are almost hair free now! I just wish it was the entire area not just specific patches. I will try again and ask them for the next sessions but will probably end up purchasing more from another company to fix this. Not sure if it's a mis communication between staff or just a terrible scam from the company to mislead customers

review_title: Lost a lot of money in useless laser hair removal
review_body: They are smiley before you buy, after they sell became rude and confrontational. Especially when you tell them that their treatments don't work and you want a refund, laser hair removal is an absolute con. They rub a thick gel on you and use the laser in an intensity you can't feel anything because must be the lowest! no one assesses my type of hair or skin and all the time trying to sell and sell while I was getting the laser done. Very annoying and rude. 6 sessions later my hair still the same and spent a lot of money in this absolutely useless treatment. I hope Truspilot realises that Vgmedispa report all the bad reviews I have just lost a lot of money and don't want this to happen to anyone else!

review_title: If no stars were posible I would give that !
review_body: If no stars were posible I would give that! At my patch test I was talked into an extra treatment by an extremely pushy lady who assured me reactions never occur . I have since had one treatment and had a horrible reaction leaving me on antibiotics and with possible permenant scaring! After being told to send pictures which i did i was reassured i would get a refund and would be called in the next 2 days with an update . A week later having heard nothing I called again and spoke to the area manager who was insulting and told me I needed to send more pictures and that treatments are non refundable!!! Utterly disgused I am clearly not medically suitable for this and have 5 treatments left to use. I wouldnt use them under any circustances after this and it would be irresponsible of them to offer further treatment. Absolutely disgusted . Please use a more professional company for your own wellbeing!

review_title: Can i give a minus one star? ?�?

Not only did she cancel my appointment to which i was running only 10 mins late to, but her rude attitude and lack of professionalism has made me reluctant to even redeem my remaining 5 sessions which i booked with Groupon. Also when i called back to reschedule my appointment yesterday (15/07/2017) this dreadful women then had the nerve to LIE to me and tell me that they and ALL of their other branches did not have any appointments until the middle of JULY 2017 as she 'could see it on her system' and that i would need to pay �50 cancellation fee 'before 6pm or i would lose a session' (never has a manager of a company ever given me an ultimatum), even after i told her i could only make payment in cash when i have my next session (she even had the nerve to send me a threatening voicemail saying this). I then rang up the Fitzrovia branch, who told me they would be happy to see me today (16/06/2017). So clearly the Manager of the Richmond branch Paula was LYING!!! I have now reported the matter to Groupon, from which i have booked many different services including laser at other clinics and never faced any problem but i will NEVER EVER use VG's services again and i hope you won't either!!!!

review_title: Natasha at Poole VGMedispa is tip-top!
review_body: Natasha at Poole VGMedispa is tip-top!

Had six laser treatments at vg medispa  but already after two treatments did I realise they weren't doing the treatment properly. I've had the same treatment somewhere else where they really took their time and results were much better.

I had my first Derma Roller treatment today with Natasha at the Poole branch of Vgmedispa and even though it was my first session I wanted to leave a review of my experience. I have previously had laser treatment at the salon with both Amee and Natasha and they were both professional and made me feel so comfortable, this treatment was the same. Natasha was brilliant, I was abit scared but her manner put me at ease, she also took great care to check on any areas I found more sensitive and adjusted the treatment accordingly. Looking forward to more treatments, this team should be commended, everyone including the receptionist create a welcoming and friendly enviroment to have your treatment in.

review_title: Never ever use VGMEDISPA in Percy ?�?
review_body: Never ever use VGMEDISPA in Percy street london. I purchased 1.5k worth of treatments and after the first treatment was so appalled by the Alma laser/radio frequency treatments (3 areas treated in under 25 mins; no massaging of area to increase lymph drainage as the case with ANY sculpting technique, held device on leg until it burnt me while girl gossip ed about how much she hated the salon) i asked for a refund. Was told this isnt possible but surely as I've not received the advertised service (45mins) or in line with my consumer rights I should have a refund requesting within 14 days from purchase.   None of the trained staff could tell me how often I should receive these treatments (was told every 6 weeks then every 2 weeks then 4 weeks ... or whether it was a laser or rf machine!!! I've had many of these treatments over the years and this is by far the biggest con ever. Kept being told I needed to buy at least 6 or more sessions to see any difference.  At approx 500 per session as a reduced rate you can get a LOT more value for money in any other salon. Don't be fooled like I was. Btw the reduced rate means you get no refund even if you request it 30 mins after buying it according to vgmedispa.
Outstanding service. Great treatment and excellent care by all the girls. Dee went out of her way to make my day.
Natasha in Poole is FANTASTIC. I have been going to VG for 2 years now and am always impressed by the standard of service and attention to detail that I am met with.
Dee in Manchester is great for my tattoo removal. No complaints other than to myself who shouldn't have had the tattoo in the first place! Looking forward to it disappearing in full.

review_title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME AND MONEY!!
review_body: DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME AND MONEY!!! Stay away from this VGMEDISPA RIchmond!! I'm very annoyed I purchased a Groupon for 6 sessions and on my 5th the receptionist (she told me she's the manager but never presented a business card or name and none manager skills) refused to give me the session and after I get very angry and i Told her that i will complain everywhere she told me that she doesn't care and asked me to leave the clinic. Rude!! she also refused to reschedule my appointment. I would not recommend. I also agree with the other reviews on the missing costumer service number as I wanted to complain about their Services in this clinic. I had appointments cancelled due to sickness very last minute and the technician keeps asking about additional treatments and additional sessions every single time you go there. Very poor service just want to sell more treatment and make money out of you they don't value their customers at all.

After doing a lot of research and calling up a number of clinics I decided to go ahead with Vgmedi spa.. not only was the customer service outstanding from day one but even the service was by far the best ever! Ayesha the manger at the Manchester branch is absolutely fantastic and just so lovely and friendly and Zainab does my treatments and she feels more of a friend than just a lady doing my lazer hair removal! As I am having my full body done I am quite exposed but she makes me feel super comfortable and since I can't take pain at all (even though I've had 3 baby's) Zainab is so patient with me and helps.. I deffinetly feel she wants my hair to be gone as she does the settings high and to suit my body so I get an overall better end result.. she shows that she cares about what she is doing and about her clients Aswell and she loves having a good laugh with you too! Overall I am extremely happy with this clinic I couldn't recommend it enough and once I have finished me laser sessions I will be getting more things done from here and also have a number of family and friends wanting to also start laser here too! Well done Manchester spa I would highly recommend to absolutely  everybody!!!!!!

I have visited many salons in my life and none have even come close to just how awful this Fitzrovia branch is. I can NEVER get through to anyone on the phone. When I have been there the phone rings and the girls (at least 4) stand behind the desk chatting as it rings. When I was 2 minutes late I was told that they couldn't see me for another 2 months. However they have cancelled my appointment twice due to staff sickness and not been able to rebook me in for about 2 months later despite it being their fault! This is a disaster and the girls and rude and not very bright. I will tell all my friends in the W1 area to stay FAR away from this salon!

I. Bought laser hair removal for an extra large area from Groupon which is supposed to cover the whole back, when I went there, the lady(sobhana) said she will only do half of my back because I am a big person!!! When I complained she just chucked me out of the salon and wouldn't refund my money!!!  Been calling the salon to discuss it with someone but no one picking the phone up!!!! I CANT believe this

So happy with the treatment! I've had 4 sessions so far with Rosie and I've had amazing results! It's deff worth the pain lol. I was introduced because my mum bought me a groupon voucher for my birthday for 1/2 legs and after my consultation I then paid extra for full body. Even though I'm quite exposed during the treatment, Rosie made me feel very comfortable and not self conscious at all. It's been great chatting to her and getting to know her as well, which is a bonus! My under arm and bikini line hardly grow back at all now and I don't get any ingrown hairs or cysts anymore!

review_title: Very happy with the laser treatment ?�?

review_title: I have been doing a laser treatment ?�?
review_body: I have been doing a laser treatment with Dee at the Manchester branch and I am happy with the results. Dee has a lot of experience in laser treatments and she makes me feel comfortable. I am doing my bikini line and perianal but I will probably do my legs when I finish.

review_title: I've been having laser treatment with ?�?
review_body: I've been having laser treatment with Rosie for a few months now and every time she makes it such a nice experience. The clinics a professional environment and all the other staff are lovely I'm very keen to add more areas now. And would highly recommend

review_title: Recently had my first laser session ?�?
review_body: Recently had my first laser session with Rosie. And can honestly say she made the whole thing very pleasant. She was professional, friendly and very honest. Will highly recommend.
Very professional staff, i had a warm welcome in Poole by Natasha who performed the derma rolla, she was very caring and friendly, I couldn't have wished for a better place to have my treatment done.

review_title: The worst clinic I have ever been!!
review_body: The worst clinic I have ever been!!! Unprofessional and rude rude staff. My laser appointments are being cancelled with option to re-book after 6 weeks... Moreover I have had three sessions so far but have not seen any decrease in hair growth.. Recommendation - stay away and don't waste your time and money.
Had a great experience with Borysia at the Bristol clinic. Felt very at ease and the whole process was very efficient. Would recommend  treatment there.

I purchased a �49 offer via Groupon for 6 laser treatments and then spent �200 as a result of VG upselling to me. I was medically unsuitable and whilst Groupon refunded me within a week I am still waiting for my refund from VGM despite receiving an acknowledgement from them that it would be processed asap. I've emailed 2x to chase the refund and called daily with no reply...

I initially purchased a 6 medium area deal on groupon for �69 but even after my first session I was keen to add on more and I'm now doing three areas!! Every time I go the girls are always super lovely and I've been having treatments with Rosie who always makes me feel comfortable, even if I am a bit of a baby and do find it rather painful at times she always gives me a moment or adjusts the settings and talks me through it - also the results have been really great so far I'm on my 3rd full Hollywood, 2nd half leg and 1st underarm (I think that'll be all the additional areas from now though!!) there are some bad reviews for other locations which is a shame but I would recommend Bristol :)

review_title: I have been receiving laser treatments ?�?
review_body: I have been receiving laser treatments over the last year at VG Medispa Bristol with Rosie. Treatment has been amazing and Rosie makes me feel very comfortable. The staff are really friendly. I'd highly recommend especially Rosie.

I have been receiving laser treatments at the Leeds VGMedispa for a while now, and it has always been a lovely experience. Cassie makes me feel very comfortable and we always have a nice chat whilst she does my treatment. Having laser can be a daunting experience but I have not once felt judged or embarrassed with Cassie which is fantastic. The results have been very good and noticeable which is obviously a plus, too! Thank you for making my first laser treatment experience so easy and I would definitely recommend Cassie to anybody considering it.
I would definitely recommend this company to my friends. The staff is great and always eager to help and provide the best service. Natasha is one of the best experts in beauty I've ever met.

review_title: I have been having laser hair removal ?�?
review_body: I have been having laser hair removal treatment at the Bristol branch since the end of last year and have been treated incredibly well on each visit.  The staff are friendly, professional and efficient and I would highly recommend the salon.

review_title: I went for my 2nd tattoo laser removal ?�?
review_body: I went for my 2nd tattoo laser removal appointment today and was seen be the lovely Natasha. She made me feel extremely relaxed and was so professional and reassuring throughout the whole procedure. Definite recommend from me.
Poor experience.

review_title: Service with a smile - Tottenham Court
review_body: Honestly, I can not fault this clinic. The staff are friendly as you are received very warmly by the reception staff. The place is clean and the procedures are professional. I normally see Paige and she is exceptional. I would recommend this place to my friends.

review_title: I have been treated by Cassie in the ?�?
review_body: I have been treated by Cassie in the Leeds branch for over 2 years now. Absolutely amazing treatment and service with incredible prices - never fails to disappoint. Will be staying with VGMediSpa for some time!

I bought 6 sporano laser sessions with VGmedispa because they say I can have my first session in April. They book my patch test on the 11th and my first session on the 13th. Both has been cancel and they don't give me any other sessions until the end of may, when will be too late to have a treatment before Summer.

review_title: Very positive feedback for the Poole ?�?
review_body: Very positive feedback for the Poole salon.

I have been to VgMedispa in Poole a few times and I have been very impressed with the excellent customer service provided. Natasha from the Poole branch is very friendly and helpful. I would recommend the Poole branch to anyone looking for treatments at a decent price and good customer service.
Absolutely awful customer service, unhelpful and rude staff. No consistency and so unreasonable and unfair.
Extremely poor experience !!!!

review_title: Leeds- Excellent staff and great clinic overall
review_body: I have been going to the Leeds clinic for some time now for laser hair removal. I am always greeted by a very warm and friendly receptionist. The therapists do take their time in giving you advice and asking you about the progress. The session is normally quick for me as it is only a small area but the results are showing. I attended for a session once and had unknowingly used a product a few days ago which may have increased my chances of skin damage. The therapist kindly explained the risks and rebooked the appointment for me. A lovely clinic overall that I have recommended to friends and family.

I have been coming for laser hair removal for over a year now on various parts of my body. Farrah based in leeds is amazing! Very personable and I feel completely at ease with her and most importantly I have amazing results and my confidence has increased massively! Thank you!!

review_title: Tottenham Court Road Salon - Absolute Shambles
review_body: Honestly, this company runs off such a culture of groupon vouchers, that it's all about people coming in as quick as possible and leaving as quick as possible because they have such a tight back to back schedule. God forbid if you're running a few minutes late!

I had a Glycolic peel treatment performed in the Poole clinic by Aimee. It was my first one so was a little nervous of what it would be like but it was amazing! Aimee went through the processes and what i was to expect as well as giving me great insight and knowledge into my skin and what other treatment would benefit my skin more! She was enthusiastic, bubbly and professional and I would definitely recommend the poole clinic, the therapist Aimee and the Glycolic Face Peel as my skin feels like a babys bottom and is glowing and has helped massively with my post acne pigmentation spots and blemishes ! Thank You!
I have been attending VG Medispa since June 2016 over all I have had a fantastic experience.

review_title: Horrendous experience with shockingly poor customer service
review_body: Not only do I have scars left from badly performed procedures, however the customer service follow up has been negligible at best.  Then the company wished to charge me to rectify the problem that they created!  They do not respond to emails and to be honest, I WOULD NEVER RECOMMEND THEM!

I was booked for mole removal on feb 13 2017 but 2 days before my schedule i got a call that it was canceled as the doctor who is suppose to do my treatment has a family emergency. I was then rescheduled for march 7 2017 at 10am . As i didnt hear anything from the clinic i decided to call them to confirm only to be told that im not even on the list. Seriously annoying. Im again scheduled on the 20th and  so  the waiting game starts again.
One star is very big for them if their 0 option i go for that. I bought voucher from Groupon that is my mistake without reading review

Being New to the world of hair removal I wanted to know all the details and what was included in the price I was paying.As I was asking more questions the rude unprofessional person on the other ended of the phone was getting flustrated and the whole conversation felt rushed and like she just wanted to get to the point of telling me the price- clearly money means more than service.I deal with clients everyday myself and would never dream of letting my customer service slip so low to the point where when I told her she was unprofessional and asked if it was a registered company as her telephone manor and poor customer service skills tells me different, she then said well that's fine you can't be a client here bye and hung up. After this conversation I was so shocked eespically after I was recommended them. First appearance is always key as it paints the picture on any buisness, from this experience i will defiantly not be recommending anyone to go there - this was Birmingham city centre branch, diabolical!!

review_title: unacceptable level of customer service - so disappointed
review_body: I purchased a groupon voucher for the alma laser anti cellulite treatments back in the summer last year.  They were unable to offer me the initial appointment until October which I took just to have an email the day before to say the machine was not working and the appointment had to be cancelled.  No phone call to apologise or to explain how long it would be before they could re-book.  Then no call to even re-book me!  I ended up calling after not hearing anything for 1 month.   Again they couldn't fit me for another 2 months as I  needed an evening appointment.   Not happy by now but at least I had an appointment.   But again on the day before that was cancelled - same story and again no phone calls.   So again I wait to hear from them - never do so I call myself and same problem with giving me an appointment...... guess what that was cancelled on the day of the appointment!
Excellent treatment by the lovely therapist Sobhna. I am getting lader hair removal and i am very happy with the service. Nice clean place and friendly staff! Would definitely recommend!
Very good treatments by lovely therapist Sobhna at the Richmond Salon.

Booked a front shoulder mole removal via Groupon but it only covered a 3mm so as mine was bigger I had to pay a good deal more in advance [self measured] although still reasonably competitive. Once I had got through the hassle of trying to get an appointment in Manchester [voice mail/no return calls etc] I have to say that the experience on the day went without a hitch.  Arrived early and was  treated early by a very professional and friendly nurse, Petra, who had come over from the Leeds branch. Very informative and no pressure selling at all.  The whole process took less than 20mins and was completely painless. so job well done as far as I am concerned.
I simply cannot wait until my treatments are finished and I no longer have to visit the branch.

review_title: Great team, never late, never had to complain. Professional staff who is always able to find appointment. Reminder text messages send before, so easy to track the number of appointments!
review_body: Great experience- I had laser hair removal, carbon peel and acid peel. Never late, always getting a free facial too. Great venue.
Visited the Bristol clinic today for mole removal, it was very clean and the staff were welcoming and friendly.

Birmingham VGMedispa - My experience with laser in the past has been very painful, so I was sceptical at first.  I was very pleasantly surprised at how pain free the lasers are at VGMedispa and at how effective the treatment was.  I have booked further sessions!  The staff are pleasant and friendly, in particular, the manager Karen, who is extremely professional and polite.  Sarah, at reception, is efficient and courteous.  I would highly recommend the Birmingham Branch!!!

review_title: Aggressive sales technique, repeated lies and no customer service
review_body: Myself and another purchased Groupon vouchers each for 6 sessions of laser hair removal. After the skin patch test at Poole was finished we were informed that VGmedispa were running a promotion whereby you received 15% off a course of treatment if paid for on the same day as the skin patch test.  Both of us were hesitant as we wanted to see the results from the other areas before committing to spending hundreds more pounds.  The manager was so keen to sell us a package she even pulled her jeans down to show us her bikini line stating that she had completed 6 sessions and she was hair free with no need to shave.  We asked how long the results would last and were informed we would need top up maintenance sessions costing approximately �100 every 12 months to prevent new hair growth.  We were both persuaded into the purchase on the basis 6 sessions would be sufficient enough to cease any other form of hair removal as recommended by staff and as per the online leaflet ?��Procedure Information Laser Hair Removal?�� which we had both read prior to purchasing the vouchers.

I've been coming to the Percy St salon for laser hair removal for over a year now and the team there (in particular Kirsty and Hanna) are just fantastic - Kirsty is knowledgeable, personable and always makes you feel really at ease, plus the results are excellent - thank you all!

review_title: They won't return my calls, emails or refund me!g
review_body: Their customer service is horrendous and I've been left with no choice but to report them to Trading Standards, I have received no response to my emails , any contact from their customer care department or even a return call from the manger at the Percy Street store. I have requeated a redund in October 2016 and they have over �900 of my money which they haven't refunded although I was advised by the beautican the treatment was not suitable for me and will cause further scarring.
I have just read the bad review and can not believe it!

I have been treated extremely unfairly and am very disgusted at the way I have been misled by this company!! As a means of rectifying the initial poor customer service I had received, VGMedispa promised me a free laser hair removal session plus a free glycolic skin peel to make amends to the situation at the Richmond branch. When the time arrived for me to arrange a glycolic skin peel I was rudely rejected by their staff!!  How is this trying to rectify the situation? I mean why offer me something and promise something if you cannot fulfil your promise? I am utterly disgusted by this company and would suggest anyone to stay well away and for groupon to stop doing business with this company!! Absolute time wasters and money grabbing business!!

Upsetting experience, with absolutely no senior staff of any kind willing to take responsibility for this. One manager actually witnessed the terrible way in which I was spoken to by a Fitzrovia staff member and chose to 'not comment'. She was the store manager. No head office to contact, with no contact telephone number, only an address to write a letter to. I never received a reply to my letter Appointment calls are answered by a call centre in an international location where they constantly tell you of 'rolling diaries' and 'fully booked' though when you visit in person to a local shop it's incorrect information. Laser hair removal treatment (6 courses) completely ineffective in all areas. Resent having paid them a penny.

review_title: Wish I had looked st the bad reviews before I booked!
review_body: Booked in for lip filler at vgs media Bristol, with a wowcher offer, she examined my lips and talked about where she would put the filler,as a  first timer I trusted this, after it was done the top left side was instantly bigger than the other she said it was just the swelling, I rang the next day as it looked worse, the receptionist asked me to wait 2 weeks to have it checked so swelling would have gone down. After 2 weeks I still had one side on the top bigger, people were pointing it out so I took time off work. I went to see the nurse, she said agreed it was slightly bigger on one side but told me she wasn't going to open another vile to correct it, she said go and buy some lip plumping gloss and put it on that side until it wears out in a few weeks, and then you can come back and pay the full price of �125 to have it done again! I walked out very unhappy with my once nice lips that now looked terrible, if she had of corrected it I would have been happy and probably would have went back again. Most of the filler has worn off now but it has put me off for life.

review_title: I can't beleive the bad reviews!
review_body: Had my first session the otherday at the birmingham branch and arrived 15 minutes late, still they managed to do my back and shoulders straight away.

I bought a voucher for 3 sessions of ALMA Laser in Richmond. the treatment hasn't shown any results but the most annoying experience was the actual service at the clinic. Very friendly ladies but over selling like crazy so they could get another �650 off me before I would apparently see any results and quite offensive the way they go about this. then I needed to reschedule an appointment and couldn't get through to their helpline after calling repeatedly for 24hrs, so I emailed them only to be told they have a 48hr cancellation policy and would charge me �50! Absolutely unacceptable
Mine was just an over-the-phone experience:

the service is shockingly awful. The manager at the Birmingham clinic is so arrogant and doesn't even care about providing good customer service or any level of customer satisfaction. I have paid �430 for my laser treatment and after just 1 treatment I feel awful because they have treated my complaint with complete disregard. After a month I keep getting told the manager will call me to resolve but I have received no call to date. They just don't care. I don't know what to do to get my money back or at the very least get this matter sorted. I have never experienced just bad service.

review_title: Unprofessional, rude, non-responsive, misleading sales techniques?�?!! Issue after issue!!! Don?��t waste your time or hard earnt money!
review_body: I bought 3 packages for myself, sister and mum early Nov 2016 for selected areas.

review_title: Not Happy, poor service want my money back
review_body: I am unhappy with the service i have received at the Birmingham branch every time i go in i am pressured into buying a new package they make you really uncomfortable as they just want your money. The lady at the reception is very rude and they lie about the appointments availability. I want somebody from the head office to get in touch with me so that i can discuss the matter in detail as i am not comfortable speaking to anybody at the branch.

I initially bought 6 sessions of laser hair removal on Groupon, and went on to buy 6 more for another body area after I saw the results. The Groupon made it excellent value for money, and the staff always tell you about the latest offers they have in 'store'.

I bought a Groupon deal for tattoo removal way back in spring 2016, after trying to get an appointment for the patch test in Richmond, Surrey, for a considerable amount of time, it was eventually booked for sometime in June. And guess what, yep it was cancelled not once but on two occasions. This was apparently due to the Richmond Office not being ready. Eventually I managed to get an appointment, which was not cancelled and had the patch test done. A further appointment was made for two weeks and if everything was good with the patch test, the laser removal would start.  This appointment was cancelled and it is now 6 months down the line and I've had no contact with the Richmond Branch to re-book. I have written, telephoned and I have been promised that this will get looked into, but I have had nothing back from their head office.  I think it is absolutely disgraceful the way this company is trading.  I expect they know that it would not be worth the aggravation of taking this to the small courts, as not only the cost involved in taking this route is quite costly, but also the time and effort for a deal which was for �69.
Stop! Don't do it! Manchester Branch.

review_title: Absolutely ridiculous customer service and rude staff
review_body: Originally I was using them I had 6 sessions and I was on my last one was a deal I found on Groupon and every day I went I was pressured into buying more sessions so I ended up buying another package for a further 6 sessions.

On going to the Reading branch to have my lips enhanced I spoke to the nurse about having sine more treatment and paid �375 for a treatment later that year after two weeks I noticed my lips were not even , one side much larger than the other, I went back and was told to  send photos , I did this and  nothing was done I went in again and this time they said the nurse was in and could do it today , went ahead and had more filler, on going to reception after I was charged � 90 to correct my lips, I was so taken back I paid... after another two weeks my lips were no better in fact they were worse, went back to the shop but got nowhere, just write to head office I was told , I have been to a clinic in London and have had to endure two weeks of hard massage ( so painful) to try and correct my lips , I then decided I did not want any more treatments with this company and cancelled my appointment and asked for my �375 back, as there was no way I was going through any more treatments , was told I would have to go though head office, up to date I have sent  3 emails with photos and have not  had one  reply from them , Ben back to the shop ... so very unhelpful , won't give me a phone number or name at head office that I can contact, what the hell is going on ... you have �475 belonging to me and I can't get anyone to reply to my emails let alone give me my money back , it's not as if I asking for my money back for the bad treatment I have had just for the treatment I have not had

review_title: Awful!!! Laser has damaged my skin permanently and staff are rude!
review_body: I have been for multiple sessions and at each one I have experienced extremely rude staff. After insisting on an evening session I was made to book a lunch time session. I had to rush from work to get to the session, was only five minutes late and then denied my treatment very rudely by the girl behind the desk in Percy Street. I lost the session.
If you want to have really bad skin and lot of acne, please go to this place

I bought 6 sessions of laser treatment from the Bristol branch using the Groupon website and I had different experiences. It started of really well and the treatment was working. But then the person treating me was changed and she made me feel horrible after the first session I got  from her. She was lecturing me during the whole session and when I said " I get your point, could you move on" she kept on and on about it. She was wrong at so many levels.

review_title: Took my money, no appointment, ignore my calls and emails
review_body: I booked with the Poole branch in September under the condition I would receive my Botox appointment before my holiday in October, they took my money, lost my details, I called back and no appointments. Have been calling, emailing since October and no refund. Spoke to one woman at head office 'Karen Powers-Hill' she emailed me once to say she would call me, no call received, her phone is constantly engaged now, ignores my emails and they still have my �80. Avoid. I'm a hard working single mum and they have taken my money!!!! disgusted!!

review_title: Laser doesn't work, awful customer service - SCAM
review_body: Branch in Reading. I have been doing laser treatment in different zones for a while now, so have extensive experience with what 'works' and what 'doesn't'. When after 2-3 treatments I made an enquiry about why the treatment hasn't been effective, I got a phone call from Paula (the manager) who not only didn't seem to care the least bit about the effectiveness of the treatment, but also shouted at me on the phone and told me that I don't know a thing about laser treatments. I was terribly shaken but continued to use their service as they wouldn't refund me. I have now completed my treatment and the results are just the same as when I started - no difference whatsoever, I could say the hair is even worse. Any time I brought it up with the manager/therapists they told me 'Oh, it depends on the growth cycle of the hair' etc which can't be the case for EACH time. Don't get fooled by the seeming kindness of the staff, after a year of being tied to their services, I guarantee you its all a sham.

I popped in to VG Medispa in Manchester for information about lip fillers. I already had a consultation booked with another clinic but thought it would be a good idea to look at more than one. They didn't have any leaflets but the nurse was there and within a couple of minutes she had persuaded me to get my lips filled right away. She said it would be very natural and everything would be ok. I was so nervous but had no top lip at all and wanted to look pretty for my Christmas party. She tempted me by saying it was a black Friday deal and only �115. The issues I have are as follows:

I hardly ever review anything but feel that people should be aware of this terrible salon. I visited the Richmond branch and went through a process of pushy sales. Basically the consultation is a 2 sec skin test and 10 /15min of up selling! Anyway I felt pressurised and purchased further treatments. However I felt extremely uncomfortable about the pressure I was put under and decided to look at reviews. Surprise surprise others felt the same way. I phoned the next day and was told it's non refundable. At no point did they state this during my visit. The Irish receptionist went to say that it was in the terms when I registered on the iPad. I reminded her that it didn't work. She then said it was in the email that was sent I didn't receive one until I left which was just a survey.  Basically she was quite patronising. I then contacted Groupon who kept coming back to say that the salon was informing them that the voucher was redeemed.  I did not have one single treatment just the consultation. Wrote to customer care email address and they again mentioned it being non refundable. Please keep your money and find other salons, many others on Groupon.  I wish I had bothered to read reviews before booking!! Im not sure why their customer service is responding to these reviews and pretending that they will help  as I contacted them to be told what the salon had stated. I'm surprised that they are not being investigated tbh!

review_title: Never try Vgmedispa for hair removal
review_body: The staff are very rude , and I was once late 5 minutes for my appointemt and the have reschudual new appointmet to me.

I had an appointment for under eye treatment via groupon booked via the appointment line. I tried to rearrange just after I had booked the appointment and was promised an email to confirm as their computer systems were down. Needless to say they never emailed me to rearrange. I tried calling a few times later to get some advice regarding my suitability and to rearrange. Again no reply. On the day of mu appointment I rang to check whether the appoibtment was still going ahead and to attempt to rearrange yet again however I was told I would not be seen and I would lose my entire �49 I had paid without receiving treatment.

review_title: STAY AWAY... Do not use them...!
review_body: Place has one desk in Richmond and looks like a pop up shop with one treatment room and stuck up staff members with no customer service or care for what you want.

review_title: Please do not use this company
review_body: I was initially going to book a treatment from this company through Groupon. I rang them up directly and they convinced me to book with them directly and they would match the price so I did. A few days later I had changed my mind about the treatment so cancelled it and asked for a refund. They refused to refund my money stating the treatments were non refundable.  Because of their incompetence I never received a confirmation email with the terms and conditions and was never told that treatments were non refundable during the numerous phone conversations I had with them. I would have never have booked if I knew this to be the case. I wanted to make a complaint but was told I had to write a letter and post it. The reply took around 6 weeks and they still refused to refund my money. When I had spoken to them on the phone they admitted they had not used my correct email address but then lied in the letter saying they had. Please do not book any treatments with this company under any circumstance.

The staff here are abrupt, rude and have so much attitude! They treat customers like dirt! Especially when we're the ones paying their wages we should expect a bit of respect! Percy Street VGMediSpa is the worst with a really rude therapist called Kirsty! They need training! AVOID under all circumstances! They will find ways to con you and find excuses to book more appointments with them especially when nothing is even wrong ! The worst place to go for laser treatment! Never again! Groupon need to stop doing business with this company !! Absolutely disgusted !

review_title: If you expect good customer service, don't use VGmedispa!
review_body: I booked a fungal nail laser treatment and was persuaded to buy an extra 4 sessions as a special deal.

This company gave me so much headache. The first appointment was fine, then the next two appointments was cancelled the day before and I had to call booking line and get another appointment 2 months later. I complained to manager and asked for refund and they said no. I just couldn't be bothered to go there after that but thats what they wanted.  They just take your money and get rid of you. I bought 6 hair laser sessions but stopped going after 3. When I went there for my initial patch test, the staff was trying to sell more treatment.  She was full on.  I haven't even had my treatment yet and she was trying to sell sell sell. I was very irritated at she shouldn't be pushing me even before I had my treatment. I think they have my complaints written on their system because when I call to make appointments they say they have one available and after checking my details they say they do not have any available for another 2 months so I give up.

They use nothing short of bullying tactics to make you feel you have to purchase additional products and the service is absolutely appalling, untrained staff giving advice on medical procedures. Want to complain about the service, don't bother, they won't respond to you and when they eventually do they provide you with an address to write to to formally lodge a complaint. I wote to the head office 3 weeks ago, still no reply. This company should be forcefully shut down for unfair practice. DO NOT VISIT this company!!

Never had this bad customer service in uk. It never worked on me and they kept changing the location. Also, staff are very disrespectful and rude. They sent me home for having some parts of my leg not shaved well and they never gave me that session. Do not go for this company. It's a headache!

AVOID THIS PLACE, THEY USE CHEAP ALMA LASER MACHINES THAT DO NOT WORK. THEY WILL BEG YOU TO BUY MORE SESSIONS TO GET MORE MONEY OUT OF YOU. THE PLACE IS RIDICULOUS AND DIRTY DO NOT BE FOOLED BY THEIR WEBSITE. STAFF WILL BE FRIENDLY AMD EVEN OFFER YOU CALL BACKS WHEN WANTING PAYMENT, AFTER THAT THEY DONT CARE.

I visited the Birmingham clinic on Saturday for an appointment for lip fillers. I just want to say how impressed i was. I was so nervous and sceptical before going to my appointment but was made to feel at ease. The manager, i think her name was Karen and the receptionist Sarah were so pleasant. They were extremely busy as the salon was full of people, but they made sure they explained everything to me and Sarah even persuaded me to buy laser hair removal.

DO NOT BOOK ANYTHING HERE I placed an order through groupon for laser hair removal. Upon making my first booking I was told to get the full treatment there would be an extra �150 to pay. I refused to pay this, was pushed into booking my first few appointments and I was then sent an email with completely different terms and conditions to those stated on the groupon website. I have tried to organise a refund through the salon and have been spoken to terribly by the staff. I haven't had any treatment and after the way I have been spoken to I do not want to enter the salon. All I want is a refund and they are doing everything they can to get out of this. They are rude and do not care about customer service. I am so unhappy and let down its disgusting. They will con you into paying extra money and change their terms and conditions after they have taken money from you. I have never been treated so appalling by a company in my life. AVOID !

Very knowledgeable and friendly therapist, she explained everything very well and was very calm and professional during the procedure. I would recommend the Birmingham clinic, they made me feel at ease through the whole experience and I have seen fantastic results!

DO NOT USE THIS BRANCH! The manager is rude, confrontational, unprofessional and an uneducated bully. All they are interested in is taking your money and forcing offers down your throat without caring about customer satisfaction. I was unhappy with the customer service provided by this branch so emailed a formal complaint. Instead of conflict resolution, the manager uses immature playground antics to victimise clients and will refuse you from having the remaining treatments you have already paid for. They cancelled my appointment without notification and did not apologise for the inconvenience this caused. It seems they are unaware of the Consumer Rights Act (2015). The Head Office has no direct contact telephone number (only a booking office number) or email address and their postal address is a so-called "virtual office"- what does that even mean? Also you cannot contact the Director/CEO of the company which leads me to believe that this company is money-grabbing with no interest in building a good reputation. Also you cannot post comments on social media, which is probably no surprise as they would be ruined!

Booked a laser course through groupon for custard factory 'clinic'. The manager (Asian lady - can't remember name) is extremely pushy with buying additional treatments. stupidly I  signed up for another set of treatments coating �210. They then discovery due to my meds they can't offer the treatment, but will check this with the nurse. 2 weeks later I had to chase them as they hadn't done anything. Then sent them an email with photo of the meds - no response.

They claim money is non refundable and I could either miss an appointment or pay an upfront extra fee of �50 but they do not re arrange appointments. Although I had previously rearranged one a month before on the same day! Worst experience ever, bad service. Scam and would strongly suggest not to buy a groupon! From Custard factory. Birmingham.

review_title: Awful misleading and terrible client service
review_body: I was very clear first time I booked my treatment that I choose the place because of the location. Staff never informed me that they were planning to move in couple of months. After several calls it took nearly four months to get my first treatment since they had excuses that it was fully booked and finally I had my appointment they called me to cancel since staff was out. At that point I wanted to cancel the whole and get my money returned but they still made excuses and booked me in with a terrible staff called Carlotte. First time I met her she had concerns and worries for every detail and would use any treatment correctly and always rely on excuses about burns and being rude, screaming at me and shouting doors. My second treatment was cancelled and took me six months without any progress and all wasted energy. I have sent around 10emails and still no action - horrible place wouldn't recommend to anyone

AVOID at all cost! Don't be tempted by cheap prices on Groupon. It takes months to get first appointment booked, they will cancel without any notice, staff are very rude, they don't answer phone calls or emails, customer service is just not acceptable. Finally managed to get a refund from the credit card company.
Avoid this Company at the Custard Factory, Manager is so rude they take your money up front and when you complain they refuse to see you again.

Only nice until you refuse to buy a �1800 package. Anna, who called herself area manager, took me in for a ?��consultation?�� which turned out to be just a sales pitch to sell a package which was discounted ONLY that day and turned very unprofessional and irritated when I refused to commit to a package. Made a patronising remark as I was leaving. Very unpleasant.

I love this place! I had a bad experience with another Leeds salon Pierre Alexander who were very unprofessional. Vgmedispa have always been amazing friendly and very professional. Always feel on w high when I leave they are so lovely.

The Fitzrovia branch is appalling. Having pre-paid for my treatment I have now had three appointments in a row cancelled at short notice. I have left messages and emails asking for someone from the management team to contact me but have heard nothing.

I have had a few treatments at the Manchester clinic. I am finally seeing some good results on my full legs and bikini. My therapist is Dee and she is always really friendly and professional. Makes me feel very comfortable during ever visit. Thanks Dee ?���

review_title: My therapist Dee makes me go to vg?�?
review_body: My therapist Dee makes me go to vg medispa. If it wasn?��t for her I wouldn?��t go! she?��s progressive but not pushy, gives frank advice, makes me feel at ease and comfortable, efficient yet thorough, I honestly can?��t sing Dee?��s praises enough except to say that I won?��t have an appointment with any other therapist, just Dee. Thanks Dee for encouraging me to stick it out to the new hair free me!!! Diane X

Percy Street salon has cancelled last minute on me twice and I have had to have long waits in between treatments. The beauticians have not all had the same training it seems - some of them ensure they go over every part of my leg and take their time, others speed through it, with no more than about 6 flashes each side of my leg leaving large areas untouched. When I have said something they have told me that's how it's done. It is so frustrating. I was not given protective goggles last time either and the beautician spent the whole time moaning about how tired she is because of her work.

review_title: Don't even bother wasting your money?�?
review_body: Don't even bother wasting your money (even if you get it on Groupon). The Fitzrovia clinic is a complete and utter waste of time. They've cancelled 99% of appointments i've had booked in with them the day before and i've then had to chase and chase to rebook. The treatments are also 1* compared to other places i've had laser hair removal. PLEASE, PLEASE, DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME OR MONEY ON THEM.

review_title: Poor customer service, badly organised, a complete waste of money
review_body: In short, don't expect a regular treatment, good customer service, or to be informed of any changes to your booking. Unprofessional service all round.

review_title: It is with regret that I am?�?
review_body: Fitzrovia - Percy Street.

nan

review_body: Dee is very kind and helpful. Glad to her in my laser treatment!!

review_title: worst customer service and reception staff
review_body: I have been going to Vgmedispa Fitzrovia for more than 1 year now and I've also referred the clinic to 3 friends that are still doing the laser. I am only going to this clinic because the laser is really good however I can't say the same for the staff. Reception staff is very rude with no empathy at all. My appointment was cancelled few hours before (whereas clients have 48hrs cancellation policy) and no one even apologised (it also happened in the past). My appointment has been rescheduled after 1 week (my friend 2 days later) and after my session I had to book the next one after 7 weeks because apparently everything was fully booked. However my friend got the next appointment after 4 weeks so I don't really understand on which basis they manage the agenda. The lady at the reception was very rude (Elaine was the name if I got the right spelling), no eye contact at all, I gave my feedback regarding appointment being cancelled and rescheduled after 1 week and that it's quite frustrating to have next appointment after 7 weeks. She made no empathy at all, nor apologise just kept saying this is what I can offer you, without even looking at my face.
Dee in Manchester is amazing !
Great service every time, friendly staff good location, flexible with appointment rearranging.
Dee was great, very quick but efficient. Coming back

review_title: It was great to experience such?�?
review_body: It was great to experience such professionalism at every level, from arrival in reception through to excellent treatment and aftercare.
Knowledgeable, professional and corteous.

review_title: After much thought and research I?�?
review_body: After much thought and research I decided to take the plunge and talk to someone about having fillers. I had been quite put off by some results I had seen online, so knew I needed to find someone who would make sure everything looked very natural and not noticeable. My consultation was booked with Dr Severine Leonett. I told her what I was thinking of getting and asked for her opinion. I mentioned my concerns about not looking natural and making sure my enhancements made me look like a better version of myself. After our discussion I felt her and I were on the same page so I decided to go for the fillers there and then! The results were fantastic. No one noticed a thing, and the only comments I?��ve had recently is that I look ?��less tired?ѝ and more refreshed, which is exactly what I wanted. The changes have enhanced my features rather than changed them, and I could not be happier. I?��m really happy I found Cadogan and how I was made to feel so comfortable and got exactly what I asked for. I feel much more confident in myself and don?��t feel too altered!

review_title: A nice clinic and a good doctor who did?�?
review_body: A nice clinic and a good doctor who did my treatment efficiently.

review_title: This was my second visit to Cadogan?�?Flawlessly Professional!
review_body: This was my second visit to Cadogan Clinic for laser hair removal, and my first experience with Safae, the new technician, but I have to say, this experience basically topped the first!
Exercise  serves  Lovely  doctors  and staff  I would like  recommend  that  Clinic  for treatment

review_title: So happy to find a clinic with top?�?
review_body: So happy to find a clinic with top doctors, my results are incredible and the whole process was very easy thanks to my surgical advisor. It may be slightly more expensive than a high street chain but when it comes to your body you can't risk cutting corners for such a permanent result. Thank you Mr Hazim Sadideen!

review_title: Felt really at ease at The Cadogan?�?
review_body: Felt really at ease at The Cadogan clinic and would highly recommend their services.  I have not yet had surgery however felt very confident with the surgeon that I came to see, Dr Zamani. I have had plastic surgery in the past that I haven't been happy with, so for me having the confidence in a Clinic is a Must.

review_title: The treatment I received at The Cadigen?�?was First Class
review_body: The treatment I received at The Cadigen Clinic was first class. Dr Catherine Borysiewicz was so lovely and extremely professional. She listened to what I had to say then sorted my problem out. What more could I have asked for?  5* practice.

review_title: Alexis Granite is a true professional?�?
review_body: Alexis Granite is a true professional and provided above excellent results.

I've recently started seeing Dr Granite and I LOVE her. I was really hesitant about my consultation, and had a lot of questions about different treatments, and didn't really know what to expect. She's incredibly friendly and I felt comfortable right away. She answered my questions honestly and even gave me notes to take home. Her approach was enough for me to book in some treatments with her, and so far, I'm really enjoying working with her.
Excellent care.

Dr Branford is the most professional, kind, humble and wonderful doctor I have ever met. I didn?��t know what to expect. With all the hype on Instagram it?��s hard to really understand what?��s what in the world of smoke and mirrors.

review_title: competence, confidence in a nice environment.
review_body: Very nice environment. Protects your privacy and provides you with all the information required to help you make sound health based decisions.
Very friendly, professional and great results.  We used the clinic for a dermatology procedure.

All the staff were kind and attentive and professional . My surgeon Hazim Sadideen was really excellent had three follow up appointments within the first week with himself and not the nurse as he wanted to be sure everything was ok . Would highly recommend the Cadogan .

review_title: The people here are very caring.
review_body: The people here are very caring.

5 stars isn?��t enough! Wow wow wow! From the moment I called up to after my treatment I have felt completely looked after and cared for. Every single member of staff I have had the pleasure to speak to has been attentive, professional and efficient and my results are everything I could have hoped for! I would not hesitate in recommending this clinic - if you want superior 5* service the Cadogan clinic is the only choice!

review_title: Want to say a massive Thankyou to?�? Olivier Branford
review_body: Want to say a massive Thankyou to Olivier! It was my first ever consultation and treatment and Olivier made me feel at ease throughout! He was very confident and professional in everything he said and felt more like a friend talking me through everything so I understood it! He gave me breaks to compose myself throughout. The after care has been fabulous too as he?��s messaged me to check on swelling and bruising and gave me ice packs to use throughout the day! He is one of a kind and I am looking forward to further treatments with him in the future! You?��re a star!
Very professional and caring staff

review_title: Excellent staff but facilities are not?�?
review_body: Excellent staff but facilities are not sufficient for no of bookings. Waiting area and recovery areas are poor and crowded. Had to wait more than an hour twice in one afternoon for theatre to become available

review_title: The entire procedure was explained in?�?
review_body: The entire procedure was explained in detail and on the day it was carried out entirely to my satisfaction . My doctor was professional yet super friendly and understanding .
Excellent service as always: quick, efficient and reassuring. Thank you.
Dr Mayou is fantastic. I've been seeing her for 10+ years. She is experienced, knowledgable and no nonsense. I can fully recommend her!
Fabulous service and friendly staff
Amazing!

review_title: Sometimes you just do get what you pay for.....
review_body: I wrestled with myself over having cosmetic surgery in the first place, it's not something that people like me do! I looked at many options and settled on Dr Lens at the Cadogan because in my opinion, if you are going to let anyone near your face, it should be the best.

review_title: Dr. Sheth is world class exceptional for treatment of skin cancer and Moh's procedures
review_body: I have seen Dr. Niseth Sheth for multiple treatments for numerous basal cell skin cancers over the past year.  His knowledge, expertise, genuine interest in each individual patient, and surgical skill are all exceptional.   He gives you his undivided attention, and discusses options, expected outcomes and risks, answers all questions, and collaborates with the patient to ensure you feel you have selected a course of action and treatment you are most comfortable with.  A consummate professional who cares.  Amongst other procedures, Dr. Sheth performed 2 challenging and extensive Moh's Surgeries on my neck and jawline several months apart because the 2 areas were too close to each other in proximity to perform both together due to how the skin flaps would have to be pulled, stretched and stitched to get the best long term cosmetic results.   I was very happy with both surgeries, and more importantly how both areas looked after healing, especially the jaw area where I was expecting potentially a very obvious disfiguring scar, yet with Dr. Sheth's skill, it is practically unnoticeable. He is world class by every measure.
Friendly staff and great service from Dr atherine Borysiewicz who took time to analyse my acne situation and explain in details the treatments.

Very friendly yet highly professional dermatology clinic.  Efficient admin and appointment booking and reminder processes.  All staff, whether reception, nurses, or specialists are professional, approachable and efficient.
Very professional, friendly and helpful staff. Would definitely recommend.

Dr Granite has been my dermatologist in London for a few years now and I have always been happy about this. Have recommended Dr Granite to others. She was recommended to me as a top dermatologist in London from peers in NYC and in my view I agree.

review_title: Breast enlargement Cadogan clinic with Cavale
review_body: I had 2 weeks ago my surgery at the Cadogan clinic with Dr
Difficult to get hold of consultant that took my enquiry and receptionist incredibly rude and difficult, based on this decided not to use.

I have been a patient for some time and feel that i am truly in the care of a centre of excellence in all the treatments they offer.  All the Surgeons, doctors and staff that I have come into contact with have been super professional, up to date on all the latest treatments, kind and super efficient. All in a one stop shop with immaculate operating theatres. Top practitioners!  They take a lot of trouble to walk you through any procedure, they follow up afterwards and I feel totally safe and confident in their hands. I cannot recommend highly enough.

review_title: Best decision I ever made to go ahead?�?
review_body: Best decision I ever made to go ahead with breast augumentation  with Olivier Bamford even though I'm in my fifties!
Excellent location, good facilities and courteous staff.

I've always had dark circles since I was a child and I've tried every possible cream as well as sleeping more, but nothing worked until I met Dr Olivier Branford. He is an amazing doctor and person overall, he knows how to put you at ease prior and during the procedures, each procedure is done carefully but also painlessly and there is little to no bruising or swelling after each procedure. It's amazing how such small tweeks can do so much, it's the exact definition of "Less is more". I've had my 3rd appintment this week to correct some fine lines and, without fail, the results are fantastic. Olivier is one of the best doctors out there and I highly recommend him. Thank you for keeping my skin fresh and natural! Merry Christmas!

Olivier is such a great doctor! I?��ve had about 3 appointments with him now and he?��s always very lovely and reassuring. He also never fails to educate and advise me fully about the work I?��m having done and answers any questions I have even if they?��re silly ones! Excellent!
Olivier is simply amazing.
Ratings from overseas!

Oliver is truely the best! I came in for Botox and was made to feel so at ease and completely relaxed. The procedure was quick and easy and I?��m so happy with the results. I have had so many compliments and have recommended to everyone. Best doctor ever! Thank you

review_title: Excellent clinic-Hospital with a topnotch team
review_body: Excellent clinic-hospital with a top team to match..

I can?��t recommend Mr Olivier Branford and The Cadogan Clinic enough... I came to see Mr Branford about a hand injury and I instantly felt reassured and in safe hands! The only Person I would now trust with all things aesthetics. Thank you again!
Olivier Branford

Good experience. Staff very polite and helpful. I had an appointment with Dr Naveen Cavale. He is a professional who knows very well what he is doing. I am very excited about the breast augumentation and I am looking forward to the treatment. I would definitely recommend Cadogan Clinic.

review_title: In early September I had a basal cell?�?
review_body: In early September I had a basal cell carcinoma removed from under my nose. Dr. Susan Mayou had originally spotted it, didn?��t like the look of it, ordered a biopsy which was then diagnosed to be the BCC.  Dr. Nisith Sheth did the recommended Mohs surgery which was thoroughly explained to me prior to and during the procedure putting my enquiring mind at ease. Within minutes Mr. William Van Niekirk was in the room to perform the required reconstruction. The wound was extensive given the area of the BCC.  Mr. Van Niekirk considered several options on how to cover the wound explaining them to me as he went.  The best option was chosen.  This was quite some experience but I was absolutely calm thanks to the sensitivity of Mr. Van Niekirk and Bushra, the attending nurse. After- care instructions were given to me before I left the clinic and they have worked a treat.  I didn?��t write this review immediately as I wanted to see how it all worked over time but I can absolutely recommend the Cadogan Clinic and its fine doctors for their skill, their sensitivity and care.  Everyone was and is completely brilliant.

review_title: The most wonderful one : Dr Severine
review_body: For the first time I found an aesthetic doctor who truly listened and understood what I wanted - she really has a keen sense of aesthetics and provided the highest quality care. I couldn't be more pleased with the results. Finally a thorough and talented cosmetic doctor, and she's lovely!
Delighted with my experiences with Dr Sheth.  He is kind, understanding and inspires confidence  - I was quite nervous.

I have been followed by Dr Sheth for more than 10 years now. He is an exceptional doctor, extremely qualified, professional and warm at the same time. I had to do quite a few small procedures on my face and eye lids and all his work has been incredibly precise and impeccable, healing to perfection every single time.  He can be trusted 100%
The staff at the clinic are amazing. Nothing is ever a problem.

Dr Olivier Branford is a great surgeon but also a lovely person. He made me feel completely at ease and in safe hands. I can see why he is at the top of his field. He is also very responsive with any queries post surgery which is reassuring. The other staff (especially Ellie Burns) were helpful and friendly too. It?��s a busy clinic so sometimes there are delays but this happens everywhere so not too negative a factor.

review_title: The most amazing experience! Best decision ever.
review_body: I don?��t even know where to start! I recently got a breast augmentation with Olivier Branford and it was the most incredible experience. Literally the best decision I?��ve ever made!! I went to a few other places for consultations before going to him, and none of them even compared! After a few minutes of meeting Dr. Branford I knew he was the surgeon for me. He is so attentive and knew exactly what I wanted. He specialises in natural looking breast augmentations and you can really tell it?��s his passion! The 4D imaging software he used in our first consultation helped me so much with finding a size and really envisioning myself with bigger breasts. The surgery itself was so expertly done, and Dr. Branford and his whole team really cared for me so much the entire time. I?��m now almost 2 weeks post op and I?��ve never been happier - the boobs look INCREDIBLE and not fake at all!! This is everything I?��ve ever wanted and more. Top surgeon! I?��ll be going to him for everything now - filler, Botox, etc. Highly highly highly reccomend. :)
I was so very impressed with the staff at the clinic.  They were all so professional, efficient and friendly.  Not least, it is so very convenient that all the procedures are carried out on-site.
After much deliberation I decided to look into breast augmentation.
Excellent - very professional and friendly staff.
Very clean, well eqipped, convenient combined with efficient and friendly staff.
Great help, very knowledgeable and straight to the point care

review_title: A clinic I?��ll be coming back to
review_body: I came to the Cadogan Clinic for Botox. I?��ve had it done at a different clinic previously but was recommended the Cadogan so decided to book a consultation with Dr Severine Leonet.

review_title: I would highly recommend Dr Sheth
review_body: I would highly recommend Dr Sheth. I was under my local gp for 3 months who misdiagnosed me and had me on three courses of antibiotics. One visit with Dr Sheth and his diagnosis was accurate and within one week of using a cream and Dermol shower gel the issue has gone. I can?��t thank him enough.

review_title: I recently had breast augmentation with Mr William Van Niekerk
review_body: I recently had breast augmentation with Dr William Van Niekerk and I couldn?��t recommend him enough. He listened to exactly what I wanted and has given me exactly that.
