I will never use any other surgeon except himself. I am 5 weeks post Op and I hardly have any scarring, they just look amazing, cannot recommend this genius enough !!! Thank you for changing my life Mr William Van Niekerk!

review_title: I had the most wonderful lady Severine
review_body: I had the most wonderful lady Severine, who did very subtle cheek and smile line fillers for me a few weeks ago. I was nervous as I've only ever done intermittent Botox and did not feel confident about doing anything else but wanted to look fresher. She was marvellous- honest, engaging and did exactly what I wanted! I look younger and better without it being obvious what I've had done! Can't rate her enough and I will only go to her from now one, for anything else!

I had gynecomastia surgery with Mr Olivier Branford at the Cadogan Clinic. Mr Branford was absolutely first-rate, both in terms of his inter-personal skills and his clinical judgment / expertise. I would not hesitate to recommend him - you are in the safest pair of hands.
Excellent service and amazing people ..

An excellent clinic with friendly staff and knowledgeable consultants in a pleasant calming atmosphere.  Dr Borysiewicz is particularly kind and knowledgeable with a genuine interest in your wellbeing.

An excellent clinic with extremely helpful nurses and my surgeon listened to everything I wanted and gave me that. I am so glad that I did my research and found somewhere that gave me the great service that Cadogan clinic have.

review_title: Lady?��s very good clinic and surgeons?�?
review_body: Lady?��s very good clinic and surgeons ?���?��?

Mr Branford is brilliant, I've been to see him a few times now. He is very assuring and listens to exactly what I want and always delivers the best results. I wouldn't go to anyone else. The clinic is very clean and the reception staff are very friendly.

review_title: Mr Tulley - first class cosmetic surgeon
review_body: Mr Tulley is a master cosmetic surgeon. Careful, thorough, and professional. I went to him after much research and have been thrilled with the results even though it is early days. He is complimented by simply the nicest, most gentle, human, patient nursing and theatre staff I have encountered.  Absolutely a top class team.
Everyone was welcoming from the receptionist to Dr Sheth. The Bedside manner was very professional but never awkward. Communication was perfectly clear and I was never given any unclear information.

I have undergone several minor procedures with Mr Ian Franklin at the Cadogan clinic. The whole experience was totally professional, and as a surgeon myself, I would have no hesitation returning to see Mr Franklin for further treatment at the Cadogan clinic.

review_title: I initially chose Cadogan Clinic as?�?it's exceptional and Camille offers a safe pair of hands!
review_body: I initially chose Cadogan Clinic as it's well-appointed and the staff all appeared incredibly qualified and experienced, especially Camille, who does the Laser Hair Removal. Considering that I was about to put my face into the hands of someone, it was very important to me to that they were qualified and experienced! After my first consultation and patch test, I've had no issues and am very happy with the patch test result so far, as well as the patient after-care/follow-up. Camille herself is warm, friendly and knowledgeable. She offered me her sound professional opinion on what would be the best treatment plan for me. I've already booked my next appointment for November and intend to take it step-by-step to see the results of the treatment, as per Camille's advice! The clinic itself is light, neat and fairly quiet, despite being full of people. I was seen promptly and staff were helpful in booking/re-arranging my appointments and answering any questions. Yes, it's pricey but having done a few laser treatments over the years, around the world, and exploring the options in London which balance safety with quality, I find this actually relatively reasonable!

review_title: Very Professional and Impressive Clinic and People
review_body: Very professional and impressive. I was referred to Dr Nisith Sheth by my GP and was seen almost immediately. My initial appointment was handled excellently -- on time, very quick, very personal and very professional.

review_title: My first visit to the Cadogan Clinic?�?
review_body: My first visit to the Cadogan Clinic was a nice experience.

review_title: I have always wanted Abdominal plastic?�?
review_body: I have always wanted Abdominal plastic surgery after having two children. I  first had a consultation at Harley Street, was not very convinced, did some research and found Cadogon Clinic -met with Surgeon Van Niekerk, who specialises in Abdominal Surgery for  Consultation- He explained the procedure clearly in detail; combining Liposuction with Abdominal Surgery, I was  happy with the consultation and decided  to go ahead with the procedure. Booked my Surgery and upon arrival I was warmly welcomed by staff- The staff were extremely friendly, the environment was conducive. Is one week after my Surgery  today and I'm  very optimistic about the result. I will highly recommend this Clinic though pricy but worth it.
Dr Granite is fantastic. I recommend her to all my friends.

review_title: I visited yesterday for the first time?�?
review_body: I visited yesterday for the first time for  cryotherapy at the Cadogan with Dr Nisith Seth, and he was truly amazing.

review_title: Ive had a couple of surgical procedures?�?
review_body: Ive had a couple of surgical procedures at the Cadogan with Mr Amar, and both experiences have been truly marvellous.

review_title: Severine at The Cadogan Clinic, London
review_body: I recently visited Severine at the Cadogan Clinic to have fillers.  Severine listened to my concerns, and I was extremely comforted by her knowledge on the subject, as well as how fillers would effect the overall look of my face.  I trusted her completely and have been thrilled with the results.  I would definitely recommend Severine to anyone considering fillers for a fresher, more youthful look.

review_title: First time but won't be my last!
review_body: Walking into the Cadogan Clinic for the first time, all I remember feeling was very, very nervous. I had no idea what to expect, in fact I wasn't entirely sure what I wanted to have done, but I was sure it would hurt a lot and I would probably cry.

review_title: Wonderful service from CC and Olivier Brandford
review_body: I have had a few appointments at the Cadogan Clinic with Dr Brandford and can attest to the highest level of service and care that both have promised and delivered throughout the last couple of months.

review_title: Excellent pre-wedding laser hair removal & facials
review_body: Before my wedding I had laser hair removal on my legs and three facials with Camille. The laser was very effective and I would definitely recommend. My bespoke facial treatments included micro-dermabrasion, LED light therapy and blackhead extraction. An incredibly thorough treatment. Both great confidence boosters ahead of the big day. Thank you!
I had been to Clinic in December last year and was impressed.   The Doctor was good.

review_title: Please meet Olivier - you won't regret it!
review_body: Olivier was completely professional and at the same time extremely personal. Something I was looking for in a surgeon.
On the clinical side, Dr Mayou provided an excellent consultation, rapidly building trust that enabled her to conduct a well-informed diagnostic.

review_title: Dr Mayou is absolutely lovely -- I only?�?
review_body: Dr Mayou is absolutely lovely -- I only needed simple help, but she was totally professional, easy to talk to, and massively helpful.  I have finally found my London dermatologist!
I was very well looked after by Mr Amar and his team before, during and after my procedure. I was anxious but easily reassured by competent staff.

Dr N Sheth (Dermatologist) examined my face after a round mark appeared below my eye. I was very worried about it and needed some expert advice. Dr Sheth examined me and explained every very clearly, calming my nerves and making me feel happier. We agreed treatment options and I am happy to say my face is back to normal again with no marks or scars. Dr Sheth is kind and incredibly nice and explains everything very clearly.

review_title: Unorganized and conflicting, but super friendly
review_body: I actually ended up with Cadogan clinic through finding one of their surgeons privately (Real Plastic Surgery), and thus ended up having my procedure done at their clinic.

I had breast augmentation surgery nearly two weeks ago. I researched the surgeon I wanted, Dr Naveen Cavale. My surgery was at the Cadogan Clinic and I'm so happy with how everything went. Can't recommend highly enough to anyone looking to do it. Dr Cavale did an amazing job. He is considerate, professional and gives great advice. Results are fantastic with minimal scarring. All the staff that have looked after me have been very friendly and kind.

I have been going to the Cadogan for a few years now and would highly recommend. The staff are amazing. In particular Dr Sheth is fantastic. Really listens to you and gives great advice as well as being an exceptional Dr. Could not recommend Dr Sheth highly enough.

review_title: It was recommended I see Dr Zamani when?�?
review_body: It was recommended I see Dr Zamani when I attended the Clinic recently and I am totally happy with what she has done - extremely efficient and professional.

review_title: Mr Olivier Branford Cadogan Clinic - breast augmentation
review_body: I?��m a clinical academic Doctor with a passion for evidenced based medicine. When choosing my surgeon and clinic for my breast augmentation procedure, I had a list of requirements. Surgical expertise and evidence-based medicine was a priority. Equally, I know that person-centred care is crucial to achieve the best outcomes. Olivier Branford combines his surgical expertise, evidenced based medicine with individualised person-centred care to achieve the best outcomes for his patients. The quality of care provided by the multi-professional surgical team at the Cadogan clinic was outstanding. If your priority is information and involvement in decision making about goals of treatment, being treated as an individual, being safe and achieving the best possible outcomes, look no further than the Cadogan clinic and Olivier Branford

Incompetent staff. Firstly I had to call the reception after pressing the buzzer twice and waiting 5 minutes for the main door to be opened, secondly I had to chase them to make a payment. I still haven?��t received my invoice that I was promised would be emailed to me. Complete shambles. Save your time and head to Harley Street - You?��ll receive much more professionalism.
Really good experience each time I have visited. Highly recommend.
Wonderful experience from start to finish. The Doctor I saw was extremely experienced and reassuring. I would not hesitate recommending them to anyone.
I?��d recommend them to anyone!
Simply excellent.

review_title: I honestly was very pleased to attend?�?
review_body: I honestly was very pleased to attend your clinic. At the reception, I was received very kindly and nicely. The specialist, Mr. Garraffa was very pleasant indeed and very helpful. He filled the atmosphere with friendly conversation while taking the relevant answer.
I have been visiting Cadogan clinic recently for the treatment of acne.
Staff are all very experienced and professional. Highly recommended!
Excellent service from wonderful staff. Would recommend to all.

review_title: This is an excellent clinic with very?�?
review_body: This is an excellent clinic with very professional staff and top of the field consultants. I highly recommend this as the top clinic in London for these services.

review_title: Excellent. No hesitation recommending Cadogan Clinic.
review_body: The staff have been extremely helpful & friendly.

review_title: So happy with my experience at Cadogan?�?
review_body: So happy with my experience at Cadogan Clinic with Olivier Branford. Amazing doctor who only provides the very best results.

Can not recommend Cadogan highly enough, everyone is professional, friendly and caring.  My surgeon Mr Branford has been amazing from start to finish, his knowledge and expertise is outstanding,  nothing is too much trouble he makes you feel like you are his only patient, I was extremely nervous about surgery but he completely reassured me and I felt safe in his hands,  I am so happy with the results of my breast reduction and lift and would only ever consider Cadogan and Mr Branford for any future procedures!
MR Olivier Amar

review_title: I went to see Maryam Zamani for?�?
review_body: I went to see Maryam Zamani for treatmenr for veins under my eyes and all I can say she is simply the best and the most professional Doctor in the industry.I work in the Aethetics industry my self and have come across many Doctors but no one comes close to Maryam Zamani. Highly recommended.
A wonderful clinic - highly professional, engaged with patients and very kind and calm. Dr Mayou is wise and attentive. All the staff were pleasant, effiicient and effective

review_title: From beginning to end I had nothing but?�?
review_body: EXCELLENT!!!

review_title: I saw Dr Sheth for the treatment of a?�?
review_body: I saw Dr Sheth for the treatment of a basil cell carcinoma skin cancer spot on my nose.  When I learned it had to be treated with surgery I was quite alarmed.  However, Dr Sheth put me at ease and was very open about exactly what my options were and possible outcomes (even with photos).

review_title: Dr Sheth and all the lovely staff at Cadogan Clinic are fantastic.
review_body: I have been using the Cadogan Clinic since 2011. I have always had excellent care.  I have had Mohs surgery a couple of times and photodynamic therapy several times to treat my skin cancer.  The care is outstanding and Dr Sheth has been a wonderful doctor.   My mother and several friends, whom I have recommended to use the clinic, have been equally happy and treated amazingly with very positive results.

review_title: Dr Anjali Mahto is a wonderful?�?
review_body: Dr Anjali Mahto is a wonderful dermatologist.

I had Mohs surgery done by Dr. Sheth on my nose due to a BCC.  I must say not only was it pleasant to be at the clinic but also Dr. Seth did an excellent job as my scare is barely visible. Additionally, I felt safe and well taken care of.

I have visited the Cadogan Clinic for several different procedures (mole mapping with Dr Alexis Granite, mole removal, a foot problem with Kaser Nazir and some non-surgical treatments - laser hair removal).  I  am always so impressed by the service and bedside manner of the staff there and would not hesitate to recommend the clinic to anyone.  Thank you!
Very professional staff. Great Clinic!!!!

Agree with other reviews. Dreadful communication and management, hard to make an appointment and when I did I was kept waiting for an hour. Avoid if you value your time over theirs, which of course is charged at a premium.
Incompetent staff, impossible to speak to management when something goes wrong.

review_title: A superb service - reassuring to have skin checked by a trusted Dr.
review_body: Excellent service ... Dr Nisith Sheth was charming and very thorough with the consultation. He put my mind at rest and reacted quickly when I was concerned about a skin outbreak. Very reassuring to check the whole body for any moles or sun damage and action was taken swiftly to deal with any minor issues. His advice ongoing is superb. Easy to recommend with confidence. I shall return for a follow up and periodic check ups. Reception staff also charming.
Professional and curteous

review_title: I first came to see Dr Sheth at Cadogan ?�?
review_body: I first came to see Dr Sheth at Cadogan Clinic many years ago and have not looked back since.  I was very nervous about the procedures I was considering and he was able to make me feel completely at ease and answered each of my (million!) questions with kindness and patience.

I came to see Nisith Sheth for Mohs surgery for  basal cell carcinoma near my eye initially about 2 years ago. I transferred for my job from Connecticut USA and was recommended to him by my dermatologist at Yale.  From beginning to end I felt very safe and comfortable in his hands. He is a consummate professional and compassionate. The clinic is in a great location and the nursing staff were all so kind and considerate.  I've been really happy with the final results and have come back for regular checks and also some laser treatment for problems on my nose which I was delighted he could fix. I have recommended my friends and will continue to do so

review_title: Dr Granite is an exceptional practitioner ?�?
review_body: Dr Granite is an exception practitioner -- from her expert advice, flawless execution and impeccable bedside manor, she is my first choice for all procedures and consultations, big or small.

review_title: Dermatology Treatment with Dr Nish Sheth
review_body: Dr Sheth has been a really attentive and kind physician while I've been under his care. His communication has been fantastic at every appointment and he's never left me in any doubt about the options available, his thoughts/recommendations and what I should expect from treatment. Most importantly, I've seen a really huge improvement!

I recently discovered a small lump under my arm and attended the clinic. Following a thorough examination, Dr Sheth  informed me that this was a cyst and diagnosed the underlying condition. Dr Sheth demonstrated his wealth of knowledge and really took the time to explain my condition in detail before carrying out a surgical procedure to remove the cyst.

review_title: I would recommend this company to ?�?
review_body: I would recommend this company to anyone. Dr Granite is the tops.

Dr. Sheth did a MOHS procedure on my nose and a skin graft.   After 3 months no one notices the graft.   Dr. Sheth is the best along with his staff.   I can't say enough good things about Dr. Sheth and his expertise, lovely man....     Nameste.

review_title: I attended the clinic for a treatment ?�?
review_body: I attended the clinic for a treatment of Botox into the forehead
A highly professional clinic. My nerves were put at ease by my surgeon from the initial consultation and today at my post op appointment I couldn't be happier with the choice that I made.

I have seen Dr Maryam Zamani for several different treatments and can't recommend her highly enough. Her manner is very friendly, warm and direct (no schmooz or hot air, like some male cosmetic doctors I've met...) and I trust her implicitly. She's helped me enormously with self-confidence and putting my best face forward.

I recently had botox on my forehead and crows feet with Libbie Wallace. Libbie was extremely thorough with her questionnaire and when talking me through the areas I wanted done. She explained where she would inject and what the outcomes should be. I really felt confident in Libbie's ability and am really happy with the job that she has done!  I couldn't recommend her highly enough!

I met Dr Sheth when I recently found a mole and wanted to get it checked. Both he and the nurse, Leanne, were absolutely fantastic. Certainly there was no waiting time: I was seen immediately, examined, taken straight down to theatre and the mole was swiftly removed. The mole was fast-tracked for analysis and as soon as he had the result, Dr Sheth called me and let me know. I needed a second excision, and this was carried out just as smoothly and painlessly as the first. Dr Sheth and Leanne were very professional and did an excellent job, but they were also incredibly kind and reassuring, and made sure I had all the information I needed. I was also given a contact number for Dr Sheth, with the assurance that I could call him at any time. The discovery of a mole is unpleasant and frightening, but I could not have been in better hands. If anyone I know or meet should discover a mole, I will urge them to go straight to Dr Sheth.

I saw Nisith Sheth following a referral from Bupa. He was kind considerate and understanding. He clearly explained everything to me, the options that I had and for me to make a decision on my own. Treatment was successful and after 6 months he even saw me at my request to reassure me everything had healed, despite my medical health cover had lapsed. Wonderful man!
I been to the clinic for a peel and the service provided was simply amazing. They are a lovely staff that cares for their patients. Would highly recommend this clinic in the heart of Chelsea.

review_title: I recently had 2 procedures done at The ?�?
review_body: I recently had 2 procedures done at The Cadagan Clinic. I had my breast implants removed and Liposuction to my upper and lower abs and flanks. From my first consultation with Mr Olivier Amar to the day of my op and aftercare I can only say I received 5 star treatment. The whole atmosphere at the clinic was super friendly putting me at ease and all the staff from the receptionists to the nurses to Mr Amar
I went to see the beautiful Dr Zamani earlier this year to see if she could help me look less tired and help brighten me up around the edges.

I can thoroughly recommend Dr. Nisith Sheth. After several years of worrying about unsightly moles I took the decision to seek removal. I was very concerned about scarring and had been told to prevaricate by other health professionals. However, when I went to Dr Sheth he was confident in achieving a good outcome and certainly did so for me. The treatment was quick and efficient and the results were excellent.

Following recommendation by an NHS dermatologist, I have seen Dr Sheth for a series of IPL treatments for rosacea and to help improve the appearance of scar tissue on my chin. Due to a bad experience elsewhere which caused the scar on my chin I was a little nervous before my first treatment, but quickly realised I had no reason to be. Dr Sheth is very professional in his manner, whilst being friendly and thoughtful; he made me feel comfortable and reassured throughout. He explained beforehand what he would be doing, how the treatments work and the results I could expect. The end result is clearly important to him too. I am thrilled with my end result, I have complete trust in Dr Sheth and would highly recommend him.

I was referred to Dr Sheth for an uncomfortable allergic reaction to a flu vaccination. He was on time, sympathetic, knowledgeable and kind, prescribed topical and oral medication and I was much improved after three applications. He has a wonderful, caring manner and I would not hesitate to recommend him. He is definitely my 'go-to' specialist.

I have been suffering from painful blistering rashes on my skin for the past 4 months and was referred to Dr Mahto after the previous consultant couldn't find an obvious cause or solution to the problem. Dr Mahto was able to see me immediately and was very helpful from the beginning. After an initial consultation she booked me in for a skin biopsy the same afternoon to get the ball rolling ASAP, she is still investigating the problem but throughout has been incredibly thorough and attentive and has given me great hope in finally finding out what the problem is and dealing with it. Dr Mahto has also been very helpful in terms of getting further tests done and fitting me in to see her ASAP.  Based upon my experience with Dr Mahto I could not recommend her highly enough.

review_title: Wish I had done this earlier!
review_body: I had been suffering from acne for about 10 months before a friend recommended Dr Anjali Mahto. My acne was making me feel incredibly upset and impacting my confidence. I started to avoid seeing friends and family and I knew I had to do something. Dr Mahto was fabulous from the moment I met her at my initial consultation. She was so welcoming, caring, personable, friendly and made me feel comfortable immediately. Dr Mahto really listened to how I felt and could empathize with me. Dr Mahto answered all my questions and addressed my worries which reassured me. I only I wish I had made an appointment earlier!

review_title: Dr. Nisith Sheth's expertise, charming and caring manner is, in my opinion, second to none.
review_body: I had not previously heard of The Cadogan Clinic, but so very luckily I was referred on to the Clinic by my Doctor.  I was extremely impressed with all the care and attention I received during my admission last month.  The whole team, across the board are both professional and courteous.  Dr. Nisith Sheth is indeed a master of his art and he certainly puts his all into the job in hand.  Dr. Sheth has given me my confidence back, in that before surgery I had a prominent growth on my face, which I felt very embarrassed about.  I had previously been told that the growth was a seborrhoeic keratosis and therefore nothing to worry about but it turned out to be a BCC, diagnosed by Dr. Sheth.  Now, after Dr. Sheth's magnificent surgery I am left with a very minimal scar, with some of my friends saying 'Are you sure you had surgery' ?    So a recommendation indeed!

review_title: Excellent Clinic and Doctor - Nisith Sheth
review_body: I saw Dr. Nisith Sheth after researching extensively.  I was becoming resistant to Botox and was not having any luck with other doctors in finding a solution.  I saw Dr. Sheth and he came up with multiple solutions. I have been seeing him for almost a year and my skin looks fantastic!  He takes the time to get to know his patients, has great bedside manner and is incredibly knowledgeable.  Cadogan Clinic is also a very nice place to visit with excellent staff and service.  They even offer makeup application after fillers if you are going somewhere after your treatment, in my case work, and do not want any sign that you had injections.  I would highly recommend Cadogan Clinic and Dr. Nisith Sheth to anyone.

I have been looked after by Dr Anjali Mahto on a number of occasions and I cannot fault the level of care she provides.  She takes time to understand  the result you want to achieve and is very gentle.  I'm a bit nervous with needles around my mouth (bad dentist experience) but she spotted my anxiety immediately, stopped and then talked me through until I was ready to carry on again.  A really really great Dermotologist and I would highly recommend her.

review_title: Excellent - I would recommend this company to anyone
review_body: I've had quite extensive botox & fillers several times with Dr Anjali Mahto - I have to say not only is she really gentle, with no bruising, but my results were unbelievably natural looking - I would recommend her to anyone - a real treasure!

Dr Nisith Sheth was recommended to me by a dermatologist through my company?��s health care scheme. I found Dr Sheth to be very personable and informative. Dr Sheth discussed in detail the treatments available to me and did so in a warm, and compassionate manner. The level of service I received from Dr Sheth, his PA and the nursing team at The Cadogan Clinic was first rate. From the initial consultation through to the aftercare I received post operation was of a very high standard and I am very grateful to Dr Sheth and his team for helping me through a challenging period.

review_title: Truly excellent professional  service with attention to detail.
review_body: Cadogan Cosmetics is a top professional organisation and I would recommend it to anyone who wishes to receive professional expert dermatological treatment I was advised that Dr. Niseth Sheth was an excellent surgeon to treat my BCC ( Basel cell carcinoma). I was at once put at ease by him and his totally professional but relaxed style. The entire procedure was explained to me by him in a simple but concise way before we commenced. At all times he was at pains to ensure I was comfortable and his bed side manner was exemplary. The outcome was exactly as he described beforehand and I am totally satisfied.

I have been a patient of Cadogan Clinic for many years and have continually been looked after by the team with the most fantastic care. All the staff are so welcoming and on one occasion when I had to have a small procedure they completely put me at ease. I couldn't recommend them more highly.

Thank you to Dr Sheth and the team at Cadogan! Such a friendly helpful staff. I've had problem skin most of my adult life. Dr Sheth was very understanding and explained everything so clearly. So happy with the treatment. Telling everyone I know to see him if possible. Thanks again

review_title: I could not recommend Dr Sheth more highly
review_body: I was referred to Dr Sheth by my local dermatologist who said that if anyone else in his family should need treatment, Dr Sheth is the man to go to.  He was completely right.  Initially, I sought help for Rosacea and Dr Sheth immediately put me at my ease with an extended introductory consultation discussing, in depth, the various treatment options. I chose to have ointment and IPL and my Rosacea has gone and my skin is now pale and smooth, no longer red and spotty.  Thanks to Dr Sheth?��s success and his empathetic bedside manner I felt confident to seek his help with non surgical cosmetic surgery.  His use of fillers has made a dramatic difference to my face, almost eradicating my nasal labial folds and even disguising my prominent eye bags.  Botox has successfully slowed down the ageing process, especially on the lines on my forehead.  When I developed Basal Cell Melanoma, Dr Sheth could not have been more helpful or professoinal, again taking time to do extensive tests and always giving sensitive advice. The treatment over several areas, including my face, was a total success and Dr Sheth and the Cadogan Clinic nurses could not have been more helpful at comforting me during what could have been a traumatic series of treatments and ensuring that I did not suffer any pain. Dr Sheth is an excellent communicator.  He always answers my queries promptly.  He always takes the time to explain, give honest information about expected outcomes and reassure me.   I feel extremely fortunate to have had such great success with treatments under an exceptional doctor.

review_title: A wonderful experience from start to finish
review_body: I made the decision to go to Cadogan Clinic after doing thorough research. I met with Nisith Sheth as I wanted to get fillers but I also had a skin condition that was knocking my confidence. Nisith Sheth is clearly very knowledgeable and I most definitely felt in safe hands, just by taking a look he knew what I had was sebborrheic dermatitis. We went through the process for the dermal fillers and I have to say he was wonderful and made me feel completely at ease, I came back a couple of weeks later just as a follow up check up to make sure everything was okay. The result look amazing and very natural, my skin is also clearing up on the basis of the prescription I was provided. I would definitely recommend Cadogan Clinic to anyone looking for something similar.

review_title: Trustworthy surgeon, backed up with research and great service
review_body: My recent experience of the Cadogan Clinic has been an incredibly positive one. With Mr Garrick Georgeu as my surgeon I received a thorough consultation - far more so than others I'd had elsewhere. I revisited him several times before my procedure as I needed reassurance of my options, which he willingly accommodated, giving sound advice at each stage. His assistant also helped ease the process, and gave useful input on all aspects of the procedure. The procedure itself couldn't have been more straightforward and I'm over the moon with the incredible results.
I attended the clinic having been to a specialist, several high profile skin care specialists etc. I had two groupings of spider veins.

I always go to Cadogan Cosmetics to get my Botox treatments with Dr. Maryam Zamani, she makes me feel at ease, knows what is best to enhance my face and the results are longer-lasting than other places I have been.  The staff at the clinic are also helpful and friendly.  I would recommend Dr. Zamani at Cadogan to anyone wanting anti-ageing treatments.

review_title: Neck lift with Mr Olivier Amar
review_body: I had a neck lift with Mr Olivier Amar at Cadogan Cosmetics after researching various clinics.  He was very informative and reassuring in the consultation and keen to give me natural-looking results so I felt confident in going with him.  The nurses and staff at the clinic were very helpful and friendly and really looked after me, and I am really happy with my surgery.  I would highly recommend Mr. Amar and the Cadogan Cosmetics to anyone wanting subtle but effective enhancements- I would definitely return in the future!

I had a mandelic peel in Feb 2015 with Sophie who was really professional and gave me some great advice for my skin,  the peel really helped and I left the clinic with a glowing complexion! I will be going back for further treatments x
Excellent service from start to finish I have already booked my next appointment.

review_title: Great staff and red carpet treatment!
review_body: I had a cosmetic procedure last year at Cadogan Cosmetics and I am thrilled with the results!  The staff are all helpful and friendly, and I was looked after superbly from beginning to end.

review_title: It was great to experience such?�?
review_body: It was great to experience such professionalism at every level, from arrival in reception through to excellent treatment and aftercare.
Knowledgeable, professional and corteous.

review_title: After much thought and research I?�?
review_body: After much thought and research I decided to take the plunge and talk to someone about having fillers. I had been quite put off by some results I had seen online, so knew I needed to find someone who would make sure everything looked very natural and not noticeable. My consultation was booked with Dr Severine Leonett. I told her what I was thinking of getting and asked for her opinion. I mentioned my concerns about not looking natural and making sure my enhancements made me look like a better version of myself. After our discussion I felt her and I were on the same page so I decided to go for the fillers there and then! The results were fantastic. No one noticed a thing, and the only comments I?��ve had recently is that I look ?��less tired?ѝ and more refreshed, which is exactly what I wanted. The changes have enhanced my features rather than changed them, and I could not be happier. I?��m really happy I found Cadogan and how I was made to feel so comfortable and got exactly what I asked for. I feel much more confident in myself and don?��t feel too altered!

review_title: A nice clinic and a good doctor who did?�?
review_body: A nice clinic and a good doctor who did my treatment efficiently.

review_title: This was my second visit to Cadogan?�?Flawlessly Professional!
review_body: This was my second visit to Cadogan Clinic for laser hair removal, and my first experience with Safae, the new technician, but I have to say, this experience basically topped the first!
Exercise  serves  Lovely  doctors  and staff  I would like  recommend  that  Clinic  for treatment

review_title: So happy to find a clinic with top?�?
review_body: So happy to find a clinic with top doctors, my results are incredible and the whole process was very easy thanks to my surgical advisor. It may be slightly more expensive than a high street chain but when it comes to your body you can't risk cutting corners for such a permanent result. Thank you Mr Hazim Sadideen!

review_title: Felt really at ease at The Cadogan?�?
review_body: Felt really at ease at The Cadogan clinic and would highly recommend their services.  I have not yet had surgery however felt very confident with the surgeon that I came to see, Dr Zamani. I have had plastic surgery in the past that I haven't been happy with, so for me having the confidence in a Clinic is a Must.

review_title: The treatment I received at The Cadigen?�?was First Class
review_body: The treatment I received at The Cadigen Clinic was first class. Dr Catherine Borysiewicz was so lovely and extremely professional. She listened to what I had to say then sorted my problem out. What more could I have asked for?  5* practice.

review_title: Alexis Granite is a true professional?�?
review_body: Alexis Granite is a true professional and provided above excellent results.

I've recently started seeing Dr Granite and I LOVE her. I was really hesitant about my consultation, and had a lot of questions about different treatments, and didn't really know what to expect. She's incredibly friendly and I felt comfortable right away. She answered my questions honestly and even gave me notes to take home. Her approach was enough for me to book in some treatments with her, and so far, I'm really enjoying working with her.
Excellent care.

Dr Branford is the most professional, kind, humble and wonderful doctor I have ever met. I didn?��t know what to expect. With all the hype on Instagram it?��s hard to really understand what?��s what in the world of smoke and mirrors.

review_title: competence, confidence in a nice environment.
review_body: Very nice environment. Protects your privacy and provides you with all the information required to help you make sound health based decisions.
Very friendly, professional and great results.  We used the clinic for a dermatology procedure.

All the staff were kind and attentive and professional . My surgeon Hazim Sadideen was really excellent had three follow up appointments within the first week with himself and not the nurse as he wanted to be sure everything was ok . Would highly recommend the Cadogan .

review_title: The people here are very caring.
review_body: The people here are very caring.

5 stars isn?��t enough! Wow wow wow! From the moment I called up to after my treatment I have felt completely looked after and cared for. Every single member of staff I have had the pleasure to speak to has been attentive, professional and efficient and my results are everything I could have hoped for! I would not hesitate in recommending this clinic - if you want superior 5* service the Cadogan clinic is the only choice!

review_title: Want to say a massive Thankyou to?�? Olivier Branford
review_body: Want to say a massive Thankyou to Olivier! It was my first ever consultation and treatment and Olivier made me feel at ease throughout! He was very confident and professional in everything he said and felt more like a friend talking me through everything so I understood it! He gave me breaks to compose myself throughout. The after care has been fabulous too as he?��s messaged me to check on swelling and bruising and gave me ice packs to use throughout the day! He is one of a kind and I am looking forward to further treatments with him in the future! You?��re a star!
Very professional and caring staff

review_title: Excellent staff but facilities are not?�?
review_body: Excellent staff but facilities are not sufficient for no of bookings. Waiting area and recovery areas are poor and crowded. Had to wait more than an hour twice in one afternoon for theatre to become available

review_title: The entire procedure was explained in?�?
review_body: The entire procedure was explained in detail and on the day it was carried out entirely to my satisfaction . My doctor was professional yet super friendly and understanding .
Excellent service as always: quick, efficient and reassuring. Thank you.
Dr Mayou is fantastic. I've been seeing her for 10+ years. She is experienced, knowledgable and no nonsense. I can fully recommend her!
Fabulous service and friendly staff
Amazing!

review_title: Sometimes you just do get what you pay for.....
review_body: I wrestled with myself over having cosmetic surgery in the first place, it's not something that people like me do! I looked at many options and settled on Dr Lens at the Cadogan because in my opinion, if you are going to let anyone near your face, it should be the best.

review_title: Dr. Sheth is world class exceptional for treatment of skin cancer and Moh's procedures
review_body: I have seen Dr. Niseth Sheth for multiple treatments for numerous basal cell skin cancers over the past year.  His knowledge, expertise, genuine interest in each individual patient, and surgical skill are all exceptional.   He gives you his undivided attention, and discusses options, expected outcomes and risks, answers all questions, and collaborates with the patient to ensure you feel you have selected a course of action and treatment you are most comfortable with.  A consummate professional who cares.  Amongst other procedures, Dr. Sheth performed 2 challenging and extensive Moh's Surgeries on my neck and jawline several months apart because the 2 areas were too close to each other in proximity to perform both together due to how the skin flaps would have to be pulled, stretched and stitched to get the best long term cosmetic results.   I was very happy with both surgeries, and more importantly how both areas looked after healing, especially the jaw area where I was expecting potentially a very obvious disfiguring scar, yet with Dr. Sheth's skill, it is practically unnoticeable. He is world class by every measure.
Friendly staff and great service from Dr atherine Borysiewicz who took time to analyse my acne situation and explain in details the treatments.

Very friendly yet highly professional dermatology clinic.  Efficient admin and appointment booking and reminder processes.  All staff, whether reception, nurses, or specialists are professional, approachable and efficient.
Very professional, friendly and helpful staff. Would definitely recommend.

Dr Granite has been my dermatologist in London for a few years now and I have always been happy about this. Have recommended Dr Granite to others. She was recommended to me as a top dermatologist in London from peers in NYC and in my view I agree.

review_title: Breast enlargement Cadogan clinic with Cavale
review_body: I had 2 weeks ago my surgery at the Cadogan clinic with Dr
Difficult to get hold of consultant that took my enquiry and receptionist incredibly rude and difficult, based on this decided not to use.

I have been a patient for some time and feel that i am truly in the care of a centre of excellence in all the treatments they offer.  All the Surgeons, doctors and staff that I have come into contact with have been super professional, up to date on all the latest treatments, kind and super efficient. All in a one stop shop with immaculate operating theatres. Top practitioners!  They take a lot of trouble to walk you through any procedure, they follow up afterwards and I feel totally safe and confident in their hands. I cannot recommend highly enough.

review_title: Best decision I ever made to go ahead?�?
review_body: Best decision I ever made to go ahead with breast augumentation  with Olivier Bamford even though I'm in my fifties!
Excellent location, good facilities and courteous staff.

I've always had dark circles since I was a child and I've tried every possible cream as well as sleeping more, but nothing worked until I met Dr Olivier Branford. He is an amazing doctor and person overall, he knows how to put you at ease prior and during the procedures, each procedure is done carefully but also painlessly and there is little to no bruising or swelling after each procedure. It's amazing how such small tweeks can do so much, it's the exact definition of "Less is more". I've had my 3rd appintment this week to correct some fine lines and, without fail, the results are fantastic. Olivier is one of the best doctors out there and I highly recommend him. Thank you for keeping my skin fresh and natural! Merry Christmas!

Olivier is such a great doctor! I?��ve had about 3 appointments with him now and he?��s always very lovely and reassuring. He also never fails to educate and advise me fully about the work I?��m having done and answers any questions I have even if they?��re silly ones! Excellent!
Olivier is simply amazing.
Ratings from overseas!

Oliver is truely the best! I came in for Botox and was made to feel so at ease and completely relaxed. The procedure was quick and easy and I?��m so happy with the results. I have had so many compliments and have recommended to everyone. Best doctor ever! Thank you

review_title: Excellent clinic-Hospital with a topnotch team
review_body: Excellent clinic-hospital with a top team to match..

I can?��t recommend Mr Olivier Branford and The Cadogan Clinic enough... I came to see Mr Branford about a hand injury and I instantly felt reassured and in safe hands! The only Person I would now trust with all things aesthetics. Thank you again!
Olivier Branford

Good experience. Staff very polite and helpful. I had an appointment with Dr Naveen Cavale. He is a professional who knows very well what he is doing. I am very excited about the breast augumentation and I am looking forward to the treatment. I would definitely recommend Cadogan Clinic.

review_title: In early September I had a basal cell?�?
review_body: In early September I had a basal cell carcinoma removed from under my nose. Dr. Susan Mayou had originally spotted it, didn?��t like the look of it, ordered a biopsy which was then diagnosed to be the BCC.  Dr. Nisith Sheth did the recommended Mohs surgery which was thoroughly explained to me prior to and during the procedure putting my enquiring mind at ease. Within minutes Mr. William Van Niekirk was in the room to perform the required reconstruction. The wound was extensive given the area of the BCC.  Mr. Van Niekirk considered several options on how to cover the wound explaining them to me as he went.  The best option was chosen.  This was quite some experience but I was absolutely calm thanks to the sensitivity of Mr. Van Niekirk and Bushra, the attending nurse. After- care instructions were given to me before I left the clinic and they have worked a treat.  I didn?��t write this review immediately as I wanted to see how it all worked over time but I can absolutely recommend the Cadogan Clinic and its fine doctors for their skill, their sensitivity and care.  Everyone was and is completely brilliant.

review_title: The most wonderful one : Dr Severine
review_body: For the first time I found an aesthetic doctor who truly listened and understood what I wanted - she really has a keen sense of aesthetics and provided the highest quality care. I couldn't be more pleased with the results. Finally a thorough and talented cosmetic doctor, and she's lovely!
Delighted with my experiences with Dr Sheth.  He is kind, understanding and inspires confidence  - I was quite nervous.

I have been followed by Dr Sheth for more than 10 years now. He is an exceptional doctor, extremely qualified, professional and warm at the same time. I had to do quite a few small procedures on my face and eye lids and all his work has been incredibly precise and impeccable, healing to perfection every single time.  He can be trusted 100%
The staff at the clinic are amazing. Nothing is ever a problem.

Dr Olivier Branford is a great surgeon but also a lovely person. He made me feel completely at ease and in safe hands. I can see why he is at the top of his field. He is also very responsive with any queries post surgery which is reassuring. The other staff (especially Ellie Burns) were helpful and friendly too. It?��s a busy clinic so sometimes there are delays but this happens everywhere so not too negative a factor.

review_title: The most amazing experience! Best decision ever.
review_body: I don?��t even know where to start! I recently got a breast augmentation with Olivier Branford and it was the most incredible experience. Literally the best decision I?��ve ever made!! I went to a few other places for consultations before going to him, and none of them even compared! After a few minutes of meeting Dr. Branford I knew he was the surgeon for me. He is so attentive and knew exactly what I wanted. He specialises in natural looking breast augmentations and you can really tell it?��s his passion! The 4D imaging software he used in our first consultation helped me so much with finding a size and really envisioning myself with bigger breasts. The surgery itself was so expertly done, and Dr. Branford and his whole team really cared for me so much the entire time. I?��m now almost 2 weeks post op and I?��ve never been happier - the boobs look INCREDIBLE and not fake at all!! This is everything I?��ve ever wanted and more. Top surgeon! I?��ll be going to him for everything now - filler, Botox, etc. Highly highly highly reccomend. :)
I was so very impressed with the staff at the clinic.  They were all so professional, efficient and friendly.  Not least, it is so very convenient that all the procedures are carried out on-site.
After much deliberation I decided to look into breast augmentation.
Excellent - very professional and friendly staff.
Very clean, well eqipped, convenient combined with efficient and friendly staff.
Great help, very knowledgeable and straight to the point care

review_title: A clinic I?��ll be coming back to
review_body: I came to the Cadogan Clinic for Botox. I?��ve had it done at a different clinic previously but was recommended the Cadogan so decided to book a consultation with Dr Severine Leonet.

review_title: I would highly recommend Dr Sheth
review_body: I would highly recommend Dr Sheth. I was under my local gp for 3 months who misdiagnosed me and had me on three courses of antibiotics. One visit with Dr Sheth and his diagnosis was accurate and within one week of using a cream and Dermol shower gel the issue has gone. I can?��t thank him enough.

review_title: I recently had breast augmentation with Mr William Van Niekerk
review_body: I recently had breast augmentation with Dr William Van Niekerk and I couldn?��t recommend him enough. He listened to exactly what I wanted and has given me exactly that. I will never use any other surgeon except himself. I am 5 weeks post Op and I hardly have any scarring, they just look amazing, cannot recommend this genius enough !!! Thank you for changing my life Mr William Van Niekerk!

review_title: I had the most wonderful lady Severine
review_body: I had the most wonderful lady Severine, who did very subtle cheek and smile line fillers for me a few weeks ago. I was nervous as I've only ever done intermittent Botox and did not feel confident about doing anything else but wanted to look fresher. She was marvellous- honest, engaging and did exactly what I wanted! I look younger and better without it being obvious what I've had done! Can't rate her enough and I will only go to her from now one, for anything else!

I had gynecomastia surgery with Mr Olivier Branford at the Cadogan Clinic. Mr Branford was absolutely first-rate, both in terms of his inter-personal skills and his clinical judgment / expertise. I would not hesitate to recommend him - you are in the safest pair of hands.
Excellent service and amazing people ..

An excellent clinic with friendly staff and knowledgeable consultants in a pleasant calming atmosphere.  Dr Borysiewicz is particularly kind and knowledgeable with a genuine interest in your wellbeing.

An excellent clinic with extremely helpful nurses and my surgeon listened to everything I wanted and gave me that. I am so glad that I did my research and found somewhere that gave me the great service that Cadogan clinic have.

review_title: Lady?��s very good clinic and surgeons?�?
review_body: Lady?��s very good clinic and surgeons ?���?��?

Mr Branford is brilliant, I've been to see him a few times now. He is very assuring and listens to exactly what I want and always delivers the best results. I wouldn't go to anyone else. The clinic is very clean and the reception staff are very friendly.

review_title: Mr Tulley - first class cosmetic surgeon
review_body: Mr Tulley is a master cosmetic surgeon. Careful, thorough, and professional. I went to him after much research and have been thrilled with the results even though it is early days. He is complimented by simply the nicest, most gentle, human, patient nursing and theatre staff I have encountered.  Absolutely a top class team.
Everyone was welcoming from the receptionist to Dr Sheth. The Bedside manner was very professional but never awkward. Communication was perfectly clear and I was never given any unclear information.

I have undergone several minor procedures with Mr Ian Franklin at the Cadogan clinic. The whole experience was totally professional, and as a surgeon myself, I would have no hesitation returning to see Mr Franklin for further treatment at the Cadogan clinic.

review_title: I initially chose Cadogan Clinic as?�?it's exceptional and Camille offers a safe pair of hands!
review_body: I initially chose Cadogan Clinic as it's well-appointed and the staff all appeared incredibly qualified and experienced, especially Camille, who does the Laser Hair Removal. Considering that I was about to put my face into the hands of someone, it was very important to me to that they were qualified and experienced! After my first consultation and patch test, I've had no issues and am very happy with the patch test result so far, as well as the patient after-care/follow-up. Camille herself is warm, friendly and knowledgeable. She offered me her sound professional opinion on what would be the best treatment plan for me. I've already booked my next appointment for November and intend to take it step-by-step to see the results of the treatment, as per Camille's advice! The clinic itself is light, neat and fairly quiet, despite being full of people. I was seen promptly and staff were helpful in booking/re-arranging my appointments and answering any questions. Yes, it's pricey but having done a few laser treatments over the years, around the world, and exploring the options in London which balance safety with quality, I find this actually relatively reasonable!

review_title: Very Professional and Impressive Clinic and People
review_body: Very professional and impressive. I was referred to Dr Nisith Sheth by my GP and was seen almost immediately. My initial appointment was handled excellently -- on time, very quick, very personal and very professional.

review_title: My first visit to the Cadogan Clinic?�?
review_body: My first visit to the Cadogan Clinic was a nice experience.

review_title: I have always wanted Abdominal plastic?�?
review_body: I have always wanted Abdominal plastic surgery after having two children. I  first had a consultation at Harley Street, was not very convinced, did some research and found Cadogon Clinic -met with Surgeon Van Niekerk, who specialises in Abdominal Surgery for  Consultation- He explained the procedure clearly in detail; combining Liposuction with Abdominal Surgery, I was  happy with the consultation and decided  to go ahead with the procedure. Booked my Surgery and upon arrival I was warmly welcomed by staff- The staff were extremely friendly, the environment was conducive. Is one week after my Surgery  today and I'm  very optimistic about the result. I will highly recommend this Clinic though pricy but worth it.
Dr Granite is fantastic. I recommend her to all my friends.

review_title: I visited yesterday for the first time?�?
review_body: I visited yesterday for the first time for  cryotherapy at the Cadogan with Dr Nisith Seth, and he was truly amazing.

review_title: Ive had a couple of surgical procedures?�?
review_body: Ive had a couple of surgical procedures at the Cadogan with Mr Amar, and both experiences have been truly marvellous.

review_title: Severine at The Cadogan Clinic, London
review_body: I recently visited Severine at the Cadogan Clinic to have fillers.  Severine listened to my concerns, and I was extremely comforted by her knowledge on the subject, as well as how fillers would effect the overall look of my face.  I trusted her completely and have been thrilled with the results.  I would definitely recommend Severine to anyone considering fillers for a fresher, more youthful look.

review_title: First time but won't be my last!
review_body: Walking into the Cadogan Clinic for the first time, all I remember feeling was very, very nervous. I had no idea what to expect, in fact I wasn't entirely sure what I wanted to have done, but I was sure it would hurt a lot and I would probably cry.

review_title: Wonderful service from CC and Olivier Brandford
review_body: I have had a few appointments at the Cadogan Clinic with Dr Brandford and can attest to the highest level of service and care that both have promised and delivered throughout the last couple of months.

review_title: Excellent pre-wedding laser hair removal & facials
review_body: Before my wedding I had laser hair removal on my legs and three facials with Camille. The laser was very effective and I would definitely recommend. My bespoke facial treatments included micro-dermabrasion, LED light therapy and blackhead extraction. An incredibly thorough treatment. Both great confidence boosters ahead of the big day. Thank you!
I had been to Clinic in December last year and was impressed.   The Doctor was good.

review_title: Please meet Olivier - you won't regret it!
review_body: Olivier was completely professional and at the same time extremely personal. Something I was looking for in a surgeon.
On the clinical side, Dr Mayou provided an excellent consultation, rapidly building trust that enabled her to conduct a well-informed diagnostic.

review_title: Dr Mayou is absolutely lovely -- I only?�?
review_body: Dr Mayou is absolutely lovely -- I only needed simple help, but she was totally professional, easy to talk to, and massively helpful.  I have finally found my London dermatologist!
I was very well looked after by Mr Amar and his team before, during and after my procedure. I was anxious but easily reassured by competent staff.

Dr N Sheth (Dermatologist) examined my face after a round mark appeared below my eye. I was very worried about it and needed some expert advice. Dr Sheth examined me and explained every very clearly, calming my nerves and making me feel happier. We agreed treatment options and I am happy to say my face is back to normal again with no marks or scars. Dr Sheth is kind and incredibly nice and explains everything very clearly.

review_title: Unorganized and conflicting, but super friendly
review_body: I actually ended up with Cadogan clinic through finding one of their surgeons privately (Real Plastic Surgery), and thus ended up having my procedure done at their clinic.

I had breast augmentation surgery nearly two weeks ago. I researched the surgeon I wanted, Dr Naveen Cavale. My surgery was at the Cadogan Clinic and I'm so happy with how everything went. Can't recommend highly enough to anyone looking to do it. Dr Cavale did an amazing job. He is considerate, professional and gives great advice. Results are fantastic with minimal scarring. All the staff that have looked after me have been very friendly and kind.

I have been going to the Cadogan for a few years now and would highly recommend. The staff are amazing. In particular Dr Sheth is fantastic. Really listens to you and gives great advice as well as being an exceptional Dr. Could not recommend Dr Sheth highly enough.

review_title: It was recommended I see Dr Zamani when?�?
review_body: It was recommended I see Dr Zamani when I attended the Clinic recently and I am totally happy with what she has done - extremely efficient and professional.

review_title: Mr Olivier Branford Cadogan Clinic - breast augmentation
review_body: I?��m a clinical academic Doctor with a passion for evidenced based medicine. When choosing my surgeon and clinic for my breast augmentation procedure, I had a list of requirements. Surgical expertise and evidence-based medicine was a priority. Equally, I know that person-centred care is crucial to achieve the best outcomes. Olivier Branford combines his surgical expertise, evidenced based medicine with individualised person-centred care to achieve the best outcomes for his patients. The quality of care provided by the multi-professional surgical team at the Cadogan clinic was outstanding. If your priority is information and involvement in decision making about goals of treatment, being treated as an individual, being safe and achieving the best possible outcomes, look no further than the Cadogan clinic and Olivier Branford

Incompetent staff. Firstly I had to call the reception after pressing the buzzer twice and waiting 5 minutes for the main door to be opened, secondly I had to chase them to make a payment. I still haven?��t received my invoice that I was promised would be emailed to me. Complete shambles. Save your time and head to Harley Street - You?��ll receive much more professionalism.
Really good experience each time I have visited. Highly recommend.
Wonderful experience from start to finish. The Doctor I saw was extremely experienced and reassuring. I would not hesitate recommending them to anyone.
I?��d recommend them to anyone!
Simply excellent.

review_title: I honestly was very pleased to attend?�?
review_body: I honestly was very pleased to attend your clinic. At the reception, I was received very kindly and nicely. The specialist, Mr. Garraffa was very pleasant indeed and very helpful. He filled the atmosphere with friendly conversation while taking the relevant answer.
I have been visiting Cadogan clinic recently for the treatment of acne.
Staff are all very experienced and professional. Highly recommended!
Excellent service from wonderful staff. Would recommend to all.

review_title: This is an excellent clinic with very?�?
review_body: This is an excellent clinic with very professional staff and top of the field consultants. I highly recommend this as the top clinic in London for these services.

review_title: Excellent. No hesitation recommending Cadogan Clinic.
review_body: The staff have been extremely helpful & friendly.

review_title: So happy with my experience at Cadogan?�?
review_body: So happy with my experience at Cadogan Clinic with Olivier Branford. Amazing doctor who only provides the very best results.

Can not recommend Cadogan highly enough, everyone is professional, friendly and caring.  My surgeon Mr Branford has been amazing from start to finish, his knowledge and expertise is outstanding,  nothing is too much trouble he makes you feel like you are his only patient, I was extremely nervous about surgery but he completely reassured me and I felt safe in his hands,  I am so happy with the results of my breast reduction and lift and would only ever consider Cadogan and Mr Branford for any future procedures!
MR Olivier Amar

review_title: I went to see Maryam Zamani for?�?
review_body: I went to see Maryam Zamani for treatmenr for veins under my eyes and all I can say she is simply the best and the most professional Doctor in the industry.I work in the Aethetics industry my self and have come across many Doctors but no one comes close to Maryam Zamani. Highly recommended.
A wonderful clinic - highly professional, engaged with patients and very kind and calm. Dr Mayou is wise and attentive. All the staff were pleasant, effiicient and effective

review_title: From beginning to end I had nothing but?�?
review_body: EXCELLENT!!!

review_title: I saw Dr Sheth for the treatment of a?�?
review_body: I saw Dr Sheth for the treatment of a basil cell carcinoma skin cancer spot on my nose.  When I learned it had to be treated with surgery I was quite alarmed.  However, Dr Sheth put me at ease and was very open about exactly what my options were and possible outcomes (even with photos).

review_title: Dr Sheth and all the lovely staff at Cadogan Clinic are fantastic.
review_body: I have been using the Cadogan Clinic since 2011. I have always had excellent care.  I have had Mohs surgery a couple of times and photodynamic therapy several times to treat my skin cancer.  The care is outstanding and Dr Sheth has been a wonderful doctor.   My mother and several friends, whom I have recommended to use the clinic, have been equally happy and treated amazingly with very positive results.

review_title: Dr Anjali Mahto is a wonderful?�?
review_body: Dr Anjali Mahto is a wonderful dermatologist.

I had Mohs surgery done by Dr. Sheth on my nose due to a BCC.  I must say not only was it pleasant to be at the clinic but also Dr. Seth did an excellent job as my scare is barely visible. Additionally, I felt safe and well taken care of.

I have visited the Cadogan Clinic for several different procedures (mole mapping with Dr Alexis Granite, mole removal, a foot problem with Kaser Nazir and some non-surgical treatments - laser hair removal).  I  am always so impressed by the service and bedside manner of the staff there and would not hesitate to recommend the clinic to anyone.  Thank you!
Very professional staff. Great Clinic!!!!

Agree with other reviews. Dreadful communication and management, hard to make an appointment and when I did I was kept waiting for an hour. Avoid if you value your time over theirs, which of course is charged at a premium.
Incompetent staff, impossible to speak to management when something goes wrong.

review_title: A superb service - reassuring to have skin checked by a trusted Dr.
review_body: Excellent service ... Dr Nisith Sheth was charming and very thorough with the consultation. He put my mind at rest and reacted quickly when I was concerned about a skin outbreak. Very reassuring to check the whole body for any moles or sun damage and action was taken swiftly to deal with any minor issues. His advice ongoing is superb. Easy to recommend with confidence. I shall return for a follow up and periodic check ups. Reception staff also charming.
Professional and curteous

review_title: I first came to see Dr Sheth at Cadogan ?�?
review_body: I first came to see Dr Sheth at Cadogan Clinic many years ago and have not looked back since.  I was very nervous about the procedures I was considering and he was able to make me feel completely at ease and answered each of my (million!) questions with kindness and patience.

I came to see Nisith Sheth for Mohs surgery for  basal cell carcinoma near my eye initially about 2 years ago. I transferred for my job from Connecticut USA and was recommended to him by my dermatologist at Yale.  From beginning to end I felt very safe and comfortable in his hands. He is a consummate professional and compassionate. The clinic is in a great location and the nursing staff were all so kind and considerate.  I've been really happy with the final results and have come back for regular checks and also some laser treatment for problems on my nose which I was delighted he could fix. I have recommended my friends and will continue to do so

review_title: Dr Granite is an exceptional practitioner ?�?
review_body: Dr Granite is an exception practitioner -- from her expert advice, flawless execution and impeccable bedside manor, she is my first choice for all procedures and consultations, big or small.

review_title: Dermatology Treatment with Dr Nish Sheth
review_body: Dr Sheth has been a really attentive and kind physician while I've been under his care. His communication has been fantastic at every appointment and he's never left me in any doubt about the options available, his thoughts/recommendations and what I should expect from treatment. Most importantly, I've seen a really huge improvement!

I recently discovered a small lump under my arm and attended the clinic. Following a thorough examination, Dr Sheth  informed me that this was a cyst and diagnosed the underlying condition. Dr Sheth demonstrated his wealth of knowledge and really took the time to explain my condition in detail before carrying out a surgical procedure to remove the cyst.

review_title: I would recommend this company to ?�?
review_body: I would recommend this company to anyone. Dr Granite is the tops.

Dr. Sheth did a MOHS procedure on my nose and a skin graft.   After 3 months no one notices the graft.   Dr. Sheth is the best along with his staff.   I can't say enough good things about Dr. Sheth and his expertise, lovely man....     Nameste.

review_title: I attended the clinic for a treatment ?�?
review_body: I attended the clinic for a treatment of Botox into the forehead
A highly professional clinic. My nerves were put at ease by my surgeon from the initial consultation and today at my post op appointment I couldn't be happier with the choice that I made.

I have seen Dr Maryam Zamani for several different treatments and can't recommend her highly enough. Her manner is very friendly, warm and direct (no schmooz or hot air, like some male cosmetic doctors I've met...) and I trust her implicitly. She's helped me enormously with self-confidence and putting my best face forward.

I recently had botox on my forehead and crows feet with Libbie Wallace. Libbie was extremely thorough with her questionnaire and when talking me through the areas I wanted done. She explained where she would inject and what the outcomes should be. I really felt confident in Libbie's ability and am really happy with the job that she has done!  I couldn't recommend her highly enough!

I met Dr Sheth when I recently found a mole and wanted to get it checked. Both he and the nurse, Leanne, were absolutely fantastic. Certainly there was no waiting time: I was seen immediately, examined, taken straight down to theatre and the mole was swiftly removed. The mole was fast-tracked for analysis and as soon as he had the result, Dr Sheth called me and let me know. I needed a second excision, and this was carried out just as smoothly and painlessly as the first. Dr Sheth and Leanne were very professional and did an excellent job, but they were also incredibly kind and reassuring, and made sure I had all the information I needed. I was also given a contact number for Dr Sheth, with the assurance that I could call him at any time. The discovery of a mole is unpleasant and frightening, but I could not have been in better hands. If anyone I know or meet should discover a mole, I will urge them to go straight to Dr Sheth.

I saw Nisith Sheth following a referral from Bupa. He was kind considerate and understanding. He clearly explained everything to me, the options that I had and for me to make a decision on my own. Treatment was successful and after 6 months he even saw me at my request to reassure me everything had healed, despite my medical health cover had lapsed. Wonderful man!
I been to the clinic for a peel and the service provided was simply amazing. They are a lovely staff that cares for their patients. Would highly recommend this clinic in the heart of Chelsea.

review_title: I recently had 2 procedures done at The ?�?
review_body: I recently had 2 procedures done at The Cadagan Clinic. I had my breast implants removed and Liposuction to my upper and lower abs and flanks. From my first consultation with Mr Olivier Amar to the day of my op and aftercare I can only say I received 5 star treatment. The whole atmosphere at the clinic was super friendly putting me at ease and all the staff from the receptionists to the nurses to Mr Amar
I went to see the beautiful Dr Zamani earlier this year to see if she could help me look less tired and help brighten me up around the edges.

I can thoroughly recommend Dr. Nisith Sheth. After several years of worrying about unsightly moles I took the decision to seek removal. I was very concerned about scarring and had been told to prevaricate by other health professionals. However, when I went to Dr Sheth he was confident in achieving a good outcome and certainly did so for me. The treatment was quick and efficient and the results were excellent.

Following recommendation by an NHS dermatologist, I have seen Dr Sheth for a series of IPL treatments for rosacea and to help improve the appearance of scar tissue on my chin. Due to a bad experience elsewhere which caused the scar on my chin I was a little nervous before my first treatment, but quickly realised I had no reason to be. Dr Sheth is very professional in his manner, whilst being friendly and thoughtful; he made me feel comfortable and reassured throughout. He explained beforehand what he would be doing, how the treatments work and the results I could expect. The end result is clearly important to him too. I am thrilled with my end result, I have complete trust in Dr Sheth and would highly recommend him.

I was referred to Dr Sheth for an uncomfortable allergic reaction to a flu vaccination. He was on time, sympathetic, knowledgeable and kind, prescribed topical and oral medication and I was much improved after three applications. He has a wonderful, caring manner and I would not hesitate to recommend him. He is definitely my 'go-to' specialist.

I have been suffering from painful blistering rashes on my skin for the past 4 months and was referred to Dr Mahto after the previous consultant couldn't find an obvious cause or solution to the problem. Dr Mahto was able to see me immediately and was very helpful from the beginning. After an initial consultation she booked me in for a skin biopsy the same afternoon to get the ball rolling ASAP, she is still investigating the problem but throughout has been incredibly thorough and attentive and has given me great hope in finally finding out what the problem is and dealing with it. Dr Mahto has also been very helpful in terms of getting further tests done and fitting me in to see her ASAP.  Based upon my experience with Dr Mahto I could not recommend her highly enough.

review_title: Wish I had done this earlier!
review_body: I had been suffering from acne for about 10 months before a friend recommended Dr Anjali Mahto. My acne was making me feel incredibly upset and impacting my confidence. I started to avoid seeing friends and family and I knew I had to do something. Dr Mahto was fabulous from the moment I met her at my initial consultation. She was so welcoming, caring, personable, friendly and made me feel comfortable immediately. Dr Mahto really listened to how I felt and could empathize with me. Dr Mahto answered all my questions and addressed my worries which reassured me. I only I wish I had made an appointment earlier!

review_title: Dr. Nisith Sheth's expertise, charming and caring manner is, in my opinion, second to none.
review_body: I had not previously heard of The Cadogan Clinic, but so very luckily I was referred on to the Clinic by my Doctor.  I was extremely impressed with all the care and attention I received during my admission last month.  The whole team, across the board are both professional and courteous.  Dr. Nisith Sheth is indeed a master of his art and he certainly puts his all into the job in hand.  Dr. Sheth has given me my confidence back, in that before surgery I had a prominent growth on my face, which I felt very embarrassed about.  I had previously been told that the growth was a seborrhoeic keratosis and therefore nothing to worry about but it turned out to be a BCC, diagnosed by Dr. Sheth.  Now, after Dr. Sheth's magnificent surgery I am left with a very minimal scar, with some of my friends saying 'Are you sure you had surgery' ?    So a recommendation indeed!

review_title: Excellent Clinic and Doctor - Nisith Sheth
review_body: I saw Dr. Nisith Sheth after researching extensively.  I was becoming resistant to Botox and was not having any luck with other doctors in finding a solution.  I saw Dr. Sheth and he came up with multiple solutions. I have been seeing him for almost a year and my skin looks fantastic!  He takes the time to get to know his patients, has great bedside manner and is incredibly knowledgeable.  Cadogan Clinic is also a very nice place to visit with excellent staff and service.  They even offer makeup application after fillers if you are going somewhere after your treatment, in my case work, and do not want any sign that you had injections.  I would highly recommend Cadogan Clinic and Dr. Nisith Sheth to anyone.

I have been looked after by Dr Anjali Mahto on a number of occasions and I cannot fault the level of care she provides.  She takes time to understand  the result you want to achieve and is very gentle.  I'm a bit nervous with needles around my mouth (bad dentist experience) but she spotted my anxiety immediately, stopped and then talked me through until I was ready to carry on again.  A really really great Dermotologist and I would highly recommend her.

review_title: Excellent - I would recommend this company to anyone
review_body: I've had quite extensive botox & fillers several times with Dr Anjali Mahto - I have to say not only is she really gentle, with no bruising, but my results were unbelievably natural looking - I would recommend her to anyone - a real treasure!

Dr Nisith Sheth was recommended to me by a dermatologist through my company?��s health care scheme. I found Dr Sheth to be very personable and informative. Dr Sheth discussed in detail the treatments available to me and did so in a warm, and compassionate manner. The level of service I received from Dr Sheth, his PA and the nursing team at The Cadogan Clinic was first rate. From the initial consultation through to the aftercare I received post operation was of a very high standard and I am very grateful to Dr Sheth and his team for helping me through a challenging period.

review_title: Truly excellent professional  service with attention to detail.
review_body: Cadogan Cosmetics is a top professional organisation and I would recommend it to anyone who wishes to receive professional expert dermatological treatment I was advised that Dr. Niseth Sheth was an excellent surgeon to treat my BCC ( Basel cell carcinoma). I was at once put at ease by him and his totally professional but relaxed style. The entire procedure was explained to me by him in a simple but concise way before we commenced. At all times he was at pains to ensure I was comfortable and his bed side manner was exemplary. The outcome was exactly as he described beforehand and I am totally satisfied.

I have been a patient of Cadogan Clinic for many years and have continually been looked after by the team with the most fantastic care. All the staff are so welcoming and on one occasion when I had to have a small procedure they completely put me at ease. I couldn't recommend them more highly.

Thank you to Dr Sheth and the team at Cadogan! Such a friendly helpful staff. I've had problem skin most of my adult life. Dr Sheth was very understanding and explained everything so clearly. So happy with the treatment. Telling everyone I know to see him if possible. Thanks again

review_title: I could not recommend Dr Sheth more highly
review_body: I was referred to Dr Sheth by my local dermatologist who said that if anyone else in his family should need treatment, Dr Sheth is the man to go to.  He was completely right.  Initially, I sought help for Rosacea and Dr Sheth immediately put me at my ease with an extended introductory consultation discussing, in depth, the various treatment options. I chose to have ointment and IPL and my Rosacea has gone and my skin is now pale and smooth, no longer red and spotty.  Thanks to Dr Sheth?��s success and his empathetic bedside manner I felt confident to seek his help with non surgical cosmetic surgery.
