His use of fillers has made a dramatic difference to my face, almost eradicating my nasal labial folds and even disguising my prominent eye bags.  Botox has successfully slowed down the ageing process, especially on the lines on my forehead.  When I developed Basal Cell Melanoma, Dr Sheth could not have been more helpful or professoinal, again taking time to do extensive tests and always giving sensitive advice. The treatment over several areas, including my face, was a total success and Dr Sheth and the Cadogan Clinic nurses could not have been more helpful at comforting me during what could have been a traumatic series of treatments and ensuring that I did not suffer any pain. Dr Sheth is an excellent communicator.  He always answers my queries promptly.  He always takes the time to explain, give honest information about expected outcomes and reassure me.   I feel extremely fortunate to have had such great success with treatments under an exceptional doctor.

review_title: A wonderful experience from start to finish
review_body: I made the decision to go to Cadogan Clinic after doing thorough research. I met with Nisith Sheth as I wanted to get fillers but I also had a skin condition that was knocking my confidence. Nisith Sheth is clearly very knowledgeable and I most definitely felt in safe hands, just by taking a look he knew what I had was sebborrheic dermatitis. We went through the process for the dermal fillers and I have to say he was wonderful and made me feel completely at ease, I came back a couple of weeks later just as a follow up check up to make sure everything was okay. The result look amazing and very natural, my skin is also clearing up on the basis of the prescription I was provided. I would definitely recommend Cadogan Clinic to anyone looking for something similar.

review_title: Trustworthy surgeon, backed up with research and great service
review_body: My recent experience of the Cadogan Clinic has been an incredibly positive one. With Mr Garrick Georgeu as my surgeon I received a thorough consultation - far more so than others I'd had elsewhere. I revisited him several times before my procedure as I needed reassurance of my options, which he willingly accommodated, giving sound advice at each stage. His assistant also helped ease the process, and gave useful input on all aspects of the procedure. The procedure itself couldn't have been more straightforward and I'm over the moon with the incredible results.
I attended the clinic having been to a specialist, several high profile skin care specialists etc. I had two groupings of spider veins.

I always go to Cadogan Cosmetics to get my Botox treatments with Dr. Maryam Zamani, she makes me feel at ease, knows what is best to enhance my face and the results are longer-lasting than other places I have been.  The staff at the clinic are also helpful and friendly.  I would recommend Dr. Zamani at Cadogan to anyone wanting anti-ageing treatments.

review_title: Neck lift with Mr Olivier Amar
review_body: I had a neck lift with Mr Olivier Amar at Cadogan Cosmetics after researching various clinics.  He was very informative and reassuring in the consultation and keen to give me natural-looking results so I felt confident in going with him.  The nurses and staff at the clinic were very helpful and friendly and really looked after me, and I am really happy with my surgery.  I would highly recommend Mr. Amar and the Cadogan Cosmetics to anyone wanting subtle but effective enhancements- I would definitely return in the future!

I had a mandelic peel in Feb 2015 with Sophie who was really professional and gave me some great advice for my skin,  the peel really helped and I left the clinic with a glowing complexion! I will be going back for further treatments x
Excellent service from start to finish I have already booked my next appointment.

review_title: Great staff and red carpet treatment!
review_body: I had a cosmetic procedure last year at Cadogan Cosmetics and I am thrilled with the results!  The staff are all helpful and friendly, and I was looked after superbly from beginning to end.

I had Cellfina around 3 months ago, the procedure was carried out by Apul Parikh who I can't speak highly enough of. Apul made me feel comfortable from the moment I met him, such a kind and friendly man. He talked me through everything in our pre procedure appointment and encouraged me to get in touch if I thought of anything else at all.

review_title: The exceptionally talented Dr Tapan Patel
review_body: What can I say about Dr Tapan Patel ? Where do I start? The words that come to my mind are ; meticulous, highly professional, a light touch with a real attention to detail. You can trust him to do the best by your face because his work matters to him. I?��ve seen Dr Tapan Patel grow over the years but his down to earth but warm and comforting manner are still the same . An exceptionally talented doctor who truly cares and is great at his job.

review_title: Don?��t recommend - Plenty of better clinics on Harley street
review_body: I used to love this clinic when I first started going! Great location, friendly people, you really feel your going to the best place on Harley street... but your not..

review_title: Totally looked after from the minute?�?o
review_body: Totally looked after from the minute you enter.  Beautiful clinic, with kind and friendly staff. Would highly recommend PHI clinic
Excellent. Thorough diagnosis and treatment recommendations and advice provided. The treatments were very effective and I?��m very pleased with the results. Highly recommended.

review_title: I had a lip augmentation with Sarah @?�?
review_body: I had a lip augmentation with Sarah @ Phi and as a first timer, I cannot recommend her enough! She calmed me down and made the process so easy straightforward and pain-free. She also produced gorgeous results- I am so happy with my lips- THANKYOU SARAH!!!!
I cannot recommend PHI Clinic highly enough.

Great professional service. My nurse, Sam, was very diligent and explained everything to me. I was a first time visitor and the clinic made me feel very welcome and ensured I fully understood what my services entailed. You can put your trust in them. I wlill definitely be back.

review_title: Fantastic experience for first timer to?�?
review_body: Fantastic experience for first timer to Botox. I can't recommend Phi Clinic enough. Dr Patel and Nurse Sam were extremely professional and made me feel comfortable. I got Botox on 3 areas and the result was very natural and completely removed the crow feet around my eyes! I'm so happy with the results that I have booked another appointment in November before I'm a bridesmaid in December.

I couldn?��t recommend Phi Clinic highly enough. The clinic has a very welcoming environment. Dr Patel and his staff spent time getting to know me and my skin at the beginning of each of my sessions. Sam Knuckey shows real skill and care when carrying out her treatments. I consider Sam a very safe and thorough set of hands to trust when it comes to my skin.

I visited Sam at Phi for a botox treatment and am so happy with the results! It was my first treatment and she was very reassuring and took the time to explain things to make sure I was comfortable. Everyone else at the clinic was kind and professional as well, and the clinic itself is lovely. I also appreciated the fact that the whole process was efficient - I was in and out in less than half an hour and could go straight on to work afterwards. I would highly recommend Sam and this clinic to anyone, I felt like I was in very safe hands and the results are better than I could have hoped.

review_title: First time visit to Phi Clinic
review_body: Couldn?��t recommend Nurse Sam more. For someone who had never visited an aesthetic clinic before I was very grateful that she took the time to carefully explain the process to me and was professional at all times. Very happy with the results!

I recently had my first botox treatment at PHI Clinic with Sarah Gaughan and couldn't be happier with it. Having botox was a big decision for me in terms of the cost, the upkeep, the social perception and what I was putting into my face; I researched a lot of different clinics, spoke to friends, read online reviews and spoke to different clinic receptionists for information. I decided to pay �50 for a consultation with Sarah to receive more tailored advice, during which Sarah was friendly, professional and very knowledgable, and her approach was holistic - looking at my face and listening to my concerns to give her professional opinion on what it would benefit from rather than just pushing botox as that was what I had enquired about. There was no pressure to proceed - in fact, she stressed the importance of going away to have a think about it, and sent me lots of information to read on email afterwards.

review_title: Planning my next visit to the beautiful PHI Clinic
review_body: PHI Clinic on Harley Street has the perfect balance of a professional, friendly and luxurious environment to put you immediately at ease. With the security of being in a clinical environment and the comforts of a 5* spa, I knew I was in the right place. The staff were very welcoming and friendly from the minute I stepped foot inside the clinic.
Professional and amazing treatments that work!

review_title: Mole removal from cheek under right eye
review_body: I had an unsightly mole on my cheek under my right eye.

review_title: Would not hesitate to recommend this?�?
review_body: Would not hesitate to recommend this clinic to anyone! Every aspect was brilliant, friendly, professional, I felt very trusting of the clinic and in safe hands. The treatment itself has changed my face and life. Something that I used to only dream about has become reality! If you are looking for a clinic, 100% choose the PHI Clinic.

review_title: Went into the clinc and not really?�?
review_body: Went into the clinc and not really somewhere i thought i would of gone, Sarah made me feel really welcome and put my nerves at ease.

review_title: My entire experience at the Phi Clinic?�?
review_body: My entire experience at the Phi Clinic has been first rate.  I had filler treatment with Mr Parikh and he is clearly a conservative expert in his field and produced a beautiful, natural and subtle result that I just love.  I will be his patient for a long time to come.

Having had many of my friends visiting phi clinic for the past few years I decided to give it a go myself and have some treatments done! I went for the silk peel facial and couldn?��t be happier with my skin! Then I went for another! The level of professionalism at phi is second to none. Overall a very knowledgable yet relaxing experience for me. I?��m booked in next for the V dream treatment which I?��m really looking forward to. Niamh and Sarah who looked after me are amazing! review_title: There is no better place for cosmetic?�?

Wonderfully realistic advice and reassuring staff. So happy with the results of my treatment at the hands of Dr Nestor and Jenna Staal that I have recommended them to friends and colleagues. Fabulous results which make the prices worthwhile.
Dr Tapan Patel is outstanding. Unbelievable results.

review_title: Best Clinic I have been to!
review_body: Having had terrible skin all my life and being promised ?��miracles?�� for huge sums of money with little or no results.... I was recommended PHI & I can honestly say that the advice and care I have received has been faultless! Dr Benji Dhillon is professional and caring and treats you with the upmost care and compassion. His knowledge is second to none and I would recommend him in a heartbeat! I have had many treatments with him and each time I am treated he explains everything I ask... believe me I ask ALOT!

review_title: Phi Clinic is one of the best private ?�?
review_body: Phi Clinic is one of the best private Clinic in London. Dr Apul Perikh is very good Surgeon. He is very professional and friendly. I felt he is a long friend of mine. He makes you feel comfortable. I recommend PHI CLINIC to any Patients who needs their services.

review_title: I gave your clinic a 5 star rating on ?�?
review_body: I gave your clinic a 5 star rating on the basis of Nurse Jude��s exemplary treatment (and the pretty smiling receptionist!) But seriously not only are the results fantastic but it��s the caring side I appreciated; I knew she really did care.  She��s an Irish Florence Nightingale. Rosacea can be a devastating skin condition reducing a grown man; myself, to tears on many occasions, and even thoughts of suicide. For over 20 years, I have avoided social encounters, broken up with girlfriends, quit jobs all because of my rosacea. Nurse Jude understood that immediately, that this simply wasn��t a cosmetic issue for me. There is nothing more I can say about her without sounding "Goddess" worshipping and slightly creepy ;-). Oh go on then a few more lines, I will miss her tremendously; her fantastic wit, her compassion, our banter, even her little note taking and of course the results. This man has been given his life back. No strike that, I��ve been given a life better than I thought possible. I stand taller and finally meet people eye to eye. Nurse Jude I hope you read this, congratulations on your pregnancy and seriously from the bottom of my heart I cannot thank you enough. Watch out world here I come!
I had a few procedures done with Jude whom I can not thank enough for everything.

review_title: The team at PHI Clinic is amazing
review_body: The team at PHI Clinic is amazing - the techs are very knowledgeable and helpful and Dr. Benji is an excellent aesthetic physician. Could recommend it more.

I started getting treatment at Phi Clinic in August for hyperpigmentation left behind from acne, i deffintiley didn't expect to get the results that I have had. My practitioner, Jenna Staal, started off by giving me a new skin care routine to follow before I started my treatment. I have since had 5 vbeam treatments and will probabaly only need one more to get to being confident to go out with no make up on at all. Which is crazy because my skin was covered in red marks before starting. I have 100% confidence in Jenna and literally can't thank her enough esspecially after seeing my before and after photos. Very happy with my decision to start treatment here and have no doubt that I will continue to come back here for any concerns I ever have for any kind of cosmetic procedure.

review_title: I am very pleased with the results I am ?�?
review_body: I am very pleased with the results I am achieving at PHI Clinic, Jude Dunican gave me great advice and a treatment plan to deal with Rosacia, a problem I've had for a while.
I cannot recommend Jenna Staal enough, her attention to detail and customer service is excellent, thank you.
I was very pleased when the  team of the Phi Clinic asked for a riewiew of my experience with nurse Jude Duncan as

review_title: I've become a little bit addicted to my ?�?
review_body: I've become a little bit addicted to my visits to the PHI clinic. I feel more youthful the minute I walk in the front door! I started with some laser treatment to my hands, I then went on to laser treatment to my face, and with that completing on my next visit, I'm going to go for the THERMIva treatment. I've been going to the clinic every month for the past 8 months. I always get a friendly welcome from all the staff. I had imagined with the clinic being in Harley street that the staff may be a bit stuffy but quite the opposite is true.  My highest praise has to go to Jude Dunican. She is such a lovely professional lady with an exceptionally kind and gentle manner. She's very knowledgable and totally believes in her treatments and potential achievable results. I've been receiving compliments on how good my skin looks. I'm always happy to recommend my treatments and pass on Jude Dunican's name. Many thanks.

review_title: I would highly recommend Dr Apul Parik
review_body: I would highly recommend Dr Apul Parikh to my friends, family and anyone who will listen.

review_title: I will recommend Dr Apul Parikh to ?�?
review_body: I will recommend Dr Apul Parikh to everyone who is looking for the smoothest & best procedure.

review_title: There is truly no better place for ?�?

Dr Dillan is so professional and knowledgeable! The receptionists are always polite and lovely. Making the overall experience pleasant and smooth, even though I dread kneedles!
A perfect experience. Jude was confident and made me feel totally at ease and the treatment was brilliant.

review_title: Whenever I visit the PHI clinic I am ?�?
review_body: Whenever I visit the PHI clinic I am always greeted with a friendly and experienced person, be it the receptionist or Dr Benji Dhillon.  This week I was greeted by the lovely, very competent and highly trained Jude Dunnican who carried out an Ultra former treatment with exceptional professionalism.  I can certainly see the results after only a few days.  I will definitely book in for another treatment in the near future when recommend by Jude.  Thanks PHI

This is an amazing treatment: I decided to do it because about a year ago I started to suffer from stress incontinence. Not only is the treatment effective, but also thanks to Nurse Jude?��s charm and expertise the process itself is comfortable and even relaxing. I felt at ease and in safe hands. I am delighted I decided to do this because besides treating the stress incontinence, ThermiVa has increased sensitivity and made the whole area feel alive again. Thank you Nurse Jude!

Hi Jude,
