Just brilliant
Considerate, professional, efficient expertise. Welcoming and honest service.

I met with Jude Dunican for a consultation four months ahead of my wedding -in relation to my post pregnancy skin scarring and pigmentation and with her nurturing, warm and ultra professional expertise, I have the best skin I have ever had. Unlike the other clinics I went to, no one tried to sell my courses of treatments I didn't need. She also knew how to take care of my Olive Asian skin. I cannot recommend Phi enough
Dr. Patel, he's  very thourow and very professional, he answered questions and understood my  worries and anxieties and put me at ease.

review_title: So I hardly leave reviews unless....
review_body: So I hardly leave reviews unless my experience has been absolutely amazing, or in this case quite the opposite.

I have been visiting this clinic for Botox for a quite some time now, and the results are always consistently flawless. The clinic itself is bright and calm, receptions staff always incredibly polite and helpful, and Dr Benji Dhillon always very welcoming and excellent at his work. I have tried getting Botox (frown lines) at other clinics and there is no comparison. It normally takes 2 weeks to the full result with Botox, but I see an instant change every single time. An overall excellent experience. Thank you ever so much

The Phi-Clinic is excellent, the service and treatments are wonderful. Many thanks to Jude for her excellent service and advice. I had for the second time, a chemical peel. The treatment is really good and gives an amazing result.

review_title: I had been suffering with really bad ?�?
review_body: I had been suffering with really bad skin for quite some time, with hyperpigmentation from acne, and was very happy to have come across PHI Clinic and nurse Jude in particular. I had been to other clinics before, but was disappointed with the treatments. The expert advise and treatment that I received from PHI Clinic has really exceeded my expectations and I would not hesitate to recommend them! Nurse Jude was very helpful and her advise and expertise has led me to have a very successful end result. She was very patient with me when I was feeling frustrated and thanks to her guidance, I trusted the process and now very happy. Thank you Jude and PHI Clinic!

Couldn't thank "Jude" enough for the brilliant job she has done for me; my facial scar is improving amazingly. she is well experienced and cares about the outcome of every treatments she provides; also has got lovely personality; being welcoming and companionate; couldn't ask for more.

review_title: An excellent clinic with excellent staff
review_body: I have had a number of treatments at the Phi Clinic and I have no hesitation in recommending it. The equipment is new and up-to-the-minute but they are careful to ensure any treatments they do are in the patient's best interest.

review_title: I love my results! Thank you Dr Dhillon
review_body: I was quite anxious about going to see Dr Dhillon. But I knew I was unhappy with the way I looked and I had heard that the PHI clinic was the best.

review_title: i recently had a number of treatment to ?�?
review_body: i recently had a number of treatment to treat acne scars.

I underwent a Cellfina treatment at the Phi Clinic under the care of Dr Benji Dhillon.  Dr Dhillon has a fantastic bedside manner, he made me feel at ease and talked me through details of the whole procedure.  My cellulite was not severe, but he was confident that I would see some improvement with the treatment.  The procedure itself was uncomfortable when the local anaesthetic was being infiltrated, as can be expected, then, once that had taken effect the rest was completely painless.  The adrenaline made me feel a little under par a few hours later, but I just took it easy for the rest of the day.  There was some bruising afterwards, and some discomfort, but nothing that a couple of paracetamol couldn't handle.  There was minor swelling locally, but this went down within a day or two.  I did not have to limit my activities at all in the days following, but I did need to wear a compression garment for 2 weeks, which made me feel very svelte!  The results were better than I could have hoped for.  There has been a great visible improvement.  Thank you Benji and thanks to all the staff that have seen me through my journey at the Phi clinic.  The service and the after care advise you provide is exemplary to your profession.

I visited Dr Dhillon as I was very uncomfortable with the cellulite on the top of my legs and bottom. I am very sporty but it didn't seem to matter how much exercise I did, nothing got rid of the cellulite.

PHI clinic is fantastic. I had a few laser treatments now with Jenna Staal and she is just wonderful. Very professional and puts me at ease every time. Dr Patel at the helm is also outstanding. So far all the treatments I had have been a great success and I will continue to come back here. Top marks. Julia

I have been receiving treatments at the Phi clinic for the last couple of months and I am very pleased and impressed with the results and with Jenna Staal who performed the treatments. Everything was explained carefully to me and I was made to feel extremely comfortable throughout the treatments, I would highly recommend the Phi Clinic
I went to the PHI Clinic after finding it on Google and I am thrilled with the care and results I received.

review_title: I have been on recommendation to PHI ?�?
review_body: I have been on recommendation to PHI clinic a couple times to have my Red Thread Veins on my face treated. Having previously had IPL, and Veinwave I can honestly say this was the most successful treatment to date and I was treated by the lovely Jenna Staal. I am an Aesthetic Nurse myself and then decided a little facial tightening would help my jawline , on discussion with Jenna we decided that Ultraformer treatment would be the most appropriate. Jenna explained everything and the treatment was a little uncomfortable but I was expecting it to be much worse. Jenna makes you feel really comfortable, is very friendly and professional. PHI clinic is my favorite place for any Non Surgical Treatments where you can be sure of getting the best treatment without pressure and its all really relaxing in an clinical environment.

review_title: Always look forward to my next visit
review_body: Have had a number of treatments at the Phi clinic and have always been happy with the results and level of care. Jenna Staal is extremely kind and always makes me feel at ease, takes the time to listen to my concerns and answers any queries I have.
A week ago I went to the PHI Clinic to have a PHI TRIPLE REPAIR, which is one of the very latest treatments used by this excellent clinic to rejuvenate and enhance skin quality.

I have been visiting PHI clinic to see Kelli- Anne for Vbeam laser. She is extremely helpful, polite, professional and I had a pleasure to have her treat my problem, moreover I am very pleased with results. Clinic overall is very clean and all staff are very nice, helpful and flexible! I would recommend this place to everyone! Thank you for your hard work.

I first experienced hyperhidrosis at the age of 11 years - I still remember my sister wanting to try my top on and will never forget her comment 'your so sweaty, the underams on this top are so wet! This is when I first noticed my sweating problem and since then I suffered everyday in silence. My teenage years were a nightmare - my school shirt and PE t-shirt was white which mean my big round patches where obvious and due to this embarassing problem I would never take off my school jumper even when I was baking in summer. I would never wear any colours apart from black and made out I do not like colourful tops. I did visit my gp who prescribed me strong deodorants, but these were so strong they would burn the skin under my arms and I would be in agony throughout the night - and to make things worse I would still sweat a little bit the next day and have wet patches but smaller ones compared to what I normally had. I tried every deodorant in the market but nothing worked. I searched and searched for treatments but I could not find anything which did not consist of having to go under the theatre. I did not want to risk having an operations as there was a lot of negative side effects of undergoing the operation so from then i left searching and continued to suffer from hyperhidrosis all throughout my teenage years and early twenties until I reached the age of 26. One day in April 2016 I was so frustrated of having wet pits that I started searching again and this time round Miradry came up. I had never heard of this treatment before and read and read for months - this treatment excited me however I thought this is too good to be true - this cant be as good as it sounds. So again I left the idea until one day in November I thought what do I have to loose? I will never know unless I  give it a try. From my months and months  of research I already knew of PHI clinic and chose to have my treatment in that clinic as it was closest to my work,
Got exactly what I asked for. Very friendly clinic
Lovely team of people. Dr Taoan is very helpful with his advice and also professional

review_title: I found PHI clinic to be extremely professional, friendly and delivered excellent results.
review_body: I have suffered from rosacea and bad flushing of my face to the point where I was embarrassed to socialise. I have tried many other clinics and many other techniques without success. I found the PHI clinic on the internet and my first consultation was with Jude Dunican who I found to be very friendly and professional. Jude explained very clearly what I could expect from the treatments that she was recommending. I am now 7 months into the treatment and the results are amazing. I would also like to say that Jude was very supportive and encouraging throughout my treatments. I intend to continue with my treatment and would recommend both Jude and the clinic to anybody else suffering in the same way as myself.

He is a very honest man, very friendly and helpful vibes. I went in as after having two children feel my face has flattened mid face he told me he thought i had absolutely beautiful features and how people aspire to have a heart face like mine. He said he would advise nothing as i didnt need fillers but if i really wanted it(trust me i was adamnt) he said i could get a few drops not even 1ml put in to make my face more symetrical,i said yes lets do that... It didnt hurt just a scratch from the injection thats all.. He answered all my questions i wasnt hesistant at all in asking will be back in for a follow up in a few weeks.All in all he is brilliant and knows his work well!

I suffered from severe acne from my early teens (in my 20s now) and no other clinic was able to get rid of it. My acne was so terrible that I was not able to sleep some nights because of the pain. My acne was extremely stubborn. Before coming to the PHI clinic, I had previously been on Roaccutane and that did not help. My GP and previous clinics ran out of options.
I had the Miradry treatment with Kelli-Anne Mottling and it has been amazing. The procedure was very easy and the results have been absolutely fantastic. I would definitely recommend!

review_title: No hesitation in recommending Dr Patel
review_body: I have had both Botox treatments and filler several times now with Dr Patel. The results have always been excellent and exactly what I requested at the outset. I would have no hesitation at all in recommending him to anyone wanting this type of treatment.
I had Mir Dry done here. The clinic is very professional and makes you feel very safe and comfortable. My clinician Jude was amazing, very knowledgeable, experienced and would highly recommend her.

Everything about phi clinic is outstanding! Dr Patel,  his assistants and staff are all extremely friendly and welcoming. He's my number one guy for fillers and Botox and I can't recommend him highly enough!

review_title: The Best Doctor I Have Ever Seen
review_body: Moving here from New York was one of the most wonderful decisions I could have made, but there were, of course, some concerns. One of them was finding a dermatologist who I could trust and turn to. After visiting several doctors, I found Dr. Patel and knew that I was "at home" within a few minutes after sitting in his chair. Knowledgeable, patient, kind and truly committed to helping me achieve my best possible results, Dr. Patel was not only the best doctor I have been to in London, but in life. Since going to him, I have not only had some of my biggest concerns addressed in a compassionate and skilled manner, but I have discovered new, non-invasive ways to put my best face forward. I really
Excellent location. Large modern clinic with good facilities. Dr Patel was professional and very understanding  with regard to my treatment. I would highly recommend this clinic

review_title: A highly professional and personalised service. Excellent Customer Care!
review_body: Having had Botox for several years I was a little apprehensive about going somewhere new. However there was no need to be concerned from the moment I first contacted the clinic I was instantly put at ease by the girl on the phone, my entire experience has been seamless all members of staff highly professional and attentive. Dr Tapan Patel was extremely approachable and informative; he really put me at ease throughout my appointment. From my early 20s I have had prominent vertical lines between my brows. As a result people have often thought I am frowning. In the industry that I work I need to look approachable and welcoming. I felt Dr Tapan really listened to what I wanted to achieve and the results truly reflected this. Previous well know clinics on Harley Street have not provided such a patient centred service.

I have been going to PHi clinic now for a while and have had a variety of treatments from mole removal to fillers! PHI clinic is by far the best treatment I have ever received, All the staff are lovely people, especially DR Patel, from the moment I met him he made me feel very relaxed and confident, he takes the time to make you feel very important and special! They provide excellent service and results! I highly recommend PHI clinic!

I am absolutely thrilled with the results of treatments ( Botox and fillers ) administered by Dr Patel. During a full consultation he listened very carefully to what I wanted and my expectations and then went on to deliver outstanding results. I was very keen to have subtle enhancements and this is exactly what Dr Patel delivered.
The best results and personalised care and attention from the amazing Spirithoula Koukoufikis. I would recommend to everyone. Thank you.
Extremely happy with the level of care, attention to detail, professionalism and outstanding  results of my consultations. Would highly recommend.
Dr Patel is excellent.  He is kind and courteous and an extremely skilled practitioner - a leader in his field.  I would highly recommend the Phi Clinic.

I have been going to phi now for a year and tried some of their top treatments and have found them amazing. I have had fantastic results and would highly recommend this clinic for their state of the art treatments they can offer!
What a fantastic clinic , I would recommend to anyone to see Dr Tapan , what a professional surgeon , he treats you with up most kindness and really takes pride in his work .

I would recommend the Phi Clinic unreservedly for anyone looking to maintain or enhance their appearance.  You can be sure of honest, knowledgable, highly experienced advice with a proper understanding of individual needs and requirements and treatment tailored accordingly.
I was very happy with the treatment received, Dr Patel listens very carefully to your desired outcome and is never heavy handed with the needle!
Dr Patel and his staff are incredible. Not only the best in what they do but beyond friendly and professional. Just extraordinary!!!

Kelli-Ann has been treating me for several months at the clinic for facial redness. She has used a combination of V-Bean and Excel V on my face and the results are amazing! From my initial consultation with her she put me at ease and answered all my questions. As a guy I was a little self conscious about going to a cosmetic clinic and asking for help but I needn't have worried. The clinic is warm and friendly and all the staff I have encountered have been fantastic.

review_title: My first experience of fillers and botox
review_body: My only previous experience of beauty treatments has been facials and hair removal treatments so I was a genuine 'cosmetic procedure virgin'. Add to that an aversion to anything causing pain or discomfort, you can imagine my trepidation towards embarking on any treatment on my face.In truth, the procedures were completely bearable. Dr Dhillon clearly expained what he was doing, and used a number of techniques to minimise pain. And the results? I was hoping to look less tired and to just look like a healthy 52 year old. My  husband has commented that i look like the old me, circa 35!

Dr Patel is not only a highly proficient medical practitioner but an extremely visual artist who knew how to improve/restore  my appearance subtly over a couple of appointments to achieve the optimal result. This coupled with a generous spirit, a gentle approach & attention to detail ensures one leaves in far better shape than one arrives, for which I am most grateful.

review_title: Truly perfect & Better than I could ever Imagine
review_body: I recently visited PHI clinic and got Botox and fillers treatment done by DR. Benji Dhillon and I have to say I could not be happier with the result. I am turning 40 this year and no matter how many facials and expensive products I purchased nothing was working on my deep lines around my eyes and forehead and no matter how much slept, I always looked tired. As much as I was hesitant to get anything done on my face, specially injection(I am terrified of needles) I decided to book consulting appointment at the PHI clinic and before I knew it I was seating in a beautiful setting and I was getting treatment from one the kindest, smartest and confident DR I have ever met, who listen to my concerns and kindly educated me about the treatment and answered all of my questions. He also somehow managed to make me feel extremely calm and relax. After 3 visits with DR. Benji, I look better than I did in my 20's and I couldn't be happier. The best thing about my treatment has been  that I still have movement in my forehead and my face looks fresh, rested & natural. Better than I could ever Imagine:)
Attended earlier this year for a Miradry procedure with Jenna Staal due to excessive sweating under my arms. The facility is clean & tidy. All the staff I came into contact with were lovely.
Exceptionally professional yet approachable service from Dr Benji Dhillon. Thrilled with the results of my botox injections- very natural looking.
Dr Tapan Patel is a man you want in your life!

I visited Phi for a Hydrafacial after it was highly recommended to me by several people. From the moment I arrived I was looked after by the friendly receptionist and was then greeted by Sarah, the nurse who would be carrying out my treatment. Sarah talked me through the treatment in detail and made sure I was comfortable with everything. She was friendly, informative and immediately put me at ease. The results were amazing and I would highly recommend Phi to anyone I speak to. I have full confidence in the quality of the staff and will definitely be back for further treatments!

review_title: Really friendly, informative and well worth investment
review_body: Really helped reduce acne scars, very professional, friendly, approachable staff - glad I found them. Really helped with my beard rash and acne scars.

Around 6 years ago I had a dermal lip filler treatment and swore I would never do it again as I ended up with a trout pout that looked fake and it made me look strange. I believe any cosmetic treatment should look natural.

I am a burns survivor and recently have received treatment to my scars from the Phi clinic. The treatment itself has been excellent and has made such a noticeable difference to the scars. The staff are always excellent and so friendly. I would recommend treatment to anyone with burns scars as i've never felt more confident since receiving the treatment.

I had been concerned about the dark circles under my eyes for about 5 years. I am an Aesthetic Nurse Practitioner so have always known how important it is to be treated by someone who has the expertise required to give a natrual result and avoid complications. I had been to the Phi Clinic training suite and also seen Dr Tapan present at the Allergan Medical Institute, it was during this presentation I decided to book at the Phi Clinic with Dr Patel to have my tear troughs treated. The staff at the clinic were professional and freindly at all times . Dr Patel treated me as a fellow colleague ( being natrually slightly anxious about the results) with respect and kindness. The results are natrual and I am so pleased that I have finally had the treatment. Everyone comments on how well I look and I would not hesitate to recommemd the clinic to any of my clients and friends.

I am thrilled with the results so far of the CO2 Fractional Laser treatment I have had to treat scarring and damage to my upper lip region.  The procedure was quick and painless.  I am now a tremendous fan of this treatment.

I have been attending the clinic for just over a month having treatment to help improve my skin and so far thanks to all the staff and especially Jude Dunican my skin has had HUGE improvements.  Jude has gone above and beyond and made it her aim to help me through the process and so far the results have been outstanding!  the clinic provides you with amazing customer service and looks amazing.   I highly recommend.
PHI Always look after me when i come in, Jude has taken good care of me and is always lovely.

review_title: An environment where you feel relaxed and confident that you are in the hands of a skilled professional.
review_body: From the moment I walked in the door I could tell that I would receive the best treatment that I could wish for. All the staff were friendly and kind; the white minimalist decor was calming rather than coldly clinical, and Dr Dhillon was sympathetic, professional, gentle and knowledgeable. He listened to me and then suggested the treatments which he thought would benefit me. He used various fillers in different areas of my face, and some 'baby botox' between my brows and outer corners of my eyes. I was very impressed by the gentle application of the filler to the bags under my eyes; this was potentially scary, but I felt confident that nothing would go wrong. 48 hours later the results are already looking good, and there is no bruising at all. I  have had very different experiences at other well-known establishments where I wasn't even offered a  follow-up appointment, and I wouldn't hesitate to recommend Dr Dhillon and the Phi Clinic as a first choice if you feel your face needs to be 'refreshed'. You won't regret it!

Not one to normally leave reviews, I felt compelled to do so this time to applaud the team at Phi for making the clinic in my opinion the best out there. This place is difficult to fault. From the friendly seamless registration process at the front desk everything was on point.

review_title: Amazing treatment by highly skilled staff
review_body: I attended phi clinic for a skin treatment with Jude. I was quite unsure at first but Jude was so knowledgeable and made me feel at ease in no time. The assessment carried out on my skin before the treatment was so thorough also that I knew I was in great hands. The clinic itself is so clean and all the staff I encountered were so friendly, it really was a pleasure to attend. The treatment was made very comfortable for me, all the staff were so attentive and responsive and I feel like my comfort was prioritised, I was so relaxed throughout. I would highly recommend phi clinic to all my friends. Thanks so much to jude and team!
A wonderful experience, with warm, professional staff who, thankfully, don't pressure sell any treatments. The clinic lived up to my every expectation & more.

The PHi Clinic is by far the best I have ever been to and I have tried the majority of the good ones in London.  Dr Tapan Patel is understanding, knows exactly how to achieve whatever you want and will always keep a very natural appearance whilst still giving amazing results cannot praise enough and would recommend to anyone.  The staff are charming and always make you feel welcome.
Benji is amazing. I recommend going to this clinic!

From the moment you walk in to the tranquil reception area you know you are in a special place. The staff are both friendly and efficient and their professionalism is undeniably evident from very early on in your consultations. I was made to feel at ease almost immediately and just knew I was in the best hands. I would definately recommend this to friends and anyone who is looking for a non pressurised and unbiased approach to beauty and astethics treatments.
Dr Tapan and his team, take care of me and my needs. I always receive wonderful customer service and have treatments which give me confidence. Love Phi !

I can only praise Dr Tapan he is a master in what he does. His advice and treatment is excellent. I have total  trust in him, I  leave feeling a million dollars. The staff are friendly and very professional. I would not go any where else now. I Highly recommend PHI Clinic.

review_title: Delighted with filler and botox results
review_body: I have attended the PHI clinic 4 times so far having had fillers previously done elsewhere. I continue to return because I find the clinic friendly so feel comfortable.Dr Tapan understands how fillers in one place can impact on another area and often suggests less work than the list I go with.Through using fillers he completely altered the shape of my nose.I have great trust in his ability to know what is right for me .

Highly personalised bespoke care, addressing clients individual concerns. Working with the latest equipment to ensure quality as well as a group of extremely well trained, talented and patient practitioners who really take the time and care to provide unmatched results.

PHI Clinic and the team provide nothing but the best patient experience from your first interaction with them. They are dedicated to ensuring the patient is always comfortable, their needs are consistently met and their customer service is second to none. That coupled with state of the art aesthetic practice, you are guaranteed to have nothing but an incredible, luxurious experience at PHI Clinic.
I arrived for my consultation and was immediately asked by the receptionist to read and sign the consent form before I'd even had the consultation.

review_title: Extremely satisfied from beginning to end!
review_body: I had the Total FX CO2 laser treatment on my entire back to modify a number of old acne scars, and three months on, I'm thrilled with the results. However, it bears mentioning the entire experience that lead to it, starting with the clinic itself. It's Harley Street, which would usually mean a staff that's as sterile as the all-white waiting rooms, but the Phi Clinic felt like family. I was warmly welcomed from day one, especially during the initial consultation with Jude Dunican, one of the clinic's aesthetic nurses. When it came to the actual procedure with Dr. Patel, I felt comfortable, well-informed, and exceptionally confident that the decisions I was making were the right ones. Price-wise, both my condition and unique financial situation were taken into consideration, and I was extremely pleased. The follow-up was thorough, and I received clear communication throughout the entire process. I think Dr. Patel and his team are a fantastic credit to their industry, and would fervently recommend the Phi Clinic for any procedure with confidence.

Dr Patel has a natural understanding of what looks aesthetically pleasing rather than go for an unnatural look on a patient. His advice has been spot on and his treatment excellent. I went to see him after seeing reviews online and he totally lived up to his reputation!

I felt very nervous about having chin augmentation but as soon as I walked into Phi my mind was put at ease by the reception staff but mainly Dr Tapan Patel. He is a first class doctor who has transformed my confidence!

review_title: Dr Patel - PHI Clinic - Harley Street
review_body: Dr Patel and and his team at the PHI Clinic in Harley Street are amazing. He made me feel at ease at my first consultation and has given me exactly what I was hoping for. I am extremely happy with the results. I would definitely recommend Dr Patel to anybody considering any kind of facial rejuvenation.
As my mentor and respected colleague. Tapan is a true professional . Facial Aesthetics is an art to those who are highly skilled in facial anatomy .

review_title: Phi is the place to go!
review_body: Dr Tapan Patel is very very very good at his job and is also a wonderful guy. He makes you feel very comfortable and last but not the least he will make you look beautiful and young but  naturally. No one will tell you had any treatment done. He's definetly the best!!!

user_review_name: please don't use my name - just "Patient, aged 57"
review_title: wonderful, discreet, non pushy with great understanding of subtle treatments
review_body: Dr Patel and his staff understand that I don't want to look over-treated or over botoxed.  They completely understand my less is more attitude, yet always produce a wonderfully fresh and renewed face.

review_title: Fantastic experience in a professional environment.
review_body: Phi clinic offers excellent, highly professional care and treatment in a caring and friendly environment.  I highly recommend them.  Dr Tapan Patel is a master in his field as are the rest of his staff.

An incredibly professional service within a very comfortable environment! I have had 2  treatments for my Xanthelasma and have had positive results. Dr Tapan Patel and his team are professional, friendly and supported/reassured me through both my treatments.  I would definitely recommend the clinic, and particularly Dr Patel, to my friends and family - the team are amazing!
People never say I look as though I've had work done. They just say I look well.

I am a regular client at the the clinic and I am impressed every time. Dr Patel is a perfectionist and a born artist. He is extremely professional and will talk you out of a treatment if he does not believe it is for you.

I have seen Dr Patal for several years now and from day one he has offered the upmost professionalism. Installing confidence in any procedures he recommends, I am always safe in the knowledge his work is amazing. He takes his time to talk to you and find out what you are looking to achieve but also his experience ensures you never receive an over treated look. I can not recommend his services enough.

I have been going to Dr Tapan Patel for over 3 years; as a qualified beautician I am a hard customer to please. My brief is 'I want to look like me but on a good day' and he totally gets what I mean. He's administered botox and fillers at regular periods and at 51 I feel I look well and healthy and have the confidence to go make up free most of the time.
Great hospitality on entry. The clinic itself was amazing. Everything I wanted and more. Dr Tapan was so helpful and exceeded expectations. Definitely recommend!

review_title: Excellent Treatment. Very please with the service and treatment.
review_body: As above.Doctor Tapan Patel has a lovely nature and is very helpful. The treatments are brilliant. I will be going back to the clinic for more treatment when needed.

Dr Patel has given me excellent care and advice on a range of treatments, including botox, fillers, lasers and several other treatments and regimens they offer at PHI.  Very happy with the service at the clinic and the level of his personal attention.

review_title: Great experience at the PHI CLINIC having TOTAL FX
review_body: I had a great experience at the Phi Clinic and I highly recommend Dr Tapan Patel who made the whole experience a pleasure and the aftercare I received post treatment was indeed superb. Dr Tapan is a true professional and I would visit his Clinic again for other treatments in  years to come.

review_title: An excellent, modern, chic and trustworthy clinic
review_body: Dr Patel is an extremely calming and professional expert in his field.  His staff members could not be more helpful or sensitive.  I would not hesitate to recommend the PHIclinic to anyone - I have already done so several times.
Honest and professional with real expertise. Definitely always feel like I am in very safe hands.
Dr Tapan Patel is not only charming, but a genius in his field.

The whole PHI-team - Front of House, professional therapists, nurses, doctors as well as the clinic management - is always friendly and shows patience, especially if the patient is quite excited (so was I) about his treatment. All details with regards to the single steps of the treatment  are explained very well and during the procedure the team cares about the well-being of the customer.

This was my first experience of a clinic like Phi- but from the moment I walked in, I felt welcome and well looked after. Jude Duncan, the nurse who performed my two Sculpsure treatments, was just wonderful- kind, warm , knowledgeable, understanding and reassuring. She made me feel completely relaxed as we chatted while the treatment was taking place. She almost succeeded in diverting me from the fact it did hurt somewhat! I would recommend Phi and Jude to anyone- I shall be returning soon.

I was recommended the Phi clinic by a friend. Upon my initial meeting with Dr Dhillon I was impressed with his honesty and professionalism. I felt he had excellent knowledge and experience of the latest treatments available and which ones would be right for my skin.
Dr Benji Dhillon has such a calming & professional manner that helped with any apprehension I may have had. The clinic is a beautiful relaxed space that puts you at ease.

I've been having several sessions to get rid of a horrific 'tramp stamp' I was unfortunate enough to collect on my 18th birthday. I've always wondered whether the process worked well and if I could find a place to do it where I felt comfortable. I've found that in PHI and their brilliant Picoway guru Jenna Staal. She's been the dream. Arriving at PHI you know you're in safe hands - it's clean, modern, not scary and gives a good vibe. Jenna's ensured the entire process has been as easy and comfortable as possible too. Sure it hurts, but she's there to get the results and they have a very luxury feel to their treatment rooms. I couldn't recommend this clinic more highly for anyone thinking of having a tattoo removed. No scarring too - phew.

I thought Apul was easy and comfortable to communicate with. He gave me all the information I needed, was patient, and showed that he was taking time to look at my case and do the best procedure for it. He didn't pressure me into anything. Make me feel insecure or uncomfortable in anyway. The aftercare was great and he answered so many of my questions and eased any concerns I had. My only issue was that there seemed to be a small issue of communication between Apul, myself and the clinic. All issues were resolved but it was the only TINY issue I had.
As soon as I sit in the beautiful reception of the PHI Clinic I feel relaxed & ready for the treatment ahead of me.
Really happy with my results for Rosacea treatment. My clinician Jenna was supportive and friendly and kept me informed on all aspects of my treatment.

Apul Parikh looked after me when I had a very bad experience with fillers at another clinic. My face had reacted to the filler and I needed treatment to dissolve it. He is kind and gentle and clearly knowledgeable and very experienced. I have told him that he "gave me my face back".

review_title: Excellent experience of tattoo removal with Jenna Staal
review_body: I have been having regular tattoo removal treatments with Jenna Staal at PHI Clinic.  I was apprehensive about the whole process at first, but Jenna really put me at ease, explaining the steps of the process clearly.  The procedure can be quite painful, but Jenna is able to carry out the treatment as quickly as possible and is great at keeping my mind off the pain! I have had 3 sessions so far and am already seeing some great results on some very dark tattoos. The rest of the staff are also always very professional and helpful and I can't recommend PHI and Jenna highly enough.
Have had various treatments here with the lovely Tapan who does what he thinks is best for you... And he's always right!

I really loved the professionalism of this clinic. From the constant follow up 2 weeks before the surgery by having the anesthetic dr checking my needs, down to how Dr Parikh gave me the right advice. I came in wanting many things to be done but he wasn't like any commercial doctor by saying yes to all. He actually directly refused my request and gave me exactly what is medically correct. You don't find Drs like this anymore.

As always, had an excellent experience with Apul Parikh for Botox and fillers. He is attentive, kind, knowledgeable, and able to produce a very natural result! And as always, the clinic and staff were lovely.

I was very happy with my treatment from start to finish. Dr Parikh was recommended to me via a friend. I was fully consulted and my nose looks great. I would recommend Dr Apul Parikh without any hesitation.
I'm always extremely happy with the natural results I achieve when seeing the Doctor's at Phi!
I can only highly recommend PhiClinic and Dr Patel for very good and natural looking Botox! Clinic is beautiful, clean and everyone is very professional.

I really can not praise Dr Tapan Patel and his team any higher; as one who was apprehensive regarding dermal fillers and Botox I was  immediately put at ease by Dr Patel on my initial visit, with no pressure to undergoing any procedures and was offered to go away and take time to make make my decision. This for me was incredibly reassuring; time was taken to discuss and ask questions and there was no pressure for me to consider other procedures that I had not previously considered.

I cannot recommend PHI Clinic more highly - everything from the simply outstanding skills of Dr. Tapan Patel to the first class service from the staff and the beautiful surroundings that make you feel immediately in safe and secure hands. I have had unpleasant experiences in the past with other clinics and doctors for a few Botox injections and fillers and finally I have found a place where I have complete trust in the doctors and fantastic outcomes. Not only do I leave feeling great and looking significantly younger than when I entered (!), I know that Dr. Patel will always do what is best for me as an individual patient; carefully assessing what will work best and ensure the best results. For anyone who wants to feel a million dollars ... if you are trying treatments for the first time or if you have had treatments before, this really is at the top of the chain and I would not consider going elsewhere - even if I lived abroad, it is a journey well spent! Excellent, first class all round, I cannot recommend PHI highly enough. Thank you Dr Patel and team!

review_title: I truly would recommend Phi clinic to anyone
review_body: I have been visiting the Phi clinic for over a year to have Picoway treatments. With the professional help of SK I have achieved a fantastic result in the removal of my tattoo.

The Phiclinic has to be the best skin clinic in London. They have the latest techniques and fantastic staff. Dr Tarpan Patel is a talented physician who always gives sound advice. You cannot fail to leave there feeling anything but rejuvenated and hopeful.

review_title: A beauty editor's review of the Phi Clinic
review_body: As a beauty journalist for a national newspaper, I've been fortunate to work with many of the best cosmetic practitioners in the UK. I can genuinely say there is nowhere I rate more highly than the Phi Clinic.

I have been treated by Dr Patel for over 7 years, and have received a variety of treatments. Originally I received regular botox treatments and was always very happy with the results. Recently I decided to go for some minor fillers to improve dark circles under my eyes that have been present since childhood. The treatment was quite quick and only mildly uncomfortable, and i am delighted with the results, which look 100% natural. I look like myself but younger. Dr Patel was able to show my pictures before my first treatment 7 years ago alongside my most recent photo and I honestly look more youthful today. Amazing!

Really positive experience ?�� helpful, friendly. Dr Dhillon was amazing ?�� clearly experienced and knowledgeable ?�� made me feel confident about my choices, and Really  appreciated the fact that he was the person who managed the whole process from the consultation through to the actual procedures. As you know my husband was with me and he was totally impressed with Dr Dhillon?��s knowledge and professionalism ?�� and we?��re both so happy with the results! Thank you.

I have been seeing jenna staal for a number of years for facial skin treatments and facial skin care - phi clinic has a great range and options depending on what my skin needs. Jenna is a true professional and really knows her stuff - she creates different programs for me to use at home which is great. People often comment about the youthful look of my skin. Thanks jenna!

I was the first patient to receive the new Sculpsure treatment at the Phi clinic.  I've had other fat-reducing procedures before, but this treatment has by far given me the most noticeable (and flattering) results.  Jenna Staal was an absolute star, thoroughly walking me through the procedure so I understood what was happening to the fat.  I had photos taken of my results every couple of months to capture my success.  The Phi Clinic has everything I look for in a "med-spa" - friendliness, cleanliness, and professionalism.

review_title: Dr Tapan Patel- The Rock star of Botox
review_body: Dr Tapan Patel  is simply an extraordinary doctor.
I have been to Phi Clinic several times over the past few years and each time have received the best patient care and treatment I could possibly hope for.

I love coming to Phi clinic for my treatments and can't fault the service I've received. All the staff are welcoming and extremely friendly. I have been seeing Jude Dunican for skin treatments over the past few months and would highly recommend her! Since the moment I met Jude, she has always put me at ease and I really look forward to our appointments together. Jude is very knowledgable, gives great advise and is very skilled in treatments! So much so, that now other members of my family visit her for various treatments!

review_title: Comfort and ease a real priority
review_body: Right from the out-set I felt that my comfort and peace-of-mind was a real priority for the clinic. Jenna Staal and Dr Patel made every effort possible to make sure I was at ease throughout my treatment and I am thrilled with the results. This will definitely be my go-to clinic in the future and I will most certianly be recommending their services to all my friends.

I've been having my treatments at the clinic with Dr Patel and Jude Dunican -Aesthetic Nurse. I have always found the clinic a welcoming environment and excellent patient service. Dr Patel and Jude Dunican have been fantastic and always made me feel relaxed and confident about my treatment. Jude always had time to as for general advice and ask questions throughout my sessions and provide reassurance when needed. Both Jude and Dr Patel have always been professional in manner and explained different options with me.

The clinic is fantastic, apart from looking amazing the staff are very helpful, professional. It was my first experience with a clinic and I could not be happier. Great natural results with fillers and laser for facial redness and very pleased with results.

It was great experience in PHI clinic . the staff specially Jenna Staal an  Dr  Patel they were  very kind , careful and respectful .  they gave me very huge confidence . I am thankful to them . 100 %  i love to recmond  My  family and friends. the place u can trust.

review_title: Excellent clinic with superb customer service
review_body: Phi Clinic. What can I say.

I HIGHLY recommend Phi Clinic to anyone. I?��ve been to a few other clinics in London over the past and as a guy I was initially nervous walking into a clinic on Harley Street but all the staff at Phi made me feel extremely welcome and comfortable.

I came across PHI clinic some time last year as it was mentioned in various magazines as the best clinic in London/UK and I wasn?��t disappointed. Since then, I have had various treatments including botox, Sculpsure and facials. It was the first time I had botox and it was administer by Dr Benji who is a true expert. I was so pleased with the results.

I was very nervous about having this treatment, however, I'm so glad I did. All the staff were fabulous especially Jenna who was so friendly and professional. She explained the procedure to me as well as giving me good after care advice. I recommend this clinic highly and can't wait to see the results.

review_title: Laser hair removal by Rodrigo Alves
review_body: I live a very busy life and shaving for me became time consuming also my skin is sensitive and I would spent a lot using the best pre-shave Oil then shaving gel.  Thue recommendation of a friend and came to PHI clinic which is the best clinic in The UK for cosmetic treatment  which can change people life and improve people's confidence. So far I have had 10x sensions of LASER HAIR removal and I have achieved an outstanding results. Jude is the nurse that looks after me, she is very professional and caring and once I finish with a the laser hair treatment I m planning a CO2 laser skin resurfacing, I recommend PHI clinic to everyone!

Came in for a consultation with Jude for Sculpsure treatment that I had read about on the daily mail. She was very knowledgeable on the subject and also very caring in her approach. Thank you for a great experience looking forward to seeing the results from this treatment.
My condition
I absolutely loved the vi peel done by Jenna in Phi clinic. I can clearly see the difference on the skin. Would recommend the clinic highly !!!!
Great clinic, professional and friendly therapists, very happy and would recommend it to anyone.

review_title: Amazing Experience at the Phi Clinic
review_body: I visited the Phi Clinic to consult with Doctor Tapan Patel on an non-surgical rhinoplasty after a very bad surgical rhinoplasty and am beyond pleased with my results.

user_review_name: CB (Please do not use my name)
review_title: I have been a client of Jenna and Dr. Patel and the service has been outstanding.
review_body: The treatments have been very good for me and the result has been totally as expected. The interaction with Jenna and Dr. Patel is very personable yet very professional.

PHI Clinic has been a 5 star experience for me. From the moment I arrived I was met by Jenna Staal who put me completely at ease by how professional she was but also extremely friendly and welcoming at the same time. With her knowledge and experience I have been completely looked after and I look forward to continuing my treatment at the PHI Clinic.

review_title: Excellent clinic with professional caring staff.
review_body: This is a great place to be treated by professional staff and I have always been very happy with my treatment and the results. I would be very happy to recommend PHI Clinic to family and friends.

review_title: First two of many visits to PHI Clinic
review_body: Wow, what can I say!

All of the staff at Phiclinic are extremely professional and make you feel very welcome and relaxed from the moment you walk in. I saw Dr Dhillon who was very knowledgeable about facial aesthetics and ensured a thorough consultation prior to treatment to ensure he knew exactly what I wanted to achieve and that I knew what outcomes to expect. I am very happy with the results, will visit again.
Very pleased with results. Professional & caring team.
I had a vi peel and so far I'm very happy.  The clinic is very welcoming and Jenna is defiantly worth a visit.

review_title: Great Job for my finial treatment
review_body: I had ultherapy with Dr. SK,She's so friendly and patient to do the treatment with me ,I had a absolutely great treatment with her.I will highly recommend this clinic and definitely will come back!

I first read about Cool Sculpting in a Sunday supplement booklet. My main area of concern was my abdomen. I phoned for an appointment at the Phiclinic and my husband and I went to speak with Jenna, Aesthetic Clinician.  Jenna explain fully the procedure and answered all our questions.  The only disappointing fact was that the abdomen was divided up into two sections, left and right, so whereas I initially thought I would get away with one treatment on each section, I ended up paying twice the amount I originally thought I would pay.  But that did not deter me and the end results were well worth it.
I never thought i would find solutions to the skin problems i was having untill i visited PHI clinic!
I first came to Phi Clinic in January 2015 for a consultation about skin rejuvenation.

I attended Phi Clinic for a Cool Sculpting treatment on my abdominal area after I had a consultation. I was treated on the day by Jude and Jenna who were professional, knowledgable and made me feel completely at ease. They talked me through the procedure and answered any questions that I had.

I would highly recommend Phiclinic to anyone - in fact I have! The staff who assist the doctor were so helpful (jenna) and make you feel so welcome and comfortable. Also the environment was very peaceful  and tranquil which makes you feel completely relaxed. I've been to a couple of different places for Botox on Harley Street before where they've rushed me in and out the door and I went away disappointed each time - however Dr Tapan spent so much time with me and really listened to what look I was looking for and gave a very natural look.

review_title: The best advice with the best results
review_body: A friend of mine works at Phi Clinic and she recommended I come along for a Botox consultation when I informed her I was considering getting it done.
A wonderful clinic with an amazing and professional staff!
Around the time I visited Dr Patel, I was too embarrassed to go out because of the fillers in my face. I had absolutely no confidence in myself.

I was referred to Dr Benji Dhillon by a friend of mine, I had botox and dermal fillers in the lips and I'm absolutely delighted with the results. Highly recommend the clinic and all the staff, thank you for my perfect lips!

I visited Phi Clinic recently as I flew into london for business. The clinic is beautiful and feels like you have walked into the future! I had dermal filler in my lips and some botox to my forehead a few weeks ago by Dr Benji Dhillon. The results are fantastic. I wanted to avoid big fake lips but he gave me a very natural result with the filler and botox. I would advise anyone to go to this place.

review_title: GENIUS - OUTSTANDING WORK BY DR TAPAN PATEL
review_body: I rarely do reviews but for this I simply had to! Dr Tapan Patel, is quite simply a genius! An artiste - I am beyond thrilled with my recent botox and filler - it is so incredible that I honestly feel 5 years younger. I am a perfectionist when it comes to my face, I used to model and am difficult to please when it comes to botox! At 35 I don't want to look like a frozen / ageless clone that I feel some people look like - I just want to shave a few years off and remove those lines that are starting to appear!!  I have dabbled with botox for years and been to literally some of the most renowned doctors in London and Paris and the work Dr Patel did is BY FAR the best I have ever had. I was so impressed that I went back and had a tiny bit of Voluma in my cheeks to help my nasolabial lines - it worked a treat. I AM SO OVER THE MOON with Dr Patel, and I am happy I have found the doctor I will use for life.

PHI clinic is set in beautiful surroundings which are very calming. Dr Patel is such a talented doctor, he is very thorough and his manner is so gentle. The results of my filler were visible immediately, yet looked totally natural. I just wanted a subtle enhancement, and this is exactly what I got. I hardly felt the injections, and Dr Patel guided me through, warning me which ones might hurt a little more. He is a world class injector and I would highly recommend him to anyone. His staff were lovely too, and Libby supported me through the process.

review_title: I thoroughly enjoyed my appointment at the Phi Clinic
review_body: I managed to get an appointment to see Dr Patel to have some fillers to my face,  the Phi Clinic is more like a boutique hotel,  it's very relaxing and luxurious, I am 65 years old and now look 36 years old,  thanks to Dr Patel,  friends and family can't believe the transformation,  I am thrilled to bits,  the staff were friendly and very helpful.
My treatment for burns scars is ongoing and I see big improvement. All staff are professional, sensitive and caring.

I am 65 and a veteran of botox and fillers.  Have been seeing someone for the last 10 years who works the beauty press better than anyone and has a packed waiting room in her Knightsbridge clinic.    I have a friend who recommended Phi so thought i would test it out.
First impressions were good, the staff were polite and the clinic looked professional.
I'm a forty one year old male who found an increasing number of people saying to me 'you look tired?��; I had adopted a permanent shadow under my eyes.

I had fantastic results with laser hair removal. I hardly need to think about shaving anymore. I also tried the hydrafacial which made my skin feel bright and clean. My treatments were with Jenna who put me at ease right away and gave me helpful advice about skincare.

I am now 47 and although I look young for my age the one thing that really let me down was my eyelids . Probably the last three years I have been obsessed about this and won't let anyone take photos of me as I hate seeing my eyes .

The staff at PHI Clinic have been extremely professional and helpful throughout my experience with them. During my consultation, I was taken through the many treatment options available ?�� something no other clinic has been able to offer so far ?�� but they were honest when telling me what would be suitable for me and my concerns. I never felt sold to, they simply gave me their clinical advice and tailored a treatment plan to suit me and my needs. I saw SK, Mr Hassan Shaaban and the nurse, Karen Bates, who looked after me during the consultation process and made me feel at ease.

In February this year I decided to have Blepharoplasty (upper and lower eyelid/eye bag surgery) and as an existing patient of Tapan Patel of PHI CLINIC for some three years I went with his recommendation and decided to book my procedure with APUL PARIKH at PHI CLINIC.

review_title: Extremely effective and beneficial treatments for both rosacea and acne vulgaris
review_body: I was treated by Dr Tapan Patel at Phi clinic on a once monthly basis for  Rosacea using the V-Beam laser. He used the correct parameters to treat Asian skin exercising caution but also the efficacy was amazing with no downtime and maximum improvement and there were no adverse reactions or side-effects. Jodie Retalick treated me with the Acleara laser for acne vulgaris particularly on the nose. She was extremely patient and supportive treating me extremely effectively with no side-effects or downtime clearing up my cystic acne completely and I no longer need antibiotics which I was taking long-term before.Emma Clarke, the receptionist is extremely medically knowledgeable on the various treatments and there pros and cons and safety issues I was initially apprehensive and quite tense before proceeding but she explained all the various aspects and concerns in immense detail but in a simplistic and understandable manner and the necessary aftercare and safety precautions to be exercised. I followed her protocol and have never had any adverse reaction whatsoever. I have had to phone her a few times with queries relating to the treatment and she has always been extremely patient and understanding spending sufficient time explaining everything to me and is a God send for Phi clinic

The staff at PHI clinic were very professional at all times.  Doctor Tapan Patel was on time, explained clearly what he could do with Botox. Only did the bare minimum, no pain.  A female was in the room at all times.  Definitely recommend.
Dr Tapan Patel is a lovely man, very caring and in my view exceptionally skilled at delivering a natural result.....Thank You

review_title: The best kept secret for all cosmetic treatments
review_body: I was introduced to the PHI clinic through a recommendation by somebody 'in the know'. I was greeted by a radiant South African lady called SK with a massive smile who immediately made me feel at ease! I met with Dr P who was extremely knowledgeable on all the latest research and gave me an overview of the clinic. I was immediately sold!! I have so far had botox, which looks extremely natural. I then went and had a free consultation with Karen for the cryolipolysis, coolsculpt. All I can say is I booked in for the following day. The treatment was performed by Jenna and Karen and was painless and mildly uncomfortable. I did two areas so I came prepared and I got to catch up on emails and managed to even watch a film!!  I felt a bit dizzy after the process and Karen brought me a cup of tea and a yummy biscuit. The whole clinic is brand new, crisp white and immaculately clean! The following week I can in to so laser on my legs! A bit swollen from my cool sculpting, the ladies reassured me that it was normal and were really excited to see the results! All I can say is that I now have one place where I know I can get all my cosmetic treatments! Prior to that I had to dash around london seeing different practitioners. What I think I like the best about the clinic is how much respect the team have for Dr P. For them it's a privilege that they have been chosen to work there and it really shows. They will be coming to my wedding! Thank you guys!

Jodie at the Phi Clinic has been an absolute sweetie during my VBeam procedure, I cannot praise her enough. I have had a few bad experiences in the past with other clinics and I am now naturally quite anxious about certain treatments. My initial fears was promptly relieved by Jodie?��s friendly and professional approach. She patiently answered all my questions and addressed all my concerns. I highly recommend the Phi Clinic and I look forward to having many more fabulous treatments there.

I had a lip filler treatment at PHI clinic with Dr. Patel. He is a wonderful, caring, patient and extremely professional doctor and wonderful human being, surrounded by very caring staff. He advised me on the treatment, and was extremely precise when injecting my lips. It was painless! Results were beautiful, natural and I am absolutely delighted with my new lips. The staff was also very caring, professional and very kind and reassuring. After care was impeccable. I only can highly recommend Dr. Patel and the PHI clinic with all my heart.

Everyone at Phi Clinic has been nothing but friendly and helpful. Sessions have been informative and have produced great results. Knowledgable staff with years of experience. Have and will continue to recommend to anyone. Was recommended to me by an equally happy Phi Clinic client.

review_title: Tear Trough Fillers by Dr Tapan
review_body: I have struggled with dark circles under my eyes from a young age. Despite experimenting with a variety of lightening creams and peels, I was extremely unhappy with the appearance of my eyes, even under makeup. I met Dr Tapan and he told me I was the ideal candidate for tear trough fillers. He said that by eradicating the groove and making it smoother, it would cast less of a shadow, thereby reducing the dark circles. Getting tear trough fillers was, without a doubt, the best decision I have ever made. The cirles under my eyes are substantially lighter and I am able to conceal them much more easily. It has made a huge difference to my self-confidence. Dr Tapan understood my problem straight away and provided me with a solution. I cannot recommend this treatment enough.

This doctor has given me some very good treatment and is very personable, without condescension. My one gripe is that he seems just a little too keen to pack the private patients into the allocated time and rake in the cash, because he has always been quite rushed with me and always misses a few - small - areas for treatment each time because of this. Still, I'd recommend him. He's probably one of the best dermatologists on Harley Street.
I recently experienced the 8 point lift using dermal fillers, at the friendly and professional PHI clinic.

review_title: PHI Clinic service- Laser Hair Removal
review_body: I am currently undergoing a series of laser hair removal treatments at PHI. I am more than happy with my results so far, and the customer service has been brilliant. The booking of my consultation and my appointments has been easy and efficient. My hair removal specialist is friendly and professional, offering helpful advice and making me feel extremely at ease during my procedure. I would definitely recommend this to friends and consider other procedures as a result of the care I have received thus far!
They were very professional and have been very honest and upfront with the treatments - how successful or not they could be. Its been a while but have seen results that I am happy with.

I did a lot of research about non surgical nose jobs and I would recommend having this treatment at Phi Clinic. Quick, professional and informative consultation. I was able to have the procedure on the same day, which I was convenient. I left feeling satisfied but obviously had to get use to my new perfect nose. So it's now the next day and I still love it! Thank you everyone at Phi Clinic :)

review_title: Phi Clinic has completely transformed my life to the better!
review_body: I have been receiving regular treatments for almost 2 years and it truly was a life changing experience. Phi Clinic members of staff have a very high sense of professionalism. The level of care and support is excellent. Highly recommended.

My treatment started two years ago, and from my first laser treatment it changed the way my scar looked and felt. Now two years on my face is more symmetrical, an even skin tone as being able to breathe from my right nostril. Dr Patel always made me feel at ease and made sure the treatment was pain-free as much as possible. My experience at the Phi Clinic has always been a positive one.

Hi, so I must say I don't often write reviews. However, I thought I would make an exception on this occasion. I went to see Dr Tapan Patel October 2014 & it was one of the best decisions I made, am so happy I went. He is so lovely & so professional and found Sk & Jack extremely helpful!!

Dr Patel is one of the nicest that I have ever met.  I had my first pigmentation treatment with him 5 years ago and he has transformed my life.  I was so impressed with him then but now when I visited his new clinic in Harley Street I was left speechless.
I have been going to the phi clinic since January and all I can say is I amazed by how friendly and professional it is.
It has been a week since my visit to the PHI CLINIC and Ican honestly say

I would fully recommend Dr Tapan Patel as he wants the best for his clients. He is honest in his dealings with you and with his experience and expertise Dr Tapan Patel understand how certain procedures react and heal on the skin. When he carried out the laser he had a very steady hand. I was also impressed with the care pre laser and post laser by the staff at the clinic.
State of the art clinic with polite friendly staff and highly qualified clinicians and technicians. I have seen Dr. Tapan Patel for botox and filler for a long time now and his results are perfect!

review_title: Miradry works! Thank you Phi Clinic!
review_body: Good stuff:

review_title: Very pleased with treatments and recommendations
review_body: I have been visiting the clinic for over a year now and have always been treated by Jodie. I have always found the service highly professional and when I have discussed areas of concern I am always recommended the treatment they think will suit me best, not the most expensive one even though sometimes I have requested it! I initially came to the clinic for hair removal, I had already received a few treatments elsewhere where the therapist often seemed bored and uninterested; Jodie was completely the opposite, ensuring that all areas where covered, making sure I was comfortable and happy with the treatment. I have since gone on to have other non invasive treatments and have been extremely surprised and pleased with how effective they can be.

review_title: First class service; first class result.
review_body: I had Botox and facial filler with Dr. Patel at PHI. The atmosphere at the

When I visited PHI I was amazed by the whole place, everything was so clean and clinical. I met the surgeon who was amazing and he guided me through the whole process. I must say I have never felt more looked after and am simply delighted with the results.

review_title: Had my breast enlargement with THG 3?�?
review_body: Had my breast enlargement with THG 3 days ago with Mr Seno and i read a few reviews and was slightly worried about what people had said about the aftercare at Dolan Park Hospital but i have to say that the care i received was amazing. I was extremely nervous about having my surgery and i have a needle phobia. As soon as i arrived i was pht completely at ease by all the nurses, they were all so lovely. I arrived at 1pm and was told my surgery might be about 3:30-4pm but i didnt end up going down until just gone 6pm (I work in a hospital so i am aware that theatre times can overrun which is not a problem) the anaesthetist came to see me about an hour proir to surgery and made me feel completely at ease and explained what would happen when i got to theatre. Mr Seno then came to see me and explained exactly what he would be doing, marked me up and then i was collected by the theatre staff. They were all so lovely and caring and made me feel much more relaxed. When i was taken back to my room i was checked on every 30 mins to check my blood pressure etc and i was always asked if i needed anything and was given pain releif when i needed it. The nurses kept my water topped up with fresh water and bought me something to eat. I was discharged the next morning after seeing my surgeon and him saying that he was happy for me to go home. I honestly couldnt praise this hospital enough for how kind and caring all of their staff are! And i am so happy with the results so far.

review_title: Breast Uplift with Implants with Mr Borghini at Riverside Hospital
review_body: I had my surgey at the end of November 2018 and my whole experience with The Hospital Group has been wonderful. After having consultations with a few other clinics, I found THG to be better suited to my needs and desired end result (breast uplift due to weight loss). When I first met my surgeon Mr Borghini, I felt comfortable and relaxed right away - you will never meet anyone more humble than this wonderful man. He doesn't know or at least never let's on how truly fantastic and skilled he is. My results are out of this world; natural looking breasts and the scars are healing incredibly well. Mr Borghini is the perfect mix of professional and warm and human - he always made me smile! I was so excited to see him for my 3 month sign off appointment to show off how amazing the results are.

review_title: Great service from start to finish.
review_body: Everyone I encountered with The Hospital Group (Dolan Park Hospital) were welcoming, helpful, friendly and seemed to genuinely care about my experience. My surgery went very smoothly and it's one of the best decisions I've ever made.

review_title: I attended the hospital group in 2010 so I hope this is still relevant
review_body: I attended the hospital group for a procedure in 2010. When I went for my op, I wasn?��t feeling well and the doctor apologised and told me they couldn?��t perform the procedure due to health concerns on MY part. They booked me back in a couple of weeks later and all went well. I feel like they really looked after me. I had my consultation in Dublin. I travelled to UK the first time & Cork the second. Staff in both places really looked after me (although the UK clinic was more modern & hygienic). So 9 years on and I?��ve never had a problem. I also inquired about another procedure and the doctor gave me great advice. He could have just took my money (i would?��ve been happy either way). Instead he gave me great advice. I would DEFINITELY recommend The Hospital Group. The staff look out for your health and well-being.

I?��ve been with the hospital group now for several years and had a few procedures with them. During all of my time with the hospital group, I have visited the aftercare Exeter clinic - I can not rate the service high enough. Always the same team - Mel & Mary - they are an absolute credit to the company. Mel is just the most friendliest, helpful and fabulous receptionist ever! Mary is always happy, caring and really is concerned and has your best interests at heart. I am having another procedure soon with the HG...and it?��s because I find the aftercare faultless, stress free and efficient with these lovely two! Thanks Girls!

review_title: The process was easy and very prompt
review_body: The process was easy and very prompt. Welcomed from the very beginning. Fantastic surgeon did a really good job and the nurse is so caring and on hand to help. Not once was I not made to be important.  The aftercare has been amazing. The whole team including those at the hospital was fantastic. My overall experience was brilliant couldnt have asked not more.

Everyone I encountered with The Hospital Group, from my initial consultation through to the moment I walked out of Dolan Park Hospital, was welcoming, helpful, friendly and seemed to genuinely care about my experience. On top of that, my surgery went very smoothly and it's one of the best decisions I've ever made.

Very good. i will use the hospital group again. The staff at dolan park hospital were amazing. The staff in harley street for my consultation were second to none. Great the whole way through. thanjyou Tina x
Friendly helpful staff very knowledgeable surgeon it?��s only been 2 weeks but can certainly see the difference following my tummy tuck and breast lift with implants

review_title: Had a tummy tuck with Mr Khoda
review_body: Had a tummy tuck with Mr Khoda, fantastic result. The whole team are so supportive. Nurses are great. Dolan park hospital is lovey. The only negative is the showers are antiquated . This is my second stay at this hospital. Whole experience is excellent .

review_title: Such a life changing decision for?�?
review_body: Such a life changing decision for surgery is worth careful research and comparisons. So glad that this is the one I made. The whole procedure from initial enquiry to discharge was professional but friendly and relaxed. I was kept fully informed at every stage, every query I had was resolved. At no time did I feel anxious or under any pressure. The care given was amazing and each member of Hospital Group team has my utmost respect and gratitude. Thank you everyone. Most of all. my thanks to the skill of surgeon. Renato. This lady can now graciously see the person that was hidden behind the advanced signs of aging.  Such a positive experience thank you Hospital Group.

review_body: I had my breast augmentation with the hospital group and I couldn?��t thank them anuf when ever I had a worry they was there on phone to help me threw when ever I needed reassurance they was there to guide me threw amazing people x

Great experience with The Hospital Group - Mr Borghini is very friendly and approachable. All the staff are warm and welcoming and always have time to fit you in with an appointment as soon as possible.

review_title: Tummy Tuck and Lipo at Dolan Park - Dr Ben Khoda
review_body: I've had a tummy tuck and lipo at Dolan Park on 2nd February and had a great experience.

Dolan Park is a lovely welcoming hospital.  I wasn?��t originally booked to have my surgery here but my surgery day at the QE was cancelled so I was booked in to Dolan Park at the last minute.  Nether the less my experience here was great. Nurses and theatre staff were lovely and made me feel comfortable and relaxed.  Mary my night nurse was a gem looking after me making sure I was in no pain.

review_title: I?��m currently in the Dolan park..
review_body: I?��m currently in the Dolan park hospital after just having had a breast augmentation with Dr Khoda. He is a fabulous surgeon and has done a great job at answering all my questions, putting me at ease about my surgery. On to the hospital/nurses, I honestly have nothing bad to say about them. The hospital is clean and the main reception is very visually appealing. The staff here are lovely, they have done their best to reassure me, keep me topped up on drinks, food and painkillers and I can?��t thank them enough. I would recommend this company to anyone, I was sceptical after other reviews I have seen but I would most definitely come back here.

From the day of my consultation to the day of my surgery has been brilliant and still now am have brilliant after care the nurses and surgeon were brilliant also have to mention cheri the Cordinator who is absolutely great

review_title: Tummy tuck done by Dr Borghini
review_body: Tummy tuck done by Dr Borghini- belly button revision surgery required 4 weeks after initial procedure and further revision required in June due to not enough skin being removed in my mid section on initial procedure. This has been the most traumatic, emotional and quite frankly, horrific ordeal that I?��ve ever been through. I haven?��t felt very supported at all since my surgery and I?��m currently in the process of raising a rather serious complaint with THG because of all the problems I?��ve had.

review_title: Upper and lower eye surgery with the fantastic hospital group
review_body: I had upper and lower eyelid surgery (blepharoplasty) through the hospital/transform group. Everything from my first consultation with my surgeon Dr Mileto to the surgery and after care received has been outstanding. I had my procedure done at the Clinic near Heathrow. I was a day surgery case had no pain at all. I decided to have this surgery as I had droopy lower lids and rather than eye bags I had malar mounds the puffyness was at the bottom of my eye almost at the top of my cheeks. It wasn?��t really bad but made me look tired for my age 43. 3 weeks after surgery I have no visible scars on my lids at all any my lower have a small scar that is fading fast Dr mileto chose the nip method under my eyes as it can be done slightly lower on the eye so wasn?��t directly under my lower lashes.  It has taken years off of me and I could not be happier with the results I no longer have to sit with ice packs on before going out to reduce the puffiness or use 3 concealers to try and mask my dark circles which have disappeared. My eyes look much bigger as they no longer have my droopy skin on my eyelids closing them. I took 2 weeks of work to recuperate and that was perfect timing. I went back to work feeling more confident than I felt in years. I have had 2 check ups with my nurse through the hospital group at the clinic in Milton Keynes and have one more in a month before being signed off by the surgeon in 8 weeks time. I cannot reccoment this surgery enough to any one who is bothered by their eyes and I would definitely reccomend Dr Mileto and all the lovely people who cared for me all the way through the process and procedure.

I had a rainoplastic  operation  because only the bump  that I had was bothering me the doctor  advice me to change the nose look too , i agreed but unfortunately  he turn my lovely nose to a pig  nose I was quite  upset  I talked  to my solicitor  decided  to do another operation I had the second operation  but still  he couldn't  bring back mu nose do not trust them  still I'm suffering

review_title: So good we came back twice.
review_body: I had a procedure in September last year.
I was very scared about having surgery but i must admit these guys were excellent from start to finish.
Great service and really friendly staff

review_title: My whole experience with The Hospital?�?
review_body: My whole experience with The Hospital Group (Dolan Park, Bromsgrove) has been amazing. I couldn't fault a single thing! The staff, right the way through from my inital consultation to my post op appointment, were all so friendly, helpful and reassuring! Dr Seno my surgeon was so professional and really made me feel at ease with the whole procedure. The hospital was so clean and welcoming as soon as you walked through the doors and instantly made you feel like it would be the best place for your surgery. Would highly recommend to anybody considering a cosmetic procedure!

review_title: From the moment I walked in and was?�?
review_body: From the moment I walked in and was greeted by the lovely Melanie on reception I felt at ease. My surgeon Mr Simons was so thorough explaining everything and answering my questions, supporting his suggestions when I queried them and listening to what I wanted to achieve, it really made me feel confident.

friendly and professional staff. made my time at the hospital pleasant. nothing was too much trouble . I chose to stay and extra day as didn't feel up travelling. on discharge day, I was advised to take my time and leave when ready . I would thoroughly recommend the hospital group and Dolan park hospital for a cosmetic procedure
I honestly cannot fault these guys. I had a gastric band done with THG at Dolan Park, Bromsgrove in July 2018 and they have been fantastic.
My surgeon Ben Khoda was brilliant. Did a fantastic job thank you

I had a breast augmentation with Mr Ben Khoda at the beginning of January. After considering other companies I felt that they were all trying to ?��hard?�� sell. At my first consultantion I explained to Mr Khoda exactly want i was wanting, he listened, advised me and straight away I knew he was the surgeon I wanted. - I didn?��t feel rushed or pushed into making a decision.
