Having wanted Breast Augmentation surgery for near on 7 years, and having seriously struggled with self confidence in the past, i decided now was an appropriate time to do something for me and to just go for it!

I've recently had a reaugmentation and mastopexy and my experience was fantastic I had my surgery at bromsgrove and the quality of care was amazing the nurses and staff was extremely accommodating. I'm currently 4 weeks post op and I've had great aftercare. I would definitely recommend. Mr Khoda has done a brilliant job and even though I'm only 4 weeks on my scars are barely even there I'm over the moon already with the results.

review_title: I?��ve recently had a breast reduction?�?
review_body: I?��ve recently had a breast reduction with Mr Ben Khoda at Dolan Park. Apart from being absolutely delighted with the outcome of my surgery, I can honestly say that my treatment / stay at Dolan Park was brilliant. The nursing staff were so good, they achieved the important balance of treating you with care and compassion but also promoting you to do as much for yourself as possible - I for one appreciated this approach.  I?��ve read quite a few negative reviews on here and whilst I understand everyone?��s experience is personal to them, I felt it important to add my experience which was overall highly positive. I wouldn?��t hesitate to stay again if the need arises.

I am currently 2 days post op recovering from breast augmentation. My surgeon is Mr Ben khoda, he has been amazing I am very happy so far! All the staff at dolan park hospital Birmingham were lovely! Haven't got 1 bad thing to say about them. Everyone was so friendly, anything you wanted or needed they were happy to help. They all made me feel very welcome and put me at ease. Please don't be put off from some of the bad reviews, seems to me some people are over exaggerating. My experience so far has been amazing. Whenever I needed pain relief they were there within minutes, if I needed help getting out of bed they were there to help straight away. They told me discharge time is between 7am and 8am however I was there until after 9am by my own choice and their advice. I tried to leave about 8am but everytime I stood up I felt very uneasy on my feet due to feeling extremely sickly so after I requested anti sickness a nurse kindly came back 5 minutes later with an injection. She told me to take half an hour and relax and leave in my own time. I fell asleep until 9am which I then felt absolutely fine to leave so I did. They don't rush you out! All the staff couldn't do enough for you. Thank you to everyone at dolan park hospital you made my stay very easy and comfortable.

review_title: I would highly recommend the Hospital?�?
review_body: I would highly recommend the Hospital Group I had my implants removed and surgeon Michael was fantastic not only did he do a wonderful job he supported what was the best action for my health.

review_title: Very happy with the surgery and aftercare. Brilliant staff at the Exeter clinic especially Mel and Mary.
review_body: I went for my initial consultation at the Exeter clinic.  The staff here were amazing, the receptionist Mel made me feel so welcome. I saw Mr Seno, who was very efficient and direct, he didn't have a lot to say, but I hadn't gone for the conversation just a good efficient surgeon. I went for my surgery at Dolan Park, the staff were excellent and the service good.  The actual surgery went very smoothly. Although I had a slight problem afterwards ( no fault of the surgeon or care,) the aftercare at the Exeter clinic was amazing, I really cannot speak to highly of it. Mel, the receptionist and Mary the nurse, were so kind and reassuring, nothing was too much trouble.  They made me feel like they were old friends, but at the same time very efficient and competent.  If I were to have another surgery I would not hesitate to use this company again.

I can?��t praise the hospital group for the surgery they did for me. I was messed around by one health medical and the hospital group restored my faith in orivate compaines. Nothing is too much trouble and the hospital was 5*

review_title: The surgeon was absolutely amazing but aftercare was horrendous
review_body: The surgeon was absolutely amazing. However the hospital and aftercare was horrendous causing me to discharge less than 24 hours after operation and the day before I was supposed to leave. On 8th January I went in for a breast reduction and uplift with MR Ben Khoda. When arriving at the hospital I was taken into my room which was a basic hospital room. A nurse came to tell me to get ready quickly I was going to theatre. I rushed and got my theatre clothes on ready fo go and she told me she had the wrong person I have to wait a few more hours. I previously told the anethitst, my surgeon and a numerous of nurses with regards to my needle pheobia and how I was feeling about theatre. They walked me into the theatre room where I began to break down in tears as I was petrified. They tried to calm me down and made me drop my gown leaving me topless in front of many nurses. I was then told to lie on the bed and gassed so they began to do the procedure. Before I knew it I woken up in recovery. I was in recovery 10 minutes then taken to my room where I was left to my own devices with no help to the toilets or change my clothes out of my gown I had to rely on my parents which were in a hotel 3 miles down the road. The next morning I was woken up by the nurse at 5:50 giving me my breakfast as she left the door open and turned all the lights on people were having to check out there rooms before 6.30am with no help from the nurses to get there stuff together. At 8am I was due pain relief but by 10 to 10 with no pain relief still after asking 5 nurses I begged the cleaner which came in to change my bedding. The HCA made me get out of bed whilst in pain so she could change the bedding. This made my heart rate drop to 64 and caused me to pass out. I was then placed in a chair on oxygen whilst she changed my bed before she left the room she changed my water which I had from the previous day and Informed the nurse I needed pain relief and she had put me on oxygen. 10.15 my parents come to the hospital and yet again had to chase for my pain relief. At 2.15pm I was due pain relief which the nurse came in and handed me paracetamol and told me to set an alarm on my phone and take every 4 hours! I informed my surgeon what had happened when he come around and he advised that I was best of recovering at home. So my parents packed my bags and we drove 4.5 hours home!

My experience has been ok, from deciding to have a gastric band to the actual day of surgery was great. The staff in the hospital however are not the nicest or most friendly. I felt like I was being pushed to go home. Being woke at 6am to be discharged and being told to get up and dressed is not good service.
Excellent from start to finish! ..my results are amazing! This is just 2 weeks after tummy tuck!
Very good .. sad thing they keep you high on cocktails of reliever..n when u reach home ..realiety sinks in   nice place lovely staff.. amazing surgeons  ..

review_title: Second operation with the hospital group
review_body: Second operation with the hospital group at Dolan Park and I have no issues with the service and level of care given.  The surgeon did a great job and the aftercare so far has been excellent. Highly recommended

review_title: Well looked after from start to finish?�?
review_body: Well looked after from start to finish ...staff all friendly ...drivers Paul and Andrew looked after me from pick up to drop off

Had rhinoplasty, septoplasty so far happy with the result surgeon very good after care nurses and rude and not very helpful waited 4 hours for pain killers and didn?��t get any food until 630pm along time when you can?��t eat from 12pm night before got booked back into to have splint removed and a nurse even tho notes stated I need to see a surgeon as I had internal splints surgeon came to help different to surgeon I had to do the operation and didn?��t know what he was doing as he doesn?��t do rhinoplasty left a splint it and didn?��t realise had a lot of pain in one side of my nose the nurse found it funny.
Thank you Mr Payne, Elizabeth and all involved. Couldn't ask for better people to be looking after me and giving me the best surgery !

I cannot fault my experience with the hospital group. From start to finish they have been professional and informative. I had my surgery beginning of the year and I am over the moon with my results exactly what I asked for and so much more. Couldnt be happier. A big thank you to Mr.B Khoda and his team.

review_title: I had my breast augmentation in October?�?
review_body: I had my breast augmentation in October 2018 with Mr Khoda, I can not recommend not only my surgeon but the the company itself were amazing. My care after my surgery was second to none & i am over the moon with my boobs!

review_title: Breast Aug at the Hospital Group
review_body: Around 12 weeks ago I had a breast augmentation and uplift and the results are amazing. My surgeon Dr George Samouris is quite literally a scar genius and excellent all round. I would highly recommend him!

review_title: 2 months ago I had breast enlargement?�?
review_body: 2 months ago I had breast enlargement with Dr Micheal Payne had a great experience at Dolan Park all the staff were lovely and I'm so happy with my results!!

review_title: Second sugrey with the company because?�?
review_body: Second sugrey with the company because the first one was done so Badly. I had to chase everything! Miss out on my chosen date due to having to wait a week for the company to get back to me. Post op care I had to again contact to ask with bandages will come off. Nurses at the hospital and local clinics are wonderful.

review_title: Felt at ease throughout the whole?�?
review_body: Felt at ease throughout the whole thing, from leaving house to returning home. Dolan Park is a lovely clean place, staff are friendly, and all medical staff were great
Superb care from the initial consultation to post operative care. Results are amazing. Mr Ben Koda is a genius. I Couldn't be happier.
Very professional. Excellent service

review_title: Best care and my choice i feel safe and?�?
review_body: Best care and my choice i feel safe and staff was amazing .I love my new breast
Amazing people looked after me. Would do it all again without hesitation
Happy with the Hospital Group.

review_title: It?��s now 4 months since my surgery and?�?
review_body: It?��s now 4 months since my surgery and I cannot fault the hospital group at all, all the staff at Dolan park made me feel comfortable and relaxed from the first consultation right through to the last. Would really highly recommend the hospital group to anyone thinking about surgery.

Within 3 weeks of my initial inquiry I had had my operation and can not fault the service I received. Every member of staff I came into contact with was professional and caring. I appreciated the direct, no nonsense approach from my surgeon and although it is very early days yet (10 days after my operation and I am still healing), I am so pleased with the result. My only regret is not having it done sooner.
The care was great. I had a lovely stay.

review_title: Staff were all very friendly & helpful
review_body: Staff were all very friendly & helpful. Hospital was clean & well presented.

review_title: Well what can I say 9 weeks ago I had?�?
review_body: Well what can I say, 9 weeks ago I had a breast uplift and implants changed by Ben khoda at Dolan park.

review_title: I'm 7 days post surgery at Riverside?�?
review_body: I'm 7 days post surgery at Riverside (London) with Dr Mileto. I had breast implants & an areola reduction, the surgery went perfectly & even though I'm an anxious person, I felt very well looked after.
Been really disappointed in the communication. So many companies think that sending booklets is enough but they?��re very impersonal.

review_title: I recently had a procedure at Dolan?�?
review_body: I recently had a procedure at Dolan Park Hospital.

review_title: The surgery went well but leading to it?�?
review_body: The surgery went well but leading to it did not fill me with confidence. Because I suffer bad from migraines I asked if it was possible to have early surgery, this did not happen. Fortunately I was able to drink water till 12 noon on day if surgery.  I was asked to come in for 14:00 to which I did, I then had to wait until after 18:00 hrs for my surgery, I was becoming agitated and concerned, I asked the surgeon when he came in if he was tired as it was getting late and I knew he?��d Benn busy all day, he assured me he was fine, I was not informed of the actual procedure that was done after the surgery and it was only when I went for my follow up appointment did I actually know how my implants were placed.  A very different experience from the first time I had surgery where I felt fully informed.

I had rhinoplasty done with the hospital group and honestly DO NOT go to them!!!! It has ruined my life and they showed no remorse for their actions and never offered any further help to correct the disastrous surgery provided by one of their consultants.

I am now 9 days post open rhinoseptoplasty. There are some bad reviews about this procedure so particularly wanted to share my experiences so far. My surgeon was Dr Ben khoda. He is the reason for the 5*. Some reviews highlighting 1 or 2 stars as the stay was rushed or some staff didn't go above and beyond..really?! And some fail to mention the actual procedure or the surgeon work?! It's why we went! Its a massive company with a big turn around. Think too many people expect the red carpet to be rolled out as it's private.

review_title: I had an abdominoplasty 7 days ago at?�?
review_body: I had an abdominoplasty 7 days ago at Dolan Park under Mr Seno. The nurses and staff at Dolan Park could not have done enough for me, they were all very kind and attentive to my needs. Mr Seno is a true professional and I look forward to seeing the end results. Thank you to all who made my surgery as untraumatic and uncomplicated as possible.
Amazing staff. Amazing surgeon. Can?��t thank you enough

review_title: Mr Payne is the best :) lol
review_body: Mr Payne is the best :) lol

review_title: Iv had to put 5 stars on here because?�?
review_body: Iv had to put 5 stars on here because unfortunately there was not a 6 star option.
Lovely nurses,very good doctor!

review_title: I had to wait 2 hrs before going up to?�?
review_body: I had to wait 2 hrs before going up to my room. Then had to wait a further 4hrs to go into theatre.

review_title: The surgery and after care was excellent
review_body: it was getting to this point which was the frustration
Sentiment of review: Both my sister and I chose the hospital group and the biggest difference I found was the inconsistencies. My sisters personal advisor was easy to contact, professional and she had a seamless booking process. Whereas my advisor, although lovely, was unprepared and unorganised, she asked the same questions each time I spoke with her and was difficult to contact. The surgeon informed me I would be a day case, so the quote was based on this, once I selected my date I prepared my lift, finances and aftercare on being a day case. Yet when I went to pay off my bill, the amount I owed was more than I expected as they had me down for a night stay. Eventually this was sorted and the amount I owed was corrected. 2 days before my operation I received a phone call to say my admission time was early afternoon, which seemed odd considering I was a day case. When questioned I was told I was down for staying over night. It took three additional phone calls to have this corrected, thanks to Diane.

review_title: I had my surgery with the hospital?�?
review_body: I had my surgery with the hospital group in Birmingham it was a very lovely Hospital and the staff were very polite and caring my surgeon was excellent and reassuring I highly recommend the hospital group Birmingham.

I have just had a gastric band fitted at Dolan Park by Mr Paul Super. The whole process was streamlined and professional. I was kept fully informed throughout my stay and the operation was performed without any issues. All staff were friendly and professional. I've had no complications since the operation. I would highly recommend Dolan Park and Mr Super to anyone considering this operation.
I had my procedure done without any complications, I felt well cared for and informed.

review_title: I had a very pleasant experience at?�?
review_body: I had a very pleasant experience at Dolan Park when having my surgery. Surgical/nursing staff were reassuring and very attentive. I did however find the room to be very basic and although it stated that it had recently been cleaned, the bathroom was still dirty with someone else?��s hair left in the shower. Follow up care has been as expected but more guidance needs to be given regarding wound aftercare. I did find it slightly off putting that my patient advisor did not remember who I was after only a week of our last meeting and the surgeon seemed quick to get me in and out of our consultation. Although high patient volumes are to be expected, the hospital should be mindful that the patient advisor is the first port of call in the stages pre surgery aswell as the surgeon. For a personalised and less stressful patient experience, more attention should be paid to the above issues, as for some people surgery is a life changing decision aswell as an expensive one.
Professional, attentive and thorough.  Completely happy with my surgeon and support team, my results are amazing!  Aftercare is as good as the surgery itself!  Highly recommended.
Was very happy with the treatment I had and the helpfulness of all the staff before and after my procedure . Also for the after care received in the  nurse clinic.
I would highly recommend The Hospital Group. From start to finish I have been looked after in a very professional, caring manner. I would not hesitate in using them again in the future. Thank you

review_title: I had full tummy tuck and Breast?�?
review_body: I had full tummy tuck and Breast enlargement in 2010.

review_title: Mr Hamadeh the Surgeon cancelled my scheduled?�?
review_body: Surgeon cancelled my scheduled procedure after I had been waiting over 10 hours, Mr Nizar Hamadeh and Dolan Park staff are not up to it. Mr Hamadeh has terrible customer service qualities and bad listening skills with ?��I don?��t care attitude?ѝ.

review_title: I was a patient at The Dolan Park (The?�?
review_body: I was a patient at The Dolan Park (The Hospital Group) from 28/11/18�??�� 30/11/18. Undergoing a Abdominoplasty and Flankoplasty led by Dr. Michael Payne. Each and everyone of the staff in that operating theatre including Dr. Payne, HCAs, nurses were amazing ?�� the care, attention and the love that I received was 100% plus.

Had a gastric band with them in 2014. At first everything was great but over time I became ill and the band stuck to my liver. I have recently had to have it removed. All the weight I lost has come back on and and �5000 out of pocket :(
OUTSTANDING

review_title: The hospital itself was very clean
review_body: The hospital itself was very clean

review_title: very good, but would like some advise.
review_body: Can?��t really fault hospital group it?��s self. I had a breast enlargement 3 and a half years ago, no problems loved them. 5 months ago one of the implants flipped and had to undergo revision surgery. Unfortunately I?��m really unhappy with the new results. I?��m not sure if I have any option to have them changed again even though the new ones are under new warranty. Would like some advise if anyone knows please.

review_title: Very  pleased  with the results from mr?�?
review_body: Very  pleased  with the results from mr Khodas procedure - he was exceptional.

*AFTER CARE NON EXISTANT* currently in the process of taking the hospital group too court. I am unable to provide photos on here but I?��m a left scarred for life (see my profile photo) they failed too see me for days whilst I begged for appointment. My breast was gaping a wound with infection, they said no one was available all weekend so I was left to the nhs care! On numerous occasions no1 would see me I was discharged with drains with no appointment booked to take them out.  They also failed to spot a hematoma on my breast Despite me saying I was in pain until the following morning after my surgery.   This company do not care about you once they have taken the money that?��s it !! Now owned by same group that owns transform-  I was refunded for procedure and they accepted someone should of been available too see me in that state but I?��m still left with huge star shaped scar & everything they put me through mentally for weeks was a disgrace. Staff lie in your notes and if you make a complaint they just turn it on too the patient. It?��s absolutely pointless complaining too this company there ?��investigstions?�� Rely on staff statements where no1 is likely too hold there hands up. Anyone reading this I beg you do your research on this company. There after care doesn?��t exist !!! I will never forgive the HG and can only hope I win my case and they are exposed. Katie

review_title: I cannot believe they are legit!
review_body: Terrible experience following gastric band surgery. Left hospital in agony, but the only pain relief I was offered were 2 paracetamol, and told to contact my GP for more. This entailed a 5 hour journey, including a flight! They were aware of this, yet nothing.
Lovely staff, I was well looked after before and after treatment. Will deffinately recommend x

I?��ve been completely impressed throughout my experience so far with The Hospital Group. I?��m one week post op with Mr Seno and feel amazing, already back doing normal activities. I was very nervous but was looked after and made to feel relaxed at Dolan Park from the moment I arrived. The nurses were warm, friendly and attentive which made the process a lot less scary. I was well fed and everything was explained to me to calm my nerves. I felt genuinely cared for and looked after. The rooms were cozy, kept to a good temperature and had a television, safe and decent bathroom facilities. All the operating assistants and nurses relating to the procedure were equally brilliant and helped calm my nerves whilst remaining professional. It was over before I knew it and I was waking up in bed with a nurse by my side. The driver service was brilliant and the drivers were friendly and caring.
Very professional , kind and the staff are wonderful
Lovely staff. Nice and clean.  Excellent no faults

The staff at the hospital were well informed at all levels. Responded to emails and phone calls in a prompt manner. The day of surgery I was kept fully informed by the consultant and all nursing staff.

I am now one week post op and I am over the moon with the results so far. I can not speak highly enough about my surgeon, Dr Khoda. His personality is infectious and puts you at ease and his skills in theatre and amazing. Whilst most of the staff at dolan Park were friendly and helpful there was a particular nurse, Dan who made me feel like an inconvenience. I requested painkillers and was advised by Dan that the nurses able to administer medication were with other patients but he would ensure someone handled my request when they were free. Almost two hours later I was in a great sea of pain and presses my buzzer where another nurse came to see me and apologised informing me that Dan had not passed the message on. The communication within the Hospital Group is very poor. After paying my deposit I found it difficult to speak with my patient liaison advisor or anyone actually. At the time of my consultation I asked if my follow up appointments could be on a weekend and was assured they could be. Since having my procedure I have found out this is not the case and infact there has been a huge confusion about where I should actually be attending my follow up (Leeds or Sheffield). I have had no choice but to make arrangements for someone to take me to the scheduled appointment which has caused great inconvenience and my husband to have to take a day off work. Overall these are small issues but have caused more stress and upset at what is already a stressful time.
Very nice staff all round
Friendly. Helpful. Very nice .

I would strongly recommend The Hospitals group. The only negative comment I have it my surgery wasn?��t until gone 6pm so I was hungry,thirsty & tired but everything else was faultless. The nurses and other staff couldn?��t do enough to help me after the operation when I was feeling unable. I?��ve already recommended this company to many people since coming out a week ago
Second time I used THG and again very happy with everything.

review_title: I have an uplift and breast implants on?�?
review_body: I have an uplift and breast implants on the 21st of oct. can't fault the hospital the staff was great always there if needed and was checked on a lot... first few hours was long waiting around but the room was nice have own tv and bathroom with Wi-Fi. so can't complain. Mr Ben khoda was my surgeon nearly 3 weeks post op and so far I'm very happy with every thing. he was honest with what he thought I needed and gave great feedback on size ect. so far so good.
Staff where amazing felt so comfortable and at ease. I would definitely recommended

I cannot recommend, Mr Seno, the staff at Exeter clinic and at Dolan Park enough. They offered an outstanding level of professionalism throughout. Every single member of staff was friendly and helpful and always went above and beyond. The clinic and hospital are extremely clean and well equipped, my two night stay could not have been made any better. From start to finish they have exceeded all my expectations. I would highly recommend THG to anyone.

review_title: Do not go to the hospital group for anything
review_body: Do not go to the hospital group for rhinoplasty! Mine looks terrible and I will be needing another one. Back in 2010 I went to them for my procedure. Every time I tried to tell them I didn?��t like it I was fobbed off! It cost nearly �5000! After all these years of trying to live with it because they didn?��t care, I will be having another procedure with a surgeon that can do it right. These people are crooks do not risk it

review_title: Hi had my op for by pass opp Monday?�?
review_body: Hi had my op for by pass opp Monday 12.0 clock home next day ,currently in Wales at static caravan resting .Feel great a few wind pains but can't wait to start this journey thanks the hospital group!!!!
Fanastic experience so far! From day of surgery to aftercare.

I had rhinoplasty done nearly 3 years ago and i regret getting it done from here My nose looks horrible, I am suffering with breathing and my nose is always watery. After I had my operation I told the Dr that I have difficulty breathing and the shape was a lot better before. he told me I should be fine after a year I went back to them few time dr didnt listen to me or even cared.  I even wanted see another Dr and the he said exactly the same and even after  3 years I am still straggling! Save your money and go somewhere else. Please think twice before you go to them.

Excellent. The friendly staff made me feel very calm relaxed and welcome at the hospital. They regularly checked to see how I was doing and ensuring I was feeling confortable. The rooms were very clean and very quiet and relaxed just what you need after surgery. Very happy with the service and would 1000% use the hospital group again. Highly recommend
Went as planned

Overall very pleased with everything from beginning to end.staff from clinic very helpfull and friendly and the hospital which I had my surgery.the staff at dolan park hospital couldn't have been any more helpfull and caring.

review_title: Difficult to contact but perfect operation and hospital stay
review_body: 1 STAR: Regarding booking my operation - my main go to person was on sick leave for at least a week and trying to get hold of ANYBODY else in the entire Hospital Group company is impossible, I left message after message, after message and nobody contacts you - IMPROVE IT, I nearly went elsewhere!

review_title: Dr Seno is bad for nose jobs
review_body: Dr Seno and generally all the other doctors at Hospital Group do not know how to do nose jobs. Left my tip too big so out of proportion with the rest of my nose. Also one nostril is noticeably bigger than the other and constantly have a runny nose. Do not go to them for something as complex as your nose!! A lot of the positive reviews on here are also posted by the company. Please look elsewhere for nose jobs. All of the good reviews on here are verified orders apart from the bad ones and once a bad review comes in, lots of good reviews come in after. This clinic is a joke! Stay clear! Still not verified my order and I had rhinoplasty in November 2016.

review_title: I would recommend Hospital Group to?�?
review_body: I would recommend Hospital Group to anyone, my experience was very professional, the staff were excellent from my first appointment to the follow up check ups after my procedure, everything was explained thoroughly from start to finish, I found them very helpful.

My experience with Dolan park, I could not fault my surgeon and really pleased so far only being 3 weeks post op, I was told at my consultation I would have to stay overnight due to the procedure I was having done, the morning after my surgery I was woken up at half 5 with breakfast and by 7 was told I could leave, I had to wait for my lift to get home and at half 8 was asked to sit in the waiting area, which I did for over an hour, not feeling well in pain, uncomfortable & feeling nauseous.  paying private for my surgery and the cost surely  we should not be pushed out of the room before 10am ?
Would highly recommend having the chauffeur driven car. Drivers were so very kind especially David!
Excellent service

review_title: Could not fault the surgeon, ward staff let the hospital group down
review_body: Could not fault the surgeon, his surgical team or the operation.

2 weeks post Breast augumention with Mr Adriano Seno, completely happy with consultation, op, and current after care! Care before op and after where brilliant, completely looked after, clean hospital and in a lovely rural settting! Would highly recommend the hospital group, Dolan park hospital staff and the surgeon Mr Seno thank you .
I have had surgery previously 8 years ago and they never fail to please. Always professional and friendly. All staff are very accommodating and understanding.

review_title: Had a wonderfull experience from start?�?
review_body: Had a wonderfull experience from start to finish!

Lovely place. Warm friendly staff. Excellent surgeon, Mr Payne. Cosy room, huge food choice, good tasting. Nothing a bother, tea, hot and cold drinks and even food available 24/7. Excellent pre op care. Attentive and sympathetic to your needs. I can't rate this highly enough.

review_title: Fab service by the surgeon Mr Khoda
review_body: Fab service by the surgeon Mr Khoda. However let down by Dolan Park and the level of care and lack of patient focused care.

Had my consultation with THG in Birmingham (dolan park hospital) on 14th September 2018 Everything went well my surgeon Dr.Sulaiman was really nice i explained to him due to religious reasons i can not agree for blood transfusion he said he is ok with that.so i paid my deposit (�1.100) and they booked me for my operation day 2nd October 2018.during my consultation I asked them few times if they are ok to operate without blood transfusion both of them Dr.Sulaiman and Elizabeth Dutton (patient advisor) said yes they are ok with that. 9 days before my operation I received a call from one of the nurses and she said they cant go ahead with my operation as I didnt agree for blood transfusion??? I was so angry and so disappointed at the time! I called Elizabeth the same day and tried to ask her what happened? Why have they change their minds? She tried to convince me to sign that I agree for blood transfusion as she was 100% sure everything will be fine and I wont need one. (Discusting behaviour!!!) After 2 days I called them and told them I dont want to agree for blood transfusion and want my deposit back. Elizabeth said it can take up to 28 days. Didnt receive my money after 28 days so I called her again she said money should be on my account in 3 days.I checked my account still no money.. Called her again (3th time) to complain about whole situation and they sent me my deposit the same day...so finally after 35 long days I received my money back. Apart from this both of them (Dr.Sulainam and Elizabeth) were really nice.

review_title: Great local clinic and great surgeon but poor hospital care
review_body: Great local clinic and great surgeon but hospital care at Dolan Park was surprisingly poor. I was admitted at 09.00 yesterday and had to wait until 15.00 for my operation, they did apologize but I would've much preferred the comfort of my own home for a few more hours as I had to wake up at 5.30am for this early admission. They didn't have my post op bra ready or make any attempt to let me get one so after my surgery I was left without one and they didn't seem to realise until they checked up on me 2 hours later. Once this was eventually on, the surgeon came in, checked all was ok and I was able to tell him where certian pains were so he could see if they were normal and luckily they were. My blood pressure was then taken every 2 hours but a different nurse each time unfortunately so I had to repeat anything previously said as no one wrote it down... I got offered food rather late in the day so was a bit disappointed as I had to waste most of it as it was so uncomfortable for me to eat with limited movement. 2 of the nurses were lovely and polite but 3 of them were very rude and I am surprised they are allowed to be like that. In the morning, I asked for elp putting my new bra on and she looked at me with disgust and confusion and then left swiftly without adjusting my straps and said I could do it myself! Despite being initially annoyed with an early discharge as I was definitely not feeling up to it, I was glad to leave and begin recovery at home. My driver home Shirley was lovely, she had also had the same surgery so could sympathize and make sure I was comfy. She was very friendly and carried all my bags to my hallway so this ended the experience on a high. I'm only a day into recovery and have my nurse appointment already booked for next Monday so hopefully the aftercare will now improve. Real shame I felt rushed and dismissed bearing in mind this a private hospital where people spend a lot of money in. Thank you to my surgeon Dr Seno though and I hope if I am to return I am treated much better. It was a busy hospital and appreciate there is lots to do but we are all paying a lot of money for this service and it's not right we should be made to feel rushed when we are in pain. Michaela

Excellent company I came to this company for a consultation, I also went to a few other companys. But from the moment I walked throgh the door I new hospital group was the one for me. They just seemed so much more professional and truly look after me and not just my money.

review_title: I had breast implants on the 6th of?�?
review_body: I had breast implants on the 6th of September i went to dolan park i was really nervous when I arrived the nurses were fantastic and put me at ease i went there at 12pm and got the surgery at 4.15pm they kept me up to date with times and what was happening i couldent thank them enough,also i am super happy with my results couldent thank ben khoda enough he was fantastic all the way through from my first appointment at the newcastle hospital group to the Birmingham dolan park
Avoid at all costs.

review_title: I am just over 6 weeks post-op now and?�?
review_body: I am just over 6 weeks post-op now and I absolutely love my new boobs! All the staff have been wonderful, this is everyone from my Patient Co-ordinator, Nurses, Anaesthetist, Reception Staff and most importantly my Surgeon (Mr Samouris). Thank you! I felt well looked after and not at all rushed (I was a daycase). My room was nice, the food was good and I had hot chocolate on tap. For my one week check up I stupidly turned up a day early but the incredible Reception Staff went out of their way to get me seen by a Nurse, so that I hadn?��t had a wasted trip. I would most definitely recommend the Hospital Group and the Dolan Park Hospital.

review_title: My surgeon was absolutely amazing I?�?
review_body: My surgeon was absolutely amazing I can't fault him for his handy work. The after care is exactly as people had said it was on here. It is shockingly crap. I'm so disappointed with the after care. There was a couple of nurses at the hospital that were brilliant but also a couple of nurses that I thought were very rude and shouldn't be in that profession. One of the nurses filled my litre jug I would say to the top and expected me to pour myself a drink...... really? Not even 24 hours my surgery. That is shocking. Also my first check up was rearranged by them which was fine the first time, only for them to call me on my 2nd check up and say rather than waiting 1 week between appointments they expect me to wait 3 WEEKS before I see anyone. That to me is disgusting. After raising my concern to them when they phoned to change that appointment I said could I have a call back from the nurse to ask whether I keep bandage or or not, I was told I would get a call back and still 4 days later I hadn't received a call back. You pay all that money literally for the uplift and implant �6,400 to be precise for crap after care. That is disgraceful. I can't thank Mr Ben khoda enough for his work he is well and truly amazing at his job.

review_title: Had a wonderful experience so far
review_body: Had a wonderful experience so far, 3 weeks post op BA with mr samouris i chose 425cc over the muscle.

review_title: as soon as i walked into the clinic?�?
review_body: As soon as i walked into the clinic there was a very warm welcome, all my questions were answered

review_title: Hi I've just had surgery at the Dolan?�?
review_body: Hi I've just had surgery at the Dolan Park hospital in bromsgrove and the staff were brilliant, I can honestly say they are the best ever?��?
Whilst I am only 2.5 weeks post op recovery stage, I am absolutely thrilled with my results so far. I had a full abdominoplasty and liposuction on my flanks.

review_title: Everyone was great to start with!
review_body: Everyone was great to start with. Good consultation with my patient adviser and surgeon. Although when they received my money I never once heard from my patient adviser (Julie stansfield)  even though I constantly rang, sent text and voicemails nearly everyday she just wasn?��t bothered! I was very close to backing out of surgery, the only reason why I didn?��t was because they keep 25% of the money! My surgeon just didn?��t care, was in and out and actually walked out the room as I was asking him a question after my surgery! The nurses were amazing, and so far my dietitian has been great! But if I could turn back time I would of 100% gone with another hospital. They have even kept �1400 of my mums money as her gp told her she was unfit for surgery and had no choice but to cancel! But if Julie had picked up her phone this process would of been a lot less stressful. I just hope I don?��t have any problems with aftercare
Excellent service provided by The Hospital Group at Dolan Park Hospital, Bromsgrove.  Special mention to my Surgeon, Ben Khoda, and nurses Emma and Faz.

review_title: Could not recommend the hospital group more
review_body: I have just had my op at the pines in Manchester and I have to say I am very impressed. Everyone from start to finish was great. From booking my consultation a few months ago I have felt at ease with the hospital group and they genuinely cared. Alison who was my main person to contact at the newcastle clinic always got back to me very quickly with any questions I had. My surgeon Mr Alleruzzo was just fantastic and was honest from start to finish. He visited me twice after my procedure and was so genuine in everything he said and had such caring words. I could not fault anyone at the pines. We arrived at 9am and from then on in until my op at 12:30 my mind was so occupied with meeting all the nurses, anethitist and my surgeon that I had no time to even get scared that day. The ladies who were with me when I went to sleep and when I woke up were great. My stay was comfortable and nothing was a bother for any of them and even looked after my other half when he was with me. The day after I arrived home a nurse called to make sure everything went ok and asked how I was feeling and Alison also sent me a message with well wishes. I just want to say a huge thank you to the hospital group and especially mr Alleruzzo for making this patient very happy and comfortable in a decision I had made.  I could not recommend the hospital group more.

Read some of the reviews prior to booking my surgery. I just had to say I had an amazing experience from consultation, through operative procedure , over night stay and just had my first post op review. Everyone from beginning to end were so caring, informative and made me feel at ease the whole way through.

review_title: The staff were so attentive and helpful?�?
review_body: The staff were so attentive and helpful and made me very comfortable

review_title: Great care and experience from the?�?
review_body: Great care and experience from the first meeting to the aftercare back home.  The hospital group liaises with your GP to organise your ongoing care if needed
Excellent care, attentive staff. Basic stark furnishing of rooms

review_title: Satisfied customer using the Hospital Group
review_body: Very friendly and informative staff and my room for the overnight stay was very clean and spacious.

review_title: Had a great experience with the Hospital Group
review_body: Had a great experience with the Hospital Group. Had my consultation at Dolan Park Hospital in August & surgery was in September, everything was so organised & all the staff were so attentive during my stay. My surgeon Michael Payne made me feel really comfortable with my op and I?��m so pleased with my results. The aftercare is great, the nurses are really helpful and are happy to answer any questions. Would definitely recommend the Hospital Group.
Fantastic experience from start to finish. Would highly recommend them. I will be back to have more surgery in the future
Friendly staff, nothing was too much, everything was explained in great detail and I felt completely at ease especially as this was my first ever surgery.
All staff were caring and went out off their way to make my stay as comfortable as possible. I would definitely recommend The Hospital Group to anyone .

From start to finish, everything has run smoothly.  Most of the staff have been friendly.  More so at the Exeter Clinic, than in hospital.  My only suggestion in the hospital was that the  rooms are very cold.  Maybe brighter colours, etc. Dr Super was lovely, as was the anaesthetist.  Have only had my band adjusted once so far,  I definitely need more adjustments.

I would highly recommend the hospital group to anyone who is considering surgery. The cintsctts and care before during and after my surgery has been of a high standard. All staff are very thorough, thoughtful and caring and I must add how refreshing it is to see the surgeon so often, during the consultation, before and after surgery and around the hospital in general. I cannot thank Dr. Payne and all staff enough.

Mr Khoda - a fantastic surgeon. From the very first day, I felt like I had made the right choice. When I arrived at the hospital group for my initial consultation, I was welcomed by Jodie Rogers (my patient care coordinator). She was so caring and gentle throughout the whole process, helped me with any questions, and reassured me with any doubts. What a beautiful lady. Even after my surgery was complete, she welcomed me to my follow-up appointment with open arms and a genuine smile. My Khoda was second to none. He took such care over listening to what I wanted, and also provided great advice. He was very professional and made me feel comfortable. He considers your wishes, whilst also advising on what is feasible and safe for your body, and what will give optimum results. He made me aware that he was contactable if I had any concerns, and even offered me a second consultation to discuss any doubts I had. The surgery was prompt and there were a range of surgery dates to choose from. On the day of surgery, he explained the process very well and put me at ease. The staff at Dolan Park Hospital were also fantastic and accommodating. The surgery went very smoothly, and I had zero complications. I am thoroughly happy with my results. And what a great way to complete the journey than with a hug and genuine good wishes from Mr Khoda. Fantastic experience and I can't thank Jodie and Ben Khoda enough! Take care guys. You have changed my life.

review_title: Awful to begin but a very happy ending ?��?
review_body: The experience was good. My initial consultation and my follow up appointments were in London which was quite far and expensive for me to get to however once there I felt at ease and my personal consultant Melanie Turner was absolutely amazing. I can?��t fault her.

review_title: Recently had surgery here and was?�?
review_body: Recently had surgery here and was impressed with the level of professionalism, and care from the nursing staff, surgeons, and after care. Would highly recommend it based on this and overall results achieved.

review_title: To be a five star needs to improve?�?
review_body: To be a five star needs to improve their staff communication on the wards to patients.

review_title: I had a band fitted by Mr Super
review_body: I had a band fitted by Mr Super, during the 2 year aftercare period the nurse was having difficulty filling the band, she believed the port had flipped. I spoke to the aftercare team requesting an xray and for them to investigate, the response I received was that Mr Super's ports do not flip so they will not investigate.

review_title: I used the Hospital Group after several?�?
review_body: I used the Hospital Group after several recommendations from different people. I would highly recommend them. They have met my expectations, from appointments, my surgeon, and currently my ongoing after care. If I was having cosmetic surgery in the furture, I would'nt hesitate to use The Hospital Group again

review_title: From my first consultation I felt?�?
review_body: From my first consultation I felt really at ease with the whole process, on the day everything was explained to me in great detail to make me feel better about what was going to happen. The aftercare was exceptional no matter what question big or small the staff were always happy to help!

review_title: The visit to Bromsgrove went well
review_body: The visit to Bromsgrove went well.  It's a lovely building out in the countryside.  All the staff were very good and looked after me really well.

review_title: I had breast augmentation surgery with Dr Seno
review_body: I had breast augmentation surgery with Dr Seno at Dolan Park Hospital and couldn?��t fault my experience one bit!
Very friendly and attentive I felt completely at ease!!
Felt very well looked after. The staff were all lovely. Thank you

review_title: Fantastic care. Lovely people. Couldn?��t be happier.
review_body: I am only 1 week post op but so far I cannot fault the care I have had. Mr Seno did my tummy tuck with muscle repair. Not once did I feel nervous leading up to it or the day I went to Dolan Park for surgery. All the staff were so lovely. From the driver, receptionist, nurses and surgeon!!  Nothing was too much trouble. Probably the best experience I?��ve ever had with someone taking my blood... the hospital is a beautiful building and very clean inside! would definitely recommend and will return for more surgery when I am ready!! I don?��t understand some of the bad reviews at all!  Some people just love to find fault!

review_title: It?��s difficult having only one point of?�?
review_body: It?��s difficult having only one point of contact prior to the operation. One person can only do so much.

review_title: From my first consultation to my one?�?
review_body: From my first consultation to my one week post operation check up, I have had a wonderful experience. At my first consultation I was worried about judgment, but everyone has been genuine and kind. I would definitely reccoment the hospital group to anyone who was looking for the same care I had.

review_title: Very easy to use & friendly service
review_body: Very easy to use & friendly service. The staff all seem very knowledgeable & easy to talk to. They did everything they said they would. Absolutely no problems at all

review_title: Been customer of hospital group three?�?
review_body: Been customer of hospital group three times now

review_title: Not a great experience whatsoever with?�?
review_body: Not a great experience whatsoever with the hospital group.  After reading reviews I chose to have my mastopexy here which now looking back was a bad decision. I had the surgery with dr Mayo who seemed great until it came to after the surgery where he seemed to fall off the face of the earth. Couldn?��t get an appointment with him and had to see another surgeon to check the work. Obviously this isn?��t great as I had questions etc which couldn?��t really be answered by anyone other than the surgeon I had. The aftercare is disgusting and the staff are seriously unhelpful. I had my surgery in bromsgrove the hospital is lovely but the staff there also weren?��t great in my opinion. Tried to give me medication which I?��d already taken 30 mins before again! It?��s a good job I wasn?��t fully out of it after my surgery to realise! They also left me in a bloody gown until later in the day when I could be released. No food was given when I said I was hungry which I know sounds trivial after having surgery but I?��d not eaten since 7am the previous morning so I was bound to be. When I finally got something it was a yogurt...dissapointing. The nurses and staff were also rude to my family when they were there and make us feel very uncomfortable. I wrote a letter of complaint to the hospital group about scarring and the treatment I received which was pretty much fobbed off. I paid good money for this surgery and expected much much better. such a shame. I?��m having to pay for treatment for my scarring as it?��s left me feeling down but what does that matter to them eh. Once they have your money it?��s game over. Anyway I know for the future and will not recommend the hospital group to anyone wanting cosmetic surgery.

review_title: My experience with the hospital group?�?
review_body: My experience with the hospital group was fantastic. Excellent care and felt at ease at all times. Very professional and friendly. Thankyou for giving me the body I have longed for. Definitely highly recommend from the staff at the Manchester clinic to the nurses at the hospital in bromsgrove.

review_title: I honestly could rate this hospital?�?
review_body: I honestly could rate this hospital more than 5 stars.... the staff are so helpful, friendly, caring and have the time to talk to you, they make sure you have everything you need and are comfy before they need to leave, factilties, decor... fantastic stay....

review_title: Much less stressful than i thought?�?
review_body: Much less stressful than i thought Wonderful care  Could do with more information bout recovery as i didnt take a  in .

review_title: I would recommend this company to?�?
review_body: I would recommend this company to anyone looking for surgery very clean very friendly staff

review_title: Aside from a pushy anaesthetist with a?�?
review_body: Aside from a pushy anaesthetist with a short fuse it was a professional and comfortable experience
Wow where do I begin

review_title: My experience with The Hospital Group?�?
review_body: My experience with The Hospital Group was brilliant.

review_title: I arrived early in the morning scared?�?
review_body: I arrived early in the morning scared and worried . Reception staff welcomed me with a lovely smile. And that was the start to the rest of my stay. All lovely friendly staff could not do enough to help my stay be comfortable one.

review_title: Thank you for making this an easy?�?
review_body: Thank you for making this an easy journey for me, yes I had some discomfort and a slight infection, which was dealt with quickly, all were there for me and still are. Hospital lovely, car journey relaxing and great conversation. All very professional, with skilled surgeons, would recommend to all.

I had a breast augmentation at Dolan Park Hospital on August 15th with Mr Georgios Samouris as my surgeon. I can honestly not fault my experience from my first consultation to now being in recovery I truly feel I made such a good decision going with them.
Excellent service from start to finish.. Would highly recommend them and would definitely use them again.. Thankyou hospital group
Very friendly &very welcoming staff, would recommend anybody to go there. Mr Michael Payne is just the best surgeon. Xx
I was Made to feel comfortable throughout my experience with Hospital Group from my two pre-op consultant appointments, pre-op appointment with the nurse, my stay at hospital to the after care.

review_title: I don?��t think the discharge time is?�?
review_body: I don?��t think the discharge time is appropriate it?��s far too early everything seemed rushed

review_title: I had a great experience here from?�?
review_body: I had a great experience here from start to finish. Very professional and informative. I love the outcome of my procedure and would highly recommend.

review_title: My Surgeon Mr. Michael Payne is absolutely brilliant!
review_body: From arrival I was made to feel welcome and comfortable!  I was shown kindness and professionalism during my stay!  Nothing was too much trouble.

review_title: The hospital was very professional they?�?
review_body: The hospital was very professional they explained everything very well and took me through every step  and follow up was excellent would definitely recommend them.

review_title: Arrived at the clinic on time
review_body: Arrived at the clinic on time, 10 am, didn?��t have surgery till 7pm bearing in mind it was scheduled for late afternoon, had to stay a while longer the next day because of my late surgery, when I asked to leave a nurse st the desk asked if I?��d just arrived ?? Had no clue to who I was although my room was opposite the nurses station, nurses who looked after me through the night were brilliant ,, checking in me often also helping me to the bathroom .

review_title: So happy I chose The Hospital Group over many others.
review_body: I would happily recommend The Hospital Group to anyone considering the procedure I had. I had many consultations before I decided whether to proceed and they were by far the best at listening to my requirements, helping me choose what was best for me and also not pushing me into a look I didn't want to go for unlike previous consultations. I was made to feel very welcome, and time in appointments or decision making was never an issue. I am so pleased I had so many consultations as it showed me just how differently all these companies work and that The Hospital Group were above and beyond the rest.

review_title: Excellent service from start to finish?�?
review_body: Excellent service from start to finish even my drivers was very professional great job done this is the start of my new journey. Very clean hospital and not long to wait for surgery
Absolutely brillant!! From consultation stage to post procedure!

review_title: I have not got one bad thing to say?�?
review_body: I have not got one bad thing to say about the hospital group they were all amazing and the after care team are all lovely couldn?��t fault this place I had breast enlargements and it was the best decision I ever made I would recommend to anyone who is looking in getting the same surgery I had please go hear It has changed my life for the better feel so much more confident in my self already

review_title: I have been looked after from my inital?�?
review_body: I have been looked after from my inital call to make an appt to now some 5 weeks post-operatively.

For the most part it was a very good experience.  Only 2 points let it down. The plebotomist took many attempts to take my blood then told me he would have to take it from my wrist and told me the wrist is the very worst place and it would hurt. Not what you say to a needle phobic! He told me to ask for numbing cream when the nurse inserted my iv. But  they refused.  From my first consultation I was promised anti sickness drugs whilst asleep because i react badly to anesthetic. However none was administered and I vomited when I came round. You should not vomit after gastric surgery and the nurse had to very quickly jab me in the thigh with a needle to stop the nausea.

review_title: I had surgery at Dolan Park
review_body: I had surgery at Dolan Park.  The hospital was immaculate, the staff very professional, helpful and friendly.

review_title: Only one week after my surgery but so?�?
review_body: Only one week after my surgery but so far I could not fault anything very clean excellent staff the care they provided was excellent very professional the hospital was very quiet and clean which made my 2 night stay very relaxing highly recommend my surgeon with his lovely laid back approach made me feel very at ease with the whole process

review_title: I had rhinoplasty with Dr Hammadeh 10?�?
review_body: I had rhinoplasty with Dr Hammadeh 10 days ago and just got the cast off today. I cannot rate him enough i am in love with my nose already! He has done exactly what I wanted and I had literally no bruising or swelling because he?��s that good. My nose is a little swollen after having the cast off but it still looks perfect, the fact it?��s going to get even better is unreal. So glad I chose the hospital group it?��s been such a good experience!!

review_title: I would go back if I needed any thing?�?
review_body: I would go back if I needed any thing else doing,

From the initial consultation to the surgery, things were perfect. The service was great, the Surgeon was very clear on everything and answered our questions. My husband and I were very happy with everything. However, the perfect service went down the drain after the surgery when I had a bit of a scare. The nurses did not handle the situation well and it took them ages to get back to me on what to do. The nurse that even answered the call both times I called was laughing with someone else on the end of the phone while I was on the phone. It was very unprofessional especially considering the fact that I was in distress on the phone.

review_title: I cannot recommend this company highly?�?
review_body: I cannot recommend this company highly enough.

A wonderful life-changing experience, from initial consultation to post op the care is exemplary. You could not wish to meet a better more professional team. Treated at all times with respect, dignity, and kindness. One week after my operation I feel wonderful.

Friendly caring people making my journey through this process so much easier, this includes my consultation to my hospital visit and then follow up visits x it was a big decision for me to make so the support was amazing and patience x
NIGHTMARE!
everything went to plan ...

I had my surgery 4 years ago and the after care from the hospital group was appalling, every time I wanted to see a dietitian there was never one available so I had to wait over a week each time for a phone call, I am still having trouble keeping some foods down, I get constant throat infections and bloating and have had to have defills so most of my weight has gone back on, and because my two year after care was up two years ago I?��m stuck, so I?��m am not impressed at all?�ɐ

I recently had surgery through the hospital group and I couldn't be happier. Dr Seno is a man of few words but I'm very happy with his work. Most of my dealings were with the Exeter branch and I have to say Mel on reception is lovely as is Nurse Mary. It's like meeting old friends when you go there.
Couldn't fault the service or care at Dolan park until discharge.

The Hospital Group were amazing in every possible way. The Cardiff clinic were fantastic. Stefanie, the client co-ordinator, was unbelievably helpful, kind, and supportive. She was extremely attentive, and ensured that any questions or queries were answered promptly, always putting me at ease.

review_title: I heard those doctors left there tools?�?
review_body: I heard those doctors left there tools in the patient but they got a big settlement for it so yeah u doctors keep your eyes peeled
Brill hospital and staff

Prior to my operation I was a little frustrated as despite constant chasing to resolve an issue with my medical results. I kept being told everything will be fine but only due to my perseverance this happened. The actual operation was fantastic and I know Mr Super is one of the top surgeons in the UK. Post op I have had to chase for my apppintments however the dieticians and nurses are lovely and so patient and kind. Overall very happy with THG. Support is fantastic. Would have been 5/5 had I not needed to chase for appointments/ information.
I had Mr Seno carrying out my facelift & upper eye work.

I went for a consultation here and the surgeon Domenico Mileto made the whole experience very rushed and inpersonal. I was not even asked if I had any questions. Instead, he talked and walked towards the door, opened it and ushered me out. The whole thing is awful. In the waiting room with lots of other people who have the same appointment time on a conveyor belt system rushed in to see the surgeon then the sales person. Would not recommend this place. I instead found another clinic which was worlds apart in terms of servoce.
Terrible, I would not recommend it.

review_title: Well looked after and kept informed?�?
review_body: Well looked after and kept informed about everything

I had a gastric band in and out in a day plenty of support no problems so far, 4 weeks post op but do as they say they know best. I Don?��t regret it at all, puts a smile on my face every time I think about it. Love the results so far feel really positive and would go there for anything else as it was such a good experience.
Amazing

review_title: I could not recommend The Hospital?�?
review_body: I could not recommend The Hospital Group enough, they were fantastic in every way and made my whole experience of survey a very positive one.

I can not fault the run up to my admittance, with the patient liaison being friendly and informative however my hospital experience was not that way sadly. My consultant was lovely and very very thorough. My complaint was with Dolan Park hospital. The room I thought was very dated, the view I had was awful, it was extremely Hot in my room with no air con and just a normal fan circulating warm air. The bathroom was dated and could do with being modernised. The food was good and some of the nurses were lovely but not all. My discharge was an absolute sham and one that my husband and I thought was disgusting considering the cost we had incurred. I was suppose to have had follow up phone calls all week post op but after two days, they stopped. My appointment with the nurse for a check up after was faultless and she was lovely.

review_title: From start to finish was faultless
review_body: From start to finish was faultless. Ease of seeing surgeon and after care was spot on. nurse appointments in Southampton after surgery

review_title: Overall I was very happy with my stay?�?
review_body: Overall I was very happy with my stay Greeting at reception was excellent Very polite .Ward nurses very good Polite cheerful and helpful My surgeon was excellent Mr Payne Very informative polite and easy to talk to Highly recommend Mr Payne

I had a mini abdo last week. From arriving at 7am to my op at 1pm all was great, staff nurses and my surgeon dr micheal payne were all so lovely and calming. They really looked after me. I was quite anxious before going to sleep but they all reassured me and I felt very comfortable.
Great care and advice received

review_title: I?��ve been a patient of the Hosptial?�?
review_body: I?��ve been a patient of the Hosptial Group for nearly 2 weeks. Had a SeptoRhinoplasty nearly two weeks ago and it all couldn?��t have gone smoother. The hosptial was really clean, the nurses were to attentive and forfilled my needs. Everything went quicker than expected and the pain was monitored as well as my heart rate every half an hour. Now I have my cast off of my nose I?��m starting to love it more each day although it can take up to a year to heal. But overall I?��ve had an amazing experience with these guys, the coordinators are so supportive and genuinely care and this company doesn?��t try and sell you the surgery which I really liked! No pressure, fast action, really helpful. Would recommended to anyone who is thinking of getting surgery especially Rhinoplasty!
Dr Kodha was amazing, and I was really happy with him from start to finish.

review_title: I was left waiting for 5 hours without?�?
review_body: I was left waiting for 5 hours without being given an idea of time, the operation happened, I had my blood pressure checked but then discharged without any other checks on myself, incisions etc.
The hospital group looks more like a hotel than a hospital. Everyone's so friendly and do a brilliant job.
Great service!!!

review_title: I would highly reccommend The Hospital Group and Mr Ben Khoda.
review_body: This is my 2nd operation with The Hospital Group and i have to say i have always been very pleased with the after care and support. The pre surgery help and I was always confident in the surgeons doing my operations. my most recent operation i was operated on by Mr Ben Khoda and he was amazing. I did have an issue after surgety as i had a hematoma from doing too much and not relaxing and this was operated on by Mr Mahdi who also did an amazing job. I have to say the care and support from all the staff has been amazing and second to none. I would highly recommend The Hospital Group and Ben Khoda.

review_title: From an initial call which was lovely?�?
review_body: From an initial call which was lovely to a very rude and arrogant sales, pushy lady calling me! They passed me through to complaints, where again a rude lady in complaints - didn't like it that I was complaining! Go figure hey - she works in complaints and doesn't like you complaining!  Steering well clear of this lot! What a shame as the initial call was lovely! NOT A CHANCE...

review_title: Service was brilliant from the start to?�?
review_body: Service was brilliant from the start to finish, the only thing was I wasn't able to eat after midnight and my op wasn't until 4 pm but I survived!

Absolutely fantastic hospital and staff. Had breast augmentation 3 weeks ago and Mr seno was wounderful and very approachable, as were all the staff, from the consultations to the after care. They made me feel at ease on the day of admission and nothing was to much trouble. The after care is brill, and stacey the nurse is lovely. Would definitely recommend this hospital. 5* treatment and care. Thank you ?�Ɂ

review_title: From consultation to surgery and after?�?
review_body: From consultation to surgery and after surgery care I cannot fault the support given to me from the team. My stay at Dolan Park was made as comfortable as possible and nothing was too much trouble for the staff. This is the beginning of my journey and I am looking forward to the new me with the help of the team at The Hospital Group. Tina x
I had rhinoplasty with Mr. Hamadeh on 26th June.

review_title: Delay on waiting room with no?�?
review_body: Delay on waiting room with no communication why there is a delay was too much.

I returned to the hospital group following my first augmentation 12 years ago as i wanted the same surgeon, knowing that the first procedure was smoothe and professional. I was given a care co-ordinator aswel as my surgeon that basically does the paperwork side of things. The surgeon (Renato Z) is kind and professional, knowing his high level of experience, I felt safe in his hands. At bromsgrove the nurses I had prior to surgery and following surgery on the initial day were wonderful however my experience following the procedure was completely different. When I came round from anaesthetic in the recovery room, the man sat beside me watching over me was distracted by two other members of staff showing him pictures on their mobile phone which they were discussing. I kept attempting to get his attention in a half come round state, crying with pain and scared but despite my attempts he continued to be distracted by these two ladies. Eventually when they left he helped calm me down....Since surgery I have felt highly concerned about the fact that a mobile phone has been allowed in an environment where patients are under anaesthetic with little clothing. I have informed staff and will be writing a formal letter of complaint about this. This was an unacceptable distraction and extremely unprofessional of staff members. The only other complaint was the nurse on duty the following morning following surgery, having only had surgery at 5pm the night before, and not coming back into the ward until around 8pm, and also having a caring night nurse, I was shocked to be abruptly asked around 8am why I hadn't got up and got dressed to be discharged for 10am. This nurse, unlike the other nurses i had looking after me the previous day, was very blunt and made me feel uncomfortable like they'd done their job and now it was time for me to go. I even got an annoyed glance when i requested for the times to be written down that i had taken medication in the last 24 hours to ensure I didn't overdose at home. She made me feel like I was in the way. This was not the type of experience I would expect to have when paying �6000 for surgery.... being a mother of three, that sort of money doesn't come easy so I would of expected better care. I had observations done throughout the night but no surgeon seen me the next morning and my wounds were not checked before discharge in any way at all the next morning, despite me asking if they should be. Following surgery I had lots of questions which the ward have answered politely each time I've called and also some illness in which I was readmitted by my clinic nurse, I had an overnight stay with IV antibiotics and everyone was caring and made me feel comfortable. The clinic nurse took out my stitches and was very gentle and calm with me. I was happy with my surgeon and the most of the experience with the hospital group however I do have concerns regarding how I was treated following surgery at bromsgrove. I would recommend Renato as a surgeon.
Very attentive and pleasant staff and surroundings, good experience and would recommend

review_title: Fantastic service from start to finish.
review_body: Fantastic service from start to finish. I am absolutely thrilled with my abdominoplasty, from the consultation with Melanie Hodder who has gone above and beyond to ensure I am happy with the service to the superb surgeon Mr  Seno. The quality of care was exceptionally good at each stage. The information prior to and following has been efficient and consistent. The hospital was of a great standard and staff were a pleasure to be around. I?��m in love with my new tummy and the results are better than expected. Highly recommend mr seno, immaculate stitching and care. Thank you so much!

I received absolutely fantastic treatment from the moment I arrived to the moment I left. From the moment I arrived I found the staff to be very tentative and supportive towards me and my partner. We found them to be very friendly and knowledgeable. We would recommend anyone to use Dolan Park in Bromsgrove from pre op to post op support we have had such an amazing experience!

Great experience at Dolan Park from Receptionists through Consultations to surgery - all members of this hospital were friendly approachable and I felt totally calm throughout my procedure.  I would recommend to anyone!

review_title: Had a very positive experience with the?�?
review_body: Had a very positive experience with the hospital group, very helpful and will answer any questions asked
Third procedure, yet again outstanding service, thank you :)

Very professional,staff were very friendly and aprocable very happy with result ime at early stages yet but have had several checkups.The surgeon was lovely I also have a follow up appointment with him.Mr Borghini did my surgery and I e over the moon with results.The hospital Dolan Park was very clean room and staff were great can not fault anything.

review_title: I am extremely happy with my results
review_body: I am extremely happy with my results. Mr Bhorgini and all of the nurses who looked after me were fantastic, I would recommend this company to anyone considering cosmetic surgery. They made me feel very comfortable during my stay with them at Dolan Park

review_title: Would recommend really good had problem?�?
review_body: Would recommend really good had problem after op and they quickly got me seen

review_title: Comfortable stay and nurses helpful and?�?
review_body: Comfortable stay and nurses helpful and friendly also hospital was spotless which made my stay extremely pleasant.

review_title: Overall a fabulous experience I have?�?
review_body: Overall a fabulous experience I have had a gastric band so have in going support , only complaint which I have made officially is that a member of staff who works in security passed a remark to myself whilst I was outside smoking saying the surgeon wouldn?��t operate if they knew I was smoking I was very upset and taking aback with this comment as I has nothing to do with him as I understand the complaint is still being investigated.
Fabulous in every way. Pre op, post op and the op itself.

review_title: I used the Newcastle office in Jesmond
review_body: I used the Newcastle office in Jesmond, all the staff from the moment you walk in are curteous and friendly.

review_title: From arriving at Newcastle to discuss?�?
review_body: From arriving at Newcastle to discuss having a gastric bypass to today, each and every person was amazing. They made myself and my husband at home straight away. I would recommend to anybody a fantastic team.

review_title: The process was simple and quick
review_body: The process was simple and quick. It was professionally handled and when I had questions I just called up and there was always someone on hand to help me.
All was brilliant,
Excellent experience everyone is so helpful patient and caring towards you for every step of your journey. Couldn't recommend enough
I?��ve recently had breast reduction surgery still very sore! Can?��t wait to see the results a big thank you to dr Ben Khoda ?���

After my experience today with the hospital group and all the other BAD experiences I've had with them, having my time again I'd Never go with them, money is all their interested in, went today for a chat about my band and asked the woman for her advice, she said I'm not here to give you advice I'm here to do what you want me to do , whether that be fluid in or out You tell me, I was furious, she then said if I wanted advice I had to pay extra to see the dietician. Had the band for 2 years and 10 months, never felt supported . This happened at the London clinic on June 13 2018, my appointment was 2.30pm thankfully my sister in law was present, she witnessed the horrible woman?��s attitude.

review_title: I had rhinoplasty at the end of April?�?
review_body: I had rhinoplasty at the end of April the day went smoothly until I was discharged the following day, approaching the operation I had a phone call giving me details of when I should arrive and when to arrange to be collected when to stop eating etc. The following day after my op I was told to leave the room for 9 at 8.30 even though previously I was told to be collected at 11 I rushed to get ready to then be told I could wait in the room!

review_title: I have waited 6 weeks to get a refund?�?
review_body: I have waited 6 weeks to get a refund of my taxi fares! my procedure was cancelled as I was unfit medically to undergo surgery, I have requested a full refund, but initially it was agreed I could have the taxi fare back. But 6 weeks on and no sign of a payment, I have telephoned accounts daily and have just spent 26 minutes holding on before giving up! Unacceptable customer service.

review_title: Fantastic service from day one and?�?
review_body: Fantastic service from day one and excellent after care too . Highly recommend Mr Bullgani 100%
Very happy with my results so far and can't wait for the swelling to go down fully to see the overall work properly.

review_title: I had breast reduction surgery with the?�?
review_body: I had breast reduction surgery with the Hospital Group 2 weeks ago. I can honestly say they have been nothing short of excellent. From my first consultaion to my care at Dolan Park and then my after care back at Liverpool Rodney Street clinic I have felt supported, comfortable and compleatly looked after.

Thw whole process has been a very positive experience from the first consultation to the after surgery clinics. Staff have been very helpful and nothing is too much trouble. Very professional. I would highly recommend this company.

review_title: Had a breast augmentation on the 18th?�?
review_body: Had a breast augmentation on the 18th at dolan park the staff where great very helpfull and freindly and put me  at ease very clean hospital highly recomended
Excellent experience, talented surgeon, faultless professional service.

review_title: The nurses were brilliant and the?�?
review_body: The nurses were brilliant and the drivers were really nice chaps, aftercare is good but the clinic is a long way from home. Made some enquiries about a concern and the nurse was going to email the surgeon, but he obviously didnt reply as I never had an answer, found leaving the hospital so early quite hard as was not feeling too good, but driver was very understanding. Overall all good . One drawback is you cannot get through very often on the given phone numbers which could be worrying.I think a couple of people have said this according to the clinic nurse.
Lovely staff. Help me feel relaxed and comfortable as was by myself.  The drives that took me down and brought me home was lovely and friendly.  They where all happy to help reassure me.

I feel the surgical/anaesthetic care was excellent.
