The room and facilities were also very good although my bed was broken (was tilting to oneside) and when I asked if it could be swapped I was told there were no clean beds available, sadly no offer was made ro clean one.  The nursing staff were all very pleasant but only came and offered any care or support when asked.  I am unable to walk without crutches and I don't feel they were really prepared for any addition support that may be required aside from that of the surgery.  Finally, although very pleasant the dieticians gave little advice and when they did they actually contradicted each other at times.  Overall I am pleased with the surgery and outcome but thought I'd mention the other points as you asked for my feedback.

review_title: I have no complaints regarding the?�?
review_body: I have no complaints regarding the surgeon Michael Payne who performed my procedure which was upper & lower blephaplasty, once discharged & at home I started to feel really uncomfortable in my lower stomach & was struggling to go toilet, my daughter called the hospital group to seek advise, she was transferred though to a nurse who basically said that the operation I had would of had nothing to do with my bladder, & to make sure I drink plenty of water & if my symptoms worsened to call back,

I had a breast reduction with Mr Payne at Dolan park 2 weeks ago, it?��s early days and I?��ve only had 1 follow up so far but couldn?��t be happier with the results, everyone I met from initial consultation to  surgery were friendly and Mr Payne is a brilliant surgeon, he answered all my questions and I felt very safe in his care. Would definitely recommend.

Had my gastric band operation on the 16th May 2018, everything went smoothly and to plan,  stayed for One night at Dolan Park in Birmingham where the staff were very helpful and lovely, it was important to me to be listened too about my sickness after an operation I chatted with the anithertist and my surgeon I was given extra sickness medication and injections for when I got back onto the ward... I wasn?��t sick once! This ment an awful lot to me due to some really unpleasant experiences in the past under NHS care. I cannot thank the hospital enough for changing my life for the better.
Sally is a rude person...so unprofessional...too focus...on money....not even caring...about  the feelings of a future client...

review_title: Wonderful quality of surgery and care?�?
review_body: Wonderful quality of surgery and care and lovely approachable people who listened and helped.

review_title: Excellent from start to finish I am?�?
review_body: Excellent from start to finish I am thinking of booking for another procedure soon!

Recently had breast uplift with implants, from the get go everyone at Dolan Park made me feel so comfortable, patient care Co ordinator Elizabeth was always so polite and very quick to respond to any quieries I had pre surgery, I had seen 2 consultants before making my decision. Mr Samouris was extremely professional and I instantly felt comfortable with him, on the day of surgery I was very anxious as I had expected to be, the nursing staff were so calming and put any worries I had at ease, when i finally come round from surgery I was so happy to see all had gone well I'm 3 weeks post op and I already know that this has changed my life, I had read reviews about aftercare being an issue but I can honestly say that I did not and have still not experienced any of this, I've had regular check's on wounds and the nurse stacey is lovely, any questions I've had are always answered, I can not thank all the staff who tended to me during my stay enough and a huge thank you to Mr Samouris for finally giving me the look I have always wanted! So happy with my outcome. Excellent service with you and would not hesitate to recommend you to others.
From the very start to finish The Hospital Group were great. All their staff made you feel at ease at the initial appointments and confident in their service.

Communication & customer service poor, very disappointed as I thought The Hospital Group was a well known & reputable company, it's worse than the NHS and for the amount of money I spent I expected a hell of a lot more in every aspect in every department. Quite shocked really!

review_title: I didn?��t stay the night in hospital and?�?
review_body: I didn?��t stay the night in hospital and when I asked for the refund for not staying there the lady went all moody and abit nasty and plus the surgeon didn?��t do what we said I wanted I?��m really upset by this I am no way happy as the surgeon hasn?��t done what I asked I wanted to go bigger he hasn?��t done that and was meant to do a uplift and didn?��t it looks a bloody mess

review_title: The experience was excellent from all?�?
review_body: The experience was excellent from all the staff involved from start to finish. Highly recommend.
Brilliant service very professional this is my second visit and would definitely go back again

review_title: The hospital group are very professional
review_body: The hospital group are very professional from the first enquiry. The patient advisors are very knowledgeable, friendly and supportive throughout. Dolan Park is a very nice place, with very high standards of cleanliness and there are great nurses and carers. My surgeon was able to explain my procedure, answer my questions and make me feel at ease with the surgery. The aftercare team and dieticitans are very tentative, they listen and resolve issues/ problems quickly without causing stress.

review_title: Been here twice and the first time was?�?
review_body: Been here twice and the first time was amazing, the second time was not so great, receptionist was rude, told me my 5 year old son was not allowed in the hospital, but had no letter or corrispondance leading up to my op explaining this and after 3 hour drive to the hospital to be told this was not good! Nurses all amazing but feel like I was just rushed in and out, no one really had the time to stop and care, day after op was literally discharged at 8am after being ill most of the night felt a little like a production line, surgeon was fab!! Mr khoda  I highly recommend and cannot fault him, my advice is to give the patient time to recover before discharging, felt like everything was 100 mile an hours literally in and out

review_title: All the staff made me feel welcome
review_body: All the staff made me feel welcome, I felt well looked after and each nurse was down to earth and warm. I would recommend the hospital group to my friends. If I had to make one comment that I didn't feel went too well was the discharge from hospital. I felt the whole thing was rushed all of the medication and was signed off to leave at 6.30am. I was asked twice when my lift was coming, nobody asked if I was ok to get myself dressed or if i needed any help packing. Apart from this I though the care over all was very good and I felt in good hands.
Absolutely fantastic place. The consultant was second to none, nurses like no hospital I?��ve ever been to. Would highly recommend this place to anyone for weight loss surgery! Thanks guys!

review_title: I can honestly say that I am absolutely?�?
review_body: I can honestly say that I am absolutely delighted with my care from Dolan park particularly from the nursing and support staff , being a nurse myself I know what good care is ! My surgeon Mr Richardson has done a fabulous job , and I felt very confident in his surgical expertise. My anaesthetist Martin , I felt so reassured when I saw him and felt very safe in his care ! . So thank you so much everyone. If I have any negative thoughts it would be about the initial consultation we were kept waiting quite a while although apologies were given and it all felt a little rushed . Otherwise I have nothing bad to say .
Very good all round - different class from the nhs

review_title: Exceptional care from start to finish.
review_body: Exceptional care from start to finish.

review_title: A seamless journey from start to finish!
review_body: A seamless journey from start to finish. Standards and attention to detail are excellent and staff are very friendly, attentive and professional.  A very smooth operation and aftercare was faultless.

review_title: First class treatment with my gastric?�?
review_body: First class treatment with my gastric band. Had issues with anaesthetic pain relief in relation to my fibromyalgia. However the nursing staff were really supportive.

review_title: Im currently 2 weeks post op and?�?
review_body: Im currently 2 weeks post op and couldn?��t be happier with my treatment. Dr Payne was amazing and after surgery for the 2 days I was in hospital kept popping in to check on me. The nurses and health care ladies were all really lovely and happy to help. I see Stacy for my post op checks who sees me on time and is really lovely.

review_title: this is my second procedure with the?�?
review_body: this is my second procedure with the hospital... always have the best service ... and after care ... highly recommend

review_title: I found the aftercare service very poor?�?
review_body: I found the aftercare service very poor and lacking after 5 weeks i have had only one follow up appointment and no further contact by phone either although I have left messages.

review_title: Very professional made me feel very?�?
review_body: Very professional made me feel very comfortable even though I was nervous, would definitely use them again

review_title: I cannot fault any part of my journey?�?
review_body: I cannot fault any part of my journey with the Hospital group. Every single member of staff that I have met have been so lovely and made me feel at ease throughout.
My whole experience  was fantastic  , I could not complain about anything. I will definitely  be recommending

review_title: I recently had a gastric band procedure?�?
review_body: I recently had a gastric band procedure with the hospital group and was left feeling let down. My patient advisor from start to finish was not the most friendly of people and i was contacted sporadically by text not phone call. I felt misinformed of some of the aspects of my op. On the day of the operation i was told to arrive at the clinic at 10am. I was taken to my room and had my obs and was given a brief explaination of what to expect that day. I was nil by mouth from midnight and was told that i wouldnt be going down to theatre till 4 so could drink water till 2 hours before. The nurse went to fetch me some water and that was it. I waited for around an hr and no one came back with any water. I went out to the station and the nurses were sat eating chocolate. My nurse then jumped up and apologised and said she had forgotten me! I eventually got my water and waited to be called. 7 hours later!!!! During this time the anaesthetist and recovery drs came and saw me briefly and i saw the surgeon for all of 2 seconds. No one came to inform me what was happening. I went out twice  to the nurses station to be told they would find out but never got back to me.  The surgery all went fine and i was bought back to the ward and on a positive note the 2 nurses throughout the night shift were absolutely amazing and cannot praise them enough. Nothing was too much trouble. Lovely ladies. The following morning i was feeling very sick from the anaesthetic but was discharged home on the most basic of information without seeing the surgeon again.

THG were exhaustive in providing me with a clear picture of the procedure and encouraged me to carefully consider before booking surgery, keeping my expectations realistic.  They prepared me for my surgery - a gastric band fitting - meticulously, informing me of, and then reinforcing at every stage, exactly what I needed to do, both pre and post-op.  I was well looked-after overnight by friendly, highly professional staff.  I'm now just over a week after surgery and, so far at least, the promised support has been there in spades.

review_title: From the day i went to the consultation?�?
review_body: From the day i went to the consultation until the operation and hospital stay everything was very good.

From my first consultation, to the day of surgery, right up until today (6 days post op) there is absolutely nothing I can fault the hospital group on. Absolutely amazing experience - they simply cannot do enough for you, even down to my patient co ordinator Stefanie responding to my messages late on a Friday evening (first day home post surgery- uplift with implants) and putting me at ease regarding my panics about whether my post op bra was on correctly!! My surgeon Mr Mileto was also amazing and has exceeded my expectations above and beyond (I love my new boobs) and from the very first time I met him he was so full of knowledge and what would be right for my body that I didn?��t have any doubts whatsoever, right up to the day of surgery when he came to see me pre op. My room in the Dolan Park hospital was also really lovely, comfortable and well facilitated and the nurses (especially student nurse Rachel and nurse Mary) were so comforting- nothing being too much of an ask. They were both so full of compassion (along with all of the other nurses too) and made my stay at Dolan Park a 10/10 experience.I am from Cardiff and was offered transportation from my home to the hospital and vice versa, and I must say the drivers we?��re even excellent- Alan I think his name was even brought me a pillow and blanket for the journey home. I am so looking forward to a speedy recovery and cannot thank the Hospital Group enough.

review_title: I was so pleased with the service I?�?
review_body: I was so pleased with the service I got. All the staff where very pleasant.  And nothing was to much trouble for them, I would highly recommend them.

I went to the Leeds Branch for a Breast Augmentation and uplift in 2016 and have just had revision surgery (due to my body rejecting the implant) Jodie the Patient coordinator has been amazing. Really helpful and professional. My Surgeon Dr Sforza was fantastic really made me feel at ease and was very friendly. They did not once make me feel pressured into making a decision and they were on hand with any further questions i had. It can be quite daunting the idea of travelling so far for the actual operation however the driver service is fantastic and the staff in  Dolan Park hospital are lovely.
From pre to post op outstanding care and professionalism. Would recommend if you are considering any cosmetic surgery.

review_title: Before the operation I was very?�?
review_body: Before the operation I was very disappointed as the shower didn?��t work properly and it took me the whole day to be seen by me hewin. I was taken to operation around 4.30 5 pm I was very frustrated but however the aftercare was amazing. Mr Hewin was just amazing person put me to ease and the rest of the staff where just great. I was extremely happy after the operation didn?��t expect it to be so good, the nurses where are blessing and very kind. The scars are beautiful. When I left home I never felt alone or lost as I would get phone calls from the nurses and hospital group checking on me always which made me feel very safe and well looked after. Appointments where given and now I?��m waiting for my first appointment. Overall it was a great experience and I am very happy patient. I want to thank them dearly for looking after me so well
Absolutely perfect Dr Michael Payne at Dolan Park hospital was perfect m. Consultation and surgery and after care everything was perfect.
Great care given by all
I attended Dolan Park Hospital in Bromsgrove & it was amazing. It had a calming and relaxed feel whilst also being professional in every aspect. I felt at ease as soon as I walked through the doors.

Would recommend to anybody, everything has gone smoothly. Lovely staff at sheffield & birmingham, surgeon (Ben Khoda) and aftercare. Very happy with my results. Only thing I would say is, there should be more food choice at Dolan Park Hospital. The menus are very limited and if your family want extra food there is only a vending machine. Although the staff very kindly gave my Mum breakfast! You would expect more than a vending machine when you arrive at that big beautiful building for your cosmetic surgery. It?��s a shame there?��s no cafe. Also guest accommodation is needed, for people making long trips for their surgery, instead of them having to book into nearby hotels.

review_title: I would recommend and use again!
review_body: I had a consultation with this company (my third one) and I felt the most comfortable here. I was able to book my breast augmentation for 6 weeks after that I could have had it sooner but couldn?��t with work. My PC was lovely and she answered all of my questions. I felt comfortable with the surgeon which was surprising because I had to take off my bra whilst he measured me and said what sized implants I could have etc, I was a little embarrassed but he was very professional and friendly and again answered all of my questions. I had my op at Dolan Park Hospital in Birmingham I got there for 7am was shown to my room where I had a little ensuite I had a shower before surgery then my surgeon came in to mark me up and I was taken to theatre at 8:40, awake again by 9:45 and back to my room by 10:05am. I had my fiancթ with me so he was there when I got back. The nurses were in and out to check on me every half hour they are all so lovely! I was brought some lunch which I had chosen that morning and after 4 hours and seeing my surgeon I was able to go home again. I?��ve since had my wound check and everything is going great. My stitches come out next week which I am nervous about but I?��m sure it will be fine as everything else has gone so smoothly!
Had otoplasty done by Italian surgeon

review_title: Overall- I found the hospital where I?�?
review_body: Overall- I found the hospital where I had the operation very clean and the staff very friendly and helpful but I feel as though after I had the operation you are left to it, the money was taken and that's it. I feel the aftercare is average, I would of thought having paid a lot of money and going private the after care would be more than it is and would check on you frequently and not just when you have issues.
Excellent staff, very helpful and friendly.

The team at both Nottingham and Birmingham helped me more than they could possibly imagine, they're such lovely people and helped me in achieving the best results. I'm so so happy with the results. From start to finish was such a quick process and they were there every step of the way. Absolutely fantastic company. Would recommend them to anyone. Cannot them enough for changing my life.

review_title: From the moment I met my surgeon to?�?
review_body: From the moment I met my surgeon to after the operation I felt at ease and had constant support.

The hospital group, staff and clinic in manchester is 5 star can not fault them at all..... however ive had better facilities in a "failing nhs" hospital than Dolan Park and therefore since THG use this hospital ive had to lower the stars. The website says bright decor rooms but i had paint chipping off my bed and walls, old fashion furniture, woke at 6am to sort my drains so i can be kicked out (discharged at 8am!) And food choices were shocking...no toast for breakfast...such a basic! As for guests to eat they have a sandwich vending machine!

From the driver to the surgeon everything was perfect. My room was clean and didn?��t expect to have my own room with bathroom. The operation and healing process went as smoothly as possible. I would highly recommend dr Seno he listened to what I wanted and I felt completely comfartable as I usually do not like showing my body. Although I?��d of preferred to go bigger I know my result was the most I could have achieved in the safest way x
Great experience

review_title: The service was very good from the?�?
review_body: The service was very good from the start. All interaction was professional with calls and appointments. A very good experience
Sentiment of review: long may it continue on my journey.

review_body: Excellent good advice and nice facilities

review_title: Surgeon was great, however aftercare non-existent.
review_body: Surgery was great, however it was the aftercare that was terrible and is the reason I wouldn?��t use this company again for breast augmentation. I was the first one in for the day, the next day the nurse who could barely speak English cane in to tell me to get ready to leave and left me to try and get myself out of bed alone which I couldn?��t, she seemed to lack knowledge of the surgery as I couldn?��t even pull myself up by myself as it felt I had a concrete block was weighing down on my chest. I had to wait for my partner to arrive to help me sit up and put my socks on. When it was time to leave, another nurse came in and said ?��you could have gone home last night?�� ... would have been nice if someone had told me. I wasn?��t given any appointment for aftercare, I ended up phoning up and apparently someone should have made me an appointment before I left to go back to my local Bristol clinic for a check up, had I not called I wouldn?��t have know this and as a result had my first checkup later than I apparently should have . I heard you were supposed to have a 3 month check up too but again never received an appointment and because my scars had healed okay (apart from being messy due to infection, probably where my check-up was left longer than it should have been) I didn?��t call to make another appointment. The lady who I first saw at the Bristol clinic was great and the surgeon, if it wasn?��t for the terrible aftercare at the Bromsgrove clinic immediately after I would have rated the clinic 5/5.
Dr. Samouris is a wonderful doctor. I am happy with the results and care at Dolan Park. very friendly team ?�Ɂ
Fantastic facility, comfortable room, with a very good food selection - the whole team can simply not do enough for you

review_title: I had considered a breast enlargement?�?
review_body: I had considered a breast enlargement for a few years, I knew a couple of people who have had one with the Hospital Group so I booked my consultation with them. When I got there they made me feel very comfortable discussing all the possibilities and met my surgeon Mr Mileto, who was very nice! After being there for about an hour I had decided on the perfect size and surgery date and booked it in. When I arrived on the day of surgery I was very nervous but everyone done their best to make me feel relaxed, I met with my surgeon once again before I went down to theatre to go through things again. Before I knew it I was lying in the hospital bed after surgery with the nurses checking on my every half an hour, I was only a day case but spent most of the day in the hospital which was great as I was not rushed to leave. I cannot thank the nurses enough for looking after me as the anaesthetic had knocked me about a bit and also I can't thank my surgeon Mr Mileto enough for doing such a fantastic job! The aftercare has also been very good, seeing a nurse 1 week and 2 weeks after my surgery to check my scars and to change my dressings. I am very pleased with the outcome of my breasts and would definitely recommend the hospital group!

review_title: Absolutely amazing place and people so?�?
review_body: Absolutely amazing place and people they are so attentive and professional

review_title: I would and indeed have recommended the?�?
review_body: I would and indeed have recommended the Hospital group, great service from the start to finish. I have had 4 surgeries to remove access skin all done by Mr Mileto and have been very please every time.

review_title: Thoroughly happy with the service at?�?
review_body: Thoroughly happy with the service at The Hospital Group. From start to finish they were fantastic with me. Elizabeth (my patient adviser) was patient and very informative, The nurses and the care at the hospital (at Dolan Park) were second to none! I was a day case and they were so lovely and kind and very attentive towards me. Lastly, my surgeon Dr Dominco Mileto  - I HIGHLY recommend. He is a man of very few words, however, he knew exactly what he was doing . I had breast enlargement and he did the most fantastic job to suit my shape. He knew my concerns, and reassured me, I am only 2 weeks post op, but extremely happy with me results.

review_title: Was very happy with my stay had lots of?�?
review_body: Was very happy with my stay had lots of help shaff all very helpful clean and good service

I had my bust reduce, from the consolation to the aftercare this experience has been amazing & would definitely recommend this company. A big thank you to Mr Ben Khoda, you are an amazing surgeon & I would 100% recommend you. You have gave me my life back & I can?��t thank you enough, saving for my next surgery for Mr Khoda to do. Thank you so much xx

review_title: So when I first made the call at?�?
review_body: So when I first made the call at booking my consultation was great got booked straight in talked me through the operation etc from booking appointment I thought sometimes info was provided that quick rather than braking it down as a first time surgery person therefore info got mixed up and appointments cancelled. I got the transport which was deffo worth it they where so caring and professional this was what I was most not looking forward to in feeling uncomfortable but was fine everybody down in the hospital where amazing always making sure your ok
Very professional service, really helpful, no stresses and the price was good. Absolutely no complaints

The surgeon, theatre staff, nurses all the hospital staff were lovely, really put me at ease. Put my mind at rest throughout the whole process. And I?��m sure everyone else I see from here on out will be lovely also. Would 100% reccomend. Thank you
Treated fantastic and everyone was there to help

review_title: I would recommend The Hospital Group to?�?
review_body: I would recommend The Hospital Group to anyone, I felt reassured and looked after the whole time.

review_title: Absolutely can not fault the care I?�?
review_body: Absolutely can not fault the care I have received with the Hospital Group and Dolan Park Hospital. Second to none!!!

review_title: Could not fault the staff or the care I?�?
review_body: Could not fault the staff or the care I received during my stay at Dolan Park.

Great experience so far, my coordinator Julie was very helpful, my surgeon Mr Nijar absolutely amazing and I felt so looked after by the fab staff at Dolan Park Hospital. Really pleased I chose The Hospital Group

I had a rhinoplasty in April 2018. Hospital staff & surgeon was amazing. The clinic staff communication could have been better. Overall I had a full recovery and would choose the hopistal group again!

review_title: Overall I'am very pleased with my?�?
review_body: Overall I'am very pleased with my experience. The nurse I had for the time of my stay was very nice and could not do more to help. The hospital it's self was up to a very clean standard and I was given a private room. I did not hear any noise throughout the night. I was attended to very well plenty of tea and biscuits given to me on several occasions after my surgery. My only mishap, I was told to fast from midnight the night before but I was not taken down for surgery until 16:30. This left me feeling quite tired and hungry. The surgeons did apologise for the confusion and I was aloud to drink some water. Small issue but these things happen. And the surgery it's self I am super pleased with the result even though I'm only 2 weeks post opp. So thank you to the hospital group and everyone involved during my visit.

Very friendly staff just not much communication between them. Also it would of been nice if someone spoke to me about aftercare before I left but everything ran very smoothly and professional would still recommend.
Great staff care. I will definitely recommend the hospital to friends.

review_title: My surgeon Dr Nizar Hamadeh was amazing?�?
review_body: My surgeon Dr Nizar Hamadeh was amazing and has done a lovely job , but the over all aftercare is ridiculous staff are rude and unprofessional just dosnt reflect the price I paid but like I said my surgeon was lovely and I?��m very happy with his work.

This company is fantastic. Starting with reception, nurses, office coordinators and doctors all conduct themselves in a professional and friendly manner. I would recommend this company to everyone including my own family.

review_title: Check in was good apart from getting?�?
review_body: Check in was good apart from getting the wrist band information wrong three times and the final correct band being put on when I was on the operating table. That is one key thing to get right!

review_title: had breast aug on 2nd may,all staff?�?
review_body: had breast aug on 2nd may,all staff were lovley, room was clean,really happy with my results so far.a big thank you to mr payne.

Had breast enlargement & uplift with Marcus Sforza in September 2016 & tummy tuck with Mr Mileto in December 2017. Sara, my Patient Care Co-ordinator for both procedures, was lovely. She was extremely friendly & helpful answering any questions I had on the day of my first appointment & also over the telephone & emails. Both surgeons very friendly & profesional, giving me their opinion on what would be best for me. I had both of my procedures at Dolan Park. All of the staff there were helpful & professional, making me drinks throughout the night & day. Nothing was too much trouble. The medical staff explained everything to me & made me feel at ease before both procedures. My aftercare has been excellent. One of my breast hadn?��t healed properly & a hole appeared. The Manchester Clinic had me back every couple of weeks to check on it until it healed completely. I cannot recommend The Hospital Group & Mr Sforza & Mr Mileto enough

review_body: I had a lovely experience at the Dolan Park Hospital in Birmingham for my procedure. The ward staff were very knowledgeable, attentive and reassuring throughout my entire stay. I would highly recommend this company to any person wanting to have cosmetic surgery.
Helpful, professional staff who made me feel very comfortable.

Had the operation 3 weeks ago now and it all seems to be going well, I?��m very happy with how everything went and my stay at the Dolan park for 2 nights after the operation was more than pleasant. Nurses were very helpful and food was okay. My nurse Stacey I?��ve had to see twice since my operation who re does my bandages has been excellent and very professional, I had a couple of questions I was worried about so I emailed her and she rang me straight up and sorted everything out instantly. Dr Payne who is my surgeon seems to have done a really good job but I obviously won?��t know 100% until it?��s fully heeled but he was dry professional and a couple of nurses have said what a nice he done so I feel pretty confident with it, I would definitely recommend the hospital, nurses and my surgeon. Thanks for everything. Patrick

It took me years to decide which cosmetic company to have my Rhinoplasty surgery with. I had been booking consultations from the age of 18 but knew I wasn?��t ready until now. From consultation to booking surgery, the process was quick and easy. On the day of surgery I was asked to be at Dolan Park by 11am, lots of forms to fill out and a very nice HCA named Steve put me at ease with his humor. 14.30pm I had my operation, the surgery staff were fantastic, I was so nervous but felt I was in good hands. After surgery, My partner stayed with me until 9pm.

review_title: I am a few weeks post mastopexy with?�?

The staff in the exeter office Mel h,  Mel and the nurse ( sorry forgot name ) have been friendly and approachable throughout my journey. Mr sano is a fantastic surgeon and I knew he was the surgeon for me the first meeting we had, he was again friendly honest and realistic which I liked, he explained my procedure and answered all questions I had I would recommend mr Sano  to anyone. I booked the chauffeur service Shirley and Alan were both professional and great drivers very chatty and friendly making a 3 hour journey fly by. Both were steady drivers especially alan on the way back being mindful of speed bumps etc. Dolan Park was so very clean I couldn?��t believe it a superb hospital in nice surroundings.  I had to stay in an extra day/night and not at one point did I feel like I was in the way. All staff were wonderful kind and very professional. The hca?��s were very attentive and helpful, nurses again very professional and caring. I would recommend the hospital group I?��m very pleased with my results a very happy customer and should I require more surgery hospital group is the one for me. Keep up the good work.

review_title: Absolutely Fantastic, 5*, Highly reccomended for Gastric band!

He took me there and back and i felt like he was a big part of my day: He was very chatty, made me feel calm on the way there and on the way back he drove so smoothly as i was tender he really is a good man. Rachel my consultant again great at what she does and answers every question you have and always gets back to you in good time. Each and every one of them works so so hard, long hours and the moment you Buzz for help they are there in a flash, very supportive, they help with anything you need, answer any questions you have and constantly check up on you to make sure you are ok both pre and post op so you never feel alone. From the bottom of my heart, thank you so much for everything you have done. Anya :-)
Staff so friendly and helpful.

review_body: Having recently had a breast uplift with implants I can not praise the surgeon?��s work enough but as far as Anything else is concerned I have not been impressed at all,you are assigned a personal coordinator to deal with you pre and post op I feel my one has been useless,my nurse at the post op reviews has been very helpful .The admin side of things has been appalling and any phone calls to them with messages left have not been answered or days later.Apart from the medical staff which is obviously the most important I would not recommend.

review_title: The majority of my experience with the?�?

However would urge you to look into this as I have absolutely no doubt you will loose future business if refresher training is not given in this area and it lets the rest of the team's hard work down.

My only criticism is my aftercare was slightly disorganised at times. They didn?��t have me scheduled in for my appointment, therefore was seen 2 hours late and this did result in me receiving a parking ticket! However my nurse Rhiannon was amazing again! Would highly recommend the hospital group.

What a amazing experience!!! From the moment I got picked up Till I got dropped off everyting was perfect the nurses drivers and esp my surgeon mr alleruzo can?��t thank him enough for changing my whole life already! review_title: Wouldn't go anywhere else Sara shone?�?
review_body: Wouldn't go anywhere else Sara shone the best patient coordinator ever. Held my hand throughout got everything sorted for me made this happen with ease and how I wanted it to be. Jumps through hoops to make you happy. Shes the woman you need to speak to. And very easy to talk to lovely woman. And would also like to praise the surgeon Ben khoda looked for reviews nothing found. Was obviously very nervouse with him being new to The Hospital group was a little sceptical at first. Well there was no need. What a guy Can I just say now, I wouldn't use any other surgeon again i have found him. He is so warm and welcoming, truly wants to help YOU, doesn't just see us as 'another job' I thought I was beyond help. He said I will do this for you. Worked in the NHS reconstructure surgery before and he worked on me and went above and beyond on my tummy tuck. I was botched by a surgeon in the past and thought I was 'unfixable' this guy fixed me. And I can not compliment or rate him high enough. Thanks Sara and Ben khoda. These two here the top Emma B xx

Where do I start, I?��m so disappointed. I trusted the hospital group to give me a breast reduction and uplift due to weight loss leaving them lifeless and empty. I got there early in the morning as intructed and blood was taken. When I got into my room urine was taken several hours later it was my turn.  I went into the operating theatre straight away surrounded by all the surgeons and staff and all the equipment which I found odd. I was told by others they put you out before taking you into the main theatre. I went straight in and was asked to get onto the operating table. I was put out before even seeing my surgeon enter the room ( doctor senno) when I came round I felt good and went home a couple of days later. 4 weeks later I found out I was 7 weeks pregnant ( total shock as I thought I would never carry a child as I was told) I was totally mortified that maybe the surgery had effected my pregnancy. Lucky and quickly the nhs got me seen and everything was fine. But a year on my breath are horrible because of my pregnancy. I paid �5000 for them to be even worse after and my scars are horrendous! I thought seeing as my blood was taken and my urine they?��d check for these sorts of things before major surgery. A total waste of money. I will be seeing a solicitor.

review_body: Very happy with my experience all staff from beginning to end was lovely and friendly.  On the day of my op was waiting round for a few hours more then I was told I would be . But very happy with my experience other then that. My after care nurse mary is lovely and reception lady Mel is always friendly.

review_title: Very friendly and caring staff and ?�?
review_body: Very friendly and caring staff and excellent facilities

review_title: constant cancellations of surgery, surgeon, hospital and city.. Fought for refund
review_body: When I saw the title "The Hospital Group" I actually thought it was a chain fo hospitals, I  went to a local consultation with a nurse in Glasgow regarding weight loss surgery, signed a contract with a date for surgery with a named hospital and surgeon.  I paid �10,000.  I was told I would need a pre-surgery assessment, and appointments with a dietician.  I had some telephone conversations with dieticians about the pre-operative liver reducing diet I was on, and I lost 2 stone in 6 weeks.  During the time I was involved with them, it was nothing but incompetence and a nightmare experience.  When I hadn't had my pre-operative check (and I was on blood thinners and didn't know when to stop taking them) I kept contacting Julie Stansfield who was assigned to me and the dietician who was concerned about this.  Nothing happened.  Then only through me constantly contacting them for an update, with less than a week to go till surgery in Leeds, (from Scotland) the surgery had been CANCELLED and they hadn't even told me!!!  Then I was told I could have another date, but at a different hospital and city, and a different surgeon, and also I'd have to go to meet that surgeon at Newcastle.  They wanted me to travel to Newcastle for the surgeon's consultation, then back home and a couple of days later travel to Birmingham for the surgery with a totally different surgeon.  Then that was CANCELLED and an appointment with a surgeon at Nuffield Leeds was made for a pre-surgery assessment.  When I met the surgeon he said the surgery had to be cancelled because I should have been off the blood thinners (I kept asking them about) should have ceased.  I had to have bloods done then.  So yet again another cancellation due to negligence.  I was frustrated and hurt at being mucked around.  I was told by the coordinator Julie Stansfield that if it was cancelled again they would refund me all my money.  That wasn't true.  They refused to refund me.  The surgeon said he would do the surgery and cut out the hospital group.  However I couldn't get my money back from them.  They REFUSED to refund me and threatened and made me feel intimidated.  The only way to get my money's worth was to have the operation.  I didn't trust anyone involved with the surgery now, and was terrified.  To me, the company had the money and then did not care about the patient.  I HAD to agree to the surgery or loose ever penny I'd got into debt for.  Then I was told I had something seriously wrong with my liver that had shown up on the blood results, and the surgery was cancelled again, and it was demanded that  I see a liver specialist and have scans done.  My gp said it was needless, he did bloods and they were fine, turned out the antibiotics I was on for an infection had affected their results, and they didn't listen to the advice of my gp.  More needless procedures that needed paying for.  I had no more money to see a private specialist, and was therefore in limbo,  I couldn't have the surgery and couldn't get my money back.  I wrote several letters to them.  I also emailed.  Each time they ignored me, and the coordinator Julie stopped taking phone calls from me.  They were in breach of contract I was informed, and also I tried to cancel the contract as it said that you had 14 days (I think it was) to cancel the contract from the date of the doctors consultation.  They refused to accept this blaming me.  I had to go to the Consumer Protection Agency, Trading Standards and spoke to the Care Commission.  Eventually after reaching breaking point this company finally paid me my money back.  The manager who was dealing with me was intimidating, and it felt that the company would do anything to hold on to the money.  I since researched them and found other stories from the media and online about other people who have had challenging experiences with them.  They seem more like surgery brokers who charge more than the surgeon who carries out the operation.  Thousands more I discovered.  I recommend going to a hospital direct.  Read your contract carefully, as sometimes we are so desperate we just sign it and don't check.  You can also be signing that you don't mind being recorded during your interviews.  I lost a lot of money with all the changes of city and hospital for pre-surgery appointments and the operation itself, in hotel costs, lost earning from my hubbies employment etc.,  As I had constant cancellations of surgery, I was on the pre-operative liver reducing diet (which is severely frugal) too long because of the changes to surgery dates.  I lost 2 stones in 6 weeks (diet went on longer) and my hair fell out, despite taking supplements.  My experience left me traumatised.  I needed weight loss surgery for health reasons, and I was let down very badly.  I note the reply below from the Hospital Group says a refund was made promptly.  It was not made promptly.  It was refused over and over again.  I had to write copious emails and letters and make numerous phone calls to an uncooperative manager.  Eventually had to seek advice from CAB, Trading Standards, CPA etc., It was a terrible struggle.

review_title: The consultant and nurse i spoke to ?�?
review_body: The consultant and nurse i spoke to were bith very pleasant.

review_title: On arrival to the hospital everything ?�?
review_body: On arrival to the hospital everything was great . Took to my room by a lovely lady . Then a lady nurse took over , she had lost my notes . I traveled down a few days before for bloods etc . I live in bolton my surgery was in Birmingham . This nurse had also done all my checks for theatre . Time to go to theatre the nurse had lost the check list . Never saw her again after this . The night staff just brilliant couldn?��t do enough for you. The day after I didn?��t recieve my normal medication till I kept asking for it . I have first thing in a morning . I received after lunch . I had waited 3 hours for my water jug to be filled up . The nurse kept forgetting she said . The day after my medication was also not given agiain till after lunch . I?��m receiving telephone calls from the diesticisns every Saturday . Yesterday I didn?��t receive one . This operation has cost me a fortune I do feel let down . The surgeon  and all operating team brilliant . I just feel that some nurses have no idea and let the side down .

(suffer terribly with anxiety) they made me feel at ease. My surgery went perfectly and I've healed amazingly. Thank you hospital group ?�?

And any worry?��s I?��ve had I?��ve been made to feel at ease. There?��s always someone on hand, and ur given choices and option with all aspects of your care

review_title: Operation delayed 7 hours to10.00pm-Referred on to NHS regarding wound
review_body: Having not eaten, and traveled for 3 hours we arrived at the hospital, in good time, for due 3.00pm operation.

review_title: Excellent Care from start to finish
review_body: From the time of admittance I was made to feel very welcome. I was checked in earlier as had come up the day before. But the room was ready so I was able to go straight in before the allotted 3 pm admittance time. All the team here are exceptional in their own way. Nothing was to much trouble.My surgeon Mr Seno, was the best, from discussing the procedure and his thoughts on my breast implant sizes, not at all pushy and a great sense of humor !Theater staff were amazing and made me feel so at ease, can only praise all the team and facilities at Dolan Park. There was no rush on discharge the next day, i was able to stay in my room until my husband collected me at 11am. with nurses bringing me coffee and biscuits! Have had several follow up calls from the clinic nurse to see if i am ok.  Wouldn't hesitate recommending Dolan Park to any one thinking of cosmetic surgery. Thanks again to all the team! xx
Extremely professional and friendly doctors, support staff( nurses & hca's) extremely rude, unprofessional and frankly unfit to practice.

I had breast augmentation with mr samouris at the hospital group. Really pleased with the results! The  service I received was great the surgeon and staff were really helpful and friendly. Would definitely recommend!

Hospital comfortable. Follow up by dietician timely and helpful. No pressure to sign up for operation and clear information on risks and impact on lifestyle. 12 months interest free loan also helped make it m�?re affordable.

review_title: The care I received at hospital was ?�?
review_body: The care I received at hospital was good, however I was very shocked to learn that I had to leave by 7 the following morning. This was not told to me before hand. I felt as though once the procedure was done, I was wanted out as quick as possible which was disappointing.
Can't fault The Hospital Group staff are amazing so helpfull and freindly nothing is to much .

From the first consulatation I was certain id made the right decision.  All staff were friendly and helpful, the surgeon was informative and made me feel at my ease. The hospital staff were fantastic.  The aftercare programme and support was also perfect. I would have no problem in recommending The Hospital Group.

The organisation of our trip / operation/ after care could have been a bit better done by  yourselfs . Staff at Hospital were very good and friendly and professional apart from one member of staff on night shift who was very abrupt which I don?��t think is acceptable when you wake up from an operation, she didn?��t seem to have very much care and compassion and was also wearing hard heeled shoes which are not appropriate on a night shift on Hospital floors as they kept everyone awake including myself . Lucky enough there was a lovely agency nurse working called patience who was very helpful and caring .

review_title: Very good hospital good staff end I ?�?
review_body: Very good hospital good staff end I fell great after surgery

I was due to undergo my operation at Dolan park on 20th of January 2018, initially they told me I had to attend for 7am in the morning but as I was travelling from Liverpool with friends who had other commitments, I informed them this was not possible, they changed my admission time to 10am which I agreed was much more achievable.

review_title: I would highly recommend The Hospital Group!!
review_body: I would highly recommend The Hospital Group to anyone thinking of surgery. The staff from top to bottom were all wonderful. They make your experience easy and comfortable.
the experience was good

From the consultation to the surgery I had an amazing experience with the Hospital Group. I don?��t think they could have made my experience anymore enjoyable. The staff where all so kind and friendly, the surgeon made me feel nothing but excitement when I?��m naturally a very anxious person, and they did everything to make sure that I got what I wanted. It was defiantly money well spent and I?��m so glad that I made the choice that I did.
I went to The Hospital Group for a breast reduction in Jan 2018.

review_title: During my stay at the hospital it was a ?�?
review_body: During my stay at the hospital it was a wonderful experience the staff were brilliant and the surgeon and theatre staff made me feel safe and st ease I would recommend hospital group to all my friends thank you all for a wonderful time
Staff were friendly rooms were comfortable

review_title: I had a good experience and I?��m in the ?�?
review_body: I had a good experience and I?��m in the healing process all the relevant people phone me with follow ups ect

review_title: Nose Tip Reduction - Mr Aristomenis Giannopoulos
review_body: I cannot fault my patient co-ordinator Sarah, or surgeon, Dr Giannopolous. They were both so friendly, making the whole experience feel comfortable, and that I had opportunity at every point to ask as many questions as I needed to. I did a lot of research to choose my surgeon, as finding examples of nose tip reductions (without breaking bones) was quite difficult, however as soon as I met Dr. G, my decision was immediately made. He was honest and told me what was realistic, but understood exactly what I wanted. He made it clear I could see him as many times as I needed to before surgery day, and even though I had tonnes of stupid questions, he answered everyone with care. Couldn't have wished for a better surgeon!
Very welcoming, helpfull and friendly staff

review_title: Gastric bypass Surgery at Dolan Park
review_body: The booking process and availability of both appointments and surgery dates was brilliant.  My surgeon, Mr Nijjar was professional and I had full confidence in him.  There was a number of surgeons to choose from too.

review_title: Mr Payne is an amazing surgeon and is ?�?
review_body: Mr Payne is an amazing surgeon and is very friendly as well as professional. His work is spot on and I am very pleased, I get a lot of compliments on it. His 'receptionist/secretary' was hard to get hold of at times and would never get back to me when promised or requested. The nurses were much better this time too.
Excellent care at Dolan Park

review_title: i am 3 weeks post op TT and lipo have ?�?
review_body: i am 3 weeks post op TT and lipo have had amazing care and after care and always there to answer any questions my surgeon dr alleluzzo was amazing done a fantastic job would highly recommend him
Staff and doctors were friendly and efficient at Dolan Park Hospital.  Will recommend them

This was the second procure I had done with the hospital group and all I can say is that they were fab . From the surgeons to the nurses to the surport staff everyone was very reassuring and kind. Both times a very positive out come and I would recommend them to any one who is looking to have cosmetic surgery . A big thank you to the hospital group team in Birmingham and London ?��

review_title: I have had three procedures done with ?�?
review_body: I have had three procedures done with the hospital group and I have been amazed with the quality of service each time. Everyone from the admin to the consultant genuinely care about you and are so helpful. My surgeon, Mr Alleruzzo, has done an excellent job and i am so happy with the results. I would recommend the Hospital Group to anyone

Firstly I?��d like to say how brilliant Julie is she made sure everything ran smoothly booked everything and answered all the questions I had. The reason I will only be giving 3 stars is that it was Dolan park that was a let down for me the reception area was beautiful then I got taken to my room at 10 to be told my operation wouldn?��t be till 5 I travelled alone so had a boring day ahead once the nurse had finished I was left at 10:30 baring in mind they knew I was alone nobody came in to see I was ok till 15:30!! Yes I know the nurses are busy but felt like I was a burden!! My room was also very dated and should be of a higher standard baring in mind the amount of money patients are spending!! Another huge disappointment is the noisy animals outside the room it was soo frustrating I was just glad I only needed to spend one night there as it would be impossible to rest and relax with the noise!! The operation.. the surgeon did an amazing job and once taken back to my room the night staff nurses were amazing they could teach the day staff a thing or two!! Another downfall from me is that the surgeon didn?��t come back to check your ok or to ask any questions when I asked the nurse if it went ok she said she didn?��t know!! Iv had other procedures done in the past privately and I have to say this was the worst but on a positive note the surgery went fine!! Follow up has been ok a nurse called I had to get in contact with another nurse to ask a question where again I felt like a burden on the phone!! Making follow up appointments has also been a let down I was told I?��d be able to follow up at Manchester due to it being closer to home which I said a Friday afternoon or a Saturday would be preferable but now iv had the treatment I?��m not able to do so.. disappointing!! I think overall I probably wouldn?��t use the hospital group again and should have maybe listened to the negatives but it?��s done now and I?��m here to tell the tale.. maybe if the hospital had a makeover, nurses learnt some bedside manner and the truth could be told before monies are exchanged this would have been a 5 stat review I actually feel I?��m being very generous providing you with 3 stars!!

review_title: All staff were extremely well experienced they ?�?
review_body: All staff were well experienced they looked after me to an exceptional standard,I cannot fault the processes at all, everyone explained exactly what their job role was and what was going to happen.
Polite, professional and friendly staff.

review_title: I had my procedure on 17th Jan and I ?�?
review_body: I had my procedure on 17th Jan and I was a day case.
From start to finish our consultant George and his accompanying staff were fabulous...

From the first consultation right through to my band adjustment appointments the service I received was excellent. Dr Nijjar was my consultant. I had 2 calls from the clinic following my surgery to check I was ok. I had my post-op appointments arranged within a week after my operation. The day of surgery I arrived at 10am and didn't get to theatre til 2pm. However, I was kept up-to-date consistently. The staff were so lovely and attentive. I would recommend THG to all my friends & family.
Everyone was so welcoming. Very caring and attentive. All staff were friendly. Hospital was very clean. I highly recommend this place x
Amazing hospital, everyone is so caring and friendly. Makes you feel at ease, they are hardworking lovely staff.
Professional, reliable and honest. What more could you ask for?
Lovely staff! Treatment was amazing! Thank you very much!!
Fab service so far, kind and friendly staff

I paid for a gastric bypass and transport �8.3k and where given a date for the surgery. I then had my date cancelled 3 times and rearranged. On the day of my surgery I where ?�� forgotten?ѝ to be picked up .. baring in mind I paid �300 for this transport. I then had the operation and where in a lot of pain which I expected but I never expected to be discharged home in so much pain with no advice on eating or drinking. I collapsed 2 days after being discharged and ended up in an NHS hospital for 10 days. I had 0 aftercare for the first 6 days after my operation which I had to research on what I where allowed to eat and drink. I phoned the hospital group numberous times over 6 days to never receive a phone call back. When I finally got Intouch with the hospital group they where in disbelief that I where in hospital and asked to speak to a nurse for confirmation.

I chose breast augmentation after having 3 children and losing a lot of weight! Dr Borghini was absolutely fantastic they look amazing and I feel even better! The staff throughout my surgery and afterwards were fantastic! Thank you for changing my life
I wanted a day case so was really happy that I was first on the theatre list - went down just after 8:30am. Was discharged at 15:30pm.

After 3 children and breastfeeding my 3rd my breasts were an awful 32A I was depressed! I never did have big boobs but they really were awful! I had breast augmentation via the hospital groups Dr Gabriel Borghini! He is absolutely fantastic! I honestly couldn?��t recommend him enough! We agreed on 375cc implants as this is what he recommended for my build I am now 32D I have so much confidence I absolutely love the new me!! He really is my hero!! Thank you so much you have changed my life!!

review_title: Mr mileto did an amazing job on my ?�?
review_body: Mr mileto did an amazing job on my breasts and he is just so charming couldn?��t of asked for a better surgeon ?���?э??ǫ�:-) ?���?���

Today I booked in for a consultation at 11:25. I arrive at 11:10. Given some forms to fill out which I duly did, then handed them back into the receptionist. At 11:45, I ask the receptionist if they are running late, as it?��s 20 minutes past my appointment time. Her reply ?��well actually the surgeon hasn?��t arrived yet?ѝ. Slightly confused by this, I query how long it will be, as I have 2 young children at home waiting for me, I don?��t have all day. She said she would find out, and off she went. When she came back, she said the surgeon is 5 minutes away, but I wouldn?��t be the first to be seen. I queried again how long it would be, and she didn?��t know.

review_title: Such friendly and very helpful staff.
review_body: Such friendly and very helpful staff.

Excellent surgeon Dr mileto ..made me feel at ease . Even came to see me at 10pm at night as I was one of last to go to theatre to check I was alright & check my wounds .. The after care at the hospital Dolan Park outstanding, would highly recommend .. if you could give more than 5 star I would

Brilliant hospital staff were really nice icu staff were amazing but word staff kept forgetting I was there as didn't see them that much even after my operation I had to ask for a drink n some sort of food as they didn't come to my room but apart from that everything was spot on
Efficient and helpful staff. Nice surroundings.

Good service. Friendly staff. I?��m 5 weeks post op and so far i am very happy with the results i have got from my surgery. The after care has been very good and have I felt very well looked after. I would recommend the hospital group to family and friends, and it would definitely be my port of call if i need anything doing in the future.

review_title: I had an uplift with implants with Dr ?�?
review_body: I had an uplift with implants with Dr seno well what can I say from start to finish the experience was amazing nurses who looked after me were amazing and  Dr seno himself was even more amazing and his work is outstanding couldn't recommend enough xxxz

review_title: Great surgeons which is the most ?�?
review_body: Great surgeons which is the most important thing.  Good aftercare too, apart from not being able to reach the emergency nurse on new years day morning.  She told me to attend the Liverpool clinic the next day but then it wasn't open so had to attend walk in centre.    however  since then absolutely brilliant.  The hospital in Birmingham wasn't as nice as I might had thought (been in posher private hospital) and I discharged myself because of noisy cockerels and geese in field next to room.  Not their field.  Food wasn't great either and no fresh milk for tea (carton stuff).  But as I said surgeons have been great and i am very hapoy with results of breast reduction and uplift.

review_title: Very happy with the service received!
review_body: Very happy with the service received, professional and friendly throughout, would definitely recommend
Amazing place fantastic staff no complaints and would highly recommend . Felt very comfortable and welcomed thankyou all i will definatly use again in the future ?�Ɂ

I was really well looked after through my consultation and the surgery. Really happy with the outcome of my surgery will always recommend to anyone looking at getting a procedure as they really listen to your wishes and concerns.

review_title: The care I was given from initial ?�?
review_body: The care I was given from initial consultation, through to treatment and after care was fantastic. I would recommend the Hospital Group to anyone who is considering any kind of treatment.
Im very happy with my result. Great after operation care.
Great reception from all staff. Friendly. After care is also superb

The initial finance process was super quick and I was very grateful I was booked in so soon for my gastric band surgery. When I arrived at the hospital it was perfect, I had a nice room and most of the nurses was friendly one in paticular went above and beyond to ensure I was comfortable. When leaving the hospital I was given a prescription and told I must get these injections and that they will be quite pricey. When I got home I was feeling terrible with the bad shoulder pain, I went to 3 different chemists who did not accept the prescription, I then had to call the on duty doctor in tears and explained the situation, he advised to book an appointment with my GP the following morning. The following morning my GP could see how stressed out I was and gave me a NHS prescription and told me I would of been paying around 80 pounds for the hospital group's prescription.
Excellent.   In 7th week and all going well.   Had my first band fill last week.

From consultation to operation and even at review everyone at the hospital group were lovely. On the day they made me feel at ease and the operation went great! I liked the fact I had my own room at the hospital so I was able to relax after my op with no noise what so ever.

review_title: I stayed here for two nights in ?�?Breast augmentation
review_body: I stayed here for two nights in December following a breast augmentation. I was meant to only stay one night but due to personal circumstances with the anesthetist, my op was cancelled and rearranged the following day. Not ideal so close to Christmas and with a flight involved as I live in Scotland but it?��s one of those things.

Polite and friendly. Clean and efficient. Attentive and caring. Private room with own ensuite. Lovely food at anytime. Great surgery result. I am six weeks post op after having a face lift. It was my second visit as had breast reduction with implants. Well worth the money.

Abserloutly amazing team of people. Beautiful clean hospital. The nursing staff were so lovely and caring and tended to every need. My surgeon was Mr Borghini and he did a fantastic job, I left the hospital feeling a new woman and he made the whole process a breeze and even had a joke or 2 with you which is always good for the nerves. Would most defiantly recommend!

review_body: I had a breast augumentation at the Hospital Group and I would recommend them 100%.
Very professional.  Not had any issues with my breast enlargement. One is still bigger after 2 months and I am told it will settle down. Thanks for a great job x

Good experience all round , from booking to surgeon, to surgery. Efficient and responsive staff and good follow up. Theatre staff were particularly helpful, professional and reassuring, you felt in safe and caring hands.

review_title: So glad I chose to go with the hospital ?�?

I was reading some reviews after I'd booked my surgery a s was abit nervous about it all but honestly everyone down at Dolan park was so friendly and welcoming. excellent!!!very happy!yesssss

review_body: It was a good experience at Dolan park

review_title: Aftercare is so poor yet prior to ?�?
review_body: Aftercare is so poor yet prior to booking surgery multiple phone calls a day ! Almost 2 years post surgery still experiencing pain . The reception staff are very rude and condescending . Not possible to get appointments even when experiencing pain . I was asked if I was happy to go home only a few hours post surgery for uplift and implants as they wanted to close the ward . Forgotten about the next morning no breakfast / medication given i sat waiting for my taxi only for a nurse to arrive and say oh sorry we didn't know there was anyone in this room . If I could go back in time I would certainly not use this clinic . As I am left with bad scars / pain 2 years on not the result I hoped for at all ! Also with regards to the hospital groups response I would like to point out that staff are still rude 2 weeks ago I was told I couldn't get an appointment for 3 months even though I'm in pain with one scar I was met with comments such as "I don't care when the surgeon said he wants to see you I'm telling you " so I'm sorry that excuse is not valid

Recently had a tummy tuck with Mr Mileto couldn't recommend him enough after researching and visiting other clinics I felt very comfortable and safe with him and my results after 4 weeks are amazing!!
amazing experience staff are very friendly and the hospital is very clean!

review_title: first of all can I say that my surgeon ?�?
review_body: first of all can I say that my surgeon was amazing and I would have no hesitation in recommending Mr Allerozzo, he really understands what the client wants/needs.

review_title: The treatment and staff at  the Dolan ?�?
review_body: The treatment and staff at  the Dolan hospital were absolutly fantastic.  My main issue lies with the hospital group in Newcastle, very little talking  information was given, in fact none really, had to look everything up via the internet, however I was given a 2inch booklet to read.

review_title: Nurses are not good treat except Emy ?�?
review_body: Nurses are not good treat except Emy she?��s the best between them

review_title: Fantastic experience but had a slight ?�?
review_body: Fantastic experience but had a slight infection at 5 weeks and was told I could not be seen for a week, went to my own doctor for antibiotics, meanwhile the hospital had emailed me to call them as they were going to see me..probably a slight cross communication but for me I'm delighted with my results so far

The whole process from initial inquiry to meeting with the surgeon, organising the date for the surgery was effortlessly organised. Everyone was kind, compassionate and the level of care I was shown pre and post surgery was faultless. I would recommend the hospital Group without hesitation.

The BMI Blackheath and Chelsfield have been fantastic, can?��t fault their care and attention. However the administration from the Hospital Group has been poor. I?��ve had conflicting information, correspondence sent to me that was addressed to someone else and unanswered messages.

From my consultation to the weeks following my surgery, everyone I spoke to at the hospital group was amazing. I was told all the information I needed and more and was made to feel at ease. My whole experience with the hospital group and Dolan Park was amazing and have already recommended to a family member! Not to mention my results so far (4 weeks post op) I am overwhelmed with them. Dr Mileto is amazing. Thankyou so much.

review_title: I was taken care off extremely well
review_body: I was taken care off extremely well, everything was so straightforward and I didn't have to worry about a thing, I would recommend the hospital group and plan to return to them in the future

review_title: This operation is the best decision I ?�?
review_body: This operation is the best decision I ever made. I have received the best care and support and have been pleasantly surprised how well I have coped with the procedure and subsequent treatment.

Everything was excellent, I wasn't rushed at all or pressured through my consultations and got to meet a surgeon at my initial consultation which other companies did not do. Hospital really clean and all staff very friendly, couldn't do enough for you. Overall a really good experience.
Happy with everything been done

Since my first consultation nearly 5 months ago I've had nothing but great and professional service from the hospital group. I had surgery in November and I felt completely looked after at every step of the way.

review_title: Excellent from start to finish second ?�?

review_title: Dolan hospital room could be nicer ?�?
review_body: Dolan hospital room could be nicer spire is nicer with complementary toiletries also at Dolan they leave you in a room and don?��t tell you what?��s going on

review_title: I have tried to make a complaint about ?�?
review_body: I have tried to make a complaint about the after care I received whilst I stayed there, I am not happy at all

I had my procedure on 21st December. I was told all went well. I went back after 7 days for my nurse check up and saw on the nurses notes that I had had implants over the muscle. In my consultation with the surgeon we had agreed the implants would go beneath the muscle and I had been told everything had gone fine so was very surprised to see this. The nurse was unable to answer my questions so I called the Hospital Group. The woman on the phone said that things can change and that on the operating table the surgeon can decide what's best. This is fair enough, but why did no one inform me afterwards that they had been placed above the muscle? I got a call from the clinic the next day to say I will need to see the surgeon if I want to know what happened and he won't be in for another 2 weeks. So I have now got to go back in a fortnight to find out what exactly happened. I find it odd that it wouldn't be documented on the notes and so someone could explain to me what happened over the phone rather than having to go back. I am really upset as I had done a lot of research before undergoing this and I haven't been given what I wanted and hadn't even been told why not!

review_title: dissapointed with the room and lack of ?�?
review_body: dissapointed with the room and lack of care from nursing staff

review_title: Mr Payne was excellent really friendly ?�?
review_body: Mr Payne was excellent really friendly whilst always being professional. I had my implants removed after having them originally done at another company 8 years ago, I wish I?��d seen the hospital group in the first place then maybe I?��d ive had the breasts I wanted. Mr Payne explained everything in great detail and any questions I had nothing was to much trouble, the staff that looked after me after my surgery were brilliant to. Really have no complaints at all.

review_title: Didn?��t feel like I was going down for ?�?
review_body: Didn?��t feel like I was going down for surgery made me feel so calm and relaxed

review_title: The best experience ever!!! Highly recommend!!!
review_body: I cannot find right words to describe my experience with hospital group!!! It was absolutely amazing and I would recommend it to any of my close family and friends! I first contacted hospital group online just for an enquiry I wasn?��t even 100% decided on my operation at that time, I was just researching, although I really wanted to get it done as after Brest feeding by breasts have been looking really bad for 8 years... I felt very uncomfortable and even my aunty mentioned during summer holidays that even her boobs weren?��t as sogy and she is in her mid 50?��s - I think this had pushed me to do the research.

review_title: Incredible! From the staff to the surgeons!
review_body: Absolutely amazing. I had a breast reduction and I?��m so happy with the results. The nurses there are amazing and they make you feel so calm about whatever your procedure. If I was to have any other procedure done I wouldn?��t hesitate to go back to them!

The Hospital Group are amazing and i recommend them to anyone considering surgery. The consultation answered all my questions and they put you at ease with no pressure. All the staff are great and very helpful and always smile and are patient. I stayed at the Dolan hospital and it's clean and quiet but very welcoming. I don't have a single bad word to say about the Hospital Group or the Dolan Hospital. They would be my first choice everytime.
Surgeon michael payne is amazing. 2nd time using. Uplift of breasts and tummy tuck- amazing results, very honest surgeon

review_title: Look elsewhere......don?��t give this company a penny!
review_body: I was due to stay at Dolan Park hospital for 2 nights after my surgery, during the first night stay I woke up around 5am and needed a drink, I left my room to find a Nursing assistant asleep at the desk, when the nurse woke up she was rude to me and I was told ?��I couldn?��t really make a cup of tea at that time in a morning?��. The following day I returned home due to not wanting a repeat of the night before and cut my stay short. The aftercare was disgusting, very unorganised and was excepted to travel to different clinics after specifically saying before I agreed to the surgery I wanted my aftercare at my chosen clinic and this was agreed in my consultation. I was constantly chasing for aftercare appointments and non had been made and I had been forgotten about. Once the company have your money they loose all lack of care for you. Due to my experience I was told by a member of staff for the company to make an official complaint....I think that speaks volumes.

review_title: I'm dissapointed with the service I ?�?
review_body: I'm dissapointed with the service I received from the dietician before and after care. I was told they would call 2 weeks prior to my op to let me know what I should be doing with my diet. My phone had no signal and they never attempted to call land line or e mail me. 10 days before my op I go for pre op. Nurse was lovely and asked how I was getting on with my diet and had I lost weight. I had no idea I should of been dieting for 2 weeks before my op. Was told if I didn't lose enough weight my op would be cancelled. I then had to crash diet drinking only 2 slim fast a day. I had opted for the gastric sleeve. Anyway I managed to lose enough weight to continue. The day of my op I was told to arrive at 13.30. My op however turned out to be 19.30. My op went ahead and was successful. I was put in my room to totally  come round. I woke as needed the toilet. I called for the nurse and was told I couldn't possibly need the loo as I hadn't had a drink for hrs. At this point I said no I do need the loo and I would go with or without her help. Eventually she relented and helped me to the loo. It wasn't her fault as she told me she was the only nurse and had double figure patients to look after and they were all coming round. I paid �9000 and expected a little more. I was told the next day I could leave.  The dietician phoned me 4 days later and said was normal for it to be difficult to swallow much. I was concerned as I could only manage 1 slim fast a day. As she said it got easier to swallow. I was losing a lot of weight fast. After 6 weeks dietician called. She said I had to eat more protein as the weight loss was probably muscle loss and not fat. I was only eating protein as still struggling to eat enough. At this point she said I had to eat fruit and vege too. The only suggestion she came up with was a protein yogurt yet she told me I was to eat crackers and more solid foods. I do believe she didn't listen to a word I said and was just going through a tick check. Not happy

review_title: The operation its self was done ?�?bypass
review_body: The operation its self was done excellently no fault at all! Although I feel as though the staff at the first meetings fail to provide you with enough info about the changes you need to make

review_title: Great hospital and lovely ward staff ?�?

Excellent surgeon

These really helped alleviate any worries I originally had, and I decided to book my initial consultation. It was really informative, and I began looking forward to my surgery more and more. The surgeon has been excellent, as was the treatment at Dolan Park Hospital. I am extremely pleased with the results despite being only 3 weeks post op! I would definitely recommend THG for any procedures.

review_title: I would an do recommend the hospital an ?�?

review_title: My surgeon instilled trust in me from ?�?
review_body: My surgeon instilled trust in me from the beginning and although i was nervous the trust i felt outweighed the nerves.  5 weeks post op (rhino) i'm very happy with the results.  Its like a big problem i had has gone.  My confidence has soared and i feel more like the me i was born to be.  The whole experience has made me expand as a person and i feel very happy.  Its not an easy thing to go through.  My recovery took a good 2 weeks and the 1st week i did have a lot of discomfort and needed to take painkillers.  I was lucky i didn't need to face anyone for a week or so and i'd advise this.  after 2 weeks I felt better and now i feel almost fully recovered with some swelling and numbness remaining but not noticeable.

review_title: Excellent service from all staff and ?�?
review_body: Excellent service from all staff and parties involved.

review_title: Excellent treatment and follow up when ?�?
review_body: Excellent treatment and follow up when a possible problem was suspected. All staff from Surgeon, theatre, ward, clinic and reception were kind, professional and courteous. The initial enquiry did not go as planned due to someone leaving the post and I was forgotten about. However I am more than pleased with my results. That and the Car park (in Dolan Park) is the reason I didn't do 5 star, please get it sorted; it is a minefield of potholes, anyone with a decent car beware! I would highly recommend Mr Seno, a gentleman and excellent surgeon.

The day of the operation I was very nervous as this was the first time I had undergone a procedure,the staff at the Dolan park hospital were great from the time of arrival till the day of departure the next day.I would definitely recommend the Dolan park hotel ,many thanks

review_title: Excellent the were so welcoming and ?�?

review_title: I had my mastopexy with the hospital ?�?
review_body: I had my mastopexy with the hospital group and met with Melissa  my pc who was so professional and I never felt rushed with my descision , the staff at Dolan Park were lovely and looked after me so well!
