Highly recommended and Sabrina was lovely as my nurse who put me at ease

review_title: I can?��t fault the after care so far but ?�?
review_body: I can?��t fault the after care so far but the pre care when I needed help the most was shocking. As soon as I paid my deposit it felt like I didn?��t matter anymore I had to constantly email or call the patient coordinator for days before finally receiving the answers to my questions. When you are paying thousands of pounds for a procedure you expect better service than this I work in customer service and would never leave my patients waiting days on answers especially when it?��s such a massive decision and you are already anxious about it all. My first appointment with the dietitian was booked incorrectly and two days after the appointment was due I again had to call to find out what was going on to be told that it was a mistake on their part after voicing my concerns the dietitian George was great and really helpful. I was told I only needed to stay one night but when Dolan park called me they said I had to stay two nights even though I had already booked flights home for the day after surgery at this point I was told I would get a call back regarding this and once again two days later I had to chase this up as no one had bothered to call me back only to be told that they knew nothing about it and would need to look into this again I had to chase this for days before I got and answer at this point just days before my surgery I was ready to cancel the whole thing if I hadn?��t already paid the full amount �8000 I would have cancelled but I chose to see it through and glad I did the staff at Dolan Park from the driver to the nursing staff were amazing and made me feel so comfortable and as I said the after care has been great so far it?��s just unfortunate that the extra stress I was put under at the start has left a bad taste in my mouth.
Amazing service from consultation to follow up appointment!!!

review_title: After reading some bad reviews I ?�?

review_title: the after care after i came out of my ?�?
review_body: well the after care in this place after my opp was just god awful i was so shocked after paying all that money as well really would never stay here again my opp did go well and by boobs look fab and thats the only good bit about it. but i was in so much pain they just left me there only till a women come in about 30 mins before i was leaving they put the drain in so far i could not move so was just left on the bed in god knows what shap. when my dad come in he hit the roof. sorry to say i would not stay here again. even going for a cheek up here its like they all so nice tell you all this fav stuff about them and as soon as they get you money thats it like all done sorry but i would not have come back here again i just coulnt but as far as the opp i am sort of happy as i cant really say how they going to look as its been 3 weeks so but the scar is fine im just wating on the one boob to take shap as they look very diff shap at the min
The experience was overall great. The bed was comfortable and I was seen to on a regular basis.

review_title: Amazing service from start to finish!!
review_body: Amazing service from start to finish! Everyone at the clinic were so friendly and helpful, Dr Seno was amazing! I would 100% recommend him he makes you feel at ease and I am sooo happy with the results! He is amazing at his job! I was really nervous and scared of hospitals but as soon as I got to Dolan Park the staff felt more like friends than nurses and I wasn?��t even nervous when I had to walk to the surgery room! They checked up on me every couple of hours and the after care has been really good! Special thanks to Daisy at Nina at Dolan Park for looking after me, Dr Seno for his amazing result, Mary the aftercare nurse for being so friendly and helpful and to Mel for helping me book the op and answering any questions I had without being pushy at all! I love the bubbly receptionist aswell who always made me laugh but I am so sorry as the name has slipped my mind for the moment! Sooo glad I went with the hospital group and would recommend to anyone! Thankyou again!

I came to the hospital group bromsgrove for a breast augmentation. From day one all staff made me feel at ease. Communication was always very easy. Op went really well and my whole stay couldn't haven't been any better. I am so please with my new breasts. Follow up appointments were always on time and again staff were great. Just waiting on my last appointment with the surgeon Mr Payne in a few weeks time. Highly recommended and i have already referred a few friends!

review_title: Mainly my experience has been first ?�?
review_body: Mainly my experience has been first class. Staff are friendly informative and reassuring.

review_title: I was over the moon with the service I ?�?
review_body: I was over the moon with the service I received here, after care and nurses are all very helpful and welcoming and I am very impressed so far with my results thanks to dr zadduchu. Would recommend this hospital to anyone looking into cosmetic surgery.

I chose to have a gastric bypass. The initial consultation was good, the date for surgery was organised but there was some confusion over certain details like the pre-op. I had a dietician call me weekly whilst doing the liver reduction diet which kept me on track but I think that you should speak to the same dietician throughout your journey. I also had some hassle regarding my dietician appointments when they cancelled and rearranged but still called me for the cancelled appointment! On another occasion I waited for a call (which i never received) only to then receive quite a rude email saying I had failed to attend my appointment! I phoned and spoke with someone who reckoned I had been called 3 times. I had no missed calls or voicemails. I had my operation at Spire Parkway mid October and the staff were great.  The hospital was clean and well presented. I had nurse call me from The Hospital Group on my discharge day to check everything went ok. I had a follow up dietician appointment a few days after. During this appointment I was told to do liquid diet for 2 weeks then move onto pureed. A week later i had another dietician phone me and she told me I had to do liquids for 4 weeks! I explained the previous dietician had said 2 weeks as well as my surgeon. This new dietician basically said that it was at my risk if i move onto the next stage too quick. I appreciate that but surely all the hospital group dieticians should be working from the same policies and procedures? I was then told I wouldn't get a call until January 2018 which personally I think is poor service. When you have gone through such a huge lifestyle change (and paid out a large sum of money to have the privilege of having the op done without having to wait long) I would expect more support. Up to now I have not been impressed with the aftercare. In hindsight I wish I had done a bit more research into other companies that offer the surgery.
Brilliant advice
Highly recommend, the nurses especially are fantastic!

Excellent doctors and support staff. I had an abdominoplasty done here and the results are amazing. Its hard for me to believe the results. Both pre operation consultation and post operative care are excellent. I cannot thank the doctors and support staff enough for the life changing contribution!! Definitely recommend
Staff very friendly, helpful and caring couldn't have asked for a better and more comfortable experience would recommend to anyone.

review_body: Take your money then when you have any problems they fob you off!!no one wants to know you after they have your money!!!!reception staff are fabulous.but my surgery was great until my problem came,then I got the blame.been nothing but problems with this company will tell all never use them!!dr mileto well as good as he was he showed his true colours!so not the person he seems to be

review_body: I am 1 week post op mastopexy / uplift with the amazing Mr seno.

Terrible experience. My surgeon was a creepy weirdo who tried to kiss me (Pagnelli) !! My boobs were bodged, my wounds opened up and I had to go back every two weeks to have them bandaged as they didn't bother to stitch them back up for me so I was left with bigger scars than normal. Terrible aftercare. I could hear a lady screaming while I was waiting in the reception area for my

Just spoken to a lady on the phone asking for a price (the Birmingham clinic) and she was really rude, nasty and arrogant. Horrible lady, really do not know how she managed to get a job customer service when she speaks down to people like the way she did with me. She has now lost a customer. Not happy!

review_title: My overall experience at the hospital ?�?was ABOVE AND BEYOND.
review_body: My overall experience at the hospital group was EXCELLENT.

I am now 6 weeks post op following my breast uplift with replacement implants surgery. My surgeon was the wonderful Renato Zaccheddu and what a fantastic result I have and I still have a little way to go! From the initial admission to me being discharged the next day, I was very well looked after by the nurses and all of the staff, nothing was too much for them. I have had previously had surgery with THG and will no doubt be back again. I really don?��t understand why they don?��t have 5 stars all round as I truly cannot fault them

review_title: I cannot recommend this company enough amazing.!
review_body: I cannot recommend this company enough, from the beginning at my consultation with my surgeon Mr Seno/ my patient care coordinator/ Dolan park hospital & my aftercare.

review_title: I suggest you avoid and research other UK providers.
review_body: Please avoid this company. . . In my experience the second they take your money they will not provide you with any information.  I was left anxious and distressed both before and after surgery.  Your named contact will ignore emails and phone calls.  They will demand extra money from you and tell you that if you do not attend an pre-op appointment (with hardly any notice) they will invoice you 25% of the surgery cost and cancel your surgery.  They will outsource your work to the Spire group and then offer you no after support.  They will leave you will open wounds that will not heal and at best tell you to visit your G.P.  The care I got was worse than I feared had I gone to Eastern Europe for the same procedure.  Please research thoroughly and go to other providers.

Terrible aftercare. The hospital group are not interested in you as a patient just the money they receive. When things go wrong they are not interested, no calls returned, emails replied, very unprofessional. The aftercare support team are also rather rude and show no empathy with patients who are having trouble. I would not recommend nor hesitate in telling others about the poor treatment and aftercare I have received.
best best best

review_title: Amazing experience at Thg with Dr ?�?
review_body: Amazing experience at Thg with Dr Michael Payne. Professional and honest always. Super happy with my results I would definitely recommend!

review_title: I had breast implants with professor Marcos Sforza
review_body: I had breast implants April 2017 with professor Marcos Sforza , he did an amazing job ,
Excellent service from my first initial enquiry, my operation and superb follow treatment.
Staff were great.  I was really looked after.

review_title: Fantastic service from start to finish
review_body: Fantastic service from start to finish. Would not use another company for cosmetic surgery.

review_title: I had breast Enlargements and was very ?�?
review_body: I had breast Enlargements and was very happy at first,I had no doubts and believed I was in good hands but when I developed complications and thought I was going to die from dvt ,from the operation,no one was there for me,no one would have a look and give me advice on what to do or any help at all.One lady I rang from the hospital group actually said to me"what do you expect me to do your surgeon is away and no one else can see you"I felt so let down and alone,they were not concerned at all that it was a serious condition and people can die from it!,I work in my local hospital,so I see this in my job.iI felt disgusted and alone and shocked!,I definitely didn't expect to be treated like this.I was also disappointed by the size after and was advised by the nurse to speak to my surgeon,which I did but he just wasn't even listening and wasn't concerned by the fact that I'd spent all this money and didn't get the results I'd expected and hoped for

review_title: Perfect breast reduction but awful gastric banding experience
review_body: I had a breast reduction with THG back in 2009 at Dolan park and had an amazing experience, it wasn't the cheapest place but we wanted it near us and researched my surgeon (Mr Gianni Trippani) the place was clean, food was great, nurses amazing, pre op & post op care was second to none.......fast forward 4 years and i decided to have a gastric band fitted so made enquiries with THG, they were pretty persistent in signing me up but as i knew the hospital & found a local clinic (nottingham) for band fills then we went ahead a few weeks later. again the hospital care was second to none, clean, nurses were amazing, surgeon was great & had no dramas post op....... Till i tried to book in for band fills! nobody ever returned calls or emails, very little appointments in the nottingham clinic with the band nurse despite promises of 'plenty of availability' so had to travel to bromsgrove (40 miles away).....it took 18 weeks to get my first fill, another 3 months for my second, same with the third etc...... yet we were expecting to be 'filled' every 4 weeks so weight loss would start soon after the surgery. 2 years in and the aftercare finishes and i still hadnt had sufficient fills to get my 'sweet spot' so i had to pay for each fill.....amazingly lots of appointments were available then! ....so i decided to take my business elsewhere & found a lovely independent band nurse that took time during my appointment and found my 'sweet spot' in the first appointment.

Surgery was botched with unacceptable scarring and 'dissolvable' stitches that did not dissolve and remain under the skin. Scarring was extensive and unsightly completely contrary to what we were told to expect. The group agreed that the wounds needed remedial work but said that the journey to and from the hospital would have to be at our own expense and that we would have to pay for a new medical record from our own Doctor. My advise would be to stay well away and look elsewhere.

review_title: Very disappointed in the after care
review_body: I am still post op so I can't comment on the final result but I'm confident I will be happy once swelling goes down. The hospital staff and mr surgeon were very nice. My issue with this company is that the aftercare team do not respond to calls or texts in a timely manner or even at all just recently for me. In my case I had a wound open up which my surgeon said required a couple stitches. This wasn't a huge deal for as they told me I could just come down to Weymouth street to get it done. Then I got a phone call saying I would have to make my own way down to near Birmingham (120 miles approx each way). When you pay for your surgical procedure it comes with transport to and from the hospital. On the day of my surgery I made my own way down. I asked if they would be able to provide me transport to the hospital for the stitches which they declined as transport was only for people going in to have surgery. I felt they could have been abit more lenient as I hadn't used their services the first time so it's not costing them any further expense. Potential customers need to be aware that any minor medical procedure post op will have to be done at Dolan park hospital. Having to travel so far for something basic as a stitch is really frustrating and inconvenient.
